prasiddha dhaarmika mandira chandananaathako mukhyamurti haraaeko tina warsapachhi phelaa pareko chha mandirabaata chorieko kariba kilo chaandiko dattaatrayako mukhya murti khetako alimaa bhetieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jumlaale janaaeko chha

aja bihaana chandananaatha nagarapaalikaako daanasaanghu bhanne thaaunmaa khetako alimaa bewaarise awasthaamaa phelaa pareko ho sthaaniya lokendra hamaalale khetako alimaa murti dekhepachhi mandira ra praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

murti bhetiepachhi prahari ghatanaasthala pugeko chha muchulkaa uthaaisakepachhi mandiramaa punahsthaapanaakaa laagi tayaari garine chandananaatha bhairawanaatha guthi wyawasthaapana samitikaa upaadhyaksa dayaadatta khatrile jaanakaari die murti chori hundaa tyasabelaa jumlaamaa andolana charkieko thiyo

durghatanaa nyunikarana abhiyaanaswarupa jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya nawalapurale suru gareko sawaarisaadhana jaanchakaa kramamaa chaara wataa chorikaa motarasaaikala baraamada garekaae chha jillaako bhitri sadakakhandamaa praharile jaanchalaai tiwrataa diesangai ekai dinamaa chaara wataa motarasaaikala baraamada bhaekaa hun

jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya nawalapurakaa pramukha prahari niriksaka munendra thaapaakaa anusaara jillaako bhitri sadakamaa chorikaa motarasaaikala badhi gudna thaalekaa chhan bhaaratiya simaawarti bajaara najikai bhaekaale yahaan chorikaa motarasaaikala badhi gudne garekaa hun thaapaale bhane durghatanaamaa chorikaa motarasaaikala prayoga bhaeko anusandhaanamaa paaiepachhi tyastaa sawaarisaadhana niyantranako rananiti liekaa haun gandaki pradesamai sabaibhandaa badhi durghatanaa hune jillaa nawalapuramaa durghatanaa nyunikaranakaa laagi traaphika praharile suru gareko abhiyaanakaa kramamaa chaara wataa choriko motarasaaikala baraamada garieko thaapaale bataae

haamile jillaako bhitri sadakamaa sawaarisaadhana jaanchalaai kadaai garna thaalekaa chhaun thaapaale bhane haamro jaanchakaa kramamaa ekai dina chaara wataa choriko motarasaaikala niyantranamaa lina saphala bhayaun traaphika praharile sawaarisaadhana jaancha gareko thaahaa paaepachhi chaalakale motarasaaikala chhodera bhaagne gareko thaapaale bataae nawalapura traaphika praharile baa pa nambarako enaesa palsara ana testa lekhieko ketiema duka se pa nambarako sisiko kaalo palsara ra lu pa nambarako enaesa palsara ekai dinamaa baraamada garna saphala bhaeko thaapaale bataae

tyastai sawaarisaadhana jaanchakaa kramamaa maadakapadaartha sewana gari sawaarisaadhana chalaaune sawaari chaalaka anumatipatra winaa ra helmeta nalagaai motarasaaikala chalaaune wyaktiharu dherai bhetieko thaapaale bataae helmeta ra sawaarisaadhana anumatipatra nabhaekaa wyaktiko motarasaaikala niyantranamaa liera jariwaanaa garepachhi uniharuko abhibhaawakalaai sawaarisaadhana bujhaaune gareko thaapaale jaanakaari die kariba kilomitara raajamaarga bhaeko nawalapuramaa gandaki pradesakai sabaibhandaa badhi durghatanaa hune gareko chha raasasa

pakraau parnemaa lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaa laganakhela basne barsa ko binoda wika ra bhaaratakaa arkaa eka warsiya baalaka rahekaa chhan kirtipura nagarapaalikaa puspalaala paarkasthita eka ghara nirmaanako laagi chaahine saamaagri phalaame tekaaharu chori gareko awasthaamaa saamaana ra baacha nambarako diai haatti gaadisahita praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parnemaa jillaako basabariyaa gaaunpaalikaa dhanagadhaa gunarwaa tolakaa warsiya rohitakumaara saaha rahekaa chhan budhabaara raati kariba baje haripura nagarapaalikaa pachagachhiyaamaa laageko maaghi melaa bharera ghara pharkidai garekaa eka janaalaai raniyaa gaaunmaa niyantranamaa lii lutapaata gardai gardaa praharile saahalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile kailaalibaata bhaaratako nayaandillibaata chori gari lyaaeko laakha bhaaratiya rupaiyaasahita tinajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha ja

praharikaa anusaara uniharule ukta rakama nayaandillisthita wisaala agrawaalako gharabaata chori garekaa thie kailaalikaa diesapi daksakumaara basnetakaa anusaara chorieko rakamabaare bhaaratiya dutaawaasale nepaala praharilaai jaanakaari garaaeko thiyo

kaathamaadaum naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa sthita deraa gari basne makawaanapura thaahaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaeki warsiyaa bholaa kumaari bidaariko kothaabaata nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ra sunakaa bibhinna gahanaa tathaa sohi gharamaa gharamaa deraa gari basne sarlaahi warahawaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa kula bahaadura sresthako kothaabaata nagada tathaa sunakaa bibhinna gahanaa gari duwai janaako kothaabaata gari kariba laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala budhabaara saanjha chori bhaeko chha

lalitapura lalitapura nagarapaalikaa paatanadhokaa deraa gari basne lamajuna sundarabajaara ghara bhaeki warsiyaa ambikaa duwaadiko kothaabaata budhabaara saanjha kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala chori bhaeko chha

praharile kaathamaadaumbaata motarasaaikala chori gardai gareko awasthaamaa mumgalabaara eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parnemaa kaabhre timaala gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya yuwaraaja taamaana rahekaa chhan

unalaai mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaa teku ra mahaanagariya prahari waritta swayambhubaata khatieko sumyukta prahari tolile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa chaumatisthita sadakabaata pradesa nambara pa nambarako motarasaaikala chori doryaaera lyaai raheko awasthaamaa pakraau gareko ho
mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaalewibhinna samayamaa kaathamaadaun upatyakaamaa haraaekaa motarasaaikala khoji gari sambandhita dhanilaai bujhaaeko chha

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale upatyakaako anaamanagara taalchhikhela pasupati baagadola teku basundhaaraa nyuroda nayaan baaneswaralagaayata ksetrabaata haraaekaa motarasaaikala khoji gari sambandhita dhanilaai bujhaaeko ho
mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha prahari waristha upariksaka bhimaprasaada dhakaalale sawaari saadhana haraaeko niwedanakaa adhaaramaa khojera sambandhita dhanilaai jimmaa lagaaieko jaanakaari die

kirtipura nagarapaalikaa puspalaala paarkasthita baaraa gadhimaai nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya jimaa laala yaadawako nirmaanaadhina gharabaata phalaamako dandi chori gardai gareko awasthaamaa lalitapura mahaankaala gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya winoda wiswakarmaalaai sanibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko haae

ukta gharamaa baa cha nambarako gaadi prayoga gari kariba saya kilo phalaamako dandi chordai gareko awasthaamaa mahaanagariya prahari waritta kirtipurabaata khatieko praharile phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile kaathamaadaunsthita eka daansabaarabaata bhaaratiya naagarikalaai lutapaata gareko aropamaa chaara janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaum budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kapana milanachoka basne saru achaaryako gharabaata nagada tathaa sunakaa wibhinna garagahanaaharu sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala budhabaara diunso chori bhaeko chha

kaathamaadaum tokhaa nagarapaalikaa sthita morana parwata dhaulaagiri gesta haausako kothaa nambara maa basne ilaama panjali ghara bhaeko madhumaayaa taamaanako nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ra mowaaila sameta gari laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala budhabaara saanjha chori bhaeko chha
baaraako kolhawi nagarapaalikaa kaa gauri sumkara chaudharilaai ghatanaa bhaeko warsapachhi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kolhawiko prahari tolile budhabaara pakraau gareko ho

chaudharilaai jillaa adaalata baaraamaa prastuta gariekomaa adaalatako adesale kaida bhuktaanako laagi kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya wiragumja parsaa pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaeko chha
bhojapurakaae bhojapura nagarapaalikaa siddeswarasthita wadaa kaaryaalayamaa chori bhaeko chha
ghatanaako wisayamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurale janaaeko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itaharile bibhinna sthaanabaata haraaekaa ra chori bhaekaa bibhinna braandakaa thaana mobaaila phelaa paari sambandhi mobaaila dhanilaai bujhaaeko chha

mowaaila haraaune tathaa chori hune gareko jana gunaaso badhepachhi praharile mowaaila khojatalaasa abhiyaana sumchaalana gareko thiyaae anya phelaa naparekaa mowaailako khojatalaasa tathaa anusandhaana kaarya bhai raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itaharile janaaeko chha
nepaala praharile raajadhaanikaa wibhinna sthaanabaata motarasaaikala chori garne janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa kirtipurakaa madana taamaana chitawanakaa soma sunaara ra sandipa guruna makawaanapurakaa santosa gole nawalaparaasikaa bharata thaapaa chandraagirikaa rinjena moktaana kaabhrepalaanchokakaa indrabahaadura taamaana ra ganaesa laamaa sindhulikaa wikrama bhujela bardiyaakaa raaju paudelalagaayata chhan

warittakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka chhedulaala kaamatile ekaanta sthaanabaata motarasaaikala chori garne girohalaai pakraau garieko jaanakaari die chori muddaa dartaa garera uniharumaathi anusandhaana bhairaheko warittale janaaeko chha

makawaanapura praharile gahanaa chori garera bhaagdai garekaa ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha praharile gaeraati chori garera bhaagdai gareko awasthaamaa hetaundaa basne warsiya saajana paraajulilaai pakraau gareko ho

hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita gaurikumaara mainaali basdai aeko gharamaa chori bhaeko bhanne khabara paaunaasaatha wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya hetaundaabaata prahari niriksaka iswariprasaada bhandaariko netaritwamaa khatigaeko tolile saamaana chori gari bhaagdai gareko awasthaamaa paraajulilaai pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
paraajulilaai aja jillaa adaalatabaata chori muddaamaa myaada thapa gari awasyaka anusandhaana tathaa kaarawaahi bhairaheko janaaieko chha
praharile dhaadinabaata chorimaa sumlagna raheko abhiyogamaa ekajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

jillaakaae benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa charaudisthita karisi sahakaari sumsthaa limitedabaata gata mumsira gate bhaeko choriko ghatanaamaa sumlagna raheko abhiyogamaa sohi gaaunpaalikaa basne chitawana raapti nagarapaalikaa lothara ghara bhaekaa niraja chepaanalaai mumgalabaara praharile pakraau gareko haae

ukta sahakaari sumsthaabaata nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan chori bhaeko ghatanaamaa sumlagna wyaktiko khoji garne kramamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinabaata khatieko praharile chepaanalaai benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa benighaatabaata nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

saathai chepaanale benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa sthita dewa wikaasa baimkako dhokaako taalchaa phutaai choriko prayaasa gareko anusandhaanabaata khulna aeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinale janaaeko chha
praharile daanako ghoraahibaata jhandai laakha bhaaratiya rupaiyaansahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

baraalale kinnu agaadi testa raaida garne bhanepachhi subbaale sahajai hunchha bhane testa raaidamaa gaeko wyakti nikai samaya naaepachhi unalaai motarasaaikala chori bhaeko asankaa bhayo ra tatkaalai mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaunmaa khabara gare

paisaa chori garnelaai pakraau garne kramamaa ukta motarasaaikala phelaa pareko parisarakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka howindra bogati bataaunchhan baimkamaa lutapaata garne ra motarasaaikala chorimaa anjana sakriya dekhieko unale bataae usale yasaaghi pani testaraaidakai naamamaa patakapataka motarasaaikala chori gareko phelaa pareko chha

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaakaa anusaara yastaa ghatanaa belaabelaamaa dekhieko ra nayaan motarasaaikala haraaune gareko janaaeko chha budhabaaramaatrai bhetiekaa motarasaaikalamaa kehi nayaan motarasaaikalasameta thiyo mahaasaakhaakaa prahari upariksaka rawi paudelale saaunadekhi ahilesamma motarasaaikala phelaa paarera dhanilaai bujhaaieko bataae

praharile kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa chamatisthita kaabhre temaala gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa ramesa rasaailiko hyaandikraapta kaarakhaanaabaata pittala tathaa kaathakaa wibhinna ghanti bajra lagaayatakaa saamaanaharu chori gareko aropamaa uniharulaai pakraau gareko haae

tokhaa nagarapaalikaa ganaesa thaana mandira najikai deraa gari basne okhaladhumgaa katunje gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaeki warsiyaa arati bistako kothaabaata nagada tathaa sunakaa bibhinna garagahanaa sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala chori bhaeko haae

gumbaako sepha tina warsadekhi kholieko thiena uhaanle daanapetikaamaa laakhaun rupaiyaan raheko bataaunubhayo bihaana baje gumbaamaa pujaa garna jaane kramamaa chori bhaeko thaahaa bhaepachhi praharilaai khabara garieko thiyo
motarasaaikala chori muddaamaa gharauti bujhaaera chhutekaa girohakaa naaikesahita chaara janaalaai makawaanapura praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa baaraa nijagadha kaa warsiya jnaanendra chaudhari rautahata gujaraa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raajakapura chaudhari baaraako kolbi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya niranjana chaudhari ra dhiraja chaudhari chhan

kaathamaadaumtaarkeswara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa hiraa tiwaari sarmaako gharamaa kohi nabhaeko awasthaamaa nagada tathaa sunakaa wibhinna garagahanaa sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala budhabaara diunso chori bhaeko chha

bhaktapura suryawinaayaka nagarapaalikaa adarsachoka basne warsiya jagataraama tawaatiko gharabaata nagada tathaa sunakaa bibhinna garagahanaa sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala somabaara saanjha chori bhaeko chha

widyuta chori niyantrana tolile baaraabaata widyuta chorimaa sumlagna janaalaai pakraau gareko chha widyuta praadhikarana kalaiyaa witarana kendrakaa karmachaari ra prahariko sumyukta tolile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

mahaagadhimaai nagarapaalikaako patrahati rauwaahi telakunwaa inarwaa bariyaarapura kanchanapura lagaayatakaa sthaanabaata uniharulaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaeko chha
bhaaratabaata chorikaa gaadi nepaala lyaaera bechne girohakaa dui janaalaai praharile kalankibaata pakraau garekaae chha

kaathamaadaun taarakeswara nagarapaalikaasthita goladhungaa basne gorakhaakaa warsiya mukundaprasaada pudaasaini ra surkhetako wirendranagara nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaumko kaabhresthali basne warsiya dipakabahaadura budhaa rahekaa chhan
praharile uniharukaae saathabaata baacha ra baacha numko skarpiyo baacha numko niji kaara ra di elasi e jeda bhaaratiya nambarako kretaa gaadi baraamada gareko chha

kaarkile ukta mandirako baakasa ra ghanti chori gardai gareko awasthaamaa sthaaniyawaasile phelaa paari praharilaai khabara gare paschaata mahaanagariya prahari waritta thimibaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho

bhaktapurakaageswari manoharaa nagarapaalikaa sthita deraa gari basne dhaadina galchhi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya nawaraaja magarako kothaabaata nagada tathaa sunakaa garagahanaa sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala budhabaara diunso chori bhaeko chha
naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa sitaapaailaathista kumaari mandira najikai gowinda kesiko gharabaata paancha laakha rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala chori bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
gorakhaa nagarapaalikaa wadaa namwara dhanubaasekaa dhurawa bhatta ra saaradaa lamichhaaneko gharamaa budhabaara saanjha chori bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
traaphika praharile wibhinna samayamaa kaathamaadaun upatyakaamaa haraaekaa motarasaaikala ra eka kaaralaai khoji gari sambandhita dhanilaai bujhaaeko chha

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale upatyakaako wasantapura koteswara naikaapa thaapaagaanu swayambhu tribhuwana siksana aspataala gongabu saamaakhusi paatana lubhu baalakumaarilagaayata ksetrabaata haraaekaa motarasaaikala ra kaara khoji gari sambandhita dhanilaai bujhaaeko ho

mahaasaakhaale raama thaapaa ganaesa khakurela atula maharjana nawaraaja dangola sanjaya boharaa subhaasakumaara srestha raamaprasaada gautama hiraakaaji maharjana besika gautama rupaka saakya suryaprakaasa thaakura kiranakumaara thaapaa rosana nagarakoti raakesa taamaana sudarsana ghimire rondo taamaana arjunaraaja sedhaai sandesa kaarki sawinaa taamaanako motarasaaikala tathaa kaara khojera bujhaaeko ho
mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha prahari waristha upariksaka bhimaprasaada dhakaalale sawaari saadhana haraaeko niwedanakaa adhaaramaa khojera sambandhita dhanilaai jimmaa lagaaieko jaanakaari die

upatyakaabaata haraaekaa adhikaamsa motarasaaikala tathaa kaara upatyakaa baahira laijaane gareko mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha mahaasaakhaale chaalu arthika warsamaa maatra haraaekaa motarasaaikala phelaa paarera sambandhita dhanilaai jimmaa lagaaisakeko chha
praharile kaathamaadaumko bauddabaata nakkali suna dekhaaera lutapaata garne eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa raamechhaapa khaandaadewi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya wisaala laamaa rahekaa chhan praharile laamaalaai bauddha nayaan bastibaata pakraau gareko haae

parsaa biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa resamakotisthita eutai gharamaa basne binoda kumaara guptaa ra manoja kumaara guptaako chhuttaachhuttai kothaabaata aitabaara raati gharamaa kohi nabhaeko awasthaamaa duwai janaako gari nagada laakha rupaiyaan ra kariba tolaa baraabarakaa sunakaa gahanaa chori bhaeko chha
mahango gaadi liera nepaala pasi chori garne eka bhiaipi bhaaratiya choralaai jhaapaa praharile pakraau garekaae chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya wirtaamodako sumyukta prahari tolile bhaarata silagadikaa warsiya raghubaraprasaada saahalaai pakraau gareko haae

saaha nepaala bhaarata simaawarti jillaa jhaapaa sunasari ra moranakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa chorimaa sumlagna raheko khuleko chha pakraaupachhi sukrabaara chorimaa sumlagna saahalaai praharile saarwajanika gareko ho

mahumgo gaadi chadhera nepaala aune dhanaadhyaharuko ghara reki garne ra kohi nabhaeko maukaa paari chorne gareko bhetieko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya pramukha esapi dinesa mainaalile bhane saahale chori garekai rakamabaata laakha parne gaadi chadheko sameta anusandhaanabaata khuleko chha
nepaala kamyunista paarti nekapaa kaa saamsada raajendra gautamako kaathamaadaumsthita niwaasabaata nagada ra garagahanaa chori bhaeko ho

saamsada gautamako ghara chori bhaepachhi bihibaarai mahaanagariya prahari baritta tinakune ra nepaala prahariko siaiwi toli ghatanaasthala pugera muchulkaa tayaara paarera awaasyaka anusandhaana suru gareko janaaeko chha

pakraau parneharumaa sindhupaalchoka balephi ghara bhai lalitapura imaadola baste sujana taamaana kaabhre bethaanachoka ghara bhai haala lalitapura mahaalaksmi basne sumana alemagara ra makawaanapura kulekhaani ghara bhai lalitapura raataa makaichoka basne suraja taamaana rahekaa chhan

uniharule sukrabaara koteswarabaata jaawalaakhela jaandai gareko baa kha nambarako basamaa sawaara rahekaa kaabhre sthaayi ghara bhaekaa mumgala bahaadura lopchanalaai basabhitra gheraa haali dhamki diera hajaara rakama lutekaa thie
rakama lutiepachhi lopchanale turuntai praharilaai khabara garekaa thie khabara paaelagattai chekajaancha garne kramamaa basalaai praharile saatadobaatobaata niyantranamaa lieko thiyo

gorakhaa enda baraaha jwelarsa indastrija praalimaa kaama garne bhaarata kalakattaa ghara bhai haala kaaski pokharaa nyuroda basdai aekaa kariba warsiya ranjana raajawumsi pharaara raheko tolaa suna liera pharaara raheko praharile janaaeko chha
budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa khadkaa gaaunsthita netra prasaada guraagaaiko gharabaata kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako sunakaa bibhinna gahanaa chori bhaeko chha

saptariko rupani gaaunpaalikaa raamapurasthita wiseswara yaadawako gothamaa baandheko bhainsiko dori kholera chori gardai gareko awasthaamaa praharile somabaara saanjha tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

bhaimsi chori gardai gareko awasthaamaa saptariko bodebarsaaina nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya mo raphila miyaanlaai niyantranamaa liieko chha unalaai niyantranamaa liera sodhapuchha gardaa praharilaai anya saathisameta chorimaa sumlagna raheko bhani bayaana diekaa adhaaramaa thapa duilaai pakraau garieko prahari naayaba upariksaka tilaka bhaaratile bataae
