luteraaharuko samuhale kaathamaadaumbaata mahottaritarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarakobasamaa lutapaata garekaa hun

ghatanaabaare khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya nijagadhabaata prahari niriksakako kamaandamaa gaeko tolile luteraamadhye eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha anya pharaaraharuko khoji bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapuramaa jethamaa ghimireko pasalamaa laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako maalasaamaana chori bhaeko bhandai niwedana pareko thiyo

ghimirele praharilaai laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaako boraa waairinako taara elaidi balba elaidi batti pumkhaasahita kehi nagada sameta gari kariba laakhakaae dhanamaana chori bhaeko bhandai praharimaa ujuri garekaa thie

ukta jwelarsabaata sunakaa gahanaaharu chori gari wyakti pharaara bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasaribaata khatieko praharile anusandhaana garne kramamaa alamalaai niyantranamaa lii unako ghara talaasi gardaa chori gareko ukta sunakaa gahanaaharu thaana phelaa paareko ho
praharile sunasari jillaa adaalatabaata budhabaara dinako myaada anumati lii yasa sambandhamaa awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha

wadaa kaaryaalayako jhyaala phodi kaaryaalayamaa raheko mowaaila thaana lyaapatapa thaana elaidi thaana ra saanti suraksaa bharpaai pustikaa chori gariraheko awasthaamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya paato saptaribaata khatieko praharile phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

kaathamaadaum puraano baaneswaramaa deraa gari basne ilaama naamataalima ghara bhaekaa sunila dhakaalako kothaabaata nagada laakha ra sunako bibhinna gahanaa sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala sanibaara belukaa chori bhaeko chha

dhanusaa janakapura ghara bhai kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa gaurighaata deraa gari basne warsiya parasuraama khanaalako kothaabaata budhabaara saanjha nagada laakha rupaiyaan ra sunako adhaa tolaako mumgalasutra sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala chori bhaeko chha
mahaanagariya prahari wita mulapaanibaata khatieko prahari taaelile suna chaandi pasalako satara phoddai gareko awasthaamaa janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

kaathamaadaumkaae naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa gaihri gaanusthita khuma bahaadura baidawaarako ghara tathaa sohi gharamaa daraa gari basneharuko kothaabaata suna tathaa chaandikaa wibhinna gahanaa ra nagada sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala somabaara diunso chori bhaeko chha

chori bhaekaamadhye khuma bahaadurako gharabaata tolaa sunakaa gahanaa ra nagada hajaara rupaiyaan tathaa deraa gari basneharu dhaadinakaa warsiya ramesa luitelako kothaabaata sunakaa gahanaa tolaa chaandikaa gahanaa tolaa nagada hajaara rupaiyaan tathaa sarlaahikaa warsiya minu ghalaanako kothaabaata nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ra sindhulikaa phuna bahaadura ranauliko kothaabaata chaandiko paau chori bhaeko ho

sresthale ghaantimaa lagaaeko tolaako sunako sikri somabaara saanjha lutapaata bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha baatomaa himdiraheko awasthaamaa haala nambarako nakhuleko nilo rumgako motarasaaikalamaa aekaa aparichita wyaktiharulegalaabaata sikri lutera pharaara bhaekosresthako bhanaai uddharita gardai prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale jaanakaari dieko chha
daksina parwatamaa gharamaa kohi nabhaeko maukaa paarichori tathaalutapaata kaaryamaa sumlagna dui janaalaaipraharile pakraau gareko chha

painyu gaaunpaalikaa sthita chetakumaari aleko gharamaa kohi nabhaeko maukaa paari raanihaara eka thaana bataare baalaa eka thaana chhaape aunthi eka thaana chandramaa eka thaana jhumkaa dui thaana windiyaa eka thaana beruwaa aunthi eka thaana ra sikri eka thaana chori garne kaaryamaa sumlagna painyu gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya naaraayana ale ra warsiya soma raanaalaai ilaakaa praharile pakraau gareko haae

budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kapana siwamandira basne sindhupaalchoka tripuraasundari gaaunpaalikaa ki atmaa ghimireko kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa saraswatinagarasthita modala traansapharmesana mobaaila haausabaata sukrabaara bihaana kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako bibhinna kampanikaa thaana mobaaila chori bhaeko chha
himaali jillaa dolpaako eka yaarsaapaatanabaata abaidharupamaa yaarsaagumbaa chori garna paatana chhirekaa janaataskaralaai praharile pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa jumlaa jillaa jillaa gothichaura gaaunpaalikaa basne surya bohoraa balibahaadura bohoraa ekaraaja budhaa munabira budhaa khuma bohoraa maanabahaadura aidi khadka bohoraa kamalabudhaa dalabahaadura thaapaa susilaa debi budhaa karna budhaa basne junabahaadura mahataaraa kabitaa mahataaraa sarijanaa aidi susilaa basneta taatopaani gaaunpaalikaa basne kaalibahaadura thaapaa taptabahaadura thaapaa janaka thaapaanisaana thaapaapaataaraasi gaaunpaalikaa kaagorkhabudhaa rahekaa chhanpakraau parekaa sabai sthaaniya raheko sephoksundo raastriya nikunjale janaakaari dieko chha

melamchi nagarapaalikaa khaanigaaunsthita sri bhairawidewi adhaarabhuta widyaalayaki pradhaanaadhyaapaka kamalaa josilaai sthaaniya maayaa ghaleko gharamaa pasera suna ra nagada choreko abhiyogamaa praharile pakraau gareko ho

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya melamchikaa anusaara uni laamo samayadekhi sohi skulamaa padhaaundai aeki thiin pidita ghalele bataae anusaara josile diunso tina bajetira maayaa ghaleko gharamaa pasera daraajamaa bhaeko suna chorekaa thie
josilaai thapa anusandhaanakaa laagi ilaakaa prahari kaaryalaya melamchimaa raakhieko prahari niriksaka mahendra darnaalale bataaekaa chhan

kaathamaadaum gokarnaeswara nagarapaalikaa maakalabaari deraa gari basne sindhupaalchoka khaampaalakota gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiyaa karunaa saapakotaako kothaabaata nagada hajaara ra sunako wibhinna garagahanaa sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala budhabaara diunso chori bhaeko chha

bhaktapurako lokanthalimaa eka pasalako kaauntarabaata hajaara rupaiyaan lokanthalikai arko kaauntarabaata hajaara haraaeko ujuri praharimaa parepachhi khojdaijaandaa praharilepaakistaani dampatti manasimha khaana ra pujaa khaanalaai pakraau garekaae haae

sisitibhi phutejakaa adhaaramaa mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaabaata khateko tolile lokanthalibaata yo dampattiko gaadiko pichhaa gareko thiyo tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalako goldena getabaata gaadi niyantranamaa lindaa uniharukaa dedha ra saadhe chaara warsakaa chhoraachhoriharu ra eka chaalaka praharile bhetyo ti dampattilaai niyantranamaa liera praharile anusandhaana gardaa chorimaa uniharukai haata raheko pattaa laageko ho

kaathamaadaum taarakeswara nagarapaalikaa kaabhresthali bheri gotha basne warsiya kubera kunwarako gharabaata sunakaa bibhinna garagahanaa gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala somabaara diunso chori bhaeko chha

mahaanagariya prahari waritta bauddhabaata khatieko praharile chori bhaeko baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala sahita chaalaka kaathamaadaum basundhaara basne dolakhaa deuraali gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya mohanalaala sresthalaai bihibaara bihaana pakraau gareko haae

raapti nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya oma sarmaa pokharelako gharamaa bihaana kariba bajetira duijanaako samuhale chori garne kramamaa pokharela dampatilaai akramana gareko hoso kramamaa pokharela ra srimati warsiyaa manarupaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan uniharuko bharatapura aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

mahaanagariya prahari waritta thimibaata khatieko prahari tolile bhaktapura madhyapura thimi nagarapaalikaa chaaradowaatobaata choriko samaana sahita kaabhrekaa anila taamaana ra sohi thaaunkaa manoja dona taamaanalaai pakraau gareko haae uniharule sindhupaalchoka helambubaata litara esiyana penta ra litara inaamela chori gari lyaaiekaa thie

chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa syaanjaali chokasthita puspaa raai jaisiko deraa kothaabaata somabaara diuso kohi nabhaeko abasthaamaa dijitala kyaameraa thaana ra tyaaba thaana sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala chori bhaeko chha

mahaanagariya traaphika mahaasaakhaa raamasaahapathabaata khatieko tolile helambu gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num suruna najikaibaata tina wataa choriko motarasaaikalasahita helambu kaa dilakumaara taamaana helambu kaa nawaraaja taamaana ra helambu kai sikaari bhanine amita taamaanalaai pakraau gareko haae
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya helambu ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya melamchiko sahayogamaa uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa balkhusthita deraa gari basne dhaadinakaa kusuma bhattako kothaabaata bihibaara belukaa nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ra sunakaa bibhinna garagahanaa sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala chori bhaeko chha

haanle ghaantimaa lagaaekokariba tolaako sunako sikri aja bihaana lutapaata bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha motarasaaikalamaa aekaa dui wyaktile galaabaata sikri lutera pharaara bhaekokesiko bhanaai uddharita gardai prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale jaanakaari dieko chha

chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa tinakune gairigaaun basne purusottama bidaariko gharabaata nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ra sunakaa wibhinna garagahanaa sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala mumgalabaara diuso chori bhaeko chha
gahanaa chori bhaekaa sailakumaara simhale praharimaa dieko jaaheri anusaaraguptaalaaipakraau garithapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale janaaeko chha
prahari hun bhandai chori gardai hindne eka yuwaalaai parwatabaata praharile pakraau gareko chha
wibhinna byaktiko nagata tathaa suna chaandi chori gardai hideko aropamaa jalajalaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya resama suwedilaai praharilepakraau gareko haae

suwedile maprahari hun bhandai parwatako kusmaa nagarapaalikaa kaa gaayatri upaadhyaayako hajaara nagada jalajalaa gaaunpaalikaa maajhaphaanta basne laksmi jisiko gharabaata eka tolaa sunako gahanaa ra adhaa tolaako sunako beruwaa aunthi saathai chhatramaana suwediko ghara kothaabaata eka thaana mobaaila ra nagada chori gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parwatale jaanakaari diekaae chha
suwedi yasaaghi pani chori muddhaamaa praharile pakraau gareko thiyo unalaai ahile jillaa adaalata parwatamaa myaada thapa gari anusandhaana gariraheko parwata praharile janaaeko chha

tokhaa nagarapaalikaa ganaesathaana choka deraa gari basne syaanjaa galyaanakaa nimena dewa thaapaako kothaabaata sunako jantara thaana mumgala sutra thaana ra laketa sahitako sikri thaana sameta gari kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala aitabaara diuso chori bhaeko haae

motarasaaikalamaa aekaa dui wyaktile galaabaata sikri lutera pharaara bhaeko serpaako bhanaai uddharita gardai prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale jaanakaari dieko chha pharaara duwai janaako praharile khoji garnaakaa saathai ghatanaako sambandhamaa awasyaka anusandhaana bharaheko janaaieko chha

yasaibicha haawaahurikaa kaarana kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa haattiwanasthita himaalayana haaita risortamaa rukha dhaldaa ukta risortako dui kothaamaa kariba ru laakha baraabarako ksati bhaeko chha

oma senaa nepaalako kaaryaalaya sohrakhuttemaa raheko ukta murti sohi sumsthaabaata siwaraatri melaako laagi aune baabaaharule jimmaa lii lagera ukta chauramaa paala taangi sutekomaa ukta sthaanabaata murti chori bhaeko bataaieko chha

luteraaharule dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gardaa sobhita raauta uhaanki srimati ra gharamaa deraa gari basne ramitaa saaha ghaaite bhaeko dhanusaakaa prahari upariksaka sekhara koiraalaale jaanakaari dinubhayo ghaaiteharuko janakapurako raamajaanaki haspitala praalimaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

ghatanaapachhi praharile tinajanaa sumkaaspada wyaktilaai pakraau gari anusandhaana gariraheko prahari upariksaka koiraalaale bataaunubhayo ghatanaasthala janakapurako mujeliyaa wadaa prahari kaaryaalayabhandaa dedha kilo mitara paschima durimaa raheko chha

piditale so niwedana bharera diepachhi niwedanalaai prahariko aparaadha mahaasaakhaa tekumaa anusandhaana ra khojatalaasako laagi pathaaune garieko waritta pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka milana kesile jaanakaari dinubhayo

uhaankaa anusaara mobaailako khoji ra anusandhaana garna nepaala praharile haalalaai aparaadha mahaasaakhaamaa maatra yunita kholeko chha mobaaila sewaa pradaayaka telikama kampanisanga pani sahakaarya ra samanwaya garnuparne ra mobaaila khojiko prawidhikaa kaarana pani haalalaai mahaasaakhaamaarphata mobaailako khoji tathaa anusandhaana garne garieko uhaanle bataaunubhayo

mahaanagariya prahari parisara bhaktapurakaa suchanaa adhikarita prahari naayaba upariksaka rewatiramana pokharelale parisara ra parisara maatahatakaa jillaakaa dui prahari warittamaa gari saradara dainika eka mobaaila haraaekaa niwedana parne gareko jaanakaari dinubhayo tyasamadhye dekhi pratisata mobaaila phelaa parne gareko uhaanle bataaunubhayo

saarwajanika sawaarimaa dhakelaadhakela gari paisaa choreko anusandhaanamaa khuleko chhauhaanle bhannubhayo pakraau parekaalaai chori tathaa daankaasambandhi kasura muddaamaa muddaa dartaa gari kaarawaahi aghi badhaaine warittale janaaeko chha
tulasipura bajaara tathaa asapaasakaa tolaharumaa chaaeri garne chaara janaalaai praharile pakraau garekaae chha

daana tulasipurakaa sachina chaudhari guru prasaada chaudharikarisna chaudhari ranaawaalakakaae saathabaata suna chaandikaa gara gahaanaa mowaaila kyaamaraa gari andaaji paancha laakha baraawarako dhanamaala praharile baraamada garekaae chha

pasalakaa taalaa phutaaera chori bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baitadikaa nimitta prahari pramukha prahari niriksaka gindra bogatile jaanakaari dinubhayo raatiko maukaa chhopi chori bhaeko bataaieko chha
pasala chori bhaeko wisayamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baitadile janaaeko chha
chori bhaeko baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala sahita bhaktapura suryawinaayaka basne sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sujana bikalaai aitabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaum budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa khadkaagaanusthita uttama khadkaako gharabaata kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako sunakaa bibhinna garagahanaa sukrabaara diuso chori bhaeko chha

kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaa itaari prasaahi basne raamadewa mandalako gharabaata nagada laakha tolaa suna saya graama chaandi tamsukakapaali kaagaja rina dieko phaaila ra soko rajistara sameta budhabaara raati lutapaata bhaeko chha

bardiyaa baansagadhi nagarapaalikaa laksmanaasthita saanaa kisaana karisi sahakaari sumsthaako kaaryaalayabaata sukrabaara bihaana nagada laakha hajaara rupaiyaan sisi kyaameraa ra kampyutara thaana chori bhaeko chha
balephi gaaunpaalikaa sthita chauhrattarakilobaata sunasari dharaanabaraaha nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya niroja ghimireko nagada laakha rupaiyaan mumgalabaara diuso lutapaata bhaeko chha

sunakaa garagahanaa tathaa nagada chori gari bikri witarana tathaa kharida garne kaaryamaa sumlagna bhaeko abhiyogamaa praharile kaabhre timaala gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num saramathali ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaun attarakhela basne warsiya wiweka bhanne waandena taamaanalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraauparnemaa raamechhaapa manthali nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala baaneswara thaapaagaaun basne warsiya raaju kaaphle raamechhaapa likhu taamaakosi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai haala katunje basne warsiya dinesa paudela dolakhaa taamaakosi ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaun kaandaaghaari basne warsiya siwa phuyaanla ra raamechhaapa likhu taamaakosi ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaun anaamanagara basne warsiya naaraayana daahaala rahekaa chhan
pakraau parekaamadhye kaaphle sohi kampanikaa purwa plambara ra magara gaarda ra sahaayaka stora kiparakosameta milemato raheko prahari upariksaka sresthale bataaunubhayo
kanchanapurako karisnapura nagarapaalikaa kaa harkabahaadura kaamiko gharabaata sunakaa tayaari awasthaakaa tolaa gahanaa chori garne tina janaalaai praharile aja pakraau gareko chha

gahanaa bechdai hindeko awasthaamaa chorimaa sumlagna karisnapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya waasudewa awasthi ra kailaaliko godaawari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya dipakabahaadura bamalaai praharile gahanaasahita pakraau gareko ho gharamaa kohi nabhaekaa belaa dhokaako taalaa phutaalera gahanaa chori gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhalaarikaa prahari niriksaka ramesadatta awasthile bataaunubhayo

choriko gahanaa sastomaa kinne kailaaliko dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa surmaadewi sunachaandi gahanaa pasalakaa sanchaalaka warsiya dipendra sowalaai sameta praharile pakraau gareko chha chorimaa sumlagnabaata praharile sunako tilahari chhadke eka thaana saano tilahari thaana eka anaithi winaa pattharako thaana eka juli eka seta dui thaana siraphula chandramaa thaana eka baali dui jora chaara thaana naakako phuli eka thaana chaandiko haara thaana eka ra chaandikaa sikkaa thaana baraamada gareko chha

gahanaa chori bhaekaa harkabahaadura kaamile praharimaa dieko jaaherianusaara sunakaa thaana gahanaa jhandai tolaa chaandikaa tolaakaa sikkaa chaandiko graamako paauju ra ru hajaara chori bhaeko thiyo chorimaa sumlagna ra chorikaa gahanaa kharida garne tinai janaalaai ipakaa jhalaariko hiraasatamaa raakhieko chha

yasaibicha madhyapurathimi nagarapaalikaakaa nagara pramukha ewum meyara klawakaa sachiwa madana sundara srestha dinadaahaadai janapratinidhiko gharamaa bhaeko choriko anusandhaana gari kaarabaahi garna maaga garnubhaeko chha aja presa bijnapti jaari gardai uhaanle dhokaa phodera bhaeko choriko nindaa gardai yathaasighra anusandhaana gari chorigarnelaai niyantranamaa lina maaga garnu bhaeko nagarapaalikaakaa prasaasakiya adhikakata kamala jnawaalile jaanakaari dinubhayo

ausadhi sughaaera lutapaata garna khojdaakhojdai eutaa girohakaa sadasyalaai pakraau paresangai ausadhi sughaaera lutapaata garne samuha sakriya raheko khuleko kaathamaadaum prahari parisara esapi asoka simhale bataae

mahaanagariya prahari parisara bhaktapurakaa anusaara taamaanako kothaabaata nagada ru eka laakha ra mobaaila seta eka thaana ra suryawinaayaka sundarabastimaa kothaamaa basne ramitaa taamaanako mobaaila seta eka thaanasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko prahari parisarakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka rewatiramana pokharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

nijaharuko saathabaata praharile choriekaa mobaaila sunachaandikaa gahanaa nagada baraamada gareko ra girohamadhyekaa pharaara wyaktiko khoji bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha yo girohale anya ksetramaa pani chori gareko khulekaale thapa anusandhaana agaadi badhaaeko prahariko bhanaai chha
mahottari jillaako bhangaahaa nagarapaalikaa sitaapura bajaarakaa wyaapaari raamakumaara saahako ru nau laakha nagada rakama aja diunsai lutapaata bhaeko chha

sitaapura bajaaramaa aiemai sanchaalana gardai aekaa saaha dhanusaako mahendranagarasthita raastriya waanaijya bainkabaata rakama liera gharatarpha aundai gardaa mahottari ra dhanusaako saandhamaa parne bighipulamaa hatiyaaradhaari chaara janaako samuhabaata lutiekaa hun

ghatanaalagattai sitaapura prahari chauki ra sasastra prahari besa kyaampa bhangaahaabaata suraksaakarmi ghatanaasthala puge pani luteraa bhaagekaale ahilesamma pakraau garna nasakieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile janaaeko chha

ghatanaasthala waripari ra anya sankaaspada thaaunmaa luteraako khojimaa prahari parichaalita garieko jiprakaa mahottarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka khagendrabahaadura khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo ghatanaa aja diunso kariba bajeko samayamaa bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
wigata warsadekhi desakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa maanisalaai behosa banaai lutapaata garne girohalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale aja pakraau gareko chha

pakraauparnemaa kaaski jillaa maachhaapuchchhe gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya kaalu pariyaara ra makawaanapura thaahaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala tanahunko dewaghaatamaa basobaasa gardai aekaa warsiya hari gole rahekaa chhan pariyaara warsadekhi nirantara chori kaaryamaa sumlagna raheko khuleko chha unale thaaunmaa behosa banaai lutapaata gareko swikaareko praharile janaaeko chha

uniharule asoja gate maadi nagarapaalikaa kalyaanapurakaa bhimabahaadura sunaarako gharamaa lutapaata garepachhi so samuhako khojikaarya suru garieko thiyo uniharulaai somabaara butawala basapaarkabaata pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka susilasimha raathaunrale jaanakaari dinubhayo

praharile uniharulaai aja saarwajanika gareko ho uniharule jhaapaa itahari lahaana wiraganja hetaundaa sunauli butawala karisnanagara nepaalaganja surkheta kaathamaadaun lagaayatakaa sthaanamaa behosa banaaera lutapaata gareko praharile janaaeko chha bayaanakaa kramamaa uniharule bhaaratako lakhanausamma pani nepaalilaai luteko swikaareko bataaieko chha uniharulaai jyaana maarne udyoga ra chori kasuraantargata kaanuni kaarawaahi garine praharile janaaeko chha
chaagunnaaraayana nagarapaalikaa sudaala basne warsiya kapiladewa sukamanilaai dhanamaala chori gari bhaagdai gareko awasthaamaa saamaana sahita budhabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha
morana letaana nagarapaalikaa budhabaare bajaaramaa raheko janachaahanaa tathaa rina sahakaari sumsthaa limitedabaata mumgalabaara nagada laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan chori bhaeko chha

mahaanagariya prahari parisara lalitapurale gaadi liera chaaeri garna jaane samuha pakraau gareko chha chori garna prayoga garieko gaadisahita praharile chaara janaa luteraalaai pakraau gareko ho praharile uniharubaata chorimaa prayoga garne aujaaraharu sameta baraamada gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa makawaanapura jillaa indrasarowara gaaunpaalikaa kodokhoriyaa phaakhela basne warsa ko somalaala syaanataana somalaala thinga chaalaka warsa ko amarita bhanne raaju laamaa ra warsa ko kumaara laamaa rahekaa chhan

pakraauparnemaa bhaarata paschima bangaala kuchawihaara jillaa kaalibaadi thaanaakaa warsiya ananda daasa saantipadaa thaanaa wadaa num kaa warsiya winoda gwaalaa wihaara pradesa arariyaa jillaa jogamuni thaanaa jogamuni gaaunkaa warsiya ajaya saaha ra paschima bangaala jalapaai jillaa menaagudi thaanaa relawekalauni gaaun basne warsiya baadala gwaalaa pakraau pareko tanahanu praharile janaaeko chha

hetaundaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa ko chaainaakwaataramaa raheko wadaa kaaryaalayabaata ru hajaara chori bhaeko wadaadhyaksa sawina nyaupaanele jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaankaa anusaara kaaryaalayamaa raheko daraaja phodieko chha kaaryaalayakaa kaagajapatra bhane durusta raheko adhyaksa nyaupaanele bataaunubhayo kaaryaalaya chori bhaeko ujyaalo bhaepachhi thaahaa paaera sthaaniyale praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

yasaigari kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa madhyabaaneswara miteri maarga deraa gari basne morana wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaeki dipaa basnetako deraa kothaamaa mumglabaara kohi nabhaeko awasthaamaa jhyaalako grila phodera nagada hajaara rupaiyaan sahita kariwa laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala chori bhaeko chha

kutapitabaata ghaaite duwai janaako raajawiraajasthita gajendranaaraayana simha sagaramaathaa anchala aspataalamaa bharnaa garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha lutapaata garne wyaktiko tiwrarupamaa khoji jaari raakhieko naayaba prahari upariksaka rimaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

karjanhaa nagarapaalikaa basne raamakumaara yaadawale enaaisi esiyaa baimka lahaanabaata jhikera lyaaeko nagada laakha rupaiyaan lii gharatarpha jaane kramamaa eutai myaajikamaa sawaara uniharule dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa sthita dhanagadhi bajaaramaa pugdaa ukta nagada lutapaata gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha khatieko praharile uniharulaai phelaa paari jaancha gardaa phulakumaarile bokeko jholaabaata ukta lutieko rakama baraamada bhaeko thiyo
sirahaako mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaa raaghopura tinagachhiyaabaata luteraako eka samuhale aja hatiyaara dekhaai ru laakha hajaara nagada lutera pharaara bhaekaa chhan

mirchaiyaasthita globala aiemai baimkabaata rakama jhikera sirahaakai kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaasthita raajaaraama sabamani traansapharatarpha jaandai gareko awasthaamaa raaghopurasthita tinagachhiyaamaa dui wataa motarasaaikalamaa aekaa chaara janaako samuhale hatiyaara dekhaai ukta rakama lutera lageko pidita mani traansapharakaa sanchaalaka raajaaraama saahalaai udarita gardai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mirchaiyaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dipendra saahale jaanakaari dinubhayo

kaathamaadaumko gomgabusthita raapti paahunaa gharako nambara kothaabaata budhabaara raati baje daanakaa suna wyawasaayi khadga bahaadura sunaarale suna lutieko bhandai praharimaa khabara garekaa thie
kilo suna ra laakha rupaiyaanbhandaa badhi rakama lutieko bhandai praharimaa khabara garepachhi kaathamaadaum prahari pramukha esaesapi wiswaraaja pokharela aphaim ghatanaasthala pugekaa thie

anusandhaana gardai jaandaa suna lutieko nabhaera naatakiya sailimaa suna lukaaeko phelaa pareko kaathamaadaum prahari prawaktaa diesapi mohana thaapaale bataae sunaarale suna gomgabusthita bijimalamaa lukaaera samitiko suna pachaauna naataka racheko prahari anusandhaanabaata khuleko chha
mahottariko gausaalaa nagarapaalikaa raamanagara jumgalabaata laakhaun rupaiyaan lutieko chha
aja beluki gausaalaabaata bardiwaasatarpha jaane kramamaa ajnaata samuhale nagada ru nau laakha ra ekathaana mobaaila luteko chha

jillaako aurahi gausaalaalagaayatakaa bajaarabaata paisaa sumkalana gari jacha numko boleromaarphata saanjhako samayamaa bardiwaasatarpha jaandai gareko awasthaamaa bicha jumgalamaa pugepachhi so lutapaata bhaeko sasastra prahari besakyaampa raamanagarale janaaeko chha

sasastra prahari niriksaka iswara koiraalaale dieko jaanakaarianusaara surya nepaalako bardiwaasasthita dilarabaata khatiekaa karmachaari uddhawa paraajulisanga motarasaaikalamaa aekaa kehi aparichita samuhale gaadi roki lutapaata gareko ho
tokhaa nagarapaalikaa ganaesasthaana basne jaanaki sresthako gharabaata sukrabaara suna tathaa chaandikaa bibhinna garagahanaa chaaeri bhaeko chha
sasastra praharile belauri nagarapaalikaa pachunibaata nakkali nepaali notasahita dui janaalaai sanibaara saanjha pakraau gareko chha

laalajhaadi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya sanjaya raanaa ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya indrasimha raanaalaai nakkali nota banaaune saamagri ra nakkali notasahita sasastra prahari bala bordara auta posta pachunibaata simaa gastimaa niskeko sasastra prahari naayaba niriksaka kesawabahaadura chandako kamaandamaa raheko tolile pakraau gareko ho

uniharuko saathabaata nakkali nota banaaune kaagaja nakkali nota hajaara darako paancha mobaaila phona dui thaana nagada ru motarasaaikalako laaisensa blubuka baraamada garieko sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hedakrwaatara saileswari kanchanapurakaa sasastra prahari upariksaka wirendrabahaadura airale jaanakaari dinubhayo pakraau parekaa duwailaai baraamada nakkali nota ra nakkali nota banaauna prayoga hune saamaanasahita awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi praharilaai bujhaaeko chha

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale sasastra prahari baristha upariksakabaata sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksakamaa padonnati hunubhaekaa janaa adhikaritaharulaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalaya halchoka swayambhumaa pausa gate ayojita bisesa samaarohamaa sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka padako dajryaani chinha pradaana garnubhayo

sohi wisesa samaarohamaa sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale sasastra prahari baristha upariksaka padamaa kaayama mukaayama mukarara hunubhaekaa janaa adhikaritaharulaai sameta sasastra prahari baristha upariksaka padako dajryaani chinha pradaana garnubhayo

nepaala sarakaara garihamantraalaya maananiya mantristarako yahi pausa gateko nirnayale janaa adhikaritaharu sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka padamaa padonnati hunubhaeko tathaa pausa gatekai nirnayale janaa sasastra prahari baristha upariksaka padamaa kaayama mukaayama mukarara hunubhaeko ho so samaarohamaa sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale padonnati barittiwikaasako mahatwapurna paatoko rupamaa raheko charchaa garnuhundai padonnatisangai praapta bhaeko uttaradaayitwa puraa garna purnawyaawasaayika bhai imaandaaritaakaasaatha kaaryaksetramaa kariyaasila rahanuparne bataaunubhayo

uhaanle raastra ra sumgathanako laagi aphno jyaanako sameta ahuti diekaa amara sasastra prahariharuko tyaaga ra balidaanako sammaana hune gari imaandaaritaakaasaatha jimmewaari nirwaahamaa laagnuparne charchaa garnuhundai sasastra prahari adhikaritaharule aphu maatahatakaalaai sameta anugamana tathaa maargadarsana gardai kusala netaritwa pradaanagari agaami dinamaa ajhai pariskarita bhaera raastra ra naagarikako sewaa suraksaa ra apata wipadamaa parekaaharuko udwaara kaaryamaa sakariya rahanuparne ullekha garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharule wyaktigata swaarthalaai thaati raakhdai saamuhika bhaawanaakaasaatha raajya pradatta jimmewaarikaa ksetraharumaa kariyaasila rahanuparne ullekha garnubhayo samaarohamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakadwaya pusparaama kesi ra raamasarana paudela lagaayata sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa baristha adhikaritaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo

sasastra prahari balamaa rikta raheko sasastra prahari jawaana padako khullaa pratiyogitaako likhita pariksaamaa arkaako naamamaa pariksaa dindai garekaa janaa nakkali pariksaarthi pausa gate pakraau parekaa chhan

haalai prakaasita wijnaapana anusaara khullaa pratiyogitadwaaraa padapurti garine saadhaarana samuha saadhaarana upasamuhatarpha sasastra prahari jawaana padako likhita pariksaamaa sasastra prahari balako tarphabaata thamba ridara baayometika dibhaaisa prayoga gari pariksaarthiharuko ekina garne kramamaa nepaala bharakaa wibhinna pariksaa kendraharubaata janaa nakkali pariksaarthiharu phelaa paarieko ho
sasastra prahari balamaa bharnaa chhanota kaarya nispaksa ra paaradarsi raheko chha

wisum maa mantriparisadko nirnayale sabai jillaamaa sasastra prahari bala puryaaune bhanyo baagalunamaa yasaaghi sasastra prahari bala thiena wisesagari simaa suraksaa wipad wyawasthaapana saanti suraksaa ra dangaa wyawasthaapanamaa sakriya hundai aeko sasastra praharilaai desakaa sabai jillaamaa puryaaune nirnayapachhi baagalunamaa dui warsaaghi maatrai sasastra prahari bala aeko thiyo

sasastra prahari bala aeko dui warsa bitnai laagdaa sameta jaggaa abhaawamaa paalamuni basera suraksaa dindai aeko chha jillaakaa sarokaarawaalaa nikaayako bewaastaakaa kaarana jaggaa wyawasthaapana huna nasakdaa sasastra prahari gulma puraano bhusumraksana kaaryaalayako saanghuro bhawanamaa asraya liera baseko chha

eutaa gulma saano kaaryaalayabhitra wyawasthaapana huna nasakdaa kaaryaalaya parisaramaa tenta paala taangera basnuparne baadhyataa raheko gulmale janaaeko chha janataako suraksaakaa laagi khatieko sasastra prahari baagalunamaa jaggaa napaaundaa bhawana banaauna nasakepachhi paalamai raata kaatera basna wiwasa bhaeko ho

surumaa puraano hulaaka kaaryaalayako saata ropani jaggaa wyawasthaapanakaa laagi pahala bhae pani bajaarabhitra sasastra raakhna nahune bhandai sthaaniyawaasile wirodha janaaepachhi nagarapaalikaale jaggaa dina maaneko thiena pachhi baagaluna nagarapalikaa raataamaataako puraano baagaluna nagarapalikaa kaaryaalayamaa raakhne bhanie pani raataamaataabaasiko wirodhakaa kaarana samasyaa aeko thiyo jaggaa wyawasthaapana huna nasakdaa gulmamaa awasyaka rahane jawaanasameta purnarupamaa parichaalana garna nasakieko sasastra prahari gulma baagalunakaa gulmapati sasastra prahari naayaba upariksaka ramesakumaara gurunale bataaunubhayo jaggaa praapta huna nasakdaa gulma wyawasthaapana bhaena gulmamaa awasyaka bhandaa badhi sasastra praharimadhye jammaa janaa maatrai baagalunamaa chhan gulmapati gurunale bhannubhayo madhye janaamaatrai kaaryaalayamaa basna sakeko ra anya janaa kaaryaalaya parisaramaa paala taangera basdai aekaa chhan

janataako sewaamaa khatiekaa sasastra prahari jawaananai paalamuni basnuparne samasyaa antya garna jaggaa wyawasthaapanakaa laagi wibhinna sthaanamaa pahala bhae pani haalasamma saarthakataa paauna nasakdaa samasyaa bhaeko gurunako bhanaai chha

janataako saanti suraksaa ra wipad wyawasthaapanamaa khatine praharilaai sthaaniya janataale naruchaaune paripaati galata bhaeko uhaanko bhanaai chha haami anusaasanamaa hunchhaun gurunale bhannubhayo ahile baagaluna nagarapaalikaa rametaaramaa saarwajanika jaggaa pahichaana bhaeko chha tara sthaaniya paalikaako siphasira nahundaa prakriyaa agaadi badheko chhaina gurunakaa anusaara jaggaa nagarapaalikaako siphaarisamaa maatrai wyawasthaapanako prakriyaa agaadi badhchha rametaaramaa ropani saarwajanika jaggaa chha gulmalaai dekhi ropani jaggaa awasyaka bhaekaale upayukta jaggaa rametaaramai bhetieko ho tara sthaaniya tahale siphaarisa nadindaa paalako baasamaa prahari basnupareko chha

yahi mansira gate gandaki pradesakaa mukhyamantri parithwi subbaa gurunale rametaaramaa gulma raakhnakaa laagi pahichaana bhaeko upayukta saarwajanika jaggaako sthaalagata niriksanasameta garnubhaeko thiyo niriksanapachhi uhaanle rametaaramai gulma raakhna jaggaa wyawasthaapana garne pratibaddhataasameta janaaunubhaeko thiyo

janataakai suraksaakaa laagi khatine sasastra praharilaai dui warsasamma jaggaa praapta nahunu duhkhada ho mukhyamantri gurunale bhannubhayo malai tadaarukataa dekhaaepachhi chhittai gulma raakhna jaggaa wyawasthaapana hunchha

sasastrakaa laagi jaggaa wyawasthaapana chhittai hune baagaluna nagarapaalikaakaa nagara pramukha janakaaraja paudelale jaanakaari dinubhayo prayaasa nabhaekaa hoinan dherai prayaasa garieko chha tara tungo laageko chhaina nagara pramukha paudelale bhannubhayo gulma raakhna jaggaa wyawasthaapanakaa laagi sthaaniyasanga samanwaya bhairaheko chha ahile gulma basdai aeko bhusumraksanako kaaryaalaya punah sakriya hune bhaepachhi tyahi saanghuro kaaryaalayasameta chhodnuparne samasyaamaa gulma pareko chha

sirahaa jillaako golabajaara nagarapaalikaa sthita golabajaarabaata kaartika gate epiepha tolile nakkali nota chhaapdai garekaa tina janaalaai rumgehaata pakraau gareko chha pakraau parneharumaa sohi jillaako kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bimalendra kumaara naayaka golabajaara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya dhiraja yaadaba ra warsiya sanje raaya chhan

kehi byaktiharule nakkali nota chhaapne kaarya gariraheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa wesa golabajaarabaata khatieko epiepha tolile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

rautahata jillaako gaura nagarapaalikaa badahawaa pula najikaiko pokharibaata asoja gate epiepha tolile eka baalikaalaai pokharibaata udwaara gareko chha sohi thaaun basne warsiyaa muskaara kumaari guptaa ukta pokharimaa paudi khelle kramamaa duweki thiin
so baare jaanakaari paaunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana rautahatabaata sasastra prahari upariksaka suryabahaadura sena waliko kamaandamaa khatieko

chitawana jillaamaa bhaaratasanga jodiekaa simaa ksetrako suraksaakaa laagi thapa dui bordara auta posta biopi sthaapanaa garieko chha sarakaarale desabhara simaa ksetramaa sasastra praharikaa biopi thapa garne nirnaya garesangai chitawanamaa pani dui wataa biopi thapeko ho

maadi nagarapaalikaa ko kaanchhi bagaai ra wadaa num ko bhangataamaa sthaapanaa gariekaa biopiko aja eka kaaryakramakaabicha udghaatana gariyo sasastra bala nambara tina gadhimaai baahinikaa baahinipati sasastra prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka mandipa sresthale biopiko udghaatana gardai agaami dinamaa simaa suraksaa thapa majabut banne bataaunubhayo uhaanle bhannubhayo eutaa biopile laamo duriko suraksaa dinuparne baadhyataa hateko chha simaa raksaamaa thapa katibaddha huna prerita gareko chha

yasaaghi chitawanako maadi nagarapaalikaamaa tinawataa maatrai biopi posta thie thapiekaa dui sangai paancha posta pugeko chha maadimai thapa eka posta sthaapanaa garne tayaari bhairaheko pramukha jillaa adhikaari naaraayanaprasaada bhattaraaile jaanakaari dinubhayo yasaaghi baandarajhulaa chharachhare ra baalmiki asramamaa sasastrakaa asthaayi posta raheko uhaanle bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari bala num ganakaa prahari upariksaka dipakakumaara thaapaale nayaan posta kilomitarako durimaa sthaapanaa bhaeko bataaunubhayo uhaanle bhannubhayo pahile tinawataa posta kilomitarako durimaa thie pahilo charanamaa duiwataa posta thapiepachhi suraksaa wyawasthaa majabuta banaauna thapa maddata pugnechha uhaanle thapiekaa postamaa janaako swikarita darabandi raheko jaanakaari dinubhayo haalalaai bhane postamaa janaa prahari tainaatha garieko chha chitawana jillaako bhaaratasanga kilomitara khulaa simaa jodieko chha maadimaa bhaaratasangako simaanaa jodieko adhikaamsa nikunja ksetra parchha
sasastra prahari bala epiephakaa khelaadisahita janaamaa kaaeraaenaa sankramana bhaeko chha

bhaktapurako duwaakotamaa raheko guhyeswari ganakaa janaa ra nilawaaraahi gana kirtipurakaa janaa sasastra praharimaa koronaakaae sankramana dekhieko haae simaabaata pharkekaa khelaadilaai kirtipura ra duwaakota maa kwaarentinamaa raakhieko thiyaae
rautahata jillaako raajadewi nagarapaalikaa sthita belawichhuwaabaata bihibaara epiepha tolile kariwa tina laakha hajaara rupaiyaa baraabarako choripaithaariko saamaana baraamada gareko chha

bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale bhansaara chhali nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ullekhita mulya baraabarako wibhinna kisimakaa ilektronika saamaana ra kasmetika saamaana sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta belawichhuwaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho baraamada saamaana gaura bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko chha

yasaigari sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta samsibaata khatieko epiepha tolile bihibaara kariwa eka laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako chori nikaasiko kwintala keraau baraamada gareko chha

naa cha nambarako balero pikaapa gaadimaa raakhi awaidha rupale laijaandai gareko ukta keraau epiepha tolile mahottari jillaako samsi gaaunpaalikaa dewisthaana sthita simaa ilaakaabaata baraamada gareko ho
epiepha tolile tyasawelaa keraau laijaana prayoga bhaeko ukta balero pikaapa gaadi sameta baraamada gareko chha baraamada saamaana tathaa gaadi jaleswara bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko chha
sindhupaalchoka jillaako melamchi nagarapaalikaa sthita eka taharo pahiro khasera puridaa so bhitra rahekaa eka janaalaai saauna gate bihaana epiepha tolile jiwitai udwaara gareko chha

ukta pahirole purieko so taharobhitra janaa puriekaa thie ukta nagarapaalikaako kabharda hala nirmaanamaa khatiekaa baaraa jillaako simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa uniharu so taharomaa basdai aekaa thie

ukta ghatanaabaare jaanakaari paaunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa wesa melamchibaata epiepha toli udwaara kaaryako laagi tyasa thaaunmaa khatieko thiyo jiwitai udwaara gariekaa unalaai upachaaraartha helidwaaraa hyaamsa aspataala dhumbaaraahi kaathamaadaumtarpha pathaaieko chha pahiromaa puriekaa anya atha janaako sawa phelaa paarieko chha

sirahaa jillaako bariyaarapatti gaanupaalikaa sthita trisulaa kholaako kinaarabaata saauna gate epiepha tolile eka saya botala daaileksa disi ra tina saya wataa naaitraabheta tyaableta baraamada gareko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta bariyaarapattibaata khatieko epiepha tolile ukta laaguausadha baraamada gareko ho tyasawelaa bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai garekaa wyaktile epiepha tolilaai dekhne bittikai ukta laaguausadha sohi thaaunmaa chhaadi bhaagi pharaara bhaekaa thie

dhanusaa jillaako sahidanagara nagarapaalikaa naathapattichokasthita naharamaa duwera bepattaa bhaekaa sohi thaaun basne mithilesakumaara mandalako saba saauna gate epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile phelaa pareko chha

maachhaa maarna bhanera aghillo dina gharabaata hidekaa uni bepattaa bhaeko bhanne jaanakaari praapta bhaepachhi sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa besa duwarakotabaata khatieko epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile so thaaunko naharamaa kariwa mitara tala unako sawa phelaa paareko ho yasaigari jhaapaa jillaako damaka nagarapaalikaa sthita kamala pokharimaa duwekaa tina janaako saba epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile phelaa paareko chha

uniharu yahi saauna gate paudi khelne kramamaa bepattaa bhaeko bhanne jaanakaari praapta bhaepachhi khoji kaarya gardaa uniharuko sawa bhetieko ho sohi nagarapaalikaa gaurisumkara basne barsiya amkusa taamaana barsiya karana thaami ra barsiya arjuna thaami so pokharimaa paudi khelne kramamaa bepattaa bhaekaa thie so ghatanaabaare jaanakaari paaunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta parithwinagarabaata tatkaalai epiepha toli khatieko thiyo

uniharu madhye amkusa taamaanako saba sohi dina phelaa paarieko thiyo bhane anya dui janaako saba saauna gate phelaa paarieko ho yasaigari sarlaahi jillaako dhanakaula gaanupaalikaa sekhaunaasthita lachkaatarne kramamaa bagera bepattaa bhaekaa sohi thaaun basne barsiya bijendra jhaako saba epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile phelaa paareko chha nija jhaa saauna gate tyasa thaaunmaa lachkaa tarne kramamaa bagera bepattaa bhaepachhi sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta balaraaudhoranabaata khatieko epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile khoji garne kramamaa unako sawa so thaaun bhandaa kariba tina saya mitara taadhaa phelaa paareko ho

jumlaabaata naagmaatarpha jaandai gareko bhe ja nambarako bhyaana saauna gate jumlaa jillaako tilaa gaaunpaalikaa dundelimaa sadakabaata kariwa mitara tala khasera durghatanaa hundaa tina janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

ghaaiteharulaai epiepha tolile udwaara gareko chha ukta durghatanaabaare jaanakaari praapta hunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma jumlaabaata khatieko epiepha toli tatkaalai so sthaanamaa pugera udwaara kaaryamaa juteko ho

sudurapaschimako puraano ksetriya sadaramukaama dipaayalako jogidaabremaa sthaapanaa garieko sasastra prahariko num gana ahilesamma aphno bhawana nahundaa siksaka taalima kendramaa basdai aeko chha sthaapanaa bhaeko tina warsa bitisakdaasameta aphno bhawana nahundaa nikai samasyaa hundai aeko ganale janaaeko chha

bhawana ta parai jaaos gana nirmaanakaa laagi jaggaasameta kharida nagariekaa kaarana samasyaa utpanna huna thaaleko chha ukta gana sthaapanaakaa laagi tina warsa pahile dipaayala silagadhi nagarapaalikaa jogidaabremaa raheko siksaka taalima kendrakaa bhawanaharu diiepachhi ahile sudurapaschima pradesabaata taalimakaa laagi aune siksakalaai baasa basnakaa laagi sameta samasyaa hundai aeko siksaka taalima kendra jogidaabrele janaaeko chha

sthaapanaa garieko tina warsa bitisakdaa sameta aphuharukaa aphno bhawana nabhaekaa kaarana siksaka taalima kendrale asthaayirupamaa pradaana gareko awaasagarihamaa basdai aeko sasastra prahari bala num gana hedakrwaatara dotikaa sasastra prahari upariksaka jaharasimha budhaamagarale bataae unale bhane haamisanga jaggaa pani chhaina bhawana pani nabhaekaale siksaka taalima kendramaa basdai aekaa chhaun kuna dina uhaanharule chhodnu bhanepachhi kahaan jaane samasyaa hunechha yahaanko dipaayala silagadhi nagarapaalikaalaai jaggaakaa laagi anurodha garieko bhae pani haalasamma jaggaa kharida garna nasakiekaa kaarana jhanai samasyaa bhaeko sasastra praharile janaaeko chha

gana sthaapanaakaa laagi awasyaka parne kamtimaa dekhi ropani jamina upayukta thaaunmaa napaaiekaa kaarana jaggaa kharida garna nasakieko nagarapaalikaakaa nimitta kaaryakaari pramukha khemaraaja gurunale bataae unale bhane sasastra prahariko gana sthaapanaakaa laagi haamile jaggaa kharida prakriyaako thaalani garekaa chhaun upayukta thaaunmaa jamina napaaekaale samasyaa bhaeko ho jaggaa khojikaarya hundaichha wisum maa sthaapanaa bhaeko ukta ganamaa kula darabandi dekhi janaasamma kaayama bhae pani thaaun abhaawakaa kaarana katipaya sasastra prahari kailaalimaa raheko sasastra prahariko num baahini tathaa ganamaa etechamaa kaaryarata raheko bataaieko chha

jillaa wipad pratikaaryadekhi saanti suraksaakaa kaamamaa sasastra prahari khatindai ae pani aphno bhawana nahundaa uniharulaai dainika kaaryasampaadanamaa samasyaa hundai aeko bataaieko chha yatimaatra nabhai ganako aphno bhawana nabhaekaa kaarana ganale sasastra praharikaa laagi sanchaalana garne antarika taalimadekhi anya piti paredasamma garna samasyaa bhaeko ganapati budhaamagarale bataae unale bhane ganamaa wibhinna khaale taalima khulchhan haamisanga ti taalima garnakaa laagi aphno bhawana chhaina sumrachanaa nirmaana gardaa chhaadera jaanebelaa jhan samasyaa hune bhaekaale taalima sanchaalanamaa samasyaa bhaeko chha

haala gana sthaapanaa bhaeko siksaka taalima kendra najikai prawidhika siksaa padhaauna widyaarthikaa laagi sthaapanaa garieko seti praawidhika siksaalaya dipaayala rahekaale ganamaa antarika taalima sanchaalana gare uniharuko padhaaimaa baadhaa utpanna hune awasthaa raheko nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa wirendra saahale bataae unale bhane gana najikai praawidhika siksaalaya chha tyahaan taalima gardaa widyaarthiko padhaaimaa samasyaa hune dekhieko chha ganalaai upayukta thaaunmaa jaggaa kharida gari saarnuparne bhaeko chha raasasa
budhigangaa nadimaa dubera bepattaa bhaekaa budhigangaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya prataapa thaapaako khojikaa laagi saata janaa sasastra prahariko wipat wyawasthaapana toli baajuraa aipugeko chha
maartadibaata kariba kilomitara durimaa parne ghatanaasthala dwaarimaa bepattaako khojikaa laagi nepaala prahari ra sasastra praharisahitako toli ahile pani laagipareko chha
simaawarti bhaaratiya bajaarabaata bhiswaa naakaa hundai nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa srota nakhuleko laakha nepaali rupaiyaan baraamada bhaeko sasastra praharile janaaeko chha
gasti tolilaai dekhapachhi paisaa bokera aundai garekaa wyakti jholaa phaalera bhaaratatarpha nai bhaagekaae sasastra prahariko bhanaai chha
baraamada garieko paisaa awasyaka anusandhaana ra kaarabaahikaa laagi nepaala prahariko jimmaa lagaaine sasastra praharile janaaeko chha

rupandehi jillaako rohinai gaanupaalikaa piprahiyaa sthita simaa ilaakaabaata jetha gate epiepha tolile kariba eka laakha eka hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaari tathaa nikaasiko saamaana baraamada gareko chha

awaidha rupale choripaithaari nikaasi gardai gareko ullekhita mulya baraabaraako saya keji chhokadaa ra kiraanaa saamaana sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta pajarakattibaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho
epiepha tolile baraamada saamaana bhansaara kaaryaalaya bhairahawaamaa bujhaaeko chha

yasaigari sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta sarmajuwaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile asaara gate kariwa eka laakha rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko lattaakapadaa tathaa kiraanaa saamaana baraamada gareko chha

bhansaara chhali awaidha rupale nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ukta lattaakapadaa tathaa kiraanaa saamaana epiepha tolile rautahata jillaako baudhimaai nagarapaalikaa bumkula sthita simaa ilaakaabaata baraamada gareko ho
baraamada samaana bhansaara kaaryaalaya gauramaa bujhaaieko chha

simaa suraksaamaa sakriyataa apanaaundai sasastra prahari balale kaalaapaani ksetramaa niyamita gasti gariraheko chha nepaala bhaarata ra chinako tridesiya naakaasanga jodieko saamarika mahatwako so ksetramaa raajyako upasthiti badhaaune kramamaa niyamita paidala gasti huna thaaleko ho

daarchulaako wyaasa gaaunpaalikaa sthita chhaanru gaagaa simaa nigaraani chauki biopi sanchaalanamaa lyaaiepachhi tyahaanbaata khatiekaa suraksaakarmile kaalaapaaniko seto pulasamma pugera niyamita gasti garna thaalekaa hun chhaanrubaata kaalaapaani kilomitarako durimaa parchha daarchulaa sadaramukaama khalangaabaata chhaanru kariba kimi ra chhaanrubaata gunji dobhaana kimiko durimaa parchha gunjibaata lipuleka kimi taadhaa chha kaalaapanibaata limpuyaadhuraa pugna sadaka baato nabhaekaale hindera jaana ghantaasamma laagchha

tyo naksaalaai sametera banaaieko nisaana chhaapalaai pratinidhisabhaako gata jetha gateko baithakale nepaalako sumwidhaanako anusuchimaa sumsodhanako widheyakalaai sarwasammatarupamaa paarita gareko chha so ksetramaa bhaaratiya suraksaa phauja basiraheko tathaa lipuleka ra limpuyaadhuraa ksetramaa yaataayaata sahaja nabhaekaale sarakaarale kramasah raajyako upasthiti badhaauna thaaleko ho nepaala ra bhaaratabichako sugauli sandhi bamojima kaalinadidekhi purwatarpha nepaala ho

sasastra prahari balakaa mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale chhaanrumaa biopi sanchaalanamaa aepachhi tyahaankaa janataa khusi bhaeko uniharule suraksita mahasusa gareko ra daarchulaa sadaramukaama basdai aekaa maanisaharu gaaun pharkana thaaleko bataaekaa chhan
chinako maanasarowara jodna bhaaratale nepaala bhumi hundai sadaka banaaeko thiyo bajeta winiyojanapachhi chhaanrumaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalale bhawana nirmaana prakriyaa suru garisakeko chha

sarakaarale bhaawana nirmaanakaa laagi ru karoda bajeta chhutyaaisakeko chha gata waisaakha gate nepaali senaako helikoptaramaarphata yahaan sasastra prahari puyaaera biopi sthaapanaa garieko thiyo gata mansira gate sarakaarale simaa ksetramaa thapa nigaraani chauki sthaapanaa garne nirnaya gareko thiyo

wigatamaa jillaamaa maatra raheko sasastra prahari balako upasthitilaai haala jillaamaa wistaara bhaisakeko chha wisum ko antyasamma wataa raheko biopilaai samma wistaara garne yojanaaanuhaara haala sanchaalanamaa lyaaieko chha

sumghiya sumsadbaata paarita agaami arthika warsako nepaala sarakaarako niti tathaa kaaryakramamaa thaaunmaa biopikaa laagi bhautika purwaadhaara nirmaana garne ullekha chha bhane sokaa laagi karoda bajeta winiyojana garieko chha

simaa suraksaasahita wibhinna kaaryaadesa paaeko sasastra praharile saangathanika punahsumrachanaa gardai chaalu awamaa biopi sthaapanaako laksya lieko chha bhane kramasah yasalaai wistaara gari dirghakaalamaa samma banaaune yojanaa aghi saareko chha yasari wistaara gardaa simaa suraksaamaa hajaarasamma suraksaakarmi khataaunuparne dekhieko chha yasakaa laagi kariba hajaara janasaktiko darabandi thapna balale nepaala sarakaarasanga agraha gareko chha

simaamaa hune laagu ausadhako kaarowaara chori nikaasi ra paithaari rokera raajaswa chuhaawata rokna sasastra praharile yogadaana gariraheko chha chaalu awako gata maaghasammamaa biopikaa kaarana karoda laakha raajaswa sumkalana bhaeko chha

prati nau kilomitaramaa biopi raakhna thaaliepachhi suraksaakarmile paidala gasti garna pani sahaja bhaeko chha nepaala ra bhaaratakaa sasastra prahariko gata warsa pokharaamaa sampanna sumyukta baithakako sahamatianusaara dui desakaa simaa naakaamaa sahayataa kaksaa sthaapanaa gardaa duwaitarpha aparaadha ra chori paithaari ghateko chha dui desakai sahamatimaa simaakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa sarbhilensa sisi kyaamaraa jadaana garne kaarya pani bhairaheko chha
raastriya sasastra prahari bala prasiksana pratisthaana maataatirthamaa sumchaalita sisum sasastra prahari niriksaka adhaarabhuta taalima sampanna bhaeko chha

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale mumgalabaara sohi pratisthaanamaa ayojita taalimako diksaanta kawaajamaa ukta taalimamaa sarwaprathama bhaekaa prasiksaarthi sasastra prahari niriksaka raamakumaara ghimirelaai utkarista puraskaaraswarupa khundaa pradaana garnukaa saathai kawaaja chaandamaari ra sahisnautaatarpha utkarista bhaekaa prasiksaarthiharulaai puraskaara pradaana gare

diksaanta samaarohamaa sammaananiya pradhaanamantri kepisarmaa oliko subhakaamanaa sandesa waachana garieko thiyo sammaananiya pradhaanamantri olile subhakaamanaa sandesa maarphata sasastra prahari bala nepaalale uchcha wyawasaayikataa anusaasana ra imaandaaritaakaa saatha raajyapradatta kaaryaadesa sampaadana gardai airaheko ra sasastra prahari bala nepaalale sampaadana garne jimmewaarimaa thapa kusalataa tathaa daksataa abhiwariddhi garna awasyaka janasakti ra saadhanasrota wyawasthaapana gardai sumgathanako sudaridhikarana gari eka adhunika ra wyawasaayika suraksaa nikaayako rupamaa wikaasa garna sarakaara sadaiwa kriyaasila raheko ra haala wiswa lagaayata nepaala kobhida ko mahaamaaribaata gujriraheko wisama paristhitimaa sameta soko niyantranakaa laagi nepaala sarakaarako niti tathaa nirnaya kaaryaanwayana garaaune sandarbhamaa simita saadhana ra srotakaa waawajuda sasastra prahari bala nepaalale kheliraheko bhumikaako muktakanthale prasumsaa gardai raajyale sumpieko hareka daayitwalaai wyawasaayika ewum anusaasanakaa saatha sasastra prahari bala nepaalale raastra ra janataako sewaamaa aphno jiwanalaai samaahita gareko kuraa itihaasa ra wartamaanale pustyaai gareko ullekha gardai diksita adhikaritaharulaai kathina phauji taalima saphalataapurwaka sampanna garekomaa badhaai dinukaa saathai kaaryaksetramaa saphalataako kaamanaa gare

maananiya garihamantri raamabahaadura thaapaa baadalale subhakaamanaa sandesa maarphata prasiksaarthiharule taalimabaata sikekaa jnaana kalaa ra kausalako upayoga gari bholikaa dinamaa dekhaaparna sakne suraksaa chunautiharulaai maanawiya mulya ra maanyataaprati pratiwadwa rahi suraksaa sewaa pradaana garna saphala rahane wiswaasa wyakta garnukaa saathaie samaajamaa saanti suraksaa kaayama huna sakemaa maatra samagra raastrako wikaasa ewum samunnati sambhawa hune ullekha gardai raajya pradatta kaaryadesaharumaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalale utkarista kaarya sampaadana gariraheko ra wisesa gari simaa suraksaamaa puyaaeko yogadaana prasumsaniya raheko bataae

diksaanta kawaajakaa pramukha atithi sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale nepaala sarakaarako samariddha nepaala sukhi nepaaliko mahaana raastriya abhiyaanalaai saphala paarna ra susaasanako pratyaabhutikaa laagi sasastra prahari bala nepaala sadaiwa kriyaasila raheko bataaudai diksita adhikaritaharulaai kaaryaksetramaa saphalataako subhakaamanaa wyakta gare

unale kobhida ko mahaamaari niyantranamaa sameta sakala darjaakaa raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharu daridha wiswaasakaasaatha agrapumktimaa rahi ahoraatra khatii raheko ra soko sabai ksetrabaata prasumsaa bhairaheko ullekha gardai diksita adhikaritaharulaai kaaryaksetramaa khatindaa sadaiwa raastra ra janataakaa laagi aphno sampurna sukha suwidhaaharulaai tyaagera jimmewaari nirwaahamaa jutirahana nirdesana die

mahaaniriksaka khanaalale sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa raastrasewakaharu desakaa wibhinna bhaagaharumaa tainaatha rahi raastriyataako jagernaa ewum naagarikako sewaa suraksaa tathaa sahayoga ra apata wipadmaa uddaara kaaryamaa raajyale sumpieko daayitwa puraa gardai prabhaawakaari dhumgale parichaalita hundai airaheko ra sumgathanakaa netaritwa tahakaa kamaandaraharule aphu maatahatakaalaai abhibhaawakatwa pradaana gardai sadaiwa kaaryaprati utprerita ra hausallaa pradaana garnuparne saathai raastra raastriyataa ra raastriya akhandataa jogaauna eka dhikkaa bhaera eka matakaa saatha kaarya garna nirdesana die

kaaryakramamaa so pratisthaanakaa kaaryakaari nirdesaka sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka pusparaama kesile prasiksaarthi adhikaritaharulaai sapatha grahana garaaekaa thie haptaa awadhiko ukta taalimamaa janaa sasastra prahari niriksakaharule saphalataapurwaka taalima sampanna garekaa chhan

diksaanta samaarohamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakaharu pusparaama kesi naaraayanabaabu thaapaa ra raamasarana paudela lagaayata sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa baristha adhikaritaharu ewum adhikarita jawaanaharuko sameta upasthiti raheko thiyo

paschima nawalaparaasiko prataapapura gaaunpaalikaa paachapedaa ra saraawala gaaunpaalikaa khajuraa kholaako kinaarabaata mumgalabaara epiepha tolile wibhinna kisimakaa laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa sohi jillaako saraawala gaaunpaalikaa raamagraama basne warsiya jogendra harijana chhan unalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta bhujahawaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile pakraau gareko ho
daarchulaako chhaanarumaa sasastra prahari balako bordara auta posta biopi sthaapanaa bhaeko chha

budhabaara sasastra prahariko kaarya ewum simaa suraksaa wibhaagakaa pramukha eaiji naaraayanabaabu thaapaako upasthitimaa sasastra prahariko biopi sthaapanaa bhaeko janaaieko chha bhaaratale bhumi atikramana gari sadaka banaaeko ksetradekhi najikai sasastra praharile biopi sthaapanaa garekaae haae

biopi sthaapanaakaa laagi nepaali senaako helikoptaramaarphata sasastra prahari atirikta prahari mahaaniriksaka naaraayanabaabu thaapaa garihamantri raamabahaadura thaapaakaa suraksaa sallaahakaara indrajita raai pramukha jillaa adhikaari yadunaatha paudela lagaayata suraksaa adhikaariharu biopimaa khatine janaa sasastra prahari lagaayata suraksaakarmi ra sanchaarakarmi chhaanaru gaekaa thie

wiwaadita kaalaapaani ksetrabaata kilomitara wara sthaapita biopiko netaritwa sasastra prahari niriksaka lilibahaadura chandale gardaichhan yahi thaaunmaa nepaala prahariko chauki pani chha yadyapi baahrai mahinaa suraksaakarmiko upasthiti bhane yahaan hune gareko chhaina
lipulekamaa bhaaratale ekatarphi sadaka banaaera udghaatana garepachhi tyasa ksetrako simaa suraksaakaa laagi nepaali senaako helikaptaramaa sasastra prahariko toli pathaaune tayaari garieko chha

gariha mantraalayakaa prawaktaa kedaaranaatha sarmaale budhabaara sasastra prahariko phauja pathaauna likhitarupamaa nirdesana diisakeko jaanakaari die unakaa anusaara dolilaai senaako helikaptarale chhaanaru puyaaune chha

chaaradinaaghi bhaaratako pithauraagadhabaata nepaalako kaalaapaanisthita gunji hundai chinako maanasarowara jaane lipu bhanyaanasammako sadaka nirmaana gari bhaaratale udghaatana garepachhi yasako sarwatra wirodha bhairaheko chha tyasaile simaa raksaakaa laagi sarakaarale tatkaalai tyasa ksetramaa sasastrako toli pathaauna laageko ho

chhaanaru bhaaratiya simaabaata eka kilomitarako durimaa parchha bhane chinako simaa ksetra kilomitarako durimaa chha pahilo charanamaa simaa nigaraani chaukimaa janaa sasastra prahari khataaine janaaieko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala num gulmakaa pramukha sasastra prahari naayaba upariksaka dambarabahaadura wistakaa anusaara prahari niriksaka milibahaadura chandako netaritwamaa toli pathaaune tayaari garieko chha

sarakaarale gata mansiramaa nai yahaan wiopi raakhne nirnaya gareko thiyo tatkaalina awasthaamaa simaa ksetramaa sasastra prahariko wiopi thiyo mansiramaa sarakaarale wiopi sthaapanaa garne nirnaya gareko thiyo

tyasapachhi jammaa sthaanamaa maatrai wiopi sthaapanaa bhaeko sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka prawinakumaara sresthale jaanakaari die unakaa anusaara sarakaari nirnayapachhi bhaaratako simaa ksetramaa ra eutaa sankhuwaasabhaako kimaathaankaamaa raakhisakieko chha tatkaalina samayamaa uttari naakaamaa saata ra baanki daksinai simaanaamaa wiopi raakhne nirnaya bhaeko thiyo

humlaako hilsaa mustaanako koralaa daarchulaako chhaanaru taaplejunako olaanachunagolaa tathaa rasuwaa ra sindhupaalchokako simaa ksetramaa kramasah wiopi raakhne tayaari yasaaghi nai garieko thiyo tara kaaryaanwayana huna sakeko thiena ahile bhane bhaaratale simaa atikramana garepachhimaatrai taato laagera chhaanarumaa wiopi raakhna laagieko ho

haala kaayama raheko sthaanamaa sasastrako simaa nigaraani chauki raheko chha eutaa chaukimaa sasastra prahari rahekaa chhan eka suraksaa chaukiko duri jhandai kilomitarako durimaa raheko chha yasalaai duri ghataaunuparne awasyakataa chha yasaaghi garihamantri raamabahaadura thaapaale haala asthaayirupamaa simaa ksetramaa khatiekaa sasastra tolilaai sthaayirupamaa raakhnakaa laagi awasyaka prakriyaa suru bhaeko bataaisakekaa chhan

sasastrakaa toli pathaauna gariha mantraalayale nepaali senaako emaai helikaptara chaartara gareko chha mausama anukula bhaemaa budhabaara helikaptara udne nepaali senaakaa prawaktaa wijnaanadewa paandele jaanakaari die

ahile kobhida ko sankramana jokhimakaa kaarana sarakaarale sasastrako asthaayisahita simaa ksetramaa eka hajaara nigaraani posta sthaapanaa gareko chha simaawarti jillaamaa hajaarabaata badhaaera hajaara sasastra prahariko phauja parichaalana garieko chha raasasa
sasastra praharikaa sasastra prahari naayaba upariksaka diesapi haru sasastra prahari upariksaka esapi badhuwaako laagi siphaarisa bhaekaa chhan

sasastra prahari bala nepaalako badhuwaa samitile sukrawaara saanjha saarwajanika gareko siphaarisa suchianusaara sasastra prahari naayaba upariksaka diesapi haru samikakumaara maharjana mahesa adhikaari dipakakumaara thaapaa raaju srestha bijayakumaara kesi sudhira suwedi ra suresa saapakotaa manoja thaapaa prakaasakumaara suwedi badhuwaako laagi siphaarisa bhaeko ullekha chha

tyastai sasastra prahari naayaba upariksaka diesapi haru dipendra kuwanra ka surendra budhaathoki harkabahaadura bista mahesa kesi sumjaya bhattaraai arjuna khatri janakaraaja basneta narabahaadura raawata dipendra giri subhaasa bhandaari raajendra thaapaa purnabahaadura saauda ra dronakumaara bista pani sasastra prahari upariksaka esapi badhuwaako laagi siphaarisa bhaekaa chhan
bhaaratasanga simaa jodiekaa daarchulaakaa thaaunmaa sasastra prahariko bordara autaposta biopi raakhne tayaari garieko chha

garihamantraalayako nirdesanamaa sasastra prahari balale daarchulaakaa thapa nayaan tina thaaunmaa biopi raakhne tayaari garieko ho yasakaa laagi sasastra prahari balale so sambandhi kaaryayojanaakaa khaakaa tayaara paarera maathillo nikaayamaa pathaaieko sasastra prahari bala nepaala num gulmakaa sasastra prahari naayaba upariksaka dammarabahaadura wistale bataae

daarchulaako lekama gaaunpaalikaa laali maalikaarjuna gaaunpaalikaa jolajiwi ra wyaasa gaaunpaalikaa dumlinamaa sasastra prahariko biopi raakhna sakine kaaryayojanaa pathaaieko prahari naayaba upariksaka wistale bataae

yasaaghi daarchulaako wyaasa gaaunpaalikaa chhaangarumaa biopi raakhne nirnaya bhaisakeko chha sadaramukaama khalangaamaa raheko sasastra praharilaai bhaaratasanga pratyaksa simaa jodiekaa ksetramaa parichaalana garna laagieko ho

koronaa bhaairasasanga ladiraheko sarakaarale sasastra praharilaai desabharikaa bhaaratasanga simaa jodiekaa ksetramaa khataaisakeko chha simaa parichaalana gariekaa sasastra praharilaai sthaayirupamaa biopi sthaapanaa gari parichaalana garna laageko ho

nepaalatarphako simaanaakaamaa bhaaratako biopi rahekaa chhan nepaala sarakaarale pani sohi anupaatamaa biopi thapne tayaari gareko ho sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulmale bioepi rahane sthaana awasyaka purwaadhaaralagaayatakaa wisayamaa jaanakaari garaaisakeko chha

koronaa sankramanakaa kaarana simaa silapachhi wistaara gariekaa asthaayi postalaai biopimaa rupaantarana garne sarakaari tayaari chha simaa silakaa laagi dhanagadhi mahendranagarabaata jillaamaa lyaaieko thapa janasaktilaai nayaan sthaapanaa hune biopimai raakhne kaaryayojanaa chha raasasa

sasastra prahari bala nepaala namwara gadhimaai baahini mukhyaalaya makawaanapurabaata khatieko epiepha tolile so sthaanamaa bewaarise awasthaamaa boraamaa raakheko ullekhita parimaanako gaanjaa phelaa parepachhi baraamada gareko ho
gariha mantraalayale sasastra prahari waristha upariksaka esaesapiharuko saruwaa ra padasthaapana gareko chha
waisaakha gate baseko mantristarako baithakale sasastra prahari bala sewaa saadhaarana samuha saadhaarana upasamuhatarpha saruwaa ra padasthaapana gareko ho
rautahatamaa sukrawaara raati aeko bhisana haawaahurile sasastra prahari basne ghara bhatkindaa ekajanaa hawaldaarasahita janaa prahari ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

ghaaite hunemaa sasastra prahari hawaladaara jumgabahaadura daraai prahari jawaanaharu dhirendra saaha kalawaara birendra saaha kaanu ra prathalaala srestha rahekaa chhan uniharuko bumkulasthita sthaaniya aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko ra awasthaa saamaanya rahekaae biopikaa inchaarja prahari niriksaka dipanarasimha raaile jaanakaari die
bumkulasthita sasastra prahari bordara autapostako kaaryaalaya sthaapanaa dekhi nai khapadaa ra karkatako chhaanaa raheko kachchi gharamaa basdai aekaa chhan
baaraamaa sasastra praharikaa jawaanale byaarekabhitrai atmahatyaa garekaa chhan

baaraako pathalaiyaasthita sasastra prahari bala nambara gulma raajaswa chuhaawata niyantrana kaaryaalayamaa kaaryarata sasastra prahari jawaana bimala bhandaarile byaareka bhitrai atmahatyaa garekaa hun

jitapurasimaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa narabasti ghara bhaekaa warsiya bhandaarile byaarekabhitra raheko suraksaa postamaa jhundiera atmahatyaa garekaa hun byaarekakaa suraksaakarmile sukrabaara bihaana bhandaarilaai jhundiraheko awasthaamaa dekhepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya simaraakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka diesapi gowinda purile bhandaariko sawa pariksanakaa laagi wiraganja pathaaeko jaanakaara die
dhanusaako bideha nagarapaalikaa kamalaarapattibaata bihibaara epiepha tolile kariwa chaara laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko lattaakapadaa baraamada gareko chha

bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale dui wataa motarasaaikalamaa raakhera nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ukta lattaakapadaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara chhinnamastaa baahini mukhyaalaya mahottari ra nambara gana dhanusaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho tyasawelaa epiepha tolile ukta lattaakapadaa lyaauna prayoga bhaeko dui watai motarasaaikala sameta baraamada gareko chha
epiepha tolile baraamada lattaakapadaa tathaa motarasaaikala bhansaara kaaryaalaya janakapuramaa bujhaaeko chha baraamada motarasaaikalako bhansaara mulya dui laakha rupaiyaan raheko chha
daanako bhaaratasanga simaa jodieko raajapura gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num ko khaamgraa naakaamaa aja sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta sthaapanaa garieko chha

postako budhabaara sasastra prahari bala nepaala num pramukha sasastra prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka naaraayanadatta paudela ra daanakaa pramukha jillaa adhikaari gowindaprasaada rijaalale sumyuktarupamaa udghaatana gare

kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka naaraayanadatta paudelale simaa suraksaa bala sthaapanaapachhi aba simaamaa hune aparaadha niyantrana garne laaguausadha osaarapasaara jastaa aparaadhika gatiwidhilaai niyantrana garne bataae
unale bhaaratasanga simaanaa jodiekaa wataa naakaamaa sasastra prahariko bordara auta posta sthaapanaa garne nepaala sarakaarako laksya raheko bataae

daanakaa pramukha jillaa adhikaari gowindaprasaada rijaalale yo arthika warsamaa daanako simaa naakaamaa wataa prastaawita sasastra prahariko kyaampa sthaapanaa garne laksya rahe taapani haalasamma tina wataa sthaapanaa garna saphala bhaeko ra baaki nau wataa kyaampa sthaapanaa garnakaa laagi kaaryayojanaa banaairaheko jaanakaari die

raajapura gaaunpaalikaakaa adhyaksa lokaraaja kesile naakaa ksetramaa sasastra prahariko kyaampa sthaapanaa hunu atyantai khusiko kuraa bhaeko bataaundai aba naakaakaa baasindaa bhaaratiya naagarika ra bhaaratiya suraksaakarmisanga hepinu naparne bataae

gasunapathari ra khaamgraa naakaamaa sthaapanaa bhaekaa sasastra prahariko bhautika sumrachanaa nirmaanakaa laagi paanchapaancha laakha upalabdha garaauna gaaunpaalikaabaata nirnaya bhaisakeko sameta gaaunpaalikaakaa adhyaksa kesile bataae

yasaaghi raajaapura gaaunpaalikaako sunapathari ra koilaabaasa naakaamaa sasastra prahariko posta sthaapanaa bhaisakekaa chhan patauli guruna bhaisaahi bhauwaa siriyaa bhaurisaala musinaakaa ra dagamaaraa naakaa sasastra prahariko bordara auta posta sthaapanaa garnakaa laagi prastaawita naakaa hun

yi prastaawita naakaamaa sasastra prahariko watai kyaampa kamtimaa chhadekhi saata kilomitarako durimaa rahanechhan haalalaai khaamgraa naakaamaa rahekaa mahilaako ujyaalo samuhako saamudaayika bhawanalaai taarawaara garera kyaampa banaaieko chha

sasastra prahari niriksaka rupachandra thaapaako kaandamaa janaako toli tyahaan khataaieko chha so awasaramaa nambara gana hedakwaatara jwaalaamaai bhaalubaanakaa ganapati esapi naaraayana srestha lagaayatako sahabhaagitaa thiyo

upasthita sthaaniyale warsaumdekhi bhaaratiya suraksaakarmi ra bhaaratiya naagarikako jyaadati sahanu pareko ra sasastra prahariko posta sthaapanaa bhaepachhi aba jyaadati sahanuparne chhaina bhani khusi bhaekaa chhan

uniharule naakaamaa raajyako upasthiti bhaepachhi garwale sira uchcha bhaekosameta bataaekaa chhan bhaaratasanga simaanaa jodieko yo naakaamaa gharadhuri basobaasa garekaa chhan daanako ghoraahidekhi daksinamaa kilomitarako durimaa yo naakaa awasthita chha

morana jillaako biraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita bhansaara kaaryaalayako nambara dhaatabaata mumgalabaara epiepha tolile wibhinna kisimakaa laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa sohi jillaako belawaari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya wipina ksetri chhan unalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma moranabaata khatieko epiepha tolile pakraau gareko ho

bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ullekhita mulya baraabarako lattaakapadaa ra juttaachappala sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara chhinnamastaa baahini mahottari ra nambara gana dhanusaabaata sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka dambarabahaadura raanaako kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho
epiepha tolile baraamada saamaana bhansaara kaaryaalaya janakapuramaa bujhaaeko chha

di ela esa e di namwarako bhaaratiya motarasaaikalamaa raakhera bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale nepaalatarpha lyaaudai gareko ullekhita mulya baraabarako ausadhi sasastra prahari bala nepaala namwara gana rautahatabaata sasastra prahari sahaayaka niriksaka binodakumaara chaudhariko kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho

epiepha tolile tyasabelaa ukta ausadhi lyaauna prayoga bhaeko ukta motarasaaikalasameta baraamada gareko chha baraamada ausadhi tathaa motarasaaikala sthaaniya bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko chha so motarasaaikalako bhansaara daakhilaa mulya hajaara rupaiyaan raheko chha
rupandehi jillaako siddhaarthanagara nagarapaalikaa dandaa ilaakaabaata chaitra gate epiepha tolile kariwa eka laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko saamaana baraamada gareko chha

bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ullekhita mulya baraabarako lattaakapadaa tathaa iloktroniksa saamaana sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma rupandehibaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho
baraamada saamaana bhansaara kaaryaalaya bhairahawaamaa bujhaaieko chha
rautahata jillaako yamunaamaai gaaunpaalikaa raajapura tulasibaata somabaara epiepha tolile pestolasahita eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
baraamada gariekaa hatiyaarasahita baitullaalaai awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatamaa bujhaaieko chha

mahottari jillaako samsi gaanupaalikaa kanahasthita simaa ilaakaabaata phaaguna gate epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile koreksa ra naaitrobheta naamaka laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa sohi jillaako bardibaasa nagarapaalikaa basne barsiya birendra mandala chhan unalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta samsibaata khatieko epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile koreksa botala ra naaitrobheta tyaableta wataasahita pakraau gareko ho

yasaigari sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta phulagaabhaabaata khatieko epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile dhanusaa jillaako mukhiyaapatti gaanupaalikaa jamunighaatasthita simaa ilaakaabaata eksiplona naamaka laaguausadha botalasahita phaaguna gate eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa mahottari jillaako jaleswara nagarapaalikaa basne barsiya ramesakaanta chaudhari chhan ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa sawaara nija chaudharilaai jaancha gardaa ukta laaguausadha phelaa parepachhi pakraau garieko ho
pakraau parekaa chaudharilaai baraamada laaguausadhasahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sthaaniya praharimaa bujhaaieko chha
baaraa jillaako parawaanipura gaanupaalikaa baata chaitra gate epiepha tolile srota nakhuleko laakha hajaara saya nepaali rupaiyaansahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa bhaarata ghara bataaune barsiya inaamola ra barsiya isaa alama chhan sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa besa jitapurabaata khatieko epiepha tolile nijaharulaai ukta rupaiyaansahita pakraau gareko ho

bhaaratabaata dui wataa motarasaaikalamaa raakhera awaidha rupale bhansaara chhali lyaaudai gareko awasthaamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara chhinnamastaa baahini mahottari ra nambara gana dhanusaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho

epiepha tolile tyasawelaa ukta saamaana lyaauna prayoga bhaeko dui wataa motarasaaikala sameta baraamada gareko chha epiepha tolile baraamada saamaana tathaa motarasaaikala bhansaara kaaryaalaya janakapuramaa bujhaaeko chha ukta motarasaaikalaharuko bhansaara daakhila mulya dui laakha rupaiyaan raheko chha
baaraa jillaako kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa pakadighaatabaata phaaguna gate epiepha tolile wibhinna kisimakaa laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa sisuwaa mahesapura basne warsiyaa sudhaa miyaa raama chhin unalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta matiarwaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile pakraau gareko ho
yasaigari sirahaa jillaako bhagawaanapura gaaunpaalikaa sthita abhayanagarabaata phaaguna gate epiepha tolile wibhinna kisimakaa laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

raastriya sasastra prahari bala prasiksana pratisthaana maataatirtha kaathamaadaummaa sumchaalita sisum praawidhika sasastra prahari adhikarita adhaarabhuta taalima sampanna bhaeko chha

so pratisthaanakaa kaaryakaari nirdesaka sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka pusparaama kesile phaaguna gate ukta taalimako samaapana garnubhayo tyasaawasaramaa uhaanle taalimakaa utkarista prasiksaarthiharulaai puraskaara pradaana garnubhayo

sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka kesile tyasaawasaramaa asahaja paristhitikaa belaa sameta kattipani wichalita nabhai kartawya nirwaaha garna tallina rahanu parne suraksaakarmiko pesaagata daayitwa raheko charchaa garnuhundai kaaryaksetramaa gaepachhi aphno jimmewaarilaai pesaagata imaandaaritaakaasaatha puraa garna prasiksaarthiharu saksama rahane wiswaasa wyakta garnubhayo

uhaanle prasiksaarthiharule taalimako dauraanamaa sikekaa jnaanalaai kaaryaksetramaa sadhaim upayoga garnuparne charchaa garnuhundai yasabaata kaaryasaphalataamaa saghaau pugne bataaunubhayo sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka kesile raastra ra sumgathanale lieko laksya praaptikaa laagi sasastra prahari karmachaariharule saamuhika bhaawanaakaasaatha imaandaaritaapurwaka kaaryaksetramaa parichaalita rahanuparne kuraa sameta ullekha garnubhayo

kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari niriksaka suwarna bamale taalima sambandhi pratiwedana prastuta garnubhaeko thiyo so taalimamaa praawidhika sasastra prahari niriksaka daaraahula srestha sarwaprathama bhaekaa chhan bhane praawidhika sasastra prahari naayawa niriksaka saphalataa bhasimaa kawaaja prathama praawidhika sasastra prahari naayawa niriksaka manisa kaarki chaandamaari prathama tathaa praawidhika sasastra prahari naayawa niriksaka asokakumaara yaadawa sahisnautaatarpha prathama bhaekaa chhan

kariba tina mahinaa awadhiko so taalimamaa chaara janaa praawidhika sasastra prahari niriksaka ra janaa praawidhika sasastra prahari naayawa niriksakasahita kula janaa prasiksaarthiharuko sahabhaagitaa raheko thiyo

so samaarohamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka naaraayanabaabu thaapaa prasiksaarthi adhikaritaharukaa abhibhaawaka warga lagaaeta sasastra prahari adhikarita tathaa jawaanaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo
