epiepha tolile baraamada saamaana tathaa ukta motarasaaikala bhansaara kaaryaalaya janakapuramaa bujhaaeko chha baraamada motarasaaikalako bhansaara daakhilaa mulya dui laakha rupaiyaan raheko chha
dhanusaa jillaako dhanauji gaaunpaalikaa sthita bhadariyaa naakaabaata phaaguna gate epiepha tolile botala ekjiplona sirapha naamaka laaguausadhasahita eka janalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa sohi jillaako janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya akaasa raaina chhan motarasaaikalamaa sawaara nija raainalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta thaadijhinjaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa unako saathamaa ullekhita parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa parepachhi pakraau gareko ho

tyasawelaa epiepha tolile nija raainale prayoga gareko ukta motarasaaikala sameta baraamada gareko chha pakraau parekaa nija raainalaari baraamada laaguausadha ra motarasaaisahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaamaa bujhaaieko chha

nepaala epiepha klawako waarsika saadhaaranasabhaa sukrabaara sampanna bhaeko chha sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalaya halchoka swayambhumaa bhaeko so saadhaarana sabhaako nepaala epiepha klawa khedakuda nirdesaka samitikaa adhyaksa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka pusparaama kesile paanasamaa dwipa prajjwalana gari udghaatana garnubhaeko thiyoe

sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka kesile tyasaawasaramaa nepaala epiepha klabamaa awaddha khelaadiharule klawako sthaapanaakaala dekhinai raastriya tathaa antarraastriya khelakuda pratiyogitaaharumaa sahabhaagi bhai praapta gareko saphalataale raastra ra sumgathanako gaurawa badhaaeko charchaa garnuhundai khelaadi utpaadanamaa nepaala epiepha klawale puyaaeko yogadaanako charchaa garnubhayo
uhaanle khelaadi raastrakaa gahanaa bhaeko charchaa garnuhundai sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa khelaadiharuko ksamataa abhibariddhikaa laagi sumgathanale dhyaana puyaairaheko bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka kesile khelakuda haamro swaasthyasanga pratyaksa jodieko wisaya bhaeko tathaa khelakudale anusaasita samaajako sarijanaa gari samaaja ewum samagra raastrako pragatimaa sameta sahayoga puyaaune bataaunubhayo
so klawakaa adhyaksa sasastra prahari upariksaka tulsiraama daahaalale klawako arthika warsa ko ayawyaya wiwarana prastuta garnuhundai bhaawi yojanaabaare charchaa garnubhayo

sasastra prahari upariksaka daahaalale so klawale wyaadamintana lanatenisa ra mahilaa bhalibala gari tina wataa raastriya pratiyogitaaharu nirantara sumchaalana gardai raastrako khelakudako wikaasamaa yogadaana puyaaudai airaheko kuraa sameta bataaunubhayo

samaarohamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka naaraayanabaawu thaapaa tathaa awakaasa praapta sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka daa karisnakumaara taamaanga lagaayata sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa baristha adhikaritaharu nepaala epiepha klawakaa sadasyaharu ewum so klawakaa khelaadiharuko sameta upasthiti raheko thiyo
rautahata jillaako gaura nagarapaalikaa sthita sabagadaabaata phaaguna gate epiepha tolile kariwa eka laakha dui hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko lattaakapadaa baraamada gareko chha
bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ukta lattaakapadaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa rautahatabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho
epiepha tolile baraamada lattaakapadaa bhansaara kaaryaalaya gauramaa bujhaaeko chha
kapilawastu jillaako kapilawastu nagarapaalikaa dagaribaata kaagajapatra nabhaeko bhaaratiya nambara pletako eutaa maarsala jipa phaaguna gate epiepha tolile baraamada gareko chha

yu pi e nambarako bhaaratiya maarsala jipalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta maryaadaapurabaata khatieko epiepha tolile jaancha gardaa ukta jipako kaagajapatra nabhaepachhi baraamada garieko ho
baraamada jipa epiepha tolile bhansaara kaaryaalaya sunaulimaa bujhaaeko chha baraamada jipako bhansaara dakhilaa mulya laakha hajaara rupaiyaan raheko chha
sarlaahi jillaako brahampuri gaanupaalikaa baata phaaguna gate epiepha tolile kariba dui laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko lattaakapadaa baraamada gareko chha
bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa ukta lattaakapadaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa sarlaahibaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho
baraamada lattaakapadaa sthaaniya bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko chha
chhaithaum nepaala epiepha skula kapa adhaarabhuta taha amantrita phutabala pratiyogitaa ko upaadhi nepaala pulisa skula saangaale haata paareko chha

widyaalaya wyawasthaapana samitikaa adhyaksa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka raamasarana paudelako pramukha atithyamaa phaaguna gate sampanna phaainala khelamaa nepaala pulisa skulale grina bhijeja ejukesana phaaundesana skula kirtipuralaai gola antarale paraajita gari upaadhi jitna saphala bhaeko ho

nepaala epiepha skula kirtipura kaathamaadaumko ayojanaamaa sumchaalita so pratiyogitaako samaapana samaarohamaa sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka bumsiraaja daahaalale wijayi tima tathaa khelaadiharulaai kapa padaka tathaa pramaanapatra pradaana garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale praawidhika sasastra prahari naayawa upariksakamaa padonnati bhaekaa chaara janaalaai maagha gate sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalaya halachoka swayambhumaa dajryaani chinha pradaana garnubhayo
uhaanharu nepaala sarakaara gariha mantraalaya sachiwa starako yahi maagha gateko nirnayale praawidhika sasastra prahari niriksakabaata praawidhika naayawa upariksakamaa padonnati hunu bhaeko ho

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale so awasaramaa darjaasangai jimmewaari ra uttaradaayitwa sameta badhne ullekha garnuhundai agaami dinamaa ajhabadhi kartawyanista ra imaandaaritaa purwaka swaasthya sewaa pradaana garna sasastra prahari balakaa chikitsakaharulaai nirdesana dinubhayo

epiepha aspataalalaai ajhai badhi utkarista banaauna saamuhika bhaawanakaasaatha pesaako maryaadaa raakhdai sabaile aaphno thaaunbaata mehanata garirahanu parne bataaunuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale aspataalalaai awasyaka purwadhaaraharu kramika rupamaa thapidai lagieko kuraa sameta ullekha garnubhayo

swaasthyakarmiharuko dharma ra karma bhanekai wiraamiharulaai utkarista upachaara sewaa pradaana garnu raheko ullekha garnuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale sakala darjaakaa raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharuko barittiwikaasa lagaayata wibhinna sewaa suwidhaaharu pradaana garnakaa laagi aphuharu kariyaasila raheko bataaunubhayo
uhaanle epiepha aspataalamaa swaasthya sewaa prabhaawakaari banaauna wijna chikitsaka lagaayata saadhana srota upalabdha garaaundai lagieko ullekha garnubhayo

samaarohamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakaharu pusparaama kesi naaraayanabaawu thaapaa ra raamasarana paudela lagaayata sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa baristha adhikaritaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo
tribhuwana wiswabidyaalaya ra sasastra prahari bala nepaalako sahakaaryamaa sumchaalita sisum uchchastariya wyawasthaapana taalima ra sisum wyawasthaapana tathaa yojanaa taalima sampanna bhaeko chha

tribhuwana wiswabidyaalayakaa upakulapati daa dharmakaanta baaskotaale phaaguna gate sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalaya halchoka swayambhumaa ayojita samaapana samaarohamaa sisum uchchastariya wyawasthaapana taalima saphalataapurwaka sampanna garnubhaekaa sasastra prahari adhikaritaharulaai pramaanapatra pradaana garnubhayo

sohi awasaramaa sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale sisum wyawasthaapana tathaa yojanaa taalima saphalataapurwaka sampanna garnubhaekaa sasastra prahari adhikaritaharulaai pramaanapatra pradaana garnubhayo tyasaawasaramaa upakulapati daa dharmakaanta baaskotaale jnaana jati baadna sakiyo tyati nai badhne charchaa garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale sumgathanako laksya tathaa uddesya praaptikaa laagi netaritwa tahamaa rahane adhikaritaharukaa laagi awasyaka kusala wyawasthaapakiya ksamataa yojanaa tarjumaa tathaa netaritwa ksamataa bikaasakaa laagi sumgathanale nirantara rupamaa wisesa mahatwakaasaatha yastaa taalimaharu sumchaalana gardai airaheko bataaunubhayo

uhaanle bholikaa dinamaa saamgathaanika kaamakaarawaahi chusta durusta tathaa utkarista dhumgale prabhaawakaari rupamaa sampaadana garnakaa laagi yastaa uchchastariya taalimako wisesa mahatwa rahane ullekha garnubhayo

tribhuwana wiswabidyaalayakaa rektara praadaa siwalaala bhusaalale taalimabaata praapta jnaanako upayoga gardai prasiksaarthi sasastra prahari adhikaritaharule kaaryaksetramaa utkarista natijaa haasila garne wiswaasa wyakta garnubhayo taalimakaa sumyojaka tribhuwana wiswabidyaalayakaa sahapraadhyaapaka daa narendraraaja paudelale tyasaawasaramaa taalimako mahatwamaathi prakaasa paarnubhaeko thiyo

eka mahinaa kaarya awadhiko uchchastariya wyawasthaapana taalimamaa janaa sasastra prahari baristha upariksakaharu tathaa wyawasthaapana tathaa yojanaa taalimamaa janaa sasastra prahari upariksakaharu prasiksaarthiko rupamaa sahabhaagi rahekaa thie

kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakaharu pusparaama kesi naaraayanabaawu thaapaa ra raamasarana paudela lagaaeta sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa baristha adhikaritaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo

jhaapaa jillaako mechinagara nagarapaalikaa sthita nakalabanda ilaakaabaata phaaguna gate epiepha tolile kariwa paancha laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko saamaana baraamada gareko chha

bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ullekhita mulya baraabarako lattaakapadaa motara paartsa ra ausadhi sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma hekwaa jhaapaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho
epiepha tolile baraamada saamaana bhansaara kaaryaalaya kaankadabhittaamaa bujhaaeko chha

yasaigari sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma hekwaa jhaapaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile phaaguna gate kariba dui laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko wibhinna kisimako ausadhi baraamada gareko chha

bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa ukta ausadhi jhaapaa jillaako mechinagara nagarapaalikaa jorasimalabaata baraamada garieko ho baraamada ausadhi bhansaara kaaryaalaya kaankadabhittaamaa bujhaaieko chha
sasastra prahari niriksaka padako aikyu pariksaako natijaa prakaasita bhaekaae chha
sasastra prahari bala nepaalako prawaktaamaa sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka diaiji prawinakumaara srestha niyukta bhaekaa chhan

sumgathanasanga sambandhita suchanaa tathaa jaanakaari sumgathanako kaaryaksetra bhitrakaa samaachaaraharu tathaa sumgathanabaata sampaadana bhaekaa janasarokaarakaa wisayaharu lagaaetakaa wibhinna suchanaaharu prawaaha garne jimmewaari unalaai diieko chha

baanke jillaako nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita chaulikaabaata epiepha tolile phaaguna gate kariwa eka laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko lattaakapadaa baraamada gareko chha
bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ukta lattaakapadaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa baankebaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho
baraamada saamaana bhansaara kaaryaalaya nepaalagumjamaa bujhaaieko chha
sirahaako nawaraajapura gaaunpaalikaa sonawarsaa sthita hulaaki sadakabaata aitabaara epiepha tolile kaagajapatra nabhaeko eutaa kaara baraamada gareko chha

biara e ema nambarako bhaaratiya kaaralaai sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa ukta kaarako kaajapatra nabhetiepachhi sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta nawaraajapurabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho
epiepha tolile baraamada kaara thaadi bhansaara kaaryaalaya sirahaamaa bujhaaeko chha baraamada kaarako bhansaara daakhilaa mulya laakha rupaiyaan raheko chha
roga laagnubhandaa roga laagna nadinu raamro bhane jastai wipadbaata jokhima kama garna sasastra prahariko prayaasamaa sthaaniya tahale samarthana janaaeko chha

agalaagi baadhi pahiro durghatanaa sarpadansa ra bhukampajastaa wipadle maanisako jyaana line maatra nabhai samaajalaai nai sakhaapa paarne bhaekaale yasabaata bachna ra bachaauna sasastra prahari bala nepaala num gana hedakwaatara kankaalani moranadwaaraa sthaaniyawaasilaai wipad wyawasthaapana anusiksana taalima suru gareko chha

moranako katahari gaaunpaalikaabaata suru bhaeko dui dine so taalima jillaakaa watai sthaaniya tahamaa janapratinidhilaai dine kaaryakrama raheko sasastra prahari upariksaka netrabahaadura kaarkile jaanakaari die taalimale ksamataa abhiwariddhi garnukaa saathai kunai pani wipad aiparemaa tatkaala uddhaara ewam raahatamaa uhaanharuko sakriya sahabhaagitaa hune ra yasabaata janadhanako ksatilaai kama garna maddata pugne wiswaasa garieko chha

tatkaala raahata ewam uddhaaramaa sakriya hunuparne sasastra prahari nepaala prahari nepaali senaa pugnu agaawai dherai janadhanako ksati hune garekaale sthaaniya tahamaa nai taalika dine ra janadhana haani hunabaachha bachaaune taalimako uddesya raheko chha

dasa laakhabhandaa badhi janasankhyaa raheko moranamaa wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa belabaari nagarapaalikaamaa ago niyantrana garne damakala chha bhane sanuwarsi gaaunpaalikaa ra rangeli nagarapaalikaale sumyuktarupamaa eka damakala kharida gari waripari hune agalaagimaa sewaa pradaana gardai aeko chha

satra wataa sthaaniya tahamaa ahile pani wataa sthaaniya tahamaa damakala chhaina bhane sukhkhaa mausamamaa hune agalaagibaata bachaauna ajhai pani nepaala prahari sasastra prahari ra nepaali senaalaai samasyaa bhairaheko morana prahari upariksaka wiswa adhikaarile jaanakaari die

moranakaa nimitta pramukha jillaa adhikaari anuja bhandaarile wipad wyawasthaapana kaarya sanchaalana ainale pratyeka sthaaniya tahakaa wadaadhyaksalaai wipad wyawasthaapanasambandhi taalima dii sthaaniyastaramai wipad wyawasthaapana samiti banaaunuparne bataaundai wipadmaa uniharuko bhumikaalaai ajha pharaakilo ra kasilo banaauna maddata pugne wiswaasa wyakta gare

katahari gaaunpaalikaakaa adhyaksa raamakumaara kaamatale wipadbaata achhuto naraheko yo gaaunpaalikaamaa taalimale thulo maddata pugne wiswaasa wyakta gardai agaami dinamaa wipad wyawasthaapanakaa laagi bajeta winiyojana garne jaanakaari die raasasa

bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale motarasaaikalamaa raakhi nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ukta lattaakapadaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwa rautahatabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho

tyasawelaa epiepha tolile lattaakapadaa lyaauna prayoga bhaeko eka thaana motarasaaikala sameta baraamada gareko chha baraamada lattaakapadaa tathaa motarasaaikala gaura bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko chha
sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalaya halchoka swayambhumaa wana ra wanyajantu aparaadha niyantrana sambandhi prasiksaka prasiksana tioti taalima sumchaalana bhaeko chha
sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka naaraayanabaawu thaapaale budhabaara sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayamaa ayojita eka kaaryakramakaa bicha ukta taalimako udghaatana gare

so awasaramaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka thaapaale raastrako amulya sampattiko rupamaa raheko wanyajantu tathaa jaiwika wiwidhataako jagernaa garnu sabaiko kartawya raheko charchaa gare unale sasastra prahari balakaa raastrasewakaharu raajyale sumpiyako jimmewaari nirwaahamaa uchcha manowalakaasaatha kariyaasila raheko kuraa sameta ullekha gare

sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka thaapaale wana ra wanyajantu aparaadha niyantranakaa laagi sahayogi siddha rahane yastaa taalimaharu niyamita rupamaa sumchaalana garidaa apeksaakarita upalabdhi haasila huna maddata pugne charchaa gardai sasastra prahari bala nepaalale wanyajantuko chorisikaasi ewum wanyajantu aparaadha niyantranamaa sarokaarawaalaa nikaayaharusanga samanwaya ra sahakaarya gardai kaaryasampaadana gariraheko bataae

sasastra prahari bala nepaala ra kendriya wanyajantu aparaadha niyantrana ikaaiko ayojanaamaa tina dinasamma sumchaalana hune ukta taalimamaa sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka janaa ra sasastra prahari niriksakaharu janaa gari kula janaa prasiksaarthiharuko sahabhaagitaa raheko chha

bhaaratiya nambarako kaaramaa raakhi awaidha rupale nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ukta lattaakapadaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma hekwaa jhaapaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko chha epiepha tolile tyasawelaa lattaakapadaa lyaauna prayoga bhaeko so kaara sameta baraamada gareko chha
baraamada lattaakapadaa tathaa ukta kaara bhansaara kaaryaalaya kaakadabhittaamaa bujhaaieko chha baraamada kaarako bhansaara daakhilaa mulya laakha rupaiyaan raheko chha
sasastra prahari balako saamaana kharidamaa thulo aniyamitataa bhaeko chha gunastarasambandhi patra nai pherabadala garera saamaana kharidamaa aniyamitataa bhaeko ho

gata arthika warsamaa sasastra praharile hajaara mitara suti kapadaa kharida garoko thiyo thekadaarale saamaana diepachhi pariksanakaa laagi nepaala naapataula tathaa gunastara wibhaaga pathaaeko thiyo
wibhaagale so kapadaa wephta daayamitara dui saya raheko bhanera riporta pathaayo tara sasastra prahari mukhyaalaya pugdaa tyasalaai badhaaera wephta mitara tina saya banaaiyo

arthaat kamasala kapadaa gunastiya bhaeko bhanera nakkali riporta banaaiyo ra sohi adhaaramaa thekadaaralaai bhuktaani diieko khuleko chha yasari patra nai kirte garera bhrastaachaara gareko ghatanaamaa akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale sameta anusandhaana gariraheko chha

srotakaa anusaara suti kapadaa maatra hoina anya kapadaa tathaa juttaalagaayata saamaana kharidamaa pani yasaigari aniyamitataa hune gareko chha spesiphikesanamaa tokeko bhandaa kamasala saamaana dine ra kamisana baadne garieko chha

yo arthika warsamaa pani sasastrako kariba karodako kharidamaa yasaigari aniyamitataa bhaeko chha akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale gambhirataasaatha anusandhaana garekomaa sasastra praharimaa bhuinchaalo jaane srota bataaunchha
sasastra prahariko kalyaana kosamaa bhairaheko bethitiko pani anusandhaana bhairaheko akhtiyaarakaa eka adhikaarile bataae daristibaata
rupandehi jillaako siddhaarthanagara nagarapaalikaa sthita meulihawaabaata somabaara epiepha tolile kariwa eka laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko saamaana baraamada gareko chha

yupi bhi nambarako bhaaratiya motarasaaikalamaa raakhi awaidha rupale nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko lattaakapadaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa rupandehibaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho

epiepha tolile tyasawelaa ukta lattaakapadaa lyaauna prayoga bhaeko so motarasaaikala sameta baraamada gareko chha epiepha tolile baraamada lattaakapadaa tathaa motarasaaikala bhansaara kaaryaalaya bhairahawaamaa bujhaaeko chha
sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale saanti suraksaa simaa raksaakaa laagi sasastra prahari bala ahoraatra khatiraheko bataaunu bhaekaae chha

kabahigotha gaanupaalikaa maa sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara autapostako nawanirmita bhawanako aitabaara udghaatana samaaraaehamaa baaeldai mahaaniriksaka khanaalale ukta kuraa bataaunu bhaekaae haae

ru laakha hajaarako laagatamaa dui wataa adhunika bhawana byaareka kaaryaalaya kaaryaalaya pramukhako niwaasa nirmaana bhaeko chha naati kanstraksana lalitapurale so bhawana nirmaanakaa laagi thekkaa paaeko thiyo
tyasaigari simraunagadha nagarapaalikaasthita raheko wirendra chokamaa biopi piparapaatiko nawanirmita bhawanako pradesa sasastrakaa baahinipati raaju aryaalale udghaatana garnu bhaekaae thiyaae
so bhanawako thekkaa pani naati kanstraksana lalitapurako raheko chha so bhawanako laagata pani ru laakha hajaara raheko sasastra prahari niriksaka surdasana aryaalale jaanakaari dinu bhayaae

unalaai awasyaka kaarabaahi prakriyaakaa laagi laagu ausadha niyantrana wyuro kaaryaalaya wiraganja parsaamaa bujhaaieko sasastra praharile janaaeko chha
mahottarijillaako matihaani nagarapaalikaa hanumaana chokabaata saauna gate epiepha tolile srota nakhuleko laakha hajaara rupaiyaansahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa sohi jillaako mahottari gaaunpaalikaa daami basne warsiya surendra thaakura chhan hanumaana chokabaata ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa jaleswaratarpha jaandai garekaa thaakuralaaiepiepha tolile sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa unako saathamaa ullekhita rupaiyaan phelaa pareko tathaa unale ukta rakamako srota khulaauna nasakepachhi pakraau garieko ho

unalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana mahottaribaata khatieko tolile pakraau gareko ho pakraau parekaa thaakuralaai baraamada rakamasahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sampatti suddhikarana wibhaaga mahottarimaa bujhaaeko chha

sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka pusparaama kesile sumyukta raastrasumghako anurodhamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalako tarphabaata saanti sthaapanaartha yunaaiteda nesansa misana ina saautha sudaanamaa phamrda pulisa yunita ephapiyu ko rupamaa kaarya garna khatii jaana laageko eka tolilaai saauna gate sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayamaa ayojita eka samaarohakaa bicha haardika widaai garnubhayo

sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka kesile tyasaawasaramaa sumgathanakaa raastrasewaka karmachaariharu dwandagrasta mulukamaa saantisthaapanaartha khatindaa raastra ra sumgathanako pratisthaa uchcha hune gari utkarista kaarya sampaadana garnetarpha kariyaasila rahanuparne bataaunubhayo

uhaanle tyahaanko janataako marma dharma ra sumskaritimaa kunai khaalako asara naparne gari wyaawasaayika ewum jimmewaari purwaka sumyukta raastrasumghako marma anusaara kaarya garnuparne ullekha garnuhundai tyahaankaa janataako sewaa sahayoga ra suraksaako laagi anusaasita ewum imaandaara bhai laagnuparne bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka kesile so tolile saanti suraksaa garne kaaryamaa praapta anubhawalaai misana ilaakaamaa sameta sadupayoga gardai saamuhika bhaawanaakaasaatha praapta jimmewaarilaai kusalataapurwaka sampanna garne wiswaasa wyakta garnubhayo

sasastra prahari upariksaka manisa thaapaako kamaandamaa ekawarse kaaryakaalakaa laagi ephapiyuko rupamaa saautha sudaanako boramaa khatii jaane so tolimaa adhikarita willaadaara tathaa jawaana gari kula saya janaa rahekaa chhan
kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakaharu naaraayanabaabu thaapaa ra raamasarana paudela lagaayata epiepha adhikarita willaadaara tathaa jawaanaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo
rupandehi jillaako sidwaarthanagara nagarapaalikaa belahiyaabaata saauna gate epiepha tolile wibhinna kisimako laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa daana jillaako tulsipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya ujwala rijaala chhana bhaaratabaata nepaala tarpha audai garekaa nija rijaalalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala namwara gana hekwaa rupandehibaata khatieko epiepha tolile sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa unako saathamaa nuphina botala phenaaragana botala tathaa daaijaapaama botala phelaa parepachhi pakraau garieko hoe

dhanusaa jillaako aurahi gaanupaalikaa chakkarachoka tathaa janakapura mahaanagarapaalikaa kyaampasa chokabaata saauna gate epiepha tolile kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako wibhinna kisimako choripaithaariko saamaana baraamada gareko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa dhanusaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile ukta saamaanaharu baraamada gareko ho bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale bhansaara chhali lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa ullekhita mulya baraabarako lattaakapadaa rajanigandhaa tathaa paana masalaa baraamada garieko ho epiepha tolile tyasawelaa ukta saamaanaharu lyaauna prayoga bhaeko wataa motarasaaikala sameta baraamada gareko chha

baraamada saamaana tathaa motarasaaikala awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sthaaniya bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko chha baraamada saamaana tathaa motarasaaikalako bhansaara daakhilaa mulya kariba laakha rupaiyaan raheko chha

yasaigari parsaa jillaako biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa sirasiyaasthita simaa ilaakaabaata saauna gate epiepha tolile kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko lattaakapadaa tathaa ilektroniksa saamaana baraamada gareko chha
bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale bhansaara chhali lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa parsaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile ukta saamaana baraamada gareko ho
baraamada saamaana awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sthaaniya bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko chha

pakraau parnemaadhanusaa musaharaniyaa kaa warsiya wirendra mahatochhan matihaanisthita sasastra prahari bordara auta postabaata khatieko paidala gastile mahatolaai nepaala bhaarata dasagajaanajikabaatapakraau gareko haae

wirendrale chaandi bhaaratako darabhumgaa puryaaune jimmaa lieko bayaanamaa khulaaekaa chhan yasaaghi pataka gari keji chaandi bhaarata chhiraaeko unale swikaarekaa chhan darabhumgaakaa kapila naamakaa sunachaandi kaarobaari tathaa tyahaankaa thulaa pasalamaa puryaaune gareko unale bataae

sasastra niriksaka mainaalikaaanusaara wirendrako saathabaata nepaalako enasisi baimka ra bhaaratako panjaaba nesanala baimkakaa etiema bhaaratiya pahichaana patra ra bhaaratiya sawaari laaisensasameta baraamada bhaeko chha wirendralaai chaandisahita jaleswara bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaune tayaari bhairahako chha
sasastra prahari balakaa janaa atirikta mahaaniriksakaeaijiharuko saruwaasaruwaa bhaeko chha
niyamita patrakaara sammelanamaa sarakaarakaa prawaktaa sameta rahekaa sanchaara tathaa suchanaa prawidhi mantri gokula baanskotaale eaijiharuko saruwaa garieko jaanakaari dinubhayaae
simaa suraksaa wibhaagakaa pusparaama kesilaai sasastra prahari bala prasiksana pratisthaanamaa saruwaa garieko chha

yastai maanawasrota saadhaana wibhaagakaa naaraayanabaabu thaapaako simaa suraksaa wibhaagamaara maanawa srota saadhaana wibhaagamaa raamasarana paudelako saruwaa bhaeko chha paudela yasaaghi prasiksana pratisthaanamaa kaaryarata thie
ilaama jillaako chulaachuli gaaunpaalikaa sthita jhaapaa ra ilaamako simaanaabaata saauna gate epiepha tolile kariwa kyuphita sakhuwaako kaathasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa jhaapaa jillaako kamalaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya milana limbu chhan nija limbule me cha nambarako pikaapa gaadimaa ukta kaatha raakhi lyaaundai awasthaamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa wesa chulaachulibaata khatieko epiepha tolile pakraau gareko ho nija limbu ukta gaadikaa chaalaka hun

epiepha tolile pakraau parekaa limbulaai baraamada kaatha tathaa ukta gaadisahitai awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya ilaamamaa bujhaaeko chha ukta kaatha tathaa gaadiko mulya kariwa laakha rupaiyaan raheko chha
rupandehi jillaako siddhaarthanagara nagarapaalikaa dandaabaata saauna gate epiepha tolile wibhinna kisimakaa laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa tanahun jillaako myaagdi gaaunpaalikaa jaamune basne warsiya khumabahaadura thaapaa chhan

sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma hekwaa rupandehibaata khatieko epiepha tolile nija thaapaalaai sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa unako saathamaa nophina botala phenaaragana botala daaijipaama botala ra naaitrojana tyaableta wataa phelaa parepachhi pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa nija thaapaalaai epiepha tolile baraamada laaguausadhasahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belahiyaamaa bujhaaeko chha

parsaa jillaako biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita rajatajayanti ilaakaabaata epiepha tolile saauna gate kariwa laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko kiraanaa saamaana baraamada gareko chha
bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ukta saamaana sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma hekwaa parsaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho
epiepha tolile baraamada saamaana awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi biragumja bhansaara kaaryaalaya parsaamaa bujhaaeko chha

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale sasastra prahari balanepaalakaa siniyara adhikaritaharu prasiksaarthiko rupamaa sahabhaagi raheko sisum wipad wyawasthaapana taalimako saauna gate sasastra prahari bala nepaala wipad wyawasthaapana taalima siksaalaya kurinataara chitawanamaa eka kaaryakramakaa bicha udghaatana garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale tyasaawasaramaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalale wipad wyawasthaapanakaa ksetramaa wibhinna sarakaari ewum gairasarakaari nikaayaharu sumga uchchastarako samanwaya gardai utkarista kaaryasampaadanako laagi kariyaasila raheko bataaunubhayo

uhaanle wipad wyawasthaapanako ksetramaa pesaagata daksa janasakti utpaadanamaa utkarista yogadaana puuyaaeko so siksaalayabaata utpaadita daksa sasastra prahari karmachaariharule desakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa wipadkaa ghatanaaharumaa khoja tathaa udwaara kaaryamaa nirwaaha gareko agranai bhumikaa prasumsaniya raheko kuraa sameta ullekha garnubhayo

wigatako bhukampabaata bhaeko ksati tathaa udwaara kaaryamaa sasastra prahari karmachaariko sakariyataa smarana garnuhanudai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale wipad wyawasthaapana taalima praapta daksa janasakti utpaadana gardai agaadi badheko sasastra prahari bala nepaalale wipadkaa belaa puyaaeko yogadaanale pidita naagarikako jiwanaraksaamaa yogadaana pugnukaa saathai janataako mana jitna saphala bhaeko bataaunubhayo

kahi katai wipad prakopa bhaekaa sahayogatako laagi sasastra prahari bala nepaalalaai samjhane wiswaasako waataawarana banaauna sumgathanakaa udwaarakarmiharu saphala raheko charchaa garnuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale bhannubhayo yo sumgathanako thulo upalabdhi ho

wipad wyawasthaapanakaa laagi adhika jnaana tathaa kalaa kausalako awasyakataa parne bataaunuhundai uhaanle udwaara kaarya atyantai sumwedanasila jokhimayukta tathaa kathina kaarya bhaekole udwaarakartaamaa uchchastarako saaririka tathaa maanasika daksataa aparihaarya hune kuraa sameta ullekha garnubhayo

kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka raamasarana paudelale dhanyawaada jnaapanako kramamaa wipad wyawasthaapanako ksetramaa utkarista yogadaana puyaauna yastaa taalima phaladaayi rahane bataaunuuhundai prasiksaarthiharule taalimako dauraanamaa badhi bhandaa badhi jnaana arjana garna prayaasa gardai kaaryaksetramaa utkarista kaarya garnuparne bataaunubhayo

ukta taalima siksaalayakaa samaadesaka sasastra prahari baristha upariksaka kisora pradhaanale taalima sambandhi yojanaa prastuta garnuhundai taalimako dauraanamaa prasiksaarthiharulaai wipad wyawasthaapanakaa wiwidha paksaharumaa uchchastarako prasiksana diine bataaunubhayo
ukta taalimamaa sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka janaa tathaa sasastra prahari niriksaka janaa gari kula janaa prasiksaarthiharuko sahabhaagitaa raheko chha
sasastra praharikaa janaa sasastra prahari naayaba upariksaka diesapiharuko saruwaa bhaeko chha
sasastra prahari mukhyaalayale mumgalabaara saanjha eka suchanaa prakaasita gardai saya janaa diesapiko saruwaa garieko jaanakaari dieko ho
sasastra prahari mahaaniriksakako kaaryaalayale gareko nirnaya anusaara saauna mahinaako talaba bhattaasameta haala saruwaa bhaeko sthaanabaata khaana paaune gari saruwaa garieko ullekha chha
sirahaajillaako sirahaa nagarapaalikaa maadarabaata epiepha tolile pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita tina yuwaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaaudayapurako kataari nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya raahula ghalemagara warsiya dibahaadura khatri ra warsiya milana maajhichhan uniharulaai sasastra prahari bala bordara autaposta maadarabaata khatieko tolile pakraau gareko ho

bhaaratabaata paidala aundai garekaa tinai janaalaaiepiepha tolile sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa uniharukaae saathabaata laaguausadha tyaableta nitraajipaama baraamada garekaaesasastra prahari bala bordara autaposta maadarakaa pramukha sasastra prahari niriksaka surendrabahaadura saahile jaanakaari die
parsaa jillaako wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita wiragumja bhansaara mulagetabaata saauna gate epiepha tolile laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa parsaa jillaako wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa nadhuwaa basne warsiya mahana patela chhan unalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma hekwaa parsaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile pakraau gareko ho
bardiyaa jillaako raajaapura nagarapaalikaa baata saauna gate epiepha tolile eka janaako sawa phelaa paareko chha

so baare jaanakaari paaunnaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta raajaapurabaata khatieko epiepha tolile khoji kaarya gardaa nija raawalako sawa sohi kuloko kinaaraamaa phelaa paareko ho
yasaigari chitawana jillaako sauraaha dhungaaghaatabaata saauna gate epiepha taalile eka janaako sawa phelaa paareko chha

sohi jillaako ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa sthita budhi raapti kholaamaa naama watana nakhuleko andaaji warsiya ekajanaa wyakti haama phaalera bepattaa bhaeko bhanne jaanakaari paaepachhi sasastra prahari bala nepaala namwara gadhimaai baahini mukhyaalaya makawaanapurabaata khatieko epiepha tolile khoji kaaryagardaa unakoe sawa sauraahako dhungaaghaatamaa phelaa paareko ho
yasaigari dolpaa jillaako mudke chullaa gaaunpaalikaa sthita kausilaa kholaamaa baadhile bagaai bepattaa bhaekaa dui janaako sawa saauna gate epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile phelaa paareko chha
sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma hekwaa dolpaabaata khatieko epiepha toli ra sthaaniya prahariko tolile khoji garne kramamaa uniharuko sawa phelaa paarieko ho

yasaigari kapilawastu jillaako maayaadewi gaaunpaalikaa bijuwaasthita pokharimaa maachhaa maarne kramamaa bepattaa bhaekaa dui janaako sawa saauna gate epiepha toli sthaaniya prahari ra sthaaniya waasindaale phelaa paarekaa chhan

so ghatanaabaare jaanakaari paaunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta chaakadachaudaabaata khatieko epiepha toli tathaa sthaaniya prahari ra sthaaniya waasindaale ukta pokharibaata uniharuko sawa nikaaleko ho

dhanusaa jillaako mukhiyaapatti musaharaniyaa gaaunpaalikaa beriyaamarnaamaa awirala warsaako kaarana jamuni nadimaa paaniko bahaawa badhna gai duwaanamaa parekaa kariwa ghara pariwaaralaai suraksita sthaanamaa saarieko chha
sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta phulagaamaabaata khatieko epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile duwaanamaa parekaa wyaktiharulaai udwaara gari suraksita sthaanamaa saareko ho
sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta phulagaamaabaata khatieko epiephatoli ra sthaaniya praharile so thaaunkaa piditaharulaai suraksita sthaanamaa saareko ho
yasaigari parsaa jillaako wiragumja mahaanagapaalikaa sthita sirsiyaa kholaamaa bepattaa bhaekaa eka janaako sawa epiepha tolile asaara gate phelaa paareko chha

sohi thaaun basne warsiya durgaa saaha duraa ukta kholaamaa khasera bepattaa bhaeko jaanakaari paaunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa parsaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile nija saahako sawa sohi mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita bhaguwaa ghaatamaa phelaa paareko ho
yasaigari mahottari jillaako jaleswara nagarapaalikaa bajaraahibaata bepattaa bhaekaa dui janaamadhye eka janaako sawa asaara gate epiepha tolile phelaa paareko chha
bepattaa bhaekaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya prasaanta thaakurako sawa sasastra prahari bala nepaala jillaa kamaanda posta jaleswarabaata khatieko epiepha tolile phelaa paareko ho
yasaigari rautahata jillaako gaura nagarapaalikaa sthita eka pokharibaata epiepha tolile eka janaako sawa phelaa paareko chha

sohi jillaako raajapura nagarapaalikaa chhatuwaa basne andaaji warsiya sonelaala saaha sunaarako sawa sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta gaurabaata khatieko epiepha tolile pokharibaata baahira nikaaleko ho

yasaigari dhanusaa jillaako dhanusaadhaama nagarapaalikaa sthita baaluwaa kholaa tarne kramamaa bepattaa bhaekaa eka janaako sawa asaara gate epiepha toli tathaa sthaaniya praharile phelaa paareko chha

sohi thaaun basne warsiya bipatiyaa chamaara kholaa tarne kramamaa bepattaa bhaeko jaanakaari paaunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa besa dhanusaadhaamabaata khatieko epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile khoji garne kramamaa unako sawa bagaaeko sthaanabaata daksinatarpha phelaa paareko ho

epiepha toli aja aparaanhasamma desakaa wibhinna bhaagamaa awirala warsaako kaarana baadhi pahiro tathaa duwaanamaa parekaa chaara saya janaalaai udwaara gareko chha udwaara kaaryamaa kariwa hajaara sasastra prahari karmachaari parichaalita bhaekaa chhan

yasaibicha aja morana jillaako wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita daraiyaa bastimaa awirala warsaako kaarana duwaanamaa parekaa gharaharubaata epiepha tolile kariwa janaalaai udwaara gareko chha
sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma hekwaa moranabaata khatieko epiepha tolile uniharulaai suraksita sthaanamaa saareko ho

yasaigari sohi jillaakai urlaawaari nagarapaalikaa sthita chaudhari tolamaa awirala warsaako kaarana bakraahaa kholaale baadha kataana gari duwaaune sambhaawanaa rahepachhi so thaaunkaa janaa wyaktiharulaai suraksita sthaanamaa saarieko chha
sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa wesa urlaawaaribaata khatieko epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile uniharuko udwaara gareko ho

yasaigari siraahaa jillaako kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaa itaariprasaai sthita ghurmi ra kamalaa kholaako tatamaa anpako rukhamaa phasekaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya maheswara saahalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara chhinnamastaa baahini mukhyaalayabaata khatieko epiepha tolile sakusala udwaara gareko chha

yasaigari sindhuli golaanjora gaaunpaalikaa sthita kilo bhanne sthaanamaa awirala warsaako kaarana sadaka maathibaata dhumgaasahitako pahiro ai awaruddha wipi lokamaarga epiepha tolile khulaaeko chha sasastra prahari bala nepaala asrita gulma sindhulibaata khatieko epiepha tolile ukta awarudwa sadaka khulaaeko ho

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale kaabhrepalaanchoka jillaako paanchakhaala nagarapaalikaa kurakure daandaamaa nawanirmita sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa kaabhrepalaanchokako kaaryaalaya bhawana tathaa wyaareka bhawanako aja eka samaarohakaa wicha silaa anaawarana gari udghaatana garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale ajai sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa sindhupaalchokako bhukampabaata ksatipachhi punarnirmaana garieko byaareka bhawana tathaa nawanirmita kaaryaalaya bhawanako sameta udghaatana garnubhayo

tyasaawasaramaa uhaanle simaa suraksaa wipad uddhaara lagaayata sumgathanalaai praapta jimmewaarikaa ksetraharumaa wyaawasaayika kusalataapurwaka jimmewaari nirwaaha garnuparne ullekha garnuhundai sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa raastrasewakaharule raastriyataako jagernaa garna tathaa jimmewaari puraa garna puryaaeko yogadaanale sumgathana lokapariya bhaeko charchaa gardai jimmewaari nirwaahako kramamaa nirantara tyaaga ra mehanata gardai parinaamamukhi kaaryasampaadanamaa sakariya rahanu parne bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale haalai pareko awirala warsaako kaarana gaeko baadhi pahiro tathaa duwaanamaa pidita bhaekaaharuko uddhaaramaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa raastra sewakaharule anya suraksaa nikaaya ewum wibhinna nikaaya ra sthaaniyasanga samanwaya tathaa sahakaarya gari uddhaara kaaryamaa bhaeko upalabdhiko saraahanaa garnuhundai naagarikako sewaa suraksaa ra apata wipadmaa udwaara kaaryamaa kunai pani kami auna nadina sasastra prahari karmachaariharulaai nirdesana dinubhayo

wipad baare jaanakaari praapta hunaasaathai uddhaara kaaryamaa tatkaala parichaalita huna nirdesana dinuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale uddhaara kaaryamaa upalabdha srotasaadhanako adhikatama upayoga gardai aphnaa sampurna ichchhaaakaamksaaharulaai thaanti raakhera parinaama niskane dhumgale parichaalita bhai naagarikalaai waastawamai saghaau pugne dhumgale jimmewaari puraa garna nirdesana dinubhayo

uddhaara kaaryamaa sasastra prahari karmachaariharule puryaaeko yogadaanako saraahanaa garnuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale bhannubhayo sasastra prahari karmachaariharu jastosukai chunautipurna paristhitimaa sameta kattipani wichalita nabhai kaaryaksetramaa ahoraatra khatinu pardachha yasabaata sasastra prahari balale puryaaune sewaa tathaa suraksaa kaaryamaa waastawamai upalabdhiharu haasila huna maddata pugdachha

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale tyasaiawasaramaa sumgathanale bhrastaachaara tathaa laimgika himsaamaa sunya sahanasilataako niti awalambana gareko charchaa gardai kaaryaksetramaa maanawaadhikaarako purna rupamaa raksaa gardai daayitwa nirwaaha garna nirdesana dinuhundai sasastra prahari kaaryasampaadana gardaa naagarikako haka adhikaarako purna rupamaa raksaa gardai daayitwa nirwaahamaa samarpita rahana nirdesana sameta dinubhayo

anya suraksaa nikaaya ewum sthaaniya prasaasana tathaa sarokaara raakhne sawaisanga awasyaka samanwaya gardai mana wachana ra karmale kaaryaksetramaa samarpita huna sakemaa sasastra prahari posaakako kadara hunchha bhannuhundai uhaanle raastra ra janataako chaahanaa anurupako kaaryasaili apanaai sewaakaa ksetraharumaa samarpita rahanuparne bataaundai chhitochharito sasastra prahari sewaa pradaana garna sampurna sasastra prahari karmachaariharulaai nirdesana dinubhayo

kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka naaraayanabaawu thaapaale dhanyawaada jnaapanako kramamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala sthaapanaa pachhi kramika rupamaa wistaara hundai haala desakaa watai jillaamaa aphno upasthiti janaauna saphala bhaeko ullekha garnubhayo

sumgathanalaai praapta jimmewaarikaa ksetraharumaa sawai nikaayasanga awasyaka samanwaya ewum sahakaarya gardai agaadi badhdaa upalabdhiharu haasila huna maddata pugne bataaunuhundai sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka naaraayanabaabu thaapaale epiepha ekaaimaa bhautika sumrachanaa thapiesangai daayitwa sameta thapieko mahasusa garera manaidekhi daayitwa nirwaahamaa katiwaddha rahanuparne bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa kaabhrepalaanchokamaa bhaeko bhawana udghaatana kaaryakramamaa kaabhre jillaakaa pramukha jillaa adhikaari udayabahaadura raanaale sasastra prahari bala nepaala sthaapanaa sangasumgai simaa suraksaa audyogika suraksaa mahatwapurna pratisthaanako suraksaa lagaayatakaa jimmewaariharuko atirikta wipad prakopako awasthaamaa sameta agrapumtimaa rahera naagarikale mahasusa garne dhumgale ahama bhumikaa nirwaaha garna saphala raheko bataaunubhayo

kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa kaabhrepalaanchokakaa ganapati sasastra prahari upariksaka benuprasaada paathakale bhawana nirmaana sambandhi pratiwedana prastuta garnubhaeko thiyo bhane sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa sindhupaalchokamaa bhaeko bhawana udghaatana kaaryakramamaa nirmaana sambandhi pratiwedana sohi ganakaa ganapati sasastra prahari upariksaka naaraayana sresthale prastuta garnubhaeko thiyo

dhanusaa jillaako sahida nagarapaalikaa sthita madraasa bhanne thaaunmaa thulo baadhi aeko so nadi kinaarabaata kariwa paancha saya mitara bhitrabaata uniharulaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara chhinnamastaa baahini mukhyaalaya mahottaribaata khatieko wipada wyawasthaapana taalima praapta daksa janasaktile sakusala udwaara gareko ho
udwaara gariekaaharumaa eka janaa mahilaa tathaa chaara janaa purusa rahekaa chhan
yasaigari dhanusaa jillaakai kamalaamaai nagarapaalikaa sthita hasamodaa sakhalaa bhanne thaaunbaata dui mahilaasahita chaara janaalaai sohi baahinibaata khatieko epiepha tolile udwaara gareko chha
yasaigari epiepha tolile morana jillaamaa ghara pariwaaralaai udwaara gari suraksita sthaana saareko chha bhane jhaapaamaa ghara pariwaaralaai udwaara gareko chha
yasaigari rautahata jillaako brindaawana nagarapaalikaa sthita chaadikholaako kaasaghaaribaata janaalaai epiepha tolile udwaara gareko chha
nakkhu kholaale bagaaera lyaaeko ukta sawa sasastra prahari bala nepaala kaaraagaara suraksaa wesa nakkhubaata khatieko epiepha tolile nadibaata baahira nikaaleko ho
awirala warsaako kaarana wibhinna thaaunharumaa baadhi tathaa duwaana parepachhi sasastra prahari balako toli udwaara kaaryamaa sakariyataakaasaatha juteko chha
sasastra prahari balakaa atha esaesapiharuko saruwaa bhaeko chha

naubasthaa taalima kendra baankemaa abhi khatri kakani taalima kendramaa durgaa bhattaraai laamaapaatana pokharaamaa raajendra saakya bardaghaata taalima kendramaa raajendra adhikaarikaae saruwaa bhaeko haae

yastaidui nambara baahini janakapuramaa ganaesa thaadaa magara chaara nambara baahini pokharaamaa sambhu suwedi nambara baahini surkhetamaa kamala giri ekedemimaa raajendra basnetalaai saruwaa garieko chha

sunasari jillaako waryu gaaupaalikaa sthita phaarama choka ra darmichoka ilaakaamaa awirala warsaako kaarana kesalliyaa kholaamaa paaniko bahaawa badhna gai kariwa eka saya ghara duwaanamaa parekaamaa so ilaakaabaata sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta amaduwaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile piditaharulaai suraksita sthaanamaa saareko chha

yasaigari rautahata jillaako katahariyaa nagarapaalikaako bakaiyaa nadimaa paaniko bahaawa badhna gai baadha kataana gari bastimaa baadhi pasepachhi kariwa ghara duwaanamaa parekomaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa wesa dudhiyaabhaarabaata sasastra prahari niriksaka omaprasaada dhakaalako kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha toli tathaa sthaaniya waasindaale tyasathaaunbaata gharaayasi saamaanaharu suraksita sthaanamaa saareko chha

yasaigari rautahata jillaakai raajapura nagarapaalikaako wadaa num ra ilaakaamaa awirala warsaakaa kaarana phasekaa eka janaa mahilaa ra dui janaa purusa wyaktiharulaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa wesa phatuwaabaata khatieko sasastra prahari niriksaka tulaabahaadura chaudhariko kamaandamaako epiepha tolile sakusala udwaara gareko chha

yasaigari rautahata nagarapaalikaa sthita sirsiyaabaata warsaakaa kaarana phusako gharabhitra phasekaa janaako sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa rautahatabaata sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka dillikumaara kaarkiko kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile sakusala udwaara gareko chha

yasaigari parsaa jillaako biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa belawaa sthita musahara bastimaa sohi sthaanamaa raheko bhedaahaara kholaamaa paaniko bahaawa badhna gai kariwa ghara duwaana parekomaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa wesa belawaabaata sasastra prahari niriksaka dipanarasimha raaiko kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile piditaharulaai udwaara gari suraksita sthaanamaa saareko chha

yasaigari parsaa jillaakai chhaparamaai gaaunpaalikaa saanojaya mumgalaapura sthita eka gharamaa warsaako kaarana duwaanamaa parekaa warsiya saaheba saaha warsiyaa sumitraa dewi ra warsiki laksmikumaari saahalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta bhiswaabaata sasastra prahari naayawa niriksaka nilahari daahaalako kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile sakusala udwaara gareko chha

yasaigari chitawana jillaako raapti nagarapaalikaa dumre pula najikai raheko samsera chepaangako ghara warsaako kaarana duwaanamaa pareko bhanne jaanakaari praapta hunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gadhimaai baahini mukhyaalaya makawaanapurabaata sasastra prahari niriksaka manisa thaapaako kamaandamaa khatieko wipada wyaawasthaapana taalima praapta daksa janasaktisahitako tolile nijako srimati tathaa tina janaa baalabaalikaaharulaai sakusala udwaara gari suraksita sthaanamaa lyaaeko chha

yasaigari paalpaa jillaako tinaau gaaunpaalikaa sthita siddhaartha lokamaargamaa pahiro gai motarasaaikalasahita puriekaa eka wyaktiko sawa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma hekwaa rupandehi ra sthaaniya praharile udwaaragari baahira nikaaleko chha

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale sasastra prahari bala nepaala yuena saanti sthaapanaa taalima siksaalaya kakani nuwaakota parisarabhitra punarnirmita wibhinna bhawanaharuko asaara gate eka samaarohakaa wicha silaa anaawarana gari udghaatana garnubhayo

tyasaawasaramaa uhaanle punarnirmita bhawanaharuko awalokana sameta garnubhayo sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale tyasaiawasaramaa ukta bhawanaharuko nirmaana kaaryamaa yogadaana puyaaune mahaanubhaawaharulaai prasumsaapatra sameta pradaana garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale tyasaawasaramaa raastrako raksaa tathaa simaanaako suraksaa raastriyataako jagernaa ewum sewaa suraksaa sahayoga ra apatawipadmaa uddhaarakaa laagi sasastra prahari bala nepaala pratiwaddha raheko charchaa garnuhundai sumgathanale raastrakaa laagi puyaaeko yogadaanale naagarika maajha lokapariya huna saphala raheko ullekha garnubhayo

uhaanle sasastra prahari bala nepaalale sumyukta raastra sumghiya saanti misana maarphata antarraastriyastaramaa sameta desako chhawi uchcha raakhne kaaryamaa yogadaana puyaaeko bataaunuhundai ukta yuena saanti sthaapanaa taalima siksaalayale taalimako maadhyamabaata daksa ewum wyaawasaayika janasakti utpaadanamaa puyaaeko yogadaanako saraahanaa sameta garnubhayo

bhukampakaa kaarana bhautika sumrachanaamaa ksati pugera prasiksana kaaryamaa baadhaa pugekomaa raastriya punarnirmaana praadhikaranako winiyojita bajetabaata punah nirmaana gariekaa bhautika sumrachanaale ukta siksaalayako kaarya sumchaalanamaa thapa urjaa milne charchaa garnuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale agaami dinamaa daksa janasakti utpaadanamaa ajhai sahajataa aune wiswaasa wyakta garnubhayo

bhrastaachaara maanawaadhikaara ulumghana ewum laimgika himsaakaa ghatanaamaa sumgathanale sunya sahanasilataako niti awalambana gareko smarana garnuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale suraksaakarmi badhibhandaa badhi wyaawasaayika banna sakemaa naagarikako sadbhaawa ewum wiswaasako waataawaranamaa abhibariddhi hunehundaa sadhai pesaagata imaandaaritaakaa saatha wyaawasaayika jimmewaari nirwaahamaa kriyaasila rahanuparne bataaunubhayo

uhaanle wigatamaa desakaa jillaamaa maatrai upasthiti raheko sasastra prahari bala nepaalako tainaathi haala desakaa sawai jillaamaa raheko ullekha garnuhundai sumgathanale chhito chharito ewum prabhaawakaari sasastra prahari sewaa pradaana garna pratiwaddha raheko charchaa garnubhayo

kaaryakramamaa raastriya sasastra prahari bala prasiksana pratisthaanakaa kaaryakaari nirdesaka sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka raamasarana paudelale dhanyawaada jnaapanako kramamaa sasastra prahari karmachaariharuko ksamataa abhibariddhikaa laagi wibhinna prasiksana kendraharudwaaraa wyaawasaayika taalimaharu sumchaalana garidai airaheko charchaa garnuhundai so siksaalayale dwandwagrasta mulukamaa saanti sthaapanaartha khatindaa misana ilaakaamaa sampaadana garnuparne wiwidha prakaritikaa jimmewaari sambandhamaa prasiksana dindai airaheko bataaunubhayo

kaaryakramamaa so siksaalayakaa samaadesaka sasastra prahari baristha upariksaka ganaesa thaadaamagarale swaagata mantawya tathaa nirmaana sambandhi pratiwedana prastuta garnuhundai prasiksaarthi bhawana siniyara adhikarita bhawana juniyara adhikarita bhawana willaadaara jawaana bhawana samaadesaka niwaasa lagaayata wibhinna nirmaana kaarya sampanna bhaeko bataaunubhayo

kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakadwaya naaraayanabaawu thaapaa ra raamasarana paudela lagaayata sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa baristha adhikaritaharu tathaa wibhinna kaaryaalayakaa pramukhaharu sthaaniya samaajasewi ewum anya mahaanubhaawaharuko sameta upasthiti raheko thiyo
parsaa jillaako biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa rajata jayanti chokabaata asaara gate epiepha tolile kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko saamaana baraamada gareko chha

bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale bhansaara chhali nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala namwara gulma hekwaa parsaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile ullekhita mulya baraabarako lattaakapadaa bhaandaawartana kiraanaa saamaana tathaa ilektronika saamaana baraamada gareko ho
epiepha tolile baraamada saamaana awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sthaaniya bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaeko chha
chitawana jillaako maadi nagarapaalikaa sthita baikuntha taalabaata asaara gate epiepha tolile eka janaako sawa nikaaleko chha

chitawana jillaa bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita bauddhachoka basne warsiya anubhaba tripaathi so taalamaa paudi khelne kramamaa bepattaa bhaeko bhanne jaanakaari paaepachhi sasastra prahari bala nepaala wipada wyawasthaapana taalima siksaalaya kurinataarabaata sasastra prahari niriksaka harikarisna giriko kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile unako sawa taalabaata baahira nikaaleko ho
loka sewaa ayogale lieko sasastra prahari bala nepaalako likhita natijaa prakaasita gareko chha
ayogale gata jetha gate sumnchaalana gareko sasastra prahari jawaanako likhita pariksaako natijaa prakaasana gareko ho
sirahaa jillaako sirahaa nagarapaalikaa sthita keteruwaa kamalaadhaarabaata asaara gate epiepha tolile kariba keji saya graama gaanjaasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaaratako wihaara raajyako jillaa madhuwani koluai baluwaa ghara bataaune warsiya satrudhana simha chhan unalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta maardarabaata khatieko epiepha tolile ukta gaanjaasahita pakraau gareko ho
wisesa adaalatale sasastra praharikaa chaara purwa pramukhalaai bhrastaachaara muddaabaata saphaai dieko chha

sasastra praharikaa wibhinna yunitamaa saamaana dhuwaani gardaa nakkali kampani khadaa gari karodaum rupaiyaan hinaaminaa gareko aropamaa akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale saalamaa wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko thiyo
sunasari jillaako harinagara gaanupaalikaa sthita nagarakattibaata asaara gate epiepha tolile kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako hajaara keji dhaanasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

awaidha rupale bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha ko cha nambarako trayaaktaramaa raakhera lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa besa bhutaahaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile ukta dhaanasahitasunasari jillaako harinagara gaanupaalikaa nagarakatti wasne warsiya ramaananda yaadawalaai pakraau gareko ho epiepha tolile trayaaktarasameta baraamada gareko chha

jhaapaa jillaako mechinagara nagarapaalikaa sthita basapaarka ilaakaabaata asaara gate epiepha tolile kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko lattaakapadaa ra wibhinna kisimako ausadhi baraamada gareko chha
bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale lyaaundai gareko ullekhita saamaana sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma jhaapaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho
baraamada saamaana awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sthaaniya bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko chha
yasaigari dhanusaa jillaako nagaraaina nagarapaalikaa sthita birtaabaata asaara gate epiepha tolile kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako chorinikaasiko maricha baraamada gareko chha

motarasaaikalamaa raakhera bhaaratatarpha laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa ullekhita mulya baraabarako kariba tina saya keji maricha sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta dewadiyaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho tyasawelaa ukta maricha laijaanna prayoga garieko tina wataa motarasaaikala sameta epiepha tolile baraamada gareko chha
baraamada maricha tathaa motarasaaikala awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sthaaniya bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko chha
yasaigari sunasari jillaako kosi gaanupaalikaa laukahisthita simaa ilaakaabaata asaara gate epiepha tolile kariba eka laakha mulya baraabarako choripaithaariko rotaabhetara baraamada gareko chha

bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale bhansaara chhalera nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta laukahibaata khatieko epiepha tolile ukta rotaabhetara baraamada gareko ho
garihamantraalayale nepaala prahari ra sasastra prahariko kaaryaksetramaa wiwaada aune gari sasastra prahari aina masyaudaa tayaara gareko chha

sasastra prahari balako gathana sewaasartasambandhamaa wyawasthaa garna baneko widheyakako masyaudaamaa sasastralaai pakraau purji jaari pakraau khaanatalaasi ra muchulkaa garna paaune adhikaara prastaawa gariekaa kaarana wiwaada aune garekaa chhan

nepaala praharile maatrai prayoga gardai aeko yi adhikaara sasastralaai yasaaghi diieko chhaina aba sasastralaai yi kaama garne adhikaara diemaa dui suraksaa nikaayabicha swatah kaaryaksetrabaare wiwaada aunechha

prastaawita widheyakako daphaa maa ullikhita sasastra prahariko kartawya ra adhikaara sirsakamaa raakhieko praawadhaanamaa yasaaghi nepaala praharile prayoga gardai aekaa adhikaaralaai samaawesa garieko chha

prastaawita masyaudaako daphaa maa sasastra praharilaai khabara sumkalana garne adhikaari diieko chha bhane upadaphaa maa khabara sumkalanakaa laagi saadaa posaakamaa sasastra prahari khataauna sakne praawadhaana chha
tyastai daphaa maa ullikhita pakraauko suchanaa diera abhilekha raakhi bharpaai garne bhani thapieko adhikaara ksetra pani nepaala praharisanga milna gaekole wiwaadita hune bhaeko chha

bhaaratako raksaulabaata awaidha rupale bhansaara chhali nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa sasastra prahari balasasastra prahari bala nepaala num gulma heda kwaatara raajaswa tathaa bhansaara gasti tolile ullekhita mulya baraabarakolattaakapadaa mowaaila haardawayara tathaa kiraanaa samaana baraamada gareko ho
baraamada garieko samaana awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi wiraganja bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko sasastra praharile janaaeko chha
dhanusaa jillaako kamalaa nagarapaalikaa duwarakotabaata asaara gate epiepha tolile eutaa katuwaa pestola ra eutaa khurpaa jasto dekhine dhaarilo bastu baraamada gareko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa besa duwarakotabaata khatieko epiepha tolile ukta katuwaa pestola ra dhaarilo bastu phelaa paareko ho gastimaa khatieko epiepha tolilaai dekhnaasaatha ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa sawaara wyaktile ukta motarasaaikala ra eutaa jholaa sohi thaaunmaa chhaadi bhaagepachhi so jholaa jaancha gardaa ukta hatiyaara phelaa pareko ho
epiepha tolile tyasawelaa so maaetarasaaikala sameta baraamada gareko chha epiepha tolile baraamada hatiyaara tathaa motarasaaikala awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sthaaniya praharimaa bujhaaeko chha
yasaigari sirahaa jillaako sirahaa nagarapaalikaa paterwaa kamalaadhaara bhanne sthaanabaata asaara gate epaeipha tolile eutaa katuwaa pestola baraamada gareko chha

bhaaratabaata motarasaaikalamaa nepaalatarpha aundai garekaa dui janaa wyaktiharu sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta maardarabaata gastimaa khatieko epiepha tolilaai dekhera punah bhaaratatarpha bhaagne kramamaa nija wyaktiharule so pestola kamalaadhaara naditarpha phyaanki pharaara bhaepachhi ukta pestola baraamada garieko ho
sirahaa nagarapaalikaa paterwaabaata praharile eka thaana katuwaa pestola baraamada gareko chha
gastimaa raheko sasastra prahari bala kyaampa maadarako tolile sanibaara wihaana chekajaanchako kramamaa pestola baraamada gareko ho
sasastra prahari niriksaka surendrabahaadura saahikaa anusaara bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha airaheko nambara nakhuleko motarasaaikalamaa sawaara wyaktile bokeko pestola baraamada bhaeko ho

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale tyasaawasaramaa kaaryaksetramaa pradarsana gareko wyaawasaayikataa tathaa kaaryadaksataa lagaaeta pesaagata jimmewaari nirwaahamaa puryaaeko yogadaanako sameta mulyaamkana gardai padonnati garieko charchaa garnuhundai agaami dinaharumaa sameta utkarista kaaryasampaadanamaa kariyaasila rahana nirdesana dinubhayo

uhaanle sakala darjaakaa raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharu aaphno tahabaata purnarupamaa wyaawasaayika bhai saamuhika bhaawanaakaa saatha jimmewaari nirwaahamaa sadhai kariyaasila rahanuparne bataaunuhundai sakaaraatmaka sochakaa saatha agaadi badhemaa saphalataa praapta hune ullekha garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale sumgathana maanawa adhikaara laimgika himsaa ra bhrastaachaara lagaayatakaa kariyaakalaapaharumaa sunya sahanasilataako niti awalambana gardai agaadi badhiraheko charchaa garnuhundai padonnati hunubhaekaa adhikaritaharulaai

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharu raastra ra naagarikako sewaa suraksaa tathaa sahayoga ra apad wipadmaa uddhaara kaaryamaa mana wachana ra karmakaa saatha ahoraatra kariyaasila rahanuparne ullekha garnubhayo
kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka pusparaama kesi lagaayata sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa baristha adhikaritaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo
botinga garne kramamaa kaaski jillaako pokharaa mahaanagaraapaalikaa lekasaaida sthita phewaataalamaa khasekaa tina janaako epiepha tolile bihibaara sakusala udwaara gareko chha

botingagariraheko belaa achaanaka aeko haawaahuriko kaaranaeka dumgaamaa paani pasna gaialapatra parekaa saptarikaa warsiya bolabama chaurasiyaa warsiya pundana chaurasiya ra warsiya bhaasa chaurasiyaaphewaataalamaa khasekaa thie

so ghatanaabaare jaanakaari praapta hunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala gana hekwaa kaaski nambara ganabaata phewaataala reskyu taawaramaa khatieko sasastra prahari sahaayaka niriksaka dipaka sigdelako netaritwako epiepha toli tatkaalai uniharuko sakusala uddhaara gareko ho
jhaapaa jillaako damaka nagarapaalikaa basapaarka ilaakaabaata baisaakha gate epiepha tolile kariba paancha laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko saamaana baraamada gareko chha
sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa paathibharaa jhaapaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile ullekhita mulya baraabarako lattaakapadaa motarapaartsa ra kiraanaa saamaana baraamada gareko ho
baraamada saamaana awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi mechinagara bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko chha

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale somabaara sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayamaa patrakaara sammelanako ayojanaa gari sasastra prahari balalaai praapta kaaryaadesa anurupa sumgathanabaata haalakaa dinaharumaa bhaegarekaa kaamakaarawaahi sambandhamaa jaanakaari garaaunubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale wibhinna prakaritikaa suraksaa chunautilaai saamanaa garna tathaa prabhaawakaari suraksaa wyawasthaakaa laagi desako sabai sthaanamaa sumgathanako upasthitiko awasyakataa mahasusa gari sumgathanako punarsumrachanaa garieko bataaunubhayo

uhaanle sumgathanako punarsumrachanaa gari wigatamaa jillaamaa upasthiti raheko sasastra prahari balalaai desakaa sabai jillaaharumaa tainaatha garieko smarana garaaunubhayo sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale bharnaa chhanauta kaaryalaai sahaja sarala ra paaradarsi banaaieko ullekhi garnuhundai saala bharimaa kula hajaara saya janaa wibhinna darjaamaa bharnaa liieko tathaa haala hajaara saya janaa bharnaa chhanauta prakariyaamaa raheko bataaunubhayo

wigatamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalaya tathaa mukhyaalayaharubaata maatrai darakhaasta awhaana garindai aekomaa bharnaamaa sawaiko pahunchalaai sunischita garna wataa himaali jillaa wataa pahaadi jillaa ra taraaikaa jillaa gari jillaabaata awedana maaga garnukaa saathai sthaaniya bhaasaamaa prachaara prasaara sameta garieko kuraa patrakaara sammelanamaa uhaanle ullekha garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale sumgathanale danda ra puraskaarako niti awalambana garnukaa saathai wipad jokhima nyunikaranakaa ksetramaa saamaajika ksetramaa wisista yogadaana puryaaune mahaanubhaawaharulaai sumgathanako tarphabaata sammaana garne kaaryako thaalani garieko sasastra prahari bala nepaalale parichaalanakaa ksetraharumaa apeksaakarita upalabdhi haasila gareko sumgathanako kalyaanakaari kaaryalaai ajhai prabhaawakaari tathaa paaradarsi tulyaaieko durgama sthaanakaa naagarikakaa dui janaa santatilaai nepaala epiepha skulamaa nihsulka adhyayanako wyawasthaa milaaieko choripaithaari nikaasi niyantrana kaaryalaai prabhaawakaari banaaieko naagarikako sewaa suraksaa tathaa sahayoga ra apatawipadmaa uddhaara kaaryamaa sighra parichaalana hune sumyantrako wikaasa garieko lagaayatakaa wiwidha kaamakaarawaahimaa bhaekaa upalabdhibaare charchaa garnubhayo

arthika paaradarsitaa ra bhrastaachaaramaa sunya sahanasilataako niti awalambana gari kadaaikaa saatha paalanaa garaaieko ullekha garnuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale gata warsa pratisata beruju phachhryauta bhaekomaa ahile dosro chaumaasikasamma aipugdaa pratisata beruju phachhryauta garieko bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale saanti suraksaa tathaa amanachayana kaayama raakhi susaasana banaai raakhna desabhara rahekaa epiepha ikaaimaa kaaryarata sasastra prahari karmachaariharu ahoraatra khatiiraheko charchaa garnuhandai imidiyata responsa tima chekapwaainta piketa tathaa gasti gari dainika rupamaa kula hajaara saya toli parichaalita raheko dainika rupamaa kariba hajaarako sumkhyaamaa sasastra prahari karmachaari niyamita dyutimaa khatieko langa renja patrola tathaa phorsa maarchamaa saya toli parichaalana garieko tathaa yasabaata rhaaiwe maa huna sakne lutapaata chori dakaitiko kunai pani ghatanaa nabhaeko ullekha garnubhayo

sasastra prahari bala nepaalale eka warsako awadhimaa wibhinna khaalakaa wataa awaidha hatiyaara baraamada garnukaa saathai goli saya raaunda myaagajina wataa baaruda eka saya graama detonetara wataa grineta wataa jiletina wataa tathaa paancha kaartuna jiletina lolaa baraamada garieko tathaa wibhinna aparaadhamaa sumlagna saya janaalaai pakraau gari sambandhita nikaayamaa bujhaaieko kuraa sameta so awasaramaa sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale jaanakaari garaaunubhayo uhaanle wibhinna wanyajantuko uddhaara garieko tathaa desakaa wibhinna eka saya sthaanamaa imidiyata responsa tima tainaatha garieko kuraa sameta ullekha gardaiai so timamaa upalabdha bhaesamma sasastra prahari balako swaasthyakarmi tathaa embulensa sameta raakhieko bataaunubhayo sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale eka warsako awadhimaa simaa aparaadha niyantranamaa gariekaa prayaasabaare ullekha garnuhundai wibhinna tahamaa samakaksiwicha bhaeko baithakako sumkhyaabaaremaa sameta jaanakaari garaaunubhayo uhaanle chhimeki mulukakaa suraksaakarmisanga samaanaantara ewum sumyukta gasti garne garieko tathaa wibhinna chaadaparwamaa simaa naakaaharumaa saya sthaanamaa sahaayataa kaksa sthaapanaa gari hajaara saya janaa yaatruharulaai sahayoga puryaaeko bataaunubhayo wipad wyawasthaapana tathaa jokhima nyunikaranatarpha sasastra prahari balale wibhinna prayaasaharu gariraheko charchaa garnuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale eka warsako awadhimaa hajaara janaalaai jiwitai uddhaara garnukaa saathai marityu bhaekaa hajaara janaako saba nikaalieko tathaa uddhaara kaaryamaa kariba hajaara sasastra prahari karmachaari parichaalita bhaeko bataaunubhayo uhaanle sasastra prahari balako suchanaa prawidhitarpha prasasta sudhaara garieko bataaunuhundai wibhinna epiepha ikaaisanga antarika netawarka jadaana garieko sarwilensa sistamamaa sudhaara garieko bhidiyo kanpharensako ksamataa wikaasa garieko sasastra prahari balako taalima paathyakramamaa sudhaara garieko lagaaetakaa wiwidha kaamakaarawaahiharumaa samayaanukula sudhaara garieko kuraa sameta ullekha garnubhayo sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale sumgathanako agaami yojanaa sambandhamaa charchaa garnuhundai bordara auta postako sumkhyaa ajhai bariddhi garne pahala garne lagaayata thapa gulma sthaapanaa garna pahala garne wipad durghatanaa tathaa prakopako awasthaamaa khoja tathaa uddhaara ksamataamaa bariddhi garnukaa saathai uddhaara kaaryalaai adhunika tathaa prawidhi maitri banaauna pahala garne lagaayatakaa wiwidha prakaritikaa agaami yojanaaharubaare sameta ullekha garnubhayo
sasastra prahari balale srotasaadhana ra janasaktiko abhaawamaa maagaanusaara nayaan yunita sthaapanaa garna nasakieko janaaeko chha

srotasaadhana ra jasakti badhaaundai maagaanusaara thulaa widyuta ra raastriya gaurawakaa ayojanaamaa sasastra prahariko yunita sthaapanaalaai praathamikataa diieko bhandai mahaaniriksaka khanaalale aphno eka warse kaaryakaalamaa karmachaari bharnaa prakriyaa thapa wyawasthita banaaieko daawi garnubhayo

sasastra prahari balale aphnaa jyestha purwakarmachaarilaai jiwana nirwaaha bhattaa dine bhaeko chha yo warsadekhi warsa katekaa purwasasastra prahari karmachaarilaai waarsika rupamaa hajaara rupaiyaan nirwaaha bhattaa dine wyawasthaa garieko ho

khanaalakaa anusaara yo warsabaata karmachaarile lina paaune rinako kotaa pani badhaaieko chha yasaaghi saya janaale rina lina paaune wyawasthaa rahekaamaa thapa wataa kotaa kaayama garera janaale rina lina paaune wyawasthaa garieko ho
kanchanapura jillaako purnabaasa nagarapaalikaa doke bajaara ilaakaabaata epiepha tolile eutaa bharuwaa banduka ra bandukamaa prayoga hune phalaamako chharraasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa sohi nagarapaalikaako taauke bajaara basne barsiya mahendra saahi chhan sasastra prahari bala nepaala gulma hekwaa kailaali nambara gulmabaata khatieko
epiepha tolile nija saahilaai chaitra gate pakraau gareko ho pakraau parekaa saahilaai baraamada hatiyaarasahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sthaaniya praharimaa bujhaaieko chha

purwa nawalaparaasi jillaako binaya triwenai gaanupaalikaa sthita byaareja pula ilaakaabaata chaitra gate epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile heroina jasto dekhine puriyaa dhulosahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

sohi thaaunko warsiya wikrama laamaa ra warsiya prabhaata budhaathokilaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta binaya triwenaibaata khatieko epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaaharulaai epiepha tolile baraamadaheroina tathaa ukta skutisahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sthaaniya praharimaa bujhaaeko chha
sasastra prahari balakaa prahari niriksaka insapektara prahari naayawa upariksaka diesapimaa badhuwaa kaa laagi siphaarisa bhaekaa chhan

mumgalabaara waseko sasastra prahari balako badhuwaa siphaarisa samitiko waithakale janaalaai diesapi badhuwaa siphaarisa gareko ho badhuwaa siphaarisako eka nambaramaa dipaka khanaala rahekaa chhan tyastai dui nambaramaa wirabhadra naatha rahekaa chhan

pakraau parnemaa bhaaratako jillaa supaula dagamaaraa graama ghara bataaune barsiya ramesa kumaara mandala chhan unalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta chhinnamastaabaata sasastra prahari niriksaka dipendrabahaadura thaapaako kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile pakraau gareko ho

kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakaharu pusparaama kesi naaraayanabaawu thaapaa ra raamasarana paudela lagaayata baristha adhikaritaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo
kirtipuramaa sasastra prahari balakaa hawaldaara marita phelaa parekaa chhan

budhabaara bihaana kirtipura tribhuwana wiswawidyaalayako ayurwedika kyaampasanajikawaristha hawaldaara saaraabahaadura wika marita phelaa parekaa huntanahun ghara bhaekaa uni nambara gana kaalinchokamaa kaaryarata thie

baanke jillaako nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita jaisapurabaata chaitra gate epiepha tolile kariwa laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko chaara saya thaana mowaailamaa prayoga hune enti rediesana chipsa baraamada gareko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala gulma hekwaa baanke nambara gulmabaata khatieko epiepha tolile ukta saamaana sohi thaaunko bhansaara kaaryaalayako najikaibaata baraamada gareko ho saamaana lyaaune wyaktiharu epiepha tolilaai dekhnaasaathai saamaana chhaadi bhaagekaa thie
epiepha tolile baraamada saamaana awasyaka karaawaahiko laagi sthaaniya bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaeko chha

yasaigari jhaapaa jillaako mechinagara nagarapaalikaa sthita bhansaaradhaata ilaakaabaata chaitra gate epiepha tolile laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko saamaana baraamada gareko chha

bhaaratabaata awaidha rupale bhansaara chhali nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko ullekhita mulya baraabarako wibhinna kampaniko ausadhi ra saata wataa lyaapatapa sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma hekwaa jhaapaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baraamada gareko ho

epiepha tolile aitabaara diusaaejhaapaa ko mechi nagarapaalikaa sthita mechi bhansaara kaaryaalayako yaatru saakhaamaakariwa atha keji chaandiko gahanaasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gulma hekwaa jhaapaabaata khatieko epiepha toli ra bhansaara kaaryaalayakaa karmachaarile jaancha gardaabhaaratako bumgaalaraajya jyaalaa jalapaaigudi ghara bataaune warsiya mithu senalaai pakraau garieko ho

sasastra prahari sahaayaka niriksaka kedaara sresthako kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile unako saathamaa ukta chaandiko gahanaa bhetieko thiyo ukta gahanaa kariwa laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako raheko chha
pakraau parekaa nijalaai baraamada chaandikaa gahanaasahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi mechi bhansaara kaaryaalaya kaankadabhittaamaa bujhaaieko chha
kaabhrepalaanchoka jillaako timaala gaaunpaalikaa laamaabagara sthita sunakosi nadimaa paudi khelne kramamaa bepattaa bhaekaa eka janaako sawa chaitra gate epiepha tolile nadibaata nikaaleko chha

chaitra gate sunakosi nadimaa paudi khelne kramamaa andaaji warsiya sumana taamaanga nadimaa duwera bepattaa bhaekaa thie so ghatanaabaare jaanaakaari paaunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala nambara gana hekwaa kaathamaadau ra nambara gana hekwaa kaabhrepalaanchokabaata gotaakhorasahitako epiepha toli tyasatarpha khatii gaeko thiyo

yasaigari sasastra prahari bala nepaala gulma hekwaa jhaapaa nambara gulmabaata khatieko epiepha tolile chaitra gate kariwa laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko saamaana baraamada gareko chha

chitawana jillaako bharatapura mahaanagaraapaalikaa sthita naaraayanai nadimaa nuhaaune kramamaa wepattaa bhaekaa eka janaako sawa phaaguna gate epiepha tolile nikaaleko chha

so ghatanaabaare jaanakaari paaunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala wipada wyawasthaapana taalima siksaalaya kurinataarabaata khatieko epiepha toli khoji kaaryako laagi ukta sthaanamaa khatieko thiyo

aja bihaanabaata sasastra prahari niriksaka bhawaraaja katuwaalako kamaandamaa awasyaka uddhaara saamaagrisahita khatieko gotaakhora tolile khoji garne kramamaa saahako sawa bihaana kariwa baje nadibaata baahira nikaalna saphala bhaeko ho epiepha tolile ukta sawa postamaartamako laagi sthaaniya praharimaa bujhaaeko chha

desa num ko china ra bhaaratasanga simaa jodiekaa sthaanamaa suraksaakaa laagi sasastra prahari raakhine bhaeko chha ukta pradesakaa arthika maamilaa tathaa yojanaamantri indrabahaadura anbole paanchatharako uttarapurwi ksetra chiwaabhanjyaanako simaa ksetra awalokanakaa kramamaa so kuraa bataaunubhaeko ho
uhaanle simaamaa hune aparaadhika gatiwidhi ra chori nikaasi kama garna bhaarata ra chinasanga jodiekaa simaamaa sasastra prahari raakhna ru karoda laakha bajeta chhutyaaisakeko jaanakaari dinubhayo

bharkharai baseko pradesa num ko mantriparisadko baithakalesasastra prahari posta raakhna sambandhita nikaayalaai akhtiyaari sameta dieko ra yasabaata simaa ksetrakaa naagarikako suraksaakaa saathai wanyajantu tathaa jatibuti chori nikaasi roknasahayoga pugne mantri anbole bataaunubhayo simaa ksetramaa samasyaa bhae tyasalaai raajanitika wisaya banaauna nahune tara samasyaa dekhie dubai desakaa pratinidhi basera samasyaa samaadhaana garine uhaanko bhanaai thiyo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale kaathamaadaumko balamwu sthita nepaala epiepha aspataala parisaramaa nawanirmita aisiyu blaka tathaa blada baimkako maagha gate udghaatana garnubhayo

sohi awasaramaa sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale balamwumaa nawanirmita emati warkasapa bhawana ra wayara haausako sameta udghaatana garnubhayo tyasaiawasaramaa sasastra prahari pariwaara mahilaa sumghaki adhyaksa srimati saritaa kanaela khanaalale so aspataalamaa upachaararata wiraamiharulaai phalaphula witarana garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale tyasaawasaramaa nepaala epiepha aspataalamaa thapa bhaeko aisiyu waarda tathaa blada baimkako suwidhaabaata gambhira roga laagekaa biraamiharule tyasa khaalakaa upachaarako laagi anyatra dhaaunuparne baadhyataabaata chhutakaaraa paaunukosaathai yasai aspataalamaa so suwidhaa praaptagari swaasthya laabha garne wiswaasa wyakta garnuhundai sumgathana sakala darjaakaa sampurna raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariko kalyaanakaari sewaa suwidhaamaa chintanasila raheko bataaunubhayo

uhaanle ghaaite tathaa upachaararata awasthaamaa ragatako abhaawa kasaile pani jhelnu naparosa bhani so aspataala parisaramaa haalai blada baimkako sthaapanaa garieko ullekha garnuhundai aspataalale sumchaalanako chhoto samayamai aisiyu tathaa blada baimka lagaayatakaa swaasthya upachaara sambandhi sewaa suwidhaa pradaana gari thulo phadko maarna saphala hunumaa sumgathanakaa purwaja netaritwawarga tathaa aspataalamaa kaaryarata sasastra prahari karmachaariharuko mahatwapurna yogadaana raheko bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale emati warkasapa tathaa wayara haausako nirmaanabaata wyawasthita bhandaarana tathaa samuchita witaranamaa sahajataa ai sumgathanakaa kaamamaa chustataa aune wiswaasa wyakta garnuuhundai marmata samhaara garnuparne sawaari saadhana kampyutara tathaa sumchaara saadhana adiko samayamai marmata gari bandobastilaai majabuda banaai raastra ra naagarikako sewaa suraksaa ra udwaaramaa parinaamamukhi kaaryasampaadana garna maddata pugne wiswaasa wyakta garnubhayo kaaryakramamaa nepaala epiepha aspataala sumchaalaka samitikaa adhyaksa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka naaraayanabaawu thaapaale sumgathanale lieko kaaryadisaa praapta garnetarpha sabai taha ra tapkaakaa sasastra prahari karmachaariharu saamuhika rupamaa ekajuta bhai laagnuparne charchaa garnuhanudai bhaawi pustaakaa laagi ke yogadaana dinasakchhau bhani chintanasila bhai nirantara rupamaa kaaryaksetramaa laagirahanu parne bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari baristha upariksaka harisachandra adhikaarile nimaarna sambandhi pratiwedana prastuta garnubhaeko thiyo sohi awasaramaa ayojita raktadaana kaaryakramamaa pinta ragata sumkalana bhaeko chha saala chaitra gatedekhi sumchaalanamaa aeko nepaala epiepha aspataalale haala eka saya saiyaa sahita medisina sarjari haardajorni tathaa nasaa enesthesiyaa maanasika tathaa snaayu ankhaa roga charma tathaa yauna roga stri tathaa prasuti ienati rediyoloji pyaatholoji danta roga baala roga wisesajna sewaasahitako imarjensi opidi sewaa mahaamaari prakopa udwaara tathaa datasa ra bhisiti sewaaharu pradaana gariraheko chha

pyaaraaglaaidinga garne kramamaa kaaski jillaako pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa lekasaaidasthita phewaataalamaa khasekaa dui janaa widesi naagarikako epiepha tolile somabaara sakusala uddhaara gareko chha
pyaaraaglaaidinga gariraheko belaa achaanaka aeko haawaahuriko kaarana dui wataa pyaaraaglaaidingamaa sawaara jaapanija naagarikaphewaataalamaa khasekaa thie

dui wataa pyaaraaglaaidinga phewaataalamaa khaseko bhanne jaanakaari paaunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala gana hekwaa kaaski nambara ganabaata khatiekaa sasastra prahari sahaayaka niriksaka dipendra bistako netaritwako epiepha toli tatkaalai uniharuko sakusala uddhaara gareko ho

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale sumyukta raastrasumghako anurodhamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalako tarphabaata saanti sthaapanaartha yunaaiteda nesansa misana ina saautha sudaanamaa phamrda pulisa yunita ephapiyuko rupamaa kaarya garna khatii jaana laageko eka tolilaai aitabaara sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayamaa ayojita eka samaarohakaa bicha haardika widaai garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale tyasaawasaramaa sumyukta raastrasumghako jhandaamuni rahi saantisthaapanaartha khatidaa raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharule raastra ra sumgathanako pratinidhitwa garne hunaale tyasathaaunmaa sadhaim anusaasita tathaa imaandaaritaakaa saatha utkarista kaaryasampaadana garna nirdesana dinubhayo

uhaanle tyasatarpha khatini jaana laageko sasastra prahari bala nepaalako ephapiyu tolile wibhinna desakaa suraksaakarmiharusanga samanwaya ra sahakaarya gari chena apha kamaanda ra phauji sumskaaramaa rahera purna wyawasaayikataakaa saatha praapta jimmewaari ra uttara daayitwa wahana garnuparnemaa joda dinubhayo
