sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale widesamaa rahandaa tyahaanko bhaasaa sumskariti ra rahanasahana pharaka hune hunaale suraksaakarmiharu thapa satarka ra chanaakho bhai sujhabujhakaa saatha jimmewaari nirwaahamaa laagnuparne charchaa garnuhundai khatii jaane tolile maanawa adhikaara ra maanawiya kaanuna tathaa lumaigika himsaamaa sunya sahanasilataako nitiko purna paalanaa gardai utkarista kaaryasampaadana garne wiswaasa wyakta garnubhayo sasastra prahari baristha upariksaka bharatakumaara sresthako kamaandamaa ephapiyuko rupamaa saautha sudaanako jubaamaa khatii jaana laageko so tolimaa janaa adhikaritasahita kula janaa rahekaa chhan kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka raamasarana paudela lagaayata sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa baristha adhikaritaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo
parsaa jillaako chhipaharamaai gaaunpaalikaa sthita jholuniyaa pulabaata maagha gate epiepha tolile eka keji gaanjaasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

sohi jillaako sakhuwaaprarsauni gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya karisnakumaara saaha ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya raakesa sahanilaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta bhiswaabaata khatieko epiepha tolile pakraau gareko ho

parsaa jillaako sakhuwaaprarsaunibaata bhiswaatarpha jaandai gareko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa sawaara nijaharulaai sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa uniharuko saathamaa ullekhita gaanjaa phelaa parepachhi uniharulaai ukta gaanjaa tathaa motarasaaikalasahitai pakraau garieko ho

epiepha tolile sanibaara bihaana kariwa dui baje siraahaa jillaako golabajaara nagarapaalikaa sthita purwa paschima lokamaargako ghurmipulabaata eka keji graama miligraama sunasahita chha janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala gana hekwaa siraahaa nambara ganabaata khatieko epiepha tolile jaancha gardaa uniharumadhye sohi jillaako laahaana nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya gaadi chaalaka mohamada riyaaja raaimako saathabaata thaana waalaa ra wataa kaacho suna sohi thaaun basne warsiya mohamada amirulako saathabaata eutaa waalaa ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya kaiyuma raaimako saathabaata eutaa waalaa phelaa parepachhi uniharulaai pakraau garieko ho

tyasawelaa uniharu sangai so gaadimaa sawaara sohi thaaun basne warsiya mohamada hakima warsiya mohamada rahamaana ra saptari jillaako khadka nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya mohamada aphrojalaai sameta epiepha tolile pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaumbaata laahaanatarpha jaandai gareko biara pie nambarako bhaaratiya skaarpiyo jipamaa sawaara uniharuko saathamaa ullekhita suna phelaa parepachhi uniharulaai pakraau garieko ho tyasawelaa epiepha tolile uniharuko saathabaata nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra thaana mowaaila seta sameta baraamada gareko chha
sasastra prahari bala nepaala gana hekwaa bisesa kaaryadala kaathamaadaum nambara ganamaa sumchaalita sisum bisista wyakti suraksaa taalima pusa gate sampanna bhaeko chha

ukta taalimako sohi ganamaa ayojita eka kaaryakramakaa wicha sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka naaraayanadatta paudelale samaapana garnuko saathai taalimakaa utkarista prasiksaarthilaai puraskaara sameta pradaana garnubhayo

sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka paudelale tyasaawasaramaa taalimabaata arjana gareko jnaana sipa kalaa ra kausalalaai kaaryaksetramaa bharapura upayoga gardai trutirahita dhumgabaata kaaryasampaadana garnuparne bataaunubhayo uhaanle yasa kisimako taalimabaata arjana gareko jnaanale kaaryaksetramaa khatiepachhi jimmewaari nirwaahamaa saphalataa haasila garna sahayoga pugne ullekha garnubhayo

kaaryakramamaa taalimakaa pramukha prasiksaka sasastra prahari niriksaka sumana chaalisele taalima sambandhi pratiwedana prastuta garnubhaeko thiyo atha haptaa awadhiko ukta taalimamaa janaa sasastra prahari niriksakasahita kula janaa prasiksaarthiharuko sahabhaagitaa raheko thiyo

kaaryakramamaa taalimako dauraanamaa prasiksaarthiharulaai khabara sumkalana tathaa mulyaamkana khataraako silessana sawaarimaargako suraksaa samaarohasthalako suraksaa mahatwapurna pratisthaanako suraksaa bala prayogako siddhaanta maanawaadhikaara maanawiya kaanuna lagaaetakaa wiwidha wisayaharumaa saiddhaantika ewum wyaawahaarika jnaana diieko kuraa jaanakaari garaaieko thiyo

sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa siniyara adhikaritaharu prasiksaarthiko rupamaa sahabhaagi raheko sisum hula tathaa dumgaa wyawasthaapana taalima ajadekhi sasastra prahari bala nepaala hula tathaa dumgaa wyawasthaapana taalima siksaalaya laamaapaatana pokharaamaa sumchaalana bhaeko chha sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale sohi siksaalayamaa ayojita eka kaaryakramakaa wicha ukta taalimako udghaatana garnubhayo sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale tyasaawasaramaa phauji sumgathanamaa taalimako mahatwamaathi prakaasa paarnuhundai taalimalaai awasarako rupamaa upayoga gardai prasiksanako dauraanamaa badhibhandaa badhi jnaana arjana garna prasiksaarthiharu tallina rahanuparne bataaunubhayo taalimabaata arjana gareko jnaanalaai kaaryaksetramaa badhibhandaa badhi upayoga gardai maanawa adhikaarako purnarupamaa raksaa gardai sumgathanako niti bamojima utkarista kaaryasampaadanamaa sakariya rahanuparne bataaunuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale naagarikako sewaa suraksaa tathaa sahayoga ra apatawipadmaa uddhaara kaaryakaa laagi sadhaim katiwaddha rahanuparne bataaunubhayo uhaanle taalimako dauraanamaa arjana gareko jnaanalaai kaaryaksetramaa gaepachhi aphu maatahatakaa adhikarita tathaa jawaanaharulaai sameta sikaaundai kaaryaksetramaa sadhaim naagarikale mahasusa garne gari utkarista kaarya garnuparne kuraa sameta ullekha garnubhayo praapta jimmewaarilaai wyaawasaayika kusalataapurwaka puraa garna katiwaddha rahanuparne charchaa garnuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale daayitwa nirwaahako kramamaa jimmewaaribodhakaa saatha pesaagata kaamakaarawaahilaai janachaahanaa anurupako kaaryasaili apanaai puraagarna nirdesana dinuhundai sampurna sasastra prahari karmachaariharulaai utkarista kaaryasampaadana garna nirdesana dinubhayo kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka baaburaama paandele dhanyawaada jnaapanako kramamaa simita srotasaadhanako baawajuda sumgathanale samayaanukula prasiksana sumchaalana gari daksa janasakti utpaadana gardai kaaryaksetramaa parichaalana gardai aeko bataaunubhayo ukta taalima siksaalayakaa samaadesaka sasastra prahari baristha upariksaka raajendra basnetale so samaarohamaa taalima sambandhi kaaryayojanaa prastuta garnubhaeko thiyo ukta taalimamaa sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka janaa tathaa sasastra prahari niriksaka janaa gari kula janaa prasiksaarthiharuko sahabhaagitaa raheko chha

wisesa adaalatale sasastra praharikaa purwa atirikta mahaaniriksaka risabhadewa bhattaraailaai mahinaa jela sajaaya ra laakha hajaara saya rupayaan jariwaanaa ra wigo japhata hune phaisalaa sunaaeko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa gotaakhora taalima praapta sasastra prahari karmachaariharuko nihsulka wyaktigata durghatanaa bimaa nawikarana bhaeko chha sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalaya halchoka swayambhumaa pausa gate ayojita eka kaaryakramakaa bicha nesanala insyorensa kampani limitedale gata warsadekhi suru garieko pratiwyakti dui laakha rupaiyaan baraabarako nihsulka wimaa polisiko nawikarana gareko ho tyasaawasaramaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka pusparaama kesile sasastra prahari bala nepaalale desa ra janataako sewaalaai aphno mulamantra maani raajyadwaaraa sumpieko jimmewaariharulaai nawina saili tathaa wyaawasaayika sochakaasaatha utkarista kaaryasampaadana gardai airaheko charchaa garnuhanudai praapta jimmewaariharumadhye wipad jokhima nyunikarana tathaa wyawasthaapana kaaryalaai yojanaabaddha rupale kaaryaanwayana gardai airaheko bataaunubhayo uhaanle sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa gotaakhora taalima praapta sasastra prahari karmachaariharu desakaa wibhinna sthaanaharumaa bhaeko jala utpanna wipada prakopa udwaara kaaryamaa khatii utkarista udwaarakako rupamaa kaarya gardai airaheko charchaa garnuhanudai summgathanale wipada wyawasthaapana sambandhi daksajanasakti utpaadana gari kaathamaadaum upatyakaa lagaayata sabai pradesaharumaa parichaalana garieko bataaunubhayo sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka kesile ukta bimaa polisile udwaarakarmiharulaai kaaryaksetramaa khatiidaa ajhai badhi hausalaa milne wiswaasa wyakta garnubhayo so insyorensa kampanikaa pramukha kaaryakaari adhikarita aruna kausalale wipada wyawasthaapanako ksetramaa utkarista kausala pradarsana gardai aeko sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa gotaakhoraharulaai kampaniko saamaajika uttaradaayitwa antargata gata warsadekhi suru garieko nihsulka bimaa polisi nawikarana garna paaundaa garwako mahasusa bhaeko bataaunubhayo uhaanle jokhimayukta kaaryamaa khatine suraksaakarmiko sammaana gardai ukta polisi maarphata sasastra prahari bala nepaalasanga sahakaarya garna paaundaa khusi laageko bataaunubhayo sohi samaarohamaa pramukha kaaryakaari adhikarita kausalale sasastra prahari bala nepaalamaa kaaryarata gotaakhora taalima praapta janaa sasastra prahari adhikarita willaadaara tathaa jawaanaharulaai nihsulka bimaa polisiko pramaanapatra pradaana garnubhayo kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa waristha adhikarita tathaa ukta bimaa kampanikaa pratinidhiharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo
mahottari jillaako samsi gaaunpaalikaa baata pausa gate epiepha tolile wewaarise awasthaamaa raheko eka thaana katuwaa pestola baraamada gareko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta samsibaata khatieko epiepha tolile wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa so thaaunmaa raheko khetako jhaadimaa lukaai chhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa ukta katuwaa pestola baraamada gareko ho

wibhinna sumchaara maadhyamamaa sasastra prahari mahaaniriksakale atha wataa sawaari saadhana prayoga gareko bhani prakaasita bhaeko samaachaara prati sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayako gambhira dhyaanaakarsana bhaeko chha sasastra prahari mahaaniriksakale kaamako silasilaamaa dui wataa maatrai sawaari saadhana niyamita rupamaa prayoga garne gareko prawaktaa suraja sresthale jaanakaari die sasastra prahari bala nepaalasanga rahekaa sawaari saadhanaharu wibhinna suraksaa prayojanamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalaya ewum sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa wibhinna kaaryaalayaharu tathaa sasastra prahari karmachaariharule prayoga garne gareko unale bataae samaachaaramaa prakaasita sawaari saadhanaharu madhye eutaa sawaari saadhana suraksaa prayojanako silasilaamaa prayoga bhairaheko sawaari saadhana ho bhane anya paancha wataa sawaari saadhanaharu sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalaya sawaari saakhaa maatahata raheko tathaa ti sawaari saadhanaharu awasyakataa anusaara sarakaari kaamako silasilaamaa prayoga hune gareko byahoraa sameta jaanakaariko laagi anurodha gardachhu sresthaddhaaraa jaari bijnaptimaa ullekha chha
sasastra prahari balako wisesa tolile aja bhaktapurako sallaaghaaribaata itaaliyana pestolasahita chaara janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraauparnemaa kaalikota tilaaguphaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya balajita saahi sohi thaaunkaa warsiya motilaala saahi sohi jillaako mahaadewa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya jaagesa saahi ra mugukaa warsiya bhimaprakaasa daahaala chhan
gariha mantraalayale sasastra prahari balakaa janaa sasastra prahari upariksakalaai sasastra prahari baristha upariksamaa badhuwaa garne nirnaya gareko chha
sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayamaa ayojita ikaai pramukha sammelana ko pausa gate eka samaarohakaa bicha samaapana garnubhayo

tyasaawasaramaa sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale so sammelana sumgathanalaai spasta disaabodha garne uddesyakaa saatha sasastra prahari bala nepaalako itihaasamaa prathama pataka garieko charchaa garnuhandai sammelanamaa sakariya sahabhaagitaa janaai aphnaa dhaaranaaharu prastuta garnuhune sahakarmi sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaharu lagaayata sampurna ikaai pramukhaharulaai dhanyawaada wyakta garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale so sammelanamaa ikaai pramuharubaata wyakta bhaeko wichaara ra daristikonamaa sampurna raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharuko bhaawanaa ra chaaso pratiwimwita bhaeko ullekha garnuhundai wigatamaa sampaadita kaaryaharuko bistarita wiwechanaa bhai sumgathanale bholikaa dinamaa line saarthaka yojanaa tathaa maargachitra tayaara garna so sammelanale mahatwapurna bhumikaa khelne bataaunubhayo

uhaanle sumgathana nayaan siraabaata agaadi badhiraheko charchaa garnuhundai sumgathanako hitako laagi sabai taha ra tapkaakaa raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharu wyaktigata swaarthabhandaa maathi uthera wyaawasaayika kaaryasampaadanamaa kariyaasila rahanu parne jasabaata sumgathana ra sabai sasastra prahari karmachaariharuko hita hune bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale atyantai wyasta kaarya taalikaamaa rahi ghanibhuta rupamaa prastutikarana chhalaphala tathaa wichaara wimarsabaata nichodako rupamaa wibhinna sujhaawaharu sumgathanalaai praapta bhaeko charchaa garnuhanudai praapta sujhaawaharulaai wijna toli maarphata punah adhyayana tathaa chhalaphala paschaata spasta nitisahita druta gatimaa kaaryaanwayanatarpha lagine bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakaharu pusparaama kesi naaraayanabaawu thaapaa ra raamasarana paudelale so samaarohamaa sammelanamaa bhaeko prastutikarana tathaa chhalaphala bhaekaa wisayaharubaare charchaa tathaa samiksaa sameta garnubhayo

sammelanamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalamaa kalyaanakaari wyawasthaa widyamaana taalima ra sudhaarakaa paksaharu widyamaana raasana pranaali sumghiyataamaa sambhaawita suraksaa chunauti simaa suraksaa ra sudaridhikarana wipada wyawasthaapanamaa samasyaa ra chunauti parichaalanako awasthaa ra chunauti bandowasti lagaayata wiwidha wisayaharumaa wistarita chhalaphala bhaeko thiyo

parsaa jillaako biraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa baata mumsira gate epiepha tolile kariwa keji gaanjaasahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parneharumaa bhaaratako katihaara ghara bataaune warsiya golaakhu sarawariyaa warsiya kumaara raaya ra warsiya sundara raaya chhan

nepaalabaata bhaaratatarpha jaandai garekaa uniharulaai sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa uniharule sarirako wibhinna bhaagamaa lukaai chhipaai laijaadai gareko awasthaamaa ullekhita parimaanako gaanjaa phelaa parepachhi sasastra prahari bala nepaala gulma hekwaa parsaa nambara gulmabaata khatieko epiepha tolile ukta gaanjaasahita pakraau gareko ho

yasaigari siraahaa jillaako laahaana nagarapaalikaa sthita raghunaathapurabaata mumsira gate epiepha tolile botala daaileksa disi naamaka laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha sohi jillaako bhagawaanapura gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya pramodakumaara yaadawalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksa wesa laahaanabaata khatieko epiepha tolile pakraau gareko ho bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai garekaa nija yaadawalaai epiepha tolile sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa unako saathamaa ukta laaguausadha phelaa parepachhi unalaai pakraau garieko ho pakraau parekaa yaadawalaai baraamada laaguausadhasahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya laahaanamaa bujhaaieko chha

garihamantri raamabahaadura thaapaa baadalale sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayamaa dui dinasamma sumchaalana hune ikaai pramukha sammelana ko aitabaara eka samaarohakaa bicha paanasamaa dwipa prajwalana gari udghaatana garnubhayo

tyasaawasaramaa uhaanle sasastra prahari bala nepaala sthaapanaako chhoto samayamai eutaa mahatwapurna suraksaa sumgathanako rupamaa sthaapita bhaeko charchaa garnuhundai desabhara rahekaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa ikaai pramukhaharu bicha apasamaa gahana chhalaphala ra bislesana garine yastaa sammelanabaata mahatwapurna niskarsamaa pugna sakine ullekha garnubhayo

uhaanle simaa suraksaa simaa aparaadha niyantrana wipad wyawasthaapana raajaswa chuhaawata niyantrana lagaaetakaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalalaai praapta kaaryaadesaharumaa sumgathanakaa raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharubaata ullekhaniya kaarya sampaadana bhairaheko charchaa garnuhundai antarraastriya staramaa sameta wiswasaanti sthaapanaamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalale mahatwapurna bhumikaa nirwaaha gariraheko bataaunubhayo garihamantri thaapaale yastaa sammelanabaata pariskarita bhai aekaa niskarsabaata sumgathanalaai awasyaka niti rananiti ra yojanaa tarjumaa garna maatra nabhai raastriya suraksaa niti nirmaanamaa sameta mahatwapurna sahayoga pugne bataaunubhayo

sohi awasaramaa garihasachiwa premakumaara raaile punasumrachanaa paschaata desakaa watai jillaamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalako kaaryaalayaharu sthaapanaa bhaeko ra hune kramamaa raheko ullekha garnuhundai sawai tahakaa kamaandaraharu upasthita hune gari ayojita yasa sammelanale raastrako samagra saanti suraksaako wartamaana awasthaabaare suksma wislesana hune wiswaasa wyakta garnubhayo

uhaanle yastaa sammelanabaata balakaa raastrasewakaharule kaaryaksetramaa bhogekaa wyawahaarika samasyaa kathinaai suraksaa chunauti ra sumbhaawita suraksaa chunautiharu pahilyaai thosa yojanaa ra spasta khaakaa sahitako kaarya yojanaa tayaara garna mahatwapurna sahayoga pugne bataaunubhayo kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharu simaanaamaa tainaatha rahi raastriyataako jagernaa ewum naagarikako sewaa suraksaa sahayoga ra uddhaara garne kaaryamaa raajyale sumpieko daayitwa puraa gari apumlaai prabhaawakaari dhumgale parichaalana garera kaaryaksetramaa parinaamamukhi kaarya sampaadana gardai airaheko bataaunubhayo

uhaanle sumgathanale maanawaadhikaarako sumraksana ra sumwadrdhana mahilaa tathaa baalabaalikaamaa hune himsaamaa sunya sahanasilataa bhrastaachaaramaa sunya sahanasilataa laaguausadha nisedha jastaa sarakaarakaa nitilaai kadaaikaasaatha awalambana gardai airaheko charchaa garnuhundai raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharulaai imaandaara kartawyanistha wyaawasaayika ra anusaasita bhai kaaryaksetramaa sakariya rahana nirdesana sameta dinubhayo sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale raastra raastriyataa raastriya akhandataa ra janataakaa khaatira sasastra prahari karmachaariharule aphno swaartha ra sukha suwidhaalaai tyaagi nepaala ra nepaalile sadaiwa garwa garna sakne raastrasewaka banna saknuparne bataaunubhayo

kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka pusparaama kesile swaagata mantawya tathaa kaaryakramako uddesyamaathi prakaasa paarnuhundai wyawasthaapanako ksetramaa atyanta mahatwapurna maanine sahabhaagitaa mulaka netaritwako maadhayamabaata garine niti nirmaana sumsaarabhara saphala bhaeko charchaa garnubhayo

so sammelanamaa desabhara rahekaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa ikaai pramukhaharu wicha raajyadwaaraa sumgathanalaai pradaana gariekaa kaaryaadesaharulaai prabhaawakaari dhumgale puraagarne ra sumgathanale nirdhaarana gareko praathamikataakaa ksetraharubhitra rahera gahana adhyayana prastutikarana ra chhalaphala tathaa samiksaa hune kuraa so awasaramaa jaanakaari garaaieko thiyo kaaryakramamaa suraksaa sallaahakaara daa indrajita raai sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakaharu naaraayanabaabu thaapaa ra raamasarana paudela lagaaeta sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa baristha adhikaritaharuko sahabhaagitaa raheko thiyo

charesa wikrigarne uddesyale boki hidekaa makawaanapura jillaako kailaasa gaaunpaalikaa daadaagaaun ghara bhai haala nuwaakota jillaako kakani gaaunpaalikaa sthita simle basne warsiya suresa moktaana epiepha tolidwaaraa charesasahita rumgehaata pakraau parekaa chhan

sasastra prahari bala nepaala gulma hekwaa kaathamaadaum nambara gulma ra sasastra prahari balako wisesa tolile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita sobhaa bhagawatibaata sanibaara diunso unalaai charesasahita pakraau gareko ho
so gulmakaa gulmapati sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka suresa gairekaa anusaara tyasawelaa moktaanako saathabaata keji charesa baraamada bhaepachhi unalaai pakraau garieko ho
sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalaya halchoka swayambhumaa mumsira gate tesro epiepha kamaanda tathaa staapha korsako sartiphikesana prograama sampanna bhaeko chha

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale so samaarohamaa epiepha kamaanda tathaa staapha kaleja saanogaucharana kaathamaadaummaa sumchaalita so korsamaa sahabhaagi bhai prophesanala stadija tarphako adhyayana puraa garekaa prasiksaarthi adhikaritaharulaai pramaanapatra pradaana garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale tyasa awasaramaa sumgathanamaa atyanta thulo mahatwa raakhne kamaanda tathaa staapha korsako so korsa puraa garne prasiksaarthiharulaai haardika badhaai dinuhundai kaaryaksetramaa khatidaa uhaanharule sikeko jnaana sipa kalaa ra kausalako pratiwimwa wyaawasaayika charitramaa sameta jhalkinu parne bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharulaai phauji sumskaara ra maryaadaamaa rahi anusaasita ra imaandaaritaakaasaatha sachchaa raastrasewakako rupamaa raastra ra naagarikako sewaa ra suraksaamaa daridhasumkalpita bhai kaaryaksetramaa khatna nirdesana sameta dinubhayo uhaanle kamaandara tahakaa sasastra prahari adhikaritaharule maatahatakaa karmachaariharuko sewaa suwidhaamaa sameta dhyaana puyaaundai raastra naagarika ra sumgathanapratiko aphno jimmewaari purna wyaawasaayikataakaasaatha puraa garnuparne bataaunubhayo

so kalejakaa samaadesaka sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka chandraprakaasa gautamale taalima sambandhi pratiwedana prastuta garnuhundai prasiksaarthiharulaai wibhinna widhaakaa khyaati praapta prophesaraharubaata prasiksana garaaieko charchaa garnubhayo

ukta korsamaa raastriya tathaa antarraastriya suraksaa chunauti niti nirmaana tathaa yojanaa simaa suraksaa audyogika suraksaa wipada wyawasthaapana wisista wyakti tathaa mahatwapurna pratisthaanako suraksaa maanawaadhikaara tathaa maanawiya kaanuna sumyukta raastrasumghiya suraksaa kaarawaahi adi wisayamaa prasiksana diieko kuraa so awasaramaa jaanakaari garaaieko thiyo saala asoja gatebaata sumchaalana bhaeko ukta

korsamaa janaa sasastra prahari naayawa upariksakaharu prasiksaarthiko rupamaa sahabhaagi rahekaa chhan kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaharu naaraayanabaawu thaapaa ra raamasarana paudela tathaa epiepha kamaanda tathaa staapha kalejakaa saiksika kaaryakrama sumyojaka awakaasa praapta sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka rawiraaja thaapaa lagaayata baristha adhikaritaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo
rasuwaa jillaako gosaaikunda gaaunpaalikaa sthita timurebaata mumsira gate epiepha tolile kariwa laakha rupaiyaan baraabarako choripaithaariko saamaana baraamada gareko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala gulma hekwaa rasuwaa nambara gulmabaata sasastra prahari sahaayaka niriksaka wisnauprasaada adhikaariko kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile ukta saamaana baraamada gareko ho
epiepha tolile baraamada saamaana awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi rasuwaagadhi bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaeko chha

parsaa jillaako biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa baata mumsira gate epiepha tolile kariwa keji charesasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha bhaaratako kalakattaa ghara bataaune warsiya ekalaakha sekhalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala gulma hekwaa parsaa nambara gulmabaata gastimaa khatieko epiepha tolile pakraau gareko ho nepaalabaata bhaaratatarpha jaandai garekaa nija sekhalaai sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa nijale sarirako bibhinna bhaagamaa berera lukaai chhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa ullekhita parimaanako charesa phelaa parepachhi unalaai pakraau garieko ho epiepha tolile pakraau parekaa nija sekhalaai baraamada charesasahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaamaa bujhaaeko chha
sasastra prahari bala raajaswa tathaa bhansaara suraksaa gulma wiraganjale aja tina kilo charesasahita eka bhaaratiyalaari pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaaratako kolakaataakaa warsiya ikawaala sekha rahekaa chhan wiraganja naakaabaata raksaulatarpha tina plaastikamaa lukaaichhipaai lagiraheko awasthaamaa pakraau garieko sasastra prahari naayaba upariksaka tilakabahaadura khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo sekhalaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaa lagieko chha

raastriya sasastra prahari bala prasiksana pratisthaana maataatirthamaa sumchaalita sisum sasastra prahari niriksaka adhaarabhuta taalima tathaa sasastra prahari sahaayaka niriksaka adhaarabhuta taalima sampanna bhaeko chha

garihamantri raamabahaadura thaapaa baadalale mumsira gate sohi pratisthaanamaa ayojita taalimako diksaanta kawaajamaa sasastra prahari niriksaka adhaarabhuta taalimamaa sarwaprathama bhaekaa prasiksaarthi sasastra prahari niriksaka dambarabahaadura ksetrilaai khukuri pradaana garnubhayo

sohi awasaramaa uhaanle sasastra prahari sahaayaka niriksaka adhaarabhuta taalimamaa sarwaprathama bhaekaa prasiksaarthi sasastra prahari sahaayaka niriksaka sandipa bhattalaai sameta khukuri pradaana garnubhayo

uhaanle sasastra prahari balakaa raastra sewakaharule tyaaga parisrama ra birataako pradarsana gardai sumgathanalaai desako mahatwapurna suraksaa sumyantrako rupamaa sthaapita gareko ullekha garnuhundai daayitwa nirwaahakaa kramamaa jiwanako utsarga garekaa bira sasastra prahari karmachaariko balidaanako smarana garnuhundai ghaaite tathaa amgabhumga bhaekaa raastrasewakaharuko sthaasthyalaabhako kaamanaa garnubhayo

garihamantri thaapaale simaa suraksaa simaa aparaadha niyantrana sasastra samuhaharuko gatiwidhi niyantrana audyogika suraksaa tathaa raajaswa chuhaawata niyantrana wipada udwaara wisista wyakti tathaa mahatwapurna pratisthaanako suraksaa hula tathaa dumthaa wyawasthaapana lagaayatakaa nepaala sarakaaradwaaraa pradaana garieko kaaryaadesaharumaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalale pradarsana gareko bhumikaako mugdakanthale prasumsaa garnubhayo

uhaanle apata wipadamaa janataalaai sewaa suraksaa ra sahayoga pradaana garna suraksaakarmiharu jastosukai praristhitimaa pani anusaasita ra kartawyanistha bhai anya nikaayaharusanga sameta awasyaka samanwaya gardai utkarista kaarya sampaadanamaa nirantara kriyaasila rahirahanuparne bataaunubhayo
garihamantri thaapaale sasastra prahari bala nepaalalaai samayaanukula srotasaadhana sampanna banaauna nepaala sarakaara garihamantraalaya katibaddha raheko kuraa sameta ullekha garnubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale dhanyawaada jnaapanako kramamaa desakaa wibhinna bhaagaharumaa tainaatha rahi raastriyataako jagernaa ewum naagarikako sewaa suraksaa tathaa sahayoga ra apata wipadamaa udwaara kaaryamaa raajyale sumpieko daayitwa puraa gardai prabhaawakaari dhumgale parichaalita bhaera sumgathanale parinaamamukhi kaarya sampaadana gardai airaheko bataaunubhayo

uhaanle raastra sewaka sasastra prahari karmachaariharu kaaryaksetramaa khatidaa sadhaim jimmewaara bhai wyaawasaayikataalaai haridayumgama gari wyaktigata swaarthalaai thaati raakhera sadaiwa sewaabhaawakaasaatha desa ra janataako sewaa ra suraksaamaa samarpita rahirahanuparne bataaunubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale diksita adhikaritaharulaai agaami dinamaa kaaryaksetramaa khatidaa sampurna naagarikalaai nai aphno pariwaarakaa sadasya samjhiera sohi bhaawakaasaatha sewaa ra suraksaamaa tana mana ra wachanakaasaatha prastuta bhai utkarista kaarya sampaadana garna nirdesana dinubhayo

suraksaakarmiharule sadaiwa raastra ra janataakaa laagi aphno sampurna sukha suwidhaaharulaai tyaagera jimmewaari nirwaaha gardai desa ra janataale sadhaim garwa garne sachchaa suraksaakarmi banna saknuparne charchaa garnuhandai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale arthika wikaasa ra samariddhikaa laagi suwyawasthaa ra susaasanayukta waataawarana nirmaana garne nepaala sarakaara garihamantraalayako bunde gariha prasaasana sudhaara kaarya yojanaa tathaa nirdesanaharu paripaalanaa gardai saantisuraksaakaa laagi ahoraatra khatiirahane pratiwaddhataa wyakta garnubhayo

kaaryakramamaa so pratisthaanakaa kaaryakaari nirdesaka sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka raamasarana paudelale swaagata mantawya tathaa taalima sambandhi pratiwedana prastuta garnuhundai prasiksaarthiharulaai samayaanukula ra baijnaanika dhumgale prasiksana pradaana gari yogya adhikarita nirmaanamaa joda diieko bataaunuhundai wyaawasaayika sipa daksataa ra netaritwa ksamataa wikaasamaa yastaa adhaarabhuta taalimako mahatwapurna bhumikaa rahane ullekha garnubhayo

sasastra prahari niriksaka adhaarabhuta taalimamaa janaa mahilaasahita kula janaa tathaa sasastra prahari sahaayaka niriksaka adhaarabhuta taalimamaa janaa mahilaasahita kula janaa prasiksaarthiharuko sahabhaagitaa raheko thiyo
sasastra prahari bala nepaalale chhatha parwakaa awasaramaa desabharakaa eka saya nadi talaau tathaa mathamandiramaa sarasaphaai gareko chha

chhatha parwakaa bartaalu bhaktajanaharulaai saghaau puyaauna sasastra praharikaa wibhinna ikaaiharubaata so sarasaphaai garieko ho sarasaphaaimaa kula dui hajaara sasastra praharikaa jawaana tathaa adhikaritaharu khatiekaa thie

kaathamaadaun upatyakaamaa maatrai wibhinna sthaanamaa sarasaphaai garieko chha tyastai pradesa num maa pradesa num maa ra pradesa num maa sthaanamaa sarasaphaai garieko sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka ajaya chhatakulile jaanakaari dinubhayo
uhaankaa anusaara sasastra prahari balale pradesa num maa pradesa num maa karnaali pradesamaa ra sudurapaschima pradesamaa thaaunkaa nadi talaau tathaa mathamandirako sarasaphaai garieko chha
sasastra prahari balako kendriya prawaktaako jimmewaari diaiji suraja sresthalaai tokieko chha
sasastra prahari pramukha sailendra khanaalale sresthalaai prawaktaako jimmewaari diekaa hunsasastra praharikaa prawaktaa sresthalaai mowaaila nambara maa samparka garna sakine chha

tyasaigari sasastra praharimaa uchcha adhikaritaharuko saruwaa ra diaijimaa badhuwaa bhaekaa adhikaritaharu padasthaapana bhaeko chha garihamantraalayale sasastra praharikaa tina diaijiko saruwaa garnuko saathai bharkharai badhuwaa bhaekaa anya janaa diaijiko padasthaapanaa sameta gareko ho

gariha mantraalayale diaijiharu baaburaama paandelaai num baahini mukhyaalaya kaaski prawina kumaara srestha num baahini mahottari ra kawindramaana sresthalaai suraksaa parisadko sachiwaalayasimhadarawaara prajaabhakta sresthalaai sasastra prahari bala prasiksana pratisthaana raamaprakaasa srestha num baahini makawaanapura raaju aryaala maanawasrota wibhaagataalima nirdesanaalayanaaraayanadatta paudela simaa suraksaa wibhaagasipi gautamalaai kamaanda tathaa staapha kaleja ra gowinda ksetriko prasaasana nirdesanaalayamaa padasthaapanaa bhaeko chha
nepaala epiepha kamaanda tathaa staapha kalejamaa rahekaa esaesapi kisora pradhaanako nepaala wipad wyawasthaapana taalima siksaalaya kurinataaramaa saruwaa garieko chha

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale sasastra prahari baristha upariksakabaata sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksakamaa padonnati hunubhaekaa janaalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalaya halchoka swayambhumaa kaartika gate ayojita bisesa samaarohamaa sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksakako dajryaani chinha pradaana garnubhayo

nepaala sarakaara mantristarako kaartika gateko nirnayale i prajaabhakta srestha raamaprakaasa srestha raaju aryaala naaraayanadatta paudela chandraprakaasa gautama ra gowinda ksetri sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksakamaa padonnati hunubhaeko ho

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale so awasaramaa kunai pani sumgathanamaa sewaarata rahandaa padonnatiko thulo mahatwa rahane charchaa garnuhundai uhaanharule kaaryaksetramaa pradarsana gareko wyaawasaayika ksamataako mulyaamkana swarupa nepaala sarakaarale padonnati gareko bataaunubhayo

uhaanle padonnatisangai badheko padiya jimmewaarilaai ajhai badhi uttaradaayi ra purna wyaawasaayikataakaa saatha nirwaaha garna nirdesana sameta dinubhayo saamuhika bhaawanaakaa saatha sabai ekajuta bhai raastra ra sumgathanale nirdista gareko laksya praapta garnetarpha laagnuparne charchaa garnuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale dirghakaalina rupamaa sumgathanakaa laksyaharu haasila garna laamo anubhawa haasila garnubhaekaa baristha adhikaritaharuko pesaagata daksataa ra jimmewaari bahana garna sakne ksamataa lagaayata jnaana sipa ra anubhawako mahatwapurna bhumikaa rahane bataaunubhayo

uhaanle sampurna sasastra prahari karmachaariharule harapala imaandaara laganasila ra kartawyanistha bhai desa ra ama naagarikako sewaa suraksaa tathaa sahayoga ra apata wipadmaa uddhaara kaaryamaa kariyaasila rahana nirdesana sameta dinubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale sumgathanale bhrastaachaara ewum laimgika himsaamaa sunya sahanasilataako niti lieko charchaa garnuhundai maanawa adhikaarako sumraksana ra sambadrdhanamaa katiwaddha rahandai daayitwa nirwaahamaa samarpita rahana nirdesana dinuubhayo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale raastrasewaka sasastra prahari karmachaarile aphno kartawya kahilyai birsana nahune bataaunuhundai kaamamaa wiswaasa garnele sadhaim saphalataa paaune bataaunubhayo

kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari pariwaara mahilaa sumghaki adhyaksa srimati saritaa kanaela khanaala lagaayata sumghakaa padaadhikaariharu sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakaharu pusparaama kesi naaraayanabaabu thaapaa ra raamasarana paudela tathaa epiepha adhikaritaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo
sasastra prahari balako wisesa tolile budhabaara kaathamaadaumko gurjudhaaraabaata kariba paancha keji charesasahita chaara janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
sasastra prahari balakaa esaesapiharu diaiji badhuwaamaa siphaarisa bhaekaa chhan
sasastra praharikaa esaesapi sumjaya raanaalepadabaata raajinaamaa diekaa chhan ne

paali senaabaata sasastramaa sewaa prawesa garekaa esaesapi sumjaya raanaale sasastra mukhyaalaya halachokamaa raajinaamaa bujhaaekaa hun uni sasastramaa wyawasaayika adhikaritakaa rupamaa chininchhan
baanke jillaako nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa baata epiepha tolile asoja gate kariwa laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako kukhuraako challaasahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa bhaaratako sitaapura ghara bataaune warsiya inasaana ali warsiya atika ali ra warsiya sepha ali khaana chhan sasastra prahari bala nepaala gana hekwaa baanke nambara ganabaata khatieko epiepha tolile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

kaaski jillaako pokharaa mahaanagaraapaalikaa lekasaaida sthita phewaataalamaa ekkaasi pareko paani tathaa haawaahuriko kaarana taalako bicha bhaagamaa alapatra parekaa atha janaa paryatakalaai epiepha tolile bhaadra gate saanjha sakusala udwaara gareko chha
soko jaanakaari praapta hunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala gana hekwaa kaaski nambara ganabaata phewaataala reskyu taawaramaa khatieko epiepha tolile uniharuko udwaara gareko ho

taalamaa botinga garne kramamaa ekkaasi aeko paani tathaa haawaahuriko kaarana chiniyaan naagarika warsiya jona libaana khaathyaanga warsiyaa binjina khaathyaanga ra bhaaratiya naagarika warsiya srinaatha yaadawa warsiya umesa yaadawa warsiya surendra jaisawaala warsiya mahendra agrawaala warsiya guddu jaisawaala ra warsa ki chaandani jaisawaalalaai sasastra prahari sahaayaka niriksaka dipaka sigdelako kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile motarabota ra thro wyaagako sahaayataale taalabaata tatkaalai udwaara gareko ho

sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta kawahigothabaata khatieko epiepha tolile baaraa jillaako surwana gaaunpaalikaa sthita santaganjabaata nepaali nambara pletako motarasaaikala chori gari bhaaratatarpha laijaadai garekaa tina janaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa bhaaratako dharahari motihaari purwi champaarana ghara bataaune raamasumkara baithaa siwanandana baithaa ra dilipakumaara jaisawaala chhan biara echa nambarako bhaaratiya motarasaaikala ra naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa bhaaratatarpha jaandai garekaa uniharulaai gastimaa khatieko epiepha tolile pakraau garieko ho pakraau parekaaharulaai epiepha tolile baraamada motarasaaikalasahitai awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kawahigothamaa bujhaaeko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayale kaabhre jillaako mandala deupura nagarapaalikaa chhaapa bhanne sthaanamaa pahirobaata bisthaapita ghara pariwaaralaai akwaabaksa pradaana gareko chha

ukta thaaunmaa bhadau gate ayojita eka kaaryakrama wicha so nagarapaalikaakaa meyara tokabahaadura waaiwaa ra sasastra prahari upariksaka benuprasaada paathakale pahirobaata bisthaapita gharapariwaaralaai so akwaabaksa hastaantarana garnubhayo
so akwaabaksa sasastra prahari bala nepaalalaai rotari intaranesanala nepaalabaata praapta bhaeko thiyo prati akwaabaksa kariba eka laakha rupaiyaan baraabarako raheko bataaieko chha
ukta akwaabaksa bitarana kaaryakramamaa meyara tokabahaadura waaiwaale pidita pariwaaralaai nagarapaalikaale garne sahayogamaa sameta kunai kami nahune bataaunubhayo

uhaanle bisthaapita pariwaaralaai nagarapaalikaako tarphabaata sameta sahayoga garine ullekha garnubhayo sasastra prahari upariksaka benuprasaada paathakale sasastra prahari balale agaami dinaharumaa sameta wipattibaata piditaharukaa laagi sahayogako kaaryakramaharulaai nirantarataa diine bataaunubhayo

sumgathanale uddhaarakaarya tathaa raahata witarana kaaryamaa sakriya sahabhaagitaa janaaundai aeko charchaagardai sasastra prahari upariksaka paathakale wipatti pidita naagarikalaai uddhaara kaaryamaa sumgathanale utkarista yogadaana puyaairaheko ullekha garnubhayo so kaaryakramamaa samaajasewi sthaaniya raajanaitika kaaryakartaa tathaa sthaaniya bhadrabhalaadamiharuko sameta upasthiti raheko thiyo tyasa thaaunmaa gata saauna mahinaamaa pareko awirala barsaako kaarana ghara bageko tathaa ghara puriera ksati bhaekaa gharapariwaaralaai so saamaagri bitarana garieko kuraa samaarohamaa charchaa garieko thiyo
nepaala insyorensa kampani limitedale upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaekaa eka sasastra prahari jawaanako srimatilaai bimaa waapatako laakha rupaiyaanko cheka pradaana gareko chha

sasastra prahari baristha upariksaka sumjayawikrama raanaa tathaa so wimaa kampanikaa pramukha daa pranawa senale bhaadra gate sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayamaa ayojita eka kaaryakramakaa bicha sasastra prahari jawaana swa arjuna basnetaki srimati wisnaulaksmi kaarkilaai ukta cheka pradaana garnubhaeko ho

sasastra prahari bala nepaala baahini mukhyaalaya moranga nambara baahinimaa kaaryarata nija sasastra prahari jawaana swa basneta gata jetha gate jhaapaa jillaako arjunadhaaraa nagarapaalikaa sthita eka hotalako chhatabaata khasera ghaaite bhaekaa thie tyasapachhi unalaai upachaarako laagi purwa ksetriya sasastra prahari bala nepaala aspataala pakali sunasarimaa lagieko tyahaan upachaara huna nasakepachhi bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana dharaana puyaaiekomaa jetha gate unako marityu bhaeko thiyo

nepaala insyorensa kampani limiteda ra sasastra prahari bala nepaalako sahakaaryamaa pausa gate sasastra prahari bala nepaalamaa kaaryarata janaa gotaakhora taalima praapta sasastra prahari karmachaariko eka warse jiwana bimaa garieko thiyo gotaakhora taalima praapta garekaa sasastra prahari jawaana swa arjuna basneta wipadako purwa tayaari tathaa khoja uddhaara sambandhi anusiksana taalimako laagi prasiksakako rupamaa ukta sthaanamaa khatieko welaa so durghatanaa bhaeko thiyo

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale sasastra prahari bala nepaalako sewaa line sewaagraahiko wiswaasa jitne dhumgale wyaawasaayika jimmewaari nirwaaha garna sasastra prahari karmachaariharulaai nirdesana dinubhaeko chha

uhaanle sasastra prahari bala nepaalako pesaa pawitra sewaa bhaeko charchaa gardai bhannubhayo naagarikale tapaaiharulaai thulo wiswaasa ra tapaaiharu sanga thuprai apeksaaharu garekaa chhan naagarikako tyo wiswaasa ra apeksaalaai puraa garna haami sasastra prahari karmachaarile aphno sampurna ichchhaa akaamksaaharulaai thaati raakhera hara prahara naagarika hitamaa kendrita bhai pesaagata imaandaaritaakaasaatha wyaawasaayika jimmewaari puraa garnupardachha

sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale sumyukta raastrasumghako anurodhamaa saanti sthaapanaartha yunaaiteda nesansa misana ina saautha sudaanako boramaa ephapiyuko rupamaa saphalataapurwaka kaaryasampanna gari swadesa pharkieko epiepha tolilaai swaagata tathaa praawidhika sasastra prahari niriksakamaa padonnati bhaekaaharulaai dajryaani chinha pradaana garnuhanudai saauna gate sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayamaa so kuraa bataaunubhaeko ho

sumgathana nayaan siraabaata agaadi badhiraheko ullekha garnuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale sumgathanako wikaasa ra wistaaramaa sampurna sasastra prahari karmachaariharule aaphno ksetrabaata yogadaana puyaaunuparne kuraa sameta ullekha garnubhayo

uhaanle sasastra prahari sewaamaa awaddha raastrasewakaharule sadhaim aphuprati garwawaanwita bhai aphno jimmewaari puraagarna kariyaasila rahanu parne charchaa garnuhundai phauji sewaamaa wyaktigata ichchhaa akaamksaa gaumdha hune kuraa sameta ullekha garnubhayo
sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale sasastra prahari karmachaariharu sadhaim aphno kartawyamaa nachuki daayitwa nirwaahamaa samarpita rahirahanuparne bataaunubhayo

yuena misanabaata pharkieko epiepha tolilaai ingita garnuhundai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale so tolile sumgathana ra desako naama rahane gari utkarista kaarya garera misanamaa aphno jimmewaari puraa gareko wiswaasa wyakta garnubhayo misanamaa wibhinna desakaa suraksaakarmi sanga sahakaarya gari arjana gareko jnaana tathaa sipalaai swadesamaa pharkiepachhi kaaryaksetramaa upayoga garnuparne charchaa garnuhundai uhaanle waastawamai naagarikako hitamaa kaarya garidaa santusti milne kuraa sameta ullekha garnubhayo so kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari niriksakabaata sasastra prahari naayawa upariksakamaa padonnati bhaekaa premasimha dhaamilaai sameta dajryaani chinha pradaana garieko thiyo

yunaaiteda nesansa misana ina saautha sudaanabaata aphno kaaryakaala puraagari sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka narendra senako kamaandamaa swadesa pharkieko so tolimaa epiepha adhikarita willaadaara tathaa jawaana gari janaa rahekaa chhan kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakaharu pusparaama kesi naaraayanabaawu thaapaa ra raamasarana paudela lagaayata sasastra prahari bala nepaalakaa baristha adhikaritaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo
sasastra prahari bala nepaalale esaesabikaa adhikaariharulaai staapha kaleja taalima dina prastaawa gareko ho
yahi saauna gatedekhi gatesamma bhaeko so koardinesana mitinamaa nepaalako tarphabaata sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka

ukta koardinesana mitinamaa simaa ksetrako suraksaa awasthaabaare chhalaphala hunukaasaathai kunai samasyaa aemaa eka apasamaa samanwaya gari suljhaaune sahamati bhaeko chha yasaigari simaa ksetrakaa suchanaalaai awasyakataa anusaara eka apasamaa adaanapradaana garne sambandhamaa sameta sahamati bhaeko chha

yasaigari duwai sumgathanako netaritwa staramaa ksetriya staramaa tathaa jillaa stara ra sthaaniya staramaa niyamita rupamaa samanwaya baithaka raakhne eka arkaakaa kamaandarabicha niyamita samparka samanwaya garne duwai desale simaa ksetramaa prabhaawakaari simaa wyawasthaapanakaa laagi sumyukta abhyaasa garne duwai desakaa taalime adhikaritalaai eka arkaako trenina ekedemiko awalokanako awasara pradaana garne lagaayatakaa wiwidha wisayaharumaa sameta sahamati bhaeko chha

solukhumbu jillaako khumwu paasaanalhaamu gaaunpaalikaa sthita kholaako taalamaa nuhaaune kramamaa duwera haraairahekaaharuko khoji kaaryako laagi sasastra prahari bala nepaalako gotaakhora sahitako epiepha toli mumgalabaara hekikoptaradwaaraa kaathamaadaumbaata tyasatarpha gaeko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala wipada wyawasthaapana taalima siksaalaya kurinataarabaata sasastra prahari naayawa niriksaka raamachandra khadkaako kamaandamaa dui janaa gotaakhorasahita wipada wyawasthaapana taalima praapta kula paancha janaako epiepha toli mumgalabaara bajera minetamaa khoji tathaa udwaara kaaryako laagi kaathamaadaubaata tyasatarpha gaeko ho

bhaaratako nayaan dillimaa hune tharda koardinesana mitinamaa sahabhaagi huna nepaali pratinidhi mandalako netaritwa gardai sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaala mumgalabaara tyasatarpha prasthaana garnubhaeko chha

uhaanlaai tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka naaraayanabaawu thaapaale subhakaamanaasahita haardika widaai garnubhayo sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalakaa saatha tyasatarpha gaeko nepaali pratinidhi mandalamaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalabaata sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka pusparaama kesi tathaa sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka kawindramaana srestha ra sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka kamalaprasaada tiusinaa chhan

yasaigari so pratinidhi mandalamaa nepaala praharikaa prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka susilakumaara bhandaari raastriya anusandhaana wibhaagakaa anusandhaana nirdesaka tekendra kaarki garihamantraalayakaa upasachiwa ekadewa adhikaari ra pararaastra mantraalayakaa saakhaa adhikarita daa ilaa mainaali sameta chhan sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka tathaa bhaaratako sasastra simaa balakaa mahaanirdesaka bicha hune ukta koardinesana mitina yahi saauna gatedekhi gatesamma hune kaaryakrama raheko chha
parsaa jillaako wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa baata saauna gate epiepha tolile wibhinna kisimakaa laaguausadhasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

biara echa nambarako bhaaratiya gaadimaa sawaara uniharulaai sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa uniharuko saathabaata daaijepaama saya wataa nuphina saya wataa ra phenaaragana saya wataa phelaa parepachhi uniharulaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala gulma hekwaa parsaa nambara gulmabaata khatieko epiepha tolile pakraau gareko ho
sasastra prahari balakaa paancha janaa atirikta prahari mahaaniriksaka eaijile raajinaamaa diekaa chhan

eaijiharu jaanakiraaja bhattaraai subodha adhikaari niraakaarawikrama saaha khadaananda chaudhari ra raajesa sresthale bihibaara raajinaamaa dieko sasastra prahari balakaa mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalako sachiwaalayale janaaeko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaalako gaadimaa kaatha raakhera anyatra laijaane kaaryamaa sumlagna rahekaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala aruna gulma chainapura sumkhuwaasabhaakaa sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka raamaprasaada bhandaarilaai sasastra prahari balale aja nilamwana gari kaarawaahi garne prakriyaa suru gareko chha ukta ghatanaamaa sumlagna rahekaa anya tina janaa sasastra prahari jawaanaharu winoda kattela ra milana kumaara raai tathaa so gaadikaa chaalaka sasastra prahari jawaana dipendra kumaara karmaakaaralaai sameta nilamwana gari kaarawaahi garne prakriyaa suru bhaeko chha

uniharule yahi jetha gate so gulmako baa ga nambarako trakamaa awaidha rupamaa kaatha raakhera dharaanatarpha laijaana laageko awasthaamaa dhanakutaa jillaako mulaghaata bhanne thaaunmaa sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa wesa mulaghaata dhanakutaako epiepha tolile niyantranamaa lieko thiyo so ghatanaabaare jaanakaari praapta hunaasaathai purwa ksetriya sasastra prahari bala nepaala mukhyaalaya baraaha baahini pakalibaata sasastra prahari upariksaka gunaakhara khanaalako adhyaksataamaa chhaanawina samiti gathana garieko thiyo

so ghatanaako gaambhiryataalaai dhyaanamaa raakhera tatkaalai sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayabaata sasastra prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka surajakumaara sresthako adhyaksataamaa tina sadasyiya chhaanawina samiti gathana garieko thiyo chhaanawina samitimaa sasastra prahari upariksaka netrakumaara khatri ra sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka kamala prasaada tiusinaa sadasya rahekaa chhan

praarambhika chhaanawinabaata ti sasastra prahari karmachaariharule kunai pani nikaayamaa kunai jaanakaari sameta nagaraai sumgathanako maryaadaa ra niti wiparita kaarya gareko dekhina aepachhi uniharulaai nilamwana gari kaarawaahi garne prakriyaa suru garieko ho chhaanawina samitile sthalagata adhyayana garnukaasaathai sodhapuchha ra anusandhaana gardaa uniharuko dosa dekhina aeko pratiwedana dieko chha

tatkaala uniharulaai nilamwana nagaridaa pramaana lopa garne prayaasa garna sakne hundaa sasastra prahari niyamaawali ko niyama ko upaniyama ko khanda kha ra gha anusaara nilamwanako prakriyaa suru garieko ho
eka janaa sasastra prahari karmachaarile etiemabaata paisaa nikaalna jaandaa tyahaan hajaara rupaiyaan nagada bhetaaepachhi ukta rakama baimkalaai hastaantarana garieko chha

sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayako gaadi chaalakako rupamaa kaaryarata sasastra prahari jawaana balaraama sresthale sanibaara aparaanha kaathamaadauko nayaan baaneswara sthita eka etiemabaata rakama nikaalna khojdaa tyahaan unale ullekhita rupaiyaan bhetaaekaa thie

sasastra prahari jawaana sresthale so rakama aitabaara glowala aiemai baimka nayaan waaneswarakaa saakhaa prawandhaka susila kumaara budhaathokilaai hastaantarana gardai ukta rakama sambandhita wyaktilaai bujhaai dina agraha garieko chha
nawalaparaasi jillaako winaya triwenai gaaunpaalikaa sthita gyaarejapulabaata baisaakha gate epiepha toli ra nepaala praharile bhaaratiya notasahita ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha
bhaaratako bagaahaa ghara bataaune warsiya karisna marahulaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala asthaayi suraksaa posta triwenaibaata khatieko epiepha toli ra nepaala prahariko tolile pakraau gareko ho
sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka sailendra khanaalale raastriya sasastra prahari bala nepaala prasiksana pratisthaana maataatirthamaa sumchaalita sisum ganapati taalimako samaapana garekaa chhan

sasastra prahari bala nepaala pradhaana kaaryaalayamaa baisaakha gate ayojita taalimako samaapana samaarohamaa sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale taalimakaa utkarista prasiksaarthiharulaai puraskaara tathaa pramaanapatra pradaana gare

ukta taalimamaa sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka kirana basneta sarwaprathama bhaekaa chhana bhane risarcha peparatarpha sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka suryabahaadura sena wali utkarista thahariekaa chhan so awasaramaa sasastra prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale kamaandara tahakaa adhikaritaharulaai wyaawasaayika ksamataayukta saksama ra daksa banaaundai uniharuko warittiwikaasamaa tewaa puyaaune abhipraayale ganapati taalima sumchaalana garieko bataae taalimamaa sahabhaagi prasiksaarthiharulaai staapha dyuti kamaanda enda myaanejamenta kraaima kantrola intelijensa aparesana apha waara tyaaktisa suraksaa wibhinna ainaniyama tathaa sasastra prahari bala nepaalako kaamakaarawaahi lagaayatakaa wiwidha wisayawastuharulaai sametera prasiksana diieko thiyo dui mahinaa awadhiko so taalimamaa kula janaa sasastra prahari naayawa upariksakaharu prasiksaarthiko rupamaa sahabhaagi rahekaa thie kaaryakramamaa sasastra prahari atirikta mahaaniriksakaharu pusparaama kesi naaraayanabaabu thaapaa raamasarana paudela ra subodhakumaara adhikaari lagaayata epiepha adhikaritaharuko upasthiti raheko thiyo

durlabha raato haabre redapaandaa chori sikaari gareko abhiyogamaa dosi pramaanaita bhaekaa abhiyukta kaaraagaara chalaana bhaekaa chhan kaaraagaara chalaana hunemaa rasuwaa jillaa amaachhodinmo gaaunpaalikaa chilime niwaasi warsakaa chhawaana taamaana raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rasuwaale janaaeko chha

raato haabre redapaandaa chori sikaari gareko abhiyogamaa jillaa adaalatabaata wisum saalamai dosi pramaanaita bhaekaa taamaanalaai niyantranamaa lina praharile laamo prayaasa gareko thiyo taatopaani najikai gaaibastuko gothamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa thaambucheta praharile niyantrayamaa lii kaaraagaara chalaana gareko bataaieko chha jillaa adaalatako phaisalaa bamojima pakraau parekaa taamaanale eka warsa kaida bhuktaana garnuparne bataaieko chha
wibhinna muddaamaa jillaa adaalatabaata dosi pramaanaita bhai pharaara suchimaa rahekaa wyaktiko khojikaaryalaai tiwra rupamaa agaadi badhaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
lalitapurako kumaaripaatisthita gudawila bachata tathaa rina sahakaari sumsthaako sanchaalaka samitikaa sabai janaalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

praharile gata sanibaara yasa sumsthaakaa adhyaksa diwaakara sresthalaai jhandai karoda rupaiyaan thageko aropakaa pakraau gareko thiyo unalaai praharile chitawanabaata pakraau gari kaathamaadaum lyaaeko thiyo
mumgalabaara raati sawaa baje dubaibaata aeko phlaai dubaiko wimaanabaata aekaa dhanusaakaa prakaasa maharaalaai wimaanasthalasthita bhansaara kaaryaalaya ra praharile pakraau garekaa hun

kaathamaadaumko raatopulamaa eka janaa bhaaratiya naagarikako marityu bhaeko chha bhaaratako kalakattaakaa warsiya pradipa mandala kasmetika saamaana banaaune udyogamaa kaama garthe udyogako kaarakhaanaa banepaamaa thiyo aphisa darabaara maargamaa unako kaama darabaaramaargako aphisamaa thiyo
kaabhre kusaadewi ghara bataaune warsiya karisna guruna bhanine wyaktilaai kutapita gari hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa janaalaai aitabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa bhaktapura chaangunaaraayana nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya teka bahaadura kesi sohi thaaun basne warsiya nawina koju bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya binoda laakhaa chaangunaaraayana nagarapaalikaa basne dolakhaa bhimeswara nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya kamala khatri phunyaala ra bhaktapura chaangunaaraayana nagarapaalikaa basne sunasari barju gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya sanisa kumaara raaya rahekaa chhan

chhiyonaki srimati anjali taamaana ra saalaa prawesa taamaana tathaa paasaana taamaanalaai dhaarilo hatiyaara dekhaai niyantranamaa lii haatakhuttaa tepale baandhi lutapaata gareko praharile janaaeko chha sohi suchanaakaa adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahari parisara ra waritta lainachaurako wisesa prahari tolile uniharulaai wibhinna sthaanabaata pakraau gareko prahari upariksaka ramesakumaara basnetale jaanakaari dinubhayo

sodhapuchha gardaa ukta rakama tathaa saamaana tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sandipa kausalako raheko bhanne khulekaale unalaai pani pakraau garieko praharile janaaeko chha unale rakamako srota khulaauna nasakekaale anusandhaanakaa laagi mahaanagariya prahari waritta thaanakotale thapa anusandhaana gariraheko basnetale jaanakaari dinubhayo

baala yauna duraachaarako aropamaa eka widesi naagarikalaai praharile aja pakraau gareko chha prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byurobaata khatieko tolile ukta kasuramaa amerikana naagarika maaikala narmana telaralaai pakraau gareko aja eka suchanaa jaari gari janaaeko chha

nikai aghidekhi khojiko suchimaa rahekaa unalaai aja kaaskiko pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita homastemaa basirahekaa belaa byuroko tolile pakraau gari awasyaka anusandhaana tathaa kaarawaahikaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaeko janaaeko chha unale amerikaa rahandaadekhi nai baalayauna duraachaara garne manasaayale nepaali baalabaalikaasanga saamaajika sanjaalamaarphata niyamita samparka garne gareko bhanne suchanakaa adhaaramaa byurole unalaai khoji gariraheko thiyo

lahaana nagarapaalikaa sthita maalapota kaaryaalayamaa chaita gate diunso bama bisphota garaaeko ghatanaamaa sumlagna raheko abhiyogamaa janaalaai sukhipura nagarapaalikaa baata somabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa sukhipura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya raamarijhana yaadawa ra laksmipura pataari gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya abhimanyu giri rahekaa chhan ukta kaaryaalayako pahilo tallaamaa dartaa chalaani saakhaa najika sewaagraahiharuko atyadhika chaapa raheko belaa achaanaka wisphota bhai janaa ghaaite bhaeko ra kaaryaalayako sisaaharu phuteko tathaa presara kukarakaa tukraaharu waarudako gandha ra taraai jantaantrika mukti morchaa goita samuha ko parchaaharu phelaa pareko sambandhamaa anusandhaanako kramamaa uniharulaai nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya janakapuradhaama ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaabaata khatieko bisesa tolile pakraau gareko ho

anusandhaanako kramamaa taraai jantaantrika mukti morchaa goita samuha ko adhyaksa jaya karisna goitako nirdesanamaa sukhipura nagarapaalikaa basne arake bhanne raama kumaara yaadawale gata phaaguna gate bhagawaanapura gaaunpaalikaako thaadi bhanne sthaanamaa lahaana maalapota kaaryaalayamaa bisphota garaaunako laagi ukta presara kukara bama aphuharulaai dieko bhani abhiyuktaharubaata khulna aeko nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

uniharumadhye ukta maalapota kaaryaalayamaa presara kukara bama raakhna jaandaa raamarijhanale lagaaeko raato jyaaketa chapala ra tisarta unako saathabaata thaana katuwaa pestola ra somaa prayoga hune raaunda goli abhimanyuko saathabaata thaana katuwaa pestola ra somaa prayoga hune raaunda goli baraamada bhaeko chha

abhiyuktaharumadhye raamarijhana chaita gate wikaasa jwelarsa lahaanamaa bhaeko wisphotako muddaamaa sirahaa jillaa adaalatabaata laakha dharautimaa rihaa bhaeko ra saauna gate wiraatanagara upamahaanagarapaalikaako kaaryaalayamaa bama bisphota garaaeko muddaamaa morana jillaa adaalatabaata hajaara rupaiyaan dharautimaa rihaa bhaeko tathaa abhimanyu giri bigata warsadekhi taraai jantaantrika mukti morchaa goita samuha maa sumlagna rahi balapurwaka chandaa asuli kaama garne gareko khulna aeko chha yasa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya janakapuradhaamale janaaeko chha

itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya kesaba kaarkiko hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya jiwana regmilaai somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha puraano risaiwiko kaarana jiwanale kesabalaai phalaamako khanti prahaara gari pharaara bhaeko ra ghaaitelaai upachaarako laagi dharaana ghopaa pathaaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha saamudaayika prahari bita saantijhodaa ra prahari chauki taraharaabaata khatieko praharile sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita karisi phaarmabaata unalaai pakraau gareko ho gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa kesawako ukta aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha yasa sambandhamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

luaapha asthaayi nambarapleta bhaeko tyaaktarakaa sahachaalaka galyaana nagarapaalikaa bumgraanti basne warsiya ganaesa gaahaalaai ghaaite awasthaamaa kaaligandaki nadimaa phaaleko abhiyogamaa sohi tyaaktarakaa chaalaka galyaana nagarapaalikaa bumgraanti basne warsiya amita pariyaaralaai sukrabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

tyaaktarabaata khasera ghaaite bhaekaa aphnai tyaaktarakaa sahachaalakalaai nadimaa bagaaeko bhanne suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya syaanjaabaata khojatalaasa tathaa anusandhaanako laagi khatieko prahari tolile ghatanaamaa sumlagna tyaaktarakaa arkaa sahachaalaka galyaana nagarapaalikaa bumgraanti basne warsiya sunila raanaalaai paalpaa prahariko sahayogamaa chaita gate pakraau gareko thiyo

sohi ghatanaamaa sumlagna rahi pharaara rahekaa mukhya abhiyukta tathaa chaalaka amitalaai srimati ra chhori sahita bhaaratatarpha bhaagna laageko awasthaamaa wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya waalina syaanjaabaata khatieko praharile rupandehiko welahiyaa naakaabaata phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

chaita gate tyaaktara chaalaka amita tathaa sahachaalakadwaya sunila ra ganaesale saankharabaata dinabhari waaluwaa boki beluki pharkane kramamaa ganaesa tyaaktarabaata khasera ghaaite bhaepachhi unalaai amita ra sunilale sohi tyaaktaramaa raakhera kaaligandaki saankharaghaatamaa lagi nadimaa bagaaeko khulna aeko chha amitalaai jillaa adaalata syaanjaabaata myaada thapa anumati lii thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya syaanjaale janaaeko chha

saamaanya wiwaada hundaa sametachhimeki sabailaai dhaakadhamki dine khadgabahaadura dekhi gaaunle sabai daraaune gareko uniharuko bhanaai chha aphuharu pani asuraksita hune traasakaa kaarana gaaunkaa mahilaa aguwaako saathamaa ghatanaako wisayamaa ujuri garna salleri aeko pidita mahilaale bataaunubhayo jillaamaa kriyaasila antarapaarti mahilaa sanjaalako sahayogamaa gata phaaguna gate jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya solukhumbumaa jabarajasti karanai sirsakamaa muddaa dartaa garieko pidita paksako bhanaai chha

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale rangaharuko parwa holilaai suraksita ra maryaadita banaauna upatyakaako tinai jillaamaa badhi traaphika prahari khataaera kadaaikaa saatha chekajaancha gareko chha

durghatanaa rahita holi parwa banaaunakaa laagi mahaasaakhaale traaphika wyawasthaapanako yojanaa tayaara gari aphno janasakti parichaalana gareko ho mahaasaakhaale holi manaaune kramamaa huna sakne sambhaawita durghatanaako jokhimalaai madhyanajara gardai upatyakaako wibhinna badhi sthaanaharumaa cheka pwaaintaharu raakhera bihaana bajedekhi nai kadaa chekajaanchako wyabasthaa milaaeko chha

durghatanaa rahita holi banaaune bisesa yojanaa sahitako chekajaanchako kramamaa modiphaai gareko motarasaaikalalaai kaarabaahi gardaa paanchasaya rupaiyaa dine chaabahilakaa mandila sresthalaai pakraau gari maaligaanu barittamaa pathaaeko chha bhane maadaka padaartha sewana gari hohallaa garne motarasaaikalalaai kaarabaahi garna khojdaa eka hajaara rupainyaa dina khojne harisiddhikaa bhaktaraaja maharjanalaai kaarabaahi saatadobaato barittamaa pathaaeko mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha

eka mahinaadekhi ochhyaanasahita bepattaa jhaa dampatiko sawa bihibaara phelaa pareko chha mahottariko piparaa gaaunpaalikaa maa gaadieko awasthaamaa uniharuko sawa phelaa pareko praharile janaaeko chha

pradesa nambara prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka dhiraja prataapa simhale yasako pusti gare unakaa anusaara paancha phita tala gaadieko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko ho sawa chaando kuhiyos bhanera nuna pani haaleko dekhiyo unale bhane

gata phaaguna gate mahottariko piparaa gaaunpaalikaasthita sahodawaabaata warsiya mosaaphira jhaa ra unaki patni warsiyaa gitaadewi jhaalaai gharamai sutiraheko awasthaamaa ochhyaanasahita wepattaa paarieko thiyo

dinesale purpaksakaa laagi sudhaaragariha napathaaundaasamma aphule nai balaatkaara hatyaa gareko bayaana diekaa thie yasaaghi bhaagarathiko sawa jillaa aspataalamaa pariksana gardaa balaatkaarapachhi hatyaa bhaeko dekhieko thiyo gata maagha gate widyaalaya gaeki bhaagarathi saanjha ghara napharkepachhi khojatalaasa gardai jaandaa bholipalta sthaaniya lawaleka jangalamaa wibhatsa ra nirwastra rupamaa sawa phelaa pareko thiyo

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya saanosribaata khatieko praharile rupaalaai madhubana nagarapaalikaa laalibajaarabaata pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaale janaaeko chha

gurunale ti baalikaalaai aitabaara saanjha yauna durwyawahaara gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya basantapurabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa rajatajayanti chokabaata srota nakhuleko kariba laakha rupaiyaan sahita rautahata katahariyaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya mukesa kumaara yaadabalaai aitabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
pra pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai prahari chauki inaruwaabaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikala chaalaka yaadabalaai

sohi thaaunsthita nirmaanaadhina pokharaa antarraastriya bimaanasthalamaa prawesa gari sumkaaspada harkata gare paschaata tyahaan khatieko nepaali senaako tolile jaancha gardaa nija nepaali senaamaa kaaryarata nabhaeko paaiekole unalaai niyantranamaa lii awasyaka anusandhaana tathaa kaarabaahikaa laagi pratiwedana sahita jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskimaa bujhaaeko ho

unako saathabaata nepaali senaako sahaayaka senaani darjaako darjyaani chinha sahita posaaka chustaa buta sri bhagawatidala gana pokharaa lekhieko parichayapatra thaana phlaairoja lekhieko kaalo rumgako nakkali waakitaki rediyo seta thaana thaana mobaaila ra ramesa sresthako naamako nepaali naagarikataako pratilipi thaana baraamada bhaeko chha
uni upara likhata sambandhi kasura antargata jillaa adaalata kaaskibaata dina myaada thapa bhai thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskile janaaeko chha

lamajuna bensisaharachoma sadakaantargata naaso gaaunpaalikaa khotromaa traka khasdaa chha janaako marityu bhaeko chha lamajuna bensisaharabaata manaana jaandai gareko dhakha numko traka sanibaara yasa sadakakhandabaata mitara tala masryaandi nadimaa khasdaa chha janaako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya lamajunakaa prahari niriksaka omaprakaasa punale bataaunubhayo

uhaankaa anusaara traka turghatanaa hundaa ghatanaasthalamai tina janaako marityu bhaeko thiyo marityu hunemaa manaanasthita naaso gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiyaa manisaa guruna sohi wadaakaa warsiya jalakaasi guruna ra saata warsiyaa liuna gurunako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha tyastai manaanasthita chaame gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiyaa dhanamaana wika ra lamajuna masryaandi gaaunpaalikaa ghermukaa warsiya laksmana nepaaliko lamajuna bensisahara nagarapaalikaa maa raheko jillaa aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa sanibaara raati marityu bhaeko prahari niriksaka punako bhanaai chha

tyastai upachaarakaa laagi chitawanasthita puraano medikala kaleja bharatapura lagiekaa tinamadhye naaso kaa tina warsiya thiyona gurunako sanibaara raati upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha gambhira ghaaite duijanaa sohi traka chaalaka tanahun bhaanu nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sumana taamaana ra naaso dhaaraapaanikaa saata warsiya mela gurunako upachaara bhairaheko prahari niriksaka punale bataaunubhayo uniharu paancha janaalaai nai upachaarakaa laagi sanibaara raati h bajetira jillaa aspataala lamajunamaa lyaaieko prahari niriksaka punale bataaunubhayo

upachaarakaa kramamaa dui janaako jillaa aspataala lamajunamaa marityu bhaeko ra tina janaako upachaara huna nasakepachhi ukta aspataalamaa siphaarisa garieko prahari niriksaka punako bhanaai chha jillaa aspataala lamajunamaa marityu bhaekaa dui janaako sawa aspataalamaa raakhieko chha ghaaite chaalaka taamaanako taaukaamaa chota laageko chha bhane saata warsiya gurunako nadekhine gari bhitri chota laageko praharile janaaeko chha praharikaa anusaara so trakamaa atha janaa sawaara thie

gata bhadau gate aphnai naatinilaai balaatkaara gareko kasuramaa hajurabubaawiruddha praharimaa ujuri parepachhi jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale ti purusalaai pakraau garera anusandhaana gari adaalatako adesaanusaara adaalatamaa muddaa dartaasangai purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa raakhdai aeko thiyo

galakota h athahattara warsiyaa eka wariddhaalaai balaatkaara gareko kasuramaa jillaa adaalata baagalunale jillaako galakota nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya bulabahaadura wikalaai tina warsa chha mahinaa kaida sajaayako phaisalaa sunaaeko chha jillaa adaalata baagalunakaa nyaayaadhisa waasudewa nyaupaaneko mangalabaarako ekala ijalaasale kasura thahara gardai jabarajasti karanai udyoga kasuramaa aropitalaai tina warsa chha mahinaa kaidasahita piditalaai ru hajaara ksatipurtiko phaisalaa gareko jillaa adaalata baagalunakaa suchanaa adhikaari suryaprasaada bhandaarile bataaunubhayo

pidita wariddhaalaai aropita wikale bhadau gate balaatkaara garne prayaasa gareko bhandai pidita paksale bhadau gate jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baagalunamaa ujuri diekaa thie tyasalagattai praharile aropitalaai sohi dina giraphtaara gareko thiyo praharile anusandhaana puraa gari jillaa sarakaari wakilako kaaryaalayamaarphata bhadau gate jillaa adaalata baagalunamaa jabarajasti karanai udyoga abhiyogamaa muddaa dartaa gareko thiyo

mahottariko piparaa gaaunpaalikaa sahodwaakaa bepattaa eka dampatiko khoji nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byuro siaibile thaaleko chha gata phaaguna gate raati aphnai gharako ochhyaanamaa sutekaa warsiya mosaaphira jhaa ra uhaanki patni warsiya gitaadewiko khoji aba kendriya anusandhaana byuro siaibi le thaaleko ho

yasaaghi nepaala prahariko pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile bepattaa dampatiko khoji gariraheko bataae pani pattaa laagna nasakepachhi prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale siaibi toli khataaeko ho jhaa dampati suteko khaatasahitai haraaekaa chhan

nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byuro siaibi pramukha sahakula thaapaale bepattaa dampatiko khojimaa toli parichaalana garieko pusti garnubhayo byurokaa prahari niriksakako kamaandako toli budhabaara nai mahottari pugera kaama thaaleko thaapaako bhanaai chha jhaa dampati raati ochhyaanabaatai bepattaa bhaeko ghatanaalaai aparaadhika samuhale apaharana gareko adkala garindai chha phaaguna gate bihaana jhaa dampati haraaeko ghatanaa saarwajanika bhaelagattai prahari toli ghatanaasthala pugera praarambhika jaancha gardaa gharakothaako sanghaaramaa ragatakaa chhitaajasto dekhiepachhi hatyaa garieko hunasaknesammako adkala garieko chha

bepattaa wariddha dampatiko pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile khoji bhairaheko janaae pani pattaa laagna nasakepachhi yahaan siaibi toli khataainuparne maaga badheko thiyo laamo samayasamma bepattaa jhaa dampati awasthaa pattaa laagna nasakepachhi khoji kaarya phitalo bhaeko gunaaso gardai maithila braahmana yuwaa mahaasabhaa pradesa samitisahita saamaajika sanghasumsthaale siaibi toli parichaalana garna prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayako dhyaanaakarsana garaaekaa thie

yasaaghi bepattaa jhaa dampatiko khojimaa praharile bhandaa badhilaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya puryaaera kerakaara gardaa pani ghatanaabaare khaasa tathya phelaa naparepachhi piparaa gaaunpaalikaa ksetramaa traasa phailieko chha jhaa dampati suteko khaatasahitai bepattaa paarieko ghatanaako yakina kuraa auna nasakdaa jhanai badhi rahasyapurna baneko chha ahile siaibile khojabina garna thaalepachhi jillaamaa ghatanaabaare yakina tathya aune asa bhane palaaeko chha

karisnapura nagarapaalikaa pipariyaa basne warsiya sumjaya raanaalaai hajaara darako thaana ra saya darako thaana nakkali nota tathaa nakkali nota banaauna prayoga hune wibhinna saamaana sahita mumgalabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

raanaale nakkali nota chhaapne kaarya garne gareko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapura ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gulariyaabaata khatieko praharile raanaako khudraa pasala jaancha gardaa ukta nakkali nota phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

saathai unako pasalabaata thaana phalaamako kaichi hajaara darako nepaali notako saaija naapne phalaamako paataabaata baneko thaana saancho thaana gama saya thaana photokapi pepara thaana rangina photokapi mesina thaana deskatapa kampyutara ra hajaara rupaiyaan sakkali nepaali nota thaana praharile baraamada gareko chha yasa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

nijagadha nagarapaalikaa buddhachoka basne rautahata chandrapura nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa bhugeswara sarmaakaa warsiya chhoraa kaalu bhanne rohita sarmaako hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa rautahata chandrapura nagarapaalikaa thegaanaa bhaekaa warsiya aruna kumaara saahalaai mumgalabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

rohitako ghaatimaa chakku prahaara gari hatyaa gareko awasthaamaa sawa ochhyaanamai raheko bhanne suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya nijagadhabaata khatieko sumyukta prahari tolile ghatanaako anusandhaana garne kramamaa hatyaamaa sumlagna arunalaai chandranigaahapurasthita kiraanaa pasalabaata phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

purwa risaiwi ra wiwaadako kaarana maarne manasaaya anusaara aruna nai chakku sahita somabaara raatidekhi rohitako gharamaa basera mumgalabaara bihaana chakku prahaara gari hatyaa gareko praarambhika anusandhaanabaata khulna aeko ho unalaai kartawya jyaana muddaamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaeko chha

ochhyaanamai sutiraheko awasthaamaa ajnaata samuhadwaaraa dina pahile bepattaa paariekaa piparaa gaaunpaalikaa sahodawaakaa wariddha dampati ajhai phelaa parekaa chhainan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka prakaasa wistakaa anusaara sthaaniya warsiya mosaaphira jhaa ra uhaanki patni warsiyaa gitaadewi jhaalaai sutirahekai awasthaamaa yahi phaaguna gate raati gharaibaata ajnaata samuhale bepattaa paarekaamaa ahilesamma uhaanharuko kunai attopatto laageko chhaina

praharile uhaanko gaaunko chaaraitirako wana chaura jhaadi kholaa naalaa pokhari ra chhimeki gaaun tathaa jillaakaa wibhinna sthaanasahita chhimeki jillaa dhanusaakaa sameta wibhinna sthaanamaa wyaapakarupamaa khojatalaasa garisakeko tathaa ahilesamma kunai suraaka phelaa napareko janaaeko chha

kapilawastu warsiyaa mahilaalaai jabarajasti karanai gareko abhiyogamaa kapilawastu nagarapaalikaa kodahawaa basne warsiya kisoralaai aitabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha ti mahilaalaai sohi thaaunsthita gahunbaarimaa jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kapilawastubaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho

magarale sohi thaaunsthita kukhuraa pharmamaa ti baalikaalaai jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhalkewarabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
kaawaasoti nagarapaalikaa chaalisakilo jumgalasthita sadakabaata thaana pestola sahita gorakhaa chumanubri gaaunpaalikaa basne janaa barsiya kisoralaai aitabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalaparaasi purwa baata khatieko praharile naa kha nambarako basalaai jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta pestola sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

lokasewaa ayoga dipaayala kendrabaata mahendranagara ksetrakaa wibhinna pariksaa kendramaa sanchaalana bhaeko prahari jawaana khullaa tathaa samaawesi janapadako likhita pariksaamaa nakkali pariksaarthi bani pariksaa dine janaalaai praharile sanibaara pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka amarabahaadura thaapaa ksetrikaa anusaara naagarikataako pramaanapatra ra prawesa patramaa photo pariwartana tathaa kirte hastaaksara gari nakkali pariksaarthi banera pariksaa dineharulaai pakraau gari anusandhaana bhairaheko chha

pakraau parnemaa kailaali gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya awinaasa chaudhari warsiya lekharaaja chaudhari warsiya wisaala chaudhari daarchulaako maarmaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa gokula dhaami warsiya kaa dinesa maharaa bajhaana masthaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya ajaya kathaayata warsiya balaraama kathaayata warsiya kamala kathaayata warsiya prawina kathaayata ra bajhaana talkota gaaunpaalikaa kaa lokaraaja josi rahekaa chhan

yasaigari kailaaliko dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya wipina chaudhari sohi upanagarapaalikaa kaa laksmana chanda warsiya saagarabahaadura deupaa bajhaanako talkota gaaunpaalikaakaa warsiya dinesa khaati warsiya nawina josi ra kailaaliko tikaapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya saagara boharaa pakraau parekaa chhan yastai bajhaana thalaaraa gaaunpaalikaakaa warsiya siwaraaja nepaali durgaathali gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya karisna kathaayata janawaasaa gaaunpaalikaakaa warsiya wikrama boharaa wunapaa kaa warsiya wimala boharaa ra janapakaa warsiya jiwana boharaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha
arkaako jaggaako kirte laalapurjaa wanaai thagi garne janaa pakraau parekaa chhana kaathamaadaum prahari parisarale uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho thapa wiwarana tala hernuhosa

kehi aparaadhika ghatanaa pariwaara ra aphantabaatai hune garekoe chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale paatana ra mailauli nagarapaalikaamaa ayojita chhuttaichhuttai kaaryakramamaa naagarika sunuwaai kaaryakramamaa praharile yasto jaanakaari dieko ho

prahari naayaba upariksaka naaraayanaprasaada adhikaarile naagarikakaa gunaaso sunne ra saantisuraksaa kaayama garna thapa ke kuraa garnuparchha bhanera kaaryaakrama ayojanaa garieko jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaanle bhannubhayo haamile ayojanaa gareko kaaryakramamaa upasthita wyaktile nai pariwaara ra aphantabaatai jogina gaahro bhaeko bataaundai aekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa anusaara yahi phaaguna gate maatrai jillaako pancheswara gaaunpaalikaa kaa raajabahaadura chandale aphnaa tina mahine chhoraako hatyaa garnukaa saathai bubaaamaa srimati ra bhaailaai kutapitako gareko ghatanaa bhaeko thiyo

ti kehi aparaadhika ghatanaa pariwaara ra aphantabaatai bhaeko janaaieko chha pranaau adhikaarile bhannubhayogharapariwaarabaatai himsaa ra aparaadhika ghatanaa huna thaalepachhi praharilaai suraksaa chunauti badheko chha

baitadikaa bhaekaa aparaadhika ghatanaa hunumaa madiraa sewana mukhya kaarana dekhieko chha naagarika sunuwaai kaaryakramamaa sahabhaagi pramukha jillaa adhikaari mohanaraaja josile madiraa sewana garekai kaarana himsaa ra aparaadhika ghatanaa badhi hunegarekaa chhan uhaanle bhannubhayo nabbepratisata aparaadhika ghatanaa madiraa sewanakaa kaarana hune dekhiekaa chhan dainika upabhogya tathaa khaadyaanna paaine pasalamaasameta madiraa bikri hune gareko sthaaniyawaasile gunaaso garekaa thie madiraa bikriwitarana tathaa sewana rokathaama tathaa niyantrana garnakaa laagi sthaaniya tahako mahatwapurna bhumikaa hune prahariko joda chha

chetanaako kamikaa kaaranale pani aparaadhika ghatanaa badhirahekaa praharile janaaeko chha chetanaa abhaawako kamile pani aparaadhika ghatanaa hune garekaa prahari uhaanle bataaunubhayo uhaanle bhannubhayochetanaako abhaawale yastaa ghatanaa badhekaa dekhinchhan

anya sahabhaagile yuwaapidhikaa laagi manoparaamarsa jastaa kaaryakrama sanchaalana garnuparne tolatolamaa hune garekaa juwaataasa ra awaidha madiraa bikri witarana tathaa sewanalaai nyunikarana garnuparne sujhaawa dinubhaeko thiyo

jillaakaa sabai sthaaniya tahamaa prahari naagarika sunuwaai garne kaaryakrama raheko chha haalasamma paatana ra melauli nagarapaalikaamaa sampanna bhaisakeko chha baanki rahekaa anya sthaaniya tahamaa pani kehi dinamai nirantara rupamaa kaaryakrama sanchaalana garine praharile janaaeko chha

pakraau parneharumaa kaathamaadau mahaanagarapaalikaa kuleschara basne nuwaakota bidura nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya nawaraaja kaarki kaathamaadau taarakeswara basne nuwaakota dupcheswara gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya sumana thaapaa ra kaathamaadau kuleswara basne bhaarata bihaara ghara bhaekaa warsiya satya naaraayana prasaada rahekaa chhan

kamajora arthika awasthaa bhaekaa baalabaalikaaharulaai nisulka khaane ra basne wyawasthaa gari skulamaa padhaaune bhandai aswaasana dii lyaaekaa baalabaalikaaharulaai thaapaale saaririka tathaa maanasika yaatanaa dine gareko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaski ra wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamabajaarabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho

indra upara baalabaalikaa sambandhi kasura antargata thapa anusandhaana prakariyaa agaadi badhaaieko tathaa baalabaalikaaharulaai haala siwina nepaala sumsthaamaa raakhi uniharuko ghara thegaanaa ra abhibhaawakako khoji kaarya bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskile janaaeko chha

dui janaa praharilaai eka taha badhuwaa garieko chhaprahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale sudurapaschima pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya dipaayala darabandi bhaekaa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka padamabahaadura thaapaa ra jawaana narabahaadura thaapaalaai eka taha badhuwaa garieko ho
badhuwaa bhaekaa dubai janaalaai bihibaara sudurapaschima pradesa prahari pramukha diaiji uttama suwedile darjyaani chinhadwaaraa susobhana garekaa chhan

puraskarita hunemaa sudurapaschima pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya dipaayalakaa pramukha prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka uttamaraaja suwedi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baitadikaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka naaraayanaprasaada adhikaari kendriya anusandhaana byurokaa prahari naayaba upariksaka panchakumaara baakhu mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya raanipokhari parichaalana kaksa darabandi bhaekaa prahari naayaba niriksaka durgaakumaara yonjana ra prahari chauki hikilaa daarchulaa darabandi rahekaa prahari jawaana asoka bahaadura kunwara chhan

jillaa adaalata morana parisarabaata janaa thunuwaa pharaara bhaekaa chhan katahari gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya manaraaja sekha ra jhaapaako birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya prakaasa chaudhari pharaara bhaekaa hun

aphnai srimaana warsiya oma bahaadura chaudhariko pharuwaa prahaara gari hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa belauri nagarapaalikaa bhuraakota basne warsiyaa basanti chaudharilaai mumgalabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha
