basantile pharuwaa prahaara gari aphnai gharamaa srimaanalaai maareko bhani aphai jaanakaari garaae paschaata ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belauribaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho yasaigari kanchanapura bhimadatta nagarapaalikaa pasupati tola basne warsiya prema thaapaako kutapita gari hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa janaalaai somabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa unakai buhaari warsiyaa sitaa thaapaa ra warsiya kisora rahekaa chhan uniharule gharaayasi bibaadakaa kaarana gata maagha gate saanjha premalaai kutapita gari kasailaai jaanakaari nagaraai upachaarako laagi mahaakaali aspataala lyaai upachaara paschaata ghara lagekomaa puna swaasthyamaa samasyaa aepachhi mahaakaali aspataala lyaaekomaa upachaarako kramamaa somabaara marityu bhaeko ho

ghatanaako khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile uniharu duwai janaalaai pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

bhansaara suraksaa gaarda nepaalagumja ra sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta jamunaaha baankebaata khatieko sumyukta suraksaa tolile jaancha garne kramamaa bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha paidala airahekaa khaanalaai hajaara darakaa nota thaana ra saya darakaa nota hajaara saya thaana gari jammaa laakha bhaaratiya rupaiyaan sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa khaana upara thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankele janaaeko chha

baikina kasura muddaamaa uchcha adaalata paatanako pusa gateko phaisalaale dina kaida ra laakha hajaara rupaiyaan jariwaanaa thahara bhai pharaara rahaakaa sudhiralaai prahari pradhaana kaaryaalaya kendriya anusandhaana byuro mahaaraajagumjabaata khatieko praharile kaathamaadaum thamelabaata pakraau gareko ho unalaai phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanako laagi jillaa adaalata kaathamaadaummaa pesa garieko ukta byurole janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale binaa anumati ausadhi osaaraposaara garne tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parnemaa bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dinesa taamaana warsiya pradipa wiswakarmaa ra wadaa nambara kaa warsiya samira taamaana rahekaa chhan

praharile bharatapura maa kothaa gari basne dinesa taamaanako kothaabaata laaguausadha bikri witarana gareko suchanaako adhaaramaa uniharulaai sukrabaara pakraau gari aitabaara saarwajanika gareko ho kaaryaalayale jaari gareko suchanaamaa taamaanako kothaabaata anumati binaa lyaaieko traamaa eka hajaara tyaableta anaargana lekhieko tyaableta staagana tyaableta phelaa pareko janaaieko chha yastai dinesako kothaamaa rahekaa samirako saathabaata ru paancha hajaara ra mobaaila eka thaana baraamada bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

yastai pradipako saathabaata ru eka laakha hajaara baraamada garieko ra unako gharamaa chekajaancha garne kramamaa traamaa atha hajaara tyaableta staagana tyaableta ra nagada ru hajaara baraamada garieko kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka suryabahaadura thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo pakraau parekaa tinai janaalaai kaarawaahikaa laagi ausadhi wyawasthaa wibhaaga saakhaa kaaryaalaya wiraganja pathaaieko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo

dogadaakedaara gaaunpaalikaa basne kariba warsiyaa bhaagarathi bhattalaai jabarajasti karanai pachhi hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya kisoralaai praharile pakraau gareko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baitadimaa budhabaara ayojita patrakaara sammelanamaa abhiyukta kisoralaai saarwajanika gariyo gata maagha gate sanaatana maawi srikotamaa adhyayanako laagi gaeki bhaagarathi skula bidaa bhaepachhi ghara naaeki ra phona swicha apha bhaepachhi khoji garne kramamaa maagha gate diunso sohi thaaunsthita ladaaleka bhanne labaleka jumgala sadaka chheu bhandaa kariba mitara tala taaukomaa chota ghaantimaa dabaae jasto daama khuttaako aumlaamaa nila daama ghaau ra yonibaata ragata jasto padaartha bageko awasthaamaa marita phelaa pareki thiin ukta ghatanaako suksma anusandhaanako kramamaa sohi skulamaa adhyayana garne abhiyukta antima kaksaa napadhi saathiharusanga khochalekatarpha gaeko saathiharulaai khochaleka bajaaramai chhodi aphu eklai khochaleka bajaarabaata chadepaanisthita aphno gharatarpha hindeko hidnekramamaa bhaagarathilaai maarne uddesyale ghatanaasthala maathi raheko sadakamaa kuri baseko bhaagarathi ai pugepachhi sadaka bhandaa talatarpha dhakeli dii hatyaa gareko khulna aeko chha uni upara jillaa adaalata baitadibaata dina myada thapa gari awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baitadile janaaeko chha

gata asoja gate madhyaahnapakha dhorapaatana nagarapaalikaa ki minaa budhaamagara ra donalda kinle naamako phesabuka prayogakartaabicha myaasenjaramaa kuraakaani hunchha ti wyaktile budhaamagaralaai kehi saamaana pathaaeko bataaunchhan lagattai unale aparichita nambarabaata phona garchhan ra budhaamagaralaai bhanchhan maile jeje bhanchhu tyahi riplaai dinu

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baagalunale somabaara ukta sangathita thagiko ghatanaakaa aropitalaai saarwajanika gareko chha pakraau parnemaa tanahunko dewaghaata nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya purusottama waagle nawalaparaasiko gaindaakota nagarapaalikaa basne warsa ko dinesa pokharela jhaapaako mechinagarakaa warsiya pradipa sitaulaa ra rukumapurwako bhume gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya santosa srestha chhan

yastai jhaapaako gauradaha nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiyaa milana ksatri ra waaglesangako bayaanakaa kramamaa paakistaani naagarikale prayoga garne samparka nambara khulepachhi anusandhaanakaa kramamaa haala kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa wasantupara gumbaamaa basne paakistaani naagarika phakraau parekaa chhan

sambandhita jillaamaa rahekaa prahari kaaryaalayaekaaisangako samanwayamaa khojatalaasa gari pratiwaadilaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baagalunale janaaeko chha widesi naagarikasametako sumlagnataamaa tinabhandaa badhi wyakti milera thagi garekaale sangathita aparaadhako muddaa chalaai anusandhaana thaalieko jiprakaakaa prahari upariksaka lokendra sresthale bataaunubhayo

mahaanagariya aparaadha niyantrana mahaasaakhaako tolile uhaanko aphnai niwaasa kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita sankhamulabaata pakraau gareko ho yasaaghi gorakhaako eka kaaryakramamaa raastrapatiwiruddha tippanai garepachhi uhaanko alochanaa hundai aeko thiyo sohi wisayamaa anusandhaanakaa laagi praharile pakraau gareko ho

raajyawiruddhako aparaadhaantargata daphaa ko kasuramaa pakraau purji jaari gari jhaankrilaai niyantranamaa liieko mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha prahari waristha upariksaka dipaka thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

ukta daphaamaa raastrapati waa sumsadlaai dhamki dina nahune ullekha chha ukta daphaako upadaphaa maa kasaile nepaalako raastrapati waa sumsadlaai sumwidhaana tathaa kaanunabamojima garnuparne kaaryasampaadana garnabaata roka lagaauna waa banchita garna waa kunai khaasa tarikaabaata kaaryasampaadana garna baadhya garaauna nahune kunai kisimako bala prayoga gari waa nagari kunai kisimako dhamki dina dara waa traasa dekhaauna waa anya kunai kisimako dabaaba dina nahune ullekha chha

upadaphaa maa daphaa bamojimako kasura garne waa garaaune wyaktilaai saata warsasamma kaida waa ru hajaarasamma jariwaanaa waa duwai sajaaya hune wyawasthaa chha akhila nepaala mahilaa sanghale jhaankrilaai kaarawaahiko maaga gardai sarakaaralaai jnaapanapatra bujhaaeko thiyo

rautahata gaura nagarapaalikaa wasapaarka najika sadakabaata srota nakhuleko laakha hajaara rupaiyaan ra laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako thaana baimka cheka sahita parohaa nagarapaalikaa jimgadawaa welawichhuwaa basne warsiya mohammada dilasaada alamalaai praharile somabaara diunso pakraau gareko chha na

mbara nabhaeko raato rumgako skutaramaa ukta rakama saathamaa boki hindeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya janakapura ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatako prahari tolile wibhinna darako ukta rakama ra alamako naamako ukta cheka sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho unalaai awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sampatti suddhikarana wibhaagamaa pathaaieko tathaa nambara nakhuleko skutarako kaarawaahiko laagi bhumsaara kaaryaalaya gauramaa pathaaieko chha

prahari chauki bhaadasarabaata khatieko prahari tolile biara si nambarako motarasaaikala chaalaka sarataaja mikaraanilaai jaancha gardaa unako saathabaata ukta rakama phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho saathai so rakama lina gaeko biara ti nambarako motarasaaikala chaalaka saiphali mikaraani ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara tasbira mikaraani sametalaai awasyaka anusandhaanako laagi praharile pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

rolpaa rolpaa nagarapaalikaa dhaanasikholaabaata sohi thaaunsthita chiuridaandaa basne warsiya prakaasa budhaa ra warsiya nara bahaadura gharti magara thaana bharuwaa banduka phalaamakaa tukraa baaruda ra thaana khukuri sahita somabaara diunso pakraau parekaa chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rolpaa ra nepaali senaako sumyukta tolile gasti garne kramamaa uniharulaai ukta hatiyaara sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya chisaapaanibaata khatieko praharile raanaako ghara talaasi gardaa ukta hatiyaara phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

jaado yaamamaa hiun parne kaarana antarika paryatakako atyadhika ghunicho hune ra baato biraai maanisaharu haraauna gai marityu sameta hune gareko bigatako ghatanaaharulaai madhyanajara gari mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga baandegaaunbaata prahari karmachaari khati phulchoki prawesako mukhya naakaa godaawari basapaarka najikai jaancha paryataka bibarana intri kaaunasilina lagaayata sachetanaamulaka bordaharu raakhnukaa saathai suraksita rupamaa antarika paryataka tathaa sthaaniya baasindaa gari ukta dinamaasameta saya janaalaai phulachoki ghumna pathaaeko mahaanagariya prahari parisara lalitapurale janaaeko chha
makawaanapura jillaako hetaundaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita kwika paarti pyaalesako chhatabaata khasera aja bihaana eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa rautahatako dewaahi nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya winoda yaadawa raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka indrabahaadura raanaale janaakaari dinubhayo
aphnai gharaanganamaa khelirahekaa belaa gata mangalabaara saanjha sirahaa nagarapaalikaa dumbaakhaataakaa pradipa yaadawakaa dui warsiya chhoraa priyaansu yaadawa bepattaa bhaeko thie

baalaka gharabaatai bepattaa bhaeko suchanaa paaera khojatalaasamaa juteko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaako tolile bihibaara saanjha h bhaaratako madhuwani jillaa khaajedi bhanne gaaunbaata priyaansulaai uddhaara gareko sirahaakaa prahari upariksaka sudiparaaja bhandaarile jaanakaari dinubhayo baalaka priyaansulaai praharile jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaamaa lyaai gae raati nai amaa sangitaakumaariko jimmaa lagaaeko janaaeko chha

baalaka bepattaalagattai pariwaarajanale praharilaai khabara garekaa thie pariwaarajanale baalakako apaharana bhaeko asankaa garekaa thie baalakako gharadekhi phelaa pareko sthaanako duri kariba kilomitara parchha haamro pahilo praathamikataa baalakalaai sakusala pattaa lagaaunu thiyo juna saphala bhayo prahari upariksaka bhandaarile bhannubhayo aba ghatanaako anusandhaana gari baalakako apaharana garneko khoji garna kendrita hunchhaun apaharanakaari josukai bhae pani khoji gari kaanuni daayaraamaa lyaaine uhaanko bhanaai thiyo

paskine khaanaamaa swachchhataa gunastariyataa ra saphaa banaaune uddesyale sirahaakaa hotala resturenta tathaa kyaantina sanchaalakalaai khaadya swachchhataasambandhi taalima diieko chha khaadya prawidhi tathaa gunastara niyantrana dibhijana raajawiraajadwaaraa bihibaara sirahaako mirchaiyaamaa ayojita khaadya swachchhataasambandhi ekadine taalimamaa sirahaakaa kariba janaa hotala resturenta tathaa kyaantina sanchaalakako sahabhaagitaa thiyo

uhaanle khaadya swachchhataakaa laagi hotala tathaa resturentamaa prayoga hune rasaayana bhaandaakudaa sauchaalaya jhyaaladhokaa bhaansaa khaanaa khuwaaune thaaun kachchaa tathaa tayaari khaanekuraakaa laagi chhuttaachhutai thaaun paaniko bhandaarana tathaa prasodhana prakriyaa haatadhune niyama khaanekuraako dekhabhaala waa prabandha khaanekuraako samparkamaa aune sampurna upakarana saphaa hunuparne jaanakaari dinubhayo

yasaibicha maagha gatedekhi khaadya prawidhi tathaa gunastara niyantrana dibhijana raajawiraajale khaadya swachchhataakaa adhaaramaa hotala resturentako staronnatikaa laagi stikara logo taansne kaarya suru garine bhaeko chha hotala tathaa resturenta sanchaalakale khaadya swachchhataa ra sarasaphaai wyawahaaramaa laagu garenagareko jaancha garera starikaranako stikara taansa garine pramukha simhako bhanaai chha wibhinna chaara kisimako starikarana kaayama gariekaamaa bhandaa badhi anka lyaaune hotala ra resturentalaai ati uttama ka tathaa dekhi samma anka lyaaunelaai uttama srenai kha dekhi ankasamma lyaaunelaai santosajanaka ga ra dekhi anka lyaaunelaai samaanya warga gha gari wargikarana garera sohianusaara hotala tathaa resturentamaa stikara taansinchha

biraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa materuwaabaata pratibandhita saya darakaa saya thaana gari jammaa laakha hajaara bhaaratiya rupaiyaan sahita jhaapaa damaka nagarapaalikaa paadaanjugi basne warsiya ajaya balakotilaai budhabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha
bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha audai garekaa ajayalaai asthaayi prahari chauki materuwaabaata khatieko praharile jaancha gardaa ukta bhaaratiya rupaiyaan sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

jillaa adaalata bhojapurale warsiya baalikaalaai jabararjasti karanai garne eka yuwakalaai warsa kaida sajaayako phaisalaa gareko chha adaalatale bhojapura nagarapaalikaa taksaarakaa kesara sundaasalaai warsa kaida ra ru hajaara ksatipuirtako phaisalaa gareko ho sresthalaai jillaa adaalata bhojapurakaa nyaayaadhisa gehendraraaja pantako ijaalasale kaida ra ksatipurtiko phaisalaa gareko ho

taaukomaa chota laagera marityu bhaeko awasthaamaa durgaamaayaako sawa gharaimaa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paanchatharakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka daanabahaadura thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo gaeko madhyaraata kariba baje ghatanaa bhaeko sthaaniyawaasile bataaekaa chhan ghatanaa thaahaa paaekaa chhimekile khabara garepachhi bihaana baje prahari ghatanaasthala pugeko thiyo
achhaamako panchadewala winaayaka nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa padamabahaadura dhaamiko hatyaamaa sumlagna rahekaa chaara janaalaai janmakaidako phaisalaa garieko chha

jillaa nyaayaadhisa nawinakumaara josiko budhabaara baseko ekala ijalaasale hatyaamaa sumlagna bhaekaa panchadewala winaayaka nagarapaalikaa kaa sthaaniyawaasi premabahaadura dhaami jiwana dhaami ramesabahaadura dhaami ra dharmabahaadura dhaamilaai janmakaidako phaisalaa sunaaeko adaalatakaa srestedaara naaraayana paudelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parneharumaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya debi bahaadura limbu ra warsiya ranasura raai rahekaa chhan wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanabaata khatieko praharile limbuko ghara talaasi garne kramamaa ukta haatahatiyaara phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parneharumaa kaathamaadaum budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa galphutaara basne morana wiraatanagara upamahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya sumana regmi ra chitawana maadi nagarapaalikaa kalyaanapura basne warsiya thama bahaadura wiswakarmaa rahekaa chhan sumanalaai kaathamaadaumbaata ra thama bahaaduralaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawana sametako sahayogamaa chitawanabaata pakraau garieko ho

udayapura jillaako triyugaa nagarapaalikaa sthita dhaaplaanataaramaa sanchaalanamaa raheko kanchanajanghaa goldena guda krasara udyogamaa bama wisphota garaaeko asankaamaa praharile tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa jillaako chaudandigadhi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya embi pulaami magara warsiya yambarabahaadura magara ra warsiya dipaka ksetri chhan uniharulaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapurale somabaara raati dhaaplaanataarasthita krasara udyogamaa sutali ra saketa bamasahita dui bama wisphota garaaeko asankaamaa pakraau garekaae haae

somabaara raati chha janaako ajnaata samuhale krasara udyogamaa gaera udyogakaa suraksaagaarda karnabahaadura taamaanalaai niyantranamaa lii bama wisphota garaaeko praharile janaaeko chha bama wisphotapachhi jillaa prahari ilaakaa prahari beltaara ra sasastra prahari besakyaampa beltaarako tolile sthaaniya ksetra ra jangala asapaasa bama wisphota garaauneko wyaapaka khoji garne kramamaa tina janaalaai pakraau gareko haae

pakraau parneharumaa dhanapaalathaana gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya dhanesu khawaasa warsiya sudhaara simha khawaasa warsiya maagana khawaasa warsiya kalakanu khawaasa rumgeli nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya jagata naaraayana khawaasa ra belabaari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya mathaalu khawaasa rahekaa chhan

bhadau gate saanjha dhanapaalathaana gaaunpaalikaa sthita dhaana khetamaa mala chharne kramamaa belabaari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya suresa kumaara khawaasale ti yuwatilaai eklai paari jabarajasti karanai gari pharaara rahekaa abhiyukta suresalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya rumgelibaata khatieko praharile mansira gate rumgeli nagarapaalikaa rumgeli bajaarabaata pakraau gareko thiyo

waidha ayabhandaa badhi kharcha gari kharida garekaa chalaachala sampatti ewam widyamaana sampatti tathaa kharcha lagaaniko srota nakhuleko paaieko ayogale janaaeko chha awaidha rupamaa arjana gareko sampatti srimati babitaa phunyaala sarmaako naamamaa sameta raakheko paaieko chha ayogakaa prawaktaa taaraanaatha adhikaarikaa anusaara aropi sarmaako awaidha sampatti japhatha gari hadaisammako kaarawaahiko maaga gardai aja wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara garieko ho

awaidha tarikaale kamaaeko sampatti aphu ra srimatiko naamamaa jaggaa kharida gareko wibhinna baimka tathaa wittiya sumsthaamaa lagaani gareko tathaa wibhinna kampaniko sumsthaapaka ewam saadhaarana seyara sameta kharida gareko paaieko chha ghusa lieko abhiyomaa kaaryaalaya sahayogi pakraau yastai ayogale sewaagraahibaata ru hajaara ghusa lieko abhiyomaa janakapuradhaama upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa wadaa kaaryaalaya sahayogi dilipakumaara panjiyaaralaai aja kaaryaalayabaatai pakraau gareko chha

gharamaa aphu nabhaekaa samayamaa chhorilaai balaatkaara gareko bhanne baalikaaki amaako ujurikaa adhaaramaa unalaai pakraau garieko jaanakaari jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa adhikaari indrabahaadura mallale dinubhayo
abhiyukta wikalaai praharile anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa raakheko bataaieko chha

bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa kamalawinaayaka wasapaarkabaata suryabinaayaka basne dolakhaa ghara bhaekaa eka wyaktilaai dalara dekhaai sasto daramaa saatidinchhu bhandai nagada laakha rupaimyaan lutapaata gareko abhiyogamaa janaalaai mumgalabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parneharumaa bhaktapura chaaradobaato deraa gari basne sindhupaalchoka baahrabise nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya wimala bhandaari ra warsiya nirmala bhandaari rahekaa chhan

uniharuko saathabaata nagada laakha hajaara rupaiyaan thaana mobaaila thaana motarasaaikala thaana parsa ra thaana wibhinna desako dalara sameta praharile baraamada gareko chha yasa sambandhamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko mahaanagariya prahari parisara bhaktapurale janaaeko chha

wariddhaako hatyaa bhaeko awasthaamaa aja bihaana gharabhitrai sawa phelaa pareko thiyo ghatanaamaa sumlagna rahi pharaara rahekaa gautamalaai wyaasa nagarapaalikaa sthita sahidagetamaa huliyaa pariwartana gari hindiraheko awasthaamaa pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaekaae chha

dhakaalako sawa aphnai gharabhitra bhuinmaa duwai haata khuttaa ra ghaantimaa kapadaale baandhi marita awasthaamaa phelaa pareko thiyo unako sarirako wibhinna bhaagamaa dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara garieko chha sawa phelaa parelagattai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunkaa prahari upariksaka aruna paudelako netaritwamaa prahari ghatanaasthala pugeko thiyo ghatanaasthalamaa kukura sameta parichaalita gari suksma rupamaa anusandhaana gardaa hatyaamaa sumlagna rahi pharaara rahekaa wyaktilaai damauli bajaarabaata pakraau garna saphala bhaekaa chhaum prahari upariksaka paudelale bhane thapa anusandhaana jaari chha
pakraau parnemaa kaabhrepalaanchoka banepaa srikhandapuraki warsiyaa jayanti kesi chhin
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrekaa anusaara kesilaai bihibaara diunso banepaabaata pakraau garieko ho

kaabhrekaa prahari upariksaka rawi paudelakaa anusaara kesilaai gharabaahira lukichhipi basiraheko awasthaamaa pakraau garieko hokesilaai uchcha adaalata paatanale baimkina kasuramaa saala waisaakha gate karoda laakha hajaara rupaiyaan jariwaanaa hune phaisalaa gareko thiyo
phaisalaayataa uni pharaara thiin pharaara abhiyuktako khoji silasilaamaa kesilaai wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa pakraau garieko prahari upariksaka paudelale bataae
paudelakaa anusaara kesilaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaabaata khatieko tolile pakraau gareko ho
unalaai bihibaara nai phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanako laagi adaalata pesa gariekomaa kaabhrepalaanchoka jillaa adaalata dhulikhelale kaida ra jariwaanaa bhuktaanako laagi kaaraagaara pathaaeko chha
bajhaanako mastaa gaaunpaalikaa ki warsiyaa samjhanaa kaami budhabaara saanjha saadhe baje gharabaata gaaigoru gothabhitra baandhna niskeki thiin

bajhaanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka rupaka khadkaakaa anusaara samjhanaako sawa postamaartamakaa laagi jillaa aspataala lagieko chha wistaritamaa riporta aisakeko chhaina praarambhika riportamaa balaatkaara khuleko chha

raaile warsiyaa buhaarilaai patakapataka jabarjasti karanai gareko anusandhaanabaata khulna aeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha pakraau parekaa raaile gata saauna gate ra bhadau gate jabarjasti karanai gareko pidita mahilaako ujurimaa ullekha chha praharile myaada thapa gari anusandhaana thaaleko janaaeko chha

aparaadhika laabha bama bisphota tathaa sumgathita muddaakaa pharaara pratiwaadi baaraa parawaanipura gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya kapiladewa mahatolaai mumgalabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

parawaanipura gaanupaalikaa sthita emaesa intaa udyogakaa sumchaalakale phirauti rakama dina aswikaara garepachhi kaattika gate intaa udyogamaa bama wisphota gari phirauti rakama nadie gharapariwaaralaai khataraa hunechha bhani mobaaila esaemaesa ra phonabaata dhamki dii pharaara rahekaa mahatolaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya prasauni ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya parawaanipurabaata khatieko prahari unakai gharabaata pakraau gareko ho
unalaai awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi jillaa adaalata baaraa pathaaune kaarya bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaeko chha

unako gharamaa bharuwaa banduka abaidha rupamaa lukaai raakheko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kusumabaata khatieko praharile unalaai ukta hatiyaara sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
kailaalimaa balaatkaarako aropamaa gaaunpaalikaakaa prasaasana adhikarita pakraau parekaa chhan

josipura gaaunpaalikaako prasaasana yojanaa tathaa anugamana saakhaakaa pramukha bhaanubhakta upaadhyaayalaai gaaunpaalikaa kaaryaalayamai kaaryarata warsiyaa mahilaa karmachaarilaai balaatkaara gareko aropamaa sanibaara pakraau garieko praharile janaaeko chha
mahilaa karmachaarile dartaa gareko jaaherikaa adhaaramaa prasaasana adhikarita upaadhyaayalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayawa upariksaka pratika wistale bataae
pachhi ghatanaasthalamaa pugdaa baalaka ghaaite awasthaamaa thie unalaai upachaarakaa laagi swaasthya chauki laijaane tayaari gardaagardai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

ukta sthaanamaa jabarajasti chandaa asuli gariraheko bhanne wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaski ra wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya baidaamabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai chandaa baapata lieko nagada laakha rupaiyaan thaana mobaaila thaana motarasaaikala ra chandaa uthaauna prayoga garieko thaana nagadi rasidasahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
uniharuwiruddha chandaa aina sambandhi kasura antargata muddaa dartaa gari thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskile janaaeko chha
praharile kaaskiko pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa hallana chokabaata jabarajasti chandaa uthaaune wiplawa samuhakaa dui widyaarthi netaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa udapayura triyugaa nagarapaalikaa motidaandaa ghara bhai kaathamaadaun taarkeswara basne warsiya rawina kesi ra rolpaa gumgaadewi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai kaathamaadaun gogumbu basne warsiya raamakumaara daangi rahekaa chhan uniharulaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaski ra wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya baidaamako sumyukta tolile pakraau gareko haae

asaara gate raati uniharu duwai janaa milera dhana bahaaduralaai hatyaa gari sawa bepattaa banaaeko bhanne khabara somabaara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile duwai janaalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile baankebaata kilo laaguausadha aphimasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

daanabaata baankeko kusuma naakaa hundai awaidha laaguausadha baanke lyaaundai gareko gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankebaata khatieko prahari tolile aja bihaana kariba h minetamaa kusuma bajaarabaata uniharulaai pakraau gareko thiyo

pakraau parnemaa purwi rukumako puthaauttaragangaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya dhanabahaadura sena ra daana ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya wasanta ghartimagara rahekaa chhan praharile uniharubaata jholaabhitra plaastikamaa raakhieko awasthaamaa eka kejikaa darale banaaiekaa wataa aphimakaa pokaa baraamada garekaae thiyo
ajai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankele patrakaara sammelanamaarphata laaguausadha aphimasahita uniharulaai saarwajanika gareko chha
jhaapaako kamala gaaunpaalikaa maa aphnai amaako hatyaa gareko aropamaa warsiya chhoraa dinesa risidewalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha
unalaai tatkaala ghatanaasthalabaatai praharile pakraau gari ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakamaa raakheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankele apaharanamaa pareko naataka garne eka mahilaalaai pakraau gareko chha
saathi banera phona samparka garne gare pani bhidio chyaata tathaa bhetaghaata garne kuraa hundaa bhane uni panchhine gareko prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

uni apaharanamaa pareko kuraa purusale praharilaai khabara garepachhi chaudhariko khoji huna thaalyo tara praharile unalaai sanibaara unakai deraamaa phelaa paareko prahari naayaba niriksaka subaasa khadkaale jaanakaari die

raamachandrale ti baalikaalaai bihibaara jabarajasti karanai garna khojeko ra tyasako dina agaadi pani baakhraako gothamaa jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bandipurabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho

srimati lina sasuraali pugekaa raidaasalaai sasuraa naresale sukrabaara saanjha kutapita gari kandaai wariksa naamaka phala paanimaa gholi khuwaaepachhi gambhira ghaaite bhaekomaa narsimnahoma nepaalagumjamaa upachaarako kramamaa unako marityu bhaeko ho ghatanaako khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankebaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

keharako gharamaa baaghako haddiharu lukaai raakheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya syaanjaabaata khatieko praharile gharakothaa talaasi gardaa kaathako theki bhitra lukaai raakheko awasthaamaa baaghako jasto dekhine taauko bangaraa chyaapu sametako bhaagako wataa haadasahita unalaai pakraau gareko ho
unalaai baraamada haadaharu sahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi dibhijana bana kaaryaalaya syaanjaamaa bujhaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya syaanjaale janaaeko chha
prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale galti garne prahari adhikaari waa jawaanaharulaai kaarabaahi garne bhaeko chha

unalaai awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi mahaanagariya prahari parisara teku pathaaieko chha muluki phaujadaari sumhitaa ko daphaa bamojima thagi samwandhi kasuramaa anusandhaanako laagi sammaanita kaathamaandaum jillaa adaalata waata miti gate waata laagu hune gari dina myaada thapa anumati pradaana bhai anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile bataaekaae chha

laaguausadha kaarobaara garne wyaktiharule naa kha nambarako kantenaramaa awaidha laaguausadha osaarapasaara gari ukta nagarapaalikaa sthita sallaaghaarimaa kaarobaara garne gareko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa khatieko praharile wisnau ra dambara bahaaduralaai ukta kantenara roki raakheko awasthaamaa chaalakako sitamuni ukta laaguausadhasahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
praharile naagarikataa kirte muddaamaa pharaara bhaekaa abhiyuktalaai warsapachhi pakraau garekaae chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle somabaara bhaanu nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya prakaasa mallalaai unakai gharabaata pakraau pakraau gareko homallalaai naagarikataa kirte muddaamaa saala waisaakha gate jillaa adaalatale eka warsa kaida sajaaya sunaaeko thiyo
gata arthika warsa maa pradesa num baata prahari kaarawaahimaa parekaa chhan prahariko acharana niti ra niyama wiparita kaama garnelaai kaarawaahi garieko ho

pradesa num prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa prahari waristha upariksaka raajakumaara baidawaarakaa anusaara nasihatamaa chaalachalanasambadhi pratikula raayamaa paancha greda ghatuwaamaa greda rokkaamaa paancha suruskela ghatuwaamaa dui padonnati rokkaamaa nokaribaata hataaiekaamaa barkhaasta gariekaamaa eka nilambanamaa saata swatah nilambanamaa nau ra sacheta garaaiekaamaa janaa chhan
aghillo arthika warsa maa pradesa num baata praharilaai kaarawaahi garieko thiyo

gata awamaa pradesa num baata eka hajaara praharilaai puraskarita garieko chha prahari waristha upariksaka baidawaarakaa anusaara puraskarita hunemaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehikaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kapilawastukaa nawalaparaasikaa gulmikaa paalpaakaa arghaakhaanchikaa daanakaa baankekaa bardiyaakaa rolpaakaa pyuthaanakaa ra rukuma purwa kaa janaa chhan

tyastai num pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa num pradesa taalima kendra butawalakaa atha num pradesa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya butawalakaa tina num pradesa sasastra prahari gana khajuraa baankekaa ra num pradesa dangaa niyantrana prahari gana butawalakaa praharilaai pani puraskarita garieko chha

praharile banaaera tayaari awasthaamaa bechna raakheko wataa presa kaarda kaarda banaauna prayoga garine saamaanaharu sameta baraamada garera lyaaeko mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha uniharule presa kaarda pratigotaa ko darale bechne garekaae anusandhaanakaae kramamaa khulekaae chha

ratha taanna bhelaa bhaekaa sthaaniyalaai praharile paaniko phoharaa haanera titarawitara banaaeko thiyo yasai kramamaa sthaaniyaharule traaphika prahari prabhaaga mumgalabajaaramaa kaaryarat prahari jawaana kamalaprasaada ghimiremaathi akramana garekaa chhana
jhaapaako siwasataaksi sthita sataaksidhaamaa eka yuwakako sawa bhetieko chha sthaaniya warsiya gomanasimha bhanine gowina magarako wibhatsa hatyaa bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

siwasataaksi nagarako wadaa nambara maa parne ratuwaamaai wariksaropanakaa wana raksakale ukta sawa dekhera praharilaai khabara gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka wijayaraaja panditale jaanakaari die
rautahatakaa pujaari sriraama saahako hatyaamaa samlagna dui janaa pakraau parekaa chhanade waani gonaahi nagarapaalikaa karuniyaakaa raamanaresa patela ra baalakumaara patela pakraau parekaa huna
unako arthika lenadenakaa kaarana hatyaa bhaeko khuleko pradesa kaa prahari pramukha prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka dhirajaprataapa sihumle bataae
magarale ti baalikaalaai patakapataka jabarajastikaranai gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anaaramanibaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho

ti mahilaalaai dara dhaakadhamki dekhaai gata sukrabaara raati jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskibaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

warsa aghi kaaraagaarabaata bhaagi pharaara rahekaa pharaka pharaka muddaakaa dui pratiwaadilaai praharile pakraau gareko chha daankaa chori muddaakaa gaurigumgaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya chuluwaa chaudhari ra kartawya jyaana muddaakaa kailaari gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya purana prasaada kumaala pakraau parekaa huna

daankaa chori muddaamaa jillaa adaalata kailaaliko asaara gateko phaisalaale warsa kaida ra hajaara saya rupaiyaan paisaa jariwaanaa thahara bhaekaa chaudharilaai somabaara aphnai gharamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa phelaa paari somabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

gaurigumgaa nagarapaalikaa sthita sthaaniyako gharamaa maagha gate raati haatahatiyaara sahita aeko samuhale nagada tathaa dhanamaala daankaa chori gari pharaara bhaeko ghatanaamaa sumlagna chaudharilaai tatkaalai pakraau gari sampurna anusandhaana kaarya paschaata kailaali jillaa adaalatamaa pesa garieko thiyo

adaalatako adesale purpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya kailaalimaa pathaaiekaa uni maagha gate kaaraagaarabaata bhaagi pharaara bhaekaa thie chaudharilaai awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi mumgalabaara kailaali jillaa adaalata pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaeko chha

kartawya jyaana muddaamaa jillaa adaalata kailaaliko jetha gateko phaisalaale sarwaswa sahita janma kaida bhai pharaara rahekaa kumaalalaai somabaara unakai gharabaata praharile pakraau gareko ho kailaari gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya raama bahaadura kumaala gharamaa eklai suteko awasthaamaa kaattika gate raati dhaarilo hatiyaara prayoga gari hatyaa gareko ghatanaamaa sumlagna purana prasaadalaai tatkaalai pakraau gari sampurna anusandhaana kaarya paschaata kailaali jillaa adaalatako adesale purpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya kailaalimaa pathaaekomaa maagha gate uni kaaraagaarabaata bhaagera pharaara bhaekaa thie

jillaa adaalata kailaaliko phaisalaa punaraawedana adaalata dipaayala ra sarwochcha adaalatabaata sameta sadara bhaeko thiyo kumaalalaai awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi kailaali jillaa adaalata pathaaieko ukta jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaeko chha

dandahinataa wiruddhako abhiyaana antargata jillaa adaalata kaaski tathaa jillaa prasaasana kaaskiko phaisalaale wibhinna muddaaharumaa kaida ra jariwaanaa sajaaya toki haalasamma pharaara rahi wibhinna sthaanamaa lukichhipi basdai aekaa janaa pharaara pratiwaadiharulaai mumgalabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa syaanajaa kolmaa ghara bhai haala pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa basne sarakaari chhaapa dastakhata kirte muddaamaa warsa kaida ra hajaara rupaiyaan jariwaanaa tokiekaa warsiya anila thaapaa magara pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa basne baimnakin kasura muddaamaa dina kaida sajaaya ra laakha hajaara rupaiyaan jariwaanaa tokiekaa warsiya dhiraja guruna ra kehi saarwajanika aparaadha muddaamaa saya rupaiyaan dekhi hajaara rupaiyaansamma jariwaanaa toki pharaara rahekaa kaaski jillaa antargatakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa basne janaa pratiwaadiharu rahekaa chhan
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaski tathaa maatahata sametabaata khatieko prahari tolile uniharulaai pakraau gari jillaa adaalata kaaskimaa pesa gareko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa kumchanabaaribaata thaana semi atometika pestola soko thaana myaagajina ra raaunda goli sahita katahari gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya abhiseka raayasahita janaalaai mumgalabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha kehi wyaktiharule wyaapaariharulaai dhaakadhamki dii rakama maagne tathaa chori garne kaaryamaa sumglana bhairaheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta pestola ra uniharule prayoga gareko ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala sahita pakraau gareko ho
tanahunko raanipokhari ghara bhaekaa daamodara ksetrile aja wihaana atmahatyaa garekaa hun

mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaunkaa pramukha prahari waristha upariksaka syaamalaala jnawaalile sawa pariksanakaa laagi mahaaraajaganjasthita siksana aspataala pathaaieko jaanakaari dinubhayo

tinapaatana gaaunpaalikaa tilpunadaamdaasthita bhimasena nimaawikaa pradhaanaadhyaapakalaai apaharana gareko abhiyogamaa sunasari dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa simalachoka basne warsiyaa pratimaa pariyaaralaai sanibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

skulamaa chhaatrawaritti baandiraheko awasthaamaa pradhaanaadhyaapaka naaraayana bhandaarilaai janaako samuhale apaharana gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sametabaata khatieko praharile sohi thaaunsthita laayogaaunko khaanipaakhaa jumgalabaata bhandaarilaai sakusala phelaa paari uddhaara gareko ho

sunasari kosi gaaunpaalikaa bhaantaabaaribaata niyantrita laaguausadha saya tyaabaleta naaitrosana saya tyaabaleta esapi ra eka saya emaelako botala koreksa sahita sohi thaaun basne warsiya susila sarmaalaai sanibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha laaguausadha niyantrana wyuro wiraatanagara ra simaa prahari chauki bhaantaabaaribaata khatieko praharile unalaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta parimaanako laaguausadhasahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

chitawana raapti nagarapaalikaa chipletibaata awaidha laaguausadha keji saya graama gaanjaa sahita sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya dipaka titunalaai sanibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhandaaraabaata khatieko praharile naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa titunalaai ukta laaguausadhasahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

baanke duduwaa gaaunpaalikaa kamaraasaabaata keji laaguausadha gaanjaako dhulo sahita janaalaai sanibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha pakraau parneharumaa bhe pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa sawaara raapti sonaari gaaunpaalikaa goradhui basne warsiya raama bahaadura chaudhari ra motarasaaikala chaalaka kohalapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bisaraama thaaru rahekaa chhan ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banakatti ka baata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle chaara dinako awadhimaa tina bahuwiwaaha muddaakaa pratiwaadilaai pakraau gari kaaraagaara chalaana gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka ewum suchanaa adhikaari yuwaraaja timilsinaakaa anusaara bhimaada nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa harimaayaa nepaalilaai nau warsapachhi risina gaaunpaalikaa gairaathoka basne warsiya winoda bhanne dhanabahaadura raanaa ra warsiyaa namunaa raanaa thakurilaai dui warsapachhi pakraau gareko ho

hatyaasthala baagaluna nagarapaalikaa sthita madhyapahaadi puspalaala lokamaargamaa parchha gautama hatyaa prakaranamaa rahasyako pardaa ajhai ughreko chhaina ghatanaako nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byurolesameta anusandhaana garisakeko chha

hatyaalagattai praharile anusandhaana thaalepani piditapaksale ajhai nyaaya paauna sakeko chhaina jillaamaa nayaan aune prahari pramukhale anusandhaanalaai tungomaa puyaaune ra dosi pattaa lagaai chhaadne aswaasana dine garepani tyo tyatimai simita banna pugeko chha

tyatibelaa praharile ghatanaakaa sambhaawita abhiyukta bhaaratamaa rahekaale pakraau garna nasakieko bataaeko thiyo tyasayataa aune nayaan prahari pramukhale pani ukta hatyaa prakaranabaare dherai prasnako saamanaa garnupariraheko chha

warsaunsamma pani dosi bhetaauna nasakekaamaa adhikaarakarmi ra naagarika samudaayabaata belaabelaa prahariko alochanaa hune gareko chha jillaa prahari pramukha prahari upariksaka saaradaaprasaada chaudharile anusandhaana jaari rahepani kunai upalabdhi haansila nabhaeko bataaunubhayo

mahamadale ti mahilaaharulaai jhaaraphuka garne bahaanaamaa budhabaara bolaai jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne khabara bihibaara belukaa praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banakattibaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho

daankaa chori muddaakaa janaa pharaara pratiwaadiharulaai ghatanaako warsapachhi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalibaata khatieko praharile bihibaara pakraau gareko chha pakraau parekaamadhye dui janaa warsa aghi ghatanaa bhaedekhi ra dui janaa warsaaghi kaaraagaarabaata bhaagi pharaara rahekaa thie

pakraau parneharumaa josipura gaaunpaalikaa basne rogahi bhanne warsiya karana raaja thaapaa sohi gaaunpaalikaa basne rohinaa bhanne warsiya warsiya bhagata chaudhari sohi gaaunpaalikaa basne kaalu bhanne warsiya guna simha kathariyaa ra bhajani nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya tikaaraama chaudhari rahekaa chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalibaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai aaphnai gharamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
uniharu duwai janaa phaaguna gate pakraau pari purpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya kailaali gaekomaa maagha gate kaaraagaara baata bhaagi pharaara bhaekaa thie
pakraau parekaa chaaraijanaalaai awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi jillaa adaalata kailaalimaa pesa garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaeko chha

prahari karmachaarilaai kutapita gari abhadra wyawahaara gareko abhiyogamaa mahaakaali nagarapaalikaa sundaranagara basne warsiya raajesa sunaara lagaayata janaalaai sohi nagarapaalikaa sundaranagara pulabaata somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

sohi nagarapaalikaasthita siwa mandira najika deuraali ghaata basne warsiya ganaesa khatrilaai kutapita gareko ghatanaamaa sumlagnalaai niyantranamaa line kramamaa praharimaathi abhadra wyawahaara garepachhi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dodhaaraachaandanibaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

khatri kutapitabaata behosa awasthaamaa raheko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha prahari chauki baabaathaanabaata khatieko praharile ghaaitelaai upachaarako laagi praathamika swaasthya kendra pathaaekomaa thapa upachaarako laagi dhanagadhi riphara garieko chha

jillaa adaalata sunasariko saala asoja gateko phaisalaale ukta muddaamaa warsa kaida ra laakha rupaiyaan jariwaanaa thahara bhai pharaara rahekaa yaadawalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile kosi gaaunpaalikaa baata pakraau gareko ho
yaadawalaai jillaa adaalata sunasariko adesale kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi kaaraagaara jhumkaa pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha

kaattika gate raati sohi thaaun basne warsiya garwe paaijaalaai gharti sametale sthaaniya makaibaarimaa bancharo prahaara gari hatyaa gareko ghatanaamaa jillaa adaalata myaagdibaata warsa kaida sajaaya bhai pharaara rahekomaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya myaagdibaata khatieko praharile ghartilaai pakraau gareko ho
ghartilaai jillaa adaalata myaagdimaa pesa gariekomaa adaalatako adesale kaida bhuktaanako laagi jillaa kaaraagaara myaagdimaa pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya myaagdile janaaeko chha
somabaara praharimaa jaaheri parelagattai praharile basnetalaai pakraau gareko jillaa prahari pramukha diesapi dhakendra khatiwadaale jaanakaari diekaa chhan
sunasariko baraahaksetra nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara patanaali kholaamaa eka yuwakako sawa phelaa pareko chha
dharaana upamahamahaanagara jiro pointakaa janakumaara raaiko sawa kholaamaa phelaa pareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahendranagarakaa enspektara paandawa raaja raajawumsile bataae

mahaasaakhaakaa prawaktaa prahari upariksaka iswara kaarkile taarakeswara nagarapaalikaa sesamati saanopula najika sankaaspada rupamaa kaalo jholaa bokera hindiraheko awasthaamaa wiswakarmaa ra raautalaai pakraau garieko jaanakaari dinubhayo

praharile pakraau garekaasanga kilograama graama aphima baraamada gareko chha baraamada garieko aphima pakraau parekaa wyaktile wibhinna gaaunbaata ru eka laakha hajaara prati kilograama lyaaune ra ru atha laakhasamma prati kilograama bechne gareko anusandhaanamaa khuleko prahari prawaktaa kaarkile bataaunubhayo

kaathamaadaum prahari parisara pramukha esaesapi syaamalaala jnawaalile kalpanaa ra karisnabahaadurabicha tinachaara warsaaghi phesabukabaata chinajaana bhaeko jaanakaari diechinajaanapachhi uniharu najika bhae

moranako jahadaa gaaunpaalikaa nepaalabhaarata simaa ksetrabaata duiwataa motarasaaikalasahita kilo gaanjaa baraamada gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaeko chha nepaali ra bhaaratiya nambara pletakaa duiwataa motarasaaikalamaa bhaaratatarpha chori nikaasi garna laagiraheko awasthaamaa praharilaai dekhepachhi jholaamaa pyaaka gareko gaanjaa ra motarasaaikala chhodera uniharu pharaara bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya raani wiraatanagarakaa prahari niriksaka dipaka thaapaale bataaunubhayo

wikale aphni chhorilaai gharabaata apaharana gari balaatkaara gareko aropa lagaaundai piditale jaaheri dieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaniyaabhaarakaa prahari niriksaka hikmatabahaadura bhandarile bataaunubhayo
pidita baalikaalaai swaasthyopachaarakaa laagi aspataala lagieko ra wikalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaniyaabhaara raakhi anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

gaaunpaalikaako dhobi bajaaramaa naalaa nirmaana tathaa graabhela garna baneko upabhoktaa samitikaa adhyaksa darpana ghisinalaai gaaunpaalikaako kothaamaa thunera adhyaksale khaali chekamaa dastakhata garaaune prayaasa gareko abhiyoga lagaaieko chha tyahaanbaata umkiekaa bhaniekaa ghisinale praharimaa jaaheri dinubhaeko thiyo

so ghatanaamaa sumlagna bhaeko aropamaa adhyaksasangai giraphtaarimaa parekaa laalabahaadura taamaanalaai pani aja dinakai myaada thapieko chha duwai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamechhaapako hiraasatamaa chhan uniharumaathi anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamechhaapakaa pramukha wasanta paathakale jaanakaari dinubhayo
mahaanagariya prahari waritta thaanakotabaata khatieko tolile chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa balambubaata dhaadina gajuri gaaunpaalikaa ki warsiyaa pawitraa thinalaai bihibaara raati pakraau gareko ho

warittakaa pramukha prahari naayawa upariksaka ghanasyaama sresthale balambumaa deraa garera basne thinale kothaabhitra jebraa jholaamaa lukaaera raakheko awasthaamaa charesasahita thinalaai pakraau garieko jaanakaari die
praharile saptaribaata netrawikrama chanda wiplawa maaowaadiki politabyuro sadasya umaa bhujelalaai saptari praharile pakraau gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanarupa saptarile uniharuwiruddha abhadra wyawahaarasambandhi muddaa chalaaeko chha
sunasari jillaa adaalatabaata uniharu mumgalabaara maatra rihaa bhaekaa thie
kutapitabaata ghaaite bhaekaa janaa prahari karmachaariharu bi enda bi aspataalamaa upachaara paschaata dischaarja bhaekaa chhan

taamaanale dieko hatiyaara liera aune kramamaa pandita pakraau parekaa thie tyasapachhi aparaadha mahaasaakhaale prahari niriksaka bholakumaara bhattako kamaandamaa nuwaakotamaa toli pathaaera taamaanalaai unakai gharabaata pakraau gareko thiyo
ajnaata wyaktile kanchatamaa goli haanera bhaageko ra uniharukaae khaaeji bhairahekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa diesapi bharata sresthale jaanakaari die
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale dui praharilaai nilambana gareko chha sawaari saadhanasumnga paisaa lieko ujurikaa adhaaramaa dui praharilaai nilambana gareko ho

nilambita hunemaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhimaana sindhulimaa kaaryarata prahari hawaldaara kamalabahaadura khadkaa ra praharichauki dhungrebaasa sindhulimaa kaaryarata prahari jawaana wirabahaaduraprasaada yaadawa raheko pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya hetaundaale janaaeko chha

uniharule baa kha nambarako sawaari saadhanasumnga rakama lieko ujuri pareko ra arthika pralobhanamaa pari aphulaai diieko jimmewaari imaandaari saatha nirwaaha nagareko janaaundai nilambana garieko kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha nilambita praharilaai sodhapuchha gardaa rakama lieko swikaara gareko pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya hetaundaale janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale prahari naayaba upariksakako sumyojakatwamaa nijaharumaathi thapa chhaanabina garna samiti gathana gareko janaaieko chha waagmati pradesa prahari kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa samanwaya adhikarita prahari niriksaka rosana thaapaale aphno kaamamaa imaandaari pradarsana garne prahari karmachaarilaai puraskarita garne ra gairawyaawasaayika kaaryamaa sumlagnalaai kaarawaahi gari prahari sewaalaai maryaadita banaaune kaaryalaai waagmati pradesa praharile wisesa abhiyaanakaa rupamaa sanchaalana gariraheko jaanakaari dinubhayo

yasaaghi pani jillaa prahari kaaryaalayaantargatakaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa kaaryarata paancha prahari ghusa liepachhi nilambanamaa parekaa thie sewaagraahisumnga arthika pralobhanamaa parne eka prahari niriksakasahita prahari karmachaari nilambita tathaa kaamamaa imaandaari pradarsana garne prahari karmachaari puraskarita bhaisakeko waagmati pradesa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa gharabhai chaangunaaraayana nagarapaalikaa jitapura bhaadaamaa basdai aunubhaeki warsiyaa kaali bhanne yasodhaa sijakhuko sawa kholaa kinaaraamaa bhetieko mahaanagariya prahari waritta jagaatikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka chakraraaja josile jaanakaari dinubhayo

karnaali pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya surkheta maatahatakaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako sahayogamaa atha pharaara aparaadhi pakraau garieko chha prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetabaata khatieko wisesa tolile surkhetamaa cheka anaadara jaalasaaja ra juwaamaa ekaeka gari tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

tyastai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya salyaanako sahayogamaa kutapita ra lutapaatakaa ekaeka gari dui janaa pakraau garieko karnaali pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetakaa prahari waristha upariksaka raajesanaatha baanstolaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

tyasaigari jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukumapaschimale chha mahinaako kaaraagaarako sajaaya phaisalaa sunaaieko laaguausadhakaa eka pharaara pratiwaadilaai pani pakraau garieko prahari prawaktaa baanstolaale bataaunubhayo tyastai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetale amsa muddaakaa eka pratiwaadilaai pani pakraau gareko chha uhaankaa anusaara dui warsa chha mahinaa kaaraagaara sajaaya sunaaiekaa laaguausadhakaa pharaara abhiyuktalaai pakraau gari sambandhita jillaakaa adaalatamaa bujhaaera phaisalaa kaaryaanwayana garaaieko chha

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa prayaaga maargasthita biendabi mita maartakaa sanchaalaka kaabhre panauti nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya karisnacharana gochhelaai marekaa kukhuraako maasu wikri gareko abhiyogamaa somabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

yaadawako sawa bihaana baje bhokraahaa narasihum jholumge pula najika sunasari kholaamaa plaastikako boraamaa baandhera paanimaa raakheko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasari pramukha kamala thaapaale jaanakaari die

mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaunkaa prawaktaa somendrasimha raathaurale taamaanako hatyaamaa sumlagna dolakhaakaa warsiya anadorje serpaalaai aja bihaana maachhaapokharisthita naagaarjuna gesta haausako num kothaabaata pakraau garieko jaanakaari dinubhayo

patrakaara sammelanamaa boldai kaathamaadaum prahari parisara pramukha esaesapi syaamalaala jnawaalile kalpanaa ra karisnabahaadurabicha tinachaara warsaaghi phesabukabaata chinajaana bhaeko jaanakaari die
praharile janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa baahrabighaabaata eka thaana lekhieko atometika pestola ra sohi pestolako thaana myaagjinasahita eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa mukhiyaapatti musarahaniyaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya sujita yaadawa rahekaa chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaabaata khatieko praharile ja ha nambarako tyaampomaa sawaara yaadawalaai jaancha gardaa unako saathamaa raheko kaalo rumgako jholaamaa chini bhitra lukaaichhipaai raakheko ukta pestolasahita somabaara bihaana pakraau gareko ho

pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa siwamaarga sthita kehi wyaktiharule awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sewana tathaa bikri witarana sameta gariraheko bhanne wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamabajaarabaata khatieko prahari tolile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa nijaharulaai thapa anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaski pathaaieko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamabajaarale janaaekaae chha

mahaanagariya prahari warita thaanakotabaata khatieko praharile dhaadina saabika kumpura gaawisa haala siddhalekha gaapaa ghara bhai chandraagiri basne barsa ko raajana biswakarmaa bhanne raajana senchurilaai pakraau gareko ho unale eka mahilaalaai aphno deraamaa lagera balaatkaara gari rakama lii bhaageko praharile janaaeko chha
saauna gate wihaana sangai sutekaa srimaana nabhetiepachhi ti mahilaale praharimaa ujuri dieki thiina pachhi unale laakha nagada tolaa suna liera bhaageko bhandai praharimaa jaaheri diina
raajana wiswakarmaa bhanne raajana senchuri upara muluki aparaadha sumhitaa bamojima jawarjasti karanai tathaa thagi kasuramaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
gaeraati gharamaa jhagadaa ra kutapita bhaeko bhanne khabara praharimaa pugeko thiyo
wihaana prahariko toli pugdaa ti mahilaa marita phelaa pareki kanchanapurakaa prahari naayawa upariksaka amarabahaadura thaapaale bataae

unakaa anusaara sawa phelaa pareko sthaabhandaa dui saya mitara para taauko bhetieko ho tokhaa nagarapaalikaa sthita sadaka kinaaraamaa raakhieko sutakesabaata ragata bageko dekhepachhi sthaaniyale praharilaai khabara garekaa thie
pakraau parnemaa naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaeko bataaune warsiya anila maharjana rahekaa chhan unalaai mahaanagariya prahari waritta thaanakotale naagadhungaabaata pakraau gareko ho

uni bihibaara bihaana dhaadinabaata kaathamaadaumtarpha baa kha nambarako sawaari saadhanamaa aekaa thie unisanga sawaari paasa nabhaepachhi praharile unalaai dhaadina tarpha nai pharkaauna khojeko thiyo saaehi kramamaa unale praharilaai eka hajaara rupaiyaan dina khaaejekaa thie
uniwirudda muluki aparaadha sumhitaa bamojima awasyaka anusandhaana tathaa kaarabaahi garieko warittale janaaeko chha

chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa naagadhungaamaa diutimaa khatieko praharilaai arthika pralobhanamaa paarna khojne baa kha nambarako maaikrobasakaa chaalaka naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa sitaapaailaa basne warsiya anila maharjanalaai sukrabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

dhaadinabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko ukta maaikrobasa praharile jaancha garne kramamaa awasyaka kaagajapatra nabhaeko paaieko ra chaalaka maharjanale nagada hajaara rupaiyaan dii arthika pralobhanamaa paarna khoje paschaata uni pakraau parekaa hun
redakrasa sosaaiti ra chikitsakako charama laaparawaahikaa kaarana janakapuradhaamamaa eka sutkeriko marityu bhaeko chha

janakapuradhaama upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita raamajaanaki aspataalamaa prasuti garaauna aeki mahottari gausaalaa nagarapaalikaaki warsaki gumgaadewi mahatoko sukrabaara wihaana marityu bhaeko ho salyakriyaamaarphata bihibaara raati baje chhori janmaaepachhi unalaai ragata abhaawa bhaekaa thiyo
tyahi anusaara praharile kapana basne warsiya rudra limbu warsiya hari kaarki ra saamaakhusi basne warsiya subodha dewakotaalaai pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parnemaa rukuma triwenai gaaunpaalikaakaa lekhaapaala hemanta kesi lekhaa sahayogi tathaa lekhaapaalakaa sahodara bhatijaa suwaasa kesi bhaai wikaasa ra arkaa bhatijaa bhimasena rahekaa chhan
baahirabaata taalaa lagaai anaawasyakarupamaa kaagajaata milaaundai gareko jaanakaari paaepachhi sthaaniyale praharilaai khabara garekaa thie
nepaala praharile maanawa bechabikhana tathaa osaarapasaara kaaryamaa sumlagna eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

byurokaa prawaktaa prahari upariksaka gowinda thapaliyaale udayapura jhaapaa sindhupaalchoka ra kaathamaadaunkaa chaara mahilaalaai kuwetamaa raamro talabamaa kaama lagaaidinchhu bhanera bhaaratamaa lagera bandhaka banaaekaale taamaanalaai pakraau garieko jaanakaari dinubhayo
daana praharile nakkali prahari banera sarwasaadhaarana ra wyawasaayilaai tharkaaune dui yuwaalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num daksina karmatuwaa niwaasi barsiya saroja nepaali ra salyaana jillaako daarmaa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num bhalachaura niwaasi barsiya gopaala mallalaai pakraau gareko ho

jillaa prahari prawaktaa diesapi sumita khadkaakaa anusaara nepaalile aphulaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ghoraahi daanamaa kaaryarata sai yogendra hamaala bhaeko bhanne nakkali parichaya patra diera hotelaharumaa nihsulka khaane ra paisaa maagera tharkaaundai aekaa thie

makawaanapurako bhimaphedi kaaraagaarabaata bhaagera pharaara bhaekaa wyakti pakraau parekaa chhan kaattika gate kaaraagaarabaata pharaara bhaekaa sunasari raamadhuni nagarapaalikaakaa warsiya kuladiparaaja dhaamilaai sukrabaara makawaanapura praharile pakraau gareko ho

unalaai praharile purwi nawalaparaasi dewachuli nagarapaalikaa rajaharasthita pula chheubaata pakraau gareko ho dhaamile warsiya rojina gurunako hatyaa garepachhi warsa kaida sajaaya sunaaiekaae thiyo
uni bhimaphedi kaaraagaaramaa kaida bhuktaani gardai thie

kanchanapuraki warsiyaa baalikaa nirmalaa pantako balaatkaarahatyaa prakaranako anusandhaanakaa kramamaa yaatanaa dieko ra saarwajanika nyaayawiruddhako kasuramaa muddaa parekaa atha janaa praharilaai kanchanapura jillaa adaalatale saphaai dieko chha

bistasahita siaibikaa tatkaalina diesapi amgura jisi prahari karmachaariharu jnaanabahaadura sethi harasimha dhaami raamasimha dhaami ekendra khadkaa jagadisaprasaada bhatta ra chaandani saaudalaai saphaai diieko jillaa adaalata kanchanapurakaa srestedaara yadunaatha sarmaale bataae

widesa pathaaidine pralobhanamaa paari nagada laakha hajaara rupaiyaan rakama thagi gari pharaara raheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaa minabhawanabaata khatieko praharile kaathamaadaum basundhaaraabaata unalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile kanchanapuramaa premikaako aslila bhidio intaranetamaa raakhne eka janaa pakraau gareko chha
aphni premikaasangako aslila bhidio banaaera intaranetamaa raakhne karisnapura nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa warsiya mohanaraaja bhatta balaatkaara aropamaa pakraau parekaa hun

kehi samayadekhi premasambandhamaa rahekaa belaa bhidio banaaieko ra ahile ekaapasamaa tiktataa badhepachhi intaranetamaa raakhidieko praarambhika anusandhaanabaata khuleko kanchanapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka amara thaapaale bataae
mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaako tolile sunasari praharisanga samanwaya gari duhabibaata warsiya sawira alamalaai aitabaara pakraau gareko ho

dui warsaaghi saauna gate saathiko gharamaa skulako garihakaarya garna aeki baalikaa pantako sawa saauna gate najikaiko ukhubaarimaa bhetieko thiyo ghatanaapachhi mulubhara dosilaai kaanuni kaarawaahiko daayaraamaa lyaauna andolana hunukaa saathai ukta muddaa antarraastriyastaramaa pani charchaako wisaya bane pani pachhillo samaya prahari anusandhaana sustaaeko dekhinchha

yasaaghi prahari pramukha rahisaknubhaekaa prahari mahaaniriksaka sarwendra khanaala ra tyasapachhikaa pramukha thaakuraprasaada jnawaalile ghatanaasthalasamamma pugera chaasokaa saathai anusandhaanamaa jodabala gare pani aparaadhi bhane pattaa lagaauna sakenan sarakaarale uchchastariya chhaanabina samitikaa saathai raastriya maanawaadhikaara ayoga ra praharile wibhinna chhuttaachhuttai chhaanabina samiti gathana garera pani ghatanaako suksma anusandhaana gareko thiyo wibhinna samitikaa pratiwedanale ghatanaabaare thapa asankaa wyakta garnukaa saathai pramaana metiekaale hatyaaraa pattaa lagaauna kathina hunesameta bataae tatkaalina prahari atirikta mahaaniriksaka dhiru basnyaatako tolile kanchanapura pugera ghatanaabaare anusandhaana gardai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako ghatanaapratiko laaparawaahi ra pramaana sankalanamaa chukeko bhandai tatkaalina jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka dilliraaja wistasahita saata janaa nilambala gareko thiyo

haala prahari upariksaka wista ra prahari niriksaka jagadisaprasaada bhatta barkhaastimaa chhan bhane tatkaalina prahari anusandhaana byuro siaibikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka angura jisisahita anya paancha prahari karmachaariko toli nilambanamaa chha

bhadau gate sarakaarale gariha mantraalayakaa sahasachiwa hariprasaada mainaaliko sumyojakatwamaa diaijiharu ra uchcha tahakaa sarakaari adhikaari sammilita chhaanabina samitile sthalagata adhyayanapachhi mantraalayamaa bujhaaeko pratiwedana ajhai kaaryaanwayana bhaeko chhaina mainaali samitibaaheka nirmalaa prakaranamaa raastriya maanawaadhikaara ayoga maanawaadhikaara sangathana ra prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayakaa tatkaalina diaiji dhiru basnyaatako netaritwamaa pani chhuttaachhuttai pratiwedana pesa garekaa chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurabaata ukta ghatanaako anusandhaana adhikarita rahane prahari naayaba upariksaka bhane chhoto samayamai dherai parirwatana hune krama dekhieko chha

suruatamaa ghatanaako anusandhaana adhikaritamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa tatkaalina prahari niriksaka haala nilambita ekindra khadkaa khatiekaa thie prakaranako dui warsamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurabaata paancha janaa anusandhaana adhikarita pherabadala bhaisakeko prahari srotale janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaum budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa gulphutaara basne baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya prasaanta simha thakurilaai hajaara darako thaana nakkali nepaali notasahita budhabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

pidita mahilaa kaama garne gaarmentako maalikale usako ichchhaa anusaara nachaldaa arkaa kaamadaara phaiyaajalaai prayoga gari esida prahaara gareko khulna aeko chha pidita mahilaako mohamadako gaarmentamaa warsa aghidekhi kaama gariraheki didile unalaai pani sohi gaarmentamaa kaama lagaaekao thiina
srimatiko hatyaa gareko kasuramaa jela parekaa sasastra prahari balakaa purwadiaiji ranjana koiraalaa bihibaara jelabaata chhutekaa chhan

sarakaari chhaapa dastakhata kirte gareko abhiyogamaa jhaapaa jillaa adaalatabaata dui warsaaghi eka warsa kaida ra ru hajaara jariwaanaa tokiekaa wirtaamoda kaa warsiya susila basneta pakraau parekaa chhan

prahari naayaba upariksaka raakesa thaapaakaa anusaara i wargako sawaari chaalaka anumatipatra laaisensa maa e ra bi warga thapera basnetale kirte laaisensa banaaekaa thie aru belaa anyatrai lukichhipi basne garekaa abhiyukta basneta bandaabandikaa belaa aphnai gharamaa aekaa thie praharile wisesa suraakiko adhaaramaa unalaai pakraau gareko janaaeko chha adaalatale kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi unalaai jhaapaa kaaraagaara chalaana gareko chha

jhaapaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya rupanaaraayana siwaakoti dosro wiwaaha gareko abhiyogamaa wisum chaita gateko phaisalaa bamojima jhaapaa adaalatabaata eka warsa paancha mahinaa kaida ra ru hajaara jariwaanaa tokiekaa abhiyukta hun

naagarikataa hatyaa balaatkaaralagaayatakaa thuprai muddaamaa kaida tokiekaa pharaara abhiyuktaharu bandaabandimaa praharile pakraau parne gareko prahariko bhanaai chha jhaapaa jillaamaa praharile gata eka warsamaa pharaara abhiyukta pakraau gari uniharubaata ru eka karoda saata laakha hajaara jariwaanaa ra jammaa kaida warsa mahinaa atha dina asula gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa prahari upariksaka karisna koiraalaale bataae raasasa

pakraau parneharumaa bhaarata motihaari thaanaa majaura panchaayata jamuniyaa graama kuraiyaa thegaanaa bhaekaa warsiya sudhira kumaara kusahawaa baaraa simranagadha nagarapaalikaa thegaanaa bhaekaa warsiya manoja saaha teli ra baaraa adarsa kotawaala gaaunpaalikaa paterwaa thegaanaa bhaekaa warsiya narendra prasaada kusahawaa rahekaa chhan

ukta sthaanamaa awaidha laaguausadha tathaa nakkali nota kaarowaara gardai chhan bhanne wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa laaguausadha niyantrana byuro koteswarabaata khatieko praharile sadaka kinaaramaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala sahita uniharulaai phelaa paari sarira tathaa motarasaaikalamaa raheko plaastikako woraa khaanatalaasi gardaa lukaai chhipaai raakhieko awasthaamaa ukta parimaanako nakkali rupaiyaan baraamada bhaeko ho

uniharuko saathabaata nakkali nepaali rupaiyaan hajaara darako hajaara saya thaana saya darako saya thaana tathaa bhaaratiya nakkali rupaiyaan saya darako saya thaana ra ra darako saya thaana praharile baraamada gareko ho

uniharulaai baraamada nakkali rupaiyaan tathaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala sameta awasyaka kaanuni kaarawaahiko laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraamaa bujhaaieko laaguausadha niyantrana byuro koteswarale janaaeko chha
aphnai bhaanjaako apaharana paschaata hatyaa garera pharaara bhaekaa ekajanaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai praharile warsapachhi pakraau gareko chha
kaathamaadaumko khichaapokhari basne raai skula jorapaatikaa kaksaa kaa widyaarthi rohitakumaara guptaako asoja gate apaharanapachhi hatyaaga garera uni pharaara bhaekaa thie

rohitakaa bubaale so rakama bujhaaera pani unakaa chhaaeraa apaharana mukta bhaekaa thienan baru tyasako dinapachhi asoja gate baalako sawa kamalaadisthita ganaesa mandira sadaka petimaa phelaa pareko thiyo abhiyuktale hatyaapachhi sawa bhariyaalaai bokaaera kamalaadiko sadakamaa lagera phyaakidiekaae anusandhaanakaae anusandhaanakaae kramamaa khulna aekaae praharile janaaekaae chha

sarakaarale tokeko swaasthya maapadanda paalanaa nagari badhi yaatru bokera sanchaalanamaa lyaaekaa yaatruwaahaka saarwajanika bhaadaakaa wataa sawaari saadhanalaai wisesa chekajaancha gari mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale pakraau gareko chha

saarwajanika yaataayaatamaa chadhne sabai yaatrule maaska lagaaunuparne senitaaijara prayoga garnuparne chaalakale panjaasahita maaska pani lagaaunuparne sitako adhaa maatrai yaatru chadhaaunu parne sitako eka laharamaa eka janaa maatrai yaatru raakhnuparne ra tokieko bhaadaadarako pratisata badhi bhaadaa lina paaune jastaa wyawasthaalaai durusta paalanaa garaaunako laagi watai traaphika kaaryaalayabaata wisesa toli parichaalana garieko mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha
rautahata praharile netra wikrama chanda wiplawa netaritwako pratibandhita nekapaakaa ekajanaa kaaryakartaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa chandrapura betaunaakaa warsiya wirendra paaswaana rahekaa chhan wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa unalaai gataraati ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya chandrapurabaata gaeko tolile unako gharaibaata pakraau gareko haae

wigatamaa chaleko aparaadhika kasuramaa waaradaata paschaat pharaara rahekaako khoji garine prakriyaa anusaara paaswaana pakraau bhai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya chandrapurako niyantranamaa raheko ra thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
sunasariko simaawarti ksetra dewaanaganja gaaunpaalikaa sthita paani tyaanki najika gae raati nepaala prahari ra bhaaratiya taskara samuhabicha goli haanaahaana bhaeko chha

golaabaarimaa pari dui janaa taskara ghaaite bhaekaa chhan bhane anya tina janaa pharaara bhaekaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha ghaaite hunemaa dewaanaganja kaa raajesa yaadawa ra kaa pintu yaadawa raheko praharile janaaekaae chha uniharukaae dharaanasthita bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaanamaa upachaara bhairahako chha

hatiyaara liera airahekaabaata praharile hatiyaara khosna thaalepachhi praharimaathi bhaaratiya samuhale goli chalaaeko haae sohi kramamaa prahari ra bhaaratiya taskara samuhabicha jhadapa bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha taskarakaa saathabaata praharile eutaa pestola chha raaunda goli ra dui wataa myaagjina baraamada gareko chha

tina janaa bhaaratatarpha pharaara bhaeko ra khojikaarya jaari raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha ghaaite bhaekaa ra pharaara bhaekaa taskari laaguausadhako kaarowaara hatiyaarako taskari chorilagaayata kaarya gardai aeko praharile janaaeko chha

nepaala telikamako sarbhara hyaaka gareko abhiyogamaa dhanakutaa paakhribaasa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala dhanakutaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya diwaakara deujaalaai budhabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

hyaakarale anatresaewala intaraneta prawidhiko prayoga gari anaadhikarita rupamaa nepaala telikamako sarbhara pranaalimaa patakapataka pahuncha banaaeko dekhiepachhi praapta sabuta pramaana ra dijitala intelijensako maadhyamabaata ukta kaaryamaa sumlagna rahekaa unalaai pakraau garieko ukta byurole janaaeko chha deujaa sahari wikaasa tathaa bhawana kaaryaalaya dhanakutaamaa kampyutara aparetara padamaa kaaryarata raheko pani anusandhaanako silasilaamaa khulna aeko chha

jillaa adaalata makawaanapurale budhabaara susmitaakaa sasuraa prakaasa thaapaa saasu tulasaa thaapaa ra amaaju durgaa thaapaa kaarki ra nanda sitaa thaapaalaai purpaksakaa laagi jela chalaana garna adesa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa diesapi indrabahaadura raanaale jaanakaari die
unakaa anusaara sasuraa prakaasa thaapaalaai bhimaphediko kaaraagaaramaa laginechha
tyastai anya tina mahilaalaai chitawanako kaaraagaaramaa lagne tayaari bhaeko chha susmitaako asaara gate hatyaa bhaeko thiyo

rautahatako raajadewi nagarapaalikaa sedhawaa tola basne warsiya asoka raaya yaadawalaai kutapita gari hatyaa gareko aropamaa sarlaahi balaraa nagarapaalikaa chhanaki tola basne warsiya bibeka simha lagaayata janaalaai mumgalabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

paisaako lenadenako bisayamaa kutapita gardaa yaadawako marityu bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha sasastra besa kyaampa chhanaki tola sarlaahibaata khatieko praharile kutapitamaa sumlagna uniharulaai pakraau gari awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sarlaahimaa bujhaaeko ho
baaraakaae bisraamapura gaaunpaalikaa sthita musaharwaa jaane baatomaa bewaarise awasthaamaa raheko kariba keji laaguausadha gaanjaa mumgalabaara belukaa praharile baraamada gareko chha
prahari chauki musaharwaabaata khatieko praharile ukta laaguausadha gaanjaa phelaa paari baraamada gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
praharile mumgalabaara saanjha nuwaakotakaae taadi gaaunpaalikaa narjaa basne warsiya raama taamaana sahita janaalaai thaana bharuwaa banduka sahita pakraau gareko chha

taamaanako gharamaa bharuwaa banduka chha bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kharaanitaarabaata khatieko praharile talaasi gardaa uniharulaai ukta bharuwaa bandukasahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

baaraakaae kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sitalapura tolasthita sadakabaata bhansaara chhali lyaaundai gareko kariba laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan mulya baraabarako kapadaa sahita janaalaai mumgalabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaamaa basne warsiya raphika amsaari warsiya rijawaana mansuri warsiya jumgilaala saaha ra warsiya jokhu paasawaana rahekaa chhan ukta sthaanamaa prahari chauki matiarwaa baaraabaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa naa ha nambara ra naa ha nambarako atomaabhansaara chhali nepaalatarpha lyaaundai garekaa ukta kapadaa sahita phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

pakraau wyaktiharulaai baraamada kapadaa tathaa atosahita bhansaara aina anusaara awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi mula bhansaara kaaryaalaya wiragumja parsaamaa pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaeko chha
praharile kaathamaadaumkaae sinaamumgalabaata gaimdaako khaagasahita chaara janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
uniharulaai saamaanasahita budhabaara thapa anusandhaana tathaa kaarabaahiko laagi dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya haattisaaramaa pathaaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
praharile juwaataasa khelirahekaae awasthaamaa chitawanakaae bharatapurabaata atha juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya gharadhani karmaachaarya warsiya gambhira srestha wadaa num kaa warsiya saraswatikumaara srestha warsiya anilakumaara srestha warsiya raajakumaara srestha warsiya suryakumaara srestha warsiya puspa srestha ra bhaarata kolakaataa ghara bhai haala bharatapura basne warsiya bappi khaana rahekaa chhan

uniharulaai bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa milanarodabaata nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaansahita praharile pakraau gareko ho uniharu wiruddha juwaa kasuraantargata muddaa dartaa gari anusandhaana gariraheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaekaae chha

bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa maiyaandewi kanyaa kalejako kampaunda najikai baaeraamaa paaekaae paarera phaaliekaae awasthaamaa eutaa bewaarise sawa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaekaae chha
praharile sirahaako chhuttaachhutai sthaanabaata pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita dui yuwakalaai pakraau gareko chha

bhaaratiya bajaarabaata paidala aundai garekaa yaadawalaai sankaa laagera jaancha gardaa laaguausadha daaileksa disi emaelako botala baraamada bhaepachhi pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaale janaaekaae chha

yastai yasaaghi somabaara maatrai gharamai laaguausadha lukaaichhipaai raakhera bikri gardai aeko awasthaamaa praharile laaguausadhasahita golabajaara nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya manojakumaara saahalaai pakraau gareko chha

aphnai ghara kothaamaa pratibandhita laaguausadha bikri witarana gariraheko awasthaamaa gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya golabajaarakaa prahari niriksaka janaka puriko netaritwamaa khatieko tolile laaguausadha daaileksa disi botala naaitrobheta tyaableta saya thaanasahita saahalaai pakraau gareko haae
kirte gareko aropamaa praharile ghoraahibaata wadaa sachiwa sahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
uniharule jabarjasti karanai muddaamaa pidita ketikaa baabule chhorilaai nyaaya dilaauna chhoriko umera ghataaune kaaryamaa saghaaeko dekhiekaale pakraau garieko praharile janaaeko chha

jabarjasti karanai muddaakaa abhiyukta yuwaka haala purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa chhan pidita ketile umera ghataaeko tathya phelaa paareko daana deukhuri jillaa adaalatamaa niwedana diepachhi adaalatale upamahaanagarapaalikaalaai ukta wisayamaa jaanakaari dina patraachaara gareko thiyo

gurunalaai kaaski jillaa adaalatabaata chaita maa bahuwiwaaha muddaamaa eka warsa mahinaa dina kaida ra hajaara rupaiyaan jariwaanaako sajaaya sunaaeko thiyo jillaabaata khatieko prahari tolile gurunalaai pokharaa kamalapokharibaata pakraau gareko haae

sigdelawiruddha pusa maa kaaski jillaa adaalatale wana paidaawaara muddaamaa tina hajaara saya rupaiyaan jarimaanaa phaisalaa gareko thiyo wadaa prahari raamabajaarako tolile sigdelalaai pakraau gareko ho

gairakaanuni rupamaa sampatti arjana gareko bhani ayogamaa pareko ujurimaathi chhaanabina gardaa yaadawale waidha bhandaa awaidha aya badhiraheko paaieko ho ayogakaa anusaara yaadawa mansira gate sunasari morana sinchaai wikaasa samitimaa obharasiyara padamaa niyukti bhaeko ra phaaguna gate awakaasa bhaeko ullekha chha ayogakaa anusaara phaagunasamma dugarma tathaa sthaaniya bhattaa karisi aya karjaalagaayata ru eka karoda dui laakha hajaara baraabarako raheko chha
praharile baankeko raapti sonaaribaata baaghako chhaalaa ra haddisahita eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaabaankeko raapti sonaari gaaunpaalikaa simalaghaari basne warsiya nawaraaja gharti magara rahekaa chhan ghartilaai pradesa prahari kaaryaalayako wisesa tolile ghara najikaiko makai baarimaa lukaai raakheko awasthaamaa chhaalaa ra haddisahita pakraau garekaae haae
praharile rupandehiko butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa hariyaatolabaata keji graama pratibandhita laaguausadha charesasahita dui janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa gulmi madaanekaa warsiya megharaaja giri ra rukuma sisnekaa warsiya ratibhaana damaai rahekaa chhan nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalayako wisesa tolile somabaara hariyaatolamaa basne dhana bahaadura damaaiko khaali ghara khaanatalaasi gardaa lukaaichhipaai raakheko ukta parinaamako laaguausadhasahita uniharulaai pakraau garekaae haae baraamada charesako bajaara mulya andaaji karoda raheko praharile janaaekaae chha
nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byuro siaibile baimkina kasura muddaamaa pharaara dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parekaa sunaaralaai adaalatale ru laakha hajaara jariwaanaa ra paancha dina kaida tathaa basnetalaai ru laakha jariwaanaa ra paancha dina kaida thahara garekaale pakraau garieko byurole janaaekaae chha pakraau parekaa sunaara ra basnetale pidita dipakakumaara wiswakarmaalaai rakama nabhaeko wibhinna baimkako cheka kaatera baimkina aparaadha garekaa thie
pakraau parekaa duwaijanaalaai praharile phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanakaa laagi kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalata pesa garieko byurole janaaeko chha
jillaakaae sisne gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara pwaanako sudrimaa warsiya srimatile chirpata prahaara gari warsiya srimaan wichhoda wikakaae hatyaa gareki hun
praharile mahottaribaata awaidha laakha rupaiyaansahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

uniharulaai mahottariko manaraa siswaa nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara sthita bhalui chokabaata praharile pakraau garekaae praharile uniharukaae saathabaata pa ra pra pa nambarako motarasaaikala sahita laakha rupaiyaan baraamada garekaae chha
sarakaari kaagaja kirte gari rina prawaaha gareko prakaranamaa baanke praharile raastriya waanaijya baimka tribhuwana chokakaa saakhaa prabandhaka lalitabahaadura saahilaai pakraau gareko chha

eka karoda laakha rina liekaa sunachaandi wyawasaayi rijawaana ahamada jasagadhako muddaa anusandhaana garne kramamaa prabandhaka saahilaai sukrabaara pakraau garieko baankekaa prahari upariksaka omabahaadura raanaale jaanakaari die
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalimaa kaaryarata inspektara ra eka kaanuna wyawasaayilaai hajaara ghusa rakama sahita pakraau garekaae chha

jawarajasti karanaisahita dui wataa muddaa milaaidine bhandai ghusa lieko gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako kanchanapura kaaryaalayabaata khatieko tolile prahari niriksaka prakaasasimha kaarki ra kaanuna wyawasaayi himaalaya wikrama wistalaai pakraau gareko ho
insapektara saahimaathi laaguausadha kaarobaarisanga kaneksana dekhieko ra sahayoga gareko aropa laageko chha
sunasariko dharaana sthitabaata janaa hatiyaara sahita pakraau parekaa chhana

pakraau parnemaa dhanakutaa sahidabhumi gaaunpaalikaa sthitamaa basne barsiya rosana raai rahekaa chhana unalaai nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya anusandhaana samuha ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanabaata khatieko prahari tolile pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parekaa rosana raai upara sunasari jillaa adaalatabaata haatahatiyaara kharakhajanaa muddhaamaa anusandhaanakaa laagi dina chha myaada thapa gari thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale laaguausadhasahita paancha janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

sanibaara abera raati bardiwaasa nagarapaalikaa maa aphima bikri garirahekaa belaa pakraau parekaa tina janaalaai aja aja ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiwaasale uniharukaa saathabaata baraamada dui kilograama aphima ra eka motarasaaikalasahita sanchaarakarmibicha saarwajanika gareko ho
sanibaara raati aphimako molamolaai garirahekaa belaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya ra nepaala prahariko laaguausadha niyantrana byuro wiraganjako sumyukta tolile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

dhaadinako benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa kaa wirabahaadura taamaana ra durgaabahaadura taamaana ewum sirahaako sirahaa nagarapaalikaa kaa dhanapata yaadawa raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raajana chaapaagaaile jaanakaari die uniharukaa saathabaata naapa numko motarasaaikalasameta baraamada bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaakaae raamanagara gaaunpaalikaa bairiyaa tolakaa warsiya raamajuluma raayakoduwai khuttaa ra haata baandhieko awasthaamaa gharabhandaa kehi durimaa raheko khetamaa sawa phelaa pareko praharile janaaekaae chha
thekedaarasanga ghusa lindai gareko awasthaamaa makawaanapurabaata nepaala praharikaa prahari niriksaka insapektara rumgehaata pakraau parekaa chhan
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhimaphedikaa pramukha prahari niriksaka inspektara raamabaalaka raaya thekadaara durgaa laamaasanga hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa lindai gareko awasthaamaa pakraau parekaa hun

raayalaai sanibaara bihaana baagamati pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya hetaundaale bhimaphedi sthita sagaramaathaa hotalabaata niyantranamaa lieko haae yasaaghi pani unale thekedaara laamaasanga paisaa maagdai aeko bujhieko chha
ghatanaabaare thapa anusandhaana gardai ghusasahita pakraau parekaa insapektara raayalaai akhtiyaaramaa bujhaaune pradesa kaaryaalaya prahariko tayaari chha

bihibaara diunso ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dinalaabaata gastimaa khatieko prahari tolile so sthaanamaa raheko baandara runane taharomaa sankaa laagi chekajaancha gardaa taharobaata eka thaana katuwaa pestola eka thaana saketa bama ra dui thaana detonetara baraamada gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dimlaakaa pramukha tathaa prahari niriksaka bhaaskara khatiwadaale aja jaanakaari die
