pakraau parnemaa sunama guruna sumkara sunaara manisa srestha ra karisna sunaara rahekaa chhan kaaski praharile aja patrakaara sammelana gari uniharulaai saarbajaanika garekaae haae

tyasapachhi sawa lukaaune kramamaa unalaai tinale najikai seti nadimaa bagaaidiekaa thie jetha gate bihaana saadhe baje prahari kantrola rumamaa tinai saathimadhyekaa ekale rasaaili haraaeko bhandai praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

kaaski prahariko tolile khojatalaasa garnekramamaa aitabaara bihaana baje pokharaa raatopairaasthita seti khomchamaa sawa phelaa paareko thiyo abhiyuktalaai myaada thapa gari kaarabaahi prakriyaa aghi badhaaine prau kaarkile jaanakaari die

wiplawa samuhako widyaarthi sumgathana akhila kraantikaariko kaathamaadaun jillaa upaadhyaksa gowinda wista ra ganataantrika manchakaa kendriya sachiwa purna bahaadura sresthalagaayata paancha janaa rahekaa chhan
pakraau parekaa uniharulaai mahaanagariya prahari parisarako hiraasatamaa raakhieko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
praharile rautahatabaata awaidha hatiyaara ra laaguausadha gaanjaasahita duuijanaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa gujaraa nagarapaalikaa jayaraajapurakaa warsiya karmulaaha ansaari ra raajapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya mahamada salaama rahekaa chhan
uniharulaai saniwaara saanjha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya garudaa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya katahariyaa baata khatigaeko gasti tolile pakraau gareko ho
praharile ansaariko saathabaata ekathaana nalakatuwaa pestola ra thaana goli baraamada garekaae chha bhane salaamako saathabaata kilo laaguausadha gaanjaa baraamada garekaae chha
kaanchhi bajaarako mainahawaa sthita sthaaniya raamabahaadura punako bhaimsipharmamaa kaama garne janaako hatyaa bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehile janaaekaae chha

hatyaa huneharumaa chaara purusa ra eka mahilaa chhan uniharu sabai sthaaniya hun hatyaa gariekaaharumaa barsiya maadhawa musahara unaki srimati barsiya jaanaki musahara barsiya kosaraaja musahara barsiya karana chaudhari ra barsiya asisa chaudhari rahekaa chhan
kaathamaadaum jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayale aropita janaamadhye wyaapasaayi asokakumaara agrawaalalaai hajaara ra anya janaalaai janahin hajaara rupaiyaan dharautimaa chhaadne adesa dieko ho

uniharulaai jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayale dina hiraasatamaa raakhera anusandhaana garna anumati diekaa thiyo anusandhaana sakera aja pheri sidio kaaryaalayamaa upasthita garaaiekomaa uniharulaai dharautimaa chhaadne adesa bhaeko ho
praharile makawaanapurabaata sumraksita wanyajantu saalakako khapetaasahita tinajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa manahari gaaunpaalikaa ramanataarakaa warsiya amika ghalaana hetaundaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya laalasim bomjana ra chitawanako raapti nagarapaalikaa khurakhurekaa warsiya budhawaa chaudhari rahekaa chhan

manahari gaaunpaalikaa sthita sangachhephela gumbaako pachhaadi laamaalaai baasa basna banaaundai gareko bhawanamaa saalakako khaapetaako kaarowaara bhairaheko bhanne wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya manaharibaata khatieko prahari tolile bihibaara graama saalakako khapetaasahita uniharulaai pakraau garekaae haae
uniharulaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya raapti manaharimaa pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale jaanakaari dieko chha
sirahaako mahesapura pataaristhita ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatabaata pharaara bhaekaa eka wyaktilaai praharile aja pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa pratibandhita laaguausadha muddaakaa pharaara pratiwaadi sirahaako lahaana nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raamaasisa yaadawa raheko chha

gata mansira gate ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahesapura pataariko hiraasatakaksabaata pharaara yaadawa sirahaa nagarapaalikaa sthita sasuraali gharamaa lukichhipi basdai aeko praapta gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaabaata khatieko prahari tolile unalaai pakraau gareko haae
bihibaara bihaana saadhe baje belabaari nagarapaalikaa kaamuka budhabaaremaa warsiya chhoraa jiwanabahaadura limbule warsiyaa amaa dewi kumaari limbuko hatyaa garekaa hun
jiwanale amaako hatyaa garepachhi atmahatyaa garekaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaekaae chha

chhoraale amaako taauko ra nidhaaramaa chhuri prahaara gari hatyaa garekaa thie bhane pachhi aphnai ghaanti ra petamaa sohi chhurile prahaara gari ghaaite banekaa thie ghaaite bhaekaa limbuko upachaarakaa kramamaa saamudaayika aspataala nobela belabaarimaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
praharile thapa anusandhaana thaaleko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

bubaalaai hatyaa gareko aropamaa maritakakaa kaanchho chhoraa warsiya winoda raayalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha aphnai gharamaa khaatamuni lukeko awasthaamaa aja bihaana winodalaai pakraau garieko basabariyaa gaaunpaalikaakaa adhyaksa raamaayodhyaa raayale jaanakaari die

ghatanaasthalamaa ahile ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya barahathawaako toli pugera sawalaai jillaa aspataala malangawamaa sawa pariksanakaa laagi lagine tayaari bhairaheko gaapaa adhyaksa raayale jaanakaari die
ghatanaa sambandhamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko sarlaahikaa prahari upariksaka wiswamanai pokharalale jaanakaari die
mahottari jillaako raamagopaalapura nagarapaalikaa sahasaulaamaa gae raati laaguausadha kaarobaarisanga prahariko jhadapa hundaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha
marityu hunemaa raamagopaalapura niwaasi surendra yaadawakaa chhoraa warsiya raajana raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile janaaekaae chha

jaari lakadaaunakaa belaa pani thulo maatraamaa laaguausadha kaarobaara gareko gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatigaekaa saadaa posaakakaa prahari ra laaguausadha kaarobaaribicha raamagopaalapura sthita sadakamaa raati kariba bajetira jhadapa bhaekaae thiyaae

pakraau parnemaa janakapuradhaama basne warsiya biltu barahi wadaanambara basne warsiya mostakina raaina warsiya jasina kawaadi ra warsiya ramesa saahu tathaa dhanusaakai mithilaa bihaari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya kisori saaha chhan
janakapuradhaama upamahaanagarapaalikaa pidaari chokasthita jaanaki baatikaa gesta haausamaa juwaa khelirahekaa uniharulaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaale janaaeko chha

ekala mahilaako hatyaa gareko asankaamaa sohi thaaunkaa warsiya mugaadhana bhanine mukesa raailaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka naaraayana chimoriyaale bataae

sthaaniya baasindaale praharilaai khabara garepachhi wadaasadasya arjuna raaisangai chhimekilaai herna pathaaundaa mahilaa marita phelaa pareki thiin mahilaa hatyaako kaarana khulna baanki raheko ra anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa prahari niriksaka amodakumaara kherawaarale jaanakaari die
bhaaratadwaaraa atikramita bhumi lipuleka jaana hindekaa netrawikrama chanda samuhakaa atha kaaryakartaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha
uniharulaai wyaasakaa sthaaniyale kutapita garna thaalepachhi praharile niyantranamaa lieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka padamabahaadura wistale bataae
uniharu chanda samuhakaa kaaryakartaa bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha sthaaniyale kutapita garna thaalepachhi praharile niyantranamaa liera sadaramukaama khalangaa lyaairaheko wistale bataae

jiwana yasaaghi pani kaalaapaani jaana bhandai sadaramukaama khalangaamaa prachaa witarana gardai gareko awasthaamaa pakraau parekaa thie bandaabandiko awasthaamaa uniharu lukera wyaasako dumlina pugekaa thie

simaa prahari chauki phenharaabaata khatieko praharile biara dablu nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa chaalaka sahanilaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa pari pakraau gareko ho
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya harinagaraabaata khatieko praharile sumkaaspada awasthaamaa hindirahekaa yaadawalaai jaancha gardaaukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paareko ho

nawalaparaasi paschima prataapapura gaaunpaalikaa khajuraakholaabaata niyantrita laaguausadha daaijepaama saya empula phenaraagana saya empula naaitraabheta hajaara saya tyaabletaspaasmo kyaapsula nurphina saya empula ra saya emaelako onoreksa botala sahita nawalaparaasi raamagraama nagarapaalikaa jokawaara basne warsiya jogendra prasaada harijanalaai mumgalabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

prahari chauki paanchapedaa ra biopi sasastra besa kyaampa bhujahawaabaata khatieko praharile naharako baato hundai nepaalatarpha paidala aundai garekaa unalaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
praharile sunasariko bhokraahaa narasimha gaaunpaalikaa baata pestolasahita laaguausadha kaarobaarilaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa saptari hanumaananagara kumkaalini nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya karisa bhanne karisna kumaara yaadawa rahekaa chhan

praharile unakaae saathabaata thaana katuwaa pestola ra raaunda goli tathaa niyantrita laaguausadha saya emaelako daaileksa disi botala spaasmo proksibhana plasa saya tyaableta naaitrosama saya tyaableta ra naaitraabheta tyaableta baraamada garekaae chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasaribaata khatieko praharile biara pi nambarako skaarapio gaadi jaancha garne kramamaa ukta hatiyaara tathaa laaguausadha phelaa paari gaadimaa sawaara yaadawalaai pakraau gareko ho

sindhupaalchokako paanchapokhari thaanapaala gaaunpaalikaa maanekharkakaa adhyaksa raamabahaadura laamaakaa chhoraa warsiya akaasa laamaa ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya wakila pariyaara rahekaa chhan uniharulaai mangalabaara praharile pakraau gareko ho

prahari sahaayaka niriksaka dipa taamaanamaathi haatapaata garepachhi pakraau parekaa unalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya melamchi lyaaieko ra thapa anusandhaana agaadi badhaaeko prahari niriksaka phalabahaadura taamaanale jaanakaari die

dhungaa laagera ghaaite bhaekaa prasani taamaanako dhulikhela aspataalako saakhaa kaaryaalaya maanekharkamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha yasa sambandhamaa praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko janaaeko chha
lakadaaunakaa belaa biraami bhandai yaatru osaarne aropamaa eutaa embulensalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya budarale kailaalibaata yaatru bokera dipaayala aundai gareko aropamaa jillaako saayala gaaunpaalikaako sejha numko embulensalaai chaalakasahita niyantranamaa lieko ho

embulensamaa chaalakasahita paancha janaa sawaari ra kehi saamaana bokeko paaiepachhi niyantranamaa lieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha karnabahaadura raulele bataae unale bhane gaadi jaanchakaa kramamaa embulensamaa yaatru bokeko paaiepachhi haamile niyantranamaa liekaa chhaun yasa sambandhamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa khabara garekaa chhaun baanki maathiko adesa aepachhi kaarawaahi hunechha

koronaa bhaairasa sankramana rokathaama tathaa niyantranakaa laagi sarakaarale laagu gareko lakadaaunakaa samayamaa yahaankaa embulensa sarakaari gaadi tathaa khaadyaannalagaayatakaa saawaari saadhanale yaatru bokne gareko gunaaso aepachhi praharile jaanchamaa kadaai garna thaaleko chha praharile niyantranamaa liekaa embulensa chaalaka tathaa yaatrulaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya budaramaa raakhieko chha
laaguausadha gaanjaasahita sirahaako golabajaara nagarapaalikaasthita balkawaabaata praharile dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa sirahaa nagarapaalikaa padamapurakaa warsiya laksmi paasawaana ra sirahaa nagarapaalikaa saaraswarakaa warsiya mohammada alaauddina miyaan rahekaa chhan
praapta gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya golabajaarabaata khatieko prahari tolile gaanjaasahita dubai janaalaai pakraau gareko ho

paasawaanale bokeko jholaa jaancha gardaa jholaabhitra lukaaichhipaai raakheko graama gaanjaa ra sarira khaanatalaasi gardaa miyaanko paaintako gojibaata graama gaanjaa baraamada bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka winoda ghimirele jaanakaari die

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadina ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajuribaata khatieko praharile baa pa ra pradesa num pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa wataa plaastikako boraamaa lukaai lyaaundai gareko ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
bubaa minabahaadurako upachaarakaa kramamaa pokharaamaa aitabaara saanjha marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya myaagdikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka kiranajanga kunwarale jaanakaari die

abhiyukta kumaaralaai pakraau gari jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa lyaaieko unale bataae abhiyukta kumaarale prahaara gareko dhungaale acheta bhaekaa minabahaaduralaai beni aspataalamaa upachaara sambhawa nabhaepachhi pokharaako manaipaala aspataalamaa siphaarisa garieko thiyo pranaau kunwarakaa anusaara chhoraale dhungaa prahaara gareko pratyaksadarsi kumaaraki amaako bayaana dieki ra chhoraa kunwarale pani swikaara garekaa chhan

pakraau parnemaa kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa bhawaanipurakaa chhote mansura rahekaa chhan mansuralaai gharabaata pakraau garieko ho bhane baanki tinajanaako khoji bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaekaae chha

pakraau parekaa mansuramaathi praharile kutapita muddaa dartaa gari kaarawaahi agaadi badhaaekaae chha patrakaara yaadawalaai kalaiyaako bharatachokasthita patrikaako kaaryaalayabaata kaama sakera ghara jaane kramamaa aitabaara belukaa kalaiyaa piluwaa sadakakhandaantargata awadhaapuramaa chaara janaako samuhamaa rahekaa wyaktile kutapita gareka thie

sankarapuraki yuwati laksmi deuwaako phesabuka aidibaata unakaa aphanta tathaa saathiharulaai aslila bhidiyo tathaa photoharu pathaai charitra hatyaa gari atmahatyaa garna baadhya paareko aropamaa kanchanapurako belauri nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya santaraama chaudharilaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka daksakumaara basnetale jaanakaari die

milanale bhinaaju naataa parne warsiya pritilaala raailaai taaukomaa dhumgaa prahaara gardaa ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya khotaana ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaksilaa ra prahari chauki khaartaamchhaabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho
saathai awasyaka anusandhaana ra sodhapuchhakaa laagi milanakai bhaai warsiya jiwana raailaai sameta praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
praharile sarlaahikaae laalawandi nagarapaalikaa baata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba kilo sahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sarlaahibaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa jholaabhitra lukaaichhipaai lyaaundai gareko ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
kanchanale aphule baabuamaako hatyaa gareko bhani num phona garepachhi prahari ghatanaasthala pugeko thiyo ghatanaasthala prahari chaukidekhi chaara kilomitara durimaa parchha

kanchanale nummaa phonasangai praharile usako pichhaa gariraheko ra bhaagdai garekaa awasthaamaa poklaabaana prahari chaukiko tolile nintranayamaa lieko prahari niriksaka tejabahaadura daahaalale jaanakaari die
ghatanaasthalamaa samdu prahari chaukikaa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka kamala tolaanako tolile suraksaa diiraheko prahari niriksaka daahaalale bataae

ghatanaako thapa anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako toli aja tyasatarpha jaane ra maritakako sawa pariksana garna aspataala lagine praharile janaaeko chha maritakakaa saata mahinaaki chhori chhin naabaalaka chhori maritakakaa daaju dewabahaadura phomwosanga rahekaa wadaadhyaksa tekabahaadura ghisinale bataae
sthaaniyawaasile gyaasa kharida garera ghara lagepachhi nikai kama taula bhaeko bhandai kaalobajaariko asankaa gari praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

baraamada bhaekaa watai gyaasako silindara maapadanda wiparita kama taula bhaeko ra nakkali sila lagaaieko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko bauddhakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka nawina kaarkile jaanakaari die
praharile kailaaliko dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa dewariyaasthita jaakhorataala jumgalabaata katuwaa pestolasahita tinajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

ksetriya anusandhaana samuha araaiti kaa prahari naayaba niriksaka kesawa josiko kamaandamaa ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalibaata khatieko sumyukta prahari tolile dhanagadhi kaa warsiya awinaasa thaapaa sohi thaaunkaa warsiya nabbu naamale chinine nawaraaja baraaili ra warsiya winoda kunwaralaai pestolasahita aja pakraau gareko haae

praharile janakapurabaata bajaara mulyabhandaa badhimaa simenta bikri gareko aropamaa ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parnemaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raamaprataapa saaha rahekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaabaata khatieko tolile bajaara mulyabhandaa badhi mulyamaa simenta bikri gardai gareko awasthaamaa ananda intarapraaijeja haardawayarakaa sanchaalaka sameta rahekaa saahalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile parsaabaata kaartuna agarabatti baraamada gareko chha

wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita parawaanipurabaata baaraako jitapuratarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako traka chekajaancha garnekramamaa ukta parimaanako agarabatti baraamada gareko praharile janaaeko chha

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa trakalaai rokera chekajaancha gardaa chaalakale agarabattiko bila bharpaai dekhaauna nasakepachhi agarabatti loda bhaeko trakasahita rautahatako barindaawana nagarapaalikaa basne chaalaka sitaaraama patelalaai niyantranamaa lieko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile agarabatti loda bhaeko trakasahita chaalakalaai awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi raajaswa anusandhaana kaaryaalaya pathalaiyaa baaraamaa bujhaaieko chha

ukta sthaanamaa hundi kaarowaara gariraheko bhanna suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha mahaanagariya prahariwaritta kaalimaatibaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho ukta ghatanaakaa wisayamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

baagaluna nagarapaalikaa maajhakota ananda chaupaaristhita deraa gari basne warsiyaa samjhanaa kisaanalaai atmahatyaa durutsaahana gareko abhiyogamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baagalunakaa prahari jawaana raakesa dawaadilaai hiraasatamaa liieko chha
tanahunko wyaasa nagarapaalikaa wadaa num kaa sthaayi baasindaa dawaadi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baagalunamaa kaaryarata thie

jillaa adaalata baagalunabaata paancha dinako myaada thapa gari anusandhaana thaalieko praharile janaaeko chha chhorilaai atmahatyaa garna baadhya paarieko bhandai maritaka samjhanaa kisaanakaa bubaa khadkabahaadura saarkile budhabaara jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baagalunamaa kitaani jaaheri diekaa thie

samjhanaa mangalabaara bihaana aphu basdai aeko kothaako silinamaa jhundieko awasthaamaa phelaa pareki thiin samjhanaale jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukhalaai sambodhana gari lekheko susaaitanotamaa tyahin kaaryarata prahari jawaana raakesa dawaadikaa kaarana aphule atmahatyaa garna baadhya bhaeko ullekha chha

atmahatyaa garnupurwa samjhanaale prahari pramukhalaai sambodhana gari lekheko notamaa dosimaathi awasyaka chhaanabina gari kaarawaahi garna anurodha garieko chha wisum bhadau gatedekhi prahari jawaana dawaadisanga chinajaana bhai maayaamaa phasdaa bichalli bhai atmahatyaako baato rojnupareko susaaitanotamaa ullekha chha

hatyaako aropamaa chhoraa surajalaai niyantratranamaa liieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya salyaanakaa prahari pramukha dhakendra khatiwadaale jaanakaari die surajale waisaakha gate amaako pani haata bhaancheko prahariko bhanaai chha
sawapariksanakaa laagi salyaana jillaa aspataala lyaaune tayaari bhairaheko prahari pramukha khatiwadaale bataae

sikhara nagarapaalikaa wadaa num basne warsiyaa raaju damaainko taaukaamaa chota laagera marityu bhaepachhi ghatanaa sankaaspada bhaeko janaai pati karisnalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale aja niyantranamaa lieko chha

raaju gambhira ghaaite raheko khabara sukrabaara praharilaai aeko ra ghatanaasthalamaa gaera herdaa marityu sankaaspada dekhiekaale nijakaa srimaanalaai niyantranamaa liieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa tathaa prahari niriksaka karna boharaale bataae
ghatanaa bhaeko dina sukrabaara eutai kothaamaa damaain dampati maatrai raheko bujhieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
netrawikrama chanda wiplawa kaa bhatijaa dilipa chandalaai nawalaparaasi bardaghaata sustaa paschima praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sarwochcha adaalatako adesako kaaryaanwayana gardai jillaa nyaayaadhisa asokakumaara basneta nepaala patrakaara mahaasumgha jillaa saakhaa ra nepaala baara esosiyasanakaa pratinidhiko rohabaramaa aja dilipalaai thunaamukta garelagattai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata aekaa praharile paraasiko buddhachokabaata pakraau garekaa hun
gata phaaguna gate kapilawastubaata abhadra wyawahaarako aropamaa pakraau parekaa unalaai chaita gate jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya kapilawastule taarekhamaa chhaadeko thiyo
sohi dina unalaai kapilawastubaata praharile pakraau gari nawalaparaasi bardaghaata sustaa paschima jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa pathaaeko thiyo
praharile rautahatabaata sayaum litara awaidha madiraa nasta gareko chha

rautahatako paschima bhega phatuwaa bijayapura nagarapaalikaamaa praharile abaidha madiraa nasta gareko ho lakadaauna suru bhaeyataa nagaraksetra antaragata wibhinna pasalamaa baraamada bhaeko saya litara abaidha madiraa nasta garieko praharile janaaeko chha

wiswabyaapi mahaamaariko rupamaa phailieko koronaa bhaairasako sanakramana niyantrana garna sarakaarale ghosanaa gareko lakadaauna pachhi abaidha madiraa utpaadana tathaa bikri bitarana rokna rautahata praharile abhiyaana chalaaeko janaaeko chha
rakamasambandhi baadawiwaadamaa sahida nagarapaalikaa birtaakaa warsiya nathuni sadaale aitabaara raati warsiyaa baabu saukhi sadaalaai gharelu hatiyaarale hirkaai hatyaa garekaa hun

jillaakaae katahariyaa nagarapaalikaa hanumaana tolakaa warsakaa sanjiwa yaadawako nirghaata kutapita gari hatyaa garieko ho kutapitabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa yaadawako upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
ghatanaamaa sumlagna bhaeko aropamaa raadhe daasalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii ghatanaabaare anusandhaaana suru garekaae chha

ilaamako phaakaphokathuma gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya sandipa limbulaai praharile pakraau gareko ho ilaama nagarapaalikaa barabotemaa koronaa bhaairasakaa sankramita phelaa pareko bhandai limbule saamaajika sanjaalamaa posta garera aphawaaha phailaaune kaama garekaale pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamale jaanakaari diekaae chha

sohi kaarana limbulaai sanibaara jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamale niyantrana lii sodhapuchha gariraheko bataaieko chha saathai galata suchanaa sampreksana nagarna ra jillaamaa haalasamma yastaa sankramita phelaa napareko bhandai dhukka bhaera lakadaaunako paalanaa garnasameta jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamale agraha gareko chha
praharile janakapuradhaamakaae sadakamaa lukichhipi jathaabhaawi paisaa phaalera bhaageko aropamaa duijanaa mahilaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa janakapuradhaama upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara ki amunaa khaatuna ra alinaa khaatuna chhan naataamaa uniharu nandabhaauju hun praharile jaanaki mandira pachhaadi raheko masjida najikabaata pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa mahilaabaare thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaale janaaeko chha
srimatiko prahaarabaata gambhira ghaaite adhikaariko sukrabaara raati upachaarakaa kramamaa kohalapura medikala kaleja baankemaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanale janaaeko chha
khotaanako baraahapokhari gaaunpaalikaa khursaanekaa warsiya srimaan chhakumaara raaiko hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa warsiyaa menukaa raai pakraau pareki hun
menukaale somabaara khukuri prahaara gardaa chhakumaarako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya khotaanakaa prawaktaa prahari niriksaka amodakumaara kherawaarale jaanakaari die
raaiko sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala gaaighaata pathaaieko chha menukaale srimaanko taauko dhaada lagaayata wibhinna thaaunmaa khukuri prahaara gareko praharile janaaeko chha
daanamaa pani ekajanaa koronaa sankramita bhetieko bhanera aja phesabukamaa staatasa raakheko bhandai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanale pakraau gareko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka sumita khadkaakaa anusaara daanako ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya dipaka nyaupaanelaai pakraau garieko ho

buhaariko hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa parsaakobahudaramaai nagarapaalikaa raamanagari basne warsiya suresa pumdita unaki warsiyaa srimati phula kumaari dewi ra uniharuki kaanchhi buhaari warsiyaa maalati dewi sameta janaalaai sanibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

warsiyaa buhaari urmilaa dewi pumditalaai gharamaa kartawya gari maarera ghaatamaa lagera daaha sumskaara gariraheko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pokhariyaabaata khatieko praharile sawako adhaa bhaaga jalisakeko awasthaamaa phelaa paareko ho maritakako srimaana widesamaa raheko bhanne bujhina aeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata prahari tola khatii gai yasa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko chha
lakadaau ulumghana rokna khojdaa moranako patharisanischare nagarapaalikaa maa nepaali kaamgresakaa sthaaniya netaamaathi chhuraa prahaara bhaeko chha

kaamgresakaa purwa ksetriya sadasya warsiya dilipa taamaanamaathi sukrabaara saanjha bajetira chhuraa prahaara bhaeko ho wiswabhara mahaamaariko rupa lieko koronaa bhaairasako sumkramana phailana nadina nepaala sarakaarale gareko lakadaauna ullumghana hune krama badhepachhi sthaaniya staramaa taamaanale tyasalaai rokne kaama garekaa thie
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya patharikaa diesapi dilipa girikaa anusaara lakadaauna ullumghana hune krama badhepachhi taamaanale sadakamaa kaatha tesryaaera tyasalaai rokne prayaasa gareko paaieko chha

tyahi wisayalaai liera sthaaniya warsiya wijaya limbusanga unako wiwaada bhaeko thiyo maadaka padaartha sewana garekaa limbule wiwaadakai kramamaa chhuraa prahaara garera taamaanalaai ghaaite banaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaeko chha
pakraau parnemaa gopaala sunaara rahekaa chhan saamaajika sanjaalamaa galata hallaa phailaaune sunaaralaai sukrawaara belukaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurale pakraau gareko ho
mahendranagarasthita mahaakaali aspataalamaa koronaa bhaairasako sumkramanakaa kaarana eka janaako marityu bhayo bhanera sunaarale aphawaaha phailaaeko kanchanapura praharile janaaeko chha
koronaabaare saamaajika sanjaalamaa aphawaaha phailaaeko bhandai praharile niyantranamaa lieko jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya kanchanapurale saamaajika sanjaalamaarphata pusti gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa chautaaraa saangaachokagadhi nagarapaalikaa melachaurasthita jayamaataa wanadewi phyula sentarakaa karmachaari kapilawastu wijayanagara gaaunpaalikaa kaa mahesakumaara chaudhari rahekaa chhan

koronaa bhaairasako jokhima nyunikaranakaa laagi nepaala sarakaarale laagu gareko lakadaaunako samayamaa bajaara mulyabhandaa badhi pratilitara kaa darale petrola bechiraheko awasthaamaa unalaai pakraau gari awasyaka anusandhaana suru garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhupaalchokakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka maadhawaprasaada kaaphlele jaanakaari die
petrolapampamaa kaaryarata karmachaarile bila nadii bajaara mulyabhandaa badhi rakama liera petrola bechdai airaheko awasthaamaa unalaai pakraau garieko prahari naayaba upariksaka kaaphlele bataae
koronaa bhaairasako kaarana mulukamaa lakadaauna laagu bhaera saaraa janajiwana astawyasta bhairaheko samayamaa rupandehiko butawalabaata awaidha laaguausadhasahita duijanaa pakraau parekaa chhan

asthaayi prahari chauki dewinagaramaa pramukha prahari naayaba niriksaka sai rumabahaadura kesi netaritwako prahari tolile butawalako dewinagara najikaibaata awaidha laaguausadhasahita dui janaalaai pakraau garna saphala bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehile janaaeko chha pakraau parnemaa sthaaniya barsiya siwa thaapaa ra barsiya indra guruna chhan

pakraau parekaa dubaijanaalaai hiraasatamaa liera laaguausadha muddaamaa thapa anusandhaana suru garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehikaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka diesapi khadgabahaadura khatrile jaanakaari die
praharile jhaapaako damakabaata koronaa bhaaisarako sankramana dekhiyo bhandai saamaajika sanjaalamaa bhrama phailaaune eka wyaktilaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa damaka niwaasi warsiya kumaara raai rahekaa chhan unalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakabaata khatieko prahari tolile sukrabaara saanjha pakraau gareko ho
unalaai awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaamaa raakhi awasyaka anusandhaana suru garieko praharile janaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale hiraa lutapaatamaa sumlagna praharisahita janaalaai somabaara patrakaara sammelana maarphata saarwajanika gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaako bhainsepaati basne warsiya sujana achaarya surkhetako wirendranagara basne warsiya surendra basela jaajarakotako siwaalaya basne warsiya wirabahaadura basneta ra daanako sijuwaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya himakaanta puna magara rahekaa chhan pakraau parekaa achaarya patrakaara hun bhane anya prahari hun

makawaanapurako kailaasa gaaunpaalikaa chaukitaara ghara bhaeki warsiyaa dhanalaksmi gurunako gharamaa bahumulya hiraa bhaeko suchanaa paaepachhi yo samuha aitabaara kaathamaadaumbaata makawaanapura pugeko thiyo

hiraa lutapaatako khabara paaelagattai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya paalunabaata prahari niriksaka wikaasakumaara taamaanako netaritwamaa khatieko prahari tolile uniharulaai makawaanapurakai thaahaa nagarapaalikaa sthita thaanaabajaarabaata niyantranamaa lieko thiyo

uniharu pradesa cha nambarako kaaramaa sawaara bhaera bhaagiraheko awasthaamaa pakraau parekaa hun surumaa hiraa kinne baahaanaa banaaera uniharu piditako gharasamma pugekaa thie tara tyahaan aphuharu prahari raheko bhandai pestola dekhaaera suna luti bhaagekaa thie

uniharulaai daakaa kasuramaa kaarawaahikaa laagi awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko makawaanapura praharile janaaeko chha daankaa kasuramaa warsadekhi warsasamma kaida ra hajaara rupaiyaandekhi laakha hajaara rupaiyaan jariwaanaasammako sajaayako praawadhaana chha
praharile parsaabaata laagu ausadha gaanjaasahita somabaara tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa bahudaramaai nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raadhaakarisna raauta ahira warsiya laksmana mahato koiri ra pakaahaamainapura gaaunpaalikaa dherekaa warsiya mandrikaa sahani rahekaa chhan
wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pokhariyaabaata khatieko sumyukta tolile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

gharaayasi bibaada hundaa awegamaa ai dhaamile srimatilaai taaukomaa daauraako hataudaale prahaara gardaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki unakaae upachaarako kramamaa medikala kaleja kohalapura baankemaa marityu bhaeko ho

yaatruko chaapa badheko maukaa paarera tokiebhandaa badhi mulyamaa basako tikata wikri gareko bhani traaphika prahariko hatalaaina nambara maa aeko gunaasokaa adhaaramaa sahaja ra suraksita yaatraakaa laagi mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale yaatru banera stina aparesana chalaaeko thiyo sohi kramamaa aitabaara janaalaai pakraau garieko mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha
praharile surkhetabaata awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara jasto dekhine dhulo padaartha saya miligraama sahita aitabaara bihaana eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa jillaakaae wirendranagara nagarapaalikaa achhaami daandaa basne warsiya mahesa sunaara rahekaa chhan sumkaaspada awasthaamaa rahekaa sunaaralaai prahari chauki subbaakunaabaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa puriyaamaa raheko ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita pakraau gareko ho

sewaagraahisanga hajaara ghusa lieko awasthaamaa yamunaamaai gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaa sadasya raamawiswaasa mukhiyaalaai akhtiyaarale rumgehaata pakraau gareko haae sewaagraahilaai paisaako baargenina garne yamunaamaai ghara bhaekaa bichauliyaa naraguna paasawaatalaai sameta pakraau garieko chha
maaska ra senitaaijarako kaalobajaari gareko aropamaa chaara wyaapaarilaai praharile janakapurabaata pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa janakapuradhaama wadaa nambara sthita susmitaa medikala halabaata sarlaahi barahathawaa wadaa nambara basne sumyaja saaha janakapuradhaama wadaa nambara sthita bhramarapuraa chokasthita atala phaarmesibaata dhanusaa laksminiyaa wadaa nambara basne anila yaadawa ra jaleswara wadaa nambara basne prabhansa chaudhari ra janakapuradhaama wadaa nambara sthita sampurna medikalabaata sthaaniya sumjaya saaha rahekaa chhan

maaska kaalobajaari gariraheko awasthaamaa pakraau gariraheko awasthaamaa ti janaa wiruddha kaalobajaara muddaa chalaaune tayaari bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chhakoronaa sumkramanako traasa phailie dekhi janakapuradhaamamaa maaska ra senitaaijarako wyaapaka abhaawa bhaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale budhaalaai so abhiyogamaa gata phaaguna gatedekhi hiraasatamaa raakheko janaaeko chha saitisa warsiya wadaasadasya budhaalaai sthaaniya mahilaale dieko ujurikaa adhaaramaa pakraau gari hiraasatamaa raakhieko prahari niriksaka daanabahaadura rokaayaale bataae
ti pidita mahilaale ghatanaa bhaeko saata dinapachhi praharimaa ujuri dieki thiin
unalaai awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaamaa raakhi awasyaka anusandhaana suru garieko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaakaae kailaasa gaaunpaalikaa akhetaarakaa warsiya laalabahaadura moktaana goli laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa hun ukta goli unako gharamai chaleko tara kasale chalaaeko bhanne khulna nasakeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale janaaekaae chha
chhaati tathaa haatamaa chota laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa moktaanalaai upachaarakaa laagi helikaptaramaa hetaumdaabaata kaathamaadaum lyaaiekaae chha
ghatanaa baare thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawanaapurale janaaekaae chha
rupandehiko omasatiyaa gaaunpaalikaamaa eka baalakako hatyaa bhaeko chha
omasatiyaa dhaansikaa warsiya baalaka akaasa harijanako intaale taaukomaa prahaara gari hatyaa bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehile janaaeko chha

yahi chaita gate bihaana baje widyaalaya gaekaa baalaka ghara napharkiepachhi khojatalaasa garne kramamaa gate maatrai omasatiyaako khetamaa sawa phelaa pareko thiyo bihaana kariba h baje sthaaniyawaasile sawa bhetepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

hatyaako asumkaamaa akaasakaa pariwaarajanale kitaani jaaherisahita jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa ujuri diekaa thie ujurikaa adhaaramaa praharile uniharulaai pakraau gari anusandhaana prakriyaa agaadi badhaaeko ho
pakraau parnemaa tikata kaauntarakaa kaarmachaari baaraa ghara bhai balkhu basne warsiya mukesa prasaada saaha lagaayata raheko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile dhaadinabaata kartawya jyaana muddaako aropamaa pharaara bhaekaa eka wyaktilaai warsapachhi pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa jillaako thaakre gaaunpaalikaa raanibaarikaa kaanchhaa thaapaa bhanine ranabahaadura thaapaa rahekaa chhan maagha gate saawika thaakre gaawisa wadaa num raanibaarikaa saaili bhanne maaili thaapaako hatyaa garera pharaara bhaeko prahariko daabi chha
pharaara abhiyukta gaaunmai lukichhipi baseko wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa kendriya anusandhaana byuro tathaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako sumyukta tolile pakraau gareko haae

pakraau parnemaa dhaadina khaanikholaa gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai haala madhyapurathimi lokanthali basne warsiyaa apsaraa baanskotaa taaplejuna teloka gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai haala lokanthali basne warsiyaa sunitaa subbaa ra taaplejuna teloka gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai lokanthali basne warsiyaa enihaa subbaa rahekaa chhan uniharulaai mahaanagariya prahari waritta thimiko tolile pakraau gareko haae
praharile siraahaabaata pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita eka yuwakalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa jillaako laksmipura pataari gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya bhuwaneswara yaadawa rahekaa chhan unalaai prahari chauki kachanaaribaata khatieko tolile sirahaako bariyaarapatti gaaunpaalikaa kachanaaribaata pakraau gareko ho

bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai gareko sapa numko motarasaaikalamaa lukaaichhipaai lyaairaheko laaguausadha daaileksa disi emaelakaa botalasahita yaadawalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
praharile khotaanako halesibaata juwaa taasa khelirahekaae awasthaamaa yuwaa sumgha ra taruna dalakaa jillaa netaasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa bagahi tolabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa keji budhabaara raati praharile baraamada gareko chha

prahari chauki parawaanipurabaata khatieko praharile naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa phelaa paari ukta laaguausadha gaanjaa baraamada gareko ho ukta motarasaaikalamaa sawaara wyaktiharu haala pharaara rahekaale praharile khoji garirahekochha
jumlaako sinjaa gaaunpaalikaa adhyaksa dewalasimha raawalamaathi sohi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya dewikarisna sarmaale kutapita garekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa adhikaari raajendra chandakaa anusaara aphnai kaaryakaksamaa phona gariraheko awasthaamaa adhyaksa raawalamaathi sarmaale laththi prahaara gari kutapita garekaa hun

karnaali swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaanamaa saamaanya upachaarapachhi adhyaksa raawala ghara pharkiekaa chhan kaaryakaksamaa phonamaa kuraakaani gariraheko thien ekkaasi sarmaa prawesa garera laththile prahaara garnubhayo ahile saamaanya upachaarapachhi ghara pharkisaken unale bhane

pramukha jillaa adhikaari durgaa wanjaadele sarmaalaai pakraau garieko jaanakaari die sarmaale sumraksana gariraheko gitti baaluwaa adhyaksa sahitako samuhale liiraheko sunepachhi saamaanya kuraakaani maatra bhaeko bataae unale bhane maile adhyaksamaathi laththi prahaara garekai chhaina

tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num niwaasi sumana kaarkiko naa kha nambarako basamaa ajnaata samuhale agajani gareko haae ajnaata samuhale mahinaa aghidekhi paarkingamaa raakhieko basamaa agajani gareko praharile janaaeko chha

agalaagibaata gaadiko badi jalera nasta bhaeko chha gaadimaa bhaeko agajanilaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko ho agajani kasale ra kina garyo bhanne bisayamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
jillaakaae dhorapaatana nagarapaalikaa gaalduna basne warsiya debiraama bikale dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gari aphnai warsiyaa srimati gauraa bikako hatyaa garekaa hun

bikalele maadaka padaartha sewana gari saamaanya wiwaadako kaarana srimatilaai dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gardaa ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya burtibaana ra prahari chauki dhorapaatanabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile raamechhaapabaata laakha hajaara rupaiyaan nakkali notasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

uniharule nakkali mudraa chaltimaa lyaaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya khaandaadewi ra prahari chauki lubhughaatabaata khatieko praharile khoji garne kramamaa taamaanako saathabaata hajaara darakaa hajaara rupaiyaan ra uniharule wibhinna pidita wyaktiharulaaidieko hajaara darakaa hajaara gari laakha hajaara nakkali mudraa baraamada gari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

saathai uniharule jalaaudina miyaan ansaari naama garekaa wyaktisanga milera goru kineko rakama bhuktaani gardaa sameta nakkali nota prayoga gareko anusandhaanabaata khulna aeko chha haala pharaara ansaariko khoji bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamechhaapale janaaeko chha
bharuwaa bandukasahita pakraau parnemaa daanako danagisarana gaaunpaalikaakaa kaa kulabahaadura wali ra sohi thaaunkaa himalaala khatri rahekaa chhan
saptariko surunagaa nagarapaalikaa kusahaasthita wibhinna pasalamaa badhi mulya lii petrolamaa kaalobajaari garne tina janaalaai pakraau garieko chha
pakraau parnemaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya aruna chaudhari warsiya ali hasana ra wadaa num kaa warsiya tejanaaraayana bhagata raheko praharile janaaeko chha

pakraau parekaa chaudhariko saathabaata litara hasanako saathabaata paancha litara ra bhagatako saatha dui litara awaidharupamaa petrolamaa kaalobajaari gari bechabikhana gariraheko awasthaamaa baraamada garieko prahari niriksaka kaarkile jaanakaari die
yataa pakraau parekaa tinai janaalaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kadarabonaamaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarile janaaeko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale kaaski jillaa adaalatakaa srestedaara lokanaatha paraajulilaai tisa hajaara ghusa rakamasahita pakraau gareko chha

srestedaara paraajulile adaalatamaa wichaaraadhina muddaamaa niyantranamaa lieko gaadi chhutaaidine prayojanakaalaagi wibhinna bahaanaamaa ghusa maaga gariraheko bhanne suchanaa ewam kaaryaalayamaa praapta ujurikaa adhaaramaa akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako kaaryaalaya pokharaabaata khatieko tolile ukta ghusa rakamasahita niyantranamaa lieko ho
kaaski praharile pokharaako jumgalamaa traansapaarti garne janaa widesi ra janaa nepaalisahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

mumgalabaara raati laaguausadha sewana gari hohallaa garne chaarajanaa narweli swidenakaa ekajanaa jarmanakaa ekajanaa ra ekajanaa nepaalilaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskile jaanakaari dieko chha
katejamaa anya paryatakaharu sameta rahe pani laagu ausadha sewana garnelaai maatra pakraau gari hiraasatamaa raakhieko kaaski praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako tolile widyaarthilaai prawesa patra dine naamamaa hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa lieko aropamaa dhanusaabaata saamudaayika widyaalayakaa eka janaa pradhaanaadhyaapakalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile parsaabaata gaanjaa ra charesasahita ekajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa paterwaa sugauli gaaunpaalikaa deurawaanaakaa warsiya nura alama miyaan rahekaa chhan unalaai prahari chaumki rumgapurataadi parsaabaata khatieko prahari tolile paterwaa sugauli gaaunpaalikaa baidhanaathapurabaata mumgalabaara pakraau garekaae ho

makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa baata srota nakhuleko bhaaratiya rupaiyaan laakha hajaara dui janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha pakraau parnemaa bhaarata bairaatapura pairosawa basne warsiya bijaya chaudhari ra anya ekajanaa chhan

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pasupatinagarabaata khatieko praharile lamahibaata wiragumjatarpha jaandai gareko dablubi i nambarako bolero gaadi jaancha garne kramamaa gaadimaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta rupaiyaan sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

dhanusaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita janakapura eyaraportabaata hajaara darako nota saya thaana raheko laakha srota nakhuleko bhaaratiya rupaiyaan ekajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha pakraau parnemaa bhaarata mujapharapura basne warsiya siwama kumaara chhan
janakapurabaata kaathamaadaum jaana laagekaa kumaaralaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta bhaaratiya rupaiyaan sahita phelaa paari praharile pakraau gareko ho
praharile gorakhaabaata wiplawa samuhakaa pyuthaana jillaa sadasyalaai pakraau gareko chha
pyuthaanakaae maandapi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa kaa barsiya khemabahaadura kaarkilaai mumgalabaara raati praharile gorakhaa nagarapaalikaa baarakilo bhanne thaaunbaata pakraau gareko haae
kaarkilaai saarwajanika saantiwiruddhako kasuramaa jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayamaa muddhaa dartaa gari anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
simaawarti bhaaratiya bajaarabaata bhansaara chhali nepaala bhitryaaieko thulo parimaanako awaidha kapadaa paschima nawalaparaasisthita mahesapura bhansaara kaaryaalayale baraamada gareko chha

jillaako wibhinna sthaanabaata kariba ru nau laakhako awaidha lattaakapadaa baraamada garieko bhansaara kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha raatiko samayamaa awaidharupamaa kapadaa osaarapasaara bhairaheko bhanne suchanaakaa adhaaramaa bhansaarabaata khatieko tolile raamagraama nagarapaalikaakaa wibhinna sthaanabaata ukta kapadaa baraamada garieko mahesapura bhansaara kaaryaalayakaa pramukha hemachandra sarmaale raasasalaai jaanakaari die

raamagraama ujaini raamagraama jitapura paalhi kyaampasa sadakalagaayatakaa sthaanabaata ekaipataka ukta kapadaa baraamada garieko chha unale bhane ma anphai pani khatiera thulo maatraako ukta saamaana baraamada garna saphala bhaiyo kapadaa ra taskarale prayoga garekaa dui motarasaaikala pani baraamada garieko chha taskari niyantranakaa laagi haami nirantara laagirahekaa chhaun

kapadaa ra motarasaaikala baraamada bhae pani taskaraharu bhane bhaagna saphala bhaeko bhansaara kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha yahaanbaata bhaaratabaata lattaakapadaa juttaachappala khaadyaanna badhi maatraamaa taskari hune gareko chha bhane kaalo maricha matara keraau supaarilagaayatako chori nikaasi badhdo chha

jillaako bhujahawaa ra wisnaupuraa chhoti bhansaarabaata badhi maatraamaa chori nikaasi paithaari hune gareko mahesapura bhansaarale janaaeko chha mahesapura mula bhansaarako paschimatarpha raheko bhaaratako khulaa simaanaasanga jodiekaa nepaalako gopaalapura muderaa gerami wisnaupuraa ragaraganja sanai padari hundai sadaramukaama paraasisammako baato taskarale badhi prayoga garne gareko bataainchha

yasaigari mahesapura bhansaarakai purwatarpha raheko bhaaratako khulaa simaasanga jodieko nepaalako ramapurawaa bhujahawaa harsapuraa basahiyaa guthiprasauni balinagara ratanaganja sustaa triwenaisammabaata purwapaschima raajamaargaantargatako bardaghaata bhumahi chisaapaani bhutaahaa baasaalagaayatakaa sthaanamaa lyaaune ra yasa ksetramaa chalne sawaari prayoga gari butawala naaraayanagadhalagaayatakaa saharamaa taskaraharule maalawastu pathaaune gareko sthaaniyawaasi bataaunchhan

chori nikaasi paithaari niyantranakaa laagi suraaki parichaalana ekala gasti sumyukta gasti sambandhita ksetrakaa chhoti bhansaarako sakriyataa sasastra prahari ra nepaala praharisanga samanwaya ewum sahakaarya gardai aeko bhansaara pramukha sarmaale bataae
nepaala praharile chha kilo graama charesasahita bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha

warittakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka diesapi rugama kunwarale jholaamaa lukaaera raakheko awasthaamaa pakraau garieko jaanakaari die pakraau parekaa ansaarilaai awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko warittale janaaeko chha
praharile paalpaabaata juwaataasa khelirahekaae awasthaamaa juwaakai khaalabaata janaa juwaadeharulaai nagadasahita pakraau gareko chha

jillaako raamapura nagarapaalikaa dumrigaaunsthita yamabahaadura saaruko gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa hajaara saya rupaiyaan nagada gaddi taasasahita paancha janaalaai pakraau gareko ho
thaapaalaai awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinamaa bujhaaieko kendriya anusandhaana byuro mahaaraajagumjale janaaeko chha
praharile rautahatabaata dhaarilo hatiyaara khukuri prahaara garera aphnai bhaaujuko hatyaa garne prayaasa gareko abhiyogamaa eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

gharaayasi wiwaadakaa kaarana bhaaujulaai taaukomaa khukuri haaneko sahanile prahari samaksa swikaara gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya garudaale janaaeko chha pakraau parekaa sahanikaa saathabaata ghatanaamaa prayoga bhaeko ragata laageko khukuri sameta baraamada bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile tanahunko anbukhaireni gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num baraadibaata laaguausadhasahita eka yuwakalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa gorakhaa jillaakaae gorakhaa nagarapaalikaa wadaa num yaanakota ghara bhaekaa warsiya anila kumaara naharki rahekaa chhan praharile unakaae saathabaata nuphina ra phenergana lagaayatako thaana laaguausadha baraamada gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa sindhupaalchoka baahrabise nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai bhaktapura thimi basne warsiya buddhibahaadura raauta lagaayata anya chhan praharile uniharuko saathabaata nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan baraamada gareko chha
baaraamaa praharile awaidha gharelu madiraa utpaadana garne wataa bhatti bhatkaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya simaraa kolhawi jitapura ra simaa prahari chauki chhatawaabaata khatieko praharile ukta bhatti tathaa madiraa nasta gareko ho
praharile sarlaahi ra rautahatakaae chhuttaachhuttai sthaanabaata awaidha laaguausadhasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
sarlaahi hariwana nagarapaalikaa bhogatenisthita baatobaata niyantrita laaguausadha naaitraabheta saya tyaabaleta sahita janaalaai somabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa hariwana nagarapaalikaa chaapaani basne warsiya anila kumaara balmapaaki ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya paarasa khadakaa rahekaa chhan ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya hariwanabaata khatieko praharile baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

rautahata maulaapura nagarapaalikaa patharaabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji charesa jasto dekhine wastu kariba saya graama ra harinako simga thaana sahita janaalaai somabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa maulaapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya naresa mahato ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya birajaana mahato rahekaa chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatabaata khatieko praharile maulaapurabaata bumkulatarpha jaandai gareko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha ra harinako simga sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
praharile butawalabaata juwaa taasa khelirahekaae awasthaamaa mahilaasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya butawalabaata khatiekaae prahari taaelile sukhkhaanagarako eka gharabaata juwaa khelirahekaae awasthaamaa uniharulaai pakraau gareko haae praharile uniharuko saathabaata hajaara nagadasahita buka taasasameta baraamada gareko chha
tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya hiraa daangilaai khukuri prahaara gari hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tulasipurale tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
kanchanapurako suklaaphaantaa nagarapaalikaa kaluwaapurakaa warsiya jayalaala bhandaari ra unaki srimati warsiyaa dhanaadewi bhandaariko hatyaa uniharukai chhoraabaata bhaeko khuleko chha
kanchanapura praharile aitabaara bhandaari dampattiko hatyaamaa sumlagna bhaeko aropamaa uniharukai chhoraa bharata bhandaarilaai pakraau gari aja patrakaara sammelana garera saarwajanika gareko haae
bhandaarile nai bubaa ra kaanchhi amaako dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gari hatyaa gareko anusandhaanabaata khuleko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurale janaaeko chha
byuroko tolile widesi winimaya muddaamaa pharaara sindhupaalchoka bhotekosi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiyaa saandomaa serpaalaai aitabaara swayambhubaata pakraau gari aja kaaraagaara chalaana gareko ho

byurokaa prawaktaa prahari upariksaka belabahaadura paandele wisum saaunamaa sindhupaalchoka jillaa adaalatako phaisalaale ru laakha hajaara jariwaanaa sunaaepachhi serpaa pharaara raheko jaanakaari die
praharile sarlaahikaae laalabandi nagarapaalikaa lakhanadehi kholaabaata kilo awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaasahita janaalaai aitabaara diunso pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parneharumaa mahottari mahottari gaaunpaalikaa parsaa basne warsiya sunila yaadawa ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya raama prataapa yaadawa rahekaa chhan

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalapurabaata khatieko praharile ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita phelaa paari motarasaaikala chaalaka sunila ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara raamalaai pakraau gareko ho
agajanibaata byaakuholaadarako sabai bhaaga jalera nasta bhaeko ra skaabhetarako adhaa bhaaga jalepachhi niyantranamaa lieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya darawaanale janaaekaae chha
praharile kaathamaadaum ra kaaskikaae chhuttaachhuttai sthaanabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaum naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa bhimadhungaasthita dipakaraaja bhattaraaiko maasu pasalamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa dhaadina gajuri gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai haala naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya lilaa bahaadura taamaana lagaayata janaalaai nagada hajaara saya ra buka taasa sahita sanibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa bhaanumaargasthita prema bahaadura kaarkiko gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa sohi mahaanagarapaalikaa phulawaari basne warsiya chakra bahaadura guruna lagaayata janaalaai hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita sanibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha
wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamabajaarabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
praharile kapilawastukaae siwaraaja nagarapaalikaa rahatakolabaata laaguausadha charesasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa daana jillaa hasipura gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya ramatulamiyaa daangajillaa raaptigaaunpaalikaa lamtiyaa basne warsiya jitamaanamiyaa ra rolpaajillaa suna chhaahaari gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya japibudhaa rahekaa chhan
traaphika praharilaai nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojne ekajanaa pakraau parekaa chhan

darawaaramaargabaata diutimaa khatiekaa traaphika praharile sankaa laagi sawaarisaadhana chekajaancha garne kramamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala chaalaka prema naatha sedaaile laai pakraau gareko ho

kaagajapatra saathamaa naraakhi motarasaaikala chalaaeko awasthaamaa phelaa paari sedaailaai kaarawaahi garne kramamaa praharilaai ukta nagada dina khojepaschaata unalaai saniwaara traaphika praharile pakraau gareko ho

yasa sambandhamaa traaphika praharile awasyaka anusandhaanakaa laagi chaalaka ra sawaari saadhanasahita mahaanagariya prahari warittakaalimaatimaa bujhaaeko mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha

pakraau parnemaa jillaa kaabhrepalaanchokakaa mintu taamaana lalitapura saatadowaato basne maanakaaji laamaa raamechhaapa ghara bhai naagarjuna basne anisa kaarki baajuraa ghara bhai ekaantakunaa basne thumaraaja upaadhyaaya koteswara basne nirpa kaarki naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa kaa ujjwala adhikaari raamechhaapa ghara bhai lalitapura basne siwa khadkaa ra kaabhre ghara bhai swayambhu basne nisaana taamaana rahekaa chhan

praharile kaathamaadaunko dallubaata uniharulaai pakraau gari lukaaera raakhieko hajaara maaskasameta baraamada gareko chha uniharule ru paancha parne maaskalaai ru samma lieko paaieko mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaunkaa prahari naayaba upariksaka howindra bogatile jaanakaari die

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa prahari tyahaan pugeko thiyo uniharulaai kaalobajaari ainaanrtagata kaarawaahi garne praharile janaaeko chha praharile khaadyaanna ra ausadhijanyalagaayatakaa chija wastuharuko karitima abhaawa sarijanaa garne bhandaara gari lukaaune ra kaalobajaari garne gareko suchanaa bhae abara garna agraha gareko chha
praharile saptaribaata kartawya jyaana muddaakaa pharaara dui pratiwaadilaai pakraau garekaae chha
uniharulaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasari ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurabaata khatieko praharile sunasari inaruwaa nagarapaalikaa baata pakraau gareko ho
kaathamaadau jillaa adaalatale aneraaswawiyukaa nilambita kendriya sadasya indrahaana raailaai barsa mahinaa kaida sajaayako phaisalaa sunaaeko chha

jillaa adaalata kaathamaadaukaa nyaayaadhisa winodakumaara pokharelako ijalaasale dosi thahara gareko thiyo sohi anusaara bihibaara kaida sajaaya nirdhaarana gareko kaathamaadau jillaa adaalatakaa srestedaara anandaprasaada sresthale janaakaari die
praharile moranabaata bihemaa aekaa tina janaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai hatiyaarasahita pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaarata arariyaakaa warsiya ajayakumaara mandala warsiya anandakumaara mandala ra warsiya raakesakumaara saaha rahekaa chhan moranako sunawarsi nagarapaalikaa basne syaamasundara mandalakaa chhoraa babluko bihemaa aekaa tinai janaalaai prahari chauki siktibaata khatieko prahari tolile bihibaara raati pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa tinai janaa wiruddha haatahatiyaara kharakhajanaa muddaa chalaauna sukrabaara myaada thapa garera anusandhaana aghi badhaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
akhtiyaarale budhabaara ukta kaaryaalayamaa kaaryarata naayaba subbaa dora prasaada panthi ra lekhaapariksaka raamachandra sresthalaai hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa linedine kramamaa pakraau gareko ho

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa anusaara baimkina kasura ra kampanisambandhi wiwaadakaa muddaako chaapa chhan wigatamaa baimkina kasurakaa ghatanaa dherai thienan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa anusandhaana adhikarita raajana gautamale bhane tara pachhillaa warsamaa badhdai jaana thaalekaa chhan

arkaiko kaaunsila dartaa nambara raakhera subhalaksmi aspataala surkhetamaa aphno naamako saainaborda taansa gari biraamiko upachaaramaa sumlagna eka nakkali chikitsakalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetale ukta ghatanaamaa sumlagna dipendra kaaphlelaai pakraau gareko ho nepaala medikala kaaunsila baansabaariko yahi phaaguna gateko patra anusaara chhaanabina garna ra kendriya anusandhaana byuroko yahi phaaguna gateko awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi nirdesana anusaara kaaphlelaai pakraau garieko prahari naayaba upariksaka rawi raawalale jaanakaari die
