pakraau parnemaa bhaarata karnaatakaa barsiya abdula majida anekala rahekaa chhan kaathamaadaumbaata wiraganja jaandai gareko raatri basalaai purwapaschima raajamaargako hetaumdaa raatomaatemaa chekajaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara unalaai praharile mumgalabaara bihaana pakraau gareko haae
suna sahita pakraau parekaa majijalaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi sunasahita baaraako pathalaiyaasthita raajaswa anusandhaana kaaryaalaya pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha

lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaa saanepaamaa baa kha nambarako basa chekajaanchakaa kramamaa ghusa dina khojepachhi basakaa chaalaka wiradhana raai ra sahachaalaka nawina raailaai praharile somabaara pakraau gareko ho
kaarabaahibaata bachna traaphika praharilaai paanchasaya ghuusa dina khojepachhi uniharulaai niyantranamaa lii thapa awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile kaaski ra sirahaabaata awaidha laaguausadhasahita chaara janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa miyaapaatanabaata niyantrita laaguausadha daaijepaama empula nurphina empula phenaaragana empula ra thaana mobaaila sahita janaalaai somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa maadi gaaunpaalikaa bhagawatitaara ghara bhai pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa sisuwaa basne warsiyaa bimalaa nepaali ra unakai srimaana warsiya wisaala nepaali rahekaa chhan wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamabajaarabaata khatieko praharile ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya lahaanabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile thapa awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko janaaeko chha

banepaa nagarapaalikaa wadaa num ra maa hotala tathaa khaajaaghara sanchaalana gari bhitra yaunadhandaa sanchaalana gardai aeko ujurikaa adhaaramaa praharile chhaapaa maarne kramamaa so kriyaakalaapa bhaeko paaepachhi hotala sanchaalakalaai pakraau gari awasyaka kaarawaahi aghi badhaaieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaakaa prahari niriksaka yogendra timilsinaale bataae

unakaa anusaara pakraau parnemaa banepaa nagarapaalikaa widyut praadhikaranachokasthita hotala trisuli khaajaagharakaa sanchaalaka naresa timilsinaa ra wadaa num godaamachokasthita hotala sagaramaathaa enda gestahaausakaa sanchaalaka raaju bhanne raajiwa maanandhara rahekaa chhan

melamchi narapaalikaa ghara bhai haala banepaa maa basdai aekaa timilsinaale sanchaalana gareko hotalamaa ketisameta raakhera awaidha yaunadhandaa gariraheko bhanne suchanaakaa adhaaramaa praharile chhaapaa maardaa hotala sanchaalakasahita anya eka mahilaalaai niyantranamaa liera awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko praharile janaaeko chha

tyastai awaidha yaunadhandaa sanchaalana gareko aropamaa hotala sagaramaathaa enda gestahaausakaa sanchaalaka maanandharasahita anya dui mahilaalaai niyantranamaa lii anusandhaana gariraheko praharile janaaeko chha
maanandharasangai saajhedaarimaa raheko banepaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa chaandani bhanne manamaayaa taamaana bhane pharaara raheko praharile janaaeko chha

praharile tyasto dhandaamaa sumlagna hotala kariba jati raheko ra ti hotalalaai nigaraani gariraheko janaaeko chha bajaara ksetramaa keti jammaa gardai awaidha yaunadhandaa sanchaalana gareko paaiepachhi praharile anusandhaanakaaryalaai tiwra paareko chha
praharile gorakhaako sotibaata somabaara janaa chiniyaan naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parekaa sabailaai wisesa suraksaakaa saatha somabaara nai raajadhaani sthita adhyaagamana wibhaagamaa purayaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gorakhaale janaaekaae chha praharikaa anusaara haptaa dina agaadi nai uniharulaai awasyaka kaagajaata pesa garna bhanietaa pani pesa nagare pachhi pakraau garieko ho

pakraau parneharumaa kaathamaadaum sundhaaraa basne udayapura ghara bhaekaa warsiya biradhana raai ra sohi thaaun basne nawina raai rahekaa chhan ukta sthaanamaa khatieko praharile baa kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa ukta nagada dii praalobhanamaa paarne khoje paschaata ukta nagada sahita chaalaka biradhana ra sahachaalaka nawinalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile dhaadinakaae benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa maajhitaarasthita sadakabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa syaanajaa putalibajaara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya jona raanaa rahekaa chhan prahari chauki jogimaaraabaata khatieko praharile ga pa nambarako skutara jaancha garne kramamaa skutara chaalaka raanaalaai kariba kilo saya graama laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

unale jillaako suraksaa wyawasthaa majabuta paarieko prahari parichaalanalaai wyawasthita garieko hareka ksetramaa nigaraani badhaaeko praharilaai aparaadha nyunikaranasambandhi wibhinna taalima pradaana gariekaa kaarana aparaadhika ghatanaamaa kami aeko bataae raasasa
praharile dhanusaabaata netrabikrama chanda wiplawa netaritwako nekapaa nikata akhila kraantikaari siksaka sumghakaa kendriya upaadhyaksalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa mithilaa bihaari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya gaurinaaraayana mandala rahekaa chhan unalaai pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaako tolile aitabaara raati bajetira dhanusaa kai ganaesamaana chaaranaatha nagarapaalikaa sthita sukhawani kholaabaata pakraau gareko ho

jhandai tina mahinaaaghi dhanusaako ksireswaranaatha nagarapaalikaa mahendranagaramaa prahari niriksakasahita tina janaako jyaana jaane gari garaaieko bama bisphotamaa unako sumlagna raheko prahariko bhanaai chha
ukta hotelamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehibaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
uniharuko saathabaata nagada laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan bhaaratiya rupaiyaan hajaara thaana mobaaila wataa motarasaaikala ra wataa ato riksaa sameta praharile baraamada gareko chha
praharile saptariko tilaathi koilaadi banarajhulaasthita baandhabaata laaguausadha sahita dui yuwaalaai pakraau gareko chha
uniharuko saathabaata phenaaragana injeksana wataa tathaa daaijelepa ra lupinosika injeksana wataa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya saptarile janaaeko chha
jillaako manaraasisawaa nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa sahadewaprasaada yaadawamaathi aparichita wyaktile bihaana baje goli prahaara garekaa hun yaadawako chhaatimuni goli laageko chha
sauchaalaya gaekaa yaadawamaathi goli prahaara garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa diesapi maadhawa budhaathokile jaanakaari die
goli laagera ghaaite bhaekaa yaadawako janakapurako jaanaki keyara haspitalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

saniwaara diunso baje jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaabaata khatieko prahari tolile jhaapaako kachanakawala gaaunpaalikaa baata abaidha rupamaa nepaalabaata bhaarata tarpha saaikalamaa loda garera laijaandai gareko hariyo matara ra maricha gari laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako samaana baraamada gareko ho

yasaigari ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaakadabhittaabaata khatieko prahari tolile mechinagara nagarapaalikaa baata nepaalabaata bhaarata tarpha laijaandai gareko laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako lattaa kapadaa baraamada gareko chha

yasaigari jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaabaata saadaa posaakamaa khatieko prahari tolile mechinagara nagarapaalikaa baatai kariwa laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako supaadi ra hariyo matara baraamada gareko thiyo
abaidha rupamaa baraamada bhaeko samaana awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi ajai mechi bhansaara kaaryaalaya bujhaaine jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaeko chha
praharile moranako sundaraharaichaa nagarapaalikaa baata niyantrita laaguausadha braauna sugara sahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

sthaaniya rekhaa kumaari magarako gharamaa laaguausadha braauna sugara raheko bhanne gopya suchanaako adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya biraatachaukabaata khatieko prahari tolile barsiyaa rekhaa kumaari magara sahita sthaaniya barsiya saaphudina alamalaai graama laaguausadha braauna sugara sahita pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa duwai janaako sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belawaarile janaaeko chha

uniharulaai praharile sanibaara diusaae bhaktapurako pharakapharaka sthaanabaata pakraau garekaae haae pakraau parekaa bogati ra puna chanda samuhakaa bhaktapura jillaa sekretarisameta raheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

pakraau parekaa bogati yasaaghi chanda samuha bhaktapura jillaa sekretari rahekai belaamaa madhyapurathimi nagarapaalikaakaa pramukha madanasundara sresthalaai saanghaatika akramana gareko aropamaa pakraau parekaa thie

bhaktapurasthita pharakapharaka thaaunmaa sarakaarabaata chanda samuhakaa kaaryakartaale sankaaspada gatiwidhi garirahekaa chhan bhanne wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa khojatalaasa gari uniharulaai pakraau gariekaae praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

gharabaahira mahilaaharu bhelaa bhaeko dekhepachhi khatrile praharilaai khabara gare kehibera prahari prabhaaga bhaimsepaatikaa prahari khatriko gharamaa puge gharaagaadi mahilaa bhelaa bhaekaa thie niyantrana garna purusa prahari pani gaekaa thie
praharile mahilaaharulaai tyahaanbaata hataauna khojyo namaanepachhi bala prayoga garyo
wiraganja hundai bhaarata bhaagekaa unilaai chha warsapachhi makawaanapura praharile bhaaratabaatai pakraau garera lyaaeko thiyo
akramanabaata anuhaara tathaa sarirako anya bhaagamaa gambhira asara pugeko kumsaakaarale nepaala tathaa bhaaratakaa wibhinna aspataalamaa upachaara garaaundai airaheki chhan

suna lukaaeko aropamaa simaa prahari chauki timure rasuwakaa prahari niriksaka khema prasaada nepaalasameta janaa karmachaari nilambana garna akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale praharilaai siphaarisa gareko chha

simaa prahari chauki timurekaa prahari niriksaka khema prasaada nepaalasametale simaa prahari chauki timureko kaaryaalaya parisarabhitra kerunabaata nepaala audai gareko naa kha num ko kantenara chekajaancha garne kramamaa pusa gate chaalaka phurwaa paasaanako saathabaata graama suna lii chaalakalaai chhodekaa thie

nilambana siphaarisamaa parekaa prahari tapasilah prahari niriksaka khema prasaada nepaala prahari naayawa niriksaka bhoja bahaadura sena wali prahari sahaayaka niriksaka raamasarana kumaala prahari hawaldaara raamasarana rimaala prahari hawaldaara purusottama khatri prahari hawaldaara raamakaaji laamaa prahari hawaldaara gopi bahaadura lo taamaana prahari jawaana siwa naaraayana chaudhari prahari jawaana yuwaraaja kharela prahari jawaana bhawilaala rumbaa laamaa prahari jawaana raamachandra wika prahari jawaana ritaa chaudhari prahari jawaana manoja ale prahari jawaana chhekyu dolmaa moktaana prahari jawaana taaraa bahaadura prajaa hari bahaadura srestha
parsaa praharile srota nakhuleko laakha hajaara rupaiyaansahita chaara janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
srimati ra saalilaai kaastika sodaa prahaara garne eka yuwakalaai kaalimaati praharile pakraau gareko chha
gorakhaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai kaathamaadaum basne siwa ramtelalaai srimati sunitaa ra saali wimalaa nepaalimaathi kaastika sodaa prahaara gareko abhiyogamaa praharile pakraau gareko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya myaagdiko tolile laaguausadhasahita tinajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile uniharuko saathabaata pheneraagana empula naphina empula daaijaapaama empula laaguausadha baraamada garekaae chha laagaausadha ra tinaijanaalaai anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baagalunamaa bujhaaieko chha

kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatale eka janaalaai maatra dharautimaa chhaadne ra baanki janaalaai muddhaa purpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaana garne adesa gareko kaathamaadaun prahari parisarakaa prawaktaa hobindra bogatile jaanakaari die

pidita bhanieki yuwatile praharimaa khabara garekaa kaarana praharile chalaaeko kobharta aparesanamaa yo giroha pusa dosro saataa samaatieko thiyo uniharuko saathabaata nagada eka laakha baraabarako cheka dhaago kapadaa taantrika pujaa saamagri lagaayata baraamada bhaeko thiyo

tanahunko anbukhaireni gaaunpaalikaa karisnamandira basne warsiya raamabahaadura kaarkiko hatyaa abhiyogamaa maritakaki srimati pakraau pareki chhin pakraau parnemaa warsiyaa samjhanaa kaarki raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anbukhairenile janaaeko chha

pakraau pareki kaarkiwiruddha kartawya jyaana muddaamaa tanahun jillaa adaalatabaata aja myaada thapa garieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anbukhairenikaa prahari niriksaka buddhi suwedile jaanakaari die gata maagha gate bhaeko ghatanaamaa maritakaki srimatiko sumlagnataa dekhiepachhi unalaai phaaguna gate pakraau garieko thiyo

gata maagha gate bihaana raamabahaadura kaarki gharamai sutiraheko awasthaamaa marita awasthaamaa phelaa parekaa thie srimaan marita awasthaamaa phelaa parepachhi srimati samjhanaale nai praharimaa khabara gareki thiin

praharile aitabaara diunso kaankadabhittaabaata kaathamaandau aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara jhaapaa siwa sattaasi nagarapaalikaa wadaa num ghara hune barsa ki winaa daangilaai pakraau gareko haae
daangilaai tatkaala niyantranamaa lii laagu ausadha niyantranaaina bamojima awasyaka anusandhaana tathaa kaarabaahi bhairaheko chha
praharile kailaaliko basapaarkasthita achhaama hotalabaata khairo hiroinasahita paancha janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
uniharubaata miligraama laaguausadha khairo hiroina baraamada gari thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaekaae chha
aphni srimatisanga baabulaai apattijanaka awasthaamaa dekhepachhi risa thaamna nasaki hatyaa gareko abhiyuktale bayaanamaa bataaeko prahari upariksaka rawiraaja khadkaale jaanakaari diekaa chhan
raati baje baabuko hatyaa garepachhi raajakumaarale punah ghara aera kapadaa pherera gothamaa gaekaa thie unale bihaana baje baabuko hatyaa bhaeko bhandai gaaunle ra praharilaai khabara garekaa thie
pakraau parekaa pandita maathi anusandhaana bhairahekaae praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

praharile makawaanapurakaae gadhi gaaunpaalikaa anpataarasthita baato najikako kholsaamaa paatapatakarale chhopi lukaai chhipaai raakheko bharuwaa banduka thaana sukrabaara diunso phelaa paari baraamada gareko chha
prahari chauki chaughadaabaata khatieko praharile ukta banduka baraamada gari yasa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
praharile bardiyaakaae badhaiyaataala gaaunpaalikaa sitalaa bajaarabaata awaidha laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa geruwaa gaaunpaalikaa saantibajaara basne warsiya maana bahaadura thaakura rahekaa chhan ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mainaapokharabaata khatieko praharile graama saya miligraama awaidha laaguausadha braauna sugara sahita unilaai sanibaara raati pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parneharumaa sindhuli dudhauli nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala lalitapura lubhu basne warsiya arjuna adhikaari sohi thaaun ghara bhai kaathamaadaum kapana basne warsiya saantiraama danuwaara ra warsiya raajiwa thaneta danuwaara rahekaa chhan
mahaanagariya prahari waritta jagaatibaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai suryabinaayaka nagarapaalikaa katunjebaata sanibaara saanjha pakraau gareko ho
praharile parsaamorana jhaapaa ra makawaanapurakaae chhuttaachhuttai sthaanabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

prahari chauki ammarapattibaata khatieko praharile naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalako sitamuni lukaai chhipaai raakheko ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari chaalaka mahatolaai pakraau gareko ho
prahari chauki gachhiyaabaata khatieko praharile nija darjiko kothaa talaasi gardaa ukta parimaanako padaartha sahita phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

jhaapaa mechi nagarapaalikaa sthitabaata awaidha laaguausadha khairo heroina jasto dekhine padaartha graama sahita birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya manisa limbu ra taaplejuna mikwaakholaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya mukesa thalaanalaai bihibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

laaguausadha wyuro kaankadabhittaa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaankadabhittaabaata khatieko praharile bhaaratako paani tyaanakibaata nepaalatarpha aundai gareko me pa nambarako skutara jaancha garne kramamaa skutaramaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta parimaanako padaartha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa saktikholaasthita baatoko chheumaa raheko paraalako kunyumaa bewaarise awasthaamaa raheko awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji bihibaara raati praharile baraamada gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pasupatinagarabaata khatieko gasti praharile ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari baraamada gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
praharile jhaapaakaae damaka nagarapaalikaa baata katuwaa pestola eka thaana ra sohi pestolamaa prayoga hune dui thaana goli baraamada gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakabaata khatieko gasti prahari tolilaai dekhnaa saatha duijanaale pestola ra goli chhaadera bhaagekaa thie jholaa chhaadi pharaara bhaepachhi khoji gardaa hatiyaara ra goli phelaa pareko praharile janaaeko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako tolile bherigumgaa nagarapaalikaa surkhetamaa kaaryarata khaanepaani tathaa sarasaphaai teknisiyanalaai laakha ghusasahita pakraau garekaae chha

kesile bherigumgaa nagarapaalikaa sthita tallo baraahasthita jholunge pula nirmaana kaarya sampanna pachhi bhuktaanimaa sahajikarana garidine bhandai sewaagraahisanga ghusa liekaae abhiyaaegamaa akhtiyaarale teknisiyana chitrabahaadura kesilaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile jhaapaabaata juwaa taasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa saamudaayika widyaalayakaa pradhaanaadhyaapakasahita atha janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

sthaaniyawaasile dieko jaanakaarikaa adhaaramaa uniharulaai bihibaara raati ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhilajhilebaata gaeko prahari tolile pakraau gareko ho juwaa khaalabaata praharile ru hajaara ra saata mobaaila baraamada gareko chha

paschima nawalaparaasisthita simaa prahari chauki mahesapurabaata khatieko tolile maaiti nepaala ra bhaaratiya prahariko sahayogamaa bhaaratako mahaaraajaganja jillaako katari roda kamtaabajaarabaata uniharulaai sakusala uddhaara gareko ho

aphnaa chhorilaai bandhaka banaai raakhiekaale uddhaara garidinu bhanne yuwatiki amaako ujurikaa adhaaramaa uniharulaai uddhaara gari aphantako jimmaa lagaaieko ra ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana pani chaliraheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paschima nawalaparaasile janaaekaae chha yuwati laijaane raai tharaki mahilaa ra anya sumlagnaharuko khoji bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya golabajaarabaata khatieko tolile gae raati golabajaara nagarapaalikaa baata kariba ru eka laakha hajaara mulya baraabarako kariba dui hajaara awaidha challaasahitako traka niyantranamaa lieko ho

cha nambarako mini trakabaata challaa lyaairaheko gopya suchanaako adhaaramaa so trakalaai niyantranamaa liieko ra awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi jillaa bhansaara kaaryaalaya pathaauna laagieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka winoda ghimirele jaanakaari die
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya lahaanabaata khatieko prahari tolile eka hajaara tayaari madiraa nasta gareko prahari niriksaka sumita kusawaahaale jaanakaari die
praharile jhaapaako mechinagara nagarapaalikaa tikaapurabaata niyantrita laaguausadha braauna sugara sahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa mechinagara nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya hiraalaala raajawumsi rahekaa chhan unalaai bisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhulaawaaribaata budhawaara saanjha graama braauna sugara sahita pakraau gareko ho
bihaana ago laagiraheko awasthaamaa sthaaniyale dekhe pachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie tyasa pachhi sthaaniya ra praharile ago niyantranaamaa liekaa thie
tyastai adarsa gaaunpaalikaa kaandisyaaulemaa raheko antinentala tredina intarapraaijeja kaathamaadaumko baa ka nambarako dojaramaa budhabaara raati ajnaata samuhale agajani gareko haae
chandraagiri nagarapaalikaakaa pramukha prasaasakiya adhikarita yuwaraaja paudelawiruddha ghusa muddaa daayara garieko chha
praharile jhaapaako mechinagara nagarapaalikaa mechikholaa najikabaata chaandi ra taamaakaa saamaana sahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile baraamada bhaeko saamagrilaai awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi mechi bhansaara kaaryaalaya kaankarabhittaa bujhaaieko chha
jalasrota tathaa sinchaai wikaasa dibhijana kaaryaalaya paatana baitadikaa nimitta kaaryaalaya pramukha sameta rahekaa injiniyara suresaraaja bhatta ghusa rakamasahita pakraau parekaa hun

chameliyaa nadi niyantrana tathaa tatabandha ayojanaa upabhoktaa samitibaata ghusa maagdai gareko awasthaamaa unalaai aja bihaanai kaaryaalayabaatai rumgehaata pakraau garieko akhtiyaale janaaekaae chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana kaaryaalaya kanchanapurabaata khatieko prahari niriksaka netaritwako tolile pakraau gareko ho

dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana dharaanako kampaaundabhitra raheko dilli pablika skulako getamaa bama wisphota gareko aropamaa ekajanaa pakraau garekaa chhan
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanabaata khatieko praharile unalaai dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa baragaachhi chokabaata pakraau gareko ho bhadau maa skulako getamaa wisphota garaaieko thiyo
praharile baaraabaata sarakaari chhaapa dastakhata kirte gareko aropamaa janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

jitapurasimaraa upamahaanaagarapaalikaa sthitamaa raheko kittaa nambara bhaeko dhura jaggaako kirte jaggaa dhani purjaa banaai bikri witarana garna laageko bhanne suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
yasaigari sarakaari chhaapa dastakhata kirte gareko abhiyogamaa janaalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraabaata khatieko praharile gata maagha gate pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa baaraa mahaagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya wohaawa ansaari baaraa kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya prahalaada prasaada regmi kailaali godaawari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya chandra bahaadura simha ra pyuthaana khaala ghara bhai daana ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya hasta bahaadura nepaali rahekaa chhan

uniharule baaraa jitapurasimaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita kittaa nambara ksetraphala ko nepaala sarakaarako naamamaa raheko jaggaako wiwaadita jaggaako sambandhamaa puna nirnaya garna bhani maalapota kaaryaalaya baaraako naamamaa mumsira gateko sarwochcha adaalatako adesalaai todamoda gari galata manasaayale sarwochcha adaalatako letarapyaata banaai kirte gari saala mumsira gate maalapota kaaryaalaya simaraa baaraalaai adhikarita waaresanaamaa wohaawa ansaariko naamamaa niwedana dartaa gareko anusandhaanabaata khulna aeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaeko chha
pakraau wyaktiharu upara sarakaari chhaapa dastakhata kirte muddaamaa awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaeko chha
tanahunko suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa narsaribaata pestolasahita pakraau parekaa chaaramadhye tina janaalaai jillaa adaalata tanahunle kaida phaisalaa gareko chha
wyakti hatyaalagaayatakaa darjanaum aparaadhamaa sumlagna taraai janataantrika mukti morchaakaa purwanetaa kaameswara patela kurmilaai praharile goli haanera niyantranamaa lieko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahata ra baaraabaata khatieko sumyukta prahari tolile gaeraati baje chandrapura nagarapaalikaa sthita jagalasahiyaabaata kurmilaai niyantranamaa lieko ho

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatakaa anusaara kurmiko waayaan khuttaamaa dui raaunda goli laageko chha ghaaite kurmilaai upachaarakaa laagi chandrapura praali aspataalamaa lagieko praharile janaaeko chha

embusa thaapera basirahekaa kurmile praharimaathi goli chalaaepachhi atmaraksaakaa laagi chaara raaunda goli chalaaieko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha praharile unako saathabaata eka thaana nalakatuwaa pestola ra tyasamaa laagne raaunda goli sameta baraamada gareko chha
chhimekilaai dhaarilo hatiyaara chhuraa prahaara gari ghaaite banaaeko abhiyogamaa praharile jhaapaabaata eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa jillaakaae kamala gaaunpaalikaa paanadaandaa basne warsiya raaju bika rahekaa chhan maadaka padaartha sewana gari chhimeki warsiya mahendra darjilaai bikale chhuraa prahaara gardaa ghaaite bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakabaata khatieko praharile unalaai somabaara raati pakraau gareko ho
ghaaite darjiko edabhaansa aspataala hundai thapa upachaarako laagi nyuro aspataala wiraatanagara pathaaieko chha yasa sambandhamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

praharile sumkhuwaasabhaako chainapura nagaraapalikaa baata pratibandhita netra wikrama chanda wiplawa netaritwako nekapaakaa janaa kaaryakartaalaai bama ra wisphotaka padaarthasahita pakraau garekaae chha

prahariko gasti tolile chainapura dobhaanekaa agni bhanine santosa taamaanasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko haae pakraau parekaa anya janaako naama bhane praharile saarwajanika gareko chhaina pakraau parekaa raai nekapaa wiplawa samuhakaa jillaa sadasya raheko praharile janaaeko chha

praharile jillaakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa agajani tathaa bama wisphotana gari pharaara rahekaako khojatalaasa garne kramamaa uniharulaai pakraau gareko haae praharile uniharulaai pakraau garne kramamaa hawaai phaairasameta gareko thiyo
pakraau parekaalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sumkhuwaasabhaako hiraasatamaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha praharile gata gate pakraau gareko bhae pani aja maatra saarwajanika gareko ho
mahaanagariya prahari waritta simhadarabaaramaa kaaryarata nepaala praharikaa prahari niriksaka insapektara wikrama suwedile prahari jawaana balabahaadura wiswakarmaalaai kutapita garekaa chhan
bahuwiwaaha muddaakaa pharaara pratiwaadilaai dhaadina praharile warsapachhi pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinako pharaara pratiwaadi pakraau abhiyaanaantargata bahuwiwaaha muddaakaa pharaara pratiwaadi aryaalalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinale janaaekaae chha
aryaalalaai dhaadina jillaa adaalatamaarphata kaida bhuktaanako laagi jillaa kaaraagaara pathaaieko chha

sthaaniya akaasa timsinaako gharabaata laaguausadha bechabikhana bhairaheko bhanne bisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamapura thoksilaabaata khatieko prahari tolile gharadhani barsiya akaasa timsinaa sahita beltaara nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya bikaasa basneta ra dharaana kaa barsiya pranaya niraulaalaai pakraau gareko ho
laamaalaai haala mahaanagariya prahari prahari waritta mahaaraajaganjamaa raakhieko praharile janaaeko chha
netrawikrama chanda wiplawa nekapaakaa prawaktaa khadgabahaadura wiswakarmaa prakaanda kaa chhoraa pakraau parekaa chhan

abhadra wyawahaarasambandhi muddhaa chitawana adaalatale khaareja garesangai chhutekaa lohanilaai praharile punah pakraau gareko haae aitabaara chitawana jillaa adaalatakaa nyaayaadhisa prakaasakumaara adhikaariko ijalaasale lohanimaathi lagaaieko abhadra wyawahaarako muddhaa khaareja garne phaisalaa sunaaeko thiyo

tara praharile unalaai pakraau gari abhadra wyawahaarasambandhi kasurako muddaa chalaaeko thiyo yasaaghi kaattika gate pakraau parekaa lohani dina hiraasatamaa basera jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayabaata paancha hajaara rupaiyaan dharautimaa rihaa bhaekaa thie
praharile makawaanapurabaata kaaramaa lukaaera taskari garna laagieko kilo gaanjaasahita eka janaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaarata paschima champaarana betiyaa gaurikotakaa warsiya bhagawaana yaadawa rahekaa chhan unalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya newaarapaani makawaanapurabaata khatieko tolile kilo gaanjaasahita hetaudaa baata pakraau gareko ho
praharile kaathamaadaum ra lalitapurakaa chhuttaachhuttai sthaanabaata juwaadelaai pakraau garekaae chha
praharile netrawikrama chanda samuhakaa sindhupaalchoka jillaa sekretari bhuwanasimha taamaanalaai pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhulikhelako gasti tolile dhulikhela nagarapaalikaa saraswati bajaarabaata sukrabaara belukaa pakraau gareko ho

saraswati bajaaramaa sankaaspada rupamaa phelaa paareko ra sodhapuchhako kramamaa hohallaa gari sthaaniyabaasindaalaai asara parne gari apasabda prayoga gardai gastimaa khatiekaa praharimaathi abhadra byawahaara garepachhi pakraau gariekaa taamaana chanda samuhakaa jillaa sekretari bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
melamchi nagarapaalikaa kaa taamaanalaai abhadra byawahaaraantargata kaarawaahi hune jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrepalaanchokale janaaeko chha

pakraau parnemaa sanakaaji darji winoda bhattaraai wisnau thaapaa narendra pomu asoka pomu kamala kaaraakheti somabahaadura taamaanalalagaayata chhan niyantranamaa rahekaa saanukaaji jabarajasti karanaikaa pharaara abhiyukta hun
gomgabu nayaan basapaarka ksetrabhitra hune anaadhikarita kaarya rokna praharile pachhillo pataka suddhikarana abhiyaana chalaaeko chha jasaantargata yasaaghi darjanaum pakraau parisakekaa chhan
praharile kaathamaadaumko wasundharaamaa gata maagha gate bihaana maaruti bhyaanako chaalakamaathi chhuraa prahaara gari pharaara rahekaa janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
jillaakaae siwasataaksi nagarapaalikaa dudhekaa warsiya bhimabahaadura thataalale bancharoko widale hirkaaera warsaki chhori rekhaa thataala limbuko hatyaa garekaa hun

bubaako kutapitabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki rekhaakaae birtaamodasthita wirtaa siti haspitalamaa upachaarako kramamaa sukrabaara wihaana marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhilajhilele janaaeko chha
chhorimaathi kutapita garne bhimabahaaduralaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhilajhilele niyantranamaa raakheko chha
praharile jhaapaa ra ilaamako simaa ksetrabaata laakha rupaiyaan baraabarako awaidha kapadaa jhaapaa ra ilaamako simaa ksetrabaata baraamada gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale bihibaara bihaana mechinagara dhaaijanabaata awaidha rupamaa bhansaara chhali me ja nambarako bolero pikaapa bhyaanamaa lukaaichhipaai lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaabaata awaidha kapadaa baraamada gareko ho
pakraau parekaa chaalaka ra gaadilaai awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi praharile ksetriya raajaswa kaaryaalaya itahari bujhaaeko chha
praharile sarlaahikaae iswarapura nagarapaalikaa srinagarabaata budhabaara diunso thulo parimaanamaa laaguausadhasahita chaara janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa mahottariko bardibaasa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsakaa khagendra mahato bardibaasa kaa warsakaa sujita magara bardibaasa kaa warsakaa saroja balampaaki magara ra bardibaasa kaa warsakaa dilabahaadura magara rahekaa chhan

praharile bihibaara diunso kariba saya graamasahita bhaktapura madhyapura thimi nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaum gausaalaa basne warsiya nuchchhelaala khadgi lagaayata janaalaai pakraau gareko haae

pakraau parneharumaa buddhasaanti gaaunpaalikaa basneharu warsiya mugaadhana raai ra warsiya tikaa kaambaana limbu rahekaa chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaako samanwayamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamabaata khatieko praharile ilaama jillaamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

pakraau duwai janaalaai jillaa adaalata jhaapaamaa daakhilaa garekomaa sohi adaalatako adesale jillaa kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya chandragadhi jhaapaa pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaeko chha

dhanusaa jillaa adalatako adesamaa tipara chaalaka munindra mahato lodara chaalaka ranjita bhanine jitendra mahato ra krasara sanchaalaka wipina mahatolaai purpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaanako adesa diepachhi jela chalaana garieko ho

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale dibhijana wana kaaryaalayanawalaparaasi sustaapurwa maa kaaryarata sahaayaka wana adhikarita ra sohi kaaryaalayakaa kaaryaalaya sahayogilaai bihibaara laakha ghusasahita pakraau gareko chha

sahaayaka wana adhikarita karisna bahaadura dewakotaa ra kaaryaalaya sahayogi pramoda kumaara telile tendarako kaatha uthaae baapata sewaagraahisanga patakapataka ghusa maaga gariraheko bhanne ujuri ewum suchanaako adhaaramaa akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako kaaryaalaya butawalabaata khatieko tolile niyantranamaa lieko ho

akhtiyaarakaa anusaara uniharulaai dui laakha ghusa liisakeko abasthaamaa ukta rakamasahita jillaa nawalaparaasi wardaghaata sustaa purwa kaawaasoti nagarapaalikaa wadaa num sthita dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya nawalapurabaata niyantranamaa lii anusandhaana bhairaheko chha

praharile baaraakaae kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa matiarwaa tolabaata niyantrita laaguausadha nurphina saya empula phenaaragana saya empula ra daaijepaama saya empula sahita janaalaai budhabaara saanjha pakraau gareko chha
dhanusaako mahendranagaramaa eka prahari niriksakasahita janaako jyaana jaane gari bhaeko bama wisphotakaae ghatanaakaa mukhya aropimadhyekaa janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa netrabikrama chandawiplawa samuhakaa pradesa byuro sadasya indalaprasaada saaha rahekaa chhan praharile unalaai saptariko surungaa nagarapaalikaa sripuramaa eka wyaktiko gharamaa chandaa maagdai gareko awasthaamaa pakraau gareko ho

dhanusaako ksireswaranaatha nagarapaalikaa sthita raajesa saahako nawanirmita gharamaa mumsira gate wisphota hundaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahendranagarakaa inchaarja prahari niriksaka amira daahaala ausadhi wyawasaayi warsakaa raajeswara saaha ra unakaa chhoraa andaaji warsakaa ananda saahako marityu bhaeko thiyo
bama wisphotako ghatanaamaa sumlagna raheko aropamaa dhanusaa praharile ahilesamma adama raaisahita janaalaai pakraau garisakeko chha

madhyapura thimi nagarapaalikaa chaaradobaatobaatasindhupaalchoka yamunaa daandaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsa kaa raamakumaara khadkaa bhaktapurako suryawinaayaka nagarapaalikaa katunje basne warsa kaa raadhe magraati ra kaabhrepalaanchoka namobuddha nagarapaalikaa basne warsa kaa suresa bhujelalaai pakraau gareko janaaeko chha
uniharu sabailaai jillaa adaalata bhaktapuramaa pesa gari laaguausadha sambandhi kasura muddaamaa myaada thapa gari anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaieko chha
praharile saptaribaata kartawya jyaana jyaana maarne udyoga bisphotaka padaarthasambandhi kasura ra sumgathita aparaadha muddaamaa pharaara eka abhiyuktalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa dhanusaa dhanusaadhaama nagarapaalikaa saraswatipurakaa warsiya indala saaha rahekaa chhan unalaai surungaa nagarapaalikaa sripura basne eka wyaktiko gharamaa chandaa maagdai gareko awasthaamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kadarabonaabaata khatieko praharile niyantranamaa lieko ho
praharile gae raati moranako biraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa aitawaarebaata laaguausadha sahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
pakraau parnemaa itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya jnaanendra chaudhari rahekaa chhan unalaai wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya ka biraatanagarabaata khatieko prahari tolile pakraau gareko ho
praharile chaudhariko saathabaata praharile naaitraabheta tyaableta chakki ebhila empula daaijipaama empula lupujesika empula phenaaragana empula ra khaali sirinja thaana baraamada gareko chha

saptariko bodebarsaaina nagarapaalikaa khadgapura amaraiyaakaa warsiya dambara yaadawako bhaaratamaa goli prahaara gari hatyaa bhaekaae haae kaamako silasilaamaa bhaaratako jhanjhaarapura gaera skaarpiyomaarphata pharkandai gardaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara ajnaata samuhale goli prahaara gari yaadawako hatyaa garekaa hun
ghatanaabaare thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarile janaaeko chha

laamaale kaathamaadaum tokhaa saamaakhusi ra nuwaakota jillaalaai adhaara banaai gundaagardi garne garekaae praharile janaaekaae chha laamaamaathi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha

laamaa pahilenai haatahatiyaara kharakhajaanaa muddaamaa saalamaa prahari barita baalaaju ra saalamaa jyaana maarne udyoga antaragata prahari barita mahaaraajaganjale muddaa chalaai sajaaya paaisasakekaaabhiyuktahun
praharile syaanjaakaae harinaasa gaaunpaalikaa gairaa kholaa basne warsiya naaraayana maanandharalaai thaana pestola sahita mumgalabaara diunso pakraau gareko chha
bisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya chisaapaanibaata khatieko praharile maanandharako gharamaa ukta pestola phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
wibhinna kisimakaa pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anbu khairenile budhabaara dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
chhimekiko hatyaa gareko abhiyomaa praharile dhanakutaabaata eka janaalaai somaabaara bihaana pakraau gareko chha
agulto prahaarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki raaikaae upachaarakaae kramamaa jillaa aspataala dhanakutaamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanakutaale janaaekaae chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko prahari taaelile nirmalaalaai pakraau gari ghatanaakaae sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
praharile kaathamaadaumko taarakeswara nagarapaalikaa guhyeswaribaata chituwaako chhaalaa ra bhaaluko pittasahita duijanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
pakraau parnemaa nuwaakota belabuta nagarapaalikaa majuwaakaa warsiya wikaasa taamaana ra nuwaakota kakani gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya suwaasa laamaa chhan

pakraau parnemaa rolpaa ghara bhai haala tanahunko bandipura gaaunpaalikaa basne purnajita puna rahekaa chhan punalaai myaagde gaaunpaalikaa jaamunebaata aja pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaekaae chha
praharile wiplawa nikata widyaarthi sangathanakaa netaa parwata sedhaainlaai pani pakraau gareko chha pakraau parekaawiruddha anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile kailaalibaata nakkali prahari banera paisaa asula garne tinajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa bajhaana khaptada chhaannaa gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai haala dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa manaheraa basne warsiya sanama bhandaari dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa hasanapura basne warsiya gaurawa hamaala ra kanchanapura punarwaasa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai dhanagadhi upa mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya kisana sijaapati rahekaa chhan
praharikaa anusaara sarmaalaai bhaaratiya nambarako motarasaaikala choriko ho haami jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata aekaa haum motarasaaikala laijaanchhaum bhani dhamkaai saya rupaiyaan lagekaa thie
sarmaakai ujurikaa adhaaramaa uniharulaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaeko chha

ago lagaai bhaagne ajnaata wyaktiko khoji gari kadaabhandaa kadaa kaarawaahi garine praharile janaaekaae chha tinadina aghi tyahi sthaanamaa rokiraakhieko sthaaniya wyaktiko skutaramaa pani chakkule sita tathaa agaadiko bhaagamaa kaatidieko praharile janaaekaae chha
praharile makawaanapurakaae raaksiraana gaaunpaalikaa parewaabhirabaata somabaara saanjha kariba kilo laaguausadha gaanjaa baraamada gareko chha

ukta bhirabaata manaharitarpha airahekaa janaale prahari chauki chainapurabaata khatieko praharilaai dekhnaasaatha jholaa phaali bhaagekaale jholaamaa raakheko ukta gaanjaa praharile phelaa paari baraamada gareko ho
praharile dolpaabaata wibhinna haatahatiyaarasahita ekajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa thulibheri nagarapaalikaa tiplaakaa warsiya khadkabahaadura rokaayaa rahekaa chhan unako saathabaata praharile goli bhareko bharuwaa banduka thaana chakku thaana baaruda graama paaso thaana kepha thaana ra sisaakaa chharraa thaana baraamada gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dolpaabaata khatieko praharile jaanchakaa kramamaa ukta hatiyaarasahita unalaai pakraau gareko ho

jillaakaae durgaabhagawati gaaunpaalikaa parsaa gaaunkaa warsiya phekana panditako hatyaa bhaeko ho hatyaa kasale garyo bhannebaare thaahaa huna nasakekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatale janaaekaae chha
pandita raati khaanaa khaaera gharabaata eka kilomitara taadhaa gothamaa sutna gaekaa thie bihaana pariwaarakaa sadasya pugdaa unako sawa dekhepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie
sawa postamaartamakaa laagi jillaa aspataala gaura lagieko chha
tanahunko bhaanu nagarapaalikaakaa injiniyara sukadewa adhikaari ra wadaa num kaa sadasya karisnabahaadura adhikaari somabaara ghusasahita pakraau parekaa chhan
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayoga ksetriya kaaryaalaya pokharaabaata khatieko tolile injiniyara adhikaari ra wadaasadasya adhikaarilaai ru hajaara ghusasahita pakraau gareko ho

haala ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaankadabhittaako niyantranamaa rahekaa miyaanle taalimamaa oriyansako ausadhi khaaera aphno naatedaarako arbudaroga niko bhaeko netawarkinamaa laagera karoda kamaaeko widesa bhramana gareko mahango lyaapatapa mobaaila ra kaara bhaeko gariba bubaaamaalaai gharamaa mahinaipichchhe laakhaun rakama kamaaera pathaauna thaaleko amaabuwaalaai liera wiswabhramanako yojanaa banaairaheko nepaala sarakaarale kehi dinabhitrai oriyansalaai khulaa garna laageko jastaa udante kuraa garera sadasya phasaauna sikaaune gareko bataae

ausadhi japhata mechi bhansaara kaaryaalaya kaankadabhittaakaa pramukha dhruwaraaja wiswakarmaale nepaalamaa pratibindhata saamaana bhaeko hundaa naakaabaata lyaaine oriyansakaa ausadhijasto dekhine phuda saplimentakaa saamaana japhata garna thaalieko jaanakaari die ausadhi wyawasthaa wibhaagako swikaritibegara kunai pani ausadhijanya wastu ayaata waa osaarapasaara garna paaindaina bhansaara pramukha wiswakarmaale oriyansakaa saamaana lyaauna napaaine bataaundai bhane meri amaa biraami hunuhunchha ma aphain biraami bhaera yahi dabaai khaandaichhu bhanne bahaanaa garera katipayale oriyansakaa saamaana naakaabaata chhiraauna khojdaa rahechhan tyasalaai haamile rokekaa chhaumn

mechi bhansaara kaaryaalayale chaalu arthika warsa ko mahinaamaa laakha hajaara mulya baraabarakaa oriyansakaa saamaana japhata gareko chha bhansaara pramukha wiswakarmaakaa anusaara oriyansa thagi dhandhaa bhaeko hundaa yasalaai rokna naakaamaa nigaraani badhaaieko chha

naakaamaa oriyansakaa pratibindhata ausadhi bhitrina nadina suraksaa nikaaya sakriya banekaa chhan gata mahinaamaa japhata oriyansakaa ausadhimadhye adhaajati saamaana sasastra prahari balako bhansaara raajaswa gulma eklaile baraamada gareko ho gulmakaa sasastra prahari naayaba upariksaka jnaanamanai paudelale so awadhimaa laakha hajaara mulya baraabarako oriyansakaa pratibandhita ausadhi baraamada garera bhansaara bujhaaieko jaanakaari die so awadhimaa nepaala praharile laakha hajaara bhansaara kaaryaalaya aphainle laakha hajaara ra sasastra praharile hajaara mulyabaraabarako oriyansakaa saamaana baraamada garera bhansaara daakhilaa garekaa thie

naakaa waaripaari darjanaum hostala abhibhaawakalaai jhukyaaera aekaa nepaali yuwakayuwatilaai kaankadabhittaa naakaa kataaera bhaaratako puryaaunuaghi oriyansakaa ejentale jhaapaako birtaamoda chaaraali dhulaabaari ra kaankadabhittaa waraparakaa kehi ghara bhaadaamaa liera raakhne garekaa chhan ti gharalaai uniharu hostela bhanchhan hostelamaa uniharulaai ejentale baahiri samparkabaata alaga gardai bandhaka banaaune garekaa chhan

mechinagara nagarapaalikaa ra buddhasaanti gaaunpaalikaako simaamaa parne dhaaijanamaa eka bhutapurwa bhaaratiya sainikako duitale pakki gharamaa oriyansakaa ejentale paschima nepaalabaata aune yuwakayuwatikaa laagi gata warsa abaidha hostela sanchaalana garekaa thie pandhradekhi warsasammakaa yuwatilaai so gharamaa yuwakasangai raakhieko thiyo eutaa kothaamaa janaasammalaai kochera raakhne garieko thiyo netrawikrama chandakaa kaaryakartaale seltara banaaeko hallaa bhaepachhi praharile sodhapuchha gareko hundaa ejentale hostela anyatrai saarekaa thie

pakraau parnemaa pokharaa riththepaanikaa warsiya jitu saahi rahekaa chhan yati earako udaanabaata kaathamaadaum jaana laagekaa saahile bokeko jholaalaai eksare mesinale chekajaancha gardaa bioara raaiphalamaa prayoga hune raaunda goli phelaa pareko praharile janaaekaae chha
jhaapaako paschima daksinai bhaaratiya simaawarti ksetra gauriganjabaata praharile thulo parinaamamaa surti baraamada gareko chha

gauriganja korobaari kunjibaari mahaabhaaraa siwaganja jhaapaa bajaaralagaayata jillaakaa paschima daksina bhaaratiya naakaasanga jodine ksetramaa bhaaratabaata awaidha rupamaa bhaari maatraamaa surtiko osaaraposaara hune gareko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa praharile simaawarti ksetramaa kadaai garekaae chha
baraamada garieko surti chhoti bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile kaathamaadaumsirahaa ra lalitapurakaae wibhinna sthaanabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau garekaae chha

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa baaneswara omasaanti choka deraa gari basne gorakhaa deuraali gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya phula bahaadura gurunako kothaamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita guruna lagaayata janaalaai sanibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

sirahaa mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaa kataari chokasthita yunika photokapi pasalamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa sohi sthaana basne warsiya naresa jhaa lagaayata janaalaai nagada hajaara saya nepaali rupaiyaan tathaa hajaara bhaaratiya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita sanibaara belukaa praharile pakraau gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mirchaiyaabaata khatieko praharile juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

lalitapura lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaa badhigraama deraa gari basne sunasari dharaana ghara bhaeki warsiya taaraa kumaari kaarkiko gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa kaarki lagaayata janaalaai nagada laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita sanibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
praharile sirahaakaae laahaana nagarapaalikaa baata awaidha rupamaa bokera hindeko chaandikaa gahanaa sahita janaa laai sanibaara saanjha pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parneharumaa morana pathari sanischare nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sumana bika ra jhaapaa siwasataasi nagarapaalikaa jhilajhile basne warsiya dala bahaadura bika rahekaa chhan praharile uniharukaae saathabaata kilo saya graama miligraama baraabarako chaandikaa wibhinna gahanaa baraamada garekaae chha
bisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya lahaanabaata khatieko praharile ukta gahanaaharu sahita phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

swaasthya mantraalayale dieko embulensamaa gaanjaa taskari hune gareko paaieko chha praharile hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaabaata kilo graama gaanjaa ra embulensasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

sanibaara saanjha praharile wadaa nambara baata mantraalayale swaasthya chauki dumariyaa rautahatalaai dieko baa jha nambarako embulensabaata ukta parimaanako gaanjaasahita embulensa chaalaka dumariyaa nagarapaalikaa kaa mohammada khalida dumariyaa kaa asoka kumaara ra bhaarata bihaara motihaarikaa winoda sahanilaai pakraau garekaae chha

sirahaako aurahi gaaunpaalikaa aurahimaa sukrabaara raati khaanaa pakaaundai gardaa warsiyaa anitaadewi yaadawalaai unako pati winoda yaadawale jalaaera hatyaa gareko maaiti paksako aropa lagaaekaa chhan

agole jalera gambhira ghaaite bhaeki anitaadewilaai wiraatanagara hundai kaathamaadaum lagieko thiyo upachaarakai kramamaa anitaadewiko aja bihaana marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaale janaaeko chha
jaajarakota junichaande gaaunpaalikaa adhyaksa karisna bahaadura kesilaai laakha ghusasahita akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako surkheta kaaryaalayako tolile rumgehaata pakraau gareko ho

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogakaae taaelile nepaala widyuta praadhikaranako kuleswara kaathamaadau widyuta witarana kendramaa jyaalaadaarimaa kaaryarata dui janaa karmachaarilaai hajaara rupaiyaan ghusasahita pakraau garekaae chha

bijuliko pola raakhidine bisayamaa sewaagraahisanga lieko hajaara ghusasahita jyaalaadaarimaa kaaryarata karmachaari karisna muraari chaudhari ra bijuliko pola gaadne kaama garne purusottama daahaalaai akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayoga tumgaalabaata khatieko tolile pakraau garekaae haae

punahnirmaana praadhikaranaantargata bhojapura nagarapaalikaamaa kaaryarata sabainjiniyara prakaasa tiwaari ghusa lindai gardaa akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale rangehaata pakraau gareko janaaeko chha injiniyara tiwaarilaai aja ru chha hajaara ghusasahita bhojapurako pradhaana hotalabaata pakraau garieko bataaieko chha

pakraau parnemaa sunasari jhumkaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsa ko maadhaba chaudhari rahekaa chhana praharile sukrabaara wihaana jhaapaabaata kaathamaandau audai gareko naa kha nambarako basalaai naagadhumgaamaa chekajaancha garne kramamaa chaudharile kaalo jholaamaa lukaai chhipaai lyaaeko naaitraabheta tyaabaleta laagu ausadha baraamada gareko chha
pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita sirahaa praharile jillaako chhuttaachhutai sthaanabaata chaara janaa yuwakalaai pakraau gareko chha

prahari chauki thaadi sirahaabaata khatieko gasti tolile sirahaako bhagawaanapura gaaunpaalikaa baata laaguausadhasahita aja jillaako nawaraajapura gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya upendrakumaara yaadawa ra bhagawaanapura gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya arunakumaara yaadawalaai pakraau gareko ho

bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai gareko sapa numko motarasaaikalalaai jaancha garne kramamaa laaguausadha daaileksa disi saata botala ra naaitraabheta pisa baraamada bhaepachhi motarasaaikalamaa sawaara duwai janaalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaale janaaeko chha

yastai sirahaako dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa baata pratibandhita laaguausadha gaanjaasahita jillaako wisnaupura gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya sunilakumaara paasawaana ra dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya mahendra saahalaai pakraau gareko chha

plaastikako jholaamaa pyaaketa banaaera gaanjaa taskari bhairaheko gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaabaata khatieko saadaa posaakako tolile saadhe kilo laaguausadha gaanjaasahita duwai janaalaai pakraau gareko ho

plaastikakaa boraamaa pyaaketa banaaera sapa numko motarasaaikalamaa lukaaichhipaai lyaairaheko awasthaamaa duwai janaalaai pakraau garieko sirahaakaa prahari upariksaka umaaprasaada chaturwedile jaanakaari dinubhayo

tyastai lenadena bigo muddaamaa jillaa adaalata sirahaabaata sajaaya paaera pharaara sirahaako bariyaarapatti gaaunpaalikaa kajaraa niwaasi warsiya wechanaprasaada yaadawalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

mahaalaksmi nagarapaalikaa imaadola deraa gari basne jhaapaa parithwinagara ghara bhaekaa warsiya sumjoka limbulaai niyantrita laaguausadha daaijepaama empula nurphina empula ra phenaaragana empula sahita budhabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa sirahaa dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa medanipura ghara bhai lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaa kupandola basne warsiya taaraakaanta chaudhari rahekaae chha mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga pulchokabaata khatieko praharile chaudharilaai bihibaara diunso thaana haattiko daahraa sahita pakraau gareko ho
parsaa praharile apaharana sarira bandhaka tathaa kartawya jyaana muddaakaa pharaara abhiyuktalaai warsapachhi pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya wikrama yaadawa rahekaa chhan yaadawale saala bhadau gate sthaaniya pannaalaala saaha sonaaralaai apaharana garne kramamaa unaki srimati dewamati dewilaai goli haani hatyaa garekaa thie

praharile sirahaakaae dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa baata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita janaalaai budhabaara saanjha pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parneharumaa bisnaupura gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya sunila kumaara paasawaana ra dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya mahendra saaha rahekaa chhan

praharile parsaakaae wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa inarwaa chaukasthita sadakabaata srota khulaauna nasakeko rakama sahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa gahawaa basne warsiya raamabaabu saaha kalawaara rahekaa chhan ukta sthaanamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko praharile raksaulabaata wiragumjatarpha jaandai gareko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara unalaai nagada laakha rupaiyaan sahita budhabaara pakraau gareko haae
laaguausadha ainaantargatako muddaamaa adaalatabaata dosi thahara bhaepani pharaara rahekaa eka janaalaai praharile moranabaata pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa kaanepokhari gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya tilabahaadura raai rahekaa chhan raailaai jillaa adaalata moranale saala asoja gate paancha mahinaa dina kaida ra dui hajaara rupaiyaan jariwaanaako phaisalaa sunaaeko thiyoadaalatako phaisalaa aunu aghidekhi raai pharaara thie
aphnai amaa maathi khukuri prahaara garekaae abhiyaaegamaa praharile sunasaribaata eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

gae raati itahari hawaai choka sthita gharamaa basiraheko awasthaamaa aphnai amaa barsiyaa kabitaa kaarkilaai khukuri prahaara garekaae abhiyaaegamaa barsiya paarasa kaarkilaai praharile pakraau garekaae haae
paarasale khukurile sarirako bibhinna bhaagamaa prahaara gari ghaaite banaaeko ra unako nobela aspataala biraatanagaramaa upachaara bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itaharile janaaeko chha

jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayale jillaamaa sadaka durghatanaa rokna so nirnaya gareko janaaeko chha mangalabaara dholaamandalibaata pharkindai gareko aichara traka paltindaa saata janaako akaalamaa marityu tathaa bhandaa badhi ghaaite bhaekaa thie

budhabaara jillaamaa pramukha jillaa adhikaariko sumyojakatwamaa prahari yaataayaata wyawasaayi naagarika samaaja sahitako sarwapaksiya baithakamaa so sahamati bhaeko thiyo baithakale sahamatilaai paalana garaauna prabhaawakaari anugamana sameta garne nirnaya sameta garekoe chha

sitabhandaa badhi yaatru chadhaaune tathaa maalabahaaka sawaarile yaatru chadhaaune garemaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale muddaa dartaa gari kaarawaahi garne sahamati baithakamaa bhaeko chha pramukha jillaa adhikaari asamaana taamaanale bhane sawaari chaalakale maadaka padaartha sewana gareko paaiemaa sawaari chaalakalaai abadekhi jariwaanaa hoina hiraasatamaa raakhera kaarawaahi garnechhau

baithakamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka rawindra regmi traaphika prahari pramukha yaataayaata wyawasaayi ra naagarika samaajakaa pratinidhiko sahabhaagitaa thiyo raasasa
praharile sumkhuwaasabhaabaata wisphotaka padaartha sahita mumgalabaara eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

kaaryaalaya pramukha pusparaaja sresthale sewaagraahisanga kaatha upalabdha garaauna siphaarisakaa laagi maaga gareko hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa lieko awasthaamaa akhtiyaarale unalaai rumgehaata pakraau gareko haae

saahale asoja gate saanjha warsiyaa gomaa bhanine saaradaa chaudhari ra chhori warsiyaa rachanaa chaudharilaai dhaarilo hatyaara prayoga gari hatyaa gareko bhandai prahariko anusandhaana pachhi sarakaari wakilako kaaryaalayale muddaa daayara gareko thiyo saahalaai praharile asoja gate motigadaabaata pakraau gareko thiyo
praharile mumgalabaara diunso jhaapaako birtaamodabaata laaguausadha braaunasugara sahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

bhaaratiya bajaarabaata bhansaara chhalera saamaana lyaauna sahayoga garidine bhandai sewaagraahisanga ghusa lieko awasthaamaa ayogakaae taaelile ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sukhipuramaa kaaryarata prahari jawaana raajakumaara yaadawalaai hajaara rupaiyaan ghusasahita pakraau garekaae haae

pratiyogitaamaa rephriko bhumikaa nibhaaekaa rosana taamaanale khelamaa jaalajhela gareko bhandai wiwaada badheko thiyo wiwaada badhdai gaepachhi gae raati netraawati gaaunpaalikaa kaa rosana taamaana ra nijakaa bhaai raama taamaanale santa ra rawinamaathi ago phukne phalaamako dhungrole taaukomaa akramana garekaa thie

dhungro prahaarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa santa bahaadura taamaanako upachaarakaae kramamaa jillaa aspataala dhaadinamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha ghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa rawinalaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaum lyaaieko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskikaa prawaktaa pranaau raajakumaara kesikaa anusaara sawaari chaalaka anumati patra binaa sawaari chalaaune maadaka padaartha sewana garekaa ra gaadiko dhokaa khullaa raakhdaa durghatanaa garaai maanawiya ksati puryaaeko abhiyogamaa chaarajanaa sawaari chaalakalaai purpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaana garieko ho

unakaa anusaara pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa dihikopaatanamaa kaara durghatanaakaa kaarana pokharaa phulabaari basne warsiya reksa aleko marityu bhaeko thiyo sawaari anumatipatra binaa kaara chalaaune daana tulsipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya kisora bhandaarile chalaaeko gacha numko kaarale thakkara dindaa anya tinajanaa ghaaite bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

pokharaa sisuwaachokasthita bhitri sadakabaata daandaakonaakatarpha jaandai gareko naapa numko motarasaaikalale thakkara dindaa paidala yaatri warsiya bhaanubhakta tiwaariko mutyu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha baalodaya uchcha maawikoe gaka numko basakaa chaalaka sunasari dharaana nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya rabina raailaai purpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaana garieko chha

pokharaa raamamandira najikai dhokaa banda nagari chalaaeko basabaata achaanaka khasdaa pokharaa wirautaa niwaasi warsiya saritaa paudela suwediko sohi basako pachhillo chakkaale kulchiyara marityu bhaeko thiyo purpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaauna hunemaa maapase gari aniyantrita tathaa laaparawaahipurna tarikaale chalaaieko gapa numko skutarakaa chaalaka warsiya sujana wika rahekaa chhan
udayapurako kataari nagarapaalikaa raamchemaa saamaanya baadabibaada pachhi bhaekaae kutapitabaata eka janaakaae marityu bhaeko chha
kutapitabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa bala bahaadurakaae upachaarako kramamaa kataari aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
kutapita garne kebala bahaaduralaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kataariko prahari tolile niyantranamaa lieko chha bhane anya thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
wiplawa netaritwako nepaala kamyunista paartikaa sindhupaalchoka jillaa sachiwalaai praharile bhaktapurabaata pakraau gareko chha

somabaara diunso madhyapura thimi nagarapaalikaa nayaanthimisthita chaaradobaatomaa aparichita byaktile sthaaniya byaapaariharulaai dhaaka dhamki dii jawarajasti chandaa asuli gari hidiraheko bhanne bisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa khatieko tolile melamchi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya bhuwanasimha taamaanalaai pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa taamaana pratibandhita nekapaakaa kaaryakartaa raheko ra uni sindhupaalchoka jillaako sekretari sameta bhanne bujhina aeko praharile janaaekaae chha
praharile daanabaata bharuwaa bandukasahita somabaara diunso eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa babai gaaunpaalikaa daandaagaaunkaa chukilo kaami rahekaa chhan ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya khilatapurabaata khatieko praharile unako gharamaa talaasi gardaa naala banduka lukaai chhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho

kariba eka mahinaa aghi khokiko ausadhi kinne bahaanaa banaaundai eka mahilaa nepaala bhaarata simaanaakaa belahiyaa aipugin sankaa laagera maaiti nepaalakaa karmachaarile unalaai roke sodhapuchha gardai jaandaa uni ilaamabaata rojagaarikaa laagi widesa jaandai gareki mahilaa raheko pattaa laagyo unalaai dalaalale bhaaratako baato hundai waidesika rojagaarimaa pathaaidine pralobhana dekhaaera dilli jaane basamaa samparka gari pathaaekaa rahechhan

simaanaakaamaa prahari tathaa sanghasumsthaakaa padaadhikaarile sodhapuchha gare khokiko ausadhi kinna sunauli jaana laageko bhani jhuto bolna dalaalale sikaae anusaara aphu rupandehimai basne ra sunaulimaa ausadhi sastomaa paaine bhaekaale kinna jaana laageko bataain maaiti nepaalakaa karmachaarile unalaai dheraibera lagaaera sodhapuchha garepachhi aphno ilaama ghara bhaeko ra rojagaarikaa laagi widesa jaana laageko bheda khulaain pachhi unalaai maaiti nepaalale pariwaarako jimmaa lagaayo

tina mahinaa agaadi rupandehiko dhakadhaikaa dui kisorilaai dui mahilaasanga rupandehiko bhagawaanapura naakaabaata bhaarata jaandai gardaa bhaaratiya simaa suraksaa balale simaa ksetramaa rokyo sodhapuchhakaa kramamaa aphuharu amaa chhori bhanera bataae pani pataka pataka kuraa pherepachhi uniharulaai maaiti nepaala bhairahawaako jimmaa lagaaieko thiyo
bechabikhanakaa laagi laijaane dui mahilaa ahile jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehiko niyantranamaa chhan uniharuwiruddha saarwajanika aparaadha aina antargata muddaa chaliraheko chha

gata kaattika gate bhaaratako mumbaibaata warsiyaa mahilaalaai dui warsiyaa chhorisangai uddhaara gariyo chitawanako bharatapura ghara bhaeki tinale wigata tina warsadekhi mumbaimaa dehawyaapaaramaa gardaiaeki thiin bhaaratiyasanga wiwaaha gareki unalaai jabarjasti srimaanle dehawyaapaaramaa lagaaekaa thie wibhinna sanghasumsthaa ra bhaaratiya prahariko sahayogamaa maaiti nepaalako samparkamaa aepachhi sodhapuchha gardaa aphnai srimaanle bhaarata lagera deha wyaapaarakaa laagi baadhya banaaeko tathya khulyo

chhoto samayamai prasasta dhana kamaaune pralobhanamaa phasdaa wibhinna jillaakaa mahilaa tathaa kisoriharu bhaaratamaa bechina pugekaa chhan yo krama rokna sakieko chhaina maaiti nepaalakaa sumyojaka maayaa ksetri bhannuhunchha rojagaarimaa jaane mahilaalaai dalaalale liera aundainan hotalamaa samparka garchhan kaathamaadaun bolaaunchhan ekadheda mahinaa kothaamaa raakhchhan aba nepaalako baato jaana paaiena bhaaratabaata jaanuparchha bhanera bhaaratamaa lagera bechchhan uhaanle khullaa simaanaakaa kaarana nepaalakaa mahilaaharu sajilai bhaarata pugne gareko bataaunubhayo
maaiti nepaala bhairahawaako tathyaanka anusaara chaalu arthika warsako paancha mahinaako awadhimaa simaa ksetrabaata janaa ra bhaaratakaa wibhinna sthaanabaata saata janaako uddhaara garieko chha
bhaarata jaana simaanaakaasamma aune mahilaa tathaa kisoriko saathamaa kehi hundaina kaagajapatra ra kapadaa sameta dalaalako niyantranamaa hune gareko sumyojaka ksetriko anubhawa chha

nepaala praharile upalabdha garaaeko tathyaankako adhaaramaa nepaalamaa waarsika dekhi ko sankhyaamaa maanawa bechabikhanako ujuri parne gareko chha prahariko tathyaanka anusaara nepaalamaa eka warsamaa jhandai hajaara maanisa haraaune ra kewala pratisata maatra phelaa parne gareko dekhinchha

pradesa num ko pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa prawaktaa tathaa prahari naayaba upariksaka nawaraaja pokharelakaa anusaara arthika warsa maa ra awa maa wataa maanawa bechabikhanakaa muddaa dartaa bhaekaa chhan yo warsa wataa muddaa dartaa bhaisakekaa chhan jasamadhye rupandehikaa dherai chhan khullaa simaanaakaa bhaekaa kaarana yaso bhaeko bujhinchha

mulatah yauna bajaara baadhyakaari karisi srama gharelu kaamadaara tathaa bhaarata hundai tesro muluka laijaanakaa laagi mahilaa bechabikhana hune gareko prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa prawaktaa pokharelale bataaunubhayo graamina bhegakaa saamaanya lekhapadha garekaa mahilaaharu duhkha nagari paisaa kamaauna sakinchha bhanne pralobhanamaa phaschhan ra bechabikhanamaa parchhan uhaanle bhannubhayo

nepaala prahari maanawa bechabikhana anusandhaana byurobaata praapta tathyaanka anusaara aghillo awamaa maanawa bechabikhana wiruddhako ujuri raheko thiyo awa ra ko asaara masaantasammako tathyaanka herne ho bhane pradesa num maa sabaibhandaa badhi wataa ujuri pareko dekhinchha

uhaanle bhannubhayo phaujadaari aparaadhasanga sambandhita wisayaharu sanghiya ra pradesa sarakaarakaa saajhaa adhikaarako suchibhitra raheko bhae pani yasa wisayamaa sanghiya sarakaara pradesa sarakaara tathaa sthaaniya sarakaarale garne kaaryakrama tathaa adhikaara ksetra spasta kitieko chhaina tyaso bhaera pradesa sarakaara tathaa sthaaniya sarakaaraharule yasa wisayamaa kaarya garna sakekaa chhainan

rupandehimaa maaiti nepaala sahita saanaa haata thri enjalsa ebisi nepaala aphanta nepaala ra subha awasara graamale maanawa bechabikhana tathaa osaarapasaara niyantranakaa ksetramaa kaama garchhan yi madhye chaara wataa sumsthaale nepaala bhaarata simaa ksetra belahiyaamaa nigaraani gariaekaa chhan rupandehimaa belahiyaasahita kakrahawaa bhagawaanapuralagaayata darjanaum simaanaakaa chhan sabai sumsthaaharule ekai thaaunmaa basera nigaraani gardaa maanawa taskaraharule anya naakaa prayoga garne gareko paaieko chha

nepaalabhitrai hune maanawa bechabikhana nitigata ra niyaamaka nikaayako daristimaa parna nasakdaa hajaaraum mahilaa tathaa baalabaalikaa nepaalabhitrai bhairaheko maanawa bechabikhanako sikaara bhairahekaa chhan yo dhandaakaa haangaaharu daansabaara dohori diskosamma phailiekaa chhan

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahendranagarabaata khatieko tolile laksminiyaan gaaunpaalikaa sapahisthita mena rodamaa sanchaalanamaa raheko amarajyoti laja enda gesta haausabaata ti jodilaai pakraau gareko haae
pakraau parekaa duwai janaalaai maanawa bechabikhana tathaa osaarapasaara niyantrana aina antargata muddaa chalaaine ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahendranagarale janaaeko chha

sohi sthaanasthita khasi bajaaramaa saalakako khapataa bikri witarana bhairaheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurabaata khatieko praharile ukta saalakako khapataasahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile baaraabaata srimatiko hatyaa gareko aropamaa ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile sawa jaliraheko awasthaamaa phelaa paareko thiyo tara mahato bhane pharaara thie ghatanaapaschaata pharaara bhaekaa unalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraabaata khatieko prahari tolile aitabaara pakraau gareko ho

budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kaamitaarasthita wataa bhattimaa praharile somabaara saanjha chhaapaa maareko ho praharile ukta bhattibaata paancha hajaara litara tayaari awasthaako madiraa ra hajaara litara kachchaa padaartha baraamada gari nasta gareko haae
hetaumdaa nawalapuraki warsaki tesrolimli ajitaako sawako siksana aspataala mahaaraajaganjamaa postamaartamapachhi nawalapuramaa somabaara daahasumskaara garieko chha
jillaa adaalatabaata dharautimaa rihaa bhaekaa nepaala kamyunista paarti wiplawa samuhakaa paancha janaa kaaryakartaalaai praharile adaalata parisarabaata puna pakraau gareko chha

sumgathitarupale raajyawiruddhako aparaadha gareko abhiyogamaa asoja gate raajapura gaaunpaalikaako mumgrethaabaata pakraau parekaa uniharulaai daana jillaa adaalatale hajaara dharautimaa rihaa garna adesa dieko thiyo
tara adaalatako adesaanusaara dharauti tirera baahirine kramamaa jillaa adaalatako geta agaadi baatai unalaai praharile saarwajanika sawaari saadhanamaa raakhi prahari kaaryaalaya lagekaa hun
dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya baaraako wana gasti tolile kohalwi nagarapaalikaa sthita sakhui juguwaabaata naapa nambarako motarasaaikalasahita warsiya ramesa chaurilaai pakraau gareko ho

sisauko goliyaa thaana kariba kyu phita motarasaaikala saaikalana thaanasahita sanibaara raati unalaai pakraau garieko dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaekaae chha kaatha osaarne kaaryamaa sumlagna anya janaa bhane gasti tolilaai dekhne wittikai pharaara bhaekaa chhan
praharile baajuraabaata awaidha laaguausadha charesasahita wadaa sadasya sahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

gastimaa raheko prahari tolile aitabaara raati maartadi bajaarabaata badimaalikaa nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaa sadasya syaama bahaadura khadkaa ra gaumula gaaunpaalikaa sthaayi ghara bhaekaa dewabahaadura rokaayaalaai dedha kilo charesasahita pakraau gareko ho uniharulaai somabaara patrakaara sammelana garera saarwajanika garieko ho

pakraau parnemaa moranga urlaabaari ghara bhai lalitapura saatadobaato basne warsa ko raaju raai warsa ki sumjaya raai ilaama ghara bhai lalitapura baalakumaari basne warsa ko taswira limbu moranga ghara bhai lalitapura baalakumaari basne warsa ko akaasa limbu makawaanapura hetaumdaa ghara bhai kaathamaandau koteswara basne warsa ko sunila prajaapati ra taaplejunga taamatuna ghara bhai kaathamaandau baaneswara basne warsa ko sujana limbu chhan

kehi warsayataa baankemaa aparaadhika ghatnaa badhdai gaekaa chhan pachhillo paancha warsayataa aparaadhika ghatanaamaa wariddhi hundai gaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankeko tathyaankale dekhaaeko chha

sangathita aparaadha chandaa atanka mahilaa himsaa hatyaajastaa gambhira prakaritikaa ghatanaamaa praharile suksma anusandhaana garna nasakdaa aparaadhako dara uchcharupamaa badheko ho wigatabhandaa pachhillo warsa hatyaa balaatkaara apaharana laaguausadha kaarobaara chori dakaitijastaa gambhira prakaritikaa aparaadha badheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankele janaaeko chha

aparaadhako sankhyaa badhdaimaa maatra suraksaa khaskiyo bhanna namilne prahariko daabi chha aparaadhabaare praharimaa riportina garne kramamaa wariddhi bhaekaale sankhyaa badheko huna sakchha baankekaa prahari pramukha ewum prahari upariksaka wirabahaadura olile bhane saanti suraksaa bhaneko tathyaankabhandaa pani anubhuta garne kuraa ho

prahari upariksaka olile ama naagarikamaa praharipratiko wiswaasa badhekaa kaarana muddaako chaapa badheko bataae unale bhane wigatamaa praharimaa auna hichkichaauneharu aja sahajai prahari kaaryaalayamaa aera nyaaya khojna thaalnubhaeko chha
yo aparaadharahita samaaja nirmaanakaa laagi raamro paksa ho pachhillo samaya naagarika sachetanaa tathaa praharipratiko wiswaasale muddaa dartaa garneko sankhyaa badheko unako daabi chha

awa maa awa maa awa maa awa maa ra awa maa wataa laaguausadhakaa muddaa dartaa bhaekaa chhan chaalu awako pachhillo mahinaamaa laaguausadhakaa muddaa dartaa bhaekaa chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankele janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa anusaara chaalu awako pachhillo mahinaamaa kilograama laaguausadha gaanjaa charesa graama aphima chaara kilo koreksa eka litara naaitrojepaama dui hajaara tyaableta baraamada gareko chha

yasaigari jillaamaa baimkina kasurasambandhi muddaa pani ullekhya rupamaa badheko chha arthika warsa maa awa maa ra chaalu awako pahilo mahinaamaa wataa baimkina kasurasambandhi muddaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa dartaa bhaekaa chhan

tyastai awa maa kula muddaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa dartaa bhaeko thiyo bhane awa maa kula eka hajaara muddaa dartaa bhaeko chha yasale paancha warsako awadhimaa muddaa dartaako sankhyaa dobbarale wariddhi bhaeko dekhaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankemaa awa maa awa maa awa maa eka hajaara muddaa dartaa bhaeko tathyaanka chha

chaalu awako pahilo mahinaamaa muddaa dartaa bhaekaa chhan yo gata arthika warsako sohi awadhiko tulanaamaa pratisatale badhi ho chaalu arthika warsako ahilesamma muddaa phasryauta bhaekaa ra muddaa anusandhaana prakriyaamaa rahekaa chhan prahari upariksaka olile bhane chaalu awako pachhillo mahinaamaa muddaamaa purusa ra mahilaalaai muddaa prakriyaamaa anusandhaanakaa laagi niyantranamaa lieko chha

unale chaalu awako mahinaamaa wibhinna sirsakamaa muddaa dartaa bhaeko jaanakaari die sahakaariko ru karoda apachalanako muddaa anusandhaana gari adaalata pathaaeko jaanakaari dindai unale hatyaa agajani lutapaatalagaayatakaa ghatanaako anusandhaana gari kaanuni kaarawaahi gareko bataae

baankemaa chaalu arthika warsako pusa mahinaasamma hajaara sawaari saadhana kaarawaahimaa parekaa chhan kaarawaahimaa parekaa sawaari saadhana tathaa sawaari dhanibaata yasa awadhimaa ru laakha hajaara raajaswa sankalana garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankele mahinaamaa janaa pharaara abhiyuktalaai pakraau gareko janaaeko chha timadhye pharaara bhaekaa ra adaalatabaata sajaaya tokiekaa pharaara janaa abhiyukta rahekaa chhan

barmeli tolasthita sadaka kinaaramaa bharkharai janmieko sisulaai maarera kasaile phyaankeko huna sakne praharile janaaeko chha sthaaniyale khabara gare lagattai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata aeko praharile sisuko sawa pariksanakaa laagi dharaanasthita bipi koiraalaa memoriyala aspataalamaa pathaaeko chha
anaadhikarita rupamaa paarkina garieko bhandai anaamanagaramaa traaphika praharile praharikai gaadimaa hwila laka gareko chha
mahaanagariya traaphika prahari raamasaahapathako tolile sadaka dhaakera paarkinamaa raakheko bhandai prahariko naajha nambarako gaadimaa hwila laka gari kaarabaahi gareko ho
ukta gaadilaai niyamaanusaara chita kaatera kaarabaahimaa lyaaieko mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha
praharile makawaanapura ra baankekaae bibhinna sthaanabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

makawaanapura ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya newaarapaanibaata khatieko praharile kariba kilo awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita parsaa parsauni gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya barijalaala jayasawaalalaai aitabaara diunso pakraau gareko chha

baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa jamunaaha cheka pwaaintabaata awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara saya miligraama sahita khajuraa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya tula bahaadura gurunalaai aitabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jamunaaha ra laaguausadha niyantrana byuro nepaalagumjako sumyukta tolile jaancha garne kramamaa gurunalaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
jillaa adaalata tanahunle jabarjasti karanai muddaakaa eka abhiyuktalaai warsa mahinaa kaida phaisalaa gareko chha
jillaa nyaayaadhisa durgaaprasaada dhungelakoe ijalaasale so muddaamaa pakraau parekaa gorakhaa paalunataara nagarapaalikaa kaa karisnakumaara wikalaai aitabaara so kaida phaisalaa sunaaeko ho

gata asaara gate tanahunko bhaanu nagarapaalikaa sthita paancha warsiyaa baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko abhiyogamaa wikalaai kaida sajaayasahita piditalaai eka laakha ksatipurti dilaaune phaisalaa bhaeko jillaa adaalatakaa srestedaara sudarsana khanaalale jaanakaari die

yasaigari sawaari jyaana muddaakaa abhiyuktalaai nyaayaadhisa dhungelako ijalaasale nau mahinaa kaidako phaisalaa gareko chha sawaari jyaana muddaamaa thunaamaa rahekaa wyaasa nagarapaalikaa kaa tulabahaadura wikalaai so kaidako phaisalaa gareko ho nijawiruddha gata jetha gate adaalatamaa muddaa daayara bhaeko thiyo

nambara pradesa sarakaarako karoda laakhako bajeta baata thekkaa swikarita bhai sadaka kaalopatre garnakaa laagi sadaka chaudaa gardai suke ahaalako saakelaa melaa laagne thaaun maa pugeko thaana eskaabhetara ago lagaaera ra bama haanera dhwasta banaaieko chha wisphota kasale ra kina garaae bhanne khulna sakeko chhaina yadyapi pratibandhita nekapaa wiplawale wisphota garaaeko asumkaa garieko chha

wisphotabaata bhaeko ksatiko wistarita wiwarana aisakeko chhaina madhumallaamaa raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryalayale bharakharai ghatanaabaare jaanakaari lieko bujhieko chha uttari morana pachhi pani tatkaalina maaowaadiko sainya taalima hune ksetrakaa rupamaa chininchha
sapa laai chekajaancha garne kramamaa laaguausadha baraamada bhaepachhi motarasaaikalamaa sawaara ti duwailaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaale janaaeko chha
yastai sirahaakai mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaa kataarichaukabaata praharile dileksa disi emaelako botala laaguausadhasahita sthaaniya barsiya asoka kumaara saahalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile sarlaahibaata thulo parimaanamaa laaguausadhasahita dui janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa kaaskiko lekhanaatha pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala tanahunko suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya purnabahaadura taamaana tathaa tanahunko suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya yajnachandra ale rahekaa chhan

bhaaratako sonawarsaabaata sarlaahiko parsaa gaaunpaalikaatarpha aundai gareko baa cha nambarako kaara sumkaa laagera chekajaancha gardaa kaarabhitra raakhieko mililitarako botala phensidila ra thaana naaitraabheta tyaableta praharile baraamada garekaae chha tyastai kaara bhitraibaata nagada laakha hajaara rupaiyaan hanakana dalara tathaa senta thaana mobaaila sameta baraamada gareko chha
praharile parsaakaae jagaranaathapura gaaunpaalikaa pidaari tolabaata kariba keji awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sanibaara saanjha baraamada gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya paterwaa sugaulibaata khatieko praharile sohi thaaunsthita paraalamaa lukaai chhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari baraamada gareko ho

pakraau parnemaa lalitapura chyaasala basne raamechhaapa khaadaadewi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya ayusa raanaa magara rahekaa chhan unalaai praharile kaathamaandau mahaanagarapaalikaa jadibutibaata pakraau gareko haae

aphnai pariwaara sadasyako nirmamataapurwaka hatyaa gareko bhandai sohi samayamaa sthaaniya tejaprasaada simhale kartawya jyaana muddaamaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa kitaani jaaheri dartaa garaaekaa thie ghatanaalagattai abhiyukta buwaa ra daaju pharaara bhaera bhaaratamaa lukichhipi basdai aekaa thie

pakraau parekaa daaju raabhawanale bhaaratamaa basne kramamaa pharaara warsiya buwaako marityu bhaisakeko praraambhika bayaana diekaa chhan bhaaratamaa lukichhipi basdai aekaa raamabhawanalaai antatah wisesa suraakiko adhaaramaa praharile nepaalabhaarata simaabaata maagha gate pakraau garekaae haae

pakraau parneharumaa baaraa nijagadha ghara bhaekaa warsiya anusa thaapaa magara ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya rawi ale magara rahekaa chhan mahaanagariya prahari waritta kaalimaatibaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta nakkali nota sahita pakraau gareko ho
pyuthaana jillaa adaalatale srimatiko hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa eka wyaktilaai purpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaana gareko chha

praharile kapilawastukaae bijayanagara gaaunpaalikaa naurangiyaabaata abaidha rupamaa bhansaara chhali lyaaundai gareko kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako wataa khasi sanibaara saanjha baraamada gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya ganaesapurabaata khatieko praharilaai dekhera lyaaundai gareko ukta khasiharu chhodi maanisa pharaara bhaepachhi ti khasiharu niyantranamaa liieko ukta prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
praharile janakapurabaata chaainija pestolasahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa dhanusaako ksireswaranaatha nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara ramadaiyaakaa warsiya jitendra yaadawa ra sohi napaa wadaa nambara basne warsiya kumoda naaraayana jhaa rahekaa chhan praharile uniharulaai sanibaara saanjha janakapurako bhaanuchokabaata pakraau garekaae haae

baa cha nambarako mahimdraa tiyubhi gaadi ra ja pa nambarako baaika eka apasamaa thokidaa tatkaala praharile chaarapaangre gaai ra baaikalaai niyantranamaa liera relwe prahari chaukimaa anusandhaana thaaleko thiyo
praharile dhaadinako gajuri gaaunpaalikaa baata niyantrita laaguausadha spaasmo hajaara tyaableta ra traamaadola hajaara saya tyaabletasahita janaalaai bihibaara diunso pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa tananhu bandipura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya hemanta guruna ra bhaanu nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sandipa pariyaara rahekaa chhan ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajuribaata khatieko praharile kaathamaadaumbaata lamjunatarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basa jaancha gardaa ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari basakaa sahachaalaka hemanta ra helpara sandipalaai pakraau gareko ho

ilaakaa prahari kaaryalaya lahaanabaata khatieko tolile sa pa sapa sa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa laaguausadhasahita gaeraati lahaana nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raakesakumaara mahato warsiya kaanchhaa mahato warsiya sumita guptaa lahaana kaa warsiya laksmeswara mahato ra warsiya dhanikalaala mahatolaai pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parekaako saathabaata laaguausadha braauna sugara eka graama miligraama ra gaanjaa graama miligraama baraamada garieko jillaa prahari kaaryalayakaa prahari upariksaka umaaprasaada chaturwedile jaanakaari dinubhayo

yastai sirahaako bhagawaanapura gaaunpaalikaa inarwaabaata praharichauki thaadiko tolile laaguausadhasahita lahaana kaa warsiya mohammada samiralaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parekaa samirako saathabaata laaguausadha phenaaragana saata empula daajilyaaba saata empula naamalebala nabhaeko saata empula baraamad garieko praharile janaaeko chha

praharichauki khiraunaabaata khatieko prahari tolile sirahaa khiraunaabaata pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita sirahaa kaa warsiya raamabharosi mukhiyaa ra kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya ajitakumaara mukhiyaalaai pakraau gareko chha

bhaaratatirabaata aundai garekaa duwai janaalaai sankaa laagera jaancha gardaa laaguausadha naaitrobheta tyaabaleta narphina eka empula phenaaragana eka empula daaijepaama eka empula ra emila eka baraamada garieko jillaa prahari kaaryalayale janaaeko chha

yasaibicha kutapita muddaamaa jillaa adaalatabaata dui mahinaa nau dina kaida ra ru paancha hajaara jariwaanaako sajaaya paaera pharaara aurahi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya gangaa yaadawalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako tolile pakraau gareko chha
emasisiko wirodha gareko bhandai bhojapura nagarapaalikaa deuraalikaa bhima raai widura raai ra nagendra taamaanalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho
