tinai janaalaai maagha gate saanjha bhojapurako deuraali chokabaata praharile giraphtaara garna khojeko thiyo tara sthaaniyale pratikaara garepachhi prahari pharkie pani sohi raati uniharulaai gharaimaa sutiraheko belaa pakraau gareko ho

sthaaniyale prahari naayaba upariksaka diesapi narabahaadura salaami magaralaai saantipurna pradarsana garna dina anurodha garekaa thie tara unale emasisiko wirodhamaa utrinelaai thunnai parne bhandai prahari khataaekaa thie
sadaramukaamanajikai deuraali chokamaa no emasisi lekhieko byaanara nai taangieko thiyo uniharule saamaajika sanjaalamaa pani emasisiko wirodha janaairahekaa belaa pakraau parekaa hun
praharile jhaapaako kankaai nagarapaalikaa surunagaabaata niyantrita laaguausadha braaunasugara sahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

bisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa laaguausadha niyantrana byuro kaakadabhittaa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya surunagaabaata khatieko prahari tolile surunagaakai eka hotalamaa basekaa moranako urlaawaari nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya nitena kaarki ra birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya raajana prasaada upretilaai graama braauna sugara sahita pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa duwai janaako sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anaaramanile janaaeko chha

surumaa motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa dhakaalako marityubhaeko bhanieko bhae pani ghatanaasthalako prakariti ra motarasaaikalako awasthaa adikaa kaarana praharile ghatanaalaai suksma rupamaa anusandhaana gareko thiyo

patrakaara mahaasangha presa yuniyana presa chautaari presa sentarakaa sanghasumsthaale ghatanaa saamaanya durghatanaa nabhai gambhira hatyaa bhaeko bhandai hatyaamaa sumlagnalaai turunta pakraau gari kadaabhandaa kadaa kaarawaahiko maaga gari raheko awasthaamaa saata dinapachhi praharile hatyaamaa sumlagna bhandai dui janaa ra ghatanaapachhi haraaeko maritaka dhakaalako aunthi ra mobaaila phona kharida garne dui janaa gari chaara janaalaai pakraau garera saarwajanika gareko thiyo
adaalatale uniharulaai hatyaa abhiyogamaa janmakaida ra dakaitimaa warsa gari kula warsa kaida phaisalaa gareko jillaa adaalatakaa srestedaara kesawaraaja kaisikale jaanakaari die

bihibaara wihaana bajesamma pani nauthepachhi gaaunle gaera herdaa maritta awasthaamaa dekhe pachhi uniharule praharilaai khabara garekaa thie ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jauwaariko tolile ghatanaasthala pugera anusandhaana suru garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa ramphokakai warsiya nimaa taamaana ra warsiya pemaa taamaana rahekaa chhan gaaunmaa goru kaatiraheko khabara paaepachhi gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa phikkala prahari chaukikaa pramukha basnetako netaritwamaa khatieko tolile ghatanaasthalabaata uniharulaai pakraau gareko thiyo

prahari ghatanaasthala pugdaa kaatieko maasu maatra phelaa pareko thiyo uniharule goru biraami bhaekaale kaatnu pareko bataaekaa chhan ghatanaasambandhamaa myaada thapa gari anusandhaana aghi badhaaine ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pasupatinagarakaa pramukha ramesa raaile bataae
moranamaa ghaatamaa jalaauna lageko mahilaako sawa praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
ghaantimaa sumkaaspada daama dekhiepachhi wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa baluwaaiki warsiyaa premadewi saahako sawa jalaauna laageko awasthaamai praharile niyantranamaa lieko ho
maritaka premadewi saahako wiwaaha warsaaghi wiraatanagara kaa gowinda saahasanga bhaeko thiyo

dhaadinabaata kaathamaadaumtarpha aundai gareko baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikala chaalaka raamechhaapa umaakunda gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya phurbaa serpaa ra pachhaadi sawaara warsiya jipa chhirina serpaa laai mumgalabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko haae

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaako tolile banepaa nagarapaalikaa magaragaaunmaathiko jangalamaa taasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa nagada ra sawaari saadhanasahita paancha janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

jangalamaa gaera lukera taasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa budhabaara belukaa paancha janaalaai niyantranamaa linukaa saathai nagada eka laakha hajaara rupaiyaan chaara skutara motarasaaikala eutaa kaara ra buka taasa baraamada garieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaale jaanakaari diekaae chha

prahari puge lagattai pharaara rahekaa janaako khojikaarya jaari raheko ra dui wataa chekabukasameta baraamada bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha pakraau parekaaharulaai taasa juwaa ainaantargata kaarawaahi hune praharile jaanakaari diekaae chha
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata tina kilo charesa sahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa ilaamakaae maasewuna gaanupaalikaa basne dilendra yonahaana rahekaa chhan budhabaara diunso thaai yaeralaainsako udaanaddhaaraa nepaalabaata baimkaka jaana laagekaa yonahaanalaai wimaanasthala suraksaa kaaryaalayale tina kilo charesa sahita pakraau gareko haae

pakraau parekaa duwai maritaka ghalesangai raheko khulepachhi hatyaa gareko asankaamaa pakraau gareko janaaieko chha aitabaara raati baje maadakapadaartha sewana gari jhagadaa hundaa dhungaa prahaara garera hatyaa gareko aropamaa pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka hemanta bhandaari ksetrile jaanakaari die
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaale laakhakaa awaidha mobaailasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa banepaa basapaarkamaa bradarsa mobaaila pasalakaa sanchaalaka sunila khanaala ra sudipa khanaala chhan uniharule bhansaara chhalera wibhinna kampanikaa mobaaila seta banepaako basapaarka ksetramaa sasto mulyamaa bikri gariraheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaale baraamada gareko haae
praharile dhanusaakaae janakanandani gaaunpaalikaa baranajhullaabaata mumgalabaara diunso pestola sahita dui janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parneharumaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya dipesa kumaara mahato ra warsiya subhakesa mahato rahekaa chhan sohi thaaunsthita hatiyaara padkaaudai hindeko bhanne suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya khajuri dhanusaabaata khatieko praharile mahatoko gharabhandaa kariba saya mitara para aphnai anpako bagaimchaamaa lukaai chhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa pestola thaana ra myaagajina thaana phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
mahaanagariya praharile prabhaaga naagadhumgaale makaiko boraamuni lukaaera bhansaara chhali lyaaeko laakha rupaiyaan baraabarako kapadaasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile kantenarabaata bhansaara chhali gari lyaaiekaa boraa kapadaa baraamada garekaae chha pakraau parekaa laamaa ra baraamada sabai kapadaalaai bhansaara kaaryaalaya saano gaucharana pathaaieko praharile janaaekaae chha

nepaala praharile netrawikrama chanda wiplawa samuhakaa kaabhrepalaanchoka jillaa sadasya ewum raastriya yuwaa janaswayumsewakakaa jillaa adhyaksa ramana pariyaaralaai agajani abhiyogamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha

paanchakhaala nagarapaalikaa hoksekaa warsiya pariyaaralaai gata saala phaaguna gate bhumlu gaaunpaalikaasthita enasela taawaramaa agajani gareko abhiyogamaa praharile mangalabaara muddaa daayara gareko ho pariyaaralaai saarwajanika sampattimaa noksaani puyaaeko kasuramaa muddaa dartaa gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dipaka girile jaanakaari die

praharile pariyaaralaai wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa banepaa nagarapaalikaasthita godaama chokabaata somabaara saanjha pakraau gareko thiyo pariyaara kehi warsaaghi gudiraheko yaatruwahaaka basamaa ago lagaaera sarwasaadhaaranako jyaana lina khojeko abhiyogamaa kehi mahinaa jela basera niskekaa thie

warsiyaa thokaralaai kaattika antima saataa wiplawa maaowaadiko jillaa pharmesanamaa jillaa sakretari bhaelagattai kaattika gate raati panauti nagarapaalikaa naubisesthata gharabaatai praharile pakraau gareko thiyo

aphnaa dui naabaalaka chhoraaharulaai wisa khuwaaera hatyaa gareko kasuramaa mahaabu gaaunpaalikaa kharigairaaki warsiyaa kalpanaa nepaalilaai dailekha jillaa adaalatale janmakaida phaisalaa sunaaeko chha
jillaa nyaayaadhisa dandapaanai laamichhaaneko ekala ijalaasabaata ukta phaisalaa gareko dailekha jillaa adaalatakaa suchanaa adhikaari binoda achaaryale jaanakaari die

aropita kalpanaalaai praharile kaattika gate hiraasatamaa lii kartawya jyaana muddaa chalaaeko thiyo praharile anusandhaana sakera dailekha jillaa adaalatamaa mumsira gate muddaa dartaa garaaeko thiyo sohi dina adaalatale purpaksakaa laagi jillaa kaaraagaaramaa thunaamaa raakheko thiyo

baajuraa jillaa adaalatakaa nyaayaadhisa maadhawaprasaada ghimireko ijalaasale pakraau parekaa janaalaai purpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaana garne adesa dieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baajuraale janaaeko chha

somabaara bhaeko pesi bahasamaa baraamadi muchulkaa nabhai banaawati bhaeko ra kutapita gari yaatanaa diera bayaana garaaeko pratiwaadiko bayaanamaa ullekha chha ti janaalaai gata kaattika gate baajuraako gaumula gaaunpaalikaa maajhapaalibaata pakraau garieko thiyo

timadhye purusa baajuraa ra mahilaalaai somabaara nai achhaama kaaraagaaramaa chalaana garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baajuraakaa prahari niriksaka daanabahaadura rokaayaale bataae rolpaa gangaadewa jhyaama ghara bhaekaa oli wiplawa samuhakaa nyaaya wibhaaga pramukhasameta hun yasaaghi uni waisaakha gate tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa raamribaata pakraau parekaa thie
unalaai daanabaata sunasari puyaaera dinako hiraasata basaainpachhi jillaa adaalata sunasarile asaara gate rihaa gareko thiyo
jillaako deumaai nagarapaalikaa jitapuramaa raheko ukta taawaramaa gaeraati bama bisphota bhaeko ho wisphotamakaa kaarana taawaramaa purna ksati bhaeko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mumgalabaarekaa anusaara ghatanaasthala najikai arko bama pani napadkieko awasthaamaa bhetieko thiyo ukta bama bhane nepaali senaako tolile bihaanai niskariya garidieko chha
praharile kailaalibaata awaidha laaguausadha braauna sugarasahita tina janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
laaguausadha sahita pakraau parekaa uniharumaathi jillaa adaalatabaata dinako myaada thapa gari anusandhaana aghi badhaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaekaae chha

kenyaamaa so samuhale wigatadekhi nai atankakaari kriyaakalaapa jaari raakhdai aekaa chhan ala sabaabale yahaankaa siksaka ra widyaarthilaai taaro banaaune gareko chha thulo sumkhyaamaa aekaa hatiyaaradhaarile akramana gari tyahaankaa kehi widyaalayamaa pani ksati puyaaekaa chhan saathai ti akramanakaarile purwi kenyaako kamuthemaa raheko prahari chaukimaa pani uniharule agajani garekaa chhan

pakraau parnemaa lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaa sumkhamulasthita deraa gari basne sindhuli dudhauli nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya mahesa adhikaari rahekaa chhan mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga pulchokabaata khatieko praharile unako kothaamaa jaancha gardaa ukta chhaalaa phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parneharumaa parsaa hiparamaai gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya karisna yaadawa ra chitawana bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya raaju paudela rahekaa chhan

kaathamaadaumbaata nuwaakotatarpha jaandai gareko baa ja nambarako tyaaksi jaancha garne kramamaa tyaaksimaa sawaara paudelako saathamaa ukta nagada phelaa paari uniharulaai praharile pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parnemaa chitawana bharatapura ghara bhai baaneswara basne rawina kaarki bhanne rawina ruchaala rahekaa chhan unalaai somabaara saanjha chitawanabaata pakraau gari kaathamaadaum lyaaieko thiyaae

unale saarwajanika basabhitra hastamaithuna gardai aghillo sitamaa baseki mahilaako kapaalamaa birya paarekaa thie tyo bhidiyo saamaajika sanjaala tathaa porna saaitaharumaa sameta apaloda bhaeko thiyo

kaathamaadaumko daksinakaali nagarapaalikaa chhaimale ra taarakeswara nagarapaalikaako jitapuraphedimaa raheko enasela taawaramaa ajnaata samuhale agajani garekaa hun agajanikaa kaarana taawaramaa ksati pugepachhi tyasa waraparako ksetramaa mobaaila sewaa awaruddha bhaeko chha
tanahun jillaa adaalatale laaguausadha muddaakaa eka abhiyuktalaai dui warsa kaidako phaisalaa gareko chha

jillaa nyaayaadhisa durgaaprasaada dhungelako somabaarako ijalaasale suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa basne karisna prajaapatilaai dui warsa kaidako phaisalaa gareko ho saathai unalaai ru eka laakha jariwaanaa garne phaisalaasameta bhaeko jillaa adaalatakaa srestedaara sudarsana khanaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

saathai suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa basne mentala bhaai bhanne wikaasa magarale bhane adaalatabaata saphaai paaekaa chhan nijaharuwiruddha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle gata waisaakha gate jillaa adaalatamaa muddaa dartaa gareko thiyo

bhansaara chhali gari abaidha rupamaa nepaalabaata bhaarata tarpha saamaana laijaadai gareko bhanne suchanaakaa adhaaramaa aja bihaana raati baje ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaakadabhittaabaata khatieko prahari tolile laakha hajaara baraabarako boraa chhagaraa ra boraa matara baraamada gareko ho
abaidha rupamaa baraamada bhaeko saamaana awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi ajai mechi bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaine ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

ghatanaamaa sumlagna yuwaalaai mahaanagariya aparaadha prahari mahaasaakhaakaae taaelile somabaara chitawanabaata pakraau gareko haae yasabaare aja patrakaara sammelana garera wistarita jaanakaari dine praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
eka warsaaghi dallulaganakhela rutamaa chalne basamaa eka yuwaale hastamaithuna gardai aghillo sitamaa baseki eka mahilaako kapaalamaa wirya skhalana gareko bhidio saarwajanika bhaeko thiyo
parsaa praharile hundimaa prayoga bhaeko laakha rakamasahita eka janaa bhaaratiyalaai pakraau gareko chha
biara bhi nambarako motarasaaikalamaa sawaara unalaai praharile chekajaancha gardaa unako saathabaata srota nakhuleko tina laakha rupaiyaan rakama phelaa pareko parsaa praharile janaaeko chha
alamamaathi awasyaka anusandhaana thaalieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale janaaeko chha

moranako belabaari nagarapaalikaa bhaaunnekaa sthaaniyako jaggaa naapi gari simaankana garna saahale saata hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa maagekaa thie unalaai akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako itaharisthita kaaryaalayako tolile pakraau gareko ho
rautahatamaa raheko jillaa kaaraagaara gaurabaata aitabaara raati eka janaa kaidi pharaara bhaekaa chhan
apaharana tathaa saaririka bandakako abhiyogamaa gaura kaaraagaaramaa kaida bhuktaana garirahekaa warindawana nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya asoka yaadawa aitabaara raati pharaara bhaekaa hun

sarlaahimaa bhaeko baalaka apaharana muddaamaa yaadawalaai adaalatale warsa kaida sajaaya sunaaeko thiyo wigata warsa dekhi jela sajaaya bhogirahekaa yaadawa raati kaidi ganne kramamaa kaaraagaarakaa kaaryaalaya sahaayaka ekaraamula hakako milomatomaa bhaageko hunasakne jillaa praharikaa diesapi nawina kaarkile jaanakaari die

kaaraagaarabhitra antarika rupamaa widyuta sambandhi kaama sameta garne garekaa yaadawa raati bajeko samayamaa widyuta sewaa awaruddha banaaera dhyaaroko phaaidaa uthaaundai bhaageko kaaraagaara prasaasanale janaaeko chha
raati batti nabalepachhi banaauna unako khoji bhaeko thiyo tara kaaraagaarabhitra phelaa naparepachhi uni bhaageko jaanakaari kaaraagaara prasaasanale paaeko thiyo
pharaara bhaekaa yaadawako khoji kaarya jaari raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatale janaaekaae chha
praharile sarakaaradwaaraa pratibandhita netrawikrama chanda wiplawa samuhakaa myaagdi jillaa sekretari resama saapakotaalaai hatiyaarasahita pakraau garekaae chha
saapakotaalaai raati nai beni sthita jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa lyaaera thapa anusandhaana suru gareko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile makawaanapura ra baankekaae wibhinna sthaanabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa newaarapaanisthita hariyaali saamudaayika jumgalabaata kariba kilo awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa praharile baraamada gareko chha

newaarapaanisthita sadakamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya newaarapaanibaata khatieko praharilaai dekhera manaharibaata hetaumdaatarpha aundai gareko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala bhaagekole praharile pichchhaa gardai jaandaa so jumgalamaa ukta motarasaaikala ra plaastikako boraamaa raheko laaguausadha gaanjaa chhaadi maanisa pharaara bhaepachhi ukta gaanjaa baraamada bhaeko ho
pharaara wyaktiko khoji gariraheko ukta ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa baata niyantrita laaguausadha saya thaana naaitraabheta sahita janaalaai aitabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa sohi sthaana basne warsiya biramaana budhaathoki ra humlaa chankheli gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya madana kumaara saahi rahekaa chhan laaguausadha niyantrana byuro nepaalagumja ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jamunaahabaata khatieko praharile bhaaratabaata nepaalagumjatarpha airahekaa uniharulaai jaancha gardaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
bhaaratatarpha taskari hundai gareko buddhachitta maalaa ra rudraaksasahita makawaanapura praharile tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

manahari gaanupaalikaa manahari bajaarasthita purwapaschima sadaka khandabaata ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya manahariko tolile chekajaanchakaa kramamaa kaarabhitra boraa ra jholaamaa lukaai chhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa ukta wastu phelaa pareko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile pratibandhita netra wikrama chanda wiplawa samuhakaa daana jillaa kamiti sadasya iswari paandelaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryalaya daanabaata saadaa posaakamaa khatieko prahari tolile paandelaai aja tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara gahatebaata pakraau gareko ho paande wiplawa samuhako paschima daanakaa sekretari sameta hun

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaabaata khatieko traaphika prahari tolile sujuki draaibhina skula ekaantakunaakaa sawaari chaalaka tanahunko bhaanu nagarapaalikaa mulapaani ghara bhai haala lalitapurako kusunti basne bharata basnetalaai pakraau gareko ho
jyaanamaaraa muddaakaa pharaara abhiyukta sindhupaalchokakaa wisnau laamaa taamaanalaai pakraau garna praharile goli chalaaeko ho

apasi waadawiwaadako kramamaa sanibaara raati taamaanale dhakeldaa ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa saarki gurunako sthaaniya swaasthya chauki hundai jillaa aspataala dhunchemaa thapa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
ghatanaapachhi pharaara rahekaa taamaanalaai simaa prahari chauki timurebaata khatieko praharile syaaphru bajaarabaata pakraau gareko ho
tanahunko bhimaada nagarapaalikaa mirchhulunasthita enasela taawaramaa gae raati ajnaata samuhale agajani garekaae chha

agajanibaata taawarako sabai upakarana jalera nasta bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhimaadakaa pramukha prahari naayaba niriksaka bhesaraaja regmile jaanakaari dinubhayo raati baje taawara banda bhaeko myaaseja enasela karmachaariko mobaailamaa aeko thiyo bihaana gaera herdaa taawara agajani bhaeko awasthaa bhetieko bataaieko chha
praharile kaathamaadaum ra baankekaae chhuttaachhuttai sthaabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita dui janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

kaathamaadaumkaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa baagabajaarasthita basapaarkabaata niyantrita laaguausadha phenaaragana empula lupi empula daaijepaama empula ra nagada laakha hajaara rupaiyaansahita sindhupaalchoka saangaachoka gadhi nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala thamela jyaathaa basne warsiya yaadawa thaapaalaai sanibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa jamunaaha cheka pwaaintabaata awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara graamasahita raaptisonaari gaaunpaalikaa kachanaapura basne warsiya rudra saahalaai sanibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

laaguausadha niyantrana byuro nepaalagumja ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jamunaahabaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa unalaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parneharumaa pimgalaasthaana basne dhanusaa ganaesamaana saaranaatha nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya dharmendra paasawaana ra sirahaa bisnaupura gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya dinesa kumaara jhaa rahekaa chhan

mahaanagariya prahari waritta gausaalaabaata khatieko praharile baa cha nambarako kaara jaancha garne kramamaa sitamuni lukaaichhipaai raakheko ukta pestola phelaa paari kaaramaa sawaara uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile kaathamaadaumkaae bibhinna sthaanabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau garekaae chha

sohi sthaanamaa mahaanagariya prahari waritta jagaatibaata khatieko praharile unalaai naa kha nambarako tipara maadaka padaartha sewana gari chalaaeko phelaa paari kaarabaahi garne kramamaa ukta nagada praharilaai dina khoje paschaata pakraau gareko ho
jhaapaako birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa paschima basapaarkabaata niyantrita laaguausadha sahita janaalaai praharile pakraau garekaae chha

bisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko prahari tolile damaka nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya sanabira taamaana ra phidima nagarapaalikaa ki barsiyaa anjanaa dhunagaanaalaai graama niyantrita laaguausadha braauna sugara sahita pakraau gareko ho
laagaausadha sahita pakraau parekaa duwaijanaako sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anaaramanile janaaeko chha
praharile pratibandhita netra wikrama chanda wiplawa samuhakaa gorakhaa jillaa sadasya omaprakaasa gurunalaai pakraau garekaae chha
paalunataara nagarapaalikaa chyaanalikaa warsiya gurunalaai praharile sanibaara raati pakraau garekaae haae

jaajarakotako nalagaadha nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya raama bahaadura wikale sanibaara saanjha khurpaa prahaara gardai hinddaa okhaladhungaakaae champaadewi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaibhaktapura nagarapaalikaa kaae kamalawinaayaka basne warsiyaa bhunaamaayaa thaapaa ra warsiyaa raajamati jyaakibanjaara ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
tyasaigari mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga wyaasimaa kaaryarata prahari hawaladaara jitendra prasaada yaadawa ra prahari jawaana tola bahaadura srestha pani ghaaite bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

ghatanaa sambandhamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaale diieko jaanakaari anusaara dilipako daahine kokhaamaa chaara janaa milera phalaamako radale ghochera kholaamaa sutaai tiparale kichera hatyaa garieko praharile niskarsa nikaalekaae haae
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaale hatyaa aropamaa pakraau parekaaharulaai sanibaarai raati kariba baje patrakaara sammelana gari saarwajanika garekaae chha

dhanusaako mithilaa nagarapaalikaa srinagarakaa warsiya dilipa mahatoko sukrabaara bihaana baje jhisamisemai tipara chalaaera hatyaa garieko thiyo yadyapi praharile gareko praarambhika anusandhaanakaa kramamaa pahilaa phalaamako libharale unimaathi prahaara gari ghaaite banaaera unimaathi naa kha nambarako tipara chalaaeko baahira aeko chha

praharile krasara udyogi wipinalaai sanibaara bihaana unako sasuraali gaaunbaata pakraau gareko thiyo praharile hatyaamaa sumlagnalaai unmukti nadine pratibaddhataa janaaepachhi sanibaarai pariwaarakaa sadasyale dilipakaae sawa bujhekaa thie sanibaara saanjha postamaartama gari dilipako sawa pariwaarajanalaai bujhaaieko dhanusaa praharile janaaekaae chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale ghusasahita lekhaa adhikaritalaai hajaara rupaiyaan ghusasahita pakraau gareko chha

purwaadhaara wikaasa kaaryaalaya lalitapurakaa lekhaa adhikarita wisnauhari pudaasainilaai hajaara ghusasahita akhtiyaarale pakraau gareko ho thekkaadaarasanga mobilaaijesana kharcha lindaalindai pakraau pareko akhtiyaarakaa prawakraa pradipa koiraalaale jaanakaari die
eka bhaaratiya naagarikako hatyaa abhiyogamaa saata janaalaai pakraau gari anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhupaalchokale janaaeko chha

bhaaratako wihaara ghara bhai parsaa jillaa pokhariyaa nagarapaalikaa basdai aekaa warsiya raajakumaara mukhiyaako hatyaa abhiyogamaa wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya prema yaadawa warsiya bholaa maajhi saaha warsiya raajesa mettara warsiya raajana saaha warsiya asoka saaha warsiya winoda paasawaana ra rupandehi tilottamaa napaa kaa warsiya santosa thaapaamagaralaai pakraau garieko praharile janaaekaae chha

jillaako phatakasilaabaata pusa gate ra prema yaadawalaai parsaa prahariko sahayogamaa pusa gate wiraganjabaata pakraau garieko ho hatyaakaa mukhya abhiyukta thekedaara samira miyaan pharaara rahekaale khojatalaasa bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

baatomaa wiwaada parepachhi mukhiyaalaai kutapita gari hatyaa garekaa thie thekedaarakai milematomaa melamchi nagarapaalikaa phatakasilaako chapletaa paakhaa bagaramaa sawa phaalekaa thie ukta thaaun asapaasa durgandha phailina thaalepachhi sthaaniyawaasile praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

sawaari durghatanaamaa ksatipurti dilaai die baapata sewaagraahisanga hajaara ghusa lieko bhandai dhanusaako ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya yajnabhumi dhaaraapaani maa kaaryarata pumjiyaarawiruddha muddhaa daayara garieko ayogakaa prawaktaa pradipakumaara koiraalaale jaanakaari diekaa chhan
aphnai bhaaujulaai dhungaa prahaara gari gambhira ghaaite banaaeko abhiyogamaa praharile moranabaata eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

jillaako belabaari nagarapaalikaa keraatola basne warsiya jagatabahaadura pariyaaralaai bihibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko ho saamaanya gharaayasi biwaada hundaa jagatabahaadurale aphnai warsiyaa bhaaujulaai dhungaa prahaara gari gambhira ghaaite banaaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha prahari chauki baahunibaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho
ghaaitelaai upachaarako laagi nyuro aspataala wiraatanagaratarpha pathaaieko chha yasa sambandhamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale baagalunale awaidha gharelu madiraa banaauna prayoga hune dui hajaara litara jaanda baraamada gari nasta gareko chha
praharile netra wikrama chanda wiplawa samuhakaa paschima nawalaparaasi jillaa sadasya mohana saapakotaalaai sukrabaara bihaana pakraau gareko chha

bardaghaata nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya saapakotaalaai praharile saraawala gaaunpaalikaako tilakapurabaata pakraau gareko haae praharile unimaathi duiwataa ghatanaamaa abhiyoga lagaai saamgathanika aparaadha muddaamaa kaarabaahi prakriyaa aghi badhaaeko chha

pakraau parnemaa baaglunako dhorapaatana nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai kaathamaadaum grinalyaanda basdai aekaa warsiya dewendrakumaara ghartimagara ra dhaadinako nilakantha nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai kaathamaadaum nayaanbajaara basne warsiya sujana paudela chhan uniharulaai mahaanagariya prahari aparaadha mahaasaakhaako tolile budhabaara pakraau gareko ho
praharile baanke makawaanapura ra baaraakaae chhuttaachhuttai sthaanabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita dui janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa baata raapti sonaari gaaunpaalikaa silariyaa basne warsiya buddhiraama wiswakarmaalaai saya graama awaidha laaguausadha charesa sahita budhabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa raatomaatesthita purwapaschima raajamaargabaata chitawana raapti nagarapaalikaa gadyauli basne warsiya karisna bahaadura thaapaa magaralaai kariba kilo awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita budhabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile chitawanabaata baaraatarpha jaandai gareko pradesa nambara pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai jaancha gardaa ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari motarasaaikala sahita chaalaka karisnabahaaduralaai pakraau gareko ho
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya prasaunibaata khatieko praharile ukta baatoko chheumaa bewaarise awasthaamaa seto boraako jholaamaa ukta laaguausadha baraamada gareko ho
praharile nuwaakotabaata bharuwaa banduka sahita eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa dupcheswara gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya guru dorje serpaa rahekaa chhan serpaale gharamaa bharuwaa banduka lukaaichhipaai raakheko chha bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha prahari chauki samundrataarabaata khatieko praharile unako ghara najikai raheko saalako rukhamaa lukaai raakheko awasthaamaa thaana bharuwaa banduka sahita budhabaara diunso praharile unalaai pakraau gareko haae

hulaaki raajamaargaantargata gujaraako simari tolako sadaka nirmaanamaa prayoga hundai aekobaa kha nambarako skaabhetaramaathi agajani bhaeko ho agajanibaata skaabhetarakaa mahattwapurna bhaaga jaleko praharile janaaeko chha

skaabhetaramaa bihibaara bihaana baje ago laageko dekhepachhi sthaaniyale praharilaai khabara garekaa thie lagattai ghatanaasthala pugekaa nepaala prahari sasastra prahari bala ra sthaaniyale ago nibhaaekaa thie
ago kina ra kasale lagaaidieko ajhasamma khulna nasakeko ra ghatanaa sambandhamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatale janaaeko chha
paanchatharako phaalgunanda gaaunpaalikaa raake bajaarabaata abaidha rupamaa lyaaudai garekaae kaartuna abaidha bhaaratiya sikime raksi sahita tina janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

prahari chauki raakebaata chekajaanchamaa khatieko prahariko tolile mumgalabaara raati ilaama baata phidima tarpha audai gareko maaruti bhena bhitra lukaaera lyaaudai gareko ukta madiraa baraamada garekaae haae

praharile madiraa sahita bhenakaa chaalaka ilaama nagarapaalikaa barabote basne barsa ko nirmala tiwaari bhenamaa sawaara warsa ko dilli ghimire ilaama nagarapaalikaa phikakla basne barsa ko monikaa achaaryalaai pakraau garekaae chha
niyantranamaa liieko madiraa bhena ra pakraau parekaa tinai janaalaai budhabaara diunso raajaswa kaaryaalaya jhaapaa pathaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paachantharale janaaeko chha
wibhinna muddaakaa dui janaa pharaara pratiwaadilaai praharile saptariko daakneswaribaata pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa saptariko daakneswari nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya balaraama mehataa ra sohi thaaunkaa warsiya munara yaadawa rahekaa chhan suraksaa besa kyaampa pattharagadhaabaata khatieko prahari tolile uniharulaai pakraau gareko haae

budhabaara jillaa adaalata salyaanale ghatanaa bhaeko jhandai saadhe dui warsapachhi apaharana ra hatyaamaa sumlagna janaalaai warsadekhi janma kaidasammako sajaayako phaisalaa sunaaeko ho saala jetha gate daanabaata salyaana lagera tulasipurakaa wyawasaayi sresthasangai ghoraahikaa yuwaa ranabahaadura ghartiko apaharana gari gate hatyaa garieko thiyo

tatkaalina daanakaa prahari pramukha dhirajaprataapa simhasahitako prahari anusandhaana tolile wyaapaari srestha apaharana ra hatyaa ghatanaakaa mukhya yojanaakaarasahita janaa sumlagna bhaeko bhanne pratiwedana saarwajanika gareko thiyo

wyawasaayi sresthalaai saala jetha gate tulasipurabaata apaharana gari salyaana puryaaieko thiyo apaharanako tina dinapachhi jetha gate nai sresthako hatyaa bhae pani sawa bhane dinapachhi maatrai phelaa pareko thiyo sawa salyaana jillaako chhatreswari gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num jhimpeko odhaaramaa phelaa pareko hundaa muddaa pani jillaa adaalata salyaanale hereko thiyo
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata maladwaaramaa lukaaera lyaaekaae graama sunasahita eka janaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha

paschima nawalaparaasiko bhumisudhaara tathaa maalapota kaaryaalaya paraasiko bhumisudhaara saakhaamaa kaaryarata kharidaara netrabahaadura chaudharilaai budhabaara ghusasahita pakraau gareko akhtiyaarale janaaeko chha

chaudharile mohiko jaggaa baandaphaandalaai milaai dine bhandai sewaagraahisanga rakama lindai gardaa akhtiyaarale pakraau gareko haaebutawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa buddhanagara ghara bhaekaa chaudharilaai niyantranamaa lii anusandhaana bhairaheko akhtiyaarale janaaeko chha

kumaalale maadaka padaartha sewana gari saamaanya wiwaadako kaarana srimatilaai hyaammara prahaara gardaa ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehi ra wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhairahawaabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho

praharile bardiyaakaae gulariyaa nagarapaalikaa sthita pasuhaatabajaara najikaibaata awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara kariba graama saya miligraama sahita janaalaai mumgalabaara raati pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa gulariyaa nagarapaalikaa gumgaanagara tola basne warsiya sani maharjana ra warsiya surendra kumaara chaudhari rahekaa chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaabaata khatieko praharile bhe pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa dallu pulasthita diutimaa khatieko praharilaai nagada saya rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojne bhaktapura baalakota basne daana ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya rabina ghartilaai mumgalabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
praharile nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa chaulikaa chokabaata bhansaara chhali lyaaundai gareko pataakaa baraamada garekaae chha

rupaidihaabaata nepaalaganjatarpha bhansaara chhali lyaaundai gareko kariba laakha rupaiyaan baraabarako boraa pataakaa mumgalabaara diunso praharile baraamada gareko haae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankebaata khatieko praharile ukta pataakaa baraamada gareko ho
parsaa praharile hundimaa prayoga bhaeko chaara laakha hajaara rakamasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

biara sike nambarako skutaramaa sawaara unalaai praharile chekajaancha gardaa srota nakhuleko rakama phelaa pareko parsaa praharile janaaeko chha sriwaastawamaathi awasyaka anusandhaana thaalieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale janaaeko chha

parsaako pokhariyaa nagarapaalikaa siwabarwaaki warsiyaa punitaa kumaariko unakai buwaaamaa ra kaakaale hatyaa garekaa hun kisoriko hatyaako ghatanaamaa sumlagna raheko asumkaamaa praharile uniharulaai somabaara pakraau gareko ho
praharikaa anusaara dinaaghi punitaa haraaeko suchanaa praharimaa pugeko thiyo ujuri bhane kasaile diekaa thienan praharile suchanaakai adhaaramaa punitaako khoji kaarya suru gareko thiyo
udayapurako kataari nagarapaalikaamaa buhaari dalita bhaeko thaahaa paaepachhi pariwaaranai milera hatyaa gareko rahasya barsapachhi praharile pattaa lagaaeko chha

jillaako kataari nagarapaalikaa simlemaa udayapuragadhi baahunitaarakaa warsiyaa sumgitaa wiswakarmaalaai unakai srimaana yuwaraaja kaarki sasuraa nainabahaadura kaarki ra dewara sujana kaarkile hatyaa gareko rahasya pattaalaageko ho

laamo anusandhaanapaschaata praharile hatyaa bhaeko bhandai gata mumsiramaa dewara sujana kaarkilaai pakraau gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kataarikaa pramukha diesapi premasaagara kesile jaanakaari die

kataaribaatai sujanalaai niyantranamaa liera garieko anusandhaanapaschaata buwaa nainabahaadura ra daaju maritakakaa srimaana yuwaraaja kaarkilaai kaathamaadaumko kapanabaata gata mumsiramaa niyantranamaa liieko diesapi kesile bataae

bhaktapura suryabinaayaka nagarapaalikaa baalakotabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji sahita kausalataara basne dolakhaa bhimeswara nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya satyamaana taamaanalaai somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

kanchanapura belauri nagarapaalikaa pachuibaata awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara jasto dekhine bastu graama sahita kailaali dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya gunaala sunuwaaralaai somabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belauri ra pradesa anusandhaana wyurobaata khatieko praharile unalaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

dhanusaa janakapura upamahaanagarapalikaa sthita sadakabaata niyantrita laaguausadha nurphina empula daaijepaama empula phenaaragana empula ra naaitraabheta tyaableta pattaa sahita janaalaai somabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa dolakhaa sailuna gaaunpaalikaa basne taansi bhanne warsiya paasaana taamaana sindhupaalchoka baahrabise nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya samira srestha ra lisanakhu gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya sonaama taamaana rahekaa chhan
nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya janakapura ra prahari chauki jiromaaila dhanusaabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako tolile kaathamaadaumko saankhusthita maalapota kaaryaalayamaa kaaryarata naayawa subbaa raameswara kuinkela ra lekhaapadhi byawasaayi sriraama saapakotaalaai hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa rakamasahita pakraau garekaae chha
gulmiko ismaa gaaunpaalikaa simapaanimaa sunakaa gahanaa lutna duijanaa buhaari milera saasuko hatyaa garekaa chhan
duwai janaalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gulmile hiraasatamaa raakhera thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
praharile jhaapaako birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa mitranagarabaata nakkali nota sahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
pakraau parnemaa jhaapaako birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa basne barsiya surendra yonahaana ra moranako belabaari nagarapaalikaa basne barsa ko kirana khawaasa rahekaa chhan

uniharulaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anaaramanibaata khatieko prahariko tolile somabaara diunso pakraau garekaae haae praharile uniharukaae saathabaata hajaara darako thaana nakkali nepaali nota baraamada garekaae chha
pakraau parekaa dubaijanaalaai sammaanita jhaapaa jillaa adaalatamaa upasthita garaai dinako myaada thapa paschaata anya anusandhaana jaari raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anaaramani janaaeko chha
praharile pratibandhita netra wikrama chanda wiplawa samuhakaa nuwaakota jillaa sekretari asoka bhanne wintosa silawaalalaai pakraau garekaae chha

saauna gate sindhuliko hariharapuragadhi gaaunpaalikaa maa rokiraakheko skaabhetaraharumaa agajani gari ksati puryaaeko aropamaa silawaalalaai prahariko wisesa byurole somabaara taarkeswarako paiyutaarabaata pakraau gareko ho
silawaalalagaayata anya wyaktiharule kaalikaa kanstraksanakaa sadaka nirmaana kaaryamaa prayoga gariekaa sawaari saadhanamaa bama ra agajani garekaa thie tyasayataa silawaala pharaara thie

chitawanakaae bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa siwaraama choka najika somabaara eka nawajaata sisuko sawa bhetieko haae boraamaa poko paarera phaalieko awasthaamaa kariba mahinaako sisuko sawa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya chitawanale janaaekaae chha

sisuko sawalaai bharatapura aspataalamaa lyaaera postamaartama garieko chha sisulaai kasalai maarera phaaleko huna sakne asumkaa praharile gareko chha ghatanaakaa baaremaa thapa anusandhaana bhairahekole bhetieko sisuko sawa kasako ho bhanne kehi nakhuleko praharile janaaekaae chha
mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale somabaara ekaidina saya sawaari chaalakalaai kaarabaahi gareko chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayoga hetaumdaa kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka kesawa bhattaraai netaritwako tolile naapi kaaryaalayaantargata num naapi toliko kaaryaalaya wiraganjabaata paasawaanalaai somabaara pakraau gareko ho

akhtiyaarakaa anusaara wiraganja raanighaatasthita naapi kaaryaalayamaa kaaryarata sarweksaka paasawaanale jaggaa haala saabika gari punah naapi jaggaadhani pramaana purjaa banaauna sewaagraahisanga hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa maagekaa unalaai rumgehaata niyantranamaa lieko akhtiyaarakaa prawaktaa pradipakumaara koiraalaale jaanakaari die
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarile wibhinna muddaamaa pharaara rahekaa abhiyuktalaai jillaakaae wibhinna sthaanabaata somabaara pakraau gareko chha
adaalatabaata kaida tathaa jariwaanaa tokii haalasamma pharaara rahekaa abhiyuktalaari lukichhipi basiraheko awasthaamaa pakraau garieko praharile janaaekaae chha
pakraau parnemaa bode barsaaina nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya khagendra yaadawa khadka nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya isaraaila miyaan sohi nagarapaalikaa kaa raajakumaara saaha rahekaa chhan

yasaigari khadka nagarapaalikaa kaa misrilaala chaudhariko hakamaa chhoraa arunakumaara chaudhari ra sukhaira chaudhariko hakamaa srimati sukamaaradewi chaudhari bode barsaaina nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya chandeswara saaha teli khadka nagarapaalikaa kaa najabuda miyaan ra sohi nagarapaalikaa kaa mahinaaraayana chaudhariko hakamaa bhaai dipanaaraayana chaudhari rahekaa chhan

yasaigari raajagadha gaaunpaalikaa kaa balawirakumaara yaadawa balaana bihula gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya jayaraama saaha surungaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya narasihum chaudhari khadka nagarapaalikaa kaa phaagu mandala bode barsaaina nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya jhauli mandala sohi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya mahendra saaha ra warsiya raamasundara yaadawa khadka nagarapaalikaa badri chaudhari ra sangitaakumaari chaudhari pakraau parekaa chhan
praharile kaathamaadaumkaae nyurodabaata hundi kaarobaaramaa sumlagna chaara janaalaai saadhe laakha rakamasahita pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa kaathamaadaum kaa gopaala agrawaala taahachalakaa kamala agrawaala sunasari dharaana kaa naaraayanakumaara agrawaala ra sindhupaalchoka melamchikaa bholaa nepaala rahekaa chhan uniharulaai mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaako tolile nyurodakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa chhaapaa maari pakraau gareko ho

baaraakaae kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaasthita kalaiyaa bajaarabaata kirte naagarikataa banaai wibhinna wyaktiko naamamaa mani traansapharabaata paisaa nikaaldai gareko awasthaamaa janaalaai aitabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parneharumaa rautahata garudaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya surendra saaha ra gadhimaai nagarapaalikaa gamariyaa tola basne syaama chaudhari rahekaa chhan
parsaa praharile laaguausadha muddaakaa pharaara pratiwaadilaai pakraau garekaae chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko praharile unakai gaaungharamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho unalaai awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi jillaa adaalata parsaa pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha

praharile aitabaara diunso dhaadinabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko pradesa kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara parsaa chhiparamaai gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya sambhusaahakaae saathabaata abaidha laaguausadha charesa jasto dekhine padaartha saya graama baraamada garekaae haae
praharile dhanagadhibaata laaguausadha braauna sugarako kaarobaaramaa sumlagna raheko aropamaa mahilaasahita paanchajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya samira ghimire warsiya saugaata bona sijaapati warsiya rohita nepaali warsiya rosana simha ra warsiyaa asmi dhungaanaa rahekaa chhan

wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa prahari tolile uniharulaai dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa baata pakraau gareko haae praharile uniharuko saathabaata braauna sugaralagaayata laaguausadha baraamada gareko chha

sawaari jyaana muddaamaa rupandehi jillaa adaalatale phaisalaa sunaaesangai pharaara rahekaa syaanjaako saawika daarsina dahathuma gaawisa haala bhirakota nagarapaalikaa wadaa num basne warsiya tekabahaadura gurunalaai pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya syaanjaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka ewum prahari prawaktaa nawinakarisna bhandaarile bataae
pakraau pratiwaadilaai aja syaanjaa jillaa adaalatamaa pesa gari tokieko sajaaya bhuktaanakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaana garieko prawaktaa bhandaarile bataae

rupandehiko tilottamaa nagarapaalikaa waada namwara jaanaki pathabaata kilo charesasahita gulmiko resungaa nagarapaalikaa waada nambara kaa warsiya sanjaya raauta ra sohi sthaanakaa warsiya padama thaapaalaai pakraau garekaae haae
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata maladwaaramaa lukaaera lyaaekaae adhaa kilo sunasahita eka janaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa kijaakethila nausaada rahekaa chhan aitabaara diusaae yueiko saarajahaabaata nepaala aekaa unalaai tribhuwana antarraastriya bhansaarawimaanasthala prahari ra mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaale pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parnemaa bhaaratiya nagaarika mohamada myaadina sthaali rahekaa chhan bhansaara ksetra katisakepachhi sumkaa laagera kaathamaadaum medikala kalejamaa lagera jachaaundaa ukta hiraa maladwaaramaa raakhera lyaaeko bhetieko praharile janaaeko chha
parsaa praharile kartawya jyaana muddhaa ra jawarajasti karanai muddhaakaa pharaara dui janaa pratiwaadilaai pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile unakai gharamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho

yasaigari sohi adaalatako maagha gateko phaisalaale jawarajasti karanai muddaamaa warsa mahinaa dina kaida sajaaya thahara bhai pharaara rahekaa parsaa chhipaharamaai gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya dinesa prasaada saaha kaanulaai sanibaara praharile pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile unakai gharamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho
duwaijanaalaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi jillaa adaalata parsaa pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale janaaeko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya newaarapaanibaata khatieko prahari tolile chekajaancha garne kramamaa biara biji nambarako bhaaratiya nambarako kaarabaata wataa pokaamaa lyaaundai gareko ukta laaguausadha gaanjaa ra kaara sahita chaalaka dhanusaa mukhiyaarapatti gaaunpaalikaa musaharaniyaa basne warsiya asoka kumaara yaadawasameta janaalaai phelaa paari niyantranamaa lieko ho
praharilaai nagada saya rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojne makawaanapura bhimaphedi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai duwaakota basne warsiya uttama thaapaa magaralaai sanibaara belukaa praharile pakraau gareko chha

jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya dipaayalale jillaamaa eka mahinaako awadhimaa kula ru laakha badhi raajaswa sankalana gareko chha pachhillo sayama jillaamaa khatieko traaphika praharile sawaari saadhana jaanchamaa kadaai garna thaaleko chha

chaalu awako mansira mahinaasammamaa kula eka hajaara sawaari chaalakalaai kaarawaahi garieko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya dipaayalakaa pramukha asoka khadkaale jaanakaari die unale bhane haamro uddesya bhaneko raajaswa sankalana garnebhandaa pani sawaari durghatanaa rokne ho haami tyahianusaara kaama garirahekaa chhaun
tyastai traaphika prahari basne bhawana ra darabandianusaarakaa traaphika prahari nahundaa pani traaphika wyawasthaapanamaa nikai samasyaa hune gareko kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

janasakti abhaawa dotimaa maatra nabhai sudurapaschimakaa sabai jillaamaa raheko ra kramikarupamaa traaphika prahari sankhyaa thapindai jaane sudurapaschima ksetriya traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya attariyaakaa pramukha tathaa traaphika prahari upariksaka lokendra sresthale jaanakaari die unale bhane janasakti abhaawa chha sabai jillaakaa aphnaa bhawana chhainan tara pani aphusanga bhaeko janasakti ra srotasaadhanalaai purnarupamaa prayoga garekaa chhaun sewaa prawaahamaa baadhaa huna dinnaun

traaphika praharile jillaamaa sanchaalana gareko traaphika sachetanaa abhiyaanaanusaara sawaari saadhanamaa sita ksamataabhandaa badhi yaatru bokne saathamaa awasyaka kaagajaata nabhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa tina janaa sawaara garne madiraa sewana gari sawaari saadhana chalaaune sita belta nabaandhne laaparawaahi garne nambarapleta nabhaekaa tathaa bidaako dina sarakaari sawaari saadhana chalaaunelaai kaarawaahi garieko traaphika kaaryaalaya dipaayala dotile janaaeko chha

awasyakataaanusaara traaphika prahariko sankhyaa kami bhae pani jillaakaa mukhya bajaara budara bipinagara saanaagaanu tilataali silagadhi ra dipaayala bajaaramaa parichaalana garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dotikaa pramukha tathaa prahari upariksaka dilipasimha deuwaale jaanakaari die unale bhane janasakti abhaawa hundaa pani jillaakaa pramukha bajaaramaa traaphika prahari parichaalana garieko chha sadaka pugekaa jillaakaa anya graamina ksetramaa pani wistaarai parichaalana garne yojanaamaa chhaun raasasa
praharile parsaabaata nakkali bhaaratiya notasahita eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko tolile parsaako wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita basapaarkamaa raheko pyaaraadaaija hotalabaata warsiya riyaaja dewaanalaai pakraau gareko ho

praharile dewaanako saathabaata darakaa thaana gari nakkali bhaaratiya rupiyaan badaamada gareko chha dewaanalaai niyantranamaa lii awasyaka anusandhaana agaadi badhaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale jaanakaari dieko chha
pakraau parnemaa moranako rumgeli nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dipaka nepaala rahekaa chhan unalaai mahaanagari prahari aparaadha mahaasaakhaako tolile gata pusa gate pakraau gareko ho
praharile sunasariko baraahaksetra nagarapaalikaa harina kholaa jumgalabaata bharuwaa banduka sahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa baraahaksetrakai barsiya prema kaarki ra barsiya bama bahaadura magara rahekaa chhana uniharulaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahendranagara ra bana raksakako sumyuta gasti tolile pakraau garekaae haae
pakraau parekaa dubai janaalaai kaanuni kaarawaahi prakariyaa agaadhi badhaaieko chha bhane anya thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahendranagarale janaaeko chha
praharile makawaanapurabaata pachapanna keji gaanjaasahita chaara janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha pakraau parnemaa tina bhaaratiya ra eka nepaali rahekaa chhan

kariba keji gaanjaasahita makawaanapurako raaksisaana gaaunpaalikaa kaa raajakumaara moktaana ra keji laagupadaarthasahita bhaarata motihaarikaa dilipakumaara simhasahita anya dui janaalaai sanibaara hetaundaako raatamaatebaata pakraau garieko ho
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata dhulo banaai lyaaieko eka kilo dui saya graama sunasahita dui janaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaaratiya naagarika mohammada mittaaliba ra paraweja musarapha rahekaa chhan sanibaara raati phlaai dubaibaata nepaala aekaa uniharulaai tribhuwana antarraastriya bhansaarawimaanasthala prahari ra mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaale pakraau gareko ho
praharile baaraabaata keji gaanjaasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa mahottariki mamataa kaarki dhanusaakaa bilata mahato parsaaki wimalaa wika sohi sthaanaki palati maajhi ra ramiyaan chaudhari rahekaa chhan

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya nijagadhabaata khatieko praharile naa kha nambarako pokharaabaata janakapura chalne basa jaancha garne kramamaa jholaamaa lyaaundai gareko kariba keji laaguausadha gaanjaa phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

jaagira awadhimaa unako waidha aya laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan paiaisaa hunemaa unako kharcha tathaa lagaani karoda laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan paisaa dekhieko prawaktaa koiraalaale jaanakaari die
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata maladwaaramaa lukaaera lyaaieko saya graama sunasahita duijanaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha

praharile mukhya yojanaakaara maanekaa adama raaina pakraau parekaa hun prahariko mosta waanteda suchimaa rahekaa pharaara raainalaai dhanusaa praharile ghatanaa ghateko dinapachhi pakraau garekaae haae

gaekaae mumsira gate raati dhanusaako mahendranagaramaa bhaeko wisphotamaa wisphaaetamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahendranagarakaa inchaarja prahari niriksaka amira daahaala ausadhi wyawasaayi warsakaa raajeswara saaha ra unakaa chhoraa andaaji warsakaa ananda saahako marityu bhaekaae thiyaae

pakraau parekaa raaina netrawikrama chanda wiplawa samuhakaa kendriya sadasya raheko praharile janaaekaae chha raainalaai pakraau gari thapa anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaamaa raakhieko prahari srotale janaaeko chha
dhanusaa praharile ekaduidinabhitrai patrakaara sammelanako ayojanaa garera unalaai saarwajanika garne tayaari garirarahekaae bujhiekaae chha

madhyapura thimi nagarapaalikaa lokanthalisthita baa kha nambarako basabhitra juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa kaathamaadaum jadibuti basne sindhupaalchoka melamchi nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya gopi kumwara lagaayata janaalaai nagada laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita bihibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko haae

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaabaata khatieko prahari tolile kaathamaadaunko sukedhaaraasthita nakkali nepaali naagarikataa banaai pharaka wyaktile traayala pariksaa dindai gardaa uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile itaharibaata atometika pestolasahita dui janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
pakraau parnemaa sundaraharaimchaa kaa warsiya jaagira khaana ra sunasari harinagaraa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa warsiya jamila ansaari rahekaa chhan

praharile bihibaara belukaa itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara kadamaa tolamaa kopa motarasaaikala chekajaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta pestolasahita pakraau garekaae haae
parsaa praharile aphnai srimatiko kutapita gari hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa srimaan laai pakraau gareko chha
praharile aphnai srimati warsiyaa lalitaa dewilaai kutapita gari hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa parsaagadhi nagarapaalikaa pacharukhaa basne warsiya dewaa mahatolaai bihibaara pakraau gareko ho
mahatole eka mahinaa agaadi kutapita gardaa ghaaite bhaeki lalitaako naaraayanai aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa bihibaara bihaana marityu bhaeko thiyo
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pokhariyaabaata khatieko praharile mahatolaai pakraau gareko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale laaguausadha muddaamaa pharaara rahekaa pratiwaadilaai barsa pachhi pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko praharile aphnai gaanugharamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogakaae taaelile hajaara rupaiyaan ghusasahita prahari chauki tribhuwananagara sarlaahimaa kaaryarata prahari naayaba niriksakasai raajesakumaara simha ra prahari jawaana manojakumaara yaadawalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile baaraabaata dasa kilo gaanjaasahita paancha janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile nijagadha nagarapaalikaa sahida chokabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba kilo sahita mahotari sitaapura nagarapaalikaa godaara basne warsiyaa mamataa kaarkisahita janaalaai bihibaara bihaana pakraau gareko ho

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya nijagadhabaata khatieko praharile naa kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa jholaamaa lyaaundai gareko ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile parsaabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
prahari chauki inarwaabaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa mahatolaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata eka kilo sunasahita dui janaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile tanahunbaata thulo parimaanamaa laagu ausadha sahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa anbukhaireni gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya umesa khadkaa sohi thaaunkaa warsiya utsawa khadkaa ra gorakhaa paalunataara nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala anbukhaireni gaaunpaalikaa nai basne warsiya janaka srestha rahekaa chhan
tanahunko bhaanu nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raaju wikako hatyaa abhiyogamaa jillaa kaaraagaara tanahunmaa thunaamaa rahekaa tina janaalaai warsako kaida sajaaya bhaeko chha

wikako hatyaamaa sumlagna raheko abhiyogamaa pakraau parekaa lamajuna dudhapokhari gaaunpaalikaa sthaayi ghara bhai bhaanu nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa manakumaari kaami lamajuna dudhapokhari gaaunpaalikaa sthaayi ghara bhai bhaanu nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa manamaayaa kaami ra dordi gaaunpaalikaa laamaagaaun ghara bhai sohi thaaun basne warsiya ayusa wika bhanne buddhibahaadura kaamilaai jillaa adaalatale budhabaara kaida sajaaya sunaaeko ho

jillaa nyaayaadhisa waasudewa paudelako ijalaasale abhiyuktalaai ukta phaisalaa gareko jillaa adaalatakaa srestedaara sudarsana khanaalale jaanakaari die abhiyuktalaai janahi ru eka laakha hajaarakaa darale jariwaanaa garne nirnayasameta bhaeko chha sohi ghatanaamaa sumlagna bhaniekaa dhanabahaadura kaami ra manakumaara kaami bhane pharaara rahekaa janaaieko chha

praharile abhiyuktalaai wisum maagha gate pakraau gareko thiyo abhiyuktale raajuko hatyaa gari bhaanu nagarapaalikaa kaauretaarako inaaramaa phaalekaa thie sthaaniya raamaprasaada hadkhaleko baarimaa sinchaaikaa laagi khaneko inaarabhitra maritakako sawa durgandhita awasthaamaa phelaa parepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie abhiyukta sabai phaaguna gatedekhi purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa gaekaa thie raasasa

chhalimaayaako sawa asoja gate ghaanti nimothi ghaanti thichi hatyaa garieko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko thiyo chhalimaayaako hatyaa abhiyogamaa baalakalaai asoja gate marinako kapilaakotabaata praharile pakraau gareko thiyo

baalakalaai gata asoja gate sindhuli jillaa adaalatabaata myaada thapa gari praharile thapa anusandhaana garekomaa asoja gate adaalatale purpaksakaa laagi baala sudhaaragariha saanothimi bhaktapuramaa raakhna adesa dieko thiyo
baalaka warsa puraa nabhaesamma baala sudhaara gariha saanothimi bhaktapuramai rahane ra tyasapachhi kaaraagaaramaa kaida bhuktaana garne siwaakotile bataaunubhayo raasasa

praharile gaekaae kaattika gate raati syaamakarisna srestha ra uhaanki srimati rukumaayaa sresthako hatyaa aropamaa udayapura chaudandigadi nagarapaalikaa kaa sumana raai ra kiranakumaara magaralaai pakraau garekaae haae uniharulaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ra kendriya anusandhaana byuroko tolile pakraau gareko haae
praharile daanako ghoraahibaata laakha rupaiyaan phirauti rakama maagne eka janaalaai paaestaaelasahita pakraau gareko chha
rolpaa jillaako pariwartana gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num raanakotakaa warsiya raajakumaara damaailaai praharile katuwaa pestolasahita phirautiko rakama bujhdaigardaa budhabaara beluki pakraau gareko ho

pidita wyaktile so kuraa daana jillaa prahari pramukha esapi janaka bhattaraailaai jaanakaari die ani prahariko yojanaa anusaara sambandhita wyaktile budhabaara belukaa pahilopataka tina laakha rupaiyaan dine bhandai nakkali paisaako gaddi tayaara paarera phirauti maagdai aekaa rolpaakaa damaailaai bolaae
tyahi tina laakha nakkali rakamako gaddi phirauti bujhdai gardaa jillaa prahariko wisesa tolile damaailaai belukaa ghoraahibaata pakraau gareko haae

mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga naagadhungaabaata khatieko prahari taaelile dhaadinabaata kaathamaadauntarpha aundai gareko naaja numko taataasumo jaancha garne kramamaa ukta sumomaa sawaara makawaanapura thaahaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya bhagawaan khatrilaai pakraau gareko haae
praharile khatrikaae saathabaata chaara kilo graama laaguausadha charesa baraamada garekaae chha ukta ghatanaako wisayamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
praharile kaathamaadaum ra mahottaribaata juwaa taasa khelirahekaae awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaum kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa kalumkisthita makawaanapura hetaumdaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya sukaraama raaiko raaigaanu tikata kaauntaramaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa kalumki basne sunasari bhaasi nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya dinesa bhujela lagaayata janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita mumgalabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

nepaalile dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gardaa guruna gambhira ghaaite bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho ghaaite gurunako ghopaa aspataala dharaanamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

mandanadeupura nagarapaalikaako wadaa nambara maa raheko krasara udyoga melamchi enda indraawati stona praalimaa bama phelaa pareko ho bama phelaa paresangai udyogakaa karmachaarile praharilaai khabara garekaa thie
enasela taawarako tala taara jodieko bama phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetale janaaekaae chha bama niskriya paarna nepaali senaako dispojala toli pugisakeko chha
praharile kailaalibaata nakkali sunako kaarobaara garne dui janaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaarata pilibhita raaghupuri gaaun chauki bajaara ghara bhaekaa warsiya muktiyaara simha ra sohi thaaunkaa warsiya manjita simha chhan praharile uniharulaai mumgalabaara saanjha dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita basapaarkako nesanala gesta haausako nambara kothaabaata pakraau gareko ho
gaeraati ajnaata samuhale baaraako jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa piluwaasthita enasela taawaramaa agajani garekaae chha

so taawara sasastra audyogika suraksaa balabhandaa kariba mitara purwamaa pardachha agajani kasale gareko ho bhanne nakhuleko ra anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryalaa baaraale janaaeko chha
yastai mumgalabaara belukaa nai chitawanako kaalikaa nagarapaalikaa milanabajaaramaa raheko enaselako taawaramaa pani agajani bhaeko thiyo
pakraau parnemaa sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala bhaktapurako madhyapura thimi nagarapaalikaa lokanthalimaa basne barsiya dharmendrakumaara kusawaahaa rahekaa chhan

praharile somabaara budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kapana eriyaamaa taharaa banaai gharelu madiraa utpaadana gariraheko abasthaamaa tayaari madiraa saya litara ra kachchaa padaartha hajaara saya litara niyantranamaa lii sthaaniya janapratinidhiharuko rohawaramaa nasta gareko ho
praharile jhaapaako birtaamoda nagarapaalikaabaata thulo parimaanamaa laaguausadha khairo hiroinasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

birtaamodasthita ratna suparamaarketamaa laaguausadha khairo hiroinako kaarowaara bhairaheko praapta suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anaaramanibaata khatieko prahari tolile somabaara birtaamoda kaa warsiya rupesa wiswakarmaalaai khairo hiroinasahita pakraau gareko ho

praharile wiswakarmaakaa saathabaata eka graama miligraama khairo hiroina baraamada gareko chha bhane unako kothaamaa khaanatalaasi gardaa mobaaila phona chaarja garne saamasuma paawara byaanka bhitra lukaaera raakhieko graama miligraama khairo hiroina baraamada bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaekaae chha
pakraau parekaa wiswakarmaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anaaramanimaa raakhera thapa anusandhaana bhairahekaae chha

naagarikataa sachyaaeko wisayamaa awasyaka sodhapuchhakaa laagi mahaanagariya prahari kaaryalaya raanipokharimaa patrachaara gardai akhtiyaarale diesapi simhalaai upasthita garaauna nirdesana dieko ho
praharile kaathamaadaumkaae nayaanbasapaarkasthita tanahun hotalabaata eka kilograama nakkali sunasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata adhaa kilo sunasahita eka bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa mahaaraastra thaanaekaa sunila hariraama rahekaa chhan mumgalabaara bihaana saadhe baje plaai dubaibaata kaathamaadaum orlekaa unale maladwaarabhitra lukaaera lyaaeko adhaa kilo suna praharile baraamada garekaae haae
awaidha rupamaa osaarapasaara tathaa bechabikhana garna laageko bhanne wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa kendriya anusandhaana byuro mahaaraajagumjabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

yasaigari kaathamaadaum tokhaa nagarapaalikaa graandi eriyaabaata sumraksita wanyajantu chituwaako chhaalaa thaana sahita janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho pakraau parneharumaa nuwaakota bidura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya saroja ojhaa kaathamaandau taarakeswara nagarapaalikaa basne akhila laamaa bhanne warsiya surendra taamaana ra kailaali lamki chuhaa nagarapaalikaa basne karisna ksetri bhanne warsiya karisna saauda ksetri rahekaa chhan
praharile pradesa num kaa mukhyamantri doramanai paudelasanga abhadra kisimako sabda prayoga garera boleko aropamaa eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita basapaarkabaata hajaara saya rupaiyaan ghusa rakamasahita sasastra prahari jawaana sachitanaaraayana wiswaasa pakraau parekaa chhan

wiraatanagarasthita sasastra prahariko biopi posta bakharimaa kaaryarata wiswaasalaai kehi samayadekhi ghumuwaakaa rupamaa khataaieko thiyo uni moranako graamathaana gaaunpaalikaako tetariyaakaa baasindaa hun
mahaanagariya prahari kaaryalaya raanipokharibaata khatieko prahari tolile kasturiko winaa jasto dekhine wastu sahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile aitabaara saanjha gogumbu nayaanbasapaarka basne sunasari raamadhuni nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya syaama raailaai chaawahila ganaesasthaanabaata pakraau gareko haae
praharile moranako welabaari nagarapaalikaa kaseni raamapurabaata pestola ra golisahita wiplawa samuhakaa tina janaa kaaryakartaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraauparnemaa sundaraharaichaa nagarapaalikaa basne karisna chaulaagaaibhanne warsiya naresa chaulaagaai wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya ksitija paudela ra pathari sanischare nagarapaalikaa siddhaartha tola basne warsiya chiranjiwi dhitaala chhan

ukta sthaanamaa haatahatiyaarasahita uniharule chandaa asula gari hindeko bhanne suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai sunasarimorana ayojanaako nahara chheu keraaghaarimaa lukaai raakheko ukta pestola ra golisahita pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parekaamadhye chaulaagaai bhadau gate itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita godaawari skulako kampaaundamaa ra bhadau gate jhaapaa wirtaamoda nagarapaalikaa chaarapaane chokasthita sahaaraa nepaala sahakaari sumsthaamaa bhaeko bama bisphotana ghatanaamaa sameta sumlagna raheko anusandhaanabaata khulna aeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya morana janaaeko chha
purwinawalaparaasiko kaawaasoti nagarapaalikaako wadaa kaaryaalaya ra kapilawastuko yasodharaa gaaunpaalikaako nambara wadaa kaaryaalayamaa gaeraati ajnaata samuhale agajani gareko ho
agajanibaata kaawaasoti nagarapaalikaako wadaa kaaryaalayakaa pharnicharalagaayatakaa saamagri jaleko praharile janaaeko chha
kaathamaadaumkaae kapanamaa gae raati gharaayasi waadawiwaadakaae kramamaa eka janaale dorile ghaanti kasi aphnai srimatikaae hatyaa garekaa chhan
budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kapana basne warsiya laksmana nepaalale dorile ghaanti kasi aphnai srimati warsiyaa usaa paneru nepaalako hatyaa garekaa hun

uniharuko saathabaata etiema mesina phutaauna prayoga gareko dhumgaa pilaasa phalaamako rencha ra chakku praharile baraamada gareko chha yasa sambandhamaa praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
praharile sanibaara saanjha budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kapana saatatalebaata awaidha laaguausadhasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile kaathamaadaumbaata netrawikrama chanda wiplawa samuhakaa janaa kaaryakartaalaai pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa swayambhu kimadola basne juna nuchchhe maharjanako jastaako taharaamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya wisaala bista sahita janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita sanibaara belukaa praharile pakraau gareko haae

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya taaplejunabaata khatieko praharile sohi thaaunsthita unako ghara khaanatalaasi gardaa ilektrika detonetara thaana nana ilektrika detonetara thaana phita incha lambaaiko sephti phyuja waayara taaima setina dibhaaisa jasto wastu thaana rimota kantrola thaana byaatri seta thaana jiletina thaana ra katuwaa pestola thaana sahita phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho

tyastai sunasari baraaha ksetra nagarapaalikaa serechokabaata raaunda goli loda bhaeko meda ina yuesae lekhieko ribhalbara thaana ra wibhinna kampanikaa mobaaila thaana sahita janaalaai sanibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parneharumaa gorakhaa ajirakota gaaunpaalikaa kaaphaladaandaa basne warsiyaa umaa bhujela ra jhaapaa damaka nagarapaalikaa beladaangi basne warsiya sumana simha rahekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasaribaata khatieko prahari tolile chekajaancha garne kramamaa ko pa nambarako skutaramaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta ribhalbara ra mobaailaharusahita phelaa paari niyantranamaa lieko ho
praharile sirahaa nagarapaalikaa paterwaabaata laaguausadha sahita duijanaalaai pakraau garekaa chha
pakraau parnemaa narahaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya emaamudina ra sirahaa nagarapaalikaa ramaulakaa warsiya mohammada rahima rahekaa chhan praharile uniharulaai bihibaara raati pakraau gareko ho

suryabinaayaka nagarapaalikaa baalakota basne warsiya raama raanaabhaatako gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya jiwana srestha sameta janaalaai nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita bihibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko haae

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko praharile bhaaratabaata wiragumjatarpha aundai gareko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara susila ra sarojanilaai ukta rakama sahita phelaa paari niyantranamaa lii sodhapuchha gardaa uniharule hundi kaarowaarakaa laagi ukta rakama raaja kumaaralaai dinakaa laagi lyaaeko bataaepachhi raaja kumaaralaai sameta praharile pakraau gareko ho

jillaako siwasataaksi niwaasi warsiya sumkara murmule chhuraa prahaara gari aphnai warsiyaa srimati taalaamai hemaramako hatyaa garekaa chhan chhuraa prahaarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki unalaai upachaarakaa laagi sthaaniya praathamika swaasthya kendra siwaganja purayaaie pani tatkaalai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
sawaarimaa atyadhika bhaarakaa kaarana durghatanaa badheko bhandai traaphika praharile nawalaparaasipurwa nawalapurako pahaadi ksetramaa sanchaalita sawaariko huta hataauna thaaleko chha

pahaadi ksetramaa chalne jipamaa jokhimapurna yaatraa garne krama narokiepachhi praharile jipako hutanai hataaune rananiti apanaaeko ho traaphika praharile nawalapurako pahaadi ksetramaa anaawasyakarupamaa sawaarimaa jadaana gariekaa hutalaai hataauna thaaleko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya nawalaparaasipurwakaa pramukha munendra thaapaale bataae

traaphika kaaryaalaya nawalapurale ekai dinamaa pahaadi ksetramaa chalne saata wataa jipakaa huta hataaeko chha patakapataka hutamaa yaatru naraakhna anurodha gardaasameta yaatru raakhna nachhaadepachhi sawaariko huta aphaimle hataauna thaaleko traaphika pramukha thaapaale bataae

jillaako pahaadi ksetramaa chalne sabai sawaariko huta hataaine unale bataae unakaa anusaara basa wyawasaayi samiti ra jipa wyawasaayi samitilaai paripatra garera maapadanda kaayama raakhna bhane pani wyawasaayile ateri garepachhi traaphika prahari aphainle huta hataauna thaaleko ho

nawalapurako baudikaali bulinataara hupsekota gaaunpaalikaakaa pahaadi ksetramaa chalne sawaarile anumatibhandaa dherai yaatrulaai raakhera jokhimapurna yaatraa garaaundai aekaa chhan gaaungaaunmaa chalne sawaarile ksamataabhandaa badhi yaatru bokne tyasaimaathi bhaara thapne gari saamaana osaardaa sawaari durghatanaa badheko praharile janaaeko chha durghatanaa nyunikaranakaa laagi yo abhiyaana thaalieko traaphika pramukha thaapaale bataae

nawalaparaasipurwa nawalapuramaa dinahunjaso sawaari durghatanaakaa ghatanaa hune garekaa chhan badhdo sawaari durghatanaa nyunikaranakaa laagi bhandai jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya nawalapurale anya wibhinna kaarya gardai aeko chha

adaalatale bihibaara iswari bhattaraai mohammada nausaada mohammada rahisa ra bholaa kumaaralaai sarwaswasahita janmakaida sajaaya sunaaeko ho nyaayaadhisa daa prakaasa upretiko ijalaasale abhiyoga daabianusaara chaarai janaalaai hadaisammako sajaaya sunaaeko srestedaara ghanendra adhikaarile jaanakaari diekaa chhan

praharikaa anusaara nausaadale mahilaako hatyaa garna bhaaratabaata dui janaalaai kaathamaadaum bolaaekaa thie dubai mohammada rahisa ra bholaa kumaara thie iswari ra nausaada bhaktapurakai gaarmenta kaarakhaanaamaa kaama garthe sohi kramamaa nausaadasanga bheta bhaeko thiyo amaale duibichako sambandha mana naparaaekaa kaarana nausaadale hatyaa yojanaa banaaeko ra bhattaraaile sahayogi bhumikaa kheleko anusandhaanamaa ullekha thiyo

raani gambhira ghaaite bhai chhatapataai raheko jaanakaari praapta hunasaatha asthaayi prahari posta badaharibaata khatieko prahari tolile unalaai upachaarako laagi modela aspataala laalagadhamaa pathaaekaa thie upachaarakaa laagi laijaadai gardaa raanisanga sodhapuchhako kramamaa aphnai jethaaju sriprasaadale khukari prahaara gari pharaara bhaeko bayaana dieki thiin
modela aspataalamaa unako upachaara sambhawa nabhaepachhi thapa upachaarako kramamaa praadesika aspataala janakapuramaa unako marityu bhaeko haae

buhaarikaae hatyaa gari pharaara rahekaa pumjiyaaralaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhalkewarabaata khatieko sumyukta prahari tolile janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaasthita relwe trayaakabaata pakraau garekaae chha

ghatanaako jaanakaari paae lagattai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanabaata khatieko prahari tolile srimati hatyaamaa sumglagna rahekaa raailaai pakraau gareko chha bhane anya thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaunko ratnapaarka ksetramaa aparaadhika wyaktiharuko suchanaa sankalana gari nigaraani raakhne kramamaa sindhupaalchokakaa kumaara sresthalaai pakraau garieko mahaanagariya aparaadha niyantrana mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha prahari waristha upariksaka sahakulabahaadura thaapaale jaanakaari die
anusandhaanakaa kramamaa unale suraksaa gaarda bhaekaa belaa prayoga gareko seta liera bhaageko khulna aeko chha

dijaaina haausale yuwatiko khoji garne kramamaa eka yuwati samparkamaa ain kaathamaadaummaa unako sarirako naapa liiyo surumaa kaathamaadaummai kaaryakramakaa laagi bhandai yuwatilaai tayaara garie pani kehi dinapachhi wiraatanagaramaa kaaryakrama garne bhaniyo

katipaya sthaanamaa yuwatisangai saadaa posaakakaa prahari aphanta banera pugekaa thie unalaai aphno prastuti dekhaaewaapat uchita paarisramika dine bataaieko thiyo apasi sahamatimaa sabai kuraa milisakepachhi ti yuwati wiraatanagara jaana tayaara bhain jahaan saadaa posaakamaa rahekaa prahari pani sangai thie

gaaunpaalikaako wadaa nambara kaae kaaryaalayamaa mumgalabaara raati ajnaata samuhale todaphoda garekaa hun wadaadhyaksako kaaryakaksasahita anya kothaaharumaa sameta taaedaphoda gareko wadaadhyaksa wedaprasaada panthile jaanakaari dinubhayaae

ghatanaako jaanakaari paaepachhi marbhunga prahari chauki simalataaribaata prahariko toli ghatanaasthalamaa pugisakeko chha nachineko maanchheko samuhale kaaryaalayamaa raheko kehi rakamasameta lutekaae bataaieko chha

jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa pramukha premaprasaada regmikaa anusaara traaphika niyama wiparita sawaari chalaaundaa kaarawaahimaa parekaa ti sawaari chaalakabaata ru eka karoda laakha hajaara raajaswa sankalana bhaeko chha

chaalu awako saaunamaa dui hajaara sawaari chaalakako kaarawaahibaata ru laakha saata hajaara raajaswa sankalana bhaeko chha tyastai bhadaumaa chaara hajaara chaalakako kaarawaahibaata ru laakha hajaara asojamaa ru chaara hajaara sawaari chaalakako kaarawaahibaata ru laakha hajaara kaattikamaa chaara hajaara chaalakako kaarawaahibaata laakha hajaara ra mansiramaa chaara hajaara sawaari chaalakako kaarawaahibaata ru laakha hajaara raajaswa sankalana bhaeko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya daanale janaaeko chha

so awadhimaa dui hajaara basa chaalaka tina hajaara traka chaalaka dui hajaara jipa chaalaka saata hajaara motarasaaikala chaalaka eka hajaara tryaaktara chaalaka eka hajaara tempo chaalaka gari jammaa hajaara sawaarisaadhana chaalaka kaarawaahimaa pareko traaphika pramukha regmile jaanakaari die
pakraau parekaa bardewaawiruddha haata hatiyaara tathaa kharakhajanaa muddaamaa myaada thapa garera anusandhaana suru garieko praharile janaaeko chha
kailaali jillaako ghodaaghodi nagarapaalikaa ksetrabaata netrawikrama chanda wiplawa samuhakaa dui kaaryakartaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaakaa prawaktaa prahari upariksaka jiwanakumaara sresthale niji nambara pletakaa sawaari saadhanale bhaadaamaa liera yaatru osaarapasaara garne gareko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa sawaari saadhanalaai pakraau garieko jaanakaari die
ahile samjhaaibujhaaigarera chhaadekaa chhaum agaami dinamaa pani niji nambara pletakaa sawaari saadhanale yaatrusanga bhaadaa lieko thaahaa paaemaa kaanunabamojima kaarawaahi garnechhaun unale bhane
praharile bardiyaakaae badhaiyaataala gaaunpaalikaa phutaahaabaata bhansaara chhaligari laijaana laageko hajaara thaana kaathakaa theki sahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

awaidha rupamaa bhansaara chhali bhaaratatarpha laijaana laageko kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan mulya baraabarako kaathako theki hajaara thaana sahita bhaarata baharaaicha basne warsiya jaabeda ali lagaayata janaalaai somabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko ho

se kha nambarako trakabaata analoda gari kaathako theki thupaari raakheko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mainaapokharabaata khatieko praharile wataa saaikala ra traka sahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
ukta muddhaamaa mahinaa kaida sajaaya tokiekomaa haalasamma pharaara thaapaalaai kohalapura nagarapaalikaa baata praharile pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parnemaa saawikako lagadigadiyaani gaawisa wadaa nambara haala sirahaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya hirabaa sahani chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaabaata khatieko tolile sahanilaai aphnai gharamaa lukichhipi basiraheko awasthaamaa pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa sahanilaai jillaa adaalatamaa pesa garepachhi sirahaa kaaraagaaramaa chalaana garieko praharile janaaeko chha

khaana lokanthalimaa raheko laksmi silaai kendramaa kaama garne gareko ra kothaamaa khaanatalaasi gardaa hajaara darakaa nakkali jasto dekhine thaana gari jammaa thaana nepaali nota baraamada gariekaae warittakaa pramukha prahari naayawa upariksaka saantiraaja koiraalaale jaanakaari die
kailaaliko dhanagadhibaata attariyaatarpha gairaheko baacha num ko jipa aitabaara niyantranamaa lii todaphoda ra lutapaata garne samuhakaa chha janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

godaawari nagarapaalikaakaa sumita bhattale chalaaeko ukta jipa dhanagadhiko boraadaandimaa niyantranamaa lii todaphoda gardai nija bhattakaa saathabaata mobaailasameta lutne samuhakaa wyaktilaai somabaara pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa daksakumaara basnetale bataae

bhijita bhisaamaa nepaala ai yahin kaaryaalaya kholera gairakaanuni gatiwidhi gareko paaiepachhi uniharulaai pakraau garieko mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaumkaa pramukha esaesapi uttamaraaja suwedile jaanakaari die

pakraau parnemaa daarchulaa jillaa duhama gaapaa basne warsiya garje sinha maharaa bhaarata utaraakhanda chamauli basne warsiya prema simha ra bhaaratakai utaraakhanda chamauli basne warsiya harisa simha rahekaa chhan
pakraau parekaa uniharulaai awasyaka anusandhaana tathaa kaarabaahiko laagi dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya haattisaara kaathamaadaaainmaa pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha

mero kaaryaalayamaa aera anaawasyaka hohallaa garekaa kaarana taha lagaauna ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa suraksaakarmi pathaaidina agraha gareko thien patrikaakaa prakaasakasameta rahekaa netaa wiswakarmaale bhanesohi bakhata malaai bhetna kaaryaalayamaa aekaa gaaunkaa yuwaasanga pani sarmaako wiwaada bhaepachhi ghatanaa bhaeko horaasasa

khukuri prahaarabaata ghaaite bhaeki saaradaako sthaaniya medikalamaa upachaara huna nasakepachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagi sumkhuwaasabhaa riphara garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurale janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurabaata gaeko prahari tolile srimaana haribahaadura bhujelalaai khukari sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko chha yasa sambandhamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
siraahaakaae golabajaara nagarapaalikaa dharamapura budha chokabaata awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara sahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mirchaiyaabaata khatieko praharile sohi thaaun basne warsiya sumjiwa mukhiyaalaai wataa plaastikako pokaamaa raheko kariba graama saya miligraama awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara sahita aitabaara saanjha pakraau gareko haae
wanaspati ghyumaa rasaayana misaaera suddha gaaiko ghyu bhandai wibhinna braandakaa stikara lagaaera bajaaramaa pathaaune girohalaai parsaa praharile pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko wisesa tolile wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa laksmanawaa brahamachoka maa raheko siddhiwinaayaka pujaa saamagri prodaktsa udyogamaa aitabaara aparaahna chhaapaa maareko ho

wanaspati ghyumaa rasaayana misaaera pujaa durgaa ra gokula braandako stikara lagaai bajaaramaa suddha gaaiko ghyu bhandai wikriwitarana garne gareko wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa praharile ukta kaarakhaanaamaa chhaapaa maarera sanchaalakasahita tina janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
udyogale suddha dhyuko naamamaa upabhoktaalaai thagi gardai aeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaakaa prahari upariksaka somendra simha raathaurale bataae
praharile paalpaabaata laaguausadhasahita eka wyaktilaai pakraau garekaae chha
