butawalabaata pokharaatarpha haaisa gaadimaa jaandai gardaa dobhaana praharichauki paalpaale rokera jaancha garne tinaau gaaunpaalikaa dobhaanamaa laaguausadhasahita baagluna nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya wiwasa malla aja pakraau pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka karisnaraaja saapakotaale jaanakaari die

pakraauparnemaa wiplawakaa kendriya sadasya sandipa laamaa sisira kendriya kosaadhyaksa tilakabahaadura guruna kendriya kaaryalaya sachiwa wakila ghartimagara khanila solukhumbu jillaa inchaarja trilochana wika ra udayapura jillaa sadasya durkhaabahaadura taamaana rahekaa chhan
prahariko wisesa byuroko tolile uniharulaai kaathamaadaumko wibhinna sthaanabaata pakraau gareko ho pakraau parekaa uniharu maathi thapa anusandhaana bhairahekaae praharile janaaekaae chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile sunasariko baraahaksetra nagarapaalikaa sthita bharaulabaata atyaadhunika hatiyaara esaelaara sahita hajaara goli baraamada gareko chha

goli ra hatiyaara jamina muni raakhieko gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa praharile bharaulamaa sthaaniyako kukhuraako khoramaa jamina muni gaadhera raakheko ukta hatiyaasahita thulo parinaamamaa goli baraamada gareko ho

baraamata garieko hatiyaara tatkaalina maaowaadile senaa samaayojanakaa belaa lukaaera raakheko hunasakne anumaana garieko chha ghatanaasthalamaa baraamata garieko hatiyaarabaare praharile muchulkaa tayaara gariraheko chha
thulo parinaamamaa goli ra atyaadhunika hatiyaara baraamada garepachhi bharaulamaa nepaali senaa sasastra prahari ra nepaala prahari parichaalana garieko chha

jillaakaae taaplejunako mikwaakholaa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num khoklinamaa sthaaniya warsiyaa kawitaa thaapaa marita phelaa pareki hun dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara bhaeko awasthaamaa sawa phelaa parekaae praharile janaaekaae chha
ghatanaakaae thapa anusandhaana bhairahekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya taaplejunale janaaekaae chha
praharile baaraakaae wisraamapura gaaunpaalikaakaa adhyaksa amirilaala raauta bhediharalaai aitabaara pakraau gari kaaraagaara chalaana gareko chha

sawaari jyaana muddaamaa adaalatabaata dosi thahara bhaekaa bhediharalaai pakraau gari kaaraagaara chalaana gariekaae haae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraakaa esapi wikaasaraaja khanaalakaa anusaara dina kaida ra dui hajaara rupaiyaan jariwanaako phaisalaa kaaryaanwana garna raautalaai pakraau gari kaaraagaara pathaaieko chha

unale chalaaeko naapa nambarako motarasaaikalale takkara dindaa saala maagha gate hansiyaa dewi chaudhariko marityu bhaeko thiyo ukta ghatanaamaa baaraa jillaa adaalatale bhadau gate bhediharalaai dosi thahara gardai dina kaida ra hajaara jariwaanaa sajaaya sunaaeko thiyo
praharile sallaaghaaribaata duwaakotatarpha jaandai gareko baa cha nambarako kaaralaai jaancha garne kramamaa chaalaka khatrile praharilaai ukta rakama dina khaaejekaa thie
praharile kaathamaadaumbaata kilo kokinasahita janaa widesi naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile gundaa naaike ramesa baahuna samuhakaa eka janaa sutaralaai pakraau gareko chha nepaala prahariko mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaako tolile baahuna samuhakaa sutara durgaa raailaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile sirahaabaata thulo parimaanamaa awaidha sunachaandiko garagahanaasahita eka yuwakalaai pakraau gareko chha

prahari chauki thaadi sirahaabaata khatieko tolile gae raati jaancha garne kramamaa jillaako bhagawaanpura gaaunpaalikaa thaadibajaarabaata awaidha suna chaandiko garagahanaasahita sirahaako golabajaara nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya manoja raayalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile sarlaahiko barahathawaabaata jhutaae wiwarana pesa gari naagarikataa line eka janaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha

maamaalaai baabu banaaera naagarikataa lieko thaahaa paaepachhi wadaa nambara kaa wadaadhyaksa yajnabahaadura khadkaako pahalamaa sanibaara belukaa hajariyaabaata pakraau gari unalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya barahathawaamaa bujhaaieko thiyo

baaraamaa eka mahilaako hatyaapachhi jalaaundai gareko sawalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha pacharautaa nagarapaalikaa piparapaatiki andaaji warsiyaa maalti dewiko sawa jalaaundai gareko awasthaamaa sukrabaara praharile niyantranamaa lieko ho

sawa purnarupamaa najaleko kaarana kehi haada phelaa paareko ra maritakakaa srimaan saasu sasuraa sabai pharaara raheko hundaa ghatanaakaa baaremaa anusandhaana bhairaheko prahari upariksaka khanaalale jaanakaari die maritakako maaiti motihaari jillaako juyaaphara bhanne thaaunmaa raheko ho
dosilaai kadaabhandaa kadaa kaarawaahi hunu pardachha ani maatra sudhaara hunchha mahilaa adhikaarakarmi babitaa jasawaalale bhane
sumkhuwaasabhaako dharmadewi nagarapaalikaa sthita mude sanischaremaa raheko sagaramaathaa ti stetakaa myaanejara harka kuluna raailaai laksita gari goli prahaara bhaeko chha
bihibaara raati bajetira kothaamaa sutiraheko awasthaamaa nachinekaa maanisako samuhale raailaai laksita gari goli prahaara gareko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya sumkhuwaasabhaale janaaekaae chha

raai bhane kothaabhitrai lukera goli laagnabaata jogiekaa chhan aphumaathi asuraksaa bhaeko bhandai uni ahile sthaaniya prahari chaukimaa sarana liera basekaa chhan myaanejara raai ti stetako kwaartaramaa basdai aekaa thie uni sutne kothaako dhokaa todaphoda gari haata chhiraaera goli prahaara bhaeko prahariko bhanaai chha
paschima nawalaparaasibaata praharile thulo parinamaa laaguausadhasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile bhairahawaabaata pokharaatarpha jaandai garekaa wataa chhuttaachhuttai basamaa sawaara uniharulaai dewinaragarasthita mahendra raajamaargamaa chekajaanchakaae kramamaa pakraau garekaae haae
pakraau parnemaa lalitapura jillaa godaawaari nagarapaalikaa chaapaagaaunkaa warsiya naresa laamaa ra pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa galeswarakaa warsiya wisaala sunaara rahekaa chhan
praharile baaraakaae bisraamapura gaaunpaalikaa sthita dasagajaabaata niyantrita laaguausadha daaijepaama nurphina ra phenaaragana gari hajaara empula bihibaara baraamada gareko chha

prahari chauki musaharwaa baaraabaata khatieko praharilaai dekhnaasaatha bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai gareko dui janaa mahilaale saathamaa raheko jholaa phaali pharaara bhaepachhi jholaa jaancha garne gardaa ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari praharile baraamada gareko ho
pharaara mahilaaharuko praharile khoji garnukaa saathai yasa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

pakraau parnemaa gorakhaa ghara bhai kaathamaadaum basdai aekaa warsiya winoda thaapaa magara ra kailaali dhanagadhi ghara bhai baaneswara basne warsiya asisa sijaapati chhan mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaumle uniharulaai budhabaara saanjha pakraau gareko ho

mumsira gate sijaapatile timro mamile timiharulaai hotalamaa lagi raakhnu bhaneko chha bhandai bihaana skula jaana laagekaa bachchaaharulaai tokhaasthita hotala blu staara ko kothaa num maa lagi bandhaka banaaekaa thie

pachhi bachchaakai nambarabaata amaalaai phona gari timro chhoraachhori mero kabjaamaa chhan laakha diemaatra pathaauchhu bhani dhamki diekaa thie ukta suchanaa praharimaa aepachhi mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaumle budhabaara uniharuko uddaara garnukaa saathai apaharanamaa sumlagna uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogakaae taaelile sewaagraahisanga laakha rupaiyaan ghusa lieko aropamaa nawalaparaasiko raamagraama nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa gopaala diswaa magaralaai pakraau garekaae chha
balaatkaara prayaasako aropamaa pakraau parekaa saptariko sambhunaatha nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa adhyaksa laksmi saahasahita tina janaa dharautimaa rihaa bhaekaa chhan
saptari jillaa adaalatakaa nyaayaadhisa jawaahara prasaada simhako ijalaasale uniharu tinai janaalaai janahi hajaara rupaiyaan dharautimaa rihaa garne adesa dieko ho
bipi koiraalaa kyaansara aspataala bharatapurakaa tatkaalina nirdesaka daa bhaktamaana sresthakaa apaharanakaari gautama yonjana warsapachhi pakraau parekaa chhan
daaktara sresthalaai apaharana gari phirauti liekaa yonjanalaai nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byuro siaibi le bihibaara mahaaraajaganjabaata pakraau gareko ho
janakapuradhaamabaatahatiyaara liera pharaara bhaekaa mahilaa praharikaa premilaai dhanusaa praharile pakraau garekaae chha
uchcha adaalata janakapuradhaamakaa nyaayaadhisa sakuntalaa ghimireki suraksaa gaarda raheki prahari jawaana ranitaa kumaari kewatakaa premi janakapuradhaamabaatai pakraau parekaa hun

suraksaa gaarda ranitaakaa premi nawalaparaasi raamagraama nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa siwendra yaadawa janakapuradhaama upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara raamapurabaata bandukasahita pakraau pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaale janaaeko chha

yaadawako mobaaila trayaaka garera lokesanako adhaaramaa pakraau gareko dhanusaa praharile janaaeko chha dhanusaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raameswara kaarkikaa anusaara yaadawako mobaaila tresa gardaa tyasako lokesana raamapuramaa dekhaaepachhi pakraau garna pugekaa praharilaai herepachhi bhaagne prayaasagardai gardaayaadawalaai pakraau gareko haae
yaadawa aphantako gharamaa lukera basdai aekaa thie sohi gharabaata pastola pani baraamada garieko dhanusaa praharile janaaeko chha
uchcha adaalata janakapuurakaa nyaayadhisaki piesao ranitaa kumaari kewatale somabaara raati hatiyaara lutiekaae ujuri garepachhi uni anusandhaanakaa laagi prahari niyantranamai raheki chhin
rukuma paschimako athawisakota nagarapaalikaa nimitta pramukha prasaasakiya adhikaritamaathi kutapita gareko aropamaa wadaadhyaksa pakraau parekaa chhan

athawisakota nagarapaalikaakaa nimitta pramukha prasaasakiya adhikarita raamabahaadura kesi ra suchanaa tathaa sanchaara prawidhi adhikarita ganaesa chandamaathi kutapita bhaepachhi wadaaadhyaksa kesaramaana wikalaai praharile budhabaara raati pakraau gareko ho

kaaryaalayako kaama sakera deraamaa pharkine kramamaa budhabaara saanjha wadaaadhyaksa kesaramaanakaa bhaai gopaala bikako samuhale kesi ra chandamaathi lukera akramana gareko thiyo sthaaniya thekedaarasameta rahekaa gopaalale pahilaadekhi nai wadaadhyaksa daaiko adamaa wadaakaa yojanaamaa hinaaminaa gardai airahekaa thie

gopaalako samuhako akramanamaa parekaa kesilaai paancha taankaa lagaaieko chha wadaaadhyaksa kesaramaanamaathi jyaanamuddaamaa anusandhaana thaalieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukumapaschimakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka sumita khadkaale bataae unakaa bhaai gopaala bhane pharaara chhan

nimitta pramukha prasaasakiya adhikaritamaathi kutapita bhaepachhi nagarapaalikaako kaamakaaja thappa bhaeko chha kutapita garneharumaathi kaarabaahiko maaga gardai aja nagarapaalikaako kaamakaaja banda garekaa chhan dosimaathi kaarabaahi nahundaasamma kaamakaaja nagarne karmachaarile bataaekaa chhan

naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa syuchaataara basne sitaaraama budhaathokiko gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa budhaathokisahita janaalaai nagada laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita budhabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko ho

rautahata jillaako baudhimaai nagarapaalikaa baata epiepha toli ra nepaala praharile mumgalabaara laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parnemaa rautahata jillaako barindaawana nagarapaalikaa haraiyaa basne dhiraja raaya yaadawa chhan

bi ara yu namwarako bhaaratiya motarasaaikalamaa nepaalatarpha audai garekaa nija yaadawalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala bordara auta posta saramajhuwaabaata khatieko epiepha toli ra nepaala praharile sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa unako saathamaa naaitrobheta tyaableta tina saya wataa phelaa parepachhi pakraau garieko ho
pakraau parekaa yaadawalaai baraamada laaguausadhasahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko prahari chauki bumkulamaa bujhaaieko chha

paancha warsiyaa baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko aropamaa purpaksako laagi thunaamaa rahekaa tanahunko wyaasa nagarapaalikaa kaa nawina thaapaalaai jillaa adaalata tanahunle janmakaidako phaisalaa gareko chha

nyaayaadhisa durgaaprasaada dhungelako ekala ijalaasale budhabaara abhiyukta thaapaalaai janmakaidako phaisalaa gareko ho baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko abhiyogamaa thaapaalaai janmakaidako sajaayasahita pidita baalikaalaai ru chaara laakha ksatipurti dilaaune phaisalaa bhaeko jillaa adaalatakaa srestedaara sudarsana khanaalale jaanakaari die baalikaalaai ksatipurtibaapatako jariwaanaa abhiyukta thaapaabaata nai bharaaune adaalatako phaisalaa chha
gata saauna gate baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko abhiyogamaa thaapaa saauna gate pakraau parekaa thie uni saauna gatedekhi purpaksako laagi jillaa kaaraagaaramaa thunaamaa thie
raamechhaapakaa eka yuwaalaai apaharana gari wandhaka banaaeko aropamaa makawaanapura praharile paancha janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa kaathamaadaumko puraano baaneswara basne warsiya asisa sijaapati kumchanapurako sripura basne warsiyaa sunitaa dhaami dhaadina netraawati ghara bhaekaa karisna guruna ra tyaaksi chaalaka asika laamaa rahekaa chhan

amlekhagumjabaata kaathamaadaum jaana laageko baa ja nambarako tyaaksimaa yaatraarata magaralaai baa ja nambarako tyaaksimaa aekaa samuhale kutapati gari niyantranamaa liekaa thie magarasangai aekaa kaabhre mandanapurakaa warsiya saroja saapakotaalaai sameta uniharule kutapita garekaa thie

wisesa suraakikaa adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurabaata khatieko prahari tolile diunso kariba h baje apaharitalaai sakusala mukta gari abhiyuktaharulaai pakraau gareko makawaanapurakaa esapi mukesakumaara simhale bataaunubhayo
baaraa praharile thulo parimaanamaa laaguausadha charesasahita bhaekajanaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile koirikaae saathabaata pyaaketa kilo graama laaguausadha charesa baraamada garekaae chha kalaiyaa bajaarasthita sandidapa saahako hotelamaa khaanaa khaairahekaa koirilaai basapaarka asthaai prahari postabaata khatieko prahari tolile pakraau gareko thiyo
koirimaathi laaguausadha sambandhi muddhaa chalaaune tayaari bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaeko chha

praharile salyaanabaata bama banaauna prayoga hune saagamri sahita netrawikrama chanda netaritwako wiplawa samuhakaa jillaa netaa padamabahaadura kesilaai pakraau garekaae chha jillaabaata khatieko suraksaa tolile mumgalabaara kesilaai daarmaa gaaunpaalikaa bhagenri kholaabaata pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa kesi ra baraamada saagamrilaai wistarita anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya salyaana khalumgaa bujhaaieko chha

pakraau parnemaa kaaski pokharaa ghara bhai kaathamaandau mahaanagarapaalikaa narephaanta basne warsa ko prakaasa gandharwa ra sohi thaaun basne okhaladhumgaakaa gopaala khadkaa rahekaa chhan uniharuko saathabaata praharile kilo gaanjaa baraamada gareko chha

syaanjaa waalinako wadaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka insapektara laai hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojdaa ayogakaae taaelile goru byaapaari rupandehiko basantapura gaaunpaalikaa kaa jaharuddhina telilaai pakraau gareko haae

kaathamaadaumko chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa gurjudhaaraamaa raheko bheikala ekedemi enda risarcha sentarabaata kaalikotako khaadaachakra ghara bhai ahile chaawahila basne wirendra malla ra kaalikotakai mahaawai ghara bhai haala sukedhaaraa basne dipaka saahilaai praharile pakraau gareko ho
praharile uniharuko saathabaata dui thaana lyaapatapa eka thaana printara ra jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya lekhieko nepaali naagarikataako nakkali kaarda thaana baraamada gareko chha

tyasaigari nakkali naagarikataa banaauna prayoga garine krima pepara thaana wibhinna wyaktiharuko naagarikataa pramaanapatra nambara ra naama prayoga gari banaaiekaa nakkali naagarikataa thaana ra nepaala sarakaara gariha mantraalaya jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya baanke bhaeko chhaapa eka thaana pani baraamada garieko mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaakaa prawaktaa jiwanakumaara sresthale jaanakaari dinubhayaae

tyasaigari yaataayaata wyawasthaa kaaryaalayabaata traayala pariksaako laagi jaari garine wibhinna naama thara ra thegaanaa bhaekaa wyaktiharako eplikenta aidiko photokapi thaana saakhaa adhikarita bhaeko chhaapa thaana kyaamlina lekhieko staampa pyaada thaana raato lekhne kalama photo taansna prayoga hune gama thaana ra kaichi thaana sameta baraamada garieko chha
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata awaidha laaguausadha kokinasahita eka janaa bolibhiyana naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha

phlaai dubaiko udaanadwaaraa kaathamaadaum aeki unalaai tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthala gaucharasthita laaguausadha niyantrana byuro saakhaa kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile pakraau gareko ho
netrawikrama chanda wiplawa netaritwako nepaala kamyunista paarti nekapaa kaa duijanaa kaaryakartaalaai rukuma paschima praharile pakraau gareko chha

praharilewiplawa samuhakaa jillaa sadasya tathaa akhila kraantikaari rukuma paschimako upasumyojaka warsiya basanta chanda ra wiplawa samuhakaa kaaryakartaa chaurajahaari nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya atiraama rokaalaai pakraau gareko haae
praharile awaidha rupamaa baaluwaa utkhanan gari osaarne kaaryamaa sumlagna raheko bhandai parsaabaata baaluwaa loda bhaekaa dui wataa tyaaktarasahita dui janaa chaalakalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya munnaa saaha sonaara ra warsiya haakima dewaana rahekaa chhan praharile uniharulaai parsaagadhi nagarapaalikaa wadaa bhedaahaa kholaabaata naa ta ra naa ta nambarako tyaaktaramaa awaidha rupamaa baaluwaa lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa pakraau garekaae haae
pakraau parneharumaa daana phusrekhaali basne rolpaa rolpaa nagarapaalikaa korchaawaana ghara bhaekaa warsiya sajina bikara unakai srimati warsiyaa nirmalaa budhaamagara rahekaa chhan

prahari chauki jamunibaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa uniharule ukta parimaanako laaguausadha nepaalabaata bhaaratatarpha lukaai chhipaai laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
uchcha adaalata janakapurakaa nyaayaadhisa sakuntalaa ghimireko suraksaa gaardako rupamaa khatieki prahari jawaanako pestola lagera unakaa premi pharaara bhaekaa chhan

prahari jawaanakaa premiko nawalaparaasi deudawaa basne warsiya sibendra yaadawabicha biwaada bhaeko bujhieko srotale janaaeko chha praharile prahari jawaana ranitaalaai anusandhaanakaa laagi niyantranamaa lieko chha

bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaabhitrai bandhaka banaaera eka yuwati ra eka kisorilaai dehawyaapaaramaa sanlagna garaaeko khulna aeko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale somabaara yahaan patrakaara sammelana ayojanaa gari pakraau parekaalaai saarwajanikasameta gareko chha

philmi sailimaa hotalamaa lukaaera uniharulaai dehawyaapaaramaa lagaaeko paaieko chha wadaa num maa raheko hotala khotaana halesi enda sagaramaathaa gestahaausakaa sanchaalakale kaathamaadaunbaata haraaekaa eka yuwati ra eka kisorilaai dehawyaapaaramaa lagaaeko praharile janaaeko chha gata kaattika gate kaathamaadaunbaata haraaekaa eka yuwati ra kisorilaai tyahaan lyaaera dehawyaapaaramaa lagaaieko ho

kaathamaadaunmaa kothaa bhaadaa gari basne warsiyaa yuwati ra warsiyaa kisorilaai kaathamaadaunbaata chitawanasamma lyaaune kaama dharaanaki yuwatile gareko khuleko chha ti duilaai eutaa banda kothaamaa raakhera dehawyaapaara garaaieko thiyo patrakaara sammelanamaa diieko jaanakaarianusaara uniharule gharamaa sandesa pathaaepachhi praharile so hotalamaa chhaapaa maareko thiyo jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka daanabahaadura mallakaa anusaara patakapataka hotalamaa khaanatalaasi gardaasameta uniharulaai phelaa paarna sakieko thiena
praharile makawaanapurabaata nakkali sawaari chaalaka anumati patrasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa rautahata wijayapura nagarapaalikaa wadaa num basne warsiya romiyo kaalikote rahekaa chhan jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurabaata khatieko prahari tolile hetaumdaa kaantiraajapatha sadaka khandamaa naa pa nambarako skutaralaai chekajaancha garne kramamaa unalaai pakraau garekaae haae

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogakaae taaelile bhumisudhaara tathaa maalapota kaaryaalaya sirahaamaa kaaryarata nimitta kaaryaalaya pramukha tathaa maalapota adhikarita raamabaabu mandalalaai paancha laakha rupainyaa ghusasahita pakraau gareko chha
praharile daanabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tulsipurabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha

raa pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa aekaa bikara runtigadhi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya dila bahaadura budhaasametale ti kisoralaai khukuri prahaara gardaa ghaaite bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya khunagribaata khatieko praharile khukuri prahaara garnemadhye bikalaai pakraau gareko ho

ghaaite kisoralaai praathamika swaasthya kendra sulichaura lagiekomaa thapa upachaarako laagi butawala riphara garieko chha pharaara dila bahaadura budhaako khoji garnukaa saathai yasa sambandhamaa praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
praharile paalpaakaae tinaanu gaanupaalikaa dobhaanawaata laaguausadha sahita janaa yuwakalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnekaa syaanjaa jillaa arjunachaupaari gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kaa sthaayi baasindaa haala pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsakaa wisaala nepaali ra kaaski maadi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num basne warsakaa kirana guruna rahekaa chhan

butawalabaata paalpaatarpha aundai gareko ga pa num ko motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai cheka jaacha garne kramamaa praharile uniharuko saathabaata daaijopama wataa nuphina wataa pheneraagana wataa emaela sisi ra hajaara nagada sameta baraamada gareko haae
anaadhikarita rupamaa paarkina garieko bhandai janakapuradhaamamaa sumyukta raastra sumgha yuena ko gaadimaa traaphika praharile hwila laka garidieko chha

paarkina nisedhita garieko thaanumaa paarkina garebaapata sumyukta raastra sumgha yuena ko nambarako gaadilaai aitabaara aparaahna traaphika praharile bhaanu chokamaa hwila laka gari kaarabaahi gareko ho

gaadiko hwila laka gareko kehi beramaa chaalaka aepachhi traaphika praharisanga bhanaabhana garekaa thie pachhi traaphika praharile chaalakako chaalaka anumati patra laisensa niyanatranamaa liekaae chha

ghusa kaandako muddaamaa dharautimaa chhutekaa jalasrota tathaa sinchaai wikaasa dibhijana dolakhaakaa pramukha prakaasa adhikaari sarakaari chhaapa ra letarapyaada kirte gareko abhiyogamaa punah pakraau parekaa chhan

ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa chitawana ghara bhai kirtipura nagarapaalikaa kaathamaandaum basdai aekaa jalasrota tathaa simchaai wikaasa dibhijana dolakhaakaa tatkaalina pramukha adhikaarile sarakaari chhaapa tathaa dastakhata kirte garera pharaara rahekaa thie

adhikaarilaai tatkaalina kaaryarata kaaryaalayako sarakaari chhaapa dastakhata kirte gareko muddaamaa sanibaara kaathamaadaummaa pakraau garieko dolakhaakaa prahari pramukha diesapi maanabahaadura raaile jaanakaari die

pakraau parnemaa nuwaakota saawika gorsyaana ghara bhai haala taarkeswaramaa basdai aekaa warsiya santabahaadura taamaana ra warsiya kesawa laamaa chhan siaibiko tolile taamaanalaai naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa naamgela chokabaata ra laamaalaai dhalkubaata pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa duwai janaalaai awasyaka anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nuwaakota bujhaaieko siaibile bataaeko chha
praharile parsaakaae wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa inarwaa sadaka khandabaata saata kilo laagu ausadha gaanjaasahita paanchajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya phulamahmada miyaan nausaada husena sakhuwaa prasauni gaaunpaalikaa madhuwanamathuwalakaa warsiya ejaajula dewaana warsakai ali husena dewaana ra warsiya ijaajula miyaa chhan

maritaka taamaanako sawa sauchaalayako sephtityaankimaa blyaanketale berera phaalieko awasthaamaa bhetiepachhi unakaa pati warsiya arjuna thaapaamagara warsiya chhawi thaapaamagara ra warsiya indra thaapaamagaralaai praharile pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa adhikaari rupaka khadkaale jaanakaari die
maritaka taamaanako sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala raakhieko chha ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana garine unale bataae
jillaakaae dudhakosi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya pawidhaana raaiko hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa sohi thaaunkaa warsiya daakamaana kaarkilaai praharile pakraau garekaae haae
kaarkilaai niyantranamaa raakhera yasa sambandhamaa awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile gaaerakhaabaata netrawikrama chanda wiplawa samuhakaa syaanajaa jillaa inchaarjasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya gokula paraajuli ra rukumako triwenai gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya jiwana ksetri rahekaa chhan praharile uniharulaai bihiwaara raati gaaerakhaako ghyaampesaala chokabaata pakraau gareko ho

paraajuli syaanajaa jillaa inchaarja hun bhane ksetri saamaanya kaaryakartaa raheko praharile janaaekaae chha uniharu biruddha praharile sukrawaara saarwajanika aparaadha antaragata muddaa dartaa gari anusandhaana prakriyaa agaadi badhaaieko chha
praharile makawaanapurabaata kilo charesasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa baaraa pacharautaa nagarapaalikaa kaa arabindakumaara patela ra adarsa kotawaala gaaunpaalikaa kaa sutlaana miyaa ansaari chhan

prahari chauki bhaimsebaata khatieko tolile uniharulaai bhimaphedi gaaunpaalikaa baata bihibaara aparaahna pakraau gareko ho baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharubaata kilo graama charesa baraamada garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale jaanakaari dieko chha
agajanibaata kaagajaata kursi ra pharnichara nasta bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jaajarakotale janaaekaae chha
saamaajika abhiyaantaa saroja raayale apaharita tathaa sramika baalabaalikaalaai uddhaara gari jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya sarlaahiko rohabaramaa bihibaara pariwaaralaai jimmaa lagaaekaa hun

uddhaara gariekaamaa atha janaa baalaka sarlaahikaa ra dui janaa wiraganjakaa rahekaa chhan uddhaara gariekaa madhye saata janaa baalakalaai sramikako rupamaa laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa bhaaratiya praharile niyantranamaa lieko thiyo bhane tina janaalaai nepaalabaata apaharanakaarile apaharana gari bhikha magaaundai gareko awasthaamaa niyantranamaa lieko saamaajika abhiyaantaa raayale bataae

uddhaara gariekaa baalakaharu laalabandi nagarapaalikaa jutapaanikaa warsiya wirabala paasawaana chandranagara gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya gangaa maajhi musahara warsiya wirabahaadura sadaa warsiya janaka maajhi warsiya bholaa maajhi wadaa num kaa warsiya raamachandra maajhi warsiya snehi maajhi ra iswarapura nagarapaalikaa kaa sitaaraama maajhi ra wiraganjakaa warsiya kisana patela sohi thaaunkaa warsiya sadarealama nadaapha rahekaa chhan

eka janaa thekedaarale bhaaratako hariyaanaa praantamaa kaama garaauna laijaandai gardaa bhaaratiya praharile aphuharulaai uddhaara gari baalagarihamaa puryaaeko chandranagara gaaunpaalikaa kaa gangaa maajhile bataaekaa chhan thekedaaralaai bhaaratiya praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
praharile baaraakaae parawaanipura gaaunpaalikaa sthita chainapurabaata bisphota garne dhamki dii phirauti rakama maaga gareko abhiyogamaa janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa baaraa parawaanipura gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya pramoda saaha godha warsiya dewa sumkara raama jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya achchhelaala gosaai ra phetaa gaanupaalikaa basne warsiya dipendra kumaara dhaanuka rahekaa chhan

baaraa parawanipapura gaanupaalikaa sthita emaesa inttaa udyogakaa sumchaalaka baaraa kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne manoja prasaada saaha telilaai baaraa parawaanipura gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya pramoda saaha godhale mahinaa pahilaadekhi pataka pataka phona gari laakha rupaiyaan phirauti rakama maaga gareko ra phirauti rakama dina aswikaara garepachhi gata kaattika gate pramoda godha sametale manoja prasaada teliko ukta inttaa udyogamaa bama bisphota gari phirauti rakama dinu natra gharapariwaara sametalaai khataraa hunechha bhani mowaailabaata esaemasa tathaa phona gari dhamki diepachhi budhabaara phirauti rakama laakha liera parawaanipura gaaunpaalikaa sthita chainapuramaa aunu bhani bolaaekaa thie

phirauti rakama maaga gari lina jaane uniharulaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya simaraabaata khatieko praharile pakraau gari uniharu upara muluki aparaadha sumhitaa parichchheda daphaa bamojima aparaadhika laabha kasura muddaamaa baaraa jillaa adaalatabaata myaada gari awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko chha

pakraau parekaamadhye pramoda saaha godhalaai parsaa biragumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita sadakabaata jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko praharile awaidha gharelu nalakatuwaa banduka thaana ra raaunda goli sahita chaitra gate pakraau gari haatahatiyaara kharakhajanaa muddaa chalaaeko anusandhaanabaata khulna aeko chha

uniharule baaraa prasauni gaaunpaalikaa basne nandakisora prasaada kumhaalalaai mowaailabaata dhamki dii laakha rupaiyaan phirauti maaga gareko ra phirauti rakama nadie paschaata asoja gate raatako samayamaa sutali bama bisphotana garaaeko tathaa parawaanipura gaaunpaalikaa sthita naaraayanai ayala riphaainarimaa sameta dhamki dii phirauti rakama maaga gareko ra rakama nadie paschaata asoja gate sutali bama bisphotana garaaeko ra so riphaainaribaata hajaara rupaiyaan phirauti rakama lieko khulna aeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaeko chha

praharile kailaaliko attariyaabaata saata kilo charesasahita chaarajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

sumkhuwaasabhaako maadi nagarapaalikaa wadaa num ko kaaryaalaya ra sadaka nirmaanakaa kramamaa raheko skaabhetaramaa gae raati ajnaata samuhale agajani gareko chha
agajanikaa kaarana wadaa kaaryaalayakaa kaagajapatra pharnichara kampyutara photokapi printara ra mobaaila phonalagaayatakaa sabai saamaana jalera nasta bhaekaa chhan

syaanjaako chaapaakota nagarapaalikaa wanakattaaki warsiyaa baalakumaari tiwaarilaai aphnai chhoraa warsiya naaraayana tiwaarile ghaanti athyaaera maareko bhanne kitaani jaaheri praapta bhaesangai chhoraalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari prawaktaa ewum prahari niriksaka hemaraaja ghimirele bataae

prawaktaa ghimirekaa anusaara chhoraa naaraayana tiwaarile mansira gate andaaji h baje amaale lagaaeko kapadaa tathaa gharako pindhimaa disaapisaaba gareko kaaranale risa thaamna nasaki awesamaa ai ghaanti athyaaera maareko khulna aeko chha

nawalaparaasi purwa debawula nagarapaalikaa jhahare kholaasthita pula muni boraamaa lukaai raakheko awasthaamaa laaguausadhasahita praharile gaidaakota nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya karisna srestha ra warsiya nisaana pariyaaralaai pakraau gareko haae
