praharile budhabaara uniharulaai waa kha nambarako baaluwaa bokeko tiparamaa lukaaieko saalako kaathasahita nilakantha bagaimchaabaata pakraau garekaae haae
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaako kraaima braanchako prahari niriksaka hun bhani paisaa asuli garna khojne eka janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaakaa anusaara pakraau parnemaa wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya diwyaprakaasa chaturwedi rahekaa chhan chaturwedile makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne eka wyaktilaai prahari hun bhandai hapkaai paisaa maageko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko prahari taaelile unalaai pakraau gareko haae

nija khatri ra sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bisaala limbule sa ta nambarako tyaaktara roki tyaaktaramaa kaama garne eka wyaktilaai haatapaata gardai katuwaa pestola sameta dekhaai apaharana sailimaa ekaanta sthaanatarpha laijaandai gareko bhanna khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamapurathoksilaabaata khatieko praharile khatrilaai ukta hatiyaara sahita pakraau gareko ho
morana praharile laaguausadhasahita ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha
prahari chauki ramaailobaata gastimaa niskieko prahari tolile kaanepokhari gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya simana magaralaai budhabaara raati baje laaguausadhasahita pakraau garekaae haae
netrawikrama chanda netaritwa samuhakaa bhojapura jillaa sekretari bama wistalaai purpaksakaa laagi kaaragaara chalana garieko chha

wistalaai bhojapura nagarapaalikaa behere dobhaana ra raamaprasaa daraai gaaunpaalikaa maanebhanjyaana jodne pakki pula nirmaanasthalamaa raakhieko skaabhetaramaa jesibimaa agajaani temkemaiyuna gaaunpaalikaa ko wadaa timmaako kaaryaalayamaa agajaani raamaprasaada raai gaaunpaalikaa ko okhreko daandaakharkamaa raheko enaselako taawaramaa agajaani garnukaa saathai haatahatiyaara wisphotaka padaarthalagaayata aparaadhika muddaa dartaa bhaeko jillaa adaalata bhojapurale janaaeko chha
temkemaiyuna gaaunpaalikaa khaawaa ghara bhaekaa jillaa sekretari wistalaai bhojapura nagarapaalikaa bhainsipankhaako gajuramukhi bhirachheuko jangalabaata gata asoja gate pakraau pareko thiyo

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale wibhinna muddaamaa pharaara rahekaa pratiwaadiharu pakraau gareko chha praharile janaalaai somabaara ra janaalaai mumgalabaara gari janaalaai pakraau gari adaalatamaa bujhaaeko chha

ti madhye chori laaguausadha amsachalana saarwajanika aparaadha juwaa tathaa lutapaata lagaayatakaa aparaadhamaa jillaa adaalata moranabaata kaida tathaa jariwaanaa sajaaya toki haalasamma pharaara rahekaa janaa pratiwaadiharulaai somabaara jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranabaata khatieko praharile pakraau gareko ho

saathai jabarajasti karanai udyoga muddaamaa jillaa adaalata moranako pusa gateko phaisalaale barsa mahinaa kaida sajaaya thahara bhai pharaara rahekaa pratiwaadi keraabaari gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya tila bahaadura sresthalaai mumgalabaara diunso ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belabaaribaata khatieko praharile pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa sawai janaalaai phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanako laagi jillaa adaalata moranamaa pesa garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaeko chha

bhakta bahaadurale maadaka padaartha sewana gari sohi thaaun basne warsiya eka yuwakalaai bharuwaa banduka lii maarchhu bhani hindeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya purkotadaha ra asthaayi prahari posta arkhaabaanabaata khatieko praharile unalaai ukta banduka sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

sirahaa bhagawaanapura gaaunpaalikaa sthita laalapura gamahariyaa sadakabaata niyantrita laaguausadha daaileksa disi wotala daaijelyaaba empula premethina haaidraaida pisa nurphina empula ra naaitraabheta tyaableta pisa sahita janaalaai mumgalabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa bhagawaanapura gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya mukesa kumaara yaadaba ra warsiya sumjaya kumaara yaadaba rahekaa chhan prahari chauki thaandibaata khatieko praharile pradesa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

parsaa parsaagadhi nagarapaalikaa katahariyaabaata niyantrita laaguausadha naaitraabheta tyaabaleta pisa spaasmo tyaabaleta pisa ra koreksa botala sahita janaalaai mumgalabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parneharumaa dhanusaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sunila simha ra baaraa jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya abhisisa adhikaari rahekaa chhan

asthaayi prahari posta biruwaaguththibaata khatieko praharile pradesa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parneharumaa kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya astamaana laamaa ra syaanajaa putali wajaara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa minaa thaapaa rahekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya syaanajaabaata khatieko praharile butawalabaata pokharaatarpha jaandai gareko ga kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

mahottari bardiwaasa nagarapaalikaa sthita bipi raajamaargabaata niyantrita laaguausadha naaitraabheta tyableta hajaara pisa phenaaragana saya empula nurphina saya empula ra daaijepaama saya empula sahita sirahaa sakhuwaanakaarakatti gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya mohammada sajima ansaarilaai mumgalabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa kaabhrepalaanchokako paanchakhaala ghara bhaekaa warsiya subhaasa srestha ra kumaara taamaana warsakaa manisa ghimire warsakaa anjana baraala baagluna galakota nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sumana paudela ra sindhupaalchokako saabika jyaamire gaawisa kaa warsiya gowibanda ghimire rahekaa chhan

praharile pakraau parekaa yuwaale khaataawaalaharuko sakkali bhisaa kaardasameta banaaera prayogamaa lyaaeko dekhiekaale sambandhita baimkakaa karmachaariharuko sameta milemato dekhieko asumkaa gareko chha prahari prawaktaa hobindra bogatile baimkakaa karmachaariko milematoko asumkaamaa anusanadhaana prakriyaa agaadi badhaaieko bataaekaa chhan
bhansaara chhalera kilo suna bhitryaaeko abhiyogamaa janaawiruddha jillaa adaalata sumkhuwaasabhaamaa muddaadaayara bhaeko chha

kilo suna bhansaara chori paithaari gareko kasuramaa karoda laakha hajaara ra tyati nai baraabarako widesi winimaya apachalana kasuramaa bigo kaayama gari tina warsa sajaayasameta maagera jillaa adaalata chainapuramaa muddaa daayara garieko wibhaagakaa mahaanirdesaka dirgharaaja mainaalile bataae

gaekaae asoja gate praharile sumkhuwaasabhaako bhotakholaamaa kilo sunasahita topke bhotelaai pakraau gareko thiyo ghatanaako anusandhaana gardaa topkesahita rinjina bhote jargaa bhote chhirina bhote gyaatso bhote kyamaa bhote ra sonaama domaa bhotele thapa kilo suna bhansaara chhalera lyaaekaaebhetieko raajaswa anusandhaana wibhaagale janaaeko chha
praharile mahottariko bardiwaasabaata mumgalabaara saanjha laagu ausadhasahita eka yuwakalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa sirahaako sakhuwaanakaara kati gaaun paalikaa ghara bhaekaa mohammada sajima ansaari rahekaa chhan ansaari mumgalabaara belukaa bardiwaasa sindhuli sadaka khandako bipi raajamaargako bardiwaasa chokamaa kaalo rumgako jholaa boki hinddai gareko awasthaamaa sumkaa laagera khaana talaasi gardaa pakraau pareko praharile janaaeko chha
aphno khaataabaata rakama gaayaba bhaeko bhandai khaataawaalale dieko ujuripachhi uniharulaai pakraau gareko anusandhaanamaa sumlagna prahari adhikaarile bataae
yasa prakaranamaa bainkakai karmachaariko sumlagnataa bhaeko asumkaamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
praharile parsaabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaakaae bahudaramaai nagarapaalikaa sthita pokhariko dilamaa kaudaa ra taasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa bahudaramaai nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya beraahima miyaan ra wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa sugauli basne warsiya laalabaabu patelalaai somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pokhariyaabaata khatieko praharile uniharuko saathabaata nagada hajaara saya nepaali rupaiyaan hajaara saya bhaaratiya rupaiyaan wataa kaudaa ra seta taasa sameta baraamada gareko chha
praharile kaathamaadaumlalitapura ra parsaako wibhinna sthaanabaata awaidha laaguausadhasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa baaraa kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne saaba husena amarudina miyaan ra parsaa pokhariyaa nagarapaalikaa basne mahamada murtujaa rahekaa chhan laaguausadha niyantrana byuro wiragumja parsaabaata khatieko praharile naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
praharile rukumapurwakaae bhume gaaunpaalikaa dhaulaapahiraabaata somabaara saanjha laaguausadha charesasahita dui yuwakalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa bhume kyaansikaa warsiya taaraa rokaa ra wadaa num mahatakaa warsiya tilaka puna magara raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukumapurwale janaaeko chha praharile uniharukaae saathabaata graama awaidha laaguausadha charesa baraamada garekaae chha

charesa jholaamaa lukaaichhipaai bokera hindirahekaa awasthaamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata wisesa toli parichaalana gari pakraau garieko jillaa prahari pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka yogendrakumaara khadkaale jaanakaari die

sewaagraahi kaarkile jaggaako tresa naksaa banaai die waapata amina budhaathokilaai hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa dindai gareko awasthaamaa ayogako tolile dubai janaalaai aitabaara kaaryaalaya agaadi raheko gallibaata pakraau gareko

somabaara bihaana dekhi bajeko bichamaa garihako tesro talaako jhyaalako grila nikaaldai pachhaadibaata haamaphaalera uniharu pharaara bhaeko morana praharikaa prawaktaa diesapi raajakumaara khinujule bataae

pharaara bhaekaa madhye moranako sundaraharaimchaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya baalaka jawarajasti karanai muddhaamaa adaalatako adesabaata purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa thie jhaapaa gauraadaha nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya baalaka jyaana maarne udyoga muddaamaa purpaksamai thie

praharile somabaara bihaana wiragumjabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara sindhuli ghara bhaekaa warsiya susana achhaami ra khotaana diktela ghara bhaekaa warsiya nisaana paudelalaai nurphina empula phenaaragana empula ra daaijepaama empula sahita pakraau gareko ho
sulka phirtaa nagareko bhandai trichandra kalejakaa pramukhalaai widyaarthile kutapita garekaa chhan
widyaarthiko kutaaibaata ghaaite nyaupaanelaai upachaarakaa laagi wira aspataalamaa lagieko mahaanagariya prahari parisarakaa prawaktaa tathaa diesapi howindra bogatile jaanakaari die

praharile aitabaara lalitapurako natolachhawaala ra gawahaalabaata lubhu basne sindhulikaa niraaja limbu natola basne kirtipurakaa susana maharjana sindhupaalchokakaa sujita thaapaamagara taaplejunakaa bhaktaraaja limbu dhanusaakaa kajoka raauta ra sunasarikaa anila saakyalaai tramaadola saya tyaabaleta sahita niyantranamaa lieko chha
praharile tribhuwana antaraaraastriya wimaanasthalabaata laakha hajaara saaudi riyaala sahita eka bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parekaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai anusandhaana paschaata awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi raajaswa anusandhaana wibhaaga hariharabhawana lalitapura pathaaine wimaanasthala suraksaa kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

ukta sthaanamaa khatieko praharile baa pa nambarako skutara jaancha gardaa skutaramaa sawaara uniharulaai awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba graama sahita phelaa paari niyantranamaa line kramamaa uniharule praharilaai ukta nagada dina khoje pachhi ukta nagada tathaa gaanjaa sahita uniharulaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko ho
praharile parsaabaata waala wiwaaha muddaamaa pharaara rahekaa pratibaadilaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaa adaalata parsaako jetha gateko phaisalaale waala wiwaaha muddaamaa barsa mahinaa kaida ra hajaara rupaiyaan sajaaya tokeko thiyo wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya sripura parsaabaata khatieko praharile unalaai aphnai deraa kothaamaa basiraheko awasthaamaa phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
raautalaai awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi jillaa adaalata parsaamaa bujhaaune kaarya bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale janaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrele dhulikhela nagarapaalikaa raanaachhaapakaa mahesa raanaabhaatako gharabaata gaeraati saadhe nau laakha rupaiyaansahita juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha

pasala wyawasaaya garne raanaabhaatako gharamaa juwaa kheliraheko bhanne wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa gae raati eka baje kaabhrepalaanchoka prahari pramukha prahari upariksaka jayaraaja saapakotaa netaritwako suraksaakarmi tolile ru nau laakha hajaara nagada tathaa eka seta kaudaasahita juwaa khelirahekaa janaalaai pakraau gareko ho
sarakaari chhaapa kirte muddaakaa kasuradaara kaathamaadaum maachhaapokhari basne chitawana kalyaanapura ghara bhaekaa warsiya chhawilaala taamaanalaai gata bihibaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

sarakaari chhaapa kirte muddaamaa warsa kaida phaisalaa bhaekaa pharaara kasuradaara taamaanalaai kendriya anusandhaana wyuro mahaaraajagumjabaata khatieko praharile kaathamaadaum raatopulabaata pakraau gareko ho

taamaana lagaayatako sumlagnataamaa yaataayaata wyawasthaa kaaryaalaya wiragumjako chhaapa ra saakhaa adhikaritako dastakhata kirte gari motarasaaikala nambara ra blubuka sameta nakkali banaaeko muddaamaa unalaai ukta kaida phaisalaa bhaeko thiyo
taamaanalaai jillaa adaalata kaathamaadaum maarphata kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya sundhaaraa pathaaieko wyurole janaaeko chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale yaataayaata wyawasthaa kaaryaalayakaa sawaari chaalaka anumatipatra baagmati ekaantakunaa lalitapura tatkaalina kaaryaalaya pramukha upasachiwa ananda kesari pokharelasahita janaa wiruddha wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha
uniharuwiruddha bhrastaachaara niwaarana aina bamojima jariwaanaa ra kaida sajaayako maagadaabisahita wisesa adaalata kaathamaadaummaa muddaa daayara garieko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanale awaidha laaguausadha braauna sugarasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa baahrakune dahabaata awaidha laaguausadha braauna sugara graama sahita sohi thaaun basne warsiya abinaasa thaapaasahita janaalaai sanibaara saanjha pakraau gareko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta parimaanako awaidha laaguausadha sahita pakraau gareko ho

saala baisaakha gate daanako saawika tribhuwana nagarapaalikaa wadaa namwara ghara bhai saawika rukumako bhume gaawisa kaandaakaa bhanne sthaanamaa pugekaa warsiya wijayakumaara punako apaharana gari hatyaa bhaeko thiyo tyasa hatyaakaandakaa mukhya abhiyukta maaniekaa janaa ahilesamma kaarawaasa sajaaya bhogirahekaa chhan

rukuma jillaa adaalatale samarpanalaai paancha mahinaa dina omaprakaasa ra akaasalaai paancha mahinaa dina ra dipakalaai paancha mahinaa dina kaida ra janahi hajaara rupaiyaan jariwaanaa tokeko thiyo tyatibelaa pharaara bhaekaa uniharulaai praharile pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parekaa janaamadhye samaparnalaai hijai kaaraagaara chalaana garieko chha bhane baanki janaalaai aja adaalatamaa pesa gari kaaraagaara chalaanakaa laagi jillaa kaaraagaara rukumapaschimamaa pathaaine praharile bataaeko chha

praharile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa baaneswara kaatyaayani chokabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa saya graama sahita baaneswara saantinagara basne mahottari bardibaasa ghara bhaekaa warsiya sajana taamaanalaai sanibaara diunso pakraau gareko ho
saathai thapa anusandhaanako kramamaa sohi sthaanamaa basirahekaa sumkaaspada anya janaalaai sameta praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
dhaadina praharile paate baaghako chhaalaasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaakaae gajuri gaaunpaalikaa chaalisemaa awaidha rupamaa paate baaghako chhaalaa kinabecha garna laageko awasthaamaa sohi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa bhaairaama prajaa raajendra taamaana jnaana bahaadura bika asisa taamaana tathaabenighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa kaa santa taamaana ra raaja kumaara taamaanalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinale janaaeko chha

ukta sthaanamaa chituwaako chhaalaa kinabecha hundaichha bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadina ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajuribaata khatieko praharile chituwaako chhaalaa thaana baa pa gapa ra ga pa nambarakaa wataa motarasaaikala sahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa sabailaai raastriya nikunja tathaa wanyajantu sumraksana aina bamojima thapa anusandhaana tathaa kaarabaahiko laagi dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya dhaadina pathaaieko chha
pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita sirahaa praharile gaeraati dui yuwakalaai pakraau gareko chha

prahari chauki sitaapurabaata khatieko gasti tolile jillaako laksmipurapataari gaaunpaalikaa kachanaaristhita bhotiyaachokabaata laaguausadhasahita saptariko balaana bihula gaaunpaalikaa malahaniyaa niwaasi warsiya amaresa yaadawa ra warsiya pankaja yaadawalaai pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa duwaimaathi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya lahaanale janaaeko chha

yasaigari awaidharupamaa bhaaratatarpha laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa sirahaa praharile sirahaa nagarapaalikaa basabittaabaata chaara pasuchaupaayaa baraamada gareko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaabaata khatieko tolile nepaalabaata bhaaratatarpha laijaandai garekaa chaara goru baraamada gareko ho
tyasaigari sirahaa praharile jillaakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa kariba tina hajaara gaanjaa bota nasta gareko chha

prahari chauki sanhaithaale sirahaa nagarapaalikaa sanhaithaamaa sthaaniyawaasile lagaaeko dui hajaara bota tathaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya lahaanabaata khatieko prahari tolile lahaana nagarapaalikaa daandaatolamaa bota gaanjaa phadaani gari nasta gareko janaaeko chha

praharile kailaalibaata nakkali prahari banera phirauti maaga gareko abhiyogamaa chaara janaalaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parnemaa dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa anilachanda pradipa giri sandipa sribaastawa ra bhaktaraaja josi rahekaa chhan

raati gaaun dhanagadhitarpha jaandai garekaa aruna chaudhari ra laksmana chaudharilaai nijaharule baatomaa rokera haami prahari haum timiharusanga laaguausadha braauna sugara chha bhani daraaidhamkaai apaharana gari kutapita garnukaa saathai ru eka laakha nadiemaa laaguausadha muddaa chaalaaidinchhaum bhani phirauti maaga garieko paaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa daksakumaara basnetale bataae
pidita aruna chaudhari uniharuko niyantranawaata bhaagna saphala bhai praharilaai jaanakaari garepachhi gaeko prahari tolile ti abhiyuktalaai niyantranamaa lieko ho

kaathamaandau naagarjuna nagarapaalikaa baaphalamaa laaguausadha bechabikhana bhairehako chha bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa khatieko prahari tolile morana pathari nagarapaalikaa sanischarema gharabhai kaathamaandau mahaanagarapaalikaa balkhu deraa gari basne barsa ko gokula bahaadura khadkaalaai pakraau garekaae haae
praharile khadkaakaae saathabaata laaguausadha daaijepaama phenaraagana ra nuphina gari saya empula baraamada garekaae chha ghatanaa sambandhamaa praharile anusandhaana gariraheko chha
praharile baajuraabaata awaidha rupamaa jadibuti sumkalana gariraheko awasthaamaa dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

ukta wanamaa abaidha rupamaa jadibudi sumkalana bhairaheko chha bhanne khabara praapta bhaepachhi prahari chauki bichhiyaa ra banakaa karmachaari sahitako sumyukta tolile ukta parimaanako jadibuti sahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile sirahaako kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaa sthita chatarighaatabaata budhabaara dui thaana swachaalita pestola ra dui thaana khaali myaagajinasahita ekajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa sohi nagarapaalikaa itaariprasaahikaa warsiya ahamada miyaan rahekaa chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ra kalyaanapura prahariko sumyukta saadaa posaakamaa khatieko tolile chekajaancha garne kramamaa miyaanlaai hatiyaarasahita pakraau gareko haae

jaggaa naamasaari ra laalapurjaa dine kaaryako sahajikaranakaa laagi sewaagraahisanga ghusabaapatako rakama liisakeko awasthaamaa ayogako tolile maalapota kaaryaalaya raajaswa saakhaamaa kaaryarata naayabasubbaa rosakaaji jasapaaulaai budhabaara diunso pakraau gareko ho
kaathamaadaunko naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa baaphalabaata laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

laaguausadha bikri witarana tathaa osaarapasaara bhairaheko bhanne suchanaakaa adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahariwaritta swayambhubaata khatieko prahari tolile aja moranako sanischare ghara bhai kaathamaadaun basdai aekaa gokulabahaadura khadkaalaai pakraau garieko ho

jillaakaae sadaananda nagarapaalikaaki mahilaako makundodhaari ajnaata samuhale duwai stana kaatare bhaageko prahari janaaeko chha kapadaa dhoiraheki mahilaalaai jabarjasti niyantranamaa liera stana kaati gambhira ghaaite banaaera pharaara bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka narabahaadura salaami magarale bataae
ghaaite mahilaako dinlaamaa upachaara huna nasakepachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagi bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana dharaana lagieko praharile janaaeko chha
traaphika praharile arkaako naamamaa sawaari chaalaka anumatipatra laaisensa kaa laagi traayala dine tina nakkali prasiksaarthilaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa gulmikaa resama basneta parsaakaa sumana bhanne jayaraama srestha ra kailaalikaa karnabahaadura wika rahekaa chhan

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaabaata khatieko tolile upatyakaakaa wibhinna traayala sentaramaa arkaako naamamaa motarasaaikalako laaisensako traayala dina aekaa uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
mahaanagariya prahari waritta mahaaraajaganjabaata khatieko praharilaai ghusa dina khojne eka mahilaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaum tokhaa nagarapaalikaa basundharaasthita agamana phudalenda enda gesta haausamaa awaidha gatiwidhi hune wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahari warita mahaaraajaganjako prahari tolile chhaapaa maari chekajaancha garne kramamaa praharilaai pralobhanamaa paari ghusa dina khojne eka mahilaalaai pakraau gareko ho

mahaanagariya prahari baritta mahaaraajaganjakaa diesapi umesa lamsaalale awaidha kriyaakalaapa hudaichha bhane suchanaako adhaaramaa gaeko prahari tolilaai nagada hajaara ghusa dina khojne mahilaai niyantranamaa liieko jaanakaari garaae

diesapi lamsaalale bhane ukta hotala ki sanchaalikaa udayapuragadhi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai tokhaa basne barsa ki somamaayaa raailaai awasyaka kaanuni prakriyaa puryaai thapa kaanuni kaarawaahiko laagi akhtiyaara duruprayoga anusandhaana ayogamaa pathaaeko chhaum
nepaala widyuta praadhikarana saakhaa witarana kendra jaleswara mahottarile widyut chuhaawata garne janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaamaa widyut chuhaawata badhi bhairahekoprati nepaala widyut praadhikarana saakhaa witarana kendra jaleswarale chuhaawata niyantrana abhiyaana chalaaepachhi janaalaai pakraau garieko so kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
widyut kaaryaalayako chuhaawata niyantrana abhiyaana tolile nepaala prahari ra sasastra prahariko sumyukta gasti toliko sahayogamaa janaalaai pakraau garieko ho

tolile tina thaana paani taanne motara elaedi tibhi eka thaana rephrijaretara eka thaana ra taara mitarasameta baraamada gareko janaaieko chha widyut chuhaawata gardaagardai pakraau parekaa laai jariwaanaa gari chhaadine widyut praadhikarana saakhaa witarana kendra jaleswarale janaaeko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale moranako jahadaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa kaaryawaahaka wadaa adhyaksa umesakumaara saahalaai hajaara rupaiyaan ghusasahita pakraau garekaae chha
jahadaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaa adhyaksa pradipa yaadawa wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa samaananda yaadawako hatyaa abhiyogamaa pharaara chhan
baaraako mahaagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa kaa daa wirendra prasaada kalawaaralaai dohoro naagarikataa lieko abhiyogamaa praharile pakraau gareko ho

sohi thaaunkaa mohana prasaada jaisawaalale dieko ujuriko adhaaramaa daa kalawaaralaai pakraau garieko baaraa praharile janaaeko chha kalawaara bhaaratiya naagarika raheko ra galata tarikaale jhutho kaagajaata pesa gari nepaali naagarikataa lieko aropa chha
pakraau parekaa kalawaaralaai aja baaraa jillaa adaalatabaata dinako myaada thapa gari awasyaka anusandhaana suru garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaekaae chha

maadaka padaartha sewana garekaa kaalu thebele gharaayasi bibaadamaa aphnai bhaai warsiya santosa thebelaai chhuraa prahaara gardaa ghaaite bhaekaa hun unalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dobhaanabaata khatieko praharile pakraau gareko ho
ghaaite santosa thebelaai upachaarako laagi jillaa aspataala hundai thapa upachaarako laagi wipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana dharaana lagieko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
praharile baaraakaae pacharautaa nagarapaalikaa lumgadaa chokabaata srota nakhuleko nagada laakha hajaara rupaiyaan sahita janaalaai somabaara diunso pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraabaata khatieko praharile simraunagadhabaata kalaiyaatarpha jaandai gareko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta nagada sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
praharile baagalunako kaathekholaa gaaunpaalikaa paalaabaata goru kaatera khaaeko aropamaa chaara janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

saawikako paalaa gaawisa ko chihaanadaandaa bhanne sthaanamaa goru kaatera khaaeko aropamaa sthaaniyawaasi warsiya yaamabahaadura saarki warsiya resama saarki warsiya aite kisaana ra warsiya rawi kisaanalaai praharile pakraau garekaae haae

pakraau parekaa chaarai janaawirudwa pasusambandhi kasuraantargata gaai goru maarna waa kutna nahune sirsakamaa muddaa dartaa garieko praharile janaaekaae chha uniharu sabailaai jillaa adaalatabaata myaada thapa gari thapa anusandhaanasameta bhairaheko chha

saahasangai pakraau parekaa anya tina janaalaai bhane ru eka laakha hajaara dharauti maaga garieko chha sarakaari wakila kaaryaalayale gata sukrabaara nagara sabhaapati saahasahita chaara janaalaai haatahatiyaara tathaa kharakhajanaa muddaamaa paancha warsa sajaaya maaga gardai jillaa adaalatamaa muddaa dartaa gareko thiyo
praharile sindhulikaae sunakosi gaaunpaalikaa majhuwaa basne suprima laamaako gothamaa abaidha rupamaa lukaaichhipaai raakheko bharuwaa banduka thaana somabaara bihaana baraamada gareko chha

laamaako gothamaa bharuwaa banduka lukaai chhipaai raakheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya khurkotabaata khatieko praharile talaasi gardaa ukta banduka phelaa paari baraamada gareko ho
dhaamijhaankriko ghaanti retera hatyaa gareko aropamaa sirahaa praharile janaalaai pakraau gari aja saarwajanika gareko chha

gaaungharamaa dhaamijhaankriko kaama gardai aekaa bhaaratako wihaara raajyako madhuwani jillaa lalamaniyaa graama belhaa panchaayata niwaasi warsiya raajakumaara yaadawako ghaanti retera hatyaa garieko awasthaamaa sirahaa nagarapaalikaa saaraswarasthita kamalaa nadiko chheumaa kaattika gate bihaana sawa phelaa pareko thiyo

ghatanaa bhaeko kariba dui saataapachhi sirahaa praharile jhaankri yaadawako hatyaamaa sumlagna raheko aropamaa sirahaako dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya phulagena saaha nijako bhatijo mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaa niwaasi jitena saaha warsiya raamakumaara saaha dhanusaako kamalaamaai nagarapaalikaa saruwaamadaa niwaasi warsiya ajaya mahato ra warsiya raajalaala mahatolaai pakraau gari aja saarwajanika gareko ho

chinajaanakai kramamaa phulagena saaha tathaa jhaankri yaadawabicha kehi rakama lenadena bhaeko ra jhaankrile phulagenasanga lieko rakama phirtaa maagdaa ultai jhaankri yaadawale phulagenalaai jyaana maarne dhamki diepachhi yojanaabaddha tarikaale ti paanchai janaa milera jhaankriko hatyaa gareko anusandhaanakaa kramamaa khuleko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka umaaprasaada chaturwedile jaanakaari die

buddhasaanti timaai kholaa najika mechinagara ra buddhasaanti ko giti baaluwaako kara uthaaune kramamaa aitabaara wiwaada bhai jhagadaa hundaa yuwaako eka samuhale khukuri prahaara gardaa buddhasaanti kaa warsiya raamakumaara thaaru chaudhari ghaaite bhaekaa hun unako baanyaa haatamaa chota laageko chha

mechinagara kaa warsiya dipaka taamaana ra nikhila bhanne suraja taamaanalagaayata janaako samuhale chaudharimaathi khukuri prahaara gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa prahari prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka mahendra sresthale jaanakaari die

ghaaite chaudharilaai upachaarakaa laagi biendasi aspataala wirtaamoda pathaaieko ra khukuri prahaaramaa sumlagna mechinagara kaa warsiya sumana sundaasa sohi sthaanakaa warsiya amasa limbu warsiya sanju taamaana warsiya harkaraaja raai warsiya dipsana nepaalalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
praharile jhaapaako bhadrapurabaata aitabaara raati juwaataasa khelirahekaae awasthaamaa nadagasahita janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha

bhadrapura sthita bajaaramaa raheko pula haausamaa taasa kheldai chhan bhanne gopya suchanaako adhaaramaa wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhadrapurabaata khatieko tolile raati baje nagadasahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko haae

pakraau parnemaa bhadrapura kaa warsiya sanjita ghosa warsiya wijaya saaha warsiya srikarisna agrawaala warsiya amaradipa ghosa warsiya rupesa jhaa warsiya sanjita saaha warsiya srawana kaamati warsiya kawira ksetri bhadrapura kaa warsiya dewendra raajawumsi rahekaa chhan

tyastai bhadrapura kaa warsiya saagara khadkaa bhadrapura kaa warsiya baladewa raajawumsi warsiya raajipa sahani warsiya anuja daasa warsiya ganaesa simha warsiya siwa mahato warsiya buddhanaaraayana mahato ra bhadrapura kaa warsiya rawi raajawumsi rahekaa chhan
praharile bardiyaabaata kilaae laaguausadha charesasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaakaae gulariyaa nagarapaalikaa sthita bhansaara rodabaata kilaae laaguausadha charesasahita daana ghaaeraahikaa warsiyaa raajakumaara puna magara warsiyaa junataaraa puna warsiyaa sunathaami budhaamagara warsiyaa khimaprasaada raaekkaa magara ra rukuma utaragumgaa niwaasi warsiyaa asmitaa raamajaalilaai praharile pakraau gareko haae

gulariyaa maa parne bhansaara raaedabaata chekajaanchakaa kramamaa sumkaaspada dekhiekaa kaarana uniharule baaekekaae jhaaelaa khaanatalaasi garne kramamaa uniharubaata charesa baraamada bhaekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaale janaaekaae chha
praharile niyantranamaa liekaa paanchaijanaalaai niyantranamaa lii anusandhaana gariraheko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarimaa kaaryarata eka prahari jawaana cheka kirte gari baimkabaata badhi rakama nikaaleko aropamaa pakraau parekaa chhan
pakraau parnemaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarimaa wigata tina warsadekhi kaaryarata prahari jawaana raajesa dwiwedi raheko prahari upariksaka syaamakarisna adhikaarile bataae

prahari jawaana dwiwedile bihibaara mahottariko sadaramukaama jaleswaramaa raheko raastriya baanaijya baimka jaleswara saakhaamaa aphnai naamako tina hajaarako eutaa ra chaara hajaarako arko cheka gari jammaa ru saata hajaarako cheka baimkamaa maathillo kothaabaata sadara gari punah ru tina hajaarakaa sthaanamaa ru hajaara ra ru chaara hajaarako sthaanamaa ru hajaara lekhera so baimkabaata ru saata hajaarako thaaunmaa ru hajaara jhikeko baimkakaa prabandhaka siwasumkara yaadawale bataae

baimkamaa bihibaara belukaa hisaaba milaana gardaa hisaaba namilepachhi sabai chekalaai jaanchabujha gardai jaandaa prahari jawaana dwiwedile aphnai duwai chekamaa kerameta gareko bhetiepachhi baimka prabandhaka yaadawale raati nai mahottarikaa prahari upariksaka adhikaarilaai so kuraako jaanakaari garaaepachhi praja dwiwedilaai prahari kaaryaalayamaa pakraau gari raakhieko ho
awaidha rupamaa chandaa sumkalana gareko abhiyogamaa praharile baaraabaata ekajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

ukta sthaanamaa yaadawale chandaa sumkalana gariraheko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya simraunagadhabaata khatieko prahari taaelile unalaai pakraau gareko ho praharile unako saathabaata kariba laakha rupaiyaan baraabarako nagadi rasida sameta baraamada gareko chha

syaanjaa jillaa adaalatale naagarikataasambandhi muddaakaa pratiwaadi syaanjaako andhikholaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya sarwajita sunaara ra phedikholaa gaaunpaalikaa badaachaurakaa warsiya chetanaatha paudelale ru tinatina laakha dharauti daakhilaa gari taarekhamaa chhutekaa praharile jaanaaekaae chha

sarwajita sunaarale kaaskiko pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa basne dilabahaadura sresthakaa warsiya chhoraa sankara sresthalaai aphno chhoraa bhaeko jhuttaa wiwarana pesa gareko ra tatkaalina wadaadhyaksa chetanaatha paudelale siphaarisa garepachhi maagha maa jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya syaanjaale naagarikataa dieko thiyo

jillaa adaalata baaraako baisaakha gateko phaisalaale kirte muddaamaa warsa kaida ra rupaiyaan jariwaanaa thahara bhai pharaara rahekaa unalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kolhawi baaraabaata khatieko praharile lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
chaudharilaai jillaa adaalata baaraamaa prastuta gariekomaa adaalatako adesale kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi karaagaara kaaryaalaya wiragumja pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale janaaeko chha
pakraau parnemaa dolakhaa jiri nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya dhyaala simha serpaa ra makawaanapura raaksiraan gaaunpaalikaa basne abhaya kumaara thina rahekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurabaata khati gaeko prahari tolile tribhuwana raajapatha antargata hetaumdaa chaukitolamaa bhainsebaata hetaumdaa tarpha audai gareko baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala chekajaancha gardaa serpaako saathabaata kilo phaaina golda sio lekhieko suna jasto dekhine pahelo rangako chaarapaate akaarako nakkali suna baraamada gareko haae

udayapura jillaako triyugaa nagarapaalikaa gairunakaa eka warsiya yuwaalaai jillaa adaalata udayapurale sthaaniya warsiyaa kisorilaai balaatkaara gareko abhiyogamaa saata warsako jela sajaaya ra ru paancha hajaara danda jariwaanaa garne phaisalaa gareko chha
udayapura jillaako kataari nagarapaalikaa maa warsiyaa kisorilaai bhagaaera wiwaaha garne eka kisoralaai praharile baalawiwaahako aropamaa pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parne kisora kataari nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya saroja giri raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kataarile bataaeko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale yaataayaata wyawasthaa kaaryaalaya kaathamaadaunkaa saakhaa adhikaritasahita chaara janaalaai ghusa lieko aropamaa pakraau gareko chha

ayogale saakhaa adhikarita sukraprasaada bhattaraai ra ghusa dine rikandisana haausakaa kirana deulaa uttama wikrama saahi ramesakumaara kesi ra suresa chhusyaakilaai pakraau gareko ho ayogako tolile uniharulaai budhabaara pakraau garepani aja saarwajanika gareko ho

yastai ayogale bhumisudhaara tathaa maalapota kaaryaalaya taulihawaa kapilawastukaa kharidaaradwaya suryaprasaada misra ra durgaaprasaada chaudharile jaggaako naamasaari garne prayojanaartha sewaagraahisanga chha hajaara ghusa lieko aropamaa wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha

yasaigari kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa nayaanbajaarasthita diutimaa khatieko praharilaai nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojne kaathamaadaum banasthali basne makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya rawindra thapaliyaalaai budhabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
nepaalabaata bhaarata tarpha laijaandai gareko pratibandhita laaguausadha gaanjaasahita aja parsaako paterwaa sugauli gaanupaalikaabaata eka yuwakalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha
purwa suchanaako adhaaramaa praharile gaaunpaalikaa rangapura chokabaata kilo gaanjaasahita sohi gaanupaalikaa niwaasi siwajanma maajhilaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile rangapura chokamaa paidala hindirahekaa maajhimaathi sankaa laagi chekajaancha gardaa unale bokeko jholaabaata wataa pokaamaa raheko dasa kilo gaanjaa baraamada garekaae thiyaae
baraamada bhaeko gaanjaa ra pakraau parekaa maajhilaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya paterwaasugaulimaa raakhi anusandhaana agaadi badhaaie praharile janaaeko chha
paschima myaagdiko maalikaa gaaunpaalikaa rumasthita raastriya janakalyaana adhaarabhuta widyaalayaki pradhaanaadhyaapaka indrakumaari punalaai khukuri prahaara garne wyakti pakraau parekaa chhan

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya darawaanabaata khatieko prahari tolile niskota ra rumako bichamaa raheko kholaabaata unalaai niyantranamaa lieko haae ghatanaako wistarita anusandhaana thaalieko pani unale bataae
kehidina aghi gulmiko chandrakota gaaunpaalikaa ko jumgalamaa baalikaasahita mahilaako hatyaamaa sumlagna bhaeko asumkaamaa praharile budhabaara raati kaaskibaata janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa baagalunako galakota nagarapaalikaa thaalepokharaakaa warsiya maadhawa sunaara ra warsiya purnabahaadura sunaara rahekaa chhan hatyaamaa sumlagna anya eka janaa bhane ajhai pharaara rahekaae praharile janaaeko chha

harraachaurako chauraali pokharaako jumgalamaa kaattika gate dui baalikaasahita eka mahilaako wibhatsa tarikaale hatyaa garera phaaleko awasthaamaa sawa phelaa pareko thiyo maritaka tinai janaako pahichaana khuleko chhaina
pakraau parekaako praarambhika bayaanamaa uniharu kaanepokhari gaaunpaalikaa kaanepokhari moranakaa raheko jaanakaari khuleko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhandaaraale swachaalita pestola ra paancha raaunda golisahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa daana tulasipura nagarapaalikaa dhanowarikaa warsiya madhukara kesi ra salyaana rima gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya naaraayana budhaathoki rahekaa chhan

baapa numko motarasaaikalamaa aekaa uniharu sankaaspadarupamaa hindiraheko awasthaamaa gastimaa raheko prahari tolile jaancha gardaa meda ina yuesae lekhieko pestola ra tyasamaa laagne golisameta baraamada bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawana janaaeko chha

jhutaa wiwaranakaa adhaaramaa janaa widesi naagarikalaai nepaali naagarikataa dilaauna saghaaeko abhiyoga laagekaa jhaapaakaa karmachaarisahita janaa parpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaana bhaekaa chhan

jhaapaa jillaa adaalatako kaattika gateko adesa anusaara sabai janaalaai jhaapaa jillaa kaaraagaara chalaana garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa prawaktaa mahendrakumaara sresthale jaanakaari die

kaaraagaara chalaana bhaekaa abhiyuktamaa jhaapaa jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayakaa kharidaara tejindra nyaupaane wirtaamoda nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaasachiwa lokaraaja baraala jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya jhaapaako muladhokaa agaadi nesanala photo studiyo chalaaune bhadrapura kaa bhimabahaadura limbu lekhaapadhi sambandhi kaama garne bhadrapura kaa premaraaja timsinaa wirtaamoda basne tekabahaadura guruna ra bhaarata kisanaganja ghara bhai wirtaamoda maa deraa gari basne mustaphaa alama rahekaa chhan

gairanepaalilaai jhutaa wiwarana bharaai jhaapaa jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya jhaapaabaata naagarikataa lieko ghatanaa saarwajanika bhaepachhi kendriya anusandhaana byuro kaathamaadaumbaata sameta chhaanabina bhaeko thiyo

praharikaa anusaara abhiyuktale milibhagata gari janaa widesi naagarikalaai nepaali naagarikataa dilaaekaa thie naagarikataawiruddha ujuri parepachhi gariha mantraalayale nai chaaso raakhi chhaanabina aghi badhaauna nirdesana dieko thiyo
ghatanaamaa jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa adhikarita gaurawa dhumgela ra kharidaara tejindra nyaupaaneko pratyaksa sumlagnataa raheko chhaanabinale thahara gareko thiyo
jillaakaae chakraghattaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa sekha balaalaki jethi srimati warsiyaa koraisaa khaatunale aphnai sautaa warsiyaa khursidaa khaatunako hatyaa gareki hun
ghatanaabaare jaanakaari paae lagattai prahari chauki sundarapurabaata khatieko praharile gharako chhatabaata haama phaalera bhaagna khojdai gardaa abhiyukta koraisaa khaatunalaai pakraau gareko chha
hatyaamaa sumlagna koraisaalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya malangawaako hiraasatamaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko prahari niriksaka saahale jaanakaari dinubhayo
praharile baankeko nepaalaganjabaata katuwaa pestolasahita eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
nepaalaganjako ganaesapurabaata bhe sa num ko ato riksaamaa laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa praharile duduwaa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kaa warsiya meraaja ali sayaadalaai pakraau garakaae haae
pakraau parekaa meraajalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairahekaae praharile janaaekaae chha
skulale lieko pariksaamaa rosnile wijnaana swaasthya ra bhokesanala wisayamaa phela bhaeko bhandai siksaka basnetalale kaksaa kothaadekhi baahira nikaalera paaipale kutapita garekaa thie

piditakaa aphantale nirghaata kutapita garne siksakalaai kaarabaahiko maaga raakhdai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranamaa jaaheri dine tayaari garekaa chhan kutapitabaata ghaaite baalikaako swaasthya pariksana ra upachaara kosi aspataalamaa garieko chha

morana praharikaa prawaktaa diesapi raajakumaara khinujule ghatanaakaa baaremaa jaanakaari raheko bataaundai kohi kasaile jaaheri diemaa dartaa garera chhaatraalaai kutapita garne siksakamaathi kaarabaahi aghi badhaaine jaanakaari die

eka wyaktiko naamamaa arkai wyaktiko marigaulaa jhiki kinabecha tathaa pratyaaropana garaaeko aropamaa nidaana aspataalakaa pramukha kaaryakaari adhikaritasahita janaalaai kaaraagaara chalaana gariekaae chha

kaathamaadaum jillaa adaalatale aspataalakaa siio wipendra pradhaana daaktara raajesa panta kaanuni sallaahakaara kumudakumaara bhattaraai jillaa prasaasana kaaryalayakaa saakhaa adhikarita raamachandra ale ra marigaulaa line biraami sumkaralaala laamaalaai purpaksakaa laagi jela chalaana garna adesa diekaae haae

prahariko maanawa bechabikhana aparaadha anusandhaana wyurole marigaulaa kinabecha gareko aropamaa aspataalakaa pramukha kaaryakaari adhikaritasahita janaalaai nakkali bhaanjaa banaaera marigaulaa pratyaaropana gareko abhiyogamaa gaekaae asoja gate pakraau gareko thiyo
praharile kaudaa kheliraheko awasthaamaa raanadhaanikaae naagaarjunabaata tina laakha hajaara rupaiyaan nagadasahita juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha
mahaanagariya prahari waritta swayambhuko tolile naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa ichangunaaraayanamaa kaudaa kheliraheko awasthaamaa mangalabaara raati uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
warittakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka laaladhwaja suwedile thulo rakama haarajita hune gari kaudaa kheliraheko awasthaamaa uniharulaai pakraau garieko jaanakaari die
pakraau parekaasanga praharile tina laakha hajaara nagada ra thaana kaudaa baraamada gareko chha
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata eka keji awaidha suna sahita eka chiniyaan naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha
kaaryaalaya sahayogilaai kutapita gareko aropamaa kailaaliko mohanyaala gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa chhawilaala haujaali pakraau parekaa chhan

kaaryaalaya sahayogi tulasaraa sijaalilaai nirghaata kutapita gareko aropamaa wadaadhyaksa haujaali pakraau parekaa hun pidita mahilaale wadaadhyaksa haujaalile aphumaathi nirghaata kutapita gareko bhandai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sukhadamaa ujuri diepachhi unalaai praharile pakraau gareko haae
kartawya jyaana muddaamaa pharaara dui abhiyuktalaai dhaadina praharile warsapachhi pakraau gareko chha

srimaanako marityu bhaepachhi kutapitamaa sumlagna janaa wiruddha srimati chhandara taamaanale kartawya jyaana muddhaa daayara gareki thiin muddhaa dartaa bhaedekhi pharaara rahekaa goma laamaa ra suka laamaalaai kaathamaadaummaa lukichhipi basiraheko awasthaamaa dhaadina prahariko anurodhamaa kendriya anusandhaana byaroko tolile pakraau gari dhaadina praharilaai bujhaaeko ho
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata dui keji chaandisahita bhutaani naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha
pakraau parekaa dorjelaai baaramada garieko chaandisahita awasyaka anusandhaana ewam kaarawaahiko laagi tribhuwana wimaanasthala bhansaara kaaryaalaya gauchara pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha

juwaa kheleko abhiyogamaa daayara bhaeko muddaamaa jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayale dharautimaa rihaa garnaasaatha somabaara pheri pakraau parekaa uniharumaathi thapa anusandhaanakaa laagi sampatti suddhikarana anusandhaana wibhaagamaa bujhaauna laagieko ho

apaharanakaarilaai pakraau garna daana praharile goli chalaaeko chha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tulasipurale tina janaa apaharanakaarilaai pakraau garna somabaara bihaana dui raaunda hawaai phaayara gareko ho

so bhidiyo saamaajika sanjaalamaa saarwajanika garidine bhandai rakamakaa laagi dhamki dindai aekaa thie blyaakamelina garekaa uniharulaai laakha rupaiyaan bujhaaune kramamaa tulasipura khamaariko jumgalamaa praharile goli chalaaeko ho

pakraau parneharumaa rasuwaa anachheduma gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya nimaa winduka ra kaathamaadaum puraano guheswari basne rasuwaa kaalikaasthaana gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya purwaa syaanawaa rahekaa chhan mahaanagariya prahari waritta baalaajubaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta dhaatu sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
prahari tolile yahi gate sarlaahi barahathawaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai kaathamaandau naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa saranapura basne warsa ko nira bahaadura kaarkilaai pakraau gareko haae

prahari kaarkilaai kaathamaandau mahaanagarapaalikaa solti dobaatomaa baa pa nambarako skutaralaai chekajaancha gardaa pyaaketa widyutiya dibhaadasa jadita taasa ra nagada hajaara phelaa sumkaapasda rupamaa phelaa pareko thiyo

dibhaaisa jadita saamagriharule juwaamaa sajilai taasa chinna sakne prahariko bhanaai chha pakraau parekaa kaarkile yastai saamagriharu bikrisameta gareko mahaanagariya prahari waritta kaalimaatile jaanakaari dieko chha
jipa prayoga gari gaanjaa taskari garne dui janaalaai praharile udayapurabaata pakraau gareko chha

praharile udayapurako taapli gaaunpaalika taaplibaata somabaara bihaana sacha nambarako jipasahita sirahaako dhanagadhi nagarapaalikaakaa warsiya kansalaala taamaanga ra warsiya mohanabahaadura taamaangalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile udayapurabaata sirahaatarpha jaandai gareko jipamaa boraamaa pyaaka garieko kariba keji gaanjaa baraamada garekaae chha

gaanjaa taskarimaa sumlagna gaadikaa chaalaka sahachaalakasahita tina janaa pharaara rahekaale uniharuko khoji bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha sumlagna duwailaai jipa ra gaanjaasahita ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kataari pathaaune tayaari bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata dui kilo eka saya graama kokinasahita braajiliyana naagarikalaai pakraau garekaae chha
pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita sirahaa praharile tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile sirahaako bariyaarapatti gaaunpaalikaa kachanaaribaata moranako miklaajuna gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya rosana khadkaa sohi thaaunkaa warsiya gowinda nepaala ra bhaaratiya naagarika warsiya mohammada riyaajalaai pakraau gareko ho

prahari chauki kachanaaribaata khatieko tolile biara yu numko motarasaaikalalaai jaancha gardaa tinai janaako saathabaata naaitrobheta pattaa spaasmo paancha pattaa ra gaanjaa graama phelaa pareko praharile janaaeko chha

pakraau parekaa tinaijanaalaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaamaa lyaai thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka apilaraaja boharaale jaanakaari die
tyastai bahuwiwaaha muddaamaa adaalatabaata kaida sajaaya paaera pharaara rahekaa eka yuwakalaai gaeraati sirahaa praharile pakraau gareko chha

bahuwiwaaha muddaamaa jillaa adaalata sirahaabaata mahinaa dinako kaida sajaaya paaera pharaara sirahaako bhagawaanapura gaaunpaalikaa naharaa niwaasi warsiya raamawilaasa saahalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho
asthaayi prahari posta bhagawaanapurabaata khatieko gasti tolile saahalaai gharamaa lukichhipi basiraheko awasthaamaa pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaale janaaeko chha

wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita bhansaara kaaryaalaya agaadiko pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaanchako kramamaa wiraatanagara omasaairaama tola basne warsiya jyotikumaara saaha ra pachhaadi basne bhaarata jogabani kaa warsiya bikki kumaarabaata sukrabaara ru saata laakha baraamada bhaeko ho jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranakaa prawaktaa raajakumaara khiunle jaanakaari die
nijaharulaai thapa awasyaka anusandhaana ra kaarawaahikaa laagi mula bhansaara kaaryaalaya wiraatanagara raani bujhaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale jillaa adaalata paschima rukumako musikotamaa kaaryarata eka janaa naayaba subbaalaai ghusa rakamasahita pakraau garekaae chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako kaaryaalaya surkhetabaata khatieko tolile khadkaalaai hajaara ghusa rakama maaga liiraheko awasthaamaa rukuma paschima musikota nagarapaalikaa khalumgaa sthita raapti hotala enda laja agaadibaata pakraau garekaae haae
laaguausadha muddaamaa pharaara rahekaa wadaadhyaksalaai nuwaakota praharile aitabaara pakraau gareko chha

jillaako myaagana gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa wadaadhyaksa raamabahaadura taamaanalaai praharile aja bihaana aphnai gharabaatai pakraau gareko haae pakraau parekaa taamaanalaai mahaanagariya prahari parisara teku pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nuwaakotale janaaekaae chha
taamaana wiruddha jetha maa kaathamaadau jillaa adaalatale taamaanalaai warsa kaida ra hajaara rupaiyaan jaribaanaa hune gari phaisalaa gareko thiyo tyasa pachhi uni pharaara bhaekaa thie
ghaaite bhagawatiko praathamika swaasthya kendra sotaanamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha yasa sambandhamaa praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
praharile baajuraako gaumula gaaunpaalikaa maajhaapaalibaata pestola ra wisphotaka padaarthasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
jillaakaae rolpaa gumgaadewa gaaunpaalikaa jinaawaanakaa warsiya chudaamanai olilagaayata janaalaai sukrabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko haae

praharile uniharuko saathabaata eutaa pestola tina raaunda goli phalaamako khaali saketa eka thaana saya graama baaruda eutaa presarakukara bama ilektronika kamarsiyala detonetara atha thaana bijuliko taara mainabatti pilaasa tepa ra kainchi tathaa sainya taalimasambandhi kaagajaata baraamada gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baagalunale bharuwaa bandukasahita chaara janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
kaathekholaa gaaunpaalikaa bihunbaata praharile kaathekholaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa tilaka wika ramesa gharti khagendra gharti ra jagata ghartilaai aja pakraau gareko ho
uniharulaai ajai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa lyaai thapa anusandhaana thaalieko praharile janaaekaae chha

bhaaratabaata nepaalamaa jiudon tathaa maasu lyaauna pratibandha chha alu ra hariyo keraau bhandai uniharule sarlaahiko malumgawaa naakaabaata gaai ra kukhuraako maasu bhitryaaeko wibhaagakaa eka adhikaarile jaanakaari die

maasu jaanchakaa laagi wibhaagale khaadya tathaa gunastara wibhaagamaa pathaaune tayaari gareko chha maasu nepaalakaa solti haayaata lagaayatakaa hotalaharuko laagi lyaaeko khulna aeko wibhaagale janaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaako tolile hundi kaarobaaramaa sumlagna janaalaai sukrabaara wiraganjabaata pakraau gareko chha
uniharule awaidha rupamaa hundi kaarobaara garne gareko parsaakaa prahari pramukha esapi somendrasimha raathaurale jaanakaari die uniharumaathi praharile thapa anusandhaana garirahe chha

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa thamelasthita diutimaa khatieko praharilaai nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojne kaathamaadaum kapana basne udayapura triyugaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya dewa kumaara raailaai bihibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

maadaka padaartha sewana gari pradesa nambara pa nambarako motarasaaikala chalaaeko awasthaamaa unalaai praharile phelaa paari kaarawaahi garne kramamaa chaalaka raaile praharilaai ukta nagada dina khojepachhi nagada sahita unalaai niyantranamaa lieko ho

khatikakaa saathamaa rahekaa bhaaratiya naagarika baharaaichakaa rohana ansaari bhaaratatarpha bhaagne kramamaa simaa ksetra jamunaahabaata unalaai niyantranamaa lieko laaguausadha niyantrana byuro saakhaa kaaryaalaya nepaalaganjakaa pramukha prahari niriksaka wirabahaadura thaapaale jaanakaari die

bihibaara nai praharile baankeko baijanaatha gaaunpaalikaa chisaapaanibaata paancha graama miligraama braaunasugarasahita nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa samira ansaarilaai niyantranamaa lieko chha

kaabhre banepaa nagarapaalikaale saanti suraksaamaa khalala puyaai todaphoda gareko aropamaa wadaa num kaa wadaadhyaksa serabahaadura suwaalasahita janaawiruddha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrepalaanchokamaa kitaani jaaheri dieko chha

wadaadhyaksa suwaalasahita janaawiruddha saantisuraksaamaa khalala puyaai todaphodamaa utrieko aropamaa jaaheri aeko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhulikhelakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dipaka girile bhane

yasaibicha aja bihaana napaa kaaryaalayamaa jisasa pramukha uddhawa kesiko adhyaksataamaa sthaaniya janapratinidhi pramukha jillaa adhikaari jillaa suraksaapramukha tathaa karmachaari sammilita baithakale phohara wyawasthaapana garne bhanieko sthaanamaa punahkaama suru garne waataawarana pariksana pratiwedana tatkaala upalabdha garaaune pratiwedanapachhi phohara wyawasthaapanako kaama suru garne nirnaya gareko chha

ajai pakraau gariekaa ghisinako rihaaiko maaga gardai sthaaniya mahilaale nagara kaaryaalayako getamaa plokaardasahita dharnaa diekaa chhan bhane nepaali kaangresasahita kehi dalale thapa barihat chhalaphala gari phohara wyawasthaapanakaa laagi uchita sthaana chhanota garna sujhaawasahita jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya dhulikhelamaa jnaapanapatra bujhaaekaa chhan raasasa
saptariko mahaadewaa gaaunpaalikaa pakari kujaraahi tolakaa warsiya naima pamariyaalaai aphnai bubaako hatyaako aropamaa purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa raakhieko chha

saptari jillaa adaalatakaa nyaayaadhisa umesa koiraalaako ijalaasale naimalaai budhabaaradekhi raajawiraaja kaaraagaaramaa thunaamaa pathaaeko ho naimamaathi unakaa bubaa warsiya mo gaphura pamariyaako hatyaa gareko aropa chha

hatyaakaa arkaa aropi gaphuraki srimati warsiyaa jamuni khaatunalaai bhane adaalatale saadhaarana taarekhamaa rihaa gareko janaaeko chha maritakakaa bhaai mo isaraaila pamariyaale jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarimaa aropita wiruddha gata asoja gate ujuri diekaa thie
jillaako siraahaa nagarapaalikaa saarasara belhaamaa andaaji barsiya purusako sawa ghaanti retieko awasthaamaa sawa phelaa pareko praharile janaaeko chha unako naama ra thegaanaa khulna sakeko chhain
sawalaai pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala lyaaieko ra anya anusanadhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya siraahaale janaaeko chha
praharile kaathamaadaumko chobhaarabaata eutaa pestola ra tyasamaa laagne raaunda golisahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaako tolile kaathamaadaum kaa manoja basneta dewendra bhandaari ra kirtipurakaa sumana khadkaalaai pakraau gareko ho praharile baa cha nambarako gaadi chekajaancha garne kramamaa hatiyaarasahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile bhojapurabaata bhaaluko pitta osaarapasaara muddaamaa sumlagna rahi pharaara raheki eka mahilaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya haattisaara kaathamaandaumaa muddaa dartaa bhaera gaeko kaattika gate kaathamaandau jillaa adaalatabaata pakraau anumati jaari bhaepachhi ti mahilaa pharaara raheki thiin
parsaa praharile apaharanakaarimaathi goli prahaara gari apaharanamaa parekaa eka baalakakaae sakusala uddaara gareko chha

praharile budhabaara bihaana wiraganja sirsiyaa khalawaatolaamaa goli haani pokhariyaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raajakumaara daasalaai pakraau gareko ho unako daahine khuttaamaa goli laageko praharile janaaeko chha
kaabhre banepaa basne parsaa biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa sirsiyaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya baalaka kaattika gate kaabhre banepaabaata gharatarpha aune kramamaa bepattaa bhaekaa thie

baalakako khoji tathaa anusandhaanako kramamaa apaharita baalakakaa baabusanga phirauti rakama lina bhaaratabaata motarasaaikalamaa aekaa daasale pestola dekhaai jholaa khosi bhaagna khojepachhi niyantranamaa line kramamaa praharile goli chalaaeko ho
ghundaamuni goli laagekaa daasako naaraayanai aspataala biragumjamaa upachaara bhairaheko ra awasthaa saamaanya raheko chha

daasale prayoga gareko biara je nambarako motarasaaikala katuwaa pestola thaana ukta pestolamaa loda garieko goli raaunda ra daasako paaintako khaltibaata ukta katuwaa pestolamaa prayoga hune goli raaunda ra mobaaila thaana sameta phelaa paari praharile baraamada gareko chha
jillaakaae karjanhaa nagarapaalikaa bandipurakaa raamabaabu paasawaanale aphnai srimati kawitaadewi paasawaanako sarirakaa wibhinna bhaagamaa bancharo prahaara gari hatyaa garekaa hun
srimatilaai bancharo prahaara gari paasawaana bhane pharaara bhaeko ra unako khoji kaaryabhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinale jyaana maarne muddaakaa pharaara pratiwaadilaai warsa pachhi pakraau gareko chha

maagha gate sohi thaaun basne pembaa dorje taamaanalaai chandra bahaadura sameta janaale jyaana maarne manasaayale kutapita gari gambhira ghaaite banaaeko jyaana maarne udyoga muddaamaa jillaa adaalata dhaadinako asaara gateko phaisalaale uniharu upara warsa kaida phaisalaa bhae paschaata pharaara rahekaamadhye chandra bahaaduralaai praharile pakraau gareko ho
chandra bahaaduralaai awasyaka kaarawaahiko mumgalabaara jillaa adaalata dhaadinamaa pesa garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinale janaaeko chha

laaguausadha niyantrana wyuro koteswarabaata khatieko praharile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa dhalkusthita sadaka kinaarabaata awaidha laaguausadha charesasahita janaalaai somabaara saanjha pakraau gareko chha
praharile makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sanjaya pokharela ra warsiyaa laksmidewi pokharelalaai pakraau gareko ho

nakhipota tathaa asapaasakaa sthaaniyale kehi dina aghi nai saatadobaato praharimaa raati maasuko gandha aune gareko ra tyasabaata nakaaraatmaka asara pareko bhandai praharilaai khabara garekaa thie praharikaa anusaara nakhipotasthita buddhatola yuwaa klabale yasabaare likhita ujuri nai dieko thiyo

apaharanakaarimaathi goli prahaara gari praharile baalakalaai sakusala uddhaara garna saphala bhaeko haae parsaa jillaako wiraganja upamahaanagarapaalikaasthita nepaalabhaarata simaa ksetramaa parne khalabaa tolamaa raati bajetira praharile apaharanakaarimaathi goli prahaara gareko ho

banepaadekhi apaharana garera lyaaeko baalakalaai sakusala uddhaara garna prahari saphala bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaakaa prahari prawaktaa diesapi gautama thaapaale jaanakaari die ti warsiya baalaka dinaaghi apaharanamaa pareko bataaieko chha

prahariko golibaata apaharanakaari ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unako naaraayanai upaksetriya aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha apaharanakaariko daahine khuttaamaa goli laageko chha praharile apaharita baalaka ra apaharanakaariko naama bhane khulaaeko chhaina
praharile jhaapaabaata bhaaratatarpha taskari garna laagieko awasthaamaa wataa gorusahita dui janaalaai niyantranamaa lieko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya wirtaamoda ra surungaako sumyakta tolile wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa mumgalawaara bihaana gorusahita kanakaai nagarapaalikaa tulasibaaribaata wirabahaadura thina ra nawalaparaasikaa wijaya chaudharilaai mumgalabaara pakraau gareko ho

praharile surungaabaata kaankarabhittaa naakaa hundai bhaarata lagindai gareko awasthaamaa kankaai nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara sthita tulasibaaribaata naa kha ra naa kha nambarako dui wataa trakamaa wataa gaaigorulaai niyantranamaa lieko ho

prahariko praarambhika anusandhaanamaa goruharu nawalaparaasibaata sohi sthaana basne pramoda yaadawale jhaapaa kankaai nagarapaalikaa basne ramesa kharelalaai bujhaaune gari pathaaieko khulna aeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anaaramanikaa diesapi mohanakumaara thaapaale jaanakaari die
praharile baaraa ra kanchanapurabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita tina janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

baaraa nijagadha nagarapaalikaa sthita hanumaanachokabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa keji saya graama sahita sarlaahi basabariyaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya raajendra raayalaai somabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha
asthaayi prahari posta ratanapurabaata khatieko praharile unalaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

kanchanapura punarwaasa nagarapaalikaa sthitabaata awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara jasto dekhine padaartha graama saya miligraama sahita kailaali dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya raajana josi ra warsiya biweka raaja upaadhyaayalaai somabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tribhuwanabastibaata khatieko praharile se pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta padaartha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
chhimekikaa anusaara raati baje khaanaa khaaera sutna gaekaa thie madiraa sewana garna awera aekaaharule biwaada hundaa hatyaa gareko asumkaa garieko chha

pakraau parneharumaa kaabhrepalaanchoka dhulikhela nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya saroja lamsaala ra raamechhaapa dorambaa gaanupaalikaa basne warsiya surendra srestha rahekaa chhan ukta akhetopahaara awaidha rupamaa osaarapasaara tathaa kharida bikri garna laageko bhanne wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa kendriya anusandhaana wyuro mahaaraajagumjabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jumlaale warsadekhi pharaara rahekaa mugu kaarmaarona gaaunpaalikaa kaa sonaama taamaanalaai phakraau gareko chha
praharile taamaanalaai chandananaatha nagarapaalikaa kaalekholibaata sukrabaara pakraau gareko haae praharikaa anusaara taamaana chaainija mudraa yuanako awaidha kaarowaari hun

unalaai surkheta jillaa adaalatale jetha gate laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan jariwaanaa tokeko thiyo waisaakha gate punaraawedana adaalatale pani jillaa adaalatako phaisalaalaai sadara garepachhi uni pharaara thie
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetale laaguausadhasahita aja dui yuwakalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile wirendranagara nagarapaalikaa surkheta chisaapaanikaa warsiya nawina khadkaa ra sohi nagarapaalikaa surkheta pipiraa choka basne warsiya ramesa thaapaalaai pakraau gareko haae

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa balkhusthita oma hareraama sawaari kaauntarabhitra juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa sohi thaaun basne makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa bhimire ghara bhaekaa warsiya niranjana raanaamagara sahita janaalaai aitabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko haae

jillaa adaalata baankekaa nyaayaadhisa dhaniswara paudelako ijalaasale aitabaara sahakaarikaa pramukha prabandhaka gopaala bhandaari sahaayaka pramukha prabandhaka gangaadhara suwedi baimnika prabandhaka arunakumaara paathaka ra sahaupasahaayaka balaraama yaadawalaai thunaamaa raakhna adesa dieko ho
baanke praharile gathana gareko wijna samuhako sahayogamaa bhaeko chhaanabinamaa sahakaariko kula punji ru karodabaata ru karoda apachalana bhaeko daabi garieko chha

sahakaarikaa hajaara niksepakartaa ra eka hajaara seyaradhanimadhye eka hajaara nau niksepakartaa ra seyara dhanile jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankemaa aphno rakama phirtaa gari abhiyuktamaathi kaarawaahiko maaga gardai jaaheri diekaa chhan
nepaala praharile tina kilograama graama charesasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga naagadhungaako tolile dhaadinabaata kaathamaadaun aundai gareko baakha numko yaatruwaahaka basa chekajaanchakaa kramamaa makawaanapura thaahaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya laksmana sinjaalimagaralaai aitabaara raati pakraau gareko ho

praharile kaalo jholaamaa charesa lukaaera kaathamaadaun lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa sinjaalimagaralaai pakraau gareko haae pakraau parekaa unalaai awasyaka anusandhaanakaa laagi mahaanagariya prahari waritta thaanakota pathaaieko praharile janaaekaae chha

jillaakaae dudhauli nagarapaalikaa ekahatiyaa basne ritu sadaale gharaayasi baadawiwaadakai kaarana aphnai barsiya srimati asaa sadaalaai maachhaa taari raheko awasthaamaa taato telamaa anuhaara dubaaidieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhulile janaaeko chha
taato telamaa aphnai srimaanale dubaaepachhi gambhira ghaaite bhaeki asaalaai sthaaniya medikalamaa upachaara huna nasakepachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagi jillaa aspataala lyaaieko chha

bardiyaako ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya saanosri bardiyaabaata prahari tolile bardiyaa madhuwana napaa wadaa num kaa warsiya pharida ansaari sohi wadaa niwaasi warsiya pappu ansaari ra warsiya suresa sunaaralaai miligraama laaguausadha braaunasugarasahita pakraau gareko ho
apasi wiwaadako kramamaa khukuri prahaara gari ghaaite banaaeko aropamaa sarlaahi praharile eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
ghaaite jayakumaaralaai upachaarako laagi jillaa aspataala malumgawaa lagieko praharile janaaeko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya haripurabaata khatieko praharile dipesalaai khukurisahita pakraau gareko chha ghatanaamaa sumlagna raakesa ra ritesa bhane haala pharaara rahekaale uniharuko khoji bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
belakotagadhi nagarapaalikaa deuraali laamaatolakaa nawaraaja raanaamagarakaa warsiya chhaaeraa sujana raanaamagarako warsiyaa phupu paarwati raanaa magarale khurpaale haanera hatyaa gareki hun
chaara dinaaghi hotalamaa sankaaspada awasthaamaa marita bhetiekaa kanchanapurako bhimadattanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya ajaya chaudhari prakaranamaa praharile gahana anusandhaana suru gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka narendra chandale ghatanaako suksmarupamaa anusandhaana thaalieko bhandai ghatanaako satyatathya baahira aune bataae

jillaakaae rupaakota majhuwaagadhi nagarapaalikaa daandaakharkakaa warsiya bisaala bhanne milana raailaai sohi thaaun basne warsiya pawana raai sametale kodaalole taaukomaa prahaara garekaa thie kodaalo prahaarabaata raaiko ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya khotaanale janaeko chha

ghatanaako jaanakaari paaunaasaatha tatkaala ghatanaasthala pugekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya khotaana ra asthaai prahari chauki khaanidaandaakaae prahari tolile anusandhaanako laagi pawana lagaayata janaalaai niyantranamaa lieko chha
makawaanapuramaa eka nepaali yuwatimaathi esida prahaara gari pharaara rahekaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai praharile warsapachhi pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaarata mahaaraajaganja amarapurwana kaa raaja bhanne dilipa raaja kesari chhan kesarilaai jillaa prahari kaaryalaya makawaanapura ra jillaa prahari kaaryalaya baaraako prahari tolile baaraako jitapurasimaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa bhalohimaa lukiraheko awasthaamaa pakraau garekaae haae
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kohalapurale nepaalaganjabaata bihibaara raati pestola sahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parekaa hatiyaarasahita praharile pakraau gareko ho

praharile nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaakaa sthita namaste bhileja risortabhitra purwatarpha paarkina garieko baa cha ko kaara chekajaacha garne kramamaa chaalaka basne sitako muni lukaai raakheko meda ina yuesa lekheko myaagjinasahitako atometika pestola baraamada gareko chha

pestola sahita pakraau parnemaa nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num raamabaagha basne tarunadalakaa nepaalaganja nagara sabhaapati barsiya sumdipajumga saaha dinesa saahi raaghaba saaha saanu maadhaba nepaali jaya bahaadura budhaa ra pritama thaapaa magara rahekaa chhan

kapadaa byaapaarilaai taskariko laaina milaai dine bhandai ghusa liekaae abhiyaaegamaa akhtiyaarakaae taaelile baaraa jillaako mahaagadhimaai nagarapaalikaasthita ganjabhawaanipura prahari chaukikaa inchaarja prahari naayawa niriksaka jattaasumkara saaha kalawaaralaai pakraau gareko ho

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayoga ksetriya kaaryaalaya hetaumdaako tolile sewaagraahisanga hajaara ghusa waapatako rakama liisakeko awasthaamaa kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa mandira chokabaata rumgehaata pakraau garekaae haae
juwaa khaalabaata praharile dui laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan baraamada gareko chha yastai thaana kaudaa ra eka buka taasa sameta baraamada bhaeko chha

kutapitako kramamaa ghaaite bhaekaa anya janaako bhaaratako lakhanaumaa upachaara bhairaheko chha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bagnaahaa ra asthaai prahari posta thaakuraddhaaraabaata khatieko praharile kutapitamaa sumlagna thaakurabaabaa nagarapaalikaa kaalaagadhi basne warsiya arjuna budhaa lagaayata janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

dharaana nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara niwaasi andaaji warsiya yuwaka arjuna raaile budhabaara raati aphni srimati warsiyaa jinaa taamaanako taaukomaa dhumgaa prahaara garera hatyaa garekaa hun dharaana paanawaari maaiti basdai aeki binaa hijo maatrai ghara aeki thiin

pakraau parekaa dhanabahaadura maritaka harisa boharaakaa bhatijaa naataa parne rahekaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baitadile anusandhaanakaa laagi bhaarata pathaaekaa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka syaamasimha maharaale jaanakaari die

pakraau parekaa boharaale aphule nai tinai janaako hatyaa gareko swikaara gareko bhaaratiya praharilaai uddharita gardai prahari sahaayaka niriksaka maharaale bataae unakaa anusaara kaattika gate chaarai janaale raksi khaaeko ra dhungaale taauko hirkaaeko ra tyasapachhi dhanabahaadura aphainle hansiyaale uniharuko linga kaateko praharilaai bayaana diekaa chhan

yasaaghi bhaaratiya praharile ghatanaamaa maritaka harisa boharaaki srimati kalaawati boharaa kirraako sumlagnataa raheko asankaa gareko bhaepani kalaawati uniharuko saamuhika hatyaa hunuaghi nai nepaala pharkieko baitadi praharilaai bataaeko thiyo

praharile anusandhaana tathaa sodhapuchhakaa laagi unalaai kaattika gate bajhaanabaata pakraau gareko baitadikaa prahari prawaktaa kisana chandale jaanakaari die harisa boharaale kalaawatisanga eka warsaaghi maatrai wiwaaha garera majaduri garna sangai bhaarata gaekaa thie kalaawatile harisa boharaasanga dosro wiwaaha gareko bujhieko chha
ghatanaako anusandhaana garna jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baitadile sameta prahari sahaayaka niriksaka syaamasimha maharaako netaritwamaa prahariko eka toli bhaaratako pithauraagadha pathaaeko thiyo
aphnai srimaanako hatyaa gareko aropamaa praharile bardiyaabaata eka mahilaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa bardiyaa jillaa baansagadhi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa dilamaayaa darai raheki chhin dilamaayaale warsiya samalaa daraiko hatyaa gari pharaara rahekaae praharile janaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale jaanakaari praapta garnaasaatha dilamaayaako khojatalaasamaa khatieko praharile baanke jillaako khajuraa gaaunpaalikaa gunaanaa bhanne sthaanabaata pakraau gareko ho

gata somabaara saanjha mahendranagara bajaarako bhaanuka chokanajikai raheko puspaanjali gesta haausako paanchaun talaabaata khasera chaudhariko marityu bhaeko thiyo anusandhaanakaa laagi gesta haausamaa rahekaa winoda khatri ramesa bhatta gesta haausakaa sanchaalakasahita eka janaa yuwatilaai niyantranamaa lii sodhapuchhako kaarya bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka narendra chandale bataae

jillaakaae myaanaluna napaa basne barsa kaa ramesa rasaailile maadaka padaartha sebana gari srimati barsiyaa kumaari bika ra paahunaa aekaa menchhyaayema gaapaa basne barsiya dambara bahaadura sunawaaralaai khukuri prahaara garera ghaaite banaaekaa hun

rasaailile mumgalabaara khukari prahaara gardaa srimati bikako taaukomaa ra paahunaa aekaa sunawaarako daahine haatamaa chota laageko chha sakhta ghaaite bhaekaa sunawaaralaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi jillaa baahira rephara garieko chha bhane wikako jillaa swaasthya kaaryaalayamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile moranakaae wibhinna sthaanabaata juwaa taasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa juwaadelaai nagada laakha hajaara sahita pakraau gareko chha
uniharu sabailaai niyantranamaa lii thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
warittakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka umesa lamsaalale thulomaatraamaa haarajita hune gari juwaa kheliraheko awasthaamaa kaudaasahita uniharulaai pakraau garieko jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parnemaa wikrama gautama raamakarisna kesi indra srestha ranjana raajawumsi syaamaprasaada paraajuli asoka srestha sitaaraama khadkaa rosana taamaana raama taamaana karisna bhandaari sumana agrawaala sumana guruna sowita silawaala sohala kaarki pawana agrawaala pawitra kumaara kaarki balaraama saapakotaa dhaawaa laamaa mukti laamaa sambhu budhaathoki prema thaapaa magara buddha laamaa nawaanga laamaa pradipa bogati rahekaa chhan
aphnai srimaanko hatyaa gareko aropamaa praharile bardiyaako baansagadhi nagapaalikaa kaa warsiyaa dilamaayaa darailaai pakraau gareko chha

dilamaayaalaai srimaan warsiya samalaa daraiko hatyaa hatyaa gari pharaara bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya wardiyaabaata khatieko praharile khoji garne kramamaa baanke khajuraa gaanupaalika gunaanaa bhanne sthaanamaa phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
dilamaayaaupara kartabya jyaana muddhaamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya wardiyaale janaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskile juwaataasa khelirahekaae awasthaamaa laakha hajaara rupaiyaan nagadasahita janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha

pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa pahaarimaargasthita chhawi paudelale sanchaalana gareko hotala kristala pyaalesamaa juwaa khelaairaheko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa pugeko praharile taasakaa gaddi ra nagadasahita juwaade pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raajakumaara kesile jaanakaari diekaa chhan

gata asoja gate gharaayasi wibaadako kaarana dirgha naaraayanale kutapita gardaa biraami bhaeki kailaasiko jillaa aspataala paraasi hundai thapa upachaarako laagi gautama buddha mutu aspataala butawalatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho
parsaa praharile laakha rupaiyaansahita hundi kaarobaariharulaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile sukrawaara wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa baata bhaarata wihaarakaa warsiya gopaalaprasaada agrawaalalaai laakha ra wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya mantukumaara saahalaai laakha hajaarasahita pakraau gareko thiyo

bhaarata raamagadhawaa thaanaa graama raamagadhawaakaa warsiya sakira miyaalaai laakha baaraa khatuwaa prasauni gaaunpaalikaa ahirwaatolakaa warsiya wirendra saaha ra baaraakai baaraagadhi gaaunpaalikaa dauruwaatolakaa warsiya sani jaisawaalalaai adhaaiadhaai laakha nagadasahita praharile pakraau gareko haae

jillaakaae beni nagarapaalikaa bhakimli musunadolemaa raheko enaselako taawara marmata garera pharkieko baa cha nambarako bolero jipamaa raati kariba bajetira agajani bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya myaagdile janaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale kukurako sahayogamaa bisphotaka padaartha pataakaa baraamada gareko chha

bihibaara diunso saadhe baje prahari upariksaka esapi mukesakumaara simha sasastra prahari gana gulma nambara kaa esapi wikaasaraaja ghimire tathaa jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurabaata taalima praapta kukurasahita khatiekaa prahari niriksakako sumyukta tolile pataakaa baraamada gareko ho
kartawya jyaana muddaakaa pharaara aparaadhilaai warsapachhi salyaana praharile prakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa tatkaalina kaabhraa gaawisa aruchaurakaa dilabahaadura puna rahekaa chhan ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya luhaamale punalaai kaabhraako raamabajaarabaata pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa dilabahaaduralaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya luhaamamai raakhera thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya salyaanale janaaekaae chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamale pallo kiraanta raastriya limbuwaana morchaakaa kendriya sachiwasahita nau janaalaai niyantranamaa lieko chha

pakraau parnemaa morchaakaa kendriya sachiwa dhanabahaadura wiswakarmaa dhamalaa paartiko mahilaa sangha kendriya adhyaksa kawiramaayaa saawaa ilaama jillaa adhyaksa wijaya anadambe sachiwa manakumaara maakhima kosaadhyaksa maitaraaja limbu jillaa sadasya kamala lakaandri warijaraaja chonawaana ajaahaana limbu ra harkaprasaada nemwaana rahekaa chhan
jillaa prahari pramukha prahari upariksaka esapi hiraabahaadura paandele saanti suraksaamaa acha aune kaama garekaale uniharulaai niyantranamaa lieko jaanakaari die
morchaakaa kaaryakartaale jillaakaa sarakaari kaaryaalayalagaayatakaa sthaanamaa raakhiekaa raastriya jhandaa hataaera morchaako jhandaa raakhekaa thie
praharile paschima nawalaparaasibaata laaguausadhasahita dui yuwaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa raamagraama nagarapaalikaa manjhariyaakaa warsiya wisraama harijana ra paalhinandana gaaunpaalikaa wesaalapurakaa warsiya bechu gosaain rahekaa chhan prahari chauki geramiko tolile jillaako bhaaratiya simaa najikai paalhinandana chamanatolabaata budhabaara uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paalpaakaa prahari niriksaka dewaraaja paudelakaa anusaara tinaau gaaunpaalikaa masyaamakaa warsiya mohanawira nepaalilaai wadaa sadasya wistale kutapita garekaa thie
praharile moranako wibhinna sthaanabaata bhansaara chhalikaa bibhinna saamaana baraamada gareko chha

mumgalabaara baraamada gariekaa so parimaanako saamaanaharu awasyaka kaarabaahiko laagi wiraatanagarasthita mula bhansaara kaaryaalaya raanimaa budhabaara bujhaaune kaama bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
uniharumaathi kaanuni kaarawaahiko prakriyaa agaadi badhaaieko sunasari praharile janaaeko chha
aphnai srimatiko hatyaa gari pharaara rahekaa eka janaalaai daana praharile warsapachhi pakraau garekaae chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanako tolile mumgalabaara saanjha lamahi nagarapaalikaa koilaabaasakaa warsiya pradipakumaara jayasawaalalaai warsapachhi pakraau garekaae haae
jayasawaala lamahi bajaarabaata pakraau parekaa hun
dhanusaako janakapuradhaama upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita widyuta praadhikarana naji aja bihaana eka janaako goli haani hatyaa garieko chha
nepaala praharile baaghako chhaalaasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

warittakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka santosasimha raathaurale jholaamaa bokera hindiraheko awasthaamaa tina phita incha lambaai bhaeko baaghako chhaalaasahita uniharulaai pakraau garieko jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parneharumaa kaathamaadaum kapana basne sindhupaalchoka waahrawise nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaaharu warsiya mumgale taamaana warsiya sujana rasauli warsiya wisnau bahaadura raauta tathaa warsiya nawaraaja raauta raamechhaapa doramwaa gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya rosana wudhaa magara ra lalitapura saanaagaaun basne sindhupaalchoka waahrawise nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya kirana laamaa rahekaa chhan

kaathamaadaum kapana nilopula najikai ukta parimaanako nakkali suna dekhaai laakharupaiyaanmaa wikri garna graahaka khojiraheko bhanne suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaumbaata khatieko praharile kharidakartaale suna kharida garna laageko laakha rupaiyaan sahita molatola gardai gareko awasthaamaa phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya saanopokharaabaata khatieko praharile sunaarako naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha gardaa motarasaaiikalako bhitri bhaagamaa lukaai chhipaai raakheko ukta mulya baraabarako chaandikaa bibhinna murti sikkaa paauju sindura battaa thaali ra gilaasa lagaayata saamaana phelaa paareko thiyo
sunaaralaai awasyaka kaarabaahiko laagi ukta saamaanasahita bhansaara kaaryaalaya pathaaine jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale janaaeko chha

daana ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa milanachoka deraa gari basne rolpaa maadi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya nima bahaadura bhandaariko kothaamaa taasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa bhandaari sahita janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita aitabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko prahariko tolile saptariko raajawiraaja nagarapaalikaa sthita netaachokabaata patakaaharu baraamada garieko praharile janaaekaae chha

bewaarise awasthaamaa lukaaieko pataakaaharu wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptariko tolile jaancha gardaa wibhinna braandakaa paancha boraa andaaji ru eka laakha hajaara baraabarako pataakaaharu baraamada garekaae haae
