praharile uniharuko saathabaata meda ina yuesae lekheko pestola thaana tyasako myaagjina thaana tathaa goli raaunda niyantrita laaguausadha phenaaragana empula lupijesika empula ebhila empula laagu ausadha daaijelyaawa empula ra sirinja thaana baraamada garekaae chha
mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga budhaanilakanthale laakha mulya parne bhansaara chhalera lyaaeko kapadaa baraamada gareko chha

basako chhatamuni phalsa batama banaaera wataa seto boraamaa bhansaara chhali gari lyaaiekaa tina hajaara thaana sarta tathaa wibhinna kapadaa baraamada gareko mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga budhaanilakanthakaa prahari niriksaka bhupendra girile jaanakaari die
basakaa chaalaka tathaa basa maalikako bhane anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
praharile dhanusaabaata kilo awaidha chaandisahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa janakapurako thaakura jwelarsakaa sanchaalaka suresa thaakura ra bhaarata wihaarako madhuwanikaa dhiraja thaakura rahekaa chhan sanibaara saanjha baje dhanusaako jatahi simaa naakaabaata baa cha nambarako taataa sumomaa kariba kilo chaandi bhaarata laijaandai gardaa pradesa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko byuro tolile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
thapa anusandhaanakaa laagi duwai janaalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaamaa raakhieko chha
tehrathumamaa aphnai patiko andakosa kaatera hatyaa garna khojeko abhiyogamaa eka mahilaalaai praharile pakraau garekaae chha

jillaakaae myaanaluna nagarapaalikaa basne chandra maayaa rasaailile bihibaara raati pati pati warsiya phaudabahaadura rasaailiko andakosa kaatera hatyaa garna khojeko abhiyogamaa chandramaayaalaai praharile pakraau garekaae haae
praharikaa anusaara andakosa kaatiepachhi ghaaite bhaekaa phaudabahaadurako jillaa aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
prahariddhaaraa pakraau pareki chandramaayaalaai myaadathapa gari anusandhaana gari raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tehrathumale janaaekaae chha

pakraau parneharumaa kaabhrepalaanchoka namobuddha nagarapaalikaa thegaanaa bhaekaa warsiya raamabahaadura mijaara raamechhaapa kaandaadewi gaaunpaalikaa thegaanaa bhaekaa warsiya prajwalaraaja srestha ra nuwaakota myaagama gaaunpaalikaa thegaanaa bhaekaa warsiya asmaa laamaa rahekaa chhan
baimkina kasura muddaakaa sumlagna rahekaa eka kansaltensikaa karmachaarilaai prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byuro siaiwi pakraau gareko chha

eka thaaunko jaggaako kaagajaata banaai arko thaaunko jaggaa raakhera baimka apha kaathamaadaunbaata rina line kramamaa jhutaa wiwaranaanusaara jaggaako mulyaankanamaa garne ebharesta injiyinarina kansaltensi wiraatanagarakaa karmachaari bhesaraaja khatrilaai pakraau garieko ho

pharaara rahekaa unalaai pakraau gari aja lalitapura jillaa adaalatamaa pesa garieko siaiwikaa prawaktaa prahari upariksaka belabahaadura paandele jaanakaari die jaggaako kaajagaata kirte garera rina prawaaha gareko aropamaa yasaaghi baimka apha kaathamaadaunkaa purwapramukha kaaryakaari adhikaritasahita janaalaai prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byuro siaiwile pakraau garisakeko chha
pakraau parnemaa baimkakaa purwapramukha kaaryakaari adhikarita ajaya srestha ra rinai surendra sresthasahita kehi baimkakaa purwakarmachaari ra kehi bahaalawaalaa karmachaari pani chhan

limbu dharaana kaa wadaadhyaksa purna limbukaa chhoraa hun limbulaai hijo saanjha pasalamai akramana bhaeko thiyo pasalamaa kapadaa heri rahekaa bakhata dharaana gautamapatha basne warsiya abdula bhanne kalaama miyaanle kapadaa kaatne kaichile nija pujanako daahinetarphako kokhaa ra pachhaadi dhaadako bhaagamaa tina thaaunmaa prahaara gari gambhira ghaaite banaaekaa thie

ghatanaalagattai pharaara rahekaa miyaanlaai aja dharaana bhaanuchokamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa pakraau garieko iprakaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dhundiraaja nyaupaanele jaanakaari die miyaanwiruddha jyaana maarne udyogamaa muddaa dartaa prakriyaamaa raheko ra ghatanaako kaaranabaare anusandhaana thaalieko prahari naayaba upariksaka nyaupaanele janaae

ghaaite pujanako dharaanasthita bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaanamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha unako kokhaabaata andraa niskiekaale raati nai salyakriyaa garieko thiyo ghaaitelaai sarjari waadamaa raakhieko chha unako awasthaa saamaanya raheko chikitsakale janaaekaa chhan
praharile mahottaribaata bihibaara raati laaguausadhasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa mahottariko bardiwaasa nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara bijalapuraa tola ghara bhaekaa warsa kaa surendra kumaara mahato ra sohi wadaa ghara bhaekaa warsa kai dilipa mahato rahekaa chhana
praharile ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa bhaaratabaata bardiwaasatarpha jaandai garekaae awasthaamaa uniharulaai mahottariko manaraa siswaa nagarapaalikaa itaharawaabaata pakraau gareko haae
praharile makawaanapurabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita eka mahilaalaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurabaata khatieko praharile hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa basapaarkabaata awaidha laaguausadha charesasahita parsaa paterwaa sugauli gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiyaa gitaa raailaai pakraau gareko haae praharile unakaae saathabaata laaguausadha charesa keji baraamada garekaae chha
praharile sirahaako nawaraajapura gaaunpaalikaa baata pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita dui yuwakalaai pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaajhapattibaata khatieko gasti tolile laaguausadhasahita lahaana nagarapaalikaa simharaahikaa warsiya dayaaraama chaudhari ra warsiya ajaya chaudharilaai pakraau gareko ho praharile uniharukaae saathabaata naaitrobheta tyaabaleta baraamada garekaae chha
jillaa prahari kaaryalaya chitawanale baaghako chhaalaasahita tina janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

praharile uniharulaai bikri witaranakaa laagi molamalaai gariraheko awasthaamaa naaraayanagadhabaata pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya chitawanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka ekanaaraayana koiraalaale jaanakaari dinubhayaae
baraamada baaghako chhaalaa ra pakraau parekaaharulaai awasyaka kaanuni kaarawaahi tathaa anusandhaanako laagi jillaa dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya chitawanamaa bujhaaieko chha
mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya raanipokharibaata khatieko wisesa tolile kaathamaadaumko eyaraporta agaadibaata chaainija pistolasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa udayapura kataarikaa bhima surkheti ra sindhulikaa bhimabahaadura maajhi chhan praharile uniharuko saathabaata raaunda goli ra dui thaana myaagajina baraamada gareko mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha diaiji sailesa thaapaa ksetrile bataaunubhayaae

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa puraano basapaarkasthita diutimaa khatieko praharilaai nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojne kaathamaadaum gausaalaa basne sarlaahi ghara bhaekaa warsiya raajakarana mahattolaai mumgalabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha
praharile sirahaabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita dui janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

jillaakaae sirahaa nawaraajapura gaaunpaalikaa haspitala chaukabaata praharile lahaana nagarapaalikaa simharaahi basne barsiya dayaaraama chaudhari ra barsiya ajaya chaudharilaai pakraau garekaae haae praharile uniharukaae saathabaata naaitrobheta tyaabaleta paataa thaana baraamada garekaae chha

maasu napakaaidieko bhandai raksile maatiekaa unale andhaadhundha kainchi prahaara gari srimatiko hatyaa garekaa thie hatyaapachhi ahile karisna jillaa kaaraagaaramaa kaida bhuktaana garirahekaa chhan
amaako hatyaapachhi bichallimaa parekaa uniharuko padhaaiko jimmaa dipaayala nagara pramukha manju malaasile line pratibaddhataa gareko paarwatile bataain

pakraau parekaa paudelale gata sanibaara diunso saadhe baje aphu apaharanamaa pareko jaanakaari praharilaai diekaa thie unale apaharanakaarile rupandehi lagi chhaadera bhaaratatarpha bolaaeko bhani rupandehimaa aitabaara ujuri diekaa thie
anusandhaanakaa kramamaa uni aphain rupandehi gaeko ra tyahaan gaera ujuri dieko khulna aeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskikaa diesapi raajakumaara kesile jaanakaari die

praharile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa balkhubaata pratibandhita bhaaratiya rupaiyaan laakha hajaara sahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parneharumaa bhaktapura basne bhaarata betiyaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya pramendra daasa ra warsiya harmendra daasa rahekaa chhan

mahaanagariya prahari waritta kaalimaatibaata khatieko praharile baa ja nambarako biragumjakaathamaadaum chalne taataa sumo jipamaa sawaara pramendralaai pratibandhita saya darakaa saya thaana bhaaratiya rupaiyaan ra harmendrako saathamaa saya darako saya thaana gari ukta bhaaratiya rupaiyaan sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
praharile makawaanapurasunasaribaanke ra bajhaanakaae chhuttaachhuttai sthaanabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita atha janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa raatomaatebaata trakabhitra wataa pokaamaa raheko kilo saya graama awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita naa kha nambarako traka chaalaka parsaa wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya aphrikaa chaudharilaai mumgalabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapura ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pasupatinagarabaata khatieko praharile ukta trakamaa jaancha garne kramamaa praharilaai abhadra wyawahaara gari bhaagepachhi praharile pichhaa gardai pestolabaata goli phaayara gari traka chaalaka chaudharilaai pakraau gareko ho

khuttaamaa goli laagi ghaaite bhaekaa traka chaalaka chaudhariko jillaa aspataala hetaumdaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha uniharulaai niyantranamaa line kramamaa dui janaa prahari karmachaari sameta saamaanya ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
trakakaa sahachaalaka rautahata garudaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya wiweka chaudhari haala pharaara bhaekole praharile khoji gariraheko chha

sunasari itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa deraa gari basne morana sundara haraichaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya tirthakumaara taamaana sahita janaalaai laaguausadha braaunasugara graama saya miligraama sahita somabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha
prahari chauki khanaarabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa baata daana tulsipura nagarapaalikaa raajaapura basne warsiya pradipa walilaai graama laaguausadha braaunasugara sahita somabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

simaa prahari chauki jayasapura ra laaguausadha niyantrana byuro nepaalagumjabaata khatieko praharile rupaidihaabaata nepaalatarpha aundai garekaa unalaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
bajhaana bunagala nagarapaalikaa sunarabagarabaata awaidha laaguausadha charesa kariba dasamalawa kilo sahita janaalaai mumgalabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paschima nawalaparaasile kariba laakha mulya baraabarako khasi bokaa baraamada gareko chha
byapaarile jillaako wibhinna naakaabaata bhansaara chhali nepaala bhitraaudai gareko awasthaamaa praharile duiwataa traka sahita kula wataa khasibokaa baraamada garekaae haae

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata gastimaa khatiekaa prahari tolile gaeraati ga kha nambarako trakamaa wataa khasibokaa loda gari binaa bhansaara nepaala bhitraaudai gardaa prahari tolile gaadi sahita ti khasibokaa baraamada gareko janaaeko chha ukta baraamada khasibokaa laakha mulya baraabara raheko prahariko anumaana chha
tyastai prahari chauki basahiyaabaata gastimaa khatiekaa prahari tolile basahiyaa naakaa baata wataa khasibokaa baraamada garekaae chha

lu kha nambarako mini trakamaa wataa khasibokaa loda gari nepaala bhitraaudai gareko awasthaamaa prahari tolile baraamada gareko haae ukta baraamada khasibokaa laakha hajaara mulya baraabara raheko prahariko anumaana chha
yasari gaeraati dui naakaa naata traka sahita kula wataa khasibokaa baraamada bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile parsaabaata bhaaratabaata taskari gardai gareko awasthaamaa saya broilara kukhuraakaa challaa baraamada gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaa ra prahari chauki aramapatti parsaabaata khatieko sumyukta tolile gasti gardai jaane kramamaa bindawaasini gaaunpaalikaa baata saya gotaa challaa baraamada gareko ho
nepaala prahari kendriya anusandhaana byurole waidesika rojagaara thagi muddaamaa pharaara bhaeki eka abhiyuktalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile gorakhaabaata awaidha hatiyaarasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaakaae sahida lakhana gaaunpaalikaa gyaajaabotabaata sthaaniya warsiya kamaanasim gurunalaai pakraau gariekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gaaerakhaakaa prahari niriksaka kamalaa naraalale jaanakaari dinubhayaae

gurunalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya manakaamanaabaata gastimaa khatieko prahari tolile aitabaara pakraau gareko ho gurunale gharamaa awaidharupamaa bharuwaa banduka lukaaichhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa praharile phelaa paareko janaaieko chha

praharile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa baasawaari sthita prema khaajaa gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa khaajaa ghara sumchaalaka dolakhaakaa prema magara sahita janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaa sahita pakraau gareko haae

daaju wisnau ghara najika raheko aphnai baarimaa ghaansa kaatiraakheko awasthaamaa bhaaile aera ekkaasi khukuri prahaara gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamakaa suchanaa adhikaari hemanta bhandaarile jaanakaari dinubhayaae

ghaaiteko baanyaa ankhaako maathi kanchatamaa kaatieko ra daahine kaanako chheumaa baahiri chota laageko chha ghatanaalagattai pugeko prahari chauki bandukekaa prahariko sahayogamaa uhaanko upachaara garna ilaama aspataala lyaaieko thiyo

khukuri prahaara garne wyaktiko khojatalaasa garne kramamaa ghatanaasthaladekhi kariba mitara para gogunako rukhamaa jhundiera atmahatyaa gareko awasthaamaa sawa phelaa paarieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamale janaaekaae chha
sawa pariksanakaa laagi ilaama aspataalamaa lyaaieko chha ghatanaakaa wisayamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha
pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita sirahaa praharile jillaako chhuttaachhutai sthaanabaata chaara yuwakalaai pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bariyaarapattibaata khatieko tolile bihibaara saanjha bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai gareko sapa numko motarasaaikala jaancha gardaa laaguausadhasahita udayapurako rautaamaai gaaunpaalikaa murakuchchi niwaasi warsiya raaju taamaanalaai pakraau gareko ho

yastai praharile sirahaako bariyaarapatti gaaunpaalikaa baata laaguausadhasahita golabajaara nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya mohammada kalaama ansaarilaai pakraau gareko ho ansaarikaa saathabaata naaitrobheta pisa graama gaanjaasameta baraamada bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaale janaaeko chha

tyastai laaguausadha gaanjaasahita praharile sirahaako dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa kasaahaa ghara bhai sirahaakai karjanhaa nagarapaalikaa khairaatola basne warsiya pramoda yaadawalaai pakraau gareko chha

aphnai gharamaa laaguausadha gaanjaa lukaaichhipaai bikri witarana gariraheko gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bandipurabaata khatieko prahari tolile kaagajamaa pokaa paareko graama gaanjaasahita yaadawalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka apilaraaja boharaale jaanakaari die
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya lahaanabaata khatieko prahari tolile phenaagana naaitrosana daaijolyaapalagaayata thaana laaguausadhasahita saahalaai pakraau garieko praharile janaaeko chha
bhojapurakaae sadaananda nagarapaalikaako kaaryaalaya parisara bhitra paarkina gari raakhekaae nagarapaalikaako gaadilaai laksita gari presara kukara bama wisphota bhaeko chha
sukrabaara bihaana kariba bajetira nagarapaalikaako gaadilaai laksita gari kukura bama wisphota garaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurakaa diesapi narabahaadura salaami magarale bataae

budhabaara saanjha tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalamaa orlieko ameriki jahaaja bihibaara bihaana naathanalaai liera phirtaa bhaeko chha chaalaka dalakaa sadasyabaaheka yuesa maarsala sarbhisakaa tina suraksaakarmi nepaala aekaa thie ameriki dutaawaasa srotakaa anusaara naathanalaai laijaana kariba eka laakha dalara kharcha bhaeko chha

amerikaamaa aphnai premikaaki naabaalikaa chhorimaathi yauna durwyawahaara garera naathana pharaara bhaekaa thienaathanalaai gata bhadaumaa prahariko wisesa byurole thamelabaata pakraau gareko thiyo adhyaagamana wibhaagale dina thunaamaa raakhi unalaai niskaasanako nirnaya gareko thiyo unalaai nepaalasthita ameriki dutaawaasako pahalamaa niyamita udaanabaata amerikaa laijaane tayaari bhaeko thiyo

naathanalaai laijaana yuesa maarsala sarbhisakaa tina suraksaakarmi eka saataaaghi kaathamaadaum aisakekaa thie tara bhadaumaa koriyana eyarako jahaaja chadhisakepachhi naathanale atmahatyaa garne dhamki die tyasapachhi suraksaako kaarana dekhaaera eyaralaayansale unalaai laijaana maanena tyasapachhi ameriki sarakaarale unalaai laijaana phlaaitawarkas kampaniko bhienajidablu plena chaartarda gareko ho

bihibaara naathanalaai adhyaagamana wibhaagabaata khatiekaa praharile wimaanakai bharyaanamaa puryaaera ameriki maarsala tolilaai bujhaaeko thiyo unalaai hatkadi lagaaera jahaajabhitra basaaiyo yasari aparaadhi bujhaauna nepaala ra amerikaabicha supurdagi sandhi chhaina

taipani antaradesiya aparaadha niyantranakaa laagi bhandai ekaarkaa desamaa lukna gaekaa aparaadhilaai pakraau garera niskaasanako prakriyaamaarphata sahakaarya hune gareko chha naathanalaai antarraastriya aparaadha prahari sumgathana intarapolale reda notisa jaari garekaale pakraau garera adhyaagamana kaanunaanusaara kaarabaahi gari nepaala auna napaaune gari niskaasana garieko adhyaagamana wibhaagakaa mahaanirdesaka iswararaaja paudelale bataae

yasari widesi aparaadhilaai wisesa wimaanamaarphata widesa niskaasana garieko yo dosro ghatanaa ho kariba warsaagaadi eka jarmana naagarikalaai lina jarmanibaata wimaana chaartarda garera lyaaieko thiyo wibhaagakaa mahaanirdesaka paudelakaa anusaara tinapatakasamma wimaana chadhaaundaa hulahujjata garepachhi jarmana naagarikalaai wisesa wimaanamaarphata laijaanu pareko thiyo

laaguausadha niyantrana byuroko tolile kaathamaadaumko saantinagara ra gokarnaeswarabaata hajaara empula niyantrita manodwipa padaarthasahita laaguausadha sahita janaalaai pakraau gari saarwajanika gareko chha

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa saantinagarabaata budhabaara pakraau parnemaa bhaaratako grina pelesa dumarawaanaa bairaganiyaakaa warsiya raajaa kunaa bela bairaganiyaa kaa warsiya raajesakumaara jayasawaala ra asogi purusottamapura kaa warsiya abhisekakumaara jayasawaala rahekaa chhan

gokarnaeswarabaata pakraau parneharumaa siraahaako golabajaara nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya utima laala saaha wadaanambara kaa warsiya asoka taamaana udayapura triyugaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sujendra lohani ra kaabhreko rosi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya pemaa laamaa rahekaa chhan
nawalaparaasi sustaa paschima baata hajaara ghusa rakamasahita dui janaalaai akhtiyaara kaaryaalaya butawalako tolile pakraau gareko chha

saba dibhijana kaaryalaya nawalaparaasikaa sahaayaka wana adhikarita parsuraama chaudharilaai hajaara ghusasahita pakraau parekaa hun akhtiyaarakaae taaelile unisangai wana kaaryalaya raheko bhawanakaa gharadhani manoja kumaara chauhaanalaai pani pakraau garekaae chha

raati kariba bajeko samayamaa kaaryaalayako jhyaalakaa sisaa phutaaera petrola bharieko minarala waatarako botalabhitra phaalera agajani garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanagadhile janaaekaae chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile aja bihaana gausaalaa nagarapaalikaa baata alelaai pakraau gareko jillaakaa prahari pramukha esapi syaamakarisna adhikaarile jaanakaari die

unakaa anusaara alelaai bama wisphotanalagaayata wibhinna aparaadhika gatiwidhimaa sumlagna raheko aropamaa pakraau garieko ho haala alesanga bayaana line ra thapa anusandhaana agaadi badhaaune kaama bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
sarakaarale wiplawa samuhalaai pratibandha lagaaepachhi netaa yo samuhakaa netaa tathaa kaaryakartaaharu pakraau pardai aekaa chhan
praharile dhanusaabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita ekajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

musaharale wisum kaattika gate aurahi nagarapaalikaa wadaa num saawikakaa aurahi gaawisa wadaa num maa aphno warsiyaa srimati bechani dewi sadaako bancharo prahaara gari hatyaa garekaa thie

ghatanaabaare jaanakaari aepachhi gate raati sumlagna tinai janaalaai pakraau ra yuwatiko uddhaara gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaekaae chha
praharile moranako urlaabaaribaata juwaataasa khelirahekaae awasthaamaa janaa juwaadeharulaai pakraau garekaae chha

morana urlaabaari sthita hotala samraatabaata somabaararaati juwaataasa khelirahekaae awasthaamaa praharile patharisanischarekaa akaasa thaapaa nagendra limbu urlaabaarikaa santosa raai karisna adhikaari dinesa thaapaa sanjiwa giri jaaito chemjona asoka raai mohana katuwaala ra wikaasa raailaai pakraau garekaae haae
pakraau parneharumaa bhaimsepaati basne sunasari itahari janataa basti ghara bhaekaa warsiyanisaana taamaana ra kupandola basne dolakhaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya dewa saahi rahekaa chhan
kaathamaadaummaa rahekaa eka wyaktikaae hatyaa yojanaa banaaera baaraabaata kaathamaadaum aipugekaa eka wyaktilaai bhaktapura praharile pestola ra golisahita pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya prahari parisara bhaktapurako tolile baaraa phetaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya sambhuprasaada saahalaai somabaara raati saadhe baje jagaati ksetrabaata pakraau gareko ho uni tyahaan baasa basnakaa laagi hotala khojdai thie

raajadhaanimaa hatyaako yojanaa liera baaraadekhi nai hatiyaara bokera aeko suchanaa paaepachhi praharile unalaai pakraau gareka haae praharile unakaae saathabaata eka thaana katuwaa pestola ra tyasako paancha raaunda goli baraamada gareko chha
pakraau parekaa saahalaai haatahatiyaara tathaa kharakhajanaa muddaamaa anusandhaana thaalieko praharile janaaeko chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa basne sindhupaalchoka balephi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya bhimasena bhandaarilaai bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa sthita basapaarkabaata warsapachhi somabaara praharile pakraau gareko haae

kaathamaadaum baaneswarasthita bhatti pasalamaa waadawiwaada bhaepachhi raaile gaalaamaa thappada haaneko wisayalaai liera bhandaarile uni basne thaanumaa eklai gai dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gari hatyaa gareko ra so paschaata lukichhipi bhaktapura jillaako eriyaamaa asthaai sahachaalakako rupamaa bibhinna gaadiharumaa kaama gareko khulna aeko chha

so muddaamaa aropita kasuradaara thahariepachhi asojako pahilo saataa jillaa adaalatale kasura anusaara uniharulaai kaida tathaa jariwaanaa nirdhaana garne adaalatako somabaarako adesamaa ullekha chha
jaagira lagaaidine bhandai paisaa asulne widyuta praadhikarana sirahaakaa karmachaarilaai akhtiyaarako tolile pakraau gareko chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayoga bardibaasakaa tolile nepaala widyuta praadhikarana saakhaa sirahaakaa ilektrasiyana chhedilaalalaai pakraau gareko haae akhtiyaarako tolile unalaai wisnapura sthita chaukako chiyaa naastaa pasalabaata hajaara ghusa rakamasahita pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parneharumaa kaathamaadaum ichumgu basne sindhuli ghyaanle gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya purnabahaadura waaiwaa kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa baaphala basne warsiya raaju khadgi kaathamaadaum kalumki basne rasuwaa gosaaikunda gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya paalsaana taamaana chhan

yastai kaathamaadaum jamala basne raamechhaapa dorambaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya lilaa thaapaa magara bhaktapura suryawinaayaka basne raamechhaapa dorambaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya siwaraama thaapaa magara kaathamaadaum tokhaa basne sunasari mahendranagara nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raajesa guruna ra rasuwaa thumaana gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya jisa ghale rahekaa chhan
girile pyuthaana nagarapaalikaakai eka barsiyaa yuwati sanga dosro wiwaaha gareko abhiyoga chha

aja diunso wiraganjako maaisthaana chokako eka mithaai pasalamaa sewaagraahilaai bhetera nagada paancha hajaara lindai gareko awasthaamaa akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako hetaundaa kaaryaalayabaata khatieko tolile prahari jawaana gambhiraa saaha telilaai pakraau gareko ho
jawaana teli parsaamaa kaaryarata chhan unalaai hetaundaa lagera thapa anusandhaana tathaa kaarabaahi aghi badhaaune akhtiyaarale janaaeko chha
praharile tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata dedha kilo sunasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
nepaala prahariko tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthala suraksaa kaaryaalayala srotakaa anusaara homabahaadurale karuwaamaa lukaaera ukta suna lyaayakaa thie
praharile pokharaabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau garekaae chha

praharile sanibaara bihaana kaakarabhittaabaata kaathamaandau audai gareko naa kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka basalaai naagadhunagaa chekapostamaa chekajaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara ilaamakaa kanchana pradhaanalaai pakraau gareko haae
pakraau parnemaa dhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kapana basne sunila thapaliyaa rahekaa chhan thapaliyaako saathabaata praharile phenaraagana nuphina ra daaijepaama gari empula baraamada gareko chha

chhimeki wadaakaa wadaadhyaksalaai kutapita gareko aropamaa praharile champaadewi gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa ajaya luintelalaai pakraau gareko ho luintelale asaara gate champaadewi gaaunpaalikaako kaaryaalaya taapkedaandaamaa sohi gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa suresa thaapaalaai kutapita garekaa thie
maadaka padaartha sewana gari luintelale aphulaai kutapita gareko bhandai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa ujuri diekaa thie luintelalaai praharile aibaara saanjha sadaramukaamabaata pakraau gareko haae

jillaakaae mithilaa bihaari nagarapaalikaa theraa basne warsiya raamawarana sarmaako hatyaa bhaeko ho hatyaa kasale garyo bhannebaare thaahaa huna nasakekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaale janaaekaae chha

taaraapatti bajaarabaata beluki kariba baje tarakaari kinera ghara pharkidai gardaa mithilaa wihaari nagarapaalikaa kachuri sadakakhandamaa motarasaaikalamaa aekaa dui janaa ajnaata wyaktile sarmaako ghaantimaa chhuraa prahaara gari pharaara bhaeko pratyaksadarsilaai uddharita gardai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaadhaamale janaaeko chha

ghatanaabaare jaanakaari paaelagattai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaako toli ghatanaasthala pugi prakariti muchulkaa uthaaera maritakako sawa pariksanako laagi janakapura anchala aspataala pathaaeko chha
madhyapurathimi nagarapaalikaa lokanthalibaata awaidha laaguausadha ra dhaarilo hatiyaarasahita praharile dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
uniharuko saathabaata laaguausadha naaitrobhetasahita dhaarilo hatiyaara baraamada bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale asthaayi traaphika prahari posta nepaalathoka dumjaa sindhulimaa kaaryarata prahari sahaayaka niriksaka syaamabahaadura maajhilaai hajaara rupaiyaan nagada ghusasahita pakraau garekaae chha

maajhile kaathamaadaumbaata sindhuli hundai baahirine sawaari saadhanalaai saanjha bajepachhi sindhuli sadaramukaama auna rokne ra paisaa diepachhi maatra auna dine gareko bhanne suchanaa tathaa ujurikaa adhaaramaa akhtiyaarako tolile sewaagraahisanga ukta rupaiyaan liisakeko awasthaamaa sanibaara raati akhtiyaarakaae taaelile pakraau gareko haae

pakraau parneharumaa kaathamaadaum jarankhu basne nuwaakota taarakeswara gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya raama bahaadura taamaana jarankhu basne nuwaakota bidura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya pitara taamaana phutuna basne gorakhaa ajirakota gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya kusala adhikaari sesamati basne nuwaakota bidura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dharmaraaja taamaana nepaalataara basne dhaadina khaniyaabaasa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya bijaya taamaana rahekaa chhan

yasaigari swayambhu basne rasuwaa chhodimbu gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya yorsaana laamaa satunagala basne gulmi ismaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya yuwaraaja bhandaari rasuwaa uttaragayaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya chhirina taamaana ra maakalabaari basne nuwaakota taarakeswara gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya raajana taamaana rahekaachhan
praharile kaaskikaae chhuttaachhuttai sthaanabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau garekaae chha

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa tallo gaganagaumdaasthita warsiya jumgabahaadura punako gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa jumgabahaadura sameta janaalaai buka taasa ra laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan sahita sanibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sisuwaabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa buddhamaargasthita warsiya chandra bahaadura gurunako gharamaa juwaataasa khelirahekaa guruna sameta janaalaai buka taasa ra nagada laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan sahita sanibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile siraahaakaae sakhuwaanaankaarakatti gaaunpaalikaa baata srota nakhuleko bhaaratiya rupaiyaan laakha sahita sanibaara bihaana ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahesawaariko praharile thaadibaata lahaanatarpha aundai gareko biara kyu nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara bhagawaanapura gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya oma prakaasa saahalaai pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parekaa baaraa jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya ramesa chaudharilaai laaguausadha nurphina empula daaijepaama empula phenaaragana empula ra khairo heroina graama sahita sanibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko ho

bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai gareko lu pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa laaguausadha niyantrana byuro parsaabaata khatieko praharile chaudharilaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari praharile pakraau gareko ho
kailaali praharile laakha awaidha rakamasahita bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha
bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha lyaaundai gareko laakha awaidha rakamasahita praharile sukrabaara kailaaliko trinagara bhansaara naakaabaata pakraau gareko ho

yupi eke nambarako kaarabaata laakha nepaali ra laakha bhaaratiya rupaiyaansahita bhaaratiya naagarika atula barmaalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalikaa prahari naayawa pariksaka daksakumaara wasnetale jaanakaari die
wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa gaadimaa lukaaeko rakamasahita niyantranamaa lieko unale bataae pakraau parekaa barmaasanga wataa wibhinna baimkakaa etiema kaardasameta praharile baraamada gareko chha

srimatiko hatyaa garelagattai sthaaniyawaasile dieko jaanakaarikaa adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya diktelabaata gaeko prahari tolile sitaaraamalaai niyantranamaa lieko chha praharikaa anusaara hatyaako kaarana bhane ahilesamma khulna sakeko chhaina
pakraau parekaa sitaaraamalaai prahari hiraasatamaa raakhera anusandhaana suru garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya khotaanale janaaekaae chha raai dampatiko eka chhoraa chhan
maritakako sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala diktela lyaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile lamajunabaata kilo awaidha niramasisahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pahillo mahinaako tathyaankamaa bauddha ksetrabaata laaguausadhakaa muddaamaa pakraau parekaa thie wibhinna samayamaa wibhinna sthaanabaata daaijepaama phenaaragana ra nuphina eka hajaara thaana baraamada garnaakaa saathai gaanjaa kilo charesa dui kilo braauna sugara graama ra naaitrobheta chakki eka hajaara thaana baraamada garieko thiyo jabararjasti karanai abhiyogakaa muddaamaa janaa wiruddha muddaa chalaaeko thiyo sahamatimaa libhina tukedara basne ra gharapariwaarale thaahaa paaepachhi abhibhaawakako dabaabamaa jabararjasti karanai muddaa dartaa garne gareko ghatanaa pani prasasta thie libhina tukedarasambandhi kaanuna nabandaasamma yastaa kisimakaa samasyaa badhdai jaane adhiwaktaa asmitaa pokharelale bataae

tyastai baimkina kasuramaa saarwajanika kasuramaa jyaana maarne udyogamaa bahuwiwaahamaa baalayauna duraachaaramaa tina thagimaa chaara widyutiya aparaadhamaa eka kartawya jyaana muddaamaa saata maanawa bechawikhana tathaa osaarapasaaramaa tina sawaari jyaanamaa saatajanaalaai pakraau gari muddaa chalaaieko thiyo gatasaataa maatrai bauddhako raamahitibaata praharile kilo raktachandanasahita chyaanbaa laamaa ra yondena gyaanju taamaanalaai pakraau gari kaathamaadaun jillaa wana kaaryaalaya pathaaekoe thiyo
prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byuro kaathamaandau ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaaliko tolile dhanagadhiko chatakapurabaata chaara wataa pestolasahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

kailaalikaa prahari upariksaka sudipa girile pestolasahita tina janaa pakraau pareko swikaara garepani pakraau parneko naama ahile bataauna namilne ra patrakaara sammelana garera jaanakaari garaaine bataaunubhayo

jhaapaako siwasataaksi nagarapaalikaa ko kaaryaalayamaa aja bihaana baje puraano risaiwikaa kaarana saathilaai chhaatimaa chhuraa prahaara gari ghaaite banaaune saagara timsinaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha
ghaaite raaiko wirtaamodasthita biendasi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaeko chha
puraano risaiwikaa kaarana raaiko chhaatimaa chhuraa prahaara garne timsinaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhilajhilele niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana gariraheko praharile janaaeko chha
nepaala praharile kalankiko naaraayanai gesta haausako tesro talaabaata wiweka sonaama sunaaralaai phaalne tinajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya prahari parisara ra kaalimaati barittako tolile dhaadina benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya santosa kandelalaai pakraau gareko ho kandela nayaanbajaarasthita sohrakhutte basdai aekaa thie

naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa basne ekala mahilaa renju tripaathilaai chithi diera unale laakha rupaiyaan maageko praharile janaaeko chhakandelale bhadau gate mahilaalaai chitthi pathaaera ru laakha maaga gareko ra yadi paisaa nadie chhorilaai hatyaa garne ra gharamaa sameta bama padkaaune dhamki dieko praharile janaaeko chha
somabaara bihaana jumgalamaa banduka chha bhanne suchanaakaa adhaaramaa gaeko prahari tolile loda gareko thaana bharuwaa banduka phelaa paareko morana praharile janaaeko chha
praharile wardiyaabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau garekaae chha

madhuwana nagarapaalikaa basne dila prasaada misrako gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya durgha bahaadura sunaara sameta janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita somabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko haae
praharile baankebajhaanakapilawastu rupandehi ra saptarikaae chhuttaachhuttai sthaanabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya dhirendra sresthalaai awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara saya miligraama sahita somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

bajhaana bitthadachira gaaunpaalikaa sthita sadakamaa chainapurabaata dhanagadhitarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basabaata awaidha laaguausadha charesa kariba keji phelaa paari somabaara diunso praharile baraamada gareko chha

prahari chauki syaadibaata khatieko praharile ukta basa jaancha garne kramamaa basako sitamaathi raakheko jholaabaata ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paareko ho ukta basakaa chaalaka sahachaalaka basa dhani ra basamaa sawaara baitadi sigaasa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya bhaana simha boharaalaai anusandhaanako laagi praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kapilawastu karisnanagara nagarapaalikaa pipalabotabaata karisnanagara nagarapaalikaa semaraa basne warsiya amkita yaadabalaai niyantrita laaguausadha spaasmo tyaableta ra paalpaa taanasena nagarapaalikaa telghaa basne warsiya prakaasa kunwaralaai naaitrobheta tyaableta ra koreksa sisi sahita somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

ukta sthaanamaa khatieko praharile karisnanagarabaata butawalatarpha jaadai gareko lu kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parneharumaa butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne dipanagara basne warsiya ammara bahaadura bika ra nawalaparaasi sunawala nagarapaalikaa asnaiyaa basne warsiya manoja kumaara thaapaa ksetri rahekaa chhan

rupandehi siddhaarthanagara nagarapaalikaa amchalapurabaata niyantrita laaguausadha spaasmo tyaabaleta naaitraabheta tyaableta ra koreksa botala sahita siddhaarthanagara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya prakaasa pumgenilaai somabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhairahawaabaata khatieko praharile lu pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa chaalaka pumgenilaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptaribaata khatieko praharile sa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa gyaansa silindarako pimdhamaa pwaala banaai lukaai chhipaai lyaaeko ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari chaalaka yaadawalaai pakraau gareko ho
rukuma paschimamaatijakai dina eka wyaktile khurpaa prahaara gari wrata baseki srimatiko hatyaa garekaa chhan
atyadhika madiraa sewana gari somabaara tijakaa dina beluki bajeko samayamaa nawinale srimati kamalaako hatyaa gareko prahari naayaba upariksaka sumita khadkaale jaanakaari die
sadakamaa hindirahekaae awasthaamaa chaarajanaa yuwaale khukuri prahaara gardaa naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa kaa akaasa basnetakaae marityu bhaekaae chha
praharile siraahaabaata naagarikataa kirte muddhaakaa pharaara pratiwaadilaai pakraau garekaae chha

naagarikataa kirte muddhaakaa pharaara pratiwaadi laksmipura pataari gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya raamalochana yaadawalaai sanibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko haae ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahesapura pataarabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile siraahaabaata niyantrita laaguausadha sahita ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

golabajaara nagarapaalikaa nipaane magara tolabaata sohi nagarapaalikaa durgaapura basne warsiya gauraba kumaara simhalaai niyantrita laaguausadha naaitrojepaama tyaawleta saya thaana sahita sanibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko haae

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya golabajaarabaata khatieko praharile sa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara simhalaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
sumgathita aparaadha muddhaakaa pharaara sunawala nagarapaalikaa jargaaha basne warsiya atmaraama achaaryalaai sanibaara belukaa praharile pakraau gareko chha

phaaguna gate raati saraawala gaaunpaalikaa tulasipurasthita mahendra raajamaargamaa roki raakhekaa naa kha ra naa kha nambarako traka tathaa saauna gate bardaghaata nagarapaalikaa sthita enasela taawaramaa bisphota tathaa agajani gareko sumgathita aparaadha muddhaamaa achaarya pharaara rahekaa thie
wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa asthaai prahari bita bhumahibaata khatieko praharile sohi thaaunsthita baatomaa hindadula gariraheko awasthaamaa phelaa paari achaaryalaai pakraau gareko ho

diutimaaraheko belaa acharanawiparita kaama gareko bhandai kutapita garne paryataka praharikaa asai wirendra yaadawa ra prahari jawaana premasumkara yaadawa kaarabaahimaa parekaa hun dhanusaakaa prahari naayawa upariksaka raameswara kaarkile kaanuna wiparita kaama gareko paaiekole asai ra prahari jawaanawiruddha kaarabaahi prakriyaa agaadi badhaaieko jaanakaari diekaa chhan dubaijanaasanga spastikarana sameta sodhieko chha

yasaigari bhidiyo khichne yuwaa abhiyantaa susila karnalaai jaanaki prahari chaukibhitra bolaaera duwryawahaara gareko bhandai asailaai pani kaarabaahi garieko unale bataae praharile haatapaata garepachhi bihibaara kehibera janakapurako jaanaki choka ksetra tanaawagrasta baneko thiyo
praharile rukuma paschimabaata laaguausadhasahita ekajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa daana babai nagarapaalikaa babarapurakaa warsiya diwasakumaara oli rahekaa chhan unalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukuma paschimabaata khatieko wisesa prahari tolile triwenai gaaunpaalikaa jhulnetaa bajaarabaata pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa oliko saathabaata entikopha naamako wataa ra tramaa naamako wataa laaguausadha tyaabaleta baraamada bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukumale janaaeko chha

moranako kaanepokhari gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya dipaka taamaanako hatyaamaa sumlagna bhaeko aropamaa praharile sindhupaalchokako bisumkhupaakhara gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai kaathamaadaum bauddha mahaamkaala basne warsiya manoja laamaapakraau pareko mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogakaae taaelile yaataayaata wyawasthaa kaaryaalaya setikaa kaaryaalaya pramukhasahita tinajanaa karmachaarilaai ghusasahita pakraau garekaae chha

ayogakaae taaelilenimitta kaaryaalaya pramukha gambhira simha wista adhikarita bhuwana josi ra jayaraaja kaarigaralaai ghusa lindaalindai pakraau gareko haae sawaari saadhana bikri gari naamasaari garidie wapata sewaagraahisanga ghusa lindai gardaa uniharu pakraau pareko akhtiyaarale janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatale wisum jetha gate nakawajani chori muddaamaa kaida tathaa jariwaanaa garnuparne phaisalaa sunaaepachhi pharaara rahekaa rosi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsakaa nirabahaadura laamaalaai warsapachhi praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parekaa laamaalaai kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatamaa pesa garieko dhulikhelasthita jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dipaka girile jaanakaari die unakaa anusaara laamaa warsadekhi pharaarako suchimaa thie unalaai ru dui laakha hajaara jariwaanaa ra eka mahinaa dina kaida sajaaya tokieko thiyo

laamaalagaayata gaali beijjati boksi aropa bahuwiwaaha cheka anaadara sawaari jyaana chori jabarjasti karanai apahelanaa kutapita ra jaalasaaji muddaamaa kaida bhuktaana garna baanki rahekaa pharaara abhiyuktalaai yasai haptaa pakraau garieko unale bataae

pakraau parekaa gaali beijjati muddaakaa panauti nagarapaalikaa kaa sesanaaraayana timalsinaa jayaraama timalsinaa jayadewa timalsinaa ra jogamaayaa timalsinaalaai ru jariwaanaakaa saathai eka mahinaa dina kaida sajaaya tokieko thiyo
