khaataamaa paryaapta rakama nabhai bhuktaanikaa laagi cheka kaatne ra dine ghatanaalaai bainkina kasuramaa muddaa chalaaine gareko chha kehi samaya agaadi dewaani haka antargata bainkina kasurako muddaa adaalatale herne praawadhaana garepachhi piditale ujuri gardaa thapa duhkha paaeko bhandai punah praharile nai bainkina kasurako muddaa herne wyawasthaa milaaieko thiyo
dharma prachaara gareko abhiyogamaa salyaana praharile janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaako saaradaa nagarapaalikaa saantinagaramaa jabarajasti isaai dharma prachaara gardai hindeko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa mahilaa ra purusalaai pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya salyaanale janaaekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa daana tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa beluwaakaa warsiya tulabahaadura pariyaara sohi thaaunkaa warsiyaa rupaa sonaama ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya chandrakali raawata ra rolpaa nagarapaalikaakaa warsiyaa bhima kumaari wika rahekaa chhan
tibbatiyana naagarikalaai nepaali naagarikataakaa laagi siphaarisa garne eka wadaadhyaksasahita tinajanaalaai kaaski praharile pakraau gareko chha

petrolapampale pampako mesinabhitra esembaliko sila kaatera kaanunawiparita petroliyama padaartha bikri witarana gareko paaieko gunastara tathaa naapataula ksetriya kaaryaalayakaa pramukha sasibhusana yaadawale jaanakaari die

pampamaathi kaarawaahi phukuwaa nabhaesamma so pampalaai nepaala ayala nigamako dipo kaaryaalaya amalekhaganjalaai petroliyama padaartha upalabdha nagaraauna sameta jaanakaara garaaeko chha sambandhita wyawasaayilaai tina dinabhitra naapataula kaaryaalaya wiraganjamaa haajira huna patra kaatieko pramukha yaadawale jaanakaari die

baaraa parsaa rautahata ra makawaanapurakaa sanchaalita pampaharuko wigata kehi mahinaadekhi anugamana tiwra paarieko ra kaiphiyata dekhiekaa kariba eka darjana pampa wyawasaayilaai kaarawaahi garieko pani pramukha yaadawale bataae
baaraa parsaa rautahata ra makawaanapurakaa pratisata udyogi wyawasaayile naapataula yantrako jaancha nagaraaeko unako bhanaai chha raasasa
baagaluna jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale chhutariachhutariai muddaamaa aropa laagekaa tina abhiyuktalaai aja saarwajanika gareko chha

dhorapaatana nagarapaalikaa bobaana gaaunmaa wariddha dampatiko hatyaakaa abhiyukta maritakakaa aphnai bhaai warsiya masaane kaamilaai saarwajanika garieko ho nijale wobaana gaaunmaa gata saauna gate raati wariddha dampatiko dhaarilo hatiyaara prayoga gari hatyaa gareko aropa laageko thiyo

nija kaamile gharayaasi jhagadaamaa awegamaa aera wariddha daai warsiya bhaanabahaadura kaami ra bhaauju warsiyaa bimaako hatyaa gareko swikaara gareko ukta kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka nawaraaja bhattale bataae

abhiyukta kaamiko gharamaa hatyaaagaawai paakeko maasubhaata nakhaaeko phelaa parepachhi anusandhaanamaa sahaja bhaeko prahari pramukha bhattale bataae ghatanaapaschaat tatkaalai praharile anusandhaana thaalyo prahari pramukha bhattale bhane ghatanaasthalako samayamai adhyayana garna paaundaa saphalataa milyo

yastai laaguausadha prayoga tathaa kaarowaaramaa sumlagna raheko aropamaa baagaluna bajaarabaata pakraau gariekaa taaraakholaa gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai baagaluna nagarapaalikaa srinagaratolamaa deraa gari basne warsiya suudina chhantaalalaai sameta aja saarwajanika garieko chha
arghaakhaanchi jillaako bhumikaasthaana nagarapaalikaa nuwaakotako lamchimaa somabaara raati dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gari pharara rahekaa chirana ghartilaai praharile pakraau garekaae chha
praharile ghartilaai sandhikharka nagarapaalikaa arghaako dharamapaanibaata bihibaara pakraau garekaae haae

bhumikaasthaana nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambarakhamaaribaasakaa warsiya chirana ghartile tyasai nagarapaalikaakaaewadaa nambara maa raheko sasuraalimaa somabaara raati gaera khukuri prahaara gardaasrimati saasu ra saalo ghaaite bhaekaa thie khukuri prahaara gari tinai janaalaai ghaaite banaaepachhi uni pharaara thie

aphu dharampaanimaa raheko bhandai saathilaai lina bolaaepachhi uni tyahaan raheko khabara praharisamaksa pugeko thiyo khabara paaunaasaatha prahari chauki khiljibaata khatieko prahari tolile ghartilaai niyantranamaa lieko ho
pakraau parekaa ghartilaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya lyaai muddhaa dartaa gari anusandhaana garirahekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya arghaakhaanchile jaanakaari dieko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anundhaana ayogale hajaara ghusa rakamasahita paschima nawalaparaasibaata widyaalaya wyawasthaapana samitikaa adhyaksa ra pradhaanaadhyaapakalaai pakraau gareko chha
akhtiyaarako butawalasthita kaaryaalayabaata khatieko tolile bihibaara paraasisthita lumbini plasako kaaryaalayabaata duwai janaalaai pakraau gareko haae
akhtiyaara ayoga kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa adhikaari suresa bhusaalakaa anusaara siksakako saruwaa sahamati ra ramanaa milaai diebaapata uniharule ghusa liekaa hun
jhaapaako siwasataaksi nagarapaalikaa dudhebaata praharile kilo gaanjaasahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhilajhilebaata khatieko prahari toli ra laaguausadha niyantrana byurole wisesa suraakiko adhaaramaa bihibaara raati saaehi sthaanakaa dilabahaadura magara narabahaadura magara ra taaraabahaadura kunwaralaai pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa uniharulaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhilajhilemaa raakhi anusandhaana bhairaheeko praharile janaaekaae chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itaharile juwaa taasa kheldai gareko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parekaa sabaijanaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itaharimaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

gandaki pradesa prahariko anusandhaana byuro ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya thaantipokharile uniharulaai bihibaara paalunataara nagarapaalikaa chiyaanadaandaasthita jumgalabaata pakraau pakraau garekaae haae praharileuniharulaai laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaansahita pakraau garekaae haae

juwaa khelnemaa tanahun lamajuna ra gorakhaakaa wyakti rahekaa diesapi mahendra nepaalale bataae uniharulaai juwaa ainaantargata muddaa dartaa garera kaarabaahi prakriyaa thaalne praharile janaaekaae chha
jillaa prahari makawaanapurale kilo graama gaanjaasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

chaalakako sitamuni phalsabatama banaai wataa pokaa banaaera lukaaichhipaai lyaairaheko awasthaamaapraharile uniharulaai hetaumdaa upahaanagarapaalikaa basapaarka sadakakhandabaata pakraau garieko makawaanapura praharile janaaeko chha

tyastai gata sraawana gate mumgalabaara ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya newaarapaanibaata prahari naayaba niriksaka madhusudana wistako netaritwako prahari taalile hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara bichatolako dhaanakhetamaa kaalo rangako plaastikamaa pyaakinga gari raakheko keji laaguausadha gaanjaa baraamada gareko janaaeko chha

mahaanagariya prahari waritta thaanakotale dieko jaanakaarianusaara arthika warsa maa laaguausadha muddaamaa wiruddha muddaa daayara bhaeko chha warittakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka kumaarawikrama thaapaa upatyakaa bhitrine pramukha naakaa dherai wyakti awatajaawata garne bhaekaale pani dherai laaguausadha osaarapasaara pani thaanakota naakaabaatai hune gareko bataaunchhan

thaanakota prahari awaidharupamaa osaarapasaara garieko laaguausadha dherai hadasamma baraamada garna saphala bhaeko chha uni bhanchhan yastai bhaktapurako jagaati kaathamaadaunko daksinakaalibaata pani laaguausadha bhitrine gareko praharile janaaeko chha

mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya raanipokharikaa anusaara kaathamaadaun praharile awa maa maatra laaguausadhasambandhi wiruddha muddaa daayara gareko chha awa maa bhaktapurale ra lalitapurale wyaktiwiruddha muddaa chalaaeko chha

kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa ewum prahari waristha upariksaka syaamalaala jnawaali laaguausadha osaarapasaaramaa taraaimadhesa mulakaa wyakti dherai sumlagna hune gareko bataaunchhan chhimeki muluka bhaaratako khulaa simaanaakaa kaarana pani taraaiko baato hundai dherai laaguausadha upatyakaa bhitrine gareko chha uni bhanchhan laaguausadhabhitra parne gaanjaa ra aphimabaaheka sabai laaguausadha widesabaata ayaata hune gareko praharile bataaeko chha

unalaai kaathamaadaum prahari parisarale pakraau gareko ho unale saauna gatebarthina sentaramaa janmiekaa eka sisulaai laakha rupaiyaan bhandaa badhi rakama liera belaayati naagarika donaa smithalaai bikri gareko parisara prawaktaa hobindra bogatile jaanakaari dinubhayaae
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jumlaale laaguausadha kaarobaara gareko aropamaa eka karmachaarilaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya jumlaamaa kaaryarata warsiya kharidaara lokendra malla rahekaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa adhikaari ewum prahari niriksaka nawina olile jaanakaari die

unisangai jumlaa paataaraasi gaaunpaalikaa patamaaraa gaaun niwaasi haala chandananaatha nagarapaalikaako eyaraportamaa basdai aekaa warsiya raajabahaadura budhaalaai pani pakraau garieko prahari niriksaka olile bataae

pramukha jillaa adhikaari durgaa banjaadele kharidaara mallako gatiwidhikaa kaarana unalaai hiraasatamaa raakhera anusandhaana bhairaheko jaanakaari die unisangai samaatiekaa budhaasahita ahilesamma laaguausadhakaa nau janaa wyaktilaai samaatera kaarawaahi garieko chha

pakraau parnemaa mahottari aurahi nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai lalitapura thasikhela basne warsa ko ambara saaha ra sindhupaalchoka ghara bhai kaathamaandau mhaipi basne warsa ko umesa laphada chhan uniharuko saathabaata praharile traamaa naamaka pisa laagu ausadha baraamada gareko chha

yaadawale ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jitapuramaa gaera bhaaratabaata awaidha kukhuraa lyaai nepaalako wibhinna thaaunmaa osaarapasaara garne garekaa thie tyasako maahola milaaidina bhandai praharilaai ukta nagada dina khojepaschaata unalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho

tapaai haami sabai mili paisaa kamaaunu parchha tapaaimle nakhaae pani haamile jasari pani kaama garchhaum bhandai apasabda prayoga gari abhadra wyawahaara dekhaaepachhi niyantranamaa liera kaarawaahi prakriyaa agaadi badhaaiekaae baaraa prahari pramukha esapi saanuraama bhattaraaile jaanakaari dinubhaekaae chha

sunasariko barju gaaunpaalikaa kaa pradipakumaara yaadawale srimatiko managalabaara hatyaa garekaa chhan gharamaa kohi nabhaeko maukaamaa pradipale srimati anandi yaadawako hatyaa gareko sthaaniyawaasi harinaaraayana yaadawale bataaunubhayo

gharaayasi jhagadaa bhaeko bahaanaamaa pradipale srimatilaai gharako pachhaadi lagera ghaanti thichera hatyaa gareko sthaaniyawaasi harinaaraayana yaadawale bataaunubhayo gharamaa kohi nabhaeko belaa pradipale srimatilaai kutapita garera gambhira ghaaite banaaeko ra upachaarakaa laagi wiraatanagara lagekaamaa upachaarakai kramamaa anandiko marityu bhaeko sunasarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka jnaanendraprasaada phunyaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

hatyaamaa sumlagna pradipa pharaara raheko ra unako khoji bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha hatyaa gareko bhandai sodhapuchhakaa laagi praharile pradipakaa bubaa raajina yaadawalaai niyantranamaa lieko chha ghatanaakaa wisayamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha

nyaayaadhisa karisnamuraari siwaakotiko ijalaasale saarpasutara bhaarata sitaamadhikaa warsiya kunaalakumaara simha wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya mannukumaara guptaa ra sarlaahi godaitaa nagarapaalikaakaa warsiya harinaaraayana jhaalaai thunaamaa raakhna adesa dieko haae
adaalatale adesa diesangai tinai janaalaai wiraatanagarako haatakholaasthita morana kaaraagaara chalaana garieko chha

wyaapaari hatyaa yojanaa prakaranamaa morana praharile anusandhaana sakera misila bujhaaepachhi jillaa sarakaari wakila kaaryaalayale abhiyogapatra tayaara paarera gata sukrabaara adaalatamaa paancha janaalaai pratiwaadi banaaera muddaa daayara gareko thiyo
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako tolile mahottariko bhumgaahahaa nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaa sadasyakaa chhoraalaai eka laakha hajaara ghusasahita pakraau garekaae chha
awaidyarupamaa dhumgaa giti tathaa waaluwaa utkhanan gari dhuwaani garne dui otaa trayaaktaralaai morana praharile mumgalawaara niyantranamaa lieko chha

praharile awaidyarupamaa dhumgaa ra baaluwaa bokne ko pa trayaaktaralaai moranako letaana ra ko ta namwarako trayaaktaralaai wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita ghinaaghaatabaata niyantranamaalieko haae
niyantranamaa liiekaa duwai trayaaktaralaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi jillaa samanwaya samitiko kaaryaalaya wiraatanagarako jimmaa lagaaiekopraharile janaaekaae chha

jalajalaa gaaunpaalikaa laamaakheta basne warsiya paawala bikalaai daauraako chirpata prahaara gari ghaaite banaaeko abhiyogamaa janaalaai somabaara prahari chauki waariweni parwatabaata khatieko praharile pakraau gareko chha

gata aitabaara raati uniharule maadaka padaartha sewana gari paawala bikalaai daauraako chirpata prahaara gari ghaaite banaaeko suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha prahari chauki waariweni parwatabaata khatieko praharile khoji garne kramamaa aphnai gharamaa lukichhupi baseko awasthaamaa uniharulaai phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

ghaaite paawala gandaki medikala kaleja pokharaamaa upachaara paschaata dischaarja bhaekaa chhan pakraau parekaa janaalaai saarwajanika hita swaasthya suraksaa suwidhaa ra naitikataa wiruddako kasura antargata dinako myaada lii thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parwatale janaaeko chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogakaae taaelile daanako ghoraahisthita sri maadhyamika widyaalayamaa kaaryarata siksaka ganaesa kesilaai hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa rakamasahita pakraau garekaae chha

diplomaa ina sibhila injiniyarinako prawesa pariksaa urtina garaaidina sahajikarana garidine bahaanaamaa pariksaarthiharusanga ghusa lieko awasthaamaa akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako kaaryaalaya butawalabaata khatieko tolile kesilaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile siraahaabaata thaana bharuwaa banduka baraamada gareko chha

praharile somabaara saanjha golabajaara nagarapaalikaa khajana puriyaabaata loda bhaeko bharuwaa banduka thaana phelaa paari baraamada gareko haae prahari chauki muksaarabaata khatieko prahari tolilaai dekhnaasaatha aparichita purusale bokeko banduka chhaadi pharaara bhae paswaata praharile ukta banduka baraamada gareko ho
eka warsako awadhimaa amsawandaa maadaka padaartha sewana ra risako awegamaa aera aphnai pariwaarakaa sadasyako hatyaa garne krama badheko kailaali praharile bataaeko chha

maadaka padaartha sewana garera unale amaabubaako hatyaa gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka daksakumaara basnetale bataae gata mansira gate lamki chuhaa nagarapaalikaako baliyaamaa jaharalaala chaudharile warsiya bubaa paltu thaaru ra warsiyakaakaa chhanaka thaaruko hatyaa gare unale amsawandaamaa kuraa namildaa hatyaa gareko prahariko anusandhaanabaata khulyo

gata asoja gate tikaapura nagarapaalikaakaalimaatimaa bubaale chhoraako hatyaa garekaa chhan triyaasi warsiya pahale luhaarale dhaarilo hatiyaara prayoga gari aphnai warsiya chhoraa karite luhaarako hatyaa gare gata kaattika gate godaawari nagarapaalikaa laalapuraki warsiyaa hiraadewi naagariko unakai srimaan wijaya naagaarile hatyaa gare

maayaa prema bhaagabandaa madiraa sewana tathaa risako agewamaa kailaalimaa eka warsako awadhimaa aphnai janmadine amaabubaa tathaa srimaanle srimati ra srimatile srimaanko gari nau janaako hatyaa bhaeko kailaalikaa prahari upariksaka daksakumaara basnetale bataae

yasa awadhimaa kartawya jyaana balaatkaara taskari ra choridakaitisambandhi aparaadha badhdai gaeko praharile janaaeko chha arthika warsa maa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa kartawya jyaanasambandhi tina jyaana maarne udyoga wisa khaaera marityu ra le jhundiera atmahatyaa gareko prahari tathyaankamaa ullekha chha yi aparaadhakaa ghatanaa awa maa badhekaa chhan yo samayamaa kartawya jyaanasambandhi jyaana maarne udyoga wisa khaaera marityu ra le jhundiera atmahatyaa garekaa chhan

awa maa aparaadhakaa ghatanaa ajha badheko tathyaankale dekhaaeko chha yo awadhimaa kartawya jyaanasambandhi jyaana maarne udyoga wisa khaaera marityu ra le jhundiera atmahatyaa ra atha janaale atmahatyaa durutsaahana gareko kailaali praharile janaaeko chha yasabaaheka awa maa saarwajajanika kasurasambandhi chaara maanawabechabikhana tathaa osaarapasaara nau bahuwiwaaha sawaari jyaanasambandhi ghatanaa bhaekaa chhan

awa maa saarwajajanika kasurasambandhi nau maanawa bechabikhana tathaa osaarapasaara bahuwiwaaha sawaari jyaanasambandhikaa ghatanaa rahekaa chhan yastai awa maa saarwajanika kasurasambandhi maanawa bechabikhana tathaa osaarapasaara bahuwiwaaha sawaari jyaanasambandhikaa ghatanaa raheko kailaali praharile janaaeko chha

kehi warsayataa kailaalimaa sarinkhalaabaddharupamaa chorikaa ghatanaa badhekaa chhan sudurapaschima pradesako asthaayi raajadhaani raheko kailaalimaa uchcha suraksaakaa bicha pani chorikaa ghatanaa badhdai gaepachhi kailaali praharilaai chunauti thapieko chha

pradesako asthaayi raajadhaani dhanagadhimaa sarinkhalaabaddha chorikaa ghatanaa badhdai gaepachhi sarwasaadhaarana trasita banekaa chhan pradesa raajadhaanimai phitalo suraksaa wyawasthaakaa kaarana chori hune krama badheko sthaaniyawaasiko aropa chha

kailaalimaa balaatkaarakaa ghatanaa pani sarinkhalaabaddharupamaa badhdai gaekaa chhan pachhillo kehi warsayataa balaatkaarakaa ghatanaasambandhi ujuri badhna thaalako kailaali praharile janaaeko chha

pachhillo tina warsayataa kailaalimaa bubaabaatai chhorisamma balaatkarita huna pugeki chhan yo awadhikaa saamuhika balaatkaara ra balaatkaarako prayaasakaa ghatanaa badheko kailaali praharile janaaeko chha
kailaali praharikaa anusaara awa maa balaatkaara ra atha balaatkaara prayaasakaa muddaa dartaa bhaekaamaa awa maa balaatkaara ra balaatkaarako prayaasasambandhi muddaa parekaa chhan
balaatkaarakaa ghatanaa badhdai bhairahekaa chhan arthika warsa maa balaatkaara ra balaatkaarako prayaasasambandhi muddaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalimaa dartaa bhaekaa chhan

laaguausadhakai kaarana kailaalimaa jaghanya aparaadha bhairaheko chha laaguausadha prayogakartaa nai hatyaa himsaa balaatkaara choridakaitijastaa kriyaakalaapamaa sumlagna hune gareko kailaali prahari pramukha prahari upariksaka sudipa girile bataae

pachhillo samaya laaguausadha prayoga tathaa osaarapasaaramaa mahilaako sumglagnataa badhdai gairaheko kailaali prahari pramukha girile daabi gare laaguausadhako daladalamaa phasekaa yuwatile nai dehawyaapaaradekhi anya kisimakaa aparaadhakaa ghatanaa badhaaune gareko unako bhanaai chha yasako niyantranakaa laagi suraksaa rananiti majabuta banaaieko unako daabi chha

awa maa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalimaa dartaa bhaekaa laaguausadhasambandhi muddaamaa janaalaai prakraau gariekaamaa awa maa dartaa bhaekaa muddaamaa laai pakraau garieko kailaali prahari pramukha girile bataae chaalu awa ko saauna gatesamma laaguausadhasambandhi parekaa paancha muddaamaa paancha janaalaai pakraau gareko unale jaanakaari die
arghaakhaanchikaae bhumikaasthaana nagarapaalikaako nuwaakotamaa eka wyaktile khukuri prahaara gardaa tinajanaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

bhumikaasthaana nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambarakhamaaribaasakaa warsiya chirana ghartile tyasai nagarapaalikaakaaewadaa nambara maa raheko sasuraalimaa somabaara raati gaera khukuri prahaara gardaasrimati saasu ra saalo ghaaite bhaekaa hun

khukuri prahaarabaata srimati warsiyaa gitaa gharti saasu warsiyaa bhumakalaa ksetri ra saalo warsiya arjuna ksetri gambhira ghaaite bhaekojillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka prakaasa wistale bataaunu bhayo

ghaaite tinai janaako jillaa aspataala sandhikharkamaa upachaara huna nasakepachhi lumbini anchala aspataala butabala pathaaieko thiyo butabalamaa pani upachaara huna nasakepachhi tinai janaalaai chitawanako puraano medikala kalejamaa pathaaieko praharile janaaekaae chha
udayapurako triyugaa nagarapaalikaa laalapattaabaata laaguausadha sahita janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parekaa duwai janaalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapuramaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

lu kha nambarako traka sadakamai paarkina gareko awasthaamaa phelaa paari praharile kaarabaahi garne kramamaa traka chaalaka girile kaarabaahibaata bachna praharilaai dieko ukta nagada sahita unalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho
praharile sirahaakaa chhuttaachhuttai sthaanabaata aja haatahaatiyaara muddaamaa pharaara tathaa laaguausadhasahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko saadaa posaakako tolile haatahatiyaara muddaamaa pharaara sirahaa nagarapaalikaa hakapaaraa niwaasi warsiya dinesakumaara yaadawalaai pakraau gareko ho

prahari chauki dewanagarabaata khatieko tolile bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai gareko sa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai jaancha garne kramamaa daaileksa disi thaana ra metrojana pama tewaleta laaguausadhasahita motarasaaikalamaa sawaara duwailaai pakraau garieko prahari naayaba upariksaka boharaale bataae

tyastai praharile sirahaa sanhaithaa naharachaukabaata bhansaara chhalera lyaaiekaa raangaasahita eka janaalaai aja pakraau gareko chha prahari chauki sanhaithaabaata khatieko tolile daksinabaata uttaratarpha bhansaara chori paithaari garera lyaairaheko awasthaamaa raangaasahita aurahi gaaunpaalikaa tulasiyaahi niwaasi warsiya raamadewa yaadawalaai pakraau gareko ho
niyantranamaa liiekaa raangaa awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi bhansaara kaaryaalaya maadaramaa bujhaaine praharile janaaeko chha

raama saagara raama swarupa bahumukhi kyaampasamaa emabiesa prathama barsako tathyaankasaastra bisayako pariksaa suru bhaepachhi pariksaa halabaatai prasnapatra myaasenjarabaata auta gari sohi thaaunsthita sujita kumaara mandalako photokapi sentaramaa gai photokapi garaaundai gareko chha bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile kaaskikaa bibhinna thaanu ra bhaktapurabaatajuwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadeharulaai pakraau gareko chha

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa jhyaurichokasthita raamaraaja paudelako gothamaa juwaataasa khelirahekaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya wikaasa thaapaa lagaayata janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita aitabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa prahari chauki janataako chautaaraa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sisuwaabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita durgaa ghaleko gharamaa juwaataasa khelirahekaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya gumgaa prasaada guruna sahita janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita aitabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskibaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa raamaghaatasthita warsiyaa urmilaa laamichhaaneko parwata hotalabhitra juwaataasa khelirahekaa laamichhaane lagaayata janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita aitabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha
wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamabajaarabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayasalyaana ra sasastra prahari bala salyaanabaata gastimaa khatieko sumyukta tolilechaara thaana bharuwaa bandukasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
mahottari praharile mobaailako aiemai nambarako adhaaramaa eka mahilaako hatyaamaa sumlagna dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

gata asaara gate gausaalaa nagarapaalikaa basne anjukumaari sresthako hatyaa bhaeko ghatanaalaai anusandhaanakaa kramamaa maritaka sresthale bokdai aeko mobaailako aiemaikaa adhaaramaa sthaaniya dui janaalaai gausaalaa praharile gharabaatai pakraaugarekaae ho

aitabaara pakraau parekaa gausaalaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dasai thaakura ra sohi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raajakisora girilaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gausaalaale saaemabaara bihaana patrakaara sammelana gardai saarwajanika gareko chha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gausaalaakaa anusaara maritaka sresthale bokdai aeko mobaaila giriko gharamaa baraamada bhaeko ra sohiko anusandhaana garne kramamaa uniharulaai pakraau garieko ho

gausaalaa bajaaramaa sanchaalita nirdhana utthaana baimkamaa kaaryarata sresthalaai madhyaraati nijakai gharamaa chakku prahaara garieko thiyo gambhira ghaaite awasthaamaa raheki sresthako upachaarako laagi janakapura laijaane kramamaa baatomaa nai marityu bhaeko thiyo

akhtiyaara tolile sahaayaka wana adhikarita disibaata rakama baraamada gare pani ukta rakama ghusako rakama nabhai aphno niji rakama bhaeko disikaa saathamaa rahekaa joraayala gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa bhajanasimha mallakaa chhoraa kirana mallale daabi garnubhaeko chha

uhaanle bhannubhayo yo paisaa mero ho sahaayaka wana adhikarita disi jilaai phasaauna kasaile aropa lagaaeko ho ma jahaan gaera pani bhanna sakchhu rakama mero ho yaddhapi mallale kuna kaama wisesa ra ke kaa laagi tyo rakama bokekaa huna tyo bhane khulaaekaa chhainan malla nirmaana wyawasaayi pani hun
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako kanchanapurakaa suchanaa adhikaari topabahaadura wistale sahaayaka wana adhikarita disi ghusasahita pakraau pareko pusti garnubhaeko chha

kaathamaadaumbaata kaankadabhittaatarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako gaadimaa wiraatanagara damaka ra jhaapaa laijaana laagieko challaa pasu kwaarentaaina chekaposta raamanagara chitawanale aitabaara bharatapurabaata so challaa niyantranamaa liera sarokaarawaalaako rohabaramaa nasta gareko ho

bikri anumati patra kwaarentaaina chekaposta darapita bhaeko patra ra anya awasyaka kehi kagajaata nabhaekaale challaa nasta garieko pasu kwaarentaaina chekaposta raamanagarakaa pramukha raama kisora saahale jaanakaari dinubhayaae

chitawanakaa poltri wyawasaayi jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayakaa pratinidhi prahari pasu wijna kendrakaa pratinidhi patrakaaralagaayatako rohabaramaa challaa nasta garieko ho yasaaghi sukrabaara maatrai chitawanamaa paancha hajaara boilara kukhuraakaa challaa nasta garieko thiyo

abaidha antarraastriya kala baaipaasamaa sumlagna kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa baaluwaataaratusaala sitalamaargasthita kothaamaa basdai aekaa chitawana bharatapurakaa warsiya nasiwa taamaanalaai bihibaara prahari pradhaana kaaryaalaya kendriya anusandhaana byuro mahaaraajagumjabaata khatieko praharile pakraau gareko chha

wibhinna pralobhana dekhaai warsiyaa kisorilaai wechawikhana garne uddesyale laijaana laageko abhiyogamaa chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa naagadhungaabaata raamechhaapa khaandaadewi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya bhuwana tamaana ra kaabhre khaanikholaa gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya aite bahaadura lopchanalaai sanibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko haae

mahaanagariya prahari baritta thaanakotabaata maaiti nepaalakaa pratinidhi sahita khatieko praharile naa kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa ti kisorilaai sumkaaspada rupamaa lii jaandai gareko awasthaamaa phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

uniharule ti kisorilaai jhaapaako birtaamodamaa rana lagaaune kaama lagaaidinchhaum kohi kasaile chekajaancha garne kramamaa sodhapuchha gardaa waastawika naama nakhulaaunu ra bhaauju sutkeri bhaekile birtaamoda jaana laageko bataaunu bhandai wibhinna pralobhana dekhaai wechawikhana garne uddesyale laijaana laageko anusandhaanako kramamaa khulna aeko ukta warittale janaaeko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale nagaraaina nagarapaalikaa dhanusaakaa sabainjiniyaralaai hajaara ghusasahita pakraau garekaae chha

mandalalaai akhtiyaaralejanakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa aspataala rodasthita anchala aspataala janakapura najikako redakrasa bhawanako paschimadaksina ra baahrabighaa chaurako purwadaksinabaata rangehaata pakraau garekaae haae

jillaako dhorapaatana nagarapaalikaa wadaa num bobaanamaa warsiya bhaanabahaadura kaami ra unaki warsiyaa srimati bimaa kaamiko wibhatsa dhumgale hatyaa gariekopraharile janaaekaae chha gaeraati aphnai gharamaa rahekaa hatyaa bhaeko prahari chauki bobaanakaa inchaarja siwaraaja suwedile jaanakaari die

dhaarilo hatiyaara prayoga gari hatyaa garieko awasthaamaa aitabaara bihaana bhaanabahaadura sawa gharanajikai makaibaarimaa ra srimati bimaako sawa gharabhitrai phelaa pareko thiyo ghatanaabaare suchanaa paaelagattai prahari toli ghatanaasthala pugera anusandhaana suru gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baagalunakaa prahari pramukha prahari upariksaka nawaraaja bhattale bataaunu bhayaae

gokarnaeswara nagapaalikaa puraano saanta bhawana basne makawaanapura gadhi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaeki warsiyaa silaa ghaleleaphnai srimaana warsiya jaalamaana syaantaanalaaichakkuprahaara gareko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa aspataalachokasthita rinaa kesiko hotalamaa sanibaara saanjha juwaataasa khelirahekaaeawasthaamaa paancha janaalaai niyantranamaa linukaa saathai juwaa khaalabaata hajaara rupaiyaan ra thaana taasabuka baraamada gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhulikhelakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dipaka girile bataaekaa chhan

unakaa anusaara pakraau parnemaa dhulikhela napaa kaa warsiya raama paraajuli warsiya prasaanta srestha ra warsiya asoka srestha dhulikhela napaa kaa warsiya dipaka taamaana ra bhaktapurako bhaktapura napaa kaa warsiya ganaesa kaaranjita rahekaa chhan
laagu ausadha byuroko tolile sunasariko itaharimaa laaguausadha braauna sugarasahita nepaali senaakaa mejarasahita duijanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa inaatolakaa naama thara nakhulekaa jange bhanne purusa wyaktiko hatyaamaa sumlagna raheko aropamaa udayapurako kataari ghara bhai kaathamaadaunko inaatola basne warsiya winoda khadkaa pakraau pareko mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha maritaka ra khadkaa sangasangai basdai aeko praharile janaaeko chha

anusandhaanakaa kramamaa uniharu bihibaara raati sangai rahekaabelaa bhaeko apasi wiwaadale ghatanaa ghateko mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha prahari waristha upariksaka sahakula thaapaale jaanakaari die khadkaale inttaa tathaa dhungaale prahaara gari unako hatyaa gareko khulna aeko ra ghatanaako wisayamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko unale bataae

sampanna bhaisakeko yojanaako rakama bhuktaani garaaidine bhandai sewaagraahisanga hajaara rupaiyaan liiraheko awasthaamaa nagaraaina nagarapaalikaakaa sawainjiniyara umesa mandalalaaiakhtiyaarale pakraau gareko haae
bubaalaai chirpata prahaara garne chhaaeraa prakaasalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakale niyantranamaa lii ghatanaa baare thapa anusandhaana garirahekaae chha

dhanagadhi ra kaathamaadaumbaata wibhinna mitimaa pakraau parekaa saata nakkali notakaa kaarobaarilaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile sukrabaara bihaana patrakaara sammelana maarphata saarwajanika gareko ho

pakraau parnemaa kailaaliko chure gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa warsiya khagrendra bama bhanne khagrendra rajawaara chure gaaunpaalikaa kai warsiya bhoja bahaadura bama dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa warsiya pallapa raaja bhatta ra mahottari jillaako bardiwaasa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya gokula khadkaa rahekaa chhan

uniharulaai pharakapharaka mitimaa mitimaa dhanagadhi ra kaathamaadaumbaata pakraau garieko kailaalikaa prahari upariksaka sudipa girile bataaekaa chhan uniharuko saathabaata khotaa nota chhaapne mesina eka thaana nota chhaapna prayoga bhaeko dui saya thaana seto pepara ra nepaala tathaa bhaaratakaa nakkali nota praharile baraamada gareko chha
laakha rupaiyaan ghusa sahita sadaka dibhijana kaaryaalaya kaaskikaa pramukha ra injiniyaralaai akhtiyaara kaaryaalaya pokharaale niyantranamaa lieko chha

sadaka dibhijana kaaryaalaya pokharaakaa pramukha hari kumaara pokhrela ra sohi kaaryaalayakai injiniyara pawitrapaanai achaaryalaai akhtiyaara pokharaale nau laakha rupaiyaan ghusa sahita bihibaara saanjha saandhe chha baje niyantranamaa lieko ho

bihibaara saanjha pramukha pokhrelakai niwaasabaata pokhrela ra achaaryalaai laakha sahita pakraau garieko asakhtayaara srotale jaanakaari diyo ukta ghusa sadhaka dibhijana kaaryaalaya pokharaabaata sadakako thekkaa milaaidine bhandai esaara nirmaana sewaakaa propaaitara risiraama gautamabaata lieko akhtiyaarale janaaeko chha

bihibaara sarwochchale unalaai taarekhamaa raakhna naparne adesa gareko chha nyaayaadhisa iswara khatiwadaa ra prakaasakumaara dhumgaanaako ijalaasale anusandhaana adhikarita tokne nirnayasambandhi phaailakai kaarana muddaa rokina nasakne bhandai aba sunuwaai suchaaru garna bhaneko ho

tara wisesa adaalatale bhane hadamyaadako kaaranale surumaa josilaai saphaai diyo akhtiyaara wisesawiruddha sarwochcha gayo sarwochchale bhrastaachaara muddaamaa hadamyaada nalaagne bhandai tathyabhitra prawesa garera pheri sunuwaai garna josiko muddaa wisesamai pharkaaidiyo

bahuwiwaaha garne raamaprasaada raai gaaunpaalikaa maanebhanjyaanakaa warsiya khagendra wika ra unaki kaanchhi srimati warsiya himaa raailaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurakaa insapektara paandawakumaara raajawumsile jaanakaari die

tyastaiaruna gaaunpaalikaa charambikaa warsiya tumka wika ra unaki kaanchhi srimati warsiya basanti wikalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho tumkaki jethi srimati amaritaako jaaheripachhi uniharulaai praharile jhaapaabaata pakraau gareko haae

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapura ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jalajalebaata sumyukta rupamaa khatieko praharile lahaanabaata gaaighaatatarpha jaandai gareko sa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

morana sunawarsi nagarapaalikaa siktisthitabaata miklaajuna gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya gowinda prasaada bhandaari ra ratuwaamaai nagarapaalikaa ghopaabaadha tola basne warsiya dipaka paudelalaai niyantrita laaguausadha saya emaelako koreksa disi botala ra paurusa jiwana kyaapsula bhaeko pyaaketa sahita budhabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha
prahari chauki siktibaata khatieko praharile ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

jhaapaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya anaaramanibaata khatieko praharile bibhinna sthaanabaata awaidha laaguausadha braauna sugara jasto dekhine padaartha saya mili graama sahita janaalaai budhabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa sumkhuwaasabhaa khaadabaari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bikrama raai jhaapaa birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya tumbaa bhanne nirmala chaudhari ra jhaapaa birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya kalyaana ksetri rahekaa chhan
pakraaumadhye raaiko saathabaata saya mili graama chaudhariko saathabaata saya mili graama ra ksetriko saathabaata saya mili graama ukta padaartha praharile baraamada gareko ho

kartawya jyaana muddaamaa pharaaraabhiyuktalaaijillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetalepakraau gareko chha pakraau parnemaa wirendranagara nagarapaalikaa surkheta gaagretaala niwaasi warsiya kamala sunaara rahekaa chhan

jillaa adaalata surkhetale phaaguna gate kartawya jyaana muddaamaa dosi thaharako phaisalaa garepaschaata pharaara rahekaa sunaaralaai hijo unakai gharamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetakaa prawaktaa ewum prahari naayaba upariksaka pradipabahaadura ksetrile jaanakaari die
sunaaralaai pakraau gari adaalatamaa bujhaaieko ra adaalatakai adesaanusaara unalaai budhabaara nai kaaragaara chalaana garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetale janaaeko chha

nawalaparaasi purwa nawalapurako kaawaasoti sabhaapatichokasthita buddhi taamaanako gharamaa juwaa kheliraheko awasthaamaa praharile nau janaalaai pakraau gareko ho juwaako khaalabaata praharile ru hajaara sameta baraamada gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalaparaasipurwakaa prahari niriksaka raajendra adhikaarile bataaunu bhayaae
pakraau parekaa sabailaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha

mahaanagariya prahari baritta saatadobaatobaata khatiekaae prahari taaelile lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaako wadaa nambara maa raheko daaunataaunaapaartamentako aum talaako blakabaata uniharulaaibudhabaara raati saadhe atha baje uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile parsaabaata awaidha laagu ausadha gaanjaasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa parsaa bahudaramaai nagarapaalikaa bisraamapura tolakaa barsakaa naimodina dewaana rahekaa chhan asthaayi prahari posta bindawaasiniko tolile unalaai nepaalabaata bhaaratatarpha jaandai garekaae awasthaamaa wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa tilaawe pulabaata niyantranamaa lieko thiyo

praharile dewaanako saathabaata laagu ausadha gaanjaa kilo phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale janaaeko chha unalaai awasyaka anusandhaana ra kaarabaahikaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaamaa raakhieko chha
traaphika praharile upatyakaamaa wibhinna bahaanaa banaai yaatru thagne hajaara tyaaksi chaalakalaai kaarawaahi gareko chha

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaako tolile arthika warsa maa kaanunawiparitakaa kaarya gari mitaramaa jaana namaanne mitara bigaarne bhaadaa aniyamitataa garne badhi bhaadaa line tyaaksikaa chaalakalaai kaarawaahi gareko ho

badhi bhaadaa line tyaaksi chaalakasanga traaphika praharile tina hajaara jariwaanaa garne gareko chha tyastai paancha patakabhandaa badhi badhibhaadaa liera kaarawaahimaa parne tyaaksi chaalakako sawaari chaalaka anumatipatra nilambanakaa laagi yaataayaata wyawasthaa kaaryaalayamaa siphaarisa garne garieko mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha

mitaramaa jaana namaanne tyaaksiko mitara bigaarne ra bigreko mitarasameta samayamaa nabanaaune tyaaksi chaalakalaai bhane ru dekhi eka hajaara samma jariwaanaa garne garieko pantale bataae mahaasaakhaale badhi bhaadaa line tyaaksi chaalakako kaarawaahikaa laagi dainika dekhi traaphika prahari upatyakaakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa khataaundai aeko chha

tyaaksi prayoga gardaa badhi bhaadaa line mitaramaa jaana namaanne yaatrule chaaheko sthaanamaa jaana namaanemaa tatkaala traaphika prahariko hatalaaina num maa khabara garna sabai yaatrulaai mahaasaakhaale agraha gareko chha yaataayaata wyawasthaa wibhaagakaa anusaara haala kaathamaadaun upatyakaamaa maatra hajaarabhandaa badhi tyaaksi sanchaalanamaa rahekaa chhan
aropitaharule ghaanti thichera hatyaa gareko aropamaa pakraau gari kartawya jyaanako ujuri dartaa garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarilejanaaeko chha

raajawiraajasthita gajendranaaraayana simha aspataalamaa saauna gate raati lyaaundaa piditako marityu bhaisakeko thiyo maritakako ghaantimaa doriko niladaama ra sariramaa chotapataka laageko dekhepachhi maritakakaa daaju raamasewaka yaadawale jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa ujuri dieko thiyo
praharile wiraatanagarakaa wyaapaari jitu bhanine jitendra raayako hatyaa yojanaasahita nepaala aekaa saarpasutarasahita yojanaakaaralaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale hatyaakaa mukhya yojanaakaara wiraatanagarakaa mannu guptaa harinaaraayana jhaa ra saarpasutara kulaanakumaara simhalaai pakraau gareko haae mannu guptaale lenadenako wisayamaa wiwaada hudaa wiraatanagara kai wyaapaari jitendra raayako hatyaa garna laakha bhaaratiya rupaiyaamaa tina janaalaai supaari diekaa thie

so ghatanaamaa sumlagna bhaaratakaa raakesa jhaa ra raaju kumaara rauniyaara pharaara raheko moranakaa prahari upariksaka wiswa adhikaarile jaanakaari dinubhayo pakraau parekaa wiruddha haata hatiyaara tathaa kharakhajaanaa ra sumgathita aparaadha aina antargata muddaa chalaaieko chha

pariyaarako gharamaa laaguausadha braaunasugara pyaaka gardaichhan bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya chhinchubaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta padaartha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa pandita chokabaata sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa bhorle basne warsiya sunila taamaanalaai niyantrita laaguausadha traamaa pisa tyaababi tyaableta pisa dikolita tyaableta pisa ra awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba saya graama sahita somabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

prahari chauki chaughadaabaata khatieko praharile hetaumdaa bajaarabaata hatiyaatarpha jaandai gareko baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara taamaanalaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

nawalaparaasipurwa kaawaasoti nagarapaalikaa tinagharebaata kaaski pokharaamahaanagarapaalikaa lekasaaida basne warsiya jiwana nepaalilaai niyantrita laaguausadha nurphina empula phenaaragana empula ra daaijepaama empula sahita somabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile ga kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara nepaalilaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

rupandehi siddhaarthanagara nagarapaalikaa basapaarkabaata marchawaara gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya jitendra yaadabalaai niyantrita laaguausadha daaijepaama saya empula phenaaragana saya empula nurphina saya empula ra daana tulsipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya ujwala rijaalalaai daaijepaama empula phenaaragana empula ra nurphina empula sahita somabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehibaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
dhaadina praharile somabaara saanjha tolaa awaidha sunajasto pahemlo dhaatusahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa majhimataarabaata suna jasto dekhine pahemlo dhaatu kariba tolaa sahita chitawana bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa ksetrapura basne warsiya santosa basneta ra nawalaparaasi madhyabindu nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya gokulamaana sresthalaai pakraau gareko haae

prahari chauki jogimaaraabaata khatieko praharile kaathamaadaumbaata chitawanatarpha jaandai gareko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta parimaanako dhaatu sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
ghaaite chhoraako awasthaa chintaajanaka raheko ra upachaarako laagi helikaptara maarphata kaathamaadaumko graandi aspataalamaa lyaaiekojillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nuwaakotale janaaeko chha
praharile chhuraa prahaara garne buwaaidrisa miyaa khaanalaai niyantranamaa lii thapa anusandhaana suru garekaae chha
praharile jaggaa kirte gareko abhiyogamaa maalapota kaaryaalaya baankekaa tatkaalina pramukha maalapota adhikaari upasachiwa dirgha bahaadura pokharelasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharikaa anusaara baanke ra bardiyaakaa maalapota kaaryaalayamaa kaama garne uniharule nakkali chhaapa ra hastaaksara prayoga garera kariba bigaahaasarakaari jamina wyaktiko naamamaa garaaekaa thie

akhtiyaarale baanke jillaakaa sarakaari ra saarwajanika jaggaa wyaktikaa naamamaa puryaaundaa karoda laakha ra bardiyaakaa jaggaa wyaktikaa naamamaa puryaaundaa karoda laakha bhrastaachaara bhaeko daawi gareko chha
pakraau parneharu kehi samayadekhi pharaara thie jaggaako anusandhaanakaa kramamaa baanke praharile yasaaghi janaalaai pakraau garisakeko chha
makawaanapura praharile kilo saya graama gaajaasahita chaara janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa manahari gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya ato chaalaka warsiya jiwana moktaana wiraganja mahaanagarapaailakaa kaa warsiya raajesa patela ra munnaa ansaari rahekaa chhan

manahari bajaarabaata hetaumdaatarpha airaheko naa ha nambarako atolaaihetaumdaa thaanaabharyaanamaa jaancha garne kramamaa keji saya graama gaanjaa sahita uniharulaai praharile pakraau gareko ho uniharule atoko sita muni so parimaana baraabarako gaanjaa lukaaera lyaaekaa thie
yastai praharile laagu ausadha kaarobaaramaa sumlagna eka bhaaratiya naagarikalaai chitawanabaata pakraau garekaae chha

gata baisaakhamaa keji saya graama gaanjaa ra bhaaratiya kaarasahita pakraau pareko ghatanaamaa sumlagna rahekaa tara pharaara bhaekaa warsiya bhaaratiya naagarika prawala agniwesalaai praharile chitawanabaata pakraau gareko ho
agniwesalaai kaanuni kaarabaahikaa laagi somabaara jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya hetaumdaamaa lyaaeko thiyo

prahari chauki inarwaale somabaara bihaana baje chekajaanchakaa kramamaa wiraganja rajatajayantichokabaata bhaarata wihaara thaanaa gaunaahaa bhitiarwaa graama panchaayata wadaa num basne mahantha raamalaai laaguausadhasahita pakraau garieko ho

praharileaitabaara bihaanapokharaabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaaratannahu dumre nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sumana thaapaalaaipakraau gareko haae praharile unakaae saathabaataniyantrita laaguausadha daaijepaama empula nurphina empula phenaraagana empula baraamada garekaae chha

prahari tolile suryawinaayaka nagarapaalikaa sthita kwuwaa choka ksetramaa awaidharupamaa utpaadana garieko kariba dui hajaara litara awaidha gharelu madiraa ra madiraa utpaadana garna prayoga hune kachchaa padaartha nasta gareko bhaandaakudaa ra dramasahita niyantranamaa lii sthaaniya wuddhijiwi janapratinidhiko rohabaramaa nasta gareko haae

yasa ksetramaa atyaadhika maatraamaa gharelu madiraa utpaadana garne ra sthaaniya tathaa anya bajaaramaa bikri gardaa jhagadaa ewum himsaa badhepachhi sthaaniyale dieko ujuriko adhaaramaa tolile akasmikarupamaa chhaapaa maarera utpaadana bhairaheko ksetrabaata niyantranamaa liera nasta gareko ho
rukuma paschimako chaurajahaaribaatapraharile hatiyaarasahita dui luteraalaaipakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa baankeko kohalapura nagarapaalikaa kausilaanagarakaa warsiya gore thaapaa magara ra dailekhako dullu nagarapaalikaa lamsakaa warsiya khadkabahaadura bika rahekaa chhanpraharileuniharulaaichaurajahaari nagarapaalikaa syaalakholaabaata lutapaatamaa sumlagna bhaeko bhandai pakraau gareko ho

uniharuko saathabaata katuwaa pestola jasto dekhine saano hatiyaara thaana eka ra bharuwaa bandukalaai katuwaa pestola banaaeko naala eka baraamada garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukuma paschimale janaaeko chha

sainaamainaa nagarapaalikaa saalajhandisthita arghaakhaanchi saaja mahala hotala enda lajabaata bhaaluko chhaalaa thaana pitta thaana ra daanta thaana sahita kapilawastu baanagumgaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya khumaananda ghimire paalpaa rainaadewi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya dhanabira bika ra paalpaa tinaaun gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya laalabahaadura saarulaai bihibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko haae

nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya daana ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya saalajhandibaata khatieko praharile ukta hotalako kothaa nambara khaanatalaasi garne kramamaa uniharulaai ukta chhaalaa sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
jhaapaabaata praharile eka raaunda goli sahita ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

bhadrapura nagarapaalikaa chandragadhi eyaraportabaata saurya eyaraddhaaraa kaathamaadaum jaana laagekaa ilaama suryodaya nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya suresa raailaai thrinatathri raaiphalamaa laagne goli raaunda sahita bihibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko haae
chitawana praharile pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita dui janaalaaibharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita paramaanandachokabaata pakraau gareko chha
chitawana praharile motarasaaikalamaa rahekaa uniharulaai sankaaspada laagepachhi khojatalaasa gardaa ukta laaguausadhasahita budhabaara pakraau gari bihibaara saarwajanika gareko ho

pakraau parekaa duwailaai laaguausadha niyantrana aina ko daphaa cha bamojima laaguausadha muddaamaa jillaa adaalatabaata paancha dinako myaada thapa gari anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka ekanaaraayana koiraalaale jaanakaari dinubhayo
jarwajasti karanai muddaamaa pharaara abhiyuktalaai ilaama praharilepakraau gareko chha
baalikaa balaatkaara garera pharaara rahekaa chulaachuli gaaunpaalikaa kaa sachina rasaaililaai praharile rasaaililaai chulaachuli gaaunpaalikaabaata pakraau gareko haae
dharaana praharilebudhabaara laagu ausadhasahita tina janaalaai chhuttaachhuttai sthaanabaata prakraau gareko chha
dharaana tinakune chekapostabaata dharaana kaa sanama saakya ra dharaana kaa abhiseka taamaanalaai prakraau garieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanale janaaeko chha

uniharulaai budhabaara sumkaa itaharibaata dharaanatarpha audai gareko sawaari saadhanamaa chekajaacha garne kramamaa tinakune prahari chekapaastale jholaamaa lukaaera lyaaudai gareko awasthaamaa lupijesika ebhila ra daaijelaabha empula prakraau gareko ho
yasaigari praharile dharaana summinaa chaukabaata lupijesika ebhila ra daaijelaabha empulasahita dharaana kaa dani raailaai prakraau gareko chha
prakraau parekaa tinai janaalaai laagu ausadha kaarobaara aina anusaara kaarabaahi agaadi badhaaiekoilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanale janaaeko chha
praharileaja bihaana baaraabaata kaathamaadaun aundai gareko naa kha nambarakaaemaa basalaai cheka jaancha garne kramamaabaaraa kalaiyaakaa warsiya raaju chaudharilaai gareko ho
praharilebudhabaara saanjhabaa pa nambarako enaeksa motarasaaikala chadhera rasuwaabaata kaathamaadaum aundai garekaarasuwaa gosaainkunda kaa pembaa dhundupa taamaanalaaipakraau gareko haae
maanawa bechabikhana tathaa jabarajasti karanai muddaakaa pharaara pratiwaadi wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya wasanta raajawasimlaai aitabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

jillaa adaalata moranako waisaakha gateko phaisalaapachhi pharaara rahekaa unalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranako samanwayamaa mahaanagariya prahari waritta gausaalaa kaathamaadaumbaata khatieko praharile pakraau gareko ho
raajawumsilaai phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanako laagi jillaa adaalatamaa pesa gariekomaa adaalatako adesale purpaksako laagi kaaraagaara pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaeko chha
kartawya jyaana muddaamaa pharaaraabhiyuktalaai bardiyaa praharile warsapachhi pakraau gareko chha

kartawya jyaana muddaamaa warsa mahinaa dinako kaida sajaaya tokiekaa abhiyuktabardiyaako badhaiyaataala gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya waliraama khunaa thaarulaai praharile warsapachhi pakraau gareko haae

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaakaa anusaarasarwochcha adaalatako saalaphaaguna gateko phaisalaa adesale thaarumaathi warsa mahinaa dinako kaidahune thahari phaisalaa bhaekomaa pharaara rahekaathaarulaai praharilepakraau gareko haae
pakraau gariekaa thaarulaai bardiyaa jillaa adaalatamaa pathaaiekopraharile jaanakaari diekaae chha
praharilelukichhipi kaudaa kheliraheko awasthaamaa managalabaarachitawanabaata janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha
baaraako simraunagadhasthita ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatabaata pharaara bhaekaa eka yuwakalaai rautahata praharile pakraau gareko chha
prahariko tolile saauna gate khaanaa khaane kramamaa pharaara pratiwaadi bhaarata motihaari lipanikaa warsiya phiroja miyaalaai dinapachhirautahatako gaurabaata pakraau gareko ho
syaanjaako waalinabaata jhandai kilo laaguausadha khairo heroinasahita mumgalabaara janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

praharile butawalabaata parwatakaa laagi chhuteko naa kha nambarako basamaa jaancha garne kramamaa waalinabhakundebaatasyaanjaako bhirakota nagarapaalikaa kaa bhima bahaadura sena ra suma simha thakuri tathaa waalina nagarapaalikaa kaa suwaasa sena ra raama baikalaai pakraau garieko ho
suna liera timurebaata syaaphruwesitarpha jaandai garekaa kaalikaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya lopchanalaaipraharilegosaaikunda gaaunpaalikaa sthita timurebaatapakraau gareko haae

gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko prahari tolilenepaalabaata bhaaratalaijaandai gareko keji gaanjaasahitachaara janaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha

prahari tolile bahuari sthita sadakamaa chekajaancha garne kramamaa biara ji nambarako bolero gaadiko tala phalsa batama banaai lukaai raakheko awasthaamaa gaanjaa phelaa paareko ho wataa pokaamaa raheko keji gaanjaa baraamada bhaekojillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale janaaekaae chha
makawaanapurako manaharibaata gaanjaa kharida gari wiraganja hundai bhaarata laijaana laageko awasthaamaa pakraau garieko prahariko bhanaai chha
pakraau parekaa chaarai janaalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaamaa raakhera thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha

kaathamaadaum tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthala gaucharabaata awaidha laaguausadha charesa jasto dekhine padaartha kariba saya graama sahita raahadaani nambara waahaka welaayati naagarika iyaana jarja paaulalaai somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
iyaanalaai thapa awasyaka anusandhaana ewam kaarawaahiko laagi laaguausadha niyantrana byuro koteswara pathaaieko antarraastriya wimaanasthala suraksaa kaaryaalaya gaucharale janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaum daksinakaali nagarapaalikaa sthita pharpina basapaarka basne bhaarata motihaari raksaula ghara bhaekaa warsiya bhulana bhanne rosana kumaara guptaalaai niyantrita laaguausadha phenaraagana saya empula norphina saya empula ra daaijepaama saya empula sahita somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pharpinabaata khatieko praharile unalaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

mahaanagariya prahari waritta saatadobaatobaata khatieko praharile pradesa nambara pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

sunasari itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa manakaamanaa tola basne warsiya saugaata raailaai awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara graama saya miligraama sahita somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itaharibaata khatieko praharile unalaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
praharile kailaaliko attariyaabaata chituwaako chhaalaasahita somaabara saanjha janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

chituwaako chhaalaa bechabikhana tathaa osaara pasaara bhairaheko bhanne wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalibaata khatieko tolile somaabara saanjha baje attariyaako eka hotelabaata dotiko badhikedaara gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya raajendra thaapaa ra kailaaliko chure gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya raamabahaadura bistalaaipakraau gareko haae

praharile pakraau parekaa arkaa dotiko wadhikedaara gaaunpaalikaa kaa raajendra thaapaako saathabaata taaukodekhi puchchharasammako phita ra phita sarirako sarirako bhaagako arko eka thaana chhaalaa baraamada garekaae chha
chituwaako chhaalaa wechakhiwanako laagi uniharu attariyaa pugeko praarambhika anusandhaanabaata khulna aeko kailaali praharile janaaeko chha

pakraau parekaa khatiwadaako kothaamaa laaguausadhako kaarobaara hunchha bhanne suchanaakaa adhaaramaa pakraau garieko ho unalaai awasyaka anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapuramaa raakhieko chha
chitawana praharile saathikaae hatyaa abhiyaaegamaa pharaara dui abhiyuktalaai pakraau gareko chha

chitawana ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa sauraahaasthita rena pharesta hotalamaa kothaa buka gari basekaa kaathamaadaun budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa basne warsa ki gitaa guruna ra warsa kaa parwata gurunalaai pakraau gareko ho

uniharulaai muluki aparaadha sumhitaa ko parichchheda jyaanasambandhi kasuraantargata kartawya jyaana muddaamaa chitawana jillaa adaalatabaata chha dinako myaada thapa gari anusandhaana kaarya bhairaheko praharilejanaaeko chha

praharile wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa somabaara saanjha nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa taangaastesana najikabaata paancha kilo graama chaandikaa gahanaasahita subhaasa guptaalaai pakraau gareko haae

gulariyaa nagarapaalikaa bardiyaakaa warsiya guptaa nepaalaganjako dewaaphulabaarimaa kothaa bhaadaamaa basdai aekaa thie bhaaratabaata awaidharupamaa nepaalaganja lyaaera sankalana gariekaa chaandikaa gahanaa bardiyaa laijaane kramamaa nepaalaganjako taangaastesana najikabaata praharile guptaalaai niyantranamaa lieko ho
guptaalaai chaandisahita awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi nepaalaganja bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko praharile janaaekaae chha

traaphika praharile sawaarisaadhana jaancha garne kramamaa somabaara saanjha daanako ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num kaa warsiya mahendra wiswakarmaa ra sohi thaaunkai warsiya abhiseka thaapaako saathabaata pattaa laaguausadha baraamada garekaae chha

pakraau chemajonalaai phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanakaa laagi kaathamaadaumjillaa adaalata pesa garekaamaa adaalatako adesaanusaara aja kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi kendriya kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya sundhaaraa pathaaeko byurole janaaeko chha

sunawala nagarapaalikaa bhatauli basne debendra khadkaako taharaamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa raamagraama nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya asoka kumaara raaya sahita janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita aitabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko haae
chirpata prahaarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa ambara bahaadurako seti anchala aspataala dhanagadhimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

nija raamabahaadurale aphnai bubaalaai chirpata prahaara gardaa ghaaite bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaali ra prahari chauki getaabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho
kaathamaadaum surkheta syaanajaa morana baaraa ra sunasarikaa wibhinna sthaanabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

syaanajaa waalina nagarapaalikaa bhakundesthita syaanjaa bhirakota nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bhima bahaadura sena sahita janaalaai awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara graama sahita aitabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya waalinabaata khatieko praharile butawalabaata pokharaatarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya keraabaaribaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

baaraa jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita bhaarata ghara bhaekaa warsiya salamagira dewaanalaai awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji sahita somabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jitapurabaata khatieko praharile pathalaiyaabaata jitapuratarpha jaandai gareko ga pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa chaalaka dewaanalaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
prahari chauki amaduwaa ra sasastra prahari balako sumyukta tolile jaancha garne kramamaa unalaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
praharile kaathamaadaumbaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile siraahaabaata banduka sahita sanibaara raati ekajanaalaai pakraaugareko chha
kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaa parachilawaa basne warsiya manisa mandala ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya mohammada jaakira mumsurilaai thaana banduka sahita praharile pakraau gareko haae

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa biara kyu nambarako motarasaaikala ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mirchaiyaabaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa manisa ra mohammadalaai ukta motarasaaikala ra banduka sahita pakraau gareko ho
naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa saanobharyaanabaata praharilaai nagada saya rupaiyaan dii arthika pralobhanamaa paarna khojne janaalaai sanibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

yasaigari kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita ranaodipa pulabaata praharilaai nagada saya rupaiyaan dii arthika pralonabhamaa paarna khojne siraahaa aurahi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya asisa ananda kumaara yaadawalaai aitabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

makawaanapura phaaparabaari ghara bhai lalitapurako imaadolamaa deraa gari basne taaraa bhanine sunitaa laamaako hatyaakaa aropi kaabhreko rosi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai lalitapura basneraajesa laamaalaai siaibile warsapachhipakraau gareko haae
kapilawastuko maayaadewi gaapaa chaakarachaudaasthita piparaabaata chaakarachaudaa tarpha audai gareko lu ka numko pisa globala inlisa bordinakobasako tulabaksabaata pokaa khairo hiroina bhetieko ho
praharile udayapurabaata mosta waanteda suchimaa rahekaa eka yuwakalaaisukrabaara bihaana pakraau gareko chha

udayapurako triyugaa nagarapaalikaa damautikaa warsiya mohanabahaadura budhaathokilaai mumsira gate bancharo prahaara gari hatyaa garera pharaara rahekaa saaehi thaanukaa warsiya homabahaadura kaarkilaaipraharile laalapattaabaata pakraau gareko ho

bhaaratabaata bhansaara chhali chori paithaari gari awaimdha rupamaa nepaala bhitryaaie wataa bhaaratiya nambara pletakaa gaadiharu baraamada gariraajaswa anusandhaana ksetriya ikaai kaaryaalaya kohalapura baankemaa pathaaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

praharile yupi edi nambarako kariba laakha mulya baraabarako skaarapiyo yupi ena nambarako laakha mulya baraabarako kaara echaara bibi nambarako laakha mulya baraabarako kaara yupi ephajeda nambarako laakhako kaara yupi ii nambarako laakha mulya baraabarako kaara ra yupi dablu nambarako laakha mulya baraabarako kaara raajaswa kaaryaalaya kohalapura pathaaeko ho

gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaako tolile pakraau garekaa kariba laakha rupaiyaan mulya baraabarakaa wataa gaadi baanke pathaaekaaejillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaakaa prahari upariksaka raajesanaatha baastolaale bataae

jillaakaae sitagumgaa saatamaaraa basne saasu warsiya indraa kumaalalaai unakaae aphnaijwaain daana jillaakaae raapti gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya wasanta kumaalale ghaantimaa dorile kasera hatyaa gareko praharile janaaeko chha

maaitimaa raheki srimatilaai lina asaara gate sasuraali aekaa araaepita wasantale somabaara raati saasusangai basera raksipiekaae ra tyasai kramamaajhagadaa hundaa ghaantimaa dorile kasera hatyaa garepachhi bhaansaakothaamaa baareko baansako chirapatamaa saasulaai jhundaaeko swikaara gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya arghaakhaanchile janaaeko chha
jabarajasti karanai muddaakaa eka janaa pharaara pratiwaadilaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

jabarajasti karanai muddaamaa warsa mahinaa kaida sajaaya paaekaa hetaumdaa upamahaanagapaalikaa kaa warsiya punyaprasaada chaulaagaaimlaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale paancha warsapachhi pakraau gareko ho

kaida sajaaya sunaaepachhi pharaara rahekaa chaulaagaaimlaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurabaata prahari niriksaka pawanakumaara jhaako netaritwamaa khatieko tolile mangalabaara hetaumdaa baata niyantranamaa lieko ho

unalaai budhabaara jillaa adaalata makawaanapuramaa pesa gari kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya bhimaphedi makawaanapuramaa pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale aja janaaeko chha
laaguausadha braauna sugarasahita praharile bihibaara nepaalaganjako jamunaahaa bhansaaramaa chekajaancha gardaa tinajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

laaguausadha niyantrana byuro saakhaa kaaryaalaya nepaalaganja ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jamunaako sumyukta tolile surkhetakaa warsiya amarita wika ra warsiya chandrabahaadura wikakaa saathai sunasarikaa warsiya dipendra thaakuralaai pakraau gareko ho
makawaanapura praharile hetaundaabaata laaguausadhasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa baaraa jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa raamanagara basne warsiya tikaaraama saarki ra sohi thaaunkaa warsiya taaraabahaadura bhujela rahekaa chhan

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayako tolile hetaundaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa raatomaatemaa pathalaiyaabaata hetaundaatarpha aundai gareko naapa numko motarasaaikalamaa chekajaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara bhujelale pachhaadi bhirne jholaamaa lukaaichhipaai lyaaundai gareko laaguausadha waanareksa eka saya ema elako botala phelaa parepachhi nijaharulaai pakraau gareko haae
pakraau parekaa uniharumaathi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale janaaeko chha
parsaa praharile kilo gaanjaasahita chaarajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa bagahibaata sarlaahi laalabandi kaa ramesa laamichhaane terwaasugauli kaa prema daasa raajesa khawaasa ra dammaramanai ghimirelaai pakraau gareko haae

pakraau parneharumaa pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa kaantipura choka basne warsiya ramesa nepaali pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa mahendrapula basne bhojapura bhojapura nagarapaalikaa baimkarodakaa warsiya sumjaya sarmaa pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa parithwichoka basne sarlaahi iswarapura nagarapaalikaa tinaghariyaakaa warsiya chita ranjana kumaara saaha ra gorakhaa gandaki gaaunpaalikaa ghyaalachoka basne warsiyaa anu pariyaara rahekaa chhan

ghatanaamaa sumlagna haala naama thara nakhulekaa bhaarata watana bhaekaa janaako khoji garnuko saathai yasa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskile janaaeko chha

praharile pokharaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaaskikota bhai pokharaa basne warsakaa saagara raanaabhaatako saathabaata herdaa kalama jasto dekhine gana ra tyasamaa laagne saata raaunda goli baraamada gareko ho
kaaski praharile laagu ausadhawiruddha abhiyaana chalaairaheko chha tyahi kramamaapraharileraanaabhaatakoderaamaa chhaapaa maardaa pena ganasangai laaguausadhasameta baraamada garekaae haae

karisnanagara nagarapaalikaa basapaarkasthita baanagumgaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bisaala nepaalilaai awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara saya miligraama sahita mumgalabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya karisnanagarabaata khatieko praharile bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai gareko nepaalilaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

purwi chitawanako ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa sthita kaparakhori maadhyamika widyaalayamai jaandapaartigarirahekaae awasthaamaa sohi widyaalayakaa pradhaanaadhyaapakasahita paancha janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya ratnanagara taandile widyaalayako nayaan bandai gareko bhawana bhitrai jaandapaati garirahekaae awasthaamaawidyaalayakaa pradhaanaadhyaapaka wisnau kattela sahapradhaanaadhyaapaka karisnawilaasa dhumgaanaa lekhaapaala baalakarisna paudela widyaalaya bhawana nirmaana samitikaa sumyojaka balaraama bagaale ra kaaryaalaya sahayogi gopaala rimaalalaaipakraau gareko haae

praharikaa anusaara asaara masaantako sabai harahisaaba phachhryautapachhi uniharu jaandapaarti gardai ramaailo garekaa hun saanjhako samayamaa hohallaa garepachhi sthaaniyale praharilaai khabara garekaa thie
pakraau parekaa uniharulaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya ratnanagaramaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairahekaae praharile janaaekaae chha
praharile wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa hulaasametala chokabaata thulo parinaamako laaguausadhasahita sasastra praharikaa sahaayaka hawaldaaralaai pakraau garekaae chha

bhaaratako jogawanibaata laaguausadha liera aundai gardaa sunasari dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya purnabahaadura thaapaamagaralaai mumgalabaara laaguausadha niyantrana wyuro wiraatanagarako tolile pakraau garekaae haae
uni sasastrako sunasariko amaduwaasthita biopi postamaa kaaryarata chhan
pakraau parekaa thaapaa magaralaai awasyaka anusandhaanakaa laagi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya raanimaa raakhieko praharile janaaekaae chha

jillaakaaedhulikhela nagarapaalikaa dewitaara basne barsiya suntali taamaanaleraati baje gharaayasi wiwaadakaa kramamaa lachhaarapachhaara paardai simentako bhittaamaa taauko thokkaaera warsiyaa saasu maailimaayaa taamaanako hatyaa gareko praharile janaaekaae chha

kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa mukunda rijaalako pharji hastaaksara gareko abhiyogamaa aja praharile eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parnemaa baalaajusthita atopaartsakaa karmachaari rawina khatri rahekaa chhan

kataari nagarapaalikaa deraa gari basne mahilaalaai jabarajasti karanai gareko abhiyogamaa kataari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya indra bahaadura taamaanalaai somabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne khawara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kataaribaata khatieko praharile indra bahaaduralaai pakraau gareko ho

ilaama nagarapaalikaa baata sandakapura gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya raama kumaara raai ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya kumaara phaago limbulaai naala bharuwaa banduka sahita somabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

ilaama nagarapaalikaa sthita makaibaari basne sonama phaago ra khadga raaiko gothamaa somabaara raati ukta hatiyaara lukaai gothamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa raama kumaara ra kumaara phaagolaai phelaa paari jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile pakraau gareko ho

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa maitidewi seto pulabaata ghattekulotarpha aundai gareko baa ja nambarako tyaaksilaai jaancha garne kramamaa jholaamaa lukaai raakheko awasthaamaa ukta wastu phelaa parepachhi tyaaksimaa sawaara nimaa golu nimaa daawaa ra tyaaksi chaalaka anupalaai mahaanagariya prahari baritta simhadarabaarabaata khatieko praharile tyaaksi sahita pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parnemaa sarlaahiko saawikako nokailabaa gaawisa kaa warsiya ganeru maajhi chhan unalaai dhanusaa praharile dhalkebarabaata pakraau gareko ho maajhimaathi ahile ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhalkebarabaata anusandhaana bhairaheko chha

maajhisahitako janaako saala saauna gate mithilaa nagarapaalikaa kaa puspalaala srestha karisna srestha nawaraaja srestha ra chandrabahaadura sresthako gharamaa laakhaum dhanamaala dakaiti garekaa thie uniharule nagada laakha hajaara saadhe tolaa sunakaa gahanaa tolaa chaandikaa gahanaa thaana mobaaila jaggaa jaminako laalapurjaa naagarikataa sawaari saadhanako blu bukasahitakaa kaagajaata sameta lutekaa thie
sohi ghatanaamaa sumlagna bhaeko aropamaa praharile yasaaghi nai sarlaahiko chandranagara gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya dewalaala kaapada ra manoja kumaara kusawaahaalaai pakraau garisakekaae chha

kaapada daankaa tathaa haatahatiyaara kharakhajanaa muddaamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiwaasa mahottariko hiraasatamaa chhan arkaa pratiwaadi kusawaahaa gata jetha gate dhanusaako bateswara gaaunpaalikaa chitrapura kholaabaata awaidha dhungaa gitti baaluwaa utkhanan garna aekaa belaa pakraau parekaa thie tyasabelaa unako saathabaata swachaalita pestola baraamada bhaeko thiyo haatahatiyaara tathaa kharakhajaanaa muddaamaa unalaai purpaksakaa laagi uni dhanusaa kaaraagaaramaa chhan
ukta dakaitimaa sumlagna bhaekaa anyaharuko pahichaana bhaisakeko ra khojatalaasa bhairaheko dhanusaa praharile janaaeko chha
chitawanabaata praharile gae raati keji laaguausadha charesasahita warsiyaa wariddhaalaaipakraau garekaae chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya taandibaata prahari naayaba upariksaka santosa achaaryako kamaandamaa khatieko prahari tolile bhaarata motihaari ghara bhai chitawanako ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa sthita chhoriko gharamaa basdai aeki andaaji warsiyaa nurjaahaa khaatunalaai pratibandhita laaguausadha keji charesasahita pakraau garekaae haae
baraamada charesasahita khaatunalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya taandi chitawanamaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana kaarya bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha

praharile parsaawardiyaa ra jhaapaakaae chhuttaachhuttai thaanubaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita tinajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha
