prahari chauki basapaarkabaata khatieko praharile unalaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya motipurabaata khatieko praharile unalaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
praharile chandraagiri nagarapaalikaakaa wadaa num haaibhijanasthita sadaka khandabaata saaehinagarapaalikaakaa kaa warsiya wiweka rijaalalaai laaguausadha naaitraabheta sahita pakraau garekaae chha
tyastaipraharile chandraagiri nagarapaalikaakaa wadaa num dhumgeaddaasthita sadaka khandabaata kailaalikaa warsiya wijaya bhattaraailaai laagu ausadha naaitraabhetasahita pakraau garekaae chha

aitabaara belukaa wiswakapa kriketamaa sattaa baaji khelaairahekaae bhanne gaaepya suchanaakaae adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryalaya parsaabaata khatiekaae prahari taaelile wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa basne barsiya asisa kumaara barnawaala ra saaehi mahaanagarapaalikaa basne barsiya niraja tiwaarilaai pakraau garekaae haae
jillaakaae gajuri gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara dudethaati malekhubaata kilo gaanjaasahita benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya dilabahaadura taamaanalaai praharile pakraau gareko haae
laaguausadha kaarobaara bhairaheko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajuribaata khatieko tolile unalaai bihibaara bihaana raati saadhe baje boraa gaanjaasahita pakraau gareko haae
pakraau parekaa taamaanamaathi awasyaka anusandhaana tathaa kaarabaahi thaalieko gajuri praharile janaaeko chha

srimaan siwakumaara lodhale dramamaa lukaaera raakhieko awasthaamaa budhabaara saanjha lalitaako sawa phelaapareko baankekaa prahari upariksaka wirabahaadura walile jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaankaa anusaara widyaalaya gaekaa chhoraale gharamaa aundaa amaalaai nadekhepachhi sodhikhoji gari hohallaa gardaa maritakako sawa dramamaa raakhieko awasthaamaa bhetieko thiyo

jiwita raheko anumaanamaa lalitaalaai siksana aspataala nepaalaganja puyaaie pani chikitsakale kehi ghantaaaghi nai marityu bhaeko bataaekaa thie sadhainjaso jhagadaa gardai kutapita garne siwakumaarale chhoraa amana widyaalaya gaeko belaamaa lalitaalaai kutera hatyaa gareko hunasakne prahariko anumaana chha

saamaanya bibaadako kramamaa magarale laurole taaukomaa prahaara gardaa gurunako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha prahari chauki ghaandrukabaata khatieko prahari tolile magaralaai pakraau gareko ho

hariwana nagarapaalikaa sthita ganaesa chokabaata rautahata chandrapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya udaya sahani ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya raama ekawaala daasalaai awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba kilo sahita budhabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko haae

chure gaaunpaalikaa madamaajyaalaa majaduri gardai airahekaa gulmikaa kamala kunwarako hatyaa gareko aropamaa praharile saaehi thaanukaa laalabahaadura laamaa ra unaki srimati kalpanaa laamaalaai pakraau garekaae haae maritaka kunwara kalpanaakaa purwapremi bhaeko khuleko praharile janaaekaae chha

sthaaniyabaasiko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya phaltude ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalibaata gaeko tolile mumgalabaara awera simaselaa kholaa kinaaramaa jaminamuni gaadeko awasthaamaa kunwarako sawa bhettaaeko thiyo kunwara asaara dekhi samparkamaa thienan

mumgalabaara diunso bajeko samayamaa parsaako wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa raamagadhawaa basne bhulana yaadawakaa chhoraa warsiya guddu yaadawale gharagotha najikai raheki aphni sauteni amaa warsiya sobhaa dewimaathi dhaarilo hatiyaara daau prahaara gardaa unako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale janaaeko chha

ghatanaabaare jaanakaari paaunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya haraichaabaata khatieko prahariko tolile khukuri prahaara garne nira bahaaduralaai tatkaala pakraau garnukaasaathai gambhira ghaaite bhaeki salinaa laai uddhaara gari upachaarako laagi bi pi koiraalaa swaasthya bijnaana pratisthaana ghopaa dharaana pathaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaeko chha

golabajaara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya baliraama mahatolaai awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara graama saya miligraama ra nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan sahita somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko haae

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya siraahaa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya golabajaarabaata khatieko praharile unako ghara khaanatalaasi gardaa bikri witaranako laagi lukaaichhipaai raakhieko ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paareko ho

dhaarilo hatiyaara khukuri prahaara gareko abhiyogamaa kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa nyuplaajaa basne dolakhaa khasku nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya prakaasa khadkaalaai somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko haae

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa nyuplaajaa basne arghaakhaanchi kaarenai gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya tukaraaja paudelalaai lenadenako wisayamaa khadkaale khukuri prahaara gardaa ghaaite bhaeko bhanne khabara praapra hunaasaatha mahaanagariya prahari waritta simhadarabaata khatieko praharile khadkaalaai khukuri sahita pakraau gareko ho
kodaalo prahaara gari aphnai amaa ra hajuraamaako hatyaa garne eka yuwakalaai dailekha jillaa adaalatale janmakaidako phaisalaa sunaaeko chha

dailekha jillaa adaalatakaa jillaa nyaayaadhisa sanatachandra lawatako ijalaasale naaraayana nagarapaalikaa bhurtikaa warsiya baalaaraama saarkilaai somabaara janmakaidako phaisalaa sunaaeko ho saarkile wisum pusa gate amaa warsiyaa paarwati saarki ra hajuraamaa warsiyaa juwaaraa saarkilaai kodaalole hirkaaera hatyaa garekaa thie

amaako jyaana gaisakepachhi aphno gharamaa maathillo talaamaa kaama gardai gareki hajuraamaa juwaaraalaai pani kodaalole hirkaaera ghaaite banaaekaa thie juwaaraako upachaarako kramamaa dailekha jillaa aspataalamaamarityu bhaeko thiyo
iswarapura nagarapaalikaa kaalinjoramaa warsiya ambarabahaadura pariyaaralaai unaki srimati sonaamaayaa nepaaliletaauko ra dhaadamaa bancharole haanera hatyaa garekipraharile janaaekaae chha

budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kapana siwapuri chokasthita hotala sumchaalana gari basne paanchathara ilihaana ghara bhaekaa warsiya raajabhakta yohanako kothaamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa raajabhakta yohana sameta janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita praharile pakraau gareko haae
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapuraleawaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita ekajanaalaai pakraaugareko chha

hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa thaanaabharyaanabaata chitawana ichchhaakaamanaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya ganaesa thaapaalaai awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji saya graama sahita somabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko haae
praharile baa cha nambarako kaara jaancha garne kramamaa kaarako dikkimaa lukaai chhipaai raakheko ukta parimaanako laaguausadha gaanjaa phelaa paari chaalaka thaapaalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile sirahaako chhuttaachhutai sthaanabaata pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita tina yuwakalaai pakraau gareko chha

prahari chauki jhaajhapattibaata khatieko prahari tolile sirahaako nawaraajapura gaaunpaalikaa baata laaguausadhasahita lahaana nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya mohamda chhatu miyaan ra warsiya mohamda amira miyaanlaai pakraau gareko ho
yastai praharile sirahaako bariyaarapatti gaaunpaalikaa sthita hawaldaarachokabaata laaguausadhasahita udayapurako triyugaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya khemaraaja wikalaai pakraau gareko chha
tyastai praharile sirahaa nagarapaalikaa baata bhansaara chhalera lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa hajaara rupaiyaan bhandaa badhi mulya baraabarako awaidha saamaana baraamada gareko chha

awaidha baataae bhaera nepaala prawesa gari pachhillaae kehi samayadekhi paryatakiya ksetramaa paaekharaamaa laaguausadha prayoga gari hohallaa gardai aekaa polyaandakaa naagarikalaaiparyataka praharile paaekharaabaata pakraau garekaae chha
praharile polyaandakaa naagarika raakola maarkinalaai kaaskiko pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa lekasaaidabaata aitabaara pakraau gareko ho

praharikaa anusaara unale lekasaaida khahare parithwichokasahitakaa ksetramaa laaguausadha sewana gari uchhrinakhala gatiwidhi garne garekaa chhan unalaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi adhyayaaganama kaaryaaalaya pokharaamaa bujhaaieko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrele sirinja akramanamaa sumlagna raheko asumkaamaa ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile banepaasthita chaara dobaato bhanne sthaanabaata somabaara diunso syaanjaakaa khagendra prasaada paathakalaaipakraau garekaae haae uni lokasewaa ayogako pariksaa tayaarikaa kramamaa kaabhremaa basdai aekaa thie
kaabhremaa dui saataaaghi eka yuwatile aphumaathi sirinja akramana bhaeko bhandai praharile ujuri dieki thiin
sirinja akramana garaauna khojnelaai kaarabaahi maaga gardai sthaaniyale ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaamaa gheraau garekaa chhan
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale sirinja akramana garaauna khojne ti wyaktilaai pakraau gari anusandhaana thaalieko bataaeko chha
nepaala prahariko laaguausadha niyantrana byurole lalitapuramaatelarina pasala thaapdai laaguausadhako kaarobaara garne dampatilaai pakraau gari aitabaara saarwajanika gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa raamechhaapa dorambaa gaanupaalikaa kaa warsiya surena nagarakoti ra unaki srimati warsiya ajitaa guruna rahekaa chhan

pakraau parneharumaa lahaana nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya mochhatu miyaa ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya moamira miyaa rahekaa chhan simaa prahari chauki jhaajhapattibaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

nawalaparaasi purwa kaawaasoti nagarapaalikaa chaalisakilo jumgalasthita purwapaschima raajamaargabaata janaalaai niyantrita laaguausadha nuphina pampula ra daaijopaama empula sahita sanibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa chitawana bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa basne sunila ksetri ra sohi mahaanagarapaalikaa basne kamala sretha rahekaa chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile lu kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
ukta thaaunmaa juwaataasa kheliraheko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
aitabaara praharile tribhuwana antaarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata daaiparamaa lukaaera lyaaieko saya graama sunasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

wisesa suraakikaa adhaaramaa kaathamaadaum prahari parisara teku ra wimaanasthala suraksaa prahari kaaryaalayako sumyukta taaelile moranakaa lilaabahaadura basnetalaai ukta sunasahita pakraau garekaae haae

waidesika rojagaarikaa kramamaatina warsa kataara basera pharkine kramamaa eka janaale daaipara lagidinu bhanera nischita rakama dine sartamaa pathaaeko basnetaleprahari samaksa bayaana diekaa kaathamaadaum praharikaa diesapi howindra bogatile jaanakaari die

rautahatako maulaapura nagarapaalikaa patharaabudharaamakaa warsiya raamakisora yaadawale gata gate warsiyaa chhori laksmi raaya yaadawako ghaanti thichera hatyaa gari pokharimaa phaaleko awasthaamaa gate bihaana sawa phelaa parekothiyo

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatamaa sukrabaara ayojita patrakaara sammelanalaai sambodhana gardai rautahata praharikaa diesapi tathaa prawaktaa nawina kaarkile bimaako rakama haatapaarnakaalaagi nabaalikaa chhoriko nirmamataapurwaka hatyaa gareko bataae

yaadawalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatabaata muluki aparaadhasumhitaa ko jyaanasambandhi kasuraantargata muddaa dartaa garera jillaa adaalata rautahatabaata dinako myaada thapa garera anusandhaana kaaryaagaadi badhaaieko prawaktaa kaarkile jaanakaari die
boksiko aropa lagaaune dui mahilaalaai praharile budhabaara pakraau gareko chha

eka mahilaalaai boksiko aropa lagaai gaaligalauja gari pidaa dieko jaaheri budhabaara wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya waalinamaa parepachhi pratiwaadiharu duwailaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya syaanjaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka nawinakarisna bhandaarile jaanakaari die
praharile tanahun bandipura nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai pokharaa basne warsiyaa somamaayaa guruna ra chaapaakota nagarapaalikaa basne warsa warsiyaa chandrakalaa thaapaalaai pakraau garekaae haae

pakraau parekaa duwailaai syaanjaa jillaa adaalatamaa bhedabhaawa tathaa anya apamaanajanya wyawahaarasambandhi kasura apamaanajanaka waa amaanawiya wyawahaara muddaamaa myaada thapa gari anusandhaana suru bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

pakraau parneharumaa kaathamaadaum tilagumgaa basne warsiya raadhesyaama nagarakoti kaathamaadaum chaawahila basne sindhupaalchoka saano siruwaari ghara bhaekaa warsiya raajesa kumaara srestha ra kaathamaadaum kalumki basne raamechhaapa raamechhaapa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya munaala kumaara moktaana rahekaa chhan

dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa tinakunebaata udayapura triyugaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya pukaara paudela ra warsiya subhaasa bikalaai awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara kariba graama sahita budhabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

asthaayi prahari posta tinakunebaata khatieko praharile itaharibaata dharaanatarpha aundai gareko baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
praharile kaathamaadaumko baaneswarabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha

wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahari waritta baaneswarabaata khatieko tolile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita jayaraama thakuriko gharabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa nagada laakha hajaara saya sahita janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko ho
jillaa praharikaaryaalayamoranalewiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita panchamukhi chokabaata mumgalabaara raati niyantrita laagu ausadha sahita eka janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaabaata saadaa posaakamaa khatieko prahari tolile mumgalawaara saanjha mechinagara nagarapaalikaa baata andaaji laakha mulya baraabarako oriyansa kampaniko naama lekhiekaa ausadhi waraamada gareko ho

tolile wibhinna kisimakaa kaartuna ausadhi waraamada gareko ho waraamada bhaeko ausadhiawasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi mumgalabaara ausadhi wyawasthaa wibhaaga buujhaaine ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaakabhittaale janaaeko chha
morana praharile nepaalabaata bhaarata laijaandai garieko kilo chaandisahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya motanabaata khatieko praharile biara eke nambarako kaara jaancha garne kramamaa kaarako sitamuni plaastika tathaa kaartuna tepale berieko awasthaamaa lukaai chhipaai raakheko ukta parimaanako chaandi jasto dekhine seto dhaatuko tukraaharu phelaa paari chaalaka saahalaai pakraau gareko ho
pakraau saahalaai awasyaka anusandhaana tathaa kaarawaahiko laagi mumgalabaara raajaswa anusandhaana kaaryaalaya itahari pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaeko chha
bardiyaa jillaa adaalatakaa mukhya nyaayaadhisa kiranakumaara pokharelako ijalaasale baagha maareko aropamaa pakraau parekaa chaudharilaai ru paancha laakha jariwaanaa tiraaeko ho
praharile syaanjaakaa wibhinna bhegabaata eka hajaara litara awaidha gharelu madiraa nasta gareko chha

praharile samudaayaprahari saajhedaari abhiyaanaantargata mangalabaara galyaana nagarapaalikaa putalibajaara nagarapaalikaa ra phedikholaa gaaunpaalikaakaa wibhinna bhegabaata thulo parimaanamaa awaidha gharelu madiraa niyantranamaa lii nasta gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya syaanjaale janaaekaae chha

galyaana prahari chaukibaata khatieko prahari tolile galyaana raamdibaata litara setidobhaana prahari chaukibaata khatieko prahari tolile putalibajaara nagarapaalikaa naudaandaabaata litara ra phedikholaa prahari chaukibaata khatieko tolile phedikholaabaata litara gari kula eka hajaara litara awaidha gharelu madiraa nasta gareko ho

sunasari duhabi nagarapaalikaa uttaratola basne gumgaa chaudhariko gharamaa kaudaa kheliraheko awasthaamaa itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya srawana kumaara chaudhari lagaayata janaalaai laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra kaudaa wataa sahita mumgalabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

praharile raajawiraajabaata kaathamaadaun aundai gareko naakha numko yaatruwaahaka basa jaanchakaa kramamaa sirahaakaa warsiya wiweka chaudhari ra nepaalaganjabaata kaathamaadaun aundai gareko naakha numko basa jaanchakaa kramamaa baankekaa warsiya wiplawa saahilaai mangalabaara saanjha pakraau gareko ho
praharile chaudhariko saathabaata empula daaijelyaawa empula phenaargana empula nurphina ra saahibaata tyaableta naaitraabheta baraamada gareko chha
awaidharupamaa pokharaamaa basdai aekaa eka rusi naagarikalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha
paryatana prahari kaaryaalayako tolile naagarikataa raahadaanilagaayata kaagajaata binaa basdai aekaarusi naagarika nikolaaya olegabicha bhornobhalaai pokharaa khaharebaata pakraau gareko ho

paryatakiyasthala lekasaaidamaa maalaa kyuriyolagaayata saamagri bechabikhana tathaa anya gatiwidhimaa sumlagna rahekaa unalaai praharile awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi adhyaagamana kaaryaalaya pokharaalaai bujhaai ajai adhyaagamana wibhaaga kaathamaadaaaim pathaaieko chha
no paarakina jona maaraheko sabaarimaa traaphika praharile lagaaeko hwila laka bigaarne duijanaalaai itaharibaata praharile pakraau garekaae chha

itahari paschima laainamaa raheko ebharesta baikamaa no paarakina jona maa paarakina garieko baa cha nambarako kaaramaa pradesa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya itaharile lagaaeko hwila lakamaa supara glu lagaai bigaarne itahari basne ganaesa dhumgaanaa ra itahari basne raaju thaapaalaaipraharile pakraau garekaae haae

pakraau parekaa duwai janaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itaharimaa raakhieko chha uniharule traaphika prahariko kaamamaa abarodha puraaunuko saathai saarwajanika sarakaari sampatiko haani noksaani gareko abhiyogamaa muddhaa daayara gariekopraharile janaaekaae chha

mahaanagariya prahari waritta simhadarabaarabaata khatieko praharile kaabhre dhulikhela basne baaraa nijagadha ghara bhaeki warsiyaa laksmi adhikaari ra unakaa srimaana warsiya raajana kumaara thaapaalaai somabaara diunso pakraau gareko haae

mechinagara nagarapaalikaa sthita diutimaa khatieko praharilaai nagada saya rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojne makawaanapura manahari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya indra taamaanalaai somabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

ukta sthaanamaa prahari chauki chaaraalibaata khatieko traaphika prahari sahitako tolile naa kha nambarako trakako kaagaja patra jaancha garne kramamaa trakako kaagajapatra nabhaeko bhani chaalaka taamaanale praharilaai ukta nagada dina khojekaa thie
praharile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa asana basne warsiya oma prakaasa chauraasiyaalaai somabaara saanjha pakraau gareko haae

mahaanagariya prahari waritta swayambhubaata khatieko praharile kaathamaadaumbaata bhaarata kalakattaa chalne dablubi i nambarako yaatrubaahaka basa jaancha garne kramamaa basako hutamaa tulasi lekhieko surti saya pyaaketa baabaa lekhieko surti hajaara saya pyaaketa phalaamako jasto dekhine daadu thaana phalaamako punyu thaana jhaanjhara saya thaana astagandha kumakuma saya pisa grina signala tobyaago battaa lagaayata gari ukta rakama baraabarako wibhinna saamaanaharu phelaa chauraasiyaalaai pakraau gareko ho
chitawana praharile keji gaanjaa baraamada gareko chha

wisesa suraakikaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhandaaraabaata khatieko prahari tolile gae raati baje purwi chitawanako raapti nagarapalikaa sthita bhawaanipuramaa naakha numko tiparamaa loda bhaeko awasthaamaa chaalakasahita keji gaanjaa baraamada gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhandaaraakaa pramukha prahari niriksaka wasanta achaaryale jaanakaari die

baraamada gaanjaa tipara ra chaalakalaai ahile jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawana pathaaieko achaaryale bataae ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhandaaraale gaanjaa taskarawiruddhako abhiyaanalaai jaari raakheko chha waiaisaakhadekhi ahilesamma wibhinna samayamaa keji gaanjaa baraamada gari nasta garieko prahari niriksaka achaaryale jaanakaari die

wikata bastikaa kaarana prahariko pahuncha kama hune yasa thaaunmaa taskarale gaanjaakheti garna lagaaune gareko niriksaka achaaryako bhanaai chha praharile gaanjaa phadaani garne ra lukaaichhipaai raakhekolaai khoji gari nasta garne abhiyaanalaai tiwrataa dieko chha
prahariledhanusaabaata awaidha rupamaa bhansaara chhali lyaaeko khainiko dhulo ra kapadaa baraamada gareko chha

praharile dhanusaadhaama nagarapaalikaa haripura basne lalana raaya ra raamaratana mahatoko gharabaata awaidha rupamaa bhansaara chhalera lyaai bhandaarana gari raakheko kariba laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan mulya baraabarako khainiko dhulo ra kapadaa aitabaara belukaa praharile baraamada gareko chha

haala naama thara watana nakhulekaa wyaktile uniharuko gharamaa kothaa lii lukaaichhipaai raakheko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhalkebarabaata khatieko praharile ukta khainiko dhulo ra kapadaa baraamada gareko ho
baraamada garieko ukta saamaana awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi bhansaara kaaryaalaya janakapura pathaaieko chha

hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa padamapokhari basne warsiya surena waaibaale aphnai warsiyaa srimati sitaa kumaari moktaanalaai chulesile prahaara gari gambhira ghaaite banaaeko abhiyogamaa aitabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko haae ghaaite sitaako churehila aspataala hetaumdaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa soltimodamaa diutimaa khatiekaa prahari taaelilaai nagada saya rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojne dhaadina dhuniwesi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya subhaasa sresthalaai aitabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya prahari waritta kaalimaatibaata khatieko prahari tolile baa kha nambarako traka jaancha garne kramamaa dhaalaa kholi saamaana bokeko kaaranale kaarabaahi garna khojdaa kaarabaahibaata bachna sresthale ukta nagada dina khojekaa thie

praharile hatyaamaa sumlagna bhaeko aropamaa sirahaa wisnaupura ghara bhai haala bhaktapura puraano thimi basdai aekaa warsiya mohammada naisaada bhaarata janaka bhagata idikaa warsiya arjuna kumaara bhanine bholaa kumaara bhaarata madhumani rajauri thaanaakaa warsiya mohammada rahisa ra maritakaki kaanchhi chhori warsiya iswari bhattaraailaai saarwajanika gareko ho
marityu hunemaa sarlaahi iswarapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya kewala mahato chhan

sarlaahi ra mahottariko simaanaa baankemaa bhaeko lagaataarako dohoro jhadapakaa kramamaa goli laagera mahatoko marityu bhaeko nambara pradesa prahari pramukha prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka pradyumna kaarkile bataae

unakaa anusaara baalaka marityu prakaranalaai liera akrosita sthaaniyako bhida niyantranakaa kramamaa akramana bhaepachhi praharile goli chalaaeko thiyo yasakramamaa dedha darjana prahari ghaaite bhaeko kaarkile bataae
praharile bhida niyantranakaa kramamaa darjanaum raaunda asrugyaasa rabara goli tathaa hawaai phaayara gareko thiyo
sthiti niyantranamaa naaepachhi jillaa suraksaa samitiko nirdesanamaa phaayara gareko ra tyasakramamaa ekako marityu bhaeko diaiji kaarkile bataae
kartawya jyaana muddaamaa warsa sajaaya tokiekaa abhiyuktalamajuna dudhapokhari gaaunpaalikaa basne bhyaante kaamilaai praharile warsapachhi pakraau gareko haae

kaami sametakaa janaale bhadau gate saanjha lamajuna dudhapokhari gaaunpaalikaa sthita kodo baarimaa tanahun bhaanu turature basne gorakhaakaa warsiya beda prasaada pokharelalaai lutapaata garne yojanaa sahita dhungaa prahaara gari maarera unako saathamaa raheko hajaara rupaiyaan lii sawa sthaaniya chepe kholaamaa phaali diekopraharile janaaeko chha

warsasamma prahariko akhaa chhalera basekaa kaamilaai pakraau gari kaida bhuktaanakaa laagiadaalatamaa upasthita garaaera jillaa kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya lamajuna pathaaiekopraharile jaanakaari diekaae chha
praharile kaathamaadaumbaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraaupakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhaktapurakaa diesapi rewatiramana pokharelakaa anusaara gharamaa kohi nabhaeko belaa unako hatyaa garera hatyaaraaharu pharaara bhaekaa chhan

bhairahawaabaata kaathamaadaunkaa laagi chhuteko lu kha numko basamaa sawaara kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sandipa rajakalaai pakraau garieko ho unako saathabaata nurphina thaana daaijaapaama thaana ra phenaraagana thaana gari jammaa thaana laaguausadha saathai prayoga bhaisakeko sirinja tina thaanasameta baraamada garieko chha

yastai sohi sthaanamaa bajhaanabaata kaathamaadaunkaa laagi chhuteko naa kha numko basamaa sawaara lalitapurakaa warsiya wikrama thokara ra lalitapurakai mahaalaksmi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya syaamasundara paudelalaai laaguausadhasahita pakraau gareko chha

uniharuko saathabaata laaguausadha nurphina thaana daaijaapaama thaana ra phenaraagana thaana gari jammaa thaana laaguausadha baraamada gareko ho pakraau parekaamaathi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalaparaasi purwakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka arjuna raanaabhaatale bataaunubhayo raasasa

jillaakaae mumlagahawaamaa raheko ankhaa kendra aspataalakaa pramukha daaktara dipendra kumaara rajakaki warsiyaa srimati supriyaa bhaaratilaai sohi aspataalakaa aptikala helparakaa rupamaa kaaryarata amitakumaara baithaale phalaame hatiyaarale haanera hatyaa gareko praharile janaaeko chha

num pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya tulasipura daanako wisesa wyuro ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile rolpaako maadi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num ghara bhai haala daanako ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num puraano basapaarkamaa basdai aekaa barsiya naresa budhaa ra ghoraahi wadaa num niwaasi barsiya sukalaala wikalaaipakraau gareko haae
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko praharile srota nakhuleko rakama sahita janaa pakraaugareko chha
pakraau duwai janaalaai hundi kaarowaara sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana kaarya bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaumgokarnaeswara nagarapaalikaa naaraayanataarabaata kaathamaadaum balkhu basne baaraa ghara bhaekaa warsiya dinesa chaudhari ra kaathamaadaum gokarna nagarapaalikaa daksinadhokaa basne baaraa ghara bhaekaa warsiya raaju laamaalaai niyantrita laaguausadha naaitrobheta hajaara saya pisa sahita budhabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

asthaayi prahari posta maaisthaanabaata khatieko praharile ja pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

daana ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa puraano basapaarkabaata rolpaa maadhi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya suresa budhaa lagaayata janaalaai awaidha laaguausadha aphima kariba keji sahita bihibaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha
makawaanapura manahari gaaunpaalikaa simapaanibaata kariba keji laaguausadha gaanjaa bihibaara bihaana praharile baraamada gareko chha

ukta sthaanamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya manaharibaata khatieko praharilaai dekhnaasaatha aparichita wyaktile jebraa jholaa chhodi pharaara bhaepaschaata jholaa jaancha gardaa ukta parimaanako laaguausadha gaanjaa phelaa pareko ho pharaara wyaktiko praharile khoji gariraheko chha
gaimdaako khaagasahita praharile kaathamaadaumbaata tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya prahari parisarako tolile gorakhaa chumanubri gaaunpaalikaa kaa laalabahaadura guruna makawaanapura gadhi gaaunpaalikaa kaa astabahaadara thinga ra dhaadina mahaadewawesi thaakre gaaunpaalikaa kaa gowinda moktaanalaai pakraau gareko ho

parisara prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka hobindra bogatikaa anusaara dhalkusthita laalabahaadurako kothaamaa talaasi lindaa khaagasahita uniharulaai pakraau garieko ho laakha rupaiyaanmaa bikri witarana huna laagiraheko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa praharile kothaamaa talaasi lieko thiyo

yasto wyahoraabaata pidita hari bahaadura kaarkile prahari mahaasaakhaamaa jaaheri darakhaasta diekaa thie mahaasaakhaabaata khatieko tolile kalpanaalaai khojatalaasa gardai jaandaa asaara gate kaathamaadaumko tekumaa phelaa paaryo

praharile laakha hajaara ra dui thaana kaudaasahita kaabhre banepaakaa raaja taamaana udayapura gaaighaatakaa wimala kaarki udayapura gaaighaatakaa dipaka raai nuwaakota taarakeswarakaa asoka taamaana ra sumkhuwaasabhaakaa raaju blonalaai pakraau gareko haae

baalikaale abhibhaawakalaai ghatanaa bataaepachhi abhibhaawakale praharilaai khabara garekaa thiekhabara paaelagattai praharile balatkaaramaa sumlagna yuwakalaai salleri bajaara asaapaasabaatai pakraau gareko ho

gorakhaa nagarapaalikaa sthita senta josepha skulamaakaksaa paanchamaa padhne warsiyasriyansa sresthalaai wijnaana wisaya padhaaune siksikaa manisaa magarale somabaara diuso kutera ghaaite banaaeko baalakaki amaa sujanaa sresthale jaanakaari diin

sohi nagarapaalikaa chhepetaara niwaasi ghaaite baalakalaai gorakhaa jillaa aspataalamaa upachaara garieko chha unako dhaada haatamaa jataatatai niladaama chha unale baantaa pani gareko baalakaki amaa sujanaale jaanakaari diin
aphnaa chhoraalaai nirghaata kutne siksikaalaai kaarabaahiko maaga gardai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa jaaheri dieko baalakaki amaa sresthale bataain

pakraau parekaa tinai janaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya saalajhandimaa raakhera thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaabaata khatieko prahari tolile bhansaara chhalera awaidharupamaa lyaaeko saamaana chhutaaidine bhandai rakamako baargenina gariraheko awasthaamaa eka prahari hawaldaarasahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

sirahaako golabajaara nagarapaalikaa niwaasi ranjita saahale jaja numko gaadimaa bhaaratabaata awaidharupamaa lyaaeko saamaana sirahaa nagarapaalikaa sthita traaphikachokasthita chekina pwaaintamaa chhutaaidinchhu bhandai baargenina gariraheko awasthaamaa prahari tolile prahari hawaldaara asokakumaara yaadawasahita gaadi chaalaka siwasankara saaha ra ranjita saahalaai pakraau gareko ho

traaphika chokamaa dyutimaa khatiekaa prahari hawaldaara yaadawale jaancha garne kramamaa bhaaratako jayanagarabaata lukaaichhipaai lyaaieko kariba tina hajaarabhandaa badhi mulya baraabarako saamaana chhutaaidinchhu bhandai so gaadi chaalaka saahasanga nija prahari hawaldaara yaadawale rakamako baargenina gariraheko awasthaamaa tinai janaalaai pakraau gari awasyaka kaanuni kaarawaahi aghi badhaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka apilaraaja boharaale jaanakaari die
kartawya jyaana muddaamaa warsa sajaaya tokiekaa abhiyukta mahaagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa madhuri tola basne birabahaadura chaudharilaai praharile warsapachhi pakraau gareko haae

warsasamma prahariko akhaa chhalera basekaa chaudharilaai pakraau gari kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi adaalatamaa upasthita garaaera biragumja kaaraagaara pathaaiekopraharile jaanakaari diekaae chha sohi muddaamaa janmakaida sunaaiekaa pratiwaadi palata saaha sonaara bhadaum gate pakraau parekaa thie

praharilebudhabaara saanjhanaaraayanagadhabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basamaa jaancha garne kramamaasindhupaalchoka chautaaraa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya widura thaapaalaai niyantrita laaguausadha daaijepaama empula phenaaragana empula nurphina empula ra naaitraabheta saya tyaawletabaraamada gareko chha

praharile budhabaara bihaana dharaanabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basalaai jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaarabhaarata wihaarakaa warsiya mahammada sawiralaai niyantrita laaguausadha daaijelyaaba saya empula phenaaragana saya empula nurphina saya empulabaraamada gareko chha

parsaa parsaagadhi nagarapaalikaa manawaa bajaarabaata sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya raamacharana mahato chaudhari sameta janaalaai niyantrita laaguausadha naaitrobheta pisa sahita budhabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

laaguausadha sewana gari sthaaniyasanga baadawiwaada gariraheko bhanne khabara praapta huna saatha prahari chauki manawaabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa buddhachoka basne sohi mahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiyaa dewi kumaari guptaalaai daaijepaama saya empula phenaraagana saya empula ra nurphina saya empula sahita budhabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

laaguausadha kaarobaara bhairaheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskibaata khatieko praharile pokharaa amarasimha chauramaa unako jholaa jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
yuwakako apaharana gari hatyaa gareko aropamaa sirahaa praharile eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

sirahaako dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya subhaasakumaara yaadawako apaharana gari hatyaa gareko aropamaa praharile sirahaakai aurahi gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya gangaaraama mandala khatbelaai pakraau gareko ho
so ghatanaamaa sumlagna raheko aropamaa khatbelaai sirahaa nagarapaalikaa baata pakraau garieko praharile janaaekaae chha
baimkina kasurakaa pharaara pratiwaadilaaibudhabaara praharile kaathamaadaumkaae baaneswarabaata pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga koteswarabaata khatieko praharile awyabasthita paarkina hataaune kramamaa sa ja nambarako sumo gaadiko kaagajapatra maaga gardaa gaadikaa chaalaka chaudharile praharilaai ukta rakama dina khojekaa thie

praharile aja bihaana naaraayanagadhabaata kaathamaandaum aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basalaai chekajaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara sindhupaalchoka bataase gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya winoda thaapaakaae saathabaatanaaitrobheta tyaableta nuphina phenaraagana ra daaijelyaapa gari jammaa empula laaguausadha baraamada gareko chha
nepaala prahari kendriya anusandhaana byurole waidesika rojagaara thagi muddaamaa pharaara rahekaa pratiwaadilaai pakraau gari jela chalaana gareko chha

byurobaata khatieko tolile waidesika rojagaara nyaayaadhikaranako wisum maagha gateko phaisalaaanusaara pharaara rahekaa kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa sumana deujaalaai mangalabaara raaniwanabaata pakraau gari aja jela chalaana gareko ho
pakraau parekaa deujaalaai kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatako adesaanusaara kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya jagannaatha dewala pathaaieko prawaktaa regmile bataae

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraa ra prahari chauki wadaki phulawariyaa baaraabaata khatieko sumyukta prahari tolile srota nakhuleko kariba laakha rupaiyaan sahita eka bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari prabhaaga darabaaramaargako prahari tolile naa pa nambarako skutara jaancha garne kramamaa bilabuka ra laaisensa nabhaekaale kaarabaahibaata banchnapaudelalepraharilaai ukta rakama dina khojekaa thie
wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa bhaanu chokabaata baaraa kolwi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya anila raamadaama ra warsiya jiwana raamadaamalaai tolaa chaandi sahita praharile pakraau gareko haae

prahari chauki basapaarkabaata khatieko praharile tolile kalaiyaabaata wiragumja basapaarkatarpha jaandai gareko baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikala chaalaka anilako saathabaata ukta chaandi phelaa paari ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara jiwana sametalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile dhaadinabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita janaalaai pakraaugareko chha

laaguausadha lyaaundai gareko bhanne wisesa suchaanaako adhaaramaa prahari chauki galchhibaata khatieko prahari tolile jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

kaathamaadaum kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa bauddha raamahitisthita chhirina laamaako gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko abasthaamaa raamahiti basne makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiyaa rewati laamaa sameta janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita somabaara diunso praharile pakraau garako chha

kaabhre banepaa nagarapaalikaa tukuchaa basne warsiya yogesa sresthako gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa yogesa sameta janaalaai nagada laakha hajaara rupaiyaan ra saya pisa taasa sahita somabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko ho
juwaataasa kheliraheko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

juwaataasa kheliraheko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamabajaarabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa maalepaatanasthita hotala baansaghaarimaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya dipasana guruna sameta janaalaai nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita somabaara belukaa praharile pakraau gareko chha
uniharulaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskibaata khatieko praharile pakraau gareko ho
praharile bhaktapura baalakota basne sunasari dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa bijayanagarakaa warsiya pranesa gautamalaai pakraau gareko haae

milana chaamlina raaile nirdesana gareko nepaali kathaanaka chalachitra wirabikrama ko prachaara prasaara garidinchhu bhanne kuraakaanimaa nirdesaka raaile namaane paschaata pranesa sametale nirdesaka tathaa kalaakaarako maanapratisthaamaa khalala puryaaune chalachitrako byaapaara byabasaayamaa ghaataa puryaaune gaali galauja garne ra chalachitrako badanaama sameta gareko bhani nirdesaka raaiko jaaheriko adhaaramaa praharile pranesalaai kaathamaadaum tekubaata pakraau gareko ho
kartabya jyaana muddaamaa pharaara bhaekaa eka abhiyuktalaai parsaa praharile pakraau gareko chha
praharile bahudaramaai nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa warsiya prajaa sahanilaai chhapakaiyaasthita nepaala bhaarata simaa ksetrabaata pakraau gareko haae

dudhauli nagarapaalikaa thaakuradamaara niwaasi warsiya tilakabahaadura khatrile dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gari srimati warsiyaa karitikumaari buhaari warsiyaa sapanaa ra warsiya suresa khadkaa kariti kumaariko bhadaa laai ghaaite banaaekaa chhan

hatiyaara prahaarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa karitikumaari ra suresalaai upachaarakaa laagi wiraatanagara pathaaieko chha bhane buhaari sapanaako sthaaniya swaasthya chaukimaa upachaara bhairaheko chha dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara garnekhatrikaaemaanasika santulana thika nabhaekaae praharile janaaekaae chha
dhaarilo hatiyaaraprahaara garne khatrilaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dakaahaabaata gaeko prahari tolile niyantranamaa lieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
praharile hatyaamaa sumlagna parsaa suwarnapurakaadewiramana adhikaarilaai aitabaara rupandehiko siddhaartha nagarapaalikaa belahiyaabaata prakaau gareko ho
adhikaarimaathi thapa kaanuni kaarabaahikaa laagi mahaanagariya prahari waritta jagaati pathaaieko sibiaile janaaeko chha

praharile saaemabaara bihaana butawalabaata kaathamaandau aundai gareko lu kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka sawaari saadhanalaai naagadhumgaa chekapostamaa chekajaanchagarne kramamaa rupandehi siwanaga kaa warsiya gowinda achaaryako saathabaata nuphina phenaraagana ra daaijelyaapa gari saya empula laaguausadha baraamada gareko chha
arapitalaai awasyaka kaarabaahikaa laagi wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya sripuramaa raakhieko praharile janaaekaae chha

bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa kamalabinaayakasthita raamechhaapa chunaapatti gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya dambara bahaadura laamaako khaajaa pasalamaa awaidha rupamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa laamaa sameta janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita aitabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko haae

keraabaari gaaunpaalikaa haatakholaa basne warsiya binoda taamaanalaai awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji sahita aitabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko haae ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belabaaribaata khatieko praharile unalaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
srimatiko hatyaa garne agamanalaai praharile niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana suru gareko praharile janaaeko chhadampati dainika kaama garera khaane majadura raheko bataaieko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehile tolaa suna sahita butawalabaata ekajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha
praharile syaanajaa andhikholaa kaa warsiya bhimabahaadura bhaata ksetrilaai taaelaa suna ra laakha hajaara bhaaratiya mudraasahita butawalako basapaarka najikaibaata pakraau gareko ho

sumkaaspada rupamaa hidirahekaa ksetrimaathi sumkaa laagera khojatalaasa garne kramamaa ukta suna ra nagada phelaa parekaae praharile jaanakaari diekaae chha ksetrikaae saathabaata praharile chaandi ra mobaaila pani baraamada gareko chha

bardiyaa nagarapaalikaa sthita traabhasa bhileja hotalabaata sohi nagarapaalikaa banagaai basne warsiya basanta bista sahita janaalaai puriyaa saano polithina sahitako kariba graama saya miligraama laaguausadha braaunasugara sahita sanibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko haae
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaniyaabhaarabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kapanasthita sumana khadkaako gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa solukhumbu ghara bhaekaa kaathamaadaum kapana basne warsiya santawira taamaana sameta janaalaai buka taasa ra nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan sahita sanibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko haae

pakraau parneharumaa sohi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya pappu guptaa ra warsiya hareraama mukhiyaa rahekaa chhan ukta sthaanamaa awaidha rupamaa bhaaratatarpha laijaana laageko awasthaamaa kariba hajaara saya rupaiyaan baraabarako kaartuna dilawaale naamaka madiraa sahita guptaa ra mukhiyaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya hanumaananagarabaata khatieko praharile pakraau gareko ho

bigata kehi samayadekhi baalikaalaai patakapataka jabarajasti karanai gardai aeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya butawalabaata khatieko praharile kuwaralaai sohi thaaunsthita binaapaate bhanne sthaanabaata pakraau gareko ho
prahari chauki sanischarebaata khatieko prahari tolilesasuraa khadga bahaadura daahaalalaaipakraau gari thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko janaaeko chha

srimaanale bancharo prahaara gardaasrimati kaptaara gambhira ghaaite bhaeki bhanne khawara praapta hunaasaathai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya khajuraa khudraabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho ghaaiteko narsina homa nepaalaganjamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya janakapura ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya garudaako sumyukta tolile katahariyaa bajaarabaata dui laakha nakkali nepaali rupaiyaansahita katahariyaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya jiyaalaala mahato ra maulaapuranagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya bihaarilaai pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parepachhi uniharule anusandhaanako kramamaa aphuharuko nota nabhaibaaraako adarsa kotawaala gaanupaalikaa kaa warsiya ananda kusawaahaa ra baaraakai simraunagadhaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya manoja saaha teliko rupaiyaa bhaeko ra duwaile aphuharulaai bhariyaa banaai pathaaeko praharisamaksa bayaana diekaa chhan

kaathamaadaum kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa baalakumaaristhita sadakabaata lalitapura lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sunila maharjanalaai niyantrita laaguausadha daaijepaama empula buprenorphina nuphina empula ra phenaaragana empula sahita bihibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatabaata khatieko praharile uniharu sawaara raheko biara e nambarako motarasaaikala sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa motarasaaikalako sitamuni lukaai chhipaai raakheko ukta laaguausadha sahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile sumkhuwaasabhaabaata juwaataasakheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha

baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa jamunaaha gaanusthita khajuraa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya nirasa raanaalaai awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara kariba saya miligraama sahita bihibaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha
laaguausadha niyantrana wyuro nepaalagumja ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jamunaahabaata khatieko praharile chekajaancha garne kramamaa unalaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

wardiyaa gulariyaa nagarapaalikaa chauguji basne warsiya raama sarana yaadawa ra bhaarata ghara bhaekaa warsiya mukesa kumaara dhobilaai niyantrita laaguausadha saya mililitarako koreksa thaana sahita bihibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya wardiyaabaata khatieko praharile bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai garekaa uniharulaai jaancha garnekramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

ukta sthaanamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko praharile nepaalabaata bhaaratatarpha jaandai gareko biara je nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa narephaanta basne sarlaahi nawalapura ghara bhaekaa warsiya wisaala magaralaai bihibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko haae

damaka nagarapaalikaa sthita paanchathara phaagunanda gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya suraja chemjonalaai saya graama taula baraabarako saalakako khapetaa sahita bihibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko haae

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale pakaahaamainapura gaaunpaalikaa kaaryapaalikaa sadasyabaalistara sahanilaai kariba saata kilolaaguausadha gaanjaasahita pakraau garekaae haae wadaa nambara dorebaata nirwaachita sahanilaai sukrabaara bihaana gaanjaasahita pakraau garieko praharile janaaeko chha

laaguausadha gaanjaasahitapakraau parekaasahanilaaijillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa raakhera anusandhaana suru garieko raajai diunso presa wijnapti jaari garera saarwajanika garinepraharile janaaeko chha
praharile udayapurabaata budhawaara laaguausadha gaanjaa kaarobaara gariraheko awasthaamaa janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

laaguausadha gaanjaa bikri bitarana bhairaheko bhanne gopya suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapurabaata khatieko prahari tolile udayapuragadhi gaaunpaalikaa koltebaata kilo gaanjaa sahita rautaamaai gaaunpaalikaa basne barsa ko yuwaraaja magara sahita janaalaai pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa janaalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapuramaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

pakraau parneharumaa baaraa kolwi nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya sawina raanaabhaata ra barsiya sabina wasneta rahekaa chhan ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya karmaiyaa sarlaahibaata khatieko prahari tolile baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalaai jaancha garne kramamaa uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

sunasari raamadhuni nagarapaalikaa jhumkaa basne warsiya raaju bhanne raajendra chaudharilaai niyantrita laaguausadha naaitrosana chakki ra spaasmo proksibhona kyaapsula sahita budhabaara belukaa praharile pakraau gareko chha

praharile kaathamaadaumko bijeswari ra nyurodabaata kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa swayambhu basne sindhupaalchoka jugala gaaunpaalikaa golche ghara bhaekaa warsiya bajra prakaasa laamaa kaathamaadaum swayambhu basne sindhupaalchoka jugala gaaunpaalikaa golche ghara bhaekaa warsiya bidyuta prakaasa laamaa ra kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa raaniwana basne raamechhaapa likhu gaaunpaalikaa saipu ghara bhaekaa warsiya umesa kaarkilaai kraau gareko haae

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa mitranagarasthita daanaswargaddhaari gesta haausabaata jhaapaa siwasataaksi nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya gopaala budhaathokilaai andaaji saya graama awaidha laaguausadha braauna sugara jasto dekhine padaartha sahita budhabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko haae

udayapura udayapuragadhi gaaunpaalikaa koltebaata sirahaa dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sumana taamaana sameta janaalaai awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji sahita budhabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

ukta sthaanamaa abaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa bikri bitarana bhairaheko bhanne suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapurabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita pakraau gareko ho

jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita jitapura bajaarabaata paidalayaatri makawaanapura baikaiyaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya soma bahaadura golelaai baaghako chhaalaa thaana sahita praharile pakraau gareko haae

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya simaraa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jitapurabaata sumyukta rupamaa khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa unalaai ukta baaghako chhaalaa sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

kataari nagarapaalikaa sthita bihibaare bhanne sthaanamaa praharimaathi biyarako botala ra baansako bhaataa prahaara gareko abhiyogamaa sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya pradipa taamaana sameta janaa purusa ra janaa mahilaa gari janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko haae

ukta sthaanamaa hohallaa gari basekaa uniharu sameta janaalaai prahari chauki riskubaata khatieko gasti tolile sodhapuchha garne kramamaa achaanaka praharimaathi biyarako botala ra baansako bhaataale prahaara gardaa janaa prahari karmachaari ghaaite bhaekaa thie
ghaaiteharulaai upachaarako laagi kataari aspataala lagieko chha saathai ghatanaamaa sumlagna anya janaa pharaara bhaekole praharile khoji gariraheko chha

golabajaara nagarapaalikaa basne raama prasaada saaha kusumi saaha ra okhali maayaa laamaako gharamaa lukaai raakheko awaidha gharelu madiraa andaaji saya litara ra madiraa banaauna prayoga hune kachchaa padaartha hajaara saya litara budhabaara diunso praharile nasta gareko haae
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya golabajaatabaata khatieko praharile ukta madiraa nasta garnukaa saathai awaidha gharelu madiraa banaauna prayoga bhaeko kachchaa padaartha sameta nasta gareko ho
praharile parsaabaata janaa hundi kaarobaarilaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa rajatajayanti chokabaata baaraako simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa pahaaditolakaa warsiya rosana saaha ra bhaaratako bihaara jillaa motihaari graama pumchaayata sugauli wadaa num kaa warsiya saurabha kumaaralaai pakraau gareko haae

bhaaratako raksaulabaatawiraganjatarpha aundai garekaa uniharulaai laakha hajaara rupaiyaansahita praharile pakraau gareko ho praharileuniharuko saathabaata duiwataa mowaailasameta baraamada garekaae chha

birendranagara nagarapaalikaa phalaate raamanagara tola basne warsiyaa bolna nasakne baalikaalaai jabarajasti karanai gareko abhiyogamaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya amita kumaalalaai mumgalabaara diunso praharile pakraau gareko chha

sohi thaaunsthita janakalyaana saamudaayika wanamaa lalaaiphakaai jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne jaanakaari praapta hunaasaatha prahari chauki baanesimala ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile kumaalalaai pakraau gareko ho

limbuko sutakesabhitra kaartunamaa ukta bastuharu phelaa paari wimaanasthala bhansaara kaaryaalayale niyantranamaa liera thapa awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi mahaanagariya prahari waritta gausaalaa pathaaeko ho

yasaigari kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa nayaanbajaarasthita laksmi jisiko gharamaa juwaataasa khelirahekaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya rabindra paudela lagaayata janaalaai nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita mumgalabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

eka hajaara darakaa nakkali nepaali nota laakha sahita janaalaai katahariyaa nagarapaalikaa katahariyaa bajaarabaata mumgalabaara belukaa praharile pakraau gareko chha pakraau parneharumaa sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya jiyaalaala mahato ra maulaapura nagarapaalikaa basne barsiya wihaari saaha rahekaa chhan

nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya janakapura ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya katahariyaa rautahatabaata khatieko sumyukta prahari tolile ukta sthaanamaa sumkaaspada tawarale hindirahekaa uniharulaai jaancha gardaa jiyaalaala ra wihaariko saathamaa ukta nakkali nota eka hajaara darakaa laakha phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurabaata khatieko tolile hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya milana pariyaaralaai pakraau gareko haae

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ra jillaa traaphika kaaryaalaya udayapurabaata khatieko sumyukta prahari tolile ko ja nambarakaae bolero pikaapa gaadilaai chekajaancha garne kramamaa lukaai chhipaai lyaaudai garekaae boraa surti phelaa paareko thiyo
baraamada garekaae surti ra gaadi sahita pakraau parekaa duwai janaalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapuramaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
aphnai chhorilaai khurpaa prahaara gareko abhiyogamaa dhaadina praharile ekajanaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

chhori sunitaakaae khurpaa prahaarabaata nidhaaramaa gahiro chota laageko praharile janaaekaae chha bubaakaaekhurpaa prahaarabaata gambhira ghaaitechhori sunitaakaaejillaa aspataala dhaadinawesimaa saamaanya upachaara pachhi thapa upachaarako laagi kaathamaadaum pathaaepachhi siksana aspataala mahaaraajaganjamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
chhorilaai khurpaa prahaara garne baabulaai niyantranamaa liera anusandhaanana suru garieko dhaadinakaa praharile jaanakaari diekaae chha

saathai rokkaalaai niyantranamaa line kramamaa unakaa saathi baa pa nambarako skutara chaalaka sohi sthaana basne warsiya sumana thaapaale praharimaathi abhadra byawahaara garekole thaapaalaai sameta praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha unale sameta maadaka padaartha sewana gareko khulna aeko chha

somawaara aparaanha nepaali senaa nepaala prahari tathaa makaalu baruna raastriya nikunjako sumyukta chekina tolile makaalu gaaunpaalikaa baata bibhinna kisimakaa jumgali janaawarako chhaalaa lagaayatakaa jadibuti sahitabhotakholaa gaaunpaalikaa gumbaa basne barsiya karmalaamaa bhotelaai pakraau gareko ho
baraamada saamaana sahita bhotelaai awasyaka kaanuni kaarawaahiko laagi makaalu baruna raastriya nikunjamaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha
sumraksita pumksi garuda sikaaragarne eka wyaktilaai morana praharile pakraau gareko chha

praharile morana sunabarsi nagarapaalikaa wadaa num sthita bheduwaathaanabaata garuda haadakhora maarera lyaaudai gareko abasthaamaa sunasari harinagaraa gaaupaalikaa ghuski ghara bataaune warsa andaaji ko ibaraahina khaanalaai dui thaana marita garuda sahita phelaa paari pakraau garieko ho
unalaai wana sumraksana aina bamojima thapa anusandhaana tathaa kaarawaahi hune ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya rumgelile janaaekaae chha

janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa janakapuradhaamasthita janakapura anchala aspataala baahirako parisaramaa bichauliyaako kaama gareko abhiyogamaa sirahaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa haala janakapura wasne warsiya sumjaya kaamati ra sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne barsiya manoja yaadawalaai aitabaara praharile pakraau gareko haae

ukta aspataalako parisara baahira basera upachaarako laagi aune biraamiharukaa aphantalaai bicha baatomaa roki jabarajasti anyantra klinikamaa laijaana lagaai kamisana line tathaa biraami ra biraamiko aphantalaai anaawasyaka dukha dine garako suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
daanabaata praharile aitabaara diusaae laaguausadha braauna sugarasahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharilesurkheta jillaa wirendranagara nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya laksmana saapakotaa nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiyaa guddu kawadiyaa ra sohi thaaun niwaasi warsaki ruksaara kawadiyaalaai pakraau gareko ho
baa cha nambarako haaileksa gaadimaa nepaalagumjabaata daanatarpha airaheko gopya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa uniharulaai prakaau gareko ho

praharile uniharuko saathawaata kaalo plaastikale beri seto plaastikamaa poko paarera raakheko laaguausadha khairo heroina eka saya graamanagada saata hajaara ra tina thaana mobaaila ra gaadi baraamada gareko chha
aphnai srimatilaai kodaalo prahaara gari ghaaite banaaeko abhiyogamaa dhanusaa praharile eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

srimaana dewu sadaale srimatilaai kodaalo prahaara gari ghaaite banaaeko khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahendranagara dhanusaabaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho kodaalo prahaarabaata ghaaite bhaeki siwasakti dewiko janakapura amchala aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale chhimekilaai dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara garne eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharilesanibaara raati bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa jugedibaata bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya naaraayana wikalaai pakraau garekaae haae

wikale sukrabaara raati chhimeki warsiyaa somamaayaa kaamilaai dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara garekaa thie hatiyaara prahaarapachhi gambhira ghaaite kaamiko chitawana medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

kaudenaabaata bhaaratatarpha jaandai gareko biara ti nambarako motarasaaikala simaa prahari chauki phenharaa sarlaahibaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalako dikkibhitra lukaaichhipaai lyaaeko ukta laaguausadha sahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
ghatanaako baaremaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari diekaae chha

ilaama nagarapaalikaa saanrumbaamaamumgalabaara saanjha madiraa sewana gari wiwaada garne kramamaa warsiya binoda raaile khukuri prahaara gardaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya suka bahaadura bhanne purna bahaadura limbuko marityu bhaeko haae
khukuri prahaarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa purna bahaadurako bienasi aspataala jhaapaamaa bihibaara bihaana upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
rolpaa pariwartana gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaum taarkeswara nagarapaalikaa nepaalataara basne warsiya bhuwana ghartimagaralaai budhabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko haae

taarkeswara nagarapaalikaa anandapurasthita khaajaa gharamaa maadaka padaartha sewana gari wiwaada hundaa bhuwana ghartimagarale wiyarako botalale prahaara gardaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sohi sthaana basne warsiya saagara wisiko manamohana aspataala mahaaraajagumjamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

wudhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kapana adarsanagara basne warsiya soma sresthako gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa soma srestha sameta janaalaai nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita budhabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko haae
dhanusaako mithilaa nagarapaalikaa dhalkewaramaa saktisaali hune andhawiswaasale adhaai warsiya baalakakaae bali diekaae khulekaae chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaa pradesa prahari ra sumghiya prahari ikaaile sumyukta rupamaa janaalaai niyantranamaa liera gareko anusandhaanako kramamaa dhaami sikdai garekaa chhimeki warsakaa satrudhana mahatole baalaka aryanako bali dieko rahasya khuleko haae

baalakaki amaa ghaansa kaatna gaekaa belaa gharamaa khelirahekaa baalakalaai warsiya chhimeki satrudhana mahataaele lalaai phakaai apaharana gari bandhaka banaaera raati baje siddhi hune andhawiswaasamaa aphnai anganamaa dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gari dewideutaako naamamaa baalakako ghaanti retera bali diekaae prahari anusandhaanamaa khulekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaakaa esapi sekhara khanaalale bataae

baalaka aryana biraami hundaasameta mahatole jhaaraphuka garne garekaa thie mahatoko ghara baalaka aryanako gharabaata jhandai saya mitara taadhaa raheko chha baalaka aryanako buwaa waidesika rojagaaramaa chhan baalakako hatyaamaa prayoga gareko ghareluhatiyaara ra lugaakapadaa sameta praharile baraamada gareko chha
kaarkile praharilaai hajaararupaiyaan dinchhu ghatanaa milaaidinupayo bhandai tatkaala hajaararupaiyaan dindaadindai akhtiyaarako tolile pakraau gareko ho

pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya janakapura parsaa prahari ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraako sumyukta tolilebhaarata wihaarakaa wikaasa sarmaa baaraa kalaiyaakaa sikendra saaha ra kalaiyaakai raamawinesa sarmaalaaigoli haani niyantranamaa lieko ho apaharanakaariko kammaramuni goli laageko chha

apaharanakaarile baalaka phirtaa garna anaakaani garepachhi aphantale praharilaai khabara garekaa thie apaharanakaarile bolaaeko sthaanamaa pugeko prahari tolilaai sawa dekhaaera uniharu bhaagna khojepachhi praharile uniharulaai goli haanera niyantranamaa lieko praharilejanaaekaae chha
hatyaa aropi amaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya luhaamamaa raakhera anusandhaana gariraheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya luhaamale janaaeko chha
baalikaako sawalaai pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala salyaanamaa lyaaieko chha

uniharubicha pahilepani saamaanya jhagadaa hune gareko sthaaniyako bhanaai chha hatyaa aropamaa sante wikalaaipraharile pakraau garekaae chha bhane ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko kaaski praharikaa diesapi rawindramaana gurunale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parneharumaa jhaapaa damaka nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala lalitapura baalakumaari basne warsiya dharmendra limbu ra kaalikota raajakota nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala lalitapura imaadola basne warsiya sujana bama thakuri rahekaa chhan
juwaa taasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa parsaa praharile janaa juwaadelaai pakraaugareko chha

praharile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa laajimpaatabaata chituwaako chhaalaa thaana sahita achhaama chaurapaati gaanupaalikaa paayala basne warsiya umesa saahalaai somabaara pakraau gareko haae ukta chhaalaa bikri garne uddesyale aphno saathamaa boki hindiraheko awasthaamaa mahaasaakhaakotaaelile saahalaai phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
laagaausadha sahita pakraau parekaa saapakotaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itaharimaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
laghuwitta kampanimaa kaama garne baalakakaa baabu suryabahaadura thaapaa bhane kaaryaalayako kaamale sadaramukaama waahira gaeko belaa ghatanaa ghatekaae praharile janaaekaae chha

praharile kalumki chokabaata kariba phita incha laamo baaghako chhaalaa jasto dekhine bastu sahita dhaadina salyakota gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaum baalaaju waaipaasa basne warsiya udaya magara ra bardiyaa raajaapura nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya karisna chaudharilaai pakraaugareko haae

bhaktapura bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa kamalabinaayaka chokamaa dyutimaa khatieko praharilaai saya rupaiyaanghusa dina khojnekaabhre banepaa basne sindhupaalchokakaa warsiya rupesa maajhilaai aitabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha
praharile baa kha nambarako tripara jaancha garne kramamaa sahachaalakale chalaaeko awasthaamaa phelaa paari pakraau garna khojdaamaajhile praharilaaiukta rakama dina khaaejekaa thie

bhairawi gaaunpaalikaa kuti basne warsiya gobinda bahaadura simhako aphnai gharamaa sutiraheko awasthaamaa dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaarabaata marityu bhaekaae haae aparichita janaa wyaktiharule dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gardaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaasimhakoupachaarako kramamaa aitabaara bihaanajillaa aspataala dailekhamaa marityu bhaeko haae

praharibaata baraamada gariekaa chekamaa aphukhusi eka karoda laakha hajaara baraabarako rakama sresthale bhareki chhan yastai baaunsa garieko chekamaa laakha baraabarako rakama raheko praharile janaaeko chha

praharile kailaali tikaapura nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara ghara bhai haala baalakumaari lalitapura basne warsiya lokendra saahi ra saaehi thaanuki warsiya rubi thaakuralaai bihibaara gausaalaabaata pakraau gareko ho uniharu premipremikaa rahekaaekhulna aeko chha
premiko isaaraamaa dherai rakama kamaaine asamaa kaarkilaai dhamkyaai rakama maaga garieko rawile prahari samaksa wayaana dieki chhin
mahaanagariya prahari waritta baaneswarabaata khatieko praharile baa cha nambarako gaadi jaancha garne kramamaa gaadimaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta nagada sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskibaata khatieko prahari tolilethulo maatraamaa abaidha laaguausadha sahita mahilaa sahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

prahari pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa badaa num parithbichokasthita hotalabaata laaguausadha osaaraposaara gari bikri bibarana garnerupandehikaa barsiya raamabariksa kohaara barsiya tetari kohaara barsiya sonama kohaarapokharaakaa barsiya anila guruna barsiya sukraraaja sunaara barsiya wikrama wika ra barsiya ajaya gurunalaai pakraau garekaae haae
uniharuko baaremaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskikaa pramukha esapi oma raanaale jaanakaari die

praharile bihibaara bihaana wiragumjabaata kaathamaandaun aundai gareko naa kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka basa cheka jaancha garne kramamaa parsaa wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa kaaaklesa daasa thaaru gauri sumkara thaakura kaathamaadaum mulapaani basne jayakisora thaakura kailaali dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa kirana laamaa wiraatanagara ananda giri ra prakaasayaadawalalaai pakraau garekaae haae
rukuma purwamaagharaayasi bibaada hundaa khukuri prahaara gariaphnai buwaako hatyaa garekaae aropamaa praharileeka yuwaalaai pakraau gareko chha
saathiko hatyaa gareko aropamaa rupandehimaa praharile janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

achaaryako jetha gate rupandehiko sainaamainaamaa raheko sitalaapura saamudaayika wanamaa bhetieko thiyo prahari anusandhaanakaa kramamaa hajaara ra ema thaana mowaailakai kaarana achaaryako hatyaa bhaeko khuleko chha

jhagadaapachhi uniharule chiranjiwiko hatyaako yojanaa banaaekaa thieraaju wika ra ramesa wikale chiranjiwi achaaryalaai motarasaaikalamaa lagera rupandehiko sainaamainaa nagarapaalikaa saalajhandi najikako sitalaapura jumgalamaa dhumgaale haanera hatyaa gari chhodeko rupandehikaa prahari pramukha esapi haridaya thaapaale jaanakaari die

praharile mumgalabaara bihaana wiraatanagarabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basalaai cheka jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaaramorana wiraatanagara ghara bhaekaa warsiya prakaasa yaadawalaainiyantrita laaguausadha daaijepaama saya empula naaitraabheta saya tyaableta phenaaragana empula ra norphina empula sahita pakraau gareko haae

praharile baaikamaa raakhera lyaaudai garekaaeukta charesa sahita sindhupaalchoka baahrabisekaa dinesa kaarki sunitaa timilsinaa ra wiswaasa thaapaalaai pakraau gareko haae praharile uniharukaae saathabaata sisiko motarasaaikala pani baraamada gareko chha
praharile kaathamaadaumko gomgabubaata dularbha banyajantu saalakako khapataasahita chaarajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha
baraamada laaguausadhasahita dubaijanaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaankadabhittaamaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko diesapi thaapaale bataae
haadanaataa karanaisambandhi muddaamaa kaida sajaaya sunaaiekaa baitadikaa eka yuwakalaai chaara warsapachhi somabaarapraharile pakraau garekaae chha

sigaasa gaaunpaalikaa siraadikaa warsiya wirabhaana dhaamilaai praharile gharabaatai pakraau gareko haae dhaamilaai jillaa adaalata baitadile haadanaataa karanai muddaamaa wisum jetha gate eka warsa kaida sajaaya sunaaeko thiyo uni yasaaghi pharaara rahekaa thie
pakraau parekaa dhaamilaai jillaa adaalata baitadile kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi jillaa kaaraagaara baitadi pathaaekopraharile janaaekaae chha

nepaala prahariko laaguausadha niyantrana byuro pradesa nepaalaganjako tolile pratibandhita laaguausadhasahita baankebaata praharile saata janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha uniharulaai nepaalabhaarata naakaa jamunahaabaata wijna kukurako sahayogamaa pakraau gareko ho

praharile ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa ki laksmi khadkaa ra nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa adarsanagaraki sumana srestha pakraau pareki hun tyastai nepaalaganja bhujaigaaunkaa kisorakumaara dhowilaai chaara tyaableta naaitrojana kyaapsula spaasmo ra eka bottala altoreksasahita jamunaahaa naakaabaata niyantranamaa liieko chha

yastai kohalapura nagarapaalikaa kaa raajendra harijanalaai tyaableta naaitro bhyaatasahita niyantranmaa liieko chha rupaidihaabaata aundai garekaa thapa dui baalakakaa saathabaata chaara tyaableta naaitrojana pani baraamada bhaeko ra ti baalakaalaai pariwaarako jimmaa lagaaune tayaari bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
praharilesomabaara sinaamangalabaatabaaghako chhaalaasahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya raanipokhari ra waritta gausaalaabaata khatieko prahari tolile thaana baaghako chhaalaasahita lalitapura saatadobaato basne dhanakutaakaa suresa bika nayaanbasapaarka basne chitawanakaa rabindra sunaara ra baaglunakaa homa bahaadura nepaalilaaipakraau gareko haae

mahaasaakhaakaae taaelile bhaarata utarapradesakaa mahomada jiyaa nitina sribaastawa mahomada seyaapha teja naaraayana suklaa kaanapurakaa rabi tiwaari bhaarata prayaagaraajakaa atala tripaathi raajesa kumaara suklaa ra kusinagarakaa nulaena waarasilaai pakraau gareko ho praharile kaathamaadaumko babaramahalabaata chha janaa ra thamelasthita hotala baisaalibaata thapa dui janaalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile kaathamaadaum ra sarlaahibaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa janaa juwaadelaai pakraau garekaae chha

kaathamaadaum kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa nayaan basapaarkabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa baanke ghara bhaekaa warsiya nabina raauta lagaayata janaalaai buka taasa ra nagada hajaara rupaiyaan sahita aitabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga nayaan basapaarkabaata khatieko praharile paarkina gari raakheko naa kha nambarako basamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa sthita pasalabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya kobhaanu ghimire sahita janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan sahita aitabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha
juwaataasa kheliraheko bhanne suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya laalabandibaata khatieko praharile juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

praharileaitabaara diunsomahottaribaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basalaai jaancha garnekramamaa basamaa sawaarabaaraa singola nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya santosa nepaalilaai awaidha laaguausadha braauna sugara graama sahitapakraau gareko haae
