praharile saaemabaara belukaa kaathamaandau mahaanagarapaalikaa laajimpaatabaata daarchulaa duhu gaanupaalikaa kaa naresa bahaadura bama ra daarchulaakai gobinda simha maharaalaai pakraau gareko haae

bhumlu gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara kolaati sthaayi ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaumko baagabajaaramaa deraa gari basne warsiya puskarabhanine raajakumaara paharilaai gata sanibaara warsiya srimati nirmalaa nepaalako hatyaa gareko aropamaa praharile pakraau gareko ho

baalaka somabaara diunso gharabaata bepattaa bhaepachhi pariwaarale praharilaai jaanakaari garaaieko thiyo praharisahita sthaaniyale unakaae khoji suru garirahekaa thie tara mumgalabaara bihaana unako sawa raati khoji garekai ghara najikako baarimaa phelaa pareko thiyaae
waidesika rojagaarimaa gaekaa sambhuko dui chhori ra eka maatra chhoraa thie ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhalkewarakaa prahari niriksaka saroja raaile baalakako hatyaa bhaeko jaanakaari diekaa chhan

parsaa biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita milanachoka bajaarabaata paterwaasugauli gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya sobhaa kumaara ale magara sameta janaalaai awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba kilo sahita aitabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha

prahari chauki milanachokabaata khatieko praharile jitapurabaata manawaatarpha jaandai gareko naa ha nambarako ato riksaa jaancha garne kramamaa wataa kaalo jholaabhitra lukaaichhipaai lyaaeko awasthaamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari ato chaalaka sobhaa kumaara sameta janaalaai pakraau gareko ho

parsaa biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa ghantaagharasthita sadakabaata sohi mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya rosana kumaara kaanulaai niyantrita laaguausadha naaitrobheta tyaableta thaana sahita aitabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko praharile bhaaratako raksaulabaata biragumja ghantaagharatarpha paidala hindirahekaa unalaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa bhairawapura chokasthita sadakabaata niyantrita laaguausadha daaileksa disi saya emaelako botala saya thaana tathaa naaitraabheta saya tyaableta mobaaila thaana ra nagada hajaara rupaiyaan sahita aitabaara raati janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parneharumaa sohi nagarapaalikaa mejaragumja basne warsiya rupesa chaudhari ra rautahata gujaraa bhawaanipura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya raahula chaudhari rahekaa chhan

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya laalabandibaata khatieko praharile naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari motarasaaikala chaalaka rupesa ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara raahulalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile dhaadinabaata laaguausadha bokeko bhaaratiya gaadisahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajuribaata khatieko praharitolile kilograama charesa ra laaguausadha aphima graamasahita jayaparithwi nagarapaalikaa bajhaanakaa kaalche bohoraalaai somabaara bihaana baje gajuriko sotikholaabaata niyantranamaa lieko ho

wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa pugeko praharile tolile bhaaratiya nambara pletako diela siedi nambarako maaruti sujuki kaarako pachhaadiko sita muni phalsa batama banaai wataa raato rumgako plaastika pokaa banaai lukaai raakheko laaguausadha baraamada gareko ho praharile bohoraako saathabaata thaana mobaaila ra samikaarda pani baraamada gareko chha
praharile dhaadina nilakantha nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya raamabahaadura ramtela ra pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya laksmana chaudharilaaipakraau garekaae chha
laaguausadha muddhaamaa pharaara pratiwaadilaai sukrabaara praharile dhaadinabaata pakraau gareko chha

dhaadina jillaa adaalatako phaisalaa anusaara laaguausadha muddhaamaa mahinaa kaida tokiekaa unalaai pakraau gari adaalatamaa pesa garaaiekomaa adaalatako adesale kaida bhuktaanako laagi kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya dhaadinamaa pathaaieko chha

banepaa nagarapaalikaa raatomaatesthita jnaana bahaadura laamaako gharabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa laamaa sameta janaalaai nagada hajaara saya rupaiyaan buka taasa ra thaana kaudaa sahita sanibaara belukaa praharile pakraau gareko haae
juwaataasa kheliraheko bhanne suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gari yasa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
paschima nawalaparaasimaa chirpatale haanera eka yuwakale aphno baabuko hatyaa garekaa chhan
baabuko hatyaa gari gharamai tolaaera basekaa unalaai praharile awasyaka anusandhaanasahita kaarbaahikaa laagi sanibaara jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa lyaaieko chha

srama swikaritiko kaama chhito garidinchhu bhani sewaagraahibaata nagada hajaara rupaiyaan line kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa baaphala basne paalpaa khaanigaaun ghara bhaekaa warsiya pitaambara gaire bihibaara diunso pakraau parekaa chhan
uniharubaata janahi hajaara rupaiyaan nagada lieko awasthaamaa prahari ra srama kaaryaalayakaa karmachaarile pakraau garekaa hun

sirahaa nagarapaalikaa pataherwaabaata laaguausadha daaileksa disi saya miligraamako botala sahita mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sunila yaadawalaai bihibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko haae

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya maadara ra sasastra prahari wala sirahaabaata sumyukta rupamaa khatieko prahari tolile ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai jaancha gardaa plaastikako jholaamaa lukaairaakheko ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari motarasaaikala sahita yaadawalaai pakraau gareko ho
katuwaa pestolasahita praharile eka bhaaratiya naagarikalaai sirahaabaata pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parekaa yaadawalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya lahaanamaa raakhi anusandhaana badhaaieko anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa adaalata sirahaabaata myaada thapa garieko chha
sirahaa nagarapaalikaa khiraunaamaa bihibaara raati srimaana raamaresa mandalale warsiyaa srimati manisaa kumaari mandalako ghaanti thichera hatyaa garekaa hun

gata phaaguna gate golabajaara nagarapaalikaa basne raamaresa mandalasanga manisaako wiwaaha bhaeko thiyo bihepachhi saasule thapa daaijo lyaaunna dabaaba didain thapa daaijo nalyaae buhaarilaai chhodna chhoraa raamaresalaai dabaaba didainaeko manisaakaa baabu raghunatha mandalale bataaekaa chhan

makawaanapura ghara bhai haala lalitapura chaapaagaaun basne warsiya ananda taamaana okhaladhungaa ghara bhai haala kaathamaandau bauddha basne warsiya manoja kaarki sindhupaalchokakaa warsiya narendra taamaana sindhulikaa warsiya ratna bahaadura maajhi ra sindhulikaa warsiya bisnau bahaadura maajhilaaipraharile pakraau gareko haae

praharile uniharuko saathabaata chituwaako chhaalaa dui thaana andaaji graamako bhaaluko pittathaili eka thaana baraamada gari bihibaara saarwajanika gareko ho praharile baraamada bhaeko jumgali janaawarako chhaalaa ra pittathaili dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya bhaktapuramaa bujhaaera thapa anusandhaana suru gareko chha
lamjunabaata aeko janti paksalaai budhabaara gorakhaako paalunataara nagarapaalikaa kumaala gaaunkaa behuli paksale kutapita gardaa lamjunakaa warsiya bisnaubahaadura kumaalakomarityu bhaeko haae
behuli paksakaae kutapitabaata ghaaite kumaalako upachaarako kramamaa pokharaako gandaki medikala kalejamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

somabaara raati lalitapurako godaawari nagarapaalikaa ko maarbala phayaaktri maathiko jumgalamaa warsaki baalikaalaai maadakapadaartha khuwaai jabarajasti karanai gareko abhiyaaegamaa paanchathara phidima ghara bhai godaawari basne warsakaa ramesa limbu ra udayapura kataari ghara bhai godaawari basdai aekaa warsiya wiweka mainaalilaaipraharile pakraau garekaae haae

mukhiyaapatti musaharniyaa gaanupaalikaamaabudhawaara bihaana bajeko samayamaa gastimaa rahekaa nepaala praharikaa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka pramoda kumaara saahasanga raheko pestola thaana ra tyasako myaagejina sameta lutera luteraaharu pharaara bhaekaa hun
haala ghatanaasthalamaa dhanusaakaa praharile hatiyaara lutneharuko khoji bhairaheko bataaekaae chha
winaa anumati drona udaaeko aropamaa pokharaamaa eka janaa widesi naagarikalaai praharile pakraau garekaae chha
sunasarimaa naagarikataa banaaidine aswaasana dekhaai nagada lindai gareko awasthaamaapraharile ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

cheta prasaadale sohi thaaunsthita jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya agaadi itahari basne warsiyaa mahilaalaai naagarikataa banaaidinchhu bhani ukta rakama lindai gareko awasthaamaa phelaa paari praharile pakraau gareko ho

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa dillibajaaramaadyutimaa khatieko praharilaai saya rupaiyaan ghusa dina khaaejne kirtipura basne daana tulsipura ghara bhaekaa warsiya lalita walilaai somabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

pradesa nambara kaa mukhyamantri sumkara pokharela sahabhaagi kaaryakramasthala najikai bama wisphota bhaeko haae mukhyamantri sumkara pokhrela eka kaaryakramakaa laagi rolpaa aepachhi tyasako wirodha swarupa bama wisphota garaaeko hunasakne praharile asumkaa gareko chha
wiplawa prabhaawita jillaa rolpaa sadaramukaama liwaana najikai bama wisphota bhaeko ho mukhyamantri nekapaako liwaanasthita nepaala udyoga waanaijya sumghako sabhaahalamaa sahabhaagi thie

praharile aitabaara belukaa surkhetabaata kaathamaandaum audai gareko naa kha basalaaichekajaancha garne kramamaa kailaali sitaapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsa ko bharata bhandaari ra bardiyaa geruwaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsa ko winoda naatha yogiko saathabaata abaidha laaguausadha braauna sugara graama baraamada gareko chha
babai gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num mathyauri niwaasi warsiya chudaamanai pariyaarako unakai saathiharuko kutapitabaata marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tulasipurale jaanakaari dieko chha
prahile bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa muladhokaa basne warsiya sunila silpakaara ra bhaktapura kamala winaayaka basne kaabhrekaa warsiya wisaala taamaanalaaipakraau gareko haae

daankaa muddaamaakaa pharaara abhiyukta laaguausadha sahita pakraau pareko chha praharile pharaara abhiyukta mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya rawindra yaadawalaai laaguausadha sahita sirahaako simaawarti ksetra maadarako dasagajaabaata sanibaara pakraau gareko ho

bisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya janakapuradhaama ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya siraahaabaata sumyukta rupamaa khatieko prahari tolile yaadawalaai naaitraabheta saya tyaableta naaitrosana tyaabaleta spaasapaalakana thaana pibhona spaasa plasa tyaableta tathaa chakku thaana sahita sohi nagarapaalikaa maadarabaata phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

chhaaeraa wijnaanalaai pakraau gari sanibaara raati nai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanakutaa pathaaieko chha praharile ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko bataaeko chha maritakako sawa postamaartamakaa laagi jillaa aspataala dhanakutaa lagiekaae chha

lalitapura lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaa dhobighaata basne sunasari dharaanakaa warsiya atita taamaana ra rautahatakaa warsiya bikalaraaja bhattaraailaai niyantrita laaguausadha tramaa tyaawleta hajaara saya pisa straamita tyaableta hajaara saya pisa tramino tyaableta saya pisa tramaachasa tyaableta pisa straabina tyaableta saya pisa ra enatiko tyaableta saya pisa sahita sanibaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha
jabarajasti karanai gareko abhiyogamaa warsiya kisoralaai bardiyaabaata praharile pakraau gareko chha
ti mahilaalaai jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya motipurabaata khatieko praharile yaadawalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharilejuwaadeharulaai niyantranamaa lii thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num raanighaata basne barsakaa rosanakumaara rauniyaara ra baaraako karaiyaamaai gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num umajana basne barsakaa sunila yaadawalaai hajaara ghusa rakamasahita akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako tolile pakraau garekaae haae

sawaari chaalaka anumati patra laaisensa banaaidine aswaasana diera sewaagraahisanga ghusa liepachhi akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako kaaryaalaya hetaumdaabaata khatieko tolile uniharulaai niyantranamaa lieko thiyo

yaataayaata wyawasthaa kaaryaalaya agaadi wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita sikhara insyorensako tesro paksa bimaa kaleksana kaauntarabaata pakraau parekaa uniharuko saathabaata akhtiyaarako tolile nagada hajaara rupaiyaan ra kehi kaagajapatra sameta baraamada gareko chha
awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita sarlaahibaata praharile ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

laalabandi nagarapaalikaa lakhandehi kholaa najikabaata sindhulikaa warsiya waanachhu thinalaai kariba keji awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita sukrabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko haae ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalapurabaata khatieko praharile sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa thinale bokeko jholaabhitra ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

praharile aja bihaana butawalabaata kaathamaandau aundai garekolu kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka basalaai chekajaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsa ko saphala gurunako saathabaata phenaaraagana nophina ra daaijopaama gari jammaa empula laaguausadha baraamada gareko chha

praharile raamechhaapa gharabhai saantinagara basne warsa ko nawina khatrilaai kaathamaandau mahaanagarapaalikaa tinakune baagamati pulabaata pakraau gareko ho praharile khatrilaai sumkaalaagi chekajaancha gardaa nijako saathabaata laaguausadha naaitraabheta tyaableta polyaanda jasto dekhine laaguausadha graama baraamada gareko chha

unale boki lyaaeko hyaanda byaagamaa bhansaara kaaryaalayale chekajaancha garne kramamaa meda ina chaainaa lekhieko banduka jasto dekhine kaalo rangako hatiyaara thaana ra kyaalibarako goliko pyaaketa thaana phelaa paari bhansaara kaaryaalayale unalaai tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthala suraksaa kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaeko ho
maalapota kaaryaalaya rupandehi bhairahawaakaa kaaryaalaya sahayogi jogendraprasaada chaudharilaaiakhtiyaarale hajaara ghusa rakamasahita pakraau garekaae chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako kaaryaalaya butawalabaata khatieko tolile unalaai ghusa rakamasahita pakraau gareko ho

sailuna gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya chudaabahaadura regmile bolna ra hidna nasakne warsiya chhoraa bedabahaadura regmilaai phohara gareko jhokamaataaukomaa hataudaale haanera hatyaa gareko prahari anusandhaanabaata khuleko chha

nepaalagumjabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basalaai jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaarasurkheta birendranagara nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya minabahaadura bogatilaai awaidha laaguausadha braauna sugara graama sahita budhabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko haae

aphantako chhori gharamaa aeko maukaa paari gata chaita gate raati eklai sutiraheko awasthaamaa jabarjasti karanai garneropamaa mandana deupura nagarapaalikaa nayaangaaunkaa warsiya raaja bajagaaimlaai mangalabaara raati unakai gharabaata praharile pakraau garekaae haae

lalitapura jillaa adaalatabaata phaaguna gateko phaisalaale thagi muddaamaa warsa kaida tathaa laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan jariwaanaa thahara bhai pharaara rahekaa karisnalaai prahari pradhaana kaaryaalaya kendriya anusandhaana byuro mahaaraajagumjabaata khatieko praharile bhaktapura thimibaata phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
karisnalaai lalitapura jillaa adaalatamaa pesa gariekomaa adaalatako adesale kaida bhuktaanako laagi kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya nakhkhu lalitapura pathaaieko chha
naa kha nambarako trakamaa lukaaichhipaai suna lyaaeko awasthaamaa praharile chekajaancha garne kramamaa kilo suna phelaa pareko ho
timuresthita bhansaara kaaryaalaya jaanchapaasa gari krasa bhaeko traka sumkaa laagi praharile punah chekajaancha gardaa kilo suna phelaa pareko praharile janaaeko chha

praharile yahi aja diusaae kaakadabhittaabaata kaathamaandau audai gareko naa kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka sawaari saadhanalaai chekajaancha gardaa siraahaa golabajaara gaaunpaalikaa kaa saroja guptaako saathabaata abaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara graama baraamada gareko chha
mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga naagadhugaamle bhansaara chhali gari lyaaieko laakha baraabarakaae kapadaaharu baraamada gareko chha

praharile aja bihaana butawalabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko lu kha nambarako basalaai chekajaancha garne kramamaa bhansaara chhali gari lyaaieko kurtaa suruwaala thaana sala thaana kurtaa thaana kurtaa ra sala seta tapsa kurtaa thaana gari ru laakha hajaara baraabarako kapadaaharu baraamada gareko ho
paterwaa sugauli gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya umesa sahanilaai awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariwa kilo ra pratibandhita jaraayoko sina thaana sahita somabaara praharile pakraau gareko haae

bisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaabaata khatieko praharile sahaniko gharamaa talaasi gardaa ukta parimaanako gaanjaa ra jaraayoko sina sahita phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho
praharile parsaabaata awaidha laaguausadha charesa baraamadagareko chha

biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa muralibaata kariba kilo charesa somabaara saanjha praharile baraamada gareko chha sohi thaaunsthita pokharimaa nuhaauna gaekaa baalabaalikaaharule gaadieko awasthaamaa ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari praharilaai khabara gare paschaata praharile baraamada gareko ho

sritamile dhungaale haanepachhi ghaaite bhaekaasrimaanako upachaarakaae kramamaa misana aspataala paalpaamaa marityu bhaeko ho arghaakhaanchiko paanaini gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai sasuraalimaa aekaa bakhata srimatiko dhungaa prahaarabaata lokabahaadurako jyaana gaeko praharile janaaeko chha
mangalaalaai niyantranamaa lii ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

wadaa nambara kaa sachiwa yajna achaaryale warsiyaa baalikaalaai jabarajasti garna khojne kramamaa unalaai sthaaniyale pakraau gareko bataaieko chha baalikaale aphulaai gaali garera haatapaata garna khaajeko aropa lagaae pani sachiwa archaayale aphno manasaaya galata naraheko bataaekaa chhan
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya budhanagarabaata khatieko praharile sohi gaaunpaalikaasthita dhunimoda chokamaa unalaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

gopya suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryalaya adhikarita sahitako tolile jholaa cheka jaancha gardaa kaaski pokharaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa laamaachaura bhaktipatha basne barsa kaa asika nepaalilaaipakraau garekaae haae
praharile sarlaahi sundarapura gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa sesa saraphaasjaakaae saathabaata kariba saya graamako sunako baalaa thaana sahita pakraau gareko haae
praharileawasyaka anusandhaana ewam kaarawaahiko laagi tribhuwana bimaanasthala bhansaara kaaryaalaya gauchara pathaaieko chha

thagiko samaachaara lekhekaa pokharaako taandawa saaptaahika ra taandawa nyuja datakamakaa sampaadaka arjuna giri saadhaarana taarekhamaa rihaa bhaekaa chhan kaathamaadaaaim jillaa adaalatale unalaai rihaa garna adesa dieko ho

pokharaakaa wipendraraaja bataasale thagi gareko bhanne samaachaara lekhekaa girilaai saaibara kraaima antargata prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byurole unalaai niyantranamaa lieko thiyo saaibara kraaima antargata muddaamaa kaaski praharile somabaara pakraau garera girilaai kaathamaadaum pathaaeko thiyo
pakraau parekaa duwaiai janaalaai thapa anusandhaanakaa laagi ahile jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalimaa raakhieko chha
dhanusaa prahariko wisesa taalile dhanusaako wibhinna thaanubaatachorikaa wataa motarasaaikalasahita paancha janalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau pareko sabaijanaalaai jillaa adaalata dhanusaabaata myaada thapa gari anusandhaana agaadi badhaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaale janaaekaae chha

mahaanagariya prahari baritta kaalimaatibaata khatieko praharile baa kha nambarako tripara jaancha garne kramamaa ruta paramita nabhaeko bhandaikaarawaahibaata bachna chaalaka taamaanale praharilaai ukta rakama dina khojekaa thie
somabaara ti yuwatimaathi jabarjasti karanai bhaeko ra saaemabaara nai chaarajanaalaai wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya baidaamale pakraau gareko ho

paryatakakaa laagi anaaraaibhala bhisaa wyawasthaakaa kaarana dherai widesilaai nepaala auna sajilo bhaeko chha kehi widesile tyasako galata prayoga garirarahekaa chhan ghumne bahaanaamaa aekaa kehi widesi awaidha hatiyaara prayoga tathaa taskari mahilaa tathaa maanawa bechabikhana laaguausadha kaarobaara apraakaritika maithunalagaayatakaa gatiwidhimaa sumlagna bhaeko paaieko chha

katipaya widesi paryataka bhisaa liera aparaadhika kaama garnakai laagi nepaala aune garekaa chhan bhandaachaahin dherailaai wiswaasa nalaagna sakchha waastawika tyahi nai ho ahile wibhinna aparaadhika gatiwidhimaa sumlagna jhandai saya widesi kaidibandi nepaalakaa kaaraagaaramaa rahekaale yasako pusti hunchha

kaaraagaara wyawasthaapana wibhaagamaa kaidibandiko rekarda raakhna baneko saphtaweyara prijana myaanejamenta inpharamesana sistama le chaara saya widesi naagarika jelamaa raheko tathyaamka dekhaaunchha kaaraagaaramaa rahekaa widesimaathi jhandai wataa pharakapharaka muddaamaa sajaaya bhogirahekaa chhan

jabarajasti karanai udyogamaa kartawya jyaanamaa maanawa bechabikhanamaa hatiyaara kharakhajanaamaa khotaachalanamaa janaa widesile kaida bhuktaana gariraheko kaaraagaara wyawasthaapana wibhaagako tathyaamkamaa ullekha chha apaharana apraakaritika maithuna awaidha bhaaru kaarobaara chori thagi mahilaa bechabikhana sampatti suddhikarana baimkina kasura ra saarwajanika aparaadhamaa sameta widesi naagarikale kaida bhuktaana garirahekaa chhan

gariha mantraalayale gata warsa dherai rassaakassibicha widesi naagarika anugamana nirdesikaa mantristariya nirnayabaata paarita gayo tara nirdesikaa kaaryaanwayana sunya chha nirdesikaa kaaryaanwayana nahunu widesikaa gatiwidhilaai tryaakina garna nasaknu jathaabhaabi anaaraaibhala bhisaa suwidhaa dinu lagaayata kaanuna kaaryaanwayanako kamajora paksako phaaidaa uthaaundai widesiharu aparaadhika gatiwidhimaa sumlagna bhaekaa chhan

prasthaana ra agamanabaaheka widesikaa anya gatiwidhi adhyaagamanalaai thaahaa hundaina gariha mantraalayaantargatako kaaraagaara wyawasthaapana wibhaagale wibhinna aparaadhamaa sajaaya paaekaa widesiko wyawasthaapana gariraheko chha wibhaagakaa mahaanirdesaka hariprasaada mainaalile adaalatako phaisalaapachhi aekaa widesilaai wibhinna kaaraagaaramaa wyawasthaapana garieko bataae unakaa anusaara widesi kaidibandile kaaraagaarabaata nepaalisaraha nai sewaasuwidhaa paairahekaa chhan sarakaarale hareka dina pratyeka kaidibandilaai saya graama chaamala ra nagada sidaako rupamaa rupayaan dindai aeko chha mahaanirdesaka mainaalile bhane widesi tathaa swadesi kaidibandiharuko sampurna swaasthya upachaara sarakaarale nai gardai aeko chha

adhyaagamana wibhaagale ahile baayometriksasahitako saphtaweyara pranaali banaauna thaaleko chha saphtaweyara kaaryaanwayanamaa ayo bhane adhyaagamana pranaalimaa kehi sahaja hune wibhaagako bujhaai chha tara ahile widesiko anugamana garna na gariha mantraalaya gambhira chha na ta adhyaagamana wibhaaga paryatakiya ksetra thamela pokharaa chitawanalagaayata sthaanamaa obhara ste rahekaa katipaya widesiharule awaidha kaama gardai aekaa chhan widesi naagarikamaathi akhtiyaara garne niti aspasta hundaa aparaadhika gatiwidhi garne widesiko sumkhyaa badheko ho

praharilaai laakha hajaara ghusa dina khojne dillikaathamaandau ruta bhaera chalne naa kha nambarako turista basakaa chaalaka sarlaahikaa syaama wiswakarmaa surkhetaki dipaa raanaa ra nuwaakota kakanikaa bharata taamaanalaai pakraau garieko ho
praharile bhaaratabaata awaidha lattaa kapadaa nepaala bhitrandaichha bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa turista basamaa khanatalaasi gareko thiyo

jiri nagarapaalikaa syaamaako dhungemaa budhabaara raati srimaan srimatibicha jhagadaa hundaa warsiyaasrimati phurlamu serpaale chirpatale hirkaaundaa warsiya srimaan nimaatenji serpaako marityu bhaeko ho maritaka nimaatenji nidhaaramaa gahiro chota laageko ra unako sawa khaatamaa ladiraheko awasthaamaa bhetieko praharile janaaeko chha

maritakako sawa postamaartamakaa laagi jillaa aspataala jirimaa raakhieko chha praharikaaanusaara madiraa sewana garera ghara gaekaa nimaatenjisanga srimati phurlamu serpaako jhagadaa bhaeko ra unale awegamaa chirpata prahaara gardaa jyaana gaeko ho

kaathamaadaum saamaakhusibaata kariba saya graamako sumraksita wanyajantu haattiko daahraa jasto wastu thaana sahitadhaadina thaakrekaa warsiya wikaasa taamaana kaabhre panautikaa warsiya kumaara taamaana laamaa nuwaakota kakanikaa warsiya raajakumaara laamaa ra khotaanakaa warsiya pharsuraama raailaai mumgalabaara praharile pakraau gareko haae

yasaigari sohi byurobaata khatieko praharile kaathamaadaum gomgabu basapaarkabaata sumraksita wanyajantu kasturiko winaa jasto kariba graama sahita kaathamaadaum gokarnaeswara basne baaglunakaa warsiya khimabahaadura gharti magaralaai gata chaita gate pakraau gareko chha

praharilebudhabaara bihaana raajabiraajabaata kaathamaadau audai gareko naa kha nambarako basalaaichekajaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara saptari sambhunaatha nagarapaalikaa kaa barsa ko pramoda kumaara saaha jillaa saptari belhi chamenaa kaa barsa ki gitaa debi ra jillaa sunasari barjutaala kaa barsa ki ranbhaa debi daasalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharilebudhabaara diuso wiragumjabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basa jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara makawaanapura agraa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya astamaana syaantaanalaai awaidha laaguausadha charesa kariba keji sahitaniyantranamaa lieko chha
golabajaara nagarapaalikaa balkabaamaa warsiya raamaawataara sadaalaai saamaanya bhanaabhana tathaa baadawiwaadamaa warsiya gowinda sadaale chirapatale taaunkomaa hirkaaundaa unako jyaana gaeko ho

pakraau parekaa sadaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya golabajaaramaa raakhieko ra sadaamaathi muluki aparaadha sumhitaa aina ko parichchheda ko jyaanasambandhi kasuraantargata muddaa chalaaune tayaari garieko prahari naayaba upariksaka kharelale bataae
chhorilaai balaatkaaragari pharaara bhaekaa ekajanaalaai chitawana praharile pakraau gareko chha
purwi chitawana khairahaniki warsiyaa chhorile gata somabaara aphu buwaabaatai patakapataka balaatkarita bhaeko bhandai praharimaa ujuri dieki thiin

piditale ujuri garnuaghinai pharaara bhaekaa ti baabule chhorilaai mahinaadekhi patakapataka balaatkaara gardai aekaa thie praharile budhabaara raati aropitalaai nuwaakotabaata pakraau garera chitawana lyaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka diesapi durgaaraaja regmile bataae
warsiya ti wyaktimaathi thapa awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

pakraau parneharumaa kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa koteswara basneharu sindhupaalchoka daandaapaakhara gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya suraja thaapaa raamechhaapakaa warsiya bikrama srestha jhaapaa bhadrapurakaa warsiya bipina guruna arghaakhaanchi sanddikharkakaa warsiya bibeka khanaala ra chitawana puraano parsaakaa warsiya abhiseka baraama rahekaa chhan
pauwaadunamaa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa ramesa paudelale mahinaako sutkeriaphnai barsiyaa srimati jaanukaakaae ghaanti retera hatyaa garekaahun

kehi barsaaghi maatrai biwaaha garekaa uniharuko mahinaa aghi chhoraa janmieko thiyo gharayaasi wiwaadakaa kaarana ramesale srimatiko hatyaa gareko hunasakne prahariko praarambhika anumaana chha yadyapi hatyaako kaarana spasta nakhulekaale ghatanaabaare thapa anusanthaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya bhojapurale janaaeko chha

hatyaaraa srimaana ramesalaai prahari niyantranamaa liera hiraasatamaa raakhieko chha sawako awasayaka kaanuni pakriyaapuraa gari postamaartamakaa laagi jillaa aspataala lyaaieko bhojapurakaa prahari pramukha diesapi kesawakumaara limbule bataae

mumgalabaara raati sawaa baje kaathamaadaumko tinakunemaa enasisi baimkako etiema mesina phodera rakama chori garna laageko awasthaamaa raamechhaapa ghara bhai kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa basne barsiya wisaala taamaanalaai praharile pakraau garekaae ho

praharile unako saathabaata etiema mesina phutaauna prayoga garne eutaa hataumdaa phalaamako chhino ra maartola sameta baraamada gareko chha ghatanaako wisayamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

kaathamaadaum gomgabu basne raamechhaapakaa warsiya dipaka thapaamagara sameta janaalaai mumgalabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa banjalaa petrola pampa agaadi paarkina gari raakheko naa kha nambarako basakaa thaana taayara chori gari pharaara bhaekaa uniharulaai praharile chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa tinathaanaamaa phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
mahaanagariya prahari traaphika prabhaaga thaapaathalibaata khatieko prahari taaelile baa kha nambara gaadi jaancha garne kramamaataamaanale ukta nagada dina khojekaa thie

sohi thaaunsthita khatieko praharile hetaumdaabaata biragumjatarpha jaandai gareko biara bi bhaaratiya nambara pletako sumo gaadi jaancha garne kramamaa gaadiko chhatamaa phalsabatama banaai lukaaichhipaai lyaaeko ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari chaalaka samiralaai praharile pakraau gareko ho

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya motipurabaata khatieko praharile ukta gutakhaa baraamada gari gaadi chaalaka chaudharilaai gutakhaa ra gaadi sahita awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi antarika raajaswa kaaryaalaya kohalapura baanke pathaaeko chha

bhaktapurako chaanchunaaraayana nagarapaalikaa taathali halalamaa deraamaa basne jhaapaa damakakaa warsiya santosa limbulaai apaharana gareko aropamaakapana chunikhelakaa warsiya dhanalaala sresthasahita janaalaaipraharile pakraau gareko ho pakraau parekaa janaako naama bhane khulaaieko chhaina

dhanalaala sametakaa janaale baacha nambarako kaaramaa santosalaai jabarjasti raakhi lageko suchanaa paaepachhi khatieko prahari tolile bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa bramhaayanaibaata santosako uddaara gari janaalaai gaadisahita pakraau gareko janaaeko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tribhuwanabastibaata khatieko praharile nirajalaai pakraau gari yasa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

chhori balaatkaara garne baabuwiruddha kisoriko amaale kitaani jaaheri dielagattai praharile aropi basnetalaai pakraau gari somabaara bhaktapura jillaa adaalatabaata myaada thapa garaai thapa anusandhaana suru gareko praharile jaanakaari diekaae chha

mohi jaggaako baandaphaanda gari lagata kattaa garne prayojanako laagi sewaagraahisanga ghusa rakamalieko awasthaamaaakhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako kaaryalaya itaharibaata khatieko tolile mandalalaai hajaara ghusa rakamasahita pakraau gareko ho
tina janaa gaanjaa wyaapaari ra uniharulaai chhutaauna ghusa dina khojne ekajanaasahita janaalaai dharaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

dhanakutaabaata keji gaanjaa liera aundai garekaa janaalaai praharile pakraau garepachhi uniharulaai chhutaaunakaa laagi praharilaai nai ghusa dina khojne janaalaai aitabaara ilaakaa prahari kaaryalaya dharaanale pakraau gareko ho

ko ha nambarako tempobhitra jholaabhitra pyaakina gari lyaaudai gareko awasthaamaa dhanakutaako paakhribaasa nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya narabahaadura raai khaalsaa chhintaana sahidabhumi gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya aite bhanne madana raai pakraau parekaa huna

yastai tempolaai aghi aghi skartina garne motarasaaikala chaalaka sahidabhumi gaaupaalikaa haala dharaana baste barsiya wijaya raai pani pakraau parekaa chhan yasaigari gaajaa kharidakartaa wiraatanagara kaa barsiya suraja kumaara saahalaai pani praharile prakraau garna saphala bhaeko chha

prakraau parekaa saathilaai chhutaauna baargeninga garekaa unalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanamaa bolaaera prakraau garieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanakaa diesapi sumana timsinaale bataaunubhayo baargeni garne saahakaa saathabaata rakama diera chhutaauna lyaaeko nagada sameta baraamada gareko uhaale bataaunubhayo

pakraau parekaaharulaai laaguausadha niyantrana aina anusaara laaguausadha osaarapasaara tathaa bikri witaranamaa jillaa adaalata sunasaribaata myaada thapi kaarabaahi agaadi badhaaieko diesapi timsinaale bataae
mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaa sthita mohona maabi pariksaa kendramaa bhaaiko naamamaa esaii pariksaa diiraheko awasthaamaa warsiya amanakumaara goitalaai aitabaara bihaana pakraau garieko chha

gopaala saryuga naayaka janataa maabi bhediyaabaata pariksaa dina aekaa kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya aphnai bhaai pikumkumaara gohitako naamamaa pariksaa diiraheko awasthaamaa amanakumaaralaai jillaa siksaa kaaryaalaya sirahaabaata khatieko anugamana tolile phelaa paari ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mirchaiyaamaa bujhaaeko ho

praharile aja bihaana biragumjabaata kaathamaandau aundai gareko naa cha nambarako yaatrubaahaka sawaari saadhanalaai chekajaancha gardaa parsaa biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa manisa kumaara saahalaai laaguausadha daaijepaama nuphina ra phenaraagana gari saya empula sahita niyantranamaa lieko chha

yasai gari sanibaara nepaalagumjabaata kaathamaandau aundai gareko naa kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka sawaari saadhanabaata baanke kohalapura nagarapaalikaa kaa santosa yaadawalaai naaitbheta tyaableta ra spaarta tyaabaleta sahita niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhulikhela nagarapaalikaa rawiopimaa maadaka padaartha sewana garepachhi srimaana srimatibicha jhagadaa bhaeko ra sohi kramamaa srimati warsiyaa laalimaayaa taamaanale srimaana warsiya sukaraama taamaana maathi khurpaa prahaara gareko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
laalimaayaalaai praharile pakraau gari ghatanaabaare awasya anusandhaana gariheko chha

ti baalikaalai jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya arghaakhaanchi ra prahari chauki dhaakaabaanabaata khatieko praharile ghartimagaralaai pakraau gareko ho
yasai gari jyaathaa sadakabaata baalaaju basne baagaluna gwaalisora gaanupaalikaa kaa bimala gauchanako saathabaata laaguausadha daaijepaama phenaraagana ra nuphina gari empula baraamada gareko chha
srimatilaai kodaalele haanera muraau bhane pharaara bhaeko ra unako khoji kaaryabhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

pidita baalikaakaa aphantale dieko ujuripachhi praharile chandananaatha nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya syaamaraaja bhaaratilaai pakraau garekaae haae baalikaalaai chaita gate asoka namunaa adhaarabhuta widyaalayamaa kheliraheko samayamaa yauna durwyawahaara gareko ujurimaa ullekha garieko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jumlaakaa prahari niriksaka nawina olile pidita baalikaako karnaali swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana siksana aspataala jumlaamaa swaasthya pariksana garieko jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaankaa anusaara ghatanaamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko chha
mahaanagariya prahari bita laganakhelabaata khatieko prahari tolile laaguausadha sahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

praharile aja bihaana bhairahawaa dekhi kaathamaandaum aundai gareko lu kha nambarako yaatruwaahaka basalaai chekajaancha gardaa basamaa sawaara chitawana padamapura basne warsa ko raajendra adhikaariko saathabaata laaguausadha daaijopaama nuphina ra phenaraagana gari empula ra naaitraabheta tyaawaleta baraamada garekaae chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaaratako motihaari ghara bhai bharatapura ksetrapura basne warsiyaa rambaadewi saaha ra unakaa bhaai warsiya wigana saaha rahekaa chhan uniharule warsiyaa bahini parikumaari saahalaai antyestikaa laagi naaraayanai nadi kinaaramaa laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaeko chha

prahari naayaba upariksaka durgaaraaja regmikaa anusaara pakraau parnemaa bhaaratako motihaari ghara bhai bharatapura ksetrapura basne warsiyaa rambaadewi saaha ra unakaa bhaai warsiya wigana saaha rahekaa chhan uniharule warsiyaa bahini parikumaari saahalaai antyestikaa laagi naaraayanai nadi kinaaramaa laijaandai gardaa praharile pakraau gareko ho

praharikoanusaara salako paaso lagaai atmahatyaa garepachhi antyestikaa laagi bahinilaai naditarpha laijaandai gareko pakraau parekaale bayaana diekaa chhan sawa pariksanakaa laagi bharatapura aspataalako sawagarihamaa raakhieko chha
chori tathaa jyaana maarne udyoga muddaakaa pharaara pratibaadi kaaski ghaandruka basne warsiya premabahaadura bikalaai somabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha

kaaski jillaa adaalatabaata dina kaida ra hajaara saya rupaiyaan jaribaanaa tokiekaa pharaara pratiwaadi bikalaai prahari chauki ghaandrukabaata khatieko praharile baagluna waagluna nagarapaalikaa khaalte bhanne sthaanamaa phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

madhyapura thimi nagarapaalikaa lokanthalimaa baa kha nambarako maaikrobasa chaalaka nayaanthimi basne warsiya baabukaaji sresthalaai kutapita gareko abhiyogamaa mugu khachhyaana gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya raajakumaara simha sameta janaalaai somabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha

sunawarsi nagarapaalikaa siktisthita sadakamaa bhaarata siktibaata daayaniyaatarpha paidala aundai gareko warsiya kohima udinalaai awaidha laaguausadha daaileksa disi botala sahita somabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
prahari chauki siktibaata khatieko praharile unalaai talaasi gardaa jholaabhitra plaastikako boraamaa baandhi lyaaeko ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byurobaata khatieko tolile paalpaako paraandi gaaunpaalikaakaa warsiya nirmala gaire ra rupandehikaa warsiya yamaprasaada panthilaai pakraau gareko ho gairelaai chaita gate bhaktapura nayaanthimibaata ra panthilaai chaita gate chitawanabaata so byurobaata khatieko praharile pakraau gareko ho

chaitra gate belukaa gharaayasi wiwaada bhaepachhi gajendrale baabulaai nirghaata kutnukaa saathai dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gari sakhta ghaaite banaaekaa thiekutapitabaata ghaaite bhaekaa baabu dalabahaadura gurunako upachaarakaa laagi jhaapaa laijaane kramamaa baataimaa marityu bhaekojillaa prahari kaaryaalaya taaplejunale janaaekaae chha

siaibile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa baalakumaarikaa rawina pulaami magaralaai sanibaara sunasaribaata pakraau gareko ho kaathamaadaum jillaa adaalatale rawinalaai chaita gate dosi thahara gari barsa kaida sajaayako phaisalaa gareko thiyo
pakraau gari jillaa adaalatamaa sunasarimaa haajira garaaiekaa rawinalaai phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanakaa laagi adaalatale sunasariko jhumkaa kaaraagaara chalaana gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dailekhabaata khatieko prahari tolile pharaara simhalaai aphnai gharamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa prakraau gareko dailekhakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka thaakuraprasaada pokharalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
nepaali chalachitraki puraani nirmaatri prajnaa josilaai praharile pakraau gareko chha cheka baaunsako kesamaa unalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko ho
itahari praharile pakraau garera prajnaalaai kaathamaandaum paathaaeko chha ahile prajnaalaai kaadamaandaum lyaaundai gareko praharile bataaeko chha

praharile sanibaara wihaana rautahata baata kaathamaandaun tarpha aundai gareko naa kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka basalaai cheka jaancha garne kramamaa rautahatakaamanoja yaadawa bhanne rubodha kumaara yaadawako saathabaata srota nakhuleko laakha rupaiyaan baraamada garekaae chha

parichaya nakhulekaa maanisakaa samuhale goli prahaara gardaa karisnanagara nagarapaalikaa widyaanagarakaa warsakaa paarasa puriko marityu bhaeko prahari upariksaka achyutam pudaasainile jaanakaari dinubhayo
chhaatimaa goli laagi gambhira ghaaite puriko upachaarako kramamaa praadesika aspataala butawalamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
so thaaunmaa dyutimaa khatieko praharile naa kha nambarako basabaata orladai garekaa abdulale bokeko jholaamaa ukta laaguausadha charesa phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho

baa pa nambarako skutara chori gari laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa kaathamaadaum koteswara basne kaabhre dolaalaghaata ghara bhaekaa warsiya sri sresthalaai aitabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

khukuri prahaarabaatagambhira ghaaite chandaalaai upachaarako laagi wipi koiraalaa swaasthya bijnaana pratisthaana dharaana lagieko chha khukuri prahaara garne sasuraa situmaanalaai prahari chauki bhaagalapurale niyantranamaa lieko chha

unako gharamaa hatiyaara raakheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetabaata khatieko praharile talaasi gardaa bistaraamuni salale beri lukaai chhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa ukta banduka phelaa paari paandelaai pakraau gareko ho
dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaarabaata ghaaite siddhi sumkara raaiko sotaana swaasthya chauki sotaanamaaupachaara bhairahekaae chha
daksinai dhaadinamaa lukaaichhipaai raakhieko awasthaamaa bihibaara raati charesa charesa banaaune dhulo ra gaanjaa baraamada gari eka janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

nepaala prahariko laaguausadha niyantrana wyuro ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajuriko tolile wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa chhaapaa maareko thiyo gajuri gaaunpaalikaa petaare niwaasi warsiyaa sukumaayaa taamaanako ghara ra gothamaa raakhieko awasthaamaa laaguausadha baraamada garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka ewum suchanaa adhikaari prakaasa wistale bataaunubhayo

parwata jillaako modi gaaunpaalikaa chitremaa kutapita gari eka yuwaako hatyaa bhaeko chha gata mangalabaara raati bajeko samayamaa sangai basera madiraa sewana garekaa yuwaabicha jhagadaa hundaa sthaaniya warsiya santosa bhanne gangaaprasaada wikako hatyaa bhaeko ho

gata mangalabaara raati bajeko samayamaa maritaka gangaaprasaada wika pakraau parekaa nepaali ra sunaara tathaa pharaara rahekaa karisnalesangai basi maadaka padaartha sewana gari ghara pharkane kramamaa saamaanya wiwaada hundaa tina janaa milera gangaaprasaadako hatyaa gareko praharile janaaeko chha pakraau parekaa abhiyuktalaai bihibaara parwata jillaa adaalatabaata saata dinako myaada thapa gari thapa anusandhaana kaarya bhairaheko prahari naayaba upariksaka tiwaarile jaanakaari dinubhayo maritaka wikako sawa pariksanakaakaa laagi jillaa aspataala parwatamaa raakhieko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pharpinabaata khatieko prahari tolile yahi chaita gate kaathamaandaukaae pharpina basapaarkamaa sawaari saadhanaharu cheka jaamcha garne kramamaa parsaa biragumjakaa barsa ko satu kumaara guptaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

dhanusaa nagaraaina nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sambhu daasa warsiya dharmendra kumaara daasa ra janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sonu mandalalaai mumgalabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

sambhu ra dharmendralaai simaa prahari chauki lagmaa jatahi dhanusaabaata khatieko prahari tolile nagaraaina nagarapaalikaa sthita baasajhaaribaata ra mandalalaai janakapurajatahi sadaka khandabaata phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa jamunaahasthita baijanaatha gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya sani thaaru ra sohi sthaana basne warsiya sikendra thaarulaai awaidha laaguausadha braauna sugara kariba graama sahita praharile pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jamunaahabaata khatieko praharile bhe pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalako hedalaaita bhitrapattiko bhaagamaa lukaaeko ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

wiraganjako inarwaabaata bihibaara bihaana praharile laaguausadha gaajaasahita amaa chhorilaai pakraau gareko chha prahari chauki inarwaabaata khatieko prahari tolile laaguausadhagaanjaako dhulo kilosahita amaachhorilaai pakraau gareko ho

nepaalabaata bhaaratatarpha paidala hindi jaandai garekaa uniharulaai prahari chauki inarwaa parsaabaata khatieko prahari tolile jaancha garne kramamaa sarirako bibhinna bhaagamaa lukaai chhipaai raakhi laijaadai gareko ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

iswarapura nagarapaalikaa raamanagara basne warsiyaa kisorilaai jabarajasti karanaigareko abhiyogamaa sohi sthaana basne warsiya raajana kumaara mahato sudilaai budhabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

gata mumgalabaara unale ti kisorilaai daratraasa dekhaai aphno gharamaa laagi jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne khabara budhabaara ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kesaragumjamaa praapta hunaasaatha khatieko praharile raajanalaai pakraau gareko ho
manoharaa pulamaa diutimaa khatieko praharilaai saya rupaiyaan dina khojnekaabhre paanchakhaala kaa anisa taamaana ra sahachaalaka sindhupaalchokakaa rawi sresthalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

mahaanagariya prahari waritta thimibaata khatiekoprahari tolile baa kha nambarako tipharalaai chekajaanchagarne kramamaa chaalaka ra sahachaalakale saathamaa chaalaka anumatipatra nabhaekaale praharilaai ukta nagada dina khojekaa thie

andolanako nebisumgha ksetriya sabhaapati homanaatha pokhrela sukunaa bahumukhi kyaampasakaa sabhaapati bijaya tolaanagisachiba samira samraata sadasya jiwana basneta lagaayata ghaaite bhaeko nebisumghale janaaeko chha thapa ghatanaa huna nadin kyaampasamaa prahari tainaatha raheko ra haala abasthaa saamaanya raheko praharile jaanakaari diekaae chha
kanchanapura bedakota nagarapaalikaako champhaapuramaa raheko asthaayi prahari chaukimaa raatikaa belaa dhungaa mudhaa garne paanchalaai praharile aja pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa champhaapurakaa wikaasa wista dhirendra chanda iswara chatauta dhirendra raawala ra hari boharaa rahekaa chhan ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhalaariko tolile paanchai janaalaai pakraau gareko ho

gaeraati baje praharichauki najikaiko chokamaa jammaa bhaekaa paanchai janaale ho hallaa garna thaalepachhi praharile samjhaai gharapathaauna khojepachhi prahari chaukimai pugera dhungaamudhaa gari prahari maathinai haatapaata garepachhi pakraau garieko chha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhalaarikaa prahari niriksaka ramesadatta awasthile bhannubhayo

chaukiko dhokaasameta todaphoda bhaeko uhaanle bataaunubhayo pakraau parekaa paanchai janaalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa pathaaieko chha pakraau parekaamaathi saarwajanika saantisuraksaa wiruddhako kasura antargata muddaa chalaaune tayaari garieko chha dhungaamudhaa garneko samuhabaata praharile eka bhaaratiya nambara pletako ra eka nepaali nambara pletako motarasaaikala sameta baraamada gareko chha

janataa maawi basabittibaata pariksaa diirahekaa hyaappilainda sekendri maawikaa anila saaha ra wimala daasalaai sameta ajako pariksaa sakine wittikai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha pahilo dina phelaa pareko mobaaila uniharuko raheko pattaa laagepachhi anusandhaanakaa laagi niyantranamaa liieko praharile janaaeko chha

ukta widyaalayamaa chitakaa laagi prayoga bhaeko bewaarise mobaaila sameta phelaa pareko chha chita choraaune kaaryamaa sumlagna raheko aropamaa khadaka nagarapaalikaa kaa dewanaaraayana mandala khadaka kaa manojakumaara chaudhari ra khadaka kaa raamasundara chaudhari surungaa nagarapaalikaa kaa lagendraprasaada chaudhari ra surungaa kaa raamaananda chaudhari pakraau pareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kadarabonaale janaaeko chha pariksaa amaryaadita bhaeko wisayamaa kendraadhyaksa raamaawataara guptaalaai sameta raajawiraaja jhikaai sodhapuchha garieko chha

gata jethamaa dipaayalamaa ksetriya kaaryaalaya kholeko karnaali egrikalchara debhalapamenta nepaalale sudurapaschima pradesakaa pahaadi jillaa achhaama baitadi baajuraa bajhaana ra dotibaata ru laakha hajaara liera pharaara bhaeko sthaaniyawaasiko aropa chha

sumsthaakaa karmachaari rakama liera pharaara bhaekaa wisayamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa ahilesamma kunai pani ujuri napareko prahari pramukha widyaananda maajhile bataaunubhayo uhaanle bhannubhayorakama liera sumsthaa bhaagyo bhanne sunnamaa aeko chha tara ujuri kasaile dieko chhaina pharaara bhaekaa ukta sumsthaakaa karmachaarile sthaaniyawaasi dirgharaaja raanaako ghara bhaadaasameta natireko bataaieko chha utta sumsthaako kendriya kaaryaalaya nepaalaganjamaa raheko ra sumsthaakaa adhyaksa bhrastaachaarako aropamaa kaaraagaara pareko bataaieko chha

taarakeswara nagarapaalikaa manamaiju deraa gari basne solukhumbukaa warsiya santosa laamaa ra kaathamaadaum taarakeswara nagarapaalikaa kaabhresthali basne warsiya ajaya laamaalaai niyantrita laaguausadha phenaaragana empula nurphina empula ra daaijepaama empula sahita mumgalabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha
morana miklaajuna sthita laamaa kholaako kinaaramaa bharuwaa banduka thaana bewaarise awasthaamaa phelaa paari mumgalabaara diuso praharile baraamada gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya urlaabaaribaata khatieko prahari tolile gasti garne kramamaa ukta banduka bewaarise awasthaamaa phelaa paari baraamada gareko ho

pratibandhita wiplawa maaowaadikaa kaaryakartaalaai niyantrana garna tathaa saamaajika wikariti wisumgati ra gundaagardi lagaayata anya aparaadhika ghatanaaharu niyantrana garna praharile akasmika kardana enda bisesa sarcha apresana abhiyaana sanchaalana gareko chha sohi kramamaa praharile khairo hiroinasahita pakraau gareko ho
jhaapaa kamala gaaunpaalikaa samayagadhamaa warsiyaa yuwatilaai jabarjasti karanai gareko aropamaa praharile eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa sthaaniyawaasi warsiya samsera taamaana raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaeko chha ghara najikaiko makaibaarimaa lagera mangalabaara raati baje jabarjasti karanai gareko yuwatikaa bubaale dieko ujurikaa adhaaramaa praharile taamaanalaai prakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa prawaktaa mahendrakumaara sresthale jaanakaari dinubhayo
taamaanalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakako hiraasatamaa raakhera anusandhaana bhairaheko pani uhaanle bataaunubhayo

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa khatieko prahari tolile praharile aja diusaae budhaalikantha nagarapaalikaa kapanabaata bhaktapura basne mugukaa rupa bahaadura budhaalaaichekajaancha gardaa nijako saathabaata ukta charesasahita pakraau gareko chha

bardiyaako madhuwana nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya gowinda pariyaaralaai gaadi chadhera bhaagne kramamaa kaathamaadaunsthita ratnapaarkabaata somabaara saanjha pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhulikhelakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dipaka girile jaanakaari dinubhayo

uhaankaa anusaara pariyaara ghara banaaune kaamamaa kehi samayadekhi kaabherapalaanchokako wibhinna sthaanamaa basdai aekaa thie gata sanibaara raati baje ti kisorilaai phona gari bhetna bolaaera jabararjasti gardaa sthaaniyawaasile thaahaa paaepachhi pariyaara bhaageko pidita pariwaaradwaaraa gata aitabaara kaabherapalaanchoka praharimaa dartaa kitaani jaaherimaa ullekha garieko chha pakraau parekaa yuwakako somabaaraiai myaada thapa gari ghatanaako anusandhaanakaa laagi hiraasatamaa raakhieko praharile janaaeko chha

kaabherapalaanchoka praharile yahi chaita gate mandanadeupura nagarapaalikaa kodaaritolaki eka warsaki kisoriko saamuhika balaatkaaramaa sumlagna chaarajanaa yuwakalaai pani pakraau gari jabararjasti karanai kasuramaa muddaa chalaaeko chha

abhiyukta taamaanale yuwatilaai aitabaara balaatkaara gareko aropamaa somabaara jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa ujuri diepachhi somabaara nai pakraau garieko prahari naayaba upariksaka bhimalaala bhattaraaile jaanakaari dinubhayo
praharile siraahaabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji baraamadagareko chha
aurahi gaaunpaalikaa tulsiyaahisthita bhitri sadakamaa bewaarise awasthaamaa raheko awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji somabaara saanjha praharile baraamada gareko chha

haala nambara nakhuleko motarasaaikalamaa sawaara aparichita byaktiharule ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sukhipurabaata gastimaa khatieko praharilaai dekhnaasaatha motarasaaikalabaata jholaa phaali pharaara bhae paschaata praharile jholaa jaancha gardaa ukta parimaanako gaanjaa baraamada gareko ho

yasaigari kaathamaadaum tokhaa nagarapaalikaa bharatapaatisthita nirmaanadhina gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa tokhaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya raamadewa rimaala sameta janaalaai buka taasa ra nagada laakha hajaara rupaiyaan sahita somabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha
kaathamaadaumsiraahaadhanakutaa ramakawaanapurabaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita praharile pakraau tathaa baraamadagareko chha

kaathamaadaum kaandaaghaari basne bhaarata sitaamanai ghara bhaekaa warsiya ajaya saastrilaai niyantrita laaguausadha nurphina empula phenaaragana empula ra daaijelyaapa empula sahita aitabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha
mahaanagariya prahari baritta kaalimaatibaata khatieko praharile kaandaaghaaristhita sadakamaa hindiraheko awasthaamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

siraahaa bariyaarapatti gaaunpaalikaa tenuwaapattibaata niyantrita laaguausadha naaitrobheta tyaableta spaasmoproksibhana thaana ra daaileksa disi saya mililitarako botala sahita mirchaiyaan nagarapaalikaa basne barsiyaa anilaa yaadawa ra udayapura kataari nagarapaalikaa ki barsiyaa apisa thaapaalaai aitabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bariyaarapatti siraahaabaata khatieko prahari tolile uniharulaai sumkaalaagi jaancha gardaa ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

dhanakutaa saagurigadhi gaaunpaalikaapaa bhadraaksesthita sadakabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji sahita sunasari itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa simarawanaa basne warsiya sumjaya limbu sameta janaalaai aitabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

prahari chauki daandaabajaarabaata khatieko tolile ukta sadakamaa ko ha nambarako atomaa jaancha garne kramamaa ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari chaalaka limbu sameta atomaa sawaara janaalaai pakraau gareko ho

makawaanapura raaksiraana gaaunpaalikaa kaapentaara basne warsiya kaanchhaalaala syaanataanako gharabaata kariba saya keji laaguausadha gaanjaa phelaa paari aitabaara diuso praharile baraamada gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile syaanataanako ghara jaancha gardaa ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari baraamada gareko ho pharaara syaanataanako praharile khoji gariraheko chha

dhanusaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya dhiraja mahatokaae saathabaata andaaji graama suna ra kataari riyaala saya sahitapakraau gareko chha mahatale abaidha rupamaa sumkalana gari laijaana laageko ukta suna tathaa kataari riyaala sahita wimaanasthalamaa khatieko praharile unalaai phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
mahatolaai awasyaka anusandhaana ewum kaarawaahiko laagi tribhuwana wimaanasthala bhansaara kaaryaalaya gauchara pathaaieko antarraastriya wimaanasthala suraksaa kaaryaalaya gaucharale janaaeko chha

aitabaara diunso gaanu najikai bhalibala kheldaa wiwaada bhaepachhi surmaa gaanupaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa jiwana boharaa ra ranu boharaale saaehi thaanukai warsiya ananda wikalaai laurole haanera ghaaite banaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari naayawaupariksaka prawina dhitaalale bataaunubhayo
ghaaite wikako jillaa aspataalamaa upachaara huna nasake pachhi nepaalaganja riphara garieko thiyo unako somabaara bihaana attariyaa pugdai gardaa baatomaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
ghatanaamaa sumglagna duwaijanaa pharaara rahekaale khaaji kaarya bhairahekodiesapi dhitaale bataaunu bhayo
