pradhaanaadhyaapakale ghatanaa lukaauna abhibhaawakalaai dabaaba diekaa thie chhoroko upachaara kharchasameta nadine bataaeko dukheso unale patrakaarasaamu garin aitabaara suru waarsika pariksaa dina raaju wanchita bhaekaa chhan aruko uksaahatamaa ghatanaalaai thulo banaauna khojieko daabi pradhaanaadhyaapakale gare bachchaa kutaaibaata nabhai myaanenjaaitisakaa kaarana biraami bhaeko ho unale bhane aspataalako kharcha milaaune kuraa bhaeko chha pitaaikai kaarana baalaka aspataala bharnaa bhaeko pramaanaita bhae siksikaalaai kaarabaahi garne pratibaddhataa unale janaae

holi parwakaa dina sunasariko dharaana upamahaanarapaalikaa baganaichaa laainamaa nimaasa taamaanako hatyaamaa sumlagna raheko aropamaa prajillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile taamaanako chhuraa prahaara garera hatyaa garne chaaralaai pakraau garera aitabaara saarwajanika gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa dharaana kaa warsiya susaanta limbu dharaana paanamaaraakaa warsiya manisa laawati limbu warsiya nischala wika ra warsiya sarana raai raheko sunasarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka jnaanendraprasaada phuyaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

uniharubaata nagada laakha hajaara rupaiyaan yuro saya chaainija yuana hajaara saya bhaaratiya rupainyaa hajaara saya bhutaani mudraa saya koriyana mudraa hajaara malesiyana mudraa ingalyaanda paaunda simgaapura dalara majyaana khelna prayoga hune goti hajaara wataa kaudaa thaana taasa buka ra juwaataasa khelna prayoga hune anya saamaana praharile baraamada gareko chha
baa kha nambarako minitraka jaancha garne kramamaa niyama wiparita chalaaekomaa traaphika niyama anusaara kaarawaahi garne kramamaa chaalaka kaarkile praharilaai saae rakama dina khaaejekaa thie

kaathamaadaum jillaamaa sthaanamaa wama wisphota bhani amaryaadita bhramapurna samaachaara sumpresana gari jhuttaa aphawaaha phailaaeko abhiyogamaa analaaina awaaja datakamakaa sahasampaadaka kapilawastukaa warsiya gaurawa khanaalalaai budhabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehibaata khatieko praharile unalaai pakraau gari saaiwara aparaadha antargata kaarawaahikaa laagi bihibaara mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaum pathaaeko ho

sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa jutapaanisthita basa bisauni chokabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji sahita makawaanapura raaniseraa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya paalasaana bamajanalaai bihibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya laalabandibaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa unalaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

suryawinaayaka nagarapaalika katunje subarnaeswara chokabaata awaidha rupamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa sohi sthaana basne sindhupaalchoka lisumkhupaakhara gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya narwu laamaa sameta janaalaai nagada laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita bihibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

bhujelale baalikaako guptaanga lagaayata sumbedanasila angaharumaa jabarajasti chalaai ghaaite banaaeko bhanne suchanaa praapta huna saatha prahari chauki phattepura saptaribaata khatieko prahari tolile unalaai pakraau gareko ho ghaaite baalikaako sthaaniya phattepura poliklinikamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

bhaaratiya nambara pletako yupiti numko trakamaa lukaaichhipaai bhaaratatarpha laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa sukrabaara bihaana ukta parimaanamaa charesa baraamada gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajurikaa prahari niriksaka nawaraaja dhungelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

laaguausadha charesasahita gajuri gaaunpaalikaa najikai parithwiraajamaargabaata bhaarata uttara pradesa niwaasi warsiya mau mahaatapalaai pakraau gari hiraasatamaa liieko chha gaadisameta niyantranamaa liera thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

sarlaahiko barahathawaa maasthaaniya raameswara sigdelako gharamaa kothaa bhaadaamaa liera basekaa udayapura surunagaakaa warsiya raamaji wiswakarmaale warsaki srimati sunitaa wiswakarmaalaai bihibaara raati khukuri prahaara gari hatyaa gareko praharile janaaeko chha
hatyaa garera bhaagdai garekaa unalaai praharile raati nai pakraau gareko ho hatyaako baaremaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko sarlaahi praharile jaanaeko chha
maritakako sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala malumgawaa pathaaeko chha

nepaala widyut praadhikarana tanahun witarana kendrale chaalu arthika warsa ko atha mahinaako awadhimaa widyut chuhaawata garne janaalaai kaarawaahi gareko chha witarana kendrale mitara waaipaasa garne mitaramaa puraa khapata huna nadine mitaramaa anya wastu prayoga garne mitarako sila todnelagaayata kaarya garne laai kaarawaahi gareko ho

kendrakaa pramukha siwa gosalile anadhikarita bijuli prayoga garne graahakabaata kaarawaahiswarupa ru tina laakha hajaara asula garieko jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaankaa anusaara widyut chuhaawata niyantrana kaaryaantargata banda bhaekaa bigriekaa mitara pariwartana garne mitarako chhadke niriksana garne mitara risilina kaarya garne thulaa graahakako tiodi mitarako khapata yunita daaunaloda gari daataa enalaaisisa garne tathaa traansapharmara thapne taara thapne nayaan laaina wistaara garne puraano naango taaralaai nayaan kaalo taarale pherne kaarya bhairaheko chha

gosalikaa anusaara kendrale widyut chuhaawata ghataauna ullekhya saphalataa praapta gareko chha gata arthika warsa saaunamaa pratisata widyut chuhaawata rahekaamaa maaghasamma pratisata kaayama raakhna witarana kendra saphala bhaeko gosalile bataaunubhayo

arthika warsa ko samagra widyut chuhaawata pratisata rahekaamaa chaalu arthika warsako maaghasamma widyut chuhaawata pratisata maatrai raheko kendrale janaaeko chha gosalikaa anusaara widyut chuhaawatamaa niyantrana kadaai garieko kaarana widyut chuhaawata ghateko ho thulaa graahakako mitara niyamita niriksana daataa daaunaloda daataa enalaaisisa garne banda mitara pherne saamudaayika thoka mitaramaa echati mitara raakhiekaa kaarana widyut chuhaawata ghataauna sahaja bhaeko uhaanle bataaunubhayo
khaandabaari nagarapaalikaa khaaisona gaaunmaa kaainlaa chhoraa sumjaya raaile warsiya bubaa bhuwanasimha raaiko hatyaagarekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sumkhuwaasabhaale janaaeko chha
bubaako hatyaamaa sumlagna chhoraa bhane pharaara rahekaa chhan maritakako sawa muchulakaa tayaara paarera postamaartamakaa laagi jillaa aspataala khaandabaari lyaaine praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaa laaguausadha niyantrana wyuro koteschara kaathamaadaum ralaaguausadha niyantrana wyuro saakhaa kaaryaalaya parsaabaata sumyuktarupamaa khatieko praharile jaachan garna kramamaa jholaamaa lukaaichhipaai lyaaiko awasthaamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari unalaai pakraau garako ho
hotalabhitra awaidharupamaa aslila kaarya sanchaalana gareko aropamaa praharile sirahaako mirchaiyaasthita eka hotala sanchaalakalaai pakraau gari muddaa chalaaeko chha

hotalabhitra awaidha yaunajanya kriyaakalaapa sanchaalana gareko bhandai praharile raahula hotalakaa sanchaalaka sanjaya thaakura ra lalitaa thaakura sarmaalaai pakraau gari saarwajanika aparaadha muddaa chalaaeko ho hotalabhitra awaidharupamaa yuwati raakhera yauna kriyaakalaapa garaairaheko sthaaniyawaasiko gunaasopaschaata sanchaalakalaai pakraau gari muddaa chalaaieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mirchaiyaakaa prahari niriksaka dinesa gautamale jaanakaari dinubhayo
traaphika praharile holimaa upatyakaabhitra jathaabhaawi rupamaa sawaari saadhana chalaaune chaalakalaai kaarawaahi gareko chha
mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale budhabaara traaphika niyama ullanghana garne duipaangre ra wataa chaarapaangre sawaari saadhanalaai kaarawaahi gareko ho

mahaasaakhaale helmeta nalagaai chalaaune tinajanaa raakhera chalaaune maadaka padaartha sewana gari chalaaune kaagajapatra nalii chalaaune jathaabhaawi laaparawaahi tarikaale chalaaune sarakaari ra anya kasuramaa chaalakalaai kaarawaahi gareko chha jasamadhye sawaari saadhanalaai kaarawaahi garera chhaadeko ra baanki sawaari saadhanalaai mahaasaakhaamaa lyaaera raakhieko chha mahaasaakhaale holi parwalaai durghatanaarahita ra maryaadita banaauna bhandaa badhi traaphika prahari khataaeko thiyo

bihaana dekhi belukaa bajesamma mahaasaakhaale sthaanabaata traaphika jaancha gareko thiyo bhane wataa mobaaila jaancha ra motarasaaikalamaa traaphika prahari parichaalana garekoe mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha mahaasaakhaale holi parwamaa kaarawaahi parekaa sawaari saadhanalaai aniwaarya kaksaamaa sahabhaagi hune wyawasthaa gareko chha
saptarikaa eka wyaapaariko apaharana garna khojne dui aropitalaai praharile pakraau gari aja apaharana tathaa sarira bandhaka muddaamaa kaarawaahi thaaleko chha

saptariko daakaneswari nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya mo jiyaaula hakako apaharana prayaasa gareko aropamaa sohi thaaunkaa warsiya malaabakasa miyaan ra warsiya raasalaala saahalaai pakraau gari kaarawaahi thaalieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

bodebarsaaina nagarapaalikaa maa tayaari saringaara ra kapadaa pasala sanchaalana garibasekaa hakalaai gata phaaguna gate pasalabaata ghara pharkane kramamaa baataabaatai apaharana garna khojieko thiyo apaharana gari bhaaratatarpha laijaana laageko belaa simaa suraksaa balakaa bhaaratiya praharile roki sodhapuchha garna thaalepachhi apaharanakaari bhaageko ra aphno jyaana jogieko hakale bataaunubhayo simaa suraksaa balakaa bhaaratiya praharile sameta so kuraako pusti gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka bhaawesa rimaalale bataaunubhayo

pasala banda gari motarasaaikalabaata ghara pharkirahekaa belaa hatiyaarasahita nakaawa lagaaekaa athadasa apaharanakaarile kutapita gari apaharana garna khojeko hakale bataaunubhayo apaharanakaarisanga katuwaa pestolasameta raheko thiyo gamchhaale haata baandhera daakaneswariko hatela hundai bhaaratako laukahitarpha laijaana laageko belaa bhaaratiya prahariko tolikaa kaarana ma jogien uhaanle bhannubhayo kutapitabaata ghaaite hakako pinthyubhari niladaama laageko chha bhane taauko phuteko chha raajawiraajasthita gajendranaaraayana simha aspataalamaa upachaara garaainubhaekaa hakako haala nyuro aspataala wiraatanagaramaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

saanibheri gaaunpaalikaakaa warsiya eka wyaktilaaiaphnai warsiyaa chhorilaai balaatkaara gareko ujurikaa adhaaramaa pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari naayawa upariksaka sumita khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

piditaki amaale baabule aphnai chhorilaai lagaataara dui warsadekhibalaatkaara gardai aeko bhandai prahari chauki purtimakaadaamaa niwedana dieki thiin unale gaekaaesukrabaara pachhillo pataka chhorimaathi balaatkaara gareko ujurimaa ullekha bhaeko diesapikhadkaale bataaunubhayo

gata aitabaara raati sohi nagarapaalikaasthita indraawati nadiko bagaramaa lagi ti baalikaalaai raai sameta janaale jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne khabara mumgalabaara bihaana praapta hunaasaatha prahari chauki higuwaapaatibaata khatieko praharile raai sameta janaalaai pakraau gareko ho
kutapitabaata ghaaite bhaekaa raamawilaasako oma dirghaayu aspataala janakapuramaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
prahari chauki ganaesapurabaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa unalaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabhojapurale jabarjasti karanai muddaakaa pharaara abhiyuktalaai warsapachhi pakraau gareko chha

praharile jillaa adaalata bhojapurabaata wisum chaita gate jabarjasti karanai muddaamaa tina warsa tina mahinaa kaida sajaaya tokiekaa temkemaiyuna gaaunpaalikaa khambukhaakaa warsiya gajakumaara raailaai pakraau gareko ho

raailaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurabaata gaeko prahari tolile jangalamaa raheko gothamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa sanibaara pakraau gareko ho raailaai adaalatako adesamaa kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya chalaana garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurale janaaeko chha

tyastai adaalatale arkaa ekalaai pupakrsakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaana gareko chha adaalatale bhojapura nagarapaalikaa helauchhaakaa warsiya sujana raailaai jabarjasti karanai udyogamaa pupakrsakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaana gareko ho raaile gata phaaguna gate sohi thaaunki warsiya baalikaalaai mandiramaa lagi karanai garna khojeko praharile janaaeko chha raailaai pidita baalikaako ujuripachhi gata phaaguna gate pakraau garieko thiyo
sarakaari jaggaa wyaktiko niji naamamaa garne bhumaaphiyaalaai saghaaeko aropamaa baanke praharile atha sarakaari karmachaarilaai niyantranamaa lieko chha

sarakaari jaggaako kaagajaata kirte gareko aropamaa gae raati bhumisudhaara tathaa maatapota kaaryaalaya baanke ra bardiyaakaa atha karmachaarilaai niyantranamaa liieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankekaa pramukha prahari upariksaka aruna paudelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

maalapota kaaryaalayakaa naayawa subbaa rudra dewakotaa tanka sarmaa ra raamabahaadura khadkaa kampyutara aparetara yajnaswara wali prema chanda ra bhumisudhaara tathaa maalapota kaaryaalaya bardiyaakaa naayawa subbaa karisnalaala sarmaa ra kharidaara bhumiraaja pokharelalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho

yasaigari maalapota kaaryaalaya baankebaata haala hulaaka kaaryaalaya baankemaa saruwaa hunubhaekaa adhikarita puspaa sresthalaai pani baanke praharile niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana suru gareko chha

sewaagraahiko bhidabhaada hune bhumisudhaara tathaa maalapota kaaryaalaya baankekaa paancha karmachaari prahariko niyantranamaa parepachhi kaaryaalayako kaama prabhaawita hune bhaeko chha baankekaa pramukha jillaa adhikaari madana bhujelale sewaa prawaahamaa samasyaa aune sthiti ae anya kaaryaalayabaata karmachaari jhikaaera kaama niyamita paarine bataaunubhayo
mahaanagariya prahari tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthala kaaryaalayale awaidharupamaa suna widesa laijaane kramamaa chaara janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

kaaryaalayale widesa laijaanakaa laagi antarraastriya udaanatarphako paarkina ksetrabaata chitawanakaa sunila raauta baaraakaa sandipa patela makawaanapurakaa arpana kesi ra khotaanakaa manoja raailaai somabaara saanjha pakraau gareko ho
pakraau parekaa chaarai janaalaai suna ra saamaanasahita awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi tribhuwana wimaanasthala bhansaara kaaryaalaya pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
aparichita wyaktiharule gokarnaeswara nagarapaalikaa sthita hanumaanachoka najikabaata chori gari laijaadai gareko thaana motarasaaikala somabaara bihaana praharile baraamada gareko chha

makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa churesthita sadakabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji sahita bhaarata bihaara basne warsiya bisnau kumaara saaha sameta janaalaai aitabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pasupatinagarabaata khatieko praharile hetaumdaabaata baaraatarpha jaandai gareko dablubi nambarako gaadi jaancha garne kramamaa dikkimaa plaastikamaa lukaai chhipaai raakheko ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari chaalaka saaha ra gaadimaa sawaara janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho
morana ratuwaamaai nagarapaalikaa amabaaristhita sadakabaata laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji phelaa paari aitabaara saanjha praharile baraamada gareko chha

sohi nagarapaalikaa miyaatola basne warsiya bhabhalaa bhanne meheroudina miyaale sohi nagarapaalikaa bhadra choka basne warsiyaa sobhaadewi saaha ra unakaa chhoraa warsiya raahula bhanne wikki saahalaai ukta laaguausadha dindai geko awasthaamaa prahari chauki jhurkiyaabaata khatieko prahari tolilaai dekhnaa ukta gaanjaa chhaadi pharaara bhaepaschaata praharile ukta laaguausadha baraamada gareko ho

praharile gulmi chhatrakota gaaunpaalikaa pallikota basne warsiya padamapaathi paandekaae saathabaatasuna jasto dekhine pahemlo dhaatuko baalaa thaana ra aumthi thaana sameta gari kariba saya graama suna jasto dekhine pahemlo dhaatusahitasanibaara raati pakraau gareko chha

laaguausadha niyantrana byuro saakhaa kaaryaalaya biragumjabaata khatieko praharile sohi thaaunsthita laamaale chalaai lyaaeko naa pa nambarako skutaralaai jaancha gardaa skutarako dikimaa ukta parimaanako laaguausadha lukaai lyaaeko awasthaamaa phelaa paari skutara sahita laamaalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho

saamuhika balaatkaarakaa tina kasuradaaralaai jillaa adaalata saptarile janahi warsa kaida sajaayako phaisalaa gareko chha jillaa nyaayaadhisa umesa koiraalaako ijalaasale raajawiraaja nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sambhu saaha wadaa num kaa warsiya nawina datta ra wadaa num kaa warsiya phudina khaanalaai balaatkaarako kasuramaa atha ra saamuhika balaatkaarako kasuramaa thapa paancha warsa gari warsa kaida sajaayako phaisalaa bhaeko adaalatale jaanakaari dieko chha

aropitamadhye kamalakisora rupani gaaunpaalikaa terahautaakaa warsiya jitendra mandala khanga ra sunasariko gadhi gaaunpaalikaa saterajhoraakaa warsiya dipaka kherawaara yaadawale jetha gate abhiyoga daabibaata saphaai paaekaa thie

purwapaschima raajamaargakaae laalabandi nagarapaalikaa lakhanadehi pula najika baata kilo awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita sarlaahi hariwana nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya jitendra raauta ra laalabandi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya mahammada najaaudinalaai bihibaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya laalabandi ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalapurabaata khatieko praharile ga pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai jaancha gardaa uniharule bokeko jholaabhitra ukta gaanjaa phelaa paari motarasaaikala sahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho
wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa asthaai prahari posta jahare ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya chhinchubaata khatieko praharile ukta hatiyaara nija gobindako gharamaa phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho
saba dibhijana wana kaaryaalayataaraagaaun kailaalikaa sahaayaka wana adhikarita bharata saaha ra lekhapaadhi wyaawasaayi puspa josilaai akhtiyaarako tolile pakraau gareko ho
bardiyaako madhuwana nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa parsuraama chaudharile kaaryapaalikaa sadasya dhanawira pariyaaramaathiakramana garekaa chhan

phaaganu gate naari diwasako awasaramaa wadaa kaaryaalayale ayojanaa gareko kaaryakramamaa kaaryapaalikaa sadasya dhanawirale kaama garirahekaa saamaajika parichaalikaa hataaieko bhandai apatti janaaekaa thie

gate kaaryapaalikaako baithaka sakinai laagdaa pugekaa pariyaarale aphu nagara pramukha ganaesa kesisanga chhalaphala garirahekaae samayamaa wadaadhyaksa chaudharile ekkaasi haatapaata gareko bataaekaa chhan

wadaadhyaksale dhanawiramaathi kursisameta prahaara gari haatapaata nai garepachhi nagara pramukha kesile chhutyaaekaa thie dhanawirale wadaadhyaksawiruddha kaarabaahiko maaga gardai ujuri gareko bataaekaa chhan
nepaali kaamgresa madhuwana nagara kaaryasamitile patrakaara sammelana gari wadaadhyaksa chaudharilaai kaarabaahi garna maaga gareko chha
nepaalaganja ksetramaa motarasaaikala chorikaaryamaa sumlagna girohalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

dailekha chaamundaa bindraasaini nagarapaalikaa kaa nyaupaanemaathi sodhapuchha gardaa dailekha chaamundaa bindraasaini nagarapaalikaa kaa wimalaprasaada nyaupaane ra dailekha athabisakota kaa arjuna saahilaai wibhinna samayamaa chori bhaekaa chaara thaana motarasaaikalasahita pakraau garieko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya nepaalaganjakaa pramukha prahari niriksaka naaraayana daangile jaanakaari dinubhayo

uhaankaa anusaara ukta girohale sisiko motarasaaikalamai dherai ankhaa lagaaune garekaa thie tyasari chori bhaekaa motarasaaikala surkheta kailaali ra dailekhabaata bikri garne gareko paaieko chha praharile baraamada garekaa motarasaaikala pani wibhinna jillaabaata jhikaaeko ho setuwika chokamaa royala inaphilda chori gardaagardai nyaupaanelaai phelaa paari motarasaaikalasahita praharile niyantranamaa liepachhi nepaalaganjabaatai bardiyaa madhuwana basne yamabahaadura ghartiko bhepa numko sisiko palsara motarasaaikala pritama gurunako lupa numko sisiko palsara motarasaaikala nepaalaganja wipi choka basne mohammada rajaa jasagadhako sisiko palsara motarasaaikala chori bhaeko ujuri jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankemaa pareko thiyo

ti ujurikaa wisayamaa praharile nyaupaanelaai sodhapuchha gardaa ghatanaamaa wimalaprasaada nyaupaane ra arjuna saahiko sameta sumlagnataa raheko ra anya motarasaaikala dailekha surkheta ra kailaalilagaayatakaa jillaamaa bikri garnako laagi lukaaichhipaai raakheko khuleko thiyo praharile sakriyataa badhaai anya chori garne wyaktiko pahichaana gari motarasaaikalako khojatalaasa garne kramamaa ti motarasaaikala surkheta kailaali ra dailekhabaata nambarapleta badali gari lukaaichhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa phelaa paareko prahari niriksaka daangile jaanakaari dinubhayo
bhaaratabaata awaidharupamaa nepaala bhitryaaeko khasibokaasahita tina janaalaai budhabaara nepaalaganjabaata praharile pakraau gareko chha

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya nepaalaganjabaata khatieko prahari tolile upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita raamabaagabaata ru laakha mulya baraabarako khasisahita tina janaalaai pakraau garieko prahari niriksaka daangile jaanakaari dinubhayo pakraau parnemaa nepaalaganja jayasapura basne phahima kuresi jaakira kuresi ra rahisa kuresi rahekaa chhan

bhaaratabaata bhansaara chhali awaidharupamaa khasiko chori paithaari gareko suchanaako adhaaramaa khatieko tolile trakamaa loda gareko awasthaamaa khasi niyantranamaa lieko ho wadaa prahari pramukha daangile bhannubhayo yati thulo maatraamaa khasi pakraau pareko yo pahilo pataka ho
khasibokaasahita pakraau parekaa tinaijanaalaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi nepaalaganja bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa pathaaieko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo

jhaapaako mechinagara nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya lakhindra raajawumsilegharaayasi wiwaadakaa kramamaa aja bihaana kodaaloko paaso ra baansale haanera srimati warsiyaa champali raajawumsiko hatyaa garekojillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka mahendrakumaara sresthale jaanakaari dinubhayo

praharikaa anusaara khagindrale kodaaloko paaso ra baansale haanepachhi unako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho maritakako sawa pariksanako laagi mechi anchala aspataala bhadrapura pathaaieko jiprakaale janaaeko chha
piditaharule raajanalaai baaneswarabaata niyantranamaa liekomaa baidesika rojagaara bibhaagale awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi prahari kaaryaalayamaa pathaaeko ho

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa khasibajaarasthita sadakamaa praharilaai nagada saya rupaiyaan dii arthika pralobhanamaa paarna khojne naa kha nambarakaa tripara chaalakalaai mumgalabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

mahaasaakhaako tolile sunasari ghara bhai naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa paanchadhaaraa halachoka basne warsiya chemajonako hatyaamaa sumlagna kaathamaadaunkaa warsiya prakaasa thaapaamagaralaai mangalabaara saanjha pakraau gareko ho
taauko ra chhaatimaa chota laageko awasthaamaa surmaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya dharaka boharaakaae sawa phelaa parekaaepraharile janaaekaae chha

ghatanaa mumgalabaara raati bhaeko huna sakne jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bajhaanakaa insepektara naina bahaadura saaunda bataaunu bhaeko chha ghatanaabaare thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko uhaan bataaunu bhayo
mahottari jillaamaa pahilo pataka saandhelaai dhaarilo hatiyaara prayoga gari kaateko abhiyogamaa praharile eka janaamaathi muddaa chalaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka khagendrabahaadura khadkaakaa anusaara jillaako ekadaaraa gaaunpaalikaa basne indala maharaa chamaarale dhaarilo hatiyaara prayoga gari saandheko tina khuttaa kaatera ghaaite banaaeko abhiyogamaa unalaai praharile prakraau gari unimaathi angabhanga muddaa chalaaieko ho
chamaarale kaatera ghaaite banaaeko saandheko awasthaa naajuka raheko chha bhane sthaaniya prasaasanale so saandheko upachaara pasu swaasthya sewaa kaaryaalaya jaleswaramaa garaaeko chha

pakraau parneharumaa gorakhaa taakukota gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai dallu basne warsiya eliyaa magara solukhumbu ghara bhai halachoka basne warsiya chhirina tendu serpaa ra udayapura ghara bhai raaniwana basne warsiya prasaanta bista rahekaa chhan
puthaa uttaragumgaa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara ra antargata parne bibhinna tolaharubaata bharuwaa banduka naala praharile baraamada gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya ranmaamaikotabaata khatieko tolile sthaaniya janapratinidhiharuko samanwayamaa phaalguna mahinaamaa gaaun gharamaa lukaai chhipaai raakhiekaa ukta banduka baraamada gari jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa somabaara bujhaaeko chha
praharile chhuttaachhutai sthaanabaata juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa nagada ru laakha hajaara saya rupaiyaan nagada ra buka taasa sahita jaanalaai niyantranamaa lieko chha

patra maatra nabhai phonabaata sameta chandaako baaremaa kuraakaani garne garepachhi suraksaa chunauti badhna sakne bhandai dailekhakaa sthaaniya sarakaara pramukhaharule karnaali pradesakaa prahari pramukha mahesawikrama saahalaai suraksaa chunauti dekhiekaa sumwedanasila sthaanamaa suraksaabala badhaauna ra suraksaa nikaaya sacheta huna agraha garnubhayo

dailekhakaa sthaaniya sarakaarakaa pramukhaharulaai dhukka bhaera basna agraha gardai pradesa prahari pramukha saahale bhannubhayo tapaarimharu janataabaata nirwaachita janapratinidhi hunuhunchha dhukka bhaera basnuhos araajaka gatiwidhi garne jokohilaai praharile wisesa dhangale khoji gariraheko chha

muluka samariddhitarpha agaadi badhne mahaan abhiyaanalaai kasaile pani awarodha garna nahune ra sumwidhaanawiparita kaarya garne sabailaai kaarawaahi garna sarakaara tayaara raheko bataaunubhayo wiplawakaa gatiwidhilaai sabai milera nisteja paarna sakine uhaanko bhanaai thiyo

sumwidhaanamaa lekhiekaa kuraawiruddha ahile wiplawa samuha agaadi badheko bhandai uhaanle bama wisphota wyakti hatyaajastaa gatiwidhimaa wiplawa samuha sakriya raheko ullekha garnubhayo uhaanle sumwidhaanale nisedha garekaa kuraa garne raajanitika samuha nabhaera apaaraadhika samuha bhaeko bhandai praharile yastaa gatiwidhiko niyantrana garne ra yastaa gatiwidhimaa sumlagnalaai pakraau gari kaarawaahi prakriyaakaa laagi kadaa kadama chaalne bataaunubhayo

laajimpaata basdai aekaa guruna aitabaara aphnai kothaamaa marita phelaa perakaa thie sawa postamaartamakaa laagi triwi siksana aspataala mahaaraajaganja pathaaiekomahaanagariya prahari waritta darabaaramaargakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka diesapi winoda sarmaa ghimirele jaanakaari dinubhayaae

postamaartama riportapachhi maatrai marityuko kaarana khulne praharile bataaeko chha marita gurunako nidhaaramaa chota dekhiekaaleaphantale jiwanako hatyaa bhaeko bhandai praharimaa ujuri diekaa chhan
krasara udyogamaa raakhieko ru laakha mulya parne seka nambarako jesibhimaa petrola chharkera agajani garieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gularikaale janaaekaae chha

udyoga maapadandaanusaara sanchaalana bhaeko chha uhaanle bhannubhayo kunai pani majadurako srama sosana garekaa chhainaun jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka karisnaraaja ojhaale agajani garne samuhako khoji bhairaheko bataaunubhaeko chha
nepaala prahariko laaguausadha niyantrana byurobaata khatieko prahari tolile dhaadinako gajuribaata jaanchakaa kramamaa kilo charesasahita tina bhaaratiya naagarikalaai aitabaara pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaanaibaata bhaaratatarpha laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa gajuristhita prahari jaancha gardaa esaaraema numko bhaaratiya kantenarabaata boraamaa haalieko awasthaamaa baraamada gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajurikaa prahari niriksaka nawaraaja dhungelale bataaunubhayo

uniharulaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajurile hiraasatamaa lieko chha sawaarisaadhana ra laaguausadha baraamada gariekaale laaguausadha osaarapasaarasambandhi muddaa chalaaine praharile janaaeko chha jillaamaa pratibandhita laaguausadha charesa yati thulo maatraamaa baraamada garieko yo pahilo pataka ho

kaathamaadaum daksinakaali nagarapaalikaa pharpina bajaarabaata parsaa biraganjakaa warsiya iswarabahaadura udaasalaai niyantrita laaguausadha phenaaragana empula nurphina empula ra daaijelyaaba empula tathaa awaidha injeksana sahita aitabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha

madhyapura thimi nagarapaalikaa saanothimisthita sadakamaa praharilaai hajaara saya rupaiyaan dii khojne sindhupaalchoka chautaaraa ghara bhaekaa warsiya mandira maajhilaai sanibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha
baa kha nambarako triparalaai jaancha garne kramamaa chaalaka maajhile saathamaa sawaari chaalaka anumatipatra nabhaekaale praharilaai ukta nagada dina khojekaa thie

motarasaaikalamaa khairenibaata bhaluhitarpha jaandai garekaadewadaha nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya anisa purilaai ajnaata samuhale akramana gari hatyaa gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya butawalakaa prahari naayawa upariksaka dilabahaadura mallale jaanakaari die
srimatiko hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa dailekhako naumule gaaunpaalikaa paitikaa warsiya dalabahaadura basnetalaai jillaa adaalatale janmakaida phaisalaa sunaaeko chha

praharile yahi phaaguna gate baje sarlaahibaata kaathamaandau audai gareko naa kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka sawaari saadhanalaai chekajaancha gardaa sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa kaa saajana guptaako saathabaata laaguausadha naaitraabheta tyaabaleta baraamada garekaae chha
morana belabaariki warsiyaa yuwatiko hatyaa aropamaa nekapaa moranakaa netaa yogendra gurunalaai pakraau parekaa chhan
unako bayaanaanusaara saptakosimaa sawa khojna ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belawaarikaa prahari niriksaka raamakumaara raaiko toli parichaalana garieko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranakaa prahari upariksaka manoja kesile guruna pakraau parepachhi kehi bisaya baahira aeko ra pramaana sumkalanako kaama bhairaheko bataae mahilaasanga antima samayamaa bheta bhaekaa adhaaramaa gurunalaai pakraau garieko ho kesile bhane gurunawiruddha mahilaakaa aphantako jaaheri pani pareko chha
kaathamaadaum narephaanta basne warsiya asoka malla warsiya naaraayana srestha ra lalitapura godaawari basne sunasari dharaana ghara bhaekaa warsiya prabina limbulaaipraharile pakraau gareko chha
uniharumadhye sresthako saathabaatakariba graama laaguausadhagaanjaa tathaa khadkaako saathabaata kasturiko binaa paanchaaumle jadibuti ra dijitala taraaju baraamada bhaeko ho

kaathamaadaumbaata wiraganjakaa laagi chhuteko naa kha nambarako basamaa lukaai raakheko eka saya paancha kilo charesasahita uniharulaai pakraau garieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajurikaa prahari niriksaka nawaraaja dhunagelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parnemaa basa chaalaka wiraganja kaa laalabahaadura saaha baaraako karaiyaamaai gaaunpaalikaa kaa anila chaudhari ra bindabaasini gaaunpaalikaa kaa sriraama saaha raheko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo

aphu apaharanamaa pareko bhani gharapariwaarakaa sadasyalaai jhuthaa suchanaa dieko abhiyogamaa praharile dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa jagatabahaadura simhalaai sukrabaara pakraau gareko chha nijakaa aphantale garaaeko jaanakaaripachhi praharile gareko anusandhaanakaa kramamaa nija simhale bhaaratako panjaawa gai tyahimbaata aphu apaharanamaa parekaale apaharanamakta huna ru laakha maaga gari jhuthaa suchanaa dieko khuleko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaeko chha
hijoko ghatanaapachhi praharile thapa suraksaa wyawasthaamaathi wyawasthita garnako laagi ahile mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalayale akasmika baithaka taya gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale wibhinna wanyajantuko chhaalaa anga ra awaidha haatahatiyaara baraamada gareko chha praharile temkemaiyuna gaaunpaalikaa chhinaamakhu rumalaakaa nirakumaara bhujelako gharamaa chhaapaa maardaa hatiyaarasahita durlabha wanyajantuko chhaalaa phelaa paareko ho

praharile wisesa suraakikaa adhaaramaa bihibaara chhaapaa maarne kramamaa bharuwaa banduka dui thaana haabreko chhaalaa eka thaana bhaaluko chhaalaa ra panjaa ekaeka thaana nigaale baaghako chhaalaa eka thaana marigako chhaalaa eka thaana baraamada gareko chha tyastai bharuwaa bandukamamaa prayoga hune byaarola dui thaana ra bandukamaa prayoga garine graama baaruda baraamada gareko chha praharile aja patrakaara sammalenamaarphat saamagri saarwajanika gareko ho

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya syaanjaakaa anusaara putalibajaara nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai phedikholaa gaaunpaalikaasthita ilaakaa hulaaka kaaryaalayamaa halkaaraa padamaa kaaryarata warsiya mahendra nepaala ra nijakai srimati warsiyaa sangitaa nepaalalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parekaa dampatile wibhinna mitimaa syaanjaako phedikholaa gaaunpaalikaa ki manju godaarabaata ru pandhra laakha saawitri darjibaata ru tina laakha hajaara chunumaayaa godaarabaata ru tina laakha hajaara wedaprasaada gautamabaata ru tina laakha karisna mahata thaapaabaata ru chaara laakha hajaara durgaakumaari khatri khadkaabaata ru saata laakha rukumako musikota nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala kaaskiko pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa maa deraa gari basne resama raawalabaata ru dui laakha hajaara gari ru kula laakha hajaara lieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya syaanjaale janaaeko chha
rukuma paschimamaa aphnai widyaarthilaai jawarajasti karanai gareko aropamaa praharile eka siksakalaai pakraau gareko chha
saanibheri gaaunpaalikaasthita raapti jnaanodaya maawimaa kaaryarata siksaka prakaasa khadkaalaai bihibaara pakraau garieko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

ukta widyaalayamaa pasu praawidhika wisaya adhyayana gardai gareki warsiyaa baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko aropamaa khadakaalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukuma paschimakaa prahari niriksaka pramodakumaara ksetrile bataae pasu praawidhika wisaya padhaaundai aekaa khadkaale baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko bhandai piditale ujuri diepachhi pakraau garieko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ra nepaala widyut praadhikarana witarana kendra raajawiraajako sumyukta anugamana tolile jillaakaa wibhinna sthaanabaata widyut chori gariraheko awasthaamaa uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parekaa uniharuko saathabaata eka thaana paani taanne motara eka thaana saaunda baksa ra eka thaana pankhaa pani baraamada garieko kendrakaa pramukha chandranaaraayana saahale jaanakaari dinubhayo

baaraa jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa jitapura basa kaauntara najikabaata kariba keji saya graama laaguausadha gaanjaa bebaarise awasthaamaa phelaa paari budhaabara raati praharile baraamada gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jitapurabaata khatieko praharile ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari baraamada gareko ho
parsaa windawaasini gaaunpaalikaa amarapatti wordara dasagajaabaata kariba keji laaguausadha gaanjaa budhabaara raati praharile baraamada gareko chha

jhauwaaguthibaata bhaaratatarpha jaandai gareko biara ti nambarako motarasaaikala chaalakale prahari chauki amarapattibaata khatieko gasti prahari tolilaai dekhnaasaatha ukta motarasaaikala chhaadi pharaara bhae paschaata motarasaaikala jaancha gardaa plaastikako jholaamaa lukaai chhipaai raakheko ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari baraamada gareko ho
lamkichuhaa nagarapaalikaa chisaapaanibaata lukaai chhipaai lyaaeko kariba keji saya graama suna sahita duijanaalaai budhabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya ramesakumaara saiju ra kailaari gaaunpaalikaa paweraa basne warsiyaa sitaa chaudharilaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalibaata khatieko praharile baa cha nambarako gaadi jaancha garne kramamaa gaadimaa lukaai chhipaai raakheko ukta parimaanako suna tathaa anya chaandikaa bhaandaakudaaharu sahita phelaa paari chaalaka saiju ra gaadimaa sawaara chaudharilaai pakraau gareko ho
nepaalaganjamaa laakha nepaali rupaiyaansahita ghumdai garekaa dui bhaaratiyalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num sthita paasaanalhaamumaargabaata jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankebaata khatieko tolile so rakamasahita bhaaratakaa warsiya rawisachandra paande ra jamunaaha chhoti bhansaara niwaasi baalaka chhotu tiwaarilaai niyantranamaa lieko prahari niriksaka dipaka mallale jaanakaari dinubhayo
uniharu yupi ga nambarako bhaaratiya motarasaaikalamaa ghumdai gardaa praharile niyantranamaa lieko ho duwai janaalaai thapa anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baankemaa raakhieko chha

khaadya ayaata niryaata gunastara pramaanaikarana kaaryaalaya nepaalaganja baankekaa kaaryaalaya pramukha khaadya anusandhaana adhikarita winodakumaara sriwaastawa hajaara rupaiyaan ghusasahita pakraau parekaa chhan

khaadya gunastara pramaanaikarana arthaata lyaaba testa garne kaamamaa sahajikarana garidiebaapata sewaagraahisanga lieko hajaara rupaiyaan ghusasahita kaaryaalaya pramukha sriwaastawalaai pakraau garieko akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale janaaeko chha
ghusasahita sriwaastawalaai pakraau gari thapa anusandhaana aghi badhaaieko akhtiyaarakaa prawaktaa raameswara dumgaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parnemaa baahrabise nagarapaalikaa gaati kaabhretolakaa warsiyaa pramabahaadura taamaana warsiyaa saajana taamaana ra warsiyaa akrosa bhanne singabahaadura taamaana chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhupaalchokako wisesa tolile kaathamaadaunko swayambhubaata pakraau gareko suchanaa adhikarita prahari niriksaka jagadisa regmile jaanakaari dinubhayo
sunasari jillaa baraaha nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai kaathamaadaun ghattekulo niwaasi pidita niraja ghimirele dieko niwedanako adhaaramaa uniharulaai pakraau garieko praharile janaaeko chha

walephi gaaunpaalikaa araniko raajamaargako kilo najika raheko goreto baatomaa gata pusa gate pidita ghimirebaata ru laakha lutapaata gari pharaara rahekaa thie pakraau parekaa aropiko baaremaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dailekhabaata khatieko prahari tolile pharaara simhalaai aphnai gharamaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa prakraau gareko dailekhakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka thaakuraprasaada pokharalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita jitapura chokabaata kariba kilo saya graama awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita janaalaai budhawaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parneharumaa makawaanapura manahari gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiyaa dhanamaayaa bika ra sohi sthaana basne warsiyaa ritaa bika rahekaa chhan ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jitapurabaata khatieko praharile chekina gardaa uniharuko saathabaata ukta awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa phelaa paari pakraau garieko ho

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita teku chokamaapraharilaainagada saya rupaiyaandina khojne chitawana bhandaaraakaa warsiya traka chaalaka ridama nepaalilaai mumgalabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
mahaanagariya prahari baritta kaalimaatibaata khatieko prahari taaelilenaa kha nambarako traka jaancha garne kramamaakaagaja patra thika nabhaeko bhandainepaalileukta rakama dina khojekaa thie

pakraau parneharumaa swayambhu basne sindhupaalchoka wisumkhu gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya raaja laamaa ra dhaadina nilakantha nagarapaalikaa basaahaa ghara bhai haala chaumati basne warsiya wisaala sunaara rahekaa chhan

bancharo prahaarapachhi sakta ghaaite bhaekaa gorelaai upachaarakaa laagi bhaaratako bareli lagiekaamaa upachaarakai kramamaa gaeraati unako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka karisnaraaja ojhaale bataaunubhayo

rupaa gaaunpaalikaa taalabesi ra tilakhoriyaabaata warsiya naaraayanabahaadura guruna warsiya dilabahaadura guruna warsiya suresa guruna ra warsiya manabahaadura thaapaa magaralaai ukta hatiyaarasahita somabaara pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskile janaaeko chha

uniharuko saathabaata bharuwaa banduka tina bora raaiphala lensasahita eka ra bora raaiphala sarta gana eka gari paancha thaana hatiyaara baraamada bhaeko prahari naayaba upariksaka rawindramaana gurunale jaanakaari garaaunubhaeko chha kaaskiko rupaa gaaunpaalikaa taalabesi tathaa sauryawaasakaa wibhinna sthaanaharumaa uniharulaai pakraau garieko ho unimaathi aja jillaa adaalatabaata myaada thapa gari awasyaka kaarawaahi suru garieko chha
nepaalaganjasthita ayogako kaaryaalayale mangalabaara saanjha baankekaa dui sarakaari kaaryaalayamaa chhaapaa maarera ru hajaara ghusasahita dui karmachaarilaai niyantrana lieko ho

akhtiyaarakaa nepaalaganja kaaryaalayakaa pramukha ganaesa gairale wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa nepaalaganja bhansaara kaaryaalayakaa naayabasubbaa laksmana chandalaai ru hajaara ra ayaataniryaata gunastara pramaanaikarana kaaryaalaya baankekaa kaaryaalaya pramukha tathaa khaadya anusandhaana adhikarita winodakumaara sriwaastawalaai ru hajaara ghusasahita rangehaata niyantranamaa lieko bataaunubhayo

nepaalaganja bhansaara kaaryaalayakaa naasu chandale ayaata hune saamaanako sahajikarana garidine bhandai sewaagraahibaata ru hajaara ghusa lieko awasthaamaa ra ayaataniryaata gunastara pramaanaikarana kaaryaalaya baankekaa pramukha sriwaastawale gunastara pramaanaikarana garidiewaapata sewaagraahiko kaama sampanna bhaepachhi ru hajaara ghusa lindai gardaa pakraau garieko ho
yasaigari akhtiyaarale mangalabaara nai yaataayaata wyawasthaa kaaryaalaya nepaalaganjamaa chhaapaamaari tyahaanbaata kehi kaagajaata niyantranamaa lieko pramukha gairale jaanakaari dinubhayo
parsaa inarwaagaaun waaipaasa rodabaata baaraa phetaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya sunila mandalalaai niyantrita laaguausadha koreksa saya pisa sahita somabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

praharile yahi phaaguna gate baje makawaanapura chaltidobhaanabaata kaathamaandau audai gareko baa kha nambarako tipharalaai naagadhumgaamaa chekajaancha gardaa makawaanapura thaahaa nagarapaalikaa ki gopini khatriko saathabaata abaidha laaguausadha charesa kilo saya graama baraamada gareko chha

ghatanaapachhi lukekaa ghartilaai unakai gharabaata pakraau garieko bhimagithe prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba niriksaka bhojabahaadura baaniyaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo ghaaite baalakumaari ra unakaa srimaan dubailaai anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya pathaaeko uhaanle bataaunubhayoe
baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko aropamaa praharile sirahaa golabajaara nagarapaalikaa dandaatolakaa warsiya poltu maharaalaai pakraau gareko chha

chhimeki warsiyaa baalikaalaai balaatkaara gari pharaara bhaeko sthaaniyawaasibaata praapta suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya golabajaarabaata khatieko prahari tolile maharaalaai pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka maadhawaraaja kharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

praharile sindhupaalchokakaa warsiya wisaala taamaana ra gorakhaakaa warsiya bhimabahaadura raanaako saathamaa kariba saya graama suna jasto dekhine pahelo dhaatuko waalaa thaana sahita sanibaara diusopakraau gareko chha
wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa gokulako deraa kothaamaa talaasi gardaa ukta jaraayoko sina mahaanagariya prahari parisara lalitapurabaata khatieko praharile phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho

praharile rasuwaakaa kaami thokraa surkhetakaa wakilabahaadura malla ra daana tulsipurakaa maimikumaari saarki sameta janaalaai bardiyaa badhaiyaataala gaaunpaalikaa karnaalipulabaata sanibaara diuso pakraau gareko chha

rasuwaa yaarchaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiyaa ra warsiyaa kisorilaai lalaaiphakaai bhaaratatarpha laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mainaapokharabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta pulamaa pugdaa phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

sarlaahi sadaramukaama malangawaamaa gae raati ajnaata samuhale goli haani eka yuwakako hatyaa gareko chha goli laagera malangawaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya manoja yaadawako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sarlaahile janaaeko chha
malangawaa nagarapaalikaa sitabhandaara najika sadaka chheumaa goli haani hatyaa garieko awasthaamaa yaadawako sawa dekhera aja bihaana sthaaniyawaasile praharilaai jaanakaari garaaekaa thie

ghatanaamaa sumlagnako khoji tiwra paarieko sarlaahikaa prahari upariksaka ganaesachandra bhattaraaile jaanakaari dinubhayo maritakako mobaailasameta saathamai bhetiekaale abhiyukta pahichaana garna sahaja hune prahari upariksaka bhattaraaile bataaunubhayo ghatanaasthalamaa goliko khokaa paancha thaana ra prayoga nabhaeko eka thaana goli phelaa pareko uhaanle bataaunubhayo

prahariko wisesa byuro ra mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaalako tolile kumlakibaata surya bhujelalaai pakraau gareko chha bhujela bama wisphotakaa mukhya yojanaakaara raheko mahaasaakhaakaa esapi somendrasimha raathaumrale bataae

pathari sanischare nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya chamaru bhanne chandraprasaada gangaai ra sunawarsi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bajru gangaailaai kariba kaththaa dhura jaggaamaa awaidha laaguausadha aphima kheti gariraheko awasthaamaa somabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pathari ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya rumgelibaata sumyukta rupamaa khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho saathai pakraau parekaa uniharu ra sunawarsi nagarapaalikaa basne baasudewa gangaai sametako jaggaamaa lagaaieko kariba hajaara bota aphima sameta praharile nasta gareko chha
ghatanaamaa sumlagna bhaekaa josukaimaathi kaanuna bamojima kaarabaahi garine nepaala praharikaa prawaktaa uttamaraaja suwedile bibisilaai bataae

mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga koteswarabaata khatieko prahari tolilaai naa kha nambarako traka jaancha garne kramamaa chaalaka waagle ukta rakama dina khojekaa thie
