mahottaribaata bhaaratatarpha jaandai gareko elasipi nambarako bhaaratiya nambarako gaadibaata madiraa baraamada gareko diesapi khagendra khadkaale jaanakaari die

gaadi chekajaancha gardaa sawaaribhitra boraamaa eka hajaara botala sophi raksi baraamada bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa diesapi khadkaale bataae gaadi ra raksi prahari tolile baraamada gari awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi raajaswa kaaryaalaya janakapura pathaaeko chha
sunasariko itahari nagarapaalikaa khanaara chaukabaata laaguausadha sahita janaalaai praharile pakraau garekaae chha

sumkaaspada tarikaale hidirahekaa itahari kaa barsiya saagara chaudharilaai sumkaa laagi chekajaancha garne kramamaa nijako saathabaatamumgalawaara belukaa baje pratibandhita laaguausadha naaitrojana tyaableta praharile baraamada gareko thiyo
laaguausadha sahita pakraau parekaa duwaijanaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itaharimaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga gumgabubaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

punale maadaka padaartha sewaana gari sohi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya tilaka daangisanga saamaanya wiwaada paschaata bharuwaa bandukale maarchhu bhani nikaaleko bhanne khabara praapta hunaa saatha asthaayi prahari posta dagamaaraabaata khatieko praharile unalaai ukta banduka sahita pakraau gareko ho

banepaa nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa baalikaalaai jabarajasti karanai garekoabhiyogamaa banepaa godaamachoka basne warsiya bipula bhanne binoda nepaali ra warsiya rojanasresthalaai somabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha
uniharule baalikaalaai lalaai phakaai jabarajasti karanai gari pharaara bhaeko khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaabaata khatieko praharile duwaijaalaai pakraau gareko ho
sunasariko jhumkaamaa eka bariddhako dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gari hatyaa garieko abasthaamaa sawa phelaa pareko chha
raamadhuni nagarapaalikaa sthita siwa chaukamaa andaaji barsiya narabahaadura ksetriko sawa gharamaa phelaa pareko ho sthaaniyale bihaana baje sawa dekhepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

baalakako sawa postamaartamakaa laagi paschimaanchala ksetriya aspataala pokharaamaa raakhieko chha baalaka sutirahekaa belaa dhaarilo hatiyaara prayoga gari hatyaa gariekopraarambhika anusandhaanabaata khuleko chha
balaatkaarako abhiyogamaa tanahunko ghirina gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa jhakabahaadura kumaala purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa parekaa chhan

gata waisaakha gate eka yuwatilaai jabarjasti karanaipachhi pharaara rahekaa kumaalalaai jillaa adaalata nawalapurale somabaara purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa pathaaeko ho kumaalale somabaara nawalapura praharisamaksa atmasamarpana garekaa thie unalaai somabaara jillaa nyaayaadhisa ambikaaprasaada niraulaako ekala ijalaasale thunaamaa pathaaune adesa dieko ho

kumaalale nawalapurako bundikaali gaaunpaalikaa jangalamaa jabarjasti karanai gareko ti yuwatile nawalapura praharimaa ujuri dieki thiin adaalatako adesa anusaara wadaadhyaksa kumaalalaai chitawana kaaraagaara chalaana garieko nawalapurakaa prahari naayaba niriksaka tikaaraama pokharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo nawalapuramaa kaaraagaara nabhaekaale chitawana pathaaieko uhaanle bataaunubhayo
sunasariko itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa maakhima tolamaa chhuraa prahaara gari eka mahilaako hatyaa garieko chha

deraa gari basdai aeki warsiyaa soniyaa raaiko sthaaniyawaasi laalabahaadura raaile somabaara chhuraa prahaara gari hatyaa gareko ho hatyaa garne raai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itahariko niyantranamaa raheko prahari upariksaka raajana adhikaarile jaanakaari dinubhayo raai wiwaahita hun unakaa srimaan widesamaa chhan
hatyaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka buddhi chaulaagaarimle bataaunubhayo

laaguausadhako kaarowaara garne girohamaa sumlagna saptariko hanumaananagara kumkaalini nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya wisunaprataapa saaha ra sindhuliko marina gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya suresa maajhi pani pakraau parekaa chhanmorana praharikaa prawaktaa diesapi ghanasyaama sresthale ekai patakamaa baraamada bhaeko laaguausadhako parinaama moranamaa yo warsakai uchcha bhaeko jaanakaari die
yataa wiraatanagara bhansaara kaaryaalayako nambara dhaatabaata praharile laaguausadhasahita dui yuwaalaai pakraau gareko chha

tehrathumako laaliguraansa nagarapaalikaa kaa puspabahaadura khadkaalaai empula lupijesika empula daaijelyaaba empula ebhila ra empula phenaaraganasahita pakraau garieko ho khadkaasangai rahekaa laagiguraansa kai warsiya raamabahaadura gurunalaai laaguausadha spaasmoproksibhana tyaableta chakkisahita pakraau garieko praharile janaaeko chha

tyastai moranako sunawarsi nagarapaalikaa giradaliyaabaata praharile laaguausadha sahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha wisesa suraakiko adhaaramaa prahari chauki amaradahabaata khatieko prahari tolile laaguausadhasahita sohi sthaanakaa warsiya resuwaa miyaanlaai pakraau gareko ho
taaplejunako atharaai triwenai gaaunpaalikaa simala botamaa gae raati bihemaa anphule bhanejasto gita nabajaaeko nihunmaa khukuri prahaara bhaekaae chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gulmikaa anusaara baalikaakaa bubaa kaanchhi srimati lyaaera antai basne gareko awasthaamaa so ghatanaa ghateko thiyo ghatanaa ghatesumgai baalikaale aphumaathi hajurabubaale gareko kartuta baabulaai bhane pachhi kesa prahari samma aeko thiyo

sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa setibhira basne warsiya harkabahaadura blonalaai awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji sahita aitabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha prahari chauki pattharakotabaata khatieko praharile unalaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha gharamaa lukaaichhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
parsaa biragumja nagarapaalikaa sumkaraachaarya getasthitabaata laaguausadha charesa sahita janaalaai somabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

prahari chauki inarwaabaata khatieko prahari tolile bhaaratatarpha jaandai garekaa paidalayaatri bhaarata kalakattaa ghara bhaeko warsiya mohamada sakilalaai laaguausadha charesa keji ra bhaarata ghara bhaeko warsiya mohamada wisaalalaai laaguausadha charesa keji sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
makawaanapura raaksiraan gaaunpaalikaa sthitabaata awaidha laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba saya keji aitabaara raati praharile baraamada gareko chha

wisesa suraakiko adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapura ra num pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya hetaumdaabaata sumyukta rupamaa khatieko prahari tolile sohi sthaana basne maailaa bhanne padama thokarako gharabaata laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba saya keji ra sohi sthaana basne maailaa syaanaboko gharabaata laaguausadha gaanjaa kariba keji phelaa paari baraamada gareko ho
suna choriko aropamaa mahottari jillaa adaalatale aja dui janaalaai kaaraagaaraa chalaana gareko chha

jela chalaana hunemaa jaleswara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya karisna srestha ra warsiya ajalama ali raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile janaaeko chha tyasaigari sohi muddaamaa jaleswara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya santosakumaara saahalaai ru eka laakha dharautimaa chhaadeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari naayawa upariksaka khagendrabahaadura khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

mahottari praharile laaguausadhasahita dui yuwakalaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parnemaa dhanusaa jillaako janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sunilakumaara yaadawa ra warsiya raamajanama thaakura raheko prahari naayawa upariksaka khadkaale bataaunubhayo

gae raati jaleswara nagarapaalikaa sthita jiromaailamaa kehi maanisa ho hallaa gariraheko khabara paaera jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottaribaata khatigaekaa prahari tolile ti dui yuwakalaai niyantranamaa liera jaancha gardaa uniharuko saathabaata laaguausadha baraamada bhaeko thiyo

praharile ti duwai yuwakako saathabaata graama laaguausadha gaanjaa ra naaitobheta naamaka laaguausadha tyaableta thaana baraamada gareko thiyo laaguausadhasahita pakraau parekaa duwailaai praharile jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa raakhi awasyaka anusandhaana agaadi badhaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile janaaeko chha

chorimaa sumlagna sarlaahi hariwana nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai jorapaati attarakhela basne warsiya bhojabahaadura yonjana sohi thegaanaa bhaekaa warsiya raamabahaadura yonjana ra hariwana nagarapaalikaa sthaayi ghara bhai kaathamaadaun basne madana laamaalaai praharile pakraau gari aitabaara chori sirsakamaa muddaa dartaa gareko chha
nepaali senaakaa eka jawaanalaai awaidha laaguausadha khairo hiroinasahitapraharile pakraau gareko chha pakraau parnemaa kailaaliko bardagoriyaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya aikendra saahi chhan

mahaanagariya aparaadha anusandhaana mahaasaakhaa tekuko tolile saahisahita ghodaaghodi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya karisna bhandaarilaai pakraau gareko chha uniharuko saathabaata praharile graama laaguausadha baraamada garekaae chha saahi lalitapuramaa kaaryarat sainika jawaana bhaeko khulna aekaae chha

wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa prahari tolile uniharulaai kaathamaadaum sthita sagaramaathaa gestahaausako kothaa num baata pakraau gareko thiyo uniharulaai thapa kaarabaahikaa laagi kaathamaadaumm prahari parisara pathaaieko chha
tokhaa nagarapaalikaa ganaesasthaanabaata nakkali nepaali rupaimyaa hajaara darakaa saya thaana sanibaara raati praharile baraamada gareko chha
warsiyaa baalikaalaai jabarajasti karanai gareko abhiyogamaa dailekha ghara bhai banepaa nagarapaalikaa maa basne warsiya kamala adhikaarilaai sanibaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha

sohi nagarapaalikaa naalaakaakre basne baalikaalaai mowaailamaa philma dekhaai dinchhu bhani lalaaiphakaai gata budhabaara adhikaarile jawarajastikaranai gareko bhanne khabara sanibaara diuso praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaabaata khatieko praharile adhikaarilaai pakraau gareko ho

apaharana tathaa kartawya jyaana muddaamaa uchcha adaalata wiraatanagarako jestha gateko phaisalaale warsa kaida sajaaya thahara bhai pharaara rahekaa pratiwaadi rumgeli nagarapaalikaa basne thenawaa bhanne ramesa mandalalaai sukrabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya rumgelibaata khatieko praharile mandalalaai rumgeli nagarapaalikaa baata phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho yasaigari raahadaani kirte muddhaamaa morana jillaa adaalatako saauna gateko phaisalaale mahinaa kaida sajaaya thahara bhai pharaara raheki dhanapaalathaana gaaunpaalikaa kadamaaha basne warsiyaa pramescharidewi mandalalaai sukrabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranabaata khatieko prahari tolile unalaai pakraau gareko ho

birendranagara nagarapaalikaa khajuraasthita simtaali chokabaata sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya nitesa basneta ra achhaama turamaakhaata gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya jitendra jisilaai awaidha laaguausadha braauna sugara kariba graama saya miligraama sahita sanibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
nepaala prahariko laaguausadha niyantrana byurobaata khatieko prahari tolile dhaadinako gajuribaata chekajaanchakaa kramamaa kilo charesasahita tina bhaaratiyalaai aja bihaana pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaunbaata bhaaratatarpha laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa gajurimaa chekajaancha gardaa esa ara ema num ko bhaaratiya kantenarabaata boraamaa haalieko awasthaamaa ukta parimaanako charesa baraamada garieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajurikaa prahari niriksaka nawaraaja dhungelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

uniharulaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajurile hiraasatamaa lieko chha sawaari saadhana ra laaguausadha baraamada gariekaale laaguausadha osaarapasaarasambandhi muddaa chalaaine praharile janaaeko chha jillaamaa pratibandhita laaguausadha charesa yati thulo maatraamaa baraamada garieko pahilo pataka ho

biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa rajatajayanti chokabaata baaraa jitapura simaraaupamahaanagarapaalikaa raamanagara basne warsiya saroja bhanne nimlaala yonjanalaai niyantrita laaguausadha naaitraabheta tyaableta thaana sahita phelaa paari praharile pakraau gareko chha
upachaarakaa kramamaa eka janaako marityu bhaepachhi chitawana bharatapurako manakaamanaa aspataalamaa aphantale todaphoda garekaa chhan
aspataala todaphodabaata kariba eka laakha rupaiyaan baraabarako ksati bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale jaanakaari dieko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurale nakkali notasahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
praharile bhojapura dabali melaa bharna aekaa uniharubaata chaara hajaara nakkali notasahita pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurakaa pramukha kesawakumaara thewele jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parekaaharuko wisayamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko pramukha thewele bataaunubhayo anyako pani sumlagnataa hune asankaamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko prahariko bhanaai chha dabali melaamaa kinamela garne kramamaa nakkali nota phelaa pareko ho nakkali nota dekhaaera thagi garne sambhaawanaa rahekaale praharile sabailaai sajaga rahanasameta agraha gareko chha

paanchatharako phidimasthita phidima maadhyamika widyaalayakaa pradhaanaadhyaapaka durgaaraaja khatriko kutapitabaata sohi widyaalayamaa adhyayanarata eka widyaarthi ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unalaai upachaarakaa laagi paanchathara jillaa aspataalamaa bharnaa garieko chha

widyaarthi basne bencha bangyaaeko wisayamaa pradhaanaadhyaapaka khatrile bihibaara kaksaa kaa widyaarthilaai sodhapuchha garnukaa saathai saamaanya kutapita garekaa thie tara aphu ukta kaaryamaa sumlagna naraheko bataaekaa widyaarthi rohita raailaai pradhaanaadhyaapaka khatrile thapa kutapita gareko abhibhaawaka ra unakaa sahapaathiko bhanaai chha khatrile taaukomaa prahaara garekaa kaarana raai ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unalaai upachaarakaa laagi unakai saathiharule paanchathara jillaa aspataalamaa bharnaa garaaekaa chhan raaisangai kaksaa maa adhyayanarata widyaarthi nisaana saapakotaakaa anusaara sohi widyaalayakaa kaksaa maa adhyayanarata widyaarthikaa kaarana bencha waangieko thiyo

yadyapi kaksaa kai widyaarthile rupaiyaan sankalana gari kursi marmata garaaekaa thie paanchatharako miklaajuna gaaunpaalikaa rawi ghara bhaekaa raai phidima deraa gari kaksaa maa adhyayana gardai aekaa chhan

pradhaanaadhyaapaka khatriko kutaaibaata ghaaite raaile rigataa laageko bataairaheko upachaaramaa sumlagna jillaa aspataalakaa aheba dipaka adhikaarile bataaunubhayo kutapitakaa kunai nila daama nadekhie pani taaukaamaa asara pareko hunasakne adhikaariko bhanaai chha taaukomaa samasyaa bhaeko bhae siti skyaana garnuparchha yasakaa laagi ghantaa parkhanuparchha adhikaarile bhannubhayo haamile dukhaai kama garne ausadhi diekaa chhaun yahi widyaalayamaa gatawarsa eka widyaarthimaathi siksakabaata kutapita bhaeko thiyo aphule praapta garnuparne ankakaa wisayamaa prasna gardaa widyaarthi kutiekaa thie

sukedhaaraa chokamaa mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga sukedhaaraabaata khatieko prahari tolile baa kha nambarako tipara jaancha garne kramamaa ruta paramita nabhaekole tipara chaalaka taamaanale praharilaai ukta rakama ghusa dina khojekaa thie

mahaanagariya prahari baritta mahaaraajagumjabaata traaphika prahari sahita khatieko prahari tolile ga pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharule maadaka padaartha sewana gareko ra kaagajapatra jaancha garne kramamaa praharilaai ukta rakama ghusa dina khojekaa thie

unale maadaka padaartha sewana gari paarkina gari raakheko motarasaaikalalaai laattile haani dhalaairaheko awasthaamaa mahaanagariya prahari baritta kamalapokharibaata khatiekaa praharile phelaa paari sodhapuchha gardaa ukta rakama ghusa dina khojekaa thie

kaathamaadau mahaanagarapaalikaa dhumgedhaaraa annapurna chokamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa dhaadina gajuri nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya chandra guruna sameta janaalaai kariba hajaara saya rupaiyaan ra buka taasa sahita bihibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha
mahaanagariya prahari waritta swayambhubaata khatieko prahari tolile baa kha nambarako bigreko gaadibhitra juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

unale aphnai saali sarlaahi balaraa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai sohi sthaana basne kisorilaai jabarajasti karanai udyoga gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha mahaanagariya prahari warita kaalimaatibaata khatieko praharile kaarkilaai pakraau gareko ho

yasaigari kailaali lamki chuhaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa baalikaalaai jabarajasti karanai gareko abhiyogamaa sohi nagarapaalikaa basne baalaaraama basutelalaai bihibaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha baalaaraamale maagha gate lalaai phakaai bibaaha garchhu bhani pralobhanamaa paari aphnai gharamaa lukaai chhipaai raakhi jabarajasti karanai gareko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya lamkibaata khatieko praharile baalaaraamalaai pakraau gareko ho

nepaalamaa bigatamaa bhaeko sasastra maaowaadi bidrohako belaa dwanda raajanitika thiyo tyasako asara ama rupamaa nai chaurtaphi pareko kuraako bhane samagra nepaali nai bhuktabhogi bhae yasabaata ama naagarikasumgai suraksaa amga pani achhuto rahena suraksaa nikaaya sadaramukaamaharumaa maatra simita bhae utaa bidrohi paksa adhaara siwiramaa bhaejastai eutaa samaya ayo jaba ukta dwandako saantipurna nirupanako suruwaata bhayo sahakarmi gumaaekaa prahariharu punah gaaungaaunmaa pharke ra bhatkekaa tutekaa ani bhagnaawasesa bhaisakekaa prahari ikaaiharumaa punah jiwantataa thapne prayaasa gare ra prahari sumgathana punah phijiyo nepaalako kunaakapchaamaa yo ho nepaala prahariko nikata itihaasa

eka yasari desai bhari aphnaa ikaaiharumaarphata janataalaai saantisuraksaa puryaaune daayitwa bokoko nepaala prahari desabhariko biwidhataayukta samaajasumga paraspara sahakaarya garna sakyo ta dui praharisumga aru paksale raamrari sahakaarya gare ta dwandauparaantako samayamaa prahari baare yi dui prasna gambhira chha yasamaa nepaala prahariko paksamaa nikai pariwartana bhaekaa chhan juna kasaiko saapeksamaa adarisya huna sakchhan tara prabhaawakaari chhan

nepaala prahariko itihaasamaa mahaaniriksaka aijipi maa sarwendra khanaalako agamana yasa kadimaa eutaa aitihaasika ghatnaa ho khanaala nepaala praharikaa aum prahari mahaaniriksaka hun unalaai wisum chaitra gate baseko nepaalako mantri parisadako baithakako nirnayale prahari naayawa mahaaniriksakabaata prahari mahaaniriksaka padamaa badhuwaa gareko thiyo wisum chaitra gate tatkaalina prahari mahaaniriksaka prakaasa aryaalale awakaasa praapta garepachhi gatebaata sarwendra khanaalale kaaryabhaara samhaalekaa thie yasa sadhaarana ghatnaale eutaa asaadhaarana rupaantarana gareko chha

prahari pradhaana kaaryaalaya itihaasamai ahilesammako sababhandaa badhi janamaitri bhaeko chha tyasahaa wiraganja ra janakapurakaa dhotidhaari nepaaliko utikai sahaja panhucha chha jati sukilaamukilaa suta lagaaekaa kohi swanaamadhanyako chha tyahaa thaaru dalita ra janajaati bhaekai kaarana kohi panhucha paaunabaata banchita chhaina madhesakaa pariwesasumga khanaala bhijna chhan janajaatiko rahanasahana unale bujhekaa chhan dalitakaa samasyaa bujhekaa chhan aphno bigatako kaaryaksetramaa khanaala jatiko lokapriya prumhari adhikarita aru kohi bhemtidaina uni lokapriya yasa kaarana chhan ki aphule sewaa dieko samaajalaai unale bujhne prayatna gare ghulamila gare ra sabaikaa bhaidie sumgathana pramukhale samaajalaai bujhepachhi tyahaa maatahatakaa ikaai ra adhikaariharulaai parichaalana garna raamro natijaa lina samasyaa bhaena

ahile samudaaya prahari saajhedaariko awadhaaranaamaa bibhinna kaaryakramaharu haamile bibhinna thaaunmaa dekhirahekaachhaum yo bhaneko sumgathana pramukhako nitile sambhawa bhaeko chha dwandauparaantako samaya sumkramanakaalina rupamaa gujriyo aba dwanda ra sumkramanakaala uparaantako prahari nirmaanko mahatwapurna charanamaanepaala praharilekusala netaritwa paaeko chha khanaalako kaaryakaala kasaile samaanya maaneko hunasakchha kaalaantaramaa gaera nepaala prahariko pariwartanakaari awadhiko rupamaa haamile nai byawaakhyaa garne chhaum bigatamaa haamile bhogiaeko kuraa ho kohi praharibaata hepieko mahasusa garne ra kohibaata prahari hepieko jasto bhaana huneri awasthaa thiyo yasamadhye praharibaata kohi anaahakamaa hepieko mahasusa hune kuraako antya khanaalako kaaryakaalamaa haamile darja garna gairahekaa chhaum praharilaai byawasaayika huna nadine prabitiko antakaalaagi praharile maatra prayaasa garera napugne raheko chha yasohundaahundai pani yo dosro awasthaako antakaa laagi pani upayukta samaya yahi nai ho khanaala jasto asala netaritwa paaeko belaa praharile yasamaa phadko maarna sake nepaala prahari esiyaamai utkarista hunechha

tyasapachhi prastuti badliyo anekaum philmamaa prahariko asala charitra dekhaaune kaama bhayo pachhi ta prahari paatra nai naayaka bhaeko gangaajala sula simghama raaudi raathora sarapharosa ra dabagumjastaa philmaharu auna thaale dwandauparaantako nepaala prahari nirmaanakaa laagi kehi daayitwa midiyaa ra naagarika samaajako pani chha

anusandhaanamaa rahekaa muddaaharuko sawaalamaa purwaprahari adhikaritaharulaai prabhaawa paarne asaphala prayaasa garna lagaaune midiyaale tyasamaa saantha dine jastaa ghatnaakrama haamile yasa wichamaa dekhnemaukaa paayaum praharilaai binaa awarodha kaama garna dine baataawarana banaaune jimmaa sarakaara ra samaajakaa aru paksaharuko tyatikai chha yasako laagi daridha raajanitika sumkalpa awasyaka chha ra sarijanaatmaka naagarika sahakaarya nepaala prahariko kamaandatharako rupamaa samaaja bujhekaa aijipi nepaalale paaeko chha yasalaai awasariko rupamaa saduupayoga garne ki chukne yo sochne kaamasarakaara ra raajanitika baritako pani ho

pakraau parnemaa deuraali daandaakaa warsiya dewaana simha moktaana raheko chha praapta suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya manahari ra prahari chauki bhaartaabaata khatieko tolile gharako pachhaadi kharamuni lukaaera raakhieko awasthaamaa bharuwaa banduka eka thaana saano katuwaa pestola eka thaana ra charesa banaaune dhulo paaudara dui kilosahita uhaanlaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale janaaeko chha
pakraau parekaa moktaanalaai awasyaka kaanuni kaarawaahi agaadi badhaaeko praharile janaaeko chha
yasaibicha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa niriksaka madhukara thaapaako netaritwamaa khatieko tolile hetaundaa baata kilo gaanjaasahita eka wariddhaalaai pakraau gareko chha

tyastai warsiya baalikaalaai balaatkaara gari mahinaadekhi pharaara rahekaa eka abhiyuktalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha kaattikako dosro haptaamaa baalikaalaai balaatkaara garne abhiyoga laagekaa makawaanapura kailaasa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya prawina bhanne wisnauprasaada bhujelalaai pakraau gareko praharile janaaeko chha

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukuma paschima ra prahari chauki magmaabaata sumyukta rupamaa khatieko prahari tolile unalaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa asanasthita mahaanagariya prahari waritta janasewaabaata khatieko praharile baa kha nambarako mini tipara jaancha garne kramamaa kaagajapatra nabhaeko bhani chaalaka magarale praharilaai ukta rakama ghusa dina khojekaa thie

yasaigari kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa kalumki dhumge addaasthitabaata praharilaai saya rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojne dhaadinakaa kedaara mallalaai budhabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha mahaanagariya prahari waritta kaalimaatibaata khatieko praharile baa kha nambarako tipara jaancha garne kramamaa chaalaka mallale kaagajapatra nabhaeko bhani praharilaai ukta rakama ghusa dina khojekaa thie
mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya raanipokharile kaathamaadaun upatyakaabaata eka laakha hajaara litara gharelu madiraa nasta gareko chha

chaalu arthika warsako ahilesamma kaathamaadaun upatyakaakaa wibhinna sthaanabaata bajaara laijaanakaa laagi tayaara paarieko ukta parinaamako gharelu madiraa nasta gareko ho kaaryaalayale kaathamaadaunbaata eka laakha hajaara litara lalitapurabaata saata hajaara ra bhaktapurabaata chaara hajaara litara gharelu madiraa baraamada gari nasta gareko ho

kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa ewum prahari waristha upariksaka pujaa simhale samaajamaa hune dherai ghatanaa gharelu madiraakaa kaarana bhaeko bhandai kaaryaalayale gharelu madiraa niyantranakaa laagi wisesa abhiyaana chalaaeko jaanakaari dinubhayo
praharile hetaumdaabaata keji gaanjaasahita eka wariddhalaai mumgalabaara pakraau gareko chha

hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya chandrabahaadura bhlonalaai ukta gaanjaasahita pakraau gareko ho jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka madhukumaara thaapaa netaritwako prahari tolile bhlonako gharabaata gaanjaa kilo sohi sthaanakaa buddilaala bhlonako gharabaata kilo ra purna bahaadura bhlonako gharabaata kilo gari keji gaanjaa baraamada gareko chha

chaalu arthika warsamaa jillaa prahari kaaryalaya makawaanapurale sanchaalana gareko gaanjaa tathaa aphima phadaani abhiyaanako antyatira aipugdaa katipaya sthaanakaa phadaani garna chhuta huna gaeko gaanjaa jammaa gari bechabikhanako laagi tayaara garera raakheko awasthaamaa prahari gharamaa chhaapaa maarera baraamada garne gareko chha

yasaigari jillaakaa wibhinna sthaanaharumaa pani laagu ausadha bechabikhanako laagi jammaa gari raakhna sakne dekhiekole sambhaawita sthaanaharumaa awasyaka suchanaaharu sumkalana gari chhaapaamaari laaguausadha gaanjaa baraamada tathaa sumlagna wyaktiharulaai pakraau garne abhiyaana sanchaalana gareko prahari upariksaka wuddhiraaja gurunale bataaunubhayo

pakraau parnemaa kaabhre bhakundebesikaa indrakumaara taamaana ra raajakumaara taamaana rahekaa chhan wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa uniharuko saathabaata ekathaana chituwaako chhaalaa baraamada bhaeko mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga koteswaraki prahari niriksaka elijaa girile jaanakaari diin

baalakako daahasumskaara gareko saanjha sohi gharamaa baasa basekaa paahunaaharubaata praharile ghatanaa sumkaaspada raheko jaanakaari paaepachhi anusandhaana suru gareko thiyo baasa basekaa paahunaaharule kothaamaa sutne kramamaa wisaadiko gandha ra dhulo dekhepachhi sumkaa laagera praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

srimaana ra srimati duwaile arko wihe garepachhi bachchaale dukha paaunchha bhanera ghatanaa ghataaeko bhanne bayaana dieki chhin diesapi saahile bhane elisaalaai maagha gate praharile jillaa adaalatamaa pesa gareko chha

janakapurabaata kaathamaadaun audai gareko naa kha nummbarako basalaai chekajaanchako kramamaa solukhumbu salleri ghara bhaeko warsa ko chhirina serpaalaai kaathamaandau chandragiri nagarapaalikaa naagadhumgaa chekapostabaata pakraau gari unako saathabaata praharile awaidha laaguausadha naaitraabheta tyaableta baraamada gareko chha

gata asoja gate kaathamaadaumn jillaa kaageswari manoharaa nagarapaalikaa thalibaata hajaara nagadasahita madhu paudelalagaayata janaa wiruddha bauddha praharile muddaa chalaaeko thiyo sohi mahinaamaa gorkarnaeswara nagarapaalikaako banesigaanubaata hajaara nagada ra dilabahaadura raaisameta saata janaalaai pakraau gari uniharu wiruddha muddaa chalaaieko thiyo

asoja mahinaamaa maatrai chaara juwaakhaalabaata ru dui laakha hajaara nagadasahita janaalaai pakraau gari mahaanagariya prahari waritta bauddhale muddaa chalaaeko ho tyastai kaattika mahinaamaa kaathamaadaunko bauddha parisarabhitrakaa wibhinna hotela tathaa juwaakhaalabaata saadaa posaakamaa khatiekaa tathaa prahari adhikarita sahitako tolile ru laakha hajaara baraamada garnuko saathai janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gari muddaa chalaaeko thiyo

kapana ra taauna plaaninako ksetramaa juwaa khelaai raheko bhanne gopya suchanaako adhaaramaa praharile mansira mahinaamaa dui juwaa khaalabaata ru laakha tina hajaara sahita janaalaai pakraau gari muddaa chalaaeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

tyastai pusa mahinaamaa dui juwaakhaalabaata praharile juwaadesahita bauddha phulabaari ra thalibaata ru saata laakha hajaara baaramada gareko thiyo pakraau parekaawiruddha muddaa dartaa garieko prahari naayawa upariksaka chandale jaanakaari dinubhayo chaalu maagha mahinaako gatesammamaa juwaade pakraau parekaa chhan bhane uniharubaata ru dui laakha baraamada bhaeko thiyo pakraau parne wittikai thapa anusandhaanapaschaata myaada thapa gari muddaa dartaa garne gareko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

chandale bhannubhayo juwaa khelna kasaile ghara kothaa kunai sampatti ra gaadimaa thaaun diemaa tyastaalaai kaarawaahi garinechha kaanunirupamaa so kaaryamaa sumlagna rahekaalaai sameta kaarawaahi garine wyawasthaa raheko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo bauddha ksetrabaata mahaanagariya prahari waritta bauddhale wataa muddaa chalaaeko ho bhane prahari parisara tekule eka muddaa chalaaeko chha hotela tathaa resturaanlaai praharile nigaraanimaa raakhi chhaapaa maarna thaalepachhi ahile gharagharamaa jammaa bhaera juwaa khelne gareko paaieko mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga kapanakaa prahari niriksaka minabahaadura kunwarale bataaunubhayo

gopya suchanaako adhaaramaa gharagharamaa gaera pani praharile juwaadeko akhadaamaa chhaapaa maarne gareko chha pachhillo samaya gharabaatai adhikaasum juwaade pakraau parne gareko tathyaanka raheko kunwarale jaanakaari dinubhayo mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga saankhu ra praharichauki naanlebhaarele sanibaara kaathamaadaun chaapakobotabaata juwaade pakraau gareko thiyo uniharumaa adhikaamsa warsa naaghekaa rahekaa chhan bajaara kendrita juwaa ahile wistaarai bajaarabaata kaathamaadaunko wibhinna gaaun ksetratira sardai gaeko prahari prabhaaga saankhukaa prahari niriksaka laksmi khanaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

prahariko pahanuchabaata bachna sakinchha bhandai juwaadeharule ahile kaathamaadaumn jillaako graamina ksetralaai akhadaa banaaundai gaeko bhae pani praharile juwaa niyantranakaa laagi suksma anusandhaanasahita kaarawaahi thaaleko khanaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

sumhitaamaa juwaa khelne maatra nabhai arule kheleko thaaunmaa chyaankhe thaapnelaai pani juwaa khele baraabarakai kaarawaahi hune kaanuni praawadhaana raheko chha bhadau gate bhandaa pahile juwaa khelnelaai juwaa aina antargata kaarawaahi hundai aeko thiyo ahile muluki aparaadha sumhitaa laagu bhaepachhi sohi kaanuni praawadhaanaanusaara kaarawaahi hundai aeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tathaa maatahatakaa prahari kaaryaalayaharubaata khatieko prahari tolile motarasaaikala chori garne uniharulaai ukta motarasaaikala sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho saathai praharile ukta motarasaaikalaharu sambandhita sawaari dhanilaai jimmaa lagaaeko chha
jethi srimatilaai gharanikaalaa gari bahuwiwaaha garne daakaneswari nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya jayaraama saahalaai jillaa adaalatale eka warsa kaida sajaayako phaisalaa gareko chha

saptari jillaa adaalatakaa nyaayaadhisa harischandra dhungaanaako ekala ijalaasale jayaraamasangai unaki kaanchhi srimati warsiyaa ruwanakumaari saahalaai sameta eka warsa kaida sajaayako phaisalaa gareko chha jayaraamale kutera gharanikaalaa garepachhi bhaaradahasthita kankaalini bhagawati mandiramaa phaaguna gate rubanakumaarisanga dosro wiwaaha garepachhi jethi srimati sanjudewile srimaan wiruddha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa ujuri dieki thiin ujurikaa saatha piditale wiwaaha dartaa chhoraako janmadartaa ra dosro wiwaaha gardaa kaateko kankaalini bhagawati mandirako rasida pesa gareki thiin
praharile nepaala widyaarthi sanghakaa adhyaksa nainasimha maharasahita saatalaai pakraau gareko chha

pokharaamaa gaadi chalaaeko wirodhamaa pakraau parekaa newisanghakaa netaalaai rihaai garna maaga gardai aja kaathamaadaunmaa pradarsana gardaa praharile pakraau gareko ho pakraau parnemaa newisanghakaa upaadhyaksa nawina raai newisangha netaa dambara sunaara sanjiwa dhakaala sanjiwa khadkaa saagara paande ra sankara khadkaa rahekaa chhan

mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaunkaa prawaktaa howindra bogatile widyaarthile nisedhita ksetra todna khojepachhi pakraau garieko jaanakaari dinubhayo pakraau parekaalaai pulisa klaba bharikutimandapamaa raakhieko chha
praharile kaathamaadaum ra kapilawastubaata abaidha laaguausadha sahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

kapilawastu karisnanagara nagarapaalikaa linagetabaata sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya gorakhaa dhobilaai laaguausadha braauna sugara jasto dekhine dhulo saanosaano kaagajamaa raheko pisa spaasamo thaana ra naaitrobheta empula sahita somabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

asthaayi prahari posta linagetabaata khatieko prahari tolile bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai garekaa paidalayaatri dhobilaai jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
gae raati mahottariko bhittaamodamaa lukichhipi basiraheko awasthaamaa unalaai pakraau garieko kaathamaadaun prahari parisarakaa prawaktaa hobindra bogatile jaanakaari dinubhayo

nalaai prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayabaata antarraastriya prahari sumgathana intarapolamaa reda notisa jaari garieko thiyo prawaktaa uttamaraaja suwedikaa anusaara pakraau parekaa khadkaalaai nepaala lyaaune tayaari bhairaheko chha

widyaalayamaa nai baalikaalaai ekaanta kothaamaa lagera aslila chalachitra dekhaaune gareko bhanne ujurikaa adhaaramaa siksakalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dotikaa prahari prawaktaa tathaa prahari naayaba upariksaka laalabahaadura dhaamile bataaunu bhayaae
praharile duwryawahaara garne siksakalaai pakraau gari jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya lyaaeko chha siksakamaathi chhaanabina gari muddhaa chalaaine jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dotile janaaeko chha

uniharuko saathamaa chaainija pestola ra saata raauda goli raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka syaama mahatole jaanakaari dinubhayo widyaalayamaa raastrapati ranina silda pratiyogitaa sanchaalana bhaeko sthaanamaa praharile sankaa laagi khaanatalaasi gardaa uniharu hatiyaarasahita pakraau parekaa thie uniharulaai haatahatiyaara tathaa kharakhajaanaa muddaa chalaaine janaaieko chha

yasaibicha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa kaaryaalaya pramukha prahari upariksaka dambarabahaadura wikale aphule dhaadinamaa bahaala raheko awadhimaa praapta gareko bhattaawaapatako ru hajaara jillaa laingika himsaa niwaarana kosalaai hastaantarana garnubhaeko chha
wisesa suchanaakoadhaaramaa moktaanako gharamaa talaasi gardaa ukta laaguausadha gaanjaa phelaa praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho
simaa ksetramaa hune laaguausadha osaara tathaa bhansaara chhali garine awaidha kaarowaaralaai niyantrana garna chalaaieko abhiyaanamaa parsaa praharile thulo saphalataa haata pareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale wiraganjakaa wibhinna sthaanabaata kilo charesasahita paancha nau saya thaana naaitrobheta tyaabletasahita eka ra bhansaara chhali bhitryaaieko ru laakha badhi mulyako kapadaasahita thori gaaunpaalikaabaata tina janaalaai niyantranamaa lieko ho

pakraau parekaa sabai abhiyuktalaai ajai parsaa praharile patrakaara sammelana gari saarwajanika gareko chha wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa wiraganjako raanighaatabaata kilo charesasahita raamabaalakaprasaada wina makawaanapura thaahaa nagarapaalikaa niwaasi somaala thinga ra bhaaratako kaanapura niwaasi mayanka baajapeilaai niyantranamaa liieko chha aja bihaana kilo charesasahita wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa baata bhaarata uttara pradesa prataapagadha niwaasi mainudina ansaari ra bhaarata wihaara motihaari niwaasi amarullaaha ansaarilaai niyantranamaa liieko parsaakaa prahari upariksaka rewati dhakaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

tyastai wiraganjako inarwaabaata nau saya thaana naaitrobheta tyaabletasahita kanchanapurako bhimadatta nagarapaalikaa niwaasi dipendra panerulaai niyantranamaa liieko upariksaka dhakaalale bataaunubhayo yasaibicha aja bihaana thori gaanupaalikaa baata lu kha num ko trakabaata nau gaatha kapadaa baraamada bhaepachhi awasyaka anusandhaanakaa laagi trakadhani chitawana maadi niwaasi risi suwedi chaalaka kumaara raai ra sahachaalaka sujana raailaai niyantranamaa liieko upariksaka dhakaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

laaguausadhasahita pakraau parekaa janaalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaamaa raakhi awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko chha bhane baraamada bhaeko kapadaa ra pakraau parekaa wyaktilaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi raajaswa anusandhaana kaaryaalaya pathalaiyaa pathaaune tayaari bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile wiraatanagara wimaanasthalabaata chaara saya litara dijela chori garne chaarajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

wiraatanagara wimaanasthala pramukha tekanaatha sitaulaakaa anusaara dijela haraaeko paaiepachhi praharilaai khawara garieko thiyo sitaulaale pusa gate ghatanaa anusandhaanakaa laagi praharimaa niwedana diieko bataae

praharile uniharukaae saathabaata lukaaera raakheko litara dijela pani baraamada gareko chha tina saya litara dijela bhane lagera bikri garisakeko ra choriko dijela kinneko pani pahichaana bhaisakekaa kaarana kinnemaathi pani anusandhaana aghi badhaaine praharile jaanakaari diekaae chha

praharile yahi maagha gate wihaana baje bhairahawaabaata kaathamaandau aundai gareko lu kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka sawaari saadhanalaai chekajaancha gardaa lalitapurakaa saradaraaja bhandaari ra lalitapurakai sirisa karmaachaaryako saathabaata daaijepaama phenaraagana ra nuphina gari empula laaguausadha baraamada gareko chha

yasai gari mahaanagariya prahari waritta nayaanbaaneswarabaata khatieko praharile parsaa wiragumjakaa dhannajaya kumaara karnakaara ra jnaani thaapaamagaralaai sumkaaspada abasthaamaa phelaapaari chekajaancha gardaa phenaraagana nuphina ra daaijepaamaa gari saya empula abaidha laaguausadha sahita pakraau gareko chha
hanumaananagara kankaalini nagarapaalikaasthita gobaragaadhaabaata kilo gaanjaasahita pakraau parekaa tina janaalaai aja sasastra praharile saarwajanika garekoe chha

baraamada garieko gaanjaasahita bhaarata wihaara supaulakaa warsiya udaya mukhiyaa hanumaananagara kankaalini kaa warsiya hiraa mukhiyaa ra warsiya laalabahaadura raaya pakraau parekaa ra uniharulaai anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaiekaamaa aja ayojita patrakaara sammelanamaa so ghatanaa saarwajanika garieko ho

gaanjaa bhaaratatarpha taskari garna laagiraheko belaa sasastra prahari ra gaanjaa taskarabicha goli haanaahaana bhae pani kohi ghaaite nabhaeko tara gheraamaa parekaa uniharulaai pakraau garera lyaaieko sasastra prahari upariksaka khema thaapaale bataaunu bhayo

nepaali bajaarabhandaa bhaaratiya bajaaramaa gaanjaako mulya tina gunaa badhi bhaekaale wyaapaka rupamaa gaanjaa osaarapasaara hune gareko pakraau parneharubaata bujhieko ho bhandai sasastra prahari upariksaka thaapaale taskarako raamro sanjaala ra suraksaa toli bhaekaale gaanjaa osaarapasaarako srotako khojikaa laagi pani praharile simaa naakaamaa kadaai garekoe bataaunubhayo
daanamaa praharile thulo parimaanamaa hatiyaara baraamada gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa kaathamaadaunmaa basdai aekaa kaabhrepalaanchokakaa warsiya anila taamaana udayapurakaa warsiya maanabahaadura khatri raamechhaapakaa warsiya sukalaala taamaanalagaayata raheko uhaanle bataaunubhayo uniharumaathi thapa anusandhaana pachhi kaanunabamojima muddaa chalaaune bataaieko chha

kaathamaadaum jillaa adaalatamaa pesa gariekaa ghalelaai adaalatako adesale kaida bhuktaanako laagi miti maagha gate nai kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya dillibajaaramaa pathaaieko chha

bhaaratabaata bhitrine maalasaamaanako hisaabale pani nepaalaganja paschimako thulo naakaa maaninchha bhaaratabaata nepaalaganja bhansaara hundai nepaala bhitrine saamaana tathaa sarakaarale asulne raajaswako hisaabale pani tyasako pusti garchha yahaanko yo warsako raajaswa asuliko laksya ru arba karoda raheko chha

nepaalaganja naakaa jokhimapurna yaatraakaa laagi pani uttikai charchaamaa airahanchha maanawa dalaalale bhaarata tathaa waidesika rojagaarakaa laagi nepaali mahilaalaai yahi naakaa hundai laijaane garekaa chhan jhaapaa saptari sirahaa nuwaakota sindhupaalchoka sindhuli kaabhrekaa mahilaa tathaa baalabaalikaasameta waidesika rojagaarakaa laagi bhaarata hundai khaadi muluka jaane kramamaa nepaalaganja naakaamaa pakraau parne garekaa chhan

maaiti nepaala nepaalaganjakaa sumyojaka kesawa koiraalaa bhannuhunchha rupaidihaamaa kinamela garna jaane nihun banaaera naakaa paara garne kosisa garinchha san ko janawaridekhi disembarasammako maaiti nepaalako tathyaankalaai herne ho bhane jokhimapurna yaatraamaa rahekaa janaalaai nepaalabhaarata simaanaakaa jamunaabaata uddhaara gari pariwaarako jimmaa lagaaieko chha

tathyaankaanusaara janaa warsamunikaa baalikaa rahekaa chhan bhane baalaka rahekaa chhan tyastai warsamaathikaa mahilaa rahekaa chhan sohi awadhimaa maaiti nepaalale khaadi mulukabaata chaara ra bhaaratabaata gari ko uddhaara gareko chha uddhaara gariekaamaa warsamunikaa baalikaa chaara baalaka chhan bhane warsamaathikaa mahilaa rahekaa chhan

haraaune ra simaa naakaabaata uddhaara garineharu uchcha gharaanaakaa mahilaa tathaa baalabaalikaasameta raheko maaiti nepaalako tathyaankabaata thaahaa hunchha wigatakaa warsamaa purwi pahaadi jillaakaa mahilaa baalabaalikaa rahane gareko bhae pani yasa warsa bhane saawikako madhyapahaadi jillaakaa mahilaa baalabaalikaa dherai rahekaa chhan sadhain bhidabhaada hune bhaekaale naakaa paara garaauna sajilo hune wislesana garera dalaalale yo naakaalaai prayogamaa lyaairaheko maaiti nepaala nepaalaganjakaa sumyojaka koiraalaa bataaunuhunchha

chhoto samayamaa aparichita maanchhele phona garne naataa jodne bhetaghaata garne ra raamro jaagira lagaaidine prema tathaa wiwaaha garne baahanaamaa yuwatilaai simaa kataaune krama badhekaale pani maanawa bechabikhana tathaa osaarapasaara niyantranamaa chunauti raheko chha ahile bhaaratamaa maatrai nabhai tesro mulukamaa sameta mahilaa tathaa kisorilaai maanawa taskarale puyaaundai aekaa chhan

kaathamaadaunko daksinakaalibaata baaghako haddi jasto dekhine wastusahita eka janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

daksinakaali nagarapaalikaa baagadhaaraa basne warsiyaa sawitaa laamaalaai baaghako haddi jasto dekhine wastu thaanasahita pakraau garieko prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya raanipokhari ra mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga chaalnaakhelabaata sumyukta rupamaa khatieko tolile sanibaara sawitaako gharamaa khaanatalaasi gardaa so wastu phelaa paareko ho

kaathamaadaum prahari parisara tekukaa diesapi howindra bogatikaa anusaara arthika lenadenakaa kaarana janakapurakaa manisakumaara guptaale baalikaako apaharana garekaa thie praharile tilagumgaako hotala ganaesa agaadibaata baalikaalaai uddaara garekaae haae apaharanakaarilesaadhe dui laakha rupaiyaan maagekaa thie
