praharilaai hajaara rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojne nuwaakota kakani gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya birabahaadura laamaalaai bihibaara praharile pakraau gareko chha
aphainle janmaaeko sisu bewaarise phaaleko aropamaa praharile aja sirahaako golabajaara nagarapaalikaabaata eka mahilaalaai pakraau gareko chha

golabajaara nagarapaalikaa sidiyotola najikai raheko anpako bagainchaamaa paraalako kunyumaa bewaarise nawajaata sisu phelaaparepachhi anusandhaana gardaa golabajaara nagarapaalikaa balkawaa niwaasi warsiyaa pinki sadaayale nai phaaleko pusthi bhaekaale unalaai pakraau garieko sirahaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

sisulaai amaa pinkikai jimmaa rahane gari uniwiruddha muddaa chalaaieko ukta kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka maadhawaraaja kharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo sisu janmaaeko aun dinamaa sisu phaalekile ajai unimuddaa sirahaa jillaa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gari anusandhaanakaa laagi myaada thapa garaaieko chha

mahottari jillaako jaleswara kaaraagaaramaa purpaksamaa rahandai aekaa dhanusaa jillaako laksminiyaan gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai haala jaleswara kaaraagaaramaa nakabajani chori muddaamaa basdai aekaa ranjita yaadawa janakapura anchala aspataalabaata upachaarakaa kramamaa gaeraati baje pharaara bhaekaamaa aja bihaana baje punahpakraau pareko jelara chiranjiwi thaapaale bataaunubhayo

dhanusaa jillaa adaalatako phaisalaaanusaara nakawajani chori muddaamaa ru hajaara dharauti tirna nasaki wisum mansira gatedekhi thunuwaa yaadawa jaleswara kaaraagaaramaa purpaksamaa basdai aekaamaa gaeraati uni upachaara garaaundaa garaaundai bhaagekaa thie

dui dinaaghi budhabaara atyadhika peta dukhera ependiksa bhaera dui janaa suraksaakarmi ra eka janaa kaaryaalaya sahayogikaa saathamaa anchala aspataala janakapuramaa upachaarakaa laagi gaekaa thunuwaa yaadawa gaeraati kariba bajetira pisaaba pherne bahaanaamaa uthera hatakadi kholi bhaageko jelara thaapaale bataaunubhayo

thunuwaa yaadawa bhaagelagattai kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa jelara thaapaako agrahamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottari ra dhanusaa jillaa prahari tathaa pradesa praharile thunuwaako khojatalaasa wyaapakarupamaa garera paancha ghantaapaschaat punahthunuwaa yaadawalaai pakraau garna saphala bhaeko mahottarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka khagendrabahaadura khadkaale bataaunubhayo

tehrathumako chhathara gaaunpaalikaa anadimamaa bhruna hatyaa gareko aropamaa mumgalawaara diunso amaachhori laai praharile niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana suru gareko chha bhruna hatyaa gareko aropamaa sohi sthaana basne barsa ki daalamu serpaa ra nijako amaa barsa ki kalpanaa serpaalaai pakraau garieko ho

chhori daalamu serpaako garbhamaa raheko bhruna hatyaa gareko asumkaamaa sthaaniyale dieko suchanaako adhaaramaa prahari chauki sukrawaarebaata khatieko prahari tolile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho uniharule bhruna hatyaa garera najikai raheko utisa ghaarimaa khaaldo khanera dhumgaa maatole pureko awasthaamaa praharile phelaa paareko thiyo

ghatanaasthalamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tehrathumabaata prahari toli khati gai kaanuni prakariyaa puraa gari sawa postamaartamako laagi jillaa aspataala dhanakutaa pathaaieko chha bhane ghatanaa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tehrathumale janaaeko chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayoga butawalako samparka kaaryaalayabaata khatieko tolile aja diunso baanke jillaa maalapota kaaryaalayakaa eka karmachaarilaai ghusa lieko aropamaa pakraau gareko chha

ayogako nepaalaganja kaaryaalayakaa pramukha ganaesa gairekaa anusaara maalapotakaa kharidaara sanjayakumaara thaakuralaai sewaagraahiwaata ru hajaara ghusa lieko aropamaa pakraau garieko ho pakraau gariekaa aropi karmachaari thaakuramaathi thapa anusandhaana prakriyaa aghi badhaaieko bataaieko chha
maanawa bechabikhana tathaa laingika himsaawiruddha kaarya gardai aeko keai nepaala kapilawastule simaanaakaa karisnanagarabaata tina warsako awadhimaa mahilaako uddhaara gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya karisnanagaramaa dartaa bhaekaa nau maanawa bechabikhana tathaa osaarapasaarasanga sambandhita muddaamaa prabhaawitale wichauliyaawiruddha kitaani jaaheri diekaa thie jillaa adaalata kapilawastule saata maanawa bechabikhana tathaa osaarapasaarasanga sambandhita muddaamaa abhiyuktalaai jela sajaayako phaisalaa sunaaeko thiyo keai nepaala saakhaa kaaryaalaya kapilawastukaa anusaara tina warsako awadhimaa dekhi warsa umera samuhakaa mahilaa bechabikhanako uchcha jokhimamaa raheko paaieko chha arthika abhaawa asiksaa berojagaari prawidhiko durupayogalagaayata kaarana mahilaa bechabikhanako jokhimamaa parne garekaa chhan
bhaaratabaata awaidha rupamaa bhansaara chhali lyaaekaa kapadaakaa saatha mahottari praharile mangalabaara eka bhaaratiyasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaarata bihaara raajyako sitaamadhi jillaako bhediyaahi gaaun panchaayata kaa warsiya sanjaya saaha ra mahottariko sonamaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya laalabaabu raaya rahekaa prahari naayaba upariksaka khagendrabahaadura khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo bhansaara chhalera kapadaa lyaaundai garekaa duwailaai praharile pakraau gareko ho uniharulaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi mula bhansaara kaaryaalaya bhitthaamoda pathaaieko chha

nepaala widyut praadhikarana saakhaa jaleswara witarana kendrale widyut chori garnebaata ru laakha jariwaanaa asula gareko chha nepaala widyut praadhikarana saakhaa jaleswara witarana kendrakaa pramukha maadhawendra yaadawakaa anusaara chaalu awako mahinaamaa jillaamaa widyut chori garne janaalaai kaarawaahi gari so rakama asula garieko ho

uhaanle jillaako wibhinna thaaunmaa hukina mitaramaa gadabadi ra anya wibhinna tarikaale widyut chuhaawata chori gardai aekaa wyaktilaai witarana kendrabaata nepaala prahari ra sasastra prahariko sumyukta tolisangai khatiekaa widyut chuhaawata niyantrana praawidhika karmachaarisahitako tolile pakraau gari kaarawaahi gareko ho widyut mahasula nabujhaaune graahakako laainasameta kaatieko chha jaleswara witarana kendraantargata hajaara graahaka chhan

raajawiraajarupani sadakakhandasthita rupani chokadekhi eka kilomitara daksinatarphako sadakamaa praharisanga bhaeko muthabhedamaa saptariko kadarabonaakaa warsiya dipendra chaudhari maarieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka raajendra wistale jaanakaari dinubhayo jaanchakaa kramamaa rokna khojepachhi chaudharile praharimaathi goli phaayara garekaa thie

maagha gate raati prahari chauki wisanapuramaa kaaryarata prahari hawaldaara mahendra sataraa yaadawamaathi hatiyaaradhaari samuha pragatisila taraai mukti morchaa samuhale goli prahaara gareko thiyo goli laagera gambhira ghaaite yaadawako triwi siksana aspataala mahaaraajaganjamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha so ghatanaamaa chaudhariko sumlagnataa hunasakne praharile asankaa gareko chha
gaaemgabusthitahatiyaara kaarobaari bhaeko asumkaamaa ekajanaalaai pakraau garna khojdaa praharimaathi jaailaagekaae bhandai praharile goli chalaaeko chha
mumgalabaara aparaanha eka gesta haausamaa rahekaa abhilaasa taamaana naamakaa wyaktilaai praharile goli prahaara gareko ho
taamaanako khuttaamaa goli laageko chha praharile unako saathabaata raaunda golisahita lodeda pestola baraamada gareko jaanakaari mahaanagariya prahari pramukha diaiji sailesa thaapaa ksetrile die
nilakantha nagarapaalikaa raatomaate chaaragharewasne warsiyaa manikaa alemagarako khukuri prahaarabaata mumgalabaara bihaana marityu bhaeko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pasupatinagarale kaida phaisalaa bhaekaa saata pharaara abhiyuktalaai pakraau gari adaalatamaa bujhaaeko chha

jillaa adaalata ilaamamaa pesa garieko jariwaanaa ra kaida asula garna baanki raheko laakha hajaara rupaiyaan jariwaanaa ra eka warsa dina kaida bhaekaa saata pharaara abhiyuktalaai pakraau garieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pasupatinagarakaa prahari niriksaka hemaraaja olile jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parnemaa ru laakha hajaara jariwaanaa ra eka warsa bana muddaamaa kaida sajaaya tokiekaa rona gaanupaalikaa irautaarakaa warsiya netrabahaadura magara chori muddaamaa dina kaida ra ru hajaara jariwaanaa tokiekaa saptari khadaka nagarapaalikaa sthaayi ghara bhai suryodaya nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya wirena mallika chhan

haatahatiyaara muddaamaa ru hajaara jariwaanaa tokiekaa suryodaya nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya santosa paudela gaali beijati muddaamaa pharaara maaijogamaai kaa maheswara achaarya karisnaprasaada bhattaraai bhisma bhattaraai ra milana bhattaraailaai janahi ru kaida tokieko thiyo
gunastara tathaa naapataula ksetriya kaaryaalaya parsaalekama parimaanako tela bikri gari upabhoktaalaai thagi gareko bhandai baaraakaa petrolapampa sanchaalakalaai kaarawaahi gareko chha

naapataula aina ko daphaa ko bamojima ti petrolapampa sanchaalakalaai dinadekhi tina mahinaasammako kaida sajaaya tathaa ru hajaarasamma jariwaanaa garieko kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa adhikaari rajanisa jhaale jaanakaari dinubhayo gata asojamaa ksetriya pramukha sasibhusana yaadawa jillaa prasaasana ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako tolile anugamanakaa kramamaa ti petrolapampakaa sanchaalakale upabhoktaalaai thagi gareko bhetieko thiyo

kaarawaahimaa parekaa petrolapampa sanchaalakamaa kalaiyaa nagarapaalikaa sthita wijaya ayala storakaa sindukaa dewi kalaiyaa sthita mohamada ayala storakaa gitaadewi saaha kalaiyaa badhawanasthita siwasankara tredarsakaa kisori saaha kalawaara gadhimaai sthita harioma ayala storakaa ritaadewi kalawaara baaraa ganjabhawaanipurasthita jayakisana ayala storakaa bachchuprasaada jaisawaala ra simaraasthita baabaa ayala storakaa pankajakumaara guptaa rahekaa chhan

mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga naagadhunagaabaata khatieko prahari tolile yahi maagha gate bihaana naagadhunagaa chekapostamaa biragumjabaata kaathamaandau aundai gareko naa kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka basalaai chekajaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara parsaa pokhariyaa nagarapaalikaa kaa abhinaasa yaadawako saathabaata abaidha laaguausadha daaijepaama empula phenaraagana empula ra nuphina empula gari empula laaguausadha baraamada gareko chha

mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga naagadhunagaabaata khatieko prahari tolile yahi maagha gate bihaana naagadhunagaa chekapostamaa kapilabastubaata kaathamaandau aundai gareko lu kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka basalaai chekajaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara kaathamaandau gokarnaeswara nagarapaalikaa kaa wijaya bhaaratiko saathabaata naaitraabheta tyaabaleta ra kaathamaandau budhaanilakanthakaa sudipa thakuri ra kaathamaandau budhaanilakanthakaa raaju girilaai pakraau gareko chha
purwi nawalaparaasi jillaako binaya triwenaibaata maagha gate epiepha toli tathaa sthaaniya praharile wibhinna kisimakaa laaguausadhasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parneharumaa sohi jillaako sumdipa kaarki ra paschima nawalaparaasi jillaako warsiya nawina sunaara chhan

bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aundai garekaa nijaharulaai sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa uniharuko saathamaa spaasmo wataa ra naaitrojana tyaableta wataa phelaa parepachhi uniharulaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala asthaayi posta triwenaibaata khatieko epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile ukta laaguausadhasahita pakraau gareko ho
kailaali praharile aruna bhatta hatyaa prakaranakaa mukhya abhiyukta sahita janaalaai pakraau garekaae chha

pharaara abhiyuktaharuko khoja talaasamaa khatieko prahari tolilemukhya abhiyukta kailaali godaawarikaa binoda aira sahaayaka abhiyukta kailaali boraadaadikaa debita simha aira kailaali bhajanikaa manju chaudhari khadakaa ra kailaali siwatolakaa lokesa khatrilaai pakraau gareko chha

jillaakaae godaawari nagarapaalikaamaa sudura paschima praadesika mahotsawa heri ghara tarpha pharkine kramamaa saaehi nagarapaalikaa basne binoda air sametakaa taaelile saaehi thaanukai aruna bhattalaai maagha gate dhaarilo hatiyaara prayoga gari hatyaa gari pharaara thie

saaibarale nakkali kaagajapatra banaaundai aeko bhanne gaaepya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa praharile chhaapaa maardaa manamaijumaa ugrachandi saaibara sanchaalana gardai aekaa kaabhrepalaanchokakaa wipuna sresthapakraau parekaa mahaanagariya prahari parisarakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka howindra bogatile jaanakaari dinubhayo

so kramamaa nija sresthale nakkali sartiphiketa sawaari chaalaka anumatipatra naagarikataalagaayatamaa waastawika naama hataai nakkali naama raakhi bikri garne gareko paaieko thiyo praharile unakaa saathabaata nakkali kaagajapatra banaauna prayoga garieko lyaapatapa photokapi mesina ra tayaari awasthaamaa raakhiekaa nakkali kaagajapatrasameta baraamada gareko chha

bhaaratako wihaara bhojapura jillaako saaripura gaaunmaa somabaarakokhabaata bachchaa najanmeko aropamaa gharakaa maanchhele chitaamaa raakhera eka mahilaalaai jiundai jalaaune prayaasa garekaa chhan pahilaa mahilaamaathi kutapita garibehosa banaaya pachhi jalaaune prayaasa bhaeko thiyo

ghatanaako baaremaa jaanakaari paaepachhi praharile tatkaala ghatanaasthala pugera ti mahilaakaae uddaara gareko thiyo mahilaalaai praharile behosikai awasthaamaa chitaabaata uthaaeraaspataala puryaayakaae thiyo ti mahilaa sthaaniya rabindra thaakuraki patni laksmi dewi hun unako ahile sthaaniya araa sadara aspataalamaa bhairaheko janaaieko chha
kaathamaadaum parsaa kapilawastu rasaptaribaatalaaguausadha sahita saata janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaum chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa sthita naagadhumgaa chekapostabaata parsaa biragumjakaa laddu saaha ra baaraa kalaiyaakaa raajiwa ksetri khadkaalaai niyantrita laaguausadha daaijopaama empula phenaraagana empula ra nurphina empula sahita somabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha chekapostamaa khatieko praharile naa kha nambarako basalaai jaancha garne kramamaa basamaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

parsaa barmachokabaata chitawana bharatapurakaa jamina bika ra sohi thaaun basne sumkara laamaalaai niyantrita laaguausadha nurphina empula daaijopaama empula ra phenaaragana empula sahita somabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha sohi thaaunsthita prahari chauki basapaarkabaata khatieko prahari tolile uniharuko saathabaata ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

kapilawastu linakageta chekapostabaata makawaanapura hetaudaa basne wiswa moktaana laamaa ra dolakhaakaa daamu bhujelalaai niyantrita laaguausadhasahita somabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha asthaai prahari posta linakagetabaata khatieko prahari tolile jaancha gardaa laamaako saathabaata niyantrita laaguausadha naaitrobheta saya empula phelaa paari uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

saptari satrudhana chokabaata sirahaakaa bharata yaadawalaai laaguausadha nurphina empula phenaaragana empula daaijelyaapa empula ra naaitraabheta saya empula sahita aitabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bodebarsaaina saptaribaata khatieko prahari tolile bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha aune kramamaa unalaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
janakapura saantinagaraki barse simaa sarmaale dui barse sisulaai wisa khuwaaeraaphule sameta atmahatyaa gareki jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaako esapi gowinda thapaliyaale bataae
yasaibicha maritaka amaachhoriko sokamaa dipa prajwalanasangai dosilaai kadaa kaarabaahiko maaga gardai janakapuramaa wirodha pradarsana bhaeko chha

madhesamaa kuprathaako rupamaa jaraa gaadera raheko jaaijo prathaa abhisaapa baneko mahottariko piparaaki mahilaa adhikaarakarmi gunjaa raayale bataain maaitabaata daaijo lyaauna nasakdaa chhoriharu jalera marna ra atmahatyaa garna garna baadhya chhan unale bhanin yo desamaa kahilesamma daaijoko nihunmaa chhoribuhaari kutine ho agomaa jalirahane parne ho yo sochaniya prasna chha

praachina buddhamurti chorera tina warsadekhi pharaara rahekaa dolpaakaa dhaawaa thaapaalaai praharile aitabaara pakraau gareko chha ghatanaamaa sumlagna thaapaa pharaara bhai kaathamaadaunmaa lukichhipi basdai ae pani kendriya anusandhaana byuroko sahayogamaa kaathamaadaunbaata pakraau garieko dolpaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka abhadesa wistale jaanakaari dinubhayo
karnaali pradesako raajadhaani wirendranagara surkhetamaa aitabaara chituwaa ra dhwaanse chituwaako chhaalaasahita yuwakalaai pakraau gareko chha

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkheta ra aparaadha anusandhaana samuhako sumyukta tolile karnaali raajamaargaantargata wirendranagara nagarapaalikaa airi chokasthita sadakamaa hindiraheko awasthaamaa eka yuwakalaai pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetakaa prawaktaa dipendrabahaadura ksetrile jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parne yuwaka raaskota nagarapaalikaa kaalikotakaa warsiya tankaprasaada upaadhyaaya hun unakaae saathabaatapraharile chituwaako chhaalaa ra dhwaanse chituwaako chhaalaa dui thaana baraamada garekaae chha
praharile chaalisa keji charesasahita dui janaa bhaaratiyalaai kapilawastu nagarapaalikaa bahaaduraganja jaane chokabaata pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaarata motihaari jillaa purwi champaarana thaanaa raksaula graama pareuwaakaa warsiya taahira ali ra sohi sthaanakaa warsiya mohammada alama raheko praharile janaaeko chha aja saanjha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa patrakaara sammelana gari uniharulaai saarwajanika garieko ho

pakraau parekaalaai jillaa adaalatabaata paancha dinakaa laagi thapa anusandhaana garna myaada thapa gari jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa thunaamaa raakhieko prahari naayaba upariksaka rawi raawalale bataaunubhayo anya sumlagna wyaktikaa baaremaa sameta suksma anusandhaana aghi badhaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile rupandehi ra kapilawastubaata awaidha laaguausadha sahita janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

rupandehi butawalabaata kaaski pokharaakaa hemabahaadura gurunalaai niyantrita laaguausadha nurphina empula pheneraagana empula daaijepaama empula naaitrosana empula sahita aitabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya butawalabaata khatieko praharile jaancha garne kramamaa unalaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kapilawastubaata khatieko praharile sumkaaspada rupamaa paidala hindirahekaa uniharulaai jaancha gardaa uniharule bokeko wataa jholaamaa wataa plaastikako gyaalenabhitra ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
kailaaliko jaanaki gaaunpaalikaa golaurikaa eka yuwakale srimatiko hatyaa gariaphule atmahatyaa garekaa chhan

aja bihaana warsiya premalaala chaudharile warsiyaa srimati ramaako hatyaa gari aphule atmahatyaa garekaa hun ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tikaapurakaa anusaara unale srimatiko taaukaamaa dui pataka bancharo prahaara garekaa thie

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tikaapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka siwabahaadura simhale premalaalale srimatiko hatyaa garera aphu gharako baardalimaa jhundieko awasthaamaa sthaaniyawaasile phelaa paareko bataaunubhayo unako upachaarakaa laagi aspataala puyaaie pani chikitsakale unalaai marita ghosanaa gareko praharile janaaeko chha

aja bihaana praharichauki kaalaakundaa tikaapurako tolile saamaanasahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho prahari chauki pramukha prahari naayawa niriksaka kulabahaadura saaudakaa anusaara kariba saadhe chaara laakhakaa kapadaa ra haardaweyarakaa saamaana danalapamaa lyaaundai garekaa belaa pakraau garieko ho

saamaanasangai pakraau parnemaa tikaapurakaa chakra thakullaa dipendra saauda raajakumaara chaudhari ra raajakumaara chaudhari rahekaa chhan khakraulaa bhansaara kaaryaalayakaa pramukha wasantakumaara kesile saamaana lilaama garine ra pakraau parekaa wyaktiko bayaana lii kaarawaahi agaadi badhaaine bataaunubhayo
jabararjasti karanai muddaamaa thunaamaa rahekaa eka kaidiko marityu bhaeko chha

kyaansara rogabaata pidita sarlaahi laalabandi kaa warsakaa siwaraama wikako upachaarako kramamaa bharatapurasthita kyaansara aspataalamaaaja bihaana marityu bhaeko jillaa kaaraagaarakaa pramukha kamalaprasaada kaaphlele jaanakaari dinubhayo

unalaai kyaansarako upachaarakaa laagi gata asoja gate kaathamaadaun sthita kendriya kaaraagaarabaata chitawana lyaaieko thiyo eghaara warsa kaida bhuktaana garnuparne wikalaai wisum chaita gate jela chalaana garieko thiyo

aphnai gharamaa lukaaichhipaai raakheko bharuwaa banduka dui thaana bandelako jasto dekhine khuttaako sapetaa dui thaanasahita unalaai pakraau gari muluki aparaadha sumhitaa aina ko parichchheda ko daphaa ko haatahatiyaara tathaa kharakhajaanaasambandhi kasuramaa muddaa dartaa garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raamaprasaada ghartile bataaunubhayo

godaawari nagarapaalikaa maadui samuhabicha khukuri waa chakku haanaahaana hudaa warsiya aruna bhattako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka abhusana timilsenaale bataaunubhayo maritakako chhaati ra petamaa dhaarilo hatiyaarako ghaau laagekaale dui samuhabicha khukuri waa chakku haanaahaana bhaeko hunasaknepra harile janaaieko chha

ghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa bhattalaai tatkaala attariyaako padmaa aspataalamaa lagiekaamaa thapa upachaarakaa laagi seti anchala aspataala dhanagadhi lyaaune kramamaa nijako baataimaa marityu bhaeko ho

arjunadhaaraa nagarapaalikaa kaalijhodaakaa warsiya khadaananda pokharelale chhimeki dui mahilaalaai khukurile prahaara gari aphule atmahatyaa garekaa chhan maritakalaai aja bihaana chhimeki mahilaako ghara najika kholsimaa ghaanti seriera marityu bhaisakeko awasthaamaa praharile phelaa paareko thiyo

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka mahendrakumaara sresthakaa anusaara maritaka pokharelale aja bihaana sohi wadaakaa warsiyaa jamunaa ojhaa ra warsiya baalakumaari bhaaratilaai khukuri prahaara gari ghaaite banaaekaa thie

pakraau parnemaa hetaundaa nawalapurakaa warsiya anamola pudaasaini ra manahari kaa prawina waaibaa rahekaa chhan aropidwayale patrakaara dhakaalako ghaanti thichera tathaa mukkaa ra dhungaa prahaara gari hatyaa gareko swikaarekaa praharile janaaeko chha
lalitapura saatadobaato ghara bhaekaa warsiya dilaguruna ra sunaakothi basne warsiya niraajana maharjanalaai praharile kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa thamelabaata pakraau gareko ho
kutapitabaata ghaaite bhaekaa uniharuko manamohana memoriyala aspataala sohrakhuttemaa upachaara bhairaheko ra ghatanaakaa wisayamaa thapa anusandhaana jaari raheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

kaathamaadaun kirtipura nagarapaalikaa salyaanathaana basne warsiya dwaarikaa khanaalako gothamaa aja bihaana agalaagi hundaa gotha purnarupamaa jalera kariba ru dui laakha baraabarako dhanamaala nasta bhaeko chha

yasaigari budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kapana payauntaara basne raadhaa taamaanako gharamaa awaidharupamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa dhanusaa janakapuradhaama ghara bhaekaa warsiya jitendra thaapaa magarasahita chaara janaalaai nagada ru hajaarasahita pakraau garieko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
parisarakaa pramukha esaesapi wasanta laamaakaa anusaara taamaana khapadaa bikri garna graahaka khojdai hindekaa thie wisesagari khapataa chinatarpha taskari hundai aeko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale saba dibhijana kaaryaalaya bhajani kailaalimaa kaaryarata pharestara harisachandra kumaaralaai ghusa lieko abhiyogamaa aja pakraau gareko chha

yastai ayogale ajai ilaakaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya simaraamaa kaaryarata sahaayaka kampyutara aparetara raajyanaaraayana saaha wiruddha wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha naagarikataako pramaanapatra banaauna pugekaa eka sewaagraahisanga saahale ghusa maageko abhiyoga laageko chha

sarwochcha adaalatabaata phaaguna gate phaisalaa bhai warsa mahinaa dina kaida sajaaya ra hajaara jariwaanaa tokiekaa tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa bijaurikaa warsiya wisnau chaudharilaai pakraau gari jillaa adaalatamaarphata ghoraahi kaaraagaara chalaana garieko jillaa praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

raajanitika saktiko adamaaadaalatako phaisalaapachhi pharaara bhanie pani khulaarupamaa hidirahekaa chaudharilaai praharile laamo samayapachhi pakraau gareko chha uni yasaaghi maaowaadi kendra nikata widyaarthi sumgathanakaa kendriya sadasya thie uni janataa widyaapitha bijauriko swawiyu upasabhaapati bhaeko belaa balaatkaara kaanda bhaeko thiyo

adaalatale sajaaya phaisalaa garisakdaa pani unale bijaurimaa asahaaya baalawikaasa nepaala naamaka sumsthaa dartaa gari sanchaalana garirahekaa thie chaudhari anyaaparaadhika ghatanaamaa sameta sumlagna bhaeko pani jillaa prahari prawaktaa diesapi raamaprasaada ghartile bataaekaa chhan praharile saarwajanikarupamaa sabailaai ajha kunai aparaadhika ghatanaamaa sumlagna bhaeko bhae jaanakaari upalabdha garaaunaanurodha gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile unalaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

baaraa jitapura baata jhaapaa mechinagara nagarapaalikaa basne sudipa paande ra dhaadina galchhi basne nabaraaja bhujelalaai laaguausadha phenaaragana empula sahita bihibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

chaalu arthika warsako ahilesamma nepaala widyut praadhikarana witarana kendra tulasipurale widyuta chori garne laai kaarawaahi gareko chha polabaata widyut hukina garera gharaayasi prayojanamaa lyaaune gharakaae gharadhanilaai pakraau garieko ukta kendra pramukha dipakajanga chaudharile bataaunubhayo

uhaankaa anusaara pakraau parekaa wyaktilaai widyutiya saamagri prayogako adhaaramaa ru dui hajaaradekhi ru hajaarasamma jariwaanaa gardaa ru chaara laakha hajaara raajaswa sankalana bhaeko kendrakaa prasaasana pramukha yuwaraaja wistale jaanakaari dinubhayo

simalaghaari niwaasi sumana puna jayaraama puna ra wikaasa pariyaaralaai paancha warsapachhi paariwaarika punarmilana garaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka aruna paudelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

niwedanalagattai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko anusandhaana tolile bepattaa bamako sahayogamaa baalakalaai bhaaratabaata uddhaara gari nepaala lyaaera bihibaara abhibhaawakako jimmaa lagaaeko uhaanle bataaunubhayo
eka janaa mahilaale maarieko tyo wiraaloko sawa prahari kaaryaalayamaa lagera ujuri dieki thiin

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhalaari ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaali prahariko sumyukta tolile wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa charesasahita boharaalaai pakraau gareko ho ghara najikai jholaamaa charesa lukaaichhipaai laijaadai garekaa belaa rangehaata pakraau garieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhalaarikaa prahari niriksaka ramesadatta awasthile bataaunubhayo

pakraau parekaa boharaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa raakhi anusandhaanako kaarya bhairaheko uhaanle bataaunubhayo boharaamaathi laagu ausadha aina anusaara muddaa chalaaine prahari niriksaka awasthile bataaunubhayo
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale raajaapura nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaa sadasya uttama chaudhariwiruddha wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha

krasara udyogako dartaa garna siphaarisa garidine bhani sewaagraahisanga chaudharile ru dui laakha hajaara ghusa maagdaamaagdai gareko awasthaamaa ayogako tolile kehi dina pahile pakraau gareko thiyo ayogale bigobamojima asula gari kaida sajaayako maaga raakhdai muddaa dartaa gareko prawaktaa raameswara dangaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parneharumaa nuwaakota ghara bhaekaa sasi taamaana sarlaahi karathawaa ghara bhaekaa saroja magara sohi sukumbaasi tola basne sumana kalawaara kaathamaadaum jorapaati basne ajaya magara raamechhaapa ghara bhaekaa bhaanu magara ra sarlaahi ghara bhaekaa sumana maajhi rahekaa chhan
praharile lalitapura lele basne nawaraaja khadakaale sumchaalana gareko dalachoki siena nirmaana sewaa praalibaata laamo hatiyaaramaa laagne goli tathaa wibhinna saamaana baraamada gareko chha

mahaaraajaganjasthita mahaanagariya prahari warittale ru paancha laakha hajaara sahita juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha warittaantargata mahaanagariya prahari waritta gongabukaa pramukha mohanawikrama kesiko netaritwamaa khateko tolile tokhaa nagarapaalikaa ganaesasthaanasthita lokabahaadura gurunako kothaamaa chha thaana taasasahita budhabaara raati baje pakraau gareko ho

warittakaa pramukha ewum prahari naayaba upariksaka phanaindra prasaainle wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa juwaa kheliraheko sthaanamaa praharile chhaapaa maardaa taasasahita janaalaai niyantranamaa liieko jaanakaari dinubhayo pakraau parekaasanga bayaana line kaama bhairaheko janaaieko chha

saptariko khadaka nagarapaalikaa sthita bisanapura chokamaa gasti garirahekaa belaa saanjha h baje prahari habaladaara mahendraprasaada yaadawalaai motarasaaikalamaa aekaa ajnaata samuhale goli prahaara gari pharaara bhaeko kalyaanapura ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka wisnaupradipa basyaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
saptarimaa praharimaathi goli prahaara bhaeko chha
kaathamaadaumko daksinakaali ra sukekholaa ksetrabaata awaidha hajaara litara tayaari ra hajaara kachcha padaartha gari hajaara litara gharelu madiraapraharile nasta gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pharpinabaata khatieko prahari tolile daksinakaali nagarapaalikaa wadaa eriyaabaata saya litara awaidha gharelu madiraa niyantranamaa lieko ho

modala kaanchhimaayaa ghale kilograama charesasahita sundhaaraasthita waidesika hulaaka bhansaara kaaryaalayabaata pakraau pareki hun nuwaakota chisaana ghara bhaeki warsiyaakaanchhimaayaale kehi myujika bhidiyomaa abhinaya gareko ra wyaawasaayika rupamaa daansa gardai aeko praharile janaaeko chha
praharile bardiyaamaa goli chalaaera hatyaa aropi yuwaraaja girilaai pakraau gareko chha

baankeko kohalapuramaa yasa aghi maagha gate nepaala praharimaa bharnaa huna surkhetabaata kohalapura pugekaa dipakasimha thakuriko wibhatsa hatyaa bhaeko thiyo ghatanaamaa sumlagna bhaeko aropamaa praharile unako khoji jaari raakheko thiyo

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakohalapurakaa disapi ramesabahaadura simha netaritwako tolile unalaai pakraau garne kramamaa bhaagna khojepachhi praharile goli chalaaeko ho unako khuttaamaa goli laageko janaaieko chha

unalaai bandhaka banaaune kaaryamaa sumlagna doti purwi gaaunpaalikaa kaa chakra khadkaa kailaali dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa kundana josi ra kailaali dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa harkesa baagalaai mumgalabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

sohi hotalamaa kaama garne chakra khadkaa sahita janaale kutapita gari jabarajasti motarasaaikalamaa raakhi apaharana gari lageko suchanaakaae adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalibaata khatieko praharile basanta bhaatalaai bandhaka banaai raakhi kutapita gareko awasthaamaa phelaa paareko ho praharile uniharuko saathabaata se pa nambarako motarasaaikala ra thaana mobaaila sameta baraamada gareko chha
aphni chhori ritaa bamajanako asramabaata haraairaheko bhandai sarlaahiko baagamati nagarapaalikaa kaajiraama tolaki sumni botale praharimaa jaaheri dieki chhan

baanke jaanaki gaaunpaalikaa badhaiyaabaata khajuraa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya lule khaanlaai awaidha laaguausadha braauna sugara graama saya miligraama sahita mumgalabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha prahari chauki saaigaanubaata khatieko praharile khaanlaai sumkaa laagi jaancha gardaa gakta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

rupandehi butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa ittaabhattisthita sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa majhuwaa basne warsiya siwa malla ra sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa sundaranagara basne warsiyaa wini thaapaalaai awaidha laaguausadha braaunasugara graama saya miligraama sahita mumgalabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya butawalabaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
chorimaa sumlagna raheko abhiyogamaa prahari niyantranamaa raheko samayamaa gata pusa gate trisuli nadimaa bepattaa bhaekaa maite taamaana aja maritaawasthaamaa bhettiekaa chhan

rasuwaako uttaragayaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya taamaana aja wadaa num solesthita trisuli nadi kinaaramaa maritaawasthaamaa bhettieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka bhimalaala bhattaraaile jaanakaari dinubhayo

taamaanako sawa jillaa aspataala trisulimaa pariksanapaschaat pariwaaralaai jimmaa lagaaieko chha unalaai gata pusa gate raati maathillo trisuli thri e jalawidyut ayojanaako nirmaana saamagri chori gareko abhiyogamaa mailuna praharile niyantranamaa lieko thiyo
kaarawaahikaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nuwaakotatarpha lyaaune kramamaa uni pairebesimaa aepachhi saucha garne baahanaamaa trisuli nadimaa haamaphaalera bepattaa bhaekaa thie

prahariko kutapitabaata galakota nagarapaalikaa kaa soma basneta ra karisna khatri ghaaite bhaekaa chhan hatiyaa prahari chaukikaa jawaana prema wista ra buddha thaapaako kutaaibaata basneta ra khatri ghaaite bhaekaa hun

gambhira ghaaite basnetako pokharaasthita phewaa siti aspataalamaana upachaara bhairaheko uhaanki srimati karisnakumaarile jaanakaari dinubhayo aitabaara raati galakota nagarapaalikaa hatiyaa bajaarasthita prahari chekapostaaghi duwai janaamaathi kutapita garieko ho khatriko awasthaa saamaanya chha ghatanaako chhaanabina gari dosilaai kaarawaahi garnuparchha ghaaite basnetaki srimati karisnakumaarile bhannubhayo

kutapitamaa sumlagna prahari jawaana wista ra thaapaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya harichaura saruwaa garieko chha ghatanaabaare anusandhaana thaalieko prahari niriksaka kesawasimha thaapaale bataaunubhayo

praharile kaathamaandau chandraagari nagarapaalikaa satumgalamaa yahi pusa gate sumtugala basne makawaanapurakaa raaja gautama ra imaadola basne rautahatakaa raaju magaralaai chekajaancha garne kramamaa laaguausadha naaitraabheta pattaa tyaabaleta sahita pakraau gareko chha

kapilawastuki manju chaudharile yahi maagha gate kaathamaandau mahaabauddha sthita aphnai kothaamaa nawajaata sisu janmaai maari pharaara bhaekomaa mahaanagariya prahari waritta janasewaale chaudharilaai pakraau gareko chha bhane sisuko sawa postamaartamako laagi siksana aspataala mahaaraajagumja pathaaeko chha

somabaara saanjha praharile biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa sripurabaata bindabaasini gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya upendra daasalaai kariba kilo saya graama laaguausadha gaanjaa sahitapakraau gareko chha
praharile kaathamaadaum mahaaraajaganjabaata janaa senegala naagarikaharulaai pakraau gareko chha praharile saamlaa hotalabaata saaemabaara raati uniharulaai pakraau garieko ho

kampani rajistraarako kaaryaalaya tripureswara kaathamaadaummaa kaaryarata sahaayaka rajistraara ra unaki chhorilaai laakha ghusa rakamasahita akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale pakraau gareko chha

tripureswaramaa sanchaalita eka widyaalayako raajaswa rakama chhuta garaaune naamamaa panthile ghusa maageko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa unalaai akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogakaa prawaktaa sahasachiwa raameswara dumgaalale niyantranamaa lieko jaanakaari die

panthile ghusa rakama chhorilaai raakhna diekaale akhtiyaarale sahaayaka rajistraara panthiki chhorilaai sameta niyantranamaa lieko chha duwai janaalaai kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita enaemabi baimkako paarkinasthalabaata pakraau garieko prawaktaa dumgaalale bataae

siaibiko tolile unalaai pakraau gareko ho raamro kaama lagaaidinchhu bhani bibhinna pralobhana dekhaai nepaali baalikaalaai jhukyaanamaa paarne kaama unale gardathe besyaalayamaa puryaai jabarajasti besyaabaritimaa sumlagna rahekaa eka byakti sunasari dharaana basne balaraama raaiko chhoraa warsa ko chhona haana raai yasa aghi pakraau parisakekaa chhan
mandana deupura nagarapaalikaa gairaathokasthita umaa sahasiksaalaya uchcha maadhyamika widyaalaya kaabhrepalaanchokabaata saiksika bhramana gaeki baalikaa chaara dinadekhi bepattaa bhaeki chhin

kaksaa maa adhyayanarata warsiyaa sunamaayaa taamaana gata pusa gatedekhi bhaktapurabaata haraaeki hun ukta widyaalayale ayojanaa gareko saiksika bhramanakaa belaa bhaktapurasthita darabaara ksetrabaata haraaeki pradhaanaadhyaapaka saalikaraama sresthale jaanakaari dinubhayo nagarakota kaathamaadaanai melamchi tathaa dolakhaamaa sameta khoji gardaa bhetna nasakieko uhaanle bataaunubhayo

siksaka ra wyawasthaapana samitikaa padaadhikaariko tolile unako khoji gardai aeko chha bepattaa sunamaayaako khojikaa laagi wibhinna sthaanakaa prahari chaukimaa khabara garieko sresthale bataaunubhayo

dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa baalikaa anusaa raaikaa hatyaaraalaai janmakaida phaisalaa garieko chha jabarjasti karanai tathaa kartawya jyaana muddaamaa unakaa dharmapitaa balimaana raai tathaa raaiki srimati padamakumaari raailaai jillaa adaalatale janmakaidako sajaaya sunaaeko ho
kaathamaadaumko nyurodabaata eka kilo sunasahita tina janaa mahilaa pakraau parekaa chhana kaathamaadaum prahari parisarabaata khateko tolilesunasahita tina janaa mahilaa pakraau gareko ho

baakhraa charaauna gaeki baalikaalaai najikaiko naharamaa nuhaauna lagera saamuhika rupamaa balaatkaara gareko bhandai piditaki amaale ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kalyaanapuramaa ujuri dartaa garaaeki thiin

sanghakaa adhyaksa hemakumaari ghartile dwandwapidita parichayapatrako wargaaikarana gari ka wargako parichayapatra dinuparne ra sahida ghosanaa garnuparne maaga garnubhayo sumghakaa sumyojaka serabahaadura basnetale desa ra janataako suraksaa dine silasilaamaa kariba dui hajaara suraksaakarmile wiragati praapta gareko ullekha gardai sarakaarale uniharulaai sahida ghosanaa garisakeko bhae pani suwidhaa praapta huna nasakekaale tyasatarpha sarakaaralaai sumwedanasila banna agraha garnubhayo

dwandwapidita suraksaakarmi pariwaara manju girile tatkaalina yudwamaa sahida bhaekaa suraksaakarmi tathaa ghaaitelaai sarakaarale suwidhaa dine wisayamaa sarakaara lachilo hunuparne wichaara wyakta garnubhayo
aitabaara raati bhaaratabaata lukaaichhipaai nepaala lyaaundai gareko eka hajaara kukhuraako challaasahita eutaa skarapiyo gaadi praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

cheka jaancha garne kramamaa nepaala prahari ra sasastra prahariko sumyukta gasti tolile godaitaa nagarapaalikaa madhuwani naakaabaata dielasienabi num ko bhaaratiya skarapiyomaa challaa lukaai lyaaundai gareko awasthaamaa challaa ra gaadilaai niyantranamaa lieko thiyo
niyantranamaa liieko challaa ra gaadilaai sarlaahi bhansaara kaaryaalayamaa pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sarlaahile janaaeko chha
rolpaa ra siraahaabaata awaidha laaguausadha charesa tathaa gaanjaa sahita janaalaai praharile niyantranamaa liekaae chha

thawaanabaata ghoraahi daanatarpha jaandai gareko lua a je nambarako jipajaancha garne kramamaa jipamaa sawaara punalaai jholaamaa sitamuni lukaaichhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

aitabaara kariba keji laaguausadha gaanjaa sahita siraahaa bhagawaanapura gaaunpaalikaa basne debendra yaadawalaai praharile niyantranamaa liekaaechha wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa khatieko praharile yaadabako gharamaa talaasi gardaa lukaai raakheko awasthaamaa ukta gaanjaa baraamada gareko ho
wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa laaguausadha niyantrana wyuro koteswarabaata khatieko praharile ukta laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari unalaai pakraau gareko ho

yasaigari kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa sinaamumgalabaata jhaapaa siwa sataakksi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bikrama maajhilaai awaidha laaguausadha khairo heroina graama ra emphetaamaaina graama sahita aitabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

rukuma sisne gaaunpaalikaa ki warsiyaa renukaa kesi saaha ra uhaankaa mahinaakaa naabaalaka chhoraa etiyama sanibaara jangalamaa marita phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukuma purwa le janaaeko chha

uhaan pusa gate ausadhi garna nepaalaganja jaane bhandai gharabaata niskanubhaeko thiyo gharadekhi tina kilomitara taadhaako udinadhungaa bhanne jangalamaa chhoraa jhundieko ra amaa bhuinmaa ladeko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko prahari pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka lokanaatha timsinaale bataaunubhayo daauraa kaatna jangala gaekaa sthaaniyawaasile sawa dekhepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

siddhaarthanagara nagarapaalikaa sumkarapuramaa bhansaara chori nikaasi tathaa niyantranako laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko prahariko jawaaphi kaarawaahimaa haala naama thara watana nakhulekaa purusako aitabaara bihaana marityu bhaeko chha

ukta sthaanamaa khatieko prahari tolile yupi echa nambarako motarasaaikala roki jaancha garne kramamaa motarasaaikalamaa aekaa janaale ekkaasi praharilaai laksita gari goli prahaara eka janaa prahari jawaanako baanyaa paakhuraamaa goli laagi ghaaite bhae paschaat praharile jawaaphi phaayara gardaa ghaaite bhaekaa ukta purusako bhima aspataala bhairahawaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

lalitapura godaawari napaa wadaa phulchokiko jumgalamaa ghumna gaekaa janaa wyaktiharu haraaeko bhanne suchanaa mahaanagariya prahari kantrola maarphata yasa kaaryaalayamaa praaptahunaasaatha mahaanagariya prahari parisara lalitapurabaata prahari waristha upariksaka rabindra bahaadura dhaanuka prahari upariksaka sekhara khanaala prahari naayawa upariksaka naaraayana prasaada chimariyaa tathaa mahaanagariya prahari warita saatadobaato mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga baadegaaun sameta baata gari wataa chhuttaa chhutai toli khoji tathaa uddhaarako laagi parichaalita bhaeko thiyo

jillaa dhanusaa ghara bhai haala baaneswara saantinagara kaathamaandau basne warsa ko wrija mohana saaha ai jillaa ghara bhai haala baaneswara saantiranagara kaathamaadaum basne warsa ko suwaasa saaha ai jillaa ghara bhai haala baaneswara saantiranagara kaathamaadaum basne warsa ko abhiseka yaadawa ai jillaa ghara bhai haala baaneswara saantiranagara kaathamaadaum basne warsa ko risi kumaara saaha ai jillaa ghara bhai haala maitidewi kaathamaadaum basne warsa ko sriraama saaha ai jillaa ghara bhai haala baaneswara saantiranagara kaathamaadaum basne warsa ko karanasaaha ai jillaa ghara bhai haala puraano waaneswara basne warsa ko suwaasa saaha jillaa syaanajaa ghara bhai haala koteswara kaathamaadaum basne warsa ki sapanaa guruna jillaa tanahu ghara bhai haala baalaaju basne barsa ki srarijanaa bhattaraai jillaa kaathamaadaum baanesrara ghara hune warsa ko awinabha simha thakuri jillaa sindhupaalchoka ghara bhai haala koteswara wasne warsa ko rosana raanaa jillaa dolakhaa ghara bhai haala koteswara basne warsa ko ramesa paudela jillaa morana ghara bhai haala koteswara basne warsa ko sumjoga ghimire jillaa kaathamaadaum budhaanilakantha basne warsa ki apsaraa khatri jillaa nuwaakota ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaum kapana basne warsa ki sreyaa thapaliyaa jillaa dhanusaa ghara bhai haala puraano baaneswara basne warsa ko santosa kumaara saaha

yasaaghi diieko jaanakaarimaa ghatanaamaa tina agni niyantrakasahita janaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa ra janaalaai saamaanya chota laagekaa chha agni niyantrana kaaryaalaya perisakaa kamaandara irika mauulinale samaachaara sankalanakaa laagi ghatanaasthala pugekaa sanchaarakarmilaai bataaunubhayo

gaumula gaaunpaalikaa andraadimaa pahilo pataka prahari pugdaa gaaunbaasi daraaera luke kehi mahinaa aghi aera baseko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka humsaraaja josiko tolilaai madiraa wyawasthaapana pachhiko awasthaa bujhnakaa laagi ukta gaaunpaalikaale gata somabaara suksma anugamanamaa andraadi pathaaekaamaa sthaaniyawaasi darale lukna pugekaa thie praharilaai dekhepachhi kohi pani gharabaata niskenan bhane ghara baahira rahekaa sameta darale tharathara kaamna thaale kaarana thiyo pahilo pataka gaaunmaa prahariko agamana

jillaako saano gaaun ho andraadi tyahaan sthaaniya sarakaara gathana bhaepachhi maatra gairasakaari kaaryaalayakaa karmachaari ra janapratinidhi jaana thaaleko sthaaniyawaasi dhanabahaadura rokaayaale bataaunubhayo

haami gaumula gaaunpaalikaakaakai wikata wadaakaa rupamaa chhaun pahile na netaa authe na sarakaari tathaa gairasarakaari kaaryaalayakaa karmachaari nai jaba desa sanghiyataamaa gayo taba aphno gaaun andraadimaa janapratinidhi sarakaari tathaa gairasarakaari kaaryaalayakaa karmachaari ani prahari aekoe uhaanle bataaunubhayo andraadie nikai wikata ra pichhadieko wadaakaa rupamaa raheko chha yahaan na teliphona laagchha nata rediyo nai bajchha haami suchanaabaata sameta baahira chhaun rokaayako gunaaso thiyo
surkheta jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale sukrabaara pharaara dui aparaadhi pakraau gareko chha

jillaa adaalatako phaisalaa kaaryaanwayana garaaune nitiantargata wibhinna aparaadhika kriyaakalaapamaa adaalatabaata sajaaya paai pharaara bhaekaa aparaadhimadhye lekabensi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya narendra budhaa ra warsiya yamabahaadura thaapaalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa ewum prahari naayaba upariksaka pradipabahaadura ksetrile jaanakaari dinubhayo

tyastai prahari sahaayaka niriksaka karisna awataara chaudhariko netaritwamaa gaeko tolile baraahataala gaaunpaalikaa surkhetako daha saamudaayika wanamaa kaatha taskari garirahekaa chingaada gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya sumana budhaamagarasahita paancha janaalaai pakraau gareko chha uniharuko saathabaata thaana chha phute saala saata thaana saata phute saala pani baraamada garieko chha kaatha taskarimaa sumlagna anya chaara pharaara chhan
nepaala praharimaa bharnaa huna aekaa surkhetakaa eka yuwakako baankeko kohalapuramaa ghaanti retera wibhatsa hatyaa bhaeko chha

surkhetako simtaa gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi dipakasimha thakuriko kohalapura nagarapaalikaa basapaarka najikai khulaa chauramaa ghaanti retieko awasthaamaa aja sawa phelaapareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kohalapurakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka ramesabahaadura simhale jaanakaari dinubhayo
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayale taalima praapta kukurako sahaayataamaa anusandhaana prakriyaalaai agaadi badhaaeko prahari naayaba upariksaka simhale jaanakaari dinubhayo
aneraaswawiyule amarita saainsa kyaampasakaa aphnaa netaa kamalaraaja josimaathi akramana garnelaai kaarawaahi garna maaga gareko chha

taaukomaa gambhira chota laageko uhaanko ahile thamelasthita manamohana aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha kaathamaadaanai mahaanagariya prahari parisarakaa prawaktaa tathaa prahari naayaba upariksaka howindra bogatile sisitibhi kyaameraabaata phuteja sankalana gari rada prahaara garneko khoji kaarya bhairaheko jaanakaari garaaunubhayo

kaathamaadaum kamalaadisthita tirupati hotalamaa wigata dinadekhi kothaa nambara maa basdai aphulaai nepaala prahariko wahaalawaalaa diesapi bhani nakkali parichayapatra sameta dekhaai aparaadhika gatiwidhi gardai aekaa thaapaalaai mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaumbaata khatieko praharile sohi hotalabaata pakraau gareko ho
baanke jillaabaata maanawa bechabikhana ra suraksita basaainsaraaibaare jaanakaari dii janaalaai paariwaarika milana garaaieko chha

pachhillo samaya adhunika prawidhi prayoga garera mahilaa yuwati ra baalabaalikaalaai pralobhanamaa paari rojagaarikaa naamamaa maanawa taskari hune gareko ra saamaajika sanjaala tathaa imoko prayogabaata yastaa kaarya bhairaheko paaieko aja yahaan ayojita eka kaaryakramamaa jaanakaari diiyo

maanawa bechabikhana niyantranakaa laagi sthaaniya tahako agaami dinako kaarya yojanaa tathaa wyawasthaapanamaa sudhaara lyaaine nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa upapramukha umaa thaapaamagarale bataaunubhayo

maanawa bechabikhana gambhira phaujadaari aparaadha ho maanisalaai kinne waa bechnelaai nepaalako kaanunale warsasamma kaida ra ru dui laakhasamma jariwaanaako wyawasthaa gareko chha maanisalaai kinne waa bechne uddesya raakhi anyatra laijaane ra kaarowaara garnelaai warsadekhi warsasamma kaida ra ru hajaaradekhi ru eka laakhasamma jariwaanaa hune kaanuna wyawasaayi adhiwaktaa wasanta gautamale bataaunubhayo

maanawa bechabikhanamaa praayah mahilaa tathaa baalabaalikaa nai parne gardachhan upamahaanagarapaalikaako mahilaa tathaa baalabaalikaa saakhaale pani mahilaa ra baalabaalikaakai wisayamaa kaama garne hunaale maanawa bechabikhana niyantranamaa yo saakhaale pani mahatwapurna bhumikaa nirwaaha gardai aeko chha ukta saakhaale maanawa bechabikhana niyantranakaa laagi yojanaa banaairaheko upamahaanagarapaalikaa mahilaa tathaa baalabaalikaa saakhaa pramukha sobhaa saahale bataaunubhayo

nepaalamaa maanawa bechabikhanako sawaala jatila ra chunautipurna bandai gaeko chha raastra ra mahilaa didibahiniko ijjata ra asmitaasanga jodieko yo sawaala raajanitiko pramukha muddaa banna nasakeko maaiti nepaalakaa ksetriya sumyojaka kesawa koiraalaale bataaunubhayo maanawa bechabikhanako prabhaawakaari wyawasthaa nahanudaa warseni sayaanai nepaalile samasyaa jheldai aekaa chhan
himaali jillaa dolpaakaa eka wadaadhyaksa buddhamurti choriko aropamaa pakraau parekaa chhan

upallo dolpaako dolpobudgha gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa kaarmaa gurunalaai praharile murti choriko aropamaa pakraau gareko ho se phoksundo gaaunpaalikaa sthita raahaapa gumbaakaa buddha murti choriko aropamaa wadaadhyaksa gurunalaai pakraau garieko praharile janaaeko chha wadaadhyaksa gurunalaai kendriya anusandhaana byuroko tolile kaathamaadaunko bauddhabaatai pakraau gareko ho guruna gaeko sthaaniya tahako nirwaachanamaa dolpobuddha gaaunpaalikaako wadaa num ko adhyaksamaa swatantrabaata bijayi bhaekaa thie bhane paarti ekataapachhi nekapaamaa prawesa garekaa thie sephoksundo gaaunpaalikaa saaldaanasthita raahaapa gumbaakai baudgha murti choriko aropamaa sephoksundo gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya ukrena paasaana guruna dolpobuddha gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya jhyaampaachhuldima laamaa wadaa num kaa warsiya chhirina daawaa guruna ra sephoksundo gaaunpaalikaakaa warsiya paasaana lundupa gurunalaai wisesa anusandhaana byuro siaibile kaathamaadaunko baudghabaatai pakraau gareko thiyo

wadaadhyaksako pakraau sambandhamaa jiprakaa dolpaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka awadesa wistasanga bujhdaa murti choriko aropamaa uni pakraau pareko ra pakraau parne krama jaari rahekaale anusandhaana jaari raheko uhaanle bataaunubhayo
sunasari duhabi nagarapaalikaa kaa phidaa husenalaai goli haani hatyaa garne tina janaalaai aja praharile saarwajanika gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile sadaramukaama inaruwaamaa aja patrakaara sammelana garera phidaa husenako goli haani hatyaa garekaa tina janaalaai pakraau garera saarwajanika gareko ho

phidaa husenako hatyaako mukhya yojanaakaara maaniekaa duhabi nagarapaalikaa chhaataabelikaa warsiya mohammada sakima husena hatyaako yojanaamaa sumlagna tathaa sahayogi warsiya mohamada jaawira husena ra hatyaamaa prayoga bhaeko hatiyaara lukaaunakaa laagi sahayoga garekaa laksminaaraayana mandirakaa pujaari duhabi nagarapaalikaa sitaapura basne wisamwara yaadawalaai pakraau gari saarwajanika gareko sunasarikaa prahari upariksaka raajana adhikaarile jaanakaari dinubhayo

tyasaigari hatyaa garekomadhye eka janaa musari bhane duhabi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya japhara miyaanlaai baankai prahariko sahayogamaa pakraau gari sunasari lyaai raheko sunasarikaa prahari upariksaka adhikaarile bataaunubhayo pakraau parekaako bayaanakaa adhaaramaa phidaako hatyaamaa prayoga gareko katuwaa pestola khokaasahitako eka thaana somaa laagne goli dui thaana ra daaigara chakku eka thaanasameta baraamada gareko praharile janaaeko chha

hatyaapachhi duhabi nagarapaalikaa maa raheko laksminaaraayana mandira parisaramaa raheko nariwalako bota najika gaadera raakheko awasthaamaa hatiyaara baraamada gareko sunasarikaa prahari upariksaka adhikaarile bataaunubhayo hatyaamaa sumlagna pakraaupaschaat bayaanakaa kramamaa hatyaa suniyojita ra risaiwikaa saathai arthika lenadenakaa kaarana bhaeko khuleko sunasarikaa prahari pramukha adhikaarile bataaunubhayo hatyaamaa anyako sameta sumlagnataako asankaamaa anusandhaana jaari raheko praharile janaaeko chha
balaatkaara hatyaa tathaa bepattaako aropa laagekaa litila buddha bhanine raamabahaadura bamjanako eka asramabaata aja eka mahaatmaa gurulaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
sindhuliko kamalaamaai nagarapaalikaa sthita paire dhaapasaara bhanne sthaanamaa raheko asramamaa sindhupaalchokabaata aeko praharile mahaatmaa gurulaai sodhapuchhakaa laagi niyantranamaa lieko ho

asramabaata mahaatmaa guru bhanine indrabahaadura syaantaanalaai sodhapuchhakaa laagi lyaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhulikaa prahari upariksaka raameswaraprasaada yaadawale jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaanle hetaundaa ghara bhaekaa syaantaanalaai sindhuli asramabaata saamaanya sodhapuchha garnuparne bhaekaale lyaaieko bataaunubhayo praharile saamaanya sodhapuchhakaa laagi lyaaieko bataae pani anya jaanakaari bhane dieko chhaina

yasaibicha sindhupaalchokabaata prahari naayawa upariksaka wimalaraaja kandelako toli pani sindhuli aipugeko chha ukta tolile budhabaara belukaa asramamaa wigata tina warsadekhi basdai aekaa raamechhaapa bhirapaani ghara bhaekaa warsiyaa sonaama muktaana topchena gurulagaayatakaa wyaktisanga sodhapuchha pachhi sthalagata awalokana gareko thiyo

raamabahaadura bamjanako sindhuliko pairai sarlaahiko pattharakota ra sindhupaalchokamaa maatra asrama raheko uhaankaa anuyaayile bataaekaa thie satyako khojikaa laagi yasa dharmamaa laageko ra aphuharule jnaana praapta gariraheko uniharuko bhanaai thiyo guru banda prasiksanamaa rahanubhaekaale bamjanalaai ahile bhetna namilne uniharule praharilaai jawaapha diekaa thie

parwata phalewaasa nagarapaalikaa wasne warsiyaa mahilaalaai gata mumsira gate raati jabarajasti karanai tathaa pusa gate raati jabarajasti karanai udyoga gareko abhiyogamaa sohi sthaana basne warsiya naaraayanabahaadura kumwaralaai mumgalabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

bhaktapura madhyapura thimi nagarapaalikaa gaththaagharasthita saathiko ghara gaeko awasthaamaa babaramahala deraa gari basne warsiyaa baalikaalaai jabarajasti karanai gareko abhiyogamaa sohi thaaun basne udayapura triyugaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya ripumardana basneta lagaayata janaalaai budhabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

unalaai sthaaniya yuwaaharule hetaumdaa aspataalasamma lyaaekaa thie hetaumdaa aspataalale unalaai budhabaara saanjhanai marita ghosanaa gareko ho dhakaalalalaai aspataalasamma lyaaekaa yuwaaharu ahile makawaanapura prahariko samparkamai chhan uniharumaarphata ghatanaako wisayamaa thapa jaanakaari line prayaasa bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
unako hatyaa bhaeko huna sakne asumkaa garieko chha unako sawa hetaumdaa aspataalamaa raakhieko chha

dhakaalale makawaanapurako sanchaara ksetramaa eka dasakabhandaa badhi samaya witaaekaa chhan makawaanapurako sakti epha ema rediyo paalun hundai ahile uni rediyo anamolamaa abaddha thie uni padamapokhariko paantalesthita buddha maawimaa siksana sameta garchhan unako srimati ra janaa baalabachchaa chhan uni ra unakaa pariwaara hetaumdaako nawalapuramaa basdai aekaa thie
jabarjasti karanai udyoga muddaamaa purpaksakaa laagi ghoraahi kaaraagaaramaa raakhiekaa baganlaachuli gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya tilabahaadura maharaako marityu bhaekoe chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka belabahaadura paandekaa anusaara budhabaara aparaahna bajetira biraami bhaekaa maharaako raapti swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana ghoraahimaa upachaarakaa kramamaa nidhana bhaeko ho

awaidha gaanjaakheti bhaeko jaanakaarianusaara pusa gatedekhi gaanjaa nasta garne abhiyaana chalaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhulikaa prahari upariksaka raameswaraprasaada yaadawale jaanakaari dinubhayo ajasamma bighaako gaanjaa nasta garieko chha kula praharile tyasa ksetrako gaanjaa phandaanisangai nasta garne abhiyaana chalaaeko prahari upariksaka yaadawale jaanakaari dinubhayo

makawaanapuramaa praharile gaanjaa taskarale lagaaeko kheti nasta garne krama badhesangai gaanjaa taskara sindhulikaa durgamasthalako pahichaana gari kehi warsadekhi wyaawasaayika rupamaa gaanjaakheti gardai aekaa chhan gaanjaakhetibaata managya amdaani hune pralobhanamaa tyasa ksetrakaa sthaaniyawaasi pani aru baali chhaadera gaanjaakhetitarpha akarsita bhaeko chhan durgamamaa janasamparka kama rahane ra niyamana garne nikaayako najara napugne bhaekaale marina gaaunpaalikaa ra hariharapuragadhi gaaunpaalikaamaa gaanjaakheti garne taskarako bigabigi raheko chha
baankeko kohalapurabaata gae raati praharile thulo parimaanako charesasahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pradesa num prahari anusandhaana wyuro nepaalaganjabaata prahari niriksaka bodharaaja regmiko netaritwamaa khatieko tolile kohalapura kausilyaa memoriyala aspataala agaadibaata kilo charesasahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho pakraau parnemaa salyaana kupindeha nagarapaalikaa kaa kaalimaana budhaa surkheta gurbhaakota kaa buddhabahaadura rijaala ra paschima rukuma musikota kaa balabahaadura budhaa rahekaa chhan tinai janaalaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi prahari hiraasatamaa raakhieko chha
paschima nawalaparaasimaa dinaaghi bepattaa bhaeki eka baalikaa gandaka naharamaa marita phelaa pareki chhin

sustaa gaaunpaalikaa kudiyaasthita harijana tolaki warsiyaa gitaa harijana gandaka naharako bhaaratiya ksetramaa marita phelaa pareki hun uni pusa gatedekhi haraairaheki thiin unako sawa gandaka paschimi naharako surajapuraa widyut utpaadanagariha najikai phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko chha unako sawa pariksanakaa laagi parithwichandra aspataala paraasi pathaaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belaataarile janaaeko chha

ayogakaa anusaara marita wyaktiko naagarikataa pesa gari saamaajika suraksaa bhattaa rakama hinaaminaa gareko bhanne ujurikaa adhaaramaa tatkaalina gaawisa sachiwa rewatikumaara koiraalaa tatkaalina kaaryaalaya sahayogi tekabahaadura srestha ra arkaa sahayogi manisa chaudhariwiruddha muddaa daayara garieko chha

juwaataasa khelaairaheko chha bhanne gopya suchanaako adhaaramaa chhaapaa maardaa laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraamada garieko mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaumkaa prawaktaa howindra bogatile jaanakaari die

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa anusaara lewaataara ra gorakhaa sahida lakhana gaaunpaalikaasthita thewaataara jodne pulamuni boraamaa poko paari phaaleko awasthaamaa sisu phelaa pareko chha sisulaai chitawana medikala kaleja bharatapuramaa upachaarakaa laagi lyaaieko praharile janaaeko chha sisu kasle chhodeko ho bhanne wisayamaa anusandhaana ra khoji bhairaheko janaaieko chha

yasaibicha naaraayanagadhasthita bajaarako petimaa bewaarise sawa phelaa pareko chha praharikaa anusaara bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa puraano tarakaari bajaaramaa aja bihaana maagi hindne andaaji warsiya purusa maritaawasthaamaa phelaa pareko ho unako sanaakhata huna sakeko chhaina chisokaa kaarana unako marityu bhaeko anumaana garieko chha

tinajanaalaai bepattaa paarieko raamabahaadura bamajanako sindhupaalchokasthita asrama bhitra prahariko khaanatalaasi gareko chhasanchalaala waaiwaako hatyaa tathaa arutinajanaalaai bepattaa paarieko unimaathi chha

jillaa adaalata sindhupaalchokabaata khaanatalaasiko anumati liera siaibisahitako prahari toli sukrabaara wihaana saadhe baje sindhupaalchoka baandegaaun sthita asrama pugeko thiyoprahari tolimaapharensika wijna pani chhan
baalawiwaahako aropamaa jillaako champaadewi gaaunpaalikaakaa warsiya uttama khatri ra sthaaniya warsiyaa eka kisorilaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko ho

khatri jnaana prakaasa maawi ghoraakhorimaa kaksaa maa ra kisori kaksaa maa adhyayanarata chhin uniharule baalawiwaaha gareko bhandai champaadewi kaa wadaadhyaksa suresa thaapaale jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa suchanaa dinubhaeko thiyo

tokeko bhandaa kama umeramaa wiwaaha gareko bhanne suchanaakaa adhaaramaa uniharu duwailaai niyantranamaa liieko jillaa prahari pramukha anantaraama sarmaale jaanakaari dinubhayo okhaladhungaaamaa pratisatabhandaa badhi baalawiwaaha hune garekaa wibhinna adhyayanale dekhaaeko chha

sambhunaatha nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa gulasana khaatunasanga baalawiwaaha garne gareko aropamaa saptari jillaa adaalatale unalaai so sajaaya dieko srestedaara dilakumaara bardewaale jaanakaari dinabhayo

bhaaratiya prahariko sahayogamaa waisaakha gate pakraau parekaa miyaan jillaa adaalatako adesamaa gata jetha gatedekhi purpaksakaa laagi raajawiraaja kaaraagaaramaa thunaamaa chhan aropile chhimeki muluka bhaaratamaa puyaaera chaita gate baalawiwaaha gareko bhandai baalikaakaa bijali miyaanle jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa ujuri garnubhaeko thiyo

upabhoktaa adhikaara sumraksana mancha chitawana saakhaale bharatapura naapi kaaryaalayakaa eka karmachaarilaai ru hajaara ghusa lieko abhiyogamaa pakraau gari jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaeko chha

paudelale bujhaaekaa notako photo khichera aphni bahinimaarphata unalaai diieko thiyo sohi notako nambarakaa adhaaramaa unalaai pakraau gari jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayamaa bujhaaieko ukta saakhaakaa adhyaksa wisnau bhusaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
pramukha jillaa adhikaari jitendra basnetale ghusa rakamasahita pakraau pare pani akhtiyaaralaai khabara nagarekaa kaarana nijaamati sewaa ainaanurupa muddaa agaadi badhaaine jaanakaari dinubhayo
sripaschima nawalaparaasiko bardaghaata nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa kamalaa chaudhariko aphnai srimaanle hatyaa gareko khuleko chha kamalaa gata pusa gatebaata haraairaheki thiin

unakaa srimaana sunilale apasi manamutaawakaa kaarana srimatiko aphainle hatyaa gareko swikaara gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka raajendraprasaada bhattale jaanakaari dinubhayo unako pusa gate jangalamaa sawa phelaa parepachhi praharile anusandhaana thaaleko thiyo ghaansa daauraa garna gaekaa sthaaniyawaasile bardaghaatako chisaapaani jangalamaa unako sawa phelaa paarepachhi anusandhaanako kramamaa unakai srimaan sunilale hatyaa gareko rahasya khuleko ho
sunilalaai praharile niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana gareko chha bhane unalaai kartawya jyaana muddaa chalaaine bataaieko chha

jabarjasti karanai ra lenadena bigo muddaamaa pharaara rahekaa dui mahilaasahita tina janaalaai sirahaa praharile pakraau gareko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaabaata khatieko tolile jabarjasti karanai muddaamaa pharaara rahekaa sirahaako wisnaupura gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya rawindra yaadawalaai pakraau gareko ho pakraau parekaa yaadawalaai sirahaa jillaa adaalatamaa bujhaaine praharile janaaeko chha

yastai lenadena bigo muddaamaa pharaara sirahaa nagarapaalikaa saaraswara niwaasi warsiyaa anitaa dewi sahani ra sohi thaaunki warsiyaa bhakti khaatunalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka maadhawaraaja kharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

prahariko tolile sirahaako wibhinna sthaanabaata kariba ru dui laakha mulya baraabarako awaidha saamaanasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha bhaaratabaata awaidha rupamaa chori paithaari gariraheko awasthaamaa awaidha saamaanasahita kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya santosakumaara yaadawa ra bariyaarapatti gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya pramodakumaara yaadawalaai pakraau gareko ho

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya lahaanabaata khatieko tolile thaana ledija skaapha kaalo maricha kilo baraamada gareko chha bhane ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya narahaale dui tina khaane tela kilo paastaa tathaa prahari chauki aurahile motarasaaikalasahita litara naagaaji khaane telalagaayatakaa samaana baraamada gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaale janaaeko chha

yastai purwi chitawanako khairahani nagarapaalikaa simalataandimaa inaarabhitra arkaa eka janaako sawa bhetieko chha sthaaniyawaasi buddhiraama chaudhariko inaaramaa sohi bhalaai mahatoko sawa bhetieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaeko chha wigata dinadekhi haraairahekaa unako sawa sadeko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko ho duwai sawa pariksanakaa laagi bharatapura aspataalamaa raakhieko chha

athaara warsamunikaa kisorile sahi ra galata kuraako wichaara garna nasakdaa jabarjasti karanaiko sikaara parne garekaa hun lalitapuramaa aja ayojita samudaayaprahari saajhedaari kaaryakrama antargatako widyaalaya prahari samparka kaaryakramamaa warsa munikaa kisoriko ksamataa sahi ra galata chhuttayaauna nasakne hanudaa uniharu badhi jabarjasti karanaiko sikaara hune gareko mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya raanipokhari kaathamaadaumnkaa pramukha prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka sailesa thaapaa ksetrile bataaunubhayo

lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa raamakumaari limbule baalabaalikaale pariwaarasangabhandaa badhi samaya widyaalayakaa siksaka ra siksikaasanga bitaaune hundaa ti baalabaalikaamaa wisesa dhyaana dinuparne jaanakaari dinubhayo baalabaalikaako jiwana raksaa garne daayitwa pariwaarabhandaa badhi siksakasiksikaako haatamaa chha wadaadhyaksa limbule bhannubhayo widyaalayamaa siksakasiksikaale kadaaikaa saatha aphnaa widyaarthiko jiwana sudhaarna laagnuparchha

mahaanagariya prahari parisara jaawalaakhela lalitapurakaa pramukha prahari waristha upariksaka rawindrabahaadura dhaanukale baalabaalikaalaai praharilaai abhibhaawakasaraha lii aphumaa parekaa samasyaa ujaagara garna agraha garnubhayo

widyaarthi siksaka abhibhaawaka prahari ra sthaaniya taha sabai mili samudaayabaata aghi badhdaa junasukai aparaadha niyantrana hunchha dhaanukale thapnubhayo praharilaai baalabaalikaale saathisaraha wyawahaara gari aphno pidaa pokhdaa thuprai jokhimako samaadhaana garna sakinchha maachhaapuchchherrra widyaalayakaa kaaryakaari pramukha winodaprasaada yaadawale baalabaalikaamaa praharisambandhi pareko nakaaraatmaka manowaijnaanika traasa saajhedaari kaaryakramamaarphata hataauna saphala bhaeko jaanakaari dinubhayo
mahaanagariya waritta saatadobaatokaa prahari naayaba upariksaka gautama misrale warsamunikaa kisorakisorilaai saamaajika sanjaalako prayoga nagarna agraha garnubhayo
intaabhattaa udyogamaa lagi balaatkaara gareko aropamaa praharile eka janaa wiruddha jabarjasti karanaiko ujuri dartaa gareko chha

baakhraa charaauna gaeki warsiyaa eka kisorilaai balaatkaara gareko aropamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kadarabonaale khadga nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raadhesyaama panditawiruddha jabarjasti karanaiko ujuri dartaa gareko janaaeko chha aropi pandita intaabhattaa udyogakaa lekhaapaala huna panditale kisorilaai lalaaiphakaai udyogabhitra lagi balaatkaara gareko bhandai piditaki amaale budhabaara praharimaa ujuri dieki thiin eka mahinaaaghi nai bhaeko balaatkaara ghatanaa gaaungharamaa nai chhalaphala gari milaapatra garna khojdaa praharimaa dhilaa gari suchanaa aeko prahari niriksaka surendra sresthale bataaunubhayo piditaki amaale budhabaara ujuri liera aepachhi kisoriko swaasthya pariksana gari ujuri dartaa garieko prahari niriksaka sresthale bataaunubhayo
baalikaa nirmalaa pantako balaatkaarapachhi hatyaa ghatanaamaa laaparabaahi garne atha prahariwiruddha muddaa chalne bhaeko chha

anusandhaanamaa pramaana nasta gareko ra nirdaaesa wyaktilaai pakraau garera yaatanaa dieko aropamaa atha prahariwiruddha muddaa chalaauna prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale nirdesana dieko ho eaiji dhiru basnyaata netaritwako chhaanabina samitiko pratiwedanakaa adhaaramaa muddaa chalaauna prahari mahaaniriksaka sarwendra khanaalale jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapuralaai nirdesana diekaa hun

pramaana nasta garekomaa atha praharilaai saarwajanika nyaayawiruddhako kasura muddaa tathaa nirdaaesalaai yaatanaa diekomaa yimadhye chaaralaai yaatanaasambandhi muddaasameta chalaaune nirnaya bhaeko chha

pakraau parnemaa rasuwaako uttaragayaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya sanjita waaibaa nuwaakotako taarakeswara gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya surendra taamaana ra sohi sthaanakaa warsiya wikaasa taamaana rahekaa prahari upariksaka dambarabahaadura wikale bataaunubhayo

praharile parithwiraajamaargako gajurimaa sawaari jaancha gardaa baa pa ra pradesa nambara pa nambarakaa motarasaaikalabaata ukta suna baraamada gareko thiyo praharile suna ra motarasaaikalasameta tinajanaalaai hiraasatamaa lieko chha
saptari mahaadewaa gaaunpaalikaa saawika daandhaa gaawisa kaa eka wariddhalaai boksoko aropamaa hatyaa garne aropitalaai jillaa adaalata saptarile janmakaidako phaisalaa gareko chha

maritakaki patni warsiyaa khikharidewi sadaale ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanarupamaa kaarawaahikaa laagi ujuri dieki thiin jillaa nyaayaadhisa raajesakumaara kaaphleko ekala ijalaasale aropita sadaalaai wisum manasira gate pupaksarakaa laagi raajawiraaja kaaraagaaramaa thunaamaa pathaaeko thiyo

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa ra kaathamaadaum gokarnaeswara nagarapaalikaa sthita abaidha madiraa banaaune kaarakhaanaabaata hajaara litara abaidha madiraa bihibaara bihaana praharile baraamada gari nasta gareko chha

mahaanagariya prahari parisarabaata khatieko praharile wibhinna sthaanamaa raheko abaidha madiraa banaaune kaarakhaanaa chhaapaa maardaa gharelu madiraa banaauna prayoga garine kachchaa padaartha kariba hajaara litara tayaari gharelu madiraa hajaara litara ra hajaara saya keji tayaari kodoko tonbaa phelaa paari sthaaniya bhadrabhalaadmiharu sumchaarakarmiharu tathaa wadaa janapratinidhiharuko rohabaramaa nasta gareko so parisarale janaaeko chha

saathai ukta sthaanabaata gyaasa chulo thaana gyaasa silindara thaana plaastrika ra phalaamako drama saya thaana ra gharelu madiraa banaauna prayoga hune bhaandaaharu thaana sameta praharile baraamada gareko chha

bikrikaa laagi bhaaratatarpha laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa praharile dhaadinako gajuribajaara najikaibaata aja bihaana kilograama pratibandhita laaguausadha charesasahita dui bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaanaibaata bhaaratatarpha kantenara trakamaa loda gari laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa suraakikaa adhaaramaa awaidha laaguausadha chaserasahita praharile uniharulaai pakraau garna saphala bhaeko ho pakraau parnemaa bhaaratako uttara pradesasthita ekaanighauli tikaapuragraama niwaasi warsiya satendra simha beghala ra patewaa sugaulikaa warsiya mahamada gaddi raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajurile janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajuri ra laaguausadha niyantrana byurobaata khatiaekaa praharile so laaguausadha pakraau gareko ho echaara esaesa numko kantenaramaa lukaai chhipaai charesa loda gareko suraaki aepachhi byurokaa tolile pichhaa gardai gajuri bajaara najikai jillaa prahari ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajuriko sahayogale uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho yasari pakraau gareko laaguausadha charesa warsakai sabaibhandaa dherai parimaanako bhaeko pani praharile janaaeko chha

maritaka magarako paancha warsiya chhori eutaa ra anya saanaa dui chhori chhan ghatanaako prakariti herdaa chiso bhuimmaa ra kothaako jhyaaladhokaa sabai banda gari daauraa baalera sutekaale nisaassiera marityu bhaeko hunasakne asankaa raheko mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga saankhukaa prahari niriksaka laksmi khanaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

khatrilaai awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi salyaana jillaa adaalatamaa pathaaieko chha
motarasaaikalasahita mobaaila ra nagada lutapaata garne eka girohalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanale niyantranamaa lieko chha

pakraau parnemaa dharaana kaa nimaa onju sorpaa ra dharaana kaa winoda limbusahita paancha janaa raheko iprakaa dharaanakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka sumanakumaara timsinaale jaanakaari dinubhayo mobaailako kala ditelakaa adhaaramaa uniharulaai pakraau garieko uhaanle bataaunubhayo

uniharule dharaana sthita sardu kholaamaa mansira gate sunasari kosi gaaunpaalikaa kaa bechana miyaako ko pa numko motarasaaikala eka thaana mobaaila ra ru eka hajaara nagada lutapaata gareko praharile janaaeko chha bhaarata arariyaa basmatiyaakaa sabura mansurile bokeko eka thaana mobaailasameta lutapaata garekaa ujuri pareko chha lutapaatapachhi ukta mobaaila dharaana kaa dipesa pariyaaralaai becheko pattaa laagepachhi praharile pusa gate pariyaaralaai niyantranamaa liera choriko mobaaila baraamada gareko prahari naayaba upariksaka timsinaale bataaunubhayo

chori gareko motarasaaikalako paatapurjaa kholera dharaana kaa ladana ansaariko motarasaaikala gyaarejamaa diekaa thie ukta gyaarejabaata injina baraamada garieko ra anya paartapurjaa bhane dharaana sthita mahesa wikako nyu paathibharaa warkasapamaa phelaa paarieko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo

hatyaa gari pharaara rahekaa abhiyukta budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kapana basne kaabhrepalaanchoka saabika khanaalathoka gaaun bikaasa samiti kaa jitendra bhanne jnaanendra sresthalaai warsa pachhi aitabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

saala saauna gate kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa naakaari tola basne wisnau ghimirelaai dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gari hatyaa garekaa sresthale aphno baastabika parichaya sameta lukaai naama pariwartana gari pharaara bhaekomaa prahari pradhaana kaaryaalaya kendriya anusandhaana byurobaata khatieko praharile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa sundhaaraabaata unalaai phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

golabajaara nagarapaalikaa sthitabaata dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa chhaparaadi basne warsiya chaturanaaraayana chaudharilaai esaemaji hatiyaara thaana myaagjina thaana ra raaunda goli sahita mumgalabaara bihaana praharile pakraau gareko chha

num pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya janakapura ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya golabajaara siraahaabaata sumyukta rupamaa khatieko prahari tolile sa pa nambarako motarasaaikala jaancha garnekramamaa chaudharile bokeko jholaabaata ukta hatiyaara phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatako gata phaaguna gateko phaisalaale paancha warsa kaida tokiekaa nuwaakota siwapuri gaaunpaalikaa kaa asoka bhanine syaarpaa taamaana kaaraagaara chalaana bhaekaa hun

prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byurobaata khatieko tolile somabaara belukaa kaathamaadaun saamaakhusibaata unalaai pakraau gari kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatamaa pesa garekaamaa adaalatako adesale ajai kaida bhuktaanikaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaana garieko ho
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale jillaa adaalata kaathamaadaunmaa kaaryarata kharidaara widura pokharelalaai ru hajaara ghusa lieko abhiyogamaa pakraau gareko chha
pachaasa laakhabhandaa badhi mulyako pratibandhita laaguausadha charesasahita pakraau parekaa warsiya eka yuwakalaai jillaa praharile saarwajanika gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa kalumki basne dhaadina galchhikaa warsiya arjunaprasaada adhikaari warsakaa kedaaraprasaada adhikaari ra kaabhreko bhumju ghara bhai chaabahila basne warsakaa anjana upreti rahekaa chhan uniharu prahari inkaauntaramaa maariekaa kumaara ghaitekaa sahayogi bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
kapilawastuko karisnanagara naakaabaata uniharulaai swadesa phirtaa garieko ho rasuwaa sunasari morana daana paalpaa rupandehi ra baagalunakaa mahilaako uddhaara garieko ho

keai nepaalako prayaasamaa bihibaara mahilaako uddhaara gari pariwaaramaa punarmilana garaaieko chha nepaalako sunauli tathaa kaankadabhittaa simaanaakaako prayoga gari saamaana kinna tathaa ghumna jaane bhani jhuto bolna lagaai simaapaara garaaieko bataaieko chha

bhaaratamaa lagera bhaaratiya dalaalale hotalako eka kothaamaa raakhi bandhaka banaaeko mahilaako bhanaai chha keai nepaala dillisthita pratinidhi nawina josile dieko jaanakaarianusaara wibhinna saata jillaabaata pharakapharaka wyaktisangako samparkako maadhyamabaata waidesika rojagaarikaa laagi ti mahilaa bhaarata pugekaa janaaieko chha maanawa bechawikhanako badalindo swarupasangai waidesika rojagaarile lyaaeko samasyaa pachhillo samayamaa nikai jatila ewum kathinapurna hundai gairaheko chha jasako chapetaamaa bhaaratako baato hundai tesro mulaka pugekaa hajaaraanai mahilaa tathaa kisori parekaa chhan rojagaarikaa laagi bhaarata hundai tesro muluka pugera uniharule duhkhakasta bhogirahekaa chhan

badhdo werojagaarako samasyaale maanawa bechabikhanako jokhimamaa parnasakne sambhaawanaa uchcha rahekaale yasatarpha sarokaarawaalaa sabai paksako dhyaana jaanuparne keai nepaalakaa kaaryakrama nirdesaka indraraaja bhattaraaile bataaunubhayo

laaguausadha niyantrana byuro kaankarabhittaabaata khatieko prahari tolile birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa baata paanchathara ghara bhai damaka maa deraa gari basne warsiya sangraama limbulaai sanibaara diunso graama khairo heroinasahita pakraau gareko pramukha prahari upariksaka bhimaprasaada dhakaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

limbuko bayaanakaa adhaaramaa praharile arjunadhaaraa nagarapaalikaa maa deraa gari basdai aekaa warsiya bhimabahaadura adhikaari unaki srimati warsiyaa omamaayaa khatiwadaa adhikaari ra saali kachanakawala ki warsiyaa rewatimaayaa daangilaai pakraau garnukaa saathai uniharuko saathabaata graama baraamada garieko ho praarambhika anusandhaanamaa uniharule laaguausadha bikriwitarana garne gareko khuleko prahari pramukha dhakaalale bataaunubhayo

parisarako tolile chori muddaamaa kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatako wisum jethako phaisalaaanusaara ru chha laakha hajaara jariwaanaa ra kaida sajaaya sunaaekaa laalakaaji guruna yahi pusa gate adaalatamaa bujhaai bharpaai line kramamaa bhaagekaa thie praharile unalaai gata sukrabaara sindhulibaata pakraau gareko ho

tyastai patrakaara sammelanamaa makawaanapurako hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa wanaspati chokakaa mahindra waaiwaale pani aphnaa buwaa khoji dina agraha garekaa chhan unale aphno buwaa chaitadekhi bamajanako asramabaatai bepattaa bhaeko janaae

ayogakaa anusaara praadhikarana nolaaita saakhaa kaathamaadaun mulapaanikaa sahayogidwaya hastabahaadura thaapaamagara kaale thaapaamagara ra jyaalaadaarimaa kaama garne widura pudaasaini sametale jaggaabaata bijuliko taara hataaidine bhandai sewaagraahisanga wibhinna bahaanaamaa ghusa maagdaamaagdai pakraau garieko chha ayogakaa prawaktaa raameswara dangaalakaa anusaara praadhikaranakaa tina karmachaarilaai bihibaara pakraau gari aja saarwajanika garieko ho yastai ayogale rupandehi siddhaarthanagara nagarapaalikaa ko anjani baaniyaanko naamamaa raheko jaggaa haala saabika gardaa sarakaari saarwajanika jaggaa wyaktiko naamamaa ghusaai aniyamitataa gareko aropamaa naapi kaaryaalaya bhairahawaakaa naapi adhikarita ghanasyaama duwe ra naapi sarweksaka saukaata ali khaan lagaayatale bhrastaachaara gareko abhiyogamaa aja muddaa daayara gareko chha ayogale maalapota kaaryaalaya bhairahawaakaa naasu balaraama srestha ra wadaa sachiwa dhanesachandra guruna sametako milemato dekhieko ayogako anusandhaanabaata khuleko janaaeko chha yastai bardiyaa raajaapura nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaa sadasya uttama chaudharile ru dui laakha hajaara ghusa lieko abhiyogamaa ayogale pakraau gareko chha krasara udyogako dartaa garna siphaarisa tathaa sahayoga garidine bhani sewaagraahisanga ghusa maagdaa maagdai ayogako nepaalaganja ksetriya kaaryaalayabaata khatieko tolile pakraau gareko ho
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kohalapuramaa praharilaai ghusa dina khojne dui goru wyaapaari pakraau parekaa chhan

pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka ramesabahaadura simhalaai ru hajaara ghusa dina khojne kohalapurakaa nawaraaja thaapaa ra hetaundaakaa abdula dewaana pakraau parekaa hun bihaana phona garera jaruri kaama chha bhanekaa thie maile kehi muddaa maamilaa holaa bhanera kaaryaalayamai aunus bhaneko thien naayaba upariksaka simhale bhannubhayo haami goru wyaapaari haanai sahayoga garnupayo bhandai mero tebalamaa paisaa raakhepachhi uniharulaai pakraau garieko ho baankekaa graamina ksetrabaata goru jammaa gari taskari hune gareko chha nepaala praharikaa mahaaniriksaka sarwendra khanaalale bihibaara maatra nepaalaganja pugera baanke ra bardiyaakaa prahari adhikaarilaai pralobhanamaa paarera rakama dina khojnelaai pakraau garera muddaa chalaauna nirdesana dinubhaeko thiyo

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kohalapurale aja saadhe baje graama braauna sugara sahita duilaai pakraau gareko chha kohalapura nagarapaalikaa sthita nirmaanaadhina awasthaamaa raheko basapaarkamaa laagu ausadha braauna sugarako kaarobaara bhairaheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa khatieko prahari tolile uniharulaai pakraau gareko hoe pakraau parnemaa nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa emapi skula tolamaa basne warsiya saahida khaana ra warsiya saddaaba khaana rahekaa chhan

diyutimaa raheko prahari karmachaarilaai nagada saya rupaiyaan ghusa dina khojne baa kha nambarako tiphara chaalaka kaabhre timaala gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya benaabahaadura taamaanalaai bihibaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

pepsikolaa manaharaa pulasthita baa kha nambarako tiphara jaancha garne kramamaa chaalaka taamaanale blubuka nabhaekole diyutimaa raheko praharilaai sawaari chaalaka rasidabhitra raakhi ukta nagada ghusa dina khojepachhi ukta rakama sahita unalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko ho
