praharile kendrakaa sanchaalaka surati gurunasahita chaara janaalaai niyantranamaa lieko chha mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga budhaanilakantha jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya ra maaiti nepaalako sumyukta anugamanamaa sudhaara kendra maapadandawiparita sanchaalana bhaeko paaieko ho uddhaara gariekaa mahilaamadhye janaalaai abhibhaawakako ra janaalaai maaiti nepaalako jimmaa lagaaieko chha so wisayamaa thapa awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha yataa tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalako paarkina ksetrabaata awaidha rupamaa suna sankalana gariraheko awasthaamaa kariba graamako sunako baalaa thaanasahita hetaundaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa saanobaabu kaarkilaai gaeraati praharile pakraau gareko chha

yastai kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa jadibutimaa nakkali sunalaai sakkali suna bhani bikri gardai hindekaa lalitapura basne kaathamaadaunm mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa raaju pariyaaralaai bihibaara saanjha pakraau gareko praharile janaaeko chha
achhaama jillaamaa bahuwiwaaha garne eka jodi prahariko phandaamaa parekaa chhan

bahuwiwaaha gareko bhani praharimaa pareko jaaherikaa adhaaramaa dhakaari gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya premaprasaada rimaala ra mangalasena nagarapaalikaa basne urmilaa bhandaarilaai achhaama praharile pakraau gareko ho

premaprasaadaki srimati jamunaa bhandaarile yahi mansira gate aphu gharamaa hundaahundai dosro wiwaaha gareko bhandai pusa gate jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa jaaheri dieko adhaaramaa uniharulaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya achhaamale janaaeko chha

jaaheri parekai dina gate pakraau parekaa duwai janaalaai achhaama jillaa adaalatabaata myaada thapa gari jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa raakhera thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko achhaamakaa prahari pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka janakabahaadura saahile jaanakaari dinubhayo kaanunaanusaara kasaile bahuwiwaaha garemaa wiwaaha badara hune ra jela sajaayasameta hune wyawasthaa raheko chha
wanyajantu redapaandaako chhaalaa osaarapasaara tathaa bikri witarana muddaamaa phaarara rahekaa eka janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaunm jillaa adaalatale saala chaita gate nuwaakota siwapuri gaaunpaalikaa kaa santosakumaara taamaanalaai paancha warsa kaida hune thahara garekomaa ukta sajaaya beruju rahi pharaara rahekaa pratiwaadilaai kendriya prahari anusandhaana byuroko tolile budhabaara pakraau gari phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanakaa laagi aja kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatamaa pesa gareko chha unalaai gurjubhanjyaana nuwaakotabaata pakraau garieko ho

redapaandaako chhaalaasahita pakraau parekaa taamaana adaalatabaata maaga bhaeko dharautibaapata jamaanimaa raakhi taarekhamaa rahekaamaa adaalatako phaisalaapachhi pharaara rahekaa thie kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatamaa pesa gariekaa taamaanalaai adaalatako adesale kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi ajai kendriya kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya sundhaaraamaa pathaaieko chha

wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byuro ra dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya kaathamaadaunbaata khatieko sumyukta tolile kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa dirghasaanti tolabaatajiundo laatokoserosahita uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

awaidha kaaryamaa sumlagna uniharulaai dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya kaathamaadaunmaa bujhaaieko prahari upariksaka chaturwedile jaanakaari dinubhayo uniharu wiruddha raastriya nikunja tathaa wanyajantu sumraksana aina anusaara muddaa agaadi badhaaieko chha

barkole berera phaaleko awasthaamaa bhetieko bachchako sawa nikai agaadi phaaliekole sadeko awasthaamaa raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanakaa prahari naayawa upariksaka sudanakumaara timsinaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parnemaa kaathamaadaun naagaarjuna basne rautahata chandrapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya chetaraaja siwakotira lalitapura mangalabajaara basne ilaama ruwaana gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiyaa anju pradhaana raheko praharile janaaekaae chha

daanamaa goli laagera eka janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhana raajapura gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi narabahaadura ghartile bokeko bharuwaa banduka padkiera barsiya dhanalaala punalaai goli laageko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanale janaaeko chha punako ahile baankemaa upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari pramukha ewum esapi belabahaadura paandele jaanakaari die

punalaai goli laageko ghatanaa saarwajanika bhaepachhi khaanatalaasi gardaa raajapura gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi barsiya narabahaadura gharti ra resamabahaadura budhaathokilaai bharuwaa wandukasahita praharile pakraau gareko chha uniharule banduka saathamaa raakhi barsaumdekhi wanyajantuko chori sikaari gardai aeko hunasakne praharile anumaana gareko chha pakraau parekaaharu maathi awasyaka anusandhaana jaari raheko ra uniharumaathi awaidha haata hatiyaara kharakhajaanaasambandhi muddaa chalaaune tayaari bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha uniharuwaata bandukamaa prayoga hune phalaamakaa tukraa sisaakaa chharraakaa tukraa salaaiko kaanti sodaajasto dekhine wastu baaruda nirmaana garna awasyaka kachchaa padaartha kepa banaauna prayoga garine ausadhiko kholasameta baraamada bhaeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

mukhamaa maaska lagaaera aekaa wyaktile sasuraako hatyaa gareko laksmile praharilaai bayaana dieki chhin taaukomaa saamaanya chota raheki laksmiko sthaaniya swaasthya chaukimaa upachaara garieko chha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya paatanakaa prahari niriksaka gindrabahaadura bogatikaa anusaara ghatanaasthalamaa purusako ghadi bhettieko chha gharamaa sasuraa ra buhaari maatrai rahekaa belaa ghatanaa ghateko ho

laksmile ghatanaapachhi arko gaaunmaa rahekaa aphnaa jethaaju dhanabahaaduralaai phona samparka gareko khuleko bogatile bataaunubhayo laksmikaa srimaan rojagaariko silasilaamaa bhaaratamaa chhan hatyaabaare kehi khulna sakeko chhaina prahari niriksaka bogatile bhannubhayo maritakako sawa pariksanakaa laagi paatana praathamika swaasthya kendra lagieko chha ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko prahari naayaba upariksaka netramanai girile bataaunubhayo

rolpaa praharile paancha kilo charesa baraamada gareko chha sunachhahari gaaunpaalikaa phuliwanabaata sulichaura aundai gareko raaja nambarako jipa jaancha garne kramamaa lukaaichhipaai jipabaata dhuwaani garna laagieko ukta charesa baraamada garieko ho charesasangai rolpaa thabaana gaaunpaalikaa uwaaki warsiyaa waramaayaa punalaai praharile pakraau gari nusandhaana prakriyaa agaadi badhaaeko chha

rolpaa jillaa adaalatabaata anusandhaanakaa laagi dinako myaada thapa garaaieko prahari naayaba upariksaka dipaka khadkaale bataaunubhayo praharile patakapataka thulo parimaanamaa charesa pakraau gardai ae pani yasako osaarapasaaramaa rokathaama huna sakeko chhaina charesa osaarapasaaramaa praayah ardhawaise mahilaa ra baalabaalikaa prayoga garne garieko paaieko chha
parsaagadhi nagarapaalikaa bhatanikaa jayakisoraprasaada chaudharile chhuraa prahaara gardaa sthaaniyawaasi warsiyaa sakuntaalaa chaudhari gambhira ghaaite hunubhaeko chha

ghaaite sakuntalaako wiraganjasthita nesanala medikala siksana aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko prahari naayaba upariksaka maanabahaadura raaile jaanakaari dinubhayo jayakisoraprasaada ra sakuntalaa nepaala raastriya uchcha maadhyamika widyaalaya badhaniyaaramaa kaksaa maa adhyayanarata chhan patakapataka raakheko wiwaaha prataawa sukantalaale aswikaara gareko bhandai jayakisorale unimaathi chhuraa prahaara gareko raaile bataaunubhayo jayakisoraprasaadalaai pakraau gari anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaun parisarako tolile tokhaa nagarapaalikaamaa durlabha wanyajantu saalakako khapataa bokera hindirahekaa nuwaakota siwapurikaa warsiya wikaasa budhaathokilaai sukrabaara raati pakraau gari aja saarwajanika gareko chha

pakraauparnemaa sankhuwaasabhaa ghara bhai budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa ganaesa mandirasangai basne warsiya sumana taamaana rautahata ghara bhai haala budhaanilakantha basne warsiya wisaala magara ra sindhupaalchoka ghara bhai budhaanilakantha basobaasa garne warsiya nawaraaja saapakotaa raheko bauddhakaa prahari niriksaka resama achaaryale jaanakaari dinubhayo uniharule gata mansira gate chiniyaan yuwati enki lilaai snukara khelne stikale taaukomaa prahaara gari aiphona lutekaa thie
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanabaata khatieko praharile sumkaa laagi jaancha garne kramamaa ukta laaguausadha sahita bikalaai phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
dui naabaalikaalaai phakaaera bhaaratatarpha bikrikaa laagi laijaandai gardaa praharile nuwaakotakaa dui yuwaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa taadi gaaunpaalikaa kaa kaanchhaa taamaana ra buddhimaana taamaana raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nuwaakotakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka bhimalaala bhattaraaile jaanakaari dinubhayo

uhaankaa anusaara nuwaakotako durgama ksetramaa parne gaaunkaa dui naabaalikaalaai bhaaratamaa raamro kaama lagaaidine bhanera tyasatarpha laijaandai gardaa jillaako taadi gaaunpaalikaa baahunabensibaata niyantranamaa liieko ho

mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga laakuribhanjyaana lalitapurako kaaryaalaya pramukha sutne kothaamaa wipada wyawasthaapana mahaasaakhaa saamaakhusimaa kaaryarata prahari jawaana rosana srestha sukrawaara raati goli laagera ghaaite bhaeko ghatanaa sambandhamaa chhaanawina gari pratiwedana pesa garna mahaanagariya prahari waritta saatadobaatokaa prahari naayawa upariksaka gautama misrako netaritwamaa sadasyiya chhaanawina samiti sanibaara gathana garieko chha

dolakhaa baiteswara gaaunpaalikaa gairimudi ghara bhaekaa warsiya prahari jawaana srestha ekai gaaunko saathi rahekaa ukta prabhaagakaa pramukha prahari sahaayaka niriksaka ramesa taamaanalaai bhetna gaeko awasthaamaa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka taamaanale pestolabaata goli analoda garne kramamaa akasmaata padkana jaandaa prahari jawaana sresthako baayaan gaalaamaa goli laagdaa ghaaite bhaekole tatkaala upachaarako laagi kista aspataala imaadola lagieko ra praarambhika upachaara paschaata nepaala prahari aspataala mahaaraajagumjamaa upachaara bhairaheko mahaanagariya prahari parisara lalitapurale janaaeko chha

sindhupaalchokako melamchi nagarapaalikaa melamchimaa saata warsakaa baalaka marita phelaa parekaa chhan sukrabaara saanjha h bajeko samayamaa melamchi nagarapaalikaakaa tankaprasaada dulaalako gharamaa deraa gari basekaa sindhuli tinapaatana gaaunpaalikaa kaa dipaka magarakaa chhoraa umesako sohi gharako arko kothaamaa basne eka mahilaako banda kothaamaa marita bhetieko ho

maadaka padaartha sewana gari pharakapharaka naama bataaune ti mahilaale hatyaa gareko asankaamaa unalaai melamchi ilaakaa prahari kaaryalayamaa lyaai anusandhaana thaalieko prahari niriksaka mahendra darnaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo maritaka baalakako sawa pariksanakaa laagi kaathamaadaunsthita triwi siksana aspataala lagieko chha

nayaanroda barahathawaa sadakakhandabaata haattidandaatarpha jaane bhitribaatomaa soti choraniyaa pula najika taauko ksatawiksata ra ghopto parera ladeko awasthaamaa mahatoko sawa phelaa pareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya prahari kaaryaalaya barahathawaale janaaeko chha

maritaka mahato waagmati nagarapaalikaako jiraayatamaa aphainle sanchaalana gareko niji widyaalayamaa padhaaundai aekaa thie hatyaamaa sumlagnako khoji tathaa ghatanaa sambandhamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko sarlaahi prahari upariksaka posaraaja pokharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

hatyaaralaai pakraau garnuparne maaga gardai aphanta tathaa sthaaniyawaasile praharilaai sawa uthaauna diekaa chhainan maritakakaa dedha warsa ra chaara warsakaa dui chhoraa chhan sawa uthaauna nadiepachhi kukurasahita prahariko wisesa anusandhaana toli ghatanaasthalamaa pugeko chha

nepaala praharile dedha mahinaadekhi lalitapuramaa saamudaayika prahari saajhedaari kaaryakrama sanchaalana garepachhi aparaadhika gatiwidhi niyantrana kaarya prabhaawakaari bandai gaeko chha yasa kramamaa kaathamaadaun upatyakaamaa baalabaalikaalaai wibhinna daansabaara resturaan ra sinemaa halabaata niyantranamaa lii kaanuni kaarawaahi garieko chha

saamudaayika sumsthaagata widyaalayakaa pradhaanaadhyaapakako laagi samudaaya prahari saajhedaari awadhaaranaasambandhi abhimukhikarana kaaryakramamaa prahari waristha upariksaka uttamaraaja suwedile saamudaayika prahari sewaa kendra aparaadha niyantrana mahaasaakhaale haala desabhara saamudaayika kendra sthaapanaa gareko bataaunubhayo kula sthaaniya tahamadhye sanga saajhedaari garieko uhaanko bhanaai chha hareka wyaktile praharilaai aparaadha niyantrana garna sahayoga garnuparchha uhaanle bhannubhayo

saptarimaa warsiyaa mahilaalaai amaanawiya wyawahaara gareko aropamaa eka mahilaasahita tina janaa pakraau parekaa chhan sanibaara raati piditako kapaala mudera juttaako maalaa lagaai amaanawiya wyawahaara gareko aropamaa praharile khadga nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya rupanaaraayana raama warsiyaa ahilyaadewi raama ra warsiya sunila raamalaai pakraau gareko janaaeko chha

charitrahinako jhutho aropa lagaai kapaala kaatera juttaako maalaa lagaai atyantai amaanawiya wyawahaara gareko piditale dukheso pokhin ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kadarabonaale abhadra wyawahaara gareko aropamaa aropitalaai pakraau gari kaarawaahi suru gareko prahari niriksaka surendra sresthale bataaunubhayo

kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa bauddhasthita tusaalabaata srota nakhuleko ru laakha hajaara tathaa chaara hajaara chiniyaan yuanasahita dui janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha pakraau parnemaa bhaaratiya naagarika chhirina dorje ra chiniyaan naagarika warsiya panchaaudi raheko prahari pradhaana kaaryaalaya kaathamaadaunle janaaeko chha mahaanagariya prahariwaritta bauddhabaata khatieko prahari tolile gaeraati jaanchakaa kramamaa uniharu pakraau parekaa hun

yasaibicha kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa ghattekulo deraa gari basne ilaama deumaai nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sawina bhattaraaiko kothaabaata bihibaara sunakaa wibhinna garagahanaa lyaapatapa eka thaana ra ru hajaarasahita kariba ru eka laakha baraabarako dhanamaala chori bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaunko chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa naagadhungaabaata aja bihaana praharile laaguausadhasahita eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha kanchanapurako karisnapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya kirana airalaai awaidha laaguausadha charesa graama tathaa niyantrita laaguausadha naaitrobheta empula spaasa pisa ra daailesa dui botalasahita bihaana praharile pakraau gareko ho

kailaalibaata kaathamaadauntarpha aundai gareko naakha numko basa jaancha garne kramamaa lukaaichhipaai lyaaeko awasthaamaa ukta laaguausadhasahita airalaai pakraau garieko prahari pradhaana kaaryaalaya kaathamaadaanaile jaanakaari dieko chha

yataa kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa saamaakhusibaata laaguausadha khairo heroinasahita tina janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha pakraauparnemaa kailaali tikaapura nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaeki warsiyaa warsaa kunwara warsiya bhuwana kaarki ra warsiya anila josi rahekaa chhan laaguausadha niyantrana byuro koteswarabaata khatieko prahari tolile uniharulaai bihibaara ukta laaguausadhasahita phelaa paareko ra ghatanaako wisayamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko janaaieko chha

atyadhika jaadokaa kaarana kothaamaa agoko koilaa raakhera sutdaa eka baalakako marityu bhaeko chha bhane amaa behosa bhaeki chhan baitadi jillaa melauli nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala dadeldhuraa basdai aekaa andaaji warsiya winoda bhattako gae raati mutyu bhaeko chha bhane unaki amaa hiraa bhatta behosa raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dadeldhuraale janaaeko chha

aksijana paryaapta rupamaa napaaundaa nisaassiera warsiya winoda bhattako marityu bhaeko chha bhane amaalaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi dadeldhuraabaata dhanagadhi riphara garieko chha amaragadhi nagarapaalikaa dadeldhuraa penesiyaa ekedemimaa keyaratekarako rupamaa kaaryarata hiraa bhattako awasthaa gambhira raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaun upatyakaamaa beglaabeglai samayamaa wibhinna sadakamaa chalne sawaari saadhanamaa paaketamaarakaa samuhale saanketika bhaasaako prayoga garera chori garne garekaa chhan tyasto chaariko krama badhepachhi mansira gatedekhi mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaunle nepaala yaataayaata wyawasaayi raastriya mahaasanghasanga milera saadaa posaakamaa prahari khataaeko thiyo

paketamaarale paisaalaai da mobaailalaai kaana praharilaai thuldaai chaalakalaai maama sahachaalakalaai male gaadibaata jharera bhaagalaai tapkilagaayatakaa saanketika sabdaharu prayoga garne gareko anusandhaanamaa khuleko chha uhaanle bhannubhayo paisaa bhaeko yaatrulaai gheraabandimaa paari thelamathelako awasthaa banaaera yaatrusanga bhaeko nagada mobaaila tathaa garagahanaa lutapaata garne gareko uhaanko bhanaai chha parisarale paketamaarisanga haalasamma ru paancha laakha hajaara nagada mobaaila thaana aipyaada chaara thaana ra lyaapatapa paancha thaana baraamada gareko chha

gata mansira gate kailaalikaa surendrabahaadura simha naatiko upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaun aunubhayo kaathamaadaunko paanipokharimaa raheko antarraastriya baalamaitri aspataala jaana gongabusthita nayaan basapaarkabaata kaantipura yaataayaata chadhnubhayo chakrapatha pugdaa saataatha janaako samuhale uhaanko saathako eutaa jholaa liyo uhaanlaai sitamaa basna agraha garera thaahaa napaaune tarikaale jyaaketako agaadi khaltiko hajaara paaketa maare yasto choriko krama badhepachhi prahari ra yaataayaata wyawasaayi milera chori niyantrana abhiyaanalaai tiwrataa diieko bataaieko chha

nepaala yaataayaata wyawasaayi raastriya mahaasanghakaa mahaasachiwa saroja sitaulaale saarwajanika sawaari saadhanabhitra chhirera chori garnukaa saathasaathai chaalaka tathaa sahachaalakalaai sameta lutapaata garne garekaale ukta abhiyaana chalaaieko bataaunuhunchha kamajora kaanunakaa kaarana paaketamaaraale patakapataka saarwajanika yaataayaatamaa chadhera chori garne gareko paaieko chha uhaan bhannuhunchha

mahaasanghako pradesa num samitile yaataayaata suraksaa saajhaa abhiyaanaantargata upatyakaabhitrako praharilaai nihsulka yaatraa paasako wyawasthaa gareko chha nepaala yaataayaata wyawasaayi raastriya mahaasangha pradesa kaa sumyojaka dharmaraaja rimaala upatyakaabhitrako saarwajanika yaataayaatako sudhaara garna praharilaai ukta paasako wyawasthaa garieko bataaunuhunchha

parisarakaa prawaktaa howindra bogati wibhinna sadakamaa samuha banaaera paaketa maarne gareko bataaunuhunchha chakrapatha ksetramaa kaabhrepalaanchoka daapchaakaa purnabahaadura wika ra kaantipura yaataayaatamaa kaabhrepalaanchoka bhoksekaa sanabahaadura taamaanako samuhale paaketa maarne gareko prawaktaa bogatile bataaunubhayo upatyakaamaa chalne kaantipura nepaala mahaanagara saajhaa yaataayatamaa badhi paaketa maarne kaama hune gareko parisarale janaaeko chha pahilopataka paaketa maarnelaai eka mahinaa jela tathaa bigo baraabarako jariwanaa dosro patakalaai dui mahinaa kaida tathaa bigobamojima jariwaanaa hune kaanuni praawadhaana raheko chha

nuwaakota ra rasuwaako simaanaa mailuna saantibajaaramaa nirmaanaadhina trisuli thri e jalawidyut ayojanaako nirmaana saamagri choriraheko kramamaa pakraau parekaa chaaramadhye eka yuwaka trisuli nadimaa phaalahaaleko nuwaakota prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

aja bihaana baje so ayojanaako nirmaana saamagri paaipa ra phalaama choriraheko kramamaa pakraau parekaa rasuwaako uttaragayaa gaaunmpaalikaa wadaa num kaa warsiya maite taamaana prahariko gheraa todera trisuli nadimaa haamphaaleko kispaanakaa adhyaksa chhatrabahaadura laamaale bataaunubhayo nuwaakota praharile samanwayaatmaka rupamaa kaarya garna nasakeko janaaunmdai aja dinabhari mailunaksetra tanaawagrasta bhaeko chha prahari ra sthaaniyawaasibicha

dohoro jhadapako sthitithiyo sthaaniyawaasi akramana ra todaphodamaa utriepachhi praharile saata raaunda hawaaiphaayara garnupareko praharile janaaeko chha sthaaniyawaasi ra praharibicha dohoro jhadapa hundaa mailuna chaukimaa sthaaniyawaasile todaphoda gareko praharile janaaeko chha
kaathamaadaaaimko daksinakaalimaa aja eka dampati marita bhetiekaa chhan

daksinakaali nagarapaalikaa hipitola basne warsiya karisnabahaadura taamaana ra unaki srimati warsiyaa laksmi taamaana aphnai kothaamaa aja bihaana marita awasthaamaa phelaa pareko prahari prawaktaa uttamaraaja suwedile jaanakari dinubhayo uniharukaa warsiya chhoraa ra chhorisameta asakta awasthaamaa phelaa parekaale upachaarakaa laagi manamohana aspataala lagieko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo chhoraa chhoriko pahichaana bhane khuleko chhaina

broilara kukhuraako challaalaai taapakrama dina koilaa baalera sutekaa uniharu aksijanako kamikaa kaarana nisaassieko hunasakne asankaa garieko chha ghatanaakaa sambandhamaa awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

bahuwiwaahako aropamaa bhojapurako sadaananda nagarapaalikaa boyaakaa prawina srestha ra bhojapura nagarapaalikaa basne indiraa taamaanalaai eka warsa mahinaa kaida sajaayasahita ru hajaara ksatipurtiko phaisalaa garekoe chha srestha ra taamaanale gata kaattika gate wiwaaha garekaa thie jillaa nyaayaadhisa harischandra innaamako ekala ijilaasale so adesa dieko ho

petroliyama padaarthako taskari rokna khojdaa gaeraati bajetira praharichauki paandepurakaa praharilaai taskarale kutapita gari hatiyaara liera pharaara bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale janaaeko chha

sthaaniya aurahi kholaako baato hundai simaawarti bhaaratako inarwaa bajaaratarpha bhaari maatraamaa petroliyama padaarthako taskari bhairaheko praapta suchanaakaa adhaaramaa prahari chauki pidaariguthibaata gaeko prahari tolirle rokana khojdaa taskara ra praharibicha wiwaada suru bhaeko thiyo praharichauki paandepurabaata thapa tinajanaa prahari ghatanaasthala pugepachhi wiwaada jhana charkina jaandaa kariba janaako sankhyaamaa rahekaa taskarale prahari jawaanalaai laathi bhaataale kutapita gari ekanaala thrinata thri banduka lutera pharaara bhaekaa chhan

taskarako kutaaibaata prahari chauki paandepurakaa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka wisnaudewa yaadawa prahari jawaana premabahaadura raanaa ra arjuna chaudhari ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaiteko nesanala medikala kaleja ra nyuro aspataala wiraganjamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
taskaraharuko khojikaarya jaari raheko parsaakaa prahari upariksaka rewati dhakaalale bataaunubhayo

pakraau parnemaa chitawana bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya amita ghisina raheko prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha unako saathabaata sunajasto dekhine pahenlo dhaatu graamakaa chaara biskuta ra kariba graamako eka thaana baalaasahita graama baraamada garieko praharile janaaeko chha

balikaakaa pariwaara aphanta ra praharile sameta baalikaako khoji gare pani haalasamma phelaa napareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa habaldaara wijaya raaile jaanakari dinubhayo baalikaa gaaunkai raastriya adhaarabhuta widyaalaya kaksaa maa adhyayanarata widyaarthi hun

ranaroganako kaama garne sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai kaathamaadaunmaa deraa gari basne warsiya anila thaaru aphnai kothaamaa marita phelaa pareko prahari pradhaana kaaryaalaya kaathamaadaunle janaaeko chha marityuko kaarana nakhuleko ra ghatanaako sambandhamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
rukuma paschima ksetramaa wisaakta raksi khaandaa tinajanaako marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa saanibheri gaaunpaalikaa magararaanajaakaa warsiya khambu kaami musikota nagarapaalikaa lahun bhalaakchaakaa warsiya kamaanasimha saarki ra musikota nagarapaalikaa nayaan gaaunkaa warsiya palabahaadura wikako wisaakta raksi sewana garera marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

maritakale orenja naama lekhieko bajaaramaa paaine raksi khaaera suteko paaiyo ukta kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka sumita khadkaale bhannubhayo ukta raksikai kaarana uniharuko marityu bhaeko hunasakchha yasabaaremaa thapa jaanakaari bhane sawa pariksana pachhi aune chha

musikota nagarapaalikaa jumlaawaanako eka wiwaahamaa sahabhaagi huna aekaa uniharu sohi thaaunmai raksi sewana gari belukaa sakusala sutekaamaa bihaana marita awasthaamaa phelaa parekaa thie uniharusangai sutekaa anya duijanaa bhane sakusala chhan ghatanaako jaanakaari paaepachhi jillaa prahari pramukha ewum prahari naayaba upariksaka khadkaasahita jillaa aspataalakaa chikitsakakoe toli ghatanaasthala pugeko thiyoe
mahottariko ilaakaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya gausaalaabaata bhaaratiya naagarikalaai aphno chhoraa bhanera naagarikataa dilaauna laagieko awasthaamaa praharile saasu ra jwaainlaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa aurahi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa siwo dewi ra unakaa jwaain bhaarata wihaarako mujaphpharapurako siwadaasapura dauraa asali panchaayata wadaa num basne warsiya raajapaala sahani raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka kisora achaaryale bataaunubhayo

ghatanaako sumksipta wiwarana miti gate kaajitokhaa napaa milanatolamaa raheko taaraanaatha aryaalako gharamaa deraa gari basne jillaa mugu soru gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsa ki ajitaa mallalaai mukha thuni ghaanti thichi hatyaa gari ghatanaa paschaat pharaara rahekaa ji mugu soru gaaunpaalikaa basne warsa ki wisnaumaayaa malla saahi lagaayatakaa janaalaai wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa aparaadha mahaasaakhaako prahari tolile miti gate kaathamaandaumkaa wibhinna sthaanaharubaata pakraau gari yasa kaaryaalayamaa lyaai sodhapuchha gardaa nijaharule aphule gareko aparaadha swikaara gareko ra anya anusandhaana jaari raheko
srimati ra chhoriko hatyaa aropamaa eka bhaaratiya naagarikalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya hetaundaale pakraau gari aja sarwajanika gareko chha

bhaarata wihaara ghara bhai hetaaaidaa maa deraa gari basne warsiya mahamda ramjaana miyaan darjilaai so hatyaako aropamaa pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurakaa prahari upariksaka buddhiraaja gurunale jaanakaari dinubhayo

abhiyukta ramajaanamiyaale aphno srimati warsaki laalamuna khaatuna ra eka warsaki chhori rosana khaatunalaai hatyaa gareko chhaanawinakaa kramamaa paaieko daawi garieko chha ghatanaa wiwaranaanusaara mansira gate hetaundaa maa eka warsaki baalikaa ra warsiya eka mahilaako sawa phelaa parepachhi praharile khojatalaasa gardaa nijako hatyaa srimaan ramjaanale gareko pusti bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale patrakaara sammelanamaarphata jaanakaari dieko chha

saptari jillaa adaalatakaa nyaayaadhisa sriprasaada sanjelako ekala ijalaasale so phaisalaa gareko ho wisum saauna gate surugaa nagarapaalikaa sthita harinaaraayana chaudhariko phulabaarimaa balaatkaara garne prayaasa gareko bhandai piditaki amaale ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kadarabonaamaa ujuri dinubhaeko thiyo praharile aropitalaai wisum saauna gate giraphtaara gari sohi dina ujuri dartaa gareko thiyo balaatkaarako aropamaa dui mahinaa kaida

nyaayaadhisa dhungaanaakaa anusaara aropitabaata eka warsabhitra kaida sajaaya hune anya aparaadha pramaanaita bhaemaa ahileko kaida sajaaya gaabhine chha tyusana padhera ghara pharkirahekaa belaa adhyaaroko maukaa chhopi aropitale balaatkaara gareko aropa lagaaundai piditaki amaale jetha gate jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa ujuri diepachhi praharile sohi dina aropita baalakalaai niyantranamaa lieko thiyo
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ra jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayadwaaraa aja yahaan ayojita sumyukta patrakaara sammelanamaa uniharulaai saarwajanika garieko ho

pakraau parnemaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa deuraa rupaithaakaa warsiya rosanakumaara chaudhari aurahi gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaasadasya warsiyaa gangaa saaha rautahata durgaa bhagawati gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai haala janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne hemanta paande ra dhanusaa jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayamaa kaaryaalaya sahayogi padamaa kaaryarata warsiya mahaawira mandala chhan

praapta suchanaakaa adhaaramaa dewapuraa rupaithaa basne widyaananda chaudharikaa chhoraa rosanakumaara chaudhariko deraa gari basne kothaamaa khaanatalaasi gardaa nakkali naagarikataalagaayatakaa kirte kaagajaata phelaa pareko praharile janaaeko chha chaudharikaa kothaabaata praharile wibhinna wyaktiko naamako naagarikataa pramaanapatra saadaa naama nabhareko nepaali naagarikataako pramaanapatra jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya dhanusaako chhaapa prasaasakiya adhikaritako chhaapa sthaaniya panjikaadhikaari chhaapa toli pramukha nagarapaalikaako chhaapa wadaadhyaksako chhaapa wiwaaha dartaa janma dartaa marityu dartaa basaainsaraaiko pramaanapatrako theli naagarikataa wiwaranako theli ra mobaaila thaana ekasameta baraamada gareko chha

pramukha jillaa adhikaari pradiparaaja kandelale baraamada bhaeko kirte naagarikataakaa pramaanapatra saalako raheko bataaunubhayo uhaanle jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayako srestaasameta baraamada bhaekaale yasabaaremaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jaanakaari dinubhayo
pakraau parekaalaai sarakaari dastakhata chhaapa kirte ra naagarikataa muddaamaa jillaa adaalatabaata myaada thapa gari anusandhaana kaarya bhairaheko janaaeko chha
morana jillaa adaalatale purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa raakhera kaarabaahi aghi badhaaune adesawiruddha saakya saauna maa uchcha adaalata gaekaa thie
suna taskariko anusandhaana gariraheko sarakaari samitile arake jwailarsakaa kaathamaadaumsthita saakhaaharumaa chhaapaa maarera karodako dhanamaala japhata gareko thiyo

rupandehiko tilottamaamaa eka yuwakako hatyaa bhaeko chha tilottamaa nagarapaalikaa dalgaakaa warsiya asoka musaharalaai budhabaara raati sthaaniya warsiya siwapujana chaudharile dhungaale haanera hatyaa gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka haridaya thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

budhabaara raati piwaahamaa saaunda sistamako wisayalaai liera asoka ra siwapujanabicha jhagadaa bhaeko thiyo jhagadaapachhi siwa pujanale asokalaai ghara jaau bhani khetamaa lyaai dhungaale taaukomaa haanera hatyaa gareko swikaareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dilabahaadura mallale bataaunubhayo abhiyukta chaudharilaai pakraau gari thunaamaa thapa anusandhaana thaalieko chha

mahottariko aurahi nagarapaalikaa phulabariyaakaa bechu chaudhariko gaeraati hatyaa bhaeko chha chaudhariko sawa ghara najikaiko ukhubaarimaa phelaa pareko prahari upariksaka iswara kaarkile jaanakaari dinubhayo

awinaasasahitale raastriyasabhaa sadasya sumanaraaja pyaakurela pradesasabhaa sadasya gowinda nyaupaane pramukha jillaa adhikaari surendra paudelasahita suraksaa sambaddha nikaayakaa pramukha inseka pratinidhi manohara pokharela sanchaarakarmi ra adhikaarakarmiko upasthitimaa hatiyaara bujhaaunubhayo goita netaritwako sadasyiya kendriya kamitikaa janaale gata jetha gate raajanitika waartaa tolisanga waartaa garne nirnaya gardai gata asoja gate lahaanamaa bunde sahamati garekaa thie
aphni warsiyaa hajuraamaalaai kutapita gari ghara nikaalaa garne naatiharulaai jillaa adaalata sindhupaalchokale kaida tathaa jariwaanaa gareko chha

jillaa nyaayadhisa tikaaraama achaaryako ijalaasale chautaaraa saangaachoka gadhi nagarapaalikaa saangaachoka niwaasi wariddhaa raadhaakumaari girilaai naatidwaya warsiya wikrama ra warsiya wisnaule haata bhaanchchine garera kutapita gari gharabaata nikaaleko abhiyogamaa janahi dui mahinaa kaida sajaayako phaisalaa bhaeko serastedaara lekhanaatha paudelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parekaa taamaana yasaaghi pani nakkali sunalaai sakkali suna bhanera bechabikhana gardaiai gareko awasthaamaa pakraau parera jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya kaathamaadaunbaata dharautimaa chhuteko anusandhaanamaa khulekaa prawaktaa bogatile bataaunubhayo pakraau pareko duwai janaasanga awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko parisarale janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasaribaata chori dakaiti niyantranakaa laagi khatieko prahariko toli ra bhaaratiya naakaabaata chaarapaancha janaako samuhamaa aeko daankaabicha goli haanaahaana hundaa ekako marityu bhaeko sunasarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka jnaanendraprasaada phuyaanlale jaanakaari die

maritakako sanaakhata huna sakeko chhaina chaarapaancha janaako samuhamaa raheko sankaaspada wyaktilaai prahari tolile rokna khojdaa uniharule praharilaai laksita gari ekkaasi goli phaayara garepachhi atmaraksaakaa laagi praharile jawaaphi phaayara gardaa so samuhakaa eka wyaktiko marityu bhaeko ho naama thara ra thegaanaa nakhuleko andaaji warsiya eka purusa wyaktiko goli laagera ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko sunasarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka phuyaanlale bataae

raaile sisu janmaai maarera dokomaa phaalna laageko bhanne sthaaniyawaasile praharimaa khabara garepaschaata jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sumkhuwaasabhaabaata khatieko praharile dokobhitra raakheko marita baalikaa sisusahita unalaai pakraau gareko ho unakaa srimaanako dedha warsa pahile marityu bhaeko khulna aeko chha
mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaako prahari tolile aja kaathamaadaumko kaalopulabaata dakaiti naaike raajana limbulaai pakraau gareko chha

mahaasaakhaako wisesa tolisangako muthabhedamaa limbu ghaaite sameta bhaekaa chhan unako duwai khuttaamaa goli laageko mahaasaakhaa prahari srotale jaanakaari dieko chha unako saathabaata eka pestola ra chaara goli baraamada bhaeko prahariko bhanaai chha

mumsira gate saatadobaatomaa himdiraheko awasthaamaa abhiyuktaddhayale baalikaalaai pasupati ghumna jaanu bhani kaathamaadaum gomgabusthita gesta haausako kothaamaa lagera jabarajasti karanai gari pharaara bhaeko bhanne ujuriko adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahari baritta saatadobaatoko prahari tolile abhiyukta duwai janaalaai pakraau gari awasyaka anusandhaanako laagi mahaanagariya prahari baritta mahaaraajagumja kaathamaadaum pathaaeko chha

sarakaari kaagaja kirte muddhaamaa jillaa adaalata dhanusaako saala jestha gateko phaisalaale pakraau adesa jaari bhai pharaara rahekaa pratiwaadi raamajaanaki mandira janakapurakaa mahantha dhanusaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya baikuntha daasa bhanne baikuntha tiwaarilaai budhabaara belukaa praharile pakraau gareko chha

tiwaarilaai mahaanagariya prahari aparaadha mahaasaakhaabaata khatieko tolile kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa putali sadakabaata pakraau gareko ho unalaaiawasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaa pathaaieko chha

raajapaa nepaala jillaa kosaadhyaksa rahekaa chhinnamastaa lokharamakaa manojakumaara mehataalaai so aropamaa pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha ukta kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka bhaawesa rimaalakaa anusaara aitabaara pakraau parekaa mehataawiruddha balaatkaara tathaa thagi duwai muddaa dartaa gari kaarawaahi agaadi badhaaieko ho

praharile butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa inttaabhattimaa suraakikaa adhaaramaa sanibaara raati khaanatalaasa gardaa laaguausadha charesa phelaa paareko pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya daana tulasipurale janaaeko chha tulasipurabaata khatieko wisesa anusandhaana tolile chaara wyaktiko jholaa khaanatalaasi gardaa kilo charesa phelaa paareko pradesa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka pusparaaja mallale jaanakaari dinubhayo praharikaa anusaara jaajarakota jillaa khalangaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya tilaka punakaa saathabaata rupandehi butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dipendra ghartibaata jaajarakota baarikota gaaunpaalikaakaa warsiya topendra boharaabaata ra jaajarakota nalgaa gaaunpaalikaakaa warsiya prema wikabaata saata kilo charesa baraamada bhaeko ho

praharile yasaaghi gata kaattika gate butawala belabaasamaa kilo charesasahita tina janaa pakraau gareko thiyo praharikaa anusaara atyadhika maatraamaa rukuma baagluna rolpaa ra gulmikaa kehi sthaanabaata laaguausadha charesa butawalamaa aune gareko paaieko prahari prawaktaa mallale jaanakaari dinubhayo yahaanbaata charesa bhaaratiya bajaaramaa puyaauna bhaaratiya graahakalaai butawala bhairahawaamaa aera kaarowaara garna sajilo hune bhaekaale wyaapaarile simaawarti bajaarasamma puyaaune gareko prahariko bhanaai chha

maachhaa maarna jaandaa saptariko daakaneswari nagarapaalikaa hatelakaa warsiya raamabaabu mukhiyaa aitabaaradekhi bepattaa bhaekaa chhan daakneswari sthita paatohatelakaa bichamaa raheko khadga nadimaa baneko pulako saaiphanamaa jameko paanimaa dubera bepattaa bhaekaa mukhiyaa ajhai phelaa parekaa chhainan saaikalamaa dhaana boki bechnakaa laagi paato bajaaratarpha gairahekaa raamabaabu pulamuni jameko paanimaa maachhaa dekhepachhi saaikala roki maachhaa maarna paanibhitra prawesa gardaa bepattaa bhaeko uhaansangai gaekaa saathi raajalaala mukhiyaale bataaunubhayo sasastra prahari ra nepaali senaako tolile aja dinabhari khojiko prayaasa gare pani saaiphanabhitra prawesa garna sakena pulamuni wataa pilaramaa ghumaauro prakaarale baneko saaiphana kariba dedha saya mitara laamo ra tina mitara gahiro bhaekaale khoji kathina bhaeko nagarapaalikaakaa pramukha siwanaaraayana saahale bataaunubhayo kaathamaadaunbaata gotaakhora magaaieko jaanakaari dinndai sasastra prahari bala raajawiraaja ganakaa prahari upariksaka khema thaapaale mangalabaara bihaana gotaakhora aipugepachhi punah khoji garine bataaunubhayo
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parwatale balaatkaarapachhi pharaara rahekaa bhaaratiya naagarikalaai aitabaara pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa bhaaratako uttara pradesako betiyaa jillaa paschima champaarana bhagaahaa thaanaa mainaataka blaka ghara bhai haala parwatako phalewaasa nagarapaalikaamaa majadura kaama gardai aekaa warsiya sadre alama rahekaa chhan

alamale phalewaasa nagarapaalikaa khaanigaaunki eka warsiyaa kisorilaai balaatkaara gari pharaara raheko bhani praharimaa ujuri pareko adhaaramaa khoji gardaa sohi thaaunmaa lukichhipi baseko awasthaamaa alama pakraau gareko ho pharaara raheko bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa praharile khoji gardaa unalaai phalewaasabaatai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parwatakaa prahari niriksaka raajana raayamaajhile jaanakaari dinubhayo praarambhika anusandhaanakaa kramamaa abhiyukta alamale kisorilaai gaeko saauna gate diunso h baje arki eka mahilaako kothaamaa ra anya samayamaa aphnai kothaamaa pani lalaaiphakaai wibhinna pralobhanamaa paarera karanai gareko khuleko chha

alamalaai aitabaarai parwata jillaa adaalatabaata yaunajanya prakaritikaa aparaadhaantargata karanaisambandhi kasura muddaamaa thapa anusandhaanako laagi paancha dina myaada thapera anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakamaa kaaryarata prahari jawaana warsiya tekaraaja paudela aja marita bhetiekaa chhan

sankhuwaasabhaako khaandabaari nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa paudela damaka nagarapaalikaa maa deraa gari basdai aekaa thie uni deraamaa marita phelaa pareko prahari naayaba upariksaka syaamala subbaale jaanakaari dinubhayo deraamaa eklai basdai aekaa paudela aja bihaana kaama sakera deraamaa pharkekaa thie paudela tina warsaaghi prahari sewaamaa prawesa garekaa thie

gandaki pradesakaa swaasthya nirdesaka daa taaraanaatha paudela lokasewaa ayogamaa ahewako pariksaamaa uttirna garaaune pralobhana dekhaai eka wyaktisanga ru eka laakha ghusa lieko aropamaa pakraau parekaa chhan unalaai pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa buddhachokabaata aja saanjha bajetira niyantranamaa liieko akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayoga pokharaa kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
chituwaako akramanabaata tanahunmaa sanibaara raati eka baalakako marityu bhaeko chha marityu hunemaa tanahunko bhaanu nagarapaalikaa dhalkewarakaa warsiya amarita guruna rahekaa chhan

chituwaako akramanabaata ghaaite bhaekaa baalakako dumresthita laksmi aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa nidhana bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunkaa prahari naayaba upariksaka syaamu aryaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

khaanaa khaaera haata dhuna gharako anganamaa niskekaa gurunalaai chituwaale akramana garera lageko thiyo chhoraa gharabhitra naaepachhi baabu maailaa gurunale praharilaai khabara garekaa thie prahari ra sthaaniyawaasiko sahayogamaa khojatalaasa gardaa gharabhandaa kehi tala raheko kholsaamaa amaritale lagaaeko jyaaketa bhetieko thiyo ukta kholsaabhandaa tala amarita ghaaite awasthaamaa bhetiekaa thie unako ghaantimaa chituwaako nanagraale chithoreko thiyo

bhaanu nagarapaalikaamaa chituwaako traasa badheko chha chituwaako akramanabaata dinako awadhimaa dui janaako jyaana gaepachhi sthaaniyawaasi trasita bhaeko sthaaniya bhagawaana tripaathile bataaunubhayo

kaattika gate chituwaako akramanabaata bhaanu nagarapaalikaa jokhaane niwaasi chaara warsiyaa baalikaa ranjitaa lamsaalako marityu bhaeko thiyo ukta ghatanaa bhaeko aun dinako dina sanibaara raati warsiya amaritako sameta chituwaako akramanabaata marityu bhaeko chha
tyastai mansira gate nai bhaanu nagarapaalikaa maa saata warsiya sanjana nepaalilaai sameta chituwaale akramana gareko thiyo tara nepaali bhane saamaanya ghaaite maatrai bhaekaa thie
kapilawastu gajehadaaki eka yuwati bhaaratamaa maritaawasthaamaa bhetiepachhi nepaalamaa rahekaa maaiti paksale pariwaarale hatyaa gareko bataaekaa chhan
wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaako mahendra chokasthita prema daahaalako kiraanaa pasalamaa aja bihaana agalaagi bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaeko chha
taamaanalaai jillaa aspataala tehrathuma hundai thapa upachaarako laagi dharaana ghopaa sunasaritarpha pathaaiekomaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

gongabukaa atha warsiya prayaasa kunwarako apaharanapachhi hatyaa aropi syaanjaa bhirakotakaa mahendra saarkiwiruddha apaharana tathaa kartawya jyaana muddaamaa praharile anusandhaana aghi badhaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pratinidhi jillaa adaalatakaa pratinidhi patrakaara ra sarokaarawaalaako rohawaramaa aja ukta charesa nasta garieko ho so samayamaa prahari gastibaata pakraau parekaa abhiyukta manasejyaa pujaaraa mohanachanda ra ranabahaadura bhanne rani chandalaai tatkaalina jillaa nyaayaadhisabaata laaguausadha niyantrana aina ko daphaa kako kasuramaa sohi ainako daphaa ka bamojima sajaayakaa laagi maaga daabi raheko thiyo uniharukaa saathabaata paancha kilo graama charesa phelaa pareko thiyo mohana chanda tatkaalina samayamaa pharaara rahekaa thie pachhi nijalaai saalako asojamaa praharile pakraau garera muddaa agaadi badhaaeko thiyo

sohi samayamaa praharile arko samuhako aite dhaami sarpe dhaami sauure jaagri ra narabahaadura boharaa sametako gari kilo graama charesa baraamada gareko thiyo tatkaalina samayamaa aite dhaami pakraau parekaa thie bhane anya abhiyukta pharaara thie pachhi wibhinna samayamaa nijaharulaai pakraau gari kaarawaahi prakriyaa agaadi badhaaieko thiyo nija abhiyuktalaai laaguausadha niyantrana aina ko daphaa kako kasuramaa sohi ainako daphaa ka bamojima sajaayakaa laagi maagadaabi raheko thiyo

ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa laami daandaasthita maadi haardaweyara pasalakaa sumchaalaka rolpaa maadi gaaunpaalikaa goganapaanikaa warsiya nandabahaadura gharti magarako aparichita wyaktile chakku prahaara gardaa marityu bhaeko chha bihibaara belukaa chakku prahaara gardaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako raapti swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana ghoraahimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

prahariko bhesamaa lutapaata machchaaundai aekaa bama ra nepaalile nai anya wyaktiharulaai prayoga garera kaathamaadaum maitidewikaa eka suna wyaapaarisanga bhaeko laakha hajaara lutekaa thie kaathamaadaum maitidewisthita buddha jwelari warkasapa praalikaa sanchaalaka buddha wiswakarmaalaai tihaara pachhi patakapataka phona gari thaapaako samuhale wila sahitako suna chha chaahiemaa dina sakchhau bhani baalaaju basantanagarasthita suryawinaayaka gesta haausa enda resturentamaa bolaaera lutapaata garekaa thie bama baalaaju barittamaa kaaryarata prahari hawaldaara hun bhane nepaali lalitapura praharile nai suru gareko sephtii pinamaa kaaryarata thie lalitapura praharile saarwajanika sawaari saadhanamaa hune aparaadhika gaatiwidhiharulaai rokna sibhilamaa prahari khataaundai aeko chha
uparathiko adhyaksataamaa gathana bhaeko sadasyiya janarala samari sainika adaalatale so muddaamaa adhikarita janaalaai saphaai diieko chha bhane aru sabai dosi saawita bhaekaa chhan

nepaali kaangresa risina gaaunpaalikaa kaa sadasyasameta rahanubhaekaa warsiya ale mansira gatedekhi bepattaa hunubhaepachhi prahari ra aphantale khoji gare pani phelaa parna sakekaa thienan sthaaniyawaasile saanjha jangalamaa sawa dekhepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie uhaanko sawa pariksanako laagi damauli aspataalamaa raakhieko ra ghatanaakaa sambandhamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

yasaigari tanahunko dewaghaata gaaunpaalikaa sinchyaana niwaasi warsiya tirthabahaadura bhujela rukhamaa jhundieko awasthaamaa marita phelaa parnubhaeko chha gharadekhi kimi durimaa raheko jangalamaa uhaan jhundieko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko ra so ghatanaakaa sambandhamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

marityu hunemaa sthaaniyawaasi mahesa chaudhariki warsiya chhori anjani chaudhari raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prahari niriksaka pratika bistale bataaunubhayo aphnai amaasanga wiwaada hundaa budhabaara saanjha anjanile sariramaa mattitela chharkiera ago lagaai atmahatyaako prayaasa gareki thiin
jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya parsaamaa raahadaani lina pesa gareko naagarikataa nakkali bhaeko aropamaa parsaa praharile dui bhaaratiya naagarikalaai mangalabaara pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa basne dinesakumaara saaha ra arawindakumaara sarraapha rahekaa chhan saahale nakkali naagarikataako adhaaramaa raahadaani lina khojdaa tathaa sarraaphale jhutho wiwarana pesa gari saalamaa lieko naagarikataako adhaaramaa chhoraako naagarikataa banaauna khojdaa pakraau pareko parsaakaa prahari upariksaka rewati dhakaalale bataaunubhayo

anusandhaanako kramamaa sarraaphako nepaala bhaarata duwaitarphakaa naagarikataa bhetiekaale yasabaaremaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko bataaieko chha saalamaa sthaaniya janapratinidhiko siphaarisamaa tolile jathaabhaawi naagarikataa witarana gardaa tyasako maukaa chhopi pratisatabhandaa badhi bhaaratiyale nakkali wiwarana pesa gari nepaali naagarikataa liekaale tyasako chhaanabina hunuparne wiraganjawaasiko maamga raheko chha

abhiyuktaharule chaitra gate baaraa jhitakaiyaa basne sibasumkara saaha telilaai apaharana gari bhaarata wihaara champaaranasthita surendra baraiko gharamaa bandhaka banaai raakheko awasthaamaa baisaakha gate nepaala prahari ra bhaaratiya prahariko sahayogamaa uddhaara garieko thiyo
abhiyuktadwayalaai praharile jillaa adaalata baaraamaa pesa garekomaa adaalatako adesale dubaijanaalaai purpaksako laagi kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya biraganja parsaa pathaaeko chha

sthaaniya netaa chaudhariko hatyaa ajita paandeyale gareko bhandai hatyaako wirodhamaa paandeyako motibhaaristhita dui talle ghara gotha godaama agajani gardaa kariba ru karoda baraabarako dhanamaala ksati bhaeko chha

sthitilaai niyantranamaa lina praharile eka darjana badhi hawaai phaayara gareko chha jhadapakaa kaarana sasastra prahari niriksaka gowinda sresthako haatamaa chota laagi ghaaite hunubhaeko chha yasaigari thapa dui prahari ghaaite rahekaa chhan

akrosita bhidale hatyaako wirodhamaa hatyaa aropi paandeyako so gaaunpaalikaa lawani chaukamaa raheko paramilaa ayala sentaramaa agajaniko prayaasa garirahekaa chhan petrola pampako suksaakaa laagi nepaala prahari sasastra prahariko thulo sankhyaamaa upasthiti raheko chha

hatyaa aropi paandeya pakraau napardaasamma maritaka pariwaarale sawako daaha sumskaara nagarne janaaekaa chhan sthitilaai niyantranamaa lina ra waartaako prayaasa garna prahari pramukha jillaa adhikaari arjuna pokharela sasastra prahari upariksaka dipaka adhikaari nepaala praharikaa upariksaka achyutama pudaasainilagaayatako toli ghatanaa sthala lawanimaa chha
marityu hunemaa thegaanaa nakhulekaa warsiya bikki limbu raheko prahari prawaktaa uttamaraaja suwedile jaanakaari dinubhayo

sukrawaara raati andaaji saadhe atha bajeko samayamaa motarasaaikalamaa aeko dui janaako samuhale kapilawastu suddhodhana gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kaa raajaabaabu bhanine dipendra kumaara kurmiko hatyaa gareko jillaa prahari pramukha prahari upariksaka achyuta prasaada pudaasainile jaanakaari die

makawaanapura jillaa adaalatako adesamaa pratibaadi gurunalaai warsa kaida tathaa hajaara jariwaanaahune thahara garekomaa nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko pradesa anusandhaana samuhale unalaai pakraau gari phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanako laagi jillaa adaalata makawaanapura pesa gareko chha

yasaaghi kaathamaadaun pugera pradhaanamantridekhi garihamantri hundai pratipaksi dalakaa netaasammalaai chhoriko hatyaaraalaai kaarawaahiko guhaara maagekaa nirmalaakaa buwaaamaale hatyaaraalaai saarwajanika garna maaga gardai dui saataadekhi jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayako mukhya prawesadwaara agaadi dharnaamaa baseyataa saamsada netaadekhi ama sarwasaadhaaranako dhyaana tyahaan kendrita bhaeko chha

wihibaara belukaasamma dharnaasthalako notakapimaa kariba eka hajaara badhile nyaayako andolana bhandai aikyabaddhataa janaaekaa chhan garihanagarako prasaasana agaadi dharnaa basekaa bubaaamaalaai bhetna pachhillo kehi dinayataa raastriyastarakaa netaako daudadhupa badhi dekhieko chha dharnaasthala pugne saamsada tathaa netaamadhye pratipaksi dala nepaali kaangresakaa badhi chhan

kehi dinaaghi sudurapaschima pradesakaa antarika maamilaa tathaa kaanunamantri prakaasa saaha dharnaasthala pugnubhayo sanghiya ra pradesa sarakaara ghatanaaprati gambhira raheko bataaundai nayaan disaabaata anusandhaana bhairaheko jaanakaari dinubhayo

tyasaigari dharnaalaai bihibaaradekhi nekapaa kraantikaari maaowaadi le sameta samarthana janaaundai mahilaa tathaa baalabaalikaamaathi ghatirahekaa ghatanaaprati sarakaara gambhira banna agraha gareko chha bhane nayaan sakti paartile pani dharnaamaa aikbaddhataa janaaeko chha dharnaamaa rahanubhaekaa nayaan sakti paartikaa netari maayaa negile nyaaya napaaundaasamma dabaabakaa laagi dharnaa jaari rahane bataaunubhayo

sthaaniya prasaasanale dharnaamaa basekaa nirmalaakaa bubaaamaalaai swaasthyaprati khyaala garna agraha gariraheko bhae pani ghatanaa anusandhaanabaare kunai jaanakaari nadine gareko negiko bhanaai chha pachhillo samaya nirmalaakaa bubaaamaako swaasthya awasthaa bigrandai gairaheko chha haamilaai nyaaya milchha ki mildaina tapaarimharule sumsadmaa awaaja sasakta banaaidinupayo nirmalaaki amaa durgaadewile kaangresa netaa gagana thaapaasita bhannubhayo haamilaai garieko upeksaale nyaaya paaunemaa sankaa badhdai gaeko chha

abhiyukta bhaniekaa wistako dienae riporta negetibha aepachhi praharile wibhinna anusandhaana toli banaaera suksmarupamaa anusandhaana gariraheko bhae pani kunai pragati kehi haasila bhainasakeko bataaeko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa tatkaalina prahari upariksaka haala barkhaasta dilliraaja wistadekhi kariba eka darjana badhi yuwaako dienae pariksana garisakeko praharile riporta negetibha aepachhi anusandhaana thapa jatila bandai gaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka kubera kadaayatale ghatanaako anusandhaana bhairaheko bataaunubhayo ghatanaako suksmarupamaa dherai widhi ra prakriyaa apanaaera anusandhaana chaliraheko chha uhaanle bhannubhayo gata saauna gate saathiko gharabaata garihakaarya garera ghara pharkina laageki nirmalaako saauna gate bihaana ukhubaarimaa sawa bhetieko thiyo
atha mahine sisu baalikaa laai apaharana gari hatyaa gareko aropamaa mahottari jillaa adaalatale eka yuwakalaai jela chalaana gareko chha

jela chalaana hunemaa aurahi nagarapaakilaa kaa warsiya bharata saaha teli rahekaa chhan gata bhadau gate saanjha bajetira aurahi nagarapaalikaa basne santosa chaudhariki chhori atha mahine sonaalilaai aurahi bajaaramai raheko aphnai phainsi storamaa amaa indresa graahakasanga saamaana bechna laageko wyasta maukaa chhopi bharatale pasalabaatai apaharana gari lagekaa thie

dudhe baalikaa apaharana gari lagera bharatale jamuniyaasthita jangalamaa jabarjasti karanai gari hatyaa gareko awasthaamaa praharile bholipalta bhadau gate sawa baraamada gareko thiyo ghatanaapaschaat laamo samayasamma bhaagi hindekaa aropilaai sunasari praharile gata kaattika gate bhantaabaaribaata prakraau gareko thiyo

pakraau gariekaa bharatalaai mahottari praharimaa supurdagi garepachhi unimaathi muddaa chalaai jillaa adaalatamaa upasthita garaaundaa unalaai baalikaa ahaparana jabarjasti karanai ra kartawya jyaana muddaamaa purpaksakaa laagi jaleswara kaaraagaaramaa pathaaieko chha

naagarjuna nagarapaalikaa syuchaataara basne sarlaahi kawilaasi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raajakisora mandalalaai kirte dastakhata gari rakama nikaaleko abhiyogamaa mumgalabaara raati praharile pakraau gareko chha

sunasariko duhabi nagarapaalikaa jayabaabaa intaabhattaa najika aja eka janaako goli haani hatyaa garieko chha sthaaniyawaasi warsiya phidaa husenako hatyaa bhaeko prahari naayaba upariksaka jnaanendraprasaada phuyaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

ahile husenakaa samarthakale duhabi bajaara ksetramaa naaraabaaji gardai kosi raajamaarga tathaa duhabibajaara thappa paarekaa chhan ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko sunasarikaa prahari upariksaka raajana adhikaarile bataaunubhayo maritaka husena duhabi nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa ewum nepaali kaangresa sunasari ksetra num kaa sabhaapati mehadi husenakaa bhaai hun kehi dina agaadi sunasariko raamanagara bhutaahaakaa khursida ansaariko sameta bhaaratabaata aeko ajnaata wyaktile goli haani hatyaa garekaa thie
praharile bharuwaa bandukasahita mangalabaara eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha baddichaura prahari chaukiko tolile baraahataala gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya kulabahaadura pulaamilaai pakraau gareko ho

baarimaa lukaaera raakheko kaatha ra phalaamabaata baneko bharuwaa banduka eka thaanakaa saathai tyasamaa laagne baarudasameta baraamada gareko prahari naayaba niriksaka pradipabahaadura ksetrile jaanakaari dinubhayo pulaamilaai haatahatiyaara kharakhajanaa muddaaantargata kaarawaahi garine uhaanle bataaunubhayo

bhaktapurako sipaadolakaa saroja taamaanalaai kendriya anusandhaana byuroko tolile pakraau gari aja jillaa adaalatamaa pesa garekaamaa unalaai ajai jela chalaana garieko byurokaa prawaktaa sudipa girile jaanakaari dinubhayo unalaai byuroko tolile somabaara kaathamaadaunko sundarijalabaata pakraau gareko thiyo bhaktapura jillaa adaalatale saala waisaakha gate chha mahinaa kaida tathaa ru paancha laakha hajaara jariwaanaa hune thahara gare pani uni pharaara hundai aekaa thie

saptari bode barsaaina nagarapaalikaa swarnapattisthita nepaala bhaarata simaanaamaa yaadawale aphu saadaa posaakako sibhila prahari bhaeko bhandai nepaalabhaarata awatajaawata garne maanisaharusanga rakama asuli garekaale unalaai niyantranamaa lieko saptarikaa prahari upariksaka raajendra wistale bataaunubhayo

prahari chauki belhibaata khatieko tolile nepaala bhaarata simaa najikai balaana bihula gaaunpaalikaa baata bewaarise awasthaamaa prati boraa kilo matara raheko boraa phelaa paareko prahari upariksaka raajendra wistale jaanakaari dinubhayo baraamada garieko mataralaai awasyaka kaanuni kaarawaahikaa laagi bhansaara kaaryaalaya tilaathimaa pathaaieko pani uhaanle bataaunubhayo

mahaanagariya prahari waritta mahaaraajaganjale ru saata laakha hajaara nagadasahita juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha warittako tolile tokhaa nagarapaalikaa gairigaaunkaa jiwanabahaadura thaapaamagarako gharamaa juwaataasa kheliraheko awasthaamaa aja bihaana uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho pakraau parnemaa tokhaakaa ramesabahaadura srestha sankara khatri rawina kaarki yuwaraaja adhikaari ranjana dhakaala hari josi awika raai bhojapurakaa tekendra kaarki chitawanakaa ramesa bhujela mahesa bhujela dinesa laamaa moranakaa kulabahaadura daahaala ra gorakhaakaa sawina guruna rahekaa chhan warittakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka phanaindra prasaaimle kaudaa eka seta ra eka buka taasasahita pakraau gareko jaanakaari dinubhayo
sarakaari wakila kaaryaalaya rupandehikaa jillaa nyaayaadhiwaktaa kosahari niraulaa ghusasahita pakraau parekaa chhan

saptariki warsiyaa eka baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko aropamaa praharile saptariko khadaka nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sadaama miyaanlaai pakraau gari aitabaara ujuri dartaa gareko chha chhatha parwa herna budhabaara bihaana khadaka nagarapaalikaa khojapurasthita chaapina kholaa gaeki piditalaai ghumna jaaun bhandai aropitale aphno ghara lagera balaatkaara gareko piditale bataain piditaki amaale bihibaara dieko ujuripachhi sohi dina piditako lahaanasthita raamakumaara umaaprasaada saaradaa smaaraka aspataalamaa swaasthya pariksana garieko chha aropitalaai sanibaara pakraau gari aitabaara jabarjasti karanaiko ujuri dartaa gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka kamalamanai bhattaraaile bataaunubhayo

praharile kaathamaadaum battisaputalimaa raheko bhaaratiya hotala kampani miraajako nepaalasthita hotala miraaja lardasa inamaa chhaapaa maareko chha chhaapaa maarera praharile janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
mahesa goyala sanchaalaka raheko hotalako paanchau talaako kothaa nummbara maa juwaa khelirahekaa janaalaai laakha hajaara rupaiyaansahita praharile niyantranamaa liera kaarabaahi thaaleko ho

rukuma paschimamaa eka wyaktile aphnai srimati ra chhoraako hatyaa garekaa chhan jillaako triwenai gaaunpaalikaa ballejuraakaa warsiya sattabahaadura budhaale srimati warsiyaa indrakalaa budhaa ra chhoraa warsiya swayamaprakaasa budhaako hatyaa garekaa hun

budhaale sanibaara raati bajeko samayamaa srimati indrakalaalaai bharuwaa bandukale goli haani ra chhoraa swayamaprakaasalaai khakuri prahaara gari hatyaa gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukuma paschimale janaaeko chha sthaaniyale khabara garepachhi ghatanaasthalamaa pugdaa amaachhoraa hatyaa garieko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka sumita khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

budhaale srimati ra chhoraako hatyaapachhi atmahatyaako prayaasa gareko uhaanle bataaunubhayo budhaale aphnai ghaantimaa khukuri prahaara gareko prahari naayaba upariksaka khadkaale bataaunubhayo budhaale madiraa sewana gari srimati ra chhoraako hatyaa gareko bujhieko ra baanki anusandhaana garna baanki raheko khadkaako bhanaai chha budhaalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kapilawastuko siwaraaja nagarapaalikaa chandrautaakaa warsiya jamirullaaha darjilaai eka warsadekhi phalaame saanlole baandhera aphnai gharamaa bandhaka banaaieko chha jamirullaaha pasusaraha jiwana bitaauna baadhya chhan
sindhupaalchokako indraawati gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa dhanabahaadura srestha marita phelaa parekaa chhan

ghatanaako waastawikataa bujhnakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako toli ghatanaasthalatarpha jaana laageko jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa adhikaari prahari naayaba upariksaka wimalaraaja kandelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parneharumaa chitawana ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sriraama chaudhari ra rautahata garudaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bikaasa chaudhari rahekaa chhan uniharumadhye sriraamako saathabaata saya darakaa saya thaana gari hajaara saya ameriki dalara tathaa suna jasto dekhine pahelo rumgako sikri thaana ra bikaasako saathabaata saya darakaa thaana gari hajaara saya ameriki dalara praharile baraamada gareko ho

dhunchesthita tirsuli kholaa pula najikai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko praharile kaathamaadaumbaata timuretarpha jaandai gareko baa ya nambarako skaarapio gaadi jaancha garne kramamaa gaadimaa sawaara uniharulaai ukta ameriki dalara sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

sunasari baraaha nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya syaamadewa mandalalaai meda ina yuesae lekhieko atometika pestola thaana myaagaajina thaana ra raaunda goli sahita sukrabaara saanjha praharile pakraau gareko chha

dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita cheka pwaaintamaa nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya biraatanagara ra asthaayi prahari posta tinakunebaata khatieko sumyukta prahari tolile dharaanabaata itaharitarpha jaandai gareko ko pa nambarako skutara jaancha garne kramamaa chaalaka mandalale kamarako bhaagamaa lukaai bokeko awasthaamaa ukta hatiyaara sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

hundiko kaarobaaramaa sumlagna raheko abhiyogamaa kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita lumbini manitraansapharakaa sumchaalaka sohi mahaanagarapaalikaa maalepaatana basne warsiya netralaala jnawaali ra manitraansapharakaa karmachaari sohi mahaanagarapaalikaa bindawaasini basne warsiya prakaasa thaapaalaai sukrabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha

ukta manitraansapharamaa abaidha tarikaale hundi kaarobaara bhaeko bhanne suchanaa aepaschaata nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalaya pradesa anusandhaana samuha pokharaa ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskibaata khatieko sumyukta prahari tolile bibhinna byaktiko naamamaa hanakanabaata abaidha rupamaa aeko rakama laakha hajaara rupaiyaan sahita kaarobaaramaa sumlagna duwaijanaalaai pakraau gareko ho
marityudanda suchanaa kendrakaa anusaara sarwochcha adaalatako san ko eka adesapachhi teksaasamaa maatra paancha janaa meksikaalilaai marityudanda diieko chha
nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byuro siaibile sumraksita wanyajantuko chhaalaasahita dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa rukuma athabisakota nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya wikaasa basneta ra salyaana baaghachaura naparapaalikaa kaa warsiya serabahaadura disi rahekaa chhan uniharulaai thapa kaarawaahikaa laagi aja dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya kaathamaadaanaimaa bujhaaieko byurokaa prawaktaa sudipa girile jaanakaari dinubhayo

bhaarata laijaana laagieko awasthaamaa paschima nawalaparaasibaata praharile tina mahilaako uddhaara gareko chha jillaako simaawarti sustaa gaaunpaalikaako ratanaganjabaata sindhupaalchokakaa dui ra baankekaa eka gari tina mahilaalaai bechna laijaana laageko asankaamaa uddhaara garieko ho sthaaniya eka sunitaa gurunalaai sameta praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha bhaaratako kuweta laijaane lobhamaa dilli puyaauna laageko suchanaa paaepachhi sunitaako gharabaata prahari chauki raamanagarako tolile niyantranamaa lieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belaataarile janaaeko chha

prahari niriksaka kedaara basnetakaa anusaara uddhaara gariekaa mahilaale dilliko baato hundai kuweta pathaaune bhandai aphuharulaai tyahaan raakhieko bataaekaa chhan prahari niyantranamaa raheki sunitaale nawalaparaasimaa basera mahilaalaai bhaarata pathaaundai aeko ra eka janaa mahilaalaai pathaaebaapata ru dasa hajaara line gareko pani khulna aeko praharile janaaeko chha

tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthalabaata bhansaara chhali awaidha rupamaa laijaana laageko kariba saya graamako sunako sikri sahitabajhaana bunagala nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya naresa bohoraa sameta janaalaai budhabaara diuso praharile pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaumkaa wibhinna sthaanaharumaa satarako taalaa phutaai chori garne raamechhaapa dorambaa gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya sudipa taamaana bhanne gumgaabahaadura magaralaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

jyoti sopa enda kemikalsa indastrijako naamamaa bhaaratiya braandako biemasi mita masalaa ra heda enda soldara syaampu atyaadhunika mesinaharu raakhi gaira kaanuni rupamaa utpaadana gari bajaaramaa wikri witarana gariraheko suchanaako adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaum jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya kaathamaadaum ra sthaaniya pratinidhiharuko rohawaramaa ukta indastrijamaa talaasi gardaa nakkali syaampu ra biemasi masalaa banaaune saamaana phelaa paari baraamada gareko thiyo

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita buddhanagarachokamaa sawaari saadhana jaancha garne kramamaa ghusadine baa kha nambarako minitrakakaa chaalaka jita bahaadura taamaanalaai budhabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

tyasaigari madhyapura thimi nagarapaalikaa gaththaaghara chokamaa sawaari saadhana jaancha garne kramamaa ghusadine naa kha nambarako traka chaalaka muratujamiyaa churiyaaralaai praharile budhabaara pakraau gareko chha
thunuwaa bhagaauna sahayoga gareko abhiyogamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tulasipurale aja eka prahari jawaanalaai pakraau gareko chha
prahari jawaana serabahaadura budhaathokilaai pakraau gari thunaamaa raakhieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prema saahile jaanakaari dinubhaeko chha

prahariko gaadibaata aja jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayabaata myaada thapera iprakaa lyaaundai gardaa raani jaruwaakaa warsiya thunuwaa wisnau budhaathoki haama phaalera pharaara bhaekaa thie thunuwaalaai bhagaauna serabahaadurale saghaaeko pramukha saahile bataaunubhayo pharaara thunuwaako khoji bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

gata bhadau gate budhinandaa maataako darsana garera ghara pharkine kramamaa chhaaprobaata baramaagnetarpha juttaachappala lina gaekaa patrakaara khadkaako awasthaa ajhai ajnaata raheko chha bepattaa bhaekaa patrakaara khadkaako khojikaa laagi nepaali senaako helikaptara aja bihaana surkhetabaata koltimaa awatarana gardai thapa khojikaa laagi sthaaniya nepaali senaa nepaala praharilaai ghatanaasthalamaa puyaaera khoji kaarya bhairaheko prajia chetaraaja baraalale jaanakaari dinubhayo ajnaata rahekaa khadkaako jillaa prasaasana patrakaara mahaasangha nepaala presa yuniyana ra sarokaarawaalaaharuko pahalamaa helikaptarabaata khoji garna sambhawa bhaeko nepaala patrakaara mahaasangha kendriya sadasya minabahaadura bamale bataaunubhayo

bepattaa bhaekaa khadkaako khojikaa laagi gariha mantralaayale raksaa mantraalayalaai helikaptarabaata khojikaa laagi patra pathaaera helikaptara parichaalana garieko jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya baajuraale janaaeko chha khojimaa sumlagna bhaekaa tolile khaadyaannasameta liera gaeko budhinandaa rediyokaa prabandhaka anila saahile bataaunu bhayo helikaptarale sthaaniyawaasilaai ghatanaasthala puyaaera kehi sumwedanasila sthalaharumaa helikaptaramaarphata khoji garne bataaieko chha kariba warsa rediyo nepaalako sthaaniya pratinidhi bhaera ra mahinaa rediyo nepaala simhadarabaaramaa kaama gardai haala rediyo budhinandaamaa kaaryarata patrakaara khadkaa bepattaa bhaeko tina mahinaa bitisakeko chha bepattaa khadkaako awasthaa bhane ajhai ajnaata raheko chha

somabaara melamchi nagarapaalikaa baahunepaatimaa taamaanamaathi akramana bhaeko jillaa samanwaya samiti sindhupaalchokakaa upapramukha baalakumaari saapakotaadwaaraa hastaaksarita wijnaptimaa ullekha garieko chha araajaka tatwako jamaatale taamaanamaathi akramana gari ghaaite banaaeko bhandai janapratinidhimaathiko hamalaako samitile nindaasameta gareko chha wijnaptimaarphata dosilaai awilamba pakraau gari kadaa kaanuni kaarawaahiko maaga garieko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale uchcha sarakaari wakila kaaryaalaya kaaskikaa sahanyaayaadhiwaktaa surendrabahaadura thaapaawiruddha aja wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha

thagi gareko aropa laagekaa eka sewaagraahiko muddaa sarwochcha adaalatamaa punaraawedana garidine pralobhana dekhaai sahanyaayaadhiwaktaa thaapaa ru paancha laakha ghusa lieko aropamaa pakraau parekaa thie

pakraau parneharumaa kaathamaadaum tokhaa nagarapaalikaa dhaapaasi chyaasidola basne sunasari dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya pawana wika kaathamaadaum pepsikolaa basne dhanusaa janakapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya manisa dhunagaanaa kaathamaadaum kaadaanghaari basne sarlaahi hariwana kaa warsiya biweka bhanne dhaneswara kumaara danuwaara kaathamaadaum mhaipi basne sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya rohita magara bhanne purnabahaadura pulaami kaathamaadaum bauddha basne dhanakutaa raajaaraani gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiyaa salinaa serpaa bhanne sumgitaa raai ra kaathamaadaum bauddha wesigaaun basne parsaa wiruwaaguthi kaa warsiya santosa kumaara laamaa rahekaa chhan

gata kaattika gate nakkali sunalaai sakkali suna ho bhani thagi gareko ujuri kendriya anusandhaana wyuromaa praapta bhaepachhi thagi kaaryamaa sumlagna wyaktiko khoji garne kramamaa uniharulaai kaathamaadaumkaa wibhinna sthaanabaata pakraau gareko ho pakraaumadhye purnabahaadura pulaamibaata laakha rupaiyaan ra sumgitaa raaibaata laakha rupaiyaan sameta praharile baraamada gareko chha

kaathamaandau mahaanagarapaalikaa bauddha mahaamkaala paanityaanaki najika sadakamaa pradesa nambara kaa maananiya sabhaasada ganaesa dulaala sawaara baa cha nambarako gaadimaa ra kaathamaandau raamahiti pipalabota basne bira bahaadura laamaako baa cha nambarako gaadimaa dhunagaa prahara garne jillaa udayapura laamitaara ghara bhai kaathamaandau mahaanagarapaalikaa mahaamkaala basne warsa ko paasaana dorje serpaalaai mahaanagariya prahari waritta bauddhabaata khatieko tolile pakraau gareko chha

dhunagaa praharabaata baa cha nambarako gaadiko agaadiko sisaa charkeko ra baa cha nambarako gaadiko agaadiko sisaa phuteko chha uniharulaai baa pa nambarako diskabhara motarasaaikala sahita niyantranamaa lii awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
udayapura jillaako rautaamaai gaaunpaalikaa laaphaagaaunmaa dui dinadekhi haraaeki eka warsiyaa baalikaa aitabaara maritaawasthaamaa phelaa pareki chhin

maritaka ti baalikaa sthaaniya durgaabahaadura khadkaako warsiyaa chhori eljinaa bhaeko udayapura jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha sanibaara baakhraa charaauna gaeki uni aitabaara sthaaniya paakhaako kharabaari jangalamaa kapadaa chyaatieko ra sarirabhari niladaama bhaeko awasthaamaa phelaa pareki thiin

gothaalo gaeki eljinaa raati aberasamma ghara naaepachhi raati ra dinabhari gaaunle milera khoji gardaa diunso baje sthaaniya kharabaari daandaako rukhako phedamaa marita bhetiepachhi praharimaa khabara garieko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo

yo saataamaa maatra jumlaamaa tina mahilaa ekaidina jabarjasti karanaiko sikaara bhaeko ujuri praharimaa pareko chha yahi kaattika gatekaa dina paataaraasi gaaunpaalikaa kaa eka ra tilaa gaaunpaalikaa jumlaakaa dui mahilaale aphu jabarjasti karanaimaa pareko ujuri praharimaa haalekaa hun

paataaraasikaa pidita mahilaako bayaanakaa adhaaramaa jabarjasti karanai gareko aropamaa sohi wadaakaa warsiya bhaire saarkilaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jumlaakaa prahari pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka sitaaraama rijaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

uhaankaa anusaara pharaara abhiyukta pakraau naparekaale nai naama saarwajanika garieko chhaina yahi kaattika gate taatopaani gaaunpaalikaa jumlaakaa eka mahilaalaai balaatkaara gareko aropamaa sohi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya bhakta saarkilaai pakraau gari anusandhaana thaalieko praharile janaaeko chha praharikaa anusaara yo eka mahinaamaa chaara janaa mahilaa jabarjasti karanaiko sikaara bhaekaa chhan

pidita ra pidaka duuwaiko jumlaamaa swaasthya pariksana huna nasakekaa kaarana anusandhaanamaa prabhaawa pareko chha karnaali swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana siksana aspataala jumlaale wisesajna ra taalima praapta chikitsaka nabhaeko pratikriyaa diepachhi prahariko anusandhaanakaa saathai pidita mahilaa samasyaamaa parekaa hun

pratisthaana jumlaakaa medikala daairektara daa pujana rokaayaale aphuharule asahayoga garna nachaaheko tara gata bhadau gate aeko raajapatrale wisesajna tathaa taalima praapta chikitsaka tokekaale ukta janasakti nabhaeko swaasthya pariksana garna nasakieko janaaunubhayo piditamahilaalaai kaalikota jillaa swaasthya kaaryaalayamaa swaasthya pariksana garna pathaaeko bataaundai pariksana kaarya dhilaaile pramaana nasta hune dara bhaeko prahari naayaba upariksaka rijaalale bataaunubhayo

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jumlaale wisesajna chikitsaka upalabdhaartha sanghiya ekaai surkhetahaala nepaalaganjamaa patraachaara gareko chha yasako bodhaartha prahari pradhaanakaaryaalaya kaathamaadaun ra jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya jumlaasametalaai diieko jiprakaa jumlaale janaaeko chha

pratisthaana jumlaale taalima praapta chikitsaka nabhaeko ra raajapatramaa ullekha bhaebamojima pariksana garna nasikane patra pathaaepachhi sanghiya ekaai surkhetamaa guhaara maagieko jiprakaa jumlaale bataaeko chha pariksana jumlaamaa nahundaa aphuharulaai jhana pidaa bhaeko piditako gunaaso chha tina mahinaaaghi pani tilaa gaaunpaalikaakai eka melaa herna gaeki baalikaa saamuhika balaatkaaramaa pareki thiin

mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya kaathamaadaunkaa prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka sailesa thaapaa ksetrikaa anusaara yo mahinaako dosro haptaamaa upatyakaakaa tina jillaamaa muddaa dartaa bhaekaa thie tesro haptaa arthaat tihaarako samayamaa jammaa wataa muddaa dartaa bhaekaa chhan

yasapataka tihaaramaa sawaari durghatanaamaa sameta nyunataa aeko chha wisesa rananitikaa saatha praharilaai parichaalana gariekaale pani dherai ghatanaa huna napaaeko thaapaale bataaunubhayo traaphika niyama ullanghanatarpha chaara hajaara janaalaai kaarawaahi garieko chha yasamaa janaalaai maapase wiruddhako kaarawaahi garieko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo tihaarako awadhimaa aparaadha mahaasaakhaako tolile ru laakha ra kaathamaadaun praharile ru laakhasahita wibhinna ksetramaa garera kula ru laakha baraabarako pataakaa baraamada gari nasta garieko praharile janaaeko chha

pakraau garekaalaai praharile jillaa adaalata rupandehibaata pakraau purjiko samarthana praapta gari aja punah myaada thapakaa laagi jillaa adaalata bhairahawaamaa pesa gareko chha boksiko aropamaa tilottamaa nagarapaalikaa nayaanmilakaa tikaaraama achaarya uhaanki patni kamalaa achaarya ra chhori pramilaa achaarya khanaalalaai pakraau garieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya butawalakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dilabahaadura mallale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parekaamadhye tikaaraama tilottamaa nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaa sachiwa raheko bataaieko chha boksi bhandai kutapita ra duwryawahaara gareko ujuri parepachhi pakraau parekaa tinai janaalaai myaada thapakaa laagi jillaa adaalata bhairahawaamaa pathaaieko chha achaarya pariwaarale chhimeki dammarakumaari nyaupaane ra lalitaa kesilaai kaattika gate diunso saadhe baje gharamaa bolaai boksiko aropa lagaai kutapita ra duwryawahaara gareko bhandai dambarakumaari nyaupaanele ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya butawalamaa ujuri diepachhi praharile sthaaniya tina janaalaai pakraau gareko ho tilottamaa nagarapaalikaakaa prawaktaa surendra srile nija tikaaraama nagarapaalikaako wadaa sachiwa jasto jimmewaari samhaaleko wyaktiko pariwaaramaa yasa kisimako kaarya hunu galata bhaeko bhandai yasa kaaryamaa sumlagnalaai kaanunabamojima kaarawaahi hune wiswaasa dilaaunubhayoe

kendriya anusandhaana byuro siaibikaa nirdesaka nirajabahaadura saahikaa anusaara kaattika gate kaathamaadaunko pasupati ksetrabaata pakraau parekaa daanakaa dinesachandra disilaai aja kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatamaa pesa gariekaamaa ajai dillibajaara kaaraagaara chalaana bhaekaa hun

daanako tribhuwana nagarapaalikaa kaa disilaai sarwochcha adaalatako bhadau gateko phaisalaaanusaara eka warsa chha mahinaa kaida ra ru eka laakha hajaara jariwaanaa tokieko thiyo pharaara hundai aekaa disilaai kendriya anusandhaana byuro siaibiko tolile kaattika gate kaathamaadaunko pasupati ksetrabaata pakraau gareko thiyo

tihaara bidaa sakielagattai phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanakaa laagi aja kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatamaa pesa gariekaamaa disi ajai dillibajaara kaaraagaara chalaana bhaekaa nirdesaka saahile jaanakaari dinubhayo waidesika rojagaara wyawasaaya sanchaalana garne ijaajatapatrabinaa nai wisum maa byutisiyana kaamamaa akarsaka paarisramikako lobhamaa itali pathaaidine bhani daanaki saaradaa ghimirebaata rakama lieko aropamaa disiwiruddha muddaa dartaa bhaeko thiyo
moranako budhigangaa gaaunpaalikaa sthita gangaa chaukabaata praharile thulo rakamasahita paanchajanaa udyogapati juwaadelaai aja bihaana pakraau gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka manojakumaara kesile dieko jaanakaarianusaara wisesa suraakikaa adhaaramaa khatieko prahari tolile wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa basne champaalaala raathiko godaamagharamaa taasa kheldai gareko awasthaamaa nagadasahita ti udyogapati pakraau parekaa hun

ukta juwaako khaalabaata praharile ru eka laakha hajaara ra buka taasa baraamada gareko chha pakraau parekaa paancha janaalaai awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranamaa raakhieko chha
nepaala praharimaa mahinaadekhi esaesapi pada khaali chha gaeko asaara mahinaadekhi esaesapi pada khaali bhaeko ho
hatyaaraalaai pattaa lagaauna dabaaba dinakaa laagi jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayamaa ajadekhi uniharu dharnaamaa basekaa hunba

praharile janasewaakaa laagi tola phri num kaa rupamaa nambaralaai jaari gareko chha suwedi srestha boleko bhandai praharilaai gaali garne jhuto khabara dine ra dhamki dine garekaale badimaalikaa nagarapaalikaa basne tekabahaadura raawalakaa warsiya chhoraa wirendra raawalalaai niyantranamaa liera kaarawaahi prakriyaa suru garieko prahari naayaba upariksaka bhaatale bataaunubhayo

galata maanasikataa ra niyata raakhi suraksaa nikaayamaathi nai awiswaasa garne khaalako gatiwidhi acharana dekhaaeko ra gaali garekaale raawalamaathi saarwajanika aparaadhasambandhi muddaamaa kaarawaahi garne tayaari garieko bhaatale jaanakaari dinubhaeko chha

jaya maalikaa yaataayaata praaliko jipa kaauntaramaa kaama gardai aekaa raawalale aphno ra aruko mobaaila prayoga garera wigata kehi saataadekhi praharilaai galata suchanaa dindai aeko praharile bataaeko chha

kartawya jyaana muddaamaa pharaara pratiwaadi udayapura saabika raamapura gaawisa kositappu basne sunasari saabika prakaasapura gaawisa kaa raajendra raailaai kendriya anusandhaana byuro mahaaraajagumjabaata khatieko praharile sunasari baraaha nagarapaalikaa thaakurabaaribaata warsapachhi sanibaara pakraau gareko chha

adaalatako phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanako laagi raailaai aitabaara praharile udayapura jillaa adaalatamaa pesa garekomaa adaalatako adesale kaida bhuktaanako laagi jillaa kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya udayapura pathaaieko chha

nepaalako sumwidhaana kaaraagaara niyamaawali sajaaya maaphi multawi pariwartanasambandhi kaaryawidhi jyestha naagarika aina ra sarwochcha adaalatakai wigatakaa najirakaa adhaaramaa chhuta paaunuparne maaga niwedanamaa garieko chha yasaaghi sarwochcha adaalalate warsa puraa bhaepachhi widesi naagarikako hakamaa pani chhuta dina sakine adesa jaari gareko thiyo sohi adesaanusaara sobharaajale pani chhuta paaunuparne maaga garieko chha sobharaajale asoja dekhi asoja gatesamma warsa kaida bhuktaana garnuparnemaa warsa bhuktaana gareko niwedanamaa ullekha chha

khaadi mulukamaa rojagaarikaa laagi jaanekramamaa dillimaa alapatra parekaa janaa ra dillisthita kothimaa bechiekaa tina nepaali mahilaalaai uddhaara gari swadesa lyaaieko ho gaajiyaawaadako indrapuramamaa alapatra parekaa mahilaalaai bhaaratiya prahariko sahayoga tathaa dillisthita nepaali raajadutaawaasako samanwayamaa maaiti nepaala ra maaiti indiyaale gata kaattika ra gate uddhaara gareko thiyo uniharulaai awasyaka paraamarsapachhi paariwaarika punahsthaapanaakaa laagi aja nepaalaganja lyaaieko maaiti nepaala nepaalaganjakaa sumyojaka kesawa koiraalaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

bhaaratiya prahariko suraksaamaa uniharulaai nepaalaganja puyaaieko thiyo uddhaara gariekaamaa jhaapaakaa sabaibhandaa dherai janaa rahekaa chhan uniharulaai pariwaarako samparkakaa adhaaramaa gharasamma puyaaine uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo khaadimuluka kuweta ra saaudimaa maasika ru hajaara talaba milnegari rojagaari dilaaidine aswaasana pachhi aphuharu jaana tayaara bhaeko uniharule bataaekaa chhan

gulmiko madaane gaaunpaalikaamaa srimatiko hatyaa garne wyakti pakraau parekaa chhan srimati sitaako hatyaa garne madaane gaaunpaalikaa kaa durgaabahaadura nepaali aitabaara pakraau parekaa hun kaattika gate raati maanchhe nabasne sthaaniya raajakumaara thaapaako khaali gharamaa srimatilaai aphule haanera hatyaa gareko durgaabahaadurale praharisaamu bayaana dieko praharile janaaeko chha

tijamaa maaita gaeki srimati laamo samayasamma gharamaa naaeko risa ra aphule maadakapadaartha sewana gareko jhomkamaa srimatiko hatyaa gareko swikaara gareko praharile janaaeko chha ghatanaapachhi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gulmikaa pramukha ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya purkota dahako prahari tolile khojatalaasa gardaa sanibaara raati dhaaraachaura gahunchhare jangalamaa lukera baseko awasthaamaa phelaa paareko prahari pramukha prahari upariksaka dipakakumaara basnetale jaanakaari dinubhaeko chha

durgaabahaadurakaa tina chhoraa ra eka chhori rahekaa chhan srimatiko hatyaa garepachhi yatibelaa ti baalabaalikaa bichalli bhaekaa chhan uniharuko chhimeki omabahaadura nepaalile gaaunpaalikaako sahayogamaa sumraksana gareko gaaunpaalikaa pramukha daanabahaadura kesile jaanakaari dinubhayo

bardiyaamaa aja bihaana ajnaata samuhako goli prahaarabaata eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha nepaalabhaarata simaamaa parne bardiyaako badhaiyaataala kaa mohana khatikako goli haanera hatyaa bhaeko sthaaniyale bataaekaa chhan

tara jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaale bhane sthaaniyale daabi garejasto goli laageko pusti nabhaeko janaaeko chha pariwaarakaa sadasyako bhanaaianusaara warsiya khatikalaai aitabaara bihaana gharamai sutiraheko belaa ajnaata samuhale petamaa goli haaneko thiyo unako saathamaa raheko hajaara rupaiyaan pani lutera lagieko chha khatikako nepaalaganja narsina kalejamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
