mahaasaakhaako wisesa prahari tolile serachanalaai aitabaara swayambhuko thulo bharyaana ksetrabaata maayaalaari pakraau gareko prahari waristha upariksaka esaesapi dhirajaprataapa simhale bataae

kaathamaadaun jillaa sankharaapura nagarapaalikaa baata mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga saankhule ru eka laakha hajaara sahita janaalaai niyantranamaa lieko chha sukrabaara saanjha sthaaniya raajakumaara taamaanako hotalamaa taasa khelirahekaa belaa taasasahita pakraau garieko prahari niriksaka laksmi khanaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
baidaama wadaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko prahari tolile ru paancha laakha hajaara sahita juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha

pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa nayaanbajaarasthita dhruwa kumaarako kothaamaa juwaa kheliraheko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa prahari niriksaka prasaanta sresthako netaritwamaa gaeko tolile uniharulaai pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa rawindramaana gurunale jaanakaari dinubhayo

uhaankaa anusaara pakraau parnemaa bhaaratako gadhimaai ghara bhai nayaanbajaara basne warsiya sunila prasaada motihaarikaa warsiya raajuprasaada jaisawaala warsiya amarendra kumaara warsiya lawakusa kumaara warsiya rambhuprasaada warsiya dhamendra prasaada warsiya pappu jaisawaala ra bhaaratakai siwara jillaa ghara bhai nayaanbajaara basne warsiya siwanaatha panditalagaayata rahekaa chhan

pidita yuwatikaa bubaale praharilaai dieko ujurikaa adhaaramaa taajapuriyaalaai pakraau garieko gauriganja ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka tekendra paudelale jaanakaari dinubhayo uni paancha mahinaaki garbhawati bhaeko bataaieko chha yuwatiko swaasthya pariksanakaa laagi ajai mechi anchala aspataala pathaaine prahari pramukha paudelale bataaunubhayo abhiyuktalaai sohi kaaryaalayamaa hiraasatamaa raakhera anusandhaana gariraheko praharile janaaeko chha jhaapaamaa chaalu arthika warsako chaara mahinaamaa maatra adhaa darjana balaatkaarakaa ghatanaa bhaekaa chhan

bardiyaa baarabardiyaa nagarapaalikaa baidikaa warsiya subbaa thaarule kyaansara rogapidita warsiyaa mahilaalaai niko paaridinchhu bhandai gharamai aera patakapataka balaatkaara garekaa chhan guruwaa dhaamijhaankri rahekaa subbaale gata maaghadekhi upachaarako naamamaa balaatkaara garne gareko pidita mahilaale bataaunubhayo

uhaanle bhannubhayo roga niko bhaihaalchha ki bhanera guruwanuraale aphumaathi gareko balaatkaarako ghatanaa baahira kasailaai bhaneko thiina tara manamaa ati pidaa bhaepachhi kaanuni nyaayako laagi praharimaa gaeko hun piditale kaattika gate ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya baansagadhimaa aphulaai balaatkaara garne subbaa thaaruwiruddha balaatkaara gareko aropamaa jaaheri dinubhaeko chha

piditale jaaheri dieko swikaara gardai thapa anusandhaana gari jaaheri dartaa gari kaanuni kaarawaahi agaadi badhaaune ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya baansagadhikaa prahari niriksaka wasanta gautamale bataaunubhayo niriksaka gautamakaa anusaara ghatanaakaa aropita subbaa thaarulaai kaattika gate nai pakraau gari anusandhaanakaa laagi hiraasatamaa liieko chha

roga thika hunubhandaa dinaanudina badhdai gaera thalaa paarna thaalepachhi bhane chitawanasthita bharatapura kyaansara aspataalamaa pariksana garaaundaa daaktarale kyaansara bhaeko bhanepachhi sohi anusaara upachaara garaairaheki chhin pidita mahilaako srimaan waidesika rojagaaramaa gaekaa chhan bhane dui chhoraa pani ghara baahira kamaauna jaane garekaa chhan
akramanakaariharule kistawaara bhanne thaaunmaa raheko parihara niwaasamaa goli prahaara garekaa thie ghatanaasthala kaasmirako raajadhaani srinagaradekhi kilomitara daksinatarpha pardachha

gaeraati bandukadhaariharule gharatarpha jaandai gardaa bhaajapaakaa pradesa sachiwa anila parihara ra uhaankaa bhaai ajita pariharako hatyaa garekaa chhan eka janaa warista prahari adhikaarile bataaunubhayo
pokharaa dipa basne warsiya amarita baastolaa maritaawasthaamaa bhetieko pradesa praharile janaaeko chha

rautahata jillaako chhuttaachhuttai sthaanamaa duijanaa purusako sawa baraamada bhaeko chha gaura chandrapura sadakakhandako garudaa nagarapaalikaa jimgadiyaa tola ra maadhawanaaraayana nagarapaalikaa maa ekaeka gari dui purusako sawa phelaa pareko praharile janaaeko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya garudaakaa pramukha prahari niriksaka chaturbhuja ojhaakaa anusaara gaura chandrapura sadakakhandaantargata jimgadiyaa najika mula baato chheuko naalaamaa dubeko awasthaamaa andaaji warsakaa purusako sawa aja phelaa pareko ho

maritakako pahichaana khulna nasakeko tathaa sawapariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala gaura pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha sthaaniyawaasikaa anusaara maadhopura gaaun chheumaa marita phelaa parekaa yuwakako ghaantimaa niladaama dekhieko chha prahari niriksaka ojhaale ghatanaabaare awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko ra sawapariksanako riporta aepaddhi marityuko kaarana khulne bataaunubhayo

marita phelaa parnemaa dogadaakedaara gaaunpaalikaa srikedaara saaungaaunki warsiyaa nirmalaa bhatta raheki khochaleka prahari chaukikaa inchaarja prahari sahaayaka niriksaka syaamasimha maharaale jaanakaari dinubhayo bepattaa hunemaa maritaka nirmalaaki saasu warsiyaa paarwati bhatta raheki chhan

nirmalaaki saasu paarwati ahilesamma pani bepattaa raheki chhan bepattaa paarwatiko khojikaa laagi prahari chauki khochalekabaata prahari sahaayaka niriksaka syaamasimha maharaako netaritwamaa prahari toli parichaalana garieko chha ghatanaa rahasyamaya rahekaale thapa anusandhaana agaadi badhaaieko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanale laakhaaai mulyakaa nepaala telikamako richaarja kaarda chorimaa sumlagna eka wyaktilaai pakraaupachhi aja saarwajanika gareko chha

praharile patrakaarasammelana gari rolpaa maadi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya dalabahaadura rokaalaai richaarja kaardasahita saarwajanika gareko ho rokaasanga ru kaa richaarda kaarda hajaara ru kaa hajaara ru kaa gari jammaa hajaara wataa richaarja kaarda baraamada garieko prahari pramukha karisnahari sarmaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

ukta richaarda kaardako mulya ru laakha hajaara raheko uhaanle bataaunubhayo rokaale ti kaarda chorera rolpaako thawaana gaaunpaalikaa kaa wibhinna thaaunmaa bechabikhana gariraheko suchanaa paaepachhi yahaanbaata khatieko prahari tolile unalaai pakraau gareko ho

unalaai pakraaupachhi anusandhaana gardaa thapa kaarda unako pyuthaana swargadwaari nagarapaalikaa sthita sasuraali gharamaa lukaaeko awasthaamaa baraamada gariekopraharile janaaeko chha ghoraahikaa eka wyawasaayile gata asoja gate laakha mulya baraabarako kaarda chori bhaeko bhandai prahari kaaryaalaya daanamaa ujuri dartaa garaaunubhaeko thiyo nijalaai rolpaa ra pyuthaana prahariko sameta sahayogamaa pakraau garieko ho rokaawiruddha chori muddaa dartaa gari kaanuni prakriyaa agaadi badhaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
mahottari jillaako chhuttaachhuttai sthaanamaa budhabaara tina janaako sawa baraamada bhaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prawaktaa ewum prahari naayaba upariksaka khagendrabahaadura khadkaakaa anusaara mahottariko wibhinna tina sthaanamaa wibhinna ghatanaamaa budhabaara tina janaako marityu bhaeko awasthaamaa sawa baraamada bhaeko ho

uhaankaa anusaara jillaako lohaarapatti nagarapaalikaa mahadaiyaa gaaunmaa sthaaniya raamasogaaratha yaadawako bhusa raakhne gharako barandaamaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne mahaajana mandalakaa chhoraa warsiya makhana mandalako sawa baraamada bhaeko ho
tyastai jillaako mahottari gaaunpaalikaa parsaa tolasthita baansaghaarimaa sthaaniya warsiya tapasi thaakura barahiko sawa doriko paaso lagaai jhundiraheko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko ho

tyasaigari jillaako gausaalaa nagarapaalikaa maa dholana kholaa kinaaramaa raheko anpa bagainchaamaa sthaaniya bholaa mahatoko chhoraa warsiya sachinakumaara mahatoko anpako rukhamaa plaastikako dorile paaso lagaai jhundiraheko awasthaamaa sawa phelaa pareko prahari naayaba upariksaka khadkaale bataaunubhayo
maritaka tinai janaako sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala jaleswaramaa lyaaieko chha
bhaaratabaata lukaaichhipaai nepaala lyaaundai gareko pyaaketa pataakaa gae raati mahottari praharile baraamada gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa anusaara jaleswara nagarapaalikaa maliwaaraasthita basa bisaunimaa bhaaratabaata bhansaara chhali lukaaichhipaai lyaaeko wibhinna braandakaa pyaaketa pataakaa praharile baraamada gareko ho

kaabhrepalaanchokako mandana deupura nagarapaalikaa bhaangetaaramaa gata sanibaara bhaeko durghatanaamaa nepaala praharikaa prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka susilakumaara bhandaarilagaayata tina janaako marityu bhaeko ghatanaakaa wisayamaa chhaanabina garna samiti banaaieko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhulikhelakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dipaka giriko sumyojakatwamaa prahari niriksaka dipaka raaya jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalayakaa inchaarja prahari niriksaka nisesa chaapaagaarim tathaa anya dui janaa sahaayaka prahari adhikarita sadasya raheko ghatanaa chhaanabina samiti banaaieko prahari upariksaka rawiraaja khadkaale bataaunubhayo uhaankaa anusaara ghatanaamaa saamaanya ghaaite bhaekaa gaadidhani ewum chaalaka pradipa bogatilaai kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa raakhi anusandhaana bhairaheko chha

sanibaara diunso baje chha janaa sawaara baacha numko lyaanda krujara kachchi sadakabaata dui saya mitara tala khaseko thiyo durghatanaamaa ghaaite prahari naayaba upariksaka bhandaari upachaaraartha aspataala laijaandai gardaa ra patrakaara warsiya jiwana paraajuli tathaa teda yuniyana kaangerasakaa num pradesa sumyojaka warsiya winoda kaarkiko ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko thiyo ghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite purwaprahari naayaba upariksaka winoda gautamako kaathamaadaunsthita graandi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha saamaanya ghaaite bogati ra arkaa dhanaraaja puri aspataalabaata dischaarja bhaisakekaa chhan maritaka ewum ghaaite puriko mandana deupura napaa baaunedihisthita jaminamaa baaluwaa khaani chalaauna niriksana garera pharrkumdaa durghatanaa bhaeko ho
naaraayana nagarapaalikaasthita tribhuwana maadhyamika widyaalayamaa adhyayanarata baalikaa yauna duwryawahaarawiruddha ekataabaddha bhaera abhiyaanamaa jutekaa hun

baalikaa tathaa widyaalaya siksakalaai yauna duwryawahaara ra balaatkaarakaa ghatanaamaa hune kaanuni kaarawaahibaare adhiwaktaa sarwaraaja josile jaanakaari garaaunu bhaeko thiyo bhane sambhaawita yauna himsaa tathaa balaatkaarabaata bachne upaaya baare karaate prasiksaka khagendra simhale prasiksana dinubhaeko thiyo baalikaa kastaa thaaunmaa jokhimamaa parne garekaa chhan jokhimabaata kasari bachnelagaayatakaa wisayamaa abhiyaanakaa sumyojaka sajanaa sunaarale prasiksana dieki thiin

so awasaramaa dailekhakaa pramukha jillaa adhikaari laksmiprasaada baanskotaale baalikaa bachaau abhiyaanale yaunajanya tathaa balaatkaarakaa ghatanaa hunai nadinamaa sahayoga puyaaune bataaundai yauna himsaa ra balaatkaarawiruddha baalikaa nai jaagaruka hunu awasyaka raheko dhaaranaa wyakta garnubhayo
sarlaahiko raamanagaramaa mumgalabaara nepaala kamyunista paarti ra nepaali kaamgresakaa kaaryakartaabicha jhadapa hundaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sarlaahikaa anusaara raamanagara gaaunpaalikaa maa bihaana saadhe bajetira dui paartikaa kaaryakartaabicha jhadapa bhaeko thiyo jhadapakaa kramamaa chaleko goli laagera kaamgresa kaaryakartaa warsiya raamawilaasa mahatoko jyaana gaeko chha
srimaana wirudda bhimadattanagarapaalikaa bhaansiki manju badaalale jabarjastikaranai muddaa praharimaa dieki chhan

srimaan dambara josile jabarjasti yaunasamparka raakheko bhandai muddaa dieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka karisnaraaja ojhaale bataaunubhayo muddaa dartaa gari adaalatabaata paancha dinako myaada thapa garekaa chhaun uhaanle bhannubhayo aja muddaa dartaapachhi dambaralaai pakraau garieko chha

muluki sumhitaa laagu bhaepachhi yasto prakaarako ghatanaa pahilo pataka aeko uhaanko bhanaai chha aparaadha sumhitaako parichchheda maa karanaisambandhi kasurako daphaa ko upadaphaa maa waiwaahika sambandha kaayama gareko awasthaamaa patile patnilaai jabarjasti karanai gare paancha warsa kaaraagaara sajaayako wyawasthaa chha

anusandhaanamaa juteko praharile kaattika gate pokharaabaata khotaanga maubaawotakaa warsakaa anila pariyaaralaai pakraau garyo anusandhaanakaa kramamaa pariyaarale laksmiko hatyaa gareko swikaara gare

adaanachuli gaaunpaalikaa biguthi humlaaki warsiyaa baalikaa ramilaa bumi gata asoja pahilo saataa aphnai kodobaarimaa lagaaeko kaankro khaana gaeki thiin durbhaagyawasah kaankro khaana gaeki uni minetabharamai goli khaaera pharkin

lakhanaumaa khuttaako salyakriyaa gareki bumiko yatibelaa bhane desina karnaali swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana siksana aspataalamaa jumlaamaa bhaiheko chha sadde sapaanga ramilaa bumilaai chhimekiko kamajorikaa kaarana apaanga bhaera aba sadhanaikaa laagi waisaakhiko sahaaraamaa baanchnuparne baadhyataa ailaageko chha

saano galtile gardaa aja ramilaa sadhainbharikaa laagi apaanga bhaeki chhan tyahi ghatanaalaai liera amaa pawitraa ra bubaa janaka bumile jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jumlaamaa aphnaa chhimekiwiruddha jaaheri niwedana haaleko girile bataaunubhayo anjaanawasah thulo bhula bhaeko bhandai chhimekile ksamaayaachanaa gareko ra ramilaako jiwanabhara swaasthya awasthaamaa aune samasyaa tathaa ahilesamma bhaeko sabai upachaara kharcha tirna chhimeki manjura bhaekaale kaanuni prakriyaabhandaa melamilaapa garne sartamaa aghi badhne sanketa unakaa maamaa amaabubaale diekaa chhan

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale saarwajanika jaggaa kirte kaagajaata gari bhrastaachaara gareko abhiyogamaa jillaa maalapota kaaryaalaya paraasikaa karmachaarisahita saata janaawiruddha wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha

ayogakaa prawaktaa raameswara dangaalakaa anusaara maalapota kaaryaalaya paraasikaa maalapota adhikarita manoharaprasaada panthi kharidaara jiwalaala bhusaala ra kampyutara aparetara ejaaja khaanle ru dui karoda laakha hajaara baraabarako bhrastaachaara gareko anusandhaanabaata khulna aeko chha

maalapota kaaryaalaya paraasikaa karmachaarisametako milematomaa sarakaari saarwajanika prakaritiko jaggaa wyakti wisesako naamabaata amuka kampaniko naamamaa bikri witarana garne prayojanakaa laagi raajinaamaako likhata tayaara gari paaritasameta gareko adhyayanabaata dekhieko chha

ukta jaggaako maalapota kaaryaalaya paraasiko arthika warsa ko nyunatam sarakaari mulyaankana pustikaa anusaara pratikatthaa ru paancha laakha hajaarako darale gairakaanuni rupamaa wyakti wisesako naamamaa kampyutaramaa prawistha gari nakkali srestaa purjaa khadaa gari kaaryaalayamaa raheko motha thelimaa ghusaaeko paaieko chha

yasaibicha prahari pradhaana kaaryaalaya naksaala kaathamaadaunmaa kaaryarata praawidhika prahari naayaba niriksaka raamabahaadura simha bhandaariko saiksika yogyataako pramaanapatra nakkali daabisahita ajai wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale nakkali kaagajaata banaai srama swikariti dieko aropamaa waidesika rojagaara wibhaaga kaathamaadaun kaaryaalaya taahaachalakaa tatkaalina karmachaariwiruddha aja wisesa adaalatamaa aropapatra daayara gareko chha

nakkali kaagajaata banaai srama swikariti pradaana garne kaaryamaa sumlagna waidesika rojagaara wibhaaga kaathamaadaun kaaryaalaya taahaachalamaa kaaryarata saakhaa adhikarita hariprasaada dewakotaa dipakakumaara achaarya ganaesawikrama saaha dinesakumaara raai pawitraa srestha ra raamaprasaada oliwiruddha aropapatra daayara gareko akhtiyaarale janaaeko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya raaniko hiraasatamaa rahekaa thunuwaa wiraatanagara kaa mohamada aripha husena ra sadima husena aja bihaana bajedekhi bajeko awadhimaa pharaara bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranakaa suchanaa adhikaari prahari naayaba upariksaka nisaana thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pharaara abhiyukta pakraaukaa laagi khoji kaarya bhairaheko ra wibhinna sthaanamaa akasmika jaancha gariraheko praharile bataaeko chha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya raanimaa prahari rahekomaa paalopaalai chhachha janaale aphno kaarya garne suchanaa adhikaari thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya raanibaata bhaaratiya simaawarti ksetra kariba mitara daksinamaa rahako chha

yasaaghi adaalatale gata asoja gate nai likhita jawaapha maaga gardai tina dinabhitra khadkaalaai sarwochcha adaalatamaa upasthita garaauna gariha mantraalaya ra makawaanapura jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa naamamaa adesa jaari gareko thiyo

khadkaalaai praharile gata bhadau gate kaathamaadaun aundai gardaa dhaadinako naubisebaata pakraau gareko thiyo praharile pakraau gareko dui dinapachhi butawalako ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya lagieko thiyo so adaalatale dharautimaa khadkaalaai dharautimaa rihaa garna adesa dieko thiyo
netaa khadkaalaai rupandehi jillaamaa bhaeko bama wisphota garera ksati puryaaeko ra makawaanapuramaa agajani gareko aropamaa sangathina aparaadhamaa muddaa daayara garieko thiyo

maadakapadaartha sewana garera sarwasaadhaaranalaai kuteko aropamaa raaiwiruddha praharile muddaa chalaaeko ho wadaadhyaksa raaile maapase garera sthaaniya wyawasaayi ra yuwalaai kuteko bhanne ujuri aepachhi pakraau garera eka saataako myaada thapa gari muddaa chalaaieko jillaa prahari pramukha anantaraama sarmaale bataaunubhayo

sarmaakaa anusaara wadaadhyaksa raaile sanibaara maapase garera arpana ayala harkapuramaa kaama garne madana timilsinaa sthaaniya yuwaa thaakura adhikaarimaathi akramana garepachhi raai prahari khoramaa pugekaa hun jimmewaara wyakti nai jhapadamaa utriepachhi kaanuni kaarawaahi garnu pareko praharile janaaeko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale sasastra prahari bala dhanusaakaa prahari sahaayaka hawaldaara chandeswara girilaai ru hajaara ghusa lieko abhiyogamaa aja pakraau gareko chha
sumyojaka sarmaalaai kataara praharile pakraau gareko enaaraenaekaa prawaktaa bhusana ghimirele pusti garnubhayo sarmaalaai pakraau garnaako kaarana bhane nakhuleko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo
prawaasi nepaalile dohaamaa ayojanaa gareko kaaryakramamaa sramika sosanasambandhi naataka pradarsana garekaa kaarana kataara praharile sarmaalaai pakraau gareko huna sakne uhaanle bataaunubhayo

pakraau parnemaa dailekha naumule gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiyaa sera bahaadura puna raheko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dailekhakaa prahari naayawa upariksaka thaakura prasaada pokharelakaa anusaara kaattika gate raati sera bahaadura punale aphnai srimati barrsiyaa saanti punako hatyaa garekaa hun

pakraau parneharumaa kaathamaadaum kirtipura nagarapaalikaa machchhegaaun deraa gari basne parsaa parsaagadhi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya indrawahaadura srestha sohi thaaun deraa gari basne gorakhaa sahida lakhana gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya naaraayana srestha kaathamaadaum mulapaani basne makawaanapura harnaamaadi kaa warsiya saahila thaapaamagara kaathamaadaum wauddha jorapaati basne parsaa wiruwaaguthi kaa warsiya raaja srestha ra kaathamaadaum kumaarigaala basne kaageswari manaharaa kaa warsiya wikaasa doche rahekaa chhan

nepaali nakkali notaharu chhaapi bajaaramaa witarana tathaa prayoga bhairaheko chha bhanne wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaumbaata khatieko praharile uniharulaai pakraau gareko ho

uniharubaata nakkali nota laakha hajaara rupaiyaan paisaa chhaapne mesina thaana soko masi wattaa paisaa chhaapna prayoga hune pepara wandala mobaaila thaana laaligunraasa amkita rabara chhaapa nakkali paisaa banaaune prayoga bhaekaa sakkali hajaarakaa nota thaana ra sayakaa nota thaana paisaa wandala wanaauna prayoga garine gorkhaa phaainaansako tyaaga thaana ra enaaisi waimkako nakkali cheka sameta praharile baraamada gareko chha
baaraako jitapurasimaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa ko auraahakaa warse surendra raamale aja bihaana aphnaa dui chhoraako hatyaa gari aphule pani atmahatyaa garekaa chhan

raamale aphnaa paancha warsiya chhoraa subina raama ra tina warsiya wipina raamako hatyaa gari aphule pani jhundiera atmahatyaa gareko prahariko anumaana chha tinaijanaako sawa pariksanakaa laagi wiraganja naaraayanai upaksetriya aspataala lagieko simaraa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka subhaasa hamaalale bataaunubhayo maanasika tanaawakaa kaarana raamale yasto gareko huna sakne prarambhika anusandhaanabaata khuleko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo

nirmalaa panta balaatkaarahatyaako chhaanabinamaa laaparawaahi gareko bhandai prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale kanchanapurakaa tatkaalina prahari upariksaka dilliraaja wistalaai niskaasanako siphaarisa gareko chha

prahari mahaaniriksaka sarwendra khanaalale gata asoja gate prahari upariksaka wista ra prahari niriksaka jagadisa bhattalaai sewaabaata niskaasana garna gariha mantraalayasamaksa patraachaara gareko prahari prawaktaa sailesa thaapaa ksetrile raasasalaai jaanakaari dinubhayo
ghaaite kumaalako upachaarakaa laagi sadaramukaama tamghaasa lyaaundai gardaa baatomaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari pramukha tathaa prahari upariksaka dipakakumaara basnetale jaanakaari dinubhayo

nepaala presa yuniyana doti saakhaakaa sumsthaapaka adhyaksasameta rahanubhaekaa khadkaako khoji kaaryamaa dhyaana dina wibhinna nikaayalaai agraha garieko yuniyanakaa jillaa adhyaksa prakaasa bamale bataaunubhayo presa yuniyanamaa abaddha sanchaarakarmi khadkaako khojikaa laagi yuniyakaa kendriya adhyaksa badri sigdelako netaritwamamaa kehi mahinaa aghi misana toli banaaieko thiyo

so tolile dhanagadhi hundai ghatanaasthala raheko baajuraa jillaasamma jaane bhane pani tyahaan napugeko bhandai dotikaa sanchaarakarmi niraasa bhaekaa hun sarakaarale teju ko khoji kaaryamaa khaasai chaaso nadekhaaeko presa yuniyanako aropa chha
sewaagraahisanga ghusa lindai gareko abhiyogamaa baabiyaachaura ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka pakraau parekaa chhan

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako surkheta kaaryaalayabaata khatieko tolile aitabaara saalakota prahari chaukibaata ru hajaara ghusa lindai gareko awasthaamaa prahari niriksaka susobhana sresthasahita prahari jawaana tilaka laamichhaanelaai rangehaata pakraau gareko ho sresthale suna pasala chorisambandhi muddaa milaaidine bhandai sewaagraahibaata ghusa maagekaa thie akhtiyaara surkhetakaa prawaktaa jangabahaadura daangile pakraau parekaa duwai janaamaathi wistaritamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko bataaunubhayo

pradesa num kaa mukhyamantri laalabaabu raautalaai jnaapanapatra bujhaauna gaekaa sike raautakaa tina janaa kaaryakartaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha mukhyamantri tathaa mantriparisad kaaryaalayako prawesadwaarabaata sanjaya yaadawa wiswanaatha chaudhari ra amaradipa yaadawalaai dhanusaa praharile aja pakraau gareko chha

kaaryaalayako prawesadwaaramai suraksaakarmile ke kaama wisesako baaremaa jnaapanapatra bujhaauna aeko sodhepachhi uniharule aphuharu sike raautako samarthaka raheko bataaepachhi tatkaalai pakraau gareko prahari upariksaka gowinda thapaliyaale bataaunubhayo

yataa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayawa upariksaka wirabahaadura budhaamagarale adhaara siwiramaa paryatakako sawa bhetieko gurjaakaa sthaaniyawaasibaata khabara aepachhi uddhaarako laagi pugeko helikaptara adhaara siwiramaa basna nasakera pharkieko jaanakaari dinubhayo

melauli nagarapaalikaa surnayaagaada nadiko pyaani bhanne thaaunmaa mahilaako asthipanjara phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baitadikaa prahari pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka netramanai girile jaanakaari dinubhayo

maachhaa maarne kramamaa sthaaniya naaraayana luhaarale mahilaako asthipanjara dekhepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie baahira raato cholaa lagaaeko ra meksi lagaaeko asthipanjara phelaa pareko janaaieko chha asthipanjara kasako ho bhanne thaahaa huna sakeko chhaina

prahariko toli ahile ghatanaasthalatarpha gaeko baitadikaa prahari prawaktaa prahari niriksaka kaantiraaja josile jaanakaari dinubhayo praharikaa anusaara ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko chha
uniharuko saathabaata ru eka laakha hajaara sameta baraamada bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha wasanta kunwarale jaanakaari dinubhayo

sarakaarale balaatkaara tathaa yaunajanya himsaakaa ghatanaalaai kama garne uddesyale aslila webasaaita banda garne ninarya gareko ho sanchaara tathaa suchanaa prawidhi mantraalayale yahi asoja gate durasanchaara sewaa pradaayaka intaraneta sewaa pradaayaka ra saamaajika sanjaala sanchaalakamaarphata prakaasana tathaa prasaarana garne tyastaa webasaaitalaai tatkaala banda garna nepaala durasanchaara praadhikaranalaai nirdesana diepachhi praadhikaranale gatedekhi kaama suru gareko ho nepaalamaa ahile kariba sayabhandaa badhi intaraneta sewaa pradaayaka kampaniharu chhan

asoja gate bhaaratako gayaabaata bhaai bepattaa bhaeko uhaankaa daaju siwa mahatole jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaan gate tirthakaa laagi bhaarata jaanubhaeko thiyo nepaalabaata tirthakaa laagi gaeko toli budhabaara ghara pharkieko tara bhaai bhane bepattaa bhaeko uhaanle bataaunubhayo gaaunkaa kariba janaako samuha tirthakaa laagi gaekaa thie winoda anya saathisangai rahekaamaa bhaaratako gayaamaa khaanaa khaane kramamaa chhutiekaa thie tyasapachhi sangai gaekaa saathiharuko samparkamaa naaepachhi bhaaratiya praharilaai sameta jaanakaari dii khoji gardaa phelaa napareko daaju siwale bataaunubhayo

parwatako kusmaa nagarapaalikaa khurkotamaa warsiyaa baalikaa balaatkaara prayaasa gareko abhiyoga laagekaa eka yuwaa ru dui laakha dharautimaa rihaa bhae pani arthika abhaawale kaaraagaara chalaana bhaekaa chhan
gharamaa sutiraheki baalikaalaai balaatkaara prayaasa gareko abhiyoga laagekaa kusmaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya winoda nepaali purpaksakaa laagi ru dui laakha dharautimaa chhutekaa hun

parwata jillaa adaalatakaa nyaayaadhisa suryabahaadura thaapaako ekala ijalaasale mangalabaara nepaalilaai ru dui laakha dharautimaa chhaadera anusandhaana garna adesa dieko thiyo abhiyukta nepaali ru dui laakha bujhaauna nasakepachhi parwata jillaa kaaraagaaramaa thunaamaa chhan

adaalata budhabaaradekhi bidaa hune bhaekaale dharautimaa chhaadne adesa bhae pani abhiyukta nepaalile dasain bidaamaa pani kaaraagaara basnuparne bhaeko chha nepaalile gaeko bhadau gate sohi thaaunki warsiyaa baalikaa gharako baaradalimaa sutiraheko awasthaamaa gharako bhittaa ra khambaa hundai baaradalimaa chadhera mukha thuni jabarjasti yauna kriyaakalaapa garna khojeko abhiyogamaa asoja gate jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parwatale pakraau gareko thiyo

baalikaa balaatkaara abhiyogamaa warse baalaka parwata jillaa adaalatako mangalabaarako adesale purpaksakaa laagi sudhaaragariha chalaana bhaekaa hun jillaa adaalatakaa nyaayaadhisa suryabahaadura thaapaako adesale baalakalaai baala sudhaaragariha saraankota kaaski pathaaieko chha

parwatako jalajalaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa ti baalakale asoja gate chhimekamaa deraa gari basne chha warsiyaa baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko aropa pidita baalikaale lagaaepachhi praharile pakraau gari anusandhaana gareko thiyo pidita baalikaako medikala rirpotamaa sameta balaatkaara bhaeko dekhieko chha praharile jabarjasti karanai muddaaantargata ujuri dartaa gareko thiyo muddaa dartaapachhi praharile baalakalaai abhibhaawakako sumraksana tathaa nigaraanimaa rahane gari ghara pathaaeko thiyo
nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byurole rasiyaa lagera kaama lagaaidinchhu bhandai gathi garne tinalaai aja pakraau gareko chha

haalasamma piditabaata ru laakha hajaara badhi rakama lieko ujuri praapta bhaeko ra thapa jaaheri aune krama jaari raheko byurole janaaeko chha pakraau parnemaa nuwaakotakaa raaju taamaana lalitapurakaa jnaanagowinda waidha ra sindhupaalchokakaa jagatabahaadura srestha chhan uniharule wyaktisanga rakama ra raahadaani sankalana garisakeko khulna aeko chha uniharuwiruddha ajai kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatabaata myaada thapa gari anusandhaana bhairaheko chha

ayogale nepaala praharikaa purwaatirikta prahari mahaaniriksaka raajendrabahaadura simha ra wijnaanaraaja sarmaa purwaprahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka ramesa kharela ra bamabahaadura bhandaari purwanaayaba mahaanyaayaadhiwaktaa narendaprasaada paathaka suryaprasaada koiraalaa ra thokaprasaada siwaakotisanga chhalaphala gareko ho

chhalaphalamaa ghatanaasthalako suraksaa suchanaa tathaa pramaanako sankalana prakriyaa waijnaanika pariksana widhi prakriyaalagaayata haalasamma bhaekaa anusandhaanabaata praapta tathyaharuko sambandhamaa chhalaphala bhaeko thiyo

ghatanaamaa nepaala praharibaata garieko praarambhika anusandhaana sarakaari toliharubaata gariekaa anusandhaana tathaa anusandhaana silasilewaara prakriyaabaata kaama aghi badhirahekaa baaremaa aparaadha anusandhaana wijnale jaanakaari garaaunubhayo

maadaka padaartha sewana garekaa dominikale sedi khahare jaane kramamaa sediko pulamaa sresthalaai chakku prahaara gari gambhira ghaaite banaaeko khabara praapta bhaepachhi khatieko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya baidaamako praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho ghaaite sresthalaai upachaarako laagi charaka memoriyala aspataala lagieko chha
wigata warsadekhi desakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa maanisalaai behosa banaai lutapaata garne girohalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale aja pakraau gareko chha

pakraauparnemaa kaaski jillaa maachhaapuchchhe gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya kaalu pariyaara ra makawaanapura thaahaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala tanahunko dewaghaatamaa basobaasa gardai aekaa warsiya hari gole rahekaa chhan pariyaara warsadekhi nirantara chori kaaryamaa sumlagna raheko khuleko chha unale thaaunmaa behosa banaai lutapaata gareko swikaareko praharile janaaeko chha

uniharule asoja gate maadi nagarapaalikaa kalyaanapurakaa bhimabahaadura sunaarako gharamaa lutapaata garepachhi so samuhako khojikaarya suru garieko thiyo uniharulaai somabaara butawala basapaarkabaata pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka susilasimha raathaunrale jaanakaari dinubhayo

praharile uniharulaai aja saarwajanika gareko ho uniharule jhaapaa itahari lahaana wiraganja hetaundaa sunauli butawala karisnanagara nepaalaganja surkheta kaathamaadaun lagaayatakaa sthaanamaa behosa banaaera lutapaata gareko praharile janaaeko chha bayaanakaa kramamaa uniharule bhaaratako lakhanausamma pani nepaalilaai luteko swikaareko bataaieko chha uniharulaai jyaana maarne udyoga ra chori kasuraantargata kaanuni kaarawaahi garine praharile janaaeko chha

kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num sthita amita ayala stora ra kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num sthita wijaya ayala storamaa sila garieko ksetriya kaaryaalayakaa pramukha sasikaanta yaadawale jaanakaari dinubhayo

ayogale maagha dekhi phaaguna gatesamma gareko anusandhaanabaata tatkaalina yaataayaata wyawasthaa kaaryaalaya sawaari chaalaka anumatipatra baagamati ekaantakunaa kaaryaalayakaa pramukha tejanaaraayana yaadawa saakhaa adhikaritaharu iswararaaja regmi bhuparaaja daahaala siwaprasaada suwedi wisnauprasaada suwedi ra mekaanikala injiiniyara syaama kesile bhrastaachaara niwaarana aina ko kasura garekaale hadaisammako jariwaanaa ra kaida sajaayako maagadaabi lii aropapatra daayara gareko janaaeko chha

tyasaigari tatkaalina yaataayaata wyawasthaa kaaryaalaya sawaari chaalaka anumatipatra baagmati thulobhayaanakaa saakhaa adhikarita saaligraama paudela kampyutara aparetara wijnaana khadgi yaataayaata wyawasthaa wibhaagakaa kampyutara aparetara laksmana tiwaari sawaari chaalaka anumatipatra baagmati ekaantakunaa kaaryaalayakaa naayabasubbaa lekhanaatha bhusaalawiruddha pani ayogale muddaa daayara gareko chha
sirahaako mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaa sthita kamalaakholaako kinaaraamaa hijo saanjha eka yuwakako sawa phelaa pareko chha
tatkaala sanaakhata hunanasakeko andaaji warsiya yuwakako sawa kholaa kinaaraamaa phelaa pareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mirchaiyaale janaaeko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bariyaarapattibaata khatieko gasti tolile bariyaarapatti gaaunpaalikaa maa chekajaancha garne kramamaa bhaaratabaata nepaalatarpha paidala aundai gareko awasthaamaa gae raati laaguausadhasahita udayapurako triyugaa nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya dewakumaara taamaana sohi thaaunkaa warsiya naageswara chaudhari ra warsiya rohitakumaara chaudharilaai pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parekaa tinai janaako saathabaata laaguausadha phenaaragana tyaableta dialejapa tyaableta ra lupijesika tyaableta baraamada bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaakaa prawaktaa tathaa prahari naayaba upariksaka maadhawaraaja kharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo yastai siraahaa nagarapaalikaa sthita traaphika chokabaata laaguausadhasahita sirahaa golabajaara nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya umesakumaara mahato ra warsiya karipaakumaara mahatolaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parekaa duwai janaako saathabaata laaguausadha naaitrobheta tyaableta naaitrojana tyaableta tathaa photobina empula baraamada bhaeko prahari naayaba upariksaka kharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo tyasaigari praharile sirahaa nagarapaalikaa sthita lakadigothabaata abaidha rupamaa bhaaratatarpha laandai gareko kaartuna sophiyaa madiraa baraamada gareko chha
gharamaa kohi nabhaeko belaa mattitela chharkiera ago lagaaundaa raautako sthaaniya aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurale janaaeko chha

sunilasanga saamaajika paramparaaanusaara mahinaa aghi rosaniko wiwaaha bhaeko thiyo yataa ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarile janaaeko chha so agalaagibaata kariba ru hajaara mulya baraabarako ksati bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka karisnaraaja ojhaako netaritwamaa raheko anusandhaana toli pani laamo samayadekhi ghatanaalaai wibhinna konabaata anusandhaana gariraheko chha

ghatanaako suruwaatamai kanchanapura prahari netaritwabaata bhaeko gambhira laaparawaahikai kaarana ahilesamma hatyaaraasamma pugna sakasa bhaeko ho prahari srotale bhanyo sawa bhetiekaa belaa gambhirataakaa saatha aunasandhaana thaaleko bhae ahile yasto awasthaa nai aune thiena

suruwaatakai trutikaa kaarana ahile anusandhaanamaa samasyaa bhaeko anusandhaana adhikaariko bhanaai chha ghatanaako anusandhaanamaa khatiekaa prahari karmachaarilaai prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayamai jhikaaera prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka dhiru basneta netaritwako tolile ghatanaabaare chhaanabina gariraheko chha kehi samayaaghi prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayabaatai ghatanaa anusandhaanako samanwayakaari bhumikaa nibhaauna prahari upariksaka durgaasimha chanda bhimadattanagara aipugnubhaeko chha

kanchanapuramaa mahilaa tathaa wibhinna dawaawa samuhale nirmalaako hatyaaraa saarwajanika garna dinahun prardasana garirahekaa chhan andolanarata yahaankaa mahilaa adhikaarakarmilaai aitabaara nepaali kaangresakaa kendriya sadasya ewum purwamantri ramesa lekhakale pani aikyawaddhataa janaaunubhayo uhaanle nirmalaale nyaaya napaaesamma dawaawa dinuparne awasyakataa aunlyaaundai aphu ra aphno paarti tyasakaa nimti laagirahane bataaunubhayo

ghatanaamaa sumlagna bhandai yasaaghi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa pramukha haala nilamwita prahari upariksaka dilliraaja wistale saarwajanika garekaa bhimadattanagarapaalikaa baagaphaantaakaa warsiya dilipasimha wistako dienae riporta namilepachhi uni saadhaarana taarekhamaa rihaa bhaekaa thie ghatanaamaa sumlagnataako aropa sthaaniyawaasile lagaaepachhi kehi samayaaghi prahari upariksaka wista uhaankaa chhoraa kiranaraaja wista ra bhimadattanagarakai yuwaa ayusa wistako sameta dienae pariksana garieko thiyo tinai janaako riporta namilepachhi ghatanaako anusandhaana thapa jatila bandai gaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka kuwera kadaayatale ghatanaako anusandhaana bhairaheko bataaundai kehi tathya phelaa napareko bataaunubhayo haami suksma rupamaa dinaraata khatiera laagekaa chhaun kadaayatale bhannubhayo anusandhaanamaa kehi nayaan tathya aeko chhaina

chitawana raastriya nikunjale pharaara rahekaa nawalaparaasiko kaawaasoti rataulikaa iswariprasaada mahatolaai sukrabaara pakraau gareko ho nikunjakaa suchanaa adhikaari narendra aryaalakaa anusaara mahato nepaala chhireko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa dinadekhi pichhaa gari nawalaparaasiko amalataaribaata pakraau garieko ho mahato so ksetramaa dui gaindaa maarne kaaryamaa sumlagna raheko nikunjale aropa lagaaeko chha

wisum asoja gate mahatosahita saata janaawiruddha gaimndaa maarera khaaga chori bikri gareko aropamaa dui muddaa dartaa bhaeko thiyo wisum asaara gate nikunjale mahatolaai warsa kaida ra ru hajaara jariwaanaako phaisalaa gareko thiyo arkaae muddaamaa pani warsa kaida ra ru hajaara jariwaanaako phaisalaa bhaeko suchanaa adhikaari aryaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo mahatolaai sukrabaara nai jillaa kaaraagaara bharatapura chalaana garieko chha

yastai ayogale mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga kaandaaghaarimaa kaaryarata prahari jawaana maanasihum rokaa ra prahari jawaana ratnaprasaada rijaalawiruddha wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha baaluwaa wyawasaayisanga ru paancha hajaara ghusa maageko abhiyoga uhaanharumaathi laageko chha

yastai ayogale saawika jillaa wikaasa samitiko kaaryaalaya rupandehiantargata gajedi gaaun wikaasa samitimaa sachiwa padamaa kaaryarata tatkaalina saakhaa adhikarita raajakumaara srestha ra kunji pwaakala maadhyamika widyaalaya kaathamaadaunkaa siksaka laksmana saapakotaako saiksika yogyataako pramaanapatra nakkali raheko daabisahita wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha
swatantra madhesako wakaalata gardai aekaa daa raautalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatale pakraau gareko ho

jillaa adaalata rautahatamaa niyamita pesimaa upasthita bhaera pharkidai gardaa unalaai praharile pakraau gareko thiyoe raajyawiruddha abhiwyakti diekaale unalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatakaa prahari upariksaka kedaara dhakaalale jaanakaari dinubhaeko chha
samitile tatkaalina esapi dilliraaja bistasahitakaa anusandhaanamaa khatiekaa praharimaaitha kaarabaahi thaalna pani sujhaawa dieko chha

samitimaa gariha mantraalayakaa sahasachiwa hariprasaada mainaaliko sumyojakatwamaa gathita samitimaa prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka raamaprasaada srestha sasastra prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka wasanta baaniyaan raastriya anusandhaana wibhaagakaa anusandhaana nirdesaka laksmana guruna sudurapaschima pradesakaa antarika maamilaa tathaa kaanuna mantraalayakaa upasachiwa wirendra kesi sadasya hunuhunthyo

saarwajanika garieko pratiwedanamaa nirmalaa haraaekai dinamaa praharilaai jaanakaari garaaeko bhae pani udaasina raheko niskarsa nikaalieko chha pantako hatyaa ghatanaasanga sambandhita pramaana sankalanamaa khatiekaa prahariko laaparwaahi raheko niskarsa nikaalieko chha sawa baraamada bhaeko sthaana nijale prayoga garne saaikala ewum notakapi saathiko gharabaata lyaaeko bhanieko ambaa ra ti saamagri praapta bhaeko sthaana tathaa asapaasakaa ksetramaa aparaadhiko pahichaanakaa laagi prayoga hunasakne gari taalimapraapta kukurako prayoga nabhaeko sawa phelaa pareko sthaana ra asapaasako ksetrakaa tatkaala paryaapta maatraamaa tatkaalina prahari pramukhale suraksaakarmi parichaalana nagareko pratiwedanamaa ullekha chha

yastai bhadau gate jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurabaata khadaa garieko baraamadi muchulkaamaa ullekha bhaeko amita golda lekhieko nilo kattu nilo ranako ganji ra khairo ranako jinsa paainta kendriya widhi wijnaana prayogasaalaamaa pariksaakaa laagi bhadau gate pathaaeko bhadau gate namunaa sachyaauna patra lekheko paaieko chha

pantako balaatkaara hatyaasanga sambandhita pramaana laagna sakne bhitri bastra paanimaa chopaleko guptaanga ra tighraa pakhaalieko ra ukta bastra nai lopa garieko pantakaa baabu yajnaraaja saauna gate maatrai nepaala pharkeko bhae pani saauna gate jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurale khadaa gareko dasi pramaanamaa sanaakhata muchulkaa kaagajaatamaa maritakakaa baabuko naamamaa sahi chhaapa gareko paaieko chha

tatkaalina prahari pramukha dilliraaja wistako wyawahaara ra kaaryasailikaa kaarana amanaagarika tathaa pidita pariwaarakaa sadasya prahariko kaama kaarawaahiprati wiswastha huna nasakeko maritakako sawa antyesti garna pidita pariwaaralaai prahari prasaasana ra kehi wyaktile anaawasyaka dabaaba diekosameta pratiwedanamaa ullekha chha

yastai ghatanaasthalamaa bhetieko kaapi saaikala raheko sthaanadekhi eka kilomitara taadhaa paanimaa raheko bhanie pani kaapi bhijeko nadekhieko nilo jela penale lekheko kunai pani aksara nametieko rosani bamako gharabaata lageko bhanieko ambaa baraamada nagareko ra tatkaalina awasthaamaa chhaanabina tolimaa rahekaa prahari karmachaarilaai tatkaala chhaanabina gari kaarawaahi garnuparne sujhaawa dieko chha

tyastai pidita pariwaarako suraksaalagaayata saamaanya jiwanayaapana prabhaawita bhaeko bhae raajyako tarphabaata saamaajika punahsthaapanaa garnuparne ra ghatanaako anusandhaana tathaa sahayogikaa rupamaa khatiekaa prahari tathaa karmachaariko kaama kaarawaahiko sambandhamaa praapta tathya pramaana ra ghatanaakramakaa adhaaramaa sumlagnataa dekhiekaa padaadhikaarilaai sameta chhaanabinako daayaraamaa lyaauna sujhaawa diieko chha
mahaanagariya prahari watta bauddhakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka diesapi syaamakumaara raai ghusasahita rumgehaata pakraau parekaa chhan
prahari adhikaariharule patakapataka unalaari sudhrina chetaawani dieko bhae pani unale rakama asuli chhaadekaa thienan antatah uni akhtiyaarako phandaamaa parekaa chhan

gaeraati pani mulapaanimaa unako sumraksanamaa chaldai aaeko juwaa akhadaamaa kaathamaadaum prahari parisarako tolile chhaapaa maareko thiyo so ghatanaamaa bhaagnekramamaa dui janaako marityu pani bhaeko thiyo

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale dasain tihaara ra chhathalaai laksita gardai wisesa suraksaa yojanaa laagu gareko chha chaadaparwako samayamaa hunasakne aparaadhika kriyaayaakalaapa badhna sakne bhandai praharile wisesa suraksaa yojanaa laagu gareko ho yo yojanaa bihibaarabaata laagu bhaeko kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka prabhuprasaada dhakaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

yojanaakaa laagi kula prahari parichaalana garieko chha jillaamaa raajamaarga ksetramaa parne mauwaakholaadekhi lotharasamma ra bhitri sadakamaa sameta gari prahari kaaryaalayabaata janaa parichaalana hunechhan

baimka tathaa wittiya sumsthaa ra suna chaandi pasalamaa lutapaata huna nadina janaa awaidha madiraa utpaadana bikri witarana niyantranakaa laagi janaa agalaagi tathaa wipadakaa ghatanaa niyantranakaa laagi janaa wibhinna sthaanamaa chekajaanchakaa laagi janaa tathaa paidala gasti chori jhaijhagadaa ra samaajamaa hune wikariti niyantranakaa laagi janaa prahari parichaalana garine prawaktaa dhakaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byurole nakkali arohana anumatipatra banaaune tina karmachaarilaai pakraau gari aja saarwajanika gareko chha
pakraauparnemaa sebhena samita treksa praalikaa kaanuna wibhaaga pramukha nibhesa kaarki bajaara wyawasthaapaka phurtenji serpaa ra lekhaapaala wijayaswara aryaala rahekaa chhan

sohi kirtepatrako chhaayaanprati sagaramaathaa pradusana niyantrana samiti solukhumbumaa pesa bhaekaamaa paryatana wibhaagabaata pani so arohana dalako samparka adhikaritakaa rupamaa khatiekaa karmachaarile paryatana wibhaagabaata bujhilieko sakkali arohanapatrako chhaayaanprati sagaramaathaa pradusana niyantrana samitimaa bujhaaepachhi wibhaagakaa karmachaari ra trekina ejensikaa karmachaarile bujhaaeko ekai miti ra ekai paramita num ko patramaa arohi sankhyaa pharaka bhaepachhi sobaare anusandhaana suru bhaeko thiyo

praharikaa anusaara ti dui widesi naagarikako paramita sulkabaapata hajaara ameriki dalara tinai janaale baandera lieko anusandhaanabaata khuleko chha praharile kaarkilaai thamela aryaalalaai mahaaraajaganja ra serpaalaai solukhumbubaata pakraau garieko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dolakhaale grantha bechabikhana garna khojeko aropamaa tina janaalaai pakraau gari aja saarwajanika gareko chha

pakraauparnemaa bhimeswara nagarapaalikaa kaa siwahari thaapaa teka thaami uddhawa gautama chhan chhaalaamaa lekhieko astahasrikaa prajnaa paramitaa granthabichakaa paanaasahita asoja gate pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dolakhaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka waasudewa paathakale jaanakaari dinubhayo grantha warsa puraano bhaeko ra tyasako mulya laakha hajaara parne pani upariksaka waasudewa paathakale jaanakaari dinubhayo

suna taskari ra sanama saakya hatyaa prakaranamaa pakraau parera chhutekaa nepaala praharikaa adhikaritako kaarabaahi phukuwaa bhaeko chha esaesapi diwesa lohani esapi wikaasaraaja khanaala ra diesapi prajita kesiko phukuwaa bhaeko ho

suna taskari ra sanama saakya hatyaako chhaanawina garna sahasachiwa iswararaaja paudela netaritwako samitiko siphaarisamaa gariha mantraalayale tinaijanaa prahari adhikaritalaai nilamwana gareko thiyo
kaathamaadaumko baalaajubaata paancha kilo suna praharile baraamada gareko chha

sunasahita eka janaa pakraau parekaa chhan tinapiple bhanne sthaanamaa chekajaancha gardaa somabaara beluki paancha kilo suna baraamada bhaeko kaathamaadaum prahari parisarakaa diesapi homendra bogatile jaanakaari die

rasuwaa keruna naakaa hudai kaathamaandau suna taskari bhairaheko chha bhanne wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahari parisarara kaathamaadauwaata wisesa prahari toli parichaalana gari tina piple waalaajumaa nigaraani tathaa emwusa toli khataaiekomaa miti gate andaaji wajeko samayamaa sumkaalaagi chekajaancha gardaa nijaharuko sarirawaata tukraa suna phelaa pareko hudaa nijalaaipakraau gari mahaanagariya prahari parisarawaata thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko

uhaanko mobaailasameta banda rahekaale aphuharu chintaamaa pareko pokharelakaa daaju parsuraamale bataaunubhayo samparkamaa nabhaekaa kaarana praharilaai khoji garna anurodha gareko uhaanle bataaunubhayo
widyaarthilaai apaharana gari hatyaa gareko aropamaa biraatanagara praharile dui janaalaai pakraau gari aja saarwajanika gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa wiraatanagara kaa warsiya mohammada saddima husena ra sohi sthaanakaa warsiya mohammada aripha alama rahekaa chhana gautamabuddha memoriyala widyaalaya raanimaa kaksaa maa adhyayanarata wiraatanagara kaa warsiya mohammada asphaakako apaharana gari hatyaa gareko aropamaa dubai janaalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaeko chha

prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale eka wijnapti jaari garera bista unakaa chhoraa kirana ra sthaaniya ayusako dienae pariksana praharile aphnai prayogasaalaamaa maatra nagarera siksaa wijnaana tathaa prawidhi mantraalaya maatahatako raastriya widhi wijnaana prayogasaalaamaa pani pariksana garieko prasta paareko ho

bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa kamala winaayaka basne warsiyaa premilaa saakyako gharako jhyaalako sisaa saphaa garne kramamaa khasera marityu bhaeko chha aphnai paanchatale gharako jhyaalako sisaa saphaa garne kramamaa khasera sanibaara marityu bhaeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

tyasaigari bhaktapurako madhyapurathimi nagarapaalikaa nagadesa basne saabitri sresthako chiyaa pasalamaa juwaataasa khelirahekaa janaalaai nagada ru hajaara sahita praharile sanibaara pakraau gareko chha juwaataasasahita praharile pakraau gareko sabailaai prahari waritta thimimaa raakhera thapa anusandhaana gariraheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
uniharu tinai janaako dienae riporta kanchanapura praharile saarwajanika garne tayaari gariraheko chha esapi bistamaathinirmalaa pantako hatyaamaa pramaana lukaaeko aropa chha
sindhupaalchokako paanchapokhari thaanpaala gaaunpaalikaa ki warsiyaa manamaayaa taamaanako sukrabaara raati hatyaa bhaeko chha

hatyaako kaarana ajhasamma khulaaieko chhaina abhiyukta waaibaalaai melamchisthita ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa lyaai anusandhaana suru garieko prahari niriksaka parasuraama mallale jaanakaari dinubhayo
kailaaliko tikaapura nagarapaalikaa satti bajaara najikako karnaali nadimaathi baneko pulamuni aja eka wyakti marita phelaa parekaa chhan

pulamuniko pilaramaa raheko jhyaanamaa adkiera paanimaa tairiraheko awasthaamaa andaaji warsiya eka wyakti marita phelaa parekaamaa maritakako sanaakhana huna naseko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tikaapurale janaaeko chha sawa tikaapura aspataalamaa raakhieko chha

kido wadaadasaim dipaawali ra chhatha parwako awasaramaa yasa jillaa antargatakaa saarwajanika sthaana saarwajanika sawaari saadhana niji awaasa byaapaarika sthala baimka tathaa wittiya sumsthaa sunachaandi pasala arthika kaarobaara hune sthaanaharumaa maanisaharuko chahala pahala wadhdai gairaheko sandarbhamaa sumbhaawita chori dakaiti lutapaata tathaa apaharana jastaa saanti suraksaasanga jodiekaa ghatanaalaai niyantrana gari ama naagarikaharumaa saanti suraksaako pratyaabhuti dilaauna sai ghantaa janastara samma sachetanaa kaaryakrama prahari gasti embusina cheka pwaainta piketa sarapraaija chekingako laagi yasa parisara tathaa maatahata prahari ikaaiharumaa kaaryarata maujudaa prahari janasakti tathaa saadhanasrotalaai adhikatama parichaalana gari bharapardo tathaa prabhaawakaari suraksaa wyawasthaa milaaunako laagi nimnaanusaarako suraksaa yojanaa tayaara garieko
mahatwapurna pratisthaana tathaa sarakaari kaaryaalako suraksaa diuti

tinajanaa ajhai nabhetiepachhi pidita pariwaarale khoja anusandhaana garna nepaala sarakaarasanga maaga garirahekaa chhan bhaaratasthita baharaaicha jillaako bairikhallaa bhanne jangalamaa chaara nepaali haraaekaamadhye haanle bhanne indabahaadura chaudhariko marita awasthaa saba phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaale janaaeko chha

jillaa bardiyaa raajaapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsa ko wirendrabahaadura saaha sohi sthaana basne warsa ko dibbu bhanne baalakarisna chaudhariwarsa ko gopaalachanda ra warsa warsako haanle bhanne indabahaadura thaaru maachhaa maarna bhani gharabaata niskiekomaa ghara napharkiekaale khojatalaasa gari paaun bhani aphantale ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya raajaapura bardiyaamaa niwedana pesa gardaa ekajanaa maritaka haanle bhanne indabahaadura chaudhariko sawa phelaa paari nepaala lyaaeko chha

ripota auna baanki raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaale janaaeko chha sohi niwedanakaa adhaaramaa prahari kaaryaalayale haraaekaa wyaktiko khojatalaasa gari bhaaratasthita baharaaicha jillaako bairikhallaa bhanne jangalamaa so maritaka wyaktiko sawa kaanuni prakriyaa puraa gari nepaala lyaauna prayaasa bhairaheko ra anya anusandhaana kaarya bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskimaa ayojita patrakaara sammelanamaa prahari pramukha omabahaadura raanaale anusandhaanakaa kramamaa niyantranamaa liiekaa paudelale ghatanaamaa aphu sumlagna raheko swikaara gareko jaanakaari dinubhayo

praharikaa anusaara somabaara raksi ra gaanjaale maatera ghara aundaa paudelale baatomaa sriyaalaai bhetepachhi surumaa chakaleta khaau bhani ru paancha die tyasapachhi punah ru dekhaai pralobhanamaa paari jabarjasti garna khoje sriyaale pratikaara garna khojepachhi ghaanti thiche ra jhaaditira phaalidie jhaadimaa ghaanti thichera balaatkaara gari dhungaale haani hatyaa gare sthaaniyawaasile aja wirodha yaalisahita jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya aghi dharnaa dindai hatyaaraalaai hadai sammako kaarawaahi garna maaga garekaa chhan

maanawa bechabikhana gareko abhiyogamaa kaathamaadaum tokhaa mahaadewataara haaita basne waagluna dhorapaatana nagarapaalikaa bobaangakaa warsiya wirabahaadura adailaai kaathamaadaum tokhaa nagarapaalikaa bhandaari tolabaata aitabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha
thapa kaanuni kaarabaahiko laagi jillaa adaalata kaathamaadaummaa pathaaieko chha

rasuwaa keruna naakaa hudai kaathamaadaum suna taskari bhairaheko chha bhanne suchanaako adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaumbaata khatieko prahari tolile tokhaa rodako saaiwaawaa chokamaa waa pa nambarako palsara motarasaaikalamaa sawaara uniharulaai jaancha gardaa tukraamaa raheko ukta parimaanako sunasahita pakraau gareko ho

jhaapaako haldibaari gaaunpaalikaamaa chaara warsiyaa baalikaa balaatkarita bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa anusaara haldibaari jalathalaki baalikaalaai sohi wadaakaa warsiya yuwakale balaatkaara gareko prahariko praarambhika anusandhaanale dekhaaeko chha

baalikaa balaatkaara gareko ujurikaa adhaaramaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale abhiyukta yuwakalaai pakraau garisakeko prahari naayaba upariksaka tathaa prawaktaa jitendrakumaara basnetale jaanakaari dinubhayo baalikaa ra yuwakako ghara sangasangai rahekaale yuwakako naama khulaauna namilne prawaktaa basnetale bataaunubhayo

aparaahna ghara pharkieki baalikaako yonimaa ragata dekhepachhi pariwaarale praharimaa ujuri diekaa thie sohi ujurikaa adhaaramaa praharile aitabaara raati nai yuwakalaai pakraau gari ghatanaako anusandhaana bhairaheko prawaktaa basnetale bataaunubhayo yasaaghi gata saauna gate jhaapaakai arjunadhaaraa nagarapaalikaa wadaa num maa chhimeki warsiya yuwakale chaara warsiyaa baalikaalaai balaatkaara garekaa thie
syaanajaamaa praharile aphnai chyaapumaa goli prahaara gari atmahatyaa garekaa chhan
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya syaanjaakaa anusaara kaaraagaara suraksaa gaardamaa kaaryarata nawalaparaasi winayi triwenaikaa prahari jawaana jitendra thaapaa magarale aphaimlaai goli haanekaa hun
aphnai nawajaata sisuko hatyaa abhiyogamaa nuwaakota praharile suryagadhi gaanupaalikaa lachyaanaki samjhanaa taamaanalaai pakraau gareko chha
sanibaara sisu janmaaera hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa warsiyaa taamaanalaai niyantranamaa lieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka muktinaatha saapakotaale jaanakaari dinubhayo
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha wasanta kunwarakaa anusaara ghatanaamaa sumlagna rahekaa parapurusako pani pahichaana bhaisakekaale unalaai pakraau garna prahari parichaalana garieko chha

sisuko sawa pariksanako laagi jillaa aspataala trisulimaa lyaaieko chha pakraau pareki mahilaako srimaana wijaya taamaana rojagaariko silasilaamaa mahinaa saaudi basera eka mahinaaaghimaatra nepaala pharkiekaa thie
amerikaako merilyaanda raajyamaa bhaeko goli kaandamaa eka nepaali cheliko hatyaa bhaeko chha bhane arkaa eka nepaali ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
suklaaphaantaa nagarapaalikaa raanipuramaa eka samuhale kanchatamaa pestola dekhaaera eka dampattilaai kutapita garnukaa saathai jyaana maarne dhamki dieko chha

kaarkile nyaayakaa laagi asthaayi prahari posta wanasaahamaa ujuri diekaa chhan asthaayi prahari chauki wanasaahaakaa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka sankara bhattale winoda saaudako samuhako khoji bhairaheko ra khoji gari chhaanabina garine wataaunubhayo sahaayaka niriksaka bhattale saaudako khojatalaasa gariraheko bataaunubhayo

sunasariko harinagara gaaunpaalikaa ra maa aja bhaeko goli prahaarabaata sohi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya maulaanaa khursida ansaariko marityu bhaekochha bhaaratiya bajaarabaata nambara pleta nabhaeko motarasaaikalamaa dui janaa sawaara rahekaa ajnaata samuhale goli chalaaeko sunasari praharile janaaeko chha bajaara ghumaphira garnakaa laagi niskekaa belaa ansaarimaathi ajnaata samuhale goli prahaara gardaa uhaanko taauko ra chhaatimaa goli laagera ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho

tyasaigari harinagara gaaunpaalikaa ghuski praharichaukimaa kaaryarata prahari hawaldaara siwalaala paudelamaathisameta goli prahaara bhaeko sthaaniyale bataaekaa chhan bhutaahaa bajaara ksetramaa goli prahaara garera bhaagi rahekaa belaa praharile baato chhekna khojdaa praharimaathi sameta goli prahaara gareko ho paudelalaai khuttaa ra kokhamaa goli laageko bataaieko chha

ghaaite bhaekaa prahari hawaldaaralaai upachaarakaa laagi wiraatanagara lagieko praharile janaaeko chha yataa sunasarikaa prahari upariksaka raajana adhikaarile goli prahaara bhaeko ra ghatanaako wisayamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko bataaunubhayo

warsiyaa yuwatilaai jawarajasti karanai gareko abhiyogamaa janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha pakraau parneharumaa nuwaakota raalukaadewi gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai kalumki basne warsiya arjuna laamaa kaathamaadaum naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa majuwaa basne warsiya surya raanaa ra bhimadhungaa narsarimaa hotala sumchaalana garne warsiya raamakarisna nagarakoti rahekaa chhan
naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa hasanataara basne warsiyaa mahilaalaai uniharule lalaai phakaai nagarakotile sumchaalana gareko hotalamaa jawarajasti karanai gareko bataaieko chha
bachchaa janmaai phaaleko abhiyogamaa dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa naaraayana choka deraa gari basne inaruwaa dumraahaa ghara bataaune warsiyaa asmitaa chaudharilaai praharile pakraau gareko chha
awiwaahitaa chaudharile purusa jaatako sisu janmaai ukta sthaanamaa phaaleko khulna aepachhi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dharaanabaata khatieko prahari tolile unalaai pakraau gareko ho

netrawikrama chanda wiplawa netaritwako nepaala kamyunista paarti rolpaa jillaa sekretari santosa suwedilaai praharile prakraau gareko chha rolpaa nagarapaalikaa dhawaanako saaunepaanimaa so paartile ayojanaa gareko saamskaritika kaaryakramamaa upasthita rahekaa suwedilaai praharile pakraau gareko ho

paartiko tina mahine abhiyaanaantargata dhawaanamaa saamskaritika kaaryakrama bhairahekaa belaa praharile suwedilaai pakraau gareko bataaieko chha kaaryakramamaa so paartikaa anya netaa kaaryakartaako sameta upasthiti rahepani suwedi maatrai pakraau pareko suraksaa srotale janaaeko chha

sangathana sudaridhikarana tathaa wistaara abhiyaanamaa laageko so paartikaa netaa kaaryakartaa ahile sadaramukaama chhaadera gaaunmai kendrita huna thaalekaa chhan pratinidhisabhaa nirwaachanakaa kramamaa yasaaghi pani laamo samaya hiraasatamaa basera rihaa bhaekaa suwedi punah pakraau parekaa hun
praharimaa jaagira lagaaidinchhu bhandai thagi garne eka bhupu prahari prahariko phandaamaa parekaa chhan
daana jillaako ghoraahi bajaaramaa metro siti sekyuriti kampani sanchaalana gardai airahekaa bhutapurwa prahari kaalibahaadura laamaalaai prakraau gari aja saarwajanika garieko ho

dolakhaa bhimeswara nagarapaalikaa charikota ghara bhai kaathamaadaun pepsikholaa basdai aekaa warsiya laamaalaai kaathamaadaunbaata daana praharisahita siaibiko tolile pakraau gareko ho abhiyukta laamaale kariba janaasanga janahi ru dui laakha hajaarasamma lieko khulna aeko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa prahari pramukha karisnahari sarmaakaa anusaara salyaana saaradaa nagarapaalikaa wadaakholaakaa warsiya bhimasena bhandaarile praharimaa ujuri diepachhi abhiyukta laamaale gareko gatiwidhi khulna aeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanale hatiyaarasahita eka wyaktilaai pakraau gareko chha yusae lekhieko atometika pestolasahita ghoraahi badaharaakaa warsiya wirabahaadura chaudharilaai pakraau gari aja saarwajanika gareko chha

jillaa prahari pramukha karisnahari sarmaakaaanusaara abhiyukta chaudharilaai ghoraahi bajaara ksetrabhitra parne buddhi gyaarejabaata pakraau gareko ho wisesa suchanaako adhaaramaa chaudharilaai bajaarabhitrai bheti ritapurwaka sarira khaanatalaasi gardaa paaintako beltamaa lukaaichhipaai raakheko atometika pestola bhetieko ho prahari pramukha sarmaale bhannubhayo pestolasangai eka thaana myaagjina ra chaara raaunda golisameta phelaa paareko chha
pratibandhita garieko bhaaratiya notasahita kanchanapurako belauri nagarapaalikaa pachui khapte naalaabaata praharile bhaaratiya naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parekaa bhaaratiya naagarika simhalaai jaancha gardaa bhaaratiya pratibandhita garieko ru darako nota ru dui laakha baraamada garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka karisnaraaja ojhaale bataaunubhayo

pakraau parekaa simhalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belauriko hiraasatamaa raakhi awasyaka anusandhaanako kaarya bhairaheko chha simha nakkali notako kaarowaaramaa sameta sumlagna rahandai aeko bataaieko chha
aitabaara bihaana kaarena raajyako haaana kaaraagaarakaa kaidiharule eutaa traka niyantranamaa lii jelako dhokaa phodera bhaageko adhikaariharule bataaekaa chhan
kaarena raajyakaa prahari pramukha auna myaata moile jelabaata janaa kaidiharu bhaageko jaanakaari dinubhayo tina janaalaai bhane punah prakraau garna saphala bhaeko pani uhaanle bataaunubhayo
gariha mantraalayale siaibiko tolikaa tinasahita paancha prahari adhikaarilaai nilambana garna nirdesana diepachhi nayaan siraabaata anusandhaana garna samitimaa diaiji pathaaieko ho
yasaaghi kanchanapurakaa tatkaalina prahari pramukha esapi dilliraaja bista nilambanamaa parisakekaa chhan
upatyakaamaa katai chori dakaiti durghatanaajastaa aparaadhika kriyaakalaapa ta bhaeko chhaina yadi bhaeko chha bhane tatkaala praharilaai khabara garnuhos

ghatanaa bhaeko paanchadekhi minetamaa prahariko toli ghatanaasthalamaa pugera ghatanaako anusandhaana garne ra dosilaai kaarawaahiko daayaraamaa lyaaune prayaasa thaalieko chha mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya raanipokharimaa yastaa ghatanaasambandhi dainika dui hajaara badhi phona aune gareko chha

kaaryaalayakaa anusaara upatyakaamaa hune jhaijhagadaa kutapita chori dakaitijastaa ghatanaabaare jaanakaari dina yastaa phona aune gareko ho jhandai laakha janasankhyaa bhaeko upatyakaakaa kaathamaadaun bhaktapura ra lalitapurabaata mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya raanipokharimaa rahekaa wataa phona laainamaa yastaa gunaasaa aune gareko chha

kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa ewum prahari waristha upariksaka pradyumnakumaara kaarki pachhillo samaya prahariprati janataako wiswaasa badhera gaeko bataaunuhunchha dainika dui hajaara kala mahaanagariya kaaryaalayamaa maatra aune ho tyasakaa alaawaa prawaktaa parisara pramukha waritta pramukha ra prabhaagakaa pramukhalaai sameta phona aune gareko chhauhaan bhannuhunchha

kaaryaalayamaa aune phonamadhye jhaijhagadaa ra durghatanaakaa badhi chha upatyakaakaa sabai parisara waritta prabhaaga ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa aune kala jodne ho bhane dainika tina hajaarabhandaa badhi huna jaane ra gopya raakhnuparne suchanaa bhane prawaktaa ra prahari kaaryaalayamaa aune gareko prawaktaa kaarkiko bhanaai chha

mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalayale upatyakaako saanti suraksaalaai majabuta banaaunakaa laagi tokieko posaaka ra saadaa posaakakaa prahari thaaunthaaunmaa siarabi ra kyuarati bhyaana motarasaaikala saaikalasahitakaa prahari khataaieko chha kaaryaalayaantargata haala hajaarabhandaa badhi prahari kaaryarata chhan

kaaryaalaya maatahatamaa haala upatyakaamaa antarraastriya wimaanasthala suraksaa gaarda traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaa kaathamaadaun bhaktapura lalitapurakaa mahaanagariya prahari parisara mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaa maanawa wyawasthaapana mahaasaakhaa saanti suraksaa mahaasaakhaa wisesa suraksaa mahaasaakhaa nepaala prahari widyaalaya paryataka prahari ra tyasaantargatakaa wibhinna waritta prabhaaga bita ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sanchaalanamaa chhan

yastai traaphika durghatanaasambandhi jaanakaari dina mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaamaa chhuttai laainako wyawasthaa garieko chha upatyakaako junasukai thaaunmaa durghatanaa bhae pani hatalaainamaa khabara garepachhi tatkaala traaphika prahari pugera ghatanaabaare jaanakaari linchha

dainika badhdo sawaari chaapa ra durghatanaabaare jaanakaari linakaa laagi mahaasaakhaamaa numkaa atha hatalaainako wyawasthaa garieko chha mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha ewum prahari waristha upariksaka wasantakumaara panta upatyakaamaa hune sawaari chaapa durghatanaa tyaaksi thagilagaayata samasyaa samaadhaanakaa laagi yaatrukaa laagi sahayogi bhaeko bataaunuhunchha yasaigari upatyakaako traaphika wyawasthaapanabaare jaanakaari lina traaphika epsako sameta wyawasthaa garieko chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale sewaagraahisanga ghusa lieko abhiyogamaa pakraau parekaa nepaala widyut praadhikarana bharatapura witarana kendra chitawanakaa kaaryaalaya sahayogi karisnabahaadura suwediwiruddha aja wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha
gariha mantraalayale gathana gareko chhaanabina samitile ti prahari adhikaariko bhumikaasameta sumkaaspada gareko bataaepachhi uniharulaai nilambana garieko ho
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale janaa praharilaai niyantranamaa lieko chha koteswara ra kaandaaghaari prabhaagakaa janaa prahari ghusa sahita pakraau pareko akhtiyaarale janaaeko chha

pakraau parnemaa asai hawaldaara ra sipaahi rahekaa chhan baaluwaa khaani sumchaalakasanga rakama liera uniharule kaama garne gareko praarambhika anusandhaanabaata khuleko chha yasa wisayamaa thapa wiwarana auna baanki chha
kanchanapura punarwaasa nagarapaalikaa kaa beludewi bistakaa nau mahine chhori saraswatilaai chorieko saata ghantaapachhi praharile phelaa paareko chha
sohi nagarapaalikaa ka gaanumaa tija manaauna maaiti aekaa belaa amaasanmgai raati suteki saraswatilaai ajnaata mahilaale madhyaraati bajeko samayamaa chorera lagekaa hun

sisu chori bhaeko khabara paaunaasaatha sthaaniya baasindaale tatkaala praharilaai khabara garekaa thie prahari ra sthaaniya baasindaale khojatalaasa gardaa aja bihaana baje maaiti gharabhandaa dedha kilomitara taadhaa dhaana khetamaa rundai gareko awasthaamaa baalikaa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prahari upariksaka kuwera kadaayatale bataaunubhayo
nagarapaalikaakaa nagara pramukha jiwana thaapaasahitako upasthitimaa sisulaai uhaankaa aphantakomaa jimmaa lagaaekaa chhaum uhaanle bhannubhayo

sisuko sariramaa sasaanaa phokaa dekhaa parepachhi upachaarakaa laagi unalaai seti anchala aspataalamaa pathaaieko ra tyahaanbaata sisulaai baala kaanti aspataala kaathamaadaunmaa lagne kuraa bujhieko prahari upariksaka kadaayatale bataaunubhayo

aphulaai jabarjasti garna khojepachhi naataale naatini parne warsiyaa kisorile haaneko radale laagera raamechhaapa nagarapaalikaa mudhaajora rajagaaunkaa warsiya purnabahaadura sresthako jyaana gaeko ho
ghatanaamaa prayoga bhaeko radasahita kisorile kariba baje prahari chauki raamechhaapamaa hatyaako baaremaa jaanakaari garaai atmasamarpanasameta gareko pani praharile janaaeko chha
pakraau parnemaa mahottari saandhaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya windeswara saaha raheko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarimaa aja ayojita patrakaara sammelanamaa uhaanlaai saarwajanika gareko ho

raajawiraaja nagarapaalikaakaa kaa raajakumaara yaadawale dieko ujurikaa adhaaramaa suksma anusandhaana pachhi saahalaai pakraau gareko saptarikaa prahari upariksaka raajendra wistale jaanakaari dinubhayo

bhaaratiya prahari ra parsaa praharisanga samparkamai rahekaa belaa windeswaralaai achaanaka wiraganjamaa dekhaaparepachhi unalaai sohi sthaanamaa gheraa haalera pakraau gari saptari lyaaieko prahari upariksaka wistale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parekaa saahasanga bhaaratiya adhaara kaarda ra jillaa wana kaaryaalaya sarlaahimaa renjara padamaa kaaryarata raheko nakkali parichaya patrasameta phelaa pareko pani uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo
karanai sambandhi kasurako jabarajasti karanai muddaamaa myaada thapa gari awasyaka anusandhaanako laagi unalaai mahaanagariya prahari waritta thimi bhaktapuramaa raakhieko chha
basapaarkamaa yaatrulaai jathaabhaawi taanera saasti dine saata janaalaai aja surkheta praharile pakraau gareko chha

aphno nischita gantawya taya gari araamadaayi yaatraako sochakaa saatha aune yaatrulaai asahaja waataawarana sirjanaa garne garekaale aja saata janaalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetakaa prawaktaa syaamasimha chaudharile jaanakaari dinubhayo pakraau parnemaa kaalikota khaandaachakra nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya arjuna malla surkhetako gurbhaakota nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya mahesa somaimagara ra wirendranagara nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya chakrabahaadura saahi rahekaa chhan

tyasaigari jumlaa dugrikaa warsiya ramesa saahi ra achhaamako turmakhaanda gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya namaraaja nyaupaane wirendranagara kaa warsiya nakendra khatri ra warsiya sandipa pariyaaralaai yaatrulaai jabarjasti gaadimaa chadhaauna kramamaa niyantranamaa liieko prawaktaa chaudharile bataaunubhayo gaadimaa chadhaauna sarwasaadhaaranalaai jabarjasti taanne ra naaune yaatrulaai abhadra wyawahaara garne wibhinna yaataayaatakaa karmachaarilaai niyantranamaa liieko prawaktaa chaudharile bataaunubhayo

paschima nawalaparaasiko sunawala nagarapaalikaasthita eka saamudaayika widyaalayakaa siksakale widyaarthimaathi gareko duwryawahaarasahita haatapaata gareko ghatanaabaare satyatathya pattaa lagaauna chhaanawina samiti banaauna maaga garieko chha

widyaarthile dosi siksakadwayalaai kaarabaahiko maaga raakhdai sunawala nagarapaalikaa ra siksaa wikaasa tathaa samanwaya ekaai paschima nawalaparaasiko paraasisthita kaaryaalayamaa niwedana dartaa garaaisakekaa chhan

balaatkarita bhai garbhawati bhaeki baansagadhi nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa baalikaalaai balaatkaara garne wyakti ko ra kahaanko ho bhannebaare jaanakaari napaaundaa ra kaanuni kaarwaahikaa laagi kitaani jaaheri dina samasyaa pareko chha

baalikaaki amaakaa anusaara uni gata waisaakha mahinaadekhi mahinaawaari bhaeki chhainan chhoriko kina mahinaawaari bhaena bhanne baaremaa socheko tara aru kehi kaaranale nabhaeko holaa bhanera saamaanyarupamaa lie pani chhoriko sarira pariwartana bhaeko dekhepachhi bhane ke kaaranale yasto bhaeko bhanne najikaiko swaasthya chauki swaasthya pariksana garna gaepachhi maatrai chhoriko petamaa bachchaa raheko thaahaa paaeko baalikaaki amaale bataain

swaasthya chaukile kati mahinaako garbha chha bhanne baaremaa kehi nabhani dindaa thapa samasyaamaa parekaa chhan baalikaako petamaa kariba paancha mahinaa arthaat haptaako garbha bhaisakeko chha yadi garbhapatana garaauna khojeko khandamaa pani kaanunale haptaako garbhalaai maatrai garbhapatana garne kaanuni maanyataa dieko chha

ghatanaakaa baaremaa thaahaa bhaeko ra pidita baalikaa ra pariwaaralaai nyaayakaa laagi pahala garna khoje pani baalikaale aphulaai balaatkaara garne wyakti ra sthaanakaa baarekaa yakina rupamaa bhanna nasakeko tara prayaasa jaari raakheko baansagadhi nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa dasaratha chaudharile bataanubhayo

baalikaa balaatkarita bhai garbhawati bhaeko ghatanaako wisayamaa aphno dhyaanaakasarna bhaeko bataaundai samasyaa saamaadhaana ra prahari ra jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya bardiyaamaa samanwaya ra pahala prakriyaa agaadi badhaaeko baansagadhi nagarapaalikaaki upapramukha tathaa nyaayika samitiki sumyojaka susmaa chaudharile bataanubhayo

nimitta prajia tathaa suchanaa adhikaari mahendrajanga saahile pidita baalikaa ra abhibhaawakale ghatanaakaa sambandhamaa niwedana liera ae aphno tahabaata anya sambandhita nikaayamaa patraachaara garne bataaunubhayo
sangathanako wyaawasaayika maryaadaa wiparita acharana garne janaalaai praharilaai kaarawaahi garieko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaale antarika suddhikarana abhiyaanaanrtagata prahari sangathanako wyaawasaayika maryaadaa wiparita acharana garne janaalaai kaarawaahi garieko janaaeko chha

kaarawaahi parnemaa prahari niriksaka eka prahari sahaayaka niriksaka tina prahari habaldaara eka ra prahari jawaana eka janaa raheko bardiyaakaa prahari upariksaka surendraprasaada mainaalile jaanakaari dinubhayo

jillaako saantisuraksaasahita antarika suddhikarana aphno pahilo praathamikataamaa raheko ullekha gardai uhaanle laaguausadha niyantrana tathaa maanawa bechabikhana mahilaa himsaa laingika himsaa atmahatyaa bahuwiwaaha gharelu himsaajastaa ghatanaako nyunikaranakaa laagi janachetanaamulaka kaaryakramalaai abhiyaanako rupamaa sanchaalana gariraheko bataaunubhayo
naagarika maitri prahari sewaaprati aphu sadaiwa samarpita rahekomaa pani prahari upariksaka mainaalile joda dinubhayo
jhaapaako kamala gaaunpaalikaa mangalabaarekaa warsiya kapadaa wyaapaari khemaraaja paudela gauriganjamaa marita phelaa parnubhaeko chha

gauriganja wadaa num baahasuddisthita winoda yaadawako dhaanakheta najika naalaamaa aja bihaana uhaanko sawa phelaa pareko gauriganja ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka tekendra paudelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

praharile budhaanilakantha nagarapaalikaa kaa chandanakarisna kaayasthako jaggaa kirte gari arkai wyaktiko naamasaarimaa sumlagna maalapota kaaryaalaya chaabahilakaa karmachaarisahita nau janaalaai aja pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parekaa nau janaalaai likhatasambandhi kasura ra sangathita aparaadha muddaamaa jillaa adaalatabaata saata dinako myaada thapa gari anusandhaana bhairaheko upariksaka laamaale bataaunubhayo
balaatkaarapachhi hatyaa garieki kanchanapurako bhimadattanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiyaa nirmalaa pantako anusandhaanakaa laagi hiraasatamaa liiekaa tina janaa rihaa bhaekaa chhan

praharile hiraasatamaa liekaa dilipa bistalaai ra rosani bamalaai saadhaarana taarekhamaa chhaadieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka karisnaraaja ojhaale bataaunubhayo babitaa bamalaai bhane ru hajaara dharautimaa chhaadieko chha

bistako dienaesameta myaacha nabhaepachhi ra pramaana nabhetiekaale saadhaarana taarekhamaa chhaadieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prahari upariksaka kuwera kadaayatale bataaunubhayo hatyaako anusandhaana bhane jaari raheko uhaanle bataaunubhayo
aidile paancha warsiyaa chhori rabinaako hatyaa gareko prahari naayaba upariksaka saagara bohoraale jaanakaari dinubhayo hatyaa garne baabu dhanabahaaduralaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
maritaka rabinaako sawapariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala maartadi lyaauna laagieko prahari naayaba upariksaka saagara bohoraale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pakraau parne madhya sarlaahi iswarapura nagarapaalikaa sthita haripurwaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya waahaajula amsaari chhan amsaarile bhadau gate sohi thaaun basne warsiyaa mahilaalaai jawarajasti karanai gareko bhandai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kesaragumjamaa ujuri parepachhi unalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho

jawarajasti karanai gareko abhiyogamaa kaabhre banepaa nagarapaalikaa chaaradobaatosthita jaya mahaakaali swita enda chaata haausamaa kaama garne raamechhaapa bethaana ghara bhaekaa warsiya arjuna bhanne wibeka khatrilaai somabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

sohi chaata haausamaa kaama garne baaraaki warsiyaa mahilaalaai bharyaana muni dhaaka dhamki dii jabarajasti karanai gareko bhandai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaamaa ujuri parepachhi praharile khatrilaai pakraau gareko ho

pakraau parneharumaa kaabhre timaala kaa warsiya bijayadona laamaa dilli titi balajitanagara basne warsiya bitu gautama kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya anuja nakarmibhaaratako dilli omabihaara basne warsiya bikaasa gosaai ra bhaarata kharipaai haausa bhodaarikanti chaalakudi basne warsiya jintujoe rahekaa chhan
uniharubaata ata ard eader achine thaana achine thaana achine thaana lyaapatapa thaana nakkali dewidakreditakaarda saya thaana ra mowaaila thaana praharile baraamada gareko chha

wibhinna desakaa wyaktiharuko kaardako daataa hyaaka gari nepaalakaa wibhinna waikaharumaa kholiekaa khaataa maarphata upalawdha garaaieko ata ard eader achine ra achine mesina prayoga gari rakama nikaali raheko chha bhanne wisesa suchanaa parisara kaathamaadaum praapta hundaa saatha tatkaala wisesa toli parichaalana gari khoja talaasa gardaa miti gate samaya wihaana wajeko samayamaa thamela sumchayakosa agaadi raheko hotala waata pakraau gari parisara kaathamaadaumwaata thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko

gata asaara gate warsiyaa kisorilaai jabarjasti karanai gari bhaagekaa abhiyukta taadi gaaunpaalikaa urlenikaa winoda taamaanalaai kaathamaadaumnko bharikutimandapa ksetrabaata gae raati pakraau gari lyaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka bhimalaala bhattaraaile jaanakaari dinubhayo

taamaanawiruddha pidita paksale gata asaara gate jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa ujuri dartaa garaaeko thiyo pakraau parekaa taamaanamaathi jabarjasti karanai muddaamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
nepaala prahari kendriya anusandhaana byurole jaapaanamaa sarakaari kotaamaa karisisambandhi kaamamaa pathaaidine bhandai ru eka karoda laakha hajaara thagi garne eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

byurokaa prawaktaa ewum prahari upariksaka saanuraama bhattaraaile janaasanga pratiwyakti ru saata laakhadekhi laakhasamma thagi gareko anusandhaanamaa khulna aeko jaanakaari dinubhayo danuwaaralaai thapa anusandhaanakaa laagi kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalata bujhaaeko chha

sohi muddaamaa piditako ujurikaa adhaaramaa byurole nuwaakotakaa warsiya saritaa guruna ra udayapurakaa warsiya laalamanai danuwaaralaai yasaaghi nai pakraau gareko thiyo anusandhaanapaschaata thagi muddaamaa kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatako adesale ru laakha dharauti maaga garekaamaa guruna tirna nasaki kaaraagaara chalaana bhaeki thiin bhane danuwaara dharauti raakhera taarikhamaa chhutekaa thie
nepaala taruna dala rolpaa nagarapaalikaa sabhaapati rohita punako hatyaaraalaai kaanuni daayaraamaa nalyaaesamma nepaali kaangresa rolpaale andolanalaai nirantarataa dine bhaeko chha
jhandai tina warsaaghi bhaeko tikaapura ghatanaasanga sambandhita muddaakaa saaksiharuko kailaali jillaa adaalatamaa bakapatra line kaama ajabaata suru bhaeko chha

kailaali jillaa adaalatakaa nyaayadhisa parsuraama bhattaraaiko ijalaasamaa tikaapura ghatanaako muddaako sunuwaai prakriyaa aghi badheko ho adaalatamaa ukta muddaako sunuwaai prakriyaa suru bhaepachhi sarwasaadhaaranako chaasosameta badheko chha

ghatanaakaa abhiyuktamadhya janaa purpaksakaa laagi kailaali kaaraagaaramaa rahekomaa eka janaaresamalaala chaudhari kendriya kaaraagaaramaa rahekaa chhan abhiyuktakaa asrita dui baalakalaai pokharaako baala sudhaara garihamaa raakhieko chha
rolpaako sulichauramaa goli chaldaa simalawaanakaa warsakaa rohita punako marityu bhaeko chha
uni liwaana nagarasamitikaa nepaala taruna dalakaa adhyaksa hun
rolpaa nagarapaalikaa dhabaanakaa dewawahaadura ghartiko saathabaata ekathaana katuwaa pestola baraamada bhaeko chha apasi wiwaada hudaan goli chaleko praarambhika anusandhaanabaata khuleko chha

ilaama sadaramukaamamaa tina wataa bama phelaa pareko chha ilaama nagarapaalikaa naaraayanasthaana najikai tatkaalina nekapaa maaowaadi kendra ilaamako paarti kaaryaalaya najikai so bama phelaa pareko ho

paarti kaaryaalayamaa puraano duiwataa saketa bama ra eutaa sutali bama bhetieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamale jaanakaari dieko chha bama bhetieko sthaanamaa praharile suraksaa diiraheko ra niskriya garne kaama bhairaheko bataaieko chha gasti garne kramamaa sankaaspada wastu dekhiepachhi jaancha gardaa bama bhaeko pusti bhaeko ho

wiplawa netaritwako nepaala kamyunista paartikaa prawaktaa khadgabahaadura wiswakarmaalaai daanako adaalatamaa upasthita garaaieko chha sukrabaara belukaa daana lyaaiekaa wiswakarmaalaai aja diunso adaalatamaa upasthita garaaera atha dinako myaada thapa garieko chha
myaada thapapachhi uhaanlaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamai thunaamaa raakhieko chha gata mansiramaa tulasipuramaa bhaeko bama kaandamaa uhaan muchhieko aropa chha

pradesa ra sanghako nirwaachanakaa kramamaa mansira gate nepaali kaangresakaa sabhaapati serabahaadura deuwaa sahabhaagi nirwaachanasabhaalaai laksita gari bama wisphota bhaeko thiyo sabhaasthalabaata mitarako durimaa bhaeko wisphotamaa warsiya myaadi prahari winoda chaudhariko marityu bhaeko thiyo

pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa kaalikaa ghara bhaeki warsiyaa karisnakumaari bajagaaim ra pokharaa beganaasa ghara bhaeki warsiyaa jamunaa kandelako dungaa durghatanaamaa pari marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sisuwaakaa prahari niriksaka kirana raawatale jaanakaari dinubhayo

bajagaaimko lekhanaatha saamudaayika laayansa aspataala ra kandelako pokharaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaanamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho dungaa gantawyamaa pugnu bhandaa kariba dui saya mitara wara nai durghatanaagrasta bhaeko ho

dungaamaa nau janaa sawaara rahekaa thie dui janaa sakusala raheko praharile janaaeko chha bepattaa hunemaa nawalaparaasiko gaindaakota ghara bhaekaa warsiya rawi khanaala unakai chhoraa saata warsiya sankara ra atha warsiya siwa khanaala paancha warsiya praachina paudela ra warsiyaa manisaa bajagaaim raheki chhan khanaala nepaali senaamaa kaaryarata rahekaa thie

ghatanaasthalamaa suraksaakarmi sasastra prahari bala sthaaniyasangai gotaakhora parichaalita bhaekoe iprakaa sisuwaakaa prahari niriksaka raawatale jaanarakaari dinubhayo bepattaako khoji tiwra paarieko praharile janaaekochha
dumgaamaa eklai gaekaa kamala kandela taalamaa dumgaa paltieko dekhepachhi behosa bhaekaa thie uni pani taalamaa khasepachhi unako uddhaara garieko thiyo unako awasthaa samaanya raheko chha

chumanuwri gaaunpaalikaa sthita sirdibaasamaa chekajaanchakaa kramamaa uniharulaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gorakhaakaa prahari pramukha prahari upariksaka bimala basnetale jaanakaari dinubhayo
yasaigari dhanusaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita raamaanandachokamaa mahottari mathihaani gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya sumtosa kumaara saaha marita awasthaamaa phelaa parekaa hun
