prahari mahaaniriksaka sarwendra khanaalale kanchanapurako nirmalaa hatyaa prakaranamaa josukai aparaadhi bhae pani unmukti namilne bataaunubhaeko chha ajadekhi bhimadattanagarabaata praarambha huna laageko mahilaa himsaa nyunikarana ewum maanawaadhikaara sumraksanasambandhi raastriya abhiyaana kaaryakramamaa sahabhaagi huna yahaan aipugnubhaekaa prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale raasasasangako kuraakaanimaa aparaadhilaai kaanuni daayaraamaa lyaaerai chhaadne bataaunubhayo

so kramamaa raastriya maanawaadhikaara ayogasita nepaala praharile samanwaya garera ajabaata suruwaata huna gairaheko mahilaa himsaa nyunikarana ewum maanawaadhikaara sumraksanasambandhi raastriya abhiyaanale aparaadha niyantranamaa bala pugne uhaanle dhaaranaa raakhnubhayo abhiyaanaanrtagata adhikaarakarmi naagarika samaajalagaayata sabai saamaajika sanghasumsthaasita samanwaya garera aghi badhchhaun prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalale bhannubhayo nyaayamaa pahuncha badhaauna sameta abhiyaana laabhadaayaka hunechha

mahilaamaathi hune himsaalagaayata kunai pani aparaadhajanya kaaryako niyantrana ewum nyunikaranamaa prahari sakriyataakaa saatha laageko uhaanko bhanaai thiyo bihibaara saanjha bhimadattanagara aipugnubhaekaa mahaaniriksaka khanaalale raati nai nirmalaa pantakaa pariwaarasanga bhetaghaata ra ghatanaasthalako sameta sthalagata niriksana garnubhaeko thiyo prahari mahaaniriksaka khanaalasangai raastriya anusandhaana wibhaagakaa pramukha dilipa regmi pani bhimadattanagara aunubhaeko chha
prahari mahaaniriksaka sarwendra khanaalale kumchanapuraki nirmalaa pantaki aamaabaabulaai bhetekaa chhan

aparaadhi pakraau garna samaya laagchha khanaalale bhane dhairya garnus ghatanaako anusandhaana garna esaesapiko toli khatieko bhandai nepaala praharimaathi wiswaasa raakhna khanaalale agraha garekaa chhan

sankaaspada jholaa dekhepachhi sthaaniya baasindaale praharilaai khabara garekaa thie charesa kasale raakhyo bhannebaaremaa anusandhaana bhairaheko bhimagithe prahari chaukikaa inchaarja prahari naayaba niriksaka bhojabahaadura baaniyaanle bataaunubhayo

saaudi arabakaa sarakaari kaanuni adhikaarile saaudi arabamaa san maa pakraau gariekaa musalamaana dharmaguru sekha salamaana alaawadaawiruddhako muddaamaa mangalabaara sunuwaai gardai uhaanlaai marityudanda dinuparne bataaekaa yahaankaa sanchaaramaadhyamale janaaekaa chhan

raajaapura nagarapaalikaam basne warsiya haanle bhanne indabahaadura chaudhariko sawa phelaa paari nepaala lyaaepani tina janaa ajhai bepattaa chhan bepattaakaa aphantale khoji garidina agraha gardai aekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya wardiyaakaa anusaara yahi bhadau gate saanjhadekhi haraaekaa bardiyaa raajaapura nagarapaalikaam basne warsa kaa wirendrabahaadura saaha sohi thaaun basne warsa kaa dibbu bhanne baalakarisna chaudhari ra sohie thaaun basne warsa kaa gopaala chandako joji kaarya jaari chha
bepattaa eka janaa marita bhetie anya tina janaako khoji kaarya jaari raakhieko raajaapura prahari kaaryaalayakaa naayaba upariksaka tikaa bhaaratile jaanakaari dinubhayo

phonabaata gaaligalauja gardai jyaana maarne dhamki dii traasa phailaaeko abhiyogamaa kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa chunadewi basne kaabhre timaala gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya satyamaana laamaalaai praharile mumgalabaara pakraau gareko chha

laaguausadha kaarobaari pakraau sumkhyaa wigata eka warsamaa hwaattai badheko chha gaanjaa charesa aphima braauna sugara niyantrita padaartha sametako awaidha kaarobaaramaa sumlagna abhiyukta pakraau sumkhyaa badhnuko pramukha kaarana prahari sakriyataa ra prabhaawakaari abhiyaana nai ho

laaguausadha praakaritika ra ardhakaritima padaartha ho jasako prayogale wyaktiko kendriya snaayu pranaalimaa asara puryaai sochne bujhne ra bislesana garne saktimaa wichalana lyaaunchha wyaktiko saaririka arthika maanasika paariwaarika ra kaanuni paksalaai naraamrosanga asara puryaaunchha kunai pani prakaarako laaguausadha chikitsakako sallaahawinaa aphukhusi dherai maatraamaa waa galatarupamaa prayoga garinchha bhane tyo laaguausadha durwyasana ho yastaa prayogakartaa durwyasani hun naagarika hita khaantira tathaa saamaajika arthika maanasika prabhaawa sametalaai madhyanajara gari yastaa padaartha pratiwandhita chhan

wiswawyaapi samasyaako rupamaa raheko laaguausadha prayoga ra kaarobaara nepaalamaa pani jatila bandai gaeko chha janasumkhyaako wariddhi tathaa bhumandalikaranako kaaranasangai laaguausadha prayogakartaa ra yasakaa kaarobaariko sumkhyaamaa wariddhi bhaeko kaarana samaajamaa dina pratidina gambhira asara pariraheko chha wikaasa ra saanti suraksaamaa nakaaraatmaka prabhaawa pariraheko chha laaguausadha awaidha osaarapasaara niyantrana garna kaanuna kaaryaanwayana garne nikaayaharu kriyaasila rahe pani antarraastriya rupamaa sumgathita ra sakriya girohako sumjaalale gardaa niyantrana kaarya jhan chunautipurna bandai gaeko chha

laaguausadha kaarobaara niyantranakaa laagi nepaala sarakaarale laaguausadha niyantrana rananiti laagu gareko chha gariha mantraalayale gariha prasaasana sudhaara yojanaa antargata bundaa nambara dekhi samma laaguausadha sambandhi niti tathaa yojanaa samaawesa garnukaa saathai laagupadaartha nisedha ra madiraa niyantrana abhiyaana suru gareko chha

widyamaana kaanunalaai abhiyaanakai rupamaa liera nepaala prahari laaguausadha kaarobaara prayoga ra durwyasana niyantrana garna sakriya chha anusandhaana gari sumlagnalaai pakraau tathaa kaanuni kaarawaahi garna praharile pachhillo samaya wisesa sakriyataa badhaaeko chha nepaala praharikaa kendriya prahari prawaktaa prahari waristha upariksaka sailesa thaapaa ksetri bhannuhunchha gariha mantraalayako gariha prasaasana sudhaara kaaryayojanaa ko adhinamaa rahi prahari pradhaana kaaryaalayale wisesa abhiyaana sumchaalana gareko chha laaguausadha niyantrana byurole kaama gariraheko chha agaami dinamaa abhiyaanalaai gambhirataakaa saatha laijaane chhaun

nepaalamaa arthika warsa maa laaguausadha sambandhi aparaadhamaa sumlagna hajaara saya janaalaai nepaala praharile pakraau gareko chha pakraau parekaamadhye hajaara saya janaa nepaali purusa saya janaa nepaali mahilaa ra saya widesi naagarika rahekaa chhan yimadhye hajaara muddhaa adaalatamaa dartaa bhaekaa chhan

pakraau parekaaharu gaanjaa charesa heroina aphima ra kokinajastaa laaguausadha sewana garne tathaa yasako osaarapasaaramaa sumlagna rahekaa chhan uniharubaata hajaara saya keji gaanjaa hajaara saya keji charesa keji heroina keji aphima ra keji kokina praharile baraamada gareko chha saaikotropiksa laaguausadhatarpha laakha hajaara saya tyaableta laakha hajaara empula hajaara saya koreksa saya sirinja phensidila saya graama polyaanda kodina manodwipaka laaguausadha keji methaaephetaamaaina keji saya graama laaguausadha khaata ra graama yaawaa sameta baraamada bhaeko chha

yasa arthika warsako tathyaanka wislesana gardaa nambara pradesabaata sabaibhandaa dherai laaguausadha gaanjaa hajaara keji baraamada bhaeko chha nambara pradesabaata sabaibhandaa dherai saya keji charesa baraamada bhaeko chha saathai nambara pradesabaata keji heroina nambara pradesabaata sabaibhandaa dherai keji aphima tathaa laaguausadha byurobaata keji kokina baraamada bhaeko chha

khullaa simaanaa ra laaguausadhako sahaja praapti kaarobaara wariddhiko pramukha kaarana ho graamina ksetramaa hune gaanjaa ra aphima khetiko bharapardo anugamana pranaali nahunu kharchilo suchanaa byabasthaapana widhi ra bajetako simitataa niyantranakaa chunauti hun laagu ausadha niyantrana byurokaa pramukha prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka thule raai bhannuhunchha nayaan kaaryawidhi ra saili apanaai hune kaarobaarako anusandhaanakaa laagi adhunika prawidhiyukta saadhanasrota awasyaka chha

galata manasaayakaa wyaktiharule arthopaarjanako uddesyale laaguausadha osaarapasaara gariraheko dekhinchha wisesa gari yuwaawarga durwyasanimaa laageko tathyaankale dekhaaeko chha pariwaara samaaja ra widyaalayabaata uchita maarga nirdesana ra herachaahako abhaawa sahi nirnaya ksamataako kami ananda praaptiko abhilaasaa ra saathiko sumgata lagaayatakaa kaaranale yuwaawarga laaguausadhako durwyasanimaa phaseko paainchha kendriya prahari prawaktaa thaapaa ksetri bhannuhanchha laaguausadhabaata sabaibhandaa badhi pidita hunemaa yuwaa pustaa chhan samaajamaa dekhieko nayaan prayogako paddhati antarraastriya rupamaa suchanaa prawidhimaa pahuncha jiwana jiune sandarbhamaa dekhieko mulya maanyataamaa aeko ksayikarana ekala pariwaarako bistaarale gardaa abhibhaawakatwamaa aeko kamiko awasthaamaa baalabaalikaalaai sumkalpa sahitako raamro maanchhe banne kuraa sikaauna sakenaum bhane yasale kaalaantaramaa pariwaara samaaja ra desalaai nai nakaaraatmaka asara paarchha tyasakaarana bidyaalayako paathyakramamaa nai samaawesa garera niyamita rupamaa padhaai huna sakyo bhane laaguausadha niyantrana abhiyaana prabhaawakaari hunechha

laaguausadha sewanale sewanakartaalaai maatra nabhai pariwaara samaaja ra desalaai nai pratyaksa prabhaawa paariraheko chha raastriya rupamaa raajyako sampatti anutpaadaka ksetramaa kharcha bhai raastralaai thulo noksaana hune tathaa urjaasila yuwaa janasakti galata baatomaa laagdaa raastralaai duragaami prabhaawa paariraheko chha sewanakartaako swaasthyamaa asara garchha saamaajamaa wikhandana lyaaune naraamro wikariti phailane saamaajika sahisnautaamaa hraasa aune hunchha laaguausadha kharidamaa kharcha hune artha sumkalana garna chori ra lutapaata jastaa ghatanaa ghatne ra anya aparaadha sameta badhne gareko paainchha

laaguausadhabaata sahari ksetramaa basobaasa garne dekhi warsakaa pratisata ra dekhi warsakaa pratisata yuwaawarga durwyasanamaa phaseko tathyaankale dekhaaeko chha prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka raai bhannuhunchha yasalaai ghataaune chunauti saamanaa garna byuro maatahata nayaan prahari ekaai sthaapanaa garne jaancha kaaryamaa kadaai garne ra janachetanaamulaka kaaryakramalaai ajhai wistaara garne yojanaa chha

saamaajika samasyaako rupamaa raheko laaguausadha niyantranamaa pachhillo samaya prahari sakriyataakaa kaarana dherai thulo sumkhyaamaa aparaadhi pakraau parekaa hun prahari mahaaniriksaka sarwendra khanaalale nayaan tarikaale aparaadha anusandhaana garna nirdesana dindai aunubhaeko chha sohi anurupa chauwisai ghantaa prahari jaancha kaanuni kaarawaahimaa kadaai nayaan prawidhiko prayogakaa kaarana kaarobaari nirutsaahita bhaekaa chhan prahari maatrai hoina sarokaarawaalaa sampurna paksa yasako niyantranako laagi jaagaruka hunuparne dekhinchha pariwaarakaa sadasyaharu pani aphnaa baalabaalikaako kriyaakalaapabaare sacheta huna awasyaka chha yuwaawarga bhawisyaprati sacheta bhai yasako sewanabaata taadhaa rahana saknuparchha sarakaaristara prahari samaaja sarokaarawaalaa nikaaya ra amanaagarika milera kaanunale tokeko patha pachhyaaundai sakriya rupamaa kaamaprati samarpita huna sake yastaa aparaadha niyantranamaa pakkai saphalataa milchha skada ridale bhanekaa chhan laksya chunnu ra yasamaa samarpita hunule sabaithoka badlinchha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapurakaa anusaara basnetale yahi bhadau gate raatako samayamaa aphnai widyaalayakaa kaksaa maa adhyayana garne warsiyaa chhaatraako gharamaa gaera kothaamaa prawesa gari yauna duwryawahaara garekaa thie chhaatraa kothaamaa chichyaaepachhi basneta pharaara bhaekaa thie

chhaatraakaa aphantale praharimaa jaaheri diepani pharaara rahandai aekaa basneta gata sanibaara pakraau parekaa thie pakraau gariekaa basnetalaai baalikaa yauna duwryawahaarasambandhi muddaa dartaa gareko jiprakaa udayapurakaa pramukha chandradewa raaile bataaunubhayo

jillaa adaalata udayapurale sunasariko baraaha ksetra ghara bhai udayapurako belukaa nagarapaalikaa maa wyaapaara gardai aekaa warsiya sudhilaala chaudharilaai sthaaniya warsiyaa baalikaa jabarjasti karanai gareko abhiyogamaa saata warsako jela sajaayako phaisalaa gareko chha

phaaguna gate belukaa nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa baalikaalaai ghara jaandai gareko belaa chaudharile jabarjasti pakrera ghaarimaa lagi balaatkaara gareko abhiyogamaa praharile chaudharilaai pakraau garera muddaa chalaaeko thiyo
purwi naakaa kaankadabhittaabaata lukaaichhipaai ru laakha hajaara bhaaratiya rupaiyaan lyaauna khojne eka yuwakalaai aja praharile bhansaara kaaryaalaya bhitraibaata pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parekaa bajraachaaryalaai awasyaka anusandhaanakaa laagi ajai nepaala eyaralaayansako jahaajabaata raajaswa anusandhaana wibhaaga kaathamaadaunmaa pathaaieko mechi bhansaara kaaryaalayakaa pramukha tekabahaadura aryaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
bajraachaaryako saathabaata baraamada garieko bhaaratiya notamaa ru ru ru ru ra ru eka hajaara ko raheko sasastra prahari naayaba upariksaka raajesa ghimirele jaanakaari dinubhayo
nepaali mudraako awaidha osaarapasaara hundi kaarowaaramaa sumlagna raheko abhiyogamaa pakraau parekaa abhiyukta ra baraamada rupaiyaanlaai aja parsaa praharile saarwajanika gareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale patrakaara sammelana gari wiraganjako wibhinna sthaanabaata baraamada gariekoe ru laakha hajaara ra hundiko kaarowaaramaa sumlagna bhaeko abhiyogamaa pakraau parekaa paancha janaa abhiyuktalaai saarwajanika gareko ho

wiraganjako ghadiarwa ra maaisthaana chokamaa hundi kaarowaara bhaeko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa kaarawaahi gardaa srota khulaauna nasakeko bhaari parimaanamaa nepaali rupaiyaan baraamada bhaepachhi awasyaka anusandhaanakaa laagi dui janaa bhaaratiya ra tina janaa nepaali naagarikalaai niyantranamaa liieko prahari naayaba upariksaka satyanaaraayana thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo
nepaala prahari kendriya anusandhaana byurole widesa pathaaune bhani maanawa bechawikhana garne dui janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parekaalaai aja kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalata kaathamaadaunbaata anumati lii maanawa bechabikhana tathaa osaarapasaara muddaamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko byurole janaaeko chha
hotala sanchaalakale praharilaai khabara garepachhi kothaa kholera herdaa sawa phelaa pareko mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaumkaa prawaktaa esapi raamadatta josile bataae

nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa raajhaasthita nepaalagumja bimaanasthalamaa dolpaabaata samita bimaanamaa nepaalagumja aekaa swawarnako jholaamaa tinako baakasabhitra lukaai lyaaeko ukta yaarsaagumbaa ra goldateka lekheko dijitala taraaju sahita phelaa paari praharile niyantranamaa lieko ho
sunabarsi nagarapaalikaa harchana gadhi sthita chhoti bhansaara kaaryaalaya agaadi praharile jaancha garne kramamaa uniharulaai ukta parimaanako laaguausadha sahita phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho

yasaigari paalpaa tinaau gaaunpaalikaa sikuwaa basne maanabahaadura lamtarilaai laaguausadha keji gaanjaa polothina jholaa ra sukeko tayaari gaanjaa andaaji graama sahita sanibaara praharile pakraau gareko ho maanabahaadurako gharamaa praharile khaanatalaasi gardaa ukta parimaanako laaguausadha phelaa paari niyantranamaa lieko ho

sundara haraichaa nagarapaalikaa wiraatachokamaa raheko thaapaa sunachaandi pasalamaa pestola dekhaai rakama tathaa suna lutne bhojapura jillaa dinlaa ghara bhai haala dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa maa deraa gari basne warsiya rosana bhanne gopaala dahaala wika laai sukrabaara pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

nijale pasalabaata graamako sunako braasaleta luti bhaagna laagdaa belabaari ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata khatieko prahari niriksaka raamakumaara raaiko netaritwako tolile swachaalita pestola dui raaunda goli sunako braasaletasahita pakraau gareko ho yasa sambandhamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

rukuma paschimako baanphikota gaaunpaalikaamaa kholaamaa bagera srimaan srimatiko marityu bhaeko chha baanphikota gaaunpaalikaa dulidulikhaakaa warsiya amarita gharti ra uhaanki srimati warsiyaa tulasaa ghartiko baanphikotako badagaai kholaamaa bagera marityu bhaeko ho

kholaamaa raheko kaathako pula tarne kramamaa chipliera bagekaa gharti dampatimadhye srimaana amaritako sawa sukrabaara beluki phelaa pareko thiyo bageko bhandaa kariba dui saya mitara tala uhaanko sawa phelaa pareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya baanphikotale janaaeko chha
nepaala taruna dalale pani laamaa dillibaata pakraau pareko pusti gareko chha laamaa pakraau pareko baare nepaala praharile anawijnataa prakata gareko chha

gharamaa eklai basdai aeki ghimirelaai khojdai jaandaa sariramaa chota ra ragataamya awasthaamaa marita phelaa paarepachhi tatkaala praharilaai khabara garieko wadaa adhyaksa chandramanai paudelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

ghatanaasthalako praarambhika anusandhaanabaata kartawya bhaeko yakina garna sakine ghatanaasthala pugnubhaekaa lamajunakaa prahari pramukha yaadawa dhakaalale bataaunubhayo praharile pokharaabaata kukura lyaaera ghatanaasthala ra ghatanaabaare thapa anusandhaana gariraheko pani uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo

jillaa adaalata kanchanapurale thapa sodhapuchha ra anusandhaanakaa laagi eka saataako myaada thapa gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prahari upariksaka kuwera kadaayatale bataaunubhayo
myaada thapa gariesanmgai uniharuko bayaana line ra anya anusandhaanako kaamakaa laagi thapa samaya mileko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurale janaaeko chha
gretara nepaalakaa adhyaksa phanaindra nepaala pakraau parekaa chhan mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaako tolile nepaalalaai gausaalaabaata pakraau gareko ho

butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa naharapurako jnaanapunja sekendari inlisa bordina skulako chhaatraawaasamaa basne kaksaaki chhaatraamaathi abhadra wyawahaara gareko bhandai unalaai prahari niyantranamaa liieko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya butawalakaa prahari niriksaka amara thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaanlaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya butawalamaa raakhieko chha

gata sanibaara beluki baje dungaa sawaara yaatrimadhye paanchako jyaana gaeko ra janaa uddhaarapachhi ghara pharkekaa thie ghatanaako satyatathya saarwajanika garne uddesyale sahaayaka prajia dharmaananda josiko sumyojakatwako so ayogamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa eka prahari niriksaka nepaala patrakaara mahaasangha rautahata sadaka dibhijana kaaryaalaya ra nepaala redakrasa sosaaitikaa ekajanaa pratinidhi rahanechhan dungaa durghatanaamaa nidhana bhaekaamadhye haalasamma gaura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiyaa saantidewi saaha omaprakaasa chandrawumsi gaura nagarapaalikaa auraiyaa ki warsiyaa runaadewi patelako sawa phelaapareko chha
toli yahaan aipugekai samayamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurale nirmalaakaa saathi rosani ra unaki didi babitaa bamalaai anusandhaanakaa laagi niyantranamaa liieko chha

andolanarata paksale bamako gharamaa badhi anusandhaana kendrita hunuparne ra maanasika santulana gumaaekaa wyaktile balaatkaari gari hatyaa nagareko daabi chha bhimadattanagaramaa jillaa prasaasanale sthiti jatila banna nadina lagaaeko kaphryukaa bicha chhaanabina samiti bhane anusandhaanamaa jutiraheko chha chhaanabina samitisahita sthaaniya prasaasanale andolana banda garera chhaanabina sahaja banaauna agrahasahita yahaankaa sarwadaliyasarwapaksiya baithakasameta daakeko thiyo

sohi ghatanaako yathaartha chhaanabinako maaga gardai pradarsana gardaa sukrabaara prahari ra andolanakaaribicha jhadapa hundaa bhimadattanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sani khunaako goli laagera marityu bhaeko thiyo

dui saataaaghi gharabaatai apaharita sirahaako golabajaara nagarapaalikaa ki ekala mahilaa kaaridewi yaadawako sawa aja maatomuni gaadieko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko chha sirahaako narahaa gaaunpaalikaa sthita baansaghaarimaa gaadieko awasthaamaa warsiya yaadawako sawa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka maadhawaraaja kharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

sawa kuhiera ganhaauna thaalepachhi sthaaniya baasindaale baansaghaarimaa sawa gaadieko hunasakne bhandai praharilaai khabara garekaa thie ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya wisnaupura ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaabaata khatieko tolile sawa gaadieko awasthaamaa nikaaleko thiyo

praharile sawa nikaalepachhi ukta sawa apaharita kaaridewikai bhaeko nijakaa aphantajanale bataaekaa chhan sawa pariksanakaa laagi sirahaa jillaa aspataala pathaaieko ra thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko prahari naayaba upariksaka kharelale bataaunubhayo gata saauna gate aphnai gharabaata aparichita dui janaale tapaainko bhatijaa biraami raheko bhandai kaaridewilaai apaharana gari lageko sthaaniya baasindaale bataaekaa chhan

yasaibicha akrosita sthaaniya baasindaale apaharita yaadawako khojatalaasamaa praharile chaaso nadindaa apaharanakaarile hatyaa gari gaadeko bhandai aja purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata choharwaa sadaka khanda eka ghantaa awaruddha garekaa chhan sthaaniya baasindaako awarodhakaa kaarana purwa ra paschimabaata aekaa sawaari saadhanaharu baatomai alapatra parekaa thie
aphnai sutne kothaamaa jhundiera sthaaniya warsiya manoja thaapaa ra warsiyaa dipaa thaapaale atmahatyaa gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya dodharaachaandanile janaaeko chha

ghatanaasthala pugekaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata prahari naayaba niriksaka naaraayana girile srimaansri mati alaga alaga chunnimaa jhundieko awasthaamaa bhetieko bataaunubhayo maritakakaa bhaaile jhyaalabaata daai bhaauju jhundieko dekhepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie maritakaharuko gata jethamaa wiwaaha bhaeko thiyo
netrawikrama chanda netaritwako nekapaakaa prawaktaa khadgabahaadura wiswakarmaalaai yahaanko jillaa adaalatale tina dina thunaamaa raakhna anumati dieko chha

kaathamaadaumnbaata aja bihaana baje yahaan lyaaiekaa wiswakarmaalaai aja nai nuwaakota jillaa adaalatale anusandhaanakaa laagi thunaamaa raakhna myaada thapa gareko ho uhaanlaai wihibaara sarwochcha adaalatale rihaa garne adesa diesangai giraphtaara gari yahaan lyaaieko thiyo
gata saauna gate raati belakotagadhi napaa bhattathokamaa dui skaabhetara jalaaieko aropamaa muddaa chalaauna yahaan lyaaieko jillaa prahari pramukha wasantabahaadura kunwarale jaanakaari dinubhayo

dhamalejilina sadaka staronnatiko kaama gardai aeko naagaarjuna kanstraksanakaa skaabhetaramaa ago lagaaindaa eutaa purna ksatigrasta ra eutaa amsika ksatigrasta bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha kuna thaaunmaa kahile skaabhetara jaleko bhanne aphulaai thaahaa nabhaeko prakaandale sanchaarakarmilaai bataaunubhayo

netrawikrama chandawiplaba netaritwako nepaala kamyunista paartikaa prawaktaa tathaa purwamantri khadgabahaadura wiswakarmaa prakaandalaai gaeraati nuwaakota lyaaieko chha gata saaunamaa belakotagadhi nagarapaalikaa bhattathokamaa dui skaabhetaramaa jalaaeko aropamaa muddaa chalaauna nuwaakota lyaaieko jillaa prahari pramukha esapi wasantabahaadura kunwarale jaanakaari dinubhayo

gata saauna gate raati dhamalejilina sadaka staronnatiko kaama gardai aeko naagaarjuna kantraksanako dui skaabhetaramaa ago lagaaieko thiyo ago lagaaeko kaarana eutaa jalera purna ksati bhaeko thiyo bhane arko amsika ksati bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha aja nai aropi wiswakarmaalaai anusandhaanako myaada thapako laagi adaalatamaa pesa garine praharile janaaeko chha
jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya kanchanapurale kapharyu adesa jaari gareko chha

jillaamaa kehi dinadekhi jaari andolana badhepachhi sthaaniya prasaasanale ahile saanjha bajedekhi sukrabaara bihaana bajesammakaa laagi kaphryu adesa jaari gareko ho sthaaniya prasaasana aina ko daphaa ka bamojima kaphryu jaari garieko pramukha jillaa adhikaari kumaarabahaadura khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

bhimadatta nagarapaalikaa wadaa num ra wadaa num bajaara ksetramaa kaphryu jaari garieko ho balaatkaarapachhi hatyaa garieki warsiyaa nirmalaa pantako ghatanaamaa sumlagnalaai kaarawaahiko maaga gardai jaari andolana jaari nai raakhieko chha

samitimaa nepaala praharikaa prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka raamaprasaada srestha sasastra prahari balakaa naayawa mahaaniriksaka basanta baanniyaa ra anusandhaana wibhaagakaa anusandhaana nirdesaka laksmana guruna ra pradesa num ko antarika maamilaa tathaa kaanuna mantraalayakaa upasachiwa wirendra kesi sadasya chhan
lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaa balkhu sundarighaatasthita chaainija kaaryaalayamaa kaama gari basne chaainija naagarika warsiya lena jonako sisaale kaatera marityu bhaeko chha

motarasaaikala chori gareko abhiyogamaa kaathamaadaum maataatirtha basne gorakhaa masela gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya raamabahaadura magaraati ra gorakhaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya iswara srimalalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa sitaapaailaa deraa gari basne dhaadina gajuri ghara bhaekaa dipaka bhandaariko deraa ghara agaadi paarkina gari raakheko baa pa namwarako motarasaaikala gaeraati chori gardai gareko awasthaamaa uniharulaai mahaanagariya prahari baritta swayambhubaata gastimaa khatieko prahari tolile phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
malesiyaamaa paisaa kamaauna gaekaa paalpaa jillaako maathaagadhi gaaunpaalikaa rupsekaa dinesa jhedi tina warsadekhi bepattaa bhaekaa chhan
daarchulaako maarmaamaa swaasthyachaukimaa kaaryarata kaaryaalaya sahayogiko hatyaa bhaeko chha

maarmaa gaaunpaalikaa gholjara ghara bhai guljara swaasthyachaukimaa kaaryarata warsiya amgawirasimha thagunnaako mangalabaara hatyaa bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daarchulaakaa prahari niriksaka hikmata boharaale jaanakaari dinubhayo thagunnaako gharamai hatyaa bhaeko thiyo prahari toli ghatanaasthalamaa pugeko chha

gharamaa pathaaunakaa laagi jammaa gareko ru laakhakai kaarana thagunnaako hatyaa bhaeko huna sakne prahariko anumaana chha ghatanaasthalamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gokuleswara ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya latinaatha ra jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata prahari toli khatieko chha

tarkimaa raheko amerikaako dutaawaasamaa somabaara goli prahaara bhaeko chha ghatanaamaa pari kunai maanawiya ksati bhane nabhaeko amerikaa ra tarki duwai tarphakaa adhikaariharule jaanakaari diekaa chhan

dutaawaasamaa prawaktaa debhida gaainarale ghatanaasthalalaai ahile suraksaakarmile aphno niyantranamaa liisakeko eephapilaai bataaunubhayo ghatanaamaa pari kohi ghaaite bhaeko waa kasaiko marityu bhaeko wiwarana chhaina haamile ghatanaakaa baaremaa wistaritamaa adhyayana garna lagaaisakekaa chhaun tarkiko suraksaakarmilaai wisesa dhanyawaada dina chaahanchhaun prawaktaale bhannubhayo
kaathamaadaunbaata jaajarakota jaandai gareko naakha numko basamaa aja eka wyakti marita phelaa parekaa chhan
maritaka athabisakota nagarapaalikaa rukumakaa warsiya narendra bohoraa raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetakaa prawaktaa syaamasimha chaudharile jaanakaari dinubhayo

bohoraa aja bihaana baje gurbhaakota nagarapaalikaa sthita basabaata jharera tyahi najikako chisaapaani haaiwe hotalamaa saucha gari pharkera punah gaadimaa basdaa sitamaa maritaawasthaamaa bhetieko prawaktaa chaudharile jaanakaari dinubhayo
kailaali jillaako kailaari gaaunpaalikaa baata apaharanamaa parekaa paancha warsakaa chhemaana chaudhariko aja praharile sakusala uddhaara gareko chha

aja bihaana kariba baje kailaari gaaunpaalikaako adarsa maadhyamika widyaalayako parisarabaata apaharanamaa parekaa baalaka chaudharilaai sohi jillaako bhaaluwaanabaata saanjha sakusala uddhaara garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalikaa prahari upariksaka winoda ghimirele bataaunubhayo
apaharanamaa sumlagna kailaaliko godaawari nagarapaalikaa laalapura gaaunkaa birju chaudharilaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

apaharanakaari chaudharile baalakaki amaa binaa chaudharilaai ghatanaapachhi gareko phonakaa adhaaramaa daana jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako sahayogamaa apaharanakaariko khoji gari baalakako uddhaara garieko prahari upariksaka ghimirele jaanakaari dinubhayo baalakalaai apaharana gari motarasaaikalamaa raakhera laijaandai gareko awasthaamaa apaharanakaari chaudhari prahariko phandaamaa parekaa hun

pakraau parnemaa khotaana halesikaa warsiya bhupendra raai bhojapura khaawaakaa warsiya sanita raai solukhumbu tambukaa warsiya minmaa serpaa kaabhre kosipaarikaa warsiya raaju bhandaari bhaktapura thimikaa warsiya suresa srestha chitawana bharapurakaa warsiya ronika srestha ra raamechhaapa dhodakhaanikaa warsiya sujana thaapaa magara rahekaa chhan

baaneswara koteswara kaandaaghaari ksetrakaa hotala resturenta tathaa anya wyawasaayilaai dhamki dii rakama asuldai hindne gareko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa khojatalaasa gardaa praharile uniharulaai niyantranamaa lieko ho pakraau parekaa saatai janaa patakapataka wibhinna aparaadhamaa sumlagna hundai aeko praharile janaaeko chha

tyastai praharile kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa ksetrapaatibaata durlabha wanyajantuko thaana haddi ra ru hajaarasahita dui chiniyaan naagarikalaai pakraau gareko chha baapa numko skutaramaa sawaara chiniyaan naagarika warsiya jaawii ra warsiya jhaana yueinalaai pakraau gari awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
chakku prahaara sarieko awasthaamaa sawa bhetieko thiyo jhyaalakaa jaali phorieko thiyo yasa wisayamaa kaathamaadaum praharile anusandhaana aghi badhaaeko daabi gareko chha
praharile jhaako hatyaa bhaeko huna sakne asumkaa gareko chha kaathamaadaum prahari pramukha esaesapi basanta kumaara laamaale ghatanaako prakariti herdaa kartabya bhaeko huna sakne bataae

nepaalabhaarata simaanaakaa jamunaahaabaata hatiyaarasahita nepaala praharile eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha pakraau parnemaa jaajarakota bheri nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya amarita wika raheko praharile janaaeko chha praharile eka thaana eyara gana ra soko raaunda golisahita wikalaai pakraau gareko chha

baankeko nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita jamunaahaa naakaabaata eyara ganasahita wikalaai pakraau garieko baankekaa prahari pramukha ewum prahari upariksaka aruna paudelale jaanakaari dinubhayo jaanchakaa kramamaa wikako saathabaata hatiyaara baraamada bhaeko prahari upariksaka paudelale bataaunubhayo

yastai jaajarakota bheri nagarapaalikaa kai warsiya dipaka wikako saathabaata pani praharile phalaamako saanlo baraamada gareko chha uniharu duwailaai awasyaka anusandhaanakaa laagi niyantranamaa lii jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa raakhieko chha
kochina padhna gharabaata widyaalaya jaandai gareki eka kisorimaathi aja bihaana mechinagara sthita satighattaa maargako chiyaa bagaanamaa duwryawahaara bhaeko chha

kaankadabhittaako lophophorasa angreji maadhyamika widyaalayamaa kaksaa maa adhyayanarata warsiyaa ti kisori kochina kaksaakaa laagi bihaana baje eklai saaikala chadhera chiyaa bagaanako baato hundai widyaalaya gairaheko awasthaamaa ukta ghatanaa bhaeko kaankadabhittaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

praharikaa anusaara bagaanako bichamaa pugepachhi tina ketaale ekkaasi samaatera bagaanabhitra lagi jabarjasti garna khojepachhi kisori chichyaaeki thiin kisori chichyaaepachhi ketaa bhaageko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaankadabhittaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka mahesa thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

abhiyuktale kisoriko skula byaaga ra saaikala khosera phyaankidiekaa thie bhane ketaaharu bhaagepachhi rundaiai uni skula pugeki thiin widyaalaya aipugepachhi kisorile ghatanaabaare pradhaanaadhyaapaka saagara gurunalaai jaanakaari garaaeki thiin tatkaala pradhaanaadhyaapaka gurunale ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaankadabhittaa pugera ghatanaabaare praharilaai jaanakaari garaaunubhaeko thiyo

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa anusaara tina warsamaa yauna himsaakaa ghatanaa badheko chha arthika warsa maa jabarjasti karanaikaa ra jabarjasti karanai udyogakaa gari kula wataa muddaa dartaa bhaekaa chhan
dartaa bhaekaa jabarjasti karanaikaa muddaamadhye wataa maatra phachhryota bhaekaa chhan jabarjasti karanai udyogakaa muddaamadhye wataako phachhryota bhaeko chha

yastai awa maa wataa jabarjasti karanai muddaa dartaa bhaekaa thie bhane wataa jabarjasti karanai udyogakaa muddaa dartaa bhaekaa thie awa maa wataa jabarjasti karanaiko aropamaa muddaa dartaa bhaeko thiyo bhane wataa jabarjasti karanai udyogamaa muddaa dartaa bhaeko thiyo

awa maa jabarjasti karanaikaa wataa muddaamadhye sabai phachhryota bhaekaa chhan wataa jabarjasti karanai udyogakaa muddaa dartaa bhaekaa thie bhamapaakaa prahari pramukha bhimaprasaada dhakaalale samaajamaa balaatkaarakaa ghatanaa badhekomaa prahari chintita raheko bataaunubhayo

balaatkaarakaa ghatanaa nyunikarana garna jhaapaakaa sthaaniya tahakaa naagarika ra prahari prasaasanabicha saarwajanika sunuwaai bhairaheko uhaanko bhanaai chha yauna duwryawahaarakaa ghatanaa nirutsaahita garna jhaapaamaa saadaa posaakamaa bhandaa badhi prahari graamina ksetramaa parichaalana garne yojanaa banaaieko prahari naayaba upariksaka dhakaala bataaunuhunchha

praharile sangathita aparaadhamaa sumlagna raheko aropamaa pakraau gariekaa netrawikrama chanda wiplawa netaritwakaa nekapaakaa prawaktaa khadkabahaadura wiswakarmaa prakaandalaai aja tina dinako myaada thapa gari kaabhrepalaanchoka jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa raakheko chha

jillaa adaalata kaabhrepalaanchoka dhulikhelale ajasammakaa laagi myaada thapa gareko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrepalaanchokakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka rawiraaja khadkaale bhannubhayo pheri bholibaata myaada thapa gari anusandhaanakaa laagi prakriyaa agaadi badhnechha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrepalaanchokakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka khadkaale gata waisaakha gate kaabhrepalaanchoka jillaako namobuddha nagarapaalikaa chaukidaandaasthita blu saaina krasara udyogamaa agajani gareko kaaryamaa sumlagna raheko paaieko kaarana pakraau garieko bataaunubhayo

chandaa asuliko aropamaa pakraau gariekaa kaalikota jillaa naraharinaatha gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa netaa prakaandalaai praharile sukrabaara belukaa sarwaaechcha adaalata parisarabaatai praharile puna pakraau gari kaabhrepalaanchoka jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhulikhelamaa lyaaeko ho

yasaaghi sohi ghatanaamaa sumlagna raheko aropamaa praharile wiplawa netaritwako paarti nekapaakaa kendriya sadasyadwaya wirendranagara nagarapaalikaa kaa karisna dhamalaa gambhira ra dhaadina jillaa nilakantha nagarapaalikaa kaa mohana kaarki jiwanta laai pakraau gari kaabhrepalaanchoka jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa raakhera awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko praharile janaaeko chha
morana wiraatanagara dharaanaroda wikki haardaweyaramaa kaaryarata suraksaagaarda wiraatanagara pipalachokakaa warsiya tanka bhattaraai marita phelaa parekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka nisaana thaapaakaa anusaara aja bihaana baje haardaweyarakaa kaamadaarale pasala kholne kramamaa suraksaagaarda bhattaraaiko sawa phelaa paarekaa hun
khotaana diktelasthita maaunta ebharesta bordina skulamaa kaaryarata siksaka raaja bhattaraai aja aphnai kothaamaa marita phelaa parekaa chhan

budhigangaa gaaunpaalikaa morana niwaasi siksaka bhattaraai saata warsadekhi ukta bordinamaa kaaryarata hunuhunthyo uhaan baantaa gareko awasthaamaa marita phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya khotaanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raajakumaara kesile bataaunubhayo marityuko kaarana khulna nasakeko pani uhaanle bataaunubhayo

ghatanaakaa wisayamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha maritaka bhattaraaiko sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala khotaanamaa raakhieko chha unako aphanta aepachhi maatra sawapariksana hune praharile janaaieko chha
kamalaale budhabaara jumlaahaa chhori gumgaa jamunaalaai sephtityaankimaa phaalekomaa gumgaako phaaleko sthaanamai tathaa jamunaako upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko thiyo
chhoriharulaai phaalera pharaara bhaeki kamalalaai sunasari itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita taraharaa bajaaramaa praharile phelaa paari pakraau gareko ho
eka saataaaghi paschima nawalaparaasiko sunawalabaata chori bhaeko skaarapiyo gaadi sasastra prahari hawaldaarako niji gharamaa phelaa pareko chha

baacha num ko gaadi sasastra prahari bala paschima nawalaparaasi num gana belaasapuramaa kaaryarata waristha hawaldaara thaakuraprasaada chaudhariko niwaasa paschima nawalaparaasi bardaghaata nagarapaalikaa paaladaandaamaa phelaa pareko ho

gaadi choriko aropamaa praharile hawaldaara chaudharisahita rupandehi sainaamainaa nagarapaalikaa kaa dilipa bohoraa ra butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa belawaasaki jaanaki baraalalaai pakraau gareko chha

gaadi chori bhaepachhi butawala bhairahawaa nawalaparaasilagaayatakaa gyaarejamaa gaadi khojne kramamaa praharile sunawala ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari jawaana gumaanasimha kumaalalaai graahaka banaaera puraano gaadi kinnu chha bhandai pathaaeko thiyo

gaadi khojne kramamaa sainaamainaakaa dilipa bohaaraale aphusanga gaadi bhaeko bataaekaa thie bohoraale ru laakha maage pani ru saata laakhamaa gaadi kharida garne kuraa mileko thiyo bikri garna laagieko gaadi upalabdha garaauna bohoraa ra jaanakile prahari jawaana kumaalalaai liera chaudhariko gharamaa pugekaa thie

prahari jawaana kumaalalaai dekhnebittikai gaadi najika rahekaa sasastra praharikaa hawaldaara chaudhari bhaagna khoje pachhi kumaalale chaudharilaai niyantranamaa liekaa thie bhane anyalaai pichhaa gardai gaeko prahariko tolile pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka raajendraprasaada bhattale jaanakaari dinubhayo

uniharule kaathamadaum putalisadakamaa pipula warka grupa naamako kaaryaalaya sumchaalana gari polyaandamaa sajilai rojagaaramaa jaana sakine maasika hajaara dekhi laakha rupaiyaansamma talabako saathai anya subidhaa sameta raheko bhani pralobhana dekhaai piditaharulaai laakha hajaara rupaiyaan laagchha bhandai prosesinako laagi pratiwyakti laakha hajaara rupaiyaan dekhi laakha rupaiyaansamma rakama sumkalana garne gareko bhanne piditaharuko niwedanako adhaaramaa mahaanagariya prahari mahaasaakhaako praharile uniharulaai ukta kaaryaalayabaata niyantranamaa lieko ho

uniharubaata wibhinna kampanikaa lyaapatapa thaana wibhinna kampaniko mobaaila thaana raahadaani thaana wibhinna chhaapaharu thaana skyaanara thaana lyaapatapa chaarjaraharu ra wibhinna kaagajapatraharu sameta praharile baraamada gareko chha

kha kasaiko chiththipatra kholemaa waa tyasako prayoga garemaa teliphona waa anya prawidhiko maadhyamabaata bhaeko kuraakaani boli dhwaniko tepa waa rekarda garemaa waa sunemaa

sohi thaaun sthita jnaanakunja maarga basne nawaraaja adhikaariko gharamaa raheko inaara sanibaara saphaa garne kramamaa maharjana ra baitadi ghara bhaekaa warsiya prema laamaa dubera asakta bhaekole uddhaara gari upachaarako laagi siksana aspataala mahaaraajagumja pathaaekomaa maharjanako marityu bhaeko thiyo

chainapura nagarapaalikaa sthita asthaayi prahari posta sabhaakholaale uni sawaara ko cha nambarako bolero gaadilaai sukrabaara cheka gardaa gaadiko diki bhitra wataa boraamaa lukaai chhipaai raakheko awasthaamaa ukta kachchaa padaartha sodaa baraamada bhaeko thiyo

sunasari itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaum anaamanagara basne swetaa upretile paarkina gari raakheko baa pa nambarako skutara ra so skutarako dikki bhitra raheko nagada laakha rupaiyaan bihibaara chori bhaeko praharile bataaeko chha

ghaaite sresthalaai janakapura amchala aspataalabaata thapa upachaarako laagi tramaa sentara kaathamaadaum pathaaieko chha pharaara luteraaharuko khojatalaasa garnuko saathai yasa sambandhamaa praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha

chhoraa apaharana pareko bhani galata suchanaa dine wyakti prahari niyantranamaa parekaa chhan baitadi paatana sthaayi ghara bhai kapana basne warsa ko raakesa wistale aphno warsiya chhoraa naresa bista apaharanamaa pareko bhani hijo praharimaa ujuri diekaa thie

unale mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya raanipokhariko kantrola na maa kala gari jaanakaari garaaekomaa so sambandhamaa anusandhaana garne kramamaa raakesa wista ra naresa wistako khojatalaasa gari gate yasa kaaryaalayaa lyaai sodhapuchha gardaa apaharanamaa pareko bhanne suchanaa galata bhaeko bujhieko unalaai niyantrana liieko praharile janaaeko chha

pakraau parneharumaa kaabhre bhumlu ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaum swayambhu basne warsiya dipaka nepaali raamechhaapa gokulagumgaa ghara bhai haala kaathamaadaum sinaamumgala basne warsiya arpana sunuwaara raamechhaapa bethaana ghara bhaekaa warsiya ujwala paande ra salyaana kaalaagaaun ghara bhai kaathamaadaum chaahabila basne warsiya jibana basneta rahekaa chhan

parwatako kusmaa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai parwatakai modi gaaunpaalikaa dobillaamaa sanchaalita hari praathamika widyaalayakaa pradhaanaadhyaapaka warsiya siwaprasaada paudela alapeswara guphaabhitra marita bhetiekaa chhan

kusmaa nagarapaalikaa wadaa num sthita alapeswara guphaako sabaibhandaa tallo bhaagamaa aja diunso chha dinapachhi praa paudela marita bhetiekaa hun bihaana pujaapaatha garna bhani mandira gaekaa paudela saauna gate sukrabaara bihaanadekhi bepattaa bhaekaa thie

alapeswara guphaabhitra unale kammaramaa baandhdai aeko patuki bhetiepachhi aphanta ra praharile khoji garne kramamaa guphaako sabaibhandaa tallo bhaagamaa dhumgaamaa adkieko awasthaamaa sawa bhetieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parwatale janaaeko chha

saawikako dumgraahaa gaawisa kaa warsiya gaarilaala wiswaasako hatyaamaa sumlagna budhigumgaa gaaunpaalikaa dumgraahaakaa warsiya bhawaralaala mandala warsiya iswarachanda gachchhadaara ra warsiya srawana gachchhadaaralaai aitabaara pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka ewam prawaktaa nisaana thaapaale aja jaanakaari dinubhayo

baakhraa gothaalo gaeki chhorilaai gharamaa bolaaera warsiya lokendra dumgaalale balaatkaara gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya chhinchukaa pramukha prahari niriksaka madhusudana nyaupaanele jaanakaari dinubhayo amaa upachaarakaa laagi nepaalaganja gaeko maukaamaa dui bahini gothaalaa gaekaa rahechhan ra jethi chhorilaai ghara bolaaera jabarjasti karanai gareko paaiyo prahari niriksaka nyaupaanele bhannubhayo
nayaan sakti paarti jumlaa jillaa sumyojaka tathaa chandananaatha nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya raadhaakarisna budhthaapaa marita awasthaamaa phelaa parekaa chhan

aitabaara raati bajetira mobaaila gastimaa gaeko prahari tolile motarasaaikalako madhuro prakaasa jugaadakholaako kinaaraamaa bhetepachhi khojatalaasa kramamaa ukta kholaamaa budhthaapaa marita awasthaamaa phelaapaarieko jumlaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa nimitta prahari naayaba upariksaka prakaasa kesile jaanakaari dinubhayo

so ghatanaakaa sambandhamaa sodhapuchhakaa laagi hotala saahu rokaayaa ra laamaalaai niyantranamaa liieko praharile janaaeko chha budhthaapaako sawa pariksanakaa laagi karnaali swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana jumlaamaa raakhieko ra ghatanaakaa sambandhamaa anusandhaana thaalieko janaaieko chha
eka warsaaghi srimatiko hatyaa gari ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa atmasamarpana garekaa mohammada astaawa beduwaakaa santaanako bichalli bhaeko chha

kohalapura nagarapaalikaa belanapurakaa warsiya beduwaale wisum asaaramaa warsiyaa srimati phalsunadewiko hatyaa garera sajaaya bhuktaanakaa laagi ahile kaaraagaaramaa rahekaale unakaa chha chhoraachhori bichallimaa parekaa hun unale jhaaraphuka garna jaane bhandai srimatilaai tina kilomitara taadhaa baatomaa lagera hatyaa garekaa thie
chakku prahaarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa raamabariksako upachaarako kramamaa amchala aspataala janakapuramaa marityu bhaeko ho raama sogaarathako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya dipaka sijaapatilaai kariba keji raato rubisahita aitabaara praharile pakraau gareko chha
mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaumko prahari tolile yuwatilaai praharile pakraau garera anusandhaana aghi badhaaepachhi yasto bhetieko ho
eka yuwatile aphulaai jabarajasti yaunasamparka garna lagaaeko bhandai kaathamaadaum praharile ujuri sameta dieki chhin

chitawanako bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaawadaa num sthita jumgalamaa ghaansa kaatna gaeki eka mahilaalaai aja bihaana baaghale lageko chha sthaaniya raaptiduna madhyawarti saamudaayika wanamaa saathiharusangai ghaansa kaatna gaeki susilaa dumrelaai baaghale lageko sthaaniyawaasi wikaasa paathakale jaanakaari dinubhayo

paathakakaa anusaara ghatanaasthala najika sarirakaa wibhinna amga phelaa pare pani unako awasthaabaare pattaa laageko chhaina baaghale akramana gareko ghatanaako pusti gardai chitawana raastriya nikunjakaa suchanaa adhikaari nurendra aryaalale haattisahitako wanyajantu praawidhika toli so ksetramaa parichaalana garieko jaanakaari dinubhayo

uniharu sabai bheri khalumgaa thaantisthita tirtharaaja boharaako gharamaa bhaadaamaa basdai aekaa thie tyastai gharamuli tirtharaaja boharaaki warsiyaa chhori nagmaa boharaako pani marityu bhaeko chha jiwitai uddhaara gariekaa khadgabahaadura luhaarako jaajarakota aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha chhaati taauko ra khuttaamaa chota laagekaa luhaarako awasthaa gambhira chha

yasai thaaunmaa gopaala sunaarako ghara pahirole purdaa kuse dhimekaa warsiya narendra pariyaara warsiya nawina pariyaarako sawa phelaa parisakeko chha nalagaada daandaagaaunkaa warsiya gowinda pariyaarako laasa phelaa pareko chhaina paani parirahekaale uddhaaramaa samasyaa bhaeko pramukha jillaa adhikaari lalitakumaara basnetale jaanakaari dinubhayo

kisorikaa hatyaako birodhamaa kanchanapurasangai kailaalimaa sameta widyaarthile pradarsana garekaa chhan bhimadattanagarapaalikaa kaaryaalayamaa sameta andolanarata paksale akrosa wyakta gardai aeko chha sanibaarayataa wibhinna sthaanamaa andolanarata paksa ra praharibicha saamaanya jhadapasameta bhaekaa chhan

somabaara bihaana kisoriko antyestikaa laagi uhaankaa aphanta gaaunlesangaiai pradesa num kaa pradesasabhaa sadasya prakaasa raawala bhimadattanagarapaalikaakaa pramukha surendra wistalagaayata sthaaniya tahakaa pratinidhiharu pugekaa thie

tyasaigari ghatanaabaare anusandhaanakaa laagi prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byuro siaibi ko toli pani bhimadattanagara aipugeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prawaktaa prahari naayawa upariksaka jnaanabahaadura setile jaanakaari dinubhayo

hatyaako chhaanabinakaa laagi siaibibaata prahari naayawa upariksaka amgura jisi netaritwako tina sadasyiya toli yahaan aipugeko ho kanchanapura praharisita samanwaya garera tolile kaama thaalisakeko janaaeko chha

chandragiri nagarapaalikaa naagadhumgaa chekapostamaa butawalabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko lu kha nambarako yaatru baahaka basa jaancha garnekramamaa basamaa sawaara magarale jholaamaa lukaai chhipaai lyaaudai gareko abasthaamaa ukta laaguausadha phelaa paari praharile unalaai pakraau gareko ho
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale aja jaari gareko wijnaptimaa wibhinna miti ra sthaanabaata uniharulaai pakraau gareko ullekha garieko chha

pakraau parnemaa nuwaakota jillaako panchakanyaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya hari pariyaara bhanne durgaabahaadura darji rautahata jillaako chandrapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya wikrama pahari makawaanapura jillaako bakaiyaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya prakaasa taamaana morana jillaako bayarawana basne warsiya dipaka limbu ra rasuwaa jillaa uttaragayaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya wisaala nepaali rahekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka prabhuprasaada dhakaalakaa anusaara pahari taamaana ra limbulaai saauna gate chitawanabaata darjilaai sohi dina kaathamaadaunbaata ra nepaalilaai saauna gate rasuwaabaata pakraau gari thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko chha
nepaala prahari kendriya anusandhaana byurole rojagaarikaa laagi wibhinna desa pathaaidine bhandai paancha wyaktisanga ru laakha thagi garne tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parekaa tinai janaalaai aja kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatabaata myaada thapa gari anusandhaana bhairaheko byurole janaaeko chha
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale bhawana tathaa sahari bikaasa kaaryaalaya rupandehikaa pramukha injiniyara suresa thaakuralaai ru laakha ghusasahita aja pakraau gareko chha

ayogale injiniyara thaakuralaai ru laakha hajaara ghusasahita rupandehiko siddhaarthanagara nagarapaalikaa barmeli tolabaata suraakiko adhaaramaa pakraau gareko akhtiyaara butawala saakhaakaa adhikarita suresa bhusaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

nagada ru laakha pachaasa hajaara ra ru laakhako baimka bhaucharasahita pramukha thaakuralaai pakraau garieko akhtiyaarako butawala kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha thaakurale ghusako nagadasangai ru laakhako bhauchara srimatilaai raakhna dieko ra uhaan tyaaksimaa jaandai gardaa hetaamaidaamaa pakraau garieko adhikarita bhusaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

bhairahawaamaa raheko kaaryaalayale rupandehi kapilabastu ra arghaakhaanchimaa bhautika nimaarnako kaama garne gardachha akhtiyaara butawalako samanwayamaa thaakuraki srimatilaai haitaumdaabaata khatieko akhtiyaarako tolile pakraau gareko ho ghusako paisaa liera wiraganjasthita gharamaa jaane kramamaa uhaan baatomai pakraau parnubhaeko ho

pradesa num prahari kaaryaalaya wiraatanagarale dieko jaanakaari anusaara moranako wiraatanagarasthita eka suna pasalabaata praharile sukrabaara saanjha sunako sikri nilne eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

nija nepaalale sikri mana napareko bataaundai sikri phirtaa garekaa thie pasalelaai sumkaa laagi praharimaa khabara garepachhi wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya kha wiraatanagarabaata khatieko tolile unalaai niyantranamaa lieko ho

prahariko niyantranamaa rahekaa nepaalako sarira khaanatalaasi garne kramamaa sikri phelaa naparepachhi nileko hunasakne anumaana gardai bhidiyo eksare garieko awasthaamaa petabhitra sikri dekhaa pareko thiyo yasa sambandhamaa awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya wiraatanagarale janaaeko chha

uniharulaai jillaa adaalata kaathamaadaumle waisaakha gate laakha jariwaanaa ra warsa mahinaa kaida sajaaya sunaaeko thiyo tyasapachhi pharaara rahekaa uniharulaai pakraau gari kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya jagannaathadewala pathaaieko chha

ghatanaamaa sumkaaspada rahekaa janaalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii yasa sambandhamaa awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha unako hatyaa balaatkaarapachhi hatyaa bhaeko huna sakne praharile janaaeko chha

mahottari samsi gaaunpaalikaa baata bhaarata sitaamadhi jhitakaiyaa basne warsiya jitendra kumaara raayalaai pestola thaana soko goli raaunda ra myaagjina thaana sahita bihibaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

pramukha jillaa adhikaari karisna paudelalakaa anusaara marityu hunemaa sindhupaalchoka jillaa bhotekosi gaapaa kaa andaaji warsiya syaama srestha sohi thaaunkaa warsiya wikrama srestha sohi thaaunkai warsiya mumgala taamaana ra sohi gaapaa kaa warsiya ramesa bhanine susa khadkaa rahekaa chhan
pahiromaa pari bepattaa bhaekaa paancha janaako khojikaarya jaari raheko ra khoja uddhaarakaa laagi rasuwaagadhi haaidropaawarakaa upakarana tathaa suraksaakarmi parichaalana garieko chha

uddhaarakaarya prabhaawakaari banaauna prajia karisna paudelalako netaritwamaa suraksaa nikaayasametako parichaalana garieko chha gosaainkunda gaaunpaalikaa adhyaksa kaisaana nurpu taamaanale uddhaaramaa awasyaka sahajikarana gariraakhnubhaeko chha sthaaniyawaasikaa anusaara kariba chaara kimi maathibaata aeko pahirole eka pakki ghara purnukaa saathai tina wataa chhaapraa hotela ra saanaa thulaa chaarawataa sawaarisaadhana purnarupamaa puriekoe chha ahile syaaphru rasuwaagadhi khandako raajamaarga awaruddha bhaeko chha

pahirole timure prawesadwaaramaa raheko asthaayi prahari posta pani pureko chha pahirokaa kaarana widyut teliphona sewaasameta awaruddha hundaa bhansaarakaa kaarya rokieko pramukha bhansaara adhikarita gopaala koiraalaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

paschima nawalaparaasiko prataapapura gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num jagaranaathapurabaata eka baalaka haraaekaa chhan sthaaniya bholaa chaudharikaa chhoraa warsiya hemanaraayana chaudhari bhanne bhullana chaudhari gata saauna gatebaata haraaekaa hun
gata saauna dina diunso kariba baje gharabaata saaikala chadhi ghumna niskiekaa chaudhari haalasamma samparkamaa naaeko unakaa bubaa bholaa chaudharile jaanakaari dinubhayo
chhoraako khojikaa laagi sthaaniya prahari prasaasana sabaimaa niwedana die pani haalasamma kunai khabara praapta nabhaeko chhoraako bekhabarapachhi aphuharu niraasa bhaeko uhaanle bataaunubhayo
gahangoro warnakaa thoplo bindu bhaeko nilo sarta nilo paainta lagaaekaa chaudhariko khoji garna pariwaarajanale sthaaniya prahari prasaasana maanawaadhikaari patrakaara sabailaai apila garekaa chhan
kariba dui mahinaaaghi baalaka apaharana gari hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa eka mahilaasahita tinajanaa maathi baaraa praharile apaharana tathaa sarira bandhakasambandhi muddaa chalaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa anusaara wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa raanighaata basne raamaprawesa saaha sohi thaaun basne paarwatidewi giri tathaa bhaaratako betiyaa basne suraja girile jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num jitapura basne lalanaprasaada saahakaa nau warsiya chhoraa amkita saahalaai apaharana gari hatyaa gareko aropa laageko thiyo

apaharanakaariharule amkitalaai jetha gate saanjha motarasaaikalamaa raakhera apaharana gari lagera pataka pataka gari ru laakha hajaara phirauti rakama liera kehi dinapachhi hatyaa anusandhaanamaa khulna auko chha baalakako sawa saauna gate parsaako jagaranaathapurako gandaka nahara chheumaa sadeko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko thiyo so ghatanaamaa sumlagna anyako khoji bhairaheko baaraa praharile janaaeko chha

pakraau parekaa wyaasa niwaasi warsiya mithu saapakotaa bhanne raaju saapakotaa ksetrilaai pakraau gari aja tanahun jillaa adaalatamaa pesa gardaa adaatalako adesale purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa pathaaeko chha

pharaara rahekaa pratiwaadi saapakotaalaai gata mumgalabaara wyaasa maa pakraau gari tanahun jillaa adaalatamaa upasthita garaaundaa adaalatako adesale purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa pathaaune adesa dieko tanahunkaa prahari naayaba upariksaka sunila mallale jaanakaari dinubhayo

yasaigari praharile thaana awaidha laaguausadhasahita aja chaara janaalaai pakraau gareko chha yasari pakraau parnemaa bhaanu nagarapaalikaa wadaa num niwaasi warsiya asisa bhujela bandipura gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num niwaasi warsiya akrama miyaa sohi sthaanakaa warsiya saagara khadkaa ra sohi sthaanakaa warsiya samira baaniyaan rahekaa chhan

jillaako bandipura gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num besisahara chokasthita sumkaaspada rupamaa bhetiekaa asisa bhujela ra akrama miyaalaai niyantranamaa lindaa uniharuko saathamaa daaijepaama lekheko emaelako sisi thaana nophina emaelako thaana ra pheneraagana emaela ko thaana gari thaana phelaa pareko thiyo

ukta laaguausadha kharida garna aekaa samira baaniyaa ra saagara khadkaalaai sameta sohi sthaanamaa phelaa paari laaguausadhasahita mobaaila setaharu baraamada gari tanahun jillaa adaalatamaa upasthita garaai myaada thapa gari thapa awasyakiya anusandhaana bhairaheko prahari naayaba upariksaka mallale bataaunubhayo

amerikaako bharjiniyaako herandana saharamaa eka nepaali mahilaamaathi goli prahaara bhaeko chha resama bajagaaimmaathi goli prahaara bhaeko eka mahinaa nabitdai amerikaako aoklaahaamaa raajyako atokaa saharamaa eka nepaali mahilaamaathi goli prahaara bhaeko ho gyaasa stesanamaa kaama garirahekaa belaa somabaara diunso sawaa baje rachanaa sresthamaathi goli prahaara bhaeko ho

nakhkhu kaaraagaara lalitapuramaa kartawya jyaana ra jabarjasti karanai muddaamaa kaida bhuktaana garirahekaa bhaktabahaadura sunaaralaai wanaspatijanya wisako prayoga garaai abhisekaraaja simhalagaayatale hatyaa gareko abhiyoga laageko chha

nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byurole dieko jaanakaarianusaara bardiyaa saawaka thaakuradwaaraa gaawisa kaa warsiya sunaaralaai sohi kaaraagaaramaa kaida bhuktaana garirahekaa simhalagaayatako samuhale banaspatijanya padaarthako wisa tayaara gari khaanaa sametamaa prayoga gari hatyaa gari yojanaabaddha dhumgale jela prasaasanalaai phasaaune laksya raakheko khulaasaa bhaeko janaaeko ho

simhalagaayatale ukta ghatanaa ghataaera antarika prasaasana tathaa tatkaalina chaukidaaralaai dosi saabita garaai antarika prasaasanamaa aphno warchaswa sthaapita garnaakaa saathai chaukidaarako pada praapta garne yojanaa banaaeko khulna aeko chha

praharile so ghatanaako mukhya yojanaakaara baanke nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa simha sahayogi saptarikaa manojakumaara chaurasiyaa ra arkaa sahayogi dolakhaakaa dhruwakarisna sarmaalaai kartawya jyaana muddaamaa sarakaari wakila kaaryaalaya lalitapuramaa pesa garieko prahariko bhanaai chha
kailaaliko bhajani nagarapaalikaa bhuruwaagaaunki eka mahilaale parapurusasanga milera aphno patiko hatyaa gareko bhajani ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

bhajani nagarapaalikaa ko bhuruwaa gaaunmaa warsiya nanduraajilaai unakai patni nirmalaa raaji ra premi bhaniekaa dilipa raajile ghaanti chyaapera hatyaa gareko khulaasaa bhaeko kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka raajendrabahaadura chandale bataaunubhayo
prahari tolile gaadieko sawa aja utkhanana gari pariksanakaa laagi tikaapura aspataala puyaaeko chha

wimaanasthala praharikaa prawaktaa esapi dinesaraaja mainaalikaa anusaara haramindara simha amila pala iswara daasa awataara simha rijawaana abdelale sutakesako paangraamaa haalera suna taskari garekaa thie

lalitapurako nakhkhu kaaraagaaramaa eka kaidiko hatyaa bhaeko chha kartabya jyaana ra jarwajasti karanai muddaamaa kaida bhuktaana garirahekaa bardiyaakaa warsiya bhakta bahaadura sunaarako hatyaa bhaeko khulna aeko chha praharile hatyaamaa samlagna janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

nakhkhu kaaraagaara lalitapuramaa kartabya jyaana ra jabarjasti karanai muddhaamaa barsa kaida bhuktaana garirahekaa jillaa bardiyaa saabika thaakuraddhaaraa gaabisa basne barsa ko bhakta bahaadura sunaaralaai miti gate jwaro tathaa baantaabhai blada presara kama bhaeko ra aiai gate belukaa bajetira siriyasa bhai upachaaraartha bira aspataalamaa lagekomaa eka dina tyahaan upachaara gari maa raakhnu parne bhaekole bira aspataalamaa beda upalabdha nabhaekole ai gate belukaa paatana aspataala lagieko ra nijako upachaarako kramamaa gate bihaana baje marityu bhaeko

abhiseka raaja simhako mukhya yojanaamaa banaspatijanya padaarthako bisa tayaara gari bhakta bahaaradura sunaaralaai khaanaa sametamaa prayoga gari hatyaa gari yojanaa baddha dhumgale jela prasaasana ra antarika prasaasana tathaa tatkaalina chaukidaaralaai dosi saabita garaai antarika prasaasanamaa aphno barchaswa sthaapita garnuko saathai chaukidaarako pada praapta garne yojanaa banaaeko khulna aeko abhiseka raaja simhale hatyaako yojanaa tathaa bisa tayaara ra tyasako prayogamaa manoja kumaara chaurasiyaa sametako sahayoga lieko tyasai gari bisa banaauna abasyaka parne banaspatijanya padaartha dhrubakarisna sarmaale jela bhitra puryaaune kaarya gareko khulna aeko maritaka bhakta bahaadura sunaarako saathamaa bhaeko bhanieko kaaraagaaramaa hune gareko aniyamitataa ra nijamaathi bhaeko durbyabahaara sambandhamaa maananiya garihamantrijyulaai sambodhana gari lekhieko patra abhiseka raaja simhale bhane bamojima dhrubakarisna sarmaale maritaka bhakta bahaadura sunaarale daajulaai dina bhani aspataalamaa aphulaai dieko thiyo bhani maritakako daajulaai dina lagaaeko tara tyo patra abhiseka simhako yojanaamaa maritaka bhakta bahaadura sunaaralaai lekhna lagaai nijalaai aspataala laijaanu aghinai gate dhrubakarisna sarmaale lalitapurako eka saaibarabaata patra skyaana gari gariha mantraalayamaa mela gari pathaaeko khulna aeko abhiseka raaja simhale bigatamaa garekaa tina wataa hatyaa surkhetabhaktapurajanakapura jillaamaa ra rupandehi jillaamaa gareko jyaana maarne udyogamaa sameta bisaadiko prayoga gari ghatanaa ghataaeko paaieko pratibaadiharu
watana jillaa baanke saawika nepaalagumnja nagarapaalikaa wadaa num haala nepaalaganja upamanapaa wadaa num baagyeswari
sajaayan bhaktapura jillaa adaalatabaata barsasurkheta ra janakapura jillaa adaalatabaata barsa sajaayan tokieko
watana jillaa saptari bairawaa gaabisawadaa num haalako bairawaa gaaupaalikaa wadaa num
watana jillaa dolakhaa baiteswara gaaupaalikaa wadaa num
kailaalikobhajani nagarapaalikaa basne barsiya nandu raajiko hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa unakai aphnai bhaai warsiya dilipa raaji ra srimati warsiyaa nirmalaaraajilaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

kariba dedha mahinaaaghi baaraa jillaako jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa niwaasi lalanaprasaada saahakaa nauwarsiya chhoraa amkitakumaarako apaharanapachhi hatyaa bhaeko baaraa praharile pusti gareko chha

bhaarata wihaarako sikataa balasarabaata pakraau parekaa ajaya patelako bayaana tathaa apaharita amkitajastai anuhaara bhaekosomabaara eka baalakako sawa sadegaleko awasthaamaa bhetiepachhi unako hatyaa bhaeko jaanakaari jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baaraale gareko chha

gata jetha gate apahararihata amkitako sawa paschimi parsaako jagaranaathapura gaaunsthita gandaka naharamaa boraamaa raakhieko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko pusti baaraakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka ranjitasimha raathaurale bataaunubhayo

praharile raamechhaapakaa tokala bhanne rohitabahaadura thaapaamagara ra sindhupaalchokakaa adipa bhanne tokalabahaadura taamaanalaai kaathamaadaunbaata pakraau gareko mahaasaakhaakaa prahari niriksaka bharata thaapaale bataaunubhayo madhyaraati raamabahaadura taamaanako deraabhitra prawesa garekaa uniharule ru laakha baraabarako dhanamaala dakaiti garekaa thie

yasaigari upatyakaakaa wbhiinna sthaanamaa motarasaaikala chori kaaryamaa sumlagna warsa ko laalabahaadura thaapaa magaralaai mahaasaakhaabaata khatieko wisesa prahari tolile bhaktapurako madhyapura thimi nagarapaalikaa bodebaata pakraau gareko chha

srama mantraalayako agrahamaa kaathamaadaum praharile jhandai eka mahinaaaghi bhielaena nepaala wana stepa sentara jiesaji maaigraamamaa chhaapaa maareko thiyo bhielaenakaa sumchaalaka raama prasaada srestha pakraau parekaa thie bhane gobinda thapaliyaa pakraau pareko kehi beramaa nai chhutekaa thie bhagaaepachhi praharile thapaliyaa ra baayometrikakaa sumchaalaka kailaasa khadkaalaai pharaara suchimaa raakheko chha

raamaprasaada sresthalaai bhane kaathamaadaum jillaa adaalatale laakha dharautimaa chhaadna adesa diepani pheri lalitapura praharile pakraau gareko chha eutai thagi muddaamaa sresthalaai pataka kasari muddaa chalaauna milchha eka kaanuna byawasaayile bhane unalaai phasaaune khela bhairaheko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptari ra nepaala widyut praadhikarana witarana kendra raajawiraajako sumyukta anugamana tolile jillaako tiruhata gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaa adhyaksa ramaananda chaudharisahita janaalaai widyut chori gareko aropamaa pakraau garieko widyuta praadhikarana raajawiraajale janaaeko chha

pakraau parekaa wadaa adhyaksasahitako naama jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptari ra nepaala widyut praadhikarana witarana kendra raajawiraajale sumyuktarupamaa tayaara garieko muchulkaamaa ullekha garieko chha

kapilawastuko ilaakaa wana kaaryaalaya jawaabairaathakaa sahaayaka bana adhikarita brahmadewa mahatolaai ru tina laakha rakamasahita aja akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale pakraau gareko chha mahatolaai akhtiyaarale chandrautaasthita nijako deraabaata tina laakha rakamasahita pakraau gareko ho

sewaagraahibaata ghusa rakama lieko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa mahatoko deraamaa akhtiyaarale chhaapaa maardaa rakamasahita mahatolaai phelaa paareko akhtiyaara butawalale janaaeko chha wanabaata goliyaa nikaasi kaatha kataani anumatikaa laagi sewaagraahibaata so rakama ghusa lieko ra thapa anusandhaana jaari rahekaa akhtiyaarale janaaeko chha mahato dui warsadekhi kapilawastu siwaraaja nagarapaalikaa chandrautaamaa deraamaa basdai aekaa thie

ayogale ajai sektara wana kaaryaalaya chandrautaa kapilawastukaasahaayaka wana adhikarita brahmadewa mahatolaai ru tina laakha ghusa lieko abhiyogamaa pakraau gareko chha mahatole eka sewaagraahisanga ghusa lindaalindai siwaraaja nagarapaalikaa baata pakraau garieko ayogale janaaeko chha

hatyaa gari phaalieko awasthaamaa sawa kuhiera durgandha phailiepachhi ghatanaabaare khulaasaa bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarile janaaeko chha gaaunmai durgandha phailiepachhi khoji garne kramamaa twaailetako rinale chhopieko awasthaamaa sawa bhetieko ho

taaplejunako phaktaanluna gaaunpaalikaa lelepamaa gaeraati dhaarilo hatiyaara prahaara gari srimatile srimaanko hatyaa gareki chhan andaaji warsiya sarmilaa limbule warsiya srimaan durgaa limbuko hatyaa gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya taaplejunale janaaeko chha

hatyaapachhi aphni paancha warsiyaa chhorilaai sameta gharabhitrai thunera sarmilaa raati nai pharaara bhaeko taaplejunakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka jnaanendrabahaadura basnetale bataaunubhayoe maritaka baabusangai raatabhara raheki paancha warsiyaa chhori bihaana roeko ra chichyaaeko awaaja sunepachhi chharachhimekile thaahaa paaekaa thie tyasalagattai praharilaai ghatanaabaare jaanakaari bhaeko thiyo
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya humlaako hiraasatabaata pharaara bhaekaa eka abhiyuktalaai praharile pakraau gari aja saarwajanika gareko chha

kartawya jyaana muddaamaa jillaa prahariko hiraasatamaa rahekaa chakheli gaaunpaalikaa kaa lokandra badulaai saarwajanika garieko ho uni yahi jetha gate bihaana baje hiraasatabaata pharaara bhaekaa thie yasaibicha sahaayaka pramukha jillaa adhikaari mahesakumaara pokharelako netaritwamaa simakota bajaara anugamana gardaa sthaaniya bajaaramaa sadeko kilograama maasu phelaa paari nasta garieko chha sthaaniya wyaapaarile ukta maasu nepaalaganjasurkhetabaata lyaaeko paaieko chha

jillaa adaalata moranako anumati praapta gari resturaanko kaarobaara rokkaa ra hotala banda garaai silabandi garieko samitile janaaeko chha suna taskaripachhi pharaara rahekaa bhandaarilaai yasai prakaranamaa jillaa adaalata moranamaa muddaa daayara garieko thiyo

marityu hune hanumaananagara kumkaalani nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya dipendra mandala hun saptarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka bhowesa rimaalakaa anusaara atyadhika madiraa sewana garekaa mandalako raajawiraaja nagarapaalikaa sthita sasuraali gaeko belaa wiwaada bhaera haata haalaahaala hanudaa marityu bhaeko ho

khaajaagharamaa dainika yaunadhandaa hune gareko gunaaso badhepachhi praharile somabaara saanjha chhaapaa maari morana gowindapura gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai haala chaaradobaatomaa khaajaaghara sanchaalana gardai aekaa sanchaalaka warsiya sumkara raautalaai graama laaguausadha gaanjaasahita pakraau gareko parisarakaa nimitta suchanaa adhikarita susilakumaara paandele jaanakaari dinubhayo

atha mahinaadekhi bhaaratamaa haraairahekaa eka rukumeli baalakako aja uddhaara garieko chha rukuma purwako sisne gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kaa warsiya rawina pariyaarako uddhaara gari aphantako jimmaa lagaaieko jillaa baalaadhikaara adhikarita maanawira olile jaanakaari dinubhayo

mahaasaakhaale yahi jetha dekhi ajasamma sanchaalana gareko dine kaathamaadaun upatyakaa chori niyantrana wisesa abhiyaanaantargata wibhinna thaaunbaata uniharulaai pakraau gareko mahaasaakhaakaa prawaktaa narendra upretile bataaunubhayo

kaathamaadaun bhaktapura ra lalitapurakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa aparaahna gharamaa lagaaieko taalchaa phorera lyaapatapa suna chaandi nagadasameta chori garnelaai wisesa abhiyaanamaarphata uniharulaai pakraau garieko janaaieko chha upatyakaako chori niyantrana garna bihaana dekhi saanjha bajesamma saadaa posaakamaa prahari khataai ukta abhiyaana sanchaalana garekaa haun uhaanle bhannubhayo
awaidha rupamaa lyaaieko yaarsaa gumbaasahita rasuwaagadhi naakaa hundai nepaala prawesa garekaa chaara yuwaalaai nepaala praharile aja pakraau gareko chha

prahari pramukha saratakumaara thaapaa ksetrikaa anusaara nepaala chinabichako rasuwaagadhi naakaa miteripulabaata kantenarako dibbaamaa lukaailyaaeko graama yaarsaagumbaasahita rasuwaa gosaainkunda gaaunpaalikaa kaa imaana ghale suryabahaadura ghale ra jila ghale tathaa naukunda gaaunpaalikaa kaa mumgala taamaanalaai pakraau garieko ho
madhyapurathimi nagarapaalikaakaa pramukha madanasundara sresthalaai akramana garne dui abhiyuktalaai aja bhaktapura jillaa adaalatale purpaksakaa laagi kaaraagaara chalaana gareko chha

gata waisaakha gate madhyapurathimi gaththaagharasthita aphnai niwaasamaa akramanamaa parnubhaekaa sresthalaai akramana gari ghaaite banaaune kusala bogati ra sawina laamaalaai jillaa adaalatakaa nyaayaadhisa bhojaraaja sarmaakoe ijalaasale thunaamaa raakhna adesa diepachhi duwailaai dillibajaara kaaraagaara chalaana garieko adaalatakaa ijalaasa adhikarita kamala mahatale jaanakaari dinubhayo

kaalikota rupsaa ghara bhai bhaktapurako sallaaghaari basne warsiya bogati netrawikrama chanda netaritwako nekapaakaa bhaktapura jillaa sekretari ra raamechhaapa dorambaa gaaunpaalikaa maanedaandaa ghara bhai saanothimi basne laamaa sohi paartikaa jillaa sadasya hun

rautahatamaa katahariyaa nagarapaalikaa duumariyaa gaaunkaa swaasthyakarmi ahewa dilipa saahakaa warsiya chhoraa sanidewala bhanne yuwaraaja saahako apaharanapachhi hatyaa bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

maritakako ghara katahariyaa dekhi jhandai kilomitara purwa gadhimaai nagarapaalikaa wadaa ra baagamati nadi kinaarako bagarabaata unako sawa baraamada garisakeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya garudaakaa pramukha prahari niriksaka chatuurbhuuja ojhaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

apaharana tathaa hatyaako aropamaa praharile paancha janaa sthaaniyalaai pakraau gari awasyaka anusandhaana suru garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa emwa prahari naayaba upariksaka raamakumaara daanile bataaunuubhayo

hatyaako kaarana bhane khuulna nasakeko tathaa ghatanaabaare anuusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatale janaaeko chha maritakako sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala gaura pathaaieko chha

naabaalakakaa saatha sanchaalanamaa raheko ukta mobaailamaa duuiwataa sima raheko thiyo mowaailamaa nepaala telikamako ra enaselako nambarako sima raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya katahariyaale janaaeko chha

ghatanaasthala jillaa sadaramuukaama katahariyaabaata jhandai kilomitara uttara paschimamaa pardachha katahariyaa nagarapaalikaamaa apaharanapachhi hatyaa bhaeko yo pahilo ghatanaa raheko bataaieko chha

jebhiyara intaranesanala skula bauddhabaata goldenageta intaranesanala kaleja wattisaputalibaata saata bhiesa niketana tinakunebaata nobela ekedemi nayaan baaneswarabaata yunibharsala kaleja maitidewibaata taaimsa intaranesanala kaleja dillibajaarabaata elaaraai skula kalumkibaata dui enakesimha memoriyala kaleja nayaan baaneswarabaata atha ra triniti intaranesanala kaleja dillibajaarabaata tina janaalaai niyantranamaa liieko parisarale janaaeko chha
