kaabhreko ugrachandi kaa wirendralaala srestha waaltina kaa balaraama saapakotaa solukhumbuko keruna kaa ankaaji serpaa ra moranako daangihaata kaa raghunaatha puriko hatiyaara praharile baraamada gareko ho
mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaale uniharuko hatiyaara baraamada gareko haae
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskibaata khatieko saadaa posaakako prahari tolile eka laakha chha hajaara nagadasahita janaa juwaadelaai pakraau gareko chha
pokharaa lekhanaatha mahaanagarapaalikaa maatepaani basne warsiya raaja gurunako gharabaata sanibaara chha buka taasasahita pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

pakraau parnemaa pokharaa lekhanaatha mahaanagarapaalikaa raanipauwaakaa warsiya netrabahaadura guruna warsiya laksmana guruna warsiya gagana guruna pokharaa kaa warsiya karisnabahaadura guruna warsiya raaja guruna warsiya lihitakumaara guruna warsiya manabahaadura guruna wadaa num bhadrakaalikaa warsiya tejabahaadura guruna ra baajhaapaatanakaa warsiya rasabahaadura guruna chhan sanibaara pakraau parekaa sabailaai thunaamaa raakhi awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya humlaabaata aja bihaana kartawya jyaana muddaakaa dui abhiyukta pharaara bhaekaa chhan

rupandehi jillaa adaalatale prahari mudabhethamaa maariekaa manoja punako mukhya sahayogikaa rupamaa bhumikaa nirwaaha gareko aropamaa pakraau parekaa atha janaalaai aja purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa raakhne adesa dieko chha

punalaai aparaadhika kriyaakalaapa ra rakama asulimaa sahayoga gareko pramaanakaa adhaaramaa pakraau parekaa tiwiruddha adaalatamaa bhaeko thunachhekako bahasapachhi jillaa nyaayaadhisa bholaanaatha dhakaalako ijalaasale purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa raakhne adesa dieko adaalatakaa saakhaa adhikarita gumgaaprasaada achaaryale jaanakaari dinubhayo
adaalatale uniharu sabailaai muluki aina adaalati bandobastiko ko dehaaya bamojima purpaksakaa laagi thunaamaa raakhne adesa dieko saakhaa adhikarita achaaryale jaanakaari dinubhayo

gata kaattika gate bhaeko ghatanaakaa abhiyukta udayapura chaudandigadhi napaa sthaayi ghara bhai haala bhaktapura sallaaghaari basne warsiya surendra chaudharilaai pakraau gariekoe mahaanagariya prahari parisara bhaktapurakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka karisna prasaaile jaanakaari dinubhayo

yasaigari chaangunaaraayana nagarapaalikaa kaa asisa bhandelalaai khukuri prahaara gari sakhta ghaaite banaai pharaara rahekaa kaabhrepalaanchoka chaumri deuraali gaaunpaalikaa kaa wimala laamaalaai praharile paancha warsapachhi aja pakraau gareko chha

bihaana aberasamma gharamai bhaekaa uniharu khaanaa khaaepachhi ekai samayamaa gharapariwaarabaata samparkawihina baneko uhaanle bataaunubhayo haami gharakaa aru sadasya nabhaeko samayamaa uniharu duwaijanaa gharabaata niskiekaa thie aphanta ra naataagotaa sabaikomaa khoji gayaanai tara kehi pani pattaa laagna sakena budhaale bhannubhayo haraaekaa duwai mahilaako umera warsa raheko chha

khoji kaaryako laagi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya darabaanamaa taswirasahita awasyaka huliyaa diera khojikaaryakaa laagi niwadena die pani ahilesamma praharile sameta uniharuko awasthaabaare kunai jaanakaari paauna nasakeko bataaieko chha chinaakaa srimaan gaaunmai rahekaa chhan saaudimaa rahekaa omamaayaankaa srimaansameta aphno srimati gharabaata bhaagera gaepachhi ghara pharkiekaa chhan
wibhinna bahaanaa banaai samayamai kaama sampanna nagarne eka nirmaana wyawasaayilaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

laamosaanghujiri sadakaantargata khaadichauradekhi mudhesammako sadaka staronnati gari kaalopatra garne jimmaa paaekaa sunaulo khimti jebhikaa thekadaara dharmaraaja bhandaarilaai aja chautaaraabaata niyantranamaa liieko prahari upariksaka mohanaprasaada pokharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo khaadichauradekhi mudhesammako kimiko ru karodamaa mukhya thekedaara bhaaratako simaanchala gauri paarwati sunaulo khimti jebhisanga thekkaa samjhautaa thiyo

pahilo khandako gata mumsirasamma sampanna hunuparne ra dosro khandako gata waisaakhamaa sampanna garisaknuparnemaa dasainpachhidekhi nai kaama banda gari kaamamaa baadhaa puyaaeko bhani sthaaniyawaasile belaabelaamaa awaaja uthaaundai aekaa thie swisa sarakaarako sahayogamaa chaara dasakaaghi nirmita khaadichaura jirisammako kimi sadaka karisi sadakakaa rupamaa nirmaana bhaeko thiyo haala sadaka jyaadai saanghuro bhaepachhi dui warsaaghidekhi sadaka sudhaarako kaama suru bhaeko thiyo sadaka chaudaa garne ra tewaa parkhaalako kaama pratisata puraa bhae pani duwai khandako jammaa kaama pratisata maatra bhaeko sadaka sudhaara tathaa wikaasa ayojanaaantargata laamosaanghutaamaakosijiri sadaka yojanaakaa pramukha kedaara nepaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
gariha mantraalayale kilo suna ra sanama saakya hatyaa prakaranakaa wisayamaa pharaka dhaaranaa raakhekaa janaa nepaala praharikaa purwa adhikaariharumaathi kaarabaahi garne bhaeko chha

kehidina aghi purwa eaiji raajendrasimha bhandaari ra diaijiddhaya hemanta malla ramesa kharelale haai riksamaa kaama garne prahari adhikaari diwesa lohani prajita kesi ra baalakarisna sumjelalaai phasaaieko bhandai asantusti janaaekaa thie

yasari praharilaai kaarabaahi gardaa praharimaa anusandhaana prakriyaa rokine uniharuko tarka thiyo saathai uniharule chhaanabina samitiko kaama kaarabaahiprati sameta asantusti janaaekaa thie anusandhaana garne kaama nijaamati karmachaariko nabhaeko uniharuko tarka thiyo
aphagaanistaanako uttari praanta takhaarako darkaada jillaamaa jillaa parisad nirwaachanamaa mahilaatarphabaata ummedawaara baneki eka sadasyalaai ajnaata sasastra eka samuhale apaharana gareko chha
darkaada jillaako jillaa parisadkaa mahilaa ummedawaara phajilaalaai praantiya raajadhaani taalukaana saharamaa apaharana garieko bataaieko chha
darkaada jillaamaa niyantrana jamaaera basekaa taalibaana atankakaari samuhale bhane yasa bisayamaa kehi tippanai garekaa chhainan

garihamantri raamabahaadura thaapaale aphule kaaryabhaara samhaaleko eka saya dinamaa nirmaanamaa dhilaasusti garne tathaa kamasala kaama garne thekedaalaai bhautika purwaadhaara mantraalaya sahari wikaasa mantraalayalagaayata niyakaayasangako samanwayamaa kaarawaahi aghi badhaaieko aja mantraalayamaa ayojita patrakaara sammelanamaa bataaunubhayo jatisukai saktisaali thekedaara bhae pani usalaai kaarawaahiko daayaraamaa lyaaera chhaadne daridhataa mantri thaapaale garnubhayo

yastai suna taskari prakaranamaa aba thulaa kaarowaari pani pakraau parne sumketa gardai uhaanle bhannubhayo suna taskarikaa bhuraa maachhaa ra majhaulaa maachhaa pakraau parekaa chhan aba thulaa maachhaa pani pakraau pardaichhan sarakaarale lieko wikaasa ra samariddhiko laksya praapta garna bhrastaachaara taskari ra aniyamitataako jaraidekhi antya garne abhiyaanamaa mantraalayale sakriya rupamaa kaama gariraheko uhaanko bhanaai thiyo uhaanle bhannubhayo susaasana kaayama garna widyamaana taskari aparaadhika ghatanaa ra gatiwidhi nisteja garna laksyasahita bunde gariha prasaasana sudhaara yojanaa banaaunaakaa saathai bunde nirdesana sabai jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayamaa pathaaieko chha sohianusaara kaarya aghi badhirahekaa chhan

madiraa niyantrana abhiyaana uhaankaa anusaara madiraa niyantrana ra laaguausadha nisedha abhiyaanalaai pani mantraalayale abhiyaanakaa rupamaa laijaana laageko chha traaphika wyawasthaapana praarambha bhaeko saatai pradesamaa praadesika suraksaa gosthi garieko laamo samayadekhi rokieko nepaala prahari ra sasastra prahariko saruwaabadhuwaa niyamita garieko bidaa katauti tathaa sarakaari sawaari saadhanako durupayoga roknejastaa kaaryalaai saya dinako aphno upalabdhikaa rupamaa garihamantri thaapaale linubhaeko chha

yahi jetha gate paancha janaa saathisanga phewaataalamaa aphain dungaa chalaaera ghumiraheko awasthaamaa achaanaka chatyaana pardaa dungaabaata khasera bepattaa bhaekaa laamaako sawa aja aparaahna pokharaa raatodaandaa najika taalamaa tairieko awasthaamaa bhetieko prahari prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka khadakabahaadura khatrile jaanakaari dinubhayo

uhaankaa anusaara dubekai dinadekhi gotaakherako tolisahita nepaala prahari sasastra prahari ra nepaala armiko tolile khoji kaarya jaari raakhepani phewaataalako siratarpam gahiro bhaagamaa dubeko kaarana sawa utrina laamo samaya laageko huna sakne bataaieko chha laamaako sawa pariksana gari ajai aphantalaai bujhaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
bama kaandakaa naamamaa dhanusaa mahottari ra saptari jillaakaa bepattaa paariekaa wyaktiko awasthaa ahile pani ajnaata chha

wisa asaara gate bamakaandako abhiyukta banaai dhanusaa jillaa dewadihaakaa janakapuramaa niji klinika chalaai chikitsaa pesaamaa sumlagna daa laksminaaraayana jhaalaai tatkaalina esapi naaraayanasimha gurunako netaritwamaa pakraau garieko saakyako pratiwedanamaa ullekha chha

huna ta yasabaare janakapura anchala prahari kaaryaalayale phaaguna gatemaa samitilaai pathaaeko patramaa bamakaandamaa janakapuramaa kunai maanisa pakraau pareko srestaa chhaina bhanne jaanakaari dieko dekhinchha
tara samitile daa jhaalaai saauna gatesamma hanumaana dhokaamaa ra saauna gatedekhi sasastra prahari gana naksaalamaa praharile raakheko pramaana prastuta gareko chha

thunaamaa raakhiekaa belaa kaathamaadaanaimaa saala saaunako antyatira thunaamaa rahekaa adhiwaktaa kataka mallale aphusahita kehi bandiharulaai sadara prahari taalima kendra mahaaraaganjamaa sodhapuchha garna laagdaa daa jhaasanga kariba adhaaghantaa raakhieko kuraa bataaekaa chhan

daa jhaako klinikamaa kaama garne dhanusaa jillaa kapileswarakaa satyanaaraayana saahalaai asaara gate praharile pakraau gari asaara gate kaathamaadaanai chalaana gareko ekamahinaapachhi uhaanko bubaa raamaekawaala saahale chhoraalaai bhetana jaandaa kaathamaadaanai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa lugaa bujhaaekaa thie

tyastai saalako bamakaandako samayamaa pakraau gari sirahaa jelamaa rahekaa dhanusaa jillaa choraa koyalapurakaa suryanaatha raana yaadawalaai asaara gate kaathamaadau kendriya kaaraagaara chalaana gareko srestaa banaai kaathamaadau jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa thunaamaa raakhieko pratiwedanamaa ullekha chha

yasapachhi bhadau gate suryanaathalaai punah sirahaa phirtaa gareko dekhie pani asoja gatemaa sagaramaathaa anchalaadhisa kaaryaalayale eutaa patra pathaai suryanaathalaai khotaana kaaraagaaramaa saarne adesa anusaara sirahaabaata asoja gatemaa udayapura jillaako siddhipura gaaun okhraahaa dobhaanamaa baasa basekaa thaaunmaa raati thunuwaale pisaaba laagyo bhani hatkadisahita disaapisaaba garna laagdaa paale upara jabarajasti bala prayoga gari hatkadisahita bhaageko bhanne prahari pratiwedanamaa ullekha chha

jetha gate janakapurabaata dhanusaa jillaa umaa premapurakaa iswarachandra laamaa ra padmabahaadura moktaanalaai pakraau gari kaathamaadaum chalaana garieko dekhinchha nepaali kaangerasako ahwaanamaa bhaeko satyaagrahamaa liekaa kaarana uhaanharulaai pakraau garie pani pachhi bama kaandamai sumlagna raheko bhani abhiyukta banaaieko thiyo

surumaa pakraau gari saarwajanika suraksaa antargata naktaajhija posta haausamaa thunaamaa raakhieko thiyo so sthaanamaa mahendranaaraana nidhi anandaprasaada dhungaanaa warisesachandra laalasanga uhaanharulaai dinasamma sumgai raakhieko thiyo tyasapachhi uhaanharuko chhaatimaa nepaali kaangresa lekheko pleta raakhna lagaaera photo khichi surti wikaasa kampaniko godaamamaa raakheko ra pachhi mahottari kaaraagaara hundai tatkaalina pramukha jillaa adhikaari ghanaanaatha ojhaako adesale jelabaata punah praharilaai bujhaai mahottaribaata kaathamaadaum chalaana garieko pratiwedanamaa ullekha chha

chaudharikaa baaremaa rahasyamaya dhangako rihaa patra pani chha tara chaudhari kahaan chhan yo sawaala chaudhari lagaayata bamakaandakaa naamamaa pakraau gari bepattaa paarie sabaisanga sambandhita chha
basnetamaathi bhaktapura kaathamaadaanai ra syaanjaa jillaa adaalata tathaa uchcha adaalata paatanamaa darjanabhandaa badhi muddaa raheko bataaieko chha

saamaajika sanjaala imo maarphata chiththaa pareko bhandai yahaanki eka mahilaalaai thagi gareko abhiyogamaa pakraau parekaa lalitapura mahaalaksmi nagarapaalikaa imaadolakaa rasmi ghimirelaai praharile thagi muddaamaa kaarabaahi suru gareko chha

nepaala telikamako simakaarda prayoga garebaapata ru laakhako chiththaa pareko bhandai tyo rakama praapta garna raajaswa sulka chaahinelagaayatakaa bahaanaamaa ti mahilaalaai thagi garne warsakaa ghimirewiruddha somabaara nuwaakota jillaa adaalatamaa muddaa dartaa gari anusandhaana suru gareko jillaa prahari pramukha wasanta kunwarale jaanakaari dinubhayo

imomaarphata wijayakumaara bhanne wyaktile phona ra sandesamaarphata thagi garne girohako sadasya ghimiremaathi garieko anusandhaanako kramamaa thapa anya wyaktile pani thagi gareko tathya bhettine krama suru bhaeko chha prahari pramukha kunwarale bataaunubhayo sabaijaso baimkamaa khaataa kholne ra nepaaladekhi bhaaratasamma nai sanjaala rahekaale anusandhaanako daayaraamaa dheraiko sumlagnataa dekhieko chha
uhaankaa anusaara pakraau parekaa ghimireko bayaanako adhaaramaa praharile kaathamaadaun mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa amira saakyalaai pakraau gari anusandhaana suru garieko chha

nepaala praharikaa purwa eaiji raajendrasimha bhandaari diaijiddhaya hemanta malla thakuri ra ramesa kharelale aitabaara diwesa lohanisahita prahari adhikaari phasaaieko bhandai apatti janaaekaa thie haai riksamaa kaama garnelaai yasari thundaa anusandhaana phitalo hune uniharule bataaekaa thie

pakraau parekaamadhye kaalu raanaa jabarjasti karanai muddaamaa wisum maa kanchanapura jillaamaa pakraau pari chha warsa kaida basera wisum maaghamaa chhuteko anusandhaanamaa khulna aeko praharile janaaeko chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale nepaala widyut praadhikarana nepaalaganja witarana kendrakaa ilektrikala injiniyara nisaara ahamada khaana ra kaaryaalaya sahaayogi girawalalaala dhobiwiruddha ru hajaara ghusa lieko abhiyogamaa aja wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha

lamajuna jillaa nyaayaadhisa komalaprasaada achaaryako ijalaasale sumgathita aparaadha niwaarana aina antargata jyaalaa majaduri gardai aekaa manaanako naasona gaaunpaalikaa daanaakyukaa warsiya paasaana gurunalaai ukta sajaaya garne phaisaalaa gareko srestedaara bhumiprasaada sarmaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

yasaaghi gata bihibaara nilambita waristha prahari upariksaka sayaamabahaadura khatrile jillaa adaalatamaa atmasamarpana garekaa thie jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale gata waisaakha gate suna taskari sanama saakyako hatyaa ra saamgathanika rupamaa aparaadhika samuha sanchaalana gareko abhiyogamaa ghalesahita janaamaathi muddaa dartaa gareko thiyo

yasa patakako badhuwaa siphaarisa raamraalaai bhandaa pani haamraalaai paarieko chha raamraa raamraa praharile nikai tala ra wiwaaditaharulaai agaadi lyaaieko bhandai prahari karmachaarimaa tibra wiwaada chha

raapti nagarapaalikaa wadaa num ko mahaadewataarasthita suradewi saamudaayika wanabhitra lukaairaakhekaa awasthaamaa kilo pratibandhita laaguausadha gaanjaa phelaa pareko chitawanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka prabhuprasaada dhakaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
aja diunsoko samayamaa ukta wanamaa ghaansa kaatna gaekaa sthaaniya maanisale jumgalamaa gaajaako thulaa pokaa dekhepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

sthaaniyale dieko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa asthaayi prahari posta lotharabaata khatieko prahariko tolile paancha kilo taulako wataa pokaamaa baandhera raakheko awasthaamaa aparaahna gaajaa phelaa paarekaa thie

ukta gaanjaalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhandaaraamaa lyaaieko praharile janaaeko chha gaanjaa kasale raakheko bhanne pahichaana huna nasakekaale anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaeko chha

yataa chitawana praharile thulomaatraamaa pratibandhita ausadhisahita ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num kamalanagarabaata kaalikotakaa warsiya bhuwana adhikaarilaai thulo parimaanamaa ausadhisahita pakraau garieko chitawanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka prabhuprasaada dhakaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata saptariko bhaaradahamaa aja eka mahilaako sawa phelaa pareko chha
hanumaanagara kumkaalani nagarapaalikaa kosi byaareja najikai purwapaschima raajamaarga chheumaa mahilaako sawa phelaa pareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhaaradahale janaaeko chha

sawa pariksanakaa laagi raajawiraajasthita gajendranaaraayana simha sagaramaathaa anchala aspataalamaa raakhieko chha ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarile janaaeko chha

pariwaarako kaanchho santaana gumaauna pugepachhi pariwaara ra simgo gaaun nai sokamaa dubeko chha amaa dewi ksetri ardhacheta awasthaamaa chhin bhane gaaunlemaa sameta ruwaabaasi chaleko chha ksetrilaai kutapita gari hatyaa garne saathi chaaraijanaa prahari niyantranamaa raheko bujhieko chha
mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaunle bhansaara chhalera lyaaeko sunasahita ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parekaa yaadawalaai aja awasyaka kaanuni kaarabaahikaa laagi tribhuwana antarraastriya wimaanasthala bhansaara kaaryaalaya gaucharana pathaaeko praharile janaaeko chha
kaabhrepalaanchokako banepaa nagarapaalikaa dhaneswarakaa warsiya iswara thaapaako hatyaamaa sumlagna dui janaa abhiyuktalaai praharile pakraau gari aja saarwajanika gareko chha

gata somabaara raati sohi thaaunmaa basdai aekaa thaapaalaai haatakhuttaa bhaanchieko awasthaamaa praharile taharaa chheumaa nai maritaawasthaamaa phelaa paareko thiyo ghatanaako anusandhaanakaa kramamaa praharile saawika sindhupaalchoka jillaa helambu gaawisa kaa warsiya laksmana bhanine wasanta khadkaa ra banepaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raaju sigdelalaai aja saarwajanika gareko chha uniharulaai praharile wiraatanagarabaata pakraau gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaakaa prahari niriksaka sunilajumga saahale bataaunubhayo

thaapaale maadaka padaartha sewana gari pataka pataka kothaamaa gai gaali beijjati gari kutapita gareko anusandhaanabaata khuleko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya banepaakaa prahari niriksaka saahale jaanakaari dinubhayo
eka mahilaalaai balaatkaara gareko aropamaa pakraau parekaa maaijogamaai gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya dipaka bhattaraailaai jillaa adaalata ilaamale adhaai warsa kaida sajaaya sunaaeko chha
uni jillaa adaalata moranamaa upasthita bhaeko moranakaa prahari upariksaka manojakumaara kesile jaanakaari garaaunubhayo

suna taskari hatyaa ra saamgathanika aparaadhalagaayatakaa wisayamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranadwaaraa janaamaathi muddaa dartaa gariemaa uni pharaarako suchimaa thie so ghatanaamaa aba pharaara abhiyuktako sumkhyaa raheko chha
rukuma paschimako musikota nagarapaalikaa sahida maidaanamaa mumgalabaara bihaana marita awasthaamaa phelaa pareki mahilaako hatyaa aropamaa eka janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha
hatyaako aropamaa musikota nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya amarabahaadura baadilaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukuma paschimale jaanakaari dieko chha
rukuma purwako sisne gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai haala musikota nagarapaalikaa khalumgamaa basdai aeki warsiyaa ichchhaa wisi marita awasthaamaa phelaa pareki thiin

uhaanlaai somabaara raati baadile aphnai deraamaa bolaai saaririka samparka garne kramamaa mahilaako jyaana gaeko ra marityupaschaat sawa bokera najikaiko naalaamaa phaaleko swikaara gareko prahari naayaba upariksaka sumita khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka risikumaara dhumgaanaako netaritwamaa gaeko prahari toliko wisesa anusandhaanapachhi amarabahaadura baadilaai pakraau garieko uhaanko bhanaai chha pakraau parekaa baadilaai kartawya jyaanaantargata muddaa chalaaeko bataaieko chha
jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya moranakaa pramukha jillaa adhikaari raamaprasaada achaaryale unalaai jela chalaanako adesa sunaaekaa hunaphaimmaathi unimaathi aaphailaai haanna lagaaeko abhiyoga chha

adesapachhi jhumkaa kaaraagaara lagiekaae chha dhaarmika himsaa bhadkaaune uddesyale aphaile aphailaai goli haanna lagaaeko aropamaa sriniwaasalaai praharile waisaakha gate kaathamaadaumbaata pakraau gareko thiyo

malesiyaamaa jyaana gumaaekaa bhaaiko sawa liera ghara jaandai gardaa baa cha nambarako pikaapabaata khasera ghaaite bhaekaa taaplejunako phaktaanaluna gaaunpaalikaa khejenimakaa warsiya bhaktabahaadura sabenhaanako marityu bhaeko paanchathara praharile janaaeko chha

mumgalabaara mechi raajamaargaantargata paanchatharako hilihaana taarimaa pugdaa pikaapabaata khasera ghaaite bhaekaa unako upachaarakaa laagi paanchathara aspataalamaa lyaaundai gardaa baatomai jyaana gaeko ho

ghatanaapachhi gaadi ra chaalakalaai jorapokhari prahari chaukile niyantranamaa lieko chha ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paanchatharakaa prahari naayaba niriksaka waamadewa gautamale bataaunubhayo
mahottari jillaako lohaarapatti nagarapaalikaamaa mumgalabaara saanjha kheliraheko awasthaamaa taaukaamaathi pola bhaanchiera khasdaa eka baalakako marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa lohaarapatti nagarapaalikaa bagadaa gaaun basne mohanaji yaadawakaa chhoraa atha warsiya sikindra yaadawa raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari upariksaka kubera kadaayatale bataaunubhayo

taauko maathi nai adhaa pola jhari gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa baalaka yaadawalaai tatkaala pariwaarajanale upachaarakaa laagi janakapura anchala aspataalamaa lagekomaa unako sohi aspataalamaa upachaarakai kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile janaaeko chha

raamapura nagarapaalikaa dewisthaana basne warsiya milana nepaali mumgalabaara diunso kaaligandakisthita kopcheghaatamaa saathiharusangai paudi khelne kramamaa bepattaa bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamapurakaa prahari naayaba niriksaka enabahaadura thaapaale bataaunubhayo bepattaa baalakako ahile khoji kaarya bhairaheko chha
paschima chitawanako jagatapurasthita dhruwa bhanne sthaanamaa gaindaako akramanabaata gaeraati eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale dieko jaanakaarianusaara bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita jagatapurabaata dhruwatarpha jaandai gardaa gaindaako akramanamaa pari sthaaniya warsiya arjuna ksetriko marityu bhaeko ho
raati gaindaale akramana garera gambhira ghaaite banaaekaa unalaai upachaarakaa laagi raati h baje kaleja apha medikala saainseja siksana aspataala bharatapuramaa lyaaieko thiyo
unako upachaarakai kramamaa raatinai jyaana gaeko praharile janaaeko chha sawalaai pariksanakaa laagi ahile bharatapura aspataala lyaaune tayaari garieko praharile janaaeko chha

gurukulamaa ilaama nagarapaalikaa barabotekaa dalita baalaka wikaasa kaarkidoli darji laai bharnaa naliera jaatiya chhuwaachhuta gareko aropamaa chaapaagaaimlaai praharile pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari pramukha prahari upariksaka wisnau kesile jaanakaari dinubhayo
mantriparisadko siphaarisamaa eghaaraun ganatantra diwasa kaa upalaksyamaa asala chaalachalanakaa kaidiko sajaaya chhotyaai somabaara maaphi diieko raastrapati kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
baitadiko dogadaakedaara gaaunpaalikaa panjyunayaansthita chaulaani nadi kinaaramaa somabaara saanjha ukta bewaarise sawa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baitadile janaaeko chha

gahun goro warna paancha phita chaara incha uchaai raatomaa kaalo dharsaa bhaeko sarta hariyo kattu lagaaeko sarira paatalo halkaa jumgaa daahri paaleko kaalo kapaala khairo juttaa lagaaeko andaaji warsakaa maanisako sawa phelaa pareko praharile janaaeko chha

sawa duitina dina pahileko jasto raheko bataaieko chha somabaara saanjha bajetira sthaaniya baasindaale nadi kinaaramaa sawa dekhepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie prahariko toli ghatanaasthalatarpha gaeko ra ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana thaalieko praharile janaaeko chha

gata sukrabaara bihaana aspataalamaa puyaae pani upachaarakai kramamaa aitabaara diunso aspataalakaa chikitsakale marita ghosita gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka ewum prawaktaa dipaka mahata ksatrile bataaunubhayo acheta awasthaamaa aspataalamaa puyaaiekaa biraami nimoniyaale grasita bhaepani chikitsakale upachaarako prayaasa gareko beni aspataalakaa daa nawaraaja bastaakotile bataaunubhayo
nepaala praharile baaghako chhaalaa bikri garne tayaarimaa rahekaa chaara janaalaai aja pakraau gareko chha
taamaulipaasa raajyamaa raheko eutaa khaadya udyogamaa kaaryarata ti mahilaalaai kaaryaalaya baahirabaata hatiyaaradhaari wyaktile gata sukrabaara ti mahilaalaai apaharana garekaa thie

mahilaaharuko sawa uttari raajyako eka raajamaarga ksetramaa bhetieko adhikaariharule jaanakaari diekaa chhan meksikoko raajyamaa laaguausadha lagaayatakaa wibhinna muddaamaa praayahnimukhaa naagarikaharu himsaamaa parne garekaa paaieko chha
kaabhrepalaanchokako paanchakhaala nagarapaalikaa boharedobhaana jaane baatoko choka najikaiko jangalamaa nakkali dalara dekhaai thagna khojne eka janaalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha

amerikana dalara satahi garna khojeko bhanne wisesa suraakiko adhaaramaa sindhupaalchokako baahrawise nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya winoda taamaanalaai pakraau garieko prahari naayaba upariksaka mahendraprasaada maraasinile bataaunubhayo

praharile morana wiraatanagara upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthaayi ghara bhai haala bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa maa deraa gari basne warsiya tharkabahaadura basnetalaai pakraau gareko prahari parisara bhaktapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka karisna prasaarimle jaanakaari dinubhayo

gata waisaakha gate bhaktapurasthita sahida dharmabhakta maanawa amga pratyaaropana kendramaa kaabhrepalaanchoka saawika tukuchaa gaawisa wadaa num ghara bhai haala banepaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya kumaara girilaai jhukyaaera mirgaulaa nikaali abhiyukta basnetalaai pratyaaropana garieko prahariko bhanaai chha

kaaski jillaako pokharaa lekhanaatha mahaanagarapaalikaa thapaudi raatomaate daandaa sthita phewaataalamaa haawaahuri tathaa chatyaanko kaarana alapatra parekaa chaara janaa antarika paryatakaharuko jetha gate epiepha tolile sakusala udwaara gareko chha

so ghatanaabaare jaanakaari paaunaasaathai sasastra prahari bala nepaala kaalikaa gana maalepaatana pokharaabaata phewaataala taawara suraksaartha khatieko epiepha toli tatkaalai udwaara kaaryamaa khatieko thiyo

tyasawelaa ti wyaktiharu dumgaa bhaadaamaa lii phewaataalamaa botina gariraheko awasthaamaa ekkaasi aeko haawaahuri warsaa ra chatyaanako kaarana dumgaa aniyantrita bhai alapatra pareko awasthaamaa epiepha tolile tatkaalai chaara janaako sakusala udwaara gareko ho
sasastra prahari naayawa upariksaka gautamaraaja kunwarako kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile uniharulaai motara botako sahaayataale udwaara gareko hoe
haraairahekaa wyaktiko khojikaaryakaa laagi sasastra prahari balako gotaakhorasahitako toli parichaalana garieko chha
eka kilo suna ra laakha rupaiyaan luteko aropamaa sasastra praharikaa asai pakraau parekaa chhan
asai wisaala khadkaalaai kaathamaadaum prahari parisarale lutapaatamaa sumlagna bhaeko aropamaa aitabaara pakraau gareko ho uni sasastra mukhyaalaya halchokako khelakuda saakhaamaa kaaryarata chhan

dolpaako thulibheri nagarapaalikaa wadaa num maa parne gyaalawaaraa paatana pugekaa tripuraasundari nagarapaalikaa likukaa warsiya naaraayanaprasaada pahaadiko leka laagera marityu bhaeko ho tyastai dolpobuddha gaaunpaalikaako dho taaksi paatana pugekaa jaajarakota nalagaada nagarapaalikaa khagenakota kaa warsiya bhadrabahaadura chanaaraako pani leka laagera marityu bhaeko chha uniharulaai leka laagepachhi upachaarakaa laagi dunaitarpha lyaaundai gardaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

yastai dho taaksi paatanamaa leka laagera sikista biraami parekaa rukuma athabisakota nagarapaalikaakaa haribahaadura saahilaai nepaali senaako helikoptarabaata uddhaara gari thapa upachaarakaa laagi nepaalaganja puyaaieko jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya dolpaale janaaeko chha

sanchaara samasyaakaa kaarana paatanabaata yathaartha jaanakaari auna kathina raheko praharile janaaeko chha saanaatinaa swaasthya samasyaalaai samasyaa namaanne ra antima awasthaa aepachhi maatra guhaarne paramparaale uddhaaramaa kathinaai aune gareko anubhawa raheko sahaayaka pramukha jillaa adhikaari indraprasaada chaapaagaaimle bataaunubhayo

parisaraantargatako mahaanagariya prahari waritta swayambhule chaumati pula najika laaguausadha kaarobaara bhairaheko wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa baankekaa warsiya dilipa giri baankekai warsiya wikaasa kesi ra kaathamaadaunkaa warsiya riwaaja laamaalaai pakraau gareko ho

patrakaara sammelanamaa parisarakaa pramukha ewum prahari waristha upariksaka wiswaraaja pokharelale swayambhu ilaakaamaa laaguausadha bikri witarana garne gareko wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa khojatalaasa gardaa tina janaalaai pakraau gareko jaanakaari dinubhayo pakraau parekaasanga sodhapuchha gardaa sahamatiko adhaaramaa bikri witarana garna hindeko khulaaekaa chhan uhaanle bhannubhayo
pakraau parekaa tinai janaalaai laaguausadha muddaamaa kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatabaata chha dinako myaada thapa gari anusandhaana bhairaheko parisarale janaaeko chha

ayogakaa prawaktaa kaaliprasaada paraajulikaa anusaara eka ejensi nawikaranakaa kramamaa naayabasubbaa saapakotaale sewaagraahisanga ghusa maagdaamaagdai ayogako tolile kaaryaalaya parisarabaatai pakraau gareko ho aropi saapakotaako anusandhaana bhairaheko ayogale janaaeko chha
yastai ayogale yaataayaata wyawasthaa kaaryaalaya mahaakaalikaa tatkaalina nimitta kaaryaalaya pramukha hemantabahaadura simhasameta janaawiruddha ajai wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha

lilaama sawaari saadhana dartaa garne kramamaa wyaapaarisangako milematomaa nimitta kaaryaalaya pramukha simha mekaanikala injiniyara dipaka thaapaa naayaba subbaa narendraraaja josi mahaadewa bhatta taaraadatta bhatta kesawadatta badu kharidaara syaamakarisna ojhaa sawaari kaarobaari gokulaprasaada srestha dinesa bama karana bhandaariwiruddha wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara garieko ayogale janaaeko chha
