akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale ausadhi wyawasthaa wibhaaga nepaalaganjamaa kaaryarata phaarmesi adhikarita tapendra bhattaraaiwiruddha wisesa adaalatamaa muddaa daayara gareko chha

aropi bhattaraaiwiruddha hadaisammako kaarabaahiko maaga garieko ayogale janaaeko chha yastai ayogale mechinagara nagarapaalikaa kaaryaalaya karisi wikaasa saakhaa chaaraali jhaapaakaa karisi prasaara adhikarita siwasumkara kusiyaitawiruddha pani wisesa adaalatamaa aja muddaa daayara gareko chha

chitawanako bharatapura oraalonajika royala senchyuri hotala ra bhaatabhateni suparamaarketako bichamaa aja bihaana h bajeko samayamaa wiplawa netaritwako nepaala kamyunista paartikaa kaaryakartaale grineta wisphota garaaeko chitawanakaa prahari upariksaka dipaka thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo
parithwi raajamaargaantargata dhaadinako dhunibesi nagarapaalikaa chaalisemaa rokiraakheko duiwataa kantenara trakamaa ajnaata samuhale agajani gareko chha

sadaka najikai rokiraakheko araje jie araje jie nambarako chakke bhaaratiya nambara pletako duiwataa kantenara traka agajanibaata jalera dhwasta bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raamabahaadura kesile jaanakaari dinubhayo

nadimaa bepattaa bhaekaa tina baalabaalikaamadhye sresthako sawa chaara kilomitara tala nadiko chhaalale kinaaramaa nikaaleko awasthaamaa bhetieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya khotaanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka lokadarsana thaapaale bataaunubhayo

pakraau parnemaa jhaapaako damaka nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya dinesa subbaa damaka nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya asisa subbaa damaka nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya dipaka subbaa damaka nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya manatulaa dhimaala bhaaratako sikkima raajya gaantoka basne warsiya bhupaala raai ra paschima bumgaala raajya basne warsiya pawana raai raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sankraantibajaarale janaaeko chha

sankraantibajaaramaa budhabaara diunso krischiyana dharmako prachaaraprasaara gardai hindekaa dharmaawalambilaai bhaaratiya nambara pleta bhaeko gaadisahita sthaaniya suchanaakaa adhaaramaa pakraau garieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sankraantibajaarakaa prahari niriksaka dambara purile bataaunubhayo pakraau parekaalaai wihibaara saarwajanika gari thapa anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tehrathuma pathaaieko chha

aphnai gharamaa sutiraheko awasthaamaa bihibaara guptaa marita awasthaamaa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha ghatanaako wisayamaa awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko sunasarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka naaraayanaprasaada chimariyaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

wisum asaaramaa parsaako wiraganjasthita asoka waatikaamaa tiwaariko hatyaamaa sumlagna kusawaahalaai nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byurole bihibaara pakraau gari aja jela chalaana gareko ho

babitaa tiwaariko jaaherimaa kartawya jyaana muddhaamaa uchcha adaalata janakapurako phaisalaaanusaara sarwaswasahita janmakaidako sajaaya thahara bhaepachhi pharaara rahekaa warsiya kusawaahalaai byuroko tolile bihibaara kaathamaadaunko saantinagarabaata pakraau gareko ho
kusawaahalaai phaisalaa kaaryaanwayanakaa laagi kaathamaadaun jillaa adaalatamaa pesa garekaamaa adaalatako adesale kaida bhuktaanakaa laagi aja kaaraagaara kaaryaalaya dillibajaara pathaaeko ho
raamechhaapako umaakunda gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaaadhyaksa warsiya kubera khatri likhu kholaa marita awasthaamaa phelaa parekaa chhan
prahari mahaaniriksaka sarwendra khanaalale prahari sumgathana surdhaana ra janataalaai sewaa prawaaha dina wataa nirdesana diekaa chhan
unale watai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa buden nirdesana sarkulara jaari garekaa chhan

prahari sewaa praapta nabhae prahari karmachaariharu aphno kartabyaprati udaasina rahera sewaa prawaaha gareko jasto laage jaaheri darakhaasta lina namaane dartaa nagare jhuttaa ujuri dartaa garemaa khanaalale hatalaainako byawasthaa garekaa chhan
ra nambarako hatalaaina sewaa suru gardai khanaalale nirdesana ulladyana gareko khandamaa kadaa kaarabaahi garne chetaawani diekaa chhan
mahottari jillaako ekadaaraa gaaunpaalikaamaa awasthita raatu kholaamaa tairiraheko awasthaamaa aja bihaana eka baalakako sawa phelaa pareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari upariksaka kubera kadaayatakaa anusaara ekadaaraa gaaunpaalikaa bageyaa basne kirita daasakaa chhoraa andaaji warsiya rosana daasako sawa aja bihaana raatu kholaamaa tairiraheko awasthaamaa bhetieko ho
marityu hunemaa sthaaniya kaalikaa maadhyamika widyaalayako kaksaa maa adhyayanarata warsiya nigama raai raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayoga kohalapurale yahaansthita nepaala widyut praadhikarana witarana kendrakaa tina janaa karmachaarilaai sewaagraahisanga ghusa liiraheko awasthaamaa pakraau gareko chha

ayogako baanke kohalapurasthita ksetriya kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka iswara kaarkikaa anusaara praadhikaranakaa ilektrikala injiniyara nisaaraahamada khaana ilektikala suparabhaaijara wikraanta suklaa ra sahayogi girawaralaala dhobilaai sewaagraahibaata ru hajaara ghusa lindai gardaa pakraau garieko ho
pratibandhita laaguausadha charesasahita pakraau parekaa eka yuwakalaai aja parsaa praharile saarwajanika gareko chha
parsaako bhiswaabaata paancha kilo charesasahita pakraau parekaa kaalikaamaai gaanupaalikaa tinadowiyaakaa chandana patelalaai praharile saarwajanika gareko ho

biara si numko bhaaratiya motarasaaikalamaa bhaaratatarpha jaandai garekaa patelalaai gaeraati jaancha gardaa wataa pyaaketamaa raheko paancha kilo charesa baraamada bhaekoe jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raajana limbule jaanakaari dinubhayo
balaatkaara gareko aropamaa praharile mahottari samsi gaaunpaalikaa baata eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha
pakraau parnemaa samsi gaaunpaalikaa kaa laksmeswara mahato nuniyaa raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari upariksaka kuwera kadaayatale bataaunubhayo
sthaaniya warsiyaa baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko sambandhamaa pidita pariwaarale jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa jaaheri diepachhi unalaai pakraau garieko prahari upariksaka kadaayatale bataaunubhayo

pakraau parekaa nuniyaamaathi jabarjastikaranai muddaa chalaaeko chha unalaai mahottari jillaa adaalatamaa upasthita garaai myaada thapa lii prahari hiraasatamaa raakhera awasyaka anusandhaana kaarabaahi agaadi badhaaeko prahari upariksaka kadaayatale bataaunubhayo

baalikaa balaatkaara garne sindhuli dudhauli nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai bhaktapura chaangunaaraayana nagarapaalikaa duwaakotamaa deraa gari basdai aekaa warsiya wisaala sunachyaurilaai jillaa adaalata bhaktapurale atha warsa kaida sajaayako phaisalaa gareko ho

adaalatakaa srestedaara karitabahaadura boharaale nyaayaadhisa maatarikaaprasaada maraasainiko ekala ijalaasale kaida phaisalaakaa saathai pidakasanga ksatipurti bharaaune kunai kuraa nabhaekaale mahilaa baalabaalikaa kaaryaalayamaarphata ru eka laakhako ksatipurti bharaaune phaisalaa bhaeko bataaunubhayo

baalikaalaai bolaaera eutaa kuraa garnuchha bhani makaibaarimaa lagera aphule bhaneko namaane maarne dhamki dii balaatkaara gareko sohi dina ghara pugepachhi baalikaale amaalaai bataaeki thiin pariwaarale saauna gate praharimaa kitaani jaaheri diepachhi mahaanagariya prahari baritta thimiko tolile sohi dina sunachyaurilaai pakraau gari jabarjasti karanai muddaa chalaaeko thiyo

madhyapurathimi nagarapaalikaakaa nagara pramukha madanasundara sresthamaathi bhaeko akramanakaa dosilaai pakraau gari kaarabaahi garna maaga gardai aja sthaaniya baasindaale mahaanagariya prahari warita thimi gheraau garieko chha

sthaaniyawaasile yaali ra prahari waritta thimi gheraau garrdai dosilaai tatkaala pakraau gar akramanakaarilaai kadaa kaarabaahi gara janapratinidhiko suraksaako wyawasthaa gara janataalaai suraksaako pratyaabhuti de lagaayatakaa naaraa lekhieko ple kaarda bokdai pradarsana garekaa thie

ayogakaa ksetriya pramukha dinesa achaaryakaa anusaara yasa jillaabaata chaalu arthika warsako haala sammako awadhimaa wibhinna khaalakaa kaa wataa ujuri parekaamaa sabaibhandaa dherai wataa siksaa ksetrakaa bhaeko pramukha achaaryale bataaunubhayo

warittako tolile nayaan basapaarka saamaakhusi wasundharaa lagaayatakaa ksetramaa nakkali pestola dekhaaera gundaagardi gardai hindekaa taarakeswara nagarapaalikaa kaa sudipa gurunalaai somabaara pakraau gari aja saarwajanika gareko ho
so prakaranamaa gata budhabaara janaamaathi jillaa prahari kaaryaalayadwaaraa muddhaa dartaa bhaekaamaa pakraaumaa parekaa janaako kramika rupamaa bayaana line krama aja sakieko ho

yasa ghatanaamaa sanama saakyako hatyaakaa aropi chha janaa ra suna taskarikaa saathai apaharana tathaa sarira bandhakalagaayata muddaamaa praharikaa awakaasapraapta eka uchcha padaadhikaari ra haala nilambita chha prahari padaadhikaari gari saata eyaralaayansakaa karmachaari ra sunakaa wyaapaarimaathi bihibaaradekhi thunachhekako bahasa suru hunechha

achaarya sriniwaasalaai praharile muddaa chalaaeko chhaaphaimlaai goli haanna lagaaeko aropamaa pakraau parekaa unalaai maaerana praharile haatahatiyaara tathaa kharakhajaanaa muddaa dartaa gareko chha
ukta muddaamaa unalaai anusandhaanakaa laagi jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya moranale dinako myaada dieko chha
achaaryalaai jillaa prahari moranako hiraasatamaa raakhera haatahatiyaara tathaa kharakhajaanaa muddaamaa anusandhaana suru gareko prahari upariksaka arunakumaara bisile bataae
jhaapaako birtaamodamaa eka purusako sawa phelaa pareko chha

birtaamoda sthita budhabaare hatiyaako gosa laainamaa naama thara nakhuleko andaaji warsiya eka purusako sawa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka jitendrakumaara basnetale jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaankaa anusaara ukta purusa sohi sthaanamaa maagera gujaaraa gardai aekaa thie

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale dieko jaanakaarianusaara aja bihaana h baje prema sunaarako gharamaa deraa gari basne dhaadina naalaanga ghara bhai naaraayanagadhasthita manakaamanaa sunachaandi pasalamaa kaama garne warsiya sujitakumaara wikale dhaadinanai ghara bhai sohi gharamaa deraa gari basne warsiya wiramaana maharjanalaai tejaapa chharkiekaa hun
nepaala prahariko kendriya anusandhaana byurole puraataatwika mahatwakaa wibhinna dhaatukaa murtilagaayata bahumulya wastusahita tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parekaasanga byurole buddha ra anya murti thaana wibhinna dhaatubaata banekaa pratimaakaa paataa thaana ra puraanaa bichamaa pwaala paarekaa sikkaa thaana baraamada gareko chha byurole aja patrakaara sammelana gari puraatatwa wibhaagamaa dartaa nagari aphukhusi manapari rakamamaa murti becheko wisesa suchanaakaa adhaaramaa pakraau garieko jaanakaari dieko ho

praharile giraphtaara garekaaharumaa kaabhre jillaa mahaabhaarata gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya mahaasaagara laamaa ra dhaadinako rubibhyaali gaaunpaalikaakaa warsiya pembaa laamaalaai praharile giraphtaara gari hiraasatamaa lieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka dambarabahaadura wikale jaanakaari dinubhayo

nekapaale gareko nepaala bandakaa kramamaa jillaako gajuri gaaunpaalikaa siddhaleka gaaunpaalikaa dhunibensi nagarapaalikaa ksetrako sadakamaa saketa bama raakheko ra senaale niskriya paarepachhi bama raakhera sarwasaadhaaranalaai trasita banaaeko aropamaa pakraau gareko ho
baanke jillaako hawaldaarapuramaa raheko kaalikaa nirmaana kampaniko saaita aphisamaa ajnaata samuhale presara kukara bama wisphota garaaeko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kohalapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka yajnaprasaada bhattaraaile gaeraati kariba saadhe bajeko samayamaa presara kukara bama wisphota bhaeko bataaunubhayo
yasaibicha baankeko kohalapura nagarapaalikaa sthita raamanagaramaa raheko charchamaa gaeraati agalaagi bhaeko chha agalaagibaata maanawiya ksati nabhae pani bhautika ksati pugeko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kohalapurakaa anusaara gaeraati kariba baje agalaagi bhaeko ho
unalaai sukrabaara saanjha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale pakraau gareko praharile bataaeko chha

morana praharile wibhinna chaarawataa aparaadhamaa janaa wiruddha jillaa adaalatamaa muddaa dartaa garisakeko chha ghatanaamaa sumlagna mukhya abhiyukta chudaamanai upreti gore sahita janaa ajhai pharaara rahekaa chhan
kailaaliko gaurigumgaa nagarapaalikaa nambara wadaa kaaryaalaya najika aja bama wisphota bhaeko chha
so wisphotabaata kunai kisimako ksati pugeko khabara naaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa wirabahaadura budhaamagarale bataaunubhayo

netrawikrama chandawiplawa netaritwako nekapaa maaowaadile aja ahwaana gareko bhanieko bandakaa kramamaa yi ghatanaa bhaekaa hun sukrabaara saanjha dhanagadhimaa masaala julusa pradarsana garne wiplawa netaritwako maaowaadi samarthita manu nepaalilaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko thiyo bandakaa kaarana yaataayaata udyoga wyawasaaya thappa rahi janajiwana prabhaawita bhaeko chha

baraahataala gaaunpaalikaa surkhetaki bhawisaraa thaapaa magarale baraahataala gaaunpaalikaa kaa bhaktabahaadura salaamilaai milaapatra garne kramamaa baddichaura prahari chaukiko haataabhitrai disaa khuwaaepachhi pakraau pareki hun

gaaunmaa salaamile madiraa sewana gari gaali beijjati gareko bhani thaapaale praharichaukimaa ujuri gareki thiin praharile thaapaa ra salaami duwai paksalaai jhikaai wadaa num kaa wadaadhyaksa dila masaangiko rohawaramaa chhalaphala gardaa abirako tikaa lagaaera salaamisanga milaapatra garchhu bhandai plaastikamaa lukaai lyaaeko disaa khuwaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka umaakaanta chaturwedile jaanakaari dinubhayo

prahari kaaryaalaya baddichauramaa milaapatrako chhalaphalakaa kramamaa disaa khuwaaepachhi salaamile praharimaa ujuri dieko ra tyasaiko adhaaramaa thaapaalaai pakraau garieko chaturwedile bataaunubhayo prahari kaaryaalayamaa disaa khuwaaune thaapaalaai thapa anusandhaana gariraheko uhaanle bataaunubhayo
baddichaura praharile chaukimai disaa khuwaaepachhi wiwaada badhdaa thaapaa ra salaamiko paksalaai chhalaphalakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetamaa pathaaieko thiyo
aspataalale laaparwaahi gareko bhandai maritakakaa aphantale dosimaathi kadaa kaarawaahiko maaga garekaa chhan
upachaaramaa laaparwaahi garnelaai kadaabhandaa kadaa kaarawaahi tathaa maritakakaa chhoraa ra chhoriko sampurna jimmaa sarakaarale linuparne uniharuko maaga chha

garbhawatiko upachaaramaa aspataalabaata kunai laaparwaahi nabhaeko daa khadkaako bhanaai chha uhaanle maritakakaa aphantale lagaaeko aropa aswikaara garnubhaeko chha uhaankaa anusaara aspataalakaa kaarana nabhai paani pokaa aphain phutera phoksomaa paani gaekaale manisaako marityu bhaeko ho
waisaakha gate dailekhamai jaancha garaaera gate chaakuri ra uhaankaa srimaan hari wika ksetriya aspataala surkhetamaa aunubhaeko ho

surkhetako wirendranagaramaa gate punah bhidiyo eksare gardaa duiwatai bachchaa marita bhaeko jaanakaari aspataalakaa daaktarale dieko wikakaa srimaan harile bataaunubhayo aspataalale ausadhi kinera lyaaunus marita bachchaa nikaalnuparchha bhaneko ra ahilesamma pani chaakuriko salyakriyaa huna nasakeko uhaanle bataaunubhayo aspataalale bhane awasthaa herera salyakriyaa garine bataaeko chha

mulya abhiwariddhi karabaata uthnu parne raajaswa santosajanaka nadekhiepachhi anugamanalaai tiwra banaaera adhyayana thaalieko kaaryaalayakaa pramukha thaanaprasaada pangenile bataaunubhayo kaaryaalayale chaita masaantasammamaa mulya abhiwariddhi karatarpha ru karoda laakha hajaara raajaswa sumkalana garne laksya raakhekaamaa ru karoda eka laakha hajaaramaatrai sumkalana bhaeko chha pangenile mulya abhiwariddhi bila nakaatne kama kaatne ra kunai pani kisimako karako daayaraamaa naaunesameta bhetiepachhi tiwra anugamana garieko bataaunubhayo anugamanakaa kramamaa bhyaata bila nakaateko paaiemaa niyamaanusaara kaarawaahi garine uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo

kaaryaalayakaa karmachaariharule suraaka sanjaalasameta prayoga garera anugamana garirahekaa chhan katipaya kampani tathaa pratisthaanamaa asumkaa dekhiekaamaa purna lekhaapariksana gari kara kaayama garne kaama pani kaaryaalayale gariraheko chha

kaaryaalayakaa kara adhikarita dilliraama paudelakaa anusaara mulya abhiwariddhi kara laagne wastuko hakamaa mahinaamaa ru laakhasamma kaarowaara hundaa dartaa huna naparne wyawasthaa chha saathai mulya abhiwariddhi laagne wastu tathaa sewaa misrita kaarowaara ra sewaako hakamaa ru laakhasammako kaarowaara hunele dartaa garnu naparne wyawasthaa bhaeko uhaanle bataaunubhayo eka patakamaa ru hajaarabhandaa badhiko mulya abhiwariddhi kara laagne wastu paithaari gardaa pani dartaa garnuparne wyawasthaa raheko adhikarita paudelale jaanakaari dinubhayo

kaaryaalayale chitawana ra nawalapuura jillaa herdai aeko chha yasa ksetramaa madiraajanya udyoga badhi bhaekaale sabaibhandaa badhi raajaswa antahsulkabaata uthne gareko kaaryaalayakaa pramukha pangenile bataaunubhayo haala kaaryaalayako maatahatamaa kariba hajaara karadaataa chhan

gariha mantraalayale sindiketa chalaaune samitikaa padaadhikaarilaai pakraau garna nirdesana dielagattai laamichhaanelaai kusmaabajaarabaata pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha dilipa ghimirele jaanakaari dinubhayo
laamichhaanelaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa raakhieko chha yasa ksetrakaa kariba chha wyawasaayile yaataayaata thappa paardaa sarwasaadhaarana samasyaamaa parekaa chhan
bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa kamalawinaayaka bhatkeko paati chokamaa paarkina gariraakheko dui motarasaaikalamaa aja agalaagi bhaeko chha

hariprasaada daahaalako gharamaa tarakaari pasala sanchaalana gardai aekaa sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa kaa maadhawa mainaaliko baapa ra sohi sthaanamaa raheko khaajaagharamaa kaama garne kaabhre banepaakaa winoda taamaanako baapa numko motarasaaikalamaa agalaagi bhaeko ho

gajuri gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya jnaanendrabahaadura magaralaai jillaa adaalatako adesale ru hajaara dharautimaa rihaa gareko ho magarako hotalamaa chaauchaau khaana gaekaa sohi sthaanakaa warsiya chandrabahaadura wikalaai hotalamaa jaatiya chhuwaachhuta gari hotalabaata baahira basna lagaaekaa thie aphulaai jaatiya chhuwaachhuta gareko janaaundai wisum chaita gate wikale jaaheri diekaa thie abhiyukta magaralaai praharile waisaakha gate pakraau gari muddaa chalaaeko thiyo

laaguausadha kaarowaara gareko aropamaa gaanjaa ra motasaaikalasahita praharile dui janaalaai galchhi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kalleribaata pakraau gari aja muddaa dartaa gareko chha motarasaaikalamaa saata kilograama graama gaanjaa osaarapasaara garirahekaa awasthaamaa baa pa num ko motasaaikala baraamada garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa nimitta kaaryaalaya pramukha ewum prahari niriksaka raaju kesile jaanakaari dinubhayo

motarasaaikalamaa raakhera lukaaichhipaai nikaasi garera bikrikaa laagi laana laageko awasthaamaa so saamaana jaanchakaa kramamaa baraamada bhaeko ho gaanjaasahita praharile galchhi kaa jayaraama adhikaari ra galchhi kaa gumgaa sresthalaai bihibaara pakraau gari aja laaguausadha osaarapasaara tathaa kaarowaara ainaantargata pakraau gari muddaa dartaa garieko ho

akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale nakkali saiksika yogyataako pramaanapatra pesa gari sarakaari sewaamaa prawesa gareko janaaundai chha karmachaariwiruddha wisesa adaalatamaa aja muddaa daayara gareko chha

ayogakaa prawaktaa dirgharaaja mainaalikaa anusaara prahari pradhaana kaaryaalaya naksaalakaa prahari naayaba niriksaka nagendrakumaara bhagata saraswati chautaaraa nimaawi tulsipura daanakaa siksaka anjanaa saaha ra padmakanyaa maawi dillibajaara kaathamaadaunkaa dhanaprasaada ghimirele nakkali saiksika yogyataako pramaanapatra pesa garera sewaa gareko paaiekaale muddaa daayara garieko ho
purwi chitawanako kaalikaa nagarapaalikaa kaa kisaanako keraa kheti phaandeko aropamaa praharile tina janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

chitawanakaa prahari upariksaka dipaka thaapaakaa anusaara kaalikaa nagarapaalikaa baata budhabaara uniharu pakraau parekaa hun ghatanaamaa sumlagna mukhya maanchhe bhane pharaara rahekaale khoji kaarya tiwra paarieko thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo uniharuko pahichaana bhane khulaaieko chhaina

so ghatanaako anusandhaana tathaa dosilaai pakraau gari kaarabaahikaa laagi ahile ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya ratnanagarakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka waasudewa khatiwadaako netaritwamaa toli parichaalana garieko chha pakraau parekaa tinaijanaa ratnanagara prahariko hiraasatamaa chhan
morana jillaa adaalata parisarabaata niskine kramamaa lohanile sanchaarakarmiharulaai haatapaata garekaa hun

yahi waisaakha gate bihaana baje dewarako kothaamaa anjumako sawa praharile sumkaaspada awasthaamaa phelaa paareko thiyo anjuma dewarako kothaamaa gai apmnai dupattaale paaso lagaai atmahatyaa gareko sasuraali paksale praharilaai jaanakaari diepachhi ghatanaasthalamaa pugeko praharile anjumako sawa bhuinmaa raheko awasthaamaa phelaa paareko parsaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raajana limbule jaanakaari dinubhayo
chaalu arthika warsako gaeko dasa mahinaamaa parsaa jillaamaa daaijokai kaarana prataadanaa khepna nasaki janaa mahilaale atmahatyaa gareko anusandhaanabaata khuleko praharile janaaeko chha
baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko abhiyogamaa jhaapaako gauraadaha nagarapaalikaabaata praharile aja eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

pakraau parnemaa gauraadaha nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya chudaadewa taamaana raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka dipaka girile jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaankaa anusaara sohi sthaanaki eka warsiyaa baalikaalaai balaatkaara gareko aropamaa taamaanalaai pakraau garieko ho
pakraau parekaa taamaanalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakamaa raakhera thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko chha

maahuli kholaa pula nirmaanako pharaphaaraka bhaepachhi dharauti phukuwaako cheka nikaasaa garne prayojanakaa laagi sewaagraahisanga ghusa lindai gareko abhiyogamaa akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogako kaaryaalaya itahariko tolile raajawiraaja nagarapaalikaa sthita nijakai kaaryaalaya parisarabaata yaadawalaai niyantranamaa lieko janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa prahari upariksaka dipaka thaapaakaa anusaara dasa joda dui padhdai garekaa dui yuwatilaai jabararjasti karanaiko prayaasa garepachhi bhattaraailaai niyantranamaa liieko ho
saptari rupani gaaunpaalikaa sthita khaando pula najika aja eka purusa marita awasthaamaa phelaa parekaa chhan
naama thara khulna nasakekaa kariba warsiya purusa marita awasthaamaa phelaa pareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupanile janaaeko chha

sawa pariksanakaa laagi raajawiraajasthita gajendranaaraayana simha sagaramaathaa anchala aspataalamaa raakhieko chha bhane ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarile janaaeko chha
aphnai srimaanko kutaaibaata gaeraati sirahaako golabajaara nagarapaalikaamaa eka mahilaako marityu bhaeko chha
golabajaara nagarapaalikaa choharwaa niwaasi warsiya karisna sarmaako kutaaibaata uhaanki warsiyaa srimati prabhaadewi sarmaako marityu bhaeko maaiti paksale aropa lagaaekaa chhan

yasaaghi pani aphno bahinilaai patakapataka kutapita garne gareko raamasaagarale bataaunubhayo prabhaako sawa pariksanakaa laagi sirahaa jillaa aspataalamaa raakhieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya golabajaarale janaaeko chha
saadhe tettisa kilo sunako taskari prakarana ra sanama saakyako hatyaa sambandhamaa aja janaamaathi jillaa adaalata moranamaa muddaa dartaa bhaeko chha

somadhye pakraau parekaa janaakaa saathai pharaara rahekaa janaa gari janaamaathi muddaa dartaa bhaeko ho yasa ghatanaako sambandhamaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale dinako anusandhaanako samaya puraa gari sarakaari wakila kaaryaalayamaarphata abhiyogapatrasahita muddaa dartaa gareko ho

aparaadhika samuha sthaapanaa sanchaalana gari sunachaandi nikaasiko awaidha kaarowaara apaharana tathaa sarira bandhaka ra kartawyajyaanasambandhi uniharumaathi chhuttaachhuttai muddaa dartaa garieko chha chha janaa purwa tathaa wartamaana prahari padaadhikaarimaathi sunachaandiko awaidha kaarowaara sambandhamaa chha janaamaathi jyaana muddaa janaa wimaanakaa karmachaari ra tina janaa suna wyaapaari gari janaamaathi muddaa dartaa garieko ho
praharikaa chha purwa tathaa bahaalawaalaa padaadhikaariwiruddha muddaa

suna taskari prakaranamaa pakraau parekaa saata janaa prahari padaadhikaarimaa purwaprahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka gowindaprasaada niraulaa bahaalawaalaa waristha prahari upariksaka diwesa lohani prahari upariksaka wikaasaraaja khanaala prahari naayawa upariksakatraya sanjayabahaadura raauta prajita kesi ra baalakarisna sanjela ra prahari jawaana wisnaubahaadura khadkaa chhan

chhaanawina samiti yasa ghatanaako sambandhamaa gariha mantraalayale gata chaita gate eka mahinaakaa laagi sahasachiwa iswararaaja paudelako netaritwamaa chhaanabina samiti gathana gareko thiyo so samitimaa raastriya anusandhaana saakhaakaa nirdesaka hutaraaja thaapaa waristha prahari upariksaka wasantakumaara laamaa gariha mantraalayakaa upasachiwa bhawiswara paande upanyaayadhiwaktaa hari regmi prahari upariksaka sudipa paathaka prahari niriksaka bhisma humaagaaim kaanuna adhikarita bhojaraaja daahaala ra sai sumana kaarkisahita nau janaa hunuhunchha
waisaakha gate lalitapurako damakala choka niwaasi saanulaala maharjanako pariwaara kamti khusi thiena

chudaamanai upreti gore unakaa bhaai ramesa upreti patni narwadaa kharela upreti niru mohanakumaara agrawaala emake raksaa bhandaari prayaasa paraajuli rohita achaarya karisna basneta mohamada ustaama miyaa rustama bhawina raai bolaaune naama bhawina taamaana kamala kaarki sandipa khadkaa chetana bhandaari sunila agrawaala pramoda srestha dolendraprasaada kharela daawaa serpaa bhojaraaja bhandaari durgaa kharela upreti bhimakumaari kharela ra surendra gautama pharaara raheko nayaan patrikaa dainikamaa chha

taskarale pahilo charanamaa bhansaara kaaryaalayakaa karmachaarisanga setina milaaepachhi eyaralaainsakaa karmachaarisanga milemato garchhan tesro leyaramaa uniharuko setina praharisanga hunchha sangasangai adhyaagamanakaa karmachaari ra guptacharasanga pani hunchha wimaanasthalamaa khatiekaa guptacharasanga bhane taskara pratyaksa rupamaa dekhindainan

bhansaarako cheka jaancha kaksamaa eksare mesina hunchha saamaanyatah jahaajabaata aekaa sampurna saamagri sohi eksare mesinamaa ekaeka gardai chekajaancha garinchha ra grina beltamaa padhaainchha tara taskarale pathaaeko saamaana sakesamma eksare mesinamaa raakhinna raakhe pani chekajaancha garnele nadekhejhain garidinchha kinabhane taskarale bhansaarakaa karmachaarimaarphat ukta saamagrikoe photo pahile nai cheka jaancha garne wyaktisamma puyaaisakeko hunchha yasari taskarikaa saamaana sajilai grina beltabaata paasa garaainchha ra kehi ghantaamai kalumki pugchha raataaraata wiraganja hundai bhaarata pugchha
omaanako maskatamaa gharelu kaama gardai airaheki eka nepaali mahilaa kaamadaaramaathi amaryaadita kaama garne paancha abhiyuktalaai omanasthita nepaali dutaawaasako sahayogamaa pakraau garieko chha

nayaan gharako ukta kothaamaa saanjha paancha janaako hula ai aphumaathi amaryaadita kaama bhaisakepachhi pola khulne darale maarera phaalne yojanaa piditale sunepachhi sauchaalayabaata raati baje praharilaai khabara gareki thiin ukta khabarapachhi omaana praharile uddhaara gari lyaaeko ra dutaawaasako sakriyataamaa wibhinna sthaanabaata abhiyuktalaai pakraau gari kaanuni kaarabaahi prakriyaa aghi badhaaieko dutaawaasale janaaeko chha

sephoksundo raastriya nikunja ra suraksaa nikaayako sumyukta gasti tolile somabaara raati bajetira uniharulaai pakraau garekaa hun pakraau parekaa sabailaai nikunja kaaryaalaya suligaadamaa lyaairaheko nikunjakaa sumraksana adhikarita raamadewa chaudharile jaanakaari dinubhayo

dolpaakaa kaagamaaraa jagadullaa maajhawana kunaasaa dopke bhaankaa thaamge taantunge lumalaa chhoyalaa saagara waasudaa phulawaari naawarapaani chaahaaraa saaikumaari maate lagaayatakaa darjanau paatanaharumaa yaarsaagumbaa paaine gardachha

paatana kholnuaghi paatanabaata yaarsaagumbaa chorera sumkalana nahos bhanera wibhinna paatanakaa sambandhita madhyawarti saamudaayika wana upabhoktaa samiti chorisikaara niyantrana samiti sthaaniya tahakaa padaadhikaari sthaaniya samudaaya niukanja ra nepaali senaale paatanapaatanamaa sumyukta gasti garne garieko nikunja sumraksana adhikarita chaudharile bataaunubhayo
yasaaghi yahi waisaakha gate awaidharupamaa yaarchaagumbaa tipna kaagamaaraa paatana pugekaa saatajanaalaai pakraau garieko pani nikunjale janaaeko chha

nuwaakota siti aspataalamaa aheba padamaa kaaryarata srimaana nawina naathalaai bhetna chaara dinaaghi yahaan aeki warsiyaa laksmi aparaahna hotalako kothaamaa maritta awasthaamaa bhettieko jillaa prahari pramukha prahari upariksaka wasanta kunwarale jaanakaari dinubhayo
kailaaliko tikaapura nagarapaalikaa sitaapura gaaunmaa wanyajantu chittala maarera kaatdai gareko awasthaamaa chhajanaalaai praharile somabaara pakraau gareko chha

sthaaniya gorakha simhako kukhuraa phaarmamaa jumgali janaawara chittalalaai maari kaatiraheko bhanne suchanaakaa adhaaramaa gaeko prahari tolile chittalako maasu ra kaatna prayoga bhaeko hatiyaarasahita chhajanaalaai pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa wirabahaadura budhaamagarale bataaunubhayo

pakraau parnemaa tikaapura nagarapaalikaa kaa gorakhabahaadura simha bhaktabahaadura thaapaa ranabahaadura thaapaa padama wika chhatrabahaadura saahi ra baaju chaudhari rahekaa chhan pakraau parekaamaathi kaanuni kaarabaahikaa laagi kailaaliko lamkisthita sektara wana kaaryaalayamaa pathaaieko chha

yasaibicha bhaaratako lakhimapura niwaasi amkita bichchhotalaai trinagara bhansaara simaanaakaabaata somabaara laaguausadha naaitrobheta tyaableta ra spaasmo praaksobhana tyaabletasahita pakraau gari anusandhaana thaalieko pani jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaeko chha
diesapi prajita kesi pakraau parekaa chhan saadhe kilo suna prakaranamaa morana praharile unalaai niyantranamaa lieko ho
bhariyaa sanama saakyako hatyaapachhi kesi netaritwako toli kaathamaadaumbaata wiraatanagara gaeko thiyo uni netaritwako tolile saakyakaae sawa paaestamaartama gari gaadimaa haalera hindeko thiyo
gaeraati kariba baje ajnaata samuhale garaaeko bama wisphotabaata kaaryaalaya bhawanamaa saamaanya ksati bhaeko pramukha jillaa adhikaari siwaraaja josile jaanakaari dinubhayo
saadhe keji suna kaandamaa muchhiekaa esapisahita tina prahari adhikaari nilambanamaa parekaa chhan
prahari niyamaawalianusaara kartawya jyaana ra sumgathita aparaadhamaa anusandhaana suru bhaesangai uniharu nilambanamaa parne prahari prawaktaa manoja nyaupaanele jaanakaari die
aijipi sarwendra khanaalale praharibhitrakaa kiraaharulaai phaalne krama suru bhaeko bataaunubhaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa niriksanapachhi sumchaarakarmisanga kuraa gardai uhaanle sumgathanakaa dhamiraaharu aba sumgathanamaa naharane bataaunubhaeko ho
janataale anubhuti garne gari aparaadha niyantrana tathaa anusandhaanako kaaryalaai agaadi badhaaieko uhaanle bataaunubhayo

nekapaa maaowaadi kendrale prahari inkaauntaramaa maariekaa manoja punalaai sahayoga gareko abhiyogamaa pakraau parekaa paarti raastriya sammelana ayojaka samitikaa sadasya lekhanaatha nyaupaane ra jillaa sadasya tulsi nyaupaanelaai aja kaarawaahi gareko chha
maaowaadi kendra rupandehi jillaa inchaarja dadhiraama nyaupaanele aja wijnapti nikaali uniharulaai paartikaa kunai pani jimmewaarimaa narahane gari hataaieko janaaunubhaeko chha
apaharanamaa sumlagna karisna raai ra siddhaartha laamaalaai kaathamaadaum jillaa adaalatale saala maagha gate warsa kaida ra dakaitimaa laakha hajaara jariwaanaako phaisalaa sunaaeko thiyo
kaathamaadaum jillaa adaalatabaata dinako myaada liera siaibile anusandhaana agaadi badhaairaheko chha

gata bhadaum gate kaathamaadaun tokhaa nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara saamaakhusimaa bhaadaamaa basdai aekaa jillaa sindhupaalchoka bhotekosi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara ghara bhaekaa gyaalbu serpaakaa chhoraa barsa kaa pembaa dorje serpaako gharakothaabaata kilo chaudhatukraa awaidha suna phelaa pareko thiyo

tatkaalai khoji garne kramamaa jillaa prahari kaaryalaya dhanusaamaa jaanakaari garaai thapa janaako saathabaata keji suna baraamada gari jammaa janaa awaidha suna taskarimaa sumlagna wyaktiharulaai pakraau parekaa thie

tina warsaaghi nepaalaganja kaa warsiya chetana maanandharako hatyaa gareko abhiyogamaa dosi thahara gardai nepaalaganjakaa rigala dhakaalalaai adaalatale sarwaswasahita janmakaidako phaisalaa gareko ho
nepaalaganjako surkheta rodasthita dhambojhichaukamaa nepaalaganja kaa warsiya chetana maanandharamaathi saala asaara gate khundaa prahaara gari hatyaa garieko thiyo

so ghatanaamaa sumlagna so ksetrakaa charchita gundaa naaike rigala bhanine yoga dhakaalale dui warsaaghi nai adaalatamaa atmasamarpana garekaa thie ghatanaako aitabaaradekhi bahasa suru bhaeko ho hatyaakaa mukhya abhiyukta rigala dhakaalasahita janaawiruddha jillaa adaalata baankemaa muddaa dartaa bhaeko thiyo
ghosita kaaryakramaantargata jillaa siksaa adhikaarilaai kaaryakaksamai thunne kaaryakrama rahe pani uhaan kaaryaalayamai naaepachhi widyaarthile kursimaa unako tasbira raakhi agajani garekaa hun

kraantikaarikaa kanchanapura adhyaksa wirendraraaja bistale praharile pakraau garekaa kendriya sadasyadwayalaai nihsarta chhaadnuparne bataaunubhayo praharile nachhaade purwaghosita kaaryakramasangai prahari prasaasanawiruddha kadaa andolana garne pani uhaanle bataaunubhayo
somabaara diunsai kraantikaarikaa netaaharule jillaa siksaa kaaryaalaya pugera jillaa siksaa adhikaari amaraprasaada bhattalaai diunsai tarcha baalera khojekaa thie

waisaakha gate widyaalayabaatai kaapikalama bechne niji widyaalayamaa taalaabandi garne gate saiksika amahadataala garne gate jillaa siksaa ra prasaasanamaa kaalobhandaasahita pradarsana garne ra gatedekhi sthaaniya sarakaara gheraau garne kaaryakrama raheko kraantikaarile janaaeko chha
purwapaschima raajamaargako kanakaai nagarapaalikaasthita durgaapura sadakakhandamaa aja aparaahna bhaeko sawaari durghatanaamaa eka dampatiko marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa dhanakutaako debrebaasa niwaasi warsiya raajesa srestha ra warsiyaa unaki srimati puspaa srestha raheko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa prahari niriksaka raajesa raaile jaanakaari dinubhayo

maritaka srestha sasuraalibaata srimati liera ghara pharkumdai gareko bataaieko chha maritaka dampati jhaapaako parithwinagarabaata kopa numko skutaramaa ghara pharkadai gardaa tiparalaai uchhinne kramamaa tiparale thakkara dieko bataaieko chha
durghatanaamaa sumlagna sawaarilaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya surunagaale niyantranamaa lieko chha
nepaalaganjasthita ausadhi wyawasthaa wibhaaga saakhaa kaaryaalayakaa phaarmesi adhikarita tapendra bhattaraailaai ghusa lindai gareko awasthaamaa pakraau garieko chha
ayogako kaaryaalaya kohalapurakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka iswara kaarkikaa anusaara phaarmesi adhikarita bhattaraailaai unakai kaaryakaksabaata ghusasahita pakraau garieko ho
himaali jillaa dolpaamaa bahumulya jadibuti yaarsaagumbaako awaidharupamaa sumkalana garna paatana pugekaa saatajanaa pakraau parekaa chhan
sephoksundo raastriya nikunja suraksaa posta toijuma ra nikunjakaa karmachaarisahitako sumyukta tolile nikunjako mukhya ksetra kaagamaaraa himaalabaata gaeraati uniharulaai pakraau gareko thiyo
pakraau parekaa duijanaa mahilaako swaasthya awasthaa kamajora bhaekaale nikunjale dosi thahara garera bolaaeko khandamaa upasthita hune gari pratiwyakti ru hajaara dharautimaa chhodieko chha
rautahata bindrabana nagarapaalikaa dhanagadhi basne warsiya saroja raamako dije baksale thichera marityu bhaeko chha

sohi sthaanamaa raheko manoja raaunda enta tenta haausabaata somabaara kariba kiloko dije baksa ghara bhitra laijaane kramamaa gharako chhaanomaa thokina gai ladna jaandaa dije baksale thichera gambhira ghaaite bhaeko unako chapura aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko thiyo

kaathamaadaun kalumki ghara bhaekaa warsiya raajendra basnetale kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa kaalimaati chokamaa sumchaalana gareko kristala intara praaijeja aiemai sentara baata somabaara nagada laakha rupaiyaan lutapaata bhaeko chha
dhaadina thaarke gaaunpaalikaa raaniwaari basne barsiya dharma bahaadura kaarkilaai praharile laaguausadha gaanjaa saadhe keji sahita pakraau gareko chha
ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya khaanikholaabaata gastimaa khatieko prahari tolile kaarkilaai mumgalabaara dhuniwesi nagarapaalikaa dhaarke bajaarabaata ukta gaanjaa sahita pakraau gareko ho

jillaako ganaesamaana chaaranaatha nagarapaalikaa dumariyaakaa siwanaatha daasa ra jnaanidewi daasaki warsiyaa chhori anjali daasako srimaanabaata hatyaa bhaeko bhandai pariwaarajanale muddaa dartaako prakriyaa suru garekaa chhan

anjaliko wiwaaha mahinaaaghi jillaako sabailaa nagarapaalikaa khariyaanikaa chartubhuja daasako warsiya chhoraa dipendra daasasanga bhaeko thiyo saamaajika ritiriwaajaanusaara tina chhorimadhye jethi anjaliko bihemaa siwanaathale karjaa liera kariba chaara laakha kharchekaa thie

pakraau parnemaa moranako belabaari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya yugena bhanne udaya raai ra taaplejunako thukimaa basne warsiya bhima limbu raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale aja patrakaara sammelana gari jaanakaari garaaeko chha duwai janaalaai gata aitabaara praharile pakraau garekaa hun
waisaakha gate beluki h bajeko samayamaa wiraatanagara sthita so kaaryaalayako paschimatarphako khullaa chauramaa uniharule bama wisphota garaaeko bataaieko chha
hatyaako aropamaa pharaara rahekaa meraajaali behanaalaai warsapachhi praharile nepaalaganjabaata pakraau gari aja saarwajanika gareko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa ayojita patrakaara sammelanamaa unalaai aitabaara nepaalaganja upamahaanagarapaalikaa baata pakraau garekoe jaanakaari diiyo
yasaibicha baanke kohalapura nagarapaalikaa parithwinagarakaa warsiya karisnalaala paudela wigata paancha dinadekhi haraairahanubhaeko chha

jaggaakaa kaarobaari paudelako pariwaarastarabaata khoji gardaa pani nabhetiepachhi unako khoji garidina praharimaa niwedana dieko chha pariwaarako tarpambaata waisaakha gate khojikaa laagi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kohalapuramaa niwedana dartaa garaaeko uhaankaa samdhi purnaprasaada lamsaalale bataaunubhayo

mahottari bardiwaasasthita raastriya waanaijya baimka saakhaamaa kaaryarata sahaayaka prabandhaka jagadisaprasaada kaaphlelaai akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayogale ghusa rakamasahita aja pakraau gareko chha
ayogako bardiwaasasthita kaaryaalayako tolile sewaagraahisanga lieko ru hajaara ghusa rakamasahita unalaai pakraau gareko ho
kaaphlelaai hiraasatamaa raakhi thapa anusandhaana thaalieko kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka thaakura pokharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo
yasaaghi kaaphle baimkakaa sewaagraahiko khaataabaata nakkali cheka banaai wibhinna saakhaabaata ru laakha nikaaleko aropamaasameta pakraau parekaa thie
traaphika praharikaa naayaba niriksaka raamachandra khaniyaanle aja diunso eka yuwatilaai esida chharkiekaa chhan

purwi chitawanako ratnanagaramaa kaaryarata khaniyaanle aja diunso bajeko samayamaa bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num trichokamaa gorakhaa ghara bhai sohi thaaun deraa gari basne warsiyaa kalpanaa sresthalaai esida chharkieko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka prabhuprasaada dhakaalakaa anusaara ti mahilaako anuhaara jiu ra khuttaamaa esida chharkiieko chha unako bharatapura aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko ra awasthaa madhyama raheko dhakaalale bataaunubhayo
yaarsaagumbaale karnaali pradesamaa arthika kriyaakalaapa badhaaeko chha

nepaala wijnaana tathaa prawidhi pratisthaanale yaarsaagumbaa paaine thaaunmaa gariraheko adhyayanakaa kramamaa karnaali pradesamaa arthika gatiwidhi badheko paaieko ho ukta ksetramaa baimkina kaarowaara badheko waijnaanika raamachandra paudelale bataaunubhayo

wibhinna antarraastriya sumsthaale gareko adhyayanamaa sameta yaarsaagumbaale karnaali pradesamaa thulo pariwartana aeko dekhaaeko chha dherai jillaakaa adhikaamsa baasindaa yaarsaagumbaamaathi asrita bhae pani yasaaghi yaarsaagumbaasambandhi kunai pani adhyayana bhaeko thiena yaarsaagumbaako badhdo sumkalanasangai naarkale kehi samaya pahilebaata adhyayana thaaleko ho ahile yaarsaagumbaako prakaara paatana khaali hundai jaanuko kaarana sumraksanakaa upaayasangai arthika ra saamaajika paatomaa adhyayana suru garieko chha ahile wibhinna charanakaa chhalaphala bhairaheko paudela bataaunuhunchha

uhaan bhannuhunchha yaarsaagumbaako waastawika awasthaa pattaa lagaaunu ra sumraksanako upaaya khojnu haamro uddesya ho wiswa bajaaramaa dherai maaga garindai aeko yaarsaagumbaa daarchulaa bajhaana dolpaa humlaa taaplejunalagaayata jillaamaa waisaakhadekhi asaarasamma sumkalana garinchha

widesamaa aphaimle kamaaera pathaaeko sampattile ghara ta banyo tara pharkiera aundaa tyahi gharabaata aphu swayum nikaalie aphnai gharabaata nikaalindaa ti purusa jhaskie kaarana thiyo unalaai thaahai nadii srimatile dibhorsa garisakeki rahichhin ghatanaa ho jhaapaako birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa wadaa num ko

srimatile galahatyaaera gharabaata nikaalepachhi nyaayako khojimaa kehi dina aghi uni birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa aeko nagarapaalikaakaa upapramukha pawitraa mahataraa prasaaile bataaunubhayo uhaanle bhannubhayo srimatikaa kaarana aphu pidita baneko bhandai nagarapaalikaako nyaayika samitimaa niwedana diepachhi haamile sabai kuraa bujhyaum waastabamai uni pidita rahechhan

birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa niwaasi rijaala tharakaa arkaa eka wyaktiko pidaa pani ustai chha waidesika rojagaarikaa silasilaamaa saaudi arabamaa rahekaa belaa srimaanlaai thaahai nadii srimati arkaisanga gaepachhi unako pani ghara bhaandiyo bhaeko achala sampatti pani srimatiko naamamaa rahechha birtaamoda nagarapaalikaakaa upapramukha prasaaimle bhannubhayo srimaanle pathaaeko sabai paisaa liera uni sasastra praharikaa eka wyaktisanga gaeki rahichhin ujuri parepachhi unalaai pakraau garera adhaa sampatti ti purusalaai dilaayaum

khotaanamaa kaaryarata sasastra praharilaai sameta ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya birtaamodako sahayogamaa pakraau gari chhalaphalabaatai yo samasyaako samaadhaana garekaa chhaum upapramukha prasaaimle bhannubhayo maile bhanekaa duiwataa kesa pratinidhi ghatanaa maatrai hun yastaa ujuri dhamaadhama nyaayika samitimaa auna thaalekaa chhan

birtaamodamaa maatra hoina yastaa ujuri damaka nagarapaalikaamaa pani adhika maatraamaa parekaa chhan damaka nagarapaalikaaki upapramukha gitaa adhikaarikaa anusaara purusa himsaakaa ujuri jhandai dui darjanako haaraahaarimaa nyaayika samitimaa parekaa chhan adhikaamsa ujuri widesa jaane purusakaa chhan katipayale maukhika sallaaha liera wiwaada samaadhaana garekaa chhan bhane katipayale nyaayika samitimai ujuri dartaa garaaekaa chhan upapramukha adhikaarile bhannubhayo waidesika rojagaarile samaajamaa ekaatarpha raamro gareko chha bhane arkaatarpha ghara pariwaara bigaareko pani chha

damaka nagarapaalikaamaa srimatiko naamamaa jaggaa bhaekaaharu dherai arkaisanga hindekaa ujuri parekaa chhan waidesika rojagaarimaa rahekaa purusa ghara pharkimdaa srimati bepattaa banekaa ra dhana sampatti sameta liera hindekaa ujuri parna thaalesangai damakamaa purusa pani himsaamaa pareko haamile paaekaa chhaum upapramukha adhikaarile bhannubhayo

srimati widesa gaepachhi napharkine ra utai arkaisanga wiwaaha garera gharajama garekaa ra srimaan srimatiko sumyukta naamamaa raheko achala sampatti rokiekaale phukuwaa gari paaun bhanera nagarapaalikaamaa kehi ujuri pareko bataaieko chha damaka nagarapaalikaamaa adhikaansa ujuri amsa saandha simaanaa chhoraachhorile bubaaamaako herachaaha nagareko ra purusa himsaakaa ujuri pani dhamaadhama pariraheko nyaayika samiti sumyojaka sameta rahanubhaekaa adhikaarile bataaunubhayo

mechinagaramaa maatrai hoina damaka nagarapaalikaamaa pani amsa saandha simaanaa michiekaa ujuri nai badhi parekaa chhan yataa birtaamoda nagarapaalikaamaa pani jaggaa saandha simaanaa sangasagai mahilaa himsaakaa ujuri badhi parne garekaa chhan

tyasaigari anya wyaktiko gharajaggaa sampattilaai asara parne gari rukha biruwaa lagaaeko aphno ghara waa balensibaata arkaako gharajaggaa waa saarwajanika baatomaa paani jhaareko sandhiyaarako jaggaatarpha jhyaala raakhi ghara banaaundaa kaanuna bamojima chhaadnuparne jaggaa nachhodeko kasaiko swaamitwamaa bhae pani paraapurwa kaaladekhi saarwajanika rupamaa prayoga hundai aeko baato bastubhaau nikaalne nikaasa bastubhaau charaaune chaura kulo nahara pokhari paati pauwaa antyesti sthala waa anya kunai saarwajanika sthalako upayoga garna nadieko waa baadhaa puyaaeko ra sumghiya waa pradesa kaanunale sthaaniya tahabaata nirupana hune bhani tokekaa wiwaadaharu sthaaniya tahamaa gathita nyaayika samitile nirupana garna saknechhan

morana pathari sanischare nagarapaalikaa nahara tolamaa aitabaara naamatharawatana nakhuleko barsiya purusa marita awasthaamaa phelaa pareko chha yasa sambandhamaa sthaniya praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha

pakraau parneharumaa daana kehuli ghara bhaekaa sanama chaudhari makawaanapura dhimaala ghara bhaekaa dhanabahaadura yonjana ra dolakhaa birteswara ghara bhaekaa gopaala nepaali rahekaa chhan yasa sambandhamaa praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
nawalaparaasi jillaako winaya triwenai gaaunpaalikaa sthita gyaarejapulabaata baisaakha gate epiepha toli ra nepaala praharile bhaaratiya notasahita ekajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha
bhaaratako bagaahaa ghara bataaune warsiya karisna marahulaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala asthaayi suraksaa posta triwenaibaata khatieko epiepha toli ra nepaala prahariko tolile pakraau gareko ho
jhola banaaera bhitryaauna laagieko suna praharile baraamada gareko ho

prabhaagakaa pramukha prataapa paudelale waisaakha mahinaa nayaan basapaarka ksetralaai maanawa bechabikhana tathaa osaarapasaara ra yauna duwryasana niyantrana ksetra banaaune kaaryayojanaaanusaara garieko aparesanamaa uniharulaai niyantranamaa lieko bataaunubhayo
ti mahilaa mahaakaali nagarapaalikaa dhaapa ki warsiyaa dropati koli raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daarchulaale janaaeko chha

wihibaara bihaana bajetira gharabaata hindeki kolile mahaakaali nadimaa haama phaaleko praharile janaaeko chha nadimaa haama phaaleko ekadui kilomitara tala nagarapaalikaakai wadaa nambara asigadaa najika koli marita phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daarchulaakaa prahari niriksaka laalabahaadura saaudale jaanakaari dinubhayo

maritaka koliko sawa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daarchulaabaata prahari niriksaka laalabahaadura saaudako netaritwamaa gaeko tolile prahari muchulkaa tayaara paari pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala daarchulaamaa lyaaiekomaa pariksanapachhi sawa aphantako jimmaa lagaaieko chha ghatanaabaare thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

srimaan ra pariwaarakaa sadasyalaai ghatanaabaare jaanakaari nagaraaeko bataaunubhayo pariwaaralaai yasto ghatanaa sunaaundaa pidaa hunchha bhanera kuraa lukaae uhaanle pidaa sunaaunubhayo balaatkaarapachhi uhaan garbhawati banepachhi jordanasthita udyogale basnetalaai ghara pharkaaidiyo haala uhaan atha mahinaaki garbhawati hunuhunchha saata dinaaghi maatra ghara pharkinubhaeki basnetalaai uhaankaa srimaan kirana basnetale garbhawati bhaeko thaahaa paaepachhi kachanakawala sthita maaitiko jimmaa lagaaekaa chhan

basnetakaa dui chhori ra eka chhoraa chhan pandhra warsakai umeramaa birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa kirana basnetasanga uhaanko maagi wiwaaha bhaeko ho budhabaara bubaa ra sthaaniya mahilaasahita aphno jiwikopaarjanako wyawasthaa milaaidinakaa laagi srimaana bhetana aunubhaeki dhanamaayaalaai uhaanko pariwaarale swikaarna tayaara bhaena srimaanale dhanamaayaasangako aphno sambandha sakieko bataaundai uhaanlaai kunai sahayoga garna nasakne bataaekaa chhan

hetaudaa mahaanagarapaalikaa purwa paschima raajamaargako tina taapke bhanne sthaanamaa prahari chauki lewartabaata khatieko prahari tolile bihibaara sawaari saadhana cheka garne kramamaa namwara nakhuleko myaajika bhyaanamaa aekaa janaa wyaktiharu jharera bhaagepachhi praharile pichhaa gardai jaandaa moktaanalaai ukta saamaana sahita phelaa paareko ho

widura nagarapaalikaa tupchesthita trisuli jalawidyut kendrako baandhasthita trisuli nadimaa mumgalabaara aparaahna baje bhettieko sawa phaaguna gatedekhi haraaekaa taamaanakai bhaeko pahichaana khuleko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nuwaakotakaa prahari niriksaka laalabaabu saahale jaanakaari die
sawako jillaa aspataala trisulimaa pariksana gari pariwaaralaai jimmaa lagaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
laaguausadha niyantrana byuro saakhaa kaaryaalaya mahendranagarale eka kilo graama charesasahita eka warsiya wariddhalaai pakraau gareko chha
mumgalabaara saanjha bhimadattanagarapaalikaa basapaarka ksetrabaata bajhaana chhabisa paathibharaa gaaunpaalikaa kadelakaa chandradewa josilaai byuroko tolile charesasahita pakraau gareko ho
pakraau garekaa josilaai hiraasatamaa raakhi anusandhaanako kaarya bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka jnaanabahaadura setile bataae

ayogale ajai sewaagraahisanga ghusa rakama line sirahaa kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaakaa nimitta kaaryaalaya pramukha waasudewakumaara yaadawa ra lekhaapaala jayaraama chaudhariwiruddha wisesa adaalatamaa aropa patra daayara gareko chha

mumgalabaara sohi gaaunpaalikaa kota sthita sasuraali ghara jaane kramamaa pulabaata khasera ghaaite bhaekaa uniharulaai upachaarako laagi sthaaniya swaasthya chauki naagimaa pathaaiekomaa upachaarako kramamaa jenisaako marityu bhaeko thiyo

rautahatamaa eka mahilaako gae raati sumkaaspada marityuu bhaeko chha katahariyaa nagarapaalikaa harsaahaatolakaa muukesa chaurasiyaaki srimati warrsiyaa simaadewiko sawa gharabhandaa kariba mitara uttaratarphako kheta ali chheumaa aja bihaana baraamada bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

unako marityuuko kaarana khulna nasake pani ghatanaa ati nai sumkaaspada raheko bhani sthaaniyawaasile dieko suchanaakaa adhaaramaa ghatanaasthala pugnubhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya garudaakaa prahari niriksaka gowinda thaapaale jaanakaari die
thapa anusandhaana tathaa sodhapuuchhakaa laagi simaaki saasu rambhaadewilaai niyantranamaa liieko chha sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala gaura pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha

bihaana eka chhimekile aera simaa ghara chheukaa khetamaa maritaawasthaamaa raheko bataaepachhi jaanakaari bhaeko maritakaki saasu rambhaadewile bataaunuubhayo jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatakaa nimitta pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka raamakuumaara daanile sawa pariksanako pratiwedana naaesamma kehi bataauna nasakine bataae simaako tina warsaaghi bihe bhaeko thiyo

baalakalaai apaharana gari hatyaa gareko aropamaa mahottari jillaako jaleswara kaaraagaaramaa purpaksamaa basdai aekaa dui janaalaai mahottari jillaa adaalatale aja janahi warsa kaida sajaaya sunaaeko chha

sohi muddaamaa jaleswara basne siwama chaudharilaai adaalatale warsa kaida ra kariba ru laakha jariwaanaa thahara gareko chha abhiyuktaharule baalaka paandelaai motarasaaikala chalaaune lobha dekhaaera jaleswara sthita basa bisaunibaata apaharana gari lagera unakaa bubaa nawinasanga ru laakha bhaaratiya phirauti maagekaa thie baalakale aphu apaharanamaa pareko bujhisakera karaauna thaalepachhi abhiyuktale unako naakamukha thichi hatyaa garekaa thie
pakraau parnemaa birtaamoda niwaasi warsiya maamaa bhaanjaa bhanine suraja chaudhari ra birtaamoda kaa warsiya raahula bhanine raajesa saaha rahekaa chhan

uniharulaai praharile birtaamodabaata pakraau gareko ho pakraau parekaa duwai janaalaai jillaa adaalata jhaapaamaa somabaara myaada thapa gari anusandhaana aghi badhaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaeko chha

yasaaghi suna wyawasaayi mukhiyaako hatyaamaa sumlagna bhaeko aropamaa praharile birtaamoda sainikamoda basne warsiya paarasakumaara dewa birtaamoda triwenai tola basne warsiya dipesa paudela ra birtaamoda kai warsiya prakaasa bhanne chiranjiwi olilaai pakraau gareko thiyo
mukhiyaalaai wyaawasaayika risaibikaa kaarana hatyaa garieko prahariko praarambhika anusandhaanabaata khuleko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa prahari upariksaka wisnau kesile bataae

birtaamodako gorkhaa dipaartamentala storanajikai raheko dewaa jwelarsakaa sanchaalaka saajana phaaguna gatedekhi ekaaeka bepattaa thie mechi raajamaargaantargata ilaamako lasunearyaalachoka sadakakhandako jamunedaandaako sadakabaata kariba phita tala jutako boraabhitra bepattaa baneko nau dinapachhi saajanako sawa bhetieko thiyo

jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya lamajunamaa kaaryarata prahari jawaana motikumaara sresthale chaalaka anumatipatra banaaidine prayojanakaa laagi ru hajaara ghusa lieko awasthaamaa ayogale nijalaai niyantranamaa lieko janaaeko chha

byurokaa diaiji thule raaile keji charesa banaaune chippada gaanjaasahita naa kha nambarako tyaamkara baraamada garieko bataae kaathamaadaummaa indhana analoda garera dhaadina gai kaathamaadaum aune kramamaa gaanjaa baraamada garieko unale bataae
dhaadinako puraano gaaun ra ankhitaarabaata gaanjaa lyaaeko ra naubisehetaumdaahudain sarlaahibaata tyo chippada bhaarata taskari garna laagiekoe praharile janaaeko chha
baanke jaanaki gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya pramoda kumaara chamaaralaai praharile katuwaa pestola thaana ra soko goli raaunda sahita pakraau gareko chha

chamaarale bhe pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa hatiyaara lyaaundai gareko suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha sumghiya prahari ikaai kaaryaalaya nepaalaganjabaata khatieko prahari tolile aitabaara nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa manakaamanaa gyaansa udhoga najikabaata unalaai cheka gardaa ukta katuwaa pestola ra goli baraamada bhaeko thiyo

surkhetamaa yuwati hatyaako abhiyogamaa eka janaa pakraau parekaa chhan panchapuri nagarapaalikaa saalakotaki warsiyaa gitaa chapaaiko hatyaako abhiyogamaa pharaara rahekaa surkhetako baraahataala gaaunpaalikaa kunaatharikaa warsiya suwaasa boharaa pakraau parekaa hun

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkheta ra kendriya anusandhaana byuro kaathamaadaunko sumyukta anusandhaanakaa kramamaa suwaasalaai kaabhrepalaanchokabaata pakraau garieko ho hatyaako baaremaa praharile aitabaara yahaan saarwajanika gareko chha phona ra phesabukako wistarita wiwaranakaa adhaaramaa suwaasalaai kaabhrepalaanchokawaata pakraau garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya surkhetakaa prahari upariksaka umaaprasaada chaturwedile bataae chapaaiko hatyaa gareko bholipalta suwaasa surkhetabaata bhaagera kaabhrepalaanchoka gaeko prahari pramukha chaturwedile bataae

praharikaa anusaara pakraau parnuaghi suwaasa kaabherapalaanchoka jillaako bhumti gaaunpaalikaa pokharichaubaasamaa majaduri gari basekaa thie hatyaa bhaeko eka mahinaapachhi saala maagha gate panchapuri nagarapaalikaa jaamune wanamaa gitaako kumkaala phelaa pareko thiyo tyasapachhi gitaako sawa khoji garne kramamaa taaukoko kumkaala eutaa khuttaako haddi kapaala kapaalamaa lagaaeko klipa eka jodaa kapadaa chappala phelaa pareko chaturwedile bataae
sunasariko itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita bipi choka najika eka purusa marita awasthaamaa aja bihaana phelaa parekaa chhan

itaharikai rabi phresa haausamaa kaaryarata dolakhaako taamaakosi nagarapaalikaa niwaasi andaaji warsiya jnaanabahaadura sunawaara marita phelaa pareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itaharile jaanakaari dieko chha

marita phelaa parekaa sunawaarako sawapariksanakaa laagi bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana pathaaieko ra tyasako pratiwedana aepachhi maatra unako marityuko kaarana khulna sakne praharile anumaana gareko chha

uni paalpaako raanimahala najikaibaata kaaligandakimaa paudi khelne kramamaa bepattaa bhaekaa thie bageko sthaanabaata kariba dui saya mitara taadhaa unako sawa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha khanaalasangai nadimaa bepattaa bhaekaa sohi thaaunkaa warsiya sumgama kaarki ajhai phelaa parekaa chhainan
nuwaakota dhuncheswara gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya lokamaana thina naikaapa jholetolasthita petimaa aitabaara marita abasthaamaa phelaa pareko praharile bataaeko chha

yasaigari kirtipura nagarapaalikaa chobhaarasthita himaala simenta phyaaktri najika kaathamaadaum sumkhamula basne kaabhrepalaanchoka pokharichaurikaa barsiya padamaprasaada chaulaagaai sanibaara marita abasthaamaa phelaa parekaa chhan
sohi nagarapaalikaa deraa gari basne makawaanapura chainapura nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya prakaasa prajaalaai sanibaara praharile pakraau gareko chha

kaathamaadaum tokhaamaa yuwatiko hatyaa gari pharaara bhaekaa yuwakalaai praharile pakraau gareko chha bhumeswari gesta haausamaa yuwati liera gaekaa salyaana saaradaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa gopaala sarmaalaai praharile pakraau gareko ho

baraamada suna ra uniharulaai praharile awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi tribhuwana bimaanasthala bhansaara kaaryaalaya sinaamumgalamaa pathaaeko chha garihamantri raamabahaadura thaapaale kehi dinaaghi wimaanasthalabaata tanakaa tana suna taskari bhairaheko bataaekaa thie
sirahaa jillaako kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaa jumdaula bhanne sthaanabaata chaitra gate epiepha tolile eka janaalaai pakraau gareko chha

sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya windura yaadawalaai sasastra prahari bala nepaala suraksaa wesa kalyaanapurabaata khatieko epiepha toli ra sthaaniya praharile eka thaana katuwaa pestolasahita pakraau gareko ho

sasastra prahari sahaayaka niriksaka saadhu mahatoko kamaandamaa khatieko epiepha tolile so thaaunmaa hijo belukaa jaancha garne kramamaa sa pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa sawaara yaadawako saathamaa ukta hatiyaara phelaa parepachhi unalaai pakraau garieko ho
epiepha tolile yaadawalaai baraamada hatiyaara ra ukta motarasaaikalasahitai awasyaka kaarawaahiko laagi sthaaniya praharilaai bujhaaeko chha

makawaanapura praharile kilo gaanjaasahita janaa bhaaratiya mahilaalaai pakraau gareko ho motihaari mardhuwaa basne sumitraa dewi sahani ra rinki debilaai pakraau garieko esapi wikaasaraaja khanaalale jaanakaari die
pakraau parekaaharu naama thara cheta bahaadura gurunga mukhya yojanaakaara umera warsa watana jillaa gorakhaa ajirakota gaapaa wadaa pesaa raajaniti taruna dalako kendriya mahaadhibesana pratinidhi
naama thara soma baahaadura gurunga umera warsa watana jillaa gorakhaa sulikota gaapaa wadaa pesaa wyabasaaya

naama thara basanta bhanne wira bahaadura gurunga bhaaratako dilli gai bhaaratiya nambarabaata gari dhamkaaune umera warsa watana jillaa gorakhaa siraanachoka gaapaa wadaa num pesaa petrola pampamaa kaama garne
naama thara ganaesa bhanne sunila dhakaala umera warsa watana s jillaa gorakhaa sulikota gaapaa wadaa num pesaa sumyukta yaataayaatamaa saha chaalaka

sunasari dewaanaganja gaaunpaalikaa maa swaasthya siwira sanchaalana gari sthaaniyawaasibaata gaira kaanuni rupamaa paisaa asula garne tina janaalaai budhabaara pakraau gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile jaanakaari dieko chha

pakraau parnemaa tehrathuma jillaako myaangalunga nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sudana suwedi sohi sthaanakaa warsiya junila suwedi ra saptari kanchanapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya prakhyaata misra raheko prahari naayaba upariksaka naaraayanaprasaada chimoriyaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

sthaaniya eka sewaagraahiko jaggaako naksaa pariwartana garidine bhanne sartamaa sewaagraahibaata ghusa lielagattai jillaa naapi saakhaa kaaryaalaya udayapurakaa pramukha syaamabaabuprasaada saaha akhtiyaarako tolibaata rumgehaata pakraau parekaa chhan

aja bihaana jillaa naapi kaaryaalayasthita kaaryaalayakaa haakima saahako kwaatarabaatai akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayoga ksetriya kaaryaalaya itahariko tolile saahalaai ru hajaara ghusasahita pakraau gareko akhtiyaarako ksetriya kaaryaalaya itaharile bataaeko chha
kaathamaadaum laajimpaatabaata praharile moranakaa sunila deba waisya ra nuwaakotakaa chetabahaadura nepaalilaai pakraau gareko ho
pratibandhita garisakeko ra darakaa kaa puraanaa bhaaratiya notaharu baraamada garieko praharile janaaeko chha waraamada garieko rakama darako thaana ra darako thaana raheko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapurakaa anusaara ghaaite baalakako jillaa aspataala udayapuramaa upachaara huna nasakepachhi sunasari dharaanasthita bipi memoriyala aspataala pathaaieko chha

tharuhata rumgasaalaa najikai hawaai phildako chauramaa bhainsikaa paadaa charaaundai garekaa baalakale jholaamaa kaalo wastu dekheko ra tyo herna khojdaa wisphota bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapurakaa prahari niriksaka maanaprasaada sresthale bataaunubhayo

wisphotabaata ghaaite banekaa baalakako petamaa bamako chharraa laageko ra taaukaamaa sameta chota laagekaa kaarana jillaa aspataala udayapuramaa upachaara huna nasaki dharaana pathaaieko prahari niriksaka sresthale bataaunubhayo
kapilawastu nagarapaalikaa kyaampasatola niwaasi susila tiwaarilaai bhaaratiya suraksaakarmile gaeko somabaara diunso aparahana gareko pariwaarika srotale daabi gareko chha

somabaara diunso gharabaata sadaramukaama taulihawaasthita paarti kaaryaalayamaa pugekaa tiwaari tyasapachhi samparkawihina awasthaamaa raheko bhandai pariwaarajanale jillaa prahari kaaryaalayamaa khojikaa laagi ujuri garekaa chhan
apaharanamaa parekaa tiwaariko khoji kaarya bhairahe pani haalasamma kunai jaanakaari praapta nabhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
mahaanagariya aparaadha mahaasaakhaale wibhinna sarakaari tathaa saiksika sumsthaako chhaapa tathaa karmachaariko dastakhata kirte garne tinajanaalaai pakraau gareko chha

srama tathaa baidesika rojagaara bibhaaga taahachalamaa thagi garne tathaa wichauliyaa kaama garne janaa mahilaa sahita janaalaai budhabaara mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaunbaata khatieko prahari tolile pakraau gareko chha bichauliyaaharule sewaagraahilaai sewaa lina nadine tathaa dasa gunaa bhandaa badhi rakama liera kaama garidine gareko suchanaako adhaaramaa uniharulaai pakraau garieko ho yasa sambandhamaa mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaunbaata awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko chha

sarwochcha adaalatale saadhe kilo suna taskarikaa mukhya abhiyuktalaai dharautimaa thunaamukta garne jillaa ra uchcha adaalatako nirnaya magaaeko chha nyaayaadhisa saaradaaprasaada ghimireko ekala ijalaasale suna taskarikaa aropitalaai dharautimaa chhaadne kaathamaadaum jillaa ra uchcha adaalata paatanako nirnayakaiphiyata magaauna aitabaara adesa dieko ho yo khabara haamile ajako naagarika dainikabaata liekaa hau
akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayoga ksetriya kaaryaalaya pokharaale jillaa siksaa kaaryaalayakaa dui janaa praawidhika karmachaarilaai ghusasahita pakraau gareko chha
pakraauparnemaa injiniyara chhawindrawikrama khaanda ra sabainjiniyara pradipakumaara baaniyaan raheko akhtiyaara durupayoga anusandhaana ayoga ksetriya kaaryaalaya pokharaale janaaeko chha

rawinaasanga raheko sunako gahanaa lii gharabaata nikaalna khojdaa unale sasuraali paksako pratirodha garepachhi sasuraali paksale jiumaa ago lagaai maarne prayaasa gareko rawinaale praharilaai jaanakaari dieko prahari naayaba upariksaka raajana limbule bataaunubhayo

nau dinasamma gharamaa lukaai raakhieki rawinaale aja umkina saphala bhai jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako mahilaa selamaa samparka garepachhi unalaai uchaarakaa laagi wiraganjako naaraayanai upaksetriya aspataalamaa bharnaa garaaieko chha

rawinaale dieko ujurako adhaaramaa praharile anusandhaanalaai agaadi badhaaunuko saathai sasuraali paksalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaamaa upasthita garaauna maatahatakaa prahari chaukilaai nirdesa dieko naayaba upariksaka limbule jaanakaari dinubhayo

bhaaratako dillimaa kaama garne rawinaakaa srimaana saawirale utai kaanchhi raakheko ra kaanchhibaata eutaa chhoro sameta raheko rawinaale praharilaai bataaeko prahariko bhanaai chha wiwaaha bhaeko tina warsa bitdaa sameta rawinaa amaa banna nasakepachhi saawirale kaanchhi bhitryaai gharabaata nikaalna khojeko praarambhika anusandhaanabaata dekhieko praharile janaaeko chha

desakaa anya jillaakaa tulanaamaa dadeldhuraamaa jabarjastikaa ghatanaamaa kami aeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dadeldhuraako tathyaamkale dekhaaeko chha chaalu arthika wasarmaa nau mahinaako awadhimaa jabarjasti karanaikaa tinawataa muddaa maatrai dartaa bhaekaa chhan bhane awa maa chaara awa maa chha jabarjastikaa ghatanaa bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dadeldhuraale janaaeko chha

wibhinna sarakaari tathaa gairasarakaari sumgha sumsthaale jagaaeko janachetanaakaa saathai prahariko sakriyataakaa kaaranale jabarjasti karanaikaa ghatanaamaa kami aeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dadeldhuraakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka chakraraaja josile bataaunubhayo

prahariko tathyaamkaanusaara jabarjastikaa ghatanaa sahari ksetrabhandaa pani graamina ksetramaa maatrai bhaekaa chhan yasaigari jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dadeldhuraale tina mahinaamaa jillaakaa saatawatai sthaaniya tahamaa jabarjasti karanaikaa ghatanaa niyantranakaa laagi janachetanaamulaka kaaryakramako ayojanaa garine jaanakaari dieko chha

jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayale eka kaaryakramako ayojanaa gari jabarjasti karanaikaa ghatanaalaai nyunikarana garnakaa laagi tinamahine kaaryayojanaasameta banaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dadeldhuraale janaaeko chha
nuwaakotako galchhi gaaunpaalikaa sikhara kateri basne barsiya siresa adhikaari bihibaara marita awasthaamaa bhetiekaa chhan

ukta sentaramaa gairakaanuni rupamaa nakkali parichaya patra tathaa pramaana patra banaaune gareko suchanaa praapta bhaepachhi mahaanagariya prahari parisara tathaa prahari baritta kartipurabaata khatieko prahari tolile maharjanalaai sumkaaspada kaagajaata tathaa kaardaharu ewum kaarda banaaune bidyutiya saamaagriharu sahita pakraau gareko thiyo

pakraau parneharumaa lamjuna ghara bhai kaathamaadaun taarakeswara nagarapaalikaa basne barsiya mohana duraa lamjuna ghara bhai kaathamaadaun manamaiju basne barsiya pasupati adhikaari tanahun wyaasa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa barsiyaa yamunaa khadkaa ra kaaski rupaa gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai banasthali basne barsiya ramesa kumaala rahekaa chhan

bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa nayaan bajaarasthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako basa ra naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala ekaapasamaa thakkara khaai aitabaara diunso durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara janaako marityu bhaeko ho

gorakhaako baarapaaka salikota gaaunpaalikaa sthita raanaruna bhiramaa jipa durghatanaamaa hundaa dui janaako marityu bhaeko chha baarapaaka gaera pharkandai gareko naacha numko jipa sanibaara saanjha kariba h durghatanaamaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gorakhaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka prakaasa daahaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

durghatanaamaa pari lamajuna dudhapokhari gaaunpaalikaa bichaurakaa warsiyakaa thaakura duwaadi ra warsiya raameswara nyaupaaneko marityu bhaeko prahari naayaba upariksaka daahaalale bataaunubhayo durghatanaamaa anya saata janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaitemadhye duiko awasthaa gambhira raheko gorakhaa aspataalakaa suchanaa adhikaari karisna dhakaalako bhanaai chha gambhira ghaaite hunemaa dudhapokhari lamajunakaa warsiya wisnau nyaupaane ra warsiya anila marahaththaa rahekaa chhan uhaanharu duwai janaalaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi raati nai chitawana pathaaieko uhaanle bataaunubhayo

durghatanaamaa pari lamajuna bensisahara nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya santosa taamaana dudhapokhari gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya amarita duwaadi warsiya wisnau duwaadi warsiya wisnau duwaadi ra tanahunko wyaasa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa susila naraala bhaeko prahari naayaba upariksaka daahaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

ghaaite naraala dudhapokhari gaaunpaalikaa siksaa saakhaakaa pramukha raheko jaanakaari praapta bhaeko uhaanle bataaunubhayo jipa sadakabaata jhandai mitara tala khaseko prahariko bhanaai chha ghatanaako jaanakaari paaelagattai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jauwaaribaata prahari niriksakako kamaandamaa baaluwaa prahari chaukibaata sameta prahariko toli ghatanaasthala pugera ghaaiteharuko uddhaara garieko thiyo jipa rirjabha garera baarapaaka ghumna aekaa uniharu pharkane kramamaa raanarunamaa durghatanaamaa parekaa hun ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
chitawanako bharatapuramaa sanibaara saanjha yaatrubaahaka basa ra skutara thakkara khaandaa tina janaako marityu bhaeko chha

bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa pakaudi bajaaramaa jagatapurabaata bharatapuratarpha aundai gareko basa ra wiparita disaabaata jaandai gareko skutara thakkara khaandaa skutaramaa sawaara tina janaako marityu bhaeko ho

naakha num ko basa ra naapa num ko skutara ekaapasamaa thakkara khaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa prawaktaa surya thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo durghatanaamaa pari skutaramaa sawaara bharatapura gitaanagara basne warsiya skutara chaalaka mohana adhikaari skutaramaa sawaara sohi sthaana basne mohanaki chhori warsiyaa winisaa adhikaari ra sohi sthaana niwaasi chaalakako daaiki chhori warsiyaa diwisaa adhikaariko marityu bhaeko thaapaale bataaunubhayo
baa kha nambarako basale pra pa nambarako skutaralaai thakkara dieko unale bataae

chitawana ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa harihara mandira agaadi sadakamaa baa kha nambarako sanaraaija bordina skulako basale baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai mumgalabaara bihaana thakkara dindaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha
marityu huneharumaa motarasaaikala chaalaka solukhumbu taapatina basne warsiya anila magara ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sunasari dharaana basne warsiya gaurawa raai rahekaa chhan

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako jillaa aspataala rukumakotamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa tyaaktara chaalaka sohi thaaun basne warsiya jiwana budhaathokiko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

mahottari jillaako gausaalaasamsi sadakakhandamaa aja bihaana tiparale thakkara dindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara dui janaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha marityu hunemaa jillaako balawaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya pramodaraama chamaara ra aurahi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya guddu nadaapha raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale jaanakaari dieko chha

kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka prakaasa wistakaa anusaara aja bihaana baje samsibaata gausaalaatira jaandai gareko naa kha num ko tiparale aurahi nagarapaalikaa kathudhaarachaukasthita sadakamaa wiparita disaabaata airaheko japa num ko motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka pramoda ra pachhaadi sawaara gudaduko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho ghatanaapaschaat sthaaniyawaasile sawa sadakamaa raakhera gausaalaa samsi sadakakhanda jaama garekaa chhan bhane tipara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa liekoe chha

purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata saptariko wirendra bajaaramaa aja bihaana trakako thakkarabaata eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha marityu hunemaa saptariko wisnaupura gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya raamakumaara khatwe mandala rahekoe prahari upariksaka raajendra dhamalaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa mandalako sthaaniya aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa jyaana gaeko praharile janaaeko chha paschimabaata purwatarpha jaandai gareko haalalaai nambara nakhuleko trakale wirendrabajaaramaa unalaai thakkara dieko thiyo ghatanaabaare thapa anusandhaana bhairahako jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka bhuwaneswara saahale jaanakaari dinubhayo
kalankibaata thaanakaaeta tarpha jaandai garekaae baa kha nambarako tiparale budhabaara raati bajetira kaathamaadaum ayala stora najikai baato kaatdai garekaa duijanaalaai thakkara dieko thiyo

tiparakaae thakkarabaata marityu hunemaa dhaadinako galchhi ghara bhai haala thaapathali basne warsiya abhaya laamaa ra chitawana ghara bhai haala gurjudhaaraa basne warsiya suwaasa hamaala rahekaa chhan tiparakaae thakkarabaata dubaijanaakaae ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko mahaanagariya prahari prabhaaga balambukaa prahari niriksaka khemaraaja raautale jaanakaari die

bihibaara raati kariba baje tira saatadobaatobaata gwaarkotarpha jaandai gareko pradesa cha nambarako taataa sumole thakkara dindaa biendabi aspataalamaa kaaryarata dui karmachaariko marityu bhaeko haae

baitadiko sunaryaa gaaunpaalikaa alugairaa bhanne thaaunmaa dhanagadhibaata bajhaana aune kramamaa jipa aniyantrita bhaera sadakabhandaa mitara tala khaseko thiyo gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa janakaraaja ra gangaadattalaai upachaarakaa laagi dadeldhuraa aspataala pathaaieko chha ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baitadikaa prawaktaa janakabahaadura dhaamile jaanakaari dinubhayo

jalabirechandibhanjyaana graamina sadakamaa chandibhanjyaanabaata raajamaargatarpha aune kramamaa aja bihaana h baje naacha nambarako bolero jipa durghatanaa hanudaa dui janaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaeko chha
maritakako naama thara watana nakhuleko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa prawaktaa suryabahaadura thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo durghatanaamaa janaabhandaa badhi ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

ahile ghaaiteko uddhaara gari thapa upachaarakaa laagi bharatapura pathaaieko chha uhaankaa anusaara so balero jipa aniyantrita bhai sadaka chheumaa raheko widyutko khambaamaa thokkiekaa thie ahile ghatanaasthalamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya muglinako toli pugi ghatanaabaare thapa jaanakaari line kaama bhairaheko prawaktaa thaapaale bataaunubhayo

dhanagadhidadeldhuraa raajamaargaantargata parne kailaaliko godaawari nagarapaalikaako gaaimaaraa sadakakhandamaa janti sawaara raheko gaadi gae raati durghatanaa hundaa behulaabehulisahita janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

baitadibaata kanchanapuratarpha aundai gareko su pa prajanum ko ukta gaadi sadakabaata jhandai mitara tala khesera bhaeko durghatanaamaa behulaa kanchanapurako belauri nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya gowinda luhaara ra behuli baitadi dogadaakedaara nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa dammaraa luhaara ghaaite hunubhaeko chha
behulaako taaukaamaa ra behulikaa haatamaa chota laageko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa prahari naayaba upariksaka pratika wistale jaanakaari dinabhayo
ghaaitemadhye dui janaako awasthaa gambhira chha kailaali prahariko tolile ghaaiteko uddhaara gari attariyaasthita padmaa aspataala ra dhanagadhiko maayaa metro aspataamaa bharnaa gareko chha

durghatanaamaa pari marityu hunemaa ismaa kaa warsiya dambarabahaadura dhitaala warsiya chitrabahaadura darlaami ra dhanabahaadura achhaami warsiya wasanta darlaami ra maalikaa gaaunpaalikaa warsiyaa sundari thaapaa raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka prawinalaala sresthale bataaunubhayo ghaaite tinamadhye ismaa kaa warsiya pharsuraama thaapaalaai bhane upachaarakaa laagi gulmi aspataala tamghaasa lyaaipuyaae pani baataamai marityu bhaisakeko gulmi aspataalakaa pramukha daa uttama paachyale jaanakaari dinubhayo

durghatanaamaa pari ghaaite ismaa ki warsiyaa saraswati darlaami ra warsiya kamala dhitaanako ahile gulmi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha dasa yaatru bokera sadaramukaamatarpha aundai gareko ukta jipa brekaphela bhai durghatanaa hundaa sadakabaata mitara tala khaseko praharile janaaeko chha

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari prabhaaga naagadhungaakaa pramukha prahari naayaba niriksaka jejanga kaarkile trakabhari saamaana liera aeko ukta trakalaai moda napugepachhi saahu wista trakabaata jharera moda milaauna khojdaa pachhaadiko chakkaale kichera ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko jaanakaari dinubhayo praharile trakakaa chaalaka sunasarikaa warsiya gowinda maajhilaai niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana gariraheko chha
durghatanaamaa andaaji warsiyaa manakumaari rokaa ghaaite bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya burtibaana praharichaukikaa inchaarja prakaasasimha bhandaarile jaanakaari dinubhayo

ukta ghatanaamaa pari kukhuraa bokne trakamaa sawaara nuwaakotakaa warsiya rosana taamaana warsiya bhupendra taamaana ra warsiya maadhawa ghimireko marityu bhaeko mahaanagariya prahari kaaryaalaya raanipokharikaa pramukha prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka wiswaraaja pokharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo
durghatanaapachhi gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa tinai janaalaai upachaarakaa laagi sahida memoriyala aspataala kalanki lagiekaamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa h baje chikitsakale marita ghosanaa garekaa thie

uhaankaa anusaara nuwaakotakai warsakaa rohana taamaana ra warsakaa wijaya taamaana ghaaite bhaekaa chhan uniharuko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha traka sahachaalakale chalaaeko jaanakaarimaa aekaale ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko prahari waritta kaalimaatikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka apilaraaja boharaale jaanakaari dinubhayo
dewilaai thakkara dine skutara ra dipasikhaalaai thakkara dine trakalaai praharile niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana gariraheko praharile janaaeko chha

hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa churiyaamaaimaa naa kha nambarako trakale naa ta nambarako tyaaktaralaai somabaara bihaana thakkara dimdaa tyaaktara chaalaka baaraa parawaanipura gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya laalabaabu yaadawako marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako hetaumdaa aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa tyaaktaramaa sawaara anya janaako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha traka ra chaalakalaai niyantranamaa lii durghatanaakaa sambandhamaa praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha

aja saanjha baje jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa purwapaschima sadakakhandako dudhauraa pulabaata dui saya mitarapurwa sadakamaa nijagadhabaata pathalaiyaatarpha aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basale pathalaiyaabaata nijagadhatarpha jaandai gareko pradesa num pa nambarako skutilaai thakkara dindaa skutimaa sawaara chaalaka nijagadha nagarapaalikaa laala basne warsiya tirthamaana syaantaana nijakai srimati warsiyaa jyoti ra eka warsiya chhoraako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko prahari prawaktaa gautama misrale jaanakaari dinubhayo
basa chaalaka pharaara bhaeko ra nijako khojatalaasa bhairaheko chha duwai sawaari prahari niyantranamaa chhan

hetaumdaa bhimaphedi kulekhaani kaathamaadaum sadakako deuraali bhanne sthaanamaa pahiro jaandaa baato abarodha bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta hunaasaatha ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhimaphedibaata khatieko praharile pahiromaa purieko ukta skaarpiyo nikaale kramamaa unako sawa phelaa paareko ho saathai baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala sameta pahiromaa purindaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara kaathamaadaum mandikaataarabasne warsiya raaja achaarya ra warsiya sumjipa adhikaarilaai upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaum pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale janaaeko chha
parithwi raajamaargasthita galchhi baireniko namaste gyaasa udyoga najikako modabaata sanibaara madhyaraati petrola bokne tyaamkara trisulimaa khaseko chha

amalekhaganjabaata kaathamaadaum audai garekaae ukta tyaamkara khasepachhi tela bharne bhaagamaa agalaagi sameta bhaeko thiyaae paanimaa maathillo bhaaga maatrai dekhieko ukta tyaamkaramaa agalaagi bhaekole uddhaaramaa sameta kathinaai bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

ukta tyaamkaramaa chaalakasahita kati janaa wyakti sawaara thie bhanne khulna sakekaae chhaina uddhaarakaa laagi chitawanako kurinataarabaata sasastra prahariko gotaakhora bolaaieko praharile janaaekaae chha

rupandehiko dewadaha nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara haattidaandaasthita rohinai kholaamaa dubera paschima nawalaparaasi sunawala nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara asnaiyaa basne warsiya karana raanaako marityu bhaeko ho

kholaamaa dubera wepattaa bhaeko khabara paaunaasaatha ghatanaasthala pugeko prahari tolile sthaaniyako sahayogamaa khoji gardai jaandaa kholaamai marita awasthaamaa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehile janaaekaae chha
mahottariko bardiwaasa nagarapaalikaamaa chatyaana laagera ekajanaa majadurako marityu bhaeko chha
bhumgahaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dukhaa chaudhariko khetamaa kaama garna gaekaa belaa chatyaana laagera ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile janaaeko chha
maritakako sawalaai janakapuradhaamasthita praadesika aspataalamaa postamaartama garaai aphantalaai bujhaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
paschima chitawanako baatuli pokharimaa baaghako akramanabaata aja eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha
