aphnai ghara agaadi raheko bakaainako rukhamaa jhulako pina khelne kramamaa pinako dori ghaantimaa beriera gambhira ghaaite bhaeki unako upachaarako laagi sirahaako lahaanasthita saptarisi aspataalatarpha laijaandai gardaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho
makawaanapuramaa kaarako thakkarabaata paidalayaatriko marityu bhaeko chha

mumgalabaara raati saadhe atha baje manahari gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara bijaunaasthita purwapaschima sadakakhandamaa baa cha nambarako kaarale thakkara dindaa andaaji warsiya purusako marityu bhaeko haae
kaarakaae thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa purusakaae upachaarakaae kramamaa hetaumdaa aspataalamaa marityu bhaekaae praharile janaaeko chha maritakako pahichaana bhane huna sakeko chhaina
praharile kaara ra chaalakalaai niyantranamaa lii thapa anusandhaana suru garekaae chha

somabaara ghaansa kaatne kramamaa bhirabaata ladera warsiya naresa wistako marityu bhaeko haae ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa wistalaai upachaarakaa laagi dhanagadhi laijaadai gardaa baataaemai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bajhaanale janaaekaae chha

battaara bajaarabaata dewighaatatarpha jaandai gareko baapa numko motarasaaikala widura nagarapaalikaa gangatemaa durghatanaa hundaa tyasakaa chaalaka widura nagarapaalikaa khadgabhanyaanakaa warsiyakaa thaakura adhikaariko marityu bhaeko haae
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa adhikaariko upachaarako kramamaa chakradewa poliklinika widuramaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya nuwaakaaetale janaaekaae chha
ghaaite sainika jawaana pariyaarako chitawanasthita puraano medikala kalejamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko gorakhaasthita ranasimha dala ganale janaaeko chha
durghatanaamaa arkaa sainika jawaana ranjina raanaa ghaaite chhan unako upachaara bhairaheko chha tipara ra chaalakalaai gorakhaa praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
gorakhaa nagarapaalikaa pandhrakilo moda najikai tiparale nepaali senaako gaadilaai thakkara didaan paanchajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

ghaaite huneharumaa ranasinha dala gana gorakhaamaa kaaryarata paaluntaara nibaasi prema pariyaara lalitapura bajrabaaraahi nagarapaalikaakaa ranjita raanaa kataari nagarapaalikaa kaa indrabahaadura taamaana siddhaleka gaaunpaalikaa dhaadina sitaaraama silawaala rahekaa chhan

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa uniharumadhya ranjita raanaa ra prema pariyaaralaai gambhira chota laagekaale thapa upachaarakaa laagi chitawanasthita puraano medikala kaleja lagieko ra anyakaae jillaa aspataala gorakhaamaa upachaara bhairahekaae jillaa traaphika kaaryaalaya gorakhaale janaaeko chha

budhabaara diunso paune baje dhulikhela nagarapaalikaa maa baa kha nambarako tiparale baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalaai thakkara dindaa motarasaakaila chaalaka warsiya daaju wedaprasaada koiraalaa ra warsiya bhaai gowardhanaprasaada koiraalaako marityu bhaeko ho
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa uniharukaae upachaarakaae kramamaa sira memoriyala apaspataalamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya kaabhrele janaaekaae chha

mahendranagarabaata janakapuratarpha airaheko ja pa nambarako motarasaaikala durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara janakapuradhaama upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara sthita dewapuraa rupaithaa basne warsiya dharmaadewi sarmaa ra unaki warsiya chhoraa nawina sarmaako marityu bhaeko haae
durghatanaamaa pari gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa uniharukaae upachaarakaae kramamaa praadesika aspataala janakapuramaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya dhanusaale janaaeko chha
jillaako kaalimaati gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num sireni niwaasi warsiya dillibahaadura aleko pahiromaa purieko awasthaamaa sawa phelaa pareko praharile janaaekaae chha
ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko prahari chauki harinagarale janaaeko chha
motarasaaikalakaae thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa ti wariddhalaai upachaarako laagi wiragumja laijaane kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sarlaahile janaaekakaae chha
saptariko raajagadha gaaunpaalikaa maa sarpako dasaaibaata mahine baalakako marityu bhaeko chha

gharamaa sutiraheko samayamaa sarpako tokaaibaata mohammada taiyaba khaanakaa mahine chhoraako marityu bhaeko haae sarpako tokaaibaata gambhira ghaaite bhaepachhi upachaarakaa laagi raajawiraajasthita gajendra naaraayana simha aspataalatarpha laijaandai gardaa baatomai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
kapilawastuko siwaraaja nagarapaalikaa sthita thunihaamaa chatyaana laagera eka janaako marityuu bhaeko chha

khetamaa kaama gardai garekaa thunihaakaa barsiya satyanaaraayana kurmikaae chatyaana laagera marityuu bhaeko haae chatyaana laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unalaai chandrautaasthita sthaaniya medikalamaa upachaarakaa laagi laijaandai gardaa marityu bhaeko nambara pradesa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

bihibaara bihaana gaaunpaalikaabaata biraami bokna wadaa nambara ko pokalitarpha jaadai gareko pradesa nambara jha nambarako embulensa wadaa nambara ko kaattikebhiramaa durghatanaa hundaa embulensa chaalaka likhu gaaunpaalikaa yasamakaa warsiya sudarsana khatriko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko haae

bihibaara bihaana warsaasangai pareko chatyaanale jillaakaa chhuttaachhuttai thaaunmaa chaara janaako marityu bhaeko ho marityu hunemaa daakaneswari nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa lalitaadebi yaadawa mahaadewaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya chhedi thaakura warsiya bechana yaadawa ra raajagadha gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya kesilaala saaha chhan
tina janaako ghatanaasthalamai ra saahako gajendranaaraayana simha aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya raajawiraajale janaaekaae chha

purwapaschima raajamaarga antargata baankeko raapti sonaari gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num siktaamaa purwawaata paschimatarpha jaandai gareko baa cha nambarako kaara aniyantrita bhaera rukhamaa thokkina pugdaa janaako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa chitawanako bharatapuura mahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num kaa kaara chaalaka warsiya kamalaraaja lamsaala ra purwa nawalaparaasi jillaako kaawaasoti nagarapaalikaa wadaa num kaa wa rsiya ksitijaraaja kanuwarako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalaparaasikaa anusaara winayitriwenai gaaunpaalikaa sardisthita khorande kholaamaa lukha nambarakaa tipara dhune kramamaa karenta prawaaha hundaa dui janaako ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko ho
marityu hunemaa chaalaka syaanjaa chaapaakota nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bharata thaapaa ra nawalapurako winayitriwenai dhurakota dewaraali basne sahachaalaka warsiya asisa wika rahekaa chhan
maritaka dui janaalaai sawa pariksanakaa laagi dumkauli praathamika swaasthya kendramaa raakhieko chha ghaaiteko madhyawindu jillaa aspataala dandaamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha
jillaakaae naugaada gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num ki warsiyaa kamalaa thagunnaako marityu bhaeko ho aja bihaana kholaa tarne kramamaa thagunnaako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
maritaka thagunnaakaa dui chhori rahekaa chhan ghatanaasthalamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gokuleswarabaata prahari niriksaka khagendra saaundako toli khatieko chha

bramhapuri gaaunpaalikaa nokailawaasthita bhitri sadaka khandamaa naa kha nambarako tiparale graabhela jhaarera haaidrolika daauna garne kramamaa pipalako haangaa bhaanchiera khasdaa brahmapuri gaaunpalikaa ki warsiyaa kailaasiya dewikaae marityu bhaeko haae
pahiromaa puriera jipa chaalaka pradipa puna ra yaatru tulsiraama kaauchhaako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gulmile janaaekaae chha

tyaaktaramaa chadhekaa warsiya wirabahaadura budhaa ra warsiya dhanasura budhaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan uniharuko karnaali swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana siksana aspataala jumlaamaa upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jumlaale janaaeko chha
sawaari durghatanaamaa pari nawalaparaasi paschima ko prataapapura gaaunpaalikaakaa adhyaksa raajakumaara sarmaako marityu bhaeko chha
gaaunpaalikaako lu jha nambarako gaadi bardaghaatatriwenai sadakakhandako laksmipuramaa aniyantrita bhaera paltandaa adhyaksa raajakumaara sarmaako marityu bhaeko haae
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sarmaako upachaarako kramamaa chisaapaani aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalaparaasile janaaeko chha
ahile maritaka sarmaako sawa postamaartakaa laagi parithwichandra aspataala paraasimaa raakhiekopraharile janaaeko chha
jillaako kailaari gaaunpaalikaa hulaaki raajamaargamaa ga pa nambarako motarasaaikalale saaikalalaai thakkara dindaa warsiya laahuraama chaudhariko marityu bhaeko haae

motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa saaikala chaalaka chaudhariko upachaarakaa kramamaa seti praadesika aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaeko chha
durghatanaamaa motarasaaikala chaalaka kailaari kaa warsiya amita chaudhari pani gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unako seti praadesika aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
bigriera paarkina gari raakhieko raakheko baaka numko traka warsaasahita aeko bhelale sadakadekhi kariba mitara tala bagaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya solukhumbule janaaekaae chha
thekedaara hari khadkaale tyasa ksetramaa kaama gariraheko bhae pani ukta traka kasako ho bhannesameta khulna nasakeko prahariko bhanaai chha

sisne ko amalaachauramaa nirmaanaadhina swaasthyachauki bhawanakaa laagi daanabaata intaa liera aeko chube dhuwaani sewaako raakha nambarako tiparako chhatabaata khasera sahachaalaka rolpaa runtigadhi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya chandrabahaadura wikako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
chaalaka ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaakaa warsakaa omaprakaasa ghartimagaralaai praharile niyantranamaa liighatanaabaare thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
durghatanaamaa parera ghaaite bhaeki durgaa aryaalako kaalikaa saamudaayika aspataala helumaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa pari jipa chaalakasahita anya saata janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaitelaai gandaki medikala kaleja pokharaa riphara garieko ra jipa chaalakalaai prahari niyantranamaa liera thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko raheko jillaa praharile janaaeko chha

ganaesamaana maargaantargata chitlaanathaanakota sadakako seto paharaamaa bihibaara naa ka nambarako eskaabhetara durghatanaa hundaa thaahaa nagarapaalikaakaa kaa warsiya purnadhwaja kesiko marityu bhaeko ho
marityu hunemaa ekadaaraa gaaunpaalikaa basne syaama yaadawaki patni warsiyaa ritaadewi raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile janaaeko chha
aphnai gharamaa basdai aeki ti mahilaalaai achaanaka swaasa phernamaa samasyaa hundaa upachaarakaa laagi jillaa aspataala jaleswaramaa lyaaundai gardaa baataamai marityu bhaeko ho
mahilaako sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala jaleswaramaa raakhieko chha

uniharu madhye kamalaawatiko apa rupamaa baseko belaa chatyaana laagdaa ghatanaasthaalamai marityu bhaeko ho bhane arko yaadawako chatyaada laagera gharamaa lyaaundai gardaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehile janaaeko chha

bhaaratabaata pharkiekaa nepaali bokera nepaalaganjabaata salyaana jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako gaadi rokiraakheko baa kha nambarako trakamaa thokkiera durghatanaa hundaa janaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

durghatanaakaa ghaaiteharulaai upachaarakaa laagi nepaalaganjasthita bheri aspataalamaa lyaaieko chha saathai maritakaharuko sawa pani postamaartamakaa laagi aspataala lagieko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya baankele janaaeko chha

gogumbubaata baalaaju tira jaadai garekaae baa kha nambarako minitraka ra biparita disaabaata audai garekaae naa pa nambarako skutara eka apasamaa thokkindaa bajhaanakaa warsakaa lokendra wista ra warsakaa dhanabahaadura budhaako marityu bhaeko haae

durghatanaamaa pari gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa budhaako tramaa sentaramaa ra wistako triwi siksana aspataala mahaaraajaganjamaa upachaarako kramamaa raati nai marityu bhaeko mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha
jhaapaakaaemechinagara nagarapaalikaa pipala daagi basne warsiya raamaayana raajawumsiko karenta laagera mumgalabaara marityu bhaeko chha
jaajarakotamaa swaasthyachaukiko bhawana nirmaanakaa laagi baaluwaa nikaalne kramamaa puriera mangalabaara eka dampatiko marityu bhaeko chha

jillaakaae khirakhiresthita baaluwaa khaanibaata baaluwaa nikaalne kramamaa puriera nalagaada nagarapaalikaa taatrakaa warsiyaa kumaari simhako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha maritaka kumaarikaa srimaan warsiya ekaraaja simhalaai upachaarakaa laagi nepaalaganja laijaandai gardaa budhabaara bihaana bheri nagarapaalikaa ko raawatagaaunmaa marityu bhaeko sthaaniyawaasi nawaraaja simhale jaanakaari die
haawaahurikaa kaarana makawaanapuramaa eka baalakasahita dui janaako marityu bhaeko chha

mumgalabaara saanjhaekkaasi aeko haawaahurile rukha dhaldaa raaksiraana chainapurakaa warsiyaa wiramaayaa prajaa ra raaksiraana kaa chha warsiya baalaka ayusa magarako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale janaaeko chha

saathai ghaaite tina janaalaai upachaarakaa laagi chitawana lagieko chha tyasaigari haawaahurile hetaundaalagaayata makawaanapura jillaako wibhinna sthaanamaa karkatapaataale nirmaana gariekaa gharakaa chhaanaasameta udaaeko chha

haawaahurile laakhaun mulya baraabarako phalaphula tarakaari nasta gareko chha khetamaa lagaaieko bhindi ghiraulaa bodi laukaa simi kaaulikaa saathai makaibaali ra anpamaa sameta ksati puyaaeko jillaa karisi jnaana kendra makawaanapurale janaaeko chha
sawaari awaagamanako anugamanakaa laagi saadaa posaakamaa khataaiekaa prahari hawaldaara nawina basnetako durghatanaamaa marityu bhaeko ho

raanke bajaarako chaamu hotala chheumaa basneta sawaara me pa nambarako motarasaaikala ra jhaapaako wirtaamodabaata phidima airaheko me kha nambarako traka aitabaara diunso thokkindaa basneta gambhira ghaaite bhai dhalekaa thie
upachaarakaa laagi jillaa aspataala ilaama puryaaundaa unalaai chikitsakale marita ghosanaa gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paanchatharakaa suchanaa adhikaari romanaraaja aryaalale jaanakaari die
prahari hawaldaara basneta chilindina prahari chauki raankemaa kaaryarata thie durghatanaamaa thakkara dine trakakaa chaalaka kamala suwedilaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dolakhaako meluna gaaunpaalikaa pawati niwaasi warsiya dipaka bhujela aitabaara chaiteghaatasthita taamaakosi nadimaa maachhaa maarna gaeko ra maachhaa maarne kramamaa unalaai kholaale bagaaeko praharile janaaeko chha

tyastai kaalinchoka gaaunpaalikaa thulaakheta basne warsiya nawaraaja paudela taamaakosi nadimaa paudi khelne kramamaa nadile bagaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dolakhaakaa prahari niriksaka resama bohoraale jaanakaari die

bepattaa duwai yuwaa aitabaara pharaka pharaka thaaunmaa maachhaa maarna ra paudi khelna gaekaa thie bepattaa bhaekaa duwai janaako sthaaniya tathaa prahariko sakriyataamaa khoji bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
unako petamaa goli laageko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhupaalchokakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka maadhawa kaaphlele jaanakaari die

anya tinajanaa mahilaasumga wanabaata daauraa lyaaundai gardaa sukrabaara saanjha ekkaasi wanabhitrai raangaale akramana gardaa paaswaanako jyaana gaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya garudaale janaaekaae chha
rautahatako dewaahi gonaahi nagara ksetramaa karenta laagera eka yuwakako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha bhane arkaa eka yuwaka gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

dewaahi gonaahi kaa raama ayodhyaa thaakurako anganamaa tyubawela gaadne kramamaa phalaamako paaipale taara chhuna pugdaa katahariyaa nagarapaalikaa hari sahaniko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
yasaigari sohi thaaunkaa chhoraa moti sahani gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite sahaniko praathamika swaastha kendra katahariyaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

ghara lipnakaa laagi maato nikaalne sthaanamaa kheldai gardaa dhiskaabaata puriera sthaaniyawaasi warsiya sumgama thaaruko marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka yogendra khadkaale jaanakaari die

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka kumaarawikrama thaapaakaa anusaara prahari ra sthaaniya baasindaako sakriyataamaa bhaeko khojikaaryakaa kramamaa aja bihaana so nadimaa bholaa mahatako sawa phelaa pareko ho uni bhumlu gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kaa baasindaa bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha sindhupaalchokabaata yaaphtina lyaaera khojne kramamaa uhaanko sawa phelaa pareko ra sohi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num basne warsiya asoka giriko bhane ajhai khojikaarya jaari raheko unale bataae
sunasariko harinagaraa gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya pawana guptaako trakabaata ladera marityu bhaeko chha

mumgalawaara diunso harinagaraa ghuski bajaaramaa ko kha nambarako trakabaata khaada tathaa chaamala jhaarne kramamaa achaanaka trakabaata ladera ghaaite bhaekaa guptaalaai upachaarako laagi jillaa aspataala laijaane kramamaa baatomaa nai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha

dolaalaghaatabaata saapina jaandai gareko baa cha nambarako bolero jipa breka phela bhaera sadakabaata tala khasi kolto pardaa sunakosi nadimaa khasera bhumlu gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya asoka giri ra warsiya bholaa mahata bepattaa bhaekaa hun

khaadyaanna liera gaeko bolerokaae chhaadiko dui wataa taayara sadakabaata tala khasi kolto pardaa ukta boleromaa sawaara tina janaamadhye dui janaa sunakosi nadimaa khasi bepattaa bhaeko huna sakne jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrepalaanchokale janaaeko chha

somabaara raati kailaaliko jaanaki gaaunpaalikaa bhursaakaa warsiya prakaasa chaudhariko karnaali nadibaata aeko naharamaa maachhaa maarne kramamaa karenta laagdaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

unisumngai maachhaa maarna gaekaa sthaaniyawaasi warsiya hari chaudhari warsiya niraajana chaudhari warsiya dewa chaudhari ra warsiya dipesa chaudharilaai niyantranamaa liieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tikaapurakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka manoharaprasaada bhattale jaanakaari die
marityu hunemaa jaleswara basne wikaau raamakaa chhoraa warsiya lataru raama raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari upariksaka syaamakarisna adhikaarile bataae
pokharimaa nuhaauna gaekaa belaa badhi paanimaa pugdaa dubera unako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala jaleswaramaa pathaaieko chha

aja nadimaa paudi khelna jaane kramamaa jillaako phikkala gaaunpaalikaa kuibhirabaata duijanaalaai sunakosi nadile bepattaa banaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhulikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka syaamabahaadura khatrile jaanakaari die

unakaa anusaara paudi khelne kramamaa surkheta panchakoti nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala phikkala gaaunpaalikaa khaanasaanamaa kaathako mistri kaama garne warsiya dinesa budhaaksetri ra warsiya janaka budhaaksetrilaai sunakosi nadile bagaai bepattaa banaaeko ho pra

harilaai sunakosi nadile maanisa bagaaeko bhanne jaanakaari aunebittikai prahari chauki khaanasaanabaata prahari toli uddhaarakaa laagi parichaalana garieko uhaanko bhanaai chha bepattaako khoji kaaryakaa laagi saatajanaa prahari ra sthaaniyawaasile khoji gariraheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhulile janaaeko chha

athabisakota nagarapaalikaa khadiki warsiyaa laali boharaa dewakotaako marityu bhaeko ho dambara dewakotaako tinatale gharamaa akasmaata agalaagi hundaa bhaansaakothaamaa khaanaa banaairaheki boharaako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka thagabahaadura kesile bataae unakaa anusaara gharamaa stora garera raakhieko petroliyama padaartha lika bhai agalaagi bhaeko praarambhika anumaana garieko chha

minitrakakaa pachhaadi basekaa taamaana trakabaata khasera tyahi trakako taayaramaa taauko parekaale ghatanaasthalamai jyaana gaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhupaalchokale janaaekaae chha sawaari saadhana ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii thapa anusandhaana suru garekaae chha

baalakako seti praadesika aspataala dhanagadhimaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki saahalaai upachaarako laagi mehilaala aspataala janakapuratarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho motarasaaikala chaalaka ganaesamaana chaaranaatha nagarapaalikaa chhaghariyaa tola basne warsiya hema sumkara saaha haala pharaara rahekaale praharile khoji gariraheko chha

baankeko baijanaathapuramaa naalaamaa jameko paanimaa dubera bihibaara tina janaa baalakako marityu bhaeko chha

saantipura basapaarkamaa raheko baagalunako barena gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa wadaadhyaksa purna khanaalako gharamaa agalaagi hundaa unakaa warsiya chhoraa samira khanaalako marityu bhaeko haae

maatoko dhiskole puriera gambhira ghaaite bhaeki unalaai upachaarakaa kramamaa aspataala laijaandai gardaa baatomai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrepalaanchokale janajaaekaae chha unako sawa pariksanakaa laagi banepaasthita sira memoriyala aspataalamaa raakhieko chha

marityu hunemaa moranaga ranageli nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai duhawi maa raheko ewiai inttaabhattaamaa kaama garne suraja risidewako barsiya chhoraa karana risidewa raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha

bhaktapurako chaangunaaraayana nagarapaalikaa sudaalamaa raheko biema intaabhattaale banaaeko pokharimaa dubera udayapura gaaighaata nagarapaalikaa amataara ghara bhai sohi bhattaamaa kaama garne warsiya mukesa raaiko gae raati marityu bhaeko chha

intaabhattaale gahiro pokhari khanne ra khulaa chhaadne gardaa hareka warsa bachchaako marityu hundai aekaamaa yasa warsa purusako marityu bhaeko chha ghatanaabaare anusandhaana suru gareko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

bhaktapurako suryawinaayakabaata raamechhaapako dorambaa jaandai gareko baa cha nambarako pikaapa bhyaana mumgalabaara bihaana baje raamechhaapako khaandaadewi gaaunpaalikaa raakaathumasthita maajhi gaaunmaa durghatanaa hundaa dorambaa gaaunpaalikaa ki warsiyaasumgitaa pahariko marityu bhaeko chha bhane arkaa eka janaako sanaakhata huna baanki raheko chha

kaathamaadaunbaata daana audai gareko baakha numko basa ra lamahibaata purwatarpha jaandai gareko raaba numko motarasaaikala gadhwaa gaaunpaalikaa kaalaakaatemaa thokkindaa durghatanaa bhaeko ho

durghatanaamaa pari rolpaako gangaadewa gaaunpaalikaakaa nimitta pramukha prasaasakiya adhikarita ganaesa punako marityu bhaeko chha rukuma triwenai gaaunpaalikaa khaaraa niwaasi uhaanko marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka sumita khadkaale bataaunubhayo

tyastai rolpaa gangaadewa gaaunpaalikaakaa kampyutara aparetara tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa niwaasi ramesa oliko pani upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha uhaanko raapti swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana ghoraahimaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho ghaaite hunemaa tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya ajaya kawara dangisarana gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiyaa sandhyaa oli ra bardiyaa baasagadhi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya karisna chaudhari rahekaa chhan

tyastai daanako ghoraahidekhi lamahitarpha jaandai gareko raapa numko skuti lamahiko beladamaaramaa durghatanaa hanudaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha marityu hunemaa ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa nawalapura niwaasi warsiya amitasimha dhaami raheko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya lamahikaa pramukha prajwala thapaliyaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

sagaradinaabaata maato jhaarera aurahitarpha aundai garekaae jata nambarako tyaaktarale kichera sohi gaaunkaa parameswara raautakaa warsiya chhoraa siwaji raautako ghatanaa sthalamai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sarlaahile janaaeko chha
sirahaako lahaana nagarapaalikaa mohanapurasthita bhitri sadaka khandamaa tryaaktarako thakkarabaata aja bihaana eka baalakako marityu bhaeko chha

uttarabaata daksinatarpha aundai gareko sa ta nambarako tryaaktarale thakkara dindaa sirahaako sukhipura ghara bhai lahaana nagarapaalikaa mohanapurasthita maamaa ghara basdai aekaa sanjayakumaara mahatokaa saata warsiya chhoraa swaagatako marityu bhaeko ho

ilaama nagarapaalikaa saakhejunakaa dipana raaiko warsiya chhoraa ninaamahaana raaiko saniwaara diunso maachhaa pokharimaa dubera marityu bhaeko haae pokharimaa dubera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa baalakakaae upachaarako kramamaa jillaa aspataala ilaamamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamale janaaeko chha

unako kalumkisthita sahida memoriyala aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko traaphika praharile janaaeko chha unakaae awasthaa saamaanya rahekaae chha
ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko traaphika praharile janaaeko chha

ghaaite madhye bimalaa ramaa ksetrakumaari ra sukamaayaa guruna gumbhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan uniharulaai upachaarakaae laagi heli maauntena eyarako heli maarphata udwaara gari kaathamaadaum pathaaiekaae chha bhane anya ghaaiteharulaai embulensamaarphata gorakhaa bajaara lyaaiekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gorakhaale jaanakaari dieko chha
jipa breka phela bhaekaa kaarana durghatanaamaa pareko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata saptariko mahuli khandamaa motarasaaikala ra bhyaana thokkindaa aja dui yuwakako marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa pari motarasaaikala chaalaka saptariko agnisaaira karisnaasawarana gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya prakaasa chaudhari ra sohi motarasaaikalamaa pachhaadi sawaara sohi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya anila chaudhariko upachaarakaa kramamaa wiraatanagarasthita nobela haspitalamaa aja marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarile janaaeko chha

dhanagadhibaata daarchulaa jaandai gareko anatesta numko jipa dasarathachanda raajamaargaantargata baitadiko paatanamaa durghatanaa hundaa chaalakako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha bhane anya chha janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

so raajamaargaantargata paatana nagarapaalikaa panatolimaa so jipa aja bihaana sadakabaata mitara tala khasera durghatanaa pareko thiyo durghatanaamaa pari jipa chaalaka daarchulaako duhu gaaunpaalikaakaa warsiya dhanasimha badaalakaae marityu bhaeko chha

sanibaara diunso chatyaana laagera sthaaniya warsiya nimaa serpaako marityu bhaeko haae haawaahurisangai aeko chatyaanale laagera serpaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
serpaako sawa jillaa aspataala khaandabaarimaa pariksana gari pariwaaralaai jimmaa lagaaieko praharile janaaeko chha

saanepaabaata kalumkitarpha jaadai gareko baa ka nambarako tipara ra saamaana bokera wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko baa kha nambarako tipara eka apasamaa thokkindaa dui janaa saamaanya ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

taanasenadekhi butawala aundai gareko lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalaai sohi disaabaata aundai gareko lu kha nambarako tiparale thakkara dindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara taanasena nagarapaalikaa baarda ki warsiya madhu sresthako marityu bhaeko haae

tripparakaae thakkarabaata unakaa srimaan himaalaprasaada srestha gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unako lumbini medikala kaleja prabhaasa paalpaamaa upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paalpaale janaaekaae chha
mahottariko matihaani nagarapaalikaa dhiraapuramaa pokharimaa dubera eka mahilaako marityu bhaeko chha
marityu hunemaa matihaani nagarapaalikaa dhiraapura basne raajadewa mandala khatbeki patni warsiyaa sukamariyaadewi mandala khatbe raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile

bihibaara saanjha gaaun najikaiko pokhariko dilamaa ghaansa kaatna gaeki khatbelaai chhaare rogale chyaapepachhi uni sohi pokharimaa khasna jaandaa dubera marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha maritaka mahilaako sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala jaleswaramaa lyaaieko chha

nawalaparaasi purwa debachuli nagarapalikaa gaabisa chokasthita sadakamaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai bihibara saanjha durghatanaa hudaan motarasaaikala chaalaka kaawaasoti nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya laala bahaadura raanaako marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako praathaamika swaasthya kendra dumkaulimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

dhanusaa dhanusaadhaama nagarapalikaa sthita sadakamaa haala nambara nakhuleko sawaari saadhanale anatesta lekhieko motarasaaikalalaai bihibaara raati thakkara dindaa janaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
naaraayanagadhamuglina khandaantargata jugedimaa bihibaara diunso rokiraakheko trakamaa motarasaaikala thokkidaa eka janaakaae marityu bhaeko chha bhane dui janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

kaathamaadaumbaata naaraayanagadhatarpha airaheko naapa nambarako motarasaaikala jugedimaa rokiraakheko naakha nambarako trakamaa thokkindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka nawalapurako kaawaasoti basne narabahaadura thaapaako marityu bhaeko haae
saptariko raajagadha gaaunpaalikaa malekhapuramaa skaabhetarako thakkarabaata eka baalikaako marityu bhaeko chha
bipi raajamaargaantargata mahottari jillaako bardiwaasa nagarapaalikaa sthita kaalaapaanimaa gae raati taataa pikaapale motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko sa cha nambarako taataa pikaapale thakkara dindaa sindhuli jillaako kamalaamaai nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya dipa khatriko marityu bhaeko haae
sohi durghatanaamaapari raamechhaapa jillaa manthali nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya rudraraaja kaarki gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ra unako upachaara bardiwaasamaa bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
purwapaschima raajamaargasthita chitawanako khairahanimaa bihibaara wihaana basa ra traka thokkindaa nau janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
wiraatanagarabaata kaathamaadaumtarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basa ra wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko naa kha nambarako traka ekaapasamaa thokkindaa nau janaa ghaaite bhaekaa hun

durghatanaamaa basamaa sawaara janaamadhye nau janaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya khairahanile janaaekaae chha uniharuko ahile bharatapurasthita puraano medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

ahile unako sawa brijawenako kupara plenasthita sawagarihamaa raakhieko ra nepaala pathaaune tayaari gariraheko enaaraenae kwinsalyaandakaa sumyojaka umesa khadkaale jaanakaari die

budhawaara raati arughaatabaata kaasigaauntarpha jaandai gareko baa cha nambarako bolero jipa arughaata gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num sthita jhorcheko jumgalamaa durghatanaa hundaa dhaarche gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaa sachiwa kirana rimaalako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho

dhaarche gaaunpaalikaa kaasigaaunmaa jestha nagaarika apaangataa parichaya patra bitarana kaaryakramamakaa laagi gaaunpaalikaa upaadhyaksa sahita janapratinidhi ra karmachaariko toli tyasatarpha gaeko thiyo
makawaanapurako gadhi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara sikharakaterimaa janti liera pharkadai gareko basa durghatanaa hundaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

budhabaara saajhaa jitapura bhanjyaanga lenadaandaabaata gadhi wadaa nambara ko sukauraakaa laagi hideko naa kha nambarako basa oraalomaa breka phela bhaera durghatanaa hundaa janaakaae ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko thiyaae bhane janaakaae upachaarakaae kramamaa marityu bhaeko haae
marityu hunemaa makawaanapura gaaunpaalikaa kaa andaaji warsiya somabahaadura rumbaa sohi sthaanakaa andaaji warsakaa somabahaadura moktaana ra naama nakhulekaa dui purusa rahekaa chhan

agalaagiko wisayamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ra jalera marityu bhaekaa baalakalaai postamaartamakaa laagi jillaa aspataalamaa lagieko praharile janaaekaae chha

unako sawa baagadograa medikala kalejamaa raakhieko chha nepaalabaata gaekaa maritakakaa bhaai narendrale sawa pahichaana garnubhaeko prahari naayaba upariksaka pokharelale jaanakaari die wisum dekhi kamyunista andolanamaa laagekaa warsiya ghimire saalako sumwidhaanasabhaa chunaawamaa jhaapaa ksetra num maa tatkaalina nekapaa maaowaadi kaa tarphabaata sabhaasad nirwaachita bhaekaa thie

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako seti praadesika aspataala dhanagadhimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho traka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

ghatanaako jaanakaarilagattai prahari chauki dharamapura ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurabaata khatieko prahari tolile thapa anusandhaana thaaleko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarile janaaeko chha
kositappu wanyajantu araksabaata niskekaa haattile jillaako kanchanapura ksetramaa dainika atanka machchaaeko sthaaniyawaasiko bhanaai chha

marityu hunemaa jillaakaae sundaraharaichaa nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya raaju bikarahekaa chhan saniwaara diunso baje ghara najikai raheko painimaa karenta lagaai maachhaa maarne kramamaa achaanaka aphnai sariramaa karenta laagdaa ghaaite bhaekaa bikako upachaarako kramamaa dharaana sthita bipi koiraalaa swaasthya bijnaana pratisthaana ghopaamaa marityu bhaeko ho
ghatanaasthalamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belawaaribaata prahari toli khati gai thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
sunasariko kosi gaaunpaalikaa purwa paschima raajamaargamaa kantenarako thakkarabaata janaako marityu bhaeko chha

saniwaara raati sawaa bajeko samayamaa naa kha nambarako kantenarako thakkarabaata ukta sthaanamaa maagi khaadai hidne maanasika santulana thika nabhaeko andaaji barsako purusa byaktiko ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko haae
thakkara dine kantenara ra chaalakalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya laukahile niyantranamaa lieko chha bhane anya thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
paalpaakaae maathaagadhi gaaunpaalikaa maa tipparako thakkarabaata eka janaako marityu bhaekaae chha

sanibaara diunso maathaagadhi baata sunawala jaandai gareko lu pa nambarako skutaralaai wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko lu kha nambarako tipparale thakkara dindaa skutara chaalaka rupandehi debadaha nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya tulasina sinakijaako marityu bhaekaae ho
tipparako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sinakijaako upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paalpaale janaaeko chha

kaalikotako jitegadaamaa jipa karnaali nadimaa khaseko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaalikotale janaaeko chha jillaako raaskotabaata yaatru lyaaera jitegadaa jhaareko lu ja nambarako jipa raaskotatarpha phirtaa hunakaa byaaka garne kramamaa jipa karnaali nadimaa khaseko kaalikotakaa prahari pramukha diesapi syaamabaabu oliyaale jaanakaari dienadimaa khaseko jipa pani purai dubeko unale jaanakaari die
bepattaa hune chaalaka dailekhako guraansa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya chakrabahaadura khadkaa raheko praharile janaaeko chha
kaaski jillaako pokharaa mahaanagaraapaalikaa lekasaaida sthita phewaataalamaa somabaara dumgaa paltindaa eka yuwaka bepattaa bhaekaa chhan bhane janaalaai sakusala uddhaara garieko chha

bepattaa hunemaa kaathamaadaum kaa warsiya sumita luintela rahekaa chhan dumgaamaa janaa chadheko ra janaalaai bhane sakusala uddhaara garieko praharile janaaeko chha uddhaara hunemaa kaathamaadaum kai rupesa adhikaari ra suwina chaalise rahekaa chhan
haraaekaa luintelalaai prahari sasastra prahari ra nepaali senaako tolile khoji gariraheko chha
wipi raajamaargaantaragata sindhuliko golanjoera gaaunpaalikaa tallowaaraamaa gaadile thakkara diera eka janaako marityu bhaepachhi sthaaniyale sadaka abaruddha garekaa chhan

thakkara dine sawaari pharaara raheko kaarana wihaana dekhi wipi raajamaarga awaruddha raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhulikaa prahari naayaka upariksaka syaama bahaadura khatrile jaanakaari dinu bhayo

wipi raajamaargamaa chalne sawaari saadhanale sresthalaai thakkara diera marityu bhaekaa kaarana sthaaniyale sadaka awaruddha gari bihaanadekhi wipi raajamaargamaa chalne kunai pani sawaari saadhana sanchaalana huna nadieko golanjora gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kaa wadaa adhyaksa romabahaadura dewakotaasuwaasale jaanakaari die
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite uniharuko gwaarkosthita bi enda bi aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha

yasaigari bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa chyaamaasimhamaa aitabaara saanjha baa ka nambarako trakako thakkarabaata ghaaite bhaekaa bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa kamalawinaayakakaa warsiya tilaka makaajuko pani marityu bhaeko chha

yasaigarikaathamaadaumko puraano basapaarkamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhaera durghatanaa hundaa godaawari nagarapaalikaa lelekaa warsiya srawana taamaana gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
jillaakaae phulina nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya durgaaprasaada sunuwaarako aphnai gharako bharyaanabaata ladera ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko haae
sunuwaarako sawa jillaa aspataalamaa postamaartama gari aphantako jimmaa lagaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya taaplejunale janaaekaae chha

jillaakaae belakotagadhi nagarapaalikaa kolputaaramaa bihaana baje baakha nambarako tiparale baapa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka kaaskiko pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhai nuwaakota basdai aekaa warsiya bharataprasaada baraala ra pachhaadi sawaara nuwaakotako belakotagadhi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dipaka pudaasaini ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

ghaaiteharulaai upachaarako laagi kaathamaadaumsthita raastriya tramaa sentara pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha thakkara dine tiparasahita chaalakalaai prahari chauki taarukaale niyantranamaa lieko chha
karenta laagera baahrabise nagarapaalikaa ghorthalikaa pappu guruna ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unakaae sthaaniya aspataalamaa upachaara bhairahekaae praharile janaaeko chha
damaulibaata muglinga tarpha jaadai gareko naa kha nambarako basa ra dumrebaata damauli audai gareko naa kha nambarako basa ekaapasamaa thokkidaa ukta durghatanaa bhaeko ho

durghatanaa ghaaite bhaekaaharuko damauli sthita ratnahari aspataalamaa janaa epolo aspataalamaa ra damauli aspataalamaa janaako upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaeko chha

naa kha nambarako basa chaalaka bharatapura upanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dhakamanai mahato sahita gambhira ghaaitelaai pokharaa ra chitawana riphara garieko chha janaa ghaaitelaai chitawana medikala kaleja ra janaalaai pokharaa sthita manaipaala aspataalamaa riphara garieko praharile janaaeko chha

chatyaanako jhilkole baayaan haatamaa thorai chota laageko saarkiko jillaa aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dailekhale janaaekaae chha
bhaktapura parsaa makawaanapura ra kaaskikaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

bhaktapura suryabinaayaka nagarapaalikaa sirjanaa nagaramaa pradesa nambara pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai bihibaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki motarasaaikalamaa sawaara baaraa jitapura simaraa ghara bhaeki warsiyaa saanti gautamako madhyapura aspataala thimimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

sirahaako kalyaanapura napaa itaariparsaahikaa raajakumaara mandalako chhoraa warsi ayusa mandala aja sukrawaara wihaana pokharimaa marita phelaa pareko ho

hijo dekhi haraaekaa mandalakaae sawa wihaana pokharimaa phelaa pareko haae bachchaa nabhetiepachhi aphantale raatabhari khoja talaasa garne kramamaa wihaanamaatra pokharimaa dubekaae awasthaamaa phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sirahaale janaaekaae chha

kholaamaa dubepachhi adhikaarikaa aphantale prahari chauki chisaapaanimaa jaanakaari garaaeko thiyo tyasapachhi ghatanaasthalamaa pugeko prahari tolile sawalaai kholaabaata nikaalieko thiyo
motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa yaadawako upachaarako kramamaa goldena aspataala biraatanagaramaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha
motarasaaikala chaalaka saptari rupani basne warsiya wikaasa pokhrela sameta ghaaite bhaekomaa unako jillaa aspataala inaruwaamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

kailaali tikaapura nagarapaalikaa asnehari chokamaa budhabaara diunso se pa nambarako motarasaaikalale thakkara dimdaa sohi thaaun basne paidalayaatri warsiyaa kaladhari raawalako marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako jillaa aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho haala pharaara motarasaaikala chaalakako praharile khoji gariraheko chha
nuwaakotako panchakanyaa gaaunpaalikaa thaprekamaa basa durghatanaa hundaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

bihibaara bihaana panchakanyaa gaaunpaalikaa arukhadkabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko baa kha nambarako basa mitara tala khasdaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa hun ghaaite madhya janaakaae awasthaa gambhira rahekaae chha
anya ghaaiteharuko awasthaa saamaanya raheko ra uniharuko upachaara sthaaniya swaasthya kendramaa bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nuwaakotale janaaekaae chha

durghatanaa pari ghaaite hunemaa khaptada chhaannaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa gaaunpaalikaa upaadhyaksa paausaraa thaapaa sohi gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsa arjuna khatri barsa kaa laksmana khatribarsa kaa rabindra josi barsa kaa sumana saarki barsa kaa sumana bika barsa kaa binoda bika barsa kaa rupaa upaadhyaaya barsa kaa debi bhakta josi ra sohi gaaunpaalikaa kaa siksaka narendra upaadhyaaya rahekaa chhan
basa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
moranako keraawaari gaaunpaalikaa belachauriki barsiyaa lekha maayaa gurunako jumgali haattiko akramanabaata marityu bhaeko chha

aja bihaana baje gurunako jumgali haattiko akramanabaata marityu bhaeko bhanne khabara praapta bhae sumgai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belawaaribaata khatieko prahari tolile ghara baahira khetamaa marita abasthaamaa phelaa paareko thiyo
maritakako sawa kaanuni prakariyaa puraa gari pariksanako laagi mumgalawaare aspataala pathaaeko chha bhane anya thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
dhaadina makawaanapura ra sirahaakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

dhaadina benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa malekhu bajaarasthita sadakamaa naa ta nambarako tyaaktarale kulchindaa tyaaktaramaa sawaara gajuri gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya hari sunaarako mumgalabaara diunso marityu bhaeko chha

makawaanapura manahari gaaunpaalikaa sunaachuristhita sadakamaa pradesa nambara pa nambarako motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa paidalayaatri hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa saannaanitaara basne warsiya dipaka subediko puraano medikala kaleja bharatapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa mumgalabaara saanjha marityu bhaeko chha

sirahaa laksmipurapataari gaaunpaalikaa dewaaristhita sadakamaa haala nambara nakhuleko motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa paidalayaatri sohi gaaunpaalikaa sitaapura basne warsiya siwa naaraayana yaadawako saptarisi aspataala lahaana hundai thapa upachaarako laagi nyuro aspataala biraatanagaratarpha laijaane kramamaa mumgalabaara raati baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

simgusako tokaaibaata jillaakaae paalunataara nagarapaalikaa kadalikaa barsaki kesamati giri ra barsaki asmitaa giri ghaaite bhaekaa hun najikaiko jumgalamaa baakhraa charaauna gaekaa belaa uniharulaai simgusale tokeko praharile janaaeko chha
uniharuko bharatapura aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko ra awasthaa saamaanya raheko praharile janaaeko chha
gaadiko thakkarabaata ghaaite bhaekaa yuwaako marityu bhaepachhi aphantale karnaaliko prawesaddhaara bherigumgaako chhinchu bajaara ksetra banda garaaekaa chhan

mumgalabaara belukaa atha bajetira sadaka kinaaramaa ubhiera phonamaa kuraa garirahekaa bherigumgaa kaa warsiya raaju boharaalaai baakha nambarako gaadile thakkara dieko thiyo gaadiko thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa yuwakako upachaarakaa laagi nepaalaganja line kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko thiyo

yastai maritakakaa aphantale ksatipurtiko maaga gardai sawaari saadhana chalna diekaa chhainan aphantale baato banda garaaepachhi wirendranagara hundai nepaalaganja jaajarakota tathaa surkhetakaa anya purwi ksetramaa chalne sawaari saadhana thappa bhaekaa chhan
aphantale baatomaa taayara baalera sawaari awatajaawata thappa paareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya chhinchule janaaeko chha
salyaanako kapurakotabaata butawala aundai gareko senaako luga nambarako gaadi maaghamaa durghatanaa hundaa jawaana warsiya yaadawaraaja dharelako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko thiyo

langadaachokabaata kudawaatarpha jaandai gareko lu pa numko motarasaaikalamaa sawaara patarautaa nagarapaalikaa kalaawumjarakaa warsiya manjaya thaakurako motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa somabaara marityu bhaeko haae
maritaka tinai janaako sawa jillaa aspataala kalaiyaamaa raakhieko ra pariksanapachhi aphantajanalaai bujhaaune praharile janaaeko chha
marityu hunemaa wihaara arariyaa jillaa motihaarigraama panchaaya basne warsiya mohammada sadaama husena raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bodewarasaainale janaaeko chha
balkhu tarakaari bajaaramaa kaama garne eka wyakti kholaa kinaaraamaa marita bhetiekaa chhan

gata maagha gate dekhi uni haraairahekaa balkhu tarakaari bajaaramaa kaama garne umesa mahatoko sawa mumgalabaara bihaana balkhu tarakaari bajaara najikai kholaamaa dubeko awasthaamaa phelaa pareko praharile janaaekaae chha
kaaskiko pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa chaauthesthita nirmaanaadhina wimaanasthalamaa somabaara beluki kaara durghatanaa hundaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

somabaara beluki baje wimaanasthalakaa kaamadaara sawaara raheko pradesa cha nambarako kaara khaaldomaa khasera durghatanaa hundaa kaaramaa sawaara syaanjaako biruwaa ghara bhai pokharaasthita chaauthemaa basdai aekaa warsiya yaamabahaadura magarako marityu bhaeko haae
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa magarako upachaarako kramamaa pokharaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaanamaa somabaara raati nai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

gaeraati paune bajetira naa ka nambarako tiparale thakkara dindaa sthaaniya warsiya prawina sresthako marityu bhaeko haae sthaaniyabaasikaa anusaara srestha sustamanasthitikaa thie ra uni sadaka petimaa sutirahekaa thie

bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa phulabaari sthita bhitri sadakakhandabaata mumgalapura tarpha jaandai gareko baa ka namwarako trakale wiparita disaabaata airaheko naa pa namwarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka bharatapura phulabaari kai barsiya raamaprasaada duwaadiko marityu bhaeko haae
trakako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako chitawana medikala kalejamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale jaanakaari dieko chha
sawa pariksanakaa laagi bharatapura aspataalamaa raakhieko chha thakkara dine traka ra trakakaa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
kaathamaadaum paanchathara ra rupandehiko chhuttaachhuttai sthaanamaa bhaekaa sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

kaathamaadaum naagaarjuna nagarapaalikaa swayambhu haaita gumbaasthita sadakamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai aitabaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikala chaalaka tanahun bhaanu nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai haala budhaanilakantha basne warsiya pradipa gurunako marityu bhaeko chha

tyaaktarabaata khasera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa limbuko jillaa aspataala hundai thapa upachaarako laagi jhaapaatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho tyaaktara sahita chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
dhanusaa kailaali morana ra rautahatakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

dhanusaa humsapura nagarapaalikaa mudhaasthita sadakamaa ja pa nambarako motarasaaikala ra ja pa nambarako motarasaaikala sanibaara diunso ekaapasamaa thakkara khaandaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa humsapura nagarapaalikaa sonigaamaa basne warsiya nawina kumaara raayako upachaarako laagi laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa duwai motarasaaikalamaa sawaara janaamadhye janaako praadesika aspataala janakapuramaa ra janaako nyuro aspataala wiraatanagaramaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

kailaali lamkichuhaa nagarapaalikaa balchaurasthita sadakamaa se ta nambarako tyaaktara durghatanaa hundaa tyaaktaramaa chyaapiera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka lamkichuhaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya karisna chaudhariko tikaapura aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa aitabaara bihaana marityu bhaeko chha

morana ratuwaamaai nagarapaalikaa kalyaanapurasthita sadakamaa bigriera paarkina gari raakheko ko ta nambarako tyaaktaramaa ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala thakkara khaai sanibaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka ratuwaamaai nagarapaalikaa sonaapura basne warsiya abida minyaako rumgeli aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara chaalaka ratuwaamaai nagarapaalikaa sonaapura basne warsiya raama kumaara giriko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

rautahata chandrapura nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa ja nambarako taataa sumo aniyantrita bhai sanibaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sumo chaalaka makawaanapura chaukitola basne warsiya jiwana bholanako chapura praalihaspitalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale dieko jaanakaarianusaara janakapurabaata bhairahawaatarpha airaheko lukha nambarako basale sohi disaabaata airaheko naakha nambarako trakalaai gaeraati thakkara dieko thiyo
kaabhreko saangaamaa boloro jipako thakkarabaata dyutimaa rahekaa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka asaiko marityu bhaeko chha

kaathamaadaumbaata banepaatarpha gairaheko baa cha nambarako bolero jipako thakkarabaata nawalaparaasiko triwenai ghara bhai prahari chauki saangaamaa kaaryarata praharikaa asai tejabahaadura gurunako marityu bhaeko ho

sasastra prahari gulma kaabhremaa darabandi bhai saangaa prahari chaukimaa kaaryarata asai gurunalaai bolero jipale kaaryaalaya agaadi nai thakkara dieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrele janaaekaae chha
chitawanako ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa sauraahaasthita haatti prajanana kendra najika khorasora jumgalamaa jumgali haattiko akramanabaata eka wariddhako marityu bhaeko chha

haattiko akramanabaata badreni ghara bhaekaa warsiya manabahaadura taamaanako marityu bhaeko haae aja bhaisi charaauna jaane kramamaa taamaanalaai haattile akramana gardaa unako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chitawana praharile janaaeko chha
naaijeriyaamaa laasaa naama diieko jwarobaata marityu hune wyaktiko sankhyaa kamtimaa pani pugeko yahaankaa swaasthya adhikaariharule jaanakaari diekaa chhan

uniharukaa anusaara naaijeriyaako roga niyantrana kendrale yo jwarobaata jyaana jaaneko sankhyaa thapa badhna sakne janaaeko chha yahaan ukta jwaroko prakopa pratidina badhdo maatraamaa raheko pani bataaieko chha
yasa jwarobaata desakaa madhyekaa kamtimaa pani wataa praantakaa naagarika prabhaawita bhaeko paaieko adhikaarileharule jaanakaari diekaa chhan
sunasari kaabhre kailaali ra kanchanapurakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

sunasari dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa thinagaabaaristhita sadakamaa kisaana chokabaata thinagaabaaritarpha jaandai gareko ko ta nambarako tyaaktarabaata ladadaa tyaaktarako pachhaadiko chakkaale kichi sohi thaaun basne warsiya buddharaaja limbuko bihibaara diunso ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

kaabhre panauti nagarapaalikaa daahaalataarasthita sadakamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai bihibaara raati durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara dhulikhela nagarapaalikaa phaskota basne warsiya sumjiba taamaanako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

kailaali lamkichuhaa nagarapaalikaa chauristhita sadakamaa roki raakheko sudura paschima pradesa cha nambarako pikaapa gaadibaata khasdaa sohi thaaun basne janaka chandako chhoraa mahinaako tenisa chandako marityu bhaeko chha
gaadimaa pachhaadi kheliraheko awasthaamaa gaadibaata khasera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako sthaaniya laalaratna aspataala lamkimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

kanchanapura punarwaasa nagarapaalikaa chakameli pula najika se pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai bihibaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa belaa basne warsiya siwaraaja raanaako praadesika aspataala dhanagadhimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
moranako letaana nagarapaalikaa dhowighaatamaa hindne kramamaa dilabaata chipliera ladera sukrabaara bihaana ekajanaako marityu bhaeko chha

dhaadinakaae benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa charaumdi pula najikai aja bihaana bhaaratiya nambarako trakale skutaralaai thakkara dindaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane eka janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

kaathamaadauntarpha jaandai gareko biara jidi nambarako bhaaratiya trakale kaathamaadaumbaata muglinatarpha jaandai gareko pradesa pa nambarako skutaralaai thakkara dindaa skutara chaalaka solukhumbu jillaa mukli nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya prakaasa basnetako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko haae

trakakaae thakkarabaata skutara maa pachhaadi sawaara kaabhrekaa sanisa thaapaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unalaai upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaumsthita tichina aspataala bharnaa garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinale janaaekaae chha
durghatanaa lagattai bhaagekaa traka chaalakalaai gajuri praharile pakraau gari anusandhaana suru garekaae chha

tiparakaae thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chandalaai upachaarako laagi seti praadesika aspataala dhanagadhi lyaaundai gardaa baatomai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaekaae chha
thakkara dine chaalakalaai tiparasahita praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

jyaana gumaaune janaa nepaali kaamadaaraharu madhye pahichaana khulekaa chaara nepaaliharumaa paalpaakaa eka bahaadura gaahaa siraahaakaa gumgaaraama chaudhari taaplejunakaa basanta guruna ra daanakaa syaama naaraayana chaudhari rahekaa chhan bhane baanki dui janaa maritakako spasta wiwarana aune kramamaa raheko raajadutaawaasale janaaeko chha

kanchanapura laalajhaadi gaaunpaalikaa belauri kaluwaapurasthita sadakamaa lu kha nambarako basa ra ma pa nambarako motarasaaikala ekaapasamaa bihibaara bihaana thokkiera durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikala chaalaka laalajhaadi gaaunpaalikaa dhakkaa basne warsiya padama chaudhariko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
basa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

chitawana bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa raamanagara bajaaramaa roki raakheko naa kha nambarako trakamaa pradesa nambara pa nambarako skutara thokkindaa skuti chaalaka bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa kabilaasa basne warsiyaa anitaa gurunako marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki unako puraano medikala kaleja bharatapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho duwai sawaari saadhana ra traka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
kanchanapura dhaadina saptari ra kaaskikaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

kanchanapurakarisnapura nagarapaalikaa bumkasthita sadakamaa rokiraakheko naa kha nambarako basamaa se pa nambarako motarasaaikala thakkara khaai budhabaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaamotarasaaikalamaa sawaara kailaali godaawari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya mohana chaudhariko marityu bhaeko chha

motarasaaikala durghatanaa hundaa sadakamaa ladekaa chaudharilaai biparita disaabaata aeko se kha nambarako minitrakale thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekomaa padamaa aspataala attariyaamaa upachaarako kramamaa unako marityu bhaeko ho

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka kailaali godaawari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya niraajana chaudhariko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha tinawatai sawaari saadhana tathaa basa ra minitraka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhaadinabenighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa archalesthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako basako thakkarabaata paidalayaatri sohi thaaun basne dinesa gurunako chhoraa warsiya prajwala gurunako budhabaara saanjha ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

saptarihanumaananagara kumkaalini nagarapaalikaa goriyaahisthita sadakamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai budhabaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi nagarapaalikaa sakaradahi basne warsiyaa munidebi yaadawako ghopaa aspataala dharaanamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kaaskipokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa jiro kilomitarasthita sadakamaa ga ja nambarako tyaaksi ra ga pa nambarako motarasaaikala eka apasamaa thakkara khaai bihibaara bihaana durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara daarchulaa ghara bhai haala pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa khaharebasne warsiya padama simha dahaadako metrositi aspataala pokharaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalachaalaka kaabhreghara bhai haala pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa nyuroda basne warsiya asisa bhujelako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha tyaaksira chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

pina banaaera kheliraheko belaa achaanaka baalikaako ghaantimaa tannaa berieko ra pariwaarakaa sadasya gharamaa nabhaekaale unako ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurale janaaeko chha
budhawaara saanjha dhaadinako gajurimaa uniharu sawaara baa pa nambarako skutaralaai wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko lu kha nambarako basale thakkara dieko thiyo
chitawanako bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa gitaanagara sthaayi thegaanaa bhaekaa uniharu kaathamaadaunbaata chitawana ghara jaandai thie
basasahita chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

salyaanako kapurakotabaata butawala aundai gareko lu ga namwarako gaadi kapurakota gaaunpaalikaa wadaa namwara chorakholaamaa durghatanaa hundaa senaakaa jawaana warsiya yaadawaraaja dharelakaae marityu bhaekaae haae
purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata moranako belabaarimaa trakale skutaralaai thakkara dindaa budhabaara eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

kanchanapura suklaaphaantaa nagarapaalikaa bana samitisthita sadakamaa se ka nambarako jesibile mumgalabaara saanjha paidalayaatrilaai thakkara dindaa bhimadatta nagarapaalikaa brahamadewa basne warsiya ganaesa baadiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
jesibi chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

jhaapaa siwasataaksi nagarapaalikaa laalajhodaasthita sadakamaa me ta nambarako tyaaktarakabaata mumgalabaara belukaa ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sahachaalaka morana taandi basne warsiya manita limbuko birtaasiti aspataala birtaamodamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha durghatanaakaa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
purwi nawalaparaasiko bulinataara gaaunpaalikaa chharachharemaa gae raati tyaaktara durghatanaa hundaa chaara janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane durghatanaamaa atha janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaamadhye tyaaktara chaalaka tathaa tyaaktara dhani bulinataara niwaasi balabahaadura jhedi magara warsiya chhaalabahaadura saaru magara warsiya wimalaraaja suslinga magara ra warsiya sandipa saaru magarako awasthaa gambhira rahekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalapurale janaaekaae chha

prahari chauki amarapati parsaa damakala ra sthaaniyako sahayogamaa eka ghantaapachhi ago niyantranamaa liieko thiyo ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale jaanakaari diekaae chha
bharatapura kaaraagarakaa eka kaidiko marityu bhaeko chha
bhaarata sidaarthanagarakaa warsiya japhara ahamadko marityu bhaeko kaaraagaara pramukha kamala prasaada kaaphlele jaanakaari diekyaansara pidita japharako mumgalabaara raati baje marityu bhaeko ho
unalaai upaachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaumbaata bharatapura lyaaieko thiyo maanawa bechabikhanako aropamaa warsa kaida ra paancha laakha sajaaya tokieko thiyo

uttarabaata daksinatarpha jaandai gareko ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala aphai aniyantrita bhai bijuliko polamaa thokkindaa chaalaka sunasariko duhawi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dipesa chaudhariko marityu bhaeko ho
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaudhariko upachaarakaa kramamaa wiraata narsina homamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya moranale janaaekaae chha
tatkaalai uddhaara garera praathamika swaasthya kendra burtibaanamaa upachaarakaa laagi laijaane kramamaa unako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

siraahaachoharwaa sadaka khanda antargata narahaa gaaunpaalikaa maa basale lupa nammbarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara siraahaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sailendra mandala ra sohi thaaunkaa warsiya amana mandalakaae marityu bhaeko haae
basakaae thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa dubai janaalaai upachaarakaa laagi wiraatanagara lagdai gardaa baatomai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya siraahaale janaaekaae chha
thakkara dine basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
parwatakaae kusmaa nagarapaalikaa siwaalayachokasthita sadakamaa basako thakkarabaata eka janaa paidalayaatriko marityu bhaekaae chha
mustaanabaata pokharaatarpha jaandai gareko ga kha nambarako basako thakkarabaata paidalayaatri modi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya dila bahaadura punako aitabaara diunso marityu bhaeko haae
basako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa punako jillaa aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii yasa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

jillaakaae khatyaada gaaunpaalikaa bugaa gaaunmaa raheko kaalikaa maadhyaamika widyaalayamaa kaaryarata baanke nepaalajumga upamahaanagarapaalikaa ganaesapurakaa warsiya jayabahaadura saahiko ladera marityu bhaeko haae

sanibaara gaaun najika raheko dhaaraamaa nuhaai dhuwaai gari paakhaamaa ghaama taapi rahekaa belaa ekkaasi basekai sthaanabaata ladera ghaaite bhaekaa saahiko upachaarakaae kramamaa sthaaniya praathamika swaasthya kendramaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
tyaaktara sadakabaata kariwa mitara tala khasekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paanchatharale janaaeko chha
kohalapura nagarapaalikaa chapparagaudi ghara bhai agaiyaamaa pasala sanchaalana gardai aekaa siwa sarmaa wanabhojapachhi so nadimaa nuhaaune kramamaa bepattaa bhaekaa praharile janaaekaae chha

sanibaara aparaahna dekhi bepattaa bhaekaa unalaai haalasamma phelaa paarna nasakieko praharile janaaekaae chha sarmaako khojimaa nepaali senaa nepaala prahari sasastra prahari ra sthaaniyawaasi sanibaara aberasamma khatiekaa thie

sindhulikaae dudhauli nagarapaalikaa sthita dakaahaa chakamake sadakakhandako todkemaa tryaaktara durghatanaa hundaa ekajanaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaekaae chha bhane janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

dudhauli nagarapaalikaa wadaa num todkepaani jangalabaata daauraa liera dakaahaatarpha jaandai gareko luta numko tryaaktara achaanaka breka phela bhai sanibaara durghatanaa hundaa dudhauli nagarapaalikaa gichiyaanikaa warsiya bramahalaala dhaamiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaekaae haae
durghatanaamaa dudhauli nagarapaalikaa wadaa num gichiyaani basne warsiya raama bharosaa warsiya raama kumara ra warsiya suklaa dhaamiko awasthaa gambhira raheko praharile janaaeko chha
ghaaiteko sindhuli aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
wiraatanagaramaa kaarako thakkarabaata ekajanaa mahilaako marityu bhaeko chha
sukrabaara diunso wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita samjhanaa chokako bhitri sadakamaa ko cha nambarako kaarako thakkarabaata sthaaniya warsiya jaagodewi kaamatako marityu bhaeko ho
thakkarabaata ghaaite mahilaalaai upachaarakaa laagi nyuro aspataala laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaekaae chha
baalikaa sthaaniya suryodaya pablika bordina skulamaa kaksaa maa adhyayanarata thiina
mahottari kanchanapura ra baitadikaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

mahottari piparaa gaaunpaalikaa sahodawaasthita sadakamaa ja kha nambarako basale ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai bihibaara diunso thakkara dimdaa motarasaaikala chaalaka piparaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya raajendra sarmaako ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baitadi dasarathachanda nagarapaalikaa husillaamodasthita sadakamaa baa pa nambarako kaara aniyantrita bhai bihibaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka sohi nagarapaalikaa saahileka basne warsiya harisa tiruwaako jillaa aspataala baitadimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa giriko pradesa aspataala surkhetamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
makawaanapurako manahari gaaunpaalikaa maa gaeraati basakaae thakkarabaata eka saaikalayaatrikaae marityu bhaeko chha

khaanepaani witaranakaa laagi getabhalwa kholna jaandaa paaipamaa chipliera ladeki bhimasena thaapaa gaaunpaalikaa nibaasi barsiyaa sitaa simkhadaako ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

dudhaulibaata arunathaakuratarpha jaandai gareko sa cha nambarako pikaapa bolero dudhauliarunathaakura graamina sadakamaa chipliera durghatanaa bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhulile janaaekaae chha durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa janaa madhye janaako awasthaa gambhira raheko praharile janaaeko chha

gambhira ghaaite hunemaa dudhauli nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya yamakumaara magara ra udayapuragadhi ki indiraa magara rahekaa chhan gambhira ghaaiteharuko thapa upachaarakaa laagi sirahaako mirchaiyaa pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa dudhauli nagarapaalikaa kaa premabahaadura magara unaki srimati sunitaa magara sudarsana kaarki dudhauli nagarapaalikaa ki sawinaa sunuwaara tulasaa kaarki ra tilakabahaadura magara ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

yastai dudhauli nagarapaalikaa ki nisaa budhaathoki dudhauli ki susilaa kaarki ra sindhuli phikkala gaaunpaalikaa ki kamalaa alemagara ra lilaa sunuwaara ghaaite bhaekaa chhan uniharuko dudhaulisthita swaasthya sumsthaamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa anusaara naaraayanagadhatarpha aundai gareko lukha num ko trakamaa pachhaadibaata aundai gareko baapa num ko paryataka basale bihaana h baje thakkara dieko thiyo

ghaaiteko bharatapura aspataala chitawana medikala kaleja ra puraano medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha ghaaitemadhye kehiko awasthaa gambhira raheko praharile janaaeko chha paryataka sauraahaa jaana aundai gareko bataaieko chha

hetaumdaabaata chitawanatarpha jaandai gareko naakha nambarako trakako thakkarabaata paidalayaatriko warsiya ammara puna magarako marityu bhaeko haae trakako thakkarabaata ghaaite bhaekaa unalaai upachaarakaa laagi hetaumdaa aspataala lyaaundai gardaa baatomai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya makawaanapurale jaanakaari dieko chha
chitawana ghara bhaekaa maritaka magara basaamaadimaa chaaumina kaarakhaanaamaa kaama garne majadura hun thakkara dine traka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana gariraheko chha

dojarako thakkarabaata gaeraati paschima daanamaa eka wariddhako marityu bhaeko chha

hetaundaabaata naaraayanagadhatarpha aundai gareko naakha numko tela bokne tyaankarakaae thakkarabaata andaaji warsiya yuwaako marityu bhaeko haae tyaankarako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa yuwaako bharatapura aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale chitawanale jaanakaari dieko chha
maritakako pahichaana khulna nasakeko ra sawa bharatapura jillaa aspataalako sawagarihamaa raakhieko praharile janaaeko chha tyaankara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dewaghaatako suraksaakaa laagi khatieko prahari toli pharkine kramamaa tanahunko jugedi bhanne sthaanamaa pokharaa ganako baa ga nambarako gaadi durghatanaa hundaa prahari jawaana sandipa kesiko marityu bhaeko haae

dhaadina dhuniwesi nagarapaalikaa jaamunesthita sadakamaa mumgalabaara saanjha baa ka nambarako aichara gaadiko thakkarabaata makawaanapura thaahaa nagarapaalikaa basne rawi taamaanako warsiya chhoraa kunaala taamaanako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
gaadi ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhanusaa laksminiyaa gaaunpaalikaa dhalkebarasthita sadakamaa ja ka nambarako basale ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dii mumgalabaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara janaako marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka ksireswaranaatha nagarapaalikaa parsaa pakadiyaa basne warsiya sumtosa thaakura ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi sthaana basne warsiya mobaaraka raainako praadesika aspataala janakapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
dubai sawaari saadhana ra basa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha ghatanaakaa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha

bardiyaako thaakuraddhaaraamaa rahako thaakurabaabaa mandirako darsana garera pharkandai gareko bhe ta nambarako tayaaktara raajaapura nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara geruwaasthita karnaali pula najikai durghatanaa hundaa geruwaa gaaunpaalikaa waarda na pahaadipurakaa warsiya baalaka rubena chaudharikaae marityu bhaeko haae

durghatanaamaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite madhye janaako awasthaa gambhira raheko praharile janaaeko chha gambhira rahekaale thapa upachaarakaa laagi nepaalaganja lagieko chha bhane anya ghaaiteharuko jillaa aspataala gulariyaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
wihaana baaklo hussukaa kaarana so durghatanaa bhaeko bataaietaa pani tayaaktara chaalaka miththu chaudharilaai niyantranamaa lii ghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

thakkara dine basa ra chaalakalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya simaraale niyantranamaa liekaae chha

kaathamaadaunbaata melamchi jaandai gareko baa pa numko motarasaaikala saankhu bajaara napugdai oraalomaa durghatanaa hundaa sindhupaalchoka melamchi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya siwa sunaarako marityu bhaeko ho

somabaara raati darabaaramaargasthita waana thaai resturentamaa aphno niyamita gaayana prastuti sidhyaaera ghara pharkine kramamaa gaayaka bhattaraai aphaimle chalaaeko kaara tinakunesthita sadakako polamaa thokkiera durghatanaa bhaekaae thiyaae
sunasariko itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa pipalachoka sthita bhitri sadaka khandamaa septityaanaki gaadiko thakkarabaata saaikalayaatriko marityu bhaeko chha

saaemabaara diunso ko kha nambarako septityaanaki gaadile saaikala yaatri itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa halagadaa basne barsa ki sunitaa kaarkilaai thakkara dieko thiyo thakkarabaata ghaaite bhaeki unalaai upachaarako laagi biraata narsinahoma aspataala lagiekomaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
