rupandehi butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa besakyaampa chokasthita sadakamaa baa cha nambarako kaarale lu pa nambarako skutaralaai budhabaara raati thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki skutaramaa sawaara sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa dewinagara basne warsiyaa sapanaa paudelako praadesika aspataala butawalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
skutara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii haala pharaara rahekaa kaara chaalakako khoji kaarya gariraheko chha

baaraa kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sakhuisthita sadakamaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala budhabaara saanjha aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikala chaalaka mahaagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya ganaesa saaha sunaarako upachaarako kramamaa jillaa aspataala kalaiyaamaa marityu bhaeko chha

dhaadina thaakre gaaunpaalikaa achhetesthita sadakamaa baa kha nambarako trakale sohi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya sumana taamaanalaai budhabaara raati thakkara dimdaa ghatanaasthalamai marityu chha traka chaalakalaai niyantranamaa lieko chha
rukuma purwamaa bhirabaata ladera eka yuwakako marityu bhaeko chha
jillaako sisne gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya mitralaala nepaaliko daajuko gharabaata aphno gharamaa jaandai gardaa sthaaniya titekholaa bhirabaata ladera marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
praharikaa anusaara uni baatobaata kariba dui saya mitara tala khasekaa thie nepaaliko sawa jillaa aspataala rukumakotamaa postamaartapachhi aphantalaai bujhaaieko chha

ilaama nagarapaalikaa linalimaa tola basne barsiya karisna bahaadura raaiko aja bihaana ghara najikai khetamaa raheko baansamaa chadhi ghaansa kaatne kramamaa ladera ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko haae
senaa pramukha mina nayaan warsamaa purwaaettara ksetramaa rahekaa sainikasanga bhetna jaane kramamaa helikoptara durghanaa bhaeko ho

marityu hune bhaaratiya senaamaa kaaryarat gorakhaako wikata ripa gaaunkaa warsiya nepaali naagarika arjuna thaapaamagara rahekaa chhan budhabaara raati jammu ra kaasmirako raajouri jillaamaa golibaari bhaepachhi dui sainikako marityu bhaeko thiyo golibaarimaa bhaaratiya naagarika warsiya saawanta sandipa raghunaathako marityu gaeko chha
praharile kaanuni prakariyaa puraa gari sawa pariksanako laagi jillaa aspataala chainapura pathaaeko chha bhane ghatanaakaae baaremaa thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

purwapaschima raajamaarga antargata parne bardiyaa raastriya nikunjabhitra bhaekaae traka durghatanaamaa marityu hune sabaiko sanaakhata bhaeko chha maritaka janaakai sanaakhata bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaale janaaekaae chha

marityu hunemaa baanke khajuraa kaaehalapura basne warsiyaapratimaa sunaara khajuraa gaaunpaalikaa jigaaun basne warsiyaa pawitraa sunaara pariyaara tathaa sahachaalaka gulmi jillaa ghara bhaekaanimabahaadura saarki rahekaa chhan

bhairahawaabaata phalaame chhada loda gari dhanagadhitarpha gairaheko lu kha nambarako traka budhabaara bihaana bardiyaa raastriya nikunja bhitra durghatanaa hundaa tina janaako marityu bhaeko thiyaae

phalaame chhada bokeko trakamaa chyaapiekaako sawa jesibiko sahaayataabaata baahira nikaalieko thiyaae durghatanaamaa traka chaalaka ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kapaasekaa karnabahaadura chaudhari ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

durghatanaamaa motarasaaikala chaalaka tanahun ghara bhaekaa warsiya ronasa guruna ra jipa chaalaka pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya saroja laamaako marityu bhaeko haae durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa uniharukaae upachaarako kramamaa paschima ksetriya aspataala gandakimaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa jipamaa sawaaramadhye eka janaako manaipaala aspataala ra anya eka janaako paschima ksetriya aspataala gandakimaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
tina watai sawaari saadhana ra basa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata bardiyaako thaakurabaabaa nagarapaalikaa maa traka durghatanaa hundaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane eka janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
bhairahawaabaata phalaame chhada loda gari dhanagadhitarpha gairaheko lu kha nambarako traka budhabaara bihaana bardiyaa raastriya nikunja bhitra durghatanaa hundaa tina janaako marityu bhaeko haae

durghatanaamaa dui mahilaa ra eka purusako marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhurigaaunle janaaekaae chha praharikaa anusaara durghatanaakaa maritakamadhye minabahaadura saahiko maatra pahichaana khuleko chha

phalaame chhada bokeko trakamaa chyaapiekaako sawa jesibiko sahaayataabaata baahira nikaalieko praharile janaaeko chha traka chaalaka ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kapaasekaa karnabahaadura chaudhari ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
rautahatamaulaapura nagarapaalikaa chirachirayaamaa tyaaktarako thakkarabaata motarasaaikalamaa sawaara janaako marityu bhaeko chha

naa ta nambarako tyaaktarale naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai mumgalabaara beluki sawaa baje thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka maulaapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya surendra raaya ra pachhaadi sawaara sohi thaaunkaa warsiya raajendra raayakaae marityu bhaeko haae

surendrako jillaa aspataala gauramaa ra raajendrako nesanala medikala kaleja wiraganjamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha tyaaktarasahita chaalakalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya maulaapurale niyantranamaa lieko chha

bhaaratiya nambarako minibasa ra wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko ma pa nambarako motarasaaikala gaeraaraati sawaa baje apasamaa thokkidaa kanchanapurakai bedakota nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya jaya bahaadura raanaako marityu bhaeko ho

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa raanaako upachaarako kramamaa praadesika aspataala dhanagadhimaa gaeraati nai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha durghatanaamaa sumlagna duwai sawaari saadhana ra minibasakaa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

ghaaite hunemaa skutara chaalaka bhaktapurako lokanthali basne warsiya siresa srestha ra pachhaadi sawaara kaathamaadaumko saantinagara basne warsiya wimochana khanaala chhan ghaaite bhaekaa sresthako thaapaathalisthita narbhika aspataalamaa ra khanaalako gaththaagharasthita naagarika aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
kaathamaadau taarakeswara nagarapaalikaa jitapura phedimaa pani gaeraati saadhe baje thelaagaadhaamaa pradesa pa nambarako motarasaaikala thokkindaa chaalaka gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

rughaakhokile gaaun nai thalaa parepachhi gaaunmai raheko raayaa swaasthyachaukimaa dainika dekhi janaa upachaarakaa laagi aune gareko ahewa wirasimha raawalale jaanakaari dinubhayo raawala aphain eka haptaadekhi gaaunmaa phailieko mausami rughaakhokile biraami bhaera swaasthyachaukimaa jaana saknubhaeko chhaina
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa budhaathokiko upachaarakaa kramamaa raapti praadesika aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daangale janaaeko chha
nepaala kamyunista paarti nekapaakaa surkheta jillaa sadasya ganaesa nepaaliko motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa pari marityu bhaeko chha
lekawesi netaakaa nepaaliko upachaarakaa kramamaa mumgalabaara marityu bhaeko ho nepaalaganjabaata kohalapura aune kramamaa nepaali somabaara motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa parekaa hun
myaagde gaaunpaalikaa gunaadikaa andaaji warsiya tyaaktara chaalaka susila pariyaaralaai trayaaktarale thakkara diera mutyu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle jaanakaari dieko chha
saptari doti chitawana ra baankemaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

saptarisurungaa nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako tyaanakarale sa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai somabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bedaananda chaudhariko saptarisi aspataala lahaanamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

doti dipaayala silagadhi nagarapaalikaa sthita tikhaakaadi bhanne sthaanamaa dotiko pipallaabaata tikhaatarpha jaandai gareko se ta nambarako tyaaktarabaata ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sohi nagarapaalikaa silagaaun basne warsiya teka bahaadura nepaalilaai upachaarako laagi saileswari aspataala dipaayalatarpha laijaane kramamaa somabaara saanjha baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

chitawana ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai mumgalabaara bihaana durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka gorakhaa gandaki gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya sudipa raanaa magaralaai upachaako laagi puraano medikala kaleja bharatapuratarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara gorakhaa gandaki gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya durgaa bahaadura thaapaako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa kohalapurabaata nepaalagumjatarpha jaandai gareko bhe pa nambarako motarasaaikala mumgalabaara bihaana durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka surkheta lekhabesi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya ganaesa nepaaliko narsinahoma nepaalagumjamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

mumgalabaara bihaana golphutaarabaata airaheko baa kha nambarako paanile bharieko tyaamkara breka phela bhaepachhi aniyantrita bhaekaae tyaamkarale basa kaara ra motarasaaikala gari sawaari saadhaanalaai thakkara dieko ho

marityu hunemaa chhathara gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya nara bahaadura limbu rahekaa chhan aphnai ghara banaaune kramamaa gharako talaa maathibaata ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa limbulaai upachaarako laagi bipikoiraalaa swaasthya bijnaana pratisthaana ghopaa pathaaieko thiyo
maritakako sawa pariksanako laagi jillaa aspataala dhanakutaamaa raakhieko saathai thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tehrathumale janaaeko chha

somawaara saajha khota daandaabaata dharaana tarpha suntalaa bokera aundai gareko ko cha nambarako bolero aniyantrita bhai baato dekhi kariwa mitara tala khasera durghatanaa hundaa dharaana upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya chaalaka phurwaa taamaanakaae marityu bhaeko haae
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa taamaanakaae upachaarako kramamaa manakaamanaa aspataala tumlinataaramaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurale janaaeko chha
chimadibaata sukrawaare tarpha jaandai gareko ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala aphai aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaa barju gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya jaya raama mehetaako marityu bhaeko haae
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa mehetaako upachaarako kramamaa biraatanagarako goldena aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha

marityu hunemaa jillaakaae suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa raatamaataakaa raaju nepaaliko mahine chhoraa rawina nepaali rahekaa chhan aitabaara saanjha gharako pindhimaa basera khaanaa khaairaheko awasthaamaa ekkaasi uni bepattaa bhaekaa thie unako sawa somabaara wihaana gharabhandaa eka kilomitara taadhaa dhaanadhunge thulopaakhaa tina pokhari saamudaayika wanamaa bhetieko thiyo

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belachautaaraakaa pramukha prahari niriksaka jagadisa regmikaa anusaara sawa wiksipta awasthaamaa sawa phelaa pareko thiyo sarirako kariba pratisata bhaaga chituwaale khaaeko awasthaamaa baalaka phelaa paaryau prahari niriksaka regmile bhane

suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaamaa pani chituwaale baalakalaai akramana garepachhi yahaankaa sthaaniyawaasi trasita bhaekaa chhan yasa agaadi tanahunko bhaanu nagarapaalikaakaa wibhinna wadaamaa chituwaako akramanabaata dedha warsako awadhimaa chha baalabaalikaako marityu bhaeko thiyo

yasaibicha dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya tanahunle somabaara nai pidita pariwaaralaai kiriyaa kharchawaapata ru hajaara raahata upalabdha garaaeko chha sahaayaka wana adhikarita baaburaama upretile maritaka baalakako gharamaa pugera bubaa raaju nepaalilaai ukta rakama pradaana gare
malesiyaako malakkaa raajyamaa kaaryarat eka nepaali kaamadaarako kaama garne kramamaa maasu kaatne mesinamaa parera saaemabaara marityu bhaeko chha
malesiyaa rojagaaramaa kariba laakha hajaara nepaali kaamadaara rahekaa chhan nepaali kaamadaaraharu suraksaa gaarda nirmaana kaarya tathaa aspataala lagaayatamaa kaaryarata chhan

rupandehiko butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya siddhaanta thaapaako siddhaartha raajamaargako siddhabaabaa najikai sawaari durghatanaamaa marityu bhayo paalpaa tinaau gaaunpaalikaa dayaama saaitamaa lupa numko skutile lukha numko tipparalaai obharateka gardaa thokkina pugyo

paalpaamaa sawaari durghatanaabaata marityu hune krama rokieko chhaina sawaari durghatanaamaa akaalamaa jyaana gumaaunemaa thaapaamaatra eklaa hoinan chaalu awako paancha mahinaamaa janaako marityuko kaarana sawaari durghatanaa ho jillaakaa mukhya tathaa sahaayaka sadakamaa saanaa thulaa durghatanaa bhaisakeko jillaa traaphika kaaryaalaya paalpaakaa pramukha parithwikumaara kaaphle bataae

durghatanaamaa gambhira ra saamaanya ghaaite bhaekaa chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ra jillaa traaphika praharile sadakamai sachetanaamulaka kaaryakrama sanchaalana gare pani durghatanaa rokieko chhaina

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha dipenda jisile chaalakakaa kaarana pratisata durghatanaa hune bataae mobaaila prayoga gari sawaarisaadhana chalaaune ra madiraa sewana gari sawaari chalaaundaa durghatanaa badhekaa hun sadaka paidala yaatru pasupanchhi lagaayatakaa kaarana pratisata sawaari durghatanaamaa pari maanawiya ksati hundai aeko chha sadaka maapadandaanusaara nirmaana huna sakeko chhaina adhikaamsa saanghuraa khaaldaa sadakamaa sawaari jogaauna chaalakale kosisa gardaa arko sawaariko thakkarabaata durghatanaa badheko prahariko daabi chha traaphika niyamapaalana nagardaa durghatanaa badheko chha

taanasena nagarapaalikaakaa pramukha asokakumaara saahile sawaari durghatanaa nyunikaranamaa sabaiko chaaso hunuparne bataae kaalopatre sadakamaa sawaarisaadhana rokindaa samasyaa badheko saahiko tippanai chha paalpaakaa pramukha jillaa adhikaari umesakumaara dhakaalale sawaari durghatanaamaa kami lyaauna sabai paksa jimmewaara huna awasyaka raheko bataae srinagara yaataayaata kampanikaa adhyaksa dilabahaadura dhungaanaale sadaka wyawasthaapana uchita rupamaa garnuparne bataae
unalaai ahile postamaartamakaa laagi jillaa aspataalamaa raakhieko praharile janaaekaae chha

janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa ki ki anitaadewi kaapadako aphnai gharamaa chisoko kaarana marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaale janaaeko chha gharamaa eklai basdai aeki anitaako sanibaara marityu bhaeko haae
yastai chisobaata baachna baaleko agole polera dhanusaamaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan agole polera ghaaite hunemaa adhikaamsa mahilaa raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanusaale janaaeko chha
uniharuko upachaara praadesika aspataala janakapuramaa bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha

purwabaata paschima tarpha aundai gareko ko pa nambarako skutaralaai biparita disaabaata jaandai gareko ko ta nambarako tyaaktarale thakkara dimdaa skutara chaalaka duhawi nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya rupesa chaudharikaae marityu bhaekaae chha

tyaaktarako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaudharikaae upachaarakaae kramamaa kosi aspataala biraatanagaramaa marityu bhaekaae praharile janaaekaae chha durghatanaamaa skutarakaaepachhaadi sawaara rahekaa barsiya chandra prakaasa chaudhari ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unakaae saaehi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairahekaae chha
ghara bhatkindaa chota laagera ghaaite bhaeki unako warsiyaa srimati taaraa dewi olilaai upachaarakaa laagi dadeldhuraa aspataala dadeldhuraatarpha pathaaieko chha

dojaramaa chyaapiera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa nagarakotilaai upachaarakaa laagi praathamika swaasthya kendra sulichaura laijaandai gardaa baatomaa nai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rolpaale janaaeko chha
saptari paalpaa ra jhaapaakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

paalpaa tinaau gaaunpaalikaa dyaama saaidasthita sadakamaa lu kha nambarako tipara ra lu pa nambarako skutara apasamaa thakkara khaai sanibaara diunso durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa skutara chaalaka rupandehi butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya siddhaanta thaapaako praadesika aspataala butawalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
duwai sawaari saadhana ra tipara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

jhaapaa damaka nagarapaalikaa yalambara chokasthita sadakamaa ko pa nambarako skutara aphain aniyantrita bhai sanibaara belukaa durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka ilaama mahamaai gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya raajakumaara limbuko laaipha laaina aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

ghatanaapachhi praharile kaathamaadaumkaa wibhinna thaaunmaa chekajaancha ra naakaabandi badhaaera tiparako khoji tibra paareko thiyo tyasakramamaa ksetrapaatimaa baa ka nambarako tipara bhetieko mahaanagariya traaphika mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha esaesapi bhimaprasaada dhakaalale jaanakaari dinu bhayaae

kaathamaadaum lalitapura ra bhaktapurabaata aekaae damakala nepaala prahari nepaali senaa sasastra prahari ra sthaaniyaharuko sahayogamaa kariba ghantaapachhi agaae niyantranamaa aeko praharile janaaeko chha

rautahatako chapurabaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko naaja nambarako sumo durghatanaa hundaa tina janaako ghatanaasthalamai ra thapa tinajanaako upachaarako laagi kaathamaadaum laijaane kramamaa baatomaa nai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
kaathamaadaum kaabhre parsaa kailaali ra rupandehikaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

kaathamaadaum kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa balkhusthita sadakamaa baa kha nambarako basale baa pa nambarako skutaralaai bihibaara diunso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa skutaramaa sawaara ilaama kolpuna ghara bhaeki warsiyaa diwaanaa taamaanako tramaa sentaramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa skutara chaalaka khotaana tembaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya dhaniraama raaiko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha basa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kaabhre dhulikhela nagarapaalikaa paatalekhetasthita sadakamaa naa ja nambarako taataa sumo bihibaara diunso durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki sumomaa sawaara sarlaahi iswarapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa minaa kumaari bogatiko dhulikhela aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha sumo chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

parsaa thori gaaunpaalikaa nayaagaaun chautaaraasthita sadakamaa thori bajaarabaata chitawana taanditarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basabaata khasera sohi basako taayarale kichdaa basamaa sawaara thori gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya amana prajaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kailaali ghodaaghodi nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa se ta nambarako tyaaktarako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki paidalayaatri kaalikota kaalikaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiyaa kalpanaa pariyaarako ghodaaghodi aspataala sukhkhadamaa upachaarako kramamaa bihibaara diunso marityu bhaeko chha
sohi tyaaktarako thakkarabaata ghaaite bhaekaa maritakakaa srimaana warsiya ramesa pariyaarako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

rupandehi tilottamaa nagarapaalikaa bhalabaaristhita sadakamaa lu kha nambarako tyaankarale saaikalalaai thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki sohi thaaun basne warsiyaa laksmi nyaupaaneko bihibaara diunso marityu bhaeko chha

saathai ukta tyaankarako thakkarabaata ghaaite bhaeki saaikalayaatri tilottamaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa bhoja kumaari kesiko sohi aspataala hundai thapa upachaarako laagi graandi aspataala kaathamaadaum riphara garieko chha pharaara tyaanakara chaalakako praharile khoji gariraheko chha

rautahatako chapurabaata kaathamaadau jaandai gareko naa ja nambarako taataa sumo durghatanaa hundaa tina janaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko haae durghatanaamaa jyaana gumaaekaaharukaae sanaakhata huna baanki rahekaae praharile janaaeko chha

kirtipurabaata phohora bokera okharapauwaa jaandai gareko naaka nambarako tipara kaathamaadaumko taarakeswara nagarapaalikaa jitapura sthita kota gaaunmaa durghatanaa handaa tipara chaalaka maailaa taamaana ra sahachaalaka kamala taamaanakaae ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaekaae praharile janaaekaae chha
praharile baalikaalaai sarlaahi jillaa laalabandi nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya maamaa maitesim lo thuliamaa chinimaayaa lo ra saaniamaa sunamaayaa loko jimmaa lagaaeko haae
basa durghatanaamaa baalikaa jiwitai phelaa parepachhi khaadichaurasthita sindhu sadaabahaara aspataalamaa lagieko thiyobaalikaalaai aspataalale wisesa suraksaakaa saatha rekhadekha gariraheko thiyo

dolakhaako kaalinchokabaata bhaktapurakaa laagi chhuteko baa kha nambarako basa sadakabaata kariba mitara tala khasera durghatanaa hundaa ghatanaasthalamaa janaa ra upachaarako kramamaa chaarasahita janaako marityu bhaeko thiyo
desakaa wibhinna thaaunbaata beni hundai mustaana jaana hindekaa ra mustaana hundai benitarpha chhutekaa sawaarisaadhana bicha baatomai rokiekaa chhan

marityu bhaekaamadhye paidalayaatru motarasaaikala tathaa skutara durghatanaa traka tina saaikala eka kaara eka ra basabaata paancha rahekaa chhan mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha prahari waristha upariksaka bhimaprasaada dhakaala adhikaamsa durghatanaa tiwragati ra chaalakako laaparwaahikaa kaarana hune gareko bataaunuhunchha

upatyakaamaa bhaekaa khaaldaakhuldi purde traaphika wyawasthaapanalaai chustadurusta banaauna pradhaanamantri kaaryaalayakaa sahasachiwako sumyojakatwamaa samiti banaaera kaama garieko chha ukta samitile upatyakaakaa sadakamaa bhaekaa khaaldaakhuldi purne karidorako wistaara garne ra traaphika wyawasthaapanalaai sahaja banaaune kaama gardachha baato wistaara ra sadakamaa bhaekaa khaaldaakhuldi puresangai sawaari durghatanaamaa kami hune laksya sarakaarale lieko chha
koteswarako sisitibhi phutejako adhaaramaa gaadiko nambara pahichaana garera praharile gaadiko khojikaarya wyaapaka banaaieko thiyo

raati saadhe baje baakha nambarako tiparale baapa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sitaapaailaa basne sindhuliko khaanasaana kaa warsiya prejana magara ra motarasaaikalamaa pachhaadi sawaara mahaanagariya prahari waritta swayambhumaa kaaryarata prahari hawaldaara saanobhaai nepaali ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

tiparakaae thakkarabaata ghaaite dubai janaakaae dhaapaasisthita graandi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale janaaeko chha duwai sawaari saadhana ra tipara chaalakalaai prahari waritta swayambhule niyantranamaa lieko chha

barahathawaa nagarapaalikaa niwaasi raamachandra saahaki warsiyaa srimati raajamatidewiko jalera marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha chisobaata bachna aphnai gharako anganamaa baalieko ago taapne kramamaa budhabaara saanjha achaanaka ago laagdaa uni purai sarira jalera gambhira ghaaite bhaeki thiin

agobaata paasawaanako ghundaadekhi petasamma jaleko chha unako upachaara ahile jillaa aspataala malangawaamaa bhairaheko sarlaahikaa prahari prawaktaa ewum prahari naayaba upariksaka pratitasimha raathaurale jaanakaari die
chitawanakaae bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa diyaalorodamaa aja bihaana basako thakkarabaata ekajanaa saaikala yaatriko marityu bhaeko chha

pulachokabaata pokharaa basapaarka tarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basakaaethakkarabaata saaikala yaatri purwi chitawanako raapti nagarapaalikaa baaksilinakaa warsiya philipa prajaakaae marityu bhaeko haae

basako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa prajaako upachaarako kramamaa bharatapura aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko chitawana praharile janaaeko chha praharile thakkara dine basa ra chaalakalaai niyantranamaa lieko janaaeko chha

chitawana raastriya nikunjaantargatako saamudaayika wanamaa wayaska paatebaagha marita phelaa pareko chha nikunjaantargata parne parsaako thori gaanupaalikaa wedaghaari saamudaayika wanamaa budhabaara baagha marita phelaa pareko ho

ghaansa kaatna gaekaa sthaaniyawaasile marita baagha dekhepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie maritaawasthaamaa phelaa pareko baaghako sarirabhari nai ghaau chhan rupaakhetile bhane wayaska baagha ekaapasamaa judhera marityu bhaeko ho ki bhanne praarambhika anusandhaanako kramamaa khuleko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaaharuko lamahi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanale janaaekaae chha janaa madhyama ra anya saamaanya ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

bardibaasabaata sindhulitarpha gairaheko ga pa nambarako spendara motarasaaikalalaai wiparita disaabaata airaheko naa kha nambarako trakale thakkara dindaa sindhuliko tinapaatana gaaunpaalikaa langura kholaakaa warsiya saroja taamaanako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

durghatanaamaa sindhuliko tinapaatana gaaunpaalikaa langura kholaa ghara bhaekaa warsa kaa kumaara khaati gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite khaatilaai upachaarako laagi kaathamaandaum sthiti graandi aspataala lagieko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

jillaako chaubise gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya laakabara limbuko sthaaniya pairepaataa bhirabaata ladera marityu bhaeko haae khaanepaaniko paaipa marmatako laagi gaekaae samayamaa bhirabaata ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa limbukaae upachaarako kramamaa bipikoiraalaa swaasthya bijnaana pratisthaana dharaanamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
ghatanaa baare thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhanakutaale janaaeko chha
bhimadatta raajamaargako dadeldhuraa sadaramukaama bajaara najika basa ra motarasaaikala thokkidaa ekajanaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane arkaa ekajanaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

kanchanapurako mahendranagarabaata bajhaana jaandai gareko naa kha na ko basasanga wiparita disaatarpha jaandai gaiiraheko se pa na ko motarasaaikala thokkindaa amaaragadhi phinnekitakaa andaaji warsiya khadaka boharako durghatanaa sthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
pokharaa raama mandira najikai ga ka nambarako skula basale kichdaa parwatako chhaulaalaanakhuri ghara bhai pokharaa basdai aeki saritaa paudela suwediko ghatanaasthalamai jyaana gaeko haae
chaalaka ra gaadi praharile niyantranamaa liekaae chha
jillaakaae budhichaurabaata kaathamaadaum jaadai gareko ga ja nambarako jipa paalunataara nagarapaalikaa budhichauramaa durghatanaa hundaa paancha janaa yaatru ghaaite bhaekaa hun

ghaaite hunemaa paalunataara nagarapaalikaa kaa wikaasa rokaa saraswati malla bardiyaako thaakurabaabaa gaaunpaalikaakaa jayaaraama thaaru raamabahaadura thaaru ra ramesa thaaru raheko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya gaaerakhaale janaaeko chha
purwapaschima raajamaarga antaragata jhaapaako damakamaa basale thakkara dindaa eka janaa paidalayaatri mahilaako marityu bhaekaae chha
mahottari jillaako jaleswarajanakapura sadakakhandako chaandanichokamaa somabaara saanjha minitiparakaae thakkara baata eka saaikalayaatriko marityu bhaeko chha

dhanusaako janakapurabaata mahottariko jaleswaratira aundai gareko baakha numko minitiparale thakkara dindaa saaikalayaatri jillaako piparaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya raamadinesa mandalakaae ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko haae
ghatanaa baare thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya solukhumbule janaaeko chha

jillaako narasimha gaaunpaalikaa sunasari pulamaa somabaara bihaana paschimatarpha jaandai gareko naakha nambarako trakasanga biraami bokera gairaheko ko cha nambarako embulensa thokkindaa embulensamaa sawaara udayapura chaudandigadi kaa warsiya chetabahaadura wistakaae marityu bhaekaae chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa embulensa chaalaka parichaalakasahita janaalaai upachaarakaa laagi jillaa aspataala inaruwaa bharnaa garieko chha ghaaite janaakai awasthaa gambhira raheko praharile janaaekaae chha
durghatanaamaa sumlagna dubai sawaari saadhana ra traka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

jillaakaae sukhipura nagarapaalikaa chhajanaasthita sadakamaa sa pa nambarako motarasaaikalale aitabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa paidalayaatri sohi thaaun basne warsiyaa domanidewi yaadawako marityu bhaeko haae
bhaktapurakaathamaadaum chalne baa kha nambarako basako thakkarabaata bihaana kariba paune baje gorakhaa ghara bhai dhumbaaraahi basdai aeki warsiya saristi pantakaae marityu bhaeko haae

sahapaathiko marityupachhi akrosita widyaarthiharule kaathamaadaumbhaktapura rutamai chalne baa kha nambarakaae arkaae basamaa agajani garekaa chhan agalaagibaata basa purna rupamaa nasta bhaeko chha tyastai widyaarthiharule baakha nambarako basa pani todaphoda garekaa chhan
praharile agajanimaa sumlagna kehi widyaarthilaai niyantranamaa lieko chha basakaa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko bataaieko chha

parwatako modi gaaunpaalikaa paatichaurabaata bijuliko pola liera gijyaana jaandai gareko naa ta nambarako tyaaktara modi gaaunpaalikaa thaanaamaa durghatanaa hundaa parwata jillaa modi gaaunpaalikaa gaumdaa niwaasi warsiya sahachaalaka dipendra nepaaliko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaako widura nagarapaalikaa sthita multhalaamaa baatoko kaama garne karmachaari liera multhalaabaata chainapuratarpha jaandai gareko baa ka nambarako aichara durghatanaa hundaa dui janaako marityu bhaeko thiyaae
durghatanaamaa pari rasuwaa jillaa naukunda gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya sudipa tamaana sahachaalaka ra khotaana jillaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya awirala tamaanako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko haae

durghatanaamaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite hunemaa nuwaakota kakani gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya ganaesa balaami chaalaka sohi jillaakaa widura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sachitakumaara rimaala jaajarakota jillaa bheri nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sankararaaja sunaara sohi thaaunkaa warsiya hemaraaja thakuri warsiya tilaka khatri ra warsiya wimala sunaara rahekaa chhan

basako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unalaai upachaarakaa laagi birtaamodasthita biendasi aspataala laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaeko chha
udayapurako udayapuragadhi gaaunpaalikaa maa jipa durghatanaa hundaa tina janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

bihibaara bihaana h baje bhaaratako sikkimabaata pharkadain gareko bhaaratiya nambara pletako esa ke pibi nambarako jipa durghanaa hundaa udayapuragadhi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya setabahaadura srestha warsiya dhakabahaadura smaali magara ra warsiya mina bahaadura sresthakaae marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa dui janaako swaasthya chauki udayapuragadhimaa upachaara bhairahako ra tina janaa gambhira ghaaitelaai baahira rephara garieko chha
marityu huneharumaa phaktaaluna laamaatara basne barsiya dipesa raai ra khotaana aiselukharka ghara bhai phaktaaluna basdai aekaa barsiya sujana raai rahekaa chhana

budhabaara bihaana baje ghara najikai raheko phedi jumgalamaa maalinago kaatana bhani hidekaa dubai janaa ghara pharki naaepachhi khoji gardai jaane kramamaa sohi jumgalako bhirabaata ladi dubai janaa marita awasthaamaa phelaa pareko bhani aphantale jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya taaplejunamaa jaanakaari garaaekaa thie
ghatanaako jaanakaari paauna saatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya taaplejunabaata prahari toli gaera thapa anusandhaana garekaae chha
butawalabaata taanesenatarpha aundai gareko lu kha nambarako basa ra wiparita disaabaata butawalatarpha jaandai gareko lu kha nambarako basa eka apasamaa thokkidaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa hun

ghaaite hunemaa butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raamabahaadura bika sohi sthaanaki warsiyaa junaa bika rupandehiko khadahawaa banagaai gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya bhimabahaadura sunaara taanasena nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa gunisaraa nepaali taanasane baganaasakaali gaaunpaalikaa kaa basa chaalaka warsiya tejabahaadura saaru ra paalpaa kai purwakholaa gaawisa wadaa namwara kaa warsiya raamu simjaali rahekaa chhan pani ghaaite bhaekaa chhana

tyastai gulmiko maalikaa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa namwara kaa warsiya homabahaadura bika warsiya dhanabahaadura bika sohi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya bhimabahaadura sunaara gulmikai madaane gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya tejabahaadura sunaara sohi sthaanakaa churaabahaadura nepaali sohi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa namwara kaa warsiya raamabahaaduura bika ra sohi sthaanakaa warsiya raaju bika rahekaa chhan

mahilaako sawalaai paatana aspataalamaa raakhieko chha thakkara dine tyaaksisahita chaalakalaai prahari parisara lalitapurale niyantranamaa lieko chha

purwa paschima raajamaarga antaragata raapti gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num paharuwaa bhanne sthaanamaa paschimatarpha aundai gareko lu kha nambarako tiparale purwatarpha jaandai gareko raa pa nambarako motarasaaikalaai thakkara dindaa motarasaaika chaalaka tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num haattikhauwaa niwaasi warsiya siwaraaja daangiko marityu bhaeko ho

jillaakaae tripuraasundari nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya manoja chalaauneko bhirabaata ladera marityu bhaeko ho

chitawanako ichchhaakaamanaa gaaunpaalikaa bhaalutaaramaa rokera raakhieko motarasaaikalalaai naa cha nambarako diai gaadile thakkara dindaa ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya suraja paudelako marityu bhaeko haae
gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa diai gaadimaa sawaara suraja paudelakaae upachaarakaae kramamaa puraano medikala kalejamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaeko chha
maaetarasaaikalalaai thakkara dine ukta sawaari saadhanalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

bhimadattanagara bajaarabaata gaddaachaukitarpha gairaheko diela arati numko jipale wiparita disaabaata airaheko mapa numko motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka bhimadattanagarapaalikaa bhagatapurakaa warsiya chandrabahaadura taamaanako marityu bhaeko haae
thakkara dine jipa prahari niyantranamaa raakhieko chha bhane maritakako sawapariksanakaa laagi mahaakaali aspataala bhimadattanagaramaa raakhieko chha

dhanusaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa haala nambara nakhuleko sawaari saadhanale ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai somabaara saawajha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaelaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kanakapatti basne warsiya binoda yaadawako praadesika aspataala janakapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

kailaalikaae dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita kedaaratolamaa gaeraati sauchaalayamaa ladera eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha kedaaratolamaa basne jagatabahaadura bamakaa warsiya chhoraa rosana bamako sauchaalayamaa ladera marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
maritaka bamako sawa pariksanakaa laagi ahile seti praadesika aspataala dhanagadhimaa raakhieko chha

sindhupaalchoka balephi gaaunpaalikaa chimlinaki warsiyaa phulamaayaa taamaana
dolakhaako bhimeswara nagarapaalikaaki barsiya junumaayaa taamaana

nayaan naagarikataa kaanuna wiruddhako pradarsanamaa prahariko golibaata tina janaako marityu bhaesangai maritakako sumkhyaa pugeko ho asaamako sabaibhandaa thulo sahara guwaahatimaa pradarsanakaa kramamaa goli laagdaa tina janaako marityu bhaeko ho sarakaari adhikaariharule paancha dinadekhi asaamakaa kehi bhaagamaa intaranetamaa pratibandha ra karphyu lagaaekaa chhan

ghaaite duwailaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi wiraatanagara pathaaieko jillaa traaphika kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
agalaagibaata kaarakhaanaamaa ranga banaaune mesina kemikala kaagajapatra tathaa anya sarasaamaana jalera nasta bhaeko prahariko bhanaai chha ke kati ksati bhayo bhane ekina wiwarana auna baanki chha
sindhupaalchokako khaadichaurajiri sadakakhandako kilomaa basa durghatanaa hundaa marityu huneko sumkhyaa pugekaae chha

dolakhaakaae kaalinchoka mandira darsana garera pharkiekaa darsanaarthi chadheko baa kha nambarako basa aitabaara bihaana kilomaa durghatanaa hundaa janaako marityu bhaekaae haae janaako ghatanaasthalamai ra thapa janaako upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

marityu hunemaa mahilaa purusa eka baalikaa ra dui baalaka rahekaa chhan maritaka janaamadhye janaako sanaakhata bhaisakeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhupaalchokakaa insapektara ganaesa khanaalale jaanakaari die
sindhupaalchoka jugala gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya suka bahaadura taamaana
dolakhaako bhimeswara nagarapaalikaaki barsiya junumaayaa taamaana
dolakhaako bhimeswara nagarapaalikaaki barsiya manju taamaana
raamechhaapako umaakunda gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya mahesa taamaana
kaabhrepalaanchoka bethaanachoka gaanupaalikaa kaa barsiyaa raamasarana khatri

hilebaata jorapaatitarpha jaadai gareko ko ha nambarako tempu ra wiparita disaabaata airaheko ko kha nambarako telara eka apasamaa thokkidaa tempu chaalaka dhanakutaa kaa warsiya dasaratha paakhrina ra tempumaa sawaara tehrathuma chhathara gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya saange serpaako ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho

durghatanaamaa tempumaa sawaara chhathara jorapaati gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya rawina ghimire ra tehrathumako laaligunraasa nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya pradipa basneta ghaaite bhaekaa chhan uniharulaai upachaarakaa laagi dhanakutaa jillaa aspataala lagieko praharile janaaekaae chha

kalumkibaata kaalimaatitarpha jaandai gareko naa cha nambarako saarwajanika basale thakkara dindaa kalumki sthita nepaalaya kalejamaa adhyayanarata sindhuli ghara bhai khasi bajaara basne pawitraa basneta ghaaite bhaeki praharile janaaeko chha unako taauko ra chhaatimaa chota laageko chha
ukta basa ra chaalakalaai kalumki praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

jillaako kanchanarupaa nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa sitaadewi sadaako sanibaara bandelako akramanabaata marityu bhaeko haae ghara najikai jangalamaa khara kaatana gaeki sadaalaai jangali bandelale ekkaasi akramana gari ghaaite paareko thiyo
sindhupaalchokako khaadichaurajiri sadakakhandako kilomaa basa durghatanaa hundaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

dolakhaakaae kaalinchoka mandira darsana garera pharkiekaa darsanaarthi chadheko baa kha nambarako basa aitabaara bihaana kilomaa durghatanaa hundaa janaako marityu bhaekaae haae janaako ghatanaasthalamai ra thapa janaako upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

sukrabaara diunso purwabaata kaathamaadauntarpha aundai gareko baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala durghatanaa handaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sindhuli jillaa sunakosi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kaa warsiya prakaasa daahaalako marityu bhaeko ho
purwi nawalaparaasiko kaawaasoti puraano kaawaasoti bajaaramaa nepaali senaa chadheko basa durghatanaa hundaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

surkhetabaata kaathamaadaum jaandai gareko nepaali senaako toli sawaara naa kha nambarako basa aja bihaana bajetira durghatanaamaa pareko ho durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekomadhye janaako awasthaa gambhira chha gambhira ghaaite hunemaa premabahaadura khatri ra wirendra saahi chhan uniharulaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi chitawana pathaaieko chha

anya ghaaiteharuko madhyawindu jillaa aspataala ra kaaligandaki aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha nepaali senaamaa bharnaa chhanauta bhaera thapa taalimakaa laagi kaathamaadaum jaandai garekaaharu durghatanaamaa pareko janaaieko chha

so durghatanaamaa janaa ghaaite bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya muglinale jaanakaari dieko chha ghaaite sabai myaajikamaa sawaara thie ghaaiteko puraano medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha uniharu sabaiko awasthaa madhyama chha
chaarawatai sawaarisaadhana ra chaalaka prahariko niyantranamaa chhan

sukrabaara bihaana kalejabaata pikanikako laagi ghyaampe daadaanmaa gairaheko baa kha nambarako basa suryawinaayakamaa durghatanaa hundaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaitemadhye janaa sakhta chhan bhane janaako awasthaa saamaanya chha

jillaako raamadhuni nagarapaalikaa maa rahekaae raasa taalamaa paudi khelne kramamaa dubera sthaaniya barsiya purana chaudhariko marityu bhaeko haae taalamaa dubera ghaaite bhaekaa chaudhariko upachaarako kramamaa bipikoiraalaa swaasthya bijnaana pratisthaana dharaanamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
ghatanaasthalamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pakalibaata prahari toli khati gai thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
paschima nawalaparaasiko sunawala nagarapaalikaa baderaamaa gae raati kaarako thakkarabaata eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha
kaathamaadaunbaata butawalatarpha jaandai gareko baa cha nambarako kaarakaae thakkarabaata sunawala nagarapaalikaa baderaakaa warsiya ramesa saahiko marityu bhaeko haae

kaarakaae thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa saahiko butawalasthita siti aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa gae raati nai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paschima nawalaparaasile janaaeko chha
kaara ra chaalaka prahariko niyantranamaa raheko chha
purwapaschima mahendra raajamaargako chitawana ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa taandimaa gae raati paune baje yaatru basa paltandaa yaatru ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

baaraabaata kaathamaadaumkaa laagi chhuteko naa kha nambarako basa aniyantrita bhaera raajamaargamaa paltandaa yaatru ghaaite bhaekaa hun ghaaitemadhye janaako bharatapuramaa raheko puraano madikala kalejako siksana aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha anya yaatruharu upachaarapachhi ghara pharkekaa chhan

upachaararata ghaaiteharumaa baaraa kalaiyaa kaa warsa ko gaurisumkara yaadawa ra warsa ko raamabaabu yaadawa chhan baaraa gadhimaai nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya manoja saaha ra bhaarata motihaari basne warsa kaa khusilaala yaadawako pani upachaara bhairaheko chha uniharuko awasthaa madhyama raheko aspataalale janaaeko chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa anusaara basamaa yaatruharu thie sakusala anya yaatruharu tatkaalai gantawya tarpha laagekaa thie
ghaaite madhya janaako awasthaa gambhira raheko praharile janaaeko chhaghaaiteharuko jillaa aspataala dhaadinabesimaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa adhikaari ekanaaraayana koiraalaakaa anusaara bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa gangaanagaramaa aphnai khetamaa kaama garirahekaa samayamaa bandelale akramana gareko ho
ghaaite tinai janaako bharatapura aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha awasthaa madhyama raheko praharile janaaeko chha
jillaakaae hilsaadekhi yaalwaanga aundai gareko baa kha nambarako tipara humlaako uttari naamkhaa gaaunpaalikaa tumkota bhiramaa durghatanaa hundaa duiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko haae

durghatanaamaa chaalakasahita chaara janaa sawaaramadhye dui janaako ghatanaasthalamaa marityubhaeko ra dui janaa ghaaite bhaekaa jillaa prahari kaaryaayakaa nimitta kaaryaalaya pramukha raajendrabahaadura simhale bataae
makawaanapura bardiyaa sunasari nawalaparaasipurwa ra sindhupaalchokakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

makawaanapura hataumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki paidalayaatri hataumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa chisaapaani deraa gari basne parsaa bindabaasini gaaunpaalikaa bahuarwaabhaathaa ghara bhaeki warsiyaa pramilaa dewi paasawaanako jillaa aspataala hetaumdaamaa upachaarako kramamaa budhabaara raati marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka parsaa parsaagadhi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya kanchana thaakurako sohi aspataalamaa ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara chitawana bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa sarmilaa thaapaa magarako churehila aspataala hetaumdaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

bardiyaa baarabardiyaa nagarapaalikaa baidhisthita sadakamaa bhe cha nambarako jipako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa paidalayaatri sohi thaaun basne raajendra thaaruko chhori warsiyaa saamanaa thaaruko medikala kaleja kohalapura baankemaa upachaarako kramamaa budhabaara diunso marityu bhaeko chha

saathai jipako thakkarabaata ghaaite bhaekaa paidalayaatri baarabardiyaa nagarapaalikaa baidhi basne warsiyaa rukamanai thaaruko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha jipa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sunasari itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa paanipiyaa jumgalasthita sadakamaa ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai budhabaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka haala naama thara watana nakhulekaa andaaji warsiya purusako ghopaa aspataala dharaanamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

sunasari raamadhuni nagarapaalikaa lagaunaa modasthita sadakamaa nambara nakhuleko sawaari saadhanako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki haala naama thara watana nakhuleki andaaji warsiyaa mahilaako jillaa aspataala inaruwaamaa upachaarako kramamaa bihibaara bihaana marityu bhaeko chha

nawalaparaasipurwa dewachuli nagarapaalikaa dumkaulisthita sadakamaa ga kha nambarako basako thakkarabaata paidalayaatri haala naama thara watana nakhulekaa andaaji warsiya purusako budhabaara saanjha ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sindhupaalchoka indraawati gaaunpaalikaa dhotaarasthita sadakamaa baa kha nambarako tiparako thakkarabaata paidalayaatri sohi gaaunpaalikaa bhaantaara basne warsiya panchabira danuwaarako bihibaara bihaana ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
tipara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha durghatanaakaa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
dolakhaako bhimeswara nagarapaalikaa tikhaatalamaa gae raati skaabhetara durghatanaa hundaa ekako marityu bhaekaae chha bhane tina janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

gae raati bajeko samayamaa charikotabaata dolakhaa bajaara jaane kramamaa skaabhetara durghatanaa hundaa dolakhaa jillaa bigu gaaunpaalikaa khopaachaagukaa warsiya raaju thaamiko marityu bhaekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dolakhaale janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa pari tina janaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite hunemaa bhimeswora nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sumana thaami bigu gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya wijaya srestha ra skaabhetara chaalaka kaalinchoka gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya raajakumaara thaami chhan ghaaitaharuko kaathamaadaunko graandi ra siksana aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

budhabaara bihaana sawaa bajeko samayamaa belawaari nagarapaalikaa raamapurasthita bhitri sadaka khandamaa daksinabaata uttara tarpha jaandai gareko ko ka nambarako kaseni bordina skulako basale kichdaa sthaaniya pramoda saahako barsiya chhoraa yasa raaja saahako marityu bhaeko ho

warsiya chhoraalaai widyaalaya pathaaunako laagi saahaki srimati siwakumaari saahale duwai chhoraalaai sangai liera gaeki thiinsaano chhoraalaai bhuinmaa raakhera thulo chhoraalaai basamaa chadhaaeki thiin tyahibelaa gudne kramamaa bhuinmaa raheko naabaalakalaai basale kichdaa ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belawaarile janaaeko chha
basa ra basa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha bhane anya thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

mahaakaali nagarapaalikaa maa raheko maayaapuri saamudaayika wanamaa bihaana ghaasadaauraa garna gaeko belaa jumgali haattile akramana gardaa sthaaniya warsiyaa basanti bhatta ra warsiyaa bhuri boharaako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kanchanapurale janaaekaae chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka parsaako parsaagadhi nagarapaalikaa kaa kanchana thaakurako taaukomaa chota laageko ra awasthaa gambhira raheko praharile janaaeko chha tyastai motarasaaikala pachhaadi sawaara bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa sarmilaa thaapaa magarako haatakhuttaamaa chota laageko chha ghaaite duwai janaako churehila aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

mumgalabaara raati makawaanapugadhi gaaunpaalikaa ko manakaamanaa mandira jaane sadaka khandamaa baa kha nambarako tipparale thakkara dindaa sthaaniya dipaka paakhrinako marityu bhaekaae praharile janaaeko chha

haattiko akramanabaata sirahaa mirchaiyaa napaa raamapurakaa srawana mahatoko warsiya chhoraa rawindra mahatoko marityu bhaeko ho unako somabaara raati upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

haattile somabaara raatinai golajabaara napaa musaharniyaa lawatolikaa asoka sadaaya badri sadaaya raamacharitra sadaaya ra dilawara sadaayako ghara bhatkaaeko praharile janaaeko chha sohi haattile raati nai golabajaara kaa jiwachha saahako ghara sameta bhatkaai dieko chha
sarlaahi rupandehi dhanusaa baanke ra makawaanapurakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaeko chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

rupandehi siyaari gaaunpaalikaa bhartaapurasthita sadakamaa lu kha nambarako tipara somabaara raati durghatanaa hundaa tipara chaalaka rupandehi suddhodhana gaaunpaalikaa bateni basne warsiya raaja kumaara yaadawako ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

dhanusaa nagaraaina nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa ja ta nambarako tyaaktara aniyantrita bhai baato chheumaa raheko pokharimaa paltiera somabaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa tyaaktara chaalaka sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya lalana sadaalaai upachaarako laagi praadesika aspataala janakapuratarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

baanke kohalapura nagarapaalikaa chauraahaasthita sadakamaa bhe pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai mumgalabaara bihaana durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka kohalapura nagarapaalikaa rajhenaa basne warsiya subhaasa kaarkiko medikala kaleja kohalapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

makawaanapura manahari gaaunpaalikaa rajaiyaasthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako trakale naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai somabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka makawaanapura hataumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya surendra ale magarako churehila aspataala hundai medikala kaleja chitawanamaa thapa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara manahari gaaunpaalikaa daradaraa basne warsiya suresa syaanataanako medikala kaleja chitawanamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha traka ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
purwapaschima raajamaarga antargata jhaapaako kanakaai nagarapaalikaa kotihoma najikai aja bhaeko sawaari durghatanaamaa pari eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

sadaka chheumaa roki raakheko naakha num ko trakamaa paschimabaata purwatarpha aundai gareko ko pa num ko motarasaaikala thokkinera punahpaschima jaandai gareko me cha num ko kaarasanga thakkara khaandaa motarasaaikala chaalaka moranako amaradaha nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya kisana saahako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaakaae sadaananda nagarapaalikaa deuraali sunakhaanisthita junaarako rasa sarkidaa sthaaniya warsiya maanabahaadura ghisinako marityu bhaeko ho somabaara sthaaniya taaraa raaiko baarimaa phaleko junaara khaandaa rasale sarkiera ghisinako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
raamechhaapa nagarapaalikaa bhumgerimaa mumgalabaara bihaana senaako gaadile motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa ekajanaakaae marityu bhaeko chha bhane eka janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi thaaunkaa barsiya baalaka raamakarisna taamaanako jillaa aspataala manthalimaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

bihaana sawaa baje galata disaabaata airaheko sarakaari num pletako sawaari saadhanale thakkara dindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara yaatru mahottarikaa warsiya salana baraalako duwai godaamaa gambhira chota laageko traaphika prahari prabhaaga simhadarabaarale janaaeko chha
ghaaite baraalako kaathamaadaun modela aspataala pradarsanimaargamaa upachaara bhairaheko prabhaagakaa prahari jawaana hemanta achaaryale jaanakaari die

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaatarpha jaandai gareko pradesa pa num ko motarasaaikalalaai putalisadaka tirabaata aeko sanghiya sumsad sachiwaalayako sarakaari num pletako pradesa jha num ko skaarpiyo gaadile thakkara dieko thiyo
so gaadi sumsadiya sunuwaai samitikaa sabhaapati laksmanalaala karnale chadhne gareko mahaanagariya traaphika prahari prabhaaga simhadarabaarakaa prahari jawaana achaaryale jaanakaari die

galata disaabaata aeko sarakaari gaadile motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dieko parithwinaaraayana saahako saalikamuni khatiekaa traaphika prahari khinaa suwedile bataain hataaramaa bhaekaale batti baalera sawaari aeko unale jaanakaari diin

sarakaari gaadikaa chaalaka lekhamaana saakyale nai ghaaiteko upachaara garaairaheko unale bataain sumsad sachiwaalayakai gaadi bhae pani kaanunaanusaara nai kaarabaahi garine prabhaagakaa pramukha prahari niriksaka prakaasa simhale jaanakaari die

sumwedanasila sthaanamaa sameta sarakaari gaadile galata disaabaata aera thakkara dinu saamaanya ghatanaa nabhaeko paidala yaatru raaghawendra bajagaainle bataae chhaanabina gari yasakaa dosilaai kaanuni kaarabaahi nagare sadakamaa paidala yaatru ewum anya chaalaka pani suraksita nahune unako bhanaai chha pratyaksarupamaa ghatanaa dekhekaa bajagaain sarakaari gaadikaa chaalakako laaparawaahile yasto bhaeko bataauchhan
kailaalikaae dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa baiyaabehadimaa motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata aja bihaana eka mahilaako marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa pari gambhira ghaaite bhaeki josiko seti praadesika aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaekaae chha

purwapaschima raajamaarga antargata sirahaako golabajaara napaa mukhya chokamaa embulensa ra motarasaaikala eka apasamaa thokkindaa dui janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane ekajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
paschimabaata purwatarphatarpha aundai gareko baa cha nambarako kaara durghatanaa hundaa kapilawastu nagarapaalikaa haranaamapurakaa andaaji barsiya suresa paandeko mutyu bhaeko ho

tibra gatiko kaara sadakako chheumaa raheko widyuta polamaa thokkina pugdaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa paandeko upachaarako kramamaa baanagumgaa chaaranambarasthita saamudaayika aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kapilawastule janaaekaae chha
paande globala aiemai bainka banagaaikaa saakhaa pramukha raheko khuleko chha paandele so kaara aphai chalaaekaa thie

durghatanaamaa anya janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaitemadhye janaalaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi butawala lyaaieko chha bhane aruko chaara nambarasthita kapilawastu saamudaayika aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko kapilawastu praharile janaaeko chha
bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa raamanagaramaa gaadiko thakkarabaata prahari hawaldaarako marityu bhaeko chha
marityu hunemaa dhaadina jillaa nilakantha nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanamaa kaaryarata warsiya prahari hawaldaara yaduprasaada paathaka rahekaa chhan
aitabaara raati baje praharichauki raamanagarabaata bharatapuratarpha aune kramamaa baa cha nambarako bolero gaadile paathaka chadheko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dieko thiyo
ghaaite paathakako bharatapura aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa gae raati nai marityu bhaeko ho thakkara dine gaadi ra chaalaka prahari niyantranamaa raheko praharile janaaeko chha

baagalunako hugdisira baraahakotabaata barenatarpha jaandai gareko dha ja nambarako pikaapa jipa pokharaachauramaa durghatanaa hundaa janaa yaatru ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite madhye tina janaako awasthaa gambhira raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baagalunale janaaeko chha

tyastai gulmi kaaligandaki ki warsiyaa susmaa puna pani ghaaite bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha ghaaite madhye ichchhaa wisnau tilakumaara chhantyaala tathaa tilakumaari puna ra kamalaa bikalaai pokharaa rephara garieko chha
kaathamaadaum kailaali baanke saptari jhaapaa baaraa sunasari ra kailaalimaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

tipara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa liisakeko chha

jhaapaako kachanakabala gaaunpaalikaa sthita saamudaayika wanamaa garieko widyutiya gheraaberaako dhokaa banda garna gaekaa belaa jangali haattiko akramanamaa pari wanakaa chaukidaara warsiya kaiyaaraama ksetriko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaeko chha

kaaryaalaya pramukha wisnaulaala ghimirekaa anusaara sthaaniya jalathala jangalabaata haatti gaauntira napasos bhanera garieko widyutiya gheraaberaako dhokaa lagaauna gaekaa ksetrilaai gae raati baje haattile akramana gareko thiyo
maritaka ksetrikaae sawa pariksanakaa laagi mechi anchala aspataala bhadrapuramaa lagieko chha

surkhetabaata dailekha jaandai kramamaa bhe ja nambarako haayasa guraansa gaaunpaalikaa mungraahaamaa durghatanaamaa pareko ho durghatanaamaa pari purusa ra eka mahilaako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dailekhale janaaeko chha maritakako sanaakhata huna sakeko chhaina

gae raati baje ilaama nagarapaalikaa sthitamaa raheko maaikholaa haaidro paawaramaa kaama garne kramamaa taara sata bhai karenta laagdaa bardiyaa ghara bhai ilaama basdai aekaa barsiya baala kumaara chaudhariko marityu bhaeko haae

karenta laagera behosa bhaekaa chaudhariko upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamale janaaeko chha ghatanaa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

timuremaa nirmaana garna laagieko sukhkhaa bandaragaahako laagi bhotekosi kholaabaata dhungaa nikaalna khojdaa skaabhetara bhaasiera bhotakosi kholaamaa dubera chaalaka chiniyaan naagarika warsiya chhu chhinako marityu bhaeko rasuwaa praharile janaaeko chha

chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa maataatirtha khusi hotala najika baato banaaune kramamaa maathibaata aeko maatoko dhiskole purera daana babai gaaunpaalikaa kaa prema puna ra prakaasa ghartiko marityu bhaeko ho
baa cha nambarako bhyaanale thakkara dindaa sindhupaalchoka baahrabise ghara bhaeki warsiyaa jyoti magarako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

arghaakhaanchikaae sandhikharka nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara narapaani raataamaataamaa bhaeko basa durghatanaamaa marityu hune sabaiko sanaakhata bhaeko chha maritaka janaakai sanaakhata bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya arghaakhaanchile janaaekaae chha
sobhaakhara pokhrela mahinaa waanagumgaa nagarapaalikaa kapilawastu

durghatanaamaa motarasaaikala chaalaka gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unakaae bharatapura aspataalamaa upachaara bhairahekaae chha motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dine traka ra chaalaka prahariko niyantranamaa rahekaa chhan

humlaako uttari gaaunpaalikaa naamkhaako sallibaata khaadya sumsthaanako chaamala bokera sadaramukaama simakotakaa laagi chhuteko lu kha nambarako tipara budhabaara diunso durghatanaa hundaa tiparamaa sawaara chaara janaako marityu bhaeko thiyo

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa janaakaae humlaamaa upachaara upachaara huna nasakepachhi senaako helikaptarabaata nepaalaganja lagieko pramukha jillaa adhikaari kumaarabahaadura khadkaale jaanakaari die
gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa simikota gaaunpaalikaa simikota kaa warsiya bhaktabahaadura rokaayaako jillaa aspataala simikotamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaekaae thiyo

humlaako uttari gaaunpaalikaa naamkhaako sallibaata khaadya sumsthaanako chaamala bokera sadaramukaama simakotakaa laagi chhuteko lu kha nambarako tipara durghatanaa hundaa naamkhaa gaaunpaalikaa hekpaa gaaunkaa nari laamaa chhirina taarmaa laamaa ra khaarpunaatha pyusa gaaunkaa barbajumga saahiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaekaae thiyaae
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa janaako jillaa aspataala simakotamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

sandhikharkabaata butabala jaandai gareko lu kha nambarako basa narapaani bajaara najikaiko ghumtimaa durghatanaa bhaeko ho durghatanamaa pari ghaaite bhaekaa chhana marityu hune madhye janaako maatra sanaakhata bhaeko chha bhane anya janaako parichaya khulna baanki rahekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya arghaakhaanchile janaaeko chha
santa bahaadura basneta warsa chhatradewa gaapaa upachaarako kramamaa chauraaha aspataala butawalamaa

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa janaa madhye janaako bhairahawaa medikala kalejamaa ra janaako chauhaaraa aspataala butawalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha bhane eka janaalaai kaathamaandau rephara garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya arghaakhaanchile janaaeko chha dui janaa bhane upachaara pachhi ghara pharkiekaa chhan

durghatanaa bhaeko sthaana khomcha bhaeko ra raatikaae samaya bhaekole uddhaara kaaryamaa kehi samasyaa bhae pani praharile uddhaara kaarya gariraheko uddaaramaa khatekaa prahari niriksaka suraja suwedile jaanakaari die

naamkhaako sallibaata simikota aundai gareko lukha nambarako tipara durghatanaa hundaa ekajanaakaae ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho durghatanaamaa anya chha janaa ghaaite raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya humlaale janaaeko chha

naa kha nambarako atole paidalayaatri bharatapurako ksetrapura basne warsiya karnabahaadura gurunalaai thakkara dieko ho thakkarabaata ghaaite gurunako chitawana medikala kalejamaa upachaarako kramamaa aja diunso marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale jaanakaari dieko chha
atochaalaka prahariko niyantranamaa raheko praharile janaaeko chha
daana gulmi ra baankekaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

daana bumgalaachuli gaaunpaalikaa bachenisthita sadakamaa ghoraahidekhi pyuthaanako dhikaawaanatarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basa sadakadekhi andaaji mitara tala khasera mumgalabaara diunso durghatanaa hundaa basamaa sawaara pyuthaana maandawi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiyaa nehaa oliko ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa basakaa chaalaka sahita anya janaako raapti swaasthya bijnaana pratisthaana ghoraahimaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa jipamaa sawaara anya janaako lumbini medikala kaleja prabhaasa paalpaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha pharaara jipa chaalakako praharile khoji gariraheko chha

baanke kohalapura nagarapaalikaa baabaanagarasthita sadakamaa nambara nakhuleko sawaari saadhanako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa haala naama thara watana nakhulekaa andaaji warsiya purusako upachaarako laagi medikala kaleja kohalapuratarpha laijaane kramamaa mumgalabaara raati baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
jipakaa chaalaka ilaamakaa atitha thebelaai anusandhaanakaa laagi praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sindhulibaata bardibaasa bajaaratarpha jaandai gareko naata nambarako tyaaktara aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hudaan tyaaktara chaalaka sarlaahiko iswarapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dinesa simhakaae marityu bhaeko haae
telarale kichera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa danuwaarako upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko mahottari praharile janaaeko chha

dhanusaakaae sahidanagara nagarapaalikaa yadukuwaamaa gae raati agalaagimaa pari eka janaakaae marityu bhaeko chha sthaaniya kaalichandra mandalako gharamaa agalaagi hundaa mandalaki chhori warsiyaa simaa dewi mandalako agalaagimaa pari marityu bhaeko haae

kaalichandraki chhori simaa ra jwaai bhaarata madhuwani basne warsiya raahula mandala gharamaa sutiraheko awasthaamaa agalaagi hundaa duwai janaa jalera gambhira ghaaite bhaekomaa upachaarako laagi praadesika aspataala janakapura hundai thapa upachaarako laagi kaathamaadaumtarpha laijaane kramamaa simaa dewiko baatomai marityu bhaeko ho
paalpaa chitawana ra raamechhaapako wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara ripdikota gaaunpaalikaa haarthoka basne warsiya sudana gaireko sthaaniya swaasthya chaukimaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

chitawana bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa khayaraghaaristhita sadakamaa naa ta nambarako tyaaktarabaata nawalaparaasipurwa gaimdaakota basne warsiya khaagiraama raanaamagara khasna gai sohi tyaaktarako pachhaadiko chakkaale kichdaa unako somabaara raati ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

raamechhaapa umaakunda gaaunpaalikaa jiromaailasthita sadakamaa baa kha nambarako aichara gaadibaata ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sohi gaadimaa kaama garne makawaanapura manahari nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya kumaara laamaako sagaramaathaa medikala wamti hundai praathamika swaasthya kendra manthalimaa thapa upachaarako kramamaa somabaara raati marityu bhaeko chha
gaadi ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha durghatanaakaa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
surkhetabaata nepaalaganjatarpha aundai gareko kapa numko motarasaaikala gae raati baankeko chisaapaanimaa durghatanaa hundaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

baankeko baijanaatha gaaunpaalikaa chisaapaanimaa motarasaaikala durghatanaa hundaa jumlaa taatopaani gaaunpaalikaa kaa manikesa gautamako marityu bhaeko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari niriksaka pawindra bamale jaanakaari die
magara baa cha nambarako bolerokaa chaalaka hun praharikaa anusaara makawaanapurabaata maachhaa bokera kaathamaadaum jaana laagekaa uni sauchakaa laagi bhiramaa gaekaa thie

jillaakaae yaari kholaabaata thaanaagaau tarpha dhaana loda garera jaandai gareko naa ta nambarako tyaaktarakaae thakkarabaata taapli gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya homa bahaadura raanaako marityu bhaeko haae
tyaaktarako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa raanaako upachaarako kramamaa sthaaniya swaasthya chaukimaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapurale janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaum gokarnaeswara nagarapaalikaa sundarijalamaa dyaama banaaune kramamaa baa ka nambarako rolara sadakabaata andaaji mitara tala khasera aitabaara diunso durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa rolarakaa chaalaka mahottari bardibaasa nagarapaalikaa gauridaandaa basne warsiya yarkamaana bhujelalaai upachaarako laagi enaemasi aspataala attarakhela laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

jumlaako kaalekholimaa rahekaae eutaa tale gharamaa bhisana agalaagi bhaeko chha

jillaakaae chandananaatha nagarapaalikaa sthita gowindra bhandaariko gharamaa aitabaara baje bhisana agalaagi bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha damakala jaane baato nabhaekaale purai ghara jalera nasta bhaeko chha
nepaali senaa nepaala prahari ra sthaaniya milera uddhaara garirahekaa chhan agalaagi niyantranamaa line kaama bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaekaae chha
udayapura sirahaa ra solukhumbukaae chhuttaachhuttai sthaanamaa bhaekaa sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaekaae chha

udayapura kataari nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa sa pa nambarako motarasaaikala ra naa kha nambarako traka sanibaara belukaa apasamaa thakkara khaai durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya santosa kaarkiko kataari aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
traka ra motarasaaikala sahita duwai chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sirahaa kalyaanapura nagarapaalikaa lawakaa tolamaa anatesta lekheko motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai sanibaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sohi thaaun basne warsiya inarajita yaadawako marityu bhaeko chha

solukhumbu nechaa salyaana gaaunpaalikaa baaghakhora bhanne sthaanamaa naa ta nambarako tyaaktara sanibaara raati aniyantrita bhai paltandaa ukta tyaaktara chalaaekaa sohi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya chhirina raaiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
balero jipa sahita sumana sumkaralaai praharile niyantranamaa linukaa saathai durghatanaako sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha

kharaabaata belachautaaraatarpha aundai gareko gapa numko motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata makawaanapura ghara bhai haala suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa belachautaaraa basne warsiya somabahaadura taamaanakaae marityu bhaeko haae

motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa taamaanako upachaarakaa kramamaa pokharaasthita manaipaala siksana aspataalamaa marityu bhaekojillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaeko chha

muglinabaata hetaundaatarpha jaana aundai gareko naakha numko trakakaae thakkarabaata naama thara ra thegaanaa nakhulekaa andaaji warsiya purusakaae marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaeko chha
trakako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako upachaarakaa kramamaa bharatapura aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko ho purusalaai thakkara dine traka ra chaalaka prahari niyantranamaa raheko chha
parithwiraajamaargaantargata dhaadinako galchhi gaaunpaalikaa bairenimaa janti bokeko basa durghatanaa hundaa baalikaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

nuwaakotako baansagadibaata amalekhaganjatarpha jaandai gareko baa kha nambarako janti bokeko basa dhaadinako bairenibajaaramaa durghatanaa hundaa nuwaakota belakotagadhi nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa dolmaa taamaanako marityu bhaeko chha
baireni bajaarasthita galchhi gaaupaalikaa kaaryaalaya bhawanakai saamunneko khaaldo chhalna khojdaa bihaana saadhe baje basa paltieko praharile janaaeko chha
arghaakhaanchi kaaski parsaa kailaalikaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

arghaakhaanchi bhumikaasthaana nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa lu ja nambarako jipale budhabaara saanjha sohi thaaun basne warsiyaa bisnau kumaari sresthalaai thakkara dimdaa ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha jipa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

parsaa wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa jyotipharmasthita sadakamaa naa cha nambarako balero pikaapale naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai budhabaara diunso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sohi mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya aphtaaba alama ansaariko upachaarako laagi naaraayanai aspataala wiragumjatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
haala pharaara rahekaa ukta balerokaa chaalakalaai praharile khojatalaasa garnukaa saathai duwai sawaari saadhanalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

budhabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa tamaataako padmamaa aspataala hundai thapa upachaarako laagi seti praadesika aspataala dhanagadhimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho jipa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
sumkhuwaasabhaako chichilaa gaaunpaalikaa maa bihibaara bihaana tyaaktara durghatanaa hundaa ekajanaakaae ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

khaandawaaribaata makaaluko numatarpha saamaana liera gairaheko ga ta nummwarako tyaaktara kuwaapaanimaa aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaa bhotakholaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa tyaaktara chaalaka warsiya manoja taamaanako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

kanchanapurako jhalaaribaata dadeldhuraatarpha gairaheko seja numko mahindraa jipale thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa tamataako upachaarakaa kramamaa seti praadesika aspataalamaa budhabaara marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kailaalile janaaeko chha
bardiyaa gulariyaa nagarapaalikaa puraano saraju nadi hulaaki sadakamaa aja bihaana motarasaaikala durghatanaa hundaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa gulariyaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya raajesa yaadawa rahekaa chhan khairaapuradekhi gulariyaatarpha gairaheko bhepa numko motarasaaikala naalaamaa paltindaa unako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
uniharulaai upachaarakaa laagi budhabaara raati h bajeko samayamaa malangawaa aspataalabaata wiraganja siphaarisa garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sarlaahile janaaeko chha
kailaaliko lamkichuhaa nagarapaalikaa maa raheko raastriya waanaijya baimkako saakhaa kaaryaalayako dosro tallaabaata khasera eka karmachaariko marityu bhaeko chha
sohi baimkamaa kaaryaalaya sahayogi padamaa karaaramaa kaaryarata daarchulaako maalikaarjuna gaaunpaalikaa pastikaa andaaji warsakaa dayaakarisna pantako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

dhaadinako gajuri gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num chaalise sthita trisuli nadimaa paudi khelne kramamaa bhaktapurako suryawinaayaka nagarapaalikaa wadaa num katunje basne warsiya wikala chhawaale sresthako marityu bhaeko ho
uddhaarakaa laagi nepaala prahari nepaali senaa ra sasastra prahari sahitako toli khatiekaa thie
raamechhaapa sarlaahi ra udayapurakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

raamechhaapa dorambaa gaaunpaalikaa dhaakrebaasa bhanne sthaanamaa dahapataalabaata dolakhaako bhaisetarpha jaandai gareko baa cha nambarako bolero gaadi sadakabaata andaaji saya mitara tala khasera somabaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa gaadimaa sawaara sailuna gaaunpaalikaa managaanu basne warsiyaa suwaani srestha ra warsiyaa dila kumaari sresthako dorambaa swaasthya chaukimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa gaadi chaalaka sameta anya janaamadhye janaako sohi swaasthya chaukimaa ra janaalaai upachaarako laagi tramaa sentara kaathamaadaum lagieko chha

sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa haala nambara nakhuleko motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa paidalayaatri sohi nagarapaalikaa parawaanipura basne warsiya hema bahaadura bhandaariko teksaasa aspaataala laalabandimaa upachaarako kramamaa somabaara raati marityu bhaeko chha

udayapura kataari nagarapaalikaa mirchaiyaakataaristhita sadakamaa kosa pa nambarako motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki sohi thaaun basne barmalaala adhikaariko chhori warsiyaa jijnaasaa adhikaariko kataaristhita sagaramaathaa aspataalamaa saamaanya upachaara paschaata thapa upachaarako laagi nobela aspataala biraatanagaramaa lagiekomaa upachaarako kramamaa somabaara saanjha unako marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha durghatanaakaa sambandhamaa sthaaniya praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha
moranako sundaraharaichaa nagarapaalikaa wiraatachokamaa aitabaara raati traka ra motarasaaikala thokkidaa ekajanaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane dui janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

purwabaata paschimatarpha jaandai gareko ko kha nambarako traka ra wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala apasamaa thokkindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka jhaapaako kankaai nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya pesala kesiko marityu bhaeko haae
asthaayi prahari chauki ichchhaakaamanaa gaaunpaalikaa phislinako barandaabaata haamaphaalera bhaagne kramamaa aja eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa ichchhaakaamanaa gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya raama kandela raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaeko chha uni nepaali senaako wardabahaadura gana sindhulimaa jawaanakaa rupamaa kaaryarata rahekaa thie

kaaryaalayakaa anusaara chauki bhawanako barandaabaata bhaagne kramamaa haamaphaaldaa uni gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa kandelako upachaarakaa kramamaa aja bihaana bharatapura aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko ho

kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka daanabahaadura mallakaa anusaara ghatanaako anusandhaanakaa laagi duijanaa praharilaai niyantranamaa liieko chha kandela bihaana h baje barandaabaata haamaphaalekaa thie
motarasaaikala trakamaa thokkiepachhi sakhta ghaaite bhaekaa duwailaai upachaarakaa laagi seti praadesika aspataala dhanagadhi puyaaie pani upachaarakaa kramamaa duwaiko marityu bhaeko ho

kaathamaadaunbaata sindhulitarpha jaandai gareko baapa numko skutara khaalto chhalaaune kramamaa aphain aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaa skutaramaa sawaara kanchanapura jillaa bhimadatta nagarapaalikaa ghara bhai puraano baaneswara basne warsiya anupamaakumaari raautakaae marityu bhaeko ho
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki raautakaae upachaarakaa kramamaa narbhika aspataala kaathamaadaunmaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

pyuthaana jhimaruka gaaunpaalikaa simleni bhanne sthaanamaa lu kha nambarako basako thakkarabaata sohi thaaun basne warsiya khima bahaadura mahatako bihibaara raati ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhanusaako laksminiyaa nikaala bhanne sthaanamaa janakapurabaata wiraatanagara jaadain gareko naa kha nambarako basale wiparita disaabaata audai gareko ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara janakapura kaa warsiya gowinda saahako marityu bhaekaae haae

basakaae thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaasaahakaae upachaarako kramamaa praadesika aspataala janakapuramaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha durghatanaamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara saaehi thaanukaa dhiresa saaha ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unakaae saaehi aspataalamaa upachaara bhai raheko chha
praharikaa anusaara gaadi ra chaalaka dubai mahendra nagara ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayako niyantranamaa rahekaa chhan
dailekha gorakhaa ra chitawanakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

dailekha naumule gaaunpaalikaa bhurungesthita sadakamaa bhe ta nambarako tyaaktara sadakabaata andaaji mitara tala khasera budhabaara diunso durghatanaa hundaa tyaaktaramaa sawaara naumule gaaunpaalikaa ddhaari basne warsiya mahendra raamajaaliko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha tyaaktara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

gorakhaa baarapaaka sulikota gaaunpaalikaa sthita sadakamaa ga ta nambarako tyaaktara sadakabaata andaaji saya mitara tala khasera budhabaara raati durghatanaa hundaa tyaaktara chaalaka nawalaparaasipaschimaraamagraama nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya jagadisa prasaada chaudhariko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

chitawana ichchhaakaamanaa gaaunpaalikaa jalabiresthita sadakamaa baa cha nambarako balero jipa ra baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala bihibaara bihaana eka apasamaa thakkara khaandaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka chitawana bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya rosana saapakotaako puraano medikala kaleja bharatapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
