dhanakutaa nagarapaalikaa chuliwanakaa warsiya sochakumaara raai paudi khelne kramamaa tamora nadile bagaaera bepattaa bhaekaa hun budhawaara aparaanha saathiharusangai paudi khelna gaekaa uni achaanaka nadile bagaaundaa bepattaa bhaekaa hun
duwaiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ra sawa pariksanakaa laagi paanchathara jillaa aspataala lyaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paanchatharale janaaeko chha
jillaakaae kataari nagarapaalikaa sthita gothadaandaamaa sikaara khelna gaekaa warsiya sumkara raautako bharuwaa bandukako chharraa laagera marityu bhaekoe praharile janaaeko chha
sikaara khelna gaekaa raautamaathi goli kasale ra kina chalaayo bhanne wisayamaa anusandhaana bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kataarikaa diesapi premasaagara kesile jaanakaari die
maritakako sawa postamaartamakaa laagi kataari aspataalamaa lyaaieko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya solukhumbukaa prahari niriksaka uttama kaarkikaa anusaara khumbu paasaanalhaamu gaaunpaalikaa labuchesthita nesanalapaarka hotalamaa mangalabaara bihaana uni marita awasthaamaa bhetiekaa hun

ilaakaa prahari chauki naamchebaata ghatanaasthalamaa pugeko praharile praarambhika anusandhaana garepachhi daainestika helikoptaramaarphata sawako pariksana garna siksana aspataala mahaarajaganja lagieko chha
paschima nawalaparaasimaa maachhaa maarne kramamaa karenta laagera eka yuwatiko marityu bhaeko chha bhane eka yuwaka ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

kalejakaa prawaktaa karisna paraajulile salyakriyaapachhi thapa upachaara awasyaka rahekole bhairahawaa laijaandaa marityu bhaeko bataae pidita ra aspataalabicha patakapataka sahamatikaa laagi waartaa bhaeko chha maritakako sawa bhairahawaasthita kalejamaa raheko chha
purwi chitawanako bhandaaraamaa tiparabaata khasdaa somabaara saanjha sahachaalakako marityu bhaeko chha
raapti nagarapaalikaa bhandaaraako bhitri sadakamaa naakha numko tiparako dhokaabaata khasdaa bardiyaa goruwaa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num basne warsiya tirthabahaadura thaaruko marityu bhaeko haae

tiparako dhokaabaata khasdaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa thaaruko upachaarakaa kramamaa puraano medikala kalejamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha tipara ra chaalaka prahariko niyantranamaa rahekaa chhan

daana ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa amaraai sthita sadakamaa raa pa nambarako motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa sautikulaa basne kamalaa sunaarako chhori warsiyaa saantaa sunaarako raapti swaasthya bijnaana pratisthaana ghoraahimaa upachaarako kramamaa aitabaara diunso marityu bhaeko chha pharaara motarasaaikala chaalakako praharile khoji gariraheko chha

daana tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa dammaragaaunsthita sadakamaa raa ka nambarako basako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sohi thaaun basne laala bahaadura bikako chhoraa warsiya raaja kumaara bikalaai upachaarako laagi kohalapura baanketarpha laijaane kramamaa aitabaara diunso baatomai marityu bhaeko chha basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baaraa jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako basale naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai aitabaara diunso thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa kamaladaandaa basne warsiya udayaraaja saapakotaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara maritakako srimati warsiyaa durgaa saapakotaalaai upachaarako laagi simaraasthita alpaaina aspataala lagiekomaa thapa upachaarako laagi bayodhyaa aspataala wiragumja riphara garieko chha basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
mahottari jillaako sadaramukaama jaleswaramaa chhuttaachhuttai durghatanaamaa dui janaako marityu bhaeko chha

jaleswara napaa basne winoda mukhiyaakaa chhoraa nau warsiya raajakumaara mukhiyaalaai sanibaara saanjha jaleswara mai raheko nepaala redakrasa sosaaiti agaadi sadakamaa luta numko tyaaktarale thakkara dindaa uni gambhira ghaaite bhaepachhi unalaai upachaarakaa laagi jillaa aspataala anchala aspataala hundai bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana dharaana lagiekaamaa aitabaara bihaana baje unako sohi aspataalamaa upachaarakai kramamaa marityu bhaeko haae

tyastai aitabaara diunso baje jillaako piparaa gaaunpaalikaa alipatti basne warsiya majida nadaaphalaai jaleswara napaa sthita buddhijiwichokamaa bardiwaasabaata baaluwaa bokera aeko naaka numko tiparale thakkara dindaa daanhine khuttaa nai sarirabaata alaga hune bhaera uni gambhira ghaaite bhaepachhi unalaai pani jillaa aspataala jaleswaramaa praathamika upachaara garaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi janakapuramaa awasthita jaanaki helthakeyara enda risarcha sentaramaa lagiekaamaa aitabaara abera saanjha unako pani sohi aspataalamaa upachaarakai kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
baaraako pathalaiyaamaa aitabaara diunso basale motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa srimaanakaae marityu bhaeko chha bhane srimati ghaaite bhaeki chhina

wiraganjabaata hetaudaatarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basale wiparita disaabaata airaheko naapa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa srimaana hetaumdaa kaa udayaraaja saapakotaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho

jillaakaae bunagala nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa anjanaa dhaamikaae khara kaatane kramamaa kilaahaalle bhirabaata ladera marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
dhaami sanibaara khara kaatna gaeki thiin saanjhasamma ghara napharkepachhi pariwaarale khoji gardaa dhaami aja marita phelaa pareki jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

saniwaara gaimdaakota nagarapaalikaa namunaa chokasthita bhitri sadakakhandamaa paraala bokeko trakamaathi basekaa madhyawindu nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya matiraama mahataa thaaruko karenta laagera marityu bhaeko haae
traka chaalaka pharaara raheko ra unako khoji kaarya bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalapurale janaaeko chha
gitaanagarabaata bharatapuratarpha aundai gareko naapa numko skutara tehrasaalachokamaa aniyantrita bhai paltidaa bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya suwaasa taamaanako marityu bhaeko haae

skutara paltidaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa taamaanako upachaarakaa kramamaa bharatapura aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha durghatanaamaa ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa pujaa sunaara gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unakaae chitawana medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

jillaakaae jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa pasaahaasthita purwapaschima raajamaargamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai naa kha nambarako trakale sukrabaara bihaana thakkara dindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sindhupaalchoka paanchapokhari thaanapaala gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya suresa bamjanako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko haae

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sarlaahi hariwana nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya buddhi bahaadura bamjanalaai upachaarako laagi biragumjatarpha pathaaieko praharile janaaekaae chha
traka ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha yasa sambandhamaa praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
sarlaahi mahottari baanke bhojapura dhanusaa kaaski dhaadina ra kaabhrekaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

mahottari aurahi nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa gausaalaabaata aurahitarpha jaandai gareko ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalabaata ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa aurahi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa dulaari dewi saahako upachaara laagi laijaane kramamaa bihibaara diunso baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikala chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

bhojapura tyaamkemaiyuma gaaunpaalikaa chakhewaamaa baa kha nambarako basa paarkina garne kramamaa kinchdaa basakaa sahachaalaka tyaamkemaiyuma gaaunpaalikaa chhinaamakhu basne warsiya bikaasa raaiko bihibaara saanjha ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sameta janaalaai upachaarako laagi praadesika aspataala janakapura lagieko chha

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa ammarasimha chokamaa ga cha nambarako jipa ra ga pa nambarako motarasaaikala bihibaara raati ekaapasamaa thakkara khaai durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka syaanjaa belakaachaura basne warsiya kesa bahaadura gurunako manaipaala siksana aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
jipa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhaadina galchhi gaaunpaalikaa mahesa dobhaanasthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako basale baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai sukrabaara bihaana thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka galchhi gaaunpaalikaa belkhu basne warsiya sandipa sresthako sthaaniya medikala galchhi hundai thapa upachaarako laagi graandi aspataala dhaapaasi kaathamaadaum laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

kaabhre namobuddha nagarapaalikaa bhemdaabaarimaa baa kha nambarako mini traka sadakabaata andaaji saya mitara tala khasera bihibaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa trakakaa sahachaalaka namobuddha nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya dipendra laamaako subheksaa aspataala sitaapaailaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa andaaji warsiya purusa wyakti raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaeko chha kaaryaalayakaa anusaara bharatapurabaata mangalapuratarpha jaandai gareko naa pa numko skutarale paidalayaatrilaai thakkara dieko thiyo

paidalayaatrilaai thakkara dine skutarakaa chaalaka pani ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite hunemaa gaindaakota nagarapaalikaa bhedaawaari basne warsiya janaka kandela raheko ra unako bharatapura aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha unako awasthaa gambhira raheko praharile janaaeko chha
jipakaae thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa purusako upachaarako kramamaa jillaa aspataala bharatapuramaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara paalpaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya raajesa nepaalako puraano medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha pharaara jipa ra chaalakako khoji garnukaa saathai yasa sambandhamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

jillaakaae butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa sukhkhaanagarasthita ghara banaaune kramamaa karenta laagera mistri kaama garne marchawaara gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya baliraama dewaana gadhiyaako marityu bhaeko haae
saathai karenta laagera ghaaite bhaekaa mistri kaama garne marchawaara gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya sundara lohaanako tinaau aspataala butawalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
jillaakaae chaudandigadhi nagarapaalikaa beltaaramaa paaruhaana ekedemi skulako naa kha nambarako skula basako thakkarabaata wadaa nambara ki warsiyaa namrataa thaapaakaae marityu bhaekaae haae
basako thakkarabaata ghaaite bhaeki thaapaalaai upachaarako laagi praathaamika swaasthya kendra beltaara laijaanasaatha chikitsakale marityu ghosanaa gareko praharile janaaekaae chha
jillaako kaaligandaki gaaunpaalikaa bhustunamaa raheko kuwaamaa dubera andaaji warsiya somabahaadura kaamiko marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

gulmiko satyawati gaaunpaalikaa lumpekakaa kaami wigata jhandai warsadekhi bhustunamai basdai aekaa sthaaniya cholaakaanta paandele bataae kuwaamaa dubeko awasthaamaa sawa dekhepachhi sthaaniyawaasile praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

purwapaschima raajamaarga antargata sarlaahiko laalabandi nagarapaalikaa kaalinjora pulamaa budhabaara bihaana tiparako thakkarabaata motarasaaikala chaalakako marityu bhaeko chha

naa kha namwarako tiparako thakkarabaata naa pa namwarako motarasaaikalakaa chaalaka jillaako iswarapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dipena mahatoko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
maritakako sawa postamaartamakaa laagi jillaa aspataala malangawaa pathaaieko chha durghatanaamaa sumlagna tipara ra chaalaka laalabandi prahariko niyantranamaa chhan

jillaako gulariyaa nagarapaalikaa sthita gulariyaa bhurigaaun hulaaki sadaka nirmaanakaa laagi atikramita gharako sumrachanaa bhatkaaune kramamaa gharako bhittaale chyaapiera bhawi prasaada paaaidelako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho
gulariyaa nagarapaalikaa wadaa num antargata parne durgaa gesta haausakaa sanchaalaka paaaidelako aphnai ghara bhatkaaune kramamaa chyaapiera marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

bhittaa bhatkindaa badhaiyaataala gaaunpaalikaa saktinagara niwaasi warsiya nawaraaja chaudhari ra warsiya manojaraama chaudhari gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaiteko gulariyaa aspataala bardiyaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

butawalabaata sandhikharka audai gareko baa pa namwarako kaara durghatanaa hundaa rupadenhi sainaamainaa kaa warsa kaa durgaadewi khadkaasohi sthaanakai warsa kaa tilaka khadkaa sohi thaaun basne warsa kaa bhaktabahaadura khadkaako mutyu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya arghaakhaanchile janaaekaae chha

durghatanaamaa rupandehi sainaamainaa nagarapaalikaa kai chaalaka gagaabahaadura khadkaa ra unakaa bhatija winoda khadkaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan uniharulaai upachaarakaa laagi praathamika swaasthya kendra pathaaieko praharile janaaekaae chha
maritakako sawa pariksanakaa laagi bharatapura aspataalamaa raakhieko praharile janaaeko chha
paate baaghako akramanabaata bardiyaa thaakurabaabaa nagarapaalikaa mohanapurakaa warsiya nikunjakaa maahute mumgru thaaruko marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

ukta ghatanaako khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya okhaladhunagaa ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya barunaeswarabaata sumyukta rupamaa khatieko praharile baandara lakhetne samuhamadhye moluna gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya chitra bahaadura sunuwaaralaai niyantranamaa lieko chha

saathai ukta jumgalabaata bharuwaa banduka thaana sameta praharile baraamada gareko chha ukta samuhakaa pharaara anya wyaktiharuko khoji garnukaa saathai yasa sambandhamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa raatomaate lachkaamaa somabaara raati traka ra motarasaaikala thokkindaa ekajanaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane ekajanaa sakhta ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

pathalaiyaawaata hetaumdaatarpha aundai gareko naa kha nambarako traka ra hetaumdaa bajaarabaata pathalaiyaatarpha gairaheko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala eka apasamaa thokkindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka hetaudaa raatomaatekaa autaara syaantaanako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

kapilawastu yasodharaa gaaunpaalikaa mudilaasthita sadakamaa yupi e e nambarako motarasaaikala baatoko saaidamaa roki raakheko araje jije nambarako telara trakamaa thokkiera aitabaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka kapilabastu nagarapaalikaa siwaapuruwaa basne warsiya baahetu yaadawako jillaa aspataala taulihawaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

jillaakaae nalagaada nagararapaalikaa dallikaa warsiya khamba khatriko sanibaara dalli prahari chauki agaadi rukhamaa ghaansa kaatdai gardaa rukhabaata ladera marityu bhaeko haae

motarasaaikala liera kaathamaadaumbaata pokharaa ghumna jaandai garekaa dacha naagarika warsiya jyaakapa syaakako durghatanaamaa marityu bhaeko ho uni sawaara pradesa pa nambarako motarasaaikala bandipura masryaandi ribhara bhyu risorta najikai yaampaamaa durghatanaamaa pareko thiyo

jillaakaae gadhawaa koilaabaasa sadakakhandako gadhawaa gaaunpaalikaa chisaapaanimaa raa ta nambarako tyaaktara durghatanaa hundaa gadhawaa gaaunpaalikaa manikaapurakaa warsiyaa ninu puna warsiyaa simaa pariyaara ra warsiyaa sunitaa punamagarako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

gadhawaa gaaunpaalikaa manikaapurabaata bhailo kheli utheko paisaale chisaapaanimaa pikanika khaai ghara pharkine kramamaa tyaakatara durghatanaa bhaeko thiyo durghatanaamaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaiteko swaasthya chauki gadhawaa ra lamahi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

darawaana bajaaradekhi ruma jaandai gareko dhaja numko jipa bilabaanagaaun najikaiko darakhaako asana bhanne thaaunmaa durghatanaa hundaa maalikaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa sakabahaadura wikako marityu bhaeko chha arkaa eka maritakako bhane pahichaana nakhulekaae praharile janaaeko chha

ukaalo baatomaa jipa pachhaadi ghasriera sadakamai paltieko ghatanaasthala pugekaa maalikaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa santosa suwedile bataae ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya darawaanabaata gaeko prahari toli redakrasakarmi janapratinidhi ra sthaaniyawaasiharu uddhaaramaa khatiekaa thie

ghaaite sabailaai upachaarakaa laagi jillaa aspataala diktelamaa lyaaieko chha ghaaiteharuko parichaya ra durghatanaako kaarana nakhuleko praharile janaaeko chha

sunasari barju gaaunpaalikaa barjutaalamaa ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala anphai aniyantrita bhai bijuliko polamaa thokkiera bihibaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka dewaanagumja gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya rabindra mehataako upachaarako laagi goldena aspataala biraatanagara laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

rolpaa nagarapaalikaa kamiredhaaraamaa kamero khanne kramamaa sunila smariti gaaunpaalikaa kaabhraaki warsiyaa pawitraa senako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko haae
liphtale thichera jhaapaako damakamaa aja bihaana eka majadurako marityu bhaeko chha
damaka sthita dimyaaksa kampleksako nirmaanaadhina bhawanako liphtale thichera paanchathara jillaa saawika siwaa ghara bhai haala damaka maa basdai aekaa warsiya santosa magarako marityu bhaeko haae

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakakaa anusaara mahalabhitrako nirmaanaadhina bidyutiya liphtamaa weldina garne kramamaa maathibaata liphtako eka hajaara kiloko kantrolara mesina achaanaka jharera kaama garirahekaa magaralaai kicheko thiyo

swaasthya kaaryaalaya chitawanale dieko jaanakaari anusaara chitawana medikala kalejamaa upachaararata lamajuna dudhapokhari wichaura sthaayi ghara bhai nawalapurako gaindaakota niwaasi warsiyaa saraswati nyaupaaneko kaattika gate bihaana upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

sadaka nirmaanako kaama gariraheko skaabhetaralaai ghara nirmaanako laagi khannakaa pujaaraa lyaaudai garekaa awasthaamaa bihibaara bihaana pele bhanne sthaanamaa khasekaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya melaulikaa prahari naayawa niriksaka maanasimha boharaale jaanakaari die skaabhetara chaalaka dasarathachanda nagarapaalikaa dehimaadaumkaa warsiya serasimha boharaa pharaara rahekaa chhan

mahaakaali raajamaargaanrtagata baitadiko satabaanjhagokuleswara sadakakhandako sinkelekamaa bihibaara bihaana traka durghatanaa hundaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

dhanagadhibaata daarchulaatarpha gairaheko sekha namwarako gyaasa bokeko traka sadakabaata mitara tala khasera durghatanaa hundaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko haae maritakako pahichaana hunanasakeko praharile janaaeko chha

ghaaite madhye dipaka taamaanako marityu bhaeko mahaanagariya prahari baritta gausaalaale jaanakaari dieko chha taamaanako upachaarakaa kramamaa mitrapaarkako dirghaayu guru aspataamaa marityu bhaeko ho
dharaana chataraa maarga hundai hetaumdaa aundai gareko pradesa pa nambarako motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata purwi makawaanapurako bakaiyaa adherikaa barsiya karisna bahaadura loko marityu bhaeko haae

nepaala praharile wisum maa wipad wyawasthaapana mahaasaakhaa sthaapanaa gari haala desabharakaa saatai pradesamaa saakhaa sthaapanaa gari uddhaara gardai airaheko chha

ma pidaa maa chhaina kinaki tapaaiharuko asirwaada ra maayaako agaadi yo pidaapidaa haina mero chhimekiharule darsaaunu bhaeko sahayoga nepaala prahari damakala pariwaaraprati yahaanbaatai haardika namana

somabaara diunso bardiwaasa nagarapaalikaa maaisthaana kholaamaa maato khanne kramamaa bhiramaathibaata khaseko dhiskole duwai janaa purieko thiyo ghatanaalagattai sthaaniya ra prahari sahayogamaa balako uddhaara garna saphala bhaepani pani baalakako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaekaae praharile janaaeko chha

jillaakaae baanagumgaa nagarapaalikaa odaaristhita taulihawaapiparaa sadakamaa lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalale aitabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa kapilawastu nagarapaalikaa nagawaa basne saaikalayaatri warsiya banaarasi biswakarmaako krimasana aspataala manaigraamamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko haae
parithwiraajamaargaantargata tanahunko wyaasa nagarapaalikaa kamalaabaarimaa saaemabaara bihaana muktinaatha jaandai gareko bhaaratiya basa durghatanaa hundaa yaatru ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

muktinaatha jaandai gareko yupibipi num ko basa aniyantrita bhai sadaka chheumaa paltindaa basamaa sawaara yaatru ghaaite bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaeko chha durghatanaamaa ghaaitemadhye janaalaai upachaarakaa laagi pokharaasthita manaipaala siksana aspataala pathaaieko ra baanki sabai dischaarja bhaisakekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa anusaara ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita gurjekholaako pula najikai sohi pula nirmaanako kaama garna basekaa kanchanapura laalajhari gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya siwaraaja chaudhariko marityu bhaeko ho
daahine haatamaa karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako raapti swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaanamaa upachaarakaa laagi laijaandai gardaa marityu bhaeko ho

daanamaa nadimaa bagera eka bepattaa bhaekaa chhan aitabaara bajetira lamahi nagarapaalikaa madhyanagara niwaasi warsiya dumkhu chaudharilaai raapti nadile bagaaundaa bepattaa bhaekaa hun nadi tarne kramamaa unalaai nadile bagaaeko thiyo
kapilawastu sarlaahi ra chitawanamaa bhaekaae chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari paancha janaakaae marityu bhaekaae chha

kapilawastu baanagumgaa nagarapaalikaa bunchisthita purwapaschima raajamaargamaa lu ta nambarako tyaaktara sanibaara saanjha khaaldomaa paltindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa tyaaktara chaalaka warsiya raamu thaaru ra sohi thaaun basne warsiya rumjita boteko saamudaayika aspataala piparaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa anya janaalaai uddhaara gari upachaarako laagi saamudaayika aspataala piparaa pathaaiekomaa thapa upachaarako laagi lumwini siti aspataala butawala riphara garieko chha

chitawana kaalikaa nagarapaalikaa gaidaakholaasthita sadakamaa naa ta nambarako tyaaktarale naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai sanibaara raati thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sohi thaaun basne warsiya bikaasa sresthako nayaan medikala kaleja bharatapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi thaaun basne warsiya mukesa paudelako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha duwai sawaari saadhana ra tyaaktara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

chitawana raapti nagarapaalikaa maartala pulasthita purwapaschima raajamaargamaa yupi siena nambarako bhaaratiya trakale naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai sanibaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka raapti nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya saroja taamaanako jillaa aspataala bharatapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
traka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

gaeraati aeko pahiromaa parera thabaana gaaunpaalikaa chherlobaana jhaarneki warsiyaa srikumaari budhaa ra unakaa warsiya chhoraa asala budhaako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rolpaale janaaekaae chha
jillaako bhumgahaa nagarapaalikaa ki urmilaadewi saradaarako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari upariksaka adhikaarile bataaunubhayaae

raati bajetira aphnai gharamaa kaama gariraheki mahilaa saradaaralaai wisaalu sarpale dasepachhi pariwaarajanale upachaarako laagi sirahaa jillaako karjanhaasthita phulakumaari memoriyala aspataalamaa raheko sarpadumsa upachaara kendramaa laijaandai gardaa baatomai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

jillaako aurahi nagarapaalikaako sripura gaaunkaa naresa mahatoki tina warsiyaa chhori simaakumaari mahatoko karenta laagera matyu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari upariksaka syaamakarisna adhikaarile bataaunubhayaae
maritaka baalikaako sawa pariksanakaa laagi aja bihaana jillaa aspataala jaleswaramaa lyaaieko chha

pahiraaemaa puriera marityu hunemaa lu ja numko jipa chaalaka gulmikaa kamala pariyaara rahekaa chhan tyastai ghaaite huneharumaa jipamaa sawaara butawalakaa lalita malla gulmi purtighaata basne warsiye prema sunuwaarabutawalakaa warsiya milana saahibutawalakai warsiya narendra hamaala rahekaa chhan
ghaaite uniharuko prodesika aspataala butawalamaa upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya paalpaale janaaekaae chha

jillaako isanaatha nagarapaalikaa wada num banjarahaaki warsiyaa kinjala yaadawa warsiya saritaa saaha ra warsiya gunjana yaadawako gaeraati maachhaa maarne kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rautahatale janaaekaae chha

rautahata chandrapura nagarapaalikaa judibelaasthita sadakamaa naa ha nambarako tyaampole thakkara dindaa budhabaara saanjha gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sohi thaaun basne saaikalayaatri warsiya saanuraama chaudhariko chapura aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

mahottari mathiyaani nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa ja ha nambarako tyaampole budhabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sohi thaaun abara basne paidalayaatri warsiya chhiwana yaadawako janakapura anchala aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

sunasari bhokraahaa narsimna gaaunpaalikaa janataa chokamaa haala nambara nakhuleko sawaari saadhanale thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa rautahata chandrapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya abhinaasa chaudhariko jillaa aspataala inaruwaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

kanchanapura belauribaata kaathamaadaumtarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako yaatruwaahaka basamaa aja bihaana baje bardaghaata nagarapaalikaa wadaa num khursaani kholaa bhanne sthaanamaa agalaagi bhaeko ho
ukta basa purnarupamaa ksati bhae pani maanawiya ksati kehi nabhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalaparaasile janaaeko chha

kanchanapurakaae belauribaata aundai gareko basa daaunne pugera bigrie pachhi yaatruharulaai arko gaadimaa raakhera pathaaeko thiyo tyasa pachhi khaali gaadi bigriera banaauna lagne kramamaa injina sarta bhaera agalaagi bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
rukuma paschimamaa pahiromaa puriera dui baalikaako marityu bhaeko chha
karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa siyaaraamakaa warsiya chhoraa suresa thaakura ra warsiyaa chhori pujaakumaariko jillaa aspataala jaleswaramaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa tinai janaalaai sthaaniyawaasiko sahayogamaa gaeraati nai upachaarakaa laagi jillaa aspataala jaleswaramaa lyaaiekaamaa bubaa siyaaraamako upachaarakai kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

warindaawana nagarapaalikaa dhamauraasthita sadakamaa haala nambara nakhuleko sawaari saadhanale biara ai nambarako motarasaaikalalaai mumgalabaara diunso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka gaura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya dinesa saahako helpa lyaanda aspataala garudaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko haae
jillaakaae dhowini gaaunpaalikaa kaa dharichana waithaakaa warsiya chhoraa mintu waithaakaae budhabaara bihaana gharamai karenta laagera marityu bhaeko ho
bijuliko taarabaata karenta laagi ghaaite bhaekaa baalakako upachaarako laagi wiraganjako naaraayanai aspataala lyaaune kramamaa baatomaa nai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaakaae mahadewaa gaaunpaalikaa balathiki warsiyaa suryamanidewi yaadawako marityu bhaeko ho ghaansa kaatne kramamaa wisaalu sarpale dasekaae unalaai upachaarakaa laagi dharaanasthita bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana laijaane kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa aitabaara raati motarasaaikala durghatanaa hundaa ekajanaakaae marityu bhaeko chha bhane ekajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

nitanapurabaata jitapuratarpha jaandai gareko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikala chaalaka budhagaai belawaa basne warsiya raamaannada chaudharikaae marityu bhaeko haae durghatanaamaagambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaudharilaai upachaarako laagi gandaka aspataala wiragumjatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
praharile thakkara dine motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai niyantranamaa lieko janaaeko chha tara traaphika praharile yamilaai thakkara dine motarasaaikalako nambara khulaauna chaaheko chhaina

kaalikaa nagarapaalikaa saktikhoramaa naa cha nambarako baleroko thakkarabaata gorkhaa jillaa ghara bhai haala saktikhoramaa amaa baabusanga basdai aekaa haasila miyaanko chhoraa hamidako marityu bhaeko haae

kapilawastuko waanagangaa nagarapaalikaa motipura niwaasi warsiyaa saawitraa achaaryako upachaarako kramamaa aja marityu bhaeko haae achaaryalaai lagaataara jwaro aepachhi pariksana garaaudaa denguko sankramana bhetieko thiyo

tina dinadekhi lumbini praadesika aspataalako saghana upachaara kaksamaa upachaara garepani ragatamaa pletaletsako maatraa nabadhepachhi saanjha saadhe baje marityu bhaeko lumbini praadesika aspataalakaa medikala suparidentenakaa daa karisna khanaalale jaanakaari dinubhayaae

dhanusaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa thumaunaasthita sadakamaa ja pa nambarako motarasaaikalakale sanibaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa saaikalayaatri sohi sthaana basne warsiya nawala yaadawako anchala aspataala janakapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara mithilaa wihaari nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya chandana saaha ra warsiya bijaya saahalaai thapa upachaarako laagi nyuro aspataala wiraatanagara pathaaieko chha

mahottari bardiwaasa nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa baa cha nambarako embulensa aniyantrita bhai sanibaara belukaa durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki embulensamaa sawaara bardiwaasa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa taaraa waadiko subha swastika aspataala bardibaasamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

daanako tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa ko bhagawati tolakaa warsiya anila wikako marityu bhaekaae ho sanibaara saanjha bajetira didi ra bhaai sangai gharako anganamaa basirahekaa samayamaa raksile maatiekaa chaalakale raa ta namwarako trayaaktara gharabhitrai chhiraaepachhi thakkarabaata wikako marityu bhaeko haae wika sthaaniya dibhaaina tempala bordina skulamaa kaksaa maa adhyanarata thie

trayaaktarako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa baalakako upachaarako kramamaa raapti praadesika aspataala tulasipuramaa sanibaara raati marityu bhaekaae ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tulasipurale jaanakaari dieko chha
tryaaktarale thakkara diepachhi bhaagna khojekaa chaalaka kaami chaudharilaai pakraau garieko ra unale atyaadhika raksisewana gareko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
praharisamaksa pidita paksale ghatanaako nispaksa chhaanawina garna ra dosilaai kadaa kaarawaahi garna maaga garekaa chhan

ilaamabaata jhaapaatarpha baansa bokera jaandai gareko me ja nambarako traka sadakabaata jhandai mitara tala khasdaa traka chaalaka jhaapaako damaka nagarapaalikaa kaa dhruba kaarki ra trakamaa sawaara warsiya rabina nepaalako marityu bhaekaae praharile janaaeko chha
makawaanapurako bhimaphedimaa taataasumo durghatanaa hundaa tina janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane atha janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

sarlaahibaata kaathamaadaum jaadai gareko naa ja nambarako sumo bhimaphedi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara chiyaanadaandaanmaa durghatanaa hundaa raamechhaapa rajanagaaunki mahine baalikaa saamraajni maajhi mahottari maaisthaana kaa warsiya birasimha waaiwaa ra sarlaahikaa mahendra sahaniko marityu bhaeko ho

durghatanaamaa anya janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaiteko hetaumdaa aspataala ra churehila aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha ghaaite yaatru sarlaahi ra sindhulikaa rahekaa chhan
durghatanaa lagattai sumo chaalaka sarlaahikaa warsiya raajakumaara basyaalalaai niyantranamaa lieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale janaaeko chha

wariddhawariddhaa maatra basne gharamaa gyaasa chuhaawata bhai agalaagi bhaeko ra sohi gyaasa silindara wisphota bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa adhikaari ewum prahari naayaba upariksaka rupaka khadkaale bataae
tyastai sohi gaaunpaalikaa baibaangamaa babaikholaako pula nirmaana garne majadura bardiyaako gulariyaa taruwaakaa warsiya purnabahaadura sunaarako babaikholaa tarne kramamaa bagera marityu bhaeko ho

jillaakaae kaalinchoka gaaunpaalikaa sthita sundraawati kholaale kaara bagaaundaa taamaakosi gaaunpaalikaa japhekaa warsiya anisa pokharelako marityu bhaeko chha bhane sohi kaaramaa sawaara taamaakosi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya wikaja pokharela ra chaalaka raamechhaapako likhu taamaakosi gaaunpaalikaa kaa pawana paudela ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

singatibaata charikotatarpha aundai gareko ikospota baacha nambarako kaara gaeraati h bajeko samayamaa sundraawatikholaa tarne kramamaa baadhile bagaaeko thiyo awirala warsaasangai kholaa badhekaale ghatanaa bhaeko sthaaniyawaasile bataaekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dolakhaakaa prahari niriksaka resama bohoraakaa anusaara maritakako sawa pariksanakaa laagi charikota aspataala lyaaieko ra kaaralaai mesina prayoga gari nikaalne tayaari bhairaheko bataaunubhayo
pachhillo kehi dinayataa pyuthaana daana kapilawastu rupandehi ra nawalaparaasimaa sarpako traasa phailieko chha
moratarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako siksana aspataala biraatanagaramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
maritaka ghartiko sawa postamaartamakaa laagi rolpaa aspataalamaa lyaaieko praharile janaaeko chha

butawalabaata daana tarpha aundai gareko lu kha nambarako basa durghatanaa hudaan saata janaa ghaaite bhaekaa hun ghaaitemadhye janaako sthaaniya aspataalamaa upachaara bhaera dischaarja bhaisakeko chha bhane dui janaa gambhira ghaaitelaai praadesika aspataala butawala pathaaieko daanakaa prahari prawaktaa diesapi winoda wikrama saahale jaanakaari die
unakaa anusaara ghambhira ghaaiteharumaa salyaanako baaghachaura ki warsiyaa gitaa kesi ra daanako lamahi ki warsiyaa gitaa kumaala raheki chhan

jillaako ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num simalataraa niwaasi barsiya gomaa waliko wisaalu sarpale dasera marityu bhaeko haae walilaai budhawaara belukaa bajetira aphnai gharamaa garaancha sarpale tokeko thiyo
baalikaako upachaarako laagi madhyaraati paune baje raapti swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana ghoraahimaa lagieko thiyo
unako upachaarakaa kramamaa gae raati marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanale jaanakaari dieko chha

mijuri ko antararaajya raajamaarga purwa jaane kramamaa traaphika battimaa rokieko uniharu sawaara toyotaa araebhi laai sohi disaamaa gairaheko toyotaako pikaapa trakale pachhaadibaata thakkara dieko thiyo
ojhaa pariwaarako nepaalamaa wiraatanagara ghara raheko bujhieko chha

bhairahawaabaata butawalatarpha aumdai gareko lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai sohi disaatarpha aundai gareko yupi sibi nambarako jipale thakkara dindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara srimaana srimatiko marityu bhaekaae haae
durghatanaamaa pari rupandehiko omasatiyaa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa numm laalapurakaa andaaji warsakaa premajita thaaru ra unaki srimati warsaki baasamati thaaruko marityu bhaekaae haae
motarasaaikalalaai thakkara diera bhaageko jipa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

durghatanaamaa pari marityu hunemaa paalpaaki phanimaayaa nepaali syaanjaa waalinaki manju bhandaari gaire waalinakai dui warsiya baalaka prasanna darji raheko pramukha jillaa adhikaari kosahari niraulaale jaanakaari die
paalpaako raamapurabaata galyaanakaa laagi chhuteko ga ja nambarako jipa syaanjaako galyaana nagarapaalikaa dimikamaa durghatanaamaa parekaae thiyaae
jipa sadakabaata jhandai mitara tala khaseko prahari chauki galyaanale janaaeko chha
makawaanapura kailaali surkheta saptari ra rupandehimaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa thaanaabharyaanasthita sadakamaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai mumgalabaara diunso durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka rautahata chandrapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya suraja mainaaliko churehila aspataala hetaumdaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

kailaali kailaari gaaunpaalikaa sthita sadakamaa se pa nambarako motarasaaikala goru gaadaa thakkara khaai mumgalabaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne raama bahaadura chaudhariko praadesika aspataala setimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
gaadaa chaalaka kailaari gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya patiraama chaudharilaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kailaali chure gaaunpaalikaa dhaprenisthita sadakamaa se ka nambarako tipara aniyantrita bhai sadakabaata andaaji saya mitara tala khasera budhabaara bihaana durghatanaa hundaa chaalaka sohi gaaunpaalikaa bayaalaa basne warsiya narendra thaapaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

saptari sambhunaatha nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa sa pa nambarako motarasaaikalale mumgalabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki haala naama thara watana nakhuleki andaaji warsiyaa mahilaako sagaramaathaa amchala aspataala raajabiraajamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sohi nagarapaalikaa pokhariyaa basne warsiya raajendra mandalako yunika aspataala rupanimaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

paalpaako raamapurabaata galyaanakaa laagi chhuteko ga ja nambarako jipa syaanjaako galyaana nagarapaalikaa dimikamaa durghatanaa hundaa andaaji saadhe warsiya baalakako marityu bhaekaae haae baalakako sanaakhata huna baanki chha
jipa sadakabaata jhandai mitara tala khaseko prahari chauki galyaanale janaaeko chha
tiparachaalakalaai niyantranamaa lii anusandhaana thaalieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya okhaladhumgaale janaaeko chha

raamechhaapa nagarapaalikaabaata manthali nagarapaalikaako wadaa num phulaasitira simenta liera jaandai garekaae naa ta nambarako tryaaktara manthali nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara ko lipekholaamaa durghatanaa hundaa trayaaktara chaalaka dhruwa rokaako marityu bhaekaae haae

tyasaigari tryaaktaramaa rahekaa dorambaa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa dinesa nepaali ra manthali nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara bhaluwaajorakaa rosana pariyaara ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaitemadhye rosana pariyaarako awasthaa gambhira bhaekaale manthalikaae taamaakosi aspataalamaa saamaanya upachaarapachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaandau pathaaieko chha
ghatanaako wisayamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairahekaae ra maritaka rokaako sawa postamaartamako laagi praathamika swaasthya kendra manthalimaa raakhieko praharile janaaekaae chha
lamahi deupura sthita yanukaa punako gharamaa mistri kaama garne kramamaa ekkaasi karenta laagera sthaaniya warsiya jiwana chaudhariko marityu bhaeko ho
karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaudhariko upachaarakaa kramamaa lamahi aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
bepattaa bhae lagattai nepaala ra sasastra prahari tathaa sthaaniyabaasiko sumyukta tolileuniharuko khoji garekaa thie
saptari sindhuli kapilawastu chitawana ra jumlaamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

saptari rupani gaaunpaalikaa sthita sadakamaa baa kha nambarako haaisale biara ebi nambarako motarasaaikalalaai somabaara diunso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka chhinamastaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya sumtosa kumaara saahako yunika aspataala rupanimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara chhinamastaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya raahula yaadawako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko raheko chha haaisa ra chaalakalaai prahari niyantranamaa lieko chha

kapilawastu baanagumgaa nagarapaalikaa siutisthita sadakamaa lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalale lu pa nambarako skutaralaai somabaara diunso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa skutara chaalaka sohi thaaun basne warsiya prakaasa chaudhariko praadesika aspataala butawalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
thakkara dine motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

chitawana bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa saugaata chokasthita sadakamaa naa cha nambarako balero jipale naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai somabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sohi mahaanagarapaalikaa gaajipura basne warsiya paalsina taamaanako nayaan medikala kaleja bharatapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
jipa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
jumlaa kanakaasundari gaaunpaalikaa rokaayawaadasthita sadakamaa bhe ja nambarako jipako thakkarabaata mugu soru gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya lokajumga saahiko somabaara raati marityu bhaeko chha

surkhetabaata mugutarpha jaandai gareko ukta jipa sadakamaa phasdaa jipa nikaalne kramamaa saahilaai thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhai upachaarako laagi karnaali swaasthya bijnaana pratisthaana jumlaa lagiekomaa upachaarako kramamaa unako marityu bhaeko ho
jipa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jaajarakotakaa anusaara chatyaanale dherai bhedaa marepachhi kusekaa kisaana chintita banekaa chhan yahaankaa kisaanako amdaaniko pramukha srota bhedaa paalana wyawasaaya ho

purwapaschima raajamaarga antargata daanako lamahibhaalubaana sadaka khandako piparimaa somawaara belukaa trakale motarasaaikalalaai thakkara didaam dui yuwaako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanale janaaeko chha

lu pa ra raa pa nambarako motarasaaikala eka apasamaa thokkie lagattai paschimabaata purwatarpha gairaheko naa kha nambarako trakale thakkara dindaa raa pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa rahekaa ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya baalakarisna bhandaari ra lamahi nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya winaayaka chaudhariko marityu bhaeko ho
durghatanaamaa pari gambhira ghaaite bhaepachhi duwai janaalaai upachaarakaa laagi lamahi aspataala puryaae lagatai chikitsakale marita ghosita garekaa thie
ukta durghatanaamaa pari lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa sawaara raapti gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara bijaurikaa warsiya dipaka maraasini gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
toribaaribaata madhumallaatarpha aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basamaa sawaara ilaamako chulaachuli gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num basne warsiyaa nandakumaari raailaai thakkara dieko ho

basabaata jharera agaadibaata baato kaatne kramamaa tyahi basale thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki raaiko araniko aspataala urlaabaarimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale jaanakaari dieko chha
thakkara dine basa ra chaalaka prahari niyantranamaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kapilawastu ra ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pakadibaata sumyukta rupamaa khatieko praharile sthaaniya baasindaako sahayogamaa wepattaa bhaekaaharuko khoji garnukaa saathai yasa sambandhamaa awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
rukuma paschimaraamechhaapa ra parwatamaa bhaekaae chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari tina janaakaae marityu bhaekaae chha

rukuma paschima athawisakota nagarapaalikaa sthita manakaabagaramaa bhe ta nambarako tyaaktara sanibaara bihaana kariba saya mitara tala bheri nadimaa khasera durghatanaa hundaa tyaaktaramaa sawaara sohi nagarapaalikaa kaatinaa basne warsiya dhawahaadura biswakarmaa ra haala naama thara watana nakhuleko wyaktiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka sahita janaalaai uddhaara gari upachaarako laagi nagara aspataala athabisakota pathaaiekomaa chaalakalaai thapa upachaarako laagi nepaalagumjatarpha riphara garieko chha

raamechhaapa gokulagumgaa gaaunpaalikaa surkesthita sadakamaa baa kha nambarako traka sanibaara saanjha kariba saya mitara tala khasera durghatanaa hundaa trakakaa dhani raamechhaapa umaakunda gaaunpaalikaa baamti basne warsiya wiswa basnetako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

parwata dha pa nambarako motarasaaikalale sanibaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki phalewaasa nagarapaalikaa khaanigaaun basne warsiyaa bisnaudewi darjiko jillaa aspataala parbatamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
sanibaara saanjha alainchi godera ghara pharkumne kramamaa baatomaa jhareko pahirole kichdaa sthaaniya warsiya maanabahaadura wistako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

pahirole kichdaa unako haata khuttaa ra taaukaamaa chota laageko ra so durgama sthalamaa dobhaanebaata swaasthyakarmi pugna napaaundai raati nai marityu bhaeko ukta kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka narabahaadura salaami magarale bataae unale bhane sanibaara saanjha pahiro parera uhaan ghaaite hunubhaeko thiyo tyo thaaun wikata rahekaale dobhaane bhanne sthaanabaata swaasthyamarki pathaaune tayaari gardaagardai marityu bhaeko bhanne jaanakaari aeko thiyo

dhaadinakaaekharibaata dhaadinabesitarpha aundai gareko ga ja nambarako jipa jwaalaamukhi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num dhaunkholaamaa arko gaadilaai uchhinne kramamaa paltiera durghatanaa bhaekaae jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinale janaaekaae chha

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa jwaalaamukhi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kharikaa warsiya raamabahaadura duwaadi ra warsiya kaali gurunalaai jillaa aspataala dhaadinabesimaa upachaarapachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaunsthita tramaa sentaramaa pathaaieko chha
ghaaiteko jillaa aspataala dhaadinabesimaa upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayawa upariksaka rupaka khadkaale jaanakaari die
kaathamaadaumkaae kapanasthita litila wana naamaka manteswari skulako bhyaana paltindaa janaa widyaarthi ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
mahottari jillaako mahottari gaaunpaalikaamaa raheko wighi kholaamaa dubera sanibaara eka baalakako marityu bhaeko chha
maritaka baalakako sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala jaleswara pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
purwi chitawanako ratnanagaramaa sanibaara raati trakako thakkarabaata eka paidalayaatriko marityu bhaeko chha

ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa wadaa num siwachokamaa naakha nambarako trakale paidalayaatrilaai thakkara dieko thiyo jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa anusaara trakako thakkarabaata naama thara wartana khulna nasakeko andaaji warsiya purusa wyaktiko upachaarakaa kramamaa bharatapura aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko ho
paidalayaatrilaai thakkara dine traka prahariko niyantranamaa raheko chha bhane maritaka purusako sawa bharatapura aspataalamaa raakhieko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaakaae bheri nagarapaalikaa timilemaa gaeraati paune bajetira pahirole ghara purindaa warsiyaa paarwati wali amaa nau warsiyaa motikalaa ra tina warsiyaa dhanasaraa chhaaeriharu ko marityu bhaeko jaajarakotakaa prahari naayawa upariksaka syaama khatrile jaanakaari dinubhayo
ahile ghatanaasthalamaa pugera prahari ra sasastra prahariko tolile uddhaarakaa gariraheko diesapi khatrile jaanakaari dinubhayo

thakkarabaata motarasaaikalamaa sawaara parsaa jillaa aurahi kaa sarendra chaudhari gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan chaudhariko pani chitawana medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa prawaktaa ekanaaraayana koiraalaale jaanakaari dinubhayo
durghatanaa ke kaaranale bhayo bhannebaaremaa anusandhaana bhairaheko achhaama praharile janaaeko chha
rupandehi tanahun ra sunasarimaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

rupandehi tilottamaa nagarapaalikaa madhawaliyaasthita sadakamaa lu pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai bihibaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa nawalapura basne andaaji warsiya ganaesa laamaako krimasana aspataala manaigraamamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

tanahun bhimaada nagarapaalikaa dhawaadisthita sadakamaa lu kha nambarako basako thakkarabaata paidalayaatri sohi thaaun basne warsiya mohanasiha thaapaako bihibaara saanjha ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sunasari inaruwaa nagarapaalikaa mahendrachokasthita sadakamaa ko ja nambarako myaajika bhyaanako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa paidalayaatri sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya baasudeba panditako goldena aspataala biraatanagaramaa upachaarako kramamaa bihibaara raati marityu bhaeko chha
bhyaana ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
rautahatamaa khaanaa pakaaune kramamaa gyaansa likeja bhaera agalaagi hundaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
ghaaite duwaijanaalaai upachaarako laagi jillaa aspataala gauratarpha pathaaieko chha yasa sambandhamaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko chha

purwi chitawanako khairahani nagarapaalikaa simalataandimaa naa kha nambarako kantenarale saaikalayaatrilaai sukrabaara bihaana thakkara dieko ho thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaiteko parichaya nakhuleko ra ahile puraano medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
ghaaite hunemaa siraanchoka gaaunpaalikaa gorakhaakaa warsiya ramesa baraala rahekaa chhan unako bharatapura aspataalamaa ahile upachaara bhairaheko chha
jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa anusaara thakkara dine pikaapa bhyaana ra chaalakalaai jugedi chaukile niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana gariraheko chha

jillaako paanaini gaanupaalikaa wadaa nambara laamadaandaamaapaalpaako baato hundai arghaakhaanchi aundai garekaaega pa nambarako motarasaaikala chipliera durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikalakaae pachhaadi basekaa syaangajaako karisnagandaki gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya resama bahaadura bhandaarikomarityu bhaekaae haae
tyastai durghatanaamaa motarasaaikala chaalaka kaaskiko lekhanaatha upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya thagabahaadura sena ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unakaae saaehiaspataalamaaupachaara bhairaheko chha

bandipura nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara chunapaharaamaa kaathamaadaumtarpha jaandai gareko baa ya nambarako kaarale thakkara dindaaraajamaargamaa yaatraa gariraheki sthaaniya warsiyaa manisaraa pariyaarakaaemarityu bhaeko haae
thakkara dinekaara ra chaalaka praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa gaganagaundaamaa gae raati gapa nambarako motarasaaikala ra gapa numko skutara ekaapasamaa thokkindaa skutarako pachhaadi basekaa pokharaa nadipura niwaasi warsiya jagabina punako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaaskikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raajakumaara kesile jaanakaari die

thakkarapachhi trakako chakkaamuni parera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa punako pokharaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaanamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa nidhana bhaeko thiyo so durghatanaamaa lekhanaatha bhandaaradhikakaa wikala sunaara ra rupaa kaa dipaka wika tathaa pokharaa archalabotakaa nisaana guruna ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
makawaanapurako hataundaa maa budhabaara raati motarasaaikalale thakkara dindaa saaikalayaatri makawaanapuragadhi kaa warsiya somalaala ghalaanako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

tyastai budhabaara diunso atoriksaako thakkarabaata ghaaite paidalayaatri hetaundaa kaa warsiya naaraayana lamsaalako upachaarako kramamaa gae raati marityu bhaeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha hetaundaa maa atoko thakkarale gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako upachaarako kramamaa bharatapuramaa marityu bhaeko ho

hetaundaakaa sawaari durghatanaamaa sumlagna pradesa pa numko motarasaaikalakaa chaalaka rosana dulaala tathaa naaha numko ato chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka mukesakumaara simhale jaanakaari dinubhayo
aja diunso belawaari nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya jiwana sresthako ghara najikai raheko saamudaayika banamaa rukhamaa chadhera ghaansa kaatne kramamaa rukhabaata ladera marityu bhaeko haae
rukhabaata ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sresthako upachaarako kramamaa nobela aspataala biraatanagaramaa marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belawaarile janaaeko chha

baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa paraspura chokasthita sadakamaa bhe pa nambarako motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata sohi thaaun basne dhaniraama paasiko warsiyaa chhori dipaali paasiko mumgalabaara diunso marityu bhaeko chha
thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki unako narsina homa nepaalagumjamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baaraa jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa bajanisthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako tiparale naa kha nambarako trakalaai mumgalabaara raati thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa traka chaalaka jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sasi prasaada guptaako upachaarako laagi laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

saathai sohi tiparale naa kha nambarako trakalaai sameta thakkara dindaa ghaaite bhaekaa traka chaalaka sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsiya neka mahammada miyaanko heltha keyara aspataala wiragumjamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha pharaara tipara chaalakako praharile khoji gariraheko chha

chandako gaadimaa chyaapiera ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ra dui janaa ghaaite bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dadeldhuraale janaaekaae chha ghaaiteharulaai upachaarakaa laagi dadeldhuraa aspataala lyaaieko chha

jillaakaae maiwaakholaa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num saanghumaa nirmaanaadhina madana bhandaari smariti rumgasaalaa nirmaanakaa kramamaa khanieko khaaldomaa jamekaae paanimaa paudi khelne kramamaa dubera warsiya manakumaara chonwaanako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya taaplejunale janaaekaae chha

praharikaa anusaara janaa saathisangai paudi khelna gaekaa manakumaarako duberamarityu bhaeko thiyo paudi khelne kramamaa dubekaa manakumaaralaai sthaaniya ra praharile dedha ghantaapachhi marita awasthaamaa phelaa paareko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
ratna raajamaargaantargata surkhetako harre daandaamaa basa durghatanaa hundaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

jaajarakotabaata nepaalaganjatarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basa budhabaara bihaana kariba baje bherigumgaa nagarapaalikaa sthita harremodamaa durghatanaa hundaa ekajanaakaae ghatanaa sthalamaa ra duijanaako kohalapura medikala kaleja baankemaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryalaya surkhetale janaaekaae chha

gaadimaa chaalaka sahita janaa sawaara rahekaa thie jasamaa janaako marityu bhaeko ra janaa ghaaite bhaekaa praharile janaaeko chha gaadi chaalaka ghaaite awasthaamaa praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
sarlaahi gulmi dhanusaa ra rukumapaschimamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

sarlaahi haripura nagarapaalikaa siswaa pulasthita sadakamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai somabaara bihaana durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka haripura nagarapaalikaa laksmipura basne warsiya mukesa chaudhariko upachaarako laagi wiragumjatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

gulmi gulmi darabaara gaaunpaalikaa dhumgeristhita sadakamaa lu pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai somabaara bihaana durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi thaaun basne warsiya drona naatha kadelako praathamika swaasthya kendra srarimgaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhanusaa ganaesamaana chaaranaatha nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa haala nambara nakhuleko tyaampoko thakkarabaata paidalayaatri sohi thaaun basne warsiya miltilaala yaadawako somabaara diunso marityu bhaeko chha
tyaampoko thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako janakapura amchala aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho thakkara dine tyaampo ra chaalakako praharile khoji gariraheko chha

rukumapaschima triwenai gaaunpaalikaa sthita khari gairaa saamudaayika banamaa baato khanne kramamaa jesibi bhirabaata andaaji saya mitara tala khasera somabaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa jesibikaa sahachaalaka daana gadhawaa gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya uttama kumaara chaudhariko upachaarako laagi laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
jillaakaae baahadasi gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya dhana kumaara raajawumsiko maachhaa maarne kramamaa ghaagraa kholaamaa dubera marityu bhaeko haae

sthaaniya gopeswara adhaarabhuta widyaalaya mathuraako kaksaa maa adhyayana garne baalaka somabaara bihaana widyaalaya jaana bhani gharabaata niskekomaa widyaalaya nagai najikaiko kataharako rukhamaa chadheko belaa arimgaalale tokeko thiyo

arimgaalako tokaaibaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa baalakako arghaakhaanchi jillaa aspataalamaa praathamika upachaarapachhi thapa upachaarako nimti anyatra laijaanuparne bataaeko thiyo arthika abhaawakaa kaarana samayamai anya aspataalamaa laijaana nasakiekaa kaarana baalakako marityu bhaekaae praharile janaaekaae chha
parsaako parsaagadhi nagarapaalikaakaae sawaiyaamaa bhaeko sawaari durghatanaamaa eka janaako marityu bhaekaae chha bhane arkaa eka janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala ra naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala ekaapasamaa thokkidaa parsaagadhi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya baagabahaadura laamaako marityu bhaeko haae
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa laamaakaae upachaarakaa kramamaa nyuro aspataala wiraganjamaa tyu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya parsaale janaaeko chha
durghatanaamaa parsaagadhi kaa warsiya rawi saaha gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unako ahile gandaka aspataala wiraganjamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

pulchokabaata siwaghaatatarpha jaandai gareko naa pa nambarako skutarale sohi disaatarpha jaandai gareko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalaai thakkara dindaa ghaaite motarasaaikala chaalaka bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya suryabandu khanaala ksetriko puraano medikala kalejamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
skutara ra skutara chaalakalaai jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale niyantranamaa lieko chha sawa pariksanakaa laagi bharatapura aspataalamaa raakhieko chha

janakapuradhaama upamahaanagarapaalikaa pidaarikaa raamasogaaratha saahako nirmaanaadhina gharako chhatabaata khasera saptariko sambhunaatha nagarapaalikaa bagarahatabaata warsiya nandu mandalakoghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
aitabaara saanjha tinakunebaata gausaalaatarpha jaandai gareko tipparale tina wataa motarasaaikalaai thakkara diera bhaagekokaathamaadaum prahari pramukha uttamaraaja suwedile jaanakaari die
tara tatkaala khojimaa khatieko prahari waritta gausalaale baa kha nambarako sumkaaspada tiparalaai niyantranamaa liisakekosuwedile jaanakaari die

durghatanaamaa parimarityu tathaa ghaaite bhaekaa kasaiko pani naama khulna nasakeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha ghaaite madhye ekako sibhila aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha bhane janaako keemasi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha
damaulibaata chhaabdi jaandai gareko ga kha nambarako mini basako breka phela bhaera pachhaadi guddaa pachhaadibaata aundai gareki gomaa pantako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ukta basamaa sawaara gorakhaa jillaa ghara bhai wyaasa bhaadagaaun basdai aeki warsiyaa saawitri adhikaari saamaanya ghaaite bhaeki chhan unakaae ratnahari aspatalaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
thakkara dine ukta basa ra chaalakalaai prahari niyantrana lieko chha

traka ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

gae raati koteswaramaa mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahasaakhaako gaadile thakkara dindaa ekajanaagambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

baalakumaaribaata koteswaratarpha airaheko mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahasaakhaako baajha nambarako siarabi bhyaanalenaama nakhulekaa eka purusalaaikoteswaramaa raheko akaase pula munithakkara dieko hounako awasthaa bhane nikai gambhira raheko bataaieko chha
purwi nawalaparaasiko arunakholaamaathiko pula trakako thakkarakaa kaarana bhaasieko chha pula bhaasiepachhi sawaari awaagamana awaruddha bhaeko chha

adhika garmi badhesangai rupandehi nawalaparaasi kapilawastulagaayata thaaunmaa wisaalu sarpako wigawigi huna thaaleko chha

parithwiraajamaargako benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa salaanaghaatamaa bhaeko basa durghatanaamaa pari bepattaa yaatruko khojikaa laagi jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya dhaadinale chhimeki chaara jillaasanga agraha gareko chha

dhaadinakaa pramukha jillaa adhikaari bhagiratha paandele gorakhaa chitawana purwinawalaparaasi ra tanahun pugera bepattaako khoji garna agraha garepachhi sabai jillaa prahari nadi kinaaramaa khoji laagekaa chhan khoji kaaryalaai prabhaawakaari banaauna yasari sabai suraksaa nikaayalaai samanwaya garieko ho

chitawanako kurinataaramaa samanwaya baithakamaa durghatanaamaa bepattaa yaatrukaa aphantale baarambaara bhairahane sawaari durghatanaa kama garaauna sarakaarale prabhaawakaari kaarya garna nasakeko bataaekaa chhan warsaako samaya thulo baadhi aekaale uddhaara ra khojikaaryamaa kathinaai bhae pani suraksaa nikaaya nirantara sakriyataakaa saatha kaama gariraheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka raajakumaara waidawaarale bataae

dhaadinakaa pramukha jillaa adhikaari bhagiratha paandele bepattaako khojikaa laagi jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya gorakhaa chitawana purwinawalaparaasi ra tanahunsanga anurodha garieko bataae basa durghatanaako dinasamma pani bepattaa yaatru nabhetiepachhi prasaasanale anya jillaasanga sahayoga maageko ho

khoji kaarya garna hinderamaatra sambhawa nabhaekaale trisuli nadi kinaaramaa rahekaa chha risortalaai sameta satarka rahana ra khoji kaaryamaa saghaaunajillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya dhaadinale agraha gareko chha
nuwaakotakaae kakani gaaunpaalikaa maa baaluwaa utkhanana gareko khaaldomaa dubera dui janaako marityu bhaeko chha

okharapauwaasthita kolpukholaa kinaaramaa awaidharupamaa baaluwaa utkhananako kramamaa baneko khaaldomaa pareki sthaaniya warsiyaa binitaa balaami ra unalaai bachaauna gaeki sindhuli phikkala gaaunpaalikaaki warsiyaa laksmi taamaanako dubera marityu bhaeko nuwaakota praharile janaaeko chha

kapilawastu nagarapaalikaa dohanisthita sadakamaa lu ta nambarako tyaaktarale yupi esa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai somabaara bihaana thakkara dindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara maayaadewi gaaunpaalikaa awiraawa basne warsiyaa pramilaa yaadawako marityu bhaeko chha
thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki unako jillaa aspataala taulihawaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

waidesika rojagaarikaa kramamaa wigata warsadekhi kataaramaa kaaryarata saagurigadhi gaaunpaalikaa dhanakutaakaa lalitabahaadura limbuko aitabaara diunso paudi khelne kramamaa samudrako chhaalamaa pari nidhana bhaeko chha
limbu kataaramaa dhanakutaa sewaa samaajako purwaadhyaksa ewumm wartamaana pramukha sallaahakaaralagaayata wibhinna saamaajika sumsthaamaa abaddha chhan
saptari baaraa ramoranakaachhuttaachhuttai sthaanamaa karenta laagera tina janaakaae marityu bhaekaae chha
saptari khadka nagarapaalikaa kalyaanapura basne rupani gaaunpaalikaa birendrabajaara ghara bhaekaa warsiya raama dulaari ale magarako karenta laagera aitabaara diunso marityu bhaeko chha
paani taanne motara chalaaune kramamaa kerenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako saptarisi aspataala lahaana sirahaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
baaraa jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa madarasaa tola basne warsiya nura mahamada dewaanako karenta laagera aitabaara saanjha marityu bhaeko chha
aphnai gharamaa bijuliko taara jodne kramamaa achaanaka karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako nobela aspataala biraatanagaramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

kapilawastu nagarapaalikaa wadaa num dohanisthita hulaaki sadaka khandako pakadi najika lu ta nambarako tyaaktara ra wiparita disaatarpha jaandai gareko yupi esa nambarako bhaaratiya nambarako motarasaaikala eka apasamaathokkindaakapilawastuko maayaadewi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num awiraawaki warsiyaa pramilaa yaadawako marityu bhaeko haae
tyaaktarako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaayaadawakoupachaarakaa kramamaa somabaara bihaana jillaa aspataala taulihawaamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa salaanaghaata najikai parithwi raajamaargamaa sarlaahibaata kaathamaadaumtarpha aundai gareko naa kha nambarako nyusaristi dilaksa basa saauna gate bihaana trisuli nadimaa khasera durghatanaa hundaa marityu huneko sumkhyaa pugeko chha

durghatanaamaa pari ghaaite bhaekaa janaako tramaa sentara kaathamaadaummaa upachaara bhairaheko chha bhane janaa wibhinna aspataalamaa upachaara paschaata dischaarja bhaekaa chhan ukta durghatanaako khabara praapta hunaasaatha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadina ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayaharu benighaata tathaa gajuri ra prahari chauki jogimaaraabaata sameta prahari toli khati gai uddaara kaaryamaa juteko thiyo

durghatanaamaa marityu bhaekaa janaako sawa aphantalaai bujhaaieko chha bhane tanahun dewaghaata gaaunpaalikaa ghinataarasthita bandai gareko pulamuni phelaa pareko kariba warsiya purusako sawa sanaakhata huna baanki raheko chha

sarlaahi malumgawaabaata aeko ukta basamaa chaalaka sahachaalaka kandaktara ra yaatru gari janaa sawaara raheko bhanne bujhieko chha durghatanaamaa pari bepattaa bhaekaa anya wyaktiharuko khoji tathaa uddaara kaarya ewum thapa anusandhaana jaari raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinale janaaeko chha

lungri gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya birendra gharti ksetriko swargadwaari nagarapaalikaa amara maawiko nawanirmita bhawanamaa grila jodne kramamaa karenta laagera marityu bhaeko haae karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako praathamika swaasthya kendra bhingrimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
saptarisarlaahi gulmi ra jhaapaamaa bhaekaae chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha
ukta nambarako motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

gulmi chandrakota gaaunpaalikaa saantipurasthita sadakamaa lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalale sanibaara raati thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sohi gaanupaalikaa mahaakaa basne warsiya chitra bahaadura saarkiko upachaarako laagi praathamika swaasthya kendra saantipuratarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
ukta motarasaaikala praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

jhaapaa haldibaari gaaunpaalikaa maa motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa pari gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa eka janaa paidalayaatriko aja bihaana marityu bhaeko chha marityu hunemaa sthaaniyawaasi warsiya dambarabahaadura taamaana raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaeko chha

daksinabaata uttaratarpha jaandai gareko me pa num ko motarasaaikalale gaeraati thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa taamaanako upachaarako kramamaa birtaamodasthita biendasi aspataala marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa prawaktaa mahendrakumaara sresthale jaanakaari die

durghatanaamaa taamaanasahita motarasaaikala chaalaka wirtaamoda kaa warsiya dewabandhu upreti ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara warsiya raakesa thaakura ghaaite bhaekaa thie ghaaitemadhye upreti ra thaakurako birtaamodasthita biendasi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

daksinabaata uttara tarpha jaandai gareko me pa nambarako motarasaaikalakaae thakkarabaatapaidalayaatri sthaaniya barsiya kumaara bhanne dambara bahaadura taamaanakaaemarityu bhaeko chha motarasaaikalakaae thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaataamaanakaaeupachaarako kramamaa biendasi aspataala birtaamodamaamarityu bhaekopraharile janaaekaae chha

tyastaidurghatanaamaa parimotarasaaikala chaalaka birtaamoda kaa barsiya dewabandhu upreti ra pachhaadi rahekaa barsiya raakesa thaakura ghaaite bhaekaa chhan uniharukaae pani saaehiaspataalamaaupachaara bhaerahekaaejillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaumbaata sindhuli jaandai gareko baakha nambarako basale madhyapurathimi gaththaagharako akaasepulamuni aniyantrita bhaera sehi disaatarphakaa baakha baakha ra naakha nambarako basalaai thakkara dieko ho

thakkara dindaa tina watai basakaa yaatruharu saamaanya ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaitemadhye janaako naagarika aspataala ra tina janaalaai madhyapura aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
thakkara dine basakaa chaalaka sindhuli golaanachora gaaunpaalikaa kaa dipakaraaja thakurilaai thimi warittale niyantranamaa lieko chha

gharabaata bajetira niskiekaa sumana saanjhasamma ghara napharrkiepachhi khojdai jaandaa pariwaarale nai pokharimaa dubeko awasthaamaa phelaa paarera praharilaai khabara garekaa thie unako sawa pariksanakaa laagi mechi anchala aspataala bhadrapuramaa pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaekaae chha

bhojapurako temkemaiyuna gaaunpaalikaako annapurnabaata yaatru liera wiraatanagarakaa laagi chhuteko mekha numko basa bhojapura nagarapaalikaako wadaa num ra ko simaanaamaa parne champirekholaa najikai durghatanaa hundaa janaaghaaite bhaekaa hun jasamaa eka janaako awasthaa gambhira raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhojapurale janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa sumlagna traka ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii anusandhaana garirahekaae chha
sarlaahibaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko basa hijo bihaana dhaadinako benighaatamaa durghatanaa hundaa marityu huneko sumkhyaa pugeko chha

sarlaahibaata kaathamaadaum aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basasukrabaara bihaana bajedhaadinako salaanaghaatabaata trisuli nadimaa khaseko thiyo basamaa sawaara janaa ahilesamma haraairahekaa chhan bhane janaako jiwitai uddhaara garieko chha basamaa janaa sabaara thie

durghatanaamaa parekaa madhye janaako uddaara gari kaathamaadaum lyaaera upachaara bhairaheko chha kurinataarasthita sasastra prahariko gotaakhora toli sameta parichaalana garera basamaa sawaara anyako khoji kaarya bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa wirtaa bajaaramaa sukrabaara saanjhasutali bama wisphota hundaa eka mahilaasahita duijanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
parsaakaa prahari upariksaka somendra simha raathaurale bhane praarambhika anusandhaanakaa kramamaa bama nabhai maaltaa baaruda bhanne pataakaa padkieko bataaunubhayaae

bhumikaasthaana nagarapaalikaako dhaaraapaanimaa saaehi thaanukaa warsiya sisira bhaatako ghara najikaiko dhiskomaa sukeko baansako kilaamaa adesa laagera ubhindaaukta kilaa jaraibaata bhaanchiera mitara tala baato chheuko pakki naalimaa khasdaaghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
sawalaai posta maartamako laagi arghaakhaanchi aspataala sandhikharkamaa pathaaieko chha

butawalabaata tamghaasa aundai gareko lu cha namwarako jipa gulmidarawaara gaaunpaalikaa wadaa namwara gaudaakotamaa durghatanaa hundaaarghaakhaanchi jillaa prahari kaaryalayamaa kaaryarata prahari jawaana karisna paande arghaakhaanchikai hari prasaada paande gulmikaa ghaagithumako dipaka wika serabahaadura bika ra bajindra sunaara ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

gharamaa sutiraheko belaawisaalu sarpale daseramarityu bhaekaae praharile janaaekaae chha bhaugolika wikatataa baatoko samasyaa sanchaara ra swaasthya sewaako pahuncha nahundaa dui janaa baalikaakomarityu bhaekaae praharile janaaekaae chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale dieko jaanakaarianusaara nawalapurako gaindaakota ghara bhai maaitamaa aeki warsiyaa indrakalaa bhusaalako inaaramaa khasera marityu bhaeko ho
inaarako dhakanimaa chadhi kapadaa sukaaune dori milaauna khojdaa dhakani bhaanchina gai bhusaala inaaramaa khaseki thiin inaaramaa khaseki bhusaalako sawa bharatapura aspataala lyaaieko chha

sarlaahiko malumgawaabaata kaathamaadaumtarpha aundai gareko basa dhaadinako salyaanaghaatabaata trisuli nadimaa khasdaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha janaako jiwitaiuddhaara garieko chha bhane darjanabhandaa badhi yaatru nadimaa haraairaheko asumkaa garieko chha

naa kha nambarako raatribasa sukrabaara bihaana h baje trisuli nadimaa khaseko praharile janaaeko chha gaadimaa kati yaatru thie bhanne khuleko chhaina tara kehi bepattaa bhaeko dhaadina prahari pramukha esapi raajakumaara baidaawaarale bataae prahari ra sthaaniya uddaara kaaryamaa juteko bataaieko chha

durghatanaamaa anya janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaitemadhye kehiko awasthaa gambhira raheko bataaieko chha uniharulaai uddhaara gari dhaadinako gajuri aspataalamaa samaanya upachaara paschaata thapa upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaum laijaane tayaari bhaeko dhaadinakaa praharile janaaeko chha yadyapi basamaa thyaakkai yati nai yaatru thie bhanne nakhulekaale haraauneko sumkhyaa yakina huna nasakekopraharile janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaunbaata pokharaa jaandai gareko waakha numko maaikrole aja bihaana ichchhaakaamanaa gaaunpaalikaa chumlintaaramaalamajunko bhujun gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya ayusa gurunalaai thakkara diekojillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaeko chha

maaikroko thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa baalakako upachaarakaa kramamaa bharatapurasthita puraano medikala kalejamaa diunso marityu bhaekaae chha praharile maaikro ra tyasakaa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

jillaako hariwana nagarapaalikaasthita purwapaschima raajamaarga khandamaapurwabaata paschimatarpha airaheko naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala wiparita disaabaata gairaheko naa kha nambarako trakamaa chhirdaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sarlaahiko barahathawaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya wikramadaasa kathawaniyaako marityu bhaeko haae
trakakaae thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa wikramako sthaaniya namunaa aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaekojillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya nawalapurale janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa motarasaaikala pachhaadi sawaara barahathawaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya manojakumaara daasa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unalaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi bharatapuratarpha lagieko chha
traaphika praharikaa anusaara atyanta tiwra gatimaa raheko motarasaaikala hariwana nagarapaalikaa chaapini pula chheu wiparita disaabaata aphnai saaidamaa airaheko trakamaa chhirna pugeko thiyo

banepaa nagarapaalikaa wadaa num tukuchaako sthaaniya rimaala sresthako saandhe tina warsako chhoraa ridesa srestha bihaana baje tira gharako paani taanne mesinako taara samaaundai khelne kramamaa karenta laagi marityu bhaeko haae

karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa baalakalaai upachaarako laagi banepaa lyaaudai gardaa baatomai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrele janaaeko chha haala maritaka baalakako laasa postarmaatamako laagi aspataalamaa raakhieko praharile janaaeko chha
sunasari myaagdi ra kanchanapuramaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

sunasari inaruwaa nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa yupi je nambarako trakale ko pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai budhabaara diunso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka inaruwaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya raama sarmaako upachaarako laagi jillaa aspataala inaruwaatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara inaruwaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya madana mehattaalaai upachaarako laagi goldena aspataala biraatanagaratarpha lagieko chha
traka ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

myaagdi beni nagarapaalikaa halle gaidaasthita sadakamaa benibaata bhakimlitarpha jaandai gareko ga ja nambarako jipa sadakabaata andaji mitara tala khasera budhabaara diunso durghatanaa hundaa jipamaa sawaara beni nagarapaalikaa musuna basne warsiya ratna bahaadura khatriko beni aspataala myaagdimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
dallaba chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

damaka nagarapaalikaa saranaarthi siwiramaa budhawaara saanjha saandhe baje saranaarthi siwirako khaadyaanna godaama chheuko polamaa paathibharaa netawarkina praa lile netawarkako taara taangne kramamaa achaanaka karenta laagdaa netawarkina praa li kaa karmachaari barsiya prakaasa kaarkikomarityu bhaeko ho
karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unakoupachaarako kramamaadamakako amdaa aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakale janaaeko chha
parithwi raajamaargaantargata dhaadinako dhunibensi nagarapaalikaa khayaraghaarimaa budhabaara raatitrakako thakkarabaata eka bhaaratiya naagarikako marityu bhaeko chha
kaathamaadaumbaata chitawanatarpha gairaheko lu kha nambarako trakakaae thakkarabaatabhaarata paschima champaaranakaa andaaji warsiya satyanaaraayana daasako marityu bhaeko ho
trakakaae thakkarabaata gambhiraghaaite bhaekaadaasako upachaarakaa kramamaa bihibaara bihaananesanala aspataala kalumkimaa marityu bhaekojillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinale janaaekaae chha

durghatanaamaa gambhira bhaekaa madana mehataakaae goldena aspataala biraatanagara upachaara bhairahekaae praharile janaaekaae chha traka ra chaalaka jillaa prahari kaaryalayale sunasariko niyantranamaa rahekaae ukta kaaryalayale jaanakari diekaae chha

purwabaata paschimatarpha aundai gareko naapa numko motarasaaikala ra wiparita disaabaata jaandai gareko naapa numko motarasaaikala ekaapasamaa thakkara khaandaa ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya sanjaya kandelakomarityu bhaeko haae

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha prahari waristha upariksaka wasantakumaara panta thulo sadaka bhautika purwaadhaarako kami ra tiwra gatikaa kaarana upatyakaamaa sawaari durghatanaa badheko bataaunuhunchha chaalakalaai traaphika jnaana nahundaa upatyakaamaa durghatanaa badheko ho uhaan bhannuhunchha

traaphika praharile upatyakaako badhi durghatanaa hune sthaanako pahichaana gari taaima kaardasameta laagu gareko chha sadaka suraksaa ra durghatanaalaai kama garna widyaalayako paathyakramamaa sadaka suraksaasambandhi jaanakaarimulaka saamagri raakhera adhyayana garnuparchha prawaktaa paudela bhannuhunchha

tiwra gatimaa janakapuratarpha jaandai gareko naa ja nambarako yaatrubaahaka wimgarale hijo saanjha janakapura dhalkewara sadakakhandako ksireswaranaatha nagarapaalikaa haraiyaasthita dhalkewaratarpha jaandai gareko ja ha nambarako ato riksaalaai thakkara dindaadurghatanaa bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

mumgalabaara bihaana baigumluruko kastaaunasthita chaara tale apaartamentako pahilo tallaa bhaasindaa bajhaana thalaraa gaaunpaalikaa bagadaakaa warsiya naaraayana khadakaa unaki srimati warsiya nirmalaa khadakaa ra chhori chaara warsiya anuskaa khadakaako marityu bhaeko ho

nirmala sohi bhawanako apaartamentamaa wigata warsadekhi suraksaagaardako kaama gardai aekaa thierojagaarikai silasilaamaa bhaarata pugekaa khadkaa pariwaara ukta bhawanako bhuim tallaamaa tentale baarera basdai aekaa thie

maritakalaai uchita ksatipurti ra arpaatamentakaa bildaralaai kaanuni kaarawaahikaa laagi sthaaniya pulkesi thaanaamaa ephaaiara dartaa gariekoakhila bhaarata nepaali ekataa manchakaa mahaasachiwa sitala malaatile jaanakaari die

baaraako mahaagadhimaai nagarapaalikaamaanaa pa nambarako motarasaaikala durghatanaa hundaa baaraako kalaiyaa upamaahaanagarapaalikaa kaa dharmendra yaadawako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaako wibhinna bhaagamaa bhaekaa durghatanaamaa pari uniharuko jyaana gaeko ho aghillo arthika warsa durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko thiyo tanahun jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalayale dieko jaanakaari anusaara sawaari durghatanaako sankhyaamaa yasawarsa kehi kami ae pani santosajanaka bhane chhaina aghillo warsabhandaa gatawarsa durghatanaamaa marityu huneko sankhyaa chaarale kami chha

aghillo arthika warsamaa durghatanaamaa ko marityu bhaeko thiyo jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale dieko jaanakaarianusaara aghillo warsabhandaa gata warsa durghatanaa badhera badhi maanisako marityu bhaeko chha
