mahottarikaae gausaalaa nagarapaalikaa gaurighaata basne warsiyaa sanju dewi raautako bihibaara bihaana karenta laagera marityu bhaeko chha

purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata paschimawaata purwatarpha gairaheko sepa nambarako motarasaaikalale budhabaara raatighodaaghodi mandira najika chhaadaa pasuchaupaayaalaai thakkara dindaa durghatanaa bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

awibhaawakale kehi samaya pachhi jhaarajhuka garaauna lagekaaemaa turunta aspataala laijaana sallaaha paschaata baalakalaai purwi paritanaa hedakwaatara sthita sarpadumsa upachaara kendra lagiekaaemaa dhilo bhaekaae kaarana aspataalamaa baalakakaaemarityu bhaekaae praharile janaaekaae chha
purwa paschima raajamaarga antargata moranako patharisanischarya nagarapaalikaawadaa nambara ra ko simaanaamaabasa ra bhyaana thokkidaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

paschimabaata purwa jaandai gareko ko kha nambarako basa ra wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko me cha nambarako myaajika bhyaana eka apasamaa thakkara khaandaa parichaya khulna baaki ekapurusako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

durghatanaamaaghaaite madhye ko awasthaa gambhira chha ghaaitelaai upachaarakaa laagi wiraatanagarako nyuro aspataalasahita wibhinna aspataala lyaaieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya patharile janaaekaae chha

saptari hanumaananagara kumkaalini nagarapaalikaa bhaaradahamaa haala nambara nakhuleko sawaari saadhanale sohi thaaun basne paidalayaatri warsiya sumkara raamako budhabaara bihaana ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
thakkara dii pharaara trakako khoji garne kramamaa sumkaaspada wataa trakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baaraa kalaiyaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa chhotki phulabariyaa basne warsiya raajesa yaadawale naa ta nambarako aphnai tyaaktarale aphnai kheta jotne kramamaa paltina gai tyaaktarale thichiera budhabaara bihaana marityu bhaeko chha

mumgalabaara saanjha parekaae awirala warsaakaa kaaranatemaala gaaunpaalikaa wadaa na sthita metawaala ra kaaldhaarakaae bichamaa khasekaae pahiro panchhaaune kramamaabaa ka nambarako jesibi purieko ho

saptari hanumaananagara kankaalani nagarapaalikaa bhaaradahasthita sadakamaa haala nambara nakhuleko sawaari saadhanako thakkarabaata paidalayaatri sohi sthaana basne warsiya sumkara raamako budhabaara bihaana ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

mahottari bardibaasa nagarapaalikaa smaritipaarka sthita sadakamaa pradesa nambara pa nambarako skutara mumgalabaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka sohi nagarapaalikaa gauribaasa basne warsiya sarwana kumaara thaapaako subha swaastika aspataala bardibaasamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
moranako sundaraharaichaa nagarapaalikaa janataa garila udyogakaa kaamadaara bhojapura deuraalikaa barsiya prakaasa kaarkiko karenta laagera marityu bhaeko chha

mumgalawaara aparaanha garila udyoga najikai raheko laksmi saraswati khaajaa gharako hodinborda marmata garne kramamaa karenta laagera ghaaite bhaekaa kaarkiko upachaarakaae kramamaa marityu bhaekojillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaeko chha
yasaigari sunasariko inaruwaa nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya ajaya mehetaako pani karenta laagera marityu bhaeko chha

mumgalawaara saanjha saandhe baje aphnai gharamaa bijuliko swicha thichne kramamaa karenta laagera ghaaite bhaekaa mehetaako upachaarako kramamaa jillaa aspataala inaruwaamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha

jillaako amachoka gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara yunmaa bhanne thaaunmaa magalabaara saanjha paudi khelne kramamaapokharimaa duberaamachoka waasingatharpukaa warsiya nimaa serpaa ra warsiya gelbu serpaakomarityu bhaeko haae
maritaka duwaiko sawa posta maartamakaa laagi jillaa aspataala bhojapura lagieko praharile janaaeko chha
kaathamaadaum rupandehi ra dhanusaamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa sthita nayaanbasapaarkabhitra somabaara diunso naa kha nambarako basako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa haala naama thara watana nakhuleko kariba warsiya paidalayaatriko nepaala aspataala saamaakhusimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

rupandehi sainaamainaa nagarapaalikaa barmaatolasthita sadakamaa baa kha nambarako phorsa gaadi aniyantrita bhai sadakamaa paltiera somabaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa arghaakhaanchi ghara bhaekaa warsiya raama bahaadura raayamaajhiko lumbini praadesika aspataala butawalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa anya janaa upachaarapachhi dischaarja bhaekaa chhan gaadi chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara badrenimaa jumgali haattile akramana gardaa sthaaniya barsiya kaanchho daraaiko marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha

gharabaata kaamako laagi sauraahaa jaane kramamaa bihaana kariba baje baaghamaaraa saamudaayika wanako chaura najika daraailaai haattile akramana gareko thiyo unako sawa sadakabaata mitarabhitra jumgalamaa phelaa pareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya taandile jaanakaari dieko chha
jillaakaae paaluntaara nagarapaalikaa baddaandaa simalakharkakaa lilaalaraaja dewakotaakaae khasi baakhraa baadhekaae dhansaara purindaa wataa khasibaakhraa marekaa hun
ghatanaamaa ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya thaantipokharikaa prahari ra sthaaniyabaasile uddaara garirahekaa chhan prahari tolile bhaimsi ra paadaalaai bhane jiwitai uddaara gareko chha

ghatanaapachhi pramukha jillaa adhikaarisahita tolile murkuchi bajaarako awasthaa awalokana gareko chha pahirole kholaa thunidaa baandha chaara thaaun bhatkaaekaale thapa ksati huna nadina sthaaniyalaai sameta parichaalana gari nepaali senaa sasastra ra nepaala prahari baandha nirmaanamaa parichaalana garieko prajia khadkaale bataae

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale dieko jaanakaarianusaara ujelinagarasthita siwaprasaada paudelako gharamaa kaama garne maanisaharule khaanaa pakaaune gyaasa chuhiera agalaagi hundaa bhaaratako wetiyaa ghara bhaekaa paancha janaa ghaaite bhaekaa hun

jhaapaa kankaai nagarapaalikaa paschima basa stesanasthita sadakamaa aitabaara diunso ko pa nambarako motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa paidalayaatri sohi nagarapaalikaa kotihoma basne warsiya indra prasaada nyaupaaneko biendasi aspataala birtaamodamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikala chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhanusaa ganaesamaana chaaranaatha nagarapaalikaa raadhaapurasthita sadakamaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala gata budhabaara raati aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sohi sthaana basne warsiya bodha bahaadura hamaalako nobela aspataala biraatanagaramaa upachaarako kramamaa aitabaara diunso marityu bhaeko chha
jillaakaae ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa maa rahekaae kulaaemaa dubera harkajita khatrikaa dedha warsiya chhoraa sisira khatrikomarityu bhaekaae haae
ghara najikai khelne kramamaa kulomaa dubera gambhira bhaekaasisiralaai upachaarakaa laagi aspataala laijaandai gardaa baatomaimarityu bhaekaaejillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanale janaaeko chha
taaltisthita kholaalaai niyantrana gari nirmaana thaalieko simenta udyoga tina dinadekhiko warsaakaa kaarana kholaamaa aeko baadhile bagaaeko suchanaa adhikaari tulasijanga thaapaale jaanakaari die

kholaamaa phasekaa majadurako uddhaarakaa laagi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajuribaata gaeko toli so sthaanamaa pugna sakeko chhaina taalti jaane baato malekhu najikai sohi kholaale bagaaepachhi uddhaarakarmi rokieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
somabaara bihaana bajesammako tathyaamkaanusaara janaako marityu bhaeko nepaala praharile jaanakaari dieko ho marityu huneharumaa purusa ra mahilaa chhan

baadhipahirokaa ghatanaamaa pari pradesa maa pradesa maa pradesa maa ra karnaali pradesamaa janaako jyaana gaeko chha baadhipahiro prabhaawita ksetramaa uddhaarako laagi nepaali senaa ra nepaala praharikaa hajaarabhandaa badhi jawaana khatiekaa chhan
aitabaara raati pahirole bagaaetaapanipraharile dhilo khabara paaekole bharkharai prahari parichaalita bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale janaaeko chha
baadhibaata jogina chhatamaa basekaa baalabaalikaalaai bhane jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptari ra sasastra prahari bala sametako tolile sakusala uddaara gareko chha
triyugaa nadiko baadhi bastimaa pasdaa banigaamaakaa kariba pariwaara wisthaapita bhaeko nagarapaalikaakaa pramukha uttamakumaara gautamale bataae
hetaundaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa raatomaatesthita khahare kholaale bagaaekaa eka janaa wariddhalaai praharile jibitaiuddhaara gareko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pasupatinagara makawaanapurabaata prahari niriksaka arunakumaara kusawaahaako netaritwamaa khatieko tolile naama thara nakhuleko andaaji warsakaa wariddhalaai praharile kholaale bagaaundai gareko awasthaabaata uddhaara gareko ho
wariddhakaae churehila aspataalamaa saamaanya upachaarapachhi bharatapura padhaaiekoe jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale janaaeko chha

so apaartamentamaa bhaeko agalaagimaa parera aru kehi ghaaite bhaeko ra ti nepaali hun yaa hoinana bhanne pahichaana huna nasakeko dutaawaasako bhanaai udarita gardai pararaastramantraalayakaa sahaayaka prawaktaa suresa adhikaarile jaanakaari die

kholaale bagaaera bepattaa bhaekaa wyaktiko khoji kaarya bhairaheko chha bepattaa bhaekaa byaktiko pahichaana nabhaekojillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale jaanakaari diekaae chha

lagaataarako warsaakaa kaarana singiyaa ra bakraahaa kholaa asapaasako sukumbaasi bastikaa saya bhandaa badhi maanisa wisthaapita bhaekaa chhan uniharulaai suraksita thaaunmaa saarne kaama bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaeko chha
paschima nawalaparaasiko sunawala nagarapaalikaa bhumahimaa rokiraakheko trakamaa kaara thokkindaa ekajanaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane arkaa ekajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

gae raati purwabaata paschimatarpha jaandai gareko baa cha nambarako kaara lu kha nambarako rokiraakheko trakamaa thakkara khaandaa kaaramaa sawaara rupandehi tilottamaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya gorkana paudelako marityu bhaeko ho

yasaigari sohi kaaramaa sawaara butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya suresa pokharela ghaaite raheko ra unako pani butawalamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
chaalakasahita traka kaara ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunawalale niyantranamaa lieko chha

balawaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya hanipha baithaalaai raato kholaale bagaaeko haae ghaansa kaatna wanamaa gaeko baithaale kholaa tarna khojdaa baadhile bagaaera lageko praharile janaaeko chha

baadhile maanisa bagaaeko suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha prahari naayaba upariksaka budhaathokiko netaritwamaa khatigaeko prahari toli ra sasastra prahari besa kyaampa banautaabaata khatieko sasastra praharile khojatalaasa garirahekaa chhan

banepaa nagarapaalikaa naalaamaa sukrabaara wihaana baje pahirole ghara bhatkandaa warsiyaa gomaa dumgaala ra warsaki soniko marityu bhaeko haae
aja bihaana baje mobaailachaarja garne kramamaa karenta laagdaa unako marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gaurigumjale janaaeko chha

dhaadinabemsitarpha jaandai gareko baacha numko bolero jipale thakkara dindaa baapa numko motarasaaikala chaalaka warsiya dharmaraaja silawaala ra adhyaksa silawaala ghaaite hunubhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka rupaka khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

ghaaite adhyaksa silawaalalaai jillaa aspataalamaa saamaanya upachaarapachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagikaathamaadaum tramaa aspataalamaa pathaaieko chha durghatanaapachhi thakkara dine gaadi ra chaalakalaai praharile hiraasatamaa lieko chha raasasa

paarkinasahitako bhuintalaamaa khadkaa pariwaarako basobaasa thiyo bhaasieko bhawanabaata ghantaapachhi sawa nikaalieko maritakakaa pariwaarale bataaekaa chhan tinai janaako sawa baorina aspataalamaa postamaartama garieko chha
purwa paschima raajamaargaantargata raapti nagarapaalikaa hardi chokamaa gae raati trakako thakkarabaata ekajanaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane arkaa eka ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
purwatarpha gairaheko naa kha nambarako trakale baato kaatne kramamaa gae raati thakkara dindaa rautahatako chandranigaahaapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya dukha maajhiko marityu bhaeko haae
trakako thakkarabaatagambhira ghaaite bhaekaa maajhiko upachaarako kramamaa raati nai bharatapura aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

sohi skulamaa kaaryaalaya sahayogiko rupamaa kaama garne chaudharile raati baje naalimaa jameko paanimaa karenta lagaai maachhaa maarne kramamaa aphailaai karenta laagdaa marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya itaharile janaaeko chha

taaimsa pha imdiyaakaa anusaara uttarapradesako phulabehada thaanaakaa praharile suchanaa paae lagattai ghatanaa sthalamaa pugera sthaaniyako sahayogamaa nepaali ra eka bhaaratiyalaai jiwitai uddhaara gareko thiyo

uddhaaramaa khatiekaa eka prahari adhikaarikaa anusaara nahara aunu bhandaa agaadi eutaa modamaa chaalakale kuraa gardai basa laai tibra gatimaa laijaana khojdaa basa niyantrana bhandaa baahira gaeko thiyo tyasapachhi basa naharako relimgamaa thokkiera khaseko thiyo uddhaara gariekaa sabai nepaalilaai upachaarapachhi daana pathaaieko chha
nirmaana ksetramaa kaaryarata dhaadina nilakantha nagarapaalikaa taarukharkakaa janaka nepaaliko marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaakaae helambu gaaunpaalikaa chanautemaa baa kha numko basa pachhaadi hataaune kramamaa basamaa thokkiera maanasika santulana gumaaeki andaaji warsiyaa mahilaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha unako parichaya khulna khu sakeko chhaina
purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata nawalaparaasiko madhyawindu nagarapaalikaa maa rokiraakheko trakamaa motarasaaikala thokkindaa ekako marityu bhaeko chha

sasastra prahari bala rupandehi baahini num darabandi bhai biopi bogadi rupandehimaa kaaryarata sahaayaka prahari jawaana magarako upachaarako kramamaa puraano medikala kaleja bharatapuramaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dotikaa anusaara aitabaara saanjha unalaai sarpale daseko thiyo jillaa aspataala dotimaa upachaara garne kramamaa unako marityu bhaeko ho
tyasaaghi sikhara nagarapaalikaa kaalaagaadhaki warsiyaa jamunaadewi kaarkiko pani sarpakai tokaaibaata marityu bhaeko thiyo
tyastai keaisimha gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya jhakendrabahaadura bogatiko marityu pani sarpakai tokaaibaatai bhayo aphnai gharamaa kitaaba padhirahekaa belaa unalaai sarpale daseko thiyo

jillaakaae gulariyaa nagarapaalikaa maa gharadekhi kehi para raheko naalaamaa paudi khelne kramamaa dubera warsiya wikaasa banjaaraa ra warsiya anila banjaaraako mumgalabaara aparaanh marityu bhaeko haae
kaankadabhittaabaata solukhumbutarpha jaandai gareko me kha nambarako basaaja bihaana bajetira siddhicharana raajamaargaantargata maanebhanjyaana gaaunpaalikaa dadhuwaamaa durghatanaa bhaeko ho

durghatanaamaa basachaalaka jhapaakaa warsiya karisnabahaadura basneta dudhakunda nagarapaalikaa solukaa warsiyaa maayaa thaapaa ra sindhuli kamalaamaai nagarapaalikaaki andaaji warsiya laalabahaadura dhaami raheko praharile janaaeko chha

gaurigumgaa nagarapaalikaa raajipurasthita sadakamaa baa kha haaisa gaadiko thakkarabaata paidalayaatri sohi nagarapaalikaa daandaasiwira basne andaaji warsiyaa gauri nepaaliko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko haae thakkara dine gaadi ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

jillaakaae manahari gaaunpaalikaamaa rupaachurikaa barsiya sanchalaala chepaanakosomabaara saanjhamobaaila chaarja garna laagekaa belaa karenta laageraghatanaasthalamaimarityu bhaekojillaa prahari kaaryaalaya makawaanapurale janaaeko chha
kaathamaadaum sarlaahi kaabhre mahottari ra baaraamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

sarlaahi baagmati nagarapaalikaa bathaanesthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako tiparako thakkarabaata sohi sthaana basne khyaalasana thinako warsiya chhoraa ayusa thinako aitabaara saanjha ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
tipara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sarlaahi dhanakaula gaaunpaalikaa malaghattaasthita bhitri sadakamaa naa ta nambara tyaaktara aniyantrita bhai aitabaara raati durghatanaa hundaa tyaaktarako telarale chyaapiera chaalaka godaitaa nagarapaalikaa rauwaa basne warsiya phekana raautako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

kaabhre paanchakhaala nagarapaalikaa dulaala chokasthita sadakamaa baa kha nambarako tiparale pradesa pa nambarako skutaralaai aitabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa skutaramaa sawaara sindhupaalchoka chautaaraa saangaachoka gadhi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bisnau dumgaalalaai upachaarako laagi dhulikhelatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

sindhulibaata kaathamaadaum jaandai gareko naa ja nambarako uinara aniyantrita bhai wipi raajamaargaantargata golanjora gaaunpaalikaa khaniyaakharka najika durghatanaa hundaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa sindhuli praharile janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite kamalaamaai nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa sailinaa srestha ra unako warsiya chhoraa yuwanalaai jillaa aspataalamaa saamaanya upachaarapachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagi helikoptaramaarphat kaathamaadaum pathaaieko chha
yastai kanapaa raanikholaaki warsiyaa khilamaayaa gurunako awasthaa pani gambhira rahekaale thapa upachaarakaa kaathamaadaum pathaaieko chha
kapilawastu lalitapura kaabhre baaraa rupandehi ra bardiyaamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

kapilawastu buddhabhumi nagarapaalikaa gorusinesthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako trakale baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai bihibaara diunso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa budhaanilakantha basne warsiya pembaa serpaako praadesika aspataala butawalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa chaalakako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha traka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kapilawastu maayaadewi gaaunpaalikaa abhiraawasthita sadakamaa yupi waai nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai bihibaara belukaa durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka bhaarata siddhaarthanagara thaanaabaasi simrahawaa basne warsiya raaju lodhako jillaa aspataala taulihawaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

lalitapura lalitapura mahaanagarapaalikaa chaapaagaaun dobaatosthita sadakamaa baa kha nambarako basale bihibaara diunso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki paidalayaatri mahaalaksmi nagarapaalikaa sunaakothi basne sunasari baraaha ghara bhaeki warsiyaa elisaa maajhilaai upachaarako laagi biendabi aspataala laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kaabhre paanchakhaala nagarapaalikaa pachaasakilosthita sadakamaa baa kha nambarako tiparamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala thakkara khaai bihibaara belukaa durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka paanchakhaala nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya syaama prasaada daahaalako dhulikhela aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara mandana deupura basne warsiya dhurwa prasaada paraajuliko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha tipara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baaraa jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai sadakamaa paltiera bihibaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka makawaanapura hatiyaa basne warsiya bisaala moktaanako wiragumja medikala kalejamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

rupandehi sainaamainaa nagarapaalikaa raamaapurasthita sadakamaa haala nambara nakhuleko tiparale lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai bihibaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi thaaunsthita baasagadhi basne warsiya dinesa sunaarako lumbini praadesika aspataala butawalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

bardiyaa baarabardiyaa nagarapaalikaa pharadangaa kholaasthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako traka aniyantrita bhai sadakabaata kariba mitara tala khasera sukrabaara bihaana durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa trakamaa sawaara baanke kohalapura nagarapaalikaa jhandahawaa basne warsiya jiwaraaikala saahako medikala kaleja kohalapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
ghimiresangai paudi khelekaa chitawana bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa baseni basne warsiya siwahari suwedilaai bhane jiwitai uddhaara garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaekaae chha
morana rumgeli nagarapaalikaa dohamanaa bajaarachheumaa chatyaana laagera sohi sthaanakaa warsiya baalaka abhata risidewa ra warsiya anila risidewako marityu bhaeko chha
chatyaana laagera behos bhaekaa duwai baalakako upachaarako kramamaa rumgeli aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

jhaapaa baahradasi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya parsuraama paathaka oliko marityu bhaeko chha gharamaa basirahekaa duwai chatyaana laagera uni gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa thie upachaarakaa laagi biendasi aspataala lagiekomaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha ghaaite bhaekaa sohi thaaunkaa warsiya durgaaprasaada oliko upachaara bhairaheko chha

jhaapaa kachanakawala gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiyaa bhumaa gaaine ghara najikai baarimaa kaama gariraheko awasthaamaa chatyaana laagi ghaaite bhaeki chhan unako mechi anchala aspataala bhadrapuramaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

sunasari baraahaa nagarapaalikaa srilumkaa taapumaa chatyaana laagera warsiya baalaka abhiseka uraanwako ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko chha warsiyaa baalikaa puspaa uraanwa ghaaite bhaeki chhin
ghaaite dubai janaakaae jillaa aspataala sandhikharkamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha

bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa bhetaghaatachokamaa naapa numko motarasaaikala ra wiparita disaabaata airaheko gapa numko motarasaaikala ekaapasamaa thakkara khaandaa naapa nambarako motarasaaikala chaalaka bharatapura kaa warsiya raajana bhatta ra gapa numko motarasaaikala chaalaka bharatapura kai warsiya raamachandra gaudelakomarityu bhaeko haae
durghanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa uniharukaaeupachaarako kramamaa chitawana medikala kalejamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaekaae chha
kaabhreko panautimaa sumghiya prahari ikaai kaaryaalaya kaabhre baagamatiko gaadi durghatanaamaa parekaae chha
kaabhreko mandana deupura nagarapaalikaako khadgo bhanne sthaanamaa durghatanaa hundaaatha janaa prahari ghaaite bhaekaa chhanghaaitemadhye eka janaako awasthaa gambhira raheko chha
ghaaiteharuko dhulikhela aspataalamaa upachaara bhairahekopradesa kaa prahari pramukha serabahaadura basnetale jaanakaari die

prahari pramukha serabahaadura basnetale dieko jaanakaarianusaara budhabaara bihaana motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa marityu bhaekaa eka sthaaniya yuwaako wisayalaai liera wiwaada badhepachhi thapa maddatakaa laagi janaako toli kaabhrebaata gaeko thiyo
tyasaigari chatyaana laagera binaasakaa bhaai warsakaa awinaasa chaudhari gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unako raapti swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana ghoraahimaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

chatyaana laagera gaidahawaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya bhagawaanadaasa lodha kanchana gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya nandaraama aryaala ra sainaamainaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya chandra bahaadura wikakaaemarityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rupandehile janaaekaae chha
upachaarakaa kramamaa manaigraamasthita krimasana aspataalamaa ra anya duijanaako butawalasthita pradesa aspataalamaa marityu bhaekopraharile janaaekaae chha
marityu huneharumaa rautahata chandrapura nagarapaalikaa kaa nirmala saaha ra sunasari inaruwaa nagarapaalikaa kaa ramesakumaara chaudhari rahekaa chhan
jillaako purwi kaaligandaki gaaunpaalikaa arbeniki warsiyaa saraswati nyaupaaneko aphnai kharabaarimaa ghaansa kaatne kramamaa ladera marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gulmile janaaeko chha
nyaupaaneko sawalaai ruru swaasthya kendramaa postamaartama gari aja saanjha nai aphantako jimmaa lagaaieko chha

karisnanagara nagarapaalikaa lakhauraa ghara bhai mahaaraajagumja nagarapaalikaa jagnaahaa maaitighara aeki punama kurmiko warsiya chhoraa paritama kurmiko inaaramaa dubera somabaara saanjha marityu bhaeko haae

khelne kramamaa ghara agaadiko inaaramaa dubera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa paritamako uddaara gari upachaarako laagi siwaraaja aspataala bahaaduragumjatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho

thunuwaako myaada thapakaa laagi gaura jaandai gareko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya chandranigaahapurakonaa jha nambarakaaebhyaana chandranigaahapurasthita baalchanapura chokamaa durghatanaa hundaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa hun ghaaite hunemaa janaa kaidi ra janaa prahari rahekaa chhan

nawalapurako gaindaakota nagarapaalikaa wadaa num ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya agaadinaa kha numko trakale naa pa numko motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaamotarasaaikala chaalakanepaala widyaarthi sangha chitawana saawika ksetra num kaa purwasabhaapati warsiya tilachandra adhikaarikomarityu bhaeko ho

khotaanako halesi mahaadewako darsana gari kaathamaadaum pharkadai garekaaebaacha numko niji kaara sindhulikaae sunakosi gaaunpaalikaa sthita kamaare phaantamaa durghatanaa hundaa kaathamaadaum mahaanagarapaalikaa nayaan baareswarakaa ekai pariwaarakaa warsiyaa hemaa laamichhaane ra warsiya achyuta laamichhaaneko marityu bhaeko ho
durghatanamaa pari kaathamaadaum kai warsiyaa asthaa laamichhaane ghaaite bhaeki chhina unalaai upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaum pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhulile jaanakaari dieko chha

warsaata suru bhaesangai bheri nadiko bahaawa badhekaale kohi kasailaai pani bheri kinaaramaa najaana ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalayale khadaanga bajaaramaa maaikimga maarphata suchanaa diera sacheta garaairahekopraharile janaaekaae chha

kosi raajamaarga antargata moranako budhigumgaa gaaunpaalikaako gumgaachokamaa sirahaamaa dijela puryaaera wiraatanagara pharkumdai gareko naa kha nambarako tyaamkaraleko pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaamotarasaaikalamaa sawaaraitahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya sandipa paudelako marityu bhaeko haae
baanke parbata ra moranamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha

baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa paraspurasthita sadakamaa bhe ta nambarako tyaaktara aniyantrita bhai paltiera sanibaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya prabesa barmaako narsina homa nepaalagumjamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

parbata mahaasilaa gaaunpaalikaa lunkhudeuraalisthita deuraalibhirako kholsaamaa ga cha nambarako jipa sadakabaata kariba saya mitara tala khasera aitabaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa jipamaa sawaara salyaana kapurakota ghara bhaeki warsiyaa wisnau thaapaa ra mahaasilaa basne warsiya karisnagopaala gurunako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

morana katahari gaaunpaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako trakale aitabaara belukaa saaikalalaai thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa saaikalayaatri katahari gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya umesa daasako goldena aspataala biraatanagaramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

gauraadaha nagarapaalikaa maa sohi sthaana basne teja bahaadura boharaako barsiya chhoraa prasanna boharaakaae khelne kramamaa sohi thaaunmaa raheko itaabhattaako khaaldomaa jameko paanimaa dubera marityu bhaeko haae
paanimaa dubera gambhira banekaa baalakalaai upachaarako laagi laaipha laaina aspataala damaka laijaane kramamaa baatomaa nai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
jhaapaa chitawana morana dhanusaa nawalaparaasi paschima ra daanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaekaae chha

jhaapaa mechinagara nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa ko kha nambarako basale paidalayaatrilaai thakkara dindaa sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyako ghanasyaama gartaulaako ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

chitawana bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa riddhikholaasthita sadakamaa baa pa nambarako basa ra ga cha nambarako kaara ekaapasamaa thakkara khaai durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa syaanjaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya homa bahaadura thaapaako nayaan medikala kaleja bharatapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

morana belabaari nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa ko pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai ko pa nambarako motarasaaikalale thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa ko pa nambarako motarasaaikalamaa sawaara itahari upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne sumkhuwaasabhaa khaandabaari ghara bhaekaa warsiya bholaamaana taamaanako upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala chaalakako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhanusaa nagaraaina nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa ta nambarako tyaaktara aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa tyaaktaramaa sawaara sohi thaaun basne sitala mumdala khatweko barsiya chhoraa raama jiwana mandala khatwelaai upachaarakaa laagi sthaaniya medikalamaa laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

nawalaparaasi paschima raamagraama nagarapaalikaa bairihawaasthita sadakamaa lu pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa raamagraama nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya samira khaanako medikala kaleja bhairahawaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

daana lamahi nagarapaalikaa chyaaukholaasthita sadakamaa bhe cha nambarako jipa aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaa jipamaa sawaara baanke baijhanaatha gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya mahesa oliko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
jipa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sanibaara raati baje madiraa sewana gari badaalale gharamaa aera pariwaarasanga jhagadaa garekaa thiegharamaa aera jhagadaa garepachhi purai pariwaara ghara chhaadera jamgalatira bhaageko ra gharamaa kohi nabhaeko bhandai badaalale aphu sutne kothaamaa gaera ago salkaaekaae naugaada gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaa sadasya jayabhaanasimha thagunnaale bataae

aphanta lina wimaanasthala prawesa garne kramamaa kaathamaadaum taahaachalakaa warsiya ritesa sresthako baa cha nambarako kaalo rumgako maajdaa gaadimaa sanibaara aparaahna bajetira ekkaasi ago laageko thiyo
achaanaka ago laagdaa gaadiko agaadipattiko bhaaga jalekowimaanasthala prahari kaaryaalaya pramukha esaesapi sandipa bhandaarile jaanakaari diekaa chhan
ke kaaranale gaadimaa ago laagyo bhanne khulna sakeko chhaina puraano gaadi bhaekaa kaarana sarta bhaeko huna sakne praharile anumaana gareko chha

mahendranagarabaata kaathamaadaum jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basale lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaaipurwapaschima raajamaargaantargata sainaamainaa nagarapaalikaa kalonimaathakkara dindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara janaako marityu bhaeko ho

basako thakkarapachhi motarasaaikalamaa ago laageko ra jalera dui janaako jyaana gaeko praharile janaaekaae chha kaagajapatra jalera nasta bhaekaale maritakako sanaakhata huna nasakeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya saalajhandikaa pramukha inspektara rawinaraaja mainaalile jaanakaari die
dui janaakai sawa lumbini praadesika aspataala butawalamaa raakhieko chha ghatanaabaare anusandhaana garna saalajhandi praharile basa ra basakaa chaalakalaai niyantranamaa lieko chha

sindhuliko khurkotabaata manthalitarpha biraami lina jaandai gareko baa cha num ko nepaala redakrasa sosaaiti bhimeswara upasaakhaa sindhuliko embulensa manthali kunaurimaa durghatanaa hundaa embulensachaalaka golaanjora gaaunpaalikaa sindhulikaa warsiya nirabahaadura sresthako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho
paudi khelne kramamaa sanibaaranadimaa dubera paalunataara nagarapaalikaa masaanethaantiki saritaa gurunako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gorakhaale janaaeko chha

kaarkigaaunbaata tarakaari liera wairenitarpha aundai gareko baa cha nambarako jipa galchhi gaaunpaalikaa ko baajhagaaunmaa durghatanaa hundaa galchhi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara kaa warsiya raajuramtela warsiya sete mijaara wadaa nambara ki warsiyaa kaanchhibhujela ra warsiyaa naanu taamaanakaae marityu bhaeko haae praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

jipa sadakabaata mitara tala khasdaa uniharukaae ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha duurghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa janaalaai baireni swaathyachaukimaa upachaarapachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagikaathamaadaum tramaa sentaramaa pathaaieko chha

kusmaabaata pokharaatarpha jaandai gareko naa kha num ko yaatruwaahaka basa rapokharaabaata baagalunatarpha aundai garekaae ga pa num ko motarasaaikalamodi gaaunpaalikaa paatichauramaa ekaapasamaa thokkindaamodi gaaunpaalikaa tilaahaarakaa warsiya karisnabahaadura thaapaako marityu bhaeko haae
durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa thaapaalaai upachaarakaa laagi manaipaala siksana aspataala pokharaa laijaane kramamaa baatomaa nai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
praharile basa ra basakaa chaalaka gorakhaakaa gowinda chepaanalaai niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana gariraheko chha
baa kha nambarako basa gokarnasthita ramajhamachoka bhanne thaaunmaa durghatanaa hundaasahachaalakako marityu bhaekopraharile janaaeko chha

nawalaparaasipaschima bardaghaata nagarapaalikaa sisaniyaasthita sadakamaa biara tie nambarako atoriksaa aniyantrita bhai sadaka chheumaa budhabaara bihaana paltindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa riksaamaa sawaara bhaarata bihaara paschima champaarana basne warsiya pramoda saahako sahida smariti saamudaayika aspataala chaupattaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa arkaa janaako lumbini praadesika aspataalamaa upachaarako bhairaheko chha atoriksaa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sunasari inaruwaa nagarapaalikaa halesi chokasthita sadakamaa naa ta nambarako tyaaktaramaa ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala thokkiera durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka raamadhuni nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya suresa chaudhariko goldena aspataala biraatanagaramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baitadiko purchaudi nagarapaalikaa kaa wadaadhyaksa gautamaprasaada bhattako bihibaarabihaana marityu bhaeko chha purchaudi nagarapaalikaakaa prawaktaa sameta rahekaa bhattako motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa pari marityu bhaeko ho

bhaugolika hisaabale wikata raastriya sadaka sanjaalasanga najodieko humlaamaa mangalabaara aparaahna durghatanaa bhaeko jipa khojikaaryakaa laagi kurinataarabaata gotaakhorasahita sasastra prahari bala niriksaka laksmana basnetako netaritwamaa janaako toli humlaa puge pani bhettaauna sakieko chhaina

durghatanaamaa parnubhaekaa upaadhyaksa saahiko jholaamaa ru hajaara naagarikataa anya kaagajaata phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya srotale jaanakaari dieko chha jipa ra sawaarayaatruko kunai pattaa nalaagepachhi jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya humlaa saamaajika wikaasamantri dala raawala karnaali pradesakaa pramukha pratipaksa dalakaa netaa jiwanabahaadura saahiko pahalamaa kurinataarabaata gotaakhora humlaako khaarpunaatha gaaunpaalikaa sthita durghatanaasthalamaa pugeko ho

kunitaarabaata durghatanaasthalamaa pugnubhaekaa sasastra prahari bala niriksaka basnetakaa anusaara karnaali nadimaa paaniko bahaawa badhekaale khojikaarya bhae pani bhettaauna muskila raheko jaanakaari dinubhayo mangalabaara durghatanaa bhaeko jipamaa pahichaana nabhaekaa eka arko wyakti raheko khaarpunaatha gaaunpaalikaa adhyaksa karna raawalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
dhanusaako janakapuradhaamako eka hotalamaa wataa silindara wisphota hundaa wataa hotela jalera purna rupamaa nasta bhaekaa chhan

janakapuradhaama upamahaanagarapaalikaa kadama chokamaaraheko gowinda mistaanna bhandaaramaa bihibaara bihaana kariba bajetira silindara wisphota bhaera agalaagi hundaa misthaana bhandaara ra anya wataa hotala gari wataa hotela jalera purnarupamaa nasta bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

sindhupaalchoka balephisthita balephi bajaaramaa khaadichaurabaata balephitarpha jaandaigareko baa kha nambarako basale baa pa nambarako skutaralaai thakkara dindaa skutara chaalaka balephi bajaaramaa suna pasala gari basne baahrabise ghumthaanakaa warsiya wijaya pradhaanako ghatanaasthaalamai marityu bhaeko ho

dhanusaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa mujeliyaasthita sadakamaa haala nambara nakhuleko motarasaaikalale mumgalabaara belukaa thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa paidalayaatri sohi thaaun basne warsiya syaama sundara thaakuralaai janakapura amchala aspataala hundai thapa upachaarako laagi biraatanagaratarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

katahariyaa nagarapaalikaa wirtitola wasne warsiya maujelaala raaya yaadawako karenta laagera mumgalabaara saanjha marityu bhaeko haae khetamaa motarabaata paani lagaaune kramamaa karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa yaadawako saamudaayika haspitala katahariyaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

kumyaaka gaaunpaalikaa subbaatola sthita gairi bhanne sthaanamaa subbaatolabaata sallaako goliyaa kaatha bokera chauthi bajaara tarpha aundai gareko lu ta nambarako tyaaktara ukaalo baatomaa anphai aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hudaa phaaleluna gaaunpaalikaa praanabuna wasne warsa ko rosana thaamsuhaanakaaemarityu bhaeko haae

purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaasthita malhaniyaanchokamaa rokiraakheko nepaali senaako ganako baaga nambarako trakamaa sapa nambarako motarasaaikala pachhaadibaata thokkindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaa niwaasi saagarakumaara jayasawaalako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho
malhaniyaanchokamaa bigriera rokiraakheko nepaali senaako trakamaa motarasaaikala thokkindaa jayasawaalako marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mirchaiyaale janaaeko chha
siwasataaksi nagarapaalikaa domukhaamaa raheko kankaai sinchaai ayojanaa naharako dyaamamaa dubera kamala gaaunpaalikaa ki barsiyaa dipaamaayaa gautako marityu bhaeko haae

praharile awasyaka kaanuni prakariyaa puraa gari sawalaai postamaartamako laagi mechi amchala aspataala bhadrapura pathaaeko chha bhane ghatanaa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko janaaeko chha

urlaawaari nagarapaalikaa madhumallaa basastendamaaaja bihaana me pa nambarako motarasaaikalale thakkara didaa paidala yaatri dhanakutaako daandaagaanu basne barsiya laala bahaadura khadkaakaae marityu bhaeko haae
thakkara dine motarasaaikala ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya urlaawaariko niyantranamaa raheko chha bhane chaalaka tatkaala pharaara rahekole khojatalaasa bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

surkheta birendranagara nagarapaalikaa tempo paarkasthita naa kha nambarako basale somabaara saanjha thakkara dimdaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sohi thaaun basne tirtha bahaadura saahiko warsiya chhoraa amkita saahiko marityu bhaeko chha

baaraa karaimaai gaaunpaalikaa karaiyaa tolasthita sadakamaa naa ta nambarako tyaaktarale thakkara dimdaa sohi thaaun basne mahesa chaudhariko warsiya chhoraa manisa chaudhariko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

bandelale akramana gardaa wisnau gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya sankara maajhi warsiya raama ekawaala raaya warsiya kisuna mandala warsiya nawina yaadawa warsiya dulaara raaya yaadawa warsiya raamadulaara raaya ra warsiya chulaai raaya ghaaite bhaeko praharile jaanaaekaae chha

bandelako akramanamaa pari raama ekawaala gambhira bhaekaa chhan unakaae sarlaahi jillaa aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha anya janaako awasthaamaa saamaanya raheko ra sthaaniya swaasthya sumsthaamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

daksinapaschima ksetrasthita basabariyaa gaaunpaalikaa maanapura byaareja najika bhitri sadakamaa ja ta nambarako tyaaktara aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaasohi thaaunkaatyaaktarakaa chaalaka upendra mahatokaa warsiya chhoraa asika mahatoko marityu bhaeko ho
morana sundaraharaimchaa salakapurasthita raajamaargamaa ko kha nambarako basale me pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai aitabaara belukaa thakkara dindaa marityu bhaeko chha
basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii anusandhaana gariraheko chha

parsaa biragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa brahama chokasthita sadakamaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalale aitabaara belukaa thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala chaalaka baaraakaa warsiya dilipa saahako marityu bhaeko haae
dubai motarasaaikala ra naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
temaala gaaunpaalikaa yaanadelamaa baa kha numko nisaana gaadibaata khasera saaehi gaaunpaalikaa sasryukharkakaa warsiya sunila laamaako marityu bhaeko haae

baagluna nisikholaa gaaunpaalikaa gaaunlepaanisthita madhya pahaadi lokamaargamaa rokieko naa ka nambarako gredara sanibaara diunso ekkaasi gudera chaalaka sarlaahi parawaanipura kaa warsiya karisnahari thaapaalaai kichdaa unako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

nirmaarnaadhina pokharimaa wana samitile paudi khelna pratibandha lagaaeko bhaepani wana heraalu khaanaa khaana gaeko belaa durghatanaa bhaeko bataaieko chha praharile ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko janaaeko chha
bhitri sadakakhandamaa karnaali ejukesana phaaundesanako me kha nambarako skula basako thakkarabaata sohi paidalayaatri warsiya raajendra jabeguko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho
basakaa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha maritakako sawa postamaartamakaa laagi mechi anchala aspataala bhadrapura pathaaeko ukta praharile janaaeko chha
tyastai paschimi makawaanapurako manahari gaaunpaalikaa sthita laamitaaramaa baakhraa charaaundai gardaa chatyaana laagera sthaaniya warsiya barindaa moktaana ghaaite bhaeki chhin
moktaanako hetaumdaa aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko makawaanapura praharile janaaeko chha
motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa liidurghatanaakaa sambandhamaa awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
daanamaa kaara durghatanaa hudaa ekajanaakaae marityu bhaekaae chha bhane arkaa ekajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

daanabaata chandrautaatarpha jaandai gareko baa cha nambarako kaara kapilawastukaae siwaraaja nagarapaalikaa maa durghatanaa hudaa ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiyatirtha achaaryakomarityu bhaekaae haae

morana sundaraharaichaa sthita sadakamaa ko ta nambarako tyaaktarabaata budhabaara saanjha ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sahachaalaka itahari basne warsiya bhimabahaadura pariyaarako dharaana ghopaa aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa purainimaa bhe pa nambarako motarasaaikalakaaethakkarabaatasohi sthaana basne abdula sekhako warsiya chhoraa ajaana sekhako narsina homa nepaalagumjamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

gulariyaa nagarapaalikaa maa rwa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka laalabahaadura gurunako syaaulaa kaatne kramamaa karenta laagera marityu bhaeko ho budhabaara pipalamaa chadhera syaaulaa kaatne gaekaa gurunalaai karenta laageko thiyo

jillaako daksinapaschima ksetramaa parne godaitaamaajanti sawaara biara pi nambarako tempo durghatanaa hudaa bhaaratako sitaamadhi pritamapurakaa warsiya dewendra mahatoko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho
praharikaa anusaara gaudetaa nagarapaalikaa bhawaanipurakaa palata mahatoko gharamaa janti sawaara tempo bihaana baje tira aniyantrita bhai sadakabaata khetamaa khaseko ho

maritakako sawa postamaartamakaa laagi sarlaahi jillaa aspataala malangawaa lyaaieko chha ghatanaamaa pari chaalaka ra anya sawaara ghaaite bhaeko tara pakraau parne darale bhaageko praharile janaaeko chha
butawalako jitagadhimaa tipparako thakkarabaata ekajanaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane ekajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

butawalabaata paschimatarpha jaandai gareko lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai butawalabaatai paschimatarpha jaandai gareko tipparale thakkara didaa butawala upamahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa na taamanagara basne warsa ki puspaa bhandaarikomarityu bhaeko haae
praharile thakkara dieko asumkaamaa lu kha ra lu kha nambarako tipparalaai niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana gariraheko chha
dhaadinako galchhi nagarapaalikaa belkhu sthita parithwi raajamaargamaa motarasaaikala durghatanaa hundaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

kaathamaadaumbaata gajuritarpha aundai gareko baakha nambarako maaikro ra gajuribaata kaathamaadaumtarpha jaandai gareko baapa nambarako motarasaailaka eka apasamaa thokkiera bhaekaae durghatanaamaamotarasaaikalamaa sawaara kaathamaadaum chandraagiri nagarapaalikaagurjudhaaraa basne warsa ko raaja maharjana ra chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa basne warsa ko kawi kumaara maharjanakaaemarityu bhaeko haae
traka chaalaka ra maaikro chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

tikaapura nagarapaalikaa kaa chhotu chaudhariko chhimekiko gharamaa watti waairina garne kramamaa marityu bhaeko haae karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaudharikaae tikaapura aspataalamaa upachaarakaae kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
chaudhariko sawa postamyaartamakaa laagi tikaapura aspataalamaa raakhieko jilla praharile janaaeko chha

yasaibicha motarasaaikalamaa sawaara warsiyaa kamalaa adhikaari ghaaite bhaekaa thie ghaaite adhikaariko saaehi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dine tipara ra chaalaka prahariko niyantranamaa raheko chha
chaalaka bisnau budhaalaai tatkaala uddhaara gari upachaara laagi humlaa jillaa aspataala pathaaieko chha ekskaabhetara nadimaa dubekaale nikaalna nasakiekopraharile janaaeko chha

bhumgahaa nagarapaalikaa harinamari basne warsiya lagana saahakaae karenta laagera somabaara diuso marityu bhaeko haae aphnai gharamaa motara jadaana bhaeko kala chalaaune kramamaa karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa saahako anchala aspataala janakapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
kailaali arghaakhaanchi saptari lalitapura ra nawalaparaasi purwa maa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

saptari khadka nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalale wataa saaikalalaai somabaara belukaa thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa saaikala chaalaka sambhunaatha nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya harihara mandalako marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka warsiya santosa kumaara saahako saptarisi aspataalamaa ra saaikala chaalaka sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya raajesa chaudhariko edabhaansa aspataala kalyaanapuramaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

lalitapura baagamati gaaunpaalikaa nayaangaaunsthita sadakamaa baa cha nambarako gaadi aniyantrita bhai sadakabaata kariba saya mitara tala khasera somabaara belukaa durghatanaa hundaa gaadi chaalaka bhattedaandaa basne mahottari ghara bhaekaa warsiya wisaala magarako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

saathai durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki sohi thaaun basne warsiya sunitaa lopchana ra warsiyaa saritaa moktaanako ananda wana aspataala tikaabhairawamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha arkaa ghaaite sohi thaaun basne makawaanapura ghara bhaekaa warsiya ramesa khupuna taamaanalaai ananda wana aspataala tikaabhairawa hundai thapa upachaarako laagi paatana aspataala riphara garieko chha

nawalaparaasi purwa binayitribenai gaaunpaalikaa sthita purbapaschima raajamaargamaa bhaaratiya yupi ti nambarako traka aniyantrita bhai somabaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa trakamaa sawaara haala naama thara watana nakhulekaa warsiya purusako marityu bhaeko chha
purwapaschima raajamaarga antaragata nawalaparaasiko sunawala jyaamiremaa ajadiunso gyaasa silindara bokeko traka ra kaara thokkindaa paancha janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

paschimabaata purwatarpha gairaheko naa ka num ko gyaasa silindara bokeko traka ra biparita disaabaata airaheko waa cha num ko kaara ekaapasamaa thakkindaa kaaramaa sawaara chaara janaa ra traka chaalaka ghaaite bhaekaa hun
agalaagibaata udyogako godaamagharamaa bhandaarana garieko kariba laakha rupaiyaan mulya baraabarako kapaasa jalera nasta bhaeko chha
raamechhaapa mahottari dhaadina sindhuli saptari baanke sarlaahi ra jhaapaamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

raamechhaapa manthali nagarapaalikaa lipe kholaasthita sadakamaa baa kha nambarako gudiraheko basabaata khasera aitabaara bihaana gambhira ghaaite bhaeki basamaa sawaara sohi nagarapaalikaa tekanapura basne warsiyaa sumitraa kaarkiko dhulikhela aspataala kaabhremaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

sohi durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaeki basamaa sawaara sohi thaaun basne warsiyaa manisaa kaarkiko dhulikhela aspataala kaabhremaa upachaara bhairaheko chha basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

mahottari piparaa gaaunpaalikaa janaka nagaristhita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako basale aitabaara belukaa thakkara dindaa saaikalayaatri piparaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya raaja mukhiyaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhaadina gajuri gaaunpaalikaa malekhu bajaarasthita sadakamaa naa pa nambara ra ga pa nambarakaa motarasaaikala waisaakha gate ekaapasamaa thakkara khaai durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala chaalaka benighaata roraana gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya beda bahaadura saarkiko narbhika aspataala kaathamaadaummaa upachaarako kramamaa aitabaara belukaa marityu bhaeko chha
duwai motarasaaikalalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sindhuli sunakosi gaaunpaalikaa riththe besisthita bipi raajamaargaamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai aitabaara belukaa durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikala chaalaka dhanusaa kamalaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya raajesa kumaara thaakurako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

saptari khadka nagarapaalikaa sthita purwapaschima raajamaargamaa sa pa nambarako motarasaaikalale aitabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa saaikalayaatri sohi thaaun basne warsiya windeswara saahako upachaarako laagi biraatanagaratarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baanke narainaapura gaaunpaalikaa sarwaraajapuruwaasthita sadakamaa bhe ta nambarako tyaaktarale aitabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa sohi gaaunpaalikaa sarwaraajapuruwaa basne hajaari behanaako warsiya chhoraa irakhaana behanaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sarlaahi hariwana nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai aitabaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sohi nagarapaalikaa sukapokhari basne warsiya raajesa sresthalaai upachaarako laagi namunaa aspataala hariwanatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

jhaapaa mechinagara nagarapaalikaa kaalijhodaasthita purwapaschima raajamaargamaa me ja nambarako bolero gaadile somabaara bihaana thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa saaikalayaatri taaplejuna saawika sikaichaa basne warsiya dipesa paudelako upachaarako laagi bi enda si aspataala wirtaamodatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
bolero gaadi ra chaalaka jhaapaa mechinagara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya wisnau chaapaagaailaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
gahun bhitryaauna aitabaara bihaanai kheta pugekaabode barsaaina nagarapaalikaa sonaapurakaa warsiya mohana saahako chatyaana laagera marityu bhaeko ho

daanako tulasipuramaa basadurghatanaa hundaa chaara janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhantulasipurabaata biraatanagara jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basa aitabaara aparaahna tulasipurako haattikhauwaamaa durghatanaamaa parekaae haae

durghatanaamaa ghaaite hunemaa dumgisarana gaaunpaalikaa ki jamunaa wali babai gaaunpaalikaa kaa sitaaraama wali tulasipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa yajnabahaadura bika ra salyaanako siddhakumaakha gaaunpaalikaakaa gehendra basneta rahekopraharile janaaekaae chha
thakkara dine motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
manaraasiswaa nagarapaalikaa kataiyaa tola basne warsiya upendra saaha sonaara aphnai kiraanaa pasalamaa styaanda phyaana banaaune kramamaa karenta laagera sanibaara diuso marityu bhaeko haae

raawaawesi gaaunpaalikaa lekha kharka basne warsiyaa dhana kumaari sresthako sanibaara saanjha chatyaana laagera marityu bhaeko haae sohi thaaunmaa chatyaana laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaeki unako upachaarako laagi sthaaniya swaasthya chauki laamidaandaatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho
duwai baalakako sawa postamaartamakaa laagi jillaa aspataala malumgawaa pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
hajaraako sawa postamaartamakaa laagi naaraayanai aspataalamaa lyaaieko praharile janaaeko chha
kanchanapura lalitapura dhaadina nawalaparaasipaschima ra rautahatamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

lalitapura lalitapura mahaanagarapalikaa mahaalaksmisthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako tyaankarale lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai bihibaara belukaa thakkara dindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi thaaun basne warsiyaa paarwati chaudharikomarityu bhaeko chha

motarasaaikalakaae thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekichaudhariko paatana aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalachaalaka lalitapura taalchhikhela basne nawalaparaasi ghara bhaekaa warsiya wisnau chaudhariko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
dubai sawaari saadhana sahita tyaankara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhaadina dhunibesi nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa lu kha nambarako trakale bihibaara bihaana thakkara dindaa haala naama thara watana nakhulekaa kariba warsiya purusako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
traka ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

nawalaparaasipaschima sunawala nagarapaalikaa ramawaapurasthita sadakamaa lu pa nambarako motarasaaikala bihibaara belukaa durghatanaa hundaa motarasaaikala chaalaka parwatakaa warsiya madana budhaathokiko jenasa aspataala butawalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
jhaapaako kankaai nagarapaalikaa durgaapuramaa jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalaya jhaapaako bhyaanale thakkara dindaasaaikalayaatriko marityu bhaeko chha

bihibaara raatikariba saadhe baje purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata purwatarpha aundai gareko prasaasanako nambarako gaadile wiparita disaabaatatarpha jaandai garekaaesaaikalalaaithakkara dindaa paanchathara naagi ghara bhai haala kankaai nagarapaalikaa kaalimodaamaa deraa gari basne warsiya umesa hinamaanakaaemarityu bhaeko ho

bhyaanakaae thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa hinamaanalaai upachaarako laagi biendasiaspataala birtaamoda laijaanekramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha maritakako sawa sohi aspataalamaa raakhieko chha bhane bhyaana ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
jhaapaako bhadrapura nagarapaalikaa maa gayaraatiwarsaa sangai pareko chatyaana laagera eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha
maritakako sawa pariksanako laagi mechi anchala aspataala bhadrapura pathaaieko praharilejanaaeko chha

baagdulaa bajaaramaa paidala hidirahekaa belaa raa kha nambarakotipparale thakkara didaa pyuthaana nagarapaalikaa wijuwaara kaalikaasthaana niwaasi warsiya karisnabahaadura yogiko marityu bhaeko hotipparakaae thakkarabaata ghaaiteyogiko jillaa aspataala wijuwaaramaa upachaarakaae kramamaamarityu bhaeko ho
maritakako sawa postamaartamakaa laagi pyuthaana aspataalamaa raakhieko chhathakkara dinetippara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa jayasapura basne muskakhima ansaariko gharamaa phrijamaa jodieko bidyutako taara sarta bhai budhabaara diuso agalaagi hundaa kariba laakha hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako dhanamaala jalera nasta bhaeko chha

siraahaa golabajaara nagarapaalikaa sthita maauntena ebharesta bordina skulako se kha nambarako basale budhabaara diuso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa sohi skulakaa gaarda sukhipura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya buniyaa yaadawako upachaarako laagi raau smaaraka aspataala lahaana laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
thakkara dine basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

chandananaatha nagarapaalikaa mirchaamaa karenta laagera sohi sthaana basne warsiya manabahaadura rokaayako bihibaara diuso marityu bhaeko haae ana testa lekhiekaae jesibikaa helpara rokaayale baatomaa raheko taaraharu hataai paara garaaune kramamaa bijuliko naango taaramaa chhuna gai karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite unakoupachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

wanamaa gaai charaauna gaeko belaabhirabaata ladera uniharukoghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha uniharuko sawalaai postamaartamakaa laagi karnaali swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana siksana aspataala puryaaieko chha
sthaaniyale nadi kinaaramaa gurunalaai marita awasthaamaa dekhepachhi praharilaai khabara garekaa thie

suddhodhana gaaunpaalikaa purainisthita mahendra gautamako polti pharmamaa raheko motarako taara jodne kramamaa karenta laagera sohi pharmamaa kaama garne baajuraakaa warsiya daanabahaadura rokaako mumgalabaara diuso marityu bhaeko haae karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako lumbini praadesika aspataala butawalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

dorambaa gaaunpaalikaa niguresthita khorepaani thaado kholaa tarne kramamaa dubera sohi sthaana basne warsiya anisa sresthako marityu bhaeko haae kholaa tarne kramamaa bagaai bepattaa bhaekaa unako ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tokarapurabaata khatieko prahari ra sthaaniya baasindaako sahayogamaa khoji garne kramamaa sawa phelaa paareko ho

mumgalabaara purwabaata paschimatarpha jaadai gareko naa kha numko trakale biparita disaabaata audai gareko ko pa numko motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa raamadhuni nagarapaalikaa jhumkaakaa warsiya umesa chaudhariko marityu bhaeko ho
durghatanaamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara udayapura gaaighaata nagarapaalikaa puraano bajaarakaa warsiya sangama raai ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unako wiraatanagaramaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
thakkara dine traka ra traka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii thapa anusandhaana suru garekaae chha

sambhunaatha nagarapaalikaamaa sthita purwapaschima raajamaargamaapurwabaata paschimatarpha jaandai gareko kocha nambarako pikaapa bhyaanale saaehi nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa makhanidewi tharunilaai thakkara dieko thiyo
thakkara dine sawaari saadhana ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii thapa anusandhaana suru garekaae chha

pokharaabaata kaathamaadautarpha jaandai gareko gaya nummbarako maaikrole bhitri sadakakhandabaata raajamaargatarpha aundai gareko gapa nummbarako skutaralaai thakkara didaa byaasa nagarapaalikaa parewaadaandaakaa warsiya ramesa sarmaako marityu bhaeko haae

maaikrokaae thakkarabaata sakhta ghaaite sarmaako upachaarakaa kramamaa damauli aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha maaikrosahita tyasakaa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa liekaae chha

mahaalaksmi nagarapaalikaa imaadolasthita gambhira samundra setu skulamaa suraksaa gaardako kaama garne raamechhaapa sunaapati basne warsiya raamabahaadura paandeko somabaara diuso karenta laagera marityu bhaeko haae
naa kha nambarako basa suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa seraataarasthita raajamaargamaa aniyantrita bhai sadakabaata khasdaa chha yaatru ghaaite bhaekaa hun

ghaaiteharuko suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa belachautaaraasthita jipi koiraalaa swaasapraswaasa upachaara kendramaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaekaae chha praharikaa anusaara basa sadakabaata paancha phita tala khaseko thiyo
thakkara dine basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii awasyaka anusandhaana garirahekaae chha
paschima nawalaparaasiko raamagraama nadawaamaa gae raatirokera raakheko bhaaratiya trakamaa motarasaaikala thokkindaa ekajanaakaae marityu bhaeko chha bhane eka janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

rokera raakheko yupi bipi numko bhaaratiya trakamaa pachhaadibaata lu pa numko motarasaaikala thokkindaa motarasaaila chaalaka paschima nawalaparaasi raamagraama hakui basne warsiya ramesa yaadawako marityu bhaeko haae
yaadawako upachaarako kramamaa parithwi chandra aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa praharile janaaeko chha durghatanaamaa pari sohi sthaanakaa warsiya raamakarinna kahaanra ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

lamahi nagarapaalikaa banaghusristhita purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata purwabaata paschimatarpha aundai gareko naa kha numko trakamaa sohi disaabaata aundai gareko raa pa numko motarasaaikala pachhaadibaata thokkiera durghatanaa hudaa saaehi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya laalu chaudhariko marityu bhaeko ho

araniko raajamaargaantargata suryawinaayaka nagarapaalikaa bhaatedhikuramaa jagaatibaata banepaatarpha jaandai gareko baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko baa pa nambarako kaarale thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka kaabhrekaa warsiya dipendra laamaakomarityu bhaekaae praharile janaaekaae chha

butawalabaata mahendranagarakaa laagi chhuteko lu kha nambara ko basa lamahi nagarapaalikaa wadaa nambara maa durghatanaa bhaeko ho

praharikaa anusaara basako pattaa bhaachchindaa basa raajamaargabaata tala khaseko ho durghatanaa pari ghaaite bhaekaa haruko lamahi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha ghatanaabaare thapa wiwarana aunabaanki chha

platina gari banaaeko nayaan baatoko naalimaa khelne kramaamaa maatoko diskole puriera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unalaai upachaarako laagi laaipha laaina aspataala damakamaa laijaane kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
sindhuli dhaadina ra makawaanapuramaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha
sumoko thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki unako biendabi aspataala lalitapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho sumo ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhaadina dhunibesi nagarapaalikaa baahunadaandaasthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako trakale naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai budhabaara diuso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka chitawana taandikaa warsiya biwasa paudelako biendabi aspataala lalitapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

makawaanapura manahari gaaunpaalikaa nayaanbastisthita sadakamaa naa pa nambarako skutaralaai naa kha nambarako trakale budhabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa skutaramaa sawaara chitawana khairenikaa warsiyaa munnaa chaudhariko puraano medikala kaleja chitawanamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa skutara chaalaka warsiya saroja chaudhariko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha dubai sawaari saadhaana ra traka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhaaraamaa nuhaaune kramamaa dhaaraamaa jodeko motarabaata karenta laagera ghaaite bhaekaa duwaijaanamadhye baaniyaako maayaa metro aspataala chatakapuramaa ra chaudhariko seti amchala aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

khairahani nagarapaalikaa namunaa petrola pampaagaadi budhawaara raati saadhe bajetira paschimabaata purwatarpha jaandai gareko baa kha nambarako basale thakkara dindaaparichaya nakhulekaakariba warsiya wariddhako ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

wariddhako sawa bharatapura aspataalamaa raakhieko ra thakkara dine basa ra chaalakalaai niyantranamaa lieko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha ghatanaabaare awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
budhabaara diunso baa kha nambarako tipparale baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalakakapilawastuko taulihawaakaa raajendra achaaryakomarityu bhaeko ho
baitadi jhaapaa paalpaa baanke ra makawaanapuramaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

baitadi dasaratha chanda nagarapaalikaa baaraakotasthita sadakamaa se ta nambarako tyaaktara sadakabaata andaaji mitara tala khasera mumgalabaara diuso durghatanaa hundaa tyaaktaramaa sawaara kailaali tikaapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya tapendra budhaamagarako ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa tyaaktaramaa sawaara dadeldhuraa parsuraama nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya ganaesa bhaatalaai upachaarako laagi jillaa aspataala baitadi lagieko chha
tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

jhaapaa damaka nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa ko pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai naa kha nambarako trakale mumgalabaara diuso thakkara dimdaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara chulaachuli gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya subhaasa raaiko laaipha laaina aspataala damakamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka chulaachuli gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya omana raaiko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha traka ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

paalpaa rambhaa gaaunpaalikaa chyaanlinasthita kachchi sadakamaa ga kha nambarako basako thakkarabaata rambhaa gaaunpaalikaa chyaanlina basne warsiyaa humakumaari saaruko mumgalabaara diuso marityu bhaeko chha

syaanajaako galyaanabaata raamapuratarpha jaandai gareko ukta basamaa sawaara saaru basabaata jharera baato krasa garne kramamaa basa agaadi badhana gai thakkara dimdaa unako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho
basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baanke nepaalagumja upamahaanagarapaalikaa bisaalanagara choka najikai lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalabaata khasera sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaarakaando basne warsiyaa amanaa khaatunako mumgalabaara diuso ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baanke jaanaki gaaunpaalikaa piparawaa choka najikai nepaalagumjabaata kohalapuratarpha jaandai gareko bhe ba nambarako motarasaaikala mumgalabaara raati aphai aniyantrita bhai dibhaaidaramaa thokidaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka mugu soru gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya sunila saahiko narsinahoma aspataala nepaalagumjamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa basaamaadisthita sadakamaa wiragumjabaata dhanagadhitarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basabaata khasera sahachaalaka dhanusaa janakapura upamahaanagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya rawi sahaniko mumgalabaara saanjha marityu bhaeko chha
basako dhokaabaata khasna jaandaa sohi basako pachhaadiko chakkaale chyaanpna gai unako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sohi nagarapaalikaasthita jaya baageswari skula najikai srestha ra sohi sthaana ghara bhaekaa warsiya himaala taamaana baariko dilamaa araama gari basekomaa ubhiera haata uthaaune kramamaa bidyuta laainako hajaara bholtako naango taaramaa chhuna gai karenta laagdaa duwai janaa ghaaite bhai upachaarako laagi praathamika swaasthya kendra melamchi lagiekomaa sresthako upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
daarchulaamaa pokharimaa dubera ekajanaakaae marityubhaeko chha

paanchakhapana nagarapaalikaa sunaara gaanusthita asinaa paanisangai chatyaana pardaa aphnai gharamaa basirahekaa sohi sthaana basne warsiyaa sitaa bika ra warsiyaa sukumaayaa limbuko mumgalabaara diuso marityu bhaeko chha chatyaana pardaa behosa bhaekaa uniharulaai upachaarako laagi swaasthya chauki waanaa lagiekomaa duwai janaako upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
achhaamakaaedui sthaanamaa aeko haawaahurisangai pareko chatyaana laagera janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite bhaekaamadhye janaako awasthaa gambhira raheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
achhaamako panchadewala winaayaka nagarapaalikaa kaalekaadaamaa janaa ra raamaarosana gaaunpaalikaa wadaa namwara maa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa hun

ghaaiteharuko uddhaara gari wayalapaataa aspataala lyaairaheko praharile janaaeko chha ghaaite hune madhye sthaaniya bhimapuraa nepaali dirge wika lalu wika raadhikaa saahi kalpanaa boharaa ra jagata boharaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya achhaamale janaaeko chha
rukhabaata ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako dharaanasthita ghopaa kyaampa dharaanamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

maadi gaaunpaalikaa sari basne warsiya jyoti pariyaarako chatyaana laagera somabaara raati marityu bhaeko chha sohi sthaana basne andaaji warsiya rosana pariyaarako gharamaa khaanaa khaane kramamaa achaanaka aeko chatyaanamaa pari unako marityu bhaeko ho

jillaako aiselukharka gaaunpaalikaademlitaara chuchche bhanne sthanaanamaa dudhakosi nadile bagaaera yuwaka bepattaa bhaekaa chhan diunso baje dudhakosi gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya bharata charmakaaralaai paudi khelne kramamaa nadile bagaaera bepattaa banaaeko ho
ghatanaako jaanakaari paaunnaasaatha tatkaala ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya aiselukharkabaata prahari toli khati gai sthaaniyawaasiko sahayogamaa khojikaarya bhairaheko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

jillaako tyaamke mayuma gaaunpaalikaa khaawaa rembo bhanne sthaanamaa somawaara bijuliko polamaa chadhera laaina marmata garne kramamaa polabaata chipliera widyuta praadhikana bhojapuramaa kaaryarata praawidhika bhojapura pauwaadummaa tiwaaribhanjyaana basne nabina raaiko ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu chha
kaanuni prakariyaa paschaata sawa pariksanako laagi jillaa aspataala bhojapuramaa raakhieko praharile janaaeko chha
sumkhuwaasabhaamaapraaima kamarsiyala baimkamaa mumgalabaara bihaana agalaagi hundaa kariba laakha baraabarako ksati bhaeko chha

sabhaapokhari gaaunpaalikaamaa raheko praaima kamarsiyala baimkako saakhaamaa mumgalabaara bihaana baje widhut sata bhaera agalaagi hundaa kariba laakha baraabarako ksati bhaeko prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka santosakumaara raaile jaanakaari die
siraahaamaabhaaratiya nambarako basale thakkara dindaa eka saaikalayaatrikaae marityu bhaeko chha

basako thakkarabaata sukhipura nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya raamalakhana saahakaaeghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile bataaeko chha tyastai arkaa saaikalamaa sawaara mirchaiyaa kaa warsiya bhadrakaali mahaasetha gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unalaai upachaarakaa laagi wiraatanagara pathaaieko praharile janaaekaae chha

jaanaki gaaunpaalikaa bhagatapuramaa se pa nambarako motarasaaikalamodamaa ghumaaune kramamaa sadaka najikai eka gharamaa thokkiera durghatanaa hundaa tikaapura nagarapaalikaa wijayanagarakaa warsakaa raajesa chaudhari ra siwanagarakaa warsakaa dipaka chaudhariko marityu bhaekopraharile jaanakaari dieko chha

purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata butawala dhaago kaarakhaanaa najikai lu kha nambarako tipparale thakkara dindaa lu pa nummko motarasaaikalamaa sawaara warsiya praadhyaapaka dolaraaja aryaalako marityu bhaeko ho

butawalabaata dewadahatarpha jaandai gardaa wiparita disaabaata airaheko tipparale thakkara didaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa praadhyaapaka aryaalako upachaarakaa kramamaa lumbini praadesika aspataala butawalamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha aryaala butawala bahumukhi kyaampasa ra siddhaartha gautamabuddha kyaampasa butawalakaa swaasthya wisayakaa praadhyaapaka thie

ghara najikaiko jangalamaa ghaansa kaatna jaane kramamaa bhirabaata kariba mitara tala khasna gai ghaaite bhaeki chandraalaai upachaarako laagi syaanjaako waalinatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho
kaaligandaki karidora antargata raamapura nagarapaalikaa syaauli bajaara najikai sadaka khanne kramamaa maathibaata khaseko dhiskole puriera skaabhetara chaalakako marityu bhaeko chha

maatoko dhiskole laagera ghaaite hunubhaekothaapaakaae upachaarakaa laagi raamapura aspataala laijaane kramamaa baatomaa nai marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya raamapurakaa pramukha bhupaalasim raanaale jaanakaari dinubhayo thaapaako sawa ahile raamapura aspataalamaa raakhieko chha

haripura nagarapaalikaa pidaari bajaaramaa aja bihaana agalaagi hudaa pasalamaa raakhieko gyaasa silindara padakindaa chaarajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan bihaanaidekhi chaleko haawaahurikaa kaarana ago phailindaa tina pasala ra eka ghara jalera nasta bhaeko chha

bajaaramaa phohara nasta garna baalieko ago haawaahurile chheumai raheko khuswu pharnichara udyoga pugdaa agalaagi hunapugeko thiyo pharnicharabaata salkieko ago chandeswara saahako maasu pasalamaa laagdaa tyasamaa raheko gyaasa silindara padakinera chaarajanaa ghaaite bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

silindara padakindaa haripura nagarapaalikaa pidaarikaa warsiya wiswanaatha saaha ra kawilaasi nagarapaalikaa pipariyaakaa warsiya bharata panditako daanhine khuttaa jaleko chha silindarabaata uchhitiekaa tukraa lagera pidaarikaa warsiya gautama saaha ra warsiya manjura ansaariko khuttaa bhaanchchieko chha ghaaitelaai upachaarakaa laagi wiraganja pathaaieko chha
jhaapaa kailaali ra moranamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

jhaapaa kankaai nagarapaalikaa purwa basapaarka chheunsthita sadakamaa me pa nambarako motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata paidalayaatri saaehi nagarapaalikaa ghailaadubbaa basne warsiya baabulaalu tuduko aitabaara raati marityu bhaeko chha

motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaatuduko biendasi aspataala damakamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka warsiya sanama raaiko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
kailaali jaanaki gaaunpaalikaa bhagatapurasthita sadakamaa se pa nambarako motarasaaikala aitabaara saanjha aphai aniyantrita bhai paltidaan dui janaako marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka tikaapura nagarapaalikaa bijayanagara basne warsiya dipaka chaudhari ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi sthaana basne warsiya raajesa chaudhariko medikala kaleja kohalapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa duwai janaako marityu bhaeko chha

ukta motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako nyuro aspataala biraatanagaramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka jhaapaakaa serabahaadura sresthako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairehako chha
wardiyaaokhaladhunagaa rukumapaschima ra kaaskimaa paanimaadubera chaarajanaakaae marityu bhaeko chha

okhaladhunagaa sunakosi gaaunpaalikaa jerunaghaatasthita sunakosi nadiko kinaaraamaa sindhuli phikkala gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya bhadre raai sunuwaara aitabaara diuso marita awasthaamaa phelaa parekaa chhan

sohi thaaunsthita bheri nadimaa maachhaa maarne kramamaa nadile bagaai bepattaa bhaekaa unako prahari chauki purtimabaata khatieko praharile sthaaniya baasindaako sahayogamaa khoji garne kramamaa sohi gaaunpaalikaa sthita chaainaa bagaramaa unako sawa phelaa pareko ho

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa dyaamasaaidasthita paarka najikai phewaataalamaa sohi mahaanagarapaalikaa gairi kheta basne baagluna baraana gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya narabahaadura ksetriko sawa aitabaara diuso phelaa pareko chha

parithwi raajamaargaantargata ichchhaakaamanaa gaaunpaalikaa kurinataarasthita sarwasaanti maawi pariksaa kendramaa esaii pariksaa dine widyaarthi bokera muglinabaata aundai gareko baa kha numko yaatrubaahaka basamaa sohi disaabaata aeko naa cha numko delibhari bhyaana ra baa pa numko motarasaaikala aja bihaana h baje ekaapasamaa thakkara khaandaa dhaadina jyaamarunakaa warsiya raajana dhamalaako marityu bhaeko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanakaa pramukha chandrakumaara girile jaanakaari dinubhayo

dhamalaako upachaarako kramamaa bihaana baje marityu bhaeko pramukha girile bataaunubhayo durghatanaamaa bhyaanakaa chaalaka saamaanya ghaaite bhaekaa chhan durghatanaakaa kaaranabaare anundhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

darjile saathiharusanga basera madiraa pieko ra bhirako baato ghara pharkumdai gardaa ladera marityu bhaeko prahariko bhanaai chha maritakako sawapariksanakaa laagi syaanjaako waalina aspataala pathaaieko ra ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana

sunasari harinagaraa gaaunpaalikaa ghuski bajaarasthita biara waai nambarako motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata saaikalayaatrilaai sohi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsisa rehaana amsaariko sanibaara diuso marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa unako upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho motarasaaikala chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

wardiyaa madhuwana nagarapaalikaa ghora pituwaa jumngalasthita sadakamaa laalabajaarabaata baanniyaabhaaratarpha jaandai gareko saaikalabaata ladera saaikalayaatri baarabardiyaa nagarapaalikaa lathuwaa gaaun basne warsiya dhanabira damaaiko sanibaara diuso marityu bhaeko chha

ukta naharamaa khelne kramamaakhasera bagaai laijaadai gareko awasthaamaa sthaaniya baasindaale phelaa paari uddaara gari upachaarako laagi amchala aspataala biraatanagara laijaane kramamaa unako baataimaa marityu bhaeko ho

bhaaratiya sanchaaramaadhyamalenepaalabaata gaekaa kahi yaatruharu pani ghaaite bhaekaae bhaaratiya praharilaai uddharita gardai lekhekaae chha ukta nepaali paryataka basa bhaaratiya praharile niyantranamaa lieko bhaaratiya sanchaaramaadhyamale janaaekaae chha bhane chaalaka pharaara bhaekaae janaaieko chha gaadi nambara bhane bhaaratiya sanchaaramaadhyamale khulaaekaae chhaina

pilibhitakaa prahari adhikarita yogendra kumaarale kaara barelitarpha jaana laagdaa nepaalako paryataka basasanga thakkara khaaeko agalaagisameta bhaeko ra khaaldomaa pareko janaaekaa chhan ukta basamaa nepaali paryataka rahekaae bhaaratiya sanchaaramaadhyama amara ujaalaalejanaaekaae chha

bhe pa ra baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala thokkiera durghatanaa hudaa bardiyaako madhuwana nagarapaalikaa indrapurakaa warsakaa suraja chaudhari ra karisnaa chaudhari tathaa baarabardiyaa nagarapaalikaa kaa warsakaa khagendra basnetako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaekaae chha
mechinagara nagarapaalikaa dhaaijanakaa warsiya wikrama raajawumsilaai baa ka nambarako jesibiko masinale chyaapidaa marityu bhaeko ho

sanibaara saanjha chaalakale jesibi prayoga gari telako drama uthaaune kramamaa sohi jesibikaa sahachaalaka raajawumsiko taauko mesinako agaadi bhaagale thichindaa ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhadrapurale janaaekaa chha

siwaraaja nagarapaalikaa chandrautaako raajaswa chekapwaaintamaa rokieko trakamaa motarasaaikala thokkindaa eka yuwaako marityu bhaeko chha marityu hunemaa siwaraaja nagarapaalikaa bhaluhi niwaasi warsiya sani thaaru rahekaa chhan

purwabaata paschimatarpha jaandai gareko naakha numko traka chandrautaa khasi bajaarasthita raajaswa chekapwaaintamaa rokieko awasthaamaa lupa numko motarasaaikalabaata madhya raati chandrautaabaata ghara pharkine kramamaa tiwragatimaa rahekaa thaaru cheka garna rokieko trakako pachhaadi thokkieko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya chandrautaale janaaeko chha

durghatanaabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa thaaruko sanjiwani saamudaayika aspataalamaa upachaarakai kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha maritakako sawa pariksanakaa laagi raati nai siwaraaja aspataala bahaaduraganja pathaaieko prahari niriksaka maheswara upaadhyaayale bataaunubhayo

bedakota nagarapaalikaa champhaapuraki warsiyaa garbhawati mahilaa rinaa raanaako aja raadhaa nadimaalugaa dhune kramamaa dubera marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhalaarikaa prahari niriksaka ramesadatta awasthile bataaunubhayo
sindhili dudhauli nagarapaalikaa pippraahisthita kamalaa kholaamaa nuhaaune kramamaa dubera sohi sthaana basne sibalaala sadaako warsiyaa chhori manisaa sadaako bihibaara diuso marityu bhaeko chha

gadhimaai nagarapaalikaa sthita samanapura bajaaramaa tyaaktarako pachhaadiko dhaalaa weldina garne kramamaa sohi dhaalaa khasi chota laagdaa sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya jaya mumgala daasako bihibaara saanjha marityu bhaeko chha
dhiskole puriera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa deuwaako upaksetriya aspataala dadeladhuraamaa upachaarako kramamaakramamaa marityu bhaekopraharile janaaekaae chha
