pokharaabaata damaulitarpha aundai gareko naa kha num ko basako thakkarabaata suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa silaamaghaari basne warsiyaa saawitri khatrikaae marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunkaa prahari naayaba upariksaka syaamu aryaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

basako thakkarabaata gambira ghaaite khatrikoupachaarako kramamaa pokharaasthita ksetriya aspataalamaamarityu bhaekopraharile janaaekaae chha thakkara dine basa ra chaalaka ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belachautaaraako niyantranamaa raheko praharile janaaeko chha

bastipura ra manharawaako bichamaa obharateka garne kramamaa motarasaaikala sata numko tyaaktaramaa tokkindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sirahaako karjanhaa nagarapaalikaa bastipura niwaasi warsiya ramesa saahako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mirchaiyaale janaaeko chha

so durghatanaamaa pari motarasaaikalako pachhaadi sawaara karjanhaa nagarapalikaa niwaasi warsiya mo iraphaana sekha ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite sekhako mirchaiyaasthita mangalama aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mirchaiyaale janaaeko chha
dramako paanibhitra dubera asakta bhaekaa unalaai upachaarako laagi janakapura baala aspataala janakapuratarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho

godaitaa nagarapaalikaa bagadahasthita mahaalaksmi chini udyogamaa ukhu loda garieko tryaaktarako muni kichieko awasthaamaa eka janaako sawa phelaa pareko chha naa ta nambarako tryaaktarako telaramuni sutiraheko awasthaamaa mangalabaara raati taauko kichieko awasthaamaa balaraa nagarapaalikaa arnaahaakaa warsiya sambhu mahato sawa phelaa pareko prahari upariksaka gopaalachandra bhattaraaile jaanakaari dinubhayo

anbukhairenibaata paaluntaara tarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basa ra gorakhaabaata anbukhaireni jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako traka mumgalabaara saanjha eka apasamaa thokkiera durghatanaa bhaeko diesapi mahendra nepaalale jaanakaari die

uniharu duwailaai gharamai basirahekaa awasthaamaa chatyaanale laageko thiyo ghaaite duwaiko manamohana aspataala birtaamodamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha haawaahurile jhaapaakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bijulikaa adhaa darjanabhandaa badhi khambaa dhaaleko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa mahendrakumaara sresthale bataaunubhayo

uhaankaa anusaara bhadrapura nagarapaalikaa sthita bhadrapura wimaanasthalako purwapatti gauradaaha gwaaladubbaamaa ekaeka ra birtaamoda nagarapaalikaa maa bijulikaa dui khambaa dhalekaa chhan tyasaigari haawaahurile menapaasthita naresa limbu ra kachanakawala gaapaa basne jhadkana thaakurako gharako tinako chhaano udaaeko chha bhane bhadrapura sthita sagaramaathaa chokamaa raheko prahari bita paltaaeko prawaktaa sresthale bataaunubhayo aja bihaana dekhi kariba bajesamma paanisangai haawaahuri ra chatyaana pareko thiyo

gorakhaako gandaki gaaunpaalikaa ghyaalchoka sthita bhadrakaali maadhyamika widyaalayakaa widyaarthikamala chepaana somawaara diunso trisuli nadimaa paudi khelne kramamaa dubera wepattaa bhaeko ghyaalchokakaa sthaaniya dipaka timalsinaale jaanakaari die

morana sundaraharaichaa nagarapaalikaa sthita purwapaschima raajamaargamaa baa kha nambarako maaikrobasa aitabaara bihaana aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaa maaikrobasa basamaa sawaara sunasari dharaana basne warsiya sabina magraatiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
