arkaa ghaaite sohi thaaun basne dhanabahaadura maharaako chhoraa warsiya kirana maharaa upachaara paschaata dischaarja bhaekaa chhan tyaaktara sahita chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
kaathamaandauko kapanamaa motarasaaikala durghatanaa hundaa ekajanaakaae marityu bhaekaae chha bhane ekajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha ewum prahari waristha upariksaka wasanta pantale ghaaiteharuko swayambhusthita manamohana memoriyala aspataala ra saatadobaatosthita sumeru aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko jaanakaari dinubhayo holimaa budhabaara maatra kaathamaadaun upatyakaakaa sthaanamaa durghatanaa bhaekaa thie

gata warsako holimaa sawaari saadhaana durghatanaamaa hundaa ghaaite bhaekaa thie traaphika praharile budhabaara holimaa upatyakaabhitra jathaabhaawi rupamaa sawaarisaadhana chalaaune chaalakalaai kaarawaahisameta gareko chha timadhye duipaangre ra chaarapaangre sawaarisaadhanakaa chaalaka kaarawaahimaa parekaa thie

sohi gaaunpaalikaa baasakharkabaata ghara pharkane kramamaa bhirabaata andaaji mitara tala khasera gambhira ghaaite bhaeki unako praathamika swaasthya kendra srarinagaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
somabaara raati baa pa nambarako motarasaaikala riksaamaa thokkindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara kaathamaandauko raanibaari basne kaabhrekaa warsiya hari sresthako marityu bhaeko ho

chitawana raastriya nikunja ksetramaa ghaansa kaatna gaeki ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa ki warsiya jaanaki chaudhariko marityu bhaeko ho gaindaako akramanabaata ghaaite chaudhariko chitawana medikala kalejamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale jaanakaari dieko chha
sawa pariksanakaa laagi bharatapura aspataalamaa raakhiekoprahari janaaekaae chha
chitawanako bharatapuramaa motarasaaikaladurghatanaa hudaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhanearkaa eka gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

gae raati baje bharatapurabaata taanditarpha jaandai gareko baapa numko motarasaaikala aphanai aniyantrita bhai kendriya basa tarminala chokako dibhaaidaramaa thakkara khaandaa motarasaaikala pachhaadi sawaara khairahani nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya kumaara adhikaariko marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale jaanakaari dieko chha

adhikaariko upachaarako kramamaa bharatapura aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko ho gambhira ghaaite motarasaaikala chaalaka dhaadina kayapura kaa warsiya somanaatha sedhaainko chitawana medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

dotibaata kailaalitarpha jaandai gareko baa kha nambarako sudurapaschima yaatayaatako maaikro basa dadeldhuraako ganyaapadhuraa gaaunpaalikaamaa durghatanaa hundaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhanedurghatanaamaa pari janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
marityu hunemaa dotiko saayala gaaunpaalikaa basne warsa ko ganaesa saauda raheko praharile janaaeko chha maritaka saauda nepaala prahari jawaana bhaeko bataaieko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dadeldhuraakaa anusaara ghaaite huneharumaa dotiko dipaayala silagadhi nagarapaalikaa khaatiwadaa basne warsa kaa kailaa dholi warsiyaa laksmi damaai sikhara nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya jara damaai ra unaki srimati warsiyaa wisnaa damaai dadeldhuraa ganyaapadhuraa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsa kaa raaju damaai kailaali jaanaki gaaunpaalikaa basne warsa kaa wirabahaadura rokkaa magara kailaali tikaapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsa ki dipaa josi tathaa dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa basne warsa ki nisaa chanda rahekaa chhan anya dui janaalaai bhane saamaanya chotapataka maatrai laagekaale uniharu ghara pharkisakekaa chhan
dipaa ra nisaalaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi dipaayalamaa raheko saileswari aspataalamaa lyaaieko chha bhane anyako upaksetriya aspataala dadeldhuraamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

gadhawaa gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num manikaapura niwaasi barsiya purana rokaa magaralaaijumgala gaekaa belaa aitawaara belukaa bajetira bhaalule ekaaeka akramana garepachhi uni gambhira ghaaite bhaekaajillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa pramukha ewum esapi belabahaadura paandele jaanakaari die
purwichitawanako bhandaaraabaata naaraayanagadhatarpha aundai gareko bolerole nipani chokamaa aja wihaana thakkara dindaa eka paidalayaatriko marityu bhaeko chha
marityu hunemaa ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa kailaasatolakaa warsiya wasanta thaapaa rahekaa jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaeko chha

naa cha nambarako bolerole ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa nipani chokamaa dieko thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa thaapaako upachaarakaa kramamaa chitawana medikala kalejamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
thaapaalaai thakkara dine wolero ra chaalaka ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya ratnanagarako niyantranamaa raheko chha
kapilawastu kaabhre sarlaahi mahottari ra kanchanapuramaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara janaako sumjibani aspataala chandrautaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
kaabhre mandana deupura nagarapaalikaa nagarabanda paatisthita bhitri sadakamaa tiparadurghatanaahudaa eka janaakaaemarityu bhaeko chha bhane ekajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

paanchakhaalabaata dhaadakharkatarpha jaandai gareko baa kha nambarako tipara aitabaara saanjha aphai aniyantrita bhai sadakabaata andaaji saya mitara tala khasdaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa tipara chaalaka sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya suresa raaiko sira memoriyala aspataala banepaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
sarlaahi haripura nagarapaalikaa chitaainasthita bhitri sadakamaa motarasaaikaladurghatanaahudaa eka janaakaaemarityu bhaeko chha bhane ekajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai pulako kalbhartamaa aitabaara diuso thokkindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka laalabandi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya raama ekawaala guptaako jillaa aspataala malumgawaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya raamakumaara yaadawako sohi aspatalaamaa upachaara paschaata thapa upachaarako laagi puraano medikala kaleja bharatapura chitawana riphara garieko chha
sarlaahi haripura nagarapaalikaa jutapaanisthita sadakamaa motarasaaikala durghatanaahudaa eka janaakaaemarityu bhaeko chhabhane ekajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala aitabaara raati aphai aniyantrita bhai baatoko chheunmaa raheko kaladhaaraako waalamaa thokkindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka hariwana nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya amara goleko jillaa aspataala malumgawaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

jhaapaa bhadrapura nagarapaalikaa basne raama limbuko gharamaa paahunaa aekaa taaplejunakaa warsiya idama linbuko sohi sthaanamaa raheko kichchakabadhako pokharimaa dubera sanibaara diuso marityu bhaeko chha

mahottari piparaa gaaunpaalikaa khairawaa basne kisuna saahako gharamaa aekaa dhanusaakaa warsiya siwaa saahako ukta ghara agaadi raheko paaniko khaaldomaa dubera sanibaara saanjha marityu bhaeko chha

dhanusaa kamalaa nagarapaalikaa lagmaasthita sadakamaa ja ta nambarako tyaaktarale ko pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai sanibaara diuso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi thaaunsthita dugarakota basne warsiyaa syaamadebi mandalalaai upachaarako laagi janakapura amchala aspataala laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

rautahata phatuwaabijayapura nagarapaalikaa santapurachokamaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikala bihibaara aphain aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sohi thaaunsthita mewaa tenagraa basne warsiya raakesa yaadabako nyuro aspataala biragumjamaa upachaarako kramamaa sanibaara saanjha marityu bhaeko chha

udayapura rautaamaai gaaunpaalikaa pokharisthita sadakamaa sa ta nambarako tyaaktara sanibaara raati aphain aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hundaa sahachaalaka rukuma saanobherigaaunpaalikaa purtinagaadaa basne warsiya dinesa chanako ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kailaali godaawari nagarapaalikaa mahendranagara rodasthita sadakamaa se cha nambarako skaarapiyole sanibaara saanjha sohi thaaun basne paidalayaatri warsiya anupa saaudalaai thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaale padamaa aspataala atariyaa hundai thapa upachaarako laagi bhaaratako bareli laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
skaarapiyo sahita chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa dyaamasaaidasthita sadakamaa yupi ti nambarako basakaa chaalaka bhaaratako banaarasa basne warsiya anila saahako sanibaara raati sawaari durghatanaa hundaa marityu bhaeko chha
bhimeswara nagarapaalikaa thuloswaanraamaa bhukampapachhi nirmita kateromaa agalaagi hundaa warsakaa khadgaprasaada chaulaagaaimko marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

jastaapaataa ra kaathadwaaraa nirmita kateromaa gaeraati agalaagi hundaa chaulaagaaimko sutekai thaaunmaa purai jalera marityu bhaeko dolakhaa praharikaa suchanaa adhikaari niriksaka pradipa mahatale jaanakaari die

kaawaasoti nagarapaalikaa kharkhotta jumgalamaa rokiraakheko naa kha nambarako trakamaa naa kha nambarako traka thokkindaa naa kha nambarako trakamaa sawaara daanakaa warsiya anaraama raakhala magarakomarityu bhaeko chha
ghaaite duijanaako bharatapura medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha naa kha nambarako trakakaa chaalaka pharaara rahekaale unako khoji bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha
paanchathara jillaako hilihaanga gaaunpaalikaa saawikako panchami gaawisa wadaa num daandeko ramite bhanne bhiramaa laageko ago gaaun pasdaa gae raati chha ghara jalekaa chhan

agalaagi bhaekaa gharamadhye manaprasaada paalunwaa harkabahaadura paalunwaa raajakumaara paalunwaa ra wedamaayaa paudyaalako ghara purnarupamaa jaleko chha uniharuko sampurna dhanamaala jalera nasta bhaeko chha agalaagikaa kaarana ke kati ksati bhayo bhanne tatkaala yakina huna nasakeko gaaunpaalikaa kaa wadaa sadasya dhanabahaadura paalunawaale bataaunubhaeko chha

jangalako ago niyantranakaa laagi sthaaniyawaasi ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gopetaara ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya amarapura jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya phidima wisnau dala gana jorapokharibaata gaeko tolile prayaasa gari rahepani niyantranamaa auna sakeko chhaina ahile ago purwi ksetra wanapaalaa jangalatarpha modieko paalunawaale bataaunubhayo
doti jillaako paschimi ksetramaa parne saayala gaaunpaalikaa wadaa nambara chhapaalimaa bhirabaata ladera eka mahilaako marityu bhaeko chha
kaathamaadaum saptari kaaski kanchanapura makawaanapura ra rolpaamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

kaathamaadaum daana mainaaghaatasthita sadakamaa baa cha nambarako kaarale phaaguna gate thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki paidalayaatri pyuthaana ki warsiyaa dhanakumaari sunuwaarakaaeupachaarako kramamaa bihibaara saanjha oma aspataala chaawahila kaathamaadaummaa marityu bhaeko chha
kaara ra chaalakalaai sthaaniya praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kaaski pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa chaauthesthita sadakamaa ga pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai naa kha nambarako trakale bihibaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka tanahunkaa raajendra pariyaarakaae upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
duwai sawaari saadhana ra traka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
motarasaaikala sahita chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha saaikala chaalaka sakusala rahekaa chhan

makawaanapura kailaasa gaaunpaalikaa pakanisthitamaa bhitri sadakakhandamaa naa ja nambarako sumole bihibaara raati paidalayaatri sohi thaaun basne warsiya subaasa blonalaai thakkara didaan ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa pari surkhetako chaukune gaaunpaalikaa kaa dinesa thaapaa ra lamajunako masryaanadi gaaunpaalikaa kaa hiraaprasaada mijaarako marityu bhaeko sasastra prahari balako laamaabagarasthita maathillo taamaakosi ayojanaako suraksaa besakaa inchaarja sasastra prahari niriksaka phurgeli serpaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaeko dolakhaakaa prawaktaa prahari niriksaka pradipa mahatale jaanakaari dinubhayo ghaaiteko dolakhaako singatisthita rolawaalina aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha ghaaiteko wistarita wiwarana auna baanki raheko prahari janaaeko chha
kaathamaadaunko kalankisthita eka bekari pasalamaa aja agalaagi hundaa jhandai ru chha laakhako ksati bhaeko chha

karnaali pradesa sarakaarale helikaptara pathaaera ti mahilaako uddhaara gareko ho uddhaaramaa bhaeko dhilaaikaa kaarana swaasthyakarmile amaako jyaana bachaauna saphala bhaepani sisulaai bachaauna nasakieko jillaa aspataalakaa anami saritaa boharaale bataaunubhayo

humlaako daksina ksetrasthita sarkegaada gaaunpaalikaa raahadewakaa warsiya dhali budhaalaai tina dinadekhi sutkeri wyathaa laageko thiyo budhabaara raati sisuko eutaa haatamaatra waahira niskie pani uhaanle sisu janmaauna sakiena aja bihaana maatra helikaptarabaata unako uddhaara garera baje jillaa aspataalamaa puyaaekaa thie tara dhilo bhaisakekaa kaarana amaako jyaana bachaauna saphala bhaepani sisulaai bachaauna nasakeko jillaa aspataalakaa anami boharaale bataaunubhayo

suchanaa praapta hunaasaatha agalaagi niyantranakaa laagi ilaama nagarapaalikaale tyasatarpha damakala pathaaieko nagarapaalikakaa prasaasakiya adhikarita raamakumaara saahale jaanakaari dinubhayo ilaamakaa sadaramukaamabaata damakalasahita prahari ra nepaali senaalaai ghatanaasthalatarpha pathaaieko pani uhaanle bataaunubhayo chakra mukhiyaako bhaanchhaagharabaata agalaagi suru bhaeko bataaieko chha
mahottari jillaako bhangaahaa nagarapaalikaa raamanagaramaa agalaagi hundaa ru saata laakha badhiko ksati bhaeko chha

bastikaa thaakura badahiko gharamaa aja widyut sata bhai agalaagi hundaa lattaakapadaa dhaatukaa bhaandaakundaa ra garagahanaa jalera nasta hundaa ru saata laakha badhiko noksaana bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarile janaaeko ho

thaakurako pakki gharako mukhya raakhanadharana garine kothaamaa bijuli pankhaabaata widyut sarta bhai ago laageko pratyaksadarsi raamaiswara thaakurale jaanakaari dinubhayo agalaagi hunaasaatha sitaapura prahari chaukibaata pugeko prahari ra tyahaankaa sthaaniyawaasiko sahayogamaa ago niyantrana garieko chha

widyut sarta bhaera kothaamaa hwaarahwaarti ago dankepachhi gharakaa maanisa sabai baahira bhaagekaa thie widyut mitarako taara chundaaepachhi kothaamaa laageko ago pampaseta inaarabaata paani taanne mesina chalaaera niyantrana bhaeko thiyo ghatanaamaa maanawiya ksati bhane nabhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari upariksaka iswara kaarkile jaanakaari dinubhayo
parithwi raajamaargaantargata tanahunko damaulikhairenitaara sadakakhandamaa aja bhaeko durghatanaamaa eka yuwatiko marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa tanahunko suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa belachautaaraakaa warsiyaa pratiksaa bhandaari raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaeko chha pokharaabaata damauli aundai gareko ga kha num ko trakale sohi disaabaata aundai gareko ga pa num ko skutaralaai myaagde gaaunpaalikaa manaharimaa thakkara dindaa bhandaari ghaaite hunubhaeko thiyo

uhaanko damauli aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa bihaana marityu bhaeko prahari niriksaka wikaasa thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo bhandaari myaagde gaaunpaalikaako swaasthya saakhaakaa karmachaari hun thakkara dine traka ra chaalaka prahari niyantranamaa raheko praharile janaaeko chha

aphnai gharako inaarabaata motara lagaai paani taanne kramamaa karenta laagera sohi inaaramaa khasekaa yaadawalaai sthaaniyabaasiko sahayogamaa inaarabaata nikaali lamahi aspataala pathaaiekomaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
syaanjaa galyaana nagarapaalikaa jaamunesthita kaaligandaki nadimaapaudi khelne kramamaa dubera ekajanaakaaemarityu bhaekaae chha

lahaana nagarapaalikaa gamhariyaa niwaasi raadhesyaama chaudhariko gharamaa bihe bhoja banaairahandaa achaanaka gyaasa silindara padkiera agalaagi hundaa biheko laagi lyaaeko nagada sunachaandi ra sarasaamaana jalera nasta bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya lahaanakaa prahari niriksaka wijaya yaadawale jaanakaari dinubhayo

gharabaata ago salkera chaudharisahita chhimeki dukhi chaudhari baalakarisna chaudhariko ekaeka ghara ra khaadyaanna gari kariba ru laakhabhandaa badhiko dhanamaala jalera nasta bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha nepaala prahari sasastra prahari ra lahaana nagarapaalikaako damakalale dui ghantaapachhi ago niyantranamaa liieko thiyo

dibhijana wana kaaryaalaya jhaapaakaa dibhijanala wana adhikarita wisnaulaala ghimirekaa anusaara kaanakaai nagarapaalikaa jaamunakhaadi niwaasi warsiya omanaatha khaanalako marityu bhaeko ho jaamunawaari saamudaayika wana uttaramaa raheko naalaapaani bhanne sthanamaa khanaalalaai haattile akramana gareko thiyo haattiko akramanabaata khanaalako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko wana adhikarita mighirele bataaunubhayo
motarasaaikalamaa sawaara saptariko surunaa nagarapaalikaa kaa mo majaluma miyaan ra raame paasawaanako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko praharile jaanakaari janaaekaae chha
basakaa kehi yaatru ghaaite bhaekaale uniharulaai upachaarakaa laagi sirahaako lahaana sthita aspataala pathaaieko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
ghatanaapachhi ahile raajamaargamaa yaataayaata thappa chha ghatanaabaare awasyaka anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

jillaakaae myaagana gaaupaalikaa maanepaakhaamaa baato khanne kramamaa maathibaata khaseko dhumgaa taaukomaa laagera sthaaniya warsiya chhore taamaanako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nuwaakotakaa pramukha tathaa prahari upariksaka karisnabahaadura pallimagarale jaanakaari die
maritakako sawa nuwaakota jillaa aspataala trisulimaa postamaartama garieko chhaghatanaakaa sambandhamaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko upariksaka pallimagarale bataae
jillaako kataari nagarapaalikaa basne barsiya naina bahaadura pahaari newaara aja bihaana sthaaniya churiyaa jumgalamaa ghaansa kaatna gaeko samayamaa bhaaluko akramanamaa pari ghaaite bhaekaa hun
rupandehi kailaali ra dhanusaamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

rupandehi siddhaarthanagara nagarapaalikaa barmeli tolasthita bhitri sadakamaa naa kha nambarako trakale lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai somabaara diuso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka tilottamaa nagarapaalikaa semaraa bajaara basne warsiya laalabahaadura gurunako siti aspataala bhairahawaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
duwai sawaari saadhana ra traka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kailaali chure gaaunpaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako trakale se pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai somabaara diuso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara ghomdaaghomdi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya arjuna nepaaliko seti amchala aspataala dhanagadhimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka ghomdaaghomdi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya suresa nepaaliko seti amchala aspataala dhanagadhimaa upachaara paschaata thapa upachaarako laagi medikala kaleja kohalapura baanke riphara garieko chha traka ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhanusaa ganaesamaana chaaranaatha nagarapaalikaa ailaanisthita bhitri sadakamaa sa pa nambarako motarasaaikalako thakkakarabaata paidalayaatri sohi sthaana basne warsiya raamabariksa thaakurako somabaara raati marityu bhaeko chha
motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

dhanusaa mithilaa nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako basale ko pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai mumgalabaara bihaana thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka bhojapura boyaa basne warsiya homanaatha taamraakaarako upachaarako laagi janakapura amchala aspataalatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara bhojapura ghara bhaekaa warsiya winoda raaiko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha duwai sawaari saadhana ra basa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

jiu dukheko niko hune bhandai naama nakhuleko jadibuti sewana gardaa dhanakutaa nagarapaalikaa belaharaa basne warsiya maadhawa pradhaanako mumgalabaara bihaana marityu bhaeko chha bhane janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

aitabaara inaarako rina haalne kramamaa maatoko dhisko khasera puriekaa maajhiko somabaara raatimaatra marita awasthaamaa uddaara garieko mahaanagariya prahari parisara kaathamaadaunkaa pramukha ewum prahari waristha upariksaka basanta laamaale jaanakaari dinubhayo maajhiko sawa phita talabaata nikaalieko uhaanle bataaunubhayo

maato nikai kamajora bhaeko kaarana ukta ghatanaa ghatepani nepaali senaa nepaala prahari ra sasastra prahari balako sumyukta tolile sawa nikaaleko ho sawa pariksanakaa laagi tribhuwana siksana aspataala mahaaraajaganja pathaaeko praharile janaaeko chha
belukaa baje khaanaa pakaaune kramamaa jhaapaakaae paathaamaari sthita bhaarati kumaari yaadawakaae gharamaa agalaagi hudaan ekai pariwaarakaa janaa jalera ghaaite bhaekaa hun

baapa numko motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa hudaanmotarasaaikala chaalaka widura napaa laamaataarakaa warsakaa winoda thaapaamagarako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka karisnabahaadura pallimagarale jaanakaari dinubhayo

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite thaapaamagarako upachaarako kramamaa jillaa aspataala trisulimaa marityu bhaeko ho tyasamaa sawaaraghaaite warsakaa wisesa thaapaamagarakaae saaehi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

saaradaa nagarapaalikaa srinagarabaata laanitabajaara jaandai gareko raata numko tryaaktara somabaara raati durghatanaa hudaatryaaktara chaalaka saaradaa nagarapaalikaa chisaapaanikaa warsiya karisna daangi ra saaradaa nagarapaalikaa chaibaanajyulaa niwaasi warsiya amara budhaathokiko marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya salyaanale janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa pari gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa duwaikaae upachaarakaae kramamaa jillaa aspataala salyaanamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha tryaaktara sadakadekhi mitara tala saaradaa nadimaa khaseko chha
durghatanaako wisayamaa bhane thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

durghatanaamaa sohi thaaun basne warsiya balabahaadura paataamagara sameta janaa ghaaite bhaekaale upachaarako laagi pokharaatarpha pathaaieko chha tyaaktara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

chitawana khairahani nagarapaalikaa dharamapurasthita bhitri sadakakhandamaa naa ta nambarako tyaaktarabaata khasera taayarale kichdaa tyaaktaramaa sawaara sohi thaaun basne warsiya phagunaa chaudhariko aitabaara saanjha ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara sahita chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
kataari nagarapaalikaa thaliyaakaa lila bahaadura magarakaa chhoraa warsiya ayusa magarakomarityu bhaeko haae

gaaiko puchchhara ra baalakako kammaramaa dorile baandhieko awasthaamaa gaaile ghisaardaa marityubhaeko huna sakne ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kataarikaa pramukha dhruwakumaara sresthale jaanakaari dinubhayo
karenta laagekaa thaamilaai upachaarako laagi charikota praathamika swaasthya kendra lyaaune kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko pariwaarale bataaekaa chhan

chandraagiri nagarapaalikaa maa inaaramaa rina haalne kramamaa maatomaa chipliera khasdaa sindhuli ghara bhai chandraagirikai mahaadewasthaana basne warsakaa raama maajhikomarityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

purwapaschima raajamaarga antargata lamahi nagarapaalikaanartimaa raa pa nambarako motarasaaikala haate tyaaktarasanga thokindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka lamahi kaa warsiya susila chaudhariko marityu bhaeko ho
durghatanaamaagambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaudhariko lamahi aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaajyaana gaeko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya lamahile janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa tyaaktara chaalaka buddhiraama chaudhari ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara raapti gaaunpaalikaa kaa amisa chaudhari ghaaite bhaekaachhan duwai ghaaitekaaeahile butawalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
jhaapaako mechinagara nagarapaalikaa sthita dhulaawaari chandragadhi sadakakhandamaa aitabaara trakako thakkarabaata janaa paidalayaatriko jyaana gaeko chha

uttarabaata daksinatarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako trakale paidala hindirahekaa jhaapaa baahradarsi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya chunu hemaranalaai thakkara dindaajyaana gaeko prahari janaaeko chha
thakkarabaata hemaranako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaankadabhittaale janaaeko chha traka ra chaalakalaai prahariko niyantranamaa raakhieko chha

risina okhlebaata risina sapaanaditarpha gairaheko ga ta nambarako tyaaktara atyadhika gatikaa kaarana durghatanaamaa pareko hunasakne risina gaaunpaalikaakaa karmachaari daanabahaadura sresthale jaanakaari die

durghatanaamaa pareko tyaaktara sadakabaata kariba mitara tala khaseko chhaghaaitelaai prahari ra sthaaniyale uddhaara garera pokharaa upachaarakaa laagi pathaaeko sresthale bataae ghaaiteko paschimaanchala ksetriya aspataala pokharaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
baitadiko paatanamaa gredarale kichera eka widyaarthiko marityu bhaepachhi dosimaathi kaarawaahi ra pidita pariwaaralaai ksatipurtiko maaga gardai aphanta ra widyaarthi andolita bhaekaa chhan
sanibaara belukaa bajetira paatanasthita bhimadatta politeknila inschyiutamaa adhyayanarata paatana nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya purnaananda paandeyalaai gredarale kichdaajyaana gaeko thiyo

bajaara ksetramaa tiwra gatimaa gudiraheko gredarale aniyantrita bhai wimaanasthala laainamaa paidala hindirahekaa paandeyalaai kicheko thiyo gredarako thakkarale paandeyako ghatanaasthalamai jyaana gaeko ra gredara chaalaka ratana budhaa pharaara bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya paatanakaa prahari niriksaka gindra bogatile jaanakaari dinubhayo pharaara chaalakako sanibaara belukaa dekhi nai khoji kaarya bhairaheko bhae pani ahile samma phelaa napareko uhaanle bataaunubhayo thakkara dine gredara paatana wimaanasthala kaalopatre garne jimmaa paaeko nirmaana kampanile prayoga gariraheko bujhieko chha

akraasita aphanta ra widyaarthile ahile paatana bajaara banda garaaera dasarathachanda raajamaarga awaruddha paarekaa chhan yasakaa saathai paatana bajaarako chokachokamaa taayara baalnukaa saathai dosimaathi kadaa kaarawaahiko maaga gardai naaraabaaji garirahekaa chhan pradarsanakaa kramamaa janaa widyaarthi ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

dosilaai kadaa kaarawaahi garnuparne aphuharuko maaga raheko widyaarthi tejaprasaada bhattale bataae unale bhane haamile saathi gumaaekaa chhaum dosilaai kaarawaahi hunuparyopidita pariwaarale ksatipurti paaunu paryohaamro maaga puraa nahundaasamma banda khuldain

pidita pariwaarale sawa bujhna namaanekaa kaarana maritakako sawa paatana praathamika swaasthya kendrako sawa gharamaa raakhieko chha raajamaarga suchaaru garnakaa laagi pidita paksa paatana nagarapaalikaa ra sambandhita nirmaana kampanikaa pratinidhibicha chhalaphala garne tayaari bhairaheko prahari niriksaka bogatile jaanakaari die
baitadi kapilawastu kanchanapura dhanusaa ra sarlaahikaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

baitadi paatana nagarapaalikaa sthita bhimadatta poli teknikala agaadi sanibaara saanjha anatesta lekhieko jesibile sadaka khanne kramamaa chyaapiera sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya purnananda paandeko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

kapilawastu buddhabhumi imiliyaasthita sadakamaa lu ta nambarako tyaaktarale lu pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai sanibaara raati thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sohi sthaana basne warsiya santaraama thaaruko nambara saamudaayika aspataala kapilawastumaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

kanchanapura suklaaphaantaa nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa ma pa nambarako motarasaaikala sanibaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya buddhiraama chaudharilaai upachaarako laagi seti amchala aspataala dhanagadhitarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

dhanusaa mukhiyaapatti musaharaniyaa gaaunpaalikaa phechaahasthita bhitri sadakamaa ja ta nambarako tyaaktara sanibaara raati aphai aniyantrita bhai paltindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa tyaaktaramaa sawaara sohi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya wikesa raamalaai upachaarako laagi janakapura amchala aspataalatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha

sarlaahi laalabandi nagarapaalikaa jutapaanisthita sadakamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata paidalayaatri sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiyaa dhanamaayaa kaarkiko sanibaara raati marityu bhaeko chha
ukta motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaeki unako churehila aspataala makawaanapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka haripura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya manoja raautako modala aspataala nawalapuramaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite chaalaka chaubise kaa warsiya mohanasimha taamaanako upachaarakaa kramamaa aitabaara bihaana bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana dharaanamaa marityu bhaeko ho
jhaapaapurwapaschima raajamaargaantargata kamala gaaunpaalikaa paadaajungimaa bhaeko motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa ekajanaako marityu bhaeko chha

purwabaata paschimatarpha aundai gareko me pa nambarako motarasaaikala sadakamaa rokera raakhieko baa cha nambarako kaaramaa thokkindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka warsiya kumaara giri ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara warsiya mahendra bhattaraai gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa thie
motarasaaikala ra kaaralaai niyantranamaa liera ghatanaako anusandhaana suru garieko praharile janaaeko chha

phattepurako sidhanawaasthita sidhanawaa raaisa milamaa dhaana kutaauna gaeki raaptisonaari sidhanawaa niwaasi warsiyaa smariti thaaruko marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya bhagawaanapurakaa pramukha prahari niriksaka wirendra wikele jaanakaari dinubhayo
ghatanaasthala sadaramukaama nepaalaganjadekhi kariba kilomitara taadhaa raapti nadipaari pardachha maritaka thaaruko sawalaai pariksanakaa laagi bheri aspataala nepaalaganjamaa raakhieko chha
janti wokera ratnanagarabaata maaditarpha jaandai gareko basa durghatanaa hundaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha basamaa sawaara janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
durghatanaamaaghaaite bhaekaa maadi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya mithuna chaudharikoupachaarakaa kramamaa bharatapura aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa praharile janaaeko chha
basa maadi nagarapaalikaa bankattaamaa naakha numko basa aniyantrita hundaa paltieko thiyo ghaaiteko bharatapura aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha chaalaka pharaara chhan

ma kha nambarako tiparalebhimadatta nagarapaalikaa naulaakheta chauraaha najikai thakkara dindaa sthaaniya warsiya baalaka wikaasa aidikomarityu bhaeko ho baalakako ghatnaasthalamaa nai jyaana gaeko praharile janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaaaimbaata okhaladhumgaajaandai gareko baa kha nambarako basa ra solukhumbuuko nele baata kaathamaadaum jaadai garekaa naa ja nambarako sumo thokidaa sumomaa sawaara janaa yaatru ghaaite bhaekaa huna solukhumbu neliki warsiya dewaukumaari khatri ki karisna kumaari khatri mogareki warsa ki dhanakumaari saarki thulungadudhakosi gaaunpaalikaa warsa ki jaammu serpaa ra unakaa tina warsiya chhoraa saamge serpaa sahita sumo chaalaka sindhupaalchokakaa warsiya raajendra baaniyaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

ghaaite janaa madhye ekako awasthaa gambhira raheko asthaayi prahari chauki phikala sindhulikaa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka sadaananda yaadawale jaanakaari diekaa chhan ghaaite solukhumbuki barsiya dewakumaari khatriko awasthaa gambhira raheko yaadawale bataae khatriko haanta bhaachinukaa saathai nidhaaramaa chota laageko chha unalaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaum pathaaieko chha anyako udayapurako ghurmimaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

madhyepahaadi lokamaargaantaragata sindhuliko phikkala gaaunpaalikaa sthita jhagaremaa bihibaara diunso basa ra sumo thokkindaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhankaathamaadaumbaata okhaladhungaatarpha jaandai gareko baa kha nambarako basa ra wiparita disaabaata airaheko naa ja nambarako taataa sumo thokkindaa sumomaa sawaara janaa yaatru ghaaite bhaekaa hun
moranako wiraatanagara mahaanagarapaalikaa maa bihiwaara diunso tyaaktarako thakkarabaata janaa paidala yaatri mahilaako marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktarako thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite raayakaae upachaarako kramamaanyuro aspataala wiraatanagaramaa marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya raanile janaaeko chha
thakkara dine tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii anusandhaana garirahekaae chha
kaathamaadaum wasantapurasthita eka gyaasa storamaa bihibaara agalaagi bhaeko chha
rupandehi rautahata ra baaraamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

rautahata chandrapura nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako trakale baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai budhabaara saanjha thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka chandrapura nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bikrama laamaako upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
dubai sawaari saadhana ra traka chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baaraa nijagadha nagarapaalikaa tehra kilosthita sadakamaa naa ja nambarako taataa sumole haala naama thara watana nakhulekaa andaaji warsiya purusa byaktilaai budhabaara raati thakkara dindaa ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha thakkara dine sumo ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
syaanajaamaa pokharimaa dubera warsiyaa baalikaakaae marityu bhaeko chha
galyaanga nagarapaalikaa maalungaa basne suklaa gandaki nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa surya kumaalako warsiyaa chhori yunikaa kumaalako pokharimaa dubera budhabaara saanjha marityu bhaeko chha
khelne kramamaa sohi sthaanamaa raheko pokharimaa dubera asakta bhaeki unako maalungaa praathamika swaasthya kendramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
kaabhre deukhurikaa raailaai upachaarakaa laagi naagarika aspataala gaththaaghara puryaaie pani chikitsakale marita ghosanaa gareko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

mahaanagariya prahari baritta thimile thakkara dine motarasaaikalakaa chaalaka kaadamaadaum kaa arunakumaara srestha ra basakaa chaalaka sindhupaalchokakaa taaraabahaadura taamaanalaai niyantranamaa lieko chha
ghatanaakaa thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
bhaktapuramaa karenta laagera ekajanaako jyaana gaekaae chha bhaktapura suryawinaayaka nagarapaalikaa adarsachokakaa gowindaprasaada chhukkaako jyaana gaeeko ho

bhaktapura nagarapaalikaa golamadikaa kesaba kawaanako gharamaa wijuli marmata garne kramamaa karenta laagera ghaaite bhaekaachhukkaakoupachaarako kramamaa bhaktapura aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
kailaaliko tikaapuramaa baaghako akramanabaata praharisahita duijanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
bihibaara bihaana tikaapura blaka na maa aeko baaghalaai gheraa haalne kramamaa traaphika praharidewibhakta dhitaala ra eka sthaaniya baalaka samraata saaha ghaaite bhaekaa hun

bardiyaa raastriya nikunjabaata wanako toli bolaaiko tikaapura nagara paalikaakaa pramukha tapendrabahaadura raawalale bataae ghanaa wasti raheko thaaunmaa baagha dekhiepachhi sthaaniya trasita banekaa chhan
makawaanapurako haattiletamaa basale thakkara didaa baato kaatdai garekaa eka wariddhako jyaana gaeko chha
makawaanapurako chhatiwanabaata hetaumdaatarpha aundai gareko naa kha nambarako basako thakkarale sthaaniya barsiya premaprasaada ghimireko jyaana gaeko praharile janaaeko chha
bardiyaa makawaanapura ra saptarimaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

bardiyaa baansagadhi nagarapaalikaa sthita mainaapokharabaansagadhi bhitri sadakakhandamaa bhe ta nambarako tyaaktarale baa cha nambarako kaaralaai mumgalabaara saanjha thakkara dimdaa tyaaktaramaa sawaara sohi thaaun basne warsiyaa somaa yaadawako tyaaktarabaata khasera marityu bhaeko chha
duwai sawaari saadhana ra tyaaktara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa newaarapaanisthita purwapaschima raajamaargamaa baa cha nambarako kaarale naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dimdaa ukta motarasaaikala puna biparita disaabaata aundai gareko naa kha nambarako trakamaa sameta thokkina jaandaa motarasaaikala chaalaka lamajuna ghara bhaekaa warsiya gobinda thokarako mumgalabaara saanjha ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi thaaunsthita bakaiyaa gaaunpaalikaa raajadamaara basne warsiya chandra baaniyaa ghaaite bhaekaale upachaarako laagi churehila aspataala hetaumdaa pathaaieko chha
tina watai sawaari saadhana traka chaalaka ra kaara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

saptari hanumaananagara nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa sa ta nambarako tyaaktarale sa ha nambarako ato riksaalaai maagha gate thakkara dimdaa ato riksaamaa sawaara sohi thaaun basne warsiya bechana pandita gambhira ghaaite bhaekaale dharaana ghopaa aspataala pathaaekomaa upachaarako kramamaa budhabaara bihaana marityu bhaeko chha

kaathamaadaumbaata rukumakaa laagi chhuteko naa kha basa jillaako saaradaa nagarapaalikaa chaiwaanajyulaa durghatanaamaa pareko ho durghatanaamaa ghaaiteharuko srinagarakaa wibhinna aspataalaharumaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

pujaari timalsinaako upachaaraartha dhulikhela aspataala laijaandai gardaa mangalabaara raati baatomai marityu bhaeko prahari chauki dhunkharkakaa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka karisna thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaankaa anusaara mandirasangai raheko gaaunpaalikaa kaaryaalayako maathillo talaamaa pujaari timalsinaa basdai aunubhaeko thiyo

ghaaite hunemaa warsiyaa ujali naatha warsiyaa nirmalaa naatha ra warsiya sanjaya naatha raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baajuraale janaaeko chha ghaaite sabaiko jillaa aspataala maartadimaa upachaara bhairaheko prahari naayaba niriksaka lokendrasimha gurule jaanakaari dinubhayo
kaathamaadaum raamechhaapa ra nawalaparaasipaschimamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaa hundaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

raamechhaapa manthalibaata maalukholaatarpha jaandai gareko baa ja nambarako maaikrobasa manthali nagarapaalikaa akaase pula najika sadakabaata andaaji saya mitara tala khasdaa maaikrobasamaa sawaara mustaanakaa raamaprasaada tulaachanako saamudaayika aspataala manthalimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaeki sohi maaikrobasamaa sawaara manthaliki anjanaa khadkaako saamudaayika aspataala manthalimaa upachaara paschaata thapa upachaarako laagi graandi aspataala kaathamaadaum riphara garieko chha
maaikrobasa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata jhaapaako damaka sthita karisna mandira sadakakhandamaa duiwataa motarasaaikala ekaapasamaa thaaekkidaa ekajanaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane tinajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

gae raati kariba baje karisna mandira chokamaa purwabaata paschima jaandai gareko mepa numko motarasaaikala ra paschimabaata purwa aundai gareko kopa numko motarasaaikala ekaapasamaa thaaekkieko thiyo

durghatanaamaa ilaama chulaachulikaa warsiya puranakumaara raaiko marityu bhaeko chha bhane damaka kaa warsiya sujana dhimaala paanchathara phaalgunanda gaaunpaalikaakaa ramesa tumroka ra parichaya khulna nasakeko andaaji warsiya eka wyakti ghaaite bhaeko chha

ghaaite sabaiko wiraatanarasthita nyuro aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya damakale janaaeko chha maritaka raai samaajawaadi yuwaa phoramakaa pradesa num samitikaa sahasumyojaka sameta raheko bataaieko chha

agalaagibaata kaarkiki warsiyaa chhori samjhanaa kaarkiko jalera marityu bhaeko ho kaarkiko bihaana baje kaathale baneko duitale gharamaa agalaagi hanudaa chhori samjhanaako gharabhitrai jalera marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa adhikaari naaraayana gautamale jaanakaari dinubhayo

amaa raamamaayaalaai sthaaniya swaasthyachaukimaa upachaara huna nasakepachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagi dharaanasthita wipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana lagieko sthaaniyawaasile bataaekaa chhan agalaagi ke kaaranabaata bhayo bhanera anusandhaana bhairaheko suchanaa adhikaari gautamale bataaunubhayo agalaagibaata ru laakha baraabarako ksati bhaeko praharile anumaana gareko chha
daana baaraa makawaanapura ra sunasarimaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

daana tulsipura upamahaanagarapaalikaa baraakhuttisthita sadakamaa tulsipurabaata phulawaaritarpha jaandai gareko raa ta nambarako tyaaktarako taayarale chyaapiyara sahachaalaka sohi upamahaanagarapaalikaa aswaaraa basne warsiya jitabahaadura chaudhariko aitabaara raati ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

baaraa parawaanipura gaaunpaalikaa sthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako basale naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai aitabaara raati thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka parsaa wiragumja mahaanagarapaalikaa belawaa tola basne warsiya raamaraajaa dahita thaaruko gandaka aspataala wiragumjamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa thaanaabharyaanasthita sadakamaa naa ja nambarako taataasumo jipako thakkarabaata haala naama thara watana nakhuleki paidalayaatri warsiyaa mahilaako somabaara bihaana marityu bhaeko chha

ukta jipale mahilaa ra unakaa mahinaakaa chhoraalaai thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhai upachaarako laagi churehila aspataala hetaumdaa hundai thapa upachaarako laagi puraano medikala kaleja bharatapura lagiekomaa upachaarako kramamaa mahilaako marityu bhaeko ho

sunasari duhabi nagarapaalikaa simariyaasthita sadakamaa ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala somabaara bihaana aphai aniyantrita bhai bijuliko polamaa thokkindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya paraweja khaanako biraata narsina homa biraatanagaramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha motarasaaikala ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
ilaama nagarapaalikaa dhobidhaaraa deraa gari basne paanchatharakaa warsiya sumgina limbuko karenta laagera aitabaara diuso marityu bhaeko chha
gharako chhatamaa latrieko taarabaata karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa limbuko jillaa aspataala ilaamamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

kaaskiko annapurna gaaunpaalikaa ko dhikurapokhari basne warsiyaa diwyaa adhikaariko phewaataalamaa ghopto pareko awasthaamaa sawa bhetieko baidaama kaaryaalayakaa pramukha komala saahale jaanakaari garaaunubhaeko chha

narsina kalejamaa adhyayanarata adhikaari aja bihaanai kyaampasa jaanakaa laagi gharabaata hindeko bataaieko chha unako sawa pokharaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaanamaa pariksanakaa laagi pathaaieko chha

marityu hunemaa sohi wadaakaa gowardhana khatriki warsiyaa chhori sirjanaa raheko baajuraa jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa nimitta prahari naayaba upariksaka lokendrasimha gurule jaanakaari dinubhayo bubaasangai milamaa gaeki sirjanaale odheko pachhauraa chaliraheko milale taandaa uni ladera taaramaa chhoekile karenta laagera marityu bhaeko uhaanle bataaunubhayo
maritaka kisoriko sawa pariksakaa laagi kolti praathamika swaasthya kendra laagieko chha mila maritaka kisoriko bubaale sanchaalana gardai aeko bataaieko chha
tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa linukaa saathai yasa sambandhamaa thapa awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha

gharamai sutkeri garaaeko umera saanai bhaeko ra swaasthya sumsthaamaa lyaauna dhilaai garekaa kaarana uhaanko nidhana bhaeko raajapuura gaanupaalikaa swaasthya saakhaa pramukha kamala rokaayaale bataaunuubhayo bachchaako swaasthya awasthaa raamrai raheko uhaanle bataaunubhayo

taaplejunamaa budhabaara bhaeko helikaptara durghatanaamaa pari marityu hunubhaekaa sumskariti paryatana tathaa naagarika uddayanamantri rawindraprasaada adhikaarisahita saatai janaako sawa kaathamaadaun lyaaieko chha

durghatanaamaa mantri adhikaari yati eyaralaainsakaa prabandha nirdesaka anachhirina serpaa nepaala naagarika uddayana praadhikaranakaa upamahaanirdesaka wirendraprasaada srestha ra nirdesaka dhurawa bhochhibhoyaa pradhaanamantri tathaa mantriparisad kaaryaalayakaa upasachiwa yuwaraaja daahaala helikaptarakaa kyaaptena prabhaakara kesi ra mantri adhikaarikaa suraksaakarmi arjunakumaara ghimireko nidhana bhaeko thiyo
helikaptara durghatanaamaa pari nidhana hunubhaekaa sumskariti paryatana tathaa naagarika uddayanamantri rawindra adhikaariko antyesti uhaanko gariha jillaa kaaskimaa hunebhaeko chha

kaaski ksetra num baata sanghiya sumsadkaa laagi nirwaachita adhikaariko sawa sukrabaara bihaana bajedekhi pokharaa pradarsani kendramaa antima sraddhaanjalikaa laagi raakhne tayaari bhairaheko uhaankaa swakiya sachiwa raajendra achaaryale jaanakaari dinubhayo
mantri adhikaari pokharaa bharatapokhariko jaamunaabotamaa janmanubhaeko ho

sumskariti paryatana tathaa naagarika uddayanamantri rawindra adhikaarilagaayata helikaptara durghatanaamaa pari marityu bhaekaaharu sabai sawako wimaanasthalamaa muchulkaa gari ajai kaathamaadaun pathaaine pramukha jillaa adhikaari anuja bhandaarile raasasalaai jaanakaari dinubhayo kaathamaadaunbaata tehrathumako chuhaanadaandaamaa wimaanasthalako sambhaawyataa adhyayanakaa laagi mantri adhikaarisahitako toli kaaryakrama sakera paathibharaa hundai kaathamaadaun pharkine kramamaa budhabaara taaplejunako daarebhiramaa durghatanaamaa pareko thiyo

durghatanaagrasta helikaptarakaa yaatruharukaa sawa kaathamaadaun pathaauna awasyaka kaanuni prakriyaa puraa garna wimaanasthalamai baseko jillaa suraksaa samitiko baithakale taaplejunamaa sawapariksana huna nasakne thahara gareko chha

taaplejunamaa nirantara himapaata bhairaheko chha ra adhikaamsa ksetramaa kuhirole dhaakiraheko chha pramukha jillaa adhikaari anuja bhandaarikaa anusaara mausamamaa sudhaara aune bittikai sawaharu kaathamaadaun pathaainechhan

hijo budhabaara diunso sumskariti paryatana tathaa naagarika uddayana mantri rawindra adhikaarisahita saatajanaa chadheko daainesti eyarako helikaptara sisnebhira najikai durghatanaagrasta hundaa sabai saatajanaako nidhana bhaeko thiyo

sumskariti paryatana tathaa naagarika uddayanamantri rawindraprasaada adhikaarisahita sawaara eyara daainestiko helikaptara aja taaplejunako mayama taarebhiramaa durghatanaagrasta hundaa helikaptaramaa sawaara saatai janaako nidhana bhaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya taaplejunakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka sanjayasimha thaapaakaa anusaara phunalina nagarapaalikaa sthita sisnemaa sawaharu phelaa pareko ho helikaptara bhiramaa thokieko rahechha prahari naayaba upariksaka bhandaarile raasasasangako phona samparkamaa bhannubhayo chharapasta awasthaamaa saata wataa sawa dadheko awasthaamaa prahari tolile phelaa paareko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa suchanaa adhikaari prahari naayaba upariksaka prakaasa wistale dinubhaeko jaanakaarianusaara baacha numko bolero jipa sadaka chheumaa raakhna laagdaa pasalamaa kuraa gari basekaa galchhi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kaa warsiyaa jamunaa bhujela ra sohi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kaa warsiyaa kaanchhi taamaanako marityu bhaeko ho bhujelako ghatanaasthalamai ra taamaanako upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho ghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaeki galchhi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num ki warsiyaa dhanakumaari taamaanako paatana aspataalamaa upachaarakaa laagi bharnaa garieko chha ghatanaapachhi gaadi chaalaka pharaara bhaekaale khoji bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

lamajuna sundarabajaara nagarapaalikaa dhaaraapaani ghara bhai haala wanasthali basne ghaaite nyaupaaneko upachaarakaa kramamaa grinasiti aspataala basundharaamaa nidhana bhaeko mahaanagariya traaphika prahari waritta nayaan basapaarkakaa pramukha jhalakabahaadura thaapaamagarale jaanakaari dinubhayo

nepaala modala maadhyaamika widyaalaya basundharaakaa adhyaksasameta rahanubhaekaa maritaka nyaupaanele saautha wesrtana kaleja basundharaamaa bhautika wijnaana tathaa ganaita wisayamaa laamo samayadekhi siksana gardai aunubhaeko thiyo durghatanaa garaaune basakaa chaalaka raamechhaapakaa warsiya mekhabahaadura kaarki ra basalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
gambhira ghaaite raautako upachaarako kramamaa meghaa aspataala marityu bhaeko chha motarasaaikala chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

kapilawastu kapilawastu nagarapaalikaa babanisthita sadakamaa baa cha nambarako skaarapiyo ra lu pa nambarako motarasaaikala ekaapasamaa thakkara khaai budhabaara raati durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara rupandehi siddhaarthanagara gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya gumgaasaagara harijanako jillaa aspataala taulihawaamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara janaa ra paidalayaatri janaako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha skaarapiyo chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

durghatanaamaa tyaaktarakaa chaalaka udayapura triyugaa nagarapaalikaa kaa durgaa bahaadura magara ra sohi tyaaktaramaa sawaara rautaamaai gaaunpaalikaa anpataarakaa dila bahaadura raaiko ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya udayapurale janaaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaiteanya janaalaai upachaarako laagi jillaa aspataala udayapura pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha

kaabhrekaae naalaabaata bhaktapura tarpha aundai gareko baa kha num ko tiparale chaangunaaraayana nagarapaalikaa taathalimaa aja diunso baa pa num ko motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka kanchanapura ghara bhaekaa warsiya wisuraaja pantako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

puraano risiwilaai liera wiwaada badhdai jaandaa bhaeko jhagadaamaa khukuri haanaahaana hundaasthaaniya warsiya jiwanakumaara yaadawa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unimaathi budhigumgaa kaa warsiya mausama raai sawina raauta sujita hinamaana warsiya suwaasa nepaali ra patharisanischare nagarapaalikaakaa warsiya abhiseka raai sametako samuhale khukuri prahaara gareko morana prahari pramukha esapi manojakumaara kesile bataae

praharikaa anusaara ghatanaamaa sumlagna abhiseka pharaara rahekaa kaarana khoji tiwra paarieko chha mausama sawina sujita ra suwaasalaai bhane niyantranamaa liera ghatanaako anusandhaana suru garieko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
panthako saathabaata graama saya miligraama braaunasugara khairo heroina phelaa pareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bardiyaakaa prahari upariksaka surendraprasaada mainaalile bataae

pakraau garieko kariba hajaara rupaiyaan baraabarako laaguausadhale saya janaa maanisalaai prabhaawita paarnasakne unako bhanaai chha anusandhaanakaa kramamaa panthale puriyaa banaai bechawikhana garne gareko khulna aekaale jillaa prahari kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa raakhi anusandhaana bhairaheko bataae

mumgalabaara raati baje jayaparithwi nagarapaalikaa tamailabaata chainapuratarpha audai gareko se pa nambarako palsara baaika durghatanaa bhaeko ho durghatanaamaa pari jayaparithwi nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya pawana chhatyaala ra saaehi nagarapaalikaa kaa barsiya prema hamaalako marityu bhaeko chha bhane baaikamaa nai sabaara akaasa simha ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

jayaparithwi nagarapaalikaa wadaa num maallaalaagnepada bhiramaa sadakabaata kariba mitara tala seti nadimaa sawa bhetieko thiyo bhane mitara bichamaa baaika adkieko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha ghaaite simhakako jillaa aspataala simakhetamaaupachaara bhairaheko chha
raatiko samayamaa madiraa sewana garera baaika chalaaeko ra ksamataabhandaa badhi sawaara bhaeko kaarana ghatanaa bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya bajhaangale janaaekaae chha

dhacha numko tyaaktara uraamako haadikharkamaa mangalabaara durghatanaa hundaa sthaaniyawaasi padamabahaadura nepaali ra wikku kesiko marityu bhaeko ho nepaaliko ghatanaasthalamai tathaa kesiko upachaarakaa laagi syaanjaa laijaandai gardaa baatomaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
tyaaktarakaa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha durghatanaabaare anusandhaana bhairaheko prahari naayaba upariksaka bhuwaneswara tiwaarile bataaunubhayo
nepaala sarakaara swaasthya tathaa janasankhyaa mantraalaya ra nepaali senaako ayojanaamaa raajawiraajamaa sanchaalita barihat swaasthya siwiramaa aja eka biraamiko marityu bhaeko chha

raajawiraaja nagarapaalikaa maa raakhieko swaasthya siwiramaa upachaarakaa laagi aekaa saptariko kanchanarupa nagarapaalikaa dharmapura kaa warsiyaa gangaa mochiko marityu bhaeko saptari praharile janaaeko chha gae raatidekhi nai upachaarakaa laagi pratiksaa suchimaa basekaa mochiko aja bihaana pisaaba garna gaeko belaa ladera marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya saptarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka bhaawesa rimaalale bataaunubhayo maritakakaa srimati dhaneswari mochikaa anusaara maritaka gangaa mutu paayalsa ra tibi rogabaata grasita thie

aspataalale janaaeanusaara siwiramaa haalasamma atha hajaara biraamile opidibaata swaasthya sewaa lieko ra le salyakriyaa garne bhaekaa chhan siwiramaa chhaati mutu maanasika haadajorni danta naaka kaana ghaanti ankhaa chhaalaa striroga wisesajna saathai sarjana daaktaradwaaraa swaasthya pariksana ra harniyaa paayalsa purusa granthi haaidrosila pittathaili pathari naaka kaana ghaanti ra paathegharasambandhi salyakriyaa garindai chha

mobaaila aspataalasahita aekaa wisesajna chikitsaka swaasthyakarmiko tolile ekai sthaanamaa thuprai kisimakaa rogako upachaara garne thaahaa paaepachhi saptari sirahaa udayapura sunasari ra chhimeki muluka bhaaratako wihaarabaata dherai sankhyaamaa biraami sewaa liirahekaa chhan
raajawiraajamaa gata phaaguna gate eka samaarohakaa bicha upapradhaanamantri ewum swaasthya tathaa janasankhyaamantri upendra yaadawale swaasthya siwirako udghaatana garnubhaeko thiyo

makawaanapura hetaumdaa upamahaanagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa haala nambara nakhuleko sawaari saadhanale parichae nakhulekaa andaaji warsiya purusalaai somabaara raati thakkara dindaa ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
karenta laagera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaasresthako upachaarako laagi gajuri aspataala laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho
solukhumbumaa simenta tathaa baaluwaa phitne mikcharale chyaapiera ekajanaakaae jyaana gaeko chha

solu dudhakunda nagarapaalikaa maa raheko gaarmaa maawiko nirmaanaadhina bhawanamaa kaama garne kramamaa mikscharale chyaapiera solu dudhakunda nagarapaalikaa kaa dhanakumaara sresthako jyaana gaeko ho jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya solukhumbukaa anusaara bhawanako thekedaarasameta rahekaa sresthalaai somabaara saanjha gaadimaa mikschara loda gardai gardaa tyahi ladera tyahi mikscharale chyaapeko ho
gambhira ghaaite sresthalaai upachaarakaa laagi jillaa aspataala phaaplumaa laijaandai gardaa baataaemaanai marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa maa somabaara raati kaarako thakkarabaata ekako marityu bhaeko chha durghatanaamaa saaehi nagarapaalikaa karisnachoka niwaasi warsiya jitabahaadura saarkiko marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaekaae chha

jagatapurabaata bharatapura aundai gareko baacha numko kaarale saarkilaai thakkara dindaa saarkiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho maritaka saarkiko sawa pariksanakaa laagi bharatapura aspataalamaa raakhieko chha
thakkara dine kaara prahariko niyantranamaa chha bhane chaalakako khojikaarya bhairahekopraharile janaaekaae chha
karenta laagera baitadimaa aja bihaana eka widyut karmachaariko marityu bhaeko chha paatana nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya bhaanasimha khatrikomarityu bhaeko sthaaniya dinesa wistale jaanakaari dinubhayo

bihaana paune baje sthaaniya surnayaagaada jalawidyutko widyutgarihamaa phyuja haalna gaekaa belaa karenta laagera marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya paatanakaa prahari niriksaka gindra bogatile bataaunubhayo
phidima nagarapaalikaa laalikharkamaa skutarale thakkara dindaa eka janaa paidala yaatruko marityu bhaeko chha
sunasariko duhabi nagarapaalikaa phutaani chaukamaa somawaara yaatru baahaka basako thakkarabaata janaa paidalayaatriko marityu bhaeko chha

biraatanagarabaata dharaana tarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basale paidala hidiraheki saptari ghara bhai haala duhabi nagarapaalikaa phutaani chaukamaa basne barsa ki rekhaa jhaalaai thakkara dieko thiyo basako thakkarabaata jhaako ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya duhabile janaaeko chha
thakkara dine wasa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii anusandhaana garirahekaae chha

chainapurabaata dhaamikhelakaa laagi chhuteko se ja nambarako jipa aitabaara raati kaaprikotamaa durghatanaa hundaa jayaparithwi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsakaa dhaule josi ra warsiyaa samu josikomarityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
sunasariko gadhi gaaunpaalikaa siwa mandira najika aitawaara tyaaktarako tralile kichera chaalakako marityu bhaeko chha

ko ta nambarako tyaaktaramaa simenta ra rada analoda garne kramamaa tyaaktarako haaidrolika bigriera banaauna khojdaa tyaaktarako trali khasera kichdaa sohi tyaaktarakaa chaalaka duhabi nagarapaalikaa tanamunaa basne barsa ko dhirendra chaudhariko ghatanaa sthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko ho
chaudhariko sawa pariksanako laagi pathaaieko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya duhabile janaaeko chha
jillaako atharaai gaaunpaalikaa hwaakukaa sthaaniya rudra khaatiko gharamaa ago laagdaa unakaa barsiya chhoraa mausama khaatiko jalera jyaana gaeko ho

simhadarabaaratarpha aundai gareko motarasaaikalalaai baakha nambarako basale thakkara dimdaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara manamaijuki asmitaa paudela gambhira ghaaite bhaeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
saathiharusanga paudi khelne kramamaa paanimaa dubi asakta bhaekaa unalaai upachaarako laagi lumbini anchala aspataala butawalatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho

ghara najikai khelne kramamaa sanibaara diuso dhungaa paltiera chyaanpidaa naraharinaatha nagarapaalikaa kotawaaraa basne nirabahaadura bistako warsiyaa chhoraa bhaabuka bistako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

paschimabaata purwatarpha jaandai gareko naa kha num ko maidaa pitho bokeko traka aniyantrita bhai rukhamaa thokie durghatanaa hudaa trakamaa sawaara baaraa nijagadha nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya bharata taamaana ra udayapurakaa warsiya asoka laamaako ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko prahari naayaba upariksaka bhaawesa rimaalale bataaunubhayo
traka chaalaka baaraa jillaa nijagadha nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya saurabha laamaa ghaaite bhaekaale unako theliyaasthita dharmeswara aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo

diunsoko samayamaa jharisangai pareko chatyaana laagera phaalgunanda gaaunpaalikaa pauwaasaarataapakaa warsiya bhagendra taamaanako marityu bhaeko ho chatyaana laagera unakai bhaai warsiya manakumaara taamaana ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite taamaanako paanchathara aspataalamaa praathamika upachaarapachhi jhaapaa siphaarisa garieko chha

paani pareko samayamaa gharamai basekaa belaa chatyaana pardaa daajuko ghatanaasthalamai jyaana gaeko ra bhaai ghaaite bhaeko paanchathara praharile janaaeko chha yastai sanibaarai pareko chatyaana laagera jillaako phaaleluna gaaunpaalikaa praabunamaa pani atha ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

sthaaniya phaudamaana taamaanako gharamaa chatyaana pardaa gharamaa basiraheko maanisa ghaaite bhaekaa hun uniharuko sthaaniya swaasthyachaukimaa upachaara bhairaheko paanchathara praharile janaaeko chha

tyasaigari sohi samayamaa jillaa paanchathara phidima nagarapaalikaa sarasiulaa basne warsiya dipaka siwaa aphnai gharamaa sutiraheko awasthaamaa achaanaka chatyaana pari tyasako jhatakaale sarirako wibhinna bhaagamaa chota laagi jillaa aspataala paanchatharamaa upachaarapaschaata ghara pharkiekaa chhan
syaanjaako galyaana nagarapaalikaa sthita dharaadimaa tyaaktara durghatanaa hundaa chaalakakaae marityu bhaeko chha

lu ta nambarako tkyaakatara siddhaartha raajamaargabaata kariba saya mitara tala dharaadi kholaamaa khasdaa gulmi satyawati gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya baaburaama pariyaarako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

budhabaara bihaana bajetira kumchanarupa nagarapaalikaa sthita jumgala ksetrabaata aeko chituwaale akramana gardaa saaehinagarapaalikaakaaraajawati dewi chaudhari bharata chaudhari hiraananda chaudhari mahaawati chaudhari ra satya naaraayana chaudhari ghaaite bhaeko saptari praharile janaaeko chha
ghaaitemadhye raajawatidewiko sthaaniya aspataalamaa tathaa baankilaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi wiraatanagara pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya raajawiraajale janaaeko chha

purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata sirahaako mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa aja bihaana skula basa ra tempo ekaapasamaa thokkindaa ekako marityu bhaeko chha bhane eka janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

purwabaata paschimatarpha jaandai gaeko naa kha nambarako skula basa ra wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko naa cha nambarako tempo ekaapasamaa thokkindaa tempumaa sawaara mirchaiyaa nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya wirendra saahako marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya mirchaiyaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka sukadewa khanaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
morana syaanajaa ra achhaamamaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

morana urlaabaari nagarapaalikaa meritolasthita sadakamaa me ta nambarako tyaaktara mumgalabaara durghatanaa hundaa tyaaktara sahachaalaka madhye jhaapaa siwasataaksi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya rasika laala hastaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

syaanajaa waalina nagarapaalikaa laampaataasthita sadakamaa waalinatarpha jaandai gareko jesiwi mumgalabaara diuso sadakabaata andaaji mitara tala khasera durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka arghaakhaanchikaa warsiya karisna pariyaarako upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa jesiwimaa sawaara waalina nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bhaktabahaadura gotaamekopraathamika swaasthya kendra waalinamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
sunasariko baraahaksetra nagarapaalikaa bichapaanimaa bhaeko agalaagimaa laakha bhandaa badhiko ksati bhaeko chha

mumgalawaara diuso baje sthaaniya siwanaaraayana sresthako gaaigothamaa achaanaka agalaagi bhai gaaigotha jalera nasta hundaa laakha hajaara baraabarako ksati bhaeko prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha

gaaethamaa salkiekaae agaae sresthako chhimeki ganaesa kaarkiko tale kachchi gharamaa salkina gai ghara bhitra raheko sampurna samaana jalera nasta hundaa laakha baraabarako ksati bhaeko chha ukta agalaagi prahari toli sthaaniyawaasi ra damakalako sahayogamaa belukaa baje purna rupamaa niyantranamaa aeko tathaa kunai pani maanawiya tathaa chaupaayaa ksati nabhaeko ukta kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

bihaana sindhuli bahumukhi kyaampasa padhna jaandai gareko samayamaa kamalaamaai nagarapaalikaa dhungrebaasamaa sumole thakkara dindaa sindhuli bahumukhi kyaampasamaa adhyayanarata rojinaa kaarki ra manitaa thaapaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

ghaaitemadhye rojinaako awasthaa gambhira rahekaale upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaun pathaaieko ra manitaako sindhuli aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha widyaarthile dosilaai kaarawaahi widyaarthiko upachaarako maaga gardai sadakamaa utriera raajamaarga abaruddha paarekaa chhan

widyaarthilaai thakkara diera pharaara raheko baacha numko sumolaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sindhulikaa prahari upariksaka chakrabahaadura simhale jaanakaari dinubhayo sumo ra sumo chaalakalaai sindhulimaadhibaata kaathamaadauntarpha jaandai gardaa sindhuligadhi najikabaata niyantranamaa lieko ra awasyaka kaarawaahi garinesameta uhaanle bataaunubhayo

kaathamaadaanaibaata taraaikaa jillaa tathaa taraaikaa jillaabaata kaathamaadaun hindekaa sawaari sindhulimai rokiekaa chhan widyaarthile raajamaarga awaruddha paarekaale sawaarisaadhanalaai gantawyatarpha waikalpika maargabaata pathaaune tayaari gariraheko prahari upariksaka simhale bataaunubhayo
taarakeswara gaaunpaalikaa taapusthita trisuli nadiko kinaaraamaa kaathamaadaum teku basne warsiyaa saanti sunaarako sawa bhetieko nuwaakota praharile jaanakaari dieko chha
sawalaai postamaartamakaa laagi nuwaakota jillaa aspataala trisulimaa pathaaieko chha ghatanaako sambandhamaa nuwaakota praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko janaaeko chha

kailaali ghomdaaghomdi nagarapaalikaa kotaasthita sadakamaa somabaara raati ana testa lekhieko tyaaktara paltiera durghatanaa hundaa tyaaktarale chyaanpiera sohi tyaaktaramaa lewara kaama garne gaurigumgaa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya karana chaudhariko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha
tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sindhupaalchoka jugala gaaunpaalikaa sthita kumbheswara bhanne sthaanamaa somabaara raati jalawiretarpha jaandai gareko baa kha nambarako traka breka phela bhai sadakabaata andaaji mitara tala khasera durghatanaa hundaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa traka chaalaka sohi gaaunpaalikaa kipche basne warsiya syaamakaaji syaanwoko khaandichaura aspataala laamosaanghumaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

sohi sthaana basne raamadewa mehetaako mahinaako chhori kariti mehetaako ghara najikai khelne kramamaa kalako paani jameko khaaldomaa dubera marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha
somawaara raati baje roki raakheko ko ta nambarako tyaaktaramaa paschimabaata purwa tarpha aundai gareko baa cha nambarako kaara tyaaktarakaae pachhaadibaata chhireko thiyo

durghatanaamaa ghaaitelaai upachaarako laagi wiraatanagara sthita nyuro aspataala pathaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha kaara tyaaktara ra chaalakalaai prahariko niyantranamaa raakhieko chha

purwapaschima raajamaargako kaawaasotimaa dudha bokeko baa kha nambarako tyaanakarale thakkara dindaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara warsiya yuwaraaja ghimire ra warsiya pitaambara paathakako marityu bhaeko ho

maritaka duwaijanaa madhyawindu nagarapaalikaakaae bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa duwaijanaalaai upachaarakaae laagi aspataala laijaadau gardaa baataaemaanai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalapurale janaaeko chha
tyaaktara sahita chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha durghatanaakaa sambandhamaa praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha
syaanjaako arjunachaupaari gaadakhaanimaa agalaagi hundaa sthaaniya warsiya karisna kaamiko jalera marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha
sunasari kanchanapura ra udayapuramaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

sunasari raamadhuni nagarapaalikaa baithaara chokasthita sadakamaa baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalale ko pa nambarako skutilaai aitabaara diuso thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa skuti chaalaka sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya karisna pariyaarako nyuro aspataala biraatanagaramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

kanchanapura karisnapura nagarapaalikaa kaluwaapurasthita sadakamaa se pa nambarako motarasaaikalabaata aitabaara raati ladera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chaalaka sohi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya nabina paandeko seti anchala aspataala dhanagadhimaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha

udayapura kataari nagarapaalikaa sisaaghaaristhita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako basakaa sahachaalaka udayapuragadhi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya rosana kaarkiko sadakamaa raheko bijuliko polamaa chyaapiera aitabaara raati marityu bhaeko chha

biparita disaabaata aeko motarasaaikalalaai basale saaida dine kramamaa basako dhokaamaa basekaa kaarki saaidamaa raheko bijuliko polamaa chyaapiera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaale upachaarako laagi kataari aspataalatarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai unako marityu bhaeko ho basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sinaamangalamaa basako thakkarabaata paidalayaatrukomarityu bhaeko chha aja bihaana bajetira baa kha nambarako basale thakkara dindaa solukhumbu ghara bhai sinaamanagala basdai aekaa padamabahaadura kaarkikomarityu bhaeko ho

mechi raajamaargamaa parne deumaai nagarapaalikaa deuraalimaa aitabaara wihaana tyaaktaradurghatanaa hudaa chaalakadeumaai nagarapaalikaa kaa sumana gurunako marityu bhaeko ho gurunako ghatanaasthalamai jyaana gaeko praharile janaaeko chha

praharikaa anusaara kota nambarako tyaaktara aniyantrita bhai sadakabaata mitara jhareko ho ghatanaamaa ilaama nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiyalilaa achaarya ra taaplejunakaa warsiyarawina sumkara ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite duwaiko ilaama aspataalamaa upachaara huna nasakepachhi jhaapaako manamohana aspataala rephara garieko jillaa praharikaa esapi maadhawa sresthale jaanakaari die

nawalaparaasi bardaghaata sustaa purwa dewachuli nagarapaalikaa rajaharasthita sadakamaa naa pa nambarako motarasaaikalale sanibaara diuso paidalayaatri sohi nagarapaalikaa jhaakre basne warsiya thaakurasimha bisuwaa magaralaai thakkara dimdaa gambhira ghaaite bhai upachaarako laagi puraano medikala kaleja bharatapura lagiekomaa upachaarako kramamaa unako marityu bhaeko chha

saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala sawaara gorakhaa sulekota gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya prakaasa dewakotaako sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha motarasaaikala chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

sindhupaalchoka paanchapokhari thaanapaala gaaunpaalikaa chhedewaasthita sadakamaa baa cha nambarako balero jipa sadakabaata andaaji mitara tala kholaamaa khasera sanibaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa jipa chaalaka melamchi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya bhima rasaailiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

tiwra gatimaa raheko ko kha nambarako tiparale baragaachhi chokamaa thakkaradidaa saaikalayaatri purusako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha warsa jatikaa dekhine purusako pahichaana khulinasakeko praharile janaaeko chha

sawalaai postamaartamakaa laagi kosi anchala aspataala wiraatanagaramaa lageko chha ahilesamma kohi pani aphanta samparkamaa naaekaa kaarana sawako pahichaana khulna gaahro bhaeko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya moranakaa prahari sahaayaka niriksaka nilamanai pokharelale bataae

tiparalaai niyantranamaa lie pani chaalaka pharaara rahekaa kaarana khoji bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha eka saataa aghi sundaraharaichaa nagarapaalikaa sisaughaarimaa naa kha nambarako triparako thakkarabaata sthaaniya barsiyaa baalikaa laksmi dhakaalakaae marityu bhaepachhi aetaa tipara jalaainukaa saathai andaaelana sameta bhaekaae thiyaae

marina gaaunpaalikaasthita ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kapilaakotamaa prahari ra sthaaniyabicha jhadapa hundaa chaara janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan hijaae beluki baje bhaeko jhadapamaa praharitarpha tina ra eka janaa sthaaniya ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

jhadapamaa pari ilakaa prahari kaaryalaya kapilaakotamaa kaaryarata prahari naayaba niriksaka jitabahaadura aryaala prahari sahaayaka niriksaka raajana khadkaa ra prahari jawaana winodakumaara saaha ghaaite hunubhaeko chha yastai praharile chalaaeko goli laagera marina gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya saarkimaana moktaana ghaaite hunubhaeko chha uhaanko daahine paataamaa goli laageko chha prahari ra sthaaniyabichako jhadapalaai rokna aja belukaa praharile raaunda hawaai phaayara gareko prahari upariksaka simhale bataaunubhayo

ghaaite moktaanako kapilaakotasthita swaasthya sumsthaamaa upachaara huna nasakepachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagi dhulikhela pathaaieko prahari upariksaka chakrabahaadura simhale jaanakaari dinubhayo ghaaite prahariharuko bhane sthaaniya swaasthya sumsthaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

yahi maagha gate marina gaaunpaalikaa dhamile niwaasi sridhwaja syaantaanako wiwaahamaa saamaanya wiwaada bhaeko thiyo praharikaa anusaara sohi dina wiwaadamaa khukuri haanaahaana hundaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa thie sankara gole ra dorje golelaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kapilaakotale sukrabaara niyantranamaa lieko thiyo ukta ghatanaamaa sumlagna anyalaai niyantranamaa line kramamaa jhadapa bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kapilaakotakaa prahari niriksaka chalitra kaarkile bataaunubhayo

dhaadinabensibaata nalaana thaantitarpha jaandai gareko baakha numko yaatrubaahaka basa sanibaara nilakantha nagarapaalikaa sasaahasthita eutaa bhyaanalaai thakkara diera sadaka chheuko jaali lagaaieko parkhaalamaa thokkiera durghatanaa bhaeko thiyo

durghatanaapachhi dhaadinamaa upachaara huna nasakepachhi kaathamaadaanai tramaa sentaramaa upachaarakaa laagi pathaaiekaamaa upachaarako kramamaa sawaari chaalaka siddhaleka gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya siwa silawaalako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinale janaaeko chha

yaatru bokeko basamaa sawaara yaatrumadhye durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaiteko jillaa aspataalamaa upachaarapachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagi tina janaalaai kaathamaadaunko tramaa sentaramaa pathaaieko chha bhane baanki ko jillaa aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha
humlaako daksina ksetramaa raheko sarkegaada gaaunpaalikaa basne dantabahaadura saahiko wyaatri phadkindaa esidale jalera duwai ankhaa banda bhaeko chha

jillaamaa sanibaaradekhi mausama sudhaara aesangai ghaamamaa wyaatri sukaauna jaane kramamaa wyaatri padkindaa esidale jalera duwai ankhaa nadekhne bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya humlaakaa suchanaa adhikaari harihara khadkaale bataaunubhayo
solaarabaata chaarja hune bholtako wyaatri sukaauna jaandaa padkera duwai ankhaa banda bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya humlaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka rawina sresthale jaanakaari dinubhayo
ahile pidita saahilaai sthaaniya sarkegaada swaasthyachaukimaa upachaara garna khojdaa sambhawa nabhaeko prahari pramukha sresthale bataaunubhayo
tanahunko bhaanu nagarapaalikaa maiwalamaa karenta laagera sanibaara saanjha eka baalakako marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa sohi thaaunkaa sambhu wistakaa warsiya chhoraa suwaasa wista raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaeko chha saaikala chalaai khelne kramamaa ghara najikaiko widyut polamaa thokkindaa widyut chuhiera wistalaai karenta laageko thiyo karenta laagera ghaaite bhaekaa wistalaai upachaarakaa laagi laijaandai gardaa baatomaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

bhaageswara gaaunpaalikaa saletaaki warsiyaa saraswati naathakaaetyaana laagera jyaana gaeko haaegharamai sutiraheko awasthaamaa bihaana saadhe baje chatyaana laagera saraswatiko jyaana gaeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

chatyaana laagera saraswatikaa dui bahini ra dui bhaai ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaite chaaraijanaalaai upaksetriya aspataala dadeldhuraa lyaaune tayaari bhairaheko jillaa prahari pramukha dambarabahaadura kesile jaanakaari die ghaaiteharuko awasthaa samaanya chha

ghoraahi upamahaanagarapaalikaa chisaapaanisthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako basa ra baa cha nambarako kaara ekaapasamaa bihibaara saanjha thakkara khaai durghatanaa hundaa basamaa sawaara rukuma purwa khalumgaa nagarapaalikaa musikota basne warsiyaa ramitaa sarmaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

saathai durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa kaaramaa sawaara nambara pradesa sabhaa sadasya uttara kumaara waliko medikala kaleja kohalapura baankemaa upachaara bhairaheko tathaa anya janaa ghaaiteharulaai upachaarako laagi butawalatarpha lagieko chha basa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
sirahaako dhanagadhimaai nagarapaalikaa sthita jayapuramaabariyaarapattibaata jiromaailatarpha aundai gareko naa kha nambarako yaatrubaahaka basa aphain aniyantrita bhai durghatanaa bhaeko ho

ghaaiteko sthaaniya aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha ahilesamma sabai ghaaite khataraamukta raheko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya lahaana sirahaakaa pramukha prahari niriksaka milanasimha basnetale jaanakaari garaae

jillaako runtigadhi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya misana budhaako gharamaa kohi nabhaeko belaa aphaile chalaaeko bandukakaae goli laagera jyaana gaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rolpaakaa diesapi dipaka khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo budhaale kina goli chalaae bhannebaaremaa kehi nakhuleko diesapi khadkaale bataaunubhayo

pyuthaana pyuthaana nagarapaalikaa simalagairaa basne warsiyaa nisaa bhandaariko karenta laagera budhabaara diuso marityu bhaeko chha aphnai khetamaa raheko baansa kaatne kramamaa bijuliko mena laainale chhoina gai karenta laagera unako marityu bhaeko ho

nuwaakotako widura nagarapaalikaa maa budhabaara saanjha minitrakale thakkara dindaa eka wariddhako marityu bhaeko chha naakha numko minitrakako thakkarabaata sohi sthaanakaa warsiya maanabahaadura saahiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha karisnabahaadura pallimagarale jaanakaari dinubhayo

uhaankaa anusaara wiraganjabaata koilaa bokera aeko minitraka nuwaakota mandalaako ukaalomaa aniyantrita bhai sadaka chheumaa hindirahekaa saahilaai thakkara dieko ho durghatanaapachhi gaadi ra tyasakaa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha bhane sawalaai pariksanakaa laagi trisuli jillaa aspataalamaa lagieko chha

tanahunko bandipura bajaarabaata anbukhaireni gaaunpaalikaa jaalabhanjyaanatarpha jaandai gareko gacha num ko jipa bandipura gaaunpaalikaa sthita jhaaragaaunmaa aja raati h baje durghatanaa hundaa dui janaako marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa bandipura gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiyaa bhimakumaari guruna ra sohi thaaunkaa warsiya manabahaadura guruna raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaeko chha uniharuko upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko bandipura aspataalamaa prahari naayaba upariksaka syaamu aryaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
sindhuli jillaa sunakosi gaaunpaalikaa kamerephaantasthita wipi raajamaargamaa budhabaara saanjha h bajetira janti liera aeko tipara durghatanaa hundaa dui janaako marityu bhaekoe chha

kaabhrepalaanchoka jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka rawiraaja khadkaakaa anusaara raamechhaapa jillaa khaandaadewi gaaunpaalikaa kathorebaata kaabhrepalaanchokako temaalatarpha behuli lii aundai gareko baakha numko tipara sindhuli jillaa sunakosi gaaunpaalikaa kamerephaantasthita wipi raajamaargamaa aniyantrita bhai sadaka chheumaa paltindaa ukta gaadimaa sawaara temaala gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiyaa karisnamaayaa maajhi ra sohi thaaunkaa warsiya chunapaai laamaako dhulikhelasthita dhulikhela saamudaayika aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho

ghaaite huneharumadhye temaala gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya dinesa taamaana ra sohi thaaunkaa warsiya niraja maajhiko awasthaa jatila rahekaale tramaa sentaramaa lagiekoe ra anya ghaaitemadhye saata janaalaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaun pathaaieko chha bhane baankiko dhulikhela aspataalamai upachaara bhairaheko chha praharile tipara chaalaka raamechhaapa jillaa khaandaadewi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya khadka maajhilaai niyantranamaa lii ghatanaabaaremaa thapa anusandhaana gariraheko janaaeko chha
siraahaa nuwaakota ra rupandehimaa bhaekaa chhuttaachhuttai sawaari durghatanaamaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha

siraahaa karjanhaa nagarapaalikaa bagahaapulasthita sadakamaa naa kha nambarako trakale mumgalabaara diuso paidalayaatri sohi nagarapaalikaako warsiyaa melinaa raailaai thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite raaikaae upachaarako laagi aspataala laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
traka ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

nuwaakota panchakanyaa gaaunpaalikaa thaprekasthita sadakamaa mumgalabaara saanjha baa cha nambarako jipa breka phela bhai sadaka dekhi andaaji saya mitara tala khasera durghatanaa hundaa chaalaka sarlaahi parawaanipura basne warsiya sumana budhaathokiko ghatanaasthalamai ra gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa daana ghara bhaekaa warsiya ali miyaalaai upachaarako laagi kaathamaadaumtarpha laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko chha
durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa janaako graandi aspataala dhaapaasi ra janaako siksana aspataala mahaaraajagumjamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

gulmimaa agomaa jalera eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha jillaako musikota nagarapaalikaa maa gothamaa laageko ago nibhaaune kramamaa jalera warsiya jitabahaadura nepaaliko marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka rawindra khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhaeko chha
