purwabaata paschimatarpha jaandai gareko lucha numko jipale thakkara dindaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa mallako lamahi aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya lamahikaa prahari niriksaka arunakumaara simhale jaanakaari dinubhayo

maritaka malla sasastra praharikaa habaldaara dharmajita mallakaa chhoraa hun simhakaa anusaara chaalakale ti baalaka kukurasanga kheliraheko awasthaamaa aphain thokkina aundaa durghatanaa bhaeko bayaana diekaa chhan

somabaara chitawana ichchhaakaamanaa gaaunpaalikaa lewataarasthita parithwi raajamaargamaa naa cha nambarako kaarale pradesa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa duijanaakaaemarityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaa pari gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka sindhupaalchokakaa wibeka khanaala ra motarasaaikalamaa sawaara sohi thaanukaaeudita basnetako jillaa aspataala bharatapuramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha
thakkara dine kaara ra chaalakalaai prahariko niyantranamaa lieko chha yasa sambandhamaa praharile awasyaka anusandhaana gariraheko chha

aja bihaana nadimaa paudi khelna gaekaa nawalapura ganaidaakotakaa warsiya amarita bhanine chitrabahaadura guruna bepattaa bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunkaa prahari naayaba upariksaka syaama aryaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

tanahuntarphabaata podi kheldai nawalapuratarphako bhaagamaa pugekaa guruna pharkane kramamaa nadiko chhaalamaa parera bepattaa bhaeko aryaalale bataaunubhayo uni kaantipura pablikesanako bharatapura kaaryaalayamaa sahayogikaa rupamaa kaama gardai aekaa thie
bepattaa aryaalako sasastra prahariko wipat wyawasthaapana kendra kurinataara chitawanabaata khatieko tolile khoji gariraheko chha

paani lagaaune kramamaa aitabaa chipliera bhirabaata khasi dhungaamaa thokina pugekaa raailaai upachaarakaa laagi birtaamodasthita birtaasiti aspataala puryaaundaa chikitsakale marita ghosanaa gareko ho
basale motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata nawalaparaasiko kaawasotimaa ekako marityu bhaeko chha

aja bihaana dandaabaata naaraayanagadhakaa laagi chhuteko naakha numko basale naapa numko motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa rautahata gomariyaa ghara bhai haala kaawaasotimaa mistri kaama gardai aekaa warsiya damendra yaadawako marityu bhaeko ho

thakkarabaata gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa yaadawako upachaarakaa kramamaa kaaligandaki aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka lilaaraaja laamichhaanele jaanakaari dinubhayo

mahottari jillaako gausaalaasamsi sadakakhandamaa bihaana tiparakaae thakkarabaata eka baalakako marityu bhaeko chha marityu hunemaa samsi gaaunpaalikaa parsaadewaara basne hayiyaada sekhakaa atha warsiyaa chhoraa sadaama sekha raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka khagendrabahaadura khadkaale bataaunubhayo

bihaana kariba baje gausaalaabaata samsi jaandai gareko naakha numko triparale samsi gaaunpaalikaa sthita sadakamaa baalaka sadaama sekhalaai thakkara dindaa unako marityu bhaeko prahari naayaba upariksaka khadkaale bataaunubhayo maritaka baalakako sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala jaleswaramaa lyaaune tayaari bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

kaathamaadaunbaata bardiyaatarpha jaandai gareko yaatruwaahaka basa parithwi raajamaargakaae dhaadina beni ghaataroraana gaaunpaalikaa hugdipula najikai durghatanaa hundaa ekakaae marityu bhaekaae chha bhane ghaaite bhaekaa chhan
baakha nambarako basa modamaa aniyantrita bhai sadakamai paltiera durghatanaa bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajurile jaanakaari dieko chha

durghatanaamaa bardiyaa seruwaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya narendra thaaru chaudhariko marityu bhaeko hokhuttaamaa gambhira chota laagekaa chaudhariko upachaarakaa laagi chitawana medikala kaleja bharatapura laijaandai gardaa baatomaa marityu bhaeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha durghatanaamaa sohi thaaun basne balabahaadura chaudhari ghaaite bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhaadinale jaanakaari dieko chha

tanahumaa aja bihaana basale kichera eka kisorako marityu bhaeko chha marityu hunemaa tanahanuko bandipura gaaunpaalikaa piplekaa warsiya wiswaasa thaapaa raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaeko chha

aphnai baabu balaka thaapaale ghara agaadi rokiraakheko gakha numko basa pachhaadi hataaune kramamaa basale kichera wiswaasa ghaaite bhaekaa thie thaapaako upachaarako kramamaa bandipura aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunkaa prahari naayaba upariksaka syaamu aryaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo thakkara dine basa ra baabu prahari niyantranamaa chhan

tanahunko bandipura gaaunpaalikaa naahaalaamaa bihibaara raati eka wariddha maritaawasthaamaa phelaa parekaa chhan hariyaali karisaka samuha bhawanako petimaa andaaji warsiya tekabahaadura wika maritaawasthaamaa phelaa parekaa hun

dhaadina ghara bataaune wika wigata paanchachha dinadekhi dumre bajaara asapaasa maagi khaai hindne gareko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaeko chha ghatanaabaare thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha pharaara pratiwaadi pakraau

tanahun adaalatabaata kaida tokiekaa eka janaalaai praharile pakraau gari kaaraagaara chalaana gareko chha gharamaa ago lagaaeko muddaamaa tanahun suklaagandaki nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya aita bhanne thagabahaadura kamara jogi paancha warsapachhi pakraau pari bihibaara kaaraagaara chalaana bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunkaa prahari naayaba upariksaka aryaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

so abhiyogamaa jillaa adaalatale jogilaai paancha warsa kaida phaisalaa gareko thiyo wisum maa sohi wadaakaa indraprasaada waagleko gharamaa ago lagaaeko abhiyogamaa jogi pharaara rahekaa thie tanahun praharile pachhillo samayamaa adaalatabaata kaida tokiekaa pharaara pratiwaadilaai pakraau garne wisesa abhiyaana nai sanchaalana gariraheko chha

tyasaigari chaangunaaraayana nagarapaalikaa taathali naalaa jaane sadakako chheumaa bhojapura saalpaasilichho gaaunpaalikaa dobhaane ghara bhai haala biema inttaabhattaa sudaalamaa kaama garne warsiya santosa raaiko marityu bhaeko chha

pakraau parnemaa udayapura jillaa ghara bhai haala gatthaaghara deraa gari basne warsiya siwaji bhanne ripumardana basneta warsiya susaanta khadkaa warsiya susila kaarki rautahata chandrapura ghara bhai haala lokanthali basne warsiya prawesa basneta rahekaa chhan

durghatanaamaa pari gorakhaa taanagraana gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya homamaayaa thaapaa laamichhaane ko chitawana medikala kalejamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho atomaa sawaara unakaa srimaan warsiya santosa laamichhaane ra chhoraa paancha warsiya susaanta ghaaite bhaekaa chhan gambhira ghaaite susaantako bharatapuramaa upachaara huna nasakepachhi graandi aspataala kaathamaadaun siphaarisa garieko chha ato ra ato chaalakalaai niyantranamaa liieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

paschima nawalaparaasiko sunawala nagarapaalikaasthita jyaamire jangalamaa motasaaikala aphain aniyantrita bhai paltidaa chaalakako marityu bhaeko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa anusaara lu pa numko motaraasaaikala aphain aniyantrita bhai durghatanaamaa pareko ho

marityu hunemaa rupandehi siddhaarthanagara nagarapaalikaakaa warsiya wisaala guruna rahekaa chhan durghatanaamaa pari gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa gurunako jillaa parithwichandra aspataala paraasimaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile jaanakaari dieko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya beltaarakaa anusaara sa ta num ko tryaaktara beltaarako dwaarakholaabaata sadaramukaama gaaighaata aune kramamaa raati baje trali paltandaa tryaaktara durghatanaa bhaeko praharile bataaeko chha
mahottari jillaako bhangaahaa nagarapaalikaa sthita simgyaahi bajaaramaa amaa chhoraa chadheko motarasaaikala sanibaara saanjha durghatanaa hundaa amaako marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa bhangaahaa nagarapaalikaa bakhari basne warsiyaa laksminiyaadewi simha raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka khagendrabahaadura khadkaale bataaunubhayo
sohi durghatanaamaa parera unakaa chhoraa warsiya manisa simha gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan bhane unako upachaara anchala aspataala janakapuramaa bhairaheko chha

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari waritta nayaan basapaarkakaa pramukha je janga kaarkile maato bokera hindeko tipara bhittaamaa paltindaa chiyaa bechne wisankhe ra unakaa srimatilaai thichera ghaaite bhaekaamaa tribhuwana siksana aspataala mahaaraajaganjamaa wisankheko upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko jaanakaari dinubhayo
ghaaite wisankheko srimatiko sohi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha thakkara dine tipara ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha

siksana aspataala mahaaraajaganja pugnebittikai aspataalale marita ghosanaa gareko aphanta bataaunchhan ahile pidita ra aspataala wyawasthaapanabicha chhalaphala bhairaheko mahaanagariya prahari waritta bauddhakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka narendra chandale jaanakaari dinubhayo

wiraganja pokhariyaa sadakakhandamaa bhaeko sawaari durghatanaamaa pari eka janaako marityu gaeko chha bhane eka janaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan durghatanaamaa pokhariyaa nagarapaalikaa raaniganjaki andaaji warsaki sawinaa khaatunakoghatanaasthalamaa marityu bhaeko ho

windhyawaasini gaaunpaalikaa bahuarwaabhaathaa sthita dhumgahi kholaamaa budhabaara wihaana pokhariyaabaata wiraganja aundai gareko naa kha nambarako trakale pokhariyaa tarpha jaandai naa ha nambarako atolaai thakkara didaadurghatanaa bhaekaae thiyo thakkarapachhi atobaata khaseki mahilaalaai trakale kicheko pratyaksadarsile bataaekaa chhan

kanchanapura jillaako mahaakaali nagarapaalikaa ki warsiya amaritaa simha thakuri baaghako akramanabaata ghaaite hunubhaeko chha hijosaanjha suklaaphaantaa raastriya nikunjamaa khara kaatna gaekaae awasthaamaa thakuri maathi baaghale akramana garekaae thiyaae uhaankaa anusaara khara kaatiraheko belaa ekkaasi aera baaghale jhamtindaa amaritaako kammara haata khuttaamaa chota laageko chha praathamika swaasthya kendra dodhaaraamaa praathamika upachaarapaschaat uhaanlaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi kailaaliko dhanagadhi lagieko chha

rawi kanchanapuramaa ayojita wibhinna kaaryakramamaa sammaana tathaa abhinandana samaarohamaa upasthita wyawastataakaa kaarana ghara jaana paaekaa thienan rawilaai janmadine amaako yasaaghi nai nidhana bhaisakeko thiyo karma dine amaasanga hurkekaa rawi nepaala aidala wijetaa baneko khusi saatna napaaundai pariwaaramaa duhkhada ghatanaa bhaeko chha

gambhira ghaaite panditalaai upachaarakaa laagi jillaa aspataala inaruwaa laijaane kramamaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho trayaaktara chaalaka inaruwaa kaa dumaralaala sarmaalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
jillaako madaane gaaunpaalikaa baajhakaterimaa tuta nambarako tyaaktarako thakkarabaata warsiyaa elisaa kesiko marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gulmile janaaeko chha

aitawaara saanjha skulabaata gharamaa pharkane kramamaa tyaaktarako thakkarabaata baalikaa ghaaite bhaeki thiin upachaarakaa laagi tamghaasa aspataalamaa lagiekomaa gaeraati upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya gulmikaa prahari upariksaka esapi dipakakumaara basnetale jaanakaari die

jillaako chumanubri gaaunpaalikaa ko jangalamaa gaeraatidekhi bhisana agalaagi bhaeko chha saamaagaaunko manaasalu besakyaampa jaane baatomaa parne jangalamaa raati kariba bajedekhi suru bhaeko agalaagi ahilesamma nibhaauna nepaala prahari ra sthaaniyawaasi laagepani nasakekoe jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka bholaa raawalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

agalaagi niyantranakaa laagi saamaagaaun praharichauki laarkesthita praharichaukibaata thapa prahari ghatanaasthalatarpha pathaaieko praharile janaaeko chha ghatanaako thapa wiwarana praapta huna baanki nai raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

agalaagibaata khaadyaanna lattaakapadaa nagadalagaayata jalera nasta hundaa ru chaara laakha hajaara baraabarako ksati bhaeko prahariko bhanaai chha gharamuli kumaarako maanasika santulana thika nabhaekaale aphainle ago lagaaeko asankaamaa praharile anusandhaanako laagi kumaaralaai niyantranamaa lieko chha ago sthaaniyawaasi janapratinidhi tathaa prahariko sahayogamaa niyantranamaa liieko gaaunpaalikaa adhyaksa kirana raaile jaanakaari dinubhayo
pokharaa mahaanagarapaalikaa hemjaasthita hanumaanachokamaa roki raakheko trakasanga motarasaaikala thokindaa aja eka janaako marityu gaeko chha ghatanaamaa arrkaa eka ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

marityu hunemaa hemjaa niwaasi warsiya asisa kunwara hun durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite kunwarako upachaaraartha aspataala laandai gardaa jyaana gaeko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya bagarakaa prahari niriksaka dipaka thaapaale bataaunubhayo

sohi tyaaktaramaa sawaara nirmalidaandaakai warsiya durgaabahaadura luintela gambhira ghaaite bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya khotaanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raajakumaara kesile jaanakaari dinubhayo ahilesamma behosa awasthaamaa rahekaa unako jillaa aspataala diktelamaa upachaara sambhawa nabhaepachhi kaathamaadaun pathaaune tayaari bhairaheko chha

diktela rupaakota majhuwaagadhi nagarapaalikaa nerpaasthita kaalikholaamaa tyaaktara durghatanaa hundaa chaalaka minaprasaada ra tyaaktaramaa sawaara maaikalako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko pratyaksadarsile bataaekaa chhan durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite sahachaalaka khemaraajako upachaarakaa kramamaa jillaa aspataala diktelamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha diktelabaata khaali pharkieko tyaaktara sadakabaata kariba mitara tala khaseko janaaieko chha tyaaktara durghatanaa hunuko kaarana ahilesamma khulna sakeko chhaina durghatanaakaa baaremaa anusandhaana bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

salyaanako kapurakotabaata tulasipuratarpha aundai gareko baakha numko basa tulasipurasalyaana sadakakhandako tulasipura raamrimaa aja basa durghatanaa hundaa janaako marityu bhaeko chha janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

ghoraahisthita karisnasena ichchhuka praawidhika siksaalayakaa siksaka ra widyaarthi chadheko ukta basa durghatanaamaa pareko ho basa jhandai saata saya mitara tala bhiramaa khaseko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tulasipurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka premabahaadura saahile jaanakaari dinubhayo siksaka ra widyaarthi salyaanako kapurakotasthita mulapaanimaa raheko wanaspati udyaanako awalokana bhramana garera tulasipuratarpha pharkidai thie ghatanaako thapa wiwarana auna baanki chha ahile prahari ra sthaaniyawaasi uddhaaramaa jutekaa chhan

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha ewum prahari waristha upariksaka wasanta pantale durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa sresthako upachaarakaa kramamaa tribhuwana siksana aspataala mahaaraajaganjamaa marityu bhaeko jaanakaari dinubhayo skutarako pachhaadi sawaara sresthaki amaa bhagawati srestha ghaaite hunubhaeko chha pikaapa bhyaana ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
baankeko baijanaatha gaaunpaalikaa jiugaaunsthita purwapaschima raajamaargamaa widyaalayako basa ra motarasaaikala thokkindaa aja dui janaako mutyu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa surkhetako lekabemsi nagarapaalikaa kaa wikrama gahataraaja ra surkhetakai gurbhaakota nagarapaalikaa kaa madana sunaara raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya kohalapurakaa prawaktaa prahari niriksaka maanabahaadura wisile jaanakaari dinubhayo

samjhanaachokatarpha jaandai gareko baalajyoti widyaalayako baaka numko basa ra baansagadhibaata kohalapuratarpha aundai gareko lupa numko motarasaaikala apasamaa thokkiekaa hun duwai janaako upachaarakaa laagi siksana aspataala kohalapura laijaandai gardaa marityu bhaeko ho

dupcheswara gaaunpaalikaa simtaanabaata ghyaanaphediko sisipu jaandai gareko baakha numko minitraka dupcheswara ghyaanadaandaamaa durghatanaa bhaeko thiyo ghatanaasthalamai janaa ra upachaarakaa laagi aspataala laijaane kramamaa eka ra upachaarakaa kramamaa thapa ekako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka bhimalaala bhattaraaile jaanakaari dinubhayo

marityu huneharumaa ghyaanaphedi sisipuki warsiyaa wibhimaayaa taamaana warsiyaa sitaa taamaana warsiyaa sunasri taamaana warsiya sukaraama taamaana warsiya sonama laamaa warsiya tokale taamaana warsiya mangale taamaana warsiya aita taamaana warsiya selwona taamaana warsiya khaamsuna taamaana warsiya riwala taamaana warsiya bhimabahaadura taamaana warsiya minamaara taamaana warsiya chhowaana sonaama taamaana warsiya laksmana taamaana warsiya wirabahaadura taamaana warsiya karisna taamaana warsiya minabahaadura taamaana warsiya sune laamaa ra sikharabensikaa warsiya ritesa pandita raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nuwaakotale janaaeko chha

chitawanako gitaanagarabaata dulahi liera baankeko samseraganja pharkidai gareko baacha numko skaarapiyo jipa ra mahendranagarabaata kaathamaadaun jaandai gareko naa kha numko basa daanako lamahi nagarapaalikaa ko rihaara najika gae raati paune baje ekaapasamaa thokkindaa skaarapiyomaa sawaara athamadhye chha janaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha belabahaadura paandeyakaaanusaara maritya hunemaa behulaakaa baabu raaptisonaari gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya maanabahaadura kesi warsiyaa amaa wimalaa khatri warsiya wiswanaatha adhikaari paancha warsiya prawina kesi warsiya dipakakumaara khadkaa kohalapura niwaasi warsiya dattabahaadura khatriko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho
kailaaliko tikaapura nagarapaalikaamaa gaeraati bhaekaa dui motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa tina janaako marityu bhaeko chha

tikaapurakhakraulaa sadakako khairipura khandamaa ana testa motarasaaikala gorugaadaamaa thoknikadaa motarasaaikalamaa sawaara dui janaako marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tikaapurale janaaeko chha marityu hunemaa tikaapura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya jiwaananda koiraalaa ra warsiya wisnau rimaala chhan durghatanaabaata ghaaite sohi thaaunkaa pawana paandeyalaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi tikaapura aspataalabaata kohalapura medikala kaleja siphaarisa garieko chha

tina janaa sawaara ukta ana testa motarasaaikala gorugaadaasanga thokkina pugeko prahari niriksaka kamalabahaadura bistale bataaunubhayo madiraa sewana garera motarasaaikala chalaaekaa kaarana so durghatanaa huna pugeko bataaieko chha tikaapura nagarapaalikaakai bandipura sadaka kinaaramaa rokiraakheko se ta numko tryaaktarako tralimaa thokkindaa pa ko motarasaaikalakaa chaalaka tikaapura kaa warsiya asisa chaudhariko marityu bhaeko chha durghatanaabaata ghaaite chaudharilaai kohalapura laijaandai gardaa baatomaa nai marityu bhaeko janaaieko chha
basako thakkarabaata tanahunmaa aitabaara raati eka paidalayaatriko marityu bhaeko chha marityu hunemaa tanahunko bhaanu nagarapaalikaa basne wikaasa gandharwa rahekaa chhan

myaagdiko benibaata nepaalaganjatarpha jaandai gareko ga kha nambarako basale bandipura gaaunpaalikaa wimalanagaramaa paidalayaatri gandharwalaai thakkara dieko thiyo basako thakkarabaata ghaaite gandharwako upachaarako kramamaa damauli aspataalamaa raati h baje marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahanule janaaeko chha thakkara dine basa ra basakaa chaalaka prahari niyantranamaa chhan gandharwako sawa damauli aspataalamaa raakhieko chha

tanahun nirwaachana ksetra nambara kaa pratinidhi sabhaa sadasya karisnakumaara sresthale bhaanu nagarapaalikaako wibhinna wadaamaa baalabaalikaalaai akramana garne narabhaksi chituwaalaai tatkaala niyantrana gari janataamaa traasako waataawarana antya garna maaga garnubhaeko chha

bhaanu nagarapaalikaa dhalkewaramaa sanibaara saanjha chituwaako akramanabaata warsiya amarita gurunako marityu bhae pachhi presa wijnapti prakaasita gari saamsada sresthale baalabaalikaa yasari ghara anganamai wanyajantuko sikaara bannuparne awasthaa nikai duhkhad bhaeko bataaunubhayo

marityu hunemaa tyaaktara chaalaka bhimaada nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya indrabahaadura nepaali ra ghirina gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya sukabahaadura wika rahekaa chhan uniharuko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaeko chha

daanamaa biraami bokeko embulensa durghatanaa bhaeko chha rukumabaata biraami liera kohalapura jaandai gareko raa cha num ko embulensa daanako lamahi nagarapaalikaasthita amiliyaamaa durghatanaa bhaeko ho

durghatanaamaa rukumakaa warsiya bhimu jaisi ghaaite hunubhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya amiliyaale bataaeko chha jaisi damako rogi bhaekaale upachaarakaa laagi kohalapura laijaandai gardaa gae raati baje durghatanaa bhaeko praharile bataaeko chha embulensamaa biraami jaisi eka biraamiko aphanta ra chaalaka sawaara thie nagarapaalikaa swaasthyachauki satabariyaako raa ja num ko embulensamaa biraamilaai kohalapura pathaaieko chha

traaphika prahari posta dadeldhuraakaa pramukha prahari naayaba niriksaka ganaesa naagaarile dinubhaeko jaanakaarianusaara durghatanaamaa pari jyaana gumaauneharumaa kailaali godaawari nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya kesawa kadaayata sohi nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa saaradaa kadaayata doti sikhara nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya yogendra boharaa sohi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya sankara joraa sohi nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa saaradaa raawata kailaali dhanagadhi upamahaanagarapaalikaa kaa naaraayana chaudhari dotiko dipaayala silagadhi nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa sasi wika sohi nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa godaa bhaata sohi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya kailaasa raawala sohi thaaunkaa warsiya yogendra raawalako sanaakhata bhaeko chha tyasaigari dadeldhuraako nawadurgaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya chakra dhaami doti sikhara nagarapaalikaa kaa rohita balaayara dadeldhuraa jillaa ganyaapadhuraa kaa warsiyaa maayaa raawala kailaali godaawari kaa purana kathaayata dadeldhuraa nawadurgaa gaaupaalikaa kaa warsiya tilaka khaati sohi thaaunkaa warsiya teja dhaami doti sikhara nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya saagara balaayara sohi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya padama wikako marityu bhaeko ho

jyaana gumaaekaaharuko postamaartama dadeldhuraasthita upaksetriya aspataalamaa garine tayaari bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dadeldhuraakaa prahari niriksaka khagendra saaudale jaanakaari dinubhayo

ukta basa durghatanaamaa pari janaako jyaana gaeko chha bhane janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan dotiko sikhara nagarapaalikaa baanidugri sainasthita pisajona ekedemi skulako basa amaragadhi nagarapaalikaasthita ugrataaraa melaabaata pharkindaa durghatanaamaa pareko ho ghaaitemadhye gambhira awasthaamaa rahekaa janaalaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi kailaalitarpha pathaaieko chha duilaai dischaarja garieko chha bhane anya janaako upaksetriya aspataala dadeldhuraamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha skulakaa sanchaalaka bhima balaayarale pariwaarasahita skulakaa anya sumsthaapaka liera melaa herna gaeko ra pharkine kramamaa syaaulebhandaa talapattibaata yaatru sameta bokera gaeko bhanne bujhieko traaphika prahari posta dadeldhuraakaa prahari naayaba niriksaka ganaesa naagaarile jaanakaari dinubhayo

ugrataaraa melaa herera dadeldhuraabaata doti pharkine kramamaa beluki baje dotisthita pisajona ekedemiko skula basa durghatanaagrasta bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dadeldhuraakaa prahari naayawa upariksaka dambara bahaadura kesile jaanakaari die
uddhaara gariekaa ghaaiteharuko ahile upaksetriya aspataala dadeldhuraamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

suryawinaayaka nagarapaalikaa baalakotamaa aja raati kariba baje eka tiparale motarasaaikalalaai thakkara didaan motarasaaikala chaalakako marityu bhaeko chha naa kha nambarako tiparale baapa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa motara saaikalamaa sawaara warsiya manoja magarako ghatnaasthalamai marityu bhaeko mahaanagariya praharibaritta thimi sumchaarasaakhaale jaanakaari dieko chha
purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata paschima nawalaparaasiko bhumahimaa aja bihaana basa durghatanaa hundaa dui janaako marityu bhaeko chha tisa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

mahendranagarabaata kaankadabhittaatarpha jaandai gareko naakha numko basa jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya najikai durghatanaa bhaeko ho durghatanaamaa pari warsiya lokendrabahaadura kaarki tathaa arkaa eka wyaktiko marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunawalakaa prahari niriksaka anoja wikale jaanakaari dinubhayo ghaaiteko sthaaniya wibhinna aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

durghatanaa pari ghaaite bhaekaako udwaarakaa laagi prahari ghatanaasthalatarpha gairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dadeldhuraakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dambara kesile bataaunubhayo durghatanaako thapa wiwarana auna baankie chha

myaajika bhyaanale kichera kanchanapurako suklaaphaantaa nagarapaalikaa saantipurakaa paancha warsiyaa nisaa josiko aja marityu bhaeko chha jhalaari bajaarabaata saantipura jaandai gareko seja numko bhyaanale jhandaabojha chokamaa kichera baalikaako marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhalaarikaa prahari niriksaka ramesadatta awasthile bataaunubhayo
jhaapaako kanakaai nagarapaalikaa sthita durgaapuramaa aja bihaana sadaka durghatanaa hundaa eka mahilaako marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa dolakhaa dibu gaaunpaalikaa ki warsiyaa dinawaai taamaana raheko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalaya jhaapaale janaaeko chha purwapaschima raajamaarga antargata durgaapuramaa ko cha num ko pikaapa bhyaanale thakkara dindaa taamaana gambhira ghaaite bhaeki thiin

unako upachaarako kramamaa birtaamodasthita biendasi aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha raajesa raaile jaanakaari dinubhayo chaalakalaai niyantranamaa liera ghatanaako thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

marityu hunemaa tripuraasundari nagarapaalikaa tripuraakotakaa warsiya hemaraaja hamaala warsiyaa laksmi rokaaya warsiya narasinha kathaayata warsiya serabahaadura thaapaa sohi nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa asmitaa rokaaya sohi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya budha dharaalaa warsiya kumaara rokaaya sohi nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya yaama rokaaya thulibheri nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya bhadra rokaaya ra warsiyaa manisaa dharaalaa raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka abhadesa bistale jaanakaari dinubhayo

yastai jillaa adaalatamaa kaaryarata aminaa budhaamagara nadimaa bepattaa raheko praharile janaaeko chha chalaanimaa yaatru ullekha rahepani budhaamagara bicha baatobaata chadheko prahari anumaana chha uhaanko jholaa ra chappala ghatanaasthalamaa bhettieko praharile janaaeko chha ghaaite hunemaa tripuraasundari nagarapaalikaa kaa nandabahaadura thaapaa ra sohi nagarapaalikaa kaa chaalaka dinesa boharaa rahekaa chhan ghaaite boharaako awasthaa gambhira raheko praharile janaaeko chha ghaaite duwaiko jillaa aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha sabai sawako mangalabaara pariksana garera aphantalaai bujhaaine bataaieko chha
jipamaa janaa sawaara thie ti yaatruko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko pramukha jillaa adhikaari bhupendra thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo maritakako sanaakhata huna sakeko chhaina
sawa nadibaata nikaalera pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataala dunai lagieko chha dui janaako bhane nadibaata jiwitai uddhaara garieko prajia thaapaale bataaunubhayo

kaabhrepalaanchokako mandana deupura nagarapaalikaa bhaangetaaramaa gata sanibaara bhaeko durghatanaamaa nepaala praharikaa prahari naayaba mahaaniriksaka susilakumaara bhandaarilagaayata tina janaako marityu bhaeko ghatanaakaa wisayamaa chhaanabina garna samiti banaaieko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya dhulikhelakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dipaka giriko sumyojakatwamaa prahari niriksaka dipaka raaya jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalayakaa inchaarja prahari niriksaka nisesa chaapaagaarim tathaa anya dui janaa sahaayaka prahari adhikarita sadasya raheko ghatanaa chhaanabina samiti banaaieko prahari upariksaka rawiraaja khadkaale bataaunubhayo uhaankaa anusaara ghatanaamaa saamaanya ghaaite bhaekaa gaadidhani ewum chaalaka pradipa bogatilaai kaaryaalayako hiraasatamaa raakhi anusandhaana bhairaheko chha

sanibaara diunso baje chha janaa sawaara baacha numko lyaanda krujara kachchi sadakabaata dui saya mitara tala khaseko thiyo durghatanaamaa ghaaite prahari naayaba upariksaka bhandaari upachaaraartha aspataala laijaandai gardaa ra patrakaara warsiya jiwana paraajuli tathaa teda yuniyana kaangerasakaa num pradesa sumyojaka warsiya winoda kaarkiko ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko thiyo ghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite purwaprahari naayaba upariksaka winoda gautamako kaathamaadaunsthita graandi aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha saamaanya ghaaite bogati ra arkaa dhanaraaja puri aspataalabaata dischaarja bhaisakekaa chhan maritaka ewum ghaaite puriko mandana deupura napaa baaunedihisthita jaminamaa baaluwaa khaani chalaauna niriksana garera pharrkumdaa durghatanaa bhaeko ho

kaabhreko mandana deupura nagarapaalikaa dhakaalathokamaa aja diunso jipa durghatanaa hundaa nepaala praharikaa diaijisusila bhandaarikomarityu bhaeko chha bhandaarisangai patrakaara jiwana paraajuli ra winoda kaarkiko marityu bhaeko nambara pradesakaa traaphikakaa diesapi nawinaraaja raaile jaanakaari die
unakaa anusaara durghatanaamaa nepaala praharikaa prahari naayawa mahaaniriksaka susila bhandaariko dhulikhela aspataalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho
helambu raajamaargaantargata dhakaalathokamaa baa cha num ko lyaandakrujara jipa sadakabaata paanchasaya mitara tala khaseko thiyo

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaale dieko jaanakaarianusaara ghatasthaapanaadekhi purnaimaasamma upatyakaakaa wibhinna sthaanamaa bhaeko durghatanaamaa chaalaka tathaa paidalayaatruko marityu bhaeko ho mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha ewum prahari waristha upariksaka wasanta pantale tiwra gatimaa jathaabhaawi sawaari saadhana chalaaekaa kaarana dherai durghatanaa bhaeko jaanakaari dinubhayo dasainko samayamaa sadaka dherai khaali hune ra tiwra gatimaa sawaari haankne prawarittile dherai durghatanaa hune gareko chha uhaanle bhannubhayo

purwa paschima raajamaargaantargata nawalaparaasiko madhyawindu nagarapaalikaa arunakholaamaa basa durghatanaa hundaa paancha janaako marityu bhaeko chha bhane kamtimaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

itaharibaata bhairahawaakaa laagi chhuteko lukha numko basa aja bihaana bajeko samayamaa aphain aniyantrita bhai sadakabaata kariba mitara tala khasdaa basamaa sawaara paancha janaako ghatanaasthalamaa nai jyaana gaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalapurakaa prahari upariksaka ramesa thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo maritakaharuko naama thegaanaa khulna nasakeko uhaanle bataaunubhayo

mahottariko bardibaasa nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa taataasumoko thakkarabaata eka paidala yaatruko marityu bhaeko chha marityu hunemaa dhanusaa jillaako mithilaa nagarapaalikaa basne bhairawabahaadura hemjana raheko jillaa traaphika prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

saniwaara dhanusaabaata sarlaahi jaandai gareko naaja nambarako taataasumo bardibaasa nagarapaalikaa sthita sadakamaa sohi disaamaa jaandai garekaa paidala yaatru hemjanalaai thakkara dindaa unako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko thiyo thakkara dine taataasumo ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko janaaieko chha
syaanjaako galyaana nagarapaalikaa dharaandimaa aja diunso jipa durghatanaa hundaa ekako marityu bhaeko chha bhane janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

galyaana nagarapaalikaa siraunsaabaata galyaana bajaaratarpha aundai gareko luja numko jipa kachchi oraalo baatomaa breka phela bhai paltindaa galyaana basne warsiya raamaprasaada bhandaariko marityu bhaeko ho

durghatanaamaa pari galyaana kaa purana sunaara lalita guruna bhumaa srestha ananda bhandaari tirthaprasaada srestha dewi saapakotaa ra galyaana basne sangitaa khanaalalaai galyaana haspitalamaa praathamika upachaarapachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagi lumbini medikala kaleja prabhaasa paalpaa pathaaieko chha ghaaitemadhye dui janaako awasthaa chintaajanaka raheko wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya waalinale janaaeko chha

marityu hunemaa thaakre gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya mahesa taamaana warsiyaa somamaayaan taamaana ra warsiyaa saawitri taamaana raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka syaamakumaara mahatole jaanakaari dinubhayo timadhye duiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko thiyo bhane saawitriko upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadauntarpha laandai gardaa baatomai marityu bhaeko thiyo

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya kaabhrepalaanchokakaa prahari upariksaka rawiraaja khadkaakaa anusaara dhunkharkabaata panautitarpha airaheko naata num ko tyaaktara aphanai aniyantrita bhai sadakamaa paltindaa ghaaite bhaekaa sarlaahi jillaa haripura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya imarana mansurako banepaasthita sira memoriyala aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko ho so ghatanaamaa pari ghaaite bhaekaamadhye sarlaahi jillaa haripura nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya janaga mansura sohi thaaunkaa warsiya phiroja mansura ra warsiya asarakha mansuralaai wira aspataalamaa riphara garieko khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

ghaaite bhaekaa jagaagira mansura naajama mansura ra ikuna mansurako sira memoriyala aspataala banepaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha praharikaa anusaara ghaaiteko awasthaa saamaanya raheko chha tyaaktara chaalaka kaasi mansurasahita atha janaa sawaara rahekaa thie chaalaka mansura saamaanya ghaaite bhaeko ra unalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii awasyaka kaarawaahikaa laagi anusandhaana bhairaheko prahari upariksaka khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo so samuha tyaaktaramaa thotro kapadaa pelne mesinasahita bokera siraka dasnaa banaaune kaama gardai hindne garekaa raheko praharile janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa baahrabise napaa niwaasi chaalaka warsiya ramesa srestha ra sahachaalaka kaabhre paanchakhaala napaa kaa warsiya prawina baaniyaan ghaaite bhaekaa chhan uniharu duwaiko dhulikhela aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale jaanakaari dieko chha

marityuhunemaa tanahun bhaanu nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya kumaara pokhrela raheko chha chitawanako naaraayanagadhabaata lamajunako bemsisahara jaandai gareko naakha numko yaatruwaahaka basale thakkara dindaa unako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko ho

gharabaata khelna jaane kramamaa saaikalamaa airahekaa pokhrelalaai basale thakkara dieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle janaaeko chha marityu bhaeko akrosamaa sthaaniyawaasile ahile dumrebemsisahara sadakakhanda awaruddha paardai pradarsana garirahekaa chhan
ukta ghatanaamaa janaa wiraami parekaa chhan maritakasahita wiraami parekaa praayah sabaijanaa widesi kaamadaara raheko selaangaara raajyako prahari pramukha majalaana maanasorale bataaunubhayo

prahari pramukhadwaaraa hastaaksara garieko eka waktawyamaa bhanieko chha marityuko kaarana ajhai adhikaarika rupamaa pusti bhaisakeko chhaina tara prahariko praarambhika anusandhaanamaa sabaijanaale madiraa sewana garepachhi aspataala bharnaa gareko paaieko chha

kaathamaadaunbaata solukhumbu aundai gareko taataa sumoe jipa durghatanaa hundaa dui janaako marityu bhaeko chha solukhumbukaa laagi chhuteko jipa diunso udayapurako ghurmimaa durghatanaa hundaa eka janaa widesi naagarikako ghatanaasthalamai ra eka janaalaai upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaun laijaandai gardaa baatomai jyaana gaeko prahari chauki ghurmile janaaeko chha

marityu hunemaa andaaji warsakaa astreliyana naagarika huseka rudaaldapha ra unakai srimati warsa ki huseka ana sirilya raheko prahari chauki ghurmikaa prahari naayaba niriksaka windeswara raawatale jaanakaari dinubhayo

ghaaite huneharumaa solukhumbu nelekaa indra basneta saraswati basneta okhaladhungaa srichaurakaa tokabahaadura taamaana kaathamaadaun kaageswari manoharaakaa manoja rokaa kirtipurakaa sirjana basneta jorapaatikaa yaandhena laamaa ra baaraakaa arjuna paande rahekaa chhana
moranako kaanepokhari gaaunpaalikaa sthita purwapaschima raajamaargamaa aitabaara saanjha kaarako thakkarabaata motarasaaikalamaa sawaara eka yuwakako marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa motarasaaikala chaalaka khotaana rupaakotamajhuwaagadhi nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya chandrabahaadura guruna gambhira ghaaite bhaekaale bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana dharaanamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha thakkara dine kaaralaai niyantranamaa lie pani chaalaka pharaara rahekaale khoji bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya patharikaa prahari niriksaka kamala bajagaaile jaanakaari dinubhayo

karisi saamaagri kampani limitedako wiraatanagarasthita godaamamaa trakale kichdaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranakaa anusaara aja diunso naakha numko trakale aphnai sahachaalakalaai saamaana jhaarne garne kramamaa thakkara dindaa jyaana gaeko janaaeko chha

baahirabaata lyaaieko saamaagri godaamamaa jhaarnubhandaa pahilaa gaadilaai milaaune kramamaa thara khulna nasakekaa kariba warsiyaa prajwalako jyaana gaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranakaa prawaktaa nisaana thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo pra

daarchulaabaata mahendranagaratarpha aundai gareko naakha num ko basa aja bihaana bhimadatta raajamaargaantargata parne dotiko ruwasakaandaa sadaka khandamaa durghatanaa hundaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

kailaalisthita ksetriya traaphika prahari kaaryaalayakaa anusaara sadakabaata jhandai mitara tala bhiramaa ukta basa khasera bhaeko durghatanaamaa pari ghaaite bhaekaamadhye chaarajanaako sthiti gambhira bhaeko ra uniharulaai kailaalikaa padmaa aspataala ra seti anchala aspataalamaa lyaaindaichha

kamalaamaai nagarapaalikaa ra marina gaaunpaalikaa ko simaanaamaa raheko ghaangara kholaako bicha bhaagako khaali bagaramaa paaniko bahaawa badhera phasekaa marina gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya karisna dewakotaa ra warsiya arjuna saapakotaako somabaara praharile sakusala uddhaara gareko chha

yasaigari kamalaamaai nagarapaalikaa daandi guraansesthita marina kholaako bicha bhaagako khaali bagaramaa paaniko wahaawa badhana gai gaai bastu charaai pharkadai gareko awasthaamaa phaseki warsiyaa rupaa kaamiko sameta nepaali senaa ra sasastra prahari balako sahayogamaa praharile somabaara sakusala uddhaara gareko chha
nuwaakota jillaako myaagana gaaunpaalikaa mailunapaakhaamaa sanibaara helikaptara durghatanaamaa pari marityu bhaekaako sawa aja kaathamaadaun pathaaieko chha

durghatanaasthala atyanta wikata sthaanamaa bhaekaale uddhaaramaa kathinaai bhaeko thiyo sadakadekhi paidala tina ghantaabhandaa taadhaako jangalako bhiramaa durghatanaa bhaekaale raatabhari sawa lyaauna prahari khatieko nuwaakotakaa prahari pramukha wasantabahaadura kunwarale bataaunubhayo

pratikula mausamakaa kaarana ghatanaasthala najika helikaptara laijaana samasyaa bhaepachhi trisulisamma trakamaa sawa lyaaera helikaptaramaa kaathamaadaun pathaaieko ho gorakhaako saamaagaaunbaata kaathamaadaunkaa laagi udeko altichyuda eyarako helikaptara sanibaara bihaana baje nuwaakotako myaagana gaaunpaalikaa mailuna paakhaako bhiramaa dughartanaa hundaa chha janaako marityu bhaeko thiyo

durghatanaamaa chaalaka nischala kesisahita chha janaako marityu bhaeko ho marityu hunemaa eka jaapaani naagarikasameta chhan jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha kunwarakaa anusaara marityu hunemaa jaapaani naagarika hiromi komaatsu raahadaani nambara tike raamechhaapakaa warsiya dillibahaadura guruna dolakhaakaa warsiyaa hiraa serpaa chumanubri gaaunpaalikaa samdokaa chhowaana nurwu ra sindhupaalchokakaa warsiya sunila taamaana ra chaalaka nischala kesi rahekaa chhan

aitabaara aparaanh suraksaa nikaaya nepaali senaa ra sasastrako gotaakhora tolile taalamaa khoji garne kramamaa sawa phelaa paarekaa hun nawalaparaasi gaimdaakotakaa warsiya rawi khanaala saata warsiya sankara khanaala atha warsiya siwa khanaala paancha warsiya praachina paudela paancha warsiya ranjita gaihre ra warsiyaa manisaa bajagaainko sawa phelaa pareko ho sawa pariksanakaa laagi pokharaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana lagieko daandaakonaaka prahari chaukikaa inchaarja prahari naayaba niriksaka wisnauwarasimha thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

helikoptaramaa paailata nischala kesisahita saata janaa sawaara rahekaa thie helikoptaramaa jaapaani naagarika hiromi komaatsu raahadaani nambara tike raamechhaapakaa warsiya dillibahaadura guruna dolakhaakaa warsiyaa hiraa serpaa chumanubri gaaunpaalikaa samdokaa chhowaana nurwu ra sindhupaalchokakaa warsiya sunila taamaanako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chhagorakhaako chumanubri gaaunpaalikaa kaa lho ani dolpaa dikiko jiwitai uddhaara garieko chha

purwi chitawanako bhurajhuremaa bihibaara raati tyaankarale motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa dui janaako marityu bhaeko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaaanusaara marityu hunemaa makawaanapura chhattiwanakaa warsiya sukamaana syaantaana ra baaraa jitapura kaa warsiya premabahaadura moktaana rahekaa chhan
chitawanabaata makawaanapuratarpha jaandai gareko naakha num ko tyaankarale sohi disaatarpha jaandai gareko gapa num ko motarasaaikalalaai raapti nagarapaalikaa jhurajhuremaa thakkara dieko thiyo

bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa tehrasaala chokamaa gae raati skutara naharamaa khasdaa sohi mahaanagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya bhawiswara bhandaariko marityu bhaeko ho skutaramaa sawaara arkaa eka wyakti naharamaa bagera wepattaa bhaekaa chhan unako pahichaana huna nasakeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
paschima chitawanamaa skula basale kichera aja eka baalikaako jyaana gaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale dieko jaanakaarianusaara sohi wadaako laahurechokamaa ukta ghatanaa bhaeko ho skulabaata widyaarthilaai ghara chhodna hinddaa aparaahna h baje so durghatanaa bhaeko ho
basa ra chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa wadaa num niwaasi mijaara sohi widyaalayamaa narsarimaa adhyayanarat thiin
sindhupaalchoka jillaako baahrabise nagarapaalikaaantargata juresthita sunakosi nadimaa maachhaa maarna gaekaa dui bhaaratiya naagarika aitabaara nadile bagaaera bepattaa bhaekaa chhan
uniharuko khoji kaarya bhairaheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya baahrabisele jaanakaari dieko chha

purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata parne kanchanapurako suklaaphaantaa nagarapaalikaa kaluwaapura najika gae raati motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa pari sasastra praharikaa sahaayaka hawaldaara bhimadattanagarapaalikaa khairabhatti ghara bhaekaa andaaji warsiya harisa bhattako marityu bhaeko chha

kailaaliko tikaapurabaata sepa num ko motarasaaikalamaa aundai garekaa bhatta chadheko motarasaaikala ra bhimadattanagarabaata dhanagadhitarpha jaandai gareko seja num ko bhyaana apasamaa thokkindaa uhaanko marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya jhalaarikaa prahari niriksaka ramesadatta awasthile bataaunubhayo
thakkara dine bhyaana ra chaalaka iprakaa jhalaariko niyantranamaa rahekaa chhan bhatta ugrataaraa sasastra prahari gana tikaapuramaa sahaayaka hawaldaara padamaa kaaryarata raheko bujhieko chha
moranako patharisanischare nagarapaalikaa sthita purwapaschima raajamaargamaa gae raati motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata paidalayaatriko marityu bhaeko chha
purwabaata paschimatarpha jaandai gareko kopa num ko motarasaaikalako thakkarabaata tehrathumako laaligunraasa nagarapaalikaa ghara bhaekaa warsiya uddhawa moteko marityu bhaeko ho

durghatanaamaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motelaai upachaarakaa laagi sthaaniya pathari aspataalamaa puyaaune bittikai marityu bhaeko ho thakkara dine motarasaaikala ra tyasakaa chaalakalaai ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya patharisanischarele niyantranamaa lieko chha

kaathamaadaunbaata naaraayanagadhatarpha jaandai gareko baakha num ko traka mangalabaara raati gajuri gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num antargata trisuli nadi khasdaa eka janaa bepattaa bhaekaa chhan bhane eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

nadimaa parera haraairahekaa gajuri gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num kaa warsiya raamakarisna bhujelako khoji bhairaheko bhane baaisa warsiya kesara pulaami upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka dambarabahaadura wikale jaanakaari dinubhayo

durghatanaamaa anya tina ghaaite bhaekaale upachaarakaa laagi kaathamaadaun tramaa sentaramaa pathaaieko chha nadi thulo bhaeko ra paani parirahekaale uddhaaramaa samasyaa pareko chha nepaala prahari nepaali senaa ra sasastra praharile uddhaarako kaarya bhairaheko chha

chhinchujaajarakota sadaka khandaantargata salyaanako banagaada kholaa paara gardaigardaa baadhi aepachhi yaatru haama phaalera baanchna saphala bhaekaa chhan jaajarakotabaata nepaalaganjakaa laagi chhuteko kiyaa gaadi banagaada kholaa paara garne kramamaa baadhi aera bagaaeko thiyo

so sadaka khandamaa awatajaawata garne salyaana surkheta jaajarakota dolpaa ra rukumakaa naagarikalaai pratyaksa asara gareko arkaa sthaaniya maanasimha dhaamile bataaunubhayo kholaa paara gardaigardaa gaadiko injinamaa paani pasera injina nai banda hune gareko chha kholaa badhepachhi yaataayaatakaa saadhana gantawyamaa napugdaa sayaun yaatru baatomai alapatra parne garekaa chhan

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tulasipurakaa anusaara marityu hunemaa bhaarata siwaharikaa warsiya harikisora guptaa rahekaa chhan guptaako basako breka phela bhaera palnitadaa ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tulasipurale janaaeko chha

tallo dolpaasthita mudkechulaa gaaunpaalikaa sarmi gaaunmaa pahirole sthaaniyawaasi raajabahaadura rokaaya ra deurupaa thakullaako ghara purieko ho haribahaadura budhaamagarako ghara bhatkeko chha maanawiya ksati nabhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha sarmi gaaunkaa adhikaamsa ghara pahiroko jokhimamaa chhan basti suraksita thaaunmaa saarna sthaaniwaasile maaga garekaa chhan

bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa baaipaasarodamaa naakha num ko trakale thakkara dindaa dui purusako marityu bhaeko ho wiraganjabaata intaa bokera kaathamaadauntarpha aundai gareko trakale paidala yaatrilaai thakkara dieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha thelaamaa paani taanne pampa raakhera duwai janaa sadakamaa hindirahekaa thie maritakako sanaakhata huna sakeko chhaina

yastai tanahunko anbukhairenibaata naaraayanagadhatarpha aundai gareko raakha num ko traka aja bihaana trisuli nadimaa khaseko chha bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa pandhrakilomaa traka sadakabaata trisuli nadimaa khaseko ho ghaaite chaalaka ra sahachaalakalaai upachaarakaa laagi bharatapura lyaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
bipi raajamaarga antargata mahottariko bardiwaasa sindhuli sadakakhandamaa basale thakkanra dindaa aja eka motarasaaikala chaakalako marityu bhaeko chha

marityu hunemaa bardiwaasa nagarapaalikaa basne warsiya netrabahaadura smaaili magara raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya mahottarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka khagendrabahaadura khadkaale bataaunubhayo sindhulibaata motarasaaikalamaa duijanaa sawaara bhai bardiwaasatarpha audai gardaa bardiwaasabaata sindhulitatarpha jaandai gareko naa kha num ko basale kaalaapaanimaa motarasaaikalalaai thakkanra dindaa chaalaka smaailiko ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko prahari naayaba upariksaka khadkaale bataaunubhayo
motarasaaikala pachhaadi basekaa sindhuli kamalaamaai nagarapaalikaa kaa indra ale magara gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unako bardibaasa janasewaa aspataalamaa praathamika upachaara bhairaheko chha

salaakhu kholaamaa aeko baadhile kispaana gaaunpaalikaa kitili bagarakaa omabahaadura taamaanako pakki ghara ra gharabhitra rahekaa muri dhaana lattaakapadaa nagada ru hajaara ksati bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nuwaakotale janaaeko chha

yastai belakotagadhi napaa amaaremaa amaare kholaamaa aeko baadhile haribhakta tiwaariko dui ghara ra gharamaa raheko kiraanaa pasala maasupasalasameta bagaaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

paanchatharako phaaleluna gaaunpaalikaa sthita eka gharamaa agalaagi hundaa mahinaaki baalikaako agole jalera mutyu bhaeko chha chhorilaai bachaaune kramamaa amaa gambhira ghaaite bhaeki chhin aja gharamaa agalaagi hundaa awinaaraayana raaiko chhori sumitaa raaiko agole jalera marityu bhaeko paanchathara praharile janaaeko chha

amaa kamalaa chhorilaai gharabhitra sutaaera ghaansa kaatna gaeki ra srimaan pani alainchi bagaanamaa kaama garna gaekaa thie gharamaa ago laageko dekhera ghara pharkimdaa chhori agole jaliraheko awasthaamaa dekhepachhi bachaaune kramamaa amaa pani ghaaite bhaeko paanchathara praharile janaaeko chha agole jalera gambhira awasthaamaa bhaeki warsiyaa kamalaako paanchathara aspataalamaa upachaara huna nasakepachhi bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaana dharaana pathaaieko chha

mumbaikaa warsiya nagendrakumaara kaartika mehataako mangalabaara hilsaamaa helikaptarabaata orlera selphi khichne kramamaa pachhaadiko pankhaa laagera marityu bhaeko thiyo mehataako sawa mangalabaara nai hilsaabaata simakota puyaaieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya humlaakaa prahari niriksaka gindrabahaadura bogatile raasasalaai bataaunubhayo

sahaayaka pramukha jillaa adhikaari mahesakumaara pokharelale maritakakaa pariwaarabaata jaaheri lii bayaana sakera sawa pariksana garna thaalieko bataaunubhayo sawa pariksanapaschaat aphantalaai bujhaai helikoptarabaata kaathamaadaun hundai bhaarata lagine tayaari garieko chha selphi khichne kramamaa pankhaa laagera mehataako taauko ksatawikseta bhaeko thiyo

pradesa num prahari kaaryaalaya wiraatanagarale dieko jaanakaarianusaara raamadhuni nagarapaalikaa kaa dinesa khadkaako warsiyaa chhori sarijanaa khadkaa ra warsiya chhoraa asmina khadkaa bihaana bhaadaa maajhne kramamaa chipliera kholaamaa khasdaa bagaaera bepattaa bhaekaa thie

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya pakalibaata khatiekaa prahari ra sthaaniyawaasi milera khojabinakaa kramamaa saanjha baje baalikaako sawa phelaa paareko chha bhane baalakako khoji kaarya bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

purwabaata naaraayanagadhatarpha aundai gareko naakha numko traka ra kaathamaadaunbaata kaankadabhittaatarpha jaandai gareko makaalu yaataayaatako naakha numko basa ekaapasamaa thokkindaa ukta durghatanaa bhaeko ho durghatanaamaa satrajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

purwapaschima raajamaargako ratnanagara nagarapaalikaa bhaanuchokamaa bhaeko ukta durghatanaamaa pari marityu hunemaa rautahata chapurakaa traka chaalaka warsiya mohana ghisina sohi thaaunkaa trakakaa sahachaalaka warsiya buddhimaana laamaa basamaa sawaara kaathamaadaun thaanakotakaa warsiya wisnauprasaada thaapaa ra taaplejuna khumlina nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiyaa taaraa baraala raheko prahari naayaba upariksaka prabhuprasaada dhakaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo

paschimabaata purwatarpha jaandai gareko mepa numko motarasaaikala ra wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko mepa numko motarasaaikala ekaapasamaa thokkindaa numko chaalaka ratuwaamaai nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya jagadisa saahako marityu bhaeko ho

unako upachaarakaa kramamaa rumgeli aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya rumgelikaa prahari niriksaka kawindrakumaara kaarkile jaanakaari dinubhayo durghatanaamaa pari arko motarasaaikalakaa chaalaka sunawarsi kaa warsiya rupanaaraayana taajapuriyaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan uhaanko nyuro aspataala wiraatanagaramaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

anusandhaanakaa kramamaa aitabaara diunso saathi kahaan jaanchhu bhanera niskiekaa srestha ghara napharkieko ra aja kholaale bagaaeko awasthaamaa sawa bhetieko mahaanagariya prahari parisara bhaktapura muddaa saakhaakaa prahari niriksaka karisna sresthale jaanakaari dinubhayo ghatanaakaa baaremaa praharile thapa anusandhaana gariraheko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo

tyasaigari awirala warsaakaa kaarana aja pani bhaktapura dubaanamaa pareko chha hanumante kholaamaa aeko baadhikaa kaarana bhaktapurako hanumaanaghaata baaraahi sthaana lagaayatako ksetra bihaanaidekhi dubaanamaa pareko chha dubaanamaa parekaa chaara janaalaai sthaaniya ra praharile uddhaara garekaa chhan

wisesagari raatiko samayamaa aune baadhibaata bachna praharile sarwasaadhaaranalaai agraha gareko chha baadhimaa uddhaara garna ra awasyaka sahayoga garna nepaali senaa prahari ra sasastra prahariko tolilaai uchcha satarkataamaa raakhieko jillaa prasaasana kaaryaalayale jaanakaari dieko chha

mahaanagariya traaphika prahari mahaasaakhaakaa pramukha ewum prahari waristha upariksaka wasantakumaara pantale bhyaanale triparalaai thakkara dindaa bhyaanamaa rahekaa tina janaamadhye thaapaa ra silawaalako upachaarakaa kramamaa tribhuwana siksana aspataala mahaaraajaganjamaa marityu bhaeko jaanakaari dinubhayo

bhyaanakaa chaalaka sindhupaalchokakaa warsiya suresa paraajuli bhane ghaaite bhaekaa chhan unako tribhuwana siksana aspataala mahaaraajaganjamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha duwai sawaarisaadhana ra triparakaa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
pokharaabaata mustaana aundai gareko ga kha num ko basa sadakabaata kariwa mitara tala khetamaa khasdaa tyasamaa sawaara janaa ghaaite bhaekaa hun

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari niriksaka suraja khatrikaa anusaara chha janaa gambhira ghaaitelaai thapa upachaarakaa laagi pokharaasthita gandaki anchala aspataala lagieko chha bhane anya ghaaiteko sthaaniya jillaa aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha basachaalaka prahariko niyantranamaa raheko ra durghatanaako wistarita wiwarana bhane auna baanki raheko uhaanle jaanakaari dinubhayo

dhumgaale laagera baitadimaa aja eka sainika jawaanako marityu bhaeko chha marityu hunemaa dogadaakedaara gaaunpaalikaa kapinnaa jasamalaakaa warsiya naaraayanadatta bhatta raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prawaktaa ewum prahari niriksaka kaantiraaja josile jaanakaari dinubhayo

bidaamaa ghara aekaa bhatta nepaali senaakaa chaara nambara baahini nepaalaganjamaa kaaryarata hunuhunthyo bhattako sawa pariksanakaa laagi jillaa aspataalamaa raakhieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

dhanagadibaata daanako tulasipuratarpha aundai gareko naakha nambarako yaatrubaahaka basa aja belukaa kholaale bagaaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya tulasipurakaa pramukha prahari naayaba upariksaka prakaasa saapakotaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

uniharu sabai bheri khalumgaa thaantisthita tirtharaaja boharaakaa gharamaa bhaadaamaa basdai aekaa thie tyastai gharamuli tirtharaaja boharaaki saatawarsiyaa chhori nagmaako pani marityu bhaeko chha jiwitai uddhaara gariekaa luhaarako jaajarakota aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha chhaati taauko ra khuttaamaa chota laagekaa unako awasthaa gambhira raheko bataaieko chha

paani parirahekaale uddhaaramaa samasyaa bhaeko pramukha jillaa adhikaari lalitakumaara basnetale jaanakaari dinubhayo wana tathaa waataawaranamantri saktibahaadura basnetale maritakaprati sraddhaanjali wyakta gardai ghaaiteko swaasthyalaabhako kaamanaa wyakta garnubhaeko chha uddhaara ra upachaaramaa kunai kasura baanki naraakhna uhaanle nirdesana dinaakaa saathai surkhetabaata ghaaitekaa upachaarakaa laagi helikaptara jaajarakota jaana laageko bataaunubhayo

dhaadinabemsi salyaanataara sadakaantargata nilakantha nagarapaalikaa wadaa num taaribemsimaa aja eutaa tipara pachhaadi hataauna laagdaa sahachaalakako kichera marityu bhaeko chha

baakha numko khaali tipara pachhaadi hataaundaa sohi tiparakaa sahachaalaka jwaalaamukhi gaaunpaalikaa wadaa num niwaasi warsiya atita adhikaariko marityu bhaeko ho gaadiko thakkarabaata ghaaite adhikaariko upachaarakaa laagi laandaalaandai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale jaanakaari dieko chha

bipi raajamaargaantargata kaabhrepalaanchokako dhulikhela nagarapaalikaa saaphino saamudaayika wanako jumgalamaa aja bihaana yaatrubaahaka basa paltindaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

bhakundebaata banepaatarpha aundai gareko baa kha nambarako basa aniyantrita bhai sadakabaata mitara tala kholsaamaa khasdaa janaa yaatru ghaaite bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari upariksaka rawiraaja khadkaale jaanakaari dinubhayo
jaajarakotamaa gaadiko thakkarabaata aja saanjha eka baalikaako marityu bhaeko chha

gaadiko thakkarabaata bheri nagarapaalikaa raawatagaaunkaa parithwibahaadura raawataki atha warsiyaa chhori rosaniko marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha khalumgaadekhi rimnaatarpha gairaheko bheri gumgaa yaataayaata samitiko naa chha nambarako gaadiko thakkarabaata ghaaite bhaeki unalaai upachaarakaa laagi jaajarakota aspataala lyaaundai gardaa baatomai marityu bhaeko ho

wiraganjabaata kaathamaadaun aundai gareko baapa num ko koilaa bokeko trakale parithwiraajamaargako thaakre gaaunpaalikaa maa thakkara dindaa makawaanapurako thaahaa nagarapaalikaa niwaasi warsiya rumjita magarako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha dambarabahaadura wikale jaanakaari dinubhayo

yastai siddhaleka gaaunpaalikaa phisaphisetaaramaa skulabasale thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalakako marityu bhaeko chha dhaadinabensibaata malekhu jaandai gareko baapa num ko motarasaaikalalaai baakha num ko skula basale thakkara dindaa motarasaaikala chaalaka jwaalaamukhi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya sujata bhandaariko marityu bhaeko chha motarasaaikalamaa sawaara duijanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan uniharuko gajuri praathamika swaasthya kendramaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

durghatanaamaa pari kariba janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaitemadhye dui janaako awasthaa gambhira raheko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya karisnapurakaa prahari naayaba niriksaka bharata dhaamile bataaunubhayo marityu hunemaa kailaaliko godaabari nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiyaa rinaa chaudhari ra unako eka warsiya chhoraa ridama raheko praharile janaaeko chha

mahendranagarabaata dhanagadhitarpha jaandai gareko ma ja num bhyaana ra dhanagadhibaata mahendranagaratarpha jaandai gareko baa ja num ko myaajika bhyaana eka apasamaa thoknikaekaa hun ghaaiteko kailaaliko attariyaasthita padmaa aspataalamaa upachaara bharaheko chha

phidimabaata phaaleluna jaandai gareko me ja num ko jipa durghatanaa hundaa wadaadhyaksa sujaataa waantaawaasahita paancha janaa ghaaite bhaekaa hun ghaaiteharulaai upachaarakaa laagi paanchathara jillaa aspataala lyaaindai garieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha
maanasarowara kailaasa parwatako tirthayaatraamaa gaekaa tina bhaaratiya naagarikako marityu bhaeko chha

yaatraakaa kramamaa asaara ra gate eka purusasahita dui mahilaako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya humlaakaa prahari naayaba niriksaka suratabahaadura chandale jaanakaari dinubhayo marityu hunemaa asaara gatekaa dina bhaarata andra pradesa koranula niwaasi paasaporta num ema kaa warsiya winitaa sanjaya khidaakara raheko ra unako marityu chinako dorapaakamaa bhaeko prahari naayaba niriksaka chandale bataaunubhayo

sohi dina arkaa tirthayaatri bhaarata andra pradesa kaakinaadaa niwaasi paasaporta num ara kaa warsiya purusa satyaalaksmi naaraayana subbaa raao graandi bheraa bhenakaa ko taaklaakotamaa marityu bhaeko thiyo unalaai pani mumgalabaara nepaalaganja hundai bhaarata lagieko uhaanle janaaunubhayo

humlaa jillaakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka rabina sresthale baahira sanchaaramaadhyamamaa aejasto tirthayaatri kohi pani alapatra napareko bataaunubhayo mausama bigrera hawaai yaataayaata sewaamaa awarodha bhaekaale simakotamaa tirthayaatriharu basnu pareko ra sabai sakusala pharkiraheko uhaanle janaaunubhayo waisaakhajethadekhi suru hune tirthayaatraamaa atha janaa tirthayaatriko hindne kramamaa marityu bhaeko uhaanko bhanaai chha
purwapaschima raajamaargaantargata sunasariko kosi gaaunpaalikaa kosi kataanamaa gaeraati sawaari durghatanaamaa pari janaako marityu bhaeko chha
marityu hunemaa bhaaratako wihaara raajyako supaula jillaasthita laksminaiyaa basne warsiya sumjiwa kumaara ra sohi thaaukaa gonu kumaara raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha

maritaka chha janaamadhye duijanaako maatra naama khuleko ra baanki chaarajanaako naama khulna baanki raheko sunasarikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka naaraayanaprasaada chimariyaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

purwabaata paschimatarpha jaandai gareko bi ara pi bi numko skaarapio jipa aphain aniyantrita hundaa chhajanaako marityu bhaeko ho durghatanaamaa pari tinajanaako ghatanaasthalamaa ra tinajanaako wiraatanagarasthita goldena aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya sunasarile janaaeko chha

ghatanaasthalamaa marityu bhaekaa tara naama nakhulekaa tinajanaako sawa jillaa aspataala inaruwaamaa raakhieko chha bhane upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaekaako sawa wiraatanagarasthita aspataalamai raakhieko praharile janaaeko chha sohi durghatanaamaa anya chaarajanaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa pramukha prahari upariksaka tekabahaadura taamaanakaa anusaara marityu hunemaa waijanaatha gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya tulabahaadura budhaa sohi gaaunpaalikaa kaa warsiya lokabahaadura sunaara kohalapura nagarapaalikaa kaa chaara warsiya ranjita paasi ra duduwaa gaaunpaalikaa kaa chaara warsiyaa rimaadewi yaadawa chhan

jillaa daiwi wipad wyawasthaapana samitile warsaako sthitiko akalana gardai samitiantargatakaa wibhinna samuhalaai uddhaara tathaa raahatakaa kaamamaa parichaalana garisakeko pramukha jillaa adhikaari ramesakumaara kesile bataaunubhayo
purwa paschima lokamaargako khairahani nagarapaalikaa maa aja bihaana gudiraheko basa aniyantrita bhai paltandaa ghaaitemadhye eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

durghatanaamaa ghaaite huneko sumkhyaa pugeko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale dieko jaanakaarianusaara bhairahawaabaata bharatapura hundai wiraganjatarpha jaandai gareko naa kha nambarako basa bihaana h baje sadaka chheumaa paltieko ho

basa paltindaa marityu hunemaa chitawanako raapti nagarapaalikaa basne warsa kaa sunila mijaara raheko praharile janaaeko chha mijaarako upachaarakaa kramamaa bharatapura aspataalamaa marityu bhaeko ho

durghatanaapachhi ghaaitemadhye janaako puraano medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha jasamadhye ekako awasthaa gambhira raheko chha anya chaara janaako elaaibha aspataala bharatapuramaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

janasamparka adhikarita adhikaarile chitawanamaa eka sumwedanasila samasyaako upachaarakaa laagi chikitsaka upachaarakaa saamagrisahita jaane laksyakaa saatha so helikoptara graandi aspataalako helipyaadamaa awatarana gareko thiyo aspataalale patrakaara sammelanako ayojanaa gari durghatanaakaa baaremaa jaanakaari sameta dieko chha

kaathamaadaun praharikaa pramukha esaesapi wiswaraaja pokharelale awataranako kramamaa chipliera helikoptara durghatanaamaa pareko jaanakaari dinubhayo uhaanle durghatanaamaa helikoptarako pakhetaamaa ksati pugeko bhae pani anya kunai maanawiya ksati bhane nabhaeko bataaunubhayo
kaabhrepalaanchokako banepaa nagarapaalikaa sthita opimaa aja bihaana minitraka paltindaa ekajanaako mutyu bhaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka mehandraprasaada maraasinikaa anusaara rawiopiko chhahaarebaata banepaatarpha tarakaari liera aundai gareko baakha numko nisaasa minitraka paltindaa mandanadeupura nagarapaalikaa ki warsiyaa lalimaayaa taamaana sakhta ghaaite bhaepachhi dhulikhelasthita dhulikhela saamudaayika aspataalamaa upachaara garaaundaa unako marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

gaadi aniyantrita bhai sadakabaata kariba mitara tala kholsaamaa khasdaa wisphota bhai agalaagi bhaeko thiyo ago nibhaauna banepaa nagarapaalikaako damakala bolaaundaa pani ukta sthaanabaata kariba minetako durimaa raheko ghatanaasthala eka ghantaapachhi maatrai pugeko bhandai sthaaniya baasindaa akrosita bhaekamaa thie damakala samayamaa napugepachhi prahari ra sthaaniya baasindaale gaadimaa laageko ago niyantranamaa liekaa thie
maharjanako oma samaaja aspataalamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha basa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa liera anusandhaana gariraheko chha

kaalikota siunaa gaaunpaalikaa niwaasi warsiya pradipa saahi jumlaa chandranaatha nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya prema pariyaara bhaarata jhaarakhanda basne warsiya dojara apretara budhana mundaa ra bihaara basne warsiya ilektronika injiniyara nandakisorako uddhaara garieko prahari naayaba upariksaka syaamakumaara saaru magarale bataaunubhayo

uddhaarakaa laagi ghatanaasthalamaa skaabhetara ra dojara prayoga garieko thiyo pahiro kariba mitara maathibaata khaseko thiyo uniharuko swaasthya pariksana garna jillaa aspataala khaandabaari lyaaindai garieko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale dieko jaanakaarianusaara pokharaabaata kaathamaadauntarpha jaandai gareko ga kha numko maaikrobasa ra wiparita disaabaata aundai gareko naa kha numko traka aja bihaana h baje ekaapasamaa judhekaa hun

ghatanaamaa pari marityu bhaekaa tinajanaako sanaakhata ahilesamma bhaeko chhaina bhane uddhaarakaa laagi lyaaindai gardaa marityu bhaekaamaa maaikrobasa chaalaka kaaski rupaakota kaa warsiya chandrabahaadura kesi rahekaa chhan
ghaaitemadhye paanchajanaako chitawana medikala kalejamaa duijanaako chitawana puraano medikala kaleja bharatapura ra ekajanaalaai pokharaa pathaaieko chha

chitawana medikala kalejamaa rahekaa duijanaa ra puraano medikala kalejamaa rahekaa duijanaa gari chaarajanaako awasthaa gambhira raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale jaanakaari dieko ra anyako awasthaa madhyama raheko chha

durghatanaamaa wadaa numm kai warsiya jipa chaalaka dambarabahaadura ghimire ra warsiya karnabahaadura bhandaari gambhira ghaaite bhai upachaarakaa laagi nepaali senaako helikaptarabaata kaathamaadaum lagieko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya baagalunakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka wiswaraajasimha thaapaale jaanakaari dinubhayo jipa kachchi sadakabaata mitara tala khaseko thiyo
surkheta baabiyaachauradekhi muramuritarpha jaandai gareko bhegha num ko atoriksaa aniyantrita bhai sadakabaata saya mitara tala khasera durghatanaagrasta bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

durghatanaamaa pari panchapuri nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiyaa winitaa saahi ra uhaanki atha mahinaaki chhori pratiksaa tathaa sohi wadaakai ato riksaa chaalaka warsiya asoka raawatako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari pramukha prahari upariksaka umaaprasaada chaturwedile jaanakaari dinubhayo
durghatanaamaa pari anya tina janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaiteko madhyapaschima ksetriya aspataala surkhetamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha

ghaaite hunemaa purwi chitawanako raapti nagarapaalikaa wadaa num basne warsiya hari silawaala raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale janaaeko chha praharikaa anusaara ghaaite silawaalako puraano medikala kalejamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha bhane tyaankara nikaalne kaarya jaari raheko chha khaseko tyaankara khaali raheko praharile janaaeko chha
parithwiraajamaargaantargata dhaadinako benighaataroraana gaaunpaalikaa jogimaaraabaata sukrabaara raati trisuli nadimaa eka traka khasdaa dui janaa haraairahekaa chhan

bhairahawaabaata simenta liera kaathamaadaunkaa laagi chhuteko naakha num ko traka sadakabaata phita tala trisulimaa parera haraaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya gajurikaa prahari niriksaka sanjaya timalsinaale jaanakaari dinubhayo nadimaa parera sindhupaalchoka baahrabisekaa traka chaalaka warsiya topabahaadura srestha ra sahachaalaka warsiya tulasi dulaala haraairahekaa chhan

nadimaa trakasameta dubeko awasthaa chha so durghatanaamaa ghaaite bhaekaa eka janaako raajamaarga saamudaayika aspataala malekhumaa upachaara bhairaheko chha bepattaa bhaekaako khoji bhairahe pani nadi badhekaale kathinaai bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha

marityu hunemaa sohi gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya wirendrabahaadura simha ra unaki srimati warsiyaa jwaalaadewi raheko tathaa tinakaa dui chhoraachhori ghaaite bhaeko chhawisagaaunpaalikaa upaadhyaksa raadhikaakumaari rataalaale jaanakaari dinubhayo ghaaitelaai upachaarakaa laagi jillaa aspataala simkheta lyaaindaichha

aja saanjha jhareko pahirole baa ga numko skaabhetara purdaa chaalaka paanchatharako hilihaana gaaunpaalikaa kaa chaalaka karisnaprasaada kutuwaalako marityu bhaeko sthaaniyawaasi raajendra limbule jaanakaari dinubhayo
uddhaarakaa laagi nepaala prahari ra sasastra prahariko toli ghatanaasthalatarpha gaisakeko pramukha jillaa adhikaari mohanabahaadura jisile jaanakaari dinubhayo

daauraakaa laagi rukha kaatne kramamaa maai nagarapaalikaa borunakaa warsiya jumga dewaanako marityu bhaeko ho ghara najikaiko jumgalamaa daauraa kaatne kramamaa aphainle dhaaleko rukha aphaintira dhaldaa dewaanako jyaana gaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya ilaamale jaanakaari dieko chha dewaanako ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko janaaieko chha
doti jillaako silagadhibaata dhanagadhitarpha gairaheko se ja num ko jipa durghatanaa hanudaa tina janaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

ganyaapadhuraa gaaunpaalikaako gajaraulaamaa jipa durghatanaa bhaeko praarambhika anusandhaanabaata jaanakaarimaa aeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka chakraraaja josile bataaunubhayo

ghatanaako thapa wiwarana auna baanki chha aja bihaana kariba baje ukta jipa dhanagadhikaa laagi chhuteko thiyo jipamaa kati janaa sawaara thie bhanne yakina chhraina uddhaarakaa laagi jillaa prahari kaaryaalayabaata prahari naayaba upariksaka josiko netaritwamaa prahari gairaheko janaaieko chha

basako thakkarabaata tanahunmaa tina janaa yuwakako marityu bhaeko chha jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunle dieko jaanakaarianusaara motarasaaikalamaa chaara janaa sawaara garirahekaamadhye dui janaako sanibaara raati nai ghatanaasthalamaa ra eka janaako upachaarakaa kramamaa aja bihaana marityu bhaeko ho durghatanaamaa pari ghaaite bhaekaa ekako bhane upachaara bhairaheko chha

durghatanaamaa pari marityu hunemaa parsaa jillaa serawaa gaaunpaalikaa basne warsiya raaja raaya sohi sthaana niwaasi warsiya dhiraja chaudhariko sanibaara raati ghatanaasthalamaa nai marityu bhaeko ho arkaa ghaaite bhaekaa warsiya sanjaya chaudhariko gandaki medikala kaleja pokharaamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa aja wihaana marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya tanahunkaa suchanaa adhikaari ewum prahari naayaba upariksaka sunila mallale jaanakaari dinubhayo

pokharaabaata kaankarabhittaatarpha jaandai gareko naakha numko basale wiparita disaamaa gudiraheko naapa numko motarasaaikalalaai parithwiraajamaargaantargata wyaasanagarapaalikaa sthita kamalabaarimaa thakkara dindaa ukta durghatanaa bhaeko ho motarasaaikalamaa sawaara warsiya bholaa chaudhariko gandaki medikala kaleja pokharaamaa upachaara bhairaheko chha maritaka dui janaako sawa damauli aspataalamaa ra eka janaako gandaki medikala kaleja pokharaamaa pariksanakaa laagi raakhieko praharile janaaeko chha
ukta basa ra tyasakaa chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lii thapa anusandhaana bhairaheko prahari naayaba upariksaka mallale bataaunubhayo

mahaanagariya prahari parisara bhaktapurakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka ewum suchanaa adhikaari karisna prasaaimkaa anusaara dhaadina thaakre ghara bhai haala thaanakotamaa basne warsiya sanjiwa suchikaaralaai gaeraati niyantranamaa liieko chha
kaabhrebaata kaathamaadauntarpha airaheko baakha numko tiparale sohi disaamaa airaheko baapa numko skutaralaai thakkara dindaa skutaramaa sawaara tinajanaako marityu bhaeko thiyo

marityu hunemaa bhaktapura lokanthalikaa warsiya haribahaadura katuwaala dolakhaa meluna ghara bhai haala madhyapura thimi basne warsa kaa sawitaa ghimire ra sawitaakai chhoraa warsiya arawina ghimire rahekaa thie

ghatanaabaata wiraganja mahaanagarapaalikaa laalaparsaakaa warsiya syaama paasawaana ghaaite bhaekaamaa wiraganjasthita naaraayanai upaksetriya aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayale janaaeko chha

narunus na amaa narunus na daadaa skula posaakamai raheki baalikaale bhaktapura aspataalako chauramaa aphu rundai aphnaa aphantako ansu puchhidindai gareko dekhdaa aspataala parisaramaa jhummiekaako ankhaa rasaaekaa thie

kaabherako saangaabaata aja kariba h baje tiwra gatimaa aeko baakha numko tiparale araniko raajamaarga khandaantargata suryawinaayaka nagarapaalikaa palaasemaa baapa num ko skutaralaai thakkara dindaa skutaramaa sawaara tina janaako ghatanaasthalamai jyaana gaeko ho

ghatanaamaa madhyapurathimi nagarapaalikaa lokanthali basne warsiya skutara chaalaka haribahaadura katuwaala dolakhaa meluna gaaunpaalikaa ghara bhai wigata warsadekhi lokanthalimaa pasala sanchaalana garera basdai aeki warsiyaa sawitaa ghimire ra uhaanko chhoraa warsiya arawina ghimireko marityu bhaeko mahaanagariya prahari waritta jagaatikaa prahari naayaba upariksaka dipaka sresthale jaanakaari dinubhayo

saangaamaa raheko nepaala prahari awaasiya maadhyamika widyaalayamaa kaksaa maa padhne chhoraa biraami bhaeko khabara aepachhi chhimeki haribahaaduralaai liera skula pugera chhoraalaai upachaarakaa laagi laijaandai gardaa tiparale thakkara dieko thiyo chhoraako upachaara nai garna napaai amaa chhoraako ekaipataka jyaana gayo

lokanthalimai ghara banaaune sapanaa bokera dui mahinaaaghi malesiyaa gaekaa srimaan kesawa ghimirele ekaisaatha srimati ra chhoraa maatrai gumaaenan ajai saanjha baje amerikaa jaana laagekaa sawitaako bhaai kumaara kaaphleko yaatraasameta yahi sokale rokieko madhyapurathimi nagarapaalikaa wadaa num kaa wadaa adhyaksa suraja khadkaale bataaunubhayo
khaanaa khaaera ma chhittai pharkanchhu hai amaa bhanera hindekaa chhoraako yo haalata bhayo bhandai amaa jaanaki katuwaala sangai rundai aspataalamaa pugekaa kasaiko ansu thaamiena

sawitaako daaju nawaraaja kaaphlele tipara chaalakalaai pakraau nagaresamma sawa nabujhne ra kadaa kaarabaahi garna maaga garnubhayo kunai pani bahaanaamaa chaalakalaai unmukti dine prayaasa garie chupa laagera nabasne uhaanle bataaunubhayo

prahari naayaba upariksaka sresthale ghatanaako praarambhika anusandhaanabaata tipara chaalakako thulo laaparabaahi dekhieko pratikriyaa dinubhayo uhaanle chaalakalaai pakraau gari kaanuni kaarabaahi agaadi badhaaune pani bataaunubhayo
kanchanapurako mahendranagarabaata pyuthaanakaa laagi sanibaara chhuteko yaatruwaahaka basa aja bihaanai durghatanaa hundaa paancha janaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko chha

aja bihaana kariba baje pyuthaanako sarumaaraani gaaunpaalikaa paakuri bhanne sthaanamaa pyuthaanakaa laagi chhuteko naa kha nambarako basa bhirabaata khasdaa paancha janaako ghatanaasthalamai marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya pyuthaanakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raajendra pokharelale jaanakaari dinubhayo durghatanaasthalamaa ghaaiteharuko uddhaarakaa laagi khatiekaa prahari naayaba upariksaka pokharelakaa anusaara durghatanaamaa tina mahilaa ra dui janaa purusako marityu bhaeko bhae pani sanaakhata huna sakeko chhaina bhane basamaa rahekaa janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhana

ghaaitemadhye paancha janaalaai butawala ra janaalaai upachaarakaa laagi jillaa aspataala pyuthaana pathaaieko chha maritakamadhye chaara janaako sawa nikaalieko bhae pani eka janaako ajhai nikaalna nasakieko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya chitawanale dieko jaanakaarianusaara naapa numko motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai raati h bajetira durghatanaa bhaeko ho durghatanaamaa pari motarasaaikala chaalaka bharatapura mahaanagarapaalikaa sukranagara niwaasi warsiya bharata raamadaama ra unakaa chhoraa motarasaaikala pachhaadi basekaa warsiya samira raamadaamako marityu bhaeko ho

rukuma paschimako athawisakota nagarapaalikaamaa jipa durghatanaa hundaa eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha athawisakota nagarapaalikaako chhaarebagabaata gotamakotatarpha gairaheko raaja numko jipa durghatanaa bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya rukuma paschimale jaanakaari dieko chha

durghatanaamaa pari athawisakota nagarapaalikaa gotamakotakaa warsiya karna budhaako marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa prahari naayaba upariksaka raajendraprasaada dhamalaale jaanakaari dinubhayo

durghatanaamaa pari janaa ghaaite bhaekaa chhan ghaaitemadhye duiko awasthaa gambhira raheko chha nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya bhupendra wika ra nagarapaalikaa kaa warsiya prajita wikako awasthaa gambhira raheko prahariko bhanaai chha ghaaite duwailaai jillaamaa saamaanya upachaarapachhi thapa upachaarakaa laagi nepaalaganja riphara garieko chha

jhaapaabaata skule widyaarthi bokera aeko mekha numko makaalu basalaai naakha numko trakale thakkara dindaa basamaa rahekaa widyaarthi ra siksaka gari janaa ghaaite bhaekaa makawaapanura jillaa prahari kaaryaalayakaa nimitta prahari pramukha diliparaaja jhaale bataaunubhayo

neltaa jhaapaako eksesa kaaryakramaantargata pokharaamaa hune eksesa kaaryakramamaa jaana laagekaa skule widyaarthi bihaana baje durghatanaamaa parekaa hun chaalisa ghaaitemadhye eka janaako kaathamaadaun janaako bharatapura ra anya janaako hetaundaa aspataalamaa upachaara bhairaheko praharile janaaeko chha

jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya daanakaa pramukha durgaasimhale dinubhaeko jaanakaarianusaara marityu hunemaa wadaa prahari kaaryaalaya ghoraahimaa kaaryarata prahari jawaana owilaala giri rahekaa chhan giri rolpaa khungi niwaasi hun sohi motarasaaikala durghatanaamaa pari chaalaka prahari jawaana prahari jawaana wasanta adhikaari ghaaite bhaekaa chhan

ghaaite adhikaariko raapti upaksetriya aspataala ghoraahimaa upachaara bhairaheko ra uni khataraamukta raheko aspaataalale janaaeko chha aja bihaana uniharu motarasaaikala gastimaa gaeko belaa durghatanaamaa parekaa thie
jitapura simaraa upamahaanagarapaalikaa dumarawaanaamaa taataa sumoko takkarabaata aja eka janaako marityu bhaeko chha

ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya simarakaa anusaara taataa sumoko thakkarabaata sthaaniyawaasi nandu chaudhariko marityu bhaeko praharile janaaeko chha dumarawaanaabaata simaraatarpha aundai gareko naa ja num ko sumole wiparita disaatarpha jaandai gareko naa pa num ko motarasaaikalalaai thakkara dindaa chaudhari ghaaite bhaekaa thie

baa cha nambarako gaadile baa pa nambarako motarasaaikalalaai aitabaara thakkara dimdaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa motarasaaikala chaalaka dhaadina galchhi gaaunpaalikaa kaa barsiya sanabahaadura taamaanako marityu bhaeko ho
thakkarabaata ghaaite unako upachaarako kramamaa oma samaaja aspataala satumgalamaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko chha gaadi chaalakalaai praharile niyantranamaa lieko chha
paalpaako raanimahalamaa nayaan warsa manaauna gaekaa dui yuwaka kaaligandaki nadimaa aja bepattaa bhaekaa chhan

baganaasakaali gaaunpaalikaa raanimahala najikaiko kaaligandaki nadimaa bandai gareko pulanira paudi khelne kramamaa bepattaa bhaeko asthaayi prahari bita raani mahalakaa pramukha dilliraama bhattaraaile bataaunubhayo
marityu hunemaa jipamaa sawaara tanahanu risinga gaaunpaalikaa kaa bhimabahaadura mugni raheko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya nawalaparaasi purwale janaaeko chha

paschimabaata purwatarpha aundai gareko ko pa nambarako motarasaaikala aniyantrita bhai rukhamaa thokkindaa motarasaaikalako pachhaadi sawaara sunasari jillaa dharaana basne warsiya sanjiwa wiswakarmaako marityu bhaeko ho

durghatanaamaa parera gambhira ghaaite bhaekaa wiswakarmaako dharaanasthita bipi koiraalaa swaasthya wijnaana pratisthaanamaa upachaarakaa kramamaa gaeraati baje marityu bhaeko ilaakaa prahari kaaryaalaya belawaarikaa prahari niriksaka raamaji katwaalale jaanakaari dinubhayo
durghatanaamaa motarasaaikalakaa chaalaka dharaana kai warsiya wijaya wiswakarmaa gambhira ghaaite bhaekaale uhaanko dharaanamai upachaara bhairaheko chha

aphnai gharamaa kaama garne kramamaa laageko chatyaanale gambhira ghaaite hunubhaekaa uhaanko nobela aspataala wiraatanagaramaa upachaarako kramamaa marityu bhaeko jillaa prahari kaaryaalaya moranale janaaeko chha
